ndrāvityasādhutvaṃ puruṣarāja ityarthānyatvaṃ kauśāmbinirityanarthakatvam | yastvagnīndrāviti kvacitprayogaḥ sa cchāndaso 'gnervā 'bhyarhitatvasya vivakṣayeti mantavyam | tulyakakṣārthapratītāvindrāgnīpadameva vyavasthitam | nanvihāpi kramānyatvādamantratvaṃ syāt | tadevārthaparatve sati tadavināśe tu kiṃ nimittamiti na vidmaḥ | tena mantraprasiddhau vākyaniyamādityapi sūtram | atha vā 'stvaprakaraṇādhītavākyaniyamāt | na hyarthābhidhāne 'nyadīyasyā ' 'tmīyasya ca viśeṣaḥ |

atha vā mantrapauruṣeyavākyayostulye 'rthābhidhānasāmarthye mantravākyaniyamo 'dṛṣṭārthaḥ | atha vā 'nekadhyānādismaraṇopāyaprasaṅge vākyaniyamāt | na hi dṛṣṭe 'rthe mantrasya dhyānādervā kaścidviśeṣa ityadṛṣṭārthatā |

na jai. sū. ( 3-8-8 ) |hyavidvānvihito 'stītyavaśyaṃ tāvadagnīdhā ' 'tmīyāḥ padārthāḥ prāgeva karmaprakramādavagantavyāḥ | tatra praiṣaḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇanyāyenārthaṃ jñāpayitumaśaknuvannadṛṣṭārtho bhavati | atha smārako mantra ityucyate | tadapi nāsti | brāhmaṇajñānāmyāsapāṭavanimittasaṃskārādeva tatsiddheḥ | saṃskārābhivyaktiheturapi pūrvapadārthasamāptirbrāhmaṇameva vā bhaviṣyati nārtho mantraiḥ | tatra yaducyate saṃskāraviśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti nāsāvadṛṣṭādanyaḥ saṃbhavatyataḥ pūrvapakṣāpattiḥ | yadi hi pratīto 'pyartho naiva dṛṣṭaṃ sādhayati tato yattaddūramapi gatvā 'vaśyaṃ kalpanīyaṃ taduccāraṇādeva varamiti |

na catuḥśṛṅgādi kiṃcitkarma tatsaṃbandhi vā prakṛtau vikṛtau vā vidyate | yadyapi ca guṇavādena kiṃcitsyāttathā 'pi tadanuṣṭhānābhāvānna tatsmṛtyā kāryam | na ca jñāyate
kva pradeśe prayujyatāmiti | tatra mantrapāṭhakramānurodhenoccāraṇamāpatatīti siddhaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ | mā mā hiṃsīrmā mā saṃtāptamityādīni vedihavirdhānādiviṣayatvādacetane 'rthabandhanādityatrāpyudāharaṇam | iha tvaprasaktāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ pratiṣedhānarthakyam |

oṣadhe trāyasva, śṛṇota grāvāṇa iti ca saṃbodhanaṃ kāryaniyogābhimukhyakaraṇārtham | na cācetanasyā ' 'bhimukhyaṃ saṃbhavati | na ca paśutrāṇe prātaranuvākaśravaṇe vā praiṣeṇa pravṛttirupapadyata ityānarthakyamarthavivakṣāyām |

dyutvamantarikṣatvaṃ cāditerekānekatvaṃ ca rudrasya vipratiṣiddham | na caiṣa vipratiṣiddho 'rthaḥ karmaupayikaḥ | kathaṃ vā 'ditirdevatā 'ntarikṣaṃ dyaurvā bhavet | na ca stutyarthatayā 'pi hetudvayaṃ parihartuṃ śakyaṃ brāhmaṇe hi vidhiśeṣabhūtāḥ stutayo 'rthavantyo bhavanti | mantrastutistvaprayojanatvānnā ' 'dartavyā |

svādhyāyādhyayanasya karmārthatvādyatkarmaṇyupayokṣyate tadabhyasitavyaṃ taccaivaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ santo vṛddhāḥ śiṣyānakṣarāvadhāraṇa eva pravartayanti saṃnihite 'pyarthe na tadvacanābhyāse |
tenāvaśyaṃ teṣāmuccāraṇamevāṅgatvenābhipretamiti |

kecitpadārthā jñānenāvijñeyāḥ | keṣāṃ cittu vākyārtha eva na jñāyate | na ca mantrārthaḥ sattāmātreṇopakaroti kriyāvelāyāmasmaryamāṇa iti yadekāntena śakye kartumuccāraṇaṃ tadeva kāryamityavadhāryate |

arthaprakāśanapakṣe yasya yo 'rthaḥ sa eva tena prakāśayitavyaḥ | keciccānityairakarmāṅgabhūtaiścārthairarthavanto mantrā lakṣyante yathā kiṃ te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāva iti | ayaṃ hi dṛ̣dhenādhyetṝṇāṃ smaraṇena viśvāmitrasyā ' 'rṣaṃ gamyate | tena kila karmārthaṃ dhanaṃ prārthayamānenendro 'bhihitaḥ | trailokyādhipate yāḥ kīkaṭeṣu janapadeṣu gāvastāstava kiṃ kurvanti | te hi nāstikāḥ kiṃ kratuneti vadanto na kiṃcitkarmānutiṣṭhanti | ataśca tā nā ' 'śiraṃ somasaṃskārārthaṃ duhate na dharmaṃ tapanti | na dharmatapane payodānena sādhanībhavanti | tasmātpramagandasya kīkaṭādhipateryadvedo—dhanaṃ tadasmākaṃ naicāśākhaṃ nagaramābhara | hagrahorbhaśchandasīti bhakāraḥ | atha vā 'smānprati tadbibhṛhi dhāraya poṣaya cetyetanno maghavanrandhayā—sādhayāsmākamiti | chāndasaṃ dīrghatvam | yadyetadvivakṣitaṃ tathā satyādimadarthābhidhānādvedasya kṛtrimatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate | na cānyo mantrārthaḥ śakyate vaktumapratīteḥ | ato 'rthasadasadbhāvāvanādṛtyākṣaroccāraṇaṃ phalavadāśrayaṇīyamiti || 31 ||

mantroccāraṇaṃ tāvadakṣaragrahaṇena nirākāṅkṣīkṛtaṃ na sākṣātkratvaṅgatvaṃ pratipadyate | akṣarāṇāṃ ca dravyavadanitikartavyatātmakatvātprakaraṇenāgrahaṇam | evaṃ padārthajñānasya vākyārthapratyayena nairākāṅkṣyādagrahaṇam | vākyārthapratyayastvakṛtārthaḥ prakaraṇe viparivartamānaḥ kriyātmakatvātprayogavacanākāṅkṣitaḥ karmasamavetānuṣṭhāsyamānārtharamṛtiphalatvenetikartavyatā bhavati | tatrādṛṣṭakalpanānimittābhāvaḥ | samāmnānānyathānupapattyā hi tatkalpyeta nopapanne 'rthavattve | yadyapi ca tatkalpanāvasaro bhavettathā 'pi kāmaṃ vākyārthapratyayādeva na tvaupayi 'kārthapratītinirākāṅkṣādvākyāta | avaśyaṃ ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayorviniyujyamānasya pramāṇamupanyasitavyam | iha ca prakaraṇādadṛṣṭārthatā liṅgācca dṛṣṭārthatā | na ca prakaraṇamaśakye 'rthe viniyoktumarhatītyekāntenaitadāpatati yacchaknuyāttanmantreṇa kuryāditi | na cāsāvadṛṣṭaṃ śaknotīti laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ vidyate | tasmādubhayorliṅgaprakaraṇayordṛṣṭārthaprayogeṇaikavākyatā | evaṃ ca sati yājñikaprayogaprasiddherna mūlāntarakalpanākleśo bhaviṣyati | ataḥ svābhāvikamevārthaprādhānyavāsthitam | naivamiti | na dṛṣṭo 'rtho nirvṛtta ityetāvataiva tādarthyamavasīyate | puruṣārthānupayogena svādhyāyādhyanavidherānarthakyāt | na ca buddhaśāstrāvidyamānavacanācetanārthabandhanānmantrārthopayogaḥ | tatra yadi dūre 'pyadṛṣṭakalpanāto na mucyāmahe tato 'tikramakāraṇābhāvāduccāraṇādeva kalpanīyam |

ubhayavādisiddhatvāduccāraṇakartavyatāyāstatprabhavatvāccādṛṣṭakalpanasya | tatrocyate yajñe yajñāṅgaprakāśanameva prayojanamiti | yadyapi lokavattairna saṃvyavahārastathā 'pi tatsva
rūpaprakāśanamātramevānuṣṭhātṝṇāmupakariṣyati | ataśca yāvanmātramevānaupayikaṃ saṃbodhanādi kāmaṃ tanna vivakṣyeta na tu tadvaśena sarvameva tyaktavyaṃ na hyaikarūpyaṃ nāma kenacinniyatam | tasmādyathādarśanābhyupagamādbarhirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyevamādīnāṃ tāvadavihatamarthaprādhānyam | tāṃ caturbhirādatta ityatrāpi vadāmaḥ || 32 ||

yadyapi mantrāḥ prāptāḥ sāmarthyena tathā 'pi catuḥsaṃkhyāmādāne vidhāsyati | tatrāruṇaikahāyanīnyāyena parasparaniyame sati mantragatacatuḥsaṃkhyāviśiṣṭamādānaṃ coditaṃ samuccayādṛte kartuṃ na śakyata ityarthātsamuccayaphalam | atha vā yāvalliṅgānumitāḥ śrutayaḥ pratimantraṃ kalpayitumārabhyante tāvadanena pratyakṣavacanena catuḥsaṃkhyāviśiṣṭāste vihitāstenāprāptavidhireva vacanam | tatra tu vinā 'pyetena mantreṣvarthātprāptavatsu tatparatve mandaṃ phalamityananyalabhyacatuḥsaṃkhyārthaṃ tasyopadeśaḥ || 33 ||
yāvaddhi mantrāmnānamanavagataprayojanaṃ prakaraṇī cākṛtārthastāvadyattatsiddhayarthaṃ kalpyate tatsarvaṃ vaidikaṃ bhavati | nairākāṅkṣyottarakālaṃ tu kalpitamapi pauruṣeyatvādapramāṇaṃ syāt |

na ca śrutimakalpayitvā liṅgādeḥ svātantryeṇa prāmāṇyamiti vakṣyate | tadetadāha | sati ca vākye liṅgaṃ viniyojakaṃ taccāsya nāstīti | yadaiva hi prakaraṇādanena yajeta raśanāṃ vā gṛhṇīyāditi kalpayitumiṣyate tadaivāśvābhidhānīmityanenāpahāro mantrasya | yadapi naivaṃ saṃbandha ityādatta iti kathaṃ tarhītyaśvābhidhānāmiti | tatkārakasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavātkriyayaiva
saha sāmānyābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam | tasmānnā ' 'dānamātre vidhīyate kiṃ tarhyaśvābhidhānīviśiṣṭe | atha vā phalataḥ paścāttanakārakasaṃbandha upanyasyate | sarvathā darśaśāstratā nāsti | yadi hi yadeva mantravacanātprāpnuyāttadeva pratyakṣavacanenocyate tato vayamupālabhyemahi | nanvevamaprāptavidhirevāyaṃ saṃjāta iti na vaktavyaṃ parisaṃkhyeti | phalenaivamabhidhānādadoṣaḥ | sarvatra hi parisaṃkhyāśabdādevakārādvā vinā na śrutyā parisaṃkhyā niyamo vocyate vidhireva tvevaṃjātīyakasya phalenaivaṃ vyapadeśaḥ | kastarhi vidhiniyamaparisaṃkhyānāṃ bhedaḥ | ucyate | vidhiratyantamaprāpte niyamaḥ pākṣike sati | tatra cānyatra ca prāpte parisaṃkhyeti kīrtyate || vidhireva hi kenacidviśeṣeṇaivaṃ bhidyate | tatra yo 'tyantamaprāpto na ca prāpsyati prāgvacanādityavagamyate tatra niyogaḥ śuddha eva vidhiryathā vrīhīnprokṣatīti | yatra tu prāgvacanātpākṣikī prāptiḥ saṃbhāvyate tatrāprāptipakṣaṃ pūrayanyo vidhiḥ pravartate sa niyantṛtvānniyama ityucyate yathā vrīhīnavahantīti | taṇḍulaniṣpattyarthākṣepādeva tatsiddherna tatprāptimātraṃ vidheḥ phalaṃ kiṃ tarhyaprāptāṃśapūraṇam | tadaprāptipakṣe ca taṇḍulairupāyāntarāṇyākṣipyeran, pūraṇe tu sati yā teṣāṃ nivṛttirasāvarthānna vākyāt | na ca tadvāraṇaṃ niyamaḥ | parisaṃkhyā hi tathā syāt | pratyāsannāṃ vā 'vahantiniyatatāmutsṛjya nānyanivṛttiphalakalpanāvasaraḥ | tatprasaktidvārā tvavahanteraniyatirāsīditi niyamāntargataivārthānnivṛttirgamyate | na ca prāpte sati vidhirayaṃ pravṛtto yenāsyānyanivṛttyarthatā kalpyeta | prāgeva tu pravartamānenārthasya prāpakaśaktinirodhādanyāprāptiḥ kṛtā sā cārthalabhyeti na tayaiva vyapadiśyate | yaḥ punaḥ prāṅniyogāttatra cānyatra ca prāpnuyāditi saṃbhāvyate yatra vā yaccānyacca sā parisaṃkhyā yathā 'traivodāhṛte yathā ca gṛhamedhīye pañcame pakṣe | atrāpi ca na prāpte satyeṣā pravartate prāpakasya śāstrasyānanumitatvāt | kathaṃ tarhi | yadyetadvākyaṃ nābhaviṣyattata enaṃ prāpsyaditi | sarvasya pratyakṣasya vākyasya nānumānikavākyapratibandhamātraṃ phalamiṣyate | kiṃ hi tena paṭhitena yasyānyato 'pyarthaḥ sidhyati tadarthaṃ gardabharaśanānivṛttiḥ phalaṃ kalpyate | tenaivaṃ kalpyate kṛtvācintānyāyena yadi nāmaivaṃ vākyaṃ na bhavettataḥ kīdṛśamanuṣṭhānaṃ syāt | tatra mantraprāptistāvadekāntena sidhyedaśvābhidhānyāṃ tadvadeva tu gardabharaśanāyāmapi prasajyeta |
yadā tvanena vākyena pratyakṣeṇa nairākāṅkṣyādaviśeṣaviniyogasamarthavākyānumānaṃ niṣiddhaṃ tadā kevalāśvābhidhānīviṣayatvasiddhirityapaunaruktyādarthavadvākyam || 34 ||

yadyapi pradeśāntarasthatvānmantravidhānaṃ na stūyate tathā 'pi prathanavidhānāttatprarocanayā ca sakalaṃ vākyamarthavat | tasya hyetadevotpattivākyam | nanu ca puroḍāśānyathānupapattiprāptatvātprathanaṃ na vidhātavyam | naitanniyogataḥ prāpnoti | drutataraṃ hi piṣṭamaprathitamapi pratheta | vidhāne tu sati tādṛśaṃ kartavyaṃ yena prathayitavyaṃ bhavati | evaṃ cādhvaryukartṛkatā 'pi sidhyati | paṭhyamānaṃ hyādhvaryavasamākhyāṃ labdhvā kartṛviśeṣaṃ niyacchati | arthaprāptaṃ tvasamākhyātatvānna niyāmakaṃ syāt | evamarthaṃ ca yadyapyekāntato 'rthātprāpnuyāttathā 'pi vākyenaiva prāpayitavyam | tasmādupapannā prathanastutiḥ | evamapi yajñapatimeva tatprathayatītyanena stutau siddhāyāṃ mantragrahaṇamanarthakam | na | mantrasyaiva stutyarthamupādānāt, prathanaṃ kartavyaṃ tasya hi kriyamāṇasyāyaṃ mantraḥ sādhanaṃ bhavati | tatra coru te yajñapatiḥ prathatāmityetānyakṣarāṇi prayujyante tathā sati yajñapatiḥ prathito bhavatīti guṇo labhyate | kimetadevāsya phalamiti netyāha | stutyarthameva taddravyasaṃskārakarmasviti nyāyāt | yadyapyatra karaṇamantrābhihitatvātphalaṃ kalpyate tathā 'pi brāhmaṇe tāvattatsaṃkīrtanamekāntena stāvakam | mantro 'pi tu liṅgaviniyojyo na phalakalpanāyai prabhavati | karaṇavibhaktiviniyuktānāṃ hi sakalopayogānyathānupapattyā phalasādhanatā yuktā liṅgānumitā punaḥ śrutirākāṅkṣāvaśena kriyāprakāśanamātraviniyogāyaiva jñāyate | tenaivaṃjātīyako
mantro 'pi pradhānaphalasaṃkīrtanātmikā stutirevābhyupagantavyā | kathamasati prathana iti kasyāyaṃ praśnaḥ kiṃ vidhyuddeśavartinaḥ puroḍāśaprathanasyāthārthavādagatasya yajñapatiprathanasyeti | dvidhā 'pi cāyuktaṃ puroḍāśaprathanaṃ tāvadvidhīyamānatvādeva na praṣṭavyam | na ca mantrābhidhānāttasyāstitvaṃ kiṃ tarhi svarūpasadbhāvādityuttaramapyasaṃbaddham | atha punaritarārthavādanyāyena kathamarudatītivatpraśnaḥ | tathā 'pyuttaramasaṃbaddham | mantreṇādhvaryuḥ puroḍāśamiti puroḍāśena saṃbadhyate na yajamānena | tasmādagrantha iti kecit | ubhayathā 'pi tvidamaduṣṭam | astu tāvatpuroḍāśaprathane | tatra hi yājñikānāṃ keṣāṃcidayaṃ mantraḥ kṛtvā prathanamabhimarśane prayujyate so 'yaṃ svasiddhāntena pṛcchati kathamasati—vṛtte prathane prayujyamānenānena prathayatīti |

tatrābhyupetyavādenottaraṃ mantrābhidhānāditi | yadyapi prathanaṃ prathamakṛtatvānnāsti mantreṇa nu sattayocyata ityupapannaḥ śabdārthaḥ | atha vā sarvaprayojakavyāpārāṇāṃ prayojyavyāpārapūrvakatvamartharūpeṇa sthitamiti śabdairapi tathaiva pravartitavyam | iha ca stutiviṣayasiddhayarthaṃ prathayatītyetadvidhīyata ityuktam | tatrā ' 'ha nāyaṃ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati viṣayānupapatteḥ | prayojakavyāpāro hi pratīyamānastadgocaraḥ syāt | sa cānupāttaprayojyavyāpāratvānna pratīyate tena yathā yajetetyanukte yājayatīti nocyate tatheha prathetetyanukte prathayatīti na vācyam | na ceha puroḍāśaḥ pratheta tena vā prathitavyamityupādānamasti | tasminnasati prathayatītyanupapannam | tadupapādayati mantrābhidhānāditi pratīkagṛhītamantropāttaprayojyavyāpāraṃ hi brāhmaṇaṃ prathayatīti vidhatte | yaśca prathasveti brūta ityanena puroḍāśakartṛkāṃ kriyāmadhvaryuḥ preṣyatītyetaddarśayati | yadyapi ca saṃbhāvyamānakriyāṇāṃ prayojyānāmanupādāyāpi vyāpāraṃ śabdena prayojakavyāpāraḥ sidhyatītyetadapyuttaraṃ saṃbhavati tathā 'pi tūttaravibhavādupādānapūrvakataivoktā | atha vā 'stu yajamānaprathane kathamasatīti sarvastutīnāṃ kiṃcicchabdagatamarthagataṃ vā ' 'lambanamuktam | tadatra kiṃnibandhanā stutiriti | tadabhidhīyate | mantroktamarthamāśritya stutiḥ pravartiṣyate | mantreṇādhvaryuḥ puroḍāśaṃ brūta iti na puroḍāśaprathanopādānābhiprāyaṃ kiṃ tarhi puroḍāśaṃ bravīti, uru te yajñapatiḥ prathatāmiti | prathasvetyapītikaraṇaḥ prabhṛtyartho na śabdaḥ padārthatāyai | yaśca prathasveti brūta ityapi tadādyartha eva | prathatāmiti brūta ityarthaḥ | yaścaivaṃ brūte sa prathayatyanenaiva | guṇavādāt | atha vā tadācaṣṭa ityevaṃ mukhyameva prathayatītyarthamāśritya prathamabuddhayā siddhā stutiḥ || 35 ||

div.div: adṛṣṭārthoccāraṇavādino 'pi tanniyamādaparamavaśyaṃ kalpanīyamadṛṣṭaṃ tanmamāpi pratyāyananiyamādbhaviṣyatītyavirodhaḥ | etena mantratvādiniyamaḥ pratyuktaḥ | satsvapyupāyāntareṣu viśiṣṭānupūrvīkamantraviśeṣāmnānādupāyāntaranivṛttau niyamādṛṣṭamātrakalpanayā siddhamarthābhidhānam || 36 || `

div.p: yeyaṃ saṃpraiṣe agnīdagnīnityatra buddhabodhanāsaṃbhavādabhidhānakarmagarhā 'bhihitā sā 'pyanupālambhaḥ | smaraṇasaṃskārārthatvāt | buddhīnāṃ hi kṣaṇikatvātsvādhyāyakālotpannānāṃ na prayogakālaṃ yāvadavasthānaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ kena ciddhayānādinā 'nusaṃdhāne kartavye mantro niyamyate |
atha vā saṃskāratvāditi | yadi hi bodha evāvatiṣṭhate tato 'navakāśatvaṃ bhavediha tu tadīyasaṃskāramātrāvasthānāttadabhivyaktidvāreṇāsti jñānotpattyavasara iti na mantrānarthakyam || 37 ||

catvāri śṛṅgeti rūpakadvāreṇa yāgastutiḥ karmakāla utsāhaṃ karoti | hautre tvayaṃ viṣu
gavāmayanāntargata ekāho viṣuvāniti |vati hoturājye viniyuktaḥ | tasya cā ' 'gneyatvādahnaścā ' 'dityadevatatvasaṃstavādādityarū
peṇāgnistutirupavarṇyate | tatra catvāri śṛṅgeti divasayāmānāṃ grahaṇam | trayo asya pādā iti śītoṣṇavarṣākālāḥ | dve śīrṣe ityayanābhiprāyam | sapta hastā ityaśvastutiḥ | tridhā baddha iti savanābhiprāyeṇa | vṛṣabha iti vṛṣṭihetutvena stutiḥ | roravīti stanayitnunā | sarvalokaprasiddhermahāndevo martyānāviveśetyutsāhakaraṇopakāreṇa sarvapuruṣahṛdayānupraveśāt | evamanena mārgeṇāsti tāvaddharmasādhanasmṛtiḥ || 38 ||

aditirdyauraditiriti | nātra dyutvādīni vivakṣitāni kiṃ tarhyaditau prakāśayiyitavyāyāmavidyamānavipratiṣiddhadharmopādānaṃ stutyartham | guṇavādena tvaudumbarādhikaraṇavatsaṃvādo yojayitavyaḥ || 39 ||

yadyapi pūrvapakṣe 'yamabhiprāyo nopanyastastathā 'pi saṃbhavādupanyasyate | yadi hi svādhyāyakāle 'rthavacanamupayujyeta tatastadāśrīyeta na tvevamasti karmabhirasaṃyogāt | tadanabhyāsastu prokṣaṇādivatsaukaryāt || 40 ||

yattu paraṃ kāraṇamavijñeyatvamuktaṃ tadayuktam | sata evārthasya puruṣāparādhenāvijñānāt | tatra cārthaprakaraṇasūktadevatārṣanigamaniruktavyākaraṇajñānānyadhigamopāyāḥ | teṣāṃ hyevamarthameva paripālanam | yathaiva ca vyākaraṇena nityapadānvākhyāne kriyamāṇe lopavikārādīnāmupāyatvenopādānamavyutpannāśca taireva padotpādanamiva manyante | tathā 'tra nityavākyārtha
pratipattāvārṣopākhyānamanityavadābhāsamānamupāyatvaṃ pratipadyate | tatra yathā kaścidvyācakṣāṇaḥ padatadavayavādīnāṃ cetanatvamivādhyasya viśeṣabādhādivyāpāraṃ nirūpayatyetenaivamukto 'yamevaṃ pratyāheti | yathā ca pūrvapakṣottarapakṣavādinau vyavahārārthaṃ kalpitāvevamṛṣyārṣeyaviviṣayā kalpanā | atha vā paramārthenaivedamṛṣibhistathoktaṃ na tu sa mantrastaireva kṛtastadānīṃ vā puruṣāntareṣvasanneva teṣāmāvirbhūtaḥ | kiṃ tarhi yathā 'dyatve 'pi kaścitprakṛtārthavivakṣāyāṃ tadarthaṃ vākyamupāditsamānastadarthasarūpaṃ mantraṃ ślokaṃ vā 'nyadīyaṃ smṛtvā svavākyasthāne prayuṅkte tatpratyayena cānye tadarthamavadhārayantyevamihāpi vedārthavidbhistadvāsitāntaḥkaraṇairmṛgvādibhirātmīyavyavahāreṣu śrutisāmānyarūpeṇa viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanārthaṃ mantrāḥ prayuktāstadbalena cāsmadādīnāṃ tadanurūpā 'nityārthapratipattirmavati | pratyayadṛḍhatvārthameva cā ' 'rṣasmaraṇam | tatraivamupākhyānaṃ smaranti | yathā kila bhūtāṃśo nāma kaścidṛṣirjarāmaraṇanirākaraṇārthī sṛṇyevetyevamādinā sūktenāścinau stutavān | bhūtāṃśo aśvinoḥ kāmamaprāiti cānte saṃkīrtanāttasyā ' 'rṣamāśvinaṃ sūktamiti ca dyotitam | tatra sṛṇiraṅkuśaḥ saraṇasādhanatvāttamarhantau tatra vā sādhū iti sṛṇyāvarthātkuñjarau | ākāraśchandasi dvivacanādeśaḥ | tāvivātyarthaṃ jṛmbhamāṇāvaṣṭāṅgapraharaṇavyāpṛtau jarbharī | turpharītū hiṃsantau | nitośatirvadhakarmā tatkāriṇau naitośau—yoddhārau tāviva turpharī—tvaramāṇā hiṃsakāviti vā | parpharīkāśobhāyuktau | udanyatiḥ pipāsārthaḥ, tatra jātau, udanyajau prāvṛṣijau cātakau jemanā—udakavantau jemaśabdātpāmādivihito matvarthīyo napratyayaḥ | tau yathodakalābhena mattau bhavatastathā yau maderū tau me jarāyumarāyu jarāmaraṇadharmakamarthāccharīramajaramamaraṃ ca kurutamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ | tenaivaṃ vākyārtho yāvaṅkuśacoditāviva kuñjarau sarvato jṛmmamāṇau śatrūṇāṃ nihantārau bhavato hiṃsrāviva ca hiṃsanavyāpṛtau dākṣyeṇa ca śobhete cātakāviva codakalābhena madātprīyete tāvubhāvapi jarāmaraṇayoḥ kupitāvivājaratvasyāmaratvasya vā prītāvajaramamaraṃ me śarīraṃ vidhattāmiti | “amyaksā ta” ityagastyārṣaṃ tena kilendro 'maratvaṃ dhanaṃ prārthitastathā coparitanyāmṛci “tvaṃ tū na indra taṃ rayiṃ dā” iti śrūyate | tadevāsyāmṛcyanuṣaṅgeṇa draṣṭavyam | iyaṃ ca cchandomadvitīye 'hani marutvatīye śastre viniyuktā | tatrāmyagityamāśabdo 'vyayaṃ sāhityavācī yato 'mātya iti bhavati sahāñcatītyamyaksā ta indra, ṛṣṭirāyudhaviśeṣaḥ pāṇikṣepyaḥ, asme iti—asmākaṃ sanemi—purāṇam | amvaṃ—toyaṃ maruto junanti—kṣipanti | agniścidityupamārtho hi sma, atase—śuṣkatṛṇe śuśukvān—dīpta
vān āpa iva dvīpaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi—annādyāni | vākyārthe tu prathamatṛtīyayordvitīyacaturthayośca padānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ | tatra setyetadākṣipto yacchabdastṛtīyapāde kalpyate | śuṣkatṛṇe dīpto 'gniriva yā lakṣyate tava sahacāriṇī nityamṛṣṭistava vallabhā sā tāvattvatprasādenāsmākameva | ye 'pyamī purāṇaṃ jalaṃ vṛṣṭirūpeṇa vikṣipanta āpa iva dvīpamannādyāni dhārayanti tava priyasakhāste 'pyasmākameva sa tvamevaṃ sādhāraṇadravyaḥ sannamaratvaṃ na kevalaṃ dehi | ekayā pratidhā 'pivaditīndrasyaiva stutiḥ | ekena prayatnenāpibatsākaṃ—yaugapadyena, sarāṃsi—pātrāṇi somasya pūrṇāni indraḥ kāṇukā—kāmayamānaḥkāmukaśabdasya cchāndaso varṇavyatyayaḥ | ākārastu vibhaktyādeśaḥ | atha vā kāntakānītyādayo niruktoktāḥ kāṇukāśabdavikalpā yojanīyāḥ | tadevaṃ sarvatra kenacitprakāreṇābhiyuktānāmarthotprekṣopapatteḥ prasiddhatarārthābhāve 'pi vedasya tadabhyupagamātsiddhamarthavattvam || 41 ||

paraṃ tu śrutisāmānyamātramiti | yajamānastāvatprārthayitā indraśca prārthyamānaḥ sarvadā 'sti | kīkaṭā nāma yadyapi janapadāstathā 'pi nityāḥ | atha vā sarvalokasthāḥ kṛṣaṇāḥ kīkaṭāḥ | pramagandaḥ—kusīdavṛttiḥ sa hi prabhūtataramāgamiṣyatītyevaṃ dadāti | nīcāśākhaḥ—ṣaṇḍhastadīyaṃ dhanaṃ naicāśākham | tacca sarvamayajñāṅgabhūtaṃ teṣāṃ karmaṇyapravṛttestadasmākamāhareti | śeṣaṃ gatārtham || 42 ||

āgneyyetyagninā devatayā liṅgena tadabhidhānasāmarthyena vā ya upadeśaḥ sa tadarthārhatāṃ mantrasya dyotayati | devatātaddhito hyeṣa smaryate yaṃ cārthaprādhānyena mantraḥ prakāśayati sā tasya devatā nābhidhānamātreṇa | ekadevatye 'pi mantre 'nekadevatāntarapadaprayoge sati taddevatyavyapadeśābhāvāt | prādhānyābhidhānaṃ ca nārthaparatvena vinopapadyate || 43 ||

ūhadarśanaṃ na mātā varghata iti | arthe ca puṣṭyādivṛddheḥ pratyakṣatvātpratiṣedhāsaṃbhavā
dānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣviti śabde vijñāyate | tatrāpi sthaulyādivṛddhayasaṃbhavādadhikārthavācitvena dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | sa cārthaparatve sarvapaśuviśeṣaṇamātrādyupāditsāyāṃ satyāmavakalpate | yā cānyapadavṛddhisadbhāvapratītiriyaṃ ca
arthaparatve 'vakalpata ityanuṣaṅgaḥ | | yadyapi mātṛprabhṛtīnāṃ pārārthyātsaṃbandhibhedādeva ca bhedasiddheranūhyatvaṃ sadevānuvadati tathā 'pi nyāyāvagatānūhasaṃkīrtanānnyāyarahiteṣūhasaṃpratyayātprakṛtau vivakṣitārthatā vijñāyate | anyathā tu tadadṛṣṭamavikṛtaireva sādhyeta | tathā yadyapyanyadevatyaḥ paśurāgneyyevamanotā kāryetyūhaprāptidarśanaṃ, evamusrāṇāṃ vapānāmityevamādīnāṃ yathārthamūhitānāmevā ' 'mnānamapi vivakṣitārthaṃ bhaviṣyati | itarathā prākṛtapadatyāge 'nyakalpane cādṛṣṭadvayaṃ kalpyeta || 44 ||

vidhireva ca brāhmaṇābhidhastatra tatra paryāyairavayavānvākhyānanirvacanādibhiścārthaprakāśanaparatvaṃ darśayati | arthānāśrayaṇe hi sarvaṃ tadanarthakaṃ syāt | tasmādvivakṣitavacanā mantrā iti siddham || 45 ||

evaṃ tāvadvidhyarthavādamantranāmadheyātmakasya vedasya dharmaṃ pratyupayogaḥ sādhita idānīṃ pauruṣeyīṣu smaryamāṇārthāvadhiṣu manvādipraṇītanibandhanāsu smṛtiṣvanibaddheṣu cā ' 'cāreṣu cintā | tatra kiṃcidudāhṛtya vicāraḥ kartavya ityaṣṭakādismaraṇāni manvādisthāni
tadgranthasamarpitāni pramāṇāpramāṇavicāraviṣayatvenodāhriyante | saṃdehahetuścābhidhīyate |

manvādivacanaṃ smṛtyapekṣaṃ smṛtiśca mūlapramāṇāpekṣiṇīti naikasyāpi vedavannirapekṣaprāmāṇyaniścayaḥ | yatastu vedavādināmevāvibhāgenāvicchinnapāramparyaparigrahādāṛdhyamato nāprāmāṇyādhyavasānamiti yuktaḥ saṃdehaḥ | tatra pūrvapakṣavādī vadati naiṣāṃ prāmāṇyamevāpekṣitavyamiti | kutaḥ |

sarvasmaraṇāni hi pratyakṣādyavagate 'rthe tadānurūpyeṇopajāyamānānyarthaṃ samarthayanti | tadihāṣṭakādīnāṃ svargādisādhyasādhanabhāvaṃ pratyakṣādīni tāvanna gṛhṇantīti sādhitam | śabdo 'pi yathā 'gnihotrādiṣu pratyakṣeṇopalabhyate naivaṃ mantrāḥ |
śabdasya tāvadekameva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam | sa cettenānavagamyamāno 'pyamtītyucyate tato varaṃ dharmāstitvameva niṣpramāṇakamabhyupagatamiti |
yathaiva dharme saṃbandhādarśanānna kiṃcilliṅgaṃ kramate tathā 'ṣṭakādiśrutāvapi |

lg.l: na vā ' 'gamena tadbodho nityena kṛtakena vā |

div.p:
yadyapyaindriyakatvādaṣṭakādismṛtīnāṃ pauruṣeyāgamagamyatvaṃ saṃbhavati | tathā 'pi vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādaśraddheyavacaneṣu puruṣeṣvanadhyavasānam | dṛśyante hyanāgamikānapyarthānāgamikatvādhyāropeṇa kecidadyatve 'pyabhidadhānāḥ | tena manvādibhirapi kimaṣṭakāśrutīrupalabhya vedamūlatvaṃ svanibandhanānāṃ pratijñātamutānupalabhyaiva śraddheyavākyatvārthamiti duṣṭapuruṣākulitacetasāṃ bhavati saṃdehaḥ | tāvatā ca prāmāṇyavighātaḥ | nityasya vacanasyā ' 'dimatsmaraṇamūlapratipādane vyāpāra eva nāsti | na ca mantraliṅgāni svayaṃ mūlatvaṃ pratipadyante |
vidhiśūnyatvāt | na ca mūlāntaraṃ nyāyāgataṃ sūcayanti | anyaparatvāt | na ca sarveṣāṃ smṛtipraṇayināmavigānam
yaducyate dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāddāropasaṃgrahaḥ | na tanmama mataṃ yasmāttatrā ' 'tmā jāyate svayam || ityādinā vigānadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ | | yena pauruṣeyāgamabalādupalabdhapūrvaśrutimūlatvaṃ syāt |

lg.l: na ca vijñāyate vākyaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tairnirūpitam |

div.p: yadi hyetadekāntena gamyeta yathāvidhi vākyānyeva manvādibhirupalabdhānīti | tataḥ kā 'pi kalpanā syādadyatve 'pyanyaparārthavādādivacanebhyo 'pi bhrāmyantaḥ puruṣā dṛśyante | tena teṣvapyāśaṅkā bhavati | mṛtasākṣikavyavahāravacca pralīnaśākhāmūlatvakalpanāyāṃ yasmai yadrocate sa tatpramāṇīkuryāt | tasmānnā ' 'gamenāpi mūlopalabdhiḥ ||

yadi hi śrutikalpanena vinā smṛtirnopapadyate tataḥ samyaṅmūlā syāt | saṃbhavati tu svapnamūlatvena tenānaikāntyādarthāpatteḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya vā 'navakāśaḥ | tasmādanupalabdhigocarāpannāyāṃ śrutau satsvapi mūlāntareṣvabhipretamūlābhāvānnirmūlatvābhidhānam | nanu ye vidurevamitikartavyatāka evaṃphalakaścāsau padārthaḥ kartavya iti | atha vā ye kartavyo 'sāvitītthaṃ viduste tathā vijānantastādṛśāḥ kathamivāsmānvipralabdhuṃ na kartavyo 'sāviti vadeyuḥ | nanvanya evaṃ vadanti kartavya ityanye na vā kartavya ityāhuḥ | kathamanyatvaṃ yadā teṣāmapyevamayaṃ smaryata iti kathite bhavatyevaṃ pratipattiḥ | atha vā ye manvādayo vidurakartavyo 'yaṃ padārtha iti kathamiva te vinā 'parādhena lokaṃ vañcayituṃ vadiṣyanti kartavya evāyamiti | smaraṇānupapattyeti | ye tāvanmanvādibhyo 'rvāñcaḥ puruṣāsteṣāṃ yajjñānaṃ tattāvadanavagatapūrvārthatvānna smṛtiḥ | manvādīnāmapi yadi prathamaṃ kiṃ citpramāṇaṃ saṃbhāvyate tataḥ smaraṇaṃ bhavennānyathā | kasmātpunaḥ putraṃ duhitaraṃ vā 'tikramya vandhyādauhitrodāharaṇaṃ kṛtam | sthānatulyatvāt | putrādisthānīyaṃ hi manvādeḥ pūrvavijñānaṃ
dauhitrasthānīyaṃ smaraṇamataśca yathā duhiturabhāvaṃ parāmṛśya dauhitrasmṛtiṃ bhrāntiṃ manyate tathā manvādibhiḥ pratyakṣādyasaṃbhavaparāmarśādaṣṭakādismaraṇaṃ mithyeti mantavyam | yathaiva pāramparyeṇāvicchedādayaṃ veda iti—vākyānumānābhiprāyeṇoktam |

itarastvarthasyaivāvicchedasmaraṇamayamāheti matvā punarnirmūlatvamāha | vedaḥ punaḥ saviśeṣaḥ pratyakṣagamyastatra ghaṭādivadeva puruṣāntarasthamupalabhya smaranti | tairapi smṛtamupalabhyānye 'pi smaranto 'nyebhyastathaiva samarpayantītyanāditā | sarvasya cā ' 'tmīyasmaraṇātpūrvamupalabdhiḥ saṃbhavatīti na nirmmūlatā | śabdasaṃbandhavyuptattimātrameva ceha vṛddhavyavahārādhīnam | prāgapi hi vedaśabdādanyavastu vilakṣaṇaṃ vedāntaravilakṣaṇaṃ vā 'dhyetṛsthamṛgvedādirūpaṃ mantrabrāhmaṇādirūpāṇi cānyavilakṣaṇānyupalabhyante | sarveṣāṃ cānādayaḥ saṃjñā iti taddvāreṇottarakālamapi gamyamānānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ sādhitam | nanvaṣṭakādiṣu puruṣāntarastheṣvapi kumbhakārakriyāsviva kiṃ cidvijñānamūlamasti | yadi hi karmasvarūpamātraṃ smaryeta tataḥ pākādi tadindriyairanyānanuṣṭhato dṛṣṭavā pare smareyuḥ | yatastviha svargādisādhyasādhanasaṃbandhaḥsmaryate | nāsau puruṣāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ kaściddṛśyata ityandhaparamparānyāyenāpramāṇatā | sarvasyānādivyavahāropanyāsena vedavatprasiddhyabhimāno bhavatyato 'ndhaparamparānidarśanam | vede hi prāmāṇyasyānāditvamihāprāmāṇyasya | katham—

lg.l: yo yo grahītā jātyandhaḥ sa svayaṃ nopalabdhavān |

div.p: tādṛśaṃ vā 'ṣṭakādismaraṇam | na ca codanā mūlabhūtopalabhyate | na cānanubhūtasaṃbandhā 'numāṃtu śakyate | yadi ca vedādupalabhya smṛtayaḥ pravartitāḥ syustato 'rthasmaraṇavadita upalabhyāyaṃ manvādibhiḥ praṇīta ityapi pāramparyeṇa smaryeta | syādetad | arthasmaraṇena kṛtārthānāṃ niṣprayojanaṃ mūlasmaraṇamanādarādbhraṣṭamiti | tadayuktam | na hi yatkṛtaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadeva vismartuṃ yujyate | arthasbhṛteḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyābhāvāt | sarve puruṣāstāvadetajjānanti yathā vedamūlajñānādvinā prāmāṇyaṃ na niścīyata iti te kathamiva tatrānādaraṃ kuryuḥ | api ca—

yadi hi tairapyarthamātramevānyebhyo 'dhigataṃ na vedo dṛṣṭa iti tatastatpūrvakeṣvapyayameva paryanuyoga iti nirmūlasaṃpradāyatvaprasaṅgānnirmūlatvānna mucyase | yadi tu pralīnaśākhāmūlatā kalpyeta tataḥ sarvāsāṃ buddhādissṛtīnāmapi taddvāraṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate | yasyaiva ca yadabhipretaṃ sa eva tatpralīnaśākhāmastake nikṣipya pramāṇīkuryāt | atha vidyamānaśāravāgatā evaite 'rthāstathā 'pi manvādaya iti sarve puruṣāstata evopalapsyante | yuktatarā ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sākṣādvedādeva pratītiriti smṛtipraṇayanavaiyarthyaṃ syāt | na ca tadvijñāyate | kīdṛśādvākyādidaṃ manvādibhiḥ pratipannaṃ kiṃ vidhiparādutārthavādarūpāditi | paśya—
na ca manvādivacanādvedamūlatvaṃ niścinumaḥ | te hi nirmūlamapi vipralambhādihetoruktyā lokaṃ vañcayitumevaṃ vadeyuḥ | tasmādapramāṇam || 1 ||

sarvathā tāvanmanvādipraṇītāḥ sannibandhanāḥ smṛtayaḥ śeṣāṇi ca vidyāsthānāni svārthaṃ pratipādayantyupalabhyante | manvādīnāṃ cāpratyakṣatvāttadvijñānamūlamadṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ cidavaśyaṃ kalpanīyam | tatra ca—

sarvatraiva cādṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ tādṛśaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ yaddṛṣṭaṃ na viruṇādvi na vā 'dṛṣṭāntaramāsañjayati | tatra bhrāntau tāvatsamyaṅnibaddhaśāstradarśanavirodhāpattiḥ sarvalokābhyupagatadṛḍhaprāmāṇyabādhaśca | idānīṃtanaiśca puruṣairapi bhrāntirmanvādīnāmanuvartitā | tatparihāropanyāsaśca manvādīnāmityanekādṛṣṭakalpanā | anubhave 'pi sa eva tāvadanubhavaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ | punaścedānīṃtanasarvapuruṣajātiviparītasāmarthyakalpanā, manvādestaccaitaṃtsarvajñavāde nirākṛtam | puruṣavākyaparā 'pyandhaparamparayā nirākṛtā | na hi niṣpratiṣṭhapramāṇātmalābho dṛśyate | tathā vipralambhe 'pi tatkalpanā | vipralipsā prayojanaṃ lokasya ca tatra bhrāntistasyāśceyantaṃ kālamanuvṛttirityādyāśrayaṇīyam | utpannasya ca dṛḍhasya pratyayasyaprāmāṇya
nirākaraṇāddṛṣṭavirodhaḥ | tasmātsarvebhyaścodanākalpanaiva jyāyasī | tatra hi tanmātrādṛṣṭābhyupagamaḥ | śeṣāstu mahājanaparigrahādayaḥ sarve 'nuvidhīyante | saṃbhāvyate ca manvādīnāṃ codaṃnāpūrvavijñānakāraṇatvena | tadarthamevā ' 'ha—tenopapanno vedasaṃyogastraivarṇikānāmiti | yāni punaranupapannavedasaṃbhāvanānāṃ mlecchādīnāmatīndriyārthasmaraṇāni teṣāṃ mūlakalpanāvelāyāmeva codanā saṃbhāvanāpadaṃ nā ' 'rụ̄dheti mithyātvahetubhūtacatuṣṭayapāriśeṣyādapramāṇatvam | saṃbhāvitāyāṃ punaścodanāyāṃ kāraṇāntaṃraniṣedhe kṛte nirmūlatvāsaṃbhavātpariśeṣasiddhaṃ codanāmūlatvam | yattu kimarthaṃ codanā nopalabhyanta iti | tatra ke cidāhuḥ | nityānumeyāstā na kadā ciduccāryante | yathāliṅgādikalpitāḥ | kathamanuccāritānāṃ mūlatvopapattiriti cet | naiṣa doṣaḥ | pāṭhāvicchedavatpāramparyeṇa smaraṇāttatsiddheḥ | yathaiva hi granthaḥ saṃpradāyādavicchinno 'stitvaṃ bhajate tathaiva pratijñayā nityānumeyaśrutisaṃpradāyāvicchedasiddhiḥ | tattvayuktam | andhaparamparānyāyādeva | yā hi codanā na kadāciduccāryate tasyāḥ sarvapuruṣapratyakṣādiprasarābhāvāddurlabhataramastitvam | tathā ca smṛterapi saiva vandhyādauhitratulyatā | liṅgādīnāṃ tu nityatvānnityamanuccaritaśrutyanumānakāraṇatvamaviruddham | tena varaṃ pralīnaśrutyanumānameva | na ca pralayo na saṃbhāvyate | dṛśyate hi pramādālasyādibhiḥ puruṣakṣayāccālpaviṣayatvam | na caivaṃ sati yatkiṃ citpramāṇamāpatsyate | śiṣṭatraivarṇikadṛḍhasmaraṇānyathānupapattilabhyatvācchrutyanumānasya | yadvā vidyamānaśākhāgataśrutimūlatvamevāstu | kathamanupalabdhiriti ceducyate—

yattu kimarthaṃ vedavākyānyeva nopasaṃgṛhītānīti | saṃpradāyavināśabhīteḥ | viśiṣṭānupūrvyā vyavasthito hi svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ śrūyate | smārtāścā ' 'cārāḥ ke citkvacitkasyāṃ cicchākhāyām | tatrāpi tu kecitpuruṣamevādhikṛtyā ' 'mnāyante | ye tu kratuprakaraṇāmnātāḥ kenacinnimittenotkṛṣyamāṇāḥ puruṣadharmatāṃ bhajante | yathā ‘malavadvāsasā saha na saṃva dettai. saṃ. ( 2-5-1 ) |’ ‘tasmānna brāhmaṇāyāvagurettai. saṃ ( 2-6-10 ) |‘ ityevamādayaḥ | tatra yadi tāvattānyeva vākyānyuddhṛtyādhyāpayeyustataḥ kramānyatvātsvādhyāyavidhivirodhaḥ syāt | anena ca nirdeśenānye 'pyarthavādoddhāreṇa vidhimātramadhīyīrankarmaupayikamātraṃ vā | tatra vedapralayaḥ prasajyeta | na cāvaśyaṃ manvādayaḥ sarvaśākhādhyāyinaḥ |

te hi prayatnena śākhāntarādhyāyibhyaḥ śrutvā 'rthamātraṃ svavākyairavismaraṇārthaṃ nibadhnīyuḥ | na ca vākyaviśeṣo jñāyate | yathaiva hi smṛterdṛḍhatvādbhrāntimūlatvaṃ nāstyevamarthavādamūlatvamapi | śaknuvanti hi te vidhyarthavādau vivektum | tatra smṛtervidhyātmakatvātprakṛtitā
dātmyānumānalabdhāspade 'rthavādapūrvakatvaṃ niṣpramāṇakam | api ca vedo 'khilo dharmamūlaṃ sasarvo 'bhihito veda iti ca svayameva smṛrtṛbhirātmā badhvā samarpitastaccaitanniyogatastatkālaiḥ kartṛbhirbuddhikāritvādupalabdhamataḥ siddhaṃ vedadvāraṃ prāmāṇyam | yastu kartṛsāmānyātsvatantrameva prāmāṇyaṃ vedamūlatvaṃ vā 'numānena sādhayati tasyārthakāmānusāribhirdṛṣṭārthairācārairanekāntaḥ | śrūyamāṇaśrutyadhīnaprāmāṇyāpatteśca viruddhatā tasmādarthāpattirevātrāvyabhicārādupacārātpaścānmānādanumānatvenoktā | asyā eva smṛterdrạdhimna iti | dṛḍhatvātkāraṇānumānamatha vā dṛḍhatvasya | na hi manuṣyā ihaiveti | niḥśeṣasaṃskāracchidā maraṇenāntaritvātkarmaphalasaṃbandhānusaṃdhānāsaṃbhavenocyate | smṛtivaidikapadārthayoḥ kartṛsāmānyādupapanno vedasaṃyogastraivarṇikānāmiti | codanāmūlasaṃbhāvanāpadalābhārtham | vismaraṇamapyupapadyata iti | dṛśyate hyadyatve 'pyarthasmaraṇaṃ granthanāśaśca | yadā tu śākhāntareṣu vidyanta eva tāḥ śrutayastadā 'pi kasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ kāḥ paṭhayantaïtyasyāṃśasya vismaraṇam | vaidikatvamātraṃ tu prāmāṇyasiddhaye paripālayanti | tadviśeṣajñānaṃ punaranaupayikatvādanādartavyameva | tathā pratyupasthitaniyamānāmiti | āgatamāgataṃ nimittaṃ prati ye niyamyante vṛddhavayaḥpratyutthānādayasteṣām | dṛṣṭārthatvādeva prāmāṇyamiti | etadayuktam | kutaḥ—

lg.l: dharmaṃ prati yato 'tredaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prastutaṃ smṛteḥ |

div.p:
na hi yāvatkiṃ cidācaraṇaṃ tasya sarvasya mūlamiha pramāṇī kriyate | dharmajijñāsādhikārāt | yadi ca gurvanugamādīnāṃ kevalaṃ dṛṣṭārthatvameva syāttataḥ kṛṣyādivaddharmaṃ pratya
prāmāṇyameveti nopanyasitavyāḥ | syādetadapramāṇatvenaiṣāmupanyāsa iti | na | tathā sati “hetudarśanācca” ityatrodāhartavyā bhaveyuḥ | tasmācchreyāṃptamiti ca darśanaṃ niṣphalam | na ca niyogataḥ śāstrādṛte prāptiḥ | śakyate hyupāyāntareṇāpi sāmadānādinā gururadhyāpanādīni kārayitum | tatrāsti niyamavidheravakāśaḥ | sarvatra ca yathā kathaṃ cillokapaṅktisahāyopādānātmarakṣaṇaprītyutpādādikā dṛṣṭārthatā bhāṣyakāroktā śakyā vaktum | na cāvaghātādīnāṃ vṛṣṭikāmayāgādīnāṃ ca dṛṣṭārthānāmavaidikatvam | tasmātsatyapi dṛṣṭārthatve saṃbhāvyate vedamūlatvaṃ niyamādṛṣṭasiddherananyapramāṇakatvāt | ataśca gurvanugamanādernaimittikatvādakriyāyāṃ pratyavāyaḥ karaṇe ca na bhavati | dṛṣṭaṃ ca prīto gururadhyāyayiṣyatītyevamādi niṣpadyate | niyamāccāvighnasamāptyarthāpūrvasiddhiḥ | evaṃ ca “ācārādgṛhyamāṇeṣu tathā jai. sū. ( 6-2-10 )syādityatra sakṛdasakṛdvā 'nuṣṭhānamiti vicāro yuktaḥ | itarathā tu dṛṣṭārthatvavaśenaivodakapānādivadavadhāraṇaṃ syāt | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa dṛṣṭārthatvādeva prāmāṇyamityuktaṃ tatpūrvapakṣavādyatiśayārtham | etaduktaṃ bhavati | yāstāvadadṛṣṭārthāḥ smṛtayastāḥ kathaṃ cidapramāṇī kuryādbhavān, imāḥ punargurvanugamanādiviṣayāḥ kathamivāpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyantīti | sabhāprapādīnāṃ yadyapi viśeṣaśrutirnaiva kalpyate tathā 'pi paropakāraśrutyaiva samastānāmupādānātprāmāṇyam | tasmācchreyāṃsamityaśve gardabhenānugantavye siddhavacchreyasāmūnairanugamanaṃ darśayati | yathā dhanvani—nirudake kṛtāḥ prapāḥ pareṣāmupakurvantyevaṃ tvamiti devatāstutipare vākye siddhavatprapāsadbhāvastasyāśca pārārthyaṃ dṛśyate | gotracihnaṃ śikhākarma tatrāpyācāraniyamasyādṛṣṭārthatvānnaiva tāvanmātrameva prayojanam | śakyaṃ hyupāyāntareṇāpi gotraṃ smartuṃ tenānya evābhiprāyaḥ | karmāṅgabhūtaṃ tāvaccaturavattapañcāvattādivibhāgasiddhayarthamavaśyaṃ smartavyaṃ gotram | ataśca taccihnārthamapi tāvacchikhākalpasmṛteḥ prāmāṇyamastu | tanniyamādṛṣṭasya tvekāntenaivānanyagatitvātpuruṣārthatā setsyatīti | tena sarvasmṛtīnāṃ prayojanavatī prāmāṇyasiddhiḥ | tatra yāvaddharmamokṣasaṃbandhi tadvedaprabhavam | yattvarthasukhaviṣayaṃ tallokavyavahārapūrvakamiti vivektavyam | eṣaivetihāsapurāṇayorapyupadeśavākyānāṃ gatiḥ | upākhyānāni tvarthavādeṣu vyākhyātāni | yattu pṛthivīvibhāgakathanaṃ taddharmādharmasādhanaphalopabhogapradeśavivekāya kiṃciddarśanapūrvakaṃ kiṃcidvedamūlam |
vaṃśānukramaṇamapi brāhmaṇakṣaṃtriyajātigotrajñānārthaṃ darśanasmaraṇamūlam | deśakālaparimāṇamapi lokajyotiḥśāstravyavahārasiddhayarthaṃ darśanagaṇitasaṃpradāyānumānapūrvakam | bhāvikathanamapi tvanādikālapravṛttayugasvabhāvadharmādharmānuṣṭhānaphalavipākavaicitryajñānadvāreṇa vedamūlam | aṅgavidyānāmapi kratvarthapuruṣārthapratipādanaṃ lokavedapūrvakatvena vivektavyam | tatra śikṣāyāṃ tāvadyadvarṇakaraṇasvarakālādipravibhāgakathanaṃ tatpratyakṣapūrvakam | yattu tathāvijñānātprayoge phalaviśeṣasmaraṇam | mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato veti ca pratyavāyasmṛtistadvedamūlam | evaṃ kalpasūtreṣvarthavādādimiśraśākhāntaraviprakīrṇanyāyalabhyavidhyupasaṃhāraphalamarthanirūpaṇaṃ tattatpramāṇamaṅgīkṛtam | lokavyavahārapūrvakāśca kecidṛtvigādivyavahārāḥ sukhārthahetutvenā ' 'śritāḥ | vyākaraṇe 'pi śabdāpaśabdavibhāgajñānaṃ sākṣādvṛkṣādivibhāgavatpratyakṣanimittam | sādhuśabdaprayogātphalasiddhirapaśabdena tu phalavaiguṇyaṃ bhavatīti vaidikam | chandovicityāmapi gāyatryādiviveko lokavedayoḥ pūrvavadeva pratyakṣaḥ | tajjñānapūrvakaprayogāttu phalamiti śrautam | tathā cāniṣṭaṃ śrūyate | yo ha vā 'viditārṣeyacchandodaivatabrāhmaṇena mantreṇa yajati yājayati vetyādi | jyotiḥśāstre 'pi yugaparivartaparimāṇadvāreṇa candrādityādigativibhāgena tithinakṣatrajñānamavicchinnasaṃpradāyagaṇitānumānagūlaṃ grahasausthyadausthyanimittapūrvakṛtaśubhāśubhakarmaphalavipākasūcanaṃ tadgataśāntyādividhānadvāreṇa vedamūlam | etena sāmudravāstu vidyādi vyākhyātam | īdṛśā vā vidhayaḥ sarvatrānumātavyāḥ | īdṛśe gṛhaśarīrādisaṃniveśe satyetadetacca pratipattavyamiti | mīmāṃsā tu lokādeva pratyākṣānumānādibhiravicchinnasaṃpradāyapaṇḍitavyavahāraiḥ pravṛttā | na hi kaścidapi prathamametāvantaṃ yuktikalāpamupasaṃhartuṃ kṣamaḥ | etena nyāyavistaraṃ vyācakṣīta ||

lg.l: parīkṣakārpitaiḥ śakyāḥ pravivektuṃ na tu svataḥ ||

div.p: tathā ca mānave 'pyabhihitama—
tathā—yastarkeṇānusaṃdhatte sa dharmaṃ veda netaraḥ ||

ityādibhistarkaviśuddhirāśritā | prāyeṇa ca manuṣyāṇāmadharmabhūyiṣṭhatvāttajjñānapratibaddhāḥ pratibhāsteṣu teṣu kumārgeṣu pravartante | tatra lokārthavādopaniṣatprasūtaistarkaśāstraiḥ sarvavipra
tipattimukhapradarśanam | tadupapattayastadbalābalapūrvakaṃ ca niścayadvāraṃ kathyate | anyathā punaḥ—

sarvāsu tu pradarśitāsu svātantryeṇa viśodhayantaḥ kāścidutsṛjyānyāḥ pramāṇī kariṣyanti | yadapi ca nityānityapṛthaktvaikatvasāmānyaviśeṣavyatirekādyekāntapratipādanaṃ tadapi pakṣapātādṛte 'nyatarāṃśanirūpaṇāśakteḥ | avaśyaṃ ca sarvātmakavastuyugapadgrahaṇāsambhavāttadbhāgopanipātipadaviṣayavivekārthamekaikanirūpaṇamādareṇa kartavyam | anyathā ye 'navāptasāmānyaviśeṣādyupapatayaḥ puruṣāste padapratipādyaṃ niṣkṛṣṭaṃ vastubhāgaṃ lokamātrālocanena naivādhyavasyeyuḥ | mantrārthavādopāttāśca stutinindāstattannityānityaikapṛthaktvaikāntamāśritya tatra tatra vidhipratiṣedhāṅgatvena pravartamānāḥ pakṣapātapratipāditavastudharmavaicitryādṛte nirālambanā syuḥ | yāścaitāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvaraparamāṇukāraṇādiprakriyāḥ sṛṣṭipralayādirūpeṇa pratītāstāḥ sarvā mantrārthavādajñānādeva dṛśyamānasūkṣmasthūladravyaprakṛtivikārabhāvadarśanena ca draṣṭavyāḥ | prayojanaṃ ca svargayāgādyutpādyotpādakavibhāgajñānam | sargapralayopavarṇanamapi daivapuruṣakāraprabhāvapravibhāgadarśanārtham | sarvatra hi tadbalena pravartate taduparame coparamatīti | vijñānamātrakṣaṇabhaṅganairātmyādivādānāmapyupaniṣadarthavādaprabhavatvaṃ viṣayeṣvātyantikaṃ rāgaṃ nivartayitumityupapannaṃ sarveṣāṃ prāmāṇyam | sarvatra ca yatra kālāntaraphalatvādidānīmanubhavāsaṃbhavastatra śrutimūlatā | sāṃdṛṣṭikaphale tu vṛścikavidyādau puruṣāntare vyavahāradarśanādeva prāmāṇyamiti vivekasiddhiḥ || 2 ||
yāvatī smṛtiḥ pratyakṣavedavākyaviruddhā tāṃ sarvāmudāhṛtya saṃpradhāryate | kiṃ punastādṛśyapi dharmapramāṇatvenāvadhāryate | kiṃ vā paryudasyata iti | kutaḥ saṃśaya iti ceducyate |

lg.l: abādho vā bhavedasyā bādho vā tadviparyayāt ||

div.p: ekaviṣaye viruddhārthopasaṃhāriṇī vijñāne virudhyete balavadabalavattvanirṇayācca bādhyabādhakabhāvaṃ pratipadyete | tadyadi śaṅkitavirodhayorapi śrutismṛtyoḥ kenacitprakāreṇa bhinnaviṣayatvena vyavasthā sidhyet | vidheyapratiṣedhyayorvā virodhābhāvādekasminnapi viṣaye samuccayasaṃbhavādekaprayogagatatvāsaṃbhavādvobhayoḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkaraṇena prayogāntare cobhayānugrahaḥ syādityevaṃ vikalpāśrayaṇe 'pyatyantavirodhābhāvātpratyakṣānumitaśrutijanitajñānayośca vaidikatvāviśeṣe tulyabalatvakalpanādubhayaprāmāṇyamupapatsyate | tato yathopanyastaviṣaye 'pi smṛtiprāmāṇyamapekṣitavyam | atha tu prayatnenānviṣyamāṇe 'pi na viṣayāntarakṛtā vyavasthā nāpi prameyāvirodhātsamuccayo nāpi vikalpenobhayānugrahaḥ kiṃ tarhyubhayapīḍanādatyantavirodha eva | pratyakṣānumeyaśrutyośca laukikapratyakṣānumānavanmahānbalaviśeṣastadā gatyantarābhāvādabhayānugrahāsaṃbhave śrutibalīyastvena smṛtiprābhāṇyamupekṣaṇīyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |

anāśaṅkitavipralambhabhrāntyādimūlā hyavyāhatavedamūlatvāvadhāraṇāḥ smṛtayo nirvyājaprāmāṇyāḥ śakyante dharmavyavahārāṅgatvena sthāpayitum | yadā tu vedaviruddhatvahetudarśanaparasparavigānādinā kenacidapi cchalenā ' 'sāmaprāmāṇyaṃ kalpyate tadā bahuśākhākhilaprakaraṇādibhedabhinneṣu vedeṣu śrutiliṅgādyātmakopadeśanāmādidvārātideśātmakavicitrapramāṇabhāgeṣu
bahuśākhāśca khilāḥ prakaraṇādayaśca ye teṣāṃ ye bhedāstairbhinneṣu vedeṣu | śrutiliṃṅgādyātmakopadeśo yaśca nāmādidvāro 'tideśastadātmakā ye vicitrapramāṇabhāgāsteṣviti vigrahaḥ | ko jānāti kā smṛtiḥ kīdṛśena vedabhāgena virudhyamānā kadā 'numāsyata iti | ataścaivaṃ jātāśaṅkairnaiva kvacidapi viśvasyeta | aviśvāsāccātyantameva prāmāṇyaṃ pratihanyeta | tathā hi—
kiṃ ca—

yadā tūditānuditāgnihotrahomavidhivadatirātragataṣoṅaśigrahaṇavacca sahasraśaḥ śrutayo 'pyasaṃbhavadyugapadanuṣṭhānārthatayā parasparaviruddhā dṛśyante tadā yadi nāma kāsāṃ citsmṛtīnāṃ svavedaśākhāgatavacanaviparītārthaśākhāntaravacanamūlānāmadhītavākyavirodho dṛśyate 'tastāvataiva sarvaśākhāpratyayakarmavyavahāriṇāṃ svayamaśrutānadhītatvamātreṇa dṛḍhasmaraṇopasthāpitapuruṣāntarastha śrutinirākaraṇaṃ na śobhate na caikaṃ jai. sū. ( 2-4-2 ) | pratiśiṣyata iti hi sarvaśrutīnāṃ sarvapuruṣānprati prāmāṇyādadhyayanavacca smṛterapi śrutidhāraṇasāmarthyāt |
kiṃ ca |

lg.l:
virodhe tvanyamūlatvamiti syādardhavaiśasam
ekasyāṃ dharmasaṃhitāyāmardhasyārdhāntareṇa vaiśasaṃ—virodha ityarthaḥ | |

tadanuprāṇyate paścādvirodhe netyatikriyā
ucitāṃ kriyāmartikramya kriyā atikriyetyarthaḥ | |
tenā ' 'sāṃ yadi vā naiva kvacidasti pramāṇatā |

sarvatrāvyāhatā vā syānna tvardhajaratīyatā
kenacitpāśupatena sarvajaratyā yoṣito 'nupabhogyatvena sarvataruṇyāśca vṛddhe 'ruciprasaṅgādardhajaratyā ' 'nayane dūtaḥ preṣita iti lokapravādo 'trārdhajaratīyaśabdenopamānatvenokta iti | ||
viruddhatvaṃ ca jānanti smartārastāḥ smaranti yat |
kā vā dharmakriyā yasyāṃ dṛṣṭo heturna yujyate |
na ca kaṃcana muñceyurdharmamārgaṃ hi te tadā ||
prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkvacana markaṭāḥ |
dṛṣṭārthaṃ vihitaṃ vede tadā kiṃ hetudarśanaiḥ ||

ṛtvigmyo dakṣiṇādānaṃ tānūnaptrādikarma ca
ṛtvijāṃ yajamānasya ca parasparamavyabhicārārthaṃ karmārambhe śapathakarma tānūnaptraṃ nāma | |
yadā caivaṃvidhānyeva vede karmāṇi santi naḥ ||
tadā kiṃ nāma dṛṣṭārthaṃ buddhyā sidhyedavaidikam |
yā tu vedaviruddheha smṛtiḥ kācana dṛśyate |
bhinnakakṣāgate ye ca pramāṇe tatra dhāvataḥ |
tayoḥ śīghreṇa nirṇīte mantharaṃ na pravartate ||
na hi yena pramāṇatvaṃ labdhapūrvaṃ kadācana |
na rudhyate tatastasya siddhiḥ kālena labhyate ||
mukhaṃ vā rudhyate tasya nā ' 'tmalābhaḥ kadācana ||
tasmādevaṃ na vaktavyaṃ sarvāsāṃ vā pramāṇatā |
atha vā sā na kasyāścidyadi kvacidanāśritā ||
vikalpaḥ | kiṃ punastāsāṃ neṣyate śrutibhiḥ saha |

div.p: ucyate ||
tulyabalavikalpo hi tāvadaṣṭadoṣatvādagatikagatinyāyena kvacidevā ' 'śrīyate | kimuta kakṣāntaritaprāmāṇyāviṣamaśiṣṭavikalpaḥ | tathā hi |

lg.l: aṅgīkṛtyāpi tau doṣau pūrvaṃ kenāpi hetunā ||
ekasya vā pramāṇatvaṃ parihartuṃ na śakyate |
avyavasthā na yuktā hi vyavasthā yatra labhyate ||
tena yasya pramāṇatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvadā 'stu tat |

div.p: tadeva tu kadācitpramāṇaṃ kadācidapramāṇamiti na kathaṃ cidapi viśrambhaḥ syāttadetaddrīhiyavaśrutyoratyantāparihāryatvādavaśyamāpatitam |
yo yasya svarūpāśrayo dharmaḥ prāptaḥ sa balavatā kāraṇāntareṇa viparyayaṃ pratipadyate |
na ca śrutijanitapratyayasya smṛtijanito bādhakatvaṃ pratipadyate |

lg.l: tasminneva kṣaṇe mūlaṃ kalpayetsvaṃ smṛtiḥ śrutim ||

div.p: eṣa tāvadvikalpapadamanārụ̄dhāyā eva smṛtereko bādhaprakāraḥ |
taddarśayati | vikalpaṃ tu vadanpakṣe tāvacchrutiprāmāṇyamabhyupaitīti | tadā ca smṛtyaprāmāṇyamavaśyaṃbhāvi tasyāścāprāmāṇyakalpanāyāṃ na śruteriva tadadhyāropaḥ |

śrutimūlatvavicchedottarakālaṃ ca prāṅnirākṛtamūlāntaropaplavādavigānasmṛtapuruṣapraṇīta
tvanirṇayācca nityatvadvāranirmūlatvāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃbhāvi vipralambhābhiprāyādi kiṃcidekaṃ mūlamāpadyate |

vrīhiśrutiparigrahakāle hi yavaśruterabhūtamevāprāmāṇyamadhyāropitam | tatprayogāntaravelāyāṃ tulyasāṃpradāyikāmnāyamānatvena saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭārthatvādiviśeṣābhāvena ca punaḥ sahajena prāmāṇyenābhibhūyate |

lg.l: na tu smṛteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ punarujjīvituṃ kṣamam |

div.p: na hyekasyā eva smṛteḥ pratyakṣaśrutyarthāparigrahakāle 'numitaśrutimūlatvaṃ tatparigrahāśrayaṇe tu bhrāntyādimūlatvamiti viruddhāvadhāraṇā 'vakalpate | āha | satyaṃ yadi prathamameva vikalpakārī śrutyarthaṃ parigṛhya dvitīyādiprayoge smṛtyarthaparigrahaṇāyopatiṣṭheta |
yo hi śrutiṃ prathamamaśrutvā śrutimevaikāṃ paśyati tasyāpratihataśrutyanumāne vṛtte |
na caiṣa niyamo 'sti jijñāsubhiḥ smṛtiviruddhā śrutireva prathamaṃ śrotavyeti |

lg.l: dvitīye yavaśāstraṃ ca na tattatprati durbalam ||

div.p: tasmātpaurvāparyaśravaṇamanāśritya ‘na caikaṃ prati śiṣyata’ ityanena nyāyena sarvapuruṣānprati nityāvasthitasamastapaṭhyamānasmaryamāṇavedaśākhāyattajñānairjijñāsubhirātmīyaśaktimātrakāritapūrvāparagrahaṇavibhāgairekavākyagatapūrvo taravarṇapadavadbalābalapanapekṣya mātāpitṛpraṇītopadeśavannirvicikitsameva prāmāṇyamabhyupagantavyam | anyathā hi—

lg.l: avirodhe 'pi hi śrutyā prāmāṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ bhavet ||

div.p: ucyate | yadyapi pūrvapalabdhayā smṛtyā śrutimanupalabhamānasya pratibandharahitaśrutyanumānaṃ kriyeta tathā 'pi kālāntare śrutiṃ śrutvā tatpratipakṣasmṛterbādhādhyavasānādavaśyaṃbhāviśrutimūlatvavicchedavaśena mūlāntarasaṃcaraṇam |
yo hi kūṭakārṣāpaṇena kaṃcitkālamajño lokamadhye vyavaharati na tena vivekajñānajanitavyutpattinā 'pi tathaiva vyavahartavyam | na cāsya tadānītanajñānamātrabādhabuddhirbhavati |

lg.l: saivedānīṃ viruddheti gamyate na punaḥ smṛtiḥ ||

div.p: naitadevam | pratiprayogaṃ pramāṇaparyālocanāt | yadi hyekaprayogamātrālocanenaiva prayogāntarāṇyapyanutiṣṭheyustato yena vrīhiśāstramapramāṇīkṛtya yavāḥ parigṛhyeransa yāvajjīvaṃ taireva yajeteti naiva pratipuruṣamubhābhyāṃ vikalpyamānābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ sidhyet | tena yāvatprayogabhāvipramāṇālocanavaśātpūrvānumitāṃ śrutiṃ kvacidapyaśṛṇvanpunarapi smṛtimevopalabhya kartṛsāmānyaliṅgenaiva śrutimanumimānaḥ pratyakṣayā śrutyā ' 'kṣiptacittatayā tatprāmāṇyenānyathānupapadyamānena smṛtyaprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayanpūrvāvadhāritamūlavyatyayameva pratipadyate na pūrvakḷptamūlasyāprāmāṇyādhyāropam | apaṭhayamānatayaivāsya sulabhāvajñānatvāt |
pūrvasmṛtigrāhiṇāṃ ca svayaṃ bādhamacetayamānānāmapi puruṣāntarasya śrutiśravaṇaprāthamyabalena bādhasaṃtānau 'nuvartata eva |

lg.l: na hi dvicandradiṅmohau na bādhyete narāntaraiḥ ||

div.p: nanu yavaśruterapi tarhi pramāṇatvena parigṛhyamāṇāyāḥ puruṣāntarabādhastadānīmastīti mithyātvaprasaṅgaḥ |

viruddhayorhi śrutismṛtyorvikalpaprasaṅgenāvaśyaṃ kalpanīye 'nyataratrāpramāṇatve yāvacchrutau paṭācchādananyāyena kalpayitumārabhyate tāvatsmṛtau svarūpāśrayaṃ kḷptamevopalabhya saṃśayacchede jāte na kadācidapyabhūtāprāmāṇyādhyāropakalpanopapattiḥ |
tataścārdhavaiśasaprasaṅganivṛttiḥ |
yathā |

yadyapyaudumbarīsarvaveṣṭanaṃ dharmaśāstrādhyetṛsmṛtivilakṣaṇapratyakṣaśrutyarthopasaṃhāraparasūtrakāsepanibaddhaṃ tathā 'pyupariṣṭādvakṣyamāṇālāntaratvābhiprāyeṇa puruṣopadiṣṭatvāviśeṣācca
smṛtivadevodāhṛtam | krītarājakabhojyānnatvavacanaṃ yadyapyatharvavede 'sti tathā 'pi tasyā ' 'havanīyasaṃbaddhayajñakarmopakārābhāvāttadadhikṛtatrayīpratipāditāgnīṣomīyasaṃsthāvadhibhojanapratiṣedhavirodhāt “prakaraṇaviśeṣādvikṛtau virodhi syāt” ityanena nyāyenādhikṛtānadhikṛtabalābalaviśeṣābhiprāyeṇa smṛtipakṣaniḥkṣepādbhāpyakāreṇodāhniyate | kṛṣṇakeśatvaṃ ca yadyapyanavasthitavayovasthākālaviśeṣaṃ jātaputratvapakṣe saṃdigdhasamāveśaṃ ca tathā 'pi yuvaiva dharmamanvicchedityevamādismaraṇaprakāśitārthaṃ yauvanāvasthāparigrahādantato vā vayordhānatikramāśrayaṇādaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣabrahmacaryaprāgupanayanasaṃbaddhakālasya ca vayasaḥ sātirekadvipañcāśaccatuṣpañcāśanmātrasaṃvatsaraparimitatvenāparihāryavayordhātikramāvaśyaṃbhāvitvādvyakta eva virodho dṛśyate | nanu ca pūrvakṛtasarvaveṣṭanottarakālavihitaṃ veṣṭitāyā eva sparśanaṃ saṃbhavatītyavirodhaḥ | kathamavirodho yadā sparśanaṃ nāma tvagindriyadvāraṃ spṛśyasaṃvedanam | na ca vastrāntaritāyā audumbaryāḥ sparśo gṛhyate | na ca vastre spṛśyamāna audumbarī spṛṣṭā bhavati | vastraudumbarījātivyaktisparśānāmatyantabhedāt |
nanu bhūmāvaudumbarībuddhyabhāvādvastrāntaritāyāṃ ca tadrabuddhayavyatirekāddṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyam | tathā hi |
kathaṃ punarayaṃ dharmaśāstreṣvanupanibaddho 'pi caṇḍālaspṛṣṭavastrasparśananimitto doṣo 'dhyavasīyate |
taducyate—

lg.l: na liptagrahaṇaṃ tatra pāṭhe 'sti tu ciraṃtane ||

div.p: amedhyasyaivaṃ yasmātpaṭhanti | caṇḍālaspṛṣṭavāsasaścāstyevāmedhyatā | tasmādasti salilādiśuddhiḥ | nanu ca manuṣyasyaiva caṇḍālasparśanimittaprāyaścittavidhānādaśuddhirūpamamedhyatvaṃ gamyate na dravyāntarasya gavāśvādeḥ | tataśca vastraṃ kiṃ gavāśvādivadaduṣṭamuta puruṣavadduṣṭamiti saṃdehe gavāśvāditulyamevāvadhārayituṃ yuktam |
ucyate—

yadā 'pi hi śuddhenaiva hastādinā caṇḍālaḥ spṛśyate gavādīnāṃ tu caṇḍālādispṛṣṭānāṃ snānaprakṣālanavidhyabhāvācchuddhirvijñāyata iti na tanmadhyapātitvam | ataśca nānena prakāreṇaudumbarīsaṃbaddhavastrasparśanāttatsparśanajñānopapattiḥ | yadā tu tayaivodgātā spṛṣṭa udgāthediti vidhistadā 'vaśyamevaudumvarītvacodgātuśarīraṃ prāptavyam | upāśrayaṇābhyupagamapakṣo 'pi ca spṛṣṭatvāparityāgenaiva sthita iti na samastācchāditāyāmavakalpate | parāśritamapi ca vastramudgāturāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyate | tenaivaudumbaryāśritenodnāyet | tasmādasti sarvaveṣṭanasparśanayorvirodha iti yuktaṃ bādhyabādhakavyavasthāpanam | atha kimarthaṃ nemau vidhī vikalpyete iti | smṛteravidhāyakatvātsvayamatulyabalatvācca tadanumitaśākhāntarapaṭhitavidhiparigrahābhiprāyeṇoktam | nāsati vyāmohavijñāna iti |

vyāmohavijñānaṃ ca jñānāntaragatavyāmohatvāvadhāraṇaṃ tadvijñānagatavyāmoharūpaṃ vā vivakṣyate | tena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ karmadhārayo vā yojyaḥ | vikalpaṃ tu vadanniti | kadā citsmṛtimūlaśrutivicchedādbhrāntyādimūlatvamāpādayati | tādṛśyā ca sakṛdapi śrautaṃ vijñānamanujñātamadhyāropyamāṇavyāmohāviṣayatvānna kadācitprāmāṇyaṃ tyajatītyapākṣikatvābhidhānam | evaṃ kevalāpramāṇatvapakṣagrahastasya punarjīvanāsaṃbhavādapākṣikaṃ ca sarvaveṣṭana
smaraṇamityāha—pākṣikaṃ ceti vā | vikalpavādisaṃmatapākṣikatvavaśādeva śrutiprāmāṇyapakṣe smārtaśrutikalpanāyāmakṛtāyāṃ mūlāntarasaṃkrānteḥ sarvakālāpramāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ | ekadā 'pi ca labdhaprāmāṇyāvakāśā śrutidurbalapratipakṣatayā na kadācidapi vyāmohī bhaviṣyatīti samarthayamāno yadeva hi tasyaikasminpakṣe mūlamityāha |

tena naitatpakṣe vijñānamiti—pramāṇavijñānamabhipretyoktam | vyāmohātpakṣāntaraṃmiti | vyāmohakalpanātaḥ pramāṇābhāvapakṣāntarasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratiṣedhati | yadvā smārtajñānameva pūrvāvadhāritavyāmohātprāmāṇyapakṣāntaraṃ na saṃkrāntamiti | duḥśrutasvapnādimūlatvena śrutivirodhaṃ darśayati—tulyakāraṇatvāditi | balīyaḥ pratipakṣanirākṛtatvātsarvadaiva śrutyanumānapratibandhānna smṛteḥ prāmāṇyapakṣasaṃkrāntiḥ | api cetaretarāśraye 'nyataḥ paricchedāditi | upariṣṭāditaretaravirodhavivaraṇādvirodhamevetaretarāśrayamāha—

pramāṇaśabdasya jñānasamānādhikaraṇatvena bhāvotpannalyuḍantatvena vā napuṃsakaliṅgatvādvedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇamitivatpramāṇe smṛtau sparśanaṃ vyāmoha iti bhavitavyam |
karaṇaviśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ vā 'bhidheyaliṅgavacanānuvṛttau lyuḍantāṭṭịdḥdhāṇañiti ṅīpi prāpte prāmāṇyaṃ smṛtāviti prayoktavyam | tamimamubhayabhraṣṭaṃ bhāṣyakāraprayogaṃ samarthayamānairevamanugamaḥ kartavyaḥ |

lg.l: na ca varṇāśrayatvena yalopo na bhaviṣyati |
yalope ca kṛte 'kāro yaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśiṣyate |

div.p: tadetaditarāśrayaṃ bhavatītyuktam |
tadidaṃ vikalpavādina ubhayatretaretarāśrayatvamekāntavādinastvanyataratra |

l.hi: tatra sparśanasya kṛptaṃ mūlaṃ kalpyaṃ smṛteriti |

div.p: naivātyantāprakṛtahetvantarābhiprāyeṇānyataḥ paricchedo 'bhihitaḥ | prakṛtayorapi ca yatkṛtamitaretarāśrayatvaṃ tavdyatiriktadharmadarśanānniścīyamāne bhavatyevānyataḥ paricchedaḥ |

smṛteḥ śrutyanumāpakaprāmāṇyātkalpyamūlatā tataśca pratyakṣaśrutyaprāmāṇyakalpanāyattaṃ
smṛteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tadbalena ca śrutyaprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayata itaretarāśrayatvamaparihāryam |

evaṃ tāvatsmṛtiprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayanneva tadvādī parājīyate | yadā tu śrutiprāmāṇyagatamitaretarāśrayatvamālocyate tadā tatrāpi pratipakṣabhūtasmṛtyaprāmāṇyāpekṣayā nirapavādaprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasiddheḥ parādhīnatvātpūrvasiddhasmṛtyaprāmāṇyalipsāyām
tena yattadādye padake 'nanumitāvasthāyāṃ śrutāvāpātakṣaṇamātre smṛteraprāmāṇyaṃ dṛśyate tāvataiva labdhapramāṇatvā śrutiḥ sarvadā nirapavādaprāmāṇyā bhavatītyanyataḥ paricchedaḥ |
tadekena mārgeṇa darśayati—kalpyamūlatvātsmṛtiprāmāṇyamanavakḷptamityādi yāvatsmārtaśrutikalpanamanupapannaṃ pramāṇābhāvāditi |

dvitīyamārge 'pi śrutiprāmāṇyadarśanādārabhya tāvannetavyaṃ yāvattadeva nirapavādaṃ siddhamiti | vrīhiyavabṛhadrathaṃtaravidhīnāṃ tvananyagatikatvātkakṣāntaritapadakā iva sthānabhedābhāvāttulyabalatayā 'navasthitavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ prāgupadiṣṭameva yojyam | ato nāpekṣyaṃ pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhasmṛtiprāmāṇyamiti || 3 ||
śrutivirodhabhagnaprasarāyāṃ hi smṛtau pūrvoktena nyāyena śrutyanumānapratibandhādākāṅkṣitamūlāntarāvaśyakalpayitavyatvācca |

lg.l: na tu śruterataḥ saiva tadvirodhe hi bādhyate ||

div.p: adhikaraṇāntaraṃ veti |

aparitoṣastāvatprathamenaiva śrutiviruddhatvahetunā balavatā siddhe bādhe nānvācayaheturatīva prayojanavān | adhikaraṇāntare punaḥ pūrvoktahetunirapekṣaḥ paryāpta evaikaḥ smṛtibādhanāyeti svatantratvena pradarśanam | virodhena ca na vyāptāyāḥ smṛterapramāṇatadvayāptau nāpavādāntarodbhavaḥ | vaisarjanahomīyaṃ vāso 'dhvaryurgṛhṇāti ityagnīṣomapraṇayanārthaṃ visarjanahomakālasaṃbandhiyajamānācchādanaṃ vāso 'dhyavayurharati muktakamevaitadāvaraṇānumitaṃ smaraṇam | evaṃ yupahastino dānamācarantīti yūpaparivyāṇaśāṭakaṃ yūpahāstiśabdena nirdiśyādhvaryuhartavyatayā ' 'cārānumitayaiva smṛtyā pratipādayanti |

ṛtvijo hi prayogamadhyapatitaṃ yajamānaṃ prakrāntakarmāvaśyasamāpanīyatvanibaddhasamāptyuttarakālabhāvi svācchandyaṃ ca viditvā kāryavattāvelāyāmeva khalagataprādhānya
khalagatadhānyavibhāgavyāpṛtabhṛtakavāditi pāṭho bhavituṃ yukta iti bhāti |vibhāgavyāvṛttabhṛtakavatsvayamutpādyotpādya tāni tānyādeyakāni śraddhājanakārthavādapuraḥsaraṃ yācante | pratyakṣaśrutivihitadeyāntaranidarśanavyāmohitaśca yajamānaḥ śraddadhānatayā tathaiva pratipadya tebhyaḥ prayacchatīti taireṣā smṛtiḥ pravartitā syādityāśaṅkāyāṃ vedamūlatvaṃ nānumīyate | pūrvavacca lobhapūrvakatvakalpanamevopapannamiti nirṇayātsaṃdehanivṛttiḥ | idaṃ ca bhāṣyakāreṇa pradarśayatā tulyakāraṇatvātpūrvatrāpi pradarśitameveti yojayitavyam |
etāvattvihādhikaraṇadvaye 'pi vaktavyam |

lg.l: virodhe satyapi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ mūlāntaraṃ katham ||

div.p: śākhāntaraviprakīrṇāni hi puruṣāntarapratyakṣāṇyeva vedavākyāni puruṣadharmānuṣṭhānakrameṇāpaṭhitāni vedasamāmnāyavināśabhayātsvarūpeṇānupanyasyārthopanibandhanadvāralabhyāni viśiṣṭadhvanisthānīyena tenaiva parokṣāṇyapi vyajyamānāni piṇḍīkṛtya smaryante | tatra yathaivā ' 'ptapratyayādidamiha paṭhyata iti kathitamuccāritamanuccāritaṃ vā śiṣyāḥ pratipadyante tathaiva sūtrakāravacanānyadhyāpakavacanasthānīyāni svānurūpavedavākyasamarpaṇamātraṃ kṛtvā nivṛttavyāpārāṇīti na tālvādidhvanipreraṇavatpauruṣeyatvena paribhavitavyāni |

lg.l: mūlāntarodbhavaṃ vaktuṃ jihvā no na pravarttate ||

div.p: yaccaitatsarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇaṃ sparśanaśrutiviruddhatvenodāhriyate | etajjaimininaiva cchāndogyānuvāde śāṭyāyanibrāhmaṇagataśrutimūlatvenaudumbarīprakaraṇe ca śāṭyāyanināṃ tāmūrdhvadaśenobhayatra vāsasī darśayatīti ‘vaiṣṭutaṃ vai vāsaḥ śrīrvai vāsaḥ śrīḥ sāme’ iti darśite tatprasaṅgenaudumbarīveṣṭanavāsaso 'pi prakāśaśrutimūlatvamevānvākhyātam |

lg.l: viruddhatve ca bādhaḥ syānna cehāsti viruddhatā |
na hi veṣṭanamātraṃ naḥ sparśaśrutyā virudhyate ||
veṣṭyetaudumbarī tatra kiṃ nāma na kṛtaṃ bhavet ||
ekarātre trirātre vā śuddhasya brāhmaṇasya ca |
kleśaprāyaṃ ca taṃ pakṣaṃ nā ' 'śrayetaiva kaścana |

div.p: tathā gautamenāpyuktam— rājñāṃ ca kāryāvighātārthaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca svādhyāyānirvṛttyarthamiti |

lg.l: vitatya daśa saṃkhyā hi tānyahāni vyavasthitā |

div.p: ucyate—

lg.l: karmaṇā yena keneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā |

div.p: yattu krītarājakabhojyānnatvavacanaṃ tadgatyantarāsaṃbhave nirdoṣatvajñāpanārthameva jñāyate | tatrāpi tu |

lg.l: sa nā ' 'pnoti phalaṃ tasya paratreti vicāritam ||

div.p: iti ninditatvānna saṃbhavadbhojyāntareṇāpi lokayātrādivaśena bhoktavyam |

lg.l: krīte tvabhojanaṃ nāma manaḥ karma niyamyate ||
śreyase vihitaṃ dharmyaṃ na sarvatra niṣidhyate ||
ekoddiṣṭaṃ sadekeṣāṃ na tu pitryaṃ kadācana ||

div.p: tatrāśrāddhabhojitvaniyamaḥ svargāyeti vijñāyate | tathā ṣaṣṭhayaṣṭamīcaturdaśīpañcadaśīṣu māṃsabhakṣaṇamaithunādikriyāpratiṣedhādgṛhasthasyānyatra kāmacāre prāpte tadakaraṇaniyamaḥ śreyase vihitaḥ | yathā ' 'ha |

lg.l: na māṃsabhakṣaṇe doṣo na madye na ca maithune |

div.p: nanu ca vākyadvayadarśanāttatra saṃyogapṛthaktvaṃ yuktamiha tvekameva dīkṣitānnabhojanapratiṣedhavākyaṃ kathaṃ prākkrayātpratiṣedhati taduttarakālaṃ ca prāgagnīṣomīyasamāpterniḥśreyasena niyacchatīti |
taducyate—

yathā 'dhvaryorvaraṇavelāyāmeva sarvaṃ yajamānena yajñopayogi svayamanujñātameveti nirvāpamantre prasavaśabdena tadānīṃtanayajamānānujñāprakāśanaṃ na kriyate tatheha krītarājakāvasthānujñātabhojanānujñāvacanamagnīṣomīyasamāptau punaruktamityavaśyaṃ niyamena pratiṣedhāntareṇa vā vāritasyānujñānārthamityavagamyate |
dīkṣitānnaviśiṣṭābhojananiyamo hi śreyorthibhyo vidhīyate |
aṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣaṃ vedabrahmacaryācaraṇasyāpi smṛtāveva pakṣāntaravikalpopanibandhanādāśramāntaraviṣayatvasaṃbhavādvā virodhābhāvaḥ | tathā hi—

lg.l: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vā 'pi yathākramam |

div.p: gautamenāpi dvādaśavarṣāṇyekavedabrahmacaryaṃ carediti prathamakalpamāśu gārhasthyapratipattyarthamuktvā dvitīyakalpe dvādaśa prativedaṃ vā sarveṣvityaṣṭācatvāriṃśatparigrahaḥ kṛtaḥ |

lg.l: gṛhasthatvaṃ na śakṣyanti kartuṃ teṣāmayaṃ vidhiḥ ||

div.p: dvaipāyanādayaścā ' 'huḥ—

lg.l:
kuryādanyanna vā kuryānmaitro
hiṃsārahitaḥ | brāhmaṇa ucyate ||

div.p: yāni ca pratidinaprayujyamānaṛksāmayajurbāhmaṇakalpavyākhyānādibrahmayajñanimittāni phalāni kratvadhikṛtapuruṣebhyo 'nyānarthakyaprasaṅgādvayāvṛttāni japadhyānamātrādhikṛtabrahmacāriparivrājakaviṣayatvenāvatiṣṭhante tānyapi svādhyāyavijñānabhūyastvena bhūyiṣṭhāni bhaviṣyantīti prativedabrahmacaryopadeśaḥ | yo vā kaścinmedhāvitayā śīghrameva vedacatuṣṭayamapyadhītya yathopapattikālaṃ tadarthajñānābhiyogamaparityajangrahaṇāntaṃ vetyetatpakṣāśrayaṇena gṛhastho bhavettaṃ prati dvādaśāṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣapakṣāvanenaiva smaraṇena pūrvapakṣīkṛtāviti nātīva śrutiviruddhatvenodāhartavyau |

lg.l: śrutyoreva hyasau dṛṣṭaḥ kva cidvā naiva vidyate ||
yadi vā bādhyamānatvamuktaṃ bāhyaṃ smṛtīḥ prati ||

div.p: etaddhi jaimininā 'tyantaṃ hitopadeśinā jijñāsubhyaḥ pratipādyate |
vrīhiyavādiṣvapi tāvatpratyakṣaśrutivihiteṣu yadi kaścidyāvajjīvamapyekameva pakṣamāśritya vyavaharenna sa kadācidapyupālambhāspadaṃ gacchet |

yāni smṛtivacanānyarthamātrameva pratipādya mūlabhūtāḥ śruṃtīranudāhṛtya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi teṣu śrutyanumānavyājasāpekṣaprāmāṇyeṣu satsu vedavacanamanapekṣatvātpramāṇataratvena sutarāṃ viśrambhaṇīyamiti śraddhāviśeṣeṇa grāhyatarārthaṃ vijñāyate | sūtrārtho 'pyevaṃ yojayitatryaḥ | śrautasmārtavijñānavirodhe yadanapekṣamapekṣāvarjitaṃ yasya vā 'pekṣaṇīyamanyannāstītyevaṃ pāṭhadvaye 'pi pūrvasūtrātpramāṇaśabdamanuṣaṅgeṇa saṃbandhya yadanapekṣaṃ tattāvatpramāṇaṃ syāditi tadānīṃtanavyavahāramātrapratipattyarthamevocyate |

tataśca na tāvacchākhāntarīyavidyamānaśrutimūlatvāśaṅkāyāṃ satyāmevātyantanirākaraṇapakṣaḥ parigrahīṣyate | na ca pratyakṣaśrutyarthānuṣṭhānahāniḥ | yadā tu kvacicchākhāntare
smaraṇamūlaṃ śrutirapi pratyakṣī bhaviṣyati tadobhayostulyabalatvādvikalpo bhaviṣyatyeva | nanvanenaiva nyāyena svaśākhāvihitaviruddhaṃ śākhāntaragatamapyagrāhyaṃ syāt | satyam |

lg.l: yadā tu śravaṇaṃ prāptaṃ tadā 'smānna viśiṣyate ||

div.head: bāhyagranthānāmaprāmāṇyanirūpaṇam |
div.p: yadvā yānyetāni trayīvidbhirna parigṛhītāni kiṃcittanmiśradharmakañcukacchāyāpatitāni lokopasaṃgrahalābhapūjākhyātiprayojanaparāṇi trayīviparītāsaṃbaddhadṛṣṭaśobhādipratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattiprāyayuktimūlopanibaddhāni sāṃkhyayogapāñcarātrapāśupataśākyagranthaparigṛhītadharmādharmanibandhanāni viṣacikitsāvaśīkaraṇoccāṭanonmādanādisamarthakatipayamantrauṣadhikādācitkasiddhinidarśanabalenāhiṃsāsatyavacanadamadānadayādiśrutismṛtisaṃvādistokārthagandhavāsitajīvikāprāyārthāntaropadeśīni yāni ca bāhyatarāṇi mlecchācāramiśrakabhojanācaraṇanibandhanāni teṣāmevaitacchrutivirodhahetudarśanābhyāmanapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ pratipādyate | na caitatkvacidadhikaraṇāntare nirūpitaṃ na cāvaktavyameva gāvyādiśabdavācakatvabuddhivadatiprasiddhatvāt |
brāhmaṇakṣatriyapraṇītatvāviśeṣeṇa vā mānavādivadeva śrutimūlatvamāśritya sacetaso 'pi śrutivihitaiḥ saha vikalpameva pratipadyeran |

tatra śraddhāmātramevaikaṃ vyavasthānimittaṃ sarveṣāṃ svapitṛpitāmahādicaritānuyāyitvāt | yaiśca mānavādismṛtīnāmapyutsannavedaśākhāmūlatvamabhyupagataṃ tānprati sutarāṃ śākyādibhirapi śakyaṃ tanmūlatvameva vaktum | ko hi śaknuyādutsannānāṃ vākyaviṣayeyattāniyamaṃ
kartum | tataśca yāvatkiṃcitkiyantamapi kālaṃ kaiścidādriyamāṇaṃ prasiddhiṃ gataṃ tatpratyakṣaśākhāvisaṃvāde 'pyutsannaśākhāmūlatvāvasthānamanubhavatulyakakṣatayā pratimāyāt | ata āha—virodhe tvanapekṣyaṃ syāditi | pāratantryaṃ tāvadeṣāṃ smaryamāṇapuruṣaviśeṣapraṇītatvāttaireva pratipannaṃ śabdakṛtakatvādipratipādanādarācca pārśvasthairapi jñāyate |

vedamūlatvaṃ punaste tulyakakṣamūlatvākṣamayaiva lajjayā ca mātāpitṛdveṣiduṣṭaputravannābhyupagacchanti | anyacca smṛtivākyamekamekena śrutivacanena virudhyeta | śākyādivacanāni tu katipayadamadānādivacanavarjaṃ sarvāṇyeva samastacaturdaśavidyāsthānaviruddhāni trayīmārgavyutthitaviruddhācaraṇaiśca buddhādibhiḥ praṇītāni | trayībāhyebhyaścaturthavarṇaniravasitaprāyemyo vyāmụ̄dhebhyaḥ samarpitānīti na vedamūlatvena saṃbhāvyante | svadharmātikrameṇa ca yena kṣatriyeṇa satā pravaktṛtvapratigrahau pratipannau sa dharmamaviplutamupadekṣyatīti kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ | uktaṃ ca |

lg.l: ātmānaṃ yo 'tisaṃdhatte so 'nyasmai syātkathaṃ hita iti ||

div.p: buddhādeḥ punarayameva vyatikramo 'laṃkārabuddhau sthitaḥ | yenaivamāha |

lg.l: mayi nipatantu vimucyatāṃ tu lokaḥ, iti |

div.p: sa kila lokahitārthaṃ kṣatriyadharmamatikramya brāhmaṇavṛttaṃ pravṛktṛtvaṃ pratipadya pratiṣedhātikramāsamarthairbrāhmaṇairananuśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ bāhyajanānanuśāsaddharmapīḍāmapyātmano 'ṅgīkṛtya parānugrahaṃ kṛtavānityevaṃvidhaireva guṇaiḥ stūyate tadanuśiṣṭānusāriṇaśca sarva eva śrutismṛtivihitadharmātikrameṇa vyavaharanto viruddhācāratvena jñāyante |
na hyeṣāṃ pūrvoktena nyāyena śrutipratibaddhānāṃ svamūlaśrutyanumānasāmarthyamasti |
na hi yathopanayanādismṛtīnāṃ śākhāntaradṛṣṭaśrutisaṃvādaḥ | evaṃ caityakaraṇatadvandanaśūdrasaṃpradānakadānādīnāṃ saṃvādaḥ saṃbhavati mūlāntarakalpanaṃ ca prāgeva pratyākhyātam |

lg.l: eta eva ca te yeṣāṃ vāṅmātreṇāpi nārcanam |

div.p: etadīyā granthā eva ca manvādibhiḥ parihāryatvenoktāḥ |

lg.l: sarvāstā niṣphalāḥ proktāstamoniṣṭhā hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ ||

div.p: tasmāddharmaṃ prati trayībāhyamevaṃjātīyakaṃ prāmāṇyenānapekṣyaṃ syāditi siddham || 4 ||

śiṣṭākope—evaṃ tāvatpuruṣārthasmṛtīnāmavirodhe virodhe ca pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve nirūpite saṃprati tu kratvarthānāṃ yajñopavītodakācamanadakṣiṇahastācaraṇasmṛtīnāṃ bahuśrutyarthamadhyapātinīnāṃ virodhāvirodhamātrameva vicāryate | tannirṇaye tu kṛte pūrvādhikaraṇābhyāṃ pramāṇatvāpramāṇatvasiddhiḥ |

lg.l: kathaṃ punarviruddhatvaṃ kathaṃ vā na viruddhatā |

div.p: yadi yajñopavītādīni kratumanupraveśyamānāni codakaprayogavacanābhyāṃ na parigṛhyante nirākriyante vā tato virodhaḥ | yadi punarānuguṇyātprakaraṇādipaṭhitavatsmṛtyanumitavākyasaṃyogena kratumanupraviśanti na ca pūrvagṛhītaṃ kiṃcidbādhante tato na viruddhānīti | anyattu darśanaṃ satyapi virodhe pramāṇaprameyabalābalavisaṃvādātsaṃdehaḥ | tathā hi |

vakṣyati hi “aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyāditi” | na ceha smārtaḥ kasyacidapi śrautasya padārthasya bādha āśaṅkyate kramakālaparimāṇāni tu samastapadārthadharmatvena niścitāni | tatra yadi pramāṇabalābalaṃ balīyastato balavacchrutiprameyatvāddurbalasvabhāvairapi kramādibhirācamanādīnāṃ bādhaḥ prameyabalābalabalīyastve tu padārthadharmebhyaḥ kramādibhyaḥ padārthatvenā ' 'camanādayo balīyāṃsa iti satyapi smṛtyākhyapramāṇe durbalatve balavadāśrayā
napi svarūpeṇa durbalānkramādīneva bādhiṣyante |

lg.l: na tadarthakriyāyāṃ hi śrutaṃ kiṃcana hīyate ||

div.p: yathaiva vijñātabalābalairapi śrutyādibhiḥ samākhyāparyantairyāvantaḥ śeṣāḥ pramīyante te sarve śeṣikathaṃbhāvena prārthitā itthaṃbhāvena sahānārabhyavādādhītairgṛhyante |
kathaṃbhāvāpekṣitāpūrvopakārasyājñātaparimāṇāṅgasādhyatvād yāvatkiṃcidyena kenacidapi pramāṇena prāpnoti tatsarvamaṅgaṃ bhavati | tasmādācamanādīnyapi yajñaprayogāṅgānītyupanyaste 'bhidhīyate || 5 ||

lg.l: śāstreṇa hi padārthānāṃ parimāṇaṃ tridhā gatam |

div.p: sarve hi padārthāḥ pradhānakālānna viprakraṣṭavyā iti prayogavacanena pratipāditaṃ tatra smārtaśiṣṭalokācārapramāṇakapadārthānuṣṭhānavikṣepāddakṣiṇaikahastādhīnavilambitānuṣṭhānācca pradhānapratyāsattibādhaprasaṅgaḥ |

samastaprayogakālāśca pūrvāhṇamadhyaṃdinādayo 'tikramyeran | kramaśca yaḥ śrutyarthapāṭhasthānamukhyapravṛttivatkramairavagataḥ sa ca vaidikapadārthārūḍhatayā vijñātāśrayapramāṇaparimāṇaḥ sannanyathātvaṃ kṣutādinimittācamanavyavadhānātpratipādyeta | evamāyāsasrastopavītapunaḥkaraṇavyavadhāne 'pi yojanīyam |

uktaparimāṇasya kramasya nānyadapi kiṃcitpramāṇamavakalpate | tathā śrutyādyavagatapracayaśiṣṭapadārthaparimāṇamavaśyamadhvaryvādibhiravismṛtasamastapadārthanirmāṇāyāvadhāraṇīyam | tataśca prathamāparikalpitapaścādāgatasmārtapadārthānuṣṭhāne pūrvāvadhāraṇabhraṃśātsamastakṛtākṛtānirūpaṇādanivṛttavaiguṇyāśaṅkasya samyakkṛtatvadāṛdhyanimittasaṃskārapāṭavābhāvādapūrvadaurbalyena nyūnaphalalābhaprasaṅgaḥ |

parimitaśrutyādyupadeśātideśātmakāṅgaśāstraparimāṇatvādvā na tadvayatiriktāṅgaśāstrāvakāśaḥ | sahakartavyāpagateṣu ca padārtheṣu sarvātmanā tvaramāṇasya yāvānevātyantāśaktyā kālaviprakarṣo bhavati tāvanmātrameva prayogavacano 'numanyate | śaktastu kṣaṇamātramapi yadi vikṣepaṃ kuryāttadasya prayogavacanavidhirna saheta | tasmātrividhasyāpi śāstraparimāṇasyānyathākaraṇānnā ' 'camanādyaviruddhamiti | ucyate || 6 ||

teṣvadarśanādvirodhasyeti vā samāptiḥ | anantarasūtre vipratipattyupāttavirodhābhāvokteranupayujyamānatvādiha ca prakrāntavirodhābhāvasyāvaśyavacanīyatvāt | upayogasadbhāve 'pi ca kākākṣivadanuṣaṅgeṇa tantreṇa cobhayasaṃbandhāt |

lg.l: apivā kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yasmādeṣu na gṛhyate |

div.p: virodhatyājitaśrutiviruddhatā | virodhatyājitaśrutimūlasya hi smaraṇasya yasya mūlāntaramidaṃ nāmetyevaṃ saṃbhavadutprekṣāmātreṇopaplavate tatrālpenaiva prayāsena nirāśaṅkamapramāṇatvaṃ niścīyate |
na vā ' 'camanādismṛteḥ kāmakrodhalobhadveṣamānalajjādikāraṇaṃ kiṃcitsaṃbhāvyate yanmūlatvena śrutimūlatvamapahnūyeta |

lg.l: virodhe 'pi pramāṇatvaṃ smṛteḥ śrutyā na vāryate ||

div.p: nanu pūrvabhāvitvātpramāṇabalābalameva prameyabalābalājjyāyastvena pratibhāti | ucyate—
prameyagataṃ hi virodhamālocya pramāṇavirodhabuddhirbhavati |

lg.l: mahāsmṛtyā 'pi yā kācinna śakyā bādhituṃ śrutiḥ ||

div.p: na kenacitpramāṇena padārtheyattā paricchidyate | tatra yadi tena vinā 'nye samastapadārthasmṛtihetavo na syustata etadapyekaṃ kāraṇamiti parimāṇamapi sthāpyeta | tasyāmapi tvavasthāyāṃ yathā śrautamātraparimāṇamasamāpya samākhyāparyantaprāpitapadārthagataparimāṇāvadhāraṇamāśrīyate tathā smṛtyācāraparyantāvagataparimāṇamāśrayiṣyata iti nirdoṣam |

lg.l: kālo 'pi ca prayogāṅgaṃ sarvānte so 'pi gṛhyate |

div.p: tasmādyatkiṃcanapramāṇakasarvapadārthaprāptyuttarakālāpekṣitasaṃbandhaḥ kālo 'pi naiva sarvopasaṃhāravirodhīti teṣu kramakālaparimāṇeṣvadarśanādvirodhasyetyucyate | yadvā teṣvācamanādiṣu kriyamāṇeṣvadarśanādvirodhasyeti sūtrārthayojanā | api ca—
atadaṅgena hi tulyakakṣeṇa vyavadhānaṃ bhavati na sarvapadārthena |

lg.l: vedimeva karotiti sa vaktuṃ śakyate tadā ||
tāmeva saguṇāṃ kartuṃ śuddhyā na vyavadhāsyate ||

div.p: imamevārthamabhipretya bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ na caivaṃjātīyakā arthāḥ padārthānāṃ vyavadhātāro bhavantīti | itarathā hyaṅgapradhānārthatve 'nāśrīyamāṇe śūnyahṛdayavacanamevaitatasyāt |

div.head: ( bhāṣyakāroktodāharaṇākṣepaḥ |)
div.p: nanvidaṃ yajñopavītamudāhartavyam | darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu ‘upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurutetai. saṃ. ( 2﻿—5﻿—11 ) |’ iti kratvaṅgatpratyakṣavidhānāt | tathā kāṭhake cānārabhyavādavidhinā sarvayajñagatayajanayājanasaṃbandho 'dhyāpanādhyayanasaṃbandhaśca śrūyate | ‘prasṛtena vai yajñena devā svargaṃ lokamāyannapasṛtenāsurānparābhāvayan | prasṛto ha vai yajñopavītino yajño 'prasṛto 'nupavītino yadvai kiṃ ca brāhmaṇo yajñopavītyadhīte yajata eva tattasmādyajñopavītyevādhīyīta yājayedyajeta vā yajñasya prasṛtyātai. ā. ( 2﻿—2) | iti’ | tathā ' 'camanavidhirapi ‘dakṣiṇata upavīyopaviśya hastāvavanijya trirācamya dviḥ parimṛjya darmāṇāṃ mahadupastīryopasthaṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukha upaviśya svādhyāyamadhīyīta’ iti yadyapi brahmayajñaprakaraṇe śrūyate tathā 'pi vedoccāraṇasaṃbandhāttadaṅgatvenāpi tāvajjñāyamānaṃ sarvayajñānāṃ mantravatprayogitvāttadaṅgaṃ bhavati | tathā ca “na somenocchiṣṭā bhavanti” iti prāptācamanapratiṣedhārthamevāvadhāryate | dakṣiṇācāratvaṃ tu﻿—

“yathā vai dakṣiṇaḥ pāṇirevaṃ devayajanam” iti prāgudakpravaṇavidhipare vākye devayajanavadyajñāṅgatvaucityādupamānamavakalpate | tena nātraikamapi virodhabādhaśaṅkāyogyamityanudāharaṇāni | tasmānnaivaitadadhikaraṇāntaram |

div.head: ( vedāviruddhaśākyādivacasāmaprāmāṇyanirūpaṇam | )
div.p: sūtrāṇi tu pūrvādhikaraṇākṣepaparihārasūtratvenaiva vyākhyātavyāni | yattarhi vedavihitaṃ na bādhate śiṣṭānvā vedavido na kopayati | vihārārāmamaṇḍalakaraṇavairāgyadhyānābhyāsāhiṃsāsatyavacanadamadānadayādi, tadbuddhādibhāṣitaṃ pramāṇenāviruddhamiti cet | na | śāstraparimāṇatvāt |

paramitānyeva hi caturdaśāṣṭādaśa vā vidyāsthānāni dharmapramāṇatvenaḥśiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītāni
upavedāḥ﻿—āyurvedadhanurvedagarndhavevadāḥ | aṅgāni﻿—śikṣādīni | upāṅgaṃ﻿—pūrvottaramīmāṃsādvayam | daṇḍanītiḥ﻿—arthaśāstramityarthaḥ |vedopavedāṅgopāṅgāṣṭādaśadharmasaṃhitāpurāṇaśāstraśikṣādaṇḍanītisaṃjñakāni, na ca teṣāṃ madhye bauddhārhatādigranthāḥ smṛtā gṛhītā vā |
tathā ca prāyaścittādidānakāle yo vākyamātmīyamanyakavikṛtaṃ vā ślokaṃ sūtraṃ voccārya mānavādiprāyaścittaṃ dadyānna kaścidapi dharmārthaṃ pratipadyeta |
tathā ca “manorṛcaḥ sāmidhenyo bhavanti” ityasya vidhervākyaśeṣe śrūyate “manurvai yatkiṃcidavadattadbheṣajaṃ bheṣajatāyai” iti prāyaścittādyupadeśavacanaṃ pāpavyādherbheṣajam |

lg.l: sthitāśca manavo nityaṃ kalpe kalpe caturdaśa ||

div.p: uktaṃ ca﻿—

lg.l: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāti yugādiṣu || iti |

div.p:
evaṃ hyapaniṣatsūktam | ‘ṛgvedaṃ bhagavo 'dhyemi yajurvedaṃ sāmavedamatharvavedaṃ caturthamitihāsaṃ purāṇaṃ pañcamam’ iti | tena pratikalpamanvantarayuganiyatanityaṛṣināmābhidheyakṛtrimavidyāsthānakārā ye vede 'pi mantrārthavādeṣu śrūyante tatpraṇītānyeva vidyāsthānāni dharmajñānāṅgatvena saṃmatāni | tathā ca ṛgvedādivihitayajñāṅgabhreṣaprāyaścittaviśeṣānabhidhāya ‘yadyavijñāta iti’ prāyaścittāntaraṃ vidadhat traividyavṛddhasmṛtivihitavinaṣṭoddeśenaivavidadhātīti gamyate | anyathā hi pratyakṣavedavihitaṃ sarvaṃ vijñātamūlaviśeṣatvādavijñātamūlatvenānabhidheyameva syāt | yadi ca smaryamāṇavedamūlagranthanibandhanānāmavijñātṛvedaviśe
ṣapūrvakatvenāpi sthitānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nā ' 'śrīyeta tathā sati naivāvijñātamūlaṃ kiṃcidyajñe kriyata iti tadvinaṣṭaprāyaścittavidhirnaivopapadyeta |

tena karmānurūpyasāmānyato dṛṣṭārthāpattibalāttadabhiprāyakalpitadharmābhāsamadhyapatitaṃ sanmūlamapyahiṃsādi śvadṛti nikṣiptakṣīravadanupayogyaviśrambhaṇīyaṃ ca tanmātropalabdhaṃ bhavatītyavaśyaṃ yāvatparigaṇitadharmaśāstrebhyo nopalabhyate tāvadagrāhyaṃ bhavati |
tasmādyāvatparigaṇitavedādiśāstravyatiriktanibandhanaṃ taddharmapramāṇatvena nāpekṣitavyamiti |

div.head: ( sadācāraprāmāṇyanirūpaṇam | )
div.p:
yattvetat | api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran, iti sūtram | atra sadācārānudāhṛtya trivargasiddhayarthaṃ vicāryate | tadviparītasaṃkīrṇavyavahāriṣu śiṣṭeṣvapathyakārivaidyāturavadavisrambhaṇīyacaritatvātsaṃbhāvyamānavedamūlatvācca dharmasaṃśayaṃ darśayitvā “dharmasya śabdamūlatvādaśabdamanapekṣyam” iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ kva cicca “virodhe tvanapekṣyam” ityetannyāyānusāreṇa | sadācāreṣu hi dṛṣṭo dharmavyatikramaḥ sāhasaṃ ca mahatāṃ prajāpatīndravasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrayudhiṣṭhirakṛṣṇadvaipāyanabhīṣmadhṛtarāṣṭravāsudevārjunaprabhṛtīnāṃ bahūnāmadyatanānāṃ ca | prajāpatestāvat “prajāpatiruṣasamabhyaitsvāṃ duhitaram” ityagamyāgamanarūpādadharmācaraṇāddharmavyatikramaḥ | indrasyāpi
gautamadharmapatnyahilyāgamanarūpo dharmavyatikramo bodhyaḥ | | tatpadasthasya ca nahuṣasya paradārābhiyogāddharmavyatikramaḥ | tathā vasiṣṭhasya putraśokārtasya jalapraveśātmatyāgasāhasam | viśvāmitrasya cāṇḍālayājanam | vasiṣṭhavatpurūravasaḥ prayogaḥ | kṛṣṇadvaipāyanasya gṛhītanaiṣṭhikabrahmacaryasya vicitravīryadāreṣvapatyotpādanaprasaṅgaḥ | bhīṣmasya ca
sarvāśramadharmavyatirekeṇāvasthānam | apatnīkasya ca rāmavatkratuprayogaḥ | tathā 'ndhasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasyejyā pāṇḍavarjitairdhanairityanadhikṛtakriyā | tathā yudhiṣṭhirasya kanīyorjitabhrātṛjāyāpariṇayanamācāryabrāhmaṇavadhārthamanṛtabhāṣaṇaṃ ca | vāsudevārjunayoḥ pratiṣiddhamātuladuhitṛrukmiṇī subhadrāpariṇayanam, ubhau
ubhau madhvāsavakṣīvau dṛṣṭau me keśavārjunau |madhvāsavakṣībāviti surāpānācaraṇam | adyatve 'pyahicchatramathurānivāsibrāhmaṇīnāṃ surāpānam | kesaryaśvāśvatarakharoṣṭrobhayatodaddānapratigrahavikrayavyavahārabhāryāpatyamitrasahabhojanādyudīcyānām | mātuladuhitrudvāhāsandīsthabhojanādīni dākṣiṇātyānām | mitrasvajanocchiṣṭaspṛṣṭabhojanaṃ sarvavarṇaparasparaspṛṣṭatāmbūlādanatadavasānānācamananirṇejakadhautagardabhārūḍhavastraparidhānabrahmahatyātiriktamahāpātakakāryapariharaṇādīnyubhayeṣām | atisthūlāni pratipuruṣajātikulāvasthitasūkṣmasvadharmavyatikramaṇāni tvanantabhedāni sarvatra vigānahetudarśanāni ca prāyeṇaiva saṃbhavantīti naivaṃjātīyakamiśrasadācāradharmatvādhyavasānasaṃbhavaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: ke śiṣṭā ye sadācārāḥ sadācārāśca tatkṛtāḥ |

div.p: nanu |
yathābhyāsaṃ hyāśayavaicitryeṇa śubhāśubhobhayahīnakriyānuṣṭhāyināmātmatuṣṭirapi vicitraiva bhavati | tathā hi |
tathā hi |

lg.l: tebhya eva hi yajñebhyaḥ śākyāḥ krudhyanti pīḍitāḥ ||

div.p: tathā |

lg.l: anye tu savyalīkena manasā tanna kurvate |

div.p: tataścānavasthitatvādyathaivā ' 'tmanastuṣṭireva cetyetanmanuvacanaṃ kathamapyanyathā netavyam | evamācāraścaiva sādhūnāmityetadapīti |
smṛtikāravacanārtho hi śiṣṭairācaritavyaḥ śiṣṭatvāya | anyathā hi tadanapekṣāḥ svātantryeṇa vyavaharamāṇā duṣṭā bhaveyurna śiṣṭāḥ |

lg.l: na ca teṣāṃ śrutirmūlaṃ vyavahārasya dṛśyate |
yadi ca syātparokṣā 'pi smaryetaiva hyasau dhruvam ||

div.p: tasmānnirmūlatvādanapekṣāṇi śiṣṭācaraṇānīti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |
“api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran” iti |

lg.l: arthārthaṃ vā na teṣvasti śiṣṭānāmeva dharmadhīḥ ||

div.p: anagnipakvamāghasaptamīpaurṇamāsīphālgunīpratipadvasantotsavādīnāṃ niyamakriyāpramāṇaṃ na śāstrādṛte kiṃcidasti | smṛtikārāścā ' 'cāraścaiva ‘sādhūnāṃ deśajātikuladharmāścā ' 'mnāyairaviruddhāḥ pramāṇamiti’ vedāviruddhānāmācārāṇāṃ sāmānyataḥ prāmāṇyamanumanyante | tathā 'nadhyāyādhikāra ūrdhvaṃ bhojanādutsava iti deśanagarotsavaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇam | vede 'pi ca mahāvrate preṅkhamāruhya hotā śaṃsatītyetadvākyaśeṣe śrūyate, yadā vai prajā maha āviśanti preṅkhaṃ tarhyārohantīti | mahaḥśabdavācyotsavaprasiddhiranūditā | yattu parimitaśāstraprameyatvāddharmādharmayoriha ca tadasaṃbhavādityuktam tadvedamūlatvānumānātpūrvavadeva pratyāsveyam | na ca smṛtirnirmūlā | vistaravacanānāmapi prapāṭhakamātreṇopasaṃhārātkimuta saṃkṣepavacanasya | śakyaṃ ca smṛtyanurūpameva vedavacanamanumātum | tathā hi |

na hi tadevaikaṃ śāstrapramāṇakaṃ yasya svarūpamapi tata evāvagantavyam | anekākārasya
hi prameyasya kaścidevā ' 'kāraḥ kenacitpramāṇena pramīyate | tatra pratyakṣādyavagate 'pyācārasvarūpe dadhigodohanādivatphalasaṃbandhaḥ śāstreṇāvagamyate | yāgādiṣvapi ca naiva svarūpajñānena śāstramapekṣitam | phalasaṃbandhamātrasyaivātīndriyatvena tadapekṣitatvāt | ato na nāmopalakṣaṇāntareṇa śāstraṃ pravṛttamupalabhya śiṣṭāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvakālaṃ tu śiṣṭavyavahāraśāstrayoraviyogādvyavahārādevāpoddhṛtya kecitsvargādisādhanatvena niyamyamānāḥ kādācitkatvaparityāgena nityaprayojyā vijñāyante | teṣāṃ cā ' 'ryāvartanivāsiśiṣṭaprayojyatvamevopalakṣaṇaṃ vedenāpi sarasvatīvinaśanaplakṣaprasravaṇādivadupāttamiti śakyamanumātum |
pratyakṣavedavihitadharmakriyayā hi labdhaśiṣṭatvavyapadeśā yatparamparāprāptamanyadapi dharmabuddhayā kurvanti tadapi svargyatvāddharmarūpameva |
tenāhorātrapaurvāparyavadanāditvādvedatadarthānāmitaretarāśrayatvāprasaṅgaḥ | smṛtirapyācāraṃ vedavacanaṃ vopalabhyābhyanujñānāyaiva pravṛttetyadoṣaḥ |
vede 'pi hi bahūnyeva dṛṣṭārthagandhaspṛṣṭāni vidhīyanta iti na tāvatā vedamūlatvābhāvaḥ |

yāni tu mlecchādisamānāni niyatāniyatakriyāntarāṇyarthasukhasādhanakṛṣisevāvāṇi jyādīni mṛṣṭānnapānamṛduśayanāsanaramaṇīyagṛhodyānālekhyagītanṛtyagandhapuṣpādikarmāṇi prasiddhāni teṣu naiva kasyaciddharmatvāśaṅkā 'stīti na tatsāmānyato dṛṣṭenetaranirākriyopapattiḥ keṣāṃcidvā dharmatvābhyupagamānna sarveṣāmeva tatprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃ tu﻿—

lg.l: sa eva kevalo dharmo netaraḥ prāṇimātragaḥ ||

div.p: tathaiva bahukālābhyastavedatadarthajñānāhitasaṃskārāṇāṃ vedaniyatamārgānusāripratibhānāṃ nonmārgeṇa pratibhānaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśrityocyate | “yadeva kiṃcanānūcāno 'bhyūhatyārṣaṃ tadbhavatīti” | vaidikavāsanājanitatvādveda eva sa bhavati |
tathā hi﻿—

lg.l: yathā rumāyāṃ lavaṇākareṣu merau yathā vojjvalarukmabhūmau |
satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || iti |

div.p: bahudinābhyastadharmavyāptātmano hi na kathaṃciddharmakaraṇarūpātmatuṣṭiranyatra saṃbhavatīti dharmatvenābhyanujñāyate |

lg.l: yadvakṣyasi sa mantraste viṣaghna iti mantrite ||
yathā vā sarpasiddhānte nakulo yāṃ kilauṣadhim ||
yathā vā yāṃ bhuvaṃ kaścidadhyāvasati puṇyakṛt ||

div.p: yattu prajāpatiruṣasamabhyaitsvāṃ duhitaramahalyāyāṃ maitreyyāmindro jāra āsīdityevamādidarśanāditihāsadarśanācca śiṣṭācāreṣu dharmātikramaṃ paśyadbhiḥ śiṣṭācāraprāmāṇyaṃ duradhyavasānamiti | tatrocyate﻿—

lg.l: yathā vā na viruddhatvaṃ tathā tadgamayiṣyati ||

div.p: prajāpatistāvatprajāpālanādhikārādāditya evocyate | sa cāruṇodayavelāyāmuṣasamudyannamyaita, sā tadāgamanādevopajāyata iti tadduhitṛtvena vyapadiśyate tasyāṃ cāruṇakiraṇākhyabījanikṣepātstrīpuruṣayogavadupacāraḥ | evaṃ samastatejāḥ paramaiśvaryanimittendraśabdavācyaḥ savitaivāhani līyamānatayā rātrerahalyāśabdavācyāyāḥ kṣayātmakajaraṇahetutvājjīryatyasmādanenaivoditenetyāditya evāhalyājāra ityucyate na tu parastrīvyabhicārāt | nahuṣeṇa punaḥ parastrīprārthananimittānantarakālājagaratvaprāptyaivā ' 'tmano durācāratvaṃ prakhyāpitam | śacyāśca patibhaktinimittapuṇyātiśayajanitatannirākaraṇāvāptaprabhāvalābhaḥ khyāta eva |

yo hi sadācāraḥ puṇyabuddhayā kriyate sa dharmādarśatvaṃ pratipadyeta yastu kāmakrodhalobhamohaśokādihetutvenopalabhyate sa yathāvidhipratiṣedhaṃ vartiṣyate | tena viśvāmitrasyāpi yadrāgadveṣapūrvakamapi tapobalārūḍhasya caritaṃ satsarvaṃ balavataḥ pathyamityanena nyāyena mahānti ca tapāṃsi kṛtvā tāni kṣayaṃ nayata uttarakālaṃ vā pāpaviśuddhiṃ prāyaścittaiḥ pratikurvāṇasya jīryatyapi | mandatapasāṃ gajairiva mahāvaṭakāṣṭhādibhakṣaṇamātmavināśāyaiva syāt | dvaipāyanasyāpi, “guruniyogādapatirapatyalipsurdevarādgurupreritādṛtumatīyāt ” ityevamāgamānmātṛsaṃbandhabhrātṛjāyāputrajananaṃ, prākkṛtapaścātkariṣyamāṇatapobalena nātiduṣkaram | anyo 'pi yastādṛktapovalo nirvahetsa kuryādeva | rāmabhīṣmayostu srehapitṛbhaktivaśāt | vidyamānadharmamātrārthadārayorevaṃ sākṣāvdyavahitāpatyakṛtapitrānṛṇyayoryāgasiddhiḥ hiraṇmayasītākaraṇaṃ ca lokāpavādabhiyā tyaktasītāgatānṛśaṃsyābhāvāśaṅkānivṛttyartham | bhīṣmaśca |
ityevaṃ vicitravīryakṣetrajaputralabdhapitranṛṇatvaḥ kevalayajñārthapatnīsaṃbandha āsīdityarthāpattyā 'nuktamapi gamyate |

lg.l: yo vā piṇḍaṃ pituḥ pāṇau vijñāte 'pi na dattavān |

div.p:
dhṛtarāṣṭro 'pi vyāsānugrahādāścaryaparvaṇi putradarśanavatkratukāle 'pi dṛṣṭavāneva | śāpānugrahasamarthā maharṣayaḥ śrūyante | tadyathaiva tadvacanādasāvandho jāto vijñāyate tathā yajñānuṣṭhānavacanāttāvati kāle dṛṣṭavānityarthāpattyā sujñānam | yadvā, “yajadevapūjāsaṃgati
karaṇadāneṣu” iti dānārtha evāyaṃ yajirbhaviṣyati kratuphalasamāni ca dānatapaścaraṇādīnyapi śrūyante tatkāraṇātkratukriyopacāraḥ |

lg.l: sā ca śrīḥ śrīśca bhūyobhirbhujyamānā na duṣyati ||

div.p: ata eva coktam﻿—

na hi mānaṣīṣvevamupapadyate | tenātītamānuṣamityuktam | ata eva vāsudevena karṇa uktaḥ “ṣaṣṭhe ca tvāmahani draupadī paryupasthāsyāti” iti | itarathā hi kathaṃ pramāṇabhūtaḥ sannevaṃ vadet | atha vā bahvya eva tāḥ sadṛśarūpā draupadya ekatvenopacaritā iti vyavahārārthāpattyā gamyate |

yathā yudhiṣṭhiropadeśātsabhāmadhyamānīyamānā sahasaiva rajasvalāveṣaṃ saputrakasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasyāyaśa utpādayitumātmānaṃ prakhyāpayituṃ draupadī kṛtavatī tathaiva kevalārjunabhāryāyā eva satyāḥ śrītvaṃ ca janenāviditaṃ parasparaṃ saṃghātāviśayaṃ ca bhedaprayogānavakāśārthaṃ darśayituṃ sādhāraṇyaprakhyāpanamityevamādivikalpaiḥ supariharatvādrāgalobhakṛtavyavahārasya ca śiṣṭaireva dharmatvenāparigrahasyoktatvādanupālambhaḥ |

tathā ca droṇavadhāṅgabhūtānṛtavāde ‘prāyaścittaṃ kāmakṛte 'pyeke’ ityevamante 'pyaśvamedhaḥ prāyaścittatvena kṛta eveti na tasya sadācāratvābhyupagamaḥ | yattu vāsudevārjunayormadyapānamātuladuhitṛpariṇayanaṃ smṛtiviruddhamupanyastaṃ tatrānnavikārasurāmātrasya traivarṇikānāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ |

lg.l: surā vai malamannānāṃ pāpmā ca malamucyate |
tasmādbrāhmaṇarājanyau vaiśyaśca na surāṃ pibet || iti |

div.p: madhusīdhvostu kṣatriyavaiśyayornaiva pratiṣedhaḥ kevalabrāhmaṇaviṣayatvāt “madyaṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇasya” iti vacanāt |
yadapyetat﻿—

lg.l: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā |
yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na peyā brahmavādibhiḥ || iti |
