( 205 ) |‘mleccha avyaktāyāṃ vāci’ iti smaraṇātsa na prayoktavya iti pratiṣedhaḥ | ‘tasmādeṣā vyākṛtā vāgudyate’ iti ca vidhiravinaṣṭaprayoganiyamārthaḥ |
ucyate﻿—

lg.l: pramādameva mā kārṣīḥ sāmarthyāya yatasva ca |
jānanto 'pi prayuñjīran yadi śāstraṃ na vārayet ||

div.p: yattu dṛṣṭārthapratyāyananirākāṅkṣatvādadṛṣṭārthaprayogotpattyaśāstratvamiti | tatrocyate﻿—
jai. sū. ( 4﻿—3﻿—3 ) |‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthatkvaṃ' tacceha prakaraṇānārabhyavādābhyāmavagataṃ, tatra﻿—

kratvarthaṃ hyatirjñātopāyatvātsarvādṛṣṭopasaṃgrahakṣamamiti niyamāpūrvamātmasātkurvatpuruṣārthāṃśe phalaśrutimarthavādī karoti | puruṣārthasya niyamasya tvavaśyakalpanīyaprayojanatvādarthapratipatteścāpabhraṃśe 'pyakṣinikocādibhyo vā sutarāṃ siddhatvādanākāṅkṣitaniyamāpūrvopajī
vanasāmarthyaṃ nāstītyavaśyamarthavādopāttameva svargaloke kāmadhugādyeva phalatvenā ' 'śrayaṇīyam | yattu na jñāyate kvedaṃ niyamāpūrvamāśritamiti, tatrābhidhīyate﻿—

jai. sū. ( 3﻿—4﻿—9 ) |‘prakaraṇaviśeṣādvā tadyuktasya tatsaṃskāro dravyavat’ iti hi jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇagatabrāhmaṇaśabdalakṣitatadapūrvasādhanayajamānasaṃskāratvātsādhubhāṣaṇaniyamāpūrvasya jai. sū. ( 3﻿—8﻿—2 ) |‘yājamānāstu tatpradhānatvātkarmavat’ ityanena nyāyena phalapratigrahaṇayogyatvādhānārthaṃ tadāśritameva vijñāyate | puruṣārthavākye 'pi samyagjñātasuprayuktatvākṣiptajñātṛprayoktṛparyupasthāpanātkriyāphalayośca tadgāmitvātpradhānayāgādyapūrvavadeva jñātṛprayoktrāśritaṃ niṣpadyate |
yathaiva ‘prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhighārayati’ iti satyapi śeṣasya tṛtīyānirdeśe kāryopayogitvātsaṃskāryatvāvadhāraṇamevaṃ brāhmaṇasyāpītyadoṣaḥ |

lg.l: yāge yo guṇabhāvaśca saṃskāre sā pradhānatā |

div.p: taccopayogitvaṃ prakaraṇatṛtīyāvibhaktiśravaṇābhyāmavagataṃ śeṣasvīkaraṇasamarthaṃ bhavati | bāhyapuruṣārthatve 'pi kāmadhukchabdasya puruṣopabhogyakāmyamānārthasādhanavacanatvātpuruṣaprādhānyapratipattiḥ | yadyapi ca sādhuśabdoccāraṇamuccārayitrarthaṃ kratvarthaṃ ca na bhavati tathā 'pi tadgataniyamapratiṣedhayoreva kratvarthapuruṣārthatve bhaviṣyataḥ | na hi yadarthe karmaṇi yau niyamapratiṣedhau tāveva kevalau tadarthau bhavataḥ | tathā hi﻿—
ataśca parārthoccāraṇāśritāvapi niyamapratiṣedhau svaprayojanākāṅkṣāvelāyāṃ saṃnihitapuruṣapradhānau vijñāyete |

śāstraśabdo yadi tāvadrūḍhastataścaturdaśasu tāvadvidyāsthāneṣu śāstrasthānāmeva prasiddhastadantargatatvācca vyākaraṇasya śāstratvanirākaraṇānupapattiḥ | athāpi śiṣyate 'neneti śāstratvamanvarthamiṣyate tathā 'pi vyākaraṇena sādhuśabdāḥ śiṣyante tadanugamopāyā vā prakṛtipratyayādayastadabhiyuktaśiṣyajano veti sarvathā śāstraśabdapravṛttiravihatā |

yathaiva hi vyākaraṇādīnāṃ kṛtrimakāvyopanibandhasādharmyācchāstratvaṃ pratiṣeddhumadhyavasīyate, tathā ' 'kāśadikkālātmanāṃ paramāṇudṛṣṭāntabalena nityatvādvedasyāśāstratvamapyayatnenaiva kriyeta | yo hi nāgarikabhāṣābhijñatayā grāmīṇairmātāpitarāvapi
śuklavacanamiti﻿—niṣṭhuravacanamityarthaḥ |śuklavacanairabhidadhīta sa kenānyena vāryeta |

lg.l: kruddho yo nāma yaṃ hanti sa tasyāṅgāni kṛntati |

div.p: yattvitarasmṛtīnāṃ prāyeṇa sārūpyādvayākaraṇasya tadvilakṣaṇatvāttanmadhyapātitvamasaṃbhāvyamiti | tatrocyate | sarvadharmasūtrāṇāṃ varṇāśramadharmopadeśitvāddharmāṇāṃ caikarūpaprāyatvātparasparasaṃvāditvaṃ yuktaṃ, vyākaraṇasya tvanya eva sādhuśabdatattvanirṇayarūpo viṣayastatrāsya vyākaraṇāntareṇaiva saṃgatiḥ syānna dharmasūtraiḥ | smṛtitvaṃ tvaṅgānāṃ dharmasūtrāṇāṃ cāviśiṣṭam |
iti hi tulyavatprāmāṇyasmaraṇam﻿—

lg.l: api vājai. sū. (1-3-1) kartṛsāmānyādukto nyāyaśca yaḥ smṛteḥ |
ekasya ca yadā yuktyā samūlatvaṃ nirūpitam |

div.p: iha tu samūlatvādekāntaritaprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ | yattu sūtravārtikabhāṣyakārāṇāmanyonyavigītavacanatvādapramāṇatvamiti | tatrābhidhīyate﻿—
mūlānurūpyeṇa hi smṛtīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ tadavigānena﻿—
punaruktatvādinā hi yatsūtrapratyākhyānaṃ tasya ca punaḥ samādhānam |
tadyathā | vājasaneyiśākhāyāmādhvaryavaṃ carakaśākhāsu ca bahvityetāvatā nālpaviṣayamapramāṇīkurvanti | tasmādayamapi na doṣaḥ | yastu sūtrakārasya prayojanānabhidhānopālambhaḥ |

satyavacanaṃ ca sarvaśrutismṛtiṣu svargasādhanatvena yāgasādhanatvena ca niyatam | satyaṃ ca dvividhaṃ śabdasatyamarthasatyaṃ ca | tatra yathaiva yathāvasthitāviplutārthavacanaṃ śreyaḥsādhanamevaṃ yathāvasthitaśabdasatyavacanamapi, yathā cārthasatyaviparyayaḥ pratyavāyāyaivaṃ viniyogakālaprayuktaśabdānṛtavacanamapi | śabdasādhutvajñānaṃ ca vyākaraṇābhiyogaviśeṣādityuktam |
na ca vyākaraṇaprayojanābhiprāyaṃ prati kecidvivadante | sa eva tvabhiprāyaḥ kiṃ nyāyyo netyarthāntarametat |

lg.l: lokato 'rthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ |dharmāya niyamaṃ cā ' 'ha vākyakāraḥ prayojanam |

div.p: niyamadvayaprayuktaṃ vyākaraṇam | sādhuśabdajñānāttatpūrvaprayogādvā svargayajñopakārasiddhirityetattāvadvedamūlamananyapramāṇakatvāt | ataścāyaṃ tāvadvedākhyena śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ |

tena vedāvagatasamyagjñātasādhuśabdaprayogātmakadharmāṅgatvena vyākaraṇaprakriyetikartavyatayā nityavācakaśabdarūpajñānaniyamaḥ kriyate | yacca kātyāyanena jñāne dharmama. bhā. paspaśāhinake | iti cettathā 'dharma iti tantreṇa prasaṅgena vā 'paśabdajñānādadharmatvāpattidoṣamabhidhāya
śāstrapūrvake prayoge 'bhyudayastattulyaṃ vedaśabdena |śāstrapūrvaprayoge 'bhyudaya iti niḥśreyasasiddhayupāye 'vadhārite yatpunaḥ parāvṛttya bhāṣyakāreṇoktam, ma. bhā. paspa. |‘atha vā punarastu jñāne dharma ityabhyupetyavādamātraṃ tatpūrvoktadoṣaparihārasāmarthyapradarśanārthaṃ kṛtvācintānyāyenoktam | paramārthatastvanyānarthakyaprasaṅgavijñātapārārthyāpāditārthavādatvātphalaśrutirna phalapratipattikṣamā vijñāyate | yathā ‘yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainamevaṃ veda’ iti jñānamātrādeva brahmahatyātaraṇaṃ yadi sidhyetko jātucidbahudravyavyayāyāsasādhyamaśvamedhaṃ kuryāt | tadvidhānaṃ tānarthakameva syāt | evaṃ śabdajñānācceddharmaḥ sidhyetko nāmānekatālvādivyāpārāyāsakhedamanubhavet | tasbhātkratuvadeva jñāna
pūrvaprayogasyaiva phalaṃ kāraṇe kāryavadupacārāttaṇḍule
devo varṣati taṇḍulān ityatra yathā taṇḍulaśabdo vṛṣṭāvupacaryate iti dṛṣṭāntārthaḥ |devavarṣaṇavajjñāne dharmavacanamāpāditādharmaparihārābhidhānaśaktimātrapradarśanārthamevopanyastaṃ na phalavattvapratipādanāya | ‘dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt’jai. sū. ( 4﻿—3﻿—1 ) | ityanena nyāyena jñānasya puruṣaśabdasaṃskāratvena nirākāṅkṣasya phalasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavāt |

ātmajñānaṃ hi saṃyogapṛthaktvātkratvarthapuruṣārthatvena jñāyate tena vinā paralokaphaleṣu karmasu pravṛttinivṛttyasaṃbhavāt | tathā ‘ya ātmā 'pahṛtapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' tathā ‘mantavyo boddhavyaḥ’ tathā ‘ātmānamupāsīta’ iti kāmavādalokavādavacanaviśeṣairjijñāsāmananasahitātmajñānakevalāvabodhaparyantaspaṣṭātmatattvajñānavidhānāpekṣitavākyāntaropāttadvividhābhyudayaniḥśreyasarūpaphalasaṃbandhaḥ | ‘sa sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmānāpnoti tarati śokamātmavittathā sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti tena pitṛlokena saṃpanno mahīyate’ ityādinā yogajanyāṇimādyaṣṭaguṇaiśvaryaphalāni varṇitāni | tathā ‘sa khalvevaṃ vartayanyāvadāyuṣaṃ brahmalokamabhisaṃpadyate na sa punarāvartate’ ityanirāvṛttyātmakaparamātmaprāptyavasthāphalavacanam | aprakaraṇagatatvenānaikāntikakratusaṃbandhācca nāñjanakhādirasruvavākyādiphalaśrutivadarthavādatvam |

pratyāśramavarṇaniyatāni nityanaimittikakarmāṇyapi pūrvakṛtaduritakṣayārthamakaraṇanimittānāgatapratyavāyaparihārārthaṃ ca kartavyāni | na ca teṣāṃ bhinnaprayojanatvādbhinnamārgatvācca bādhavikalpaparasparāṅgāṅgibhāvāḥ saṃbhavanti | śabdajñānasya tvekāntena prayogāṅgatvātpūrvatarabhāvitvācca na pṛthak phalasaṃbandhasaṃbhava iti jñānapūrvaprayogaphalavattvameva niścīyate | yattvādimadvayākaraṇajñānatatpūrvakaprayogaphalasaṃbandho 'nādividhimūlo nāvakalpata iti | tatra yūpādikaraṇavadvayākaraṇaparamparānāditvādanupālambhaḥ | ‘tasmādeṣā vyākṛtā’ iti ca vyākaraṇavyavahāranityatvamuktam |

lg.l: tatra hyucyata ityeva vyākṛteti tu niṣphalam ||

div.p:
yadapi ca manunā paṅktipāvanamadhye kedādevopalabhyoktam | ‘yaśca vyākurute vācaṃ yaśca mīmāṃsate 'dhvaram’
yaśca vyākurute vācaṃ yaśca mīmāṃsate 'dhvaram | tāvubhau puṇyakarmāṇau paṅktipāvanapāvanau | iti tenāpi pūrvapaścāduktādhītavedatvayajñamīmāṃsanavyatiriktaviṣayeṇa satā 'vaśyametadeva vyākaraṇajñānamāśrayitavyamiti tannityatvasiddhiḥ
atraca vārtikakāraiḥ ‘tadaśaktiścānurūpatvāt’ iti sūtraṃ prasaṅgātpūrvameva ‘anyāyaścānekaśabdbatvam’ iti sūtravyākhyānānte ‘yathā prakṛti sārūpyadvāreṇāpabhraṃśā’ ityādigranthena vyākhyātatvānna vyākhyātam | evaṃ ‘ekadeśatvācca vibhaktivyatyaye syāt’ iti sūtraṃ ca bhāṣyakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ vyākhyātatvādupekṣitamiti veditavyam | || 27 || 28 || 29 ||

iha nāmākhyātopasarganipātānāṃ madhyānnāmāni parigṛhyante, teṣāmapi jātiguṇakriyādravyayadṛcchāsarvanāmaśabdānāṃ madhyājjātiśabdāścintyante | teṣāmapyekaṃ gośabdamudāhṛtyavicāryate kiṃ punarayamākṛtervācako 'tha vyakteriti, tataḥ |
kiṃ ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthā utānya iti | āha﻿—
ucyate﻿—
yadi śabdārthānāmananyatvaṃ lokavedayorbhavettata etasyā vyaktyākṛtyabhidhānacintāyā vṛddhavyavahārasthānekaprayogānusaraṇadvāreṇābhidheyānabhidheyatvanirṇayaḥ śakyate kartum |

lg.l: prayojanaṃ tu lokasya na kiṃcidapi sidhyati |

div.p: saṃmūrchitānekārthasaṃnidhāne hi śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ kiyatyapyarthajāte pratyaya karoti tena cāviviktābhidheyagamyamānāśenāpi samastadharmopetena kāryasiddhau kriyamāṇāyāṃ prayuktaḥ |

lg.l: samastaṃ kriyate vyaktyā ko vivekadhiyo guṇaḥ ||

div.p: yadyucyetehāpi vedavatsāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇabādhasiddhireva prayojanāmiti | taducyate﻿—

lg.l: sarvaṃ hi dadhidānādi lokejai. sū. ( 11﻿—1﻿—4 ) | karmārthalakṣaṇam |

div.p:
tena laukikavaidikaśabdārthaikatve satyākṛtyadhikaraṇamupapattimattvātpravojanavattvāccā ' 'rabdhavyam | bhedapakṣe tvānārabhyamityavadhṛtya bhedapakṣastāvatpratipādyate | niyatāniyatasva
racchāndasaprakṛtipratyayalopāgamavarṇavikārasadasadbhāvakṛtarūpabhedādadhyāyānadhyāyopanītānupanītatraivarṇikacātuvarṇyaprayojyāprayojyatvaguruśuśrūṣārādhitagurusaṃpradāyayadṛcchāprayuktavākyaṃta- darthānyatvavadyadi padapadārthānyatvaṃ lokavedayostato laukikānāmeva vyavahāropanipātādarthavattā, vede tvānarthakyānna codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ | svareṇa rūpabhedaṃ manyate |

adhyāyānadhyāyatayā vṛtrahananādyarthayogena cāvidagdhavākyavaduttānavahanavākyabhaṅgaḥ | sarveṣāṃ ca vaidikānāmanyatvānna tato 'pi paurvāparyeṇārthāvagatiḥ | grāhyatvādidharmabhedaniyatāniyatapadavākyaracanādvārā vyapadeśarūpabhedābhyāṃ sarvaśabdānāmarthānāṃ laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca bheda iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate﻿—
bhede satyapūrvātsarvavaidikapadānāmanavagatasaṃbandhatvenārthaśūnyatvātkriyākārakasaṃsargātmakaprayogacodanānāmabhāva eva syāt |

śabdārthaikatvamiti vaktavye 'rthaikatvavacanaṃ phalādeva śabdaikatvoktisiddhiṃ matvaivamuktam | atha vā vastumātraparyāyatvādubhayasādhāraṇyābhiprāyeṇaivārthaikatvoktiḥ | prayogacodanābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ parapakṣe svapakṣe vā tadbhāvasiddhirvedavādinaiva saha vivāde 'vakalpate nānye
netyata āha﻿—prayojanamidaṃ tatpramāṇamabhidhīyatāmiti | taducyate | pratyabhijñārūpapratyayavibhāgājjñāyamānobhayaprameyarūpāvibhāgādvā vākyatatsamūhamātranibandhanāpannapadavarṇaviṣayatvavyapadeśāvibhāgādvā tathoccārayitṝṇāṃ sthānakaraṇaprayatnāvibhāgādvā lakṣaṇavidāṃ vā bahutarānugamanāvibhāgāditi hetvarthavikalpāḥ |

lg.l: evaṃ satyeva gotvādau dharmo yadi vilakṣaṇaḥ |

div.p: na ca yā eva devānāṃ gāvastā evāvaśyaṃ sarvatra vaidikasya gośabdasya vācyā bhavanti | manuṣyagavīṣu dakṣiṇādisādhaneṣu sutarāṃ prayujyamānatvāt |

ato 'vaśyameteṣāmeva gavādīnāṃ devasaṃbaddhānāmuttānavahanapratipādanamiti vaktavyam | atha vā bhūmiṣṭhānāmeva satāṃ kenāpi guṇavādena pṛthivīgolakatrailokyabhramaṇādinā vā purāṇoktena dṛṣṭivaśādyathaiva vayamupari devānpaśyāma evamadho dyuparivartanādayamapi loko devairupari dṛśyata iti uttānavahanadṛṣṭiḥ | tasmāllokavedayorabhinnāḥ śabdārthā iti siddhe |
vicāryate kimākṛtiḥ śabdārtho 'tha vyaktiriti |

lg.l: niyogena vikalpena dve vā saha samuccite |

div.p: prathamaṃ tāvadaṣṭapakṣyevaṃ darśayitavyā | gośabdasyārthaḥ kimākṛtireva, vyaktireva, utā ' 'kṛtirvā vyaktirvā, athā ' 'kṛtiśca vyaktiśca, kimubhayoḥ saṃbandha uta samudāyaḥ, kimākṛtiviśiṣṭā vyaktiruta vyaktiviśiṣṭā ' 'kṛtiriti | tathā kimākṛtyaiva viśiṣṭaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃ vyaktyaiva ākṛtyā vā vyaktyā vā, atha samudāyenāpyākṛtiviśiṣṭayā vyaktyā, atha vyaktiviśiṣṭyā ' 'kṛtyā, atha parasparaviśiṣṭābhyāṃ dvābhyāmiti | tathā kimākṛtyaiva viśiṣṭaḥ samudāya ityādyapi pūrvavadeva saṃbandhaviśiṣṭasamudāyapakṣamātrātiriktaṃ yojanīyam | evaṃ kimākṛtyaiva viśiṣṭaḥ saṃbandha eva, uta vyaktyaiva, athavā 'kṛtyā vā vyaktyā vā, atha samudāyena kimanyataraviśiṣṭyā 'nyatarayā, athobhābhyāmityevaṃ samudāyaviśeṣaṇatvapakṣāḥ pūrvavadeva yojyāḥ |

evaṃ kiṃ saṃbandhenaiva viśiṣṭā ' 'kṛtiratha samudāyenaivātha vikalpamānābhyāmuta samuccitābhyām | tathaitadviśiṣṭā kimākṛtirevātha vyaktireva, atha vikalpite kiṃ samuccite kimiti | tathā kimākṛtiviśiṣṭasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭā vyaktirevātha vyaktiviśiṣṭasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭā ' 'kṛtirevātha vikalpa uta samuccayaḥ | evaṃ samudāyenāpi yojyam | tathā saṃbandhaviśiṣṭavyaktiviśiṣṭākṛtirevātha saṃbandhaviśiṣṭākṛtiviśiṣṭā vyaktirevātha vikalpo 'tha samuccayaḥ | evaṃ samudāyaviśiṣṭapakṣāḥ kalpayitavyāḥ | tathā kiṃ jātyaiva viśiṣṭena saṃbandhena viśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ, atha vyaktyaiva viśiṣṭena saṃbandhena viśiṣṭā jātiratha vikalpo 'tha samuccayaḥ | evaṃ samudāyenāpi viśiṣṭatā yojyā | tathā kiṃ saṃbandhenaiva viśiṣṭayā jātyaiva viśiṣṭā vyaktirutaivaṃvidhayā vyaktyaiva viśiṣṭā jātiratha vikalpo 'tha samuccayaḥ |

evaṃ samudāyenaiva viśiṣṭayetyapi yojayitavyam | evaṃ jātiliṅgayorjātikārakayorjātisaṃkhyayośca pratyekaṃ jātivyaktipakṣavikalpitasamuccitapakṣotthānaṃ darśayitvā vyakterliṅgādīnāṃ ca darśayitavyam | tathā liṅgasaṃkhyā liṅgakārakasaṃkhyā kārakayugalānyapi vikalpya pratyekadvitriliṅgādisahitaikajātivyaktivikalpāstriyogapañcayogāśrayā darśayitavyāḥ |

lg.l: ete cātyantaniṣkṛṣṭāḥ pakṣā yadyapi na sthitāḥ |
na caitasmānna santyeva na caite niṣprayojanāḥ |

div.p: tataśca﻿—
nanu prathamapāda evā ' 'kṛternirūpaṇādidānīṃ praśnottare mandaprayojane | ucyate﻿—

lg.l: rūpaśabdāvibhāgācca jai. sū. ( 6﻿—3﻿—4 ) ityetreti śeṣaḥ |vakṣyatyetaddhi jaiminiḥ |

div.p: sarveṣu hi pārthiveṣu gavādighaṭādiṣu saṃsthānaṃ bhavet | agnitoyavāyvākāśādīnāṃ tu pārthivadravyaparigrahavaśādākārānuvṛttiḥ kalpyeta na svātantryeṇa, dikkālātmamanasāṃ tu guṇakarmaṇāṃ ca na kathaṃcidapi saṃsthānaṃ saṃbhavati | sāmānyamātraṃ tu sarvasvaviśeṣānuvṛttirūpaṃ saṃbhāvyate | tasmādetadevābhidheyākṛtilakṣaṇaṃ nāvayavaracanāsaṃsthānākṛtitvamavakalpate |

tasya hyupalakṣaṇamālocyamānaṃ na jāteranyallabhyate tataśca jātireva sāmānyamiti nyāyeṃnā ' 'padyate | tena prathamapāde rucakasvastikavardhamānakodāharaṇātsaṃsthānākṛtyabhidhānāśaṅkākṣayādarśanavadāsīdityetābhyāṃ praśnottarābhyāṃ vyāvartyate | ataśca dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ yāvatkiṃcitprāgvyaktibhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatsarvamākṛtirevetyabhipretya mātraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ | asādhāraṇaviśeṣā vyaktiriti | ke cidāhuḥ | asādhāraṇā viśeṣā eva vyaktiḥ | viśeṣavyatiriktavyaktyabhāvāditi |

khaṇḍamuṇḍādayastāvadanyā api vyaktayo bhavantyeva gavayamahiṣādivyaktayaśca | śābaleyo 'pi yathaikastathā 'nyo 'pi yaḥ śabalāpatyatvena gamyate sa sarvaḥ śābaleyaḥ | etaccobhayavarṇanimittaṃ vā yādṛcchikaṃ vā nāmānyatrāpi viniyogavaśādvartata eva | tadapatye ca śābaleya ityasādhāraṇavyapadeśānupapattiḥ | viśeṣavyaktiśabdayorbahuvacanaikavacanāntayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogavacanabhedadoṣaḥ | tasmādasādhāraṇā viśeṣā yasyāṃ sā vyaktirityevaṃ vyākhyeyam | nanu pūrvoktena nyāyena khaṇḍādīnāmapi bahuvyaktisādhāraṇyādvayaktivyatiriktānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ kevalaikaikavyaktigatānāṃ viśeṣāṇāmasaṃbhavādbahuvrīhirapyanupapannaḥ | ucyate | naiva viśeṣāṇāṃ pratyekamasādhāraṇatvamāśritya vyaktiviśeṣaṇatvenopādānam | kathaṃ tarhi sādhāraṇarūpāṇāmapyekadvitrādibhedena kvacidupalabdhānāṃ yadekatra piṇḍīkṛtānāṃ grahaṇaṃ tadapekṣamasādhāraṇaviśeṣatvābhidhānam |

lg.l: pravibhaktā hi ye dṛṣṭā dṛśyante saṃhatāḥ punaḥ |

div.p:
na caikasyāṃ vyaktau ye samuditā dṛṣṭāsta eva vyaktyantare 'pyanyūnānatiriktā dṛśyante | ya evādṛṣṭapūrvastasminsamudāye saṃprati dṛśyate sa evāsādhāraṇatāmāpādayati | anantabhedāsvapi vyaktiṣu nātyantāpūrvaviśeṣaṇopalakṣaṇopādānaṃ kiṃcidutkarṣāpakarṣamātreṇa ca sarvatrāsādhāraṇopalakṣaṇalābhātparasāmānyāpekṣayā ca sarvāṇyevāvāntarasāmānyāni viśeṣavyapadeśaṃ prāpnuvanti | saṃghātāvasthāyāṃ ca vyaktiviśeṣaṇatvātteṣu viśeṣaśabdaḥ | etacca vyakterviśeṣāṇāmanyatvamupariṣṭādbhāpyakāro 'pi vakṣyatyeva, yo 'rthaḥ sāmānyasya
viśeṣāṇāṃ cā ' 'śrayaḥ sā vyaktiriti | tatra kecidgotvādiṣu viśeṣatvamaṅgīkṛtya sāmānyavācinā śabdenānabhidheyatvādyadeva mahāsāmānyaṃ sattāvastubhāvaśabdābhidheyaṃ tadeva śabdasvarūpavyavacchinnaṃ gotvādiviśeṣavyavacchinnaṃ vā gosattākhyamākṛtyabhidhānapakṣe vācyamiti manyante | yathā ' 'huḥ﻿—

lg.l:
tattu
kakṣyāśabdaḥ koṣṭhavācī, dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvānyekasyāṃ sattāvāṃntarasāmānyakakṣyāyāṃ, pṛthivītvādīni dravyatvāvāntarasāmānyakakṣyāyāṃ, rūpatvādīni guṇatvāvāntarasāmānyakakṣyāyāṃ ca vartanta iti kakṣyāvibhāgo jñeyaḥ |kakṣyāvibhāgena sāmānyānāṃ nirūpaṇāt |

div.p: pratiniyatārthaviṣayā hi śabdānāṃ vācakaśaktirarthāpattyā gamyate | tatrānantarāvāntarasāmānyavacanānāṃ dravyaguṇakarmaśabdānāmeva tāvadasaṃkīrṇārthatvātsattārthatvamanupapannaṃ kimuta durāntaritārthagavādiśabdānām |
śuddhavacanatve tāvatsarveṣāmekārthapratyāyanātparyāyatvaprasaṅgaḥ | punaruktatvāccāstiśabdaprayogānupapattiḥ |
deśakālādyapekṣāyāmapi naiva sattāyāṃ nāstitvamabhidhātuṃ yuktam | vibhutvanityatvābhyāṃ sarvadeśakālavyāpitvāt |

ya eva hyastiśabdena dvitīyo bhāvavikāra ucyatejai. sū. ( 6﻿—3﻿—4 ) ityetreti śeṣaḥ | | jāyamānavipariṇāmādyavasthasarvavastuṣu vinaśyattāparyanteṣu vastvākṛtipratipattirdṛśyate | tena yadi nāma mahāsāmānyamabhidheyaṃ pratijñāyate tato vastvarthaḥ sarvaśabdānāmiti pratyāyyalakṣaṇamiti kāmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nāstyartha iti | na cāvayavārthaparityāgena sacchabdasattāśabdau vartete iti bhavacchabdavadevā
stīti sadbhāvaḥ satteti na tu vaiśeṣikaparibhāṣayā yato dravyaguṇakarmasu saditi pratītiḥ sā satteti | evaṃlakṣaṇā jātiḥ pratipattavyā ||

astikṣīrā gauriti tiṅantasamāsatvenānupasaṃkhyānādavaśyaṃbhāvipratyayalakṣaṇadvārasubantatvayogyāvyayapadena saha kṣīrāśabdasyānyapadārthe bahuvrīhirabhyupagantavyaḥ | tatra cāyaṃ sadarthavacanaḥ sakṣīrā gauriti pratyayotpādāt | tataśca vastuni sati ca prayujyamānamastiśabdamupalabhya tadarthānusaraṇapratyāsannaṃ sacchabdaṃ ca devāttaliti ca svārthikaṃ devatetibattalamihāpyastidhātuvācyārthaviśiṣṭakartṛpratītimanaṅgīkṛtya śuddhadhātvarthamātravacanāveva sacchabdasattāśabdau gṛhītvaivaṃ tārkikaiḥ kalpitaṃ sacchabdavācyā sattā mahāsāmānyamiti |
tadukteti﻿—yāvadyāvadvivādāya muktakaṃ dīyate manaḥ | anavasthādidoṣeṇa tāvattāvadvihanyate | ityanena nyāyena ciranikhātataḍāgādigataśaivālavacchuṣkatarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatvena nirākṛtasyāpi punaḥ punarudravena samāpayitumaśakyatvāttārkikoktasyāntagamane﻿—samāpane, anādarādabhiyuktairupekṣitatvātprasiddhaṃ sadimāṃ﻿—yuktāyuktavicārāvasthāṃ prāptamityarthaḥ |taduktāntagamane 'nādarācca padavākyavidbhirapyupekṣitaṃ prasiddhamivemāmavasthāṃ prāptaṃ gavādiśabdavācyatvenāpi saṃbhāvyate |

lg.l:
dharmāntaratvavṛttestu
dharmāntareti﻿—jātyākhyāddharmāddharmāntaratvena﻿—dvitīyabhāvavikāratvena vartamānatvādityarthaḥ | sattāyāḥ kuta eva sā |

div.p: yadevā ' 'kṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktyabhidhānapakṣe vyaktiviśiṣṭākṛtipakṣe vā nirākaraṇakāraṇaṃ tadatrāpi sulabham | viśeṣaṇasya pūrvatarābhidhānaprasaṅgāt |

lg.l: gosattāṃ cāpi gośabdo yadi nāma bravītyayam |
gojātyā vā viśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ vadedvayaktibhireva vā ||

div.p: tatra﻿—

viśeṣaṇamanabhidhāya tadviśiṣṭaviśeṣyābhidhānāsaṃbhavādviśeṣaṇasya ca viśeṣyeṇātyantasaṃbandhātpūrvatarābhihitaviśeṣaṇabhūtagotvasaṃbandhādeva sattāvagamasiddherna tatrābhidhānaśaktikalpanāyāmarthāpattirapyanyathā 'pyupapadyamānaphalatvapratihatā satī na pravartate | tathā vyaktiviśiṣṭasattābhidhāne 'pyeṣa eva nirākaraṇahetuḥ | anityasaṃbandhajñānānantaśabdaśaktivyaktyabhidhānapūrvakaikasattābhidhānakalpanāyāśca kevalavyaktyabhidhānapakṣavadanupapattiḥ | yattu apūrvadevatāsvargaiḥ samamāhuriti |
tatrābhidhīyate﻿—

kecicchrutārthāpattyā kecidvākyaśeṣavākyāntaraparyupasthāpitārthaviśeṣavacanā eva santo 'tyantāvyabhicārisvārthadvāreṇa sattāṃ gamayanto 'nabhidhāyakatvenāvadhāryante na sattāpadārtho vyabhicaratīti lakṣaṇayaiva tebhyaḥ sattāpratītiḥ |

sarvapadārthānāmiva kāryārthāpattigamyāni sāmarthyāni santi yāgādijanitaṃ ca puṃsāṃ phalaprāptisāmarthyamapūrvaśabdavācyaṃ yāgānuṣṭhānātpūrvamabhūtamanuṣṭhānottarakālaṃ cāpūrvaṃ jāyata iti yaugikatvādevāpūrvaśabdābhidhānaṃ sarvatra labhyate | tathā dīvyanti dyotante vā candrādityāgnigrahanakṣatrātārakādirūpeṇa vāyavaśca satatagatyā stūyante sarvairmantrairiti devāḥ sujñānaśabdasaṃbandhā viśeṣarūpaireveti na sattāgocaratvaṃ pratipadyante | tathā svargaśabdenāpi nakṣatradeśo vā vaidikapravādapaurāṇikayājñikadarśanenocyate yathā hi vede ‘ye hi janāḥ puṇyakṛtaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti teṣāmetāni jyotīṃṣi nakṣatrāṇi tathā caiṣa jyotiṣmantaṃ puṇyalokaṃ jayati’ iti | yadi vetihāsapurāṇopapannaṃ merupṛṣṭham | atha vā 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vibhaktaṃ kevalameva sukhaṃ yatsaṃvatsarādiṣvanubhūyamānaṃ duḥkhasādhanaśītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādisamastadvaṃdvarahitārthāpattisiddhadeśāntarānubhavanīyaṃ, tacca yadyapi tādṛśamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ tathā 'pi miśrānubhavādeva vivekenoddhṛtya svargaśabdārthatvena jñāyamānaṃ sattāṃ gamayatīti na tadabhidhānamapekṣyate |
kiṃ tāvatprāptam﻿—

‘vrīhīnavahanti’ ‘paśuṃ saṃjñapayati’ ‘somamabhiṣuṇoti’ ‘pāvayati’ somena paśunā vrīhimiśca yajata iti yāvanta evamādayo vināśimūrtimadviṣayāḥ saṃskārāḥ prayojanasiddhayarthā vā teṣāṃ prayogacodanāyā ākṛtāvabhāvādvyaktau tu bhāvātkāryapradhānatvācca padārthapratītervidhyadhīnatvācca sarvapuruṣaceṣṭānāmavaśyaṃ vidhiviṣayatvayogyavākyārthapūraṇasamarthapadārthakalpanamaṅgīkartavyam | tathā yadapi ‘brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ’ ‘na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayitavyam’ ityādipratiṣedhavidhānaṃ tadapi prāptipūrvakatvena sāpekṣatvādvyaktau ca prāptisaṃbhavādākṛteścānadhikārādasatyāṃ prāptāvanarthakameva syāt | tasmādyena

śabdārthena prayogacodanānāṃ bhāvo bhavati sa evābhyupagantuṃ nyāyyo na tattvajñānamātrādṛṣṭisiddhayarthapadārthakalpanā yukteti | syādetat, vyaktisaṃbhavatprayogacodanāsu vyaktyarthastato 'nyatrā ' 'kṛtyartha eva bhaviṣyatīti | tadasat | nyāyena hi sthitamekasya śabdasyārthaikyamanavasthitasaṃbandhānekādṛṣṭavācakaśaktikalpanavikalpadoṣaprasaṅgāt | saṃbaddhānāṃ cārthānāmanyatarābhidhānenaivetaratra pratipattisiddheḥ | kathaṃ tarhyākṛtipratyaya iti cedata āha—avibhāgāt iti | yatastu nityameva vyaktyākṛtyoravibhāgastasmāvdyaktirabhihitā satī śaknotyevā 'kṛtiṃ gamayitum | taduktaṃ jai. ( 1-1-7 ) |tadbhūtādhikaraṇe | yasya tu padasya yo 'rtho 'bhidheyatvenā ' 'śritastasya tatparihārāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃ
tatrasthasyeti tasminnevārthe vartamānasya śabdasyetyarthaḥ |tatrasthasyaivārthāntaraṃ lākṣaṇikatvenābhyupagantavyamiti | api cā ' 'kṛtipadārthakasya vyaktiṣu sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvānnirṇayo na syādvayaktipadārthakasya punaratyantāntarbhūtākṛtiniścayasiddherna śabdavyāpārakalpanopapattiḥ | tasmādvayaktireva śabdārtho nā ' 'kṛtiḥ | na ca vikalpasamuccayasaṃbandhasamudāyānyataraviśiṣṭānyatarābhidhānapakṣāḥ saṃbhavantyavibhāgādeva sarveṣāmapi jñānasiddheḥ || 30 ||

gośabdādīnāmākṛtivacanatve gauḥ śuklaḥ, ‘aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā gavā krīṇāti’ iti ‘ṣaḍgāvo deyāḥ’ ‘ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt’ ityevamādiṣu prayogeṣu sarveṣāṃ jātiguṇamātravacanatvātsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāpnoti |

lg.l: na hi gotvātkṛtiḥ śuklā nāruṇā nāpi ṣaḍguṇā |

div.p: jātiguṇaviśiṣṭavyaktivacanatvena śuddhavyaktivacanatvena vā pratyakṣe bhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ, tacca tatra dravyam | evaṃvidhamapi samānadravyaśabdatvaṃ tvatpakṣe na syāditi nañā tadabhāvaprasaṅgaṃ darśayati | yattu bhāṣyakāro viparītārthena dravyaśabdenaiva tadāśrayaguṇalakṣaṇayā nañaścāsamarthasamāsamaṅgīkṛtya na dravyāśrayavacanaḥ śabdo bhavet | ākṛtivādina ityāha | tadatikliṣṭaṃ vyadhikaraṇanirdiṣṭaguṇaprayogārhaṃ cetyupekṣitavyam | tatrāpi caivamakṣarārthamātrasaṃbhavayojanā | dravyāśrayasya guṇasya yaḥ śabdo 'dravyaśabdaḥ sa ākṛternirguṇatvādekavākyasaṃbandhaṃ gotvaṃ śuklamityādivanna pratipadyate | sāmānādhikaraṇyacodyaṃ tu svapakṣe 'pyaviśeṣāttadānīmapyanupapannameveti pūrvaiva vyākhyā kartavyā || 31 || 32 ||

kiṃ ca
‘anyadarśanācca’ iti pūrvapakṣasūtragataṃ bhāṣyaṃ spaṣṭatvādupekṣya, ‘ākṛtistu kriyārthatvāt’ iti siddhāntasūtragataṃ ‘śyenacitaṃ cinvīta’ iti vacanamākṛtau saṃbhavatīti bhāṣyaṃ yathāśrutārthamasaṃgatabhiva manvāno duṣṭatvena buddhisthaṃ dūṣayitumupakramate—kiṃcetyādinā | naiveṣṭakābhirākṛtisaṃpādanamabhyupagataṃ yataḥ svabhāvātsnāyvādyārabdhadravyasamavāyitvenopālambhaḥ syātpiṣṭapiṇḍasiṃhavatsādṛśyasaṃpattiḥ pakṣadvaye 'pi codanārthaḥ | sā tvākṛtyantaravilakṣaṇaśyenākṛtyā syānna tu vyaktyantaravilakṣaṇaśyenaviśeṣeṇāsādhāraṇena vā | nirvikalpatvātsāmānyaviśeṣānapekṣaṃ vyaktimātrasādṛśyamavidheyaṃ, sarvadravyeṣu tulyatvāt | ekavyaktiparigrahācca vyaktyantareṇa sādṛśyaṃ na kāryaṃ syāt | tasmācchayenacitkriyā
vyaktau śabdārthe na saṃbhavati | na sādhakatama iti | na hyevaṃ smṛtiḥ śyenaiścīyata iti śyenacit, ‘karmaṇyagnyākhyāyām’pā. sū. ( 3 | 2 | 92 ) | iti hi sā | śyenaṃ cayanena sādhayeditīpsitatamatvam | tatrāpi ‘mukhyāsabhavātsādṛśyaparigrahaḥ | asādhāraṇe śabdapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt’
asādhāraṇetyārabhyetaratrā ' 'kṛtirityanto vārtikagranthaḥ yathā ākṛtiḥśabdārtha ityārambha—śakyata āśrayitumityantabhāṣyagranthavyākhyānārthastathānyāyasudhāyā vistaraḥ | avyapadeśyatvena
ca sarvatrāviśeṣāt, sāmānyākāreṇa ca nirūpaṇe vikalpāt, vyāpakāpekṣayā, vyāpyasāmānyasya naiva viśeṣavyāpyāpekṣayetaratrā ' 'kṛtiḥ | tatra viśeṣapakṣe saṃbandhānanvākhyānavyabhicārasāmānyabuddhayabhāvapratyarthaśaktikalpanādayo doṣāḥ | na ca yatra saṃśayastatpratyāyyaṃ bhavatīti nirviṣayatā śabdasya | etena svatantrobhayābhidhānamārgaḥ pratyuktaḥ | vyaktiviśiṣṭākṛtimārgo 'pi ‘nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā’ iti nyāyādvyakteḥ prathamagrahaṇaprasaṅgāt saṃbandhasamudāyayorapi svarūpapratyayābhāvātsarvatra cāviśeṣādavaśyaṃ saṃbandhisamudāyiviśeṣaṇatā 'bhyupagantavyā bhavati | tatrāpi śaktitrayakalpanā | vyaktyaṃśe coktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ | na ca vyaktyākṛtyorbhinnakāryayorguṇapradhānanānāvasthayoḥ samudāyopagamanaṃ yuktam | anatyantabhedācca bhinnadharmau saṃbandhasamudāyau na yuktau | ākṛtiviśiṣṭo 'pi vyaktiviśeṣo naiva pratīyate | vyaktiviśeṣabuddhayabhāvād vyaktimātramiti cenna | tadānīṃ tasyā ' 'kṛtito 'nyatvenānirūpaṇāt | mātraśabdo hi sāmānyavācītyākṛtirevocyate | nānākāreṣu ca vastuṣu tadbhedānusāritvācchaktīnāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ gotvākāranibandhanaiva gośabdavācyatvaśaktirgamyate tadekādhārasāmānyāntarāvagatirviśeṣākāṅkṣā vetyarthavyāpyavyāptimyām | anatyantavyatirekāccā ' 'kṛteramūrtatvādyāśrayadoṣāprasaṅgaḥ | sā hi pratīyate niṣkṛṣṭarūpā, kriyāyoginī tu vyaktyupetā bhavatyeveti prokṣaṇāvekṣaṇādi tu na kathaṃcinna saṃbhavati | viśa
sanādyapi tu vyaktyavyatirekāpekṣayā saṃbhavatyeva | tathā hi—paśvādiṣvapanītāṅgeṣu viśeṣabuddhayabhāvātsāmānyarūpaiva viśasanādiviśiṣṭā buddhirdṛṣṭā | nanvevamanityā ' 'kṛtiḥ syāt | tenāṃśeneṣṭaiva | āśrayāntarāvināśāttu sarvairapyavināśo 'vaśyamevaiṣṭavyaḥ | tena yattāvanmātrameva tasya vināśo 'nekadeśasya tu na kathaṃcidvināśaḥ syādityubhayathā vyavahāraḥ | atyantavyatireke tu naiva dharmavidhiviṣayo vyavatiṣṭheta | na ca paśutvamamūrtatvāt | tadupalakṣitaṃ tu yaddravyaṃ taddravyatvādṛte na tādrūpyeṇa gamyata ityekārthasamavāyādvyāpakatvācca dravyaṃ gamayitavyaṃ, tatrāpyamūrtatvaṃ doṣaḥ | āśrayopalakṣaṇācca dravyamātraprasaṅgaḥ | viśeṣastu paśutvasya vā dravyatvasya vā 'vyāpakatvādagamyaḥ | na vā 'pratītaṃ vidhinā saṃbadhyate | na ca yatra saṃśayastatpratītam | na cānyatrokto dharmastatrāsaṃbhavādanyatra kāryaḥ | tasmānna sāmānye kṛto viśeṣeṣu yuktaḥ, viśeṣā api vyapadeśātsāmānyamevetyamūrtatā | asādhāraṇena tu naiva vyavahārastasmādanirūpyo dharmavidhiviṣayaḥ | sāmānādhikaraṇyādi ca prasiddhiviparītaṃ lakṣaṇayā kalpyam | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu vyatirekābhyupagamenā ' 'śrayamātragatiruktā viśeṣarūpā na kadācid vyaktiḥ pratīyate | yo 'pyāśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ so 'pyaupacārikaḥ | sāmānyācca viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ tatra nā ' 'śrayitavyam | ākṣepamātrabhāvādatha vaitadviṣaya evāyaṃ prapañcaḥ kiṃ śabdenā ' 'kṛtyā veti | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cā ' 'kṛtyeti nirṇayaḥ | yo hi dhūmādagnimattvaṃ pratipadyate tasya taikṣṇye 'pyākāṅkṣā siddhā | mānasādapacārāditi | yo hi jāḍyātsāmānyavācitāṃ hitvā kaṃcideva viśeṣaṃ yatra saṃbandhānupavastaṃ vācyaṃ manyate tasya sāmānyāpratīterna viśeṣāntarāpekṣā bhavati | atha vā yathā śabdātsvatantrāmākṛtiṃ budhyate naivaṃ kadācidākṛtimabuddhvā vyaktimiti | kena tarhi gotvāgośabdayorviśeṣaḥ | vyatirekāṃśasyaikatra vivakṣā | gotvavāniti tu sphuṭaṃ pratyayena jātimadabhidhānaṃ vibhāgopapatteḥ | sāmānyasya vopalakṣaṇatvānna bhedapakṣadoṣaḥ | bhedānāmeva cāyaṃ pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ vācakaḥ | yastūpādīyamānatve saṃśayaḥ sa saṃkhyādhāraviṣayaḥ | uddiśyamāneṣu nirṇya eva | gavādiśabdagrahaṇaṃ sarvanāmākhyāśabdānāmantarbhāvārtham | prayojanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdayorekaviṣayatvātsāmānyaśiṣṭasya viśeṣaśiṣṭenābādhaḥ pūrvapakṣe | evaṃ vā—

lg.l: yadarthadyotakau tau tu vācakaḥ sa vicāryete ||
pratīyate viśeṣo yaḥ saṃśayena sa nā 'pyate ||
tato vicāro jāyeta na sāmānyadhiyā vinā ||
kaḥ jai. sū. 2-1-1 ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇa |punarbhāva ityādau vivekenārthanirṇayaḥ |
sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣo vā kiṃ vācyamiti cintyate ||
siddhā seha vivekārthaṃ tatra bhāvasya bhāṣitā ||
eṣā tatra ca cintoktā śeṣā prāsaṅigakī kathā ||
na cā ' 'kṛtyā na ca vyaktyā vinā tannopapadyate ||
dadhi viprebhya ityādau phalaṃ loke bhaviṣyati ||

nanu gauritiśabdādau sarvametadvicāritam
jai sū. ( 1-1-5 ) ityatra vṛttikāramatānuvāde śabdārthasaṃbandhākṣepaparihāragranthe bhāṣyakārairiti śeṣaḥ | |
yā tu śabdārthatā proktā seha siddhā na cintitā ||
ekatve 'pi ca śabdasya siddhe tatreha cintyate |
arthābhede ca cinteyaṃ śabdābhede tu satyāpi |
hananaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ neti pramāṇaṃ cātra nāsti naḥ ||
lokavedayoḥ śabdārthānāmananyatvanirūpaṇāvasare bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ |yaccānyadidamityāha rūpabhedaṃ kriyāśruteḥ ||
tāveva vede śabdārthau loke yāviti bhāṣyate |
arthāntare ca śabdasya na prayogo vidhīyate ||
sarvathā śakyate bhedo na vaktuṃ śabdavācyayoḥ |
yadvā caivaṃ tadā yuktā cinteyaṃ kriyate 'dhunā ||
kimākṛteḥ padārthatvaṃ kiṃ vyakteḥ kiṃ dvayoriti |
bahavaḥ pratibhāntyatra pakṣāḥ pratipadaṃ ca ye ||

div.p:
tenā ' 'dyau dvāveva pakṣau vicāryete kimākṛtiḥ śabdārtho vyaktiriti | bhāṣyakāreṇa ca saṃśayakāraṇamuktaṃ sāmānyapratyayādvayaktau ca kriyāsaṃbhavāditi | etadayuktaṃ, vyakterapi pratīyamānatvātkathaṃ jātereva pratītirupanyasyate | yadi ca vyaktirna saṃpratīyeta tataḥ saṃśaya eva na syātkimabhidhīyate 'neneti | na ca kriyāsaṃbhavo 'bhidheyatve kāraṇaṃ
vyaktyantarāṇāmapi prasaṅgāt | tena pūrvoktameva saṃśayakāraṇaṃ mantavyam | prayogapratītyoḥ sādhāraṇatvācchāstrāntare vyaktipakṣābhyupagamātsaṃśayaḥ | yadvā śabda uccārite sāmānyapratyayād vyaktyākṛtyoḥ sāmānyāttulyātpratyayād vyaktau ca śabdādākṛtāvālambhanasparśanaśyenasadṛśacayanādikriyāsaṃmavātsāmānye vyaktau ca pratyayātkriyāsaṃbhavāditi coktam | kā punarākṛtiḥ kā vyaktiriti | kathaṃ punarayaṃ praśno yadā gaurityetasya śabdasya ko 'rtha ityatra jātirnirūpitā | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yenaitanna jñātamasau pṛcchati kā punarākṛtiḥ kā vyaktiriti | saṃdehādvā 'tra punarubhayasminpratīyamāne kā vyaktiḥ kiyatī vā jātiriti | vaiparītyena vā kaścitpṛcchati yadā śābaleyādipiṇḍānna kiṃcid vyaktaṃ vastvantaraṃ bhinnamupalabhyate tadā kuto 'yaṃ viveko vyaktiriyaṃ jātiriyamiti | atha vā vyavahārārthaṃ sarvaiva cintā kriyate jāteśca padārthatve 'pi vyaktau kriyāsaṃbhavānniṣprayojanā cintā yatastvasau prayatnenaitadvicārayati | tena nūnaṃ kā 'pyasya piṇḍādatyantabhinnavyavahārayogyā jātirabhipretetyabhiprāyaḥ | tatrā ' 'ha | dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sāmānyamātramākṛtiriti | yau tāvadajñānasaṃśayavādinau tayoḥ svarūpakathanamātreṇaiva nirākaraṇaṃ vaktavyam | yastu viparītavādī tasyaiva nirākaraṇamabhidhīyate | yadyapi jātirvyakteratyantabhinnā nopalabhyate tathā 'pi śabalākāre tasminnupalabhyamāne sāmānyabuddherālambanaṃ prathamapādoktena nyāyenā ' 'kṛtiritarā vyaktiḥ | na cānena granthena jāteḥ sadbhāvaḥ pramāṇaṃ vā pratipādyate vyaktervivekaḥ kevalaḥ kathyate | tenaivābhiprāyeṇa mātraśabdaprayogo 'nyathā tasya gatārthataiva bhavet | yadapyuktaṃ nūnaṃ kā 'pyatyantabhinnā jātirabhipreteti | tasyāpyuttaraṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sāmānyamātramākṛtirabhipretā nātyantavyatirikteti | dravyādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yatsāmānyaṃ sattārūpaṃ tadanena nirdiśyate, tannirdeśenāvāntarasāmānyānāmapi nirdeśasiddhiḥ | yadvā sāmānyaśabdasya pratyekaṃ saṃbandhāddravyatvādīni trīṇi sāmānyāni nirdiśyante sattayā vyavahārābhāvāt | atha vā mātraśabdaprayogāddravyādiṣu yāvantyavāntarasāmānyāni mahāsāmānyaṃ ca tatsarvamabhidhīyate | asādhāraṇaviśeṣā vyaktiriti bahuvrīhiḥ | asādhāraṇā viśeṣā yasyāṃ vyaktau seyamasādhāraṇaviśeṣā, na tvasādhāraṇāśca te viśeṣāśceti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃbhavati | upariṣṭādviśeṣādhārasya vyaktitvābhidhānāt | smṛteśca
nityadravyavṛttayo viśeṣā iti smṛtiḥ | | tena samyagabhihitaṃ kimākṛtirvā vyaktiriti | kiṃ prāptam | ālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādiprayogacodanāyā vyaktipakṣe bhāvādākṛtipakṣe cābhāvāt ‘brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ’ ‘surā na pātavyā’ ityādipratiṣedhacodanāyāśca vyaktipakṣa eva saṃbhavāddevadatta gāmabhyājetyebamādilaukikavyavahāracodanāyāścopapattervyaktiḥ śabdārtha iti niścīyate | saṃkhyākārakopapatteśca | yadi hi vyaktiḥ
śabdārtho bhavati tato vṛkṣau vṛkṣābhyāmiti prātipadikābhihitāsu vyaktiṣu pratyayābhihitadvitvādisaṃkhyākaraṇādikārakaṃ vobhayamupapadyate, itaratra tu jāterasaṃkhyeyatvādakārakātvāccobhayamapyanupapannam | lākṣaṇikavyaktyāśrayaṇaṃ cā ' 'padyetām | tathā ca sarvavaidikavākyārthānāṃ lākṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt | vyaktipakṣe ca puruṣo devadatta iti mukhyaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyopapattiḥ | jātipakṣe lākṣaṇikadvāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ bhavettenāpi vyakteḥ padārthatvamavasīyate | ‘paśumālabheta’ iti ca śruterhṛdayajihvādibhirvyaktyavayavairupariṣṭād vyavahāro dṛśyate na jāṃtyā karmabhiśca dravyasyāpekṣitatvād | vyaktipakṣe 'pekṣitābhidhānaṃ netaratra, siddhasvarūpāyāśca vyakterabhidheyatvaṃ yuktaṃ nāprasiddhāyā jāterato vyaktiḥ śabdārthaḥ | kimityubhayaṃ vācyaṃ nā ' 'śrīyate prayogapratītikriyopapatteriti cet | na | anekaśaktikalpanāprasaṅgādekābhidhānenaiva saṃbandhāditaratra pratīterupapannatvād vyakterevābhidheyatvam | sāmānyapratyayaḥ kathamiti ced vyaktisaṃbandhādupapatsyate | yatraiva kriyānupapattistatraivārthāpattyā vyaktivacanatvaṃ yuktam, anyatra tu pūrvapratīterjātivacanatvameva nyāyyamiti cet | na | uktamārgeṇānekaśaktikalpanādidoṣaprasaṅgāt | avanasthitaśabdārthasaṃbandhāpatteḥ saṃśayāpatteśca | vyaktivādinaḥ kathaṃ nirnimittatā vyaktyantare śabdasya pravṛttiriti cedākṛticihnanimittatvād vyaktyantare prayogasyāvirodhaḥ | bhāṣyakārastu kathaṃ sāmānyāvagatiḥ—ityupanyasya, ākṛtiścihnabhūtā bhaviṣyatītyuttaraṃ dadāti, tadasaṃbaddham | kathaṃ sāmānyapratyayaḥ kāraṇe pṛṣṭe vyaktyantaraprayoganimittaṃ kathyate | tenādhyāhāreṇaitad vyākhyeyam | kathaṃ sāmānyāvagatiriti cet | vyaktisaṃbandhāt | kathaṃ vyaktyantare prayogaḥ, cihnatvādākṛterityevam | yadvā kathaṃ sāmānyāvagatiriti tedityupanyaste pūrvapakṣavādī sāmānyāvagatimapahnotumaśaknuvannākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktyabhidhānapakṣaṃ parigṛhṇātyākṛtiścihnabhūtā viśeṣaṇabhūtā 'bhidheyā bhaviṣyati | ataśca tatpratītiracodyā | tena kevalā viśiṣṭā vā vyaktiḥ śabdārthaḥ | tathā ca ‘ṣaṅ deyā’ ityevamādiṣu ṣaḍādikā saṃkhyopapatsyate | anyaṃ tadvarṇamiti ca vyaktyantare 'nyaśabdopapattistaddharmatā ca bhaviṣyati | anyathā vyaktyantarānayane 'pi jāterananyatvādaguṇatvāccobhayamanupapannaṃ, tasmād vyaktiḥ śabdārtha iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | naitad vyaktiḥ śabdavācyeti kiṃ tvākṛtiḥ padārtha iti vijñāyate | ‘śyenacitaṃ cinvīta’ iti śravaṇāt | atra hi śyenavyaktiṃ cayanena kuryādākṛtiṃ veti vākyārthau syātām | yāvadiṣṭakābhiḥ śyenavyakteḥ kartumaśakyatvāt snāyvādibhirapyanirvṛtteriṣṭakābādhācchenavyakteḥ prayojanakalpanāccinoteramukhyārthatvāt ‘karmaṇyagnyākhyāyām’pā. sū. ( 3—2—92 ) | iti smṛtiparityāgaprasaṅgācca cayanena śyenavyaktiṃ kuryādityevaṃ tāvannopapadyate | tathā ' '
kṛterapīṣṭakābhiḥ kartumaśakyatvāddaivanirmitatvātprayojanakalpanāccinoterayathārthatvaprasaṅgātsmṛtibādhāccā ' 'kṛtiṃ kuryādityapi nopapadyate | pariśeṣācchayenamiva citamagnisthalaṃ cayanena nirvartayediti vākyārthaḥ, tataśca yayā kayā cicchayenavyaktyā sadṛśasyāgneścetumaśakyatvātsarvavyaktisādṛśyāsaṃbhavādatītānāgatavyaktisādṛśyānupapatteśca śyenākṛtisādṛśyasaṃpattisaṃbhavāccā ' 'kṛtiḥ śabdārthaṃ iti niścīyate |

atha kasmācchayenavyaktibhiścayanacodaneyaṃ nā ' 'śnīyate ‘śyenacitaṃ cinvīta’ iti | tatra bhāṣyakāreṇottaraṃ dattam | īpsitatamo hyasau śyenaśabdena nirdiśyata iti | tadayuktam | na hyatra śyenaśabdaḥ svārtho, na ca sakalaśyenacicchabdottarakālaṃ śrutatvād dvitīyāyāstada
naca śyenaśabdo dvitīyānta ityarthaḥ |nto, yenepsitatamārthapratipādakaḥ syāt | tena karmaṇyagnyākhyāyāmiti smṛteḥ śyenaśabdārthasya karaṇatvaṃ niṣeddhavyam | karmaṇi hi kārake cinoteḥ kvippratyayaḥ smaryate yadi cinotiragnyākhyā bhavati | na ca cinoteḥ kevalasyāgnivacanatvaṃ saṃbhavati | tena kvibantacinotiśruteḥ śyenacicchabdasya sakalasyāgnivacanatvaṃ niścīyate na śyenaśabdasya pṛthagarthatā | tena śyenaśabdārthaḥ karaṇatayā vijñāyate | yadi vā 'sau karaṇaṃ syāttato lakṣaṇābhāvāttṛtīyāsamāsavacanānupapattirbhavet | tṛtīyā cāśrutā kālpanīyā | śrutakaraṇatve iṣṭakāparityāgaśca syāt | satyāṃ ca gatau pratiṣiddhānekaśyenavyaktihiṃsā jāyate tena karaṇatvānupapatteḥ śyenamiva citamagniṃ cinvīteti vākyārtho 'taścoktena nyāyenāsya vākyasyā ' 'kṛtipakṣe saṃbhavādākṛtiḥ padārtha iti | naitadevam | na hi cayanakriyāsaṃbhavamātreṇā ' 'kṛterabhidheyatvaṃ labhyate | vyaktipakṣe 'bhyupalambhanādikriyāsaṃbhavāt | bahutvāccālambhanādivākyānāṃ tadanyathānupapattyā vyaktereva padārthatvamavasīyate | athā ' 'kṛtipakṣe 'pi vyaktilakṣaṇayā tānyupapatsyanta ityucyate tadaitadapi śakyameva vaktuṃ śyenavākye vyaktirākṛtilakṣaṇārtheti | yuktā caikatra lakṣaṇā netareṣu bahuṣu | agatyā vā tṛtīyāsamāsāśrayaṇaṃ śyenavākye karīṣyate | saṃkhyākārakādyupapattiśca vyaktipakṣe tena vyaktiḥ śabdārtha iti sthite 'bhidhīyate jātirabhidheyeti | kutaḥ—

gośabdoccāraṇe hi pūrvamevāgṛhītāsu vyaktiṣu sāmānyaṃ pratīyate tadākārajñānotpattepaścādvyaktayaḥ pratīyante 'taścā ' 'kṛtipratyayasya nimittāntarābhāvādvyaktipratyaye ca pūrvapratītasāmānyanimittatvādākṛtiḥ śabdārtha iti vijñāyate | yadi ca vyaktayo 'bhidheyā bhaveyustatastāsāṃ citrakhaṇḍabhuṇḍādiviśeṣasvarūpagrahaṇādvicitrā śabdoccāraṇe buddhi syāt | ekākārā tūtpadyate | tenāpyākṛtiḥ śabdārtha iti niścīyate | gāmānayeti codite 'rtha
prakaraṇābhāve yāṃ kāṃ citsāmānyayuktāṃ vyaktimānayati na sarvāṃ na viśiṣṭām | yadi ca vyakterabhidheyatvaṃ tataḥ sarvāsāṃ yugapadabhihitatvādaśeṣānayanaṃ syāt | yā vā 'bhidheyā saivaikā ' 'nīyeta yatastvaviśeṣeṇa jātimātrayuktā ' 'nīyate tenāpi sāmānyasya padārthatvaṃ vijñāyate | vyaktipakṣe ca sarvā vā svatantrā vyaktayo 'bhidhīyeran vyaktiviśiṣṭo vā samudāyaḥ kā cidvaikā vyaktiriti | tatra sarvavyaktyabhidhānaṃ tāvadayuktam | anekavācakaśaktikalpanāprasaṅgādanityaśabdārthasaṃbandhāpatteraśeṣavyaktigrahaṇāśakteśca saṃbandhāgrahaṇe sati vyavahārānupapatteḥ | nityavad gośabdasyāṣṭaśabdavadbahuviṣayatvādekavacanadvivacanaśrutyasaṃbhavādgośabdābhihitāsu ca sarvavyaktiṣu śuklaguṇābhāve gauḥ śukla iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāsaṃbhavāt | ‘paśunā yajeta’ iti ca paśuśabdopāttābhiḥ sarvavyaktibhiryāgasya kartumaśakyatvāttataśca vedāprāmāṇyaprasaktiḥ | evaṃ samudāyapakṣo 'pi na saṃbhavati | tatrāpi hi viśeṣaṇatvena vyaktayo 'bhidhātavyāstataścoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ | vyaktivyatiriktasamudāyakalpanā, tena ca vyavahārābhāvādabhidhānānarthakyaṃ samudāyivināśe ca tasyāpyanityatvādanityaśabdārthasaṃbandhaprasaṅgaḥ | samudāyasya caikatvādadvivacanabahuvacanānupapattiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāsaṃbhavaśca | tena cāmūrtena yāgādyasaṃbhavādvedasyāprāmāṇyam | athaikā vyaktirabhidhīyata ityucyate tatrāpi saṃbandhānityatvaṃ, kā 'sāvabhidhīyata ityajñānādvayavahārāṇāmasaṃbhavaḥ sāmānyapratyayānupapattirdvivacanabahuvacanābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ | prāk cābhidheyavyaktyutpatteruttarakālaṃ ca prayogāsaṃbhavaḥ | samāne ca gotve pratītau ceyamabhidhīyate neyamiti viśeṣakāraṇaṃ nāsti | ataḥ paraṃ bhāṣyārthaḥ | yadi caikā vyaktirabhidheyā bhavedvayaktyantare prayogo na syādabhidheyavyakte statrābhāvādatyantavilakṣaṇatvācca, sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktā hi vyaktirityucyate | na ca sāmānyaviśeṣau muktvā vyaktyantare 'nyadasti yena śabdaprayogaḥ syāt | nanu ca yathaivaikā sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktā tathā dvitīyā yataśca yathaivaikasyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktāyāṃ śabdasya pravṛttirevamaviśeṣāditaratrāpi bhaviṣyati | yadi sāmānyarūpaṃ viśeṣarūpaṃ vā vyaktyantaraṃ syāttato vilakṣaṇatvācchabdo na pravartate, yadā tu tadapyubhayavinirmuktaṃ rūpaṃ tadā tulyarūpatvādayuktā śabdasya pravṛttiriti | yadyevaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktatvādekatretaratra ca śabdo vartate hanta tarhi sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktatvameva sāmānyaṃ śabdasyābhidheyaṃ syāditi siddho naḥ pakṣaḥ | tasyā ' 'kṛtiśabdavācyatve kevalaṃ bhavataḥ pradveṣa iti | pūrvapakṣavādyāha naivaṃ mayocyate sāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktatvādvayaktau śabdo vartate vyaktyantare veti, kiṃ tu sāmānyaviśeṣavyatirekeṇānyāpohavadvayaktiḥ kathyate | tatra kathaṃ sāmānyameva tarhi vācyamityucyate yo hyarthaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣāṇāṃ cā ' 'śrayaḥ sā vyaktirna sāmānyaviśeṣau | tataśca yathaivaikasyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavyatiriktāyāṃ vyaktau
śabdasya vṛttistathā 'nyasyāmapi bhaviṣyati | siddhāntavādyāha—yadi tāvatsāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktatvācchabdo vartate tataḥ sāmānyameva vācyam | atha samānaṃ nimittaṃ nāsti tadā vyaktyantare vṛttirna prāpnoti | tadabhāve 'pi cedvarteta tato 'śvavyaktāvapi vṛttiprasakteratiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi | naivam | sāmānyanirapekṣāyāmeva śabdapravṛttau prayogakṛtavyavasthāśrayaṇānnātiprasaṅgo bhaviṣyati, | yadyevaṃ prayogavaśena śabdo varteta tato 'dya jātāyāṃ gavi na dṛṣṭa iti śabdo na pravarteta tena prayogakṛtā cevdyavasthā kva cidaprasaṅgo na cedatiprasaṅga iti | yattu bhinnāsu vyaktiṣu sāmānyapratyayo na prāpnotyayamapi gaurayamapīti tadihātiprasaṅgāpādanena na saṃbadhyata iti vyaktyantare prayogo na prāpnotītyasminnavasare vaktavyam | śaktyā tarhi vyavasthā bhaviṣyati, yatra śaktaḥ śabdastatra vartiṣyate prayokṣyate ca yatra tu śaktirnāsti tatra prayogapravṛttī na bhaviṣyatastataśca govyaktiṣveva śakteḥ prayogavyavasthā bhaviṣyati | naivamapi vyavasthā labhyate | prāk prayogācchabdaśakteravijñānātprayogapratītyadhīnaṃ hi śabdaśaktijñānaṃ tatkathamivānutpannaṃ prayogakāle vyavasthākāraṇatvenā ' 'śrayituṃ yuktam | yadyapi śrotā prayogācchaktiṃ jānāti tathā 'pi prayoktrā kathaṃ jñātaṃ govyaktāvayaṃ śaktaḥ śabdo nāśvavyaktāviti, tenāśvavyaktāvapi prayogaḥ prāpnoti | jātyā kimiti vyavasthā nā ' 'śrīyate yatra gotvamupalakṣaṇaṃ tatra śabdo vartiṣyate yatra tannāsti tatrāśvavyaktyādau vṛttirna bhaviṣyati tataśca vyavasthāsiddhiriti | satyamevaṃ sidhyati, kiṃ tvāpanno bhavānasmatpakṣamākṛtirvācyeti | na hyanabhidhāya gotvamupalakṣaṇaṃ govyaktāveva prayogavyavasthā labhyate taccedabhihitaṃ siddhamākṛtiśabdārthatvamiti | pūrvapakṣavādī tu dvitīyaṃ pūrvapakṣamupanyasyati satyamākṛtirabhidhīyate kiṃ tu guṇatvena sthitā vyaktiḥ prādhānyena śabdārthaḥ | na cā ' 'vayorubhayaṃ nābhidhīyata iti pratijñā | kasya citprādhānyena kiṃ cidabhidheyatayā vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ cidguṇatvena, taduktaṃ vyaktiḥ prādhānyenābhidheyeti | evaṃ sati prayogavyavasthobhayapratītiśca tathā ' 'lambhanādikriyopapattiśca bhaviṣyati | itarastvāha—maivaṃ labhyate | jātiścetpūrvamabhidheyatvenābhyupagatā 'traiva śabdasyopakṣīṇaśaktitvānna vyaktivacanatā labhyate | na cā ' 'kṛtisaṃvedanenāpi vyaktipratīteranyathā 'pyupapannatvātsatyāṃ gatāvanekārthatā yujyate 'bhyupagantum | arthāpattyā ca śabdasya vācakaśaktiḥ kalpyate | sā ca yadā vyaktipratīteranyathā 'pyupapannatvāt kṣīṇā tadā vācakaśaktikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti | na ca sāmānyaviśeṣavacanatvaṃ śabdasya dṛṣṭamakṣādiśabdānāmanekasāmānyavacanatvāt | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca vyakteraśabdārthatvaṃ niścīyate | anuccarite 'pi śabde pratītasāmānyasya vyaktipratīteḥ śrutiśabdasyāpi cāgṛhītasāmānyasya vyaktipratyayābhāvāttenā ' 'kṛtireva śabdārtha iti |
sāṃprataṃ pakṣāntaramupanyasyati | atha vyaktiviśiṣṭāyāmākṛtau kimiti na vartate | tadetatprayogapratītikriyāsaṃbhavatvena vā pakṣāntaramupanyastam | yadvā vyaktereva śabdārthatvaṃ sādhayitumidamucyate 'nenābhiprāyeṇa, kadā citsiddhāntavādyākṛteḥ śabdārthatvamanenābhyupagatamevā ' 'lambhanādikriyāsaṃbhavaśca bhaviṣyatītyanenābhiprāyeṇa vyakterapi guṇatvenābhidhānamicchati tato 'haṃ pūrvaṃ tāvadviśeṣaṇe vartitumarhatīti vyaktivacanatvameva sādhayiṣyāmīti | itarastu tadabhiprāyaṃ jñātvottaraṃ vadati vyaktyantaraviśiṣṭāyāṃ prayogo na prāpnotīti | yadi hi vyaktiviśiṣṭā jātirabhidhīyate tato vyaktyabhidhānapakṣoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ, anekaśaktikalpanādirūpo vyaktyantare prayogaśca na prāpnoti viśeṣaṇasyānyatvāditi | tena jātireva śabdārthaḥ | nanu guṇabhūtā pratīyate 'taścānyena pradhānenābhidheyena bhavitavyamiti | naivaṃ śabdena tāvatsaivābhidhīyate | yadi vivakṣāvaśenārthādguṇatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ vā bhavati bhavatu nāma na tāvatā śabdābhidheyatvaṃ vyāhanyate | yadā cāsau śabdenābhidhīyate tadā guṇatvaṃ naiva pratīyate tenārthādguṇatvapratītiradoṣaḥ | nanu pūrvapakṣoktaiḥ kāraṇairvyaktereva śabdārthatvaṃ yuktaṃ vyaktyantare prayogo na prāpnotīti cet | ākṛtiścihnabhūtā bhaviṣyati | yathā 'nabhidhīyamānamapi kākanilayanaṃ devadattagṛhaśabdasya svārthamabhidadhataścihnabhūtatāṃ pratipadyate tadvadākṛtiścihnaṃ vyaktyabhidhāne bhaviṣyati | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu daṇḍiśabdo dṛṣṭāntatvenopātto yathā tena na nāma kila daṇḍo 'bhidhīyate | atha ca daṇḍaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyāyyate tadvadākṛtāvapīti | nanu daṇḍiśabde prakṛtyā daṇḍo 'bhidhīyata eva kathamucyate na ca tāvaddaṇḍo 'bhidhīyata iti | kathaṃ copalakṣaṇatvenā ' 'kṛtāvupanyastāyāṃ viśiṣṭaḥ
pratyāyyata iti viśeṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayopanyastamiti | nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | viśeṣyābhidhāyakapratyayābhiprāyatvāddaṇḍānabhidhānasya | yathā pratyayena na ca tāvaddaṇḍo 'bhidhīyate | atha ca tadviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyāyyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ | yattūpalakṣaṇopanyāse viśeṣaṇasya dṛṣṭāntatā na yukteti | tadupalakṣaṇasyāpi viśeṣakatvānna codyam | yadvā kenacitsāmānyena dṛṣṭāntatā bhaviṣyatyanabhidheyatvena viśeṣakatvena cetyaduṣṭaṃ, tataśca samyagabhihitaṃ yathā daṇḍiśabde tadvadatrāpi bhaviṣyatīti | evaṃ cāprasaṅgātiprasaṅgau na bhaviṣyata iti | tadetanna yujyate | yuktaṃ devadattagṛhasya puruṣasya ca kevalasyābhidhānaṃ viśiṣṭapratītāvapi kākanilayanadaṇḍayoḥ pratyakṣadaṇḍaśabdāvagatayorviśeṣaṇatvopapatteḥ | na tu gotvasyāsaṃnihitasyehopalakṣaṇatvaṃ yujyate | apratītaviśeṣaṇe viśeṣyāpratīteḥ | na ca daṇḍiśabdavattadavayavena gotvābhidhānaṃ pratīmo yena dvitīyāvayavena vyakterevābhidhānaṃ syāt | ataśca yadi tāvadgotvamabhidhīyate tatastadevoktena nyāyena vācyaṃ bhavet | apratītasya viśeṣaṇatvāsaṃbhavāt | uktavadatiprasaṅgaḥ śabdaprayogasya prāpnoti | na ca yathā daṇḍiśabdaḥ kevale daṇḍe na prayujyata iti viśiṣṭavacano 'vadhāryate tadvadākṛtau prayogābhāvādviśiṣṭavacano 'vadhārayituṃ śakyate | śyenacityādāvākṛtau prayogadarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca jātireva vācyetyavadhāryate śyenacidvākye kevalāyāmākṛtau prayuktatvāt | kvacidapi cā ' 'kṛtyā vinā vyaktimātre prayogādarśanādevaṃ ye 'pi saṃbandhasamudāyādayaḥ pūrvapakṣāste 'pyuktena nyāyena nirākṛtāstenā ' 'kṛtireva śabdārtha iti || 33 ||

ye tvā ' 'lambhanādicodanābhāvādayo ‘na kriyā syāt’ ityetatsūtrānubhāṣitāḥ pūrvapakṣoktā hetavasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmanena sūtreṇa parihāro 'bhidhīyate—‘tadarthatvātprayogasyāvibhāgaḥ’ iti | tadarthatvāt—apūrvārthasvādālambhanaprokṣaṇādyaṅgānāmapūrvasādhane prayogeṇa bhavitavyaṃ dravyaṃ cāpūrvasādhanaṃ yāgena svasiddhayarthamākṣiptatvānnā ' 'kṛtirasamarthatvāttadabhidhānaṃ tu dravyaniyamārthaṃ pratipattavyaṃ na svārthaṃ jāteranapekṣitatvādadṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgātsādhanatvāpratīteśca | yadapi jāteḥ prātipadikābhihitāyāḥ karaṇatvaṃ pratīyate tadapi dravyaniyāmakatvenaiva na sākṣādayogyatvāt | tenā ' 'kṛtyabhidhānasya dravyaniyamārthatvāddravye vā ' 'lambhanaprokṣaṇasaṃkhyākārakasāmānādhikaraṇyādisaṃbhavādaduṣṭatā | tadāha—prayogasyāvibhāga ityākṛtipakṣe 'pyālambhanādiprayogasya dravyādavibhaktataiveti | athavā ' 'kṛtyabhidhānasya dravyaniyamārthatvāduktavatprayogasyāvibhāga iti | yadvā | ākṛtivyaktyoratyantabhedābhāvātkadā civdyaktirūpeṇa dravyamabhidhīyate kadā citsāmānyarūpeṇa yathā vivakṣitaṃ tathā śabdasyobhayarūpavastvarthatvāvdyaktyabhidhāne 'pi na prayogasya vibhāgo nānārūpateti | jātervā vyaktito 'tyantabhedābhāvād vyaktau kṛtā dharmā jātau kṛtā eva bhavantīti na prayogamya vibhāgena prayojanamiti | yadvā | ākṛtivyaktyorubhayoryogārthatvāddhamāṇāṃ ca
yatra kva cana yāgasādhane kṛtānāṃ prayojanavattvādadravyādavibhaktateti |
tasmādākṛtipakṣe 'pyālambhanādisaṃbhavādākṛtireva śabdārtha iti siddham || 35 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilasvāmikṛtau mīmāṃsāvārtike prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ |

div.p: evaṃ smṛtisahitasya vedasya prāmāṇye siddhe 'dhunā vākyārthavyākhyānāvasare satyaparisamāptyaiva pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ kena saṃbandhena nāmadheyacintāyāḥ prastāvaḥ kriyate | ke cittāvadāhuḥ | kimudbhidādayo guṇasya pramāṇamuta kriyāṇāmeva nāmadheyatveneti | tadayuktam | evaṃ sati hi samastameva śāstraṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇādabhinnaṃ syāt | sarvatra hyetadvicāryate, kimidaṃ vākyamasyārthasya pramāṇamutānyasyeti | ye 'pi caite dve api sūtre pūrvottarapakṣau parikalpyaikādhikaraṇatvena vyācakṣate tairapi ‘uktaṃ samāmnāyaidamarthyamityanena sūtreṇa kaḥ siddhāntānabhipretaḥ pūrvapakṣānuguṇo 'rtho vidhīyata iti vaktavyam | na hyuktaidamarthyāntarbhāvacanamudbhidādīnāmaniṣṭam | tasmāddvayorapyadhikaraṇayoranumitapūrvapakṣayoruttarapakṣasūtradvayametaditi vyākhyeyam | tatra prathamaṃ tāvadudbhidādīnudāhṛtya saṃdehaḥ kriyate, kimete kaṃ ciddharmaṃ pratyupayogaṃ gacchantyuta neti | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | ‘āmnāyasya kriyārthatvāt’jai. sū. ( 1-2-1 ) | ityānarthakyam | āha ca |

nahyete vidhyādiṣvantarbhavanti | sādhyasādhanetikartavyatānabhidhāyitvāttāvaccodanābāhyatvaṃ, stutibuddhayabhāvādarthavādātirekaḥ, karmāṅgabhūtaivaṃsaṃjñakaprakāśayitavyārthābhāvānmantrakāryanivṛttiḥ | na cānyadvedaprayojanamastītyapramāṇamevaṃjātīyakā iti | atrābhidhīyate—

yadā tadarthatrayānyatamārthamiti sthitaṃ tadā vicāraḥ kimarthamiti | na tāvadarthavādatvaṃ vākyaśeṣatvābhāvāt | kathaṃ punarayaṃ na vākyaśeṣo yāvatā ‘vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā’ ityādivadekavākyatā 'vagamyate | naitadasti | vidhātavyasya hi yaḥ śeṣaḥ so 'rthavādaḥ | ayaṃ tu vidhyuddeśādeva nātiricyata ityavākyaśeṣaḥ | tatsaṃbhavinaśca stutyupayogitvaṃ na yujyata ityuktamaudumbarādhikaraṇe | na caikapadena stutirdṛṣṭā | na ceha tāṃ pratipadyāmahe | yadapyudbhedanaṃ paśūnāmanena kriyata ityevaṃ prāśastyaṃ kalpyeta tadapi tṛtīyāntasamudāyāśrayabalavattarakaraṇatvaprasiddhayā bādhyate | anyathā hi prātipadikaprādhānyādvā ‘vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā’ itivatprathamaiva prāyokṣyata | na cāsya mantratvaṃ, tādrūpyeṇāpratīteḥ | adhyetṛsmaraṇābhāvācca | na caikapadatvātsākāṅkṣatvaṃ karaṇapratītyā vā smārakatvam | na caitadabhidheyaḥ kaścitprayogasamavāyyartho dṛśyate | na cāsamavetaprakāśane karmāṅgatvam | māntravarṇikadravyakalpanāyāmapi gauravam | na cāsya sūktavākavadviniyojikā śrutirasti yena māntravarṇikadravyakalpanā syāt | na cāsya rūpaṃ prayogārham | ataścāviniyuktatvāt ‘iṣe tvādivadapi nādhyāhāreṇa nirākāṅkṣīkṛtya prayogaḥ | sphuṭaṃ ca brāhyaṇenaikavākyatvamityamantratvam | tasmādvidhyuddeśāntargatasyaivottarādhikaraṇena vicāryate guṇavidhirnāmadheyamiti | tatra tāvat—

prātipadikaṃ tāvadudbhedanasamarthe dravye khanitrādāvavayavaprasiddhayāṃ pravartate | na ca samudāyo 'rthāntaravācī loke prasiddhaḥ | na ca lokādanavagato 'rtho vedādavagamyate saṃbandhasya śāstrāhetutvāt | tṛtīyā 'pi ca karaṇavācinī, kriyāyāśca śaktimad dravyaṃ tadādhārā vā śaktiḥ karaṇaṃ, tenodbhitsādhanako yāgo 'vagamyate | na ca yāgasyodbhittvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kvacitprasiddham arthavattvātpravṛttiviśeṣakaratvam | vidhāyakodbhitpadapuruṣāṇāṃ pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ | anyathā hyanuccaritasamaiva pravṛttireṣāṃ syāt | atha vā prasiddhatvādguṇavidhirarthavattvamabhidheyavattvaṃ nāmadheyatve tvartho na vijñāyata iti yojyate | atha vā bhedenārthavattvaṃ hetuḥ, udbhitpadasya yajitaḥ phalāntaratvāt | tataśca vidhipuruṣayoḥ pravṛtiviśeṣa iti vācyam | nanu nāmadheyamapi kratuṃ viśiṃṣadarthatpravṛttiviśeṣakaraṃ ca syāt | naitadasti | kutaḥ—

yadā tāvaddhātunaiva lakṣaṇayā vidhiviṣayatvayogyatvādyāgaviśeṣaḥ pratipādyate tadā kimaparaṃ tatra nāma kariṣyati | atha sāmānyamātramabhidhīyate tatastasyāniṣṭamevaitannāmetyasaṃ baddhaṃ siddhatvādeva ca viśeṣasya na nāmadheyaṃ vidhāyiṣyata iti vakṣyati | yadā ca kenāpi prakāreṇodbhidādīnāṃ viśeṣavacanatvaṃ tadā tadatyantāvinābhūtasāmānyavacanatvena yajeranarthakatvam | lāghavaṃ ca vidherguṇavidhau bhaviṣyati | yāgānuvādāt | yadyevaṃ guṇākṣiptatvādvidhiśakterna tarhi karma vidhīyate, tathā cāvihite karmaṇi kasya guṇo vidhīyata ityānarthakyamata āha—prakṛtau jyotiṣṭoma iti | nanu guṇavidhipakṣe jyotiṣṭomenetyasyāpi tatparatvādavihitameva karma | gatyabhāvādidamekaṃ karmavidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati | tadvyāvṛtte ca vidhāyake ca guṇasya vidhātumaśakyatvāj jyotiṣṭomapadamevaikaṃ nāmadheyam | atha vā tadekaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭaṃ karmavidhānamitarāṇi karmānuvādena guṇavidhānāni | nanvevaṃ sati sarvā ekāhāhīnasatracodanā jyotiṣṭomasyaiva guṇavidhidvāreṇa prakaraṇādanatiriktā iti karmāntarābhāvānna jyotiṣṭomaḥ kasyacitprakṛtiriti tacchabdena nābhidhātavyaḥ | siddhāntābhiprāyeṇā ' 'heti ke cit | atha vā prakriyata iti prakṛtiḥ, prakṛtajyotiṣṭoma ityarthaḥ |
atha vā ‘athaiṣa jyotiḥ’ ityevamādīnāṃ karaṇavibhaktyākhyātasaṃsparśābhāvādguṇavidhitvānupapatterekāntena bhedakatayā karmanāmatvaṃ tadapekṣayā ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ prakṛtiḥ | nanūtpattivākyaśiṣṭena somena jyotiṣṭomena vā 'varodhājjyotiṣṭome guṇāntaravidhānamayuktam | kāmyatvādudbhidādayo bādhakā bhaviṣyanti | nitye prayoge ca pūrvaguṇasyārthavattā | atha vā viśiṣṭavihitamapi karma svarūpamātraṃ niṣkṛṣya guṇāntare vihitaṃ nautpattikādviśiṣyate | anyathā gatyasaṃbhavādvikalpa iti manyate || 1 ||

yadutpattau prathamajñāne 'rthāntarapūrvakatvenaikāntato na prasiddhamudbhidādi tadvaidikavyavahāre prathamopanipātātsāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheyaṃ syāt | atha vaivamapūrvaṃ karma vidadhadarthavadbhaviṣyati | atha vā kasya nāmadheyamiti saṃdehe 'bhidhīyate | yasyotpattāvapūrvaṃ niṣpadyate yāgasyetyarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam—

lg.l: guṇo vidhīyamāno hi phale karmaṇi vā bhavet |
viśiṣṭavidhibuddhayā vā sarvathā ca na yujyate ||

div.p:
phalaṃ prati tāvadvidhīyamāne parapadasaṃbandhavidhānaṃ vyavahitakalpanā dhātoḥ pārārthyamautpattikasomabādho 'nadanīyena ca khanitrādinā 'tyantāprasiddhena yāga iti doṣāstathā yāgaṃ prati guṇavidhau phalapadānarthakyam | sārvakāmyaprāptajyotiṣṭomaviśeṣaṇatve vākyabhedaḥ | pratyayavyāpāraviprakṛṣṭatā dhātupārārthyānadanīyayāgasomabādhavikalpāścātyantāyuktāḥ | tathā viśiṣṭavidhau
sarvapārārthyeti—viśiṣṭavidhāne 'pi viśiṣṭasyāpadārthattvena sarveṣāṃ nāmadhātvākhyātānāṃ viśiṣṭasamarpaṇātpārārthyamityarthaḥ |sarvapārārthyamanekavidhiśaktikalpanā matvarthalakṣaṇā, gamyamānasāmānādhikaraṇyatyāgo 'nadanīyayāgaśceti doṣāḥ | tasmānna guṇavidhiḥ | taddarśayati—itarathā śrutirudbhidādīn vakṣyati tadvato lakṣayet | vakṣyantī lakṣayet iti vā granthaḥ | prātipadikasāmarthyamuktvā vibhaktisaṃbandhādapyetadevāvagamyata iti darśayati—yāgena kuryādityādinā | kiṃ ca—

yatkaraṇābhidhāyinyā tṛtīyayā ityevamādiṣu kārakāṇāṃ vibhaktyarthatvābhyupagamātkathaṃ
abhyupagamāditi—‘iha hi guṇamaruṇimānamamūrtaṃ santaṃ kriyāyāḥ karaṇamiti śabda upadiśati yatkaraṇābhidhāyinyā tṛtīyāvibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati—aruṇayeti, | ityādyaruṇādhikaraṇasthabhāṣyaviruddhamidaṃ bhāṣyamityāśayaḥ | karaṇavācino hi prātipadikādityucyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | karaṇāśrayavācino hītyabhiprāyaḥ | atha vā karaṇaśabdo yādṛśamarthaṃ bravīti tādṛśasya prātipadikaṃ vācakameva | kṛdantena hi kārakaviśiṣṭaṃ dravyamevocyate na vibhaktivanniṣkṛṣṭā śaktiḥ | tathā ca karaṇaṃ karaṇena karaṇāyeti ca kārakāntarayogo dṛśyate | anyathā hi vibhaktyabhihitenaivaikena kārakeṇa vaśīkārānna dravyaṃ kārakāntarayogaṃ pratipadyeta | śaktestu śaktyantaraṃ nāstyeva | tasmācchaktyupasarjanadravyavacanatvātkṛdantānāmupapannaṃ karaṇaśabdārthavācitvaṃ prātipadikasya | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati | yadasmin vākye karaṇaṃ tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāttṛtīyayotpattavyaṃ yāgaścātra phalabhāvanāyāḥ karaṇaṃ na dravyamiti vakṣyatijai. sū. ( 2-1-1 ) bhāvārthādhikaraṇe iti śeṣaḥ | | tataśca yadyudbhitpadaṃ yāgavacanamevaṃ tṛtīyāntaṃ sadekavākyatāṃ yāsyatyarthāntaravacanatve tvasaṃbaddhaṃ syāt | nanu ca—

yathaiva ‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ ‘somena yajeta’ ityādīnāṃ karaṇabhūtayāgaikavākyatve sati tṛtīyāntatvaṃ vaiyadhikaraṇye 'pyaviruddhamevamihāpīti | haṭha iti—ciraṃtanataḍāgodakā
cchāditaharitadravyamucyate | yathā tadutsāryamāṇamapi svacchandataḥ punaḥpunarudakaṃ chādayatyevaṃ yo 'nyo 'pi svacchandavyavahāraḥ sa haṭha iti prasiddhaḥ | taducyate—

vrīhyādayo hyatyantarụ̄dhāste svārthamaparityajantaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamapratipadyamānā gatyantarābhāvādguṇavidhayo vijñāyante | ye punarudbhidādayo yaugikāsteṣāṃ yenaiva prakāreṇa yatnena dravyavacanatvaṃ tenaiva karmavacanatvamapyupapadyata iti pratyakṣaprasiddhāvanudāsīnāyāmanumānenāpyajñānasaṃśayavyudāsakaraṇaṃ na duṣyati | sarvaśabdārthāvadhāraṇe hyayamabhyupāyo, yatprasiddhasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāma | pradhānaṃ ca karaṇatvaṃ yāge labdhātmakaṃ śaknoti prātipadikamātmaviṣayamāpādayitum | kiṃ ca—

tvatpakṣe hyavaśyaṃ kācidvibhaktyarthe 'pi pratyayasya vidhiśaktiḥ kalpyā syāt | tasmādavayadvāreṇāsti karmaṇyapi prasiddhiḥ | jyotiṣṭomāderapi svaphalodbhedanakāritvādetannāmaprasaṅga iti cet | na | sāmānādhikaraṇyāvadhāritaviṣayaviśeṣasyāvayavānvākhyānāt | na cāsya jyotiṣṭomādibhiḥ samabhivyāhāro 'sti | athavā 'rthāpattivaśenaitadviśeṣaviṣayamevodbhedanaṃ nimittaṃ, na cānyatra tadastīti vyavasthā | yathā sāsnādimadgatagamanaviśeṣanimittatvaṃ gośabdasya | avidhāyakatvādityasya vyākhyā na nāmadheyaṃ vidhāyiṣyata iti | saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandharūpeṇa ‘vṛddhirādaic’pā. sū. ( 1 | 1 | 1 |) ityādivadavidhānaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyāvayavaprasiddhibhyāṃ tatsiddheḥ | na tu nāmadheyārtho na vidhīyate tadadhīnatvādyāmaviśeṣasiddheḥ | iha hi yadyapi saṃjñāsaṃjñisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāsti tathā 'pyātmarūpavyavacchinnamevārthaṃ saṃjñā gamayatīti
viśeṣaṇaviśaṣyabhāvānna bhidyate | nanvevaṃ śabdasvarūpābhidhānaṃ prasajyeta |pratyakṣāvagatasvarūpaviśiṣṭārthābhidhānādaprasaṅgaḥ | sarvatra hyagṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśiṣṭabuddhirna dṛṣṭā, na tvana bhihitaviśeṣaṇā | na caitāvatā śabdasvarūpāropaprasaṅgaḥ | tadanurodhena vidyamānārthāṃśaviśeṣoddharaṇādityuktaṃ prāk | nāmnaiva caivamādīnāṃ prakṛtito bhedo 'nyathā hi tadanavacchinno yajirguṇaphalādyarthaṃ punaḥ śrutiḥ prakṛtigāmitvānnaiva karma bhindyāt | atha vā sarvanāmadheyeṣu kiṃcidarthagatamapi viśeṣaṇamastītyaruṇaikahāyanyādivadeva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatā | na ca yajyuccāraṇamantareṇāsya yāgaviśeṣanāmatvamiti na sāmānyasyārthakatvam | parasparasaṃnidhānena hi nāmāpi yāgaviṣayaṃ yāgo 'pyetadavacchinno na sāmānyamātraṃ prakṛto veti labhyate | tasmādubhayorarthavattā viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhānāccobhayorapi vidhānamiti nānuvādatvam | evaṃ ca sati na nāmatvaṃ vidhitvamātrapratiyogīti, ye pūrvapakṣe vidhyantarbhāvaṃ siddhānte tu vidhyarthavādamantrātirekaṃ nāmnāṃ varṇayanti teṣāmayuktameva | aśeṣavyavahārāṅgabhāvācca nāpravṛttiviśeṣakaratā | nahyṛtvigvaraṇādidhvanenāhaṃ yakṣya iti laghurākhyānopāyaḥ syāt | ‘darśapūrṇamāsāvārapsyamānaḥ same darśapūrṇamāsābhyām’
nāmadheyasya bhāṣyakāroktaṃ guṇaphalopabandhenārthavattvaṃ prayojanāntaropalaṇārthamityāha—aśeṣeti | kāni prayojanāntarāṇīti cet |
saṃjñāyāḥ karmabhettṛtvaṃ dvitīye yadvadiṣyate | yacceṣṭau yāgaṣaṭkasya phalavattvaṃ vadiṣyate | somayāgasya ca jyotiṣṭome 'dhyāye caturthake | yaścāgnihotradharmāṇāṃ praveśaḥ kauṇḍapāyine || saptame vakṣyate sarvaṃ tannāmnāṃ phalamiṣyate | vākyāntarotpādite ca karmaṇyaṅgaṃ vidhīyate || phalaṃ vā yatra tatrāsmānnarte karma viśeṣadhīḥ | dravyadaivataśūnyāyāṃ yāgotpattau ca nāmataḥ || vinā nirdhāraṇābhāvādviśeṣasyāvidheyatā | dharmapramopayogittvamapyasyetthaṃ ca sidhyati || yāgenānena yakṣye 'haṃ tena yājaya māmiti | nāmnā vinaivamādiśca vyavahāro na sidhyati || mīmāṃsāvidhivākyārthajñānānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇe | trividhe vyavahāre 'smin sarvasminnāma kāraṇam | ityevaṃ pradarśitānyanusaṃdheyāni | iti guṇopabandho darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāma iti ca phalopabandho 'nyathā na syāt | tasmānnāmadheyānyevaṃjātīyakānīti siddham || 2 ||

idānīmayaugikeṣu vrīhyādivallokarụ̄dheṣu jātiguṇaśabdeṣu cintā | na hyānumānikakaraṇatvānurodhena pratyakṣaprasiddhayabhāvaḥ saṃbhavatīti pūrvādhikaraṇenāsiddhiḥ | nanu ‘ājyaiḥ stuvate’ ‘pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate’ ‘bahiṣpavamānena stuvate’ ityutpattivākyatvādetānyudāhartavyāni | tathā hi—

sā tu nodāhṛtā sūtrakāreṇa ‘yasmin guṇopadeśa’ iti guṇavākyasyā ' 'śritatvāt | atha kimarthaṃ tenaiva tadāśritam | yatra kva cana pratipādite phalāviśeṣāt | pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇaheturvā vākyabhedastatraṃ saṃbhavatītyudāhṛtam | atha votpattivākyasthasyā ' 'jyādipadasya pakṣadvaye 'pi sākāṅkṣatvādekasyāpi niścayaheturnāstītyanyataḥ siddhayapekṣaṇādanudāharaṇatvam | ghṛtavācitvāttāvanna stotranāmatvaṃ vijñāyate | yānyājyāni taiḥ stuvata iti ca śrūyate tatra kānyeva nāmāni kathaṃ vā tenābhidhīyanta iti sahā 'pyutpattivākyenānyataḥ siddhiravāptavyā | utpattivākyasthitameva cā ' 'jyādipadaṃ yathā rụ̄dhiṃ parityajya stutināmatāṃ pratipadyate tathā heturvācya ityapekṣā | guṇavidhitve 'pi ghṛtasya stutāvakaraṇatvāttatsaṃbaddhamantralakṣaṇayā 'vaśyaṃ saṃbandhakṛdvākyamapekṣaṇīyam | iha vidhāne matvarthalakṣaṇāprasa ṅgāt | anuvādatve tu nāyaṃ doṣo bhavati | tena stotrāṇāmapyājyavattā 'nyata eva labdhavyeti tadubhayapakṣe 'pi sāpekṣatā | tataśca stuvata ityetāvanmātramatra vivakṣitamityājyādiśabdo 'nyato nirṇīṃyate | pavamānaśabdastu yaugikatvātpūrvādhikaraṇasiddheranudāharaṇamiti kecit | apare tu manyante | nodbhidādivatpavanakriyāṃ prati kartṛtvaṃ stotrasyopapadyate, somo hi tatra pavate | tataśca na karmaṇyavayavaprasiddhirastīti pavamānārthamantrakatvāllakṣitalakṣaṇā matvarthalakṣaṇāto durbalatareti vākyabhedenaiva siddherudāharaṇam | tatra prasiddhayādayaḥ
pūrvapakṣe pūrvavadeva vyākhyeyāḥ | citretyuttarapakṣe
citro guṇo vidhīyamāna ityādi siddhāntabhāṣyeṇāgnīṣomīye guṇavidhyabhiprāyasya prakaṭīkaraṇādityarthaḥ | dyotanādagnīṣomīye guṇavidhiriṣṭaḥ | atra kāraṇumacyate—

strītvādivibhāgo hi prāṇivyatirikte 'rthe śabdānukaraṇamātreṇa vijñāyate paśvādiṣu tvartharūpeṇa | prakṛtaṃ ca dadhyādidravyātmakatvānnaitadyogyaṃ karmetyutkṛṣyamāṇe vākyādyāgamātrasaṃbandhinī prasakte sāmarthyāt prāṇiyāgamākāṅkṣantī ‘prakṛtau vā dviruktatvāt’jai. sū. ( 3-6-1 ) | ityanena nyāyena sarvaprāṇiyāgaparamaprakṛtimagnīṣomīyaṃ gacchataḥ | tatra yadyapyutpattivākyaśiṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇasāraṅgalohitasāraṅgādiguṇāntaraṃ puṃstvaṃ ca bādhakaṃ saṃbhāvyate, tathā 'pi pūrvavadeva bādhavikalpauvaktavyau | sāptadaśyapūrvapakṣanyāyaścātra draṣṭavyaḥ | ekapadopāttānekārthavidhānāccaikakārakanibandhanatvādavākyabhedābhiprāyaḥ | paśukāma śabdo 'pi ca svargakāmādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyenārjanāṅgatvādanuvādo 'bhimato na yāgaphalam | na hi paśuyāgaḥ paśumakāmayamānenānuṣṭhātuṃ śakyate | yāgānuvādo vijñātatvāditi |

yāvadyāvadvidheyāntaramupādīyate tāvattāvatpūrvatrā nekaśaktikalpanābhayādanuvādatvākāṅkṣā bhavati | agatyā tu tatrāpi vidhyaṅgīkaraṇam | asti cātra strītvacitratvabhāgagnīṣomīyayāga ityanūdyate | guṇe phalakalpanāyāṃ yajateravivakṣeti | kimarthaṃ guṇāvidhitvapakṣa eva sannirākriyate | siddhāntagrantho 'yaṃ pramādāllikhita iti kecit | apare tvāhuḥ | phalasaṃbandhe kila pradhānatvādguṇoktivighātaḥ syāditi | tadayuktam | sarvathā nāmadheyapratipakṣo guṇavidhiḥ sa ca phalasaṃbandhe 'pyanapagataḥ | tathā cajai. sū. ( 2-1-1 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ | vakṣyati sthita etasminnadhikaraṇe guṇavidhirnāmadheyamiti vicāra iti | phalasaṃbandhe hyekāntena yāgasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādguṇavidhireva syāditi | tenaivaṃ vācyam | iha tu trayaḥ pakṣāḥ pratibhānti | guṇavidhiḥ phale, yāge vā nāmadheyaṃ veti | ekaikasya ca dvayaṃ dvayaṃ nirākarta
vyam | tatra pūrvapakṣastha eva durbalataratvāttṛtīyaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti | dhātupārārthyaprasaṅgāditi | ataśca ‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ itivadyāge guṇavidhānam | karaṇabhūtasyāpi ca yāga syotpattivākyāvagatakaraṇatvārthākṣiptasādhyāṃśānuvādeva guṇe vidhīyamāne na matvarthalakṣaṇā | guṇavādyeva vā 'nabhibhavasamarthaṃ yāge guṇavidhānamāśrayati | phale guṇavidhikalpanāyāṃ pūrvādhikaraṇoktadoṣaprasaṅgāditi | tathā ‘pañcadaśānyājyāni’ ityatra ‘astirbhavantiparaḥ’
prathamapuruṣo 'prayujyamāno 'pyasti iti śeṣapūraṇam pā sū ( 2-3-1 ) atratyaṃ kātyāyanasmaraṇam | iti sattopakalpanaṃ prayogavacanācca vidhiḥ | nanu ca pañcadaśāni saptaśānīti caivaṃrūpaḥ śabdo na saṃkhyāmātravācī ‘stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthaḥ’pā sū ( 5-1-5 ) atratyaṃ vārtikam | iti smaraṇāt | na hi stoma iti stotrīyāsaṃkhyāto 'nyā vidhīyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | stotrasādhanamātraparicchedena stutimānātmakastomasiddheḥ sadṛśamṛkparicchede ghṛtaparicchede ca stutimānanimi ttastomavācitvam | na cātra matvarthalakṣaṇā | kutaḥ—

iha tāvadājyādīnāṃ śrutavākyasaṃyogābhāvādavaśyaṃ prakaraṇāmnānānumitavākyasaṃbandhapūrvakaḥ prayogavacanavidhirāśrayitavyaḥ | tena matvartha eva pratipādyata iti na lakṣaṇā | tatraitatsyāt | dravyatvādājyādīnāṃ kartavyatāviśeṣātmaketikartavyatārthinā prakaraṇena na grahaṇamiti | sattaivātra kriyetyanupālambhaḥ | pradhānadeśatvāccāṅgānāmājyādibhiravaśyaṃ stotrasamīpe bhavitavyam | ataśca yathaiva ‘agnimupanidhāya stuvate’ ityatrāgniḥ sattāmātreṇopakarotyevamihāpīti nirdoṣaṃ, tasmādguṇavidhānamiti | atrābhidhīyate | ‘pradhānato 'bhisaṃbandha’ iti | anekārthavidhānaṃ hi pradhānakarmavidhāne satyupapadyate | atra punaḥ karmānuvādena guṇo vidhīyate | na ca guṇānāṃ parasparaṃ saṃbandho vidyate | tatraikaguṇavidhāne guṇāntarānākṣepādarthāpattyabhāve śrautānekavidhivyāpārakalpanāyāṃ punaḥ punaruccāraṇaṃ pratyayasya kartavyamiti vākyabhedaḥ syāt | āha ca—
ekapadopātte 'pi cānekavidhiśaktikalpanāgauravamastyeva | utpattivākyaśiṣṭe guṇāntarāvirodhāccāśaktiḥ | tathā hi—
yatrānūdyamāna evāvaśyaṃ guṇo 'pyanuvaditavyastatra nairapekṣyadarśanādākāṅkṣādhīnasaṃbandhaguṇāntaravidhānānupapattiḥ | na ca niṣkṛṣya kriyāmātraṃ guṇavidhiḥ śakyaḥ kartum | kutaḥ—

yāni parasparanirapekṣāṇi vrīhiyavādivākyavatpravartante teṣāṃ tulyabalavattvādbhavati vikalpaḥ | iha cotpattivākyamanyanirapekṣaṃ vidadhyānnotpannavākyam, anutpanne 'nuvādānupapatteḥ | paśukāmasaṃbandhācca padāntaragatārthagrahaṇanimitto 'pi vākyabhedo vidyate | yadyapi ca phalaṃ na vidhīyate tathā 'pi tatra karmavidhānātkarmaṇi ca guṇāvidherastyeva gauravam | api ca karmaṇaḥ phalaguṇau prati yugapadvidhyanuvādadoṣo 'paraḥ syāt | na ca paśukāmapadamarjanāṅgatvātprāptamanūdyate | katham—

na hi sādhanabhūtaṃ paśuṃ kaścitkāmayate vinaiva tu kāmena prārthitānyathānupapattyā tamupādatte | gauṇī vā tasya kāmyatā bhavet | ataḥ svātantryeṇa yanmukhyayā vṛttyā kāmyate tadeva kāmaśabdopabandhātphalaṃ pratīmaḥ | vistareṇa caitad ‘asādhakaṃ tu tādarthyāt’jai. sū. ( 6-1-1 ) | ityatra vakṣyāmaḥ | phalaṃ cāgnīṣomīyasya kratvaṅgatvānnaitadanyadvā 'stītyanuvādāsaṃbhavaḥ | prakaraṇaṃ ca bādhyeta prājāpatyamya yāgasya | nāmadheyatve tu karmaphalasaṃbandhamātrakaraṇānna kaścidoṣaḥ | ‘pañcadaśānyājyāni’ iti dravyasaṃkhyayorubhayoḥ stotreṣvaprāptatvānnānyatarānuvādenetaravidhānasaṃbhavaḥ | karmāntarasthaṃ ca na pratīyate | tadanuvādena ca vidhāvakarmāṅgatvaprasaṅgaḥ prakaraṇabādhaśca | na ca viśiṣṭadravyavidhirupapadyata iti vakṣyate ‘tatraikatvamayajñāṅgabhūtam’jai. sū. ( 4-1-5 ) | iti | na cākriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate, vidhāyakasya nāmapadaiḥ sākṣādasaṃbandhāt | na ceha kriyopāttā, yā vidhīyamānā 'rthādanekamapi guṇamākṣipet | na caiṣāṃ stutiprayogavacanena grahaṇam, akriyātmakatvāt | āha ca |

na ca bhavatikriyāṃ pratyaṅgatvamupapadyate | sarvo 'pi hi labdhātmako 'nyatra vyāpriyate | sattāyāstu vastvātmalābhamātrāpavargānna sādhyatvam | tadvyatiriktasādhyāntarānapekṣaṇāccopakārāsaṃbandhānnetikartavyatātvam | yattu rathaṃtaraṃ bhavatītyevaṃcoditānāmapi prakaraṇena grahaṇaṃ tadatideśaprāptāvāntarakriyāsaṃbandhavijñānāt | na vā ' 'jyādīnāṃ loke sattā na siddhā yenedānīṃ bhāvyeta stutiprayogasaṃnidhisthāpanabhāvanā kariṣyata iti cet | na | acoditattvāt | ‘agnimupanidhāya’ iti tu spaṣṭaṃ vidhānam | ātmalābhavyatiriktā ceyaṃ kriyā śakyate kathaṃbhāvena grahītum | siddhānte ca vākyasyārthavattvānnānyathānupapattyā viniyojakavākyakalpanā | yadi tu ājyaiḥ stuvate’ ityanena vihitānāṃ pañcadaśatvavidhirucyeta tataḥ pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyena saiva matvarthalakṣaṇeti matvā vadati—api cā ' 'jyāni stotrāṇītyādi | saṃsargidravyatvāccā ' 'jyānāṃ sākṣātpañcadaśatvayogābhāvādaśrutapalādiparimāṇakalpanā 'vaśyāśrayitavyā bhavet | tenaivaṃ jñāyate yadyapyutpattau nāmatvaṃ na jñātaṃ guṇavākye ca tasyānadhikāraḥ | tathā 'pyetadguṇavidhānamevaṃ sidhyati | yadyutpattāvājyaśabdo nāmadheyaṃ nānyatheti |

yadājimīyustadājyānāmājyatvamiti | yasmāddevāḥ prajāpativacanādeteṣu stotreṣvājimadhāvan | tatastadarhatvādetānyājyānīti | tathā ‘tāsāṃ vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata’ iti yasmādapāṃ vāyunāṃ pṛṣṭhe spṛṣṭe rathaṃtarādīni jātāni tasmāttāni pṛṣṭhānītyarthavādādvijñā
tam | tatprakṛtitvācca vāmadevyādiṣu pṛṣṭhaśabdaprasiddhiḥ | dvāvetāvarthāvekasya vākyasyāśakyāvityasyānantaram, atha kasmānna pañcadaśasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭānītyevamādi draṣṭavyam | viśiṣṭānāṃ vācakasyābhāvāditi—pradhānākhyātānuccāraṇābhiprāyam | nanu padadvayamiti—bhavatikriyāsaṃbandhābhiprāyam | naitatpadadvayamapi vidhāyakamiti | pradhānakriyā hi viśeṣaṇāni piṇḍīkaroti sattāyāstu pratyekavartitvānna samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ | ataśca parasparasaṃbandhābhāvaḥ | pañcadaśāni yāni kānicidbhavanti, ājyānyapi yāvanti tāvanti bhavantīti kalpanā tasmānnobhayaṃ vidhāyakam | na cānuvādakaṃ, stotreṣu tādṛśasyābhāvādanarthakatvaprasaṅgācca | tasmādekānuvādenetaravidhirnāmadheyatve 'vakalpate | vidhāyakamiti cātra vidheyārthopanayanavyāpārātpunaḥ punarabhihitaṃ na tu nāmapadasya vidhiśaktirasti | pañcadaśānīti ca stutisādhakatamastotrīyārkparicchedānmukhyaṃ stutimānanimittaṃ stomatvamiti śabdasāmañjasyaṃ bhaviṣyati || 3 ||

nanu sarvatra dviprakārameva nāmapadaṃ sāṃvijñāyikaṃ yaugikaṃ ca | ubhayamapi cādhikaraṇadvayena pratipāditaṃ, kimidānīmavaśiṣyate yena punarvicāryate | ucyate | yaugikānāmeva matvarthalakṣaṇāparihāreṇātra cintā, uttarādhikaraṇe tu sāṃvijñāyikānāṃ vākyabhedāsaṃbha
vāt | tatrāgnaye hotramasminniti siddhānte 'pyabhyupagamādanyasamāsārthānupalabdheścāntarṇītamatvartho bahuvrīhirakhedena guṇaṃ vidhatte | ta eva ca prasiddhayādayo hetavaḥ satyāmapi ca sāyaṃ home 'gniprāptau tadvarjaṃ prātarhome homamātrānuvādādvā sarvadarvihomeṣvavihitadevatākeṣu vidhāsyati vākyasāmarthyāt | tathā ' 'ghāryata ityāghāra iti dhāraṇasamarthaṃ dravyamājyapayaḥprabhṛtyabhidhīyate | tacca dvitīyānirdeśāt kṣāraṇakriyāsaṃskāryatvenādhyavasīyamānamanupayujyamānasaṃskārānupapatteḥ prayojanamapekṣate | dharmamātraṃ cāsya kṣāraṇaṃ śabdārthamātrāpavargitvānnāśeṣakṣāraṇaṃ karoti | tatkṣāritaikadeśena kiṃ kartavyamityastyapekṣā | loke 'pi ca dravadravyāṇāṃ kvacitpānādāvupayokṣyamāṇānāmīṣatkṣāraṇasaṃskāraṃ kurvanti | tenābhiṣavayuktapūtīkavadbhakṣaṇayuktaphalacamasavacca saṃskāryaṃ dravyaṃ karmamātrābhilāṣi | prakaraṇavaśena darśapūrṇamāsapradhānānyupasarpati | tatrāpi cā ' 'gneyādīnāṃ vihitadravyakatvādupāṃśuyājaḥ kevalaḥ sākāṅkṣa iti tādarthyaṃ pratipadyate | āha ca—

atha vā yatkarotīti pratyayārthamātraṃ sākāṅkṣatvādevopāṃśuyājabhāvanāmanūdyā ' 'ghāradravye vākyena vidhīyamāne tatsādhyatvādeva dhātvarthaḥ prāpto 'nūdyate | dhrauvaprāptyaiva vā tasya kṣaraṇātmakatve vijñāte kṣaraṇasamarthamātrapayaḥprabhṛtividhiṃ manyate | na ca dhātvarthādeva siddhernāmnā prayojanam | na ca saṃskārakarmāṇi kvacinnāmavanti dṛśyante | śrutyaiva guṇo vidhīyata iti | dvitīyāśrutyaiva saṃskāryatvādavaśyaṃ kvacidasya guṇatvamityavagamābhiprā
yam | atrocyate—
atra vadāmaḥ—

lg.l: sāyaṃ home yadi brūyādāghāre ca paro vidhim |

div.p: ucyate—

lg.l: anūdya cāpi dhātvarthaṃ guṇaḥ sarvo vidhīyate |
śuddhaṃ na śrūyate karma prakṛtaṃ nāsti tena tat ||
na cedanyena śiṣṭāḥ syustatprakhyaṃ ceti cottaram ||
na ca tena vinā śakyā devatāvidhikalpanā ||

div.p:
‘athaiṣa jyotiḥ’ ityādivarjamudāharaṇam | teṣāṃ tṛtīyānirdeśābhāvādguṇavidhitvānupapatteḥ | te 'pi ca vākyāntareṣu yadā tṛtīyānirdeśa pratipadyante tadāṃ vicāryante | atha vā prathamānirdeśena dravyamapi prastutya paścāttatsādhyopanyāsaḥ saṃbhavatītyete 'pyudāharaṇameva | tatra taireva prasiddhayādibhirguṇavidhiḥ | na cātra karmaṇi pravṛtinimittaṃ kiṃ
cidasti | vatyarthopādānena karmaṇi pravṛttau cātyantaviprakṛṣṭā gauṇatā syāt | tatra varaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇā | sādhanaṃ hi pratītamatyantavinābhāvātsvasādhyāṃ kriyāmakleśena pratipādayati vinaiva matublopena | kiṃ ca—

guṇavidhipakṣe hi svārthāparityāgenaiva śyenapadaṃ tadvantamuttarakālaṃ lakṣayati | ātmoccāraṇakāle tu svārthameva viniyuṅkte | bhavatastu śyenārthānupayogādādita eva sādṛśyavivakṣayā padaṃ pravṛttamityupagamācchrutibādhaprasaṅgaḥ | taducyate—

śyenādivākyeṣu hi yathā vai śyeno nipatyā ' 'datta evamayamapītyupagamānna stutirdṛśyate | tayā ca vidhīyamānasya bhavitavyam | guṇavidhāne ca śyenadravyaṃ vidhīyata iti tadeva stotavyama | na ca tasyā ' 'tmanaivopamānaṃ yuktam | athocyetānanyatvena sutarāṃ stutirbhavati, ananyasaṃbhavicaritatvāt | yathā—

bhavati hi loke kālpanikamavasthādigatabhedamāśrityaivamapi stutiḥ saṃbhavati bhede na yuktā | nāmadheyatve tu
śrutirhi nāmadheyatve, lakṣaṇā guṇavidhau iti bhāṣyaṃ yathāśrutārthamanupapannamiti matvā 'nyathā vyācaṣṭe nāmadheyatve tvityādinā—gauravamityantena |yāgaśyenasya dravyaśyenopamopapatterāñjasyam | itarathā hi dvau matvarthavatyarthau lakṣayitavyau | kālpanikaśca bheda iti gauravam | na ca yāgastutyā tadāśritadravyastavanamavakalpate, yāgavidheranirākṛtatvāt | avidheyagatā hi
stutiranyatra saṃcāryeta yāgastu svayameva vidhibhāgatreti na dravyaṃ stūyate vidhīyate vā | punarapi ca yāgena dravyalakṣaṇādviprakṛṣṭatā | samabhivyāhārācca dravyavadeva yāgavacanatvaṃ mukhyam | vidhau ca tava lakṣaṇā mamānuvāde | guṇavacanebhyaśca matublopaḥ sma1ryate na dravyavacanebhyaḥ | ivārthastu paraśabdasya paratra prayogātsvayamevopajāyate | matvarthalakṣaṇā ca svayaṃ kalpanīyā, kḷptastu vatyarthaḥ | ‘yathā vai śyena’ ityādinā | pūrvoktāśca dhātupārārthyapratyayaviprakarṣādayo doṣā vaktavyāḥ || 5 ||

tantrasaṃbandhenā ' 'khyātapadasya dhātvarthaḥ phalaṃ prati karaṇaṃ guṇaṃ ca prati sādhyo bhavanna virotsyate | tenodbhidā yāgaṃ yāgena ca paśūn bhāvayediti yugapadvidhivyāpārādvinaiva matvarthalakṣaṇayā saṃbandhasiddhiḥ | tathā ' 'jyādipadasya tantreṇa stotrasaṃkhyādiyogaḥ | tasmātsarvatra tvatparikalpite nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ prasidhdyādibhirguṇapratyayānapagamāttadvidhānameva bhavatvalaṃ nāmadheyatveneti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvādhikaraṇākṣepeṇedamārabhyate | tatredamapi vākyaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vājapeyopanyāsaḥ | sarvāṇyeva tvihodāhartavyāni | āha ca—
vājapeye tāvadayaṃ viśeṣo 'bhidhīyate—

dvidhā hi tantraṃ bhavati pratyekaṃ vā samudāye vā vākyaparisamāptāvākhyātaguṇatvaprādhānyāpekṣayā | tadiha dravyaṃ yāge vidhīyate na phalamaphalatvaprasaṅgāt | uddiśyamānaṃ hi sarvatra phalaṃ bhavati, taccetkriyāṃ pratyupādīyetāṅgameva syāt | yāgo 'pi phalaṃ pratyupādātuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ prati, tatsaṃskāratvaprasaṅgāttṛtīyānirdeśabādhācca | na ca yāgasaṃskṛtasya dravyasyānyatropayogo vidyate yenaivamāśrīyeta | etena yāgaphalayordravyaṃ pratyupādānaṃ pratyuktam | na ca phale yāgadravyayorupādānam | ekena nirākaṅkṣe phale 'nyasyāvidhānāt | yathā vakṣyati jai. sū. ( 2—1—1 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ |“yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadartham” iti | na ca dravyopasarjano yāgaḥ phale vidhīyate, matvarthalakṣaṇādiprasaṅgāt | tatraitadevā ' 'patati yāgena phalaṃ yāgaṃ ca dravyeṇeti | tataśca phalenopādeyavidheyaguṇabhūtayāgagrahaṇādguṇena coddeśyānūdyapradhānabhūtāpekṣaṇāttantratvābhāvaḥ | ekamārgāśrayaṇe 'nyatarasyāsaṃbandhāt | tatra yugapadāśrayaṇe vākyabhedāt | avaśyaṃ hi yatroddiśyamānādirūpaṃ yatra copādīyamānādyātmakatā tatra yāgasyaite dve vākye kalpanīye | nanu dve evaite iti tantrapadamabhito darśayan bravīti—catvāri padānyupa- labhemahīti | atulyārthatvādatantratvābhiprāyeṇa | parasya tu śabdarūpābhedātsādhāraṇyā
bhimānaḥ | naitadastīti—kāryaprādhānyācchabdarūpasya tadgatavairūpyādbhedāpattiḥ | āha yadidamuktamiti—vairūpyaṃ pariharati | guṇavidhyaṃśe 'pi hyavaśyamākhyātaṃ vidhirūpamevābhyupagantavyam | bājapeyapadasyānākhyātatvenāvidhāyakatvāt | yadyubhatra vidhiriti—dravyasaṃskāryatvaprasaṅgamanādṛtyā ' 'khyātaguṇabhāvakṛtapratyekavākyaparisamāptinimittaparamparāsaṃbandhopanyāsaḥ | prakaraṇānurodhāt ‘brīhibhiryajeta’ ityādivadvayavastheti cet | na | vākyena yāgamātre vidhānāditi—tantrasaṃbandhe hi parasparanirapekṣayoryāgena saṃbandhaḥ | ekaviśeṣitetarasaṃbandhe vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt | tatrāniṣpanne svārājyayāgaprakaraṇe guṇo vidhīyamānaḥ śuddhayajatisaṃbandhātsārvatriko 'pūrvayāgasaṃbandho vā vijñāyate | darśapūrṇamāsādivākyaistu niṣpādite prakaraṇe vidhīyamānā vrīhyādayo 'vatiṣṭhanta iti vaiṣamyam | tena svārājyakāmairyāgaikavākyatā gamyamānā notsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyatīti nāmadheyatā || 8 ||

evaṃ siddheṣu nāmadheyeṣu nāmadheyakāryeṣu cedānīmapavādaḥ prastūyate | kasmātpunarihaiva
darvihomapadaṃ na vicāryate, vicāritametadapi tatprakhyamityanena | vidhyuddeśagatānāṃ ceha vicārastatra tvarthavādagatānāṃ ‘yadekayā juhuyāddarvihomaṃ kuryāt’ iti | siddhe vā karmanāmadheyatve tadviśeṣavicārastatra | iha punaḥ sāmānyacinteti nopanyastam | yā tu tatra guṇavidhyāśaṅkā sā 'dhikaraṇamadhye paricodanāmātraṃ sarvamevaitatprāsaṅgikam | aṣṭame ca pūrvavadapūrvacintādhikārāt| kena pūrvarvihitānāṃ karmaṇāmāgreyādīnāṃ nāmadheyatvamāśaṅkyate | taducyate | aṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādibhirdravyamātrayuktāḥ kramavatyo bhāvanāḥ pratipādyante | tāsāṃ ca sthānakrameṇāgnyādidaivatyāni yājyānuvākyāyugalānyāmnāyante | tāni kramaviniyuktāni santi māntravarṇikīḥ karmāṅgabhūtā devatāḥ kalpayanti | na hyanyathā te mantrāḥ karmopayogaṃ gaccheyuḥ | kriyāsvarūpaprakāśanena tatsaṃbandhiprakāśanena vā mantrāḥ karmopayogitāṃ gacchanti | na caitaiḥ kriyā dravyaṃ cābhidhīyate | yadagnyādyabhidhīyate tasya saṃbandhitvaṃ na jñātaṃ tatrāsaṃbandhyagnyādiprakāśane 'naṅgatvaprasaṅgaḥ | tenāvadhāritāṅgatvamantrānurodhenaivaṃ vijñāyate yānete vadanti te nūnamagnyādayaḥ kriyāṅgamiti te ca mantreṣu prādhānyābhidhānāddevatātvena prajñātā iti tadavailakṣaṇyātkarmasvapi devatā bhavanti | puroḍāśādibhirapi ca havirātmakatvādyogyatayā yāgasādhanatvenopaplavamāneṃrdevataivā ' 'kāṅkṣiteti dravyadevatāsaṃbandhaniṣpatteranumitānāṃ yāgānāṃ ‘tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram’jai. sū. ( 1 | 4 | 3 ) ityāgneyādīnāṃ nāmadheyatvam | atha vā 'ṣṭākapālādīnāṃ haviṣṭvāt ‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ iti hyavadāne gṛhīte codanāntareṇa ca tatsaṃskārārthopastaraṇābhighāraṇagrahaṇāccaturavatte niṣpanne ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’tai. saṃ. ( 2 | 6 | 8 ) | iti vacanādyāvaddravyaṃ niṣpannānāṃ homānāṃ tathaivāgnyādiṣu prāpteṣu nāmadheyatvam| evaṃ cānekārthavidhidoṣo na bhaviṣyati| tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate—

lg.l: na cedanyena śiṣṭāḥ syuryāgāḥ śabdena kenacit |

div.p: na tāvaddravyadevatāsaṃskārasaṃyogena yāgavidhirupapadyate | katham |

nāṣṭākapālo bhavatītyetāvatā kaścitpuruṣavyāpāro vidhīyate yo 'nuṣṭhānāya smṛtikaraṇaṃ mantramapekṣeta | na ca puroḍāśabhavanaṃ puruṣasyānuṣṭheyaṃ, pratiniyatakartṛtvātkriyāṇām | nāpi dravyaṃ, svarūpeṇa siddhātmakatvādakartavyaṃ, yena smaryeta | na ca ‘agnirmūrdhā’ ityādibhirdravyaṃ tadvyāpārovā 'bhidhīyate yenā ' 'kāṅkṣayā 'pi saṃbadhyeran | agnyādyabhidhāyināṃ na kaścittaiḥ saṃbandho vidyate |

lg.l: na ca yāgo haviṣṭavaṃ vā puroḍāśe 'vadhāritam |

div.p:
yadi hi prathamaṃ yāgatvamavadhāryeta tato devatākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ devatāvācino mantrāḥ saṃbadhyeran, na tu tadbhavatiśabdenoktam | na ca yāgasaṃbandhātprāk puroḍāśādīnāṃ haviṣṭavamavadhāryate | saṃbandhiśabdo hyayaṃ na dravyasvarūpaprayuktaḥ | tadeva hi dravyamayāgasaṃbaddhaṃ payaḥprabhṛti na loke haviḥśabdavācyaṃ bhavati | etena caturavattacodanākalpitakarmanāmatvaṃ pratyuktam | āghārādiṣu tu kriyātmakatvānmantrākāṅkṣāyāṃ vacanaviniyogavaśācca bhavati māntravarṇikadevatākalpanā | sarvajaghanyaścāyaṃ devatāvidhiḥ sarvajyeṣṭhe taddhitadetāvidhau saṃbhavati kimityāśrīyate | anyathānupapattimūlaścāsau | na ca taddhite saṃbhavatyanyathānupapattiḥ | tasmādanenaiva kṛte dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe 'rthavādapuraḥsareṇa bhavatiśabdena vihite viśeṣārthaṃ krameṇa mantrāmnānam | agatyā cānekārthavidhiraṅgīkriyate | vidhānārthe taddhitānte śabda iti—vidhiprayojanatvābhiprāyeṇa | sarvaṃ caitattasmādavibhaktaṃ gamyate | devatā tāvatprātipadikenoktā tadviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ taddhitena saṃbandho 'pi tatraivārthagṛhītastatsāmānādhikaraṇyāccāśeṣātmīyopasarjanayuktamaṣṭākapālapadaṃ viśeṣaṇatvena tatraivāntargatam | dravyasya cā ' 'gneyatvena bhavanamabhāvyamānasya na sidhyatīti tadākṣiptā bhāvanā 'pi tatraiva |
na ca yāgena vinā ' 'gneyatvaṃ bhāvayituṃ śakyamiti puruṣavyāpāraviśeṣo 'pi yāgastadantargataḥ | tataśca taddhitāntapadopāttavidhinā sarvamanyadarthādākṣipyamāṇaṃ na vākyaṃ bhinatti | bhāvanāvidhipūrvakaśca sarvatra dhātvarthakārakavidhirbhavatītyaśrūyamāṇā 'pi saiva tāvadviśiṣṭā vidhīyate | tato viśeṣaṇānyathānupapattyā sarvasaṃsargātmakatvācca tāmeva saṃbandhaśabdenābhidhatte, na tvavyāpārātmakatvāddravyadevatāsaṃbandhaḥ śakyate vidhātum | ‘avibhāgat’ iti—arthākṣepahetuḥ | ‘na cedanyena’ iti—anyathānupapattiśaraṇābhidhānam || 9 ||
