nāmadheyaprastāvena dravyanāmasu nimittaṃ pratyadhikaraṇatrayamārabhyate | tulyahetutvātpuroḍāśo 'pyugāhṛtaḥ | tatra ‘śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt’jai. sū. ( 1—3—4 ) iti yājñikānāṃ saṃskṛteṣuprayogātsā3rvatrikatvādavigītatvācca saṃskāranimittatā | tathā hi—
tannāsti | kutaḥ |

ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta evāmīṣāmarthā iti
lokavedādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |sthitatvāllokaprasiddhipratīkṣe vede yatraikadeśe 'pi jātinimittatā labhyate na tatra punarnimittāntaraśaktikalpanā saṃbhavati | saṃskṛteṣvapi jāteranapagamāttannimittatātikramo na śakyo vaktum | ataśca śāstrasthairapyavirodhānna bādhaḥ | kiṃ ca |
tena jātimete na vyabhicaranti | vyabhicaranti tu saṃskārān, avihitatvāllekavyavahāravelāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhāvāt |

yadi hi cchedanavidhivelāyāṃ bandhanavidhau vā kaścillaukiko 'rtho labhyeta tataḥ kimevaṃ vyavasthitavacanavyaktiviparyayeṇa kalpyeta yacchidyate sa nūnaṃ yūpa iti | asti ca barhirādergatistasmādatulyatā || 10 ||
nanu samudāyaprasiddheḥ śrutisthānīyatvādvākyasthānīyāvayavaprasiddhirdurbalā syāt | tathā hi |
satyamevametat | avaśyaṃ tvavayavānāmapi svārthe śaktirāśrayaṇīyā tadanāśrayaṇe 'vayavaprasiddhitvābhāvāt | tatra ca |

labdhātmikā hi samudāyaprasiddhiravayavaprasiddhiṃ bādhate tasyāstvātmalābho yatra pramāṇāntareṇa pūrvānubhūtāvayavārtharahite 'rthe śabdaprayogo dṛśyate yathā 'śvatvakarṇatvarahite vṛkṣe 'śvakarṇaśabdasya | na hyatra pūrvaśaktyanusāreṇa pratītirupapadyata ityarthāpattyā śaktyantaraṃ kalpyate | tataścobhayasaṃbhave 'vayavārthānusaṃdhānādvikṣiptāyā avayavaprasiddherakṣaraśravaṇamātralabhyatvādiyaṃ balīyasī bhavati | atra punarapsu prakarṣasecanakriyākaraṇatvasaṃbhavādavayavaśaktibhireva vākyavatprayogopapatteḥ śaktyantare pramāṇābhāvātsamudāyaprasidhdyabhāvaḥ | tathā hi |

lg.l: adṛṣṭāṃ samudāyasya kaḥ śaktiṃ jātu kalpayet ||

div.p:
tasmānnāpsu samudāyaprasiddhiriti dravadravyamātrasādhāraṇatā | nanu saṃskāranimittatve 'pyapsāmānādhikaraṇyakṛtatvādīkārasya ghṛtānnivṛttiḥ syāt | yadi hi prāgīkārātsaṃskāranimittatā 'vagamyeta tataḥ strīpratyayo 'yamāśrayaliṅganimitta ityavadhāraṇādanyaliṅgā
nnivarteta | ayaṃ punaranyaprayogaḥ saṃskāreṣvīkārānta evānavagatavibhāgo vedyādivatprayukta ityanyādṛśasya vācakatvaṃ nāvadhāryeta tasmādīkārāntaḥ syāt | yaugikatve tu prāgīkārādyogo gamyata iti strīpratyayo 'yaṃ nimittābhāvādaghṛte na prayokṣyate, codakaprāptaṃ tu prātipadikamātraṃ prayoktavyam | na ca dravyeṣvarthasamavāyādvidhiśabdaprayoganiyamo, yataḥ prokṣaṇaśabdabādhena jātipakṣavad ghṛtamityeva prayogaḥ syāt || 11 ||
nirmanthye 'pi pūrvādhikaraṇavaṃjjātisaṃskāranimittapakṣāvudbhāvyānantareṇa yaugikatvaṃsādhanīyam |

jai. sū. ( 11-1-3 )‘loke karmāṃrthalakṣaṇam’ ityaśabdārthenāpi vyavahārādbhavedaciranirdagdhaghṛtapratītiḥ | sarvaghṛtānāṃ ca navanītavikāratvātpunaḥ śruteraciranirdagdhanavanītārthatā syāt | iha tu śabdapramāṇake 'nyakriyājanitanivṛttamātracaritārtho nirmanthyaśabdāściraviśeṣopādānāsamarthaḥ kathamaciranirmathitaviṣayaḥ kalpyate | nahyatrāciratvamapi yoge 'ntargataṃ, kriyāyogamātranimittatvāt | tasmādasadetat | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

yathaiva lohitoṣṇīṣādividhiṣu viśeṣyāṇāṃ prāptatvādviśeṣaṇaparatvamevamihāpi viśeṣyānuvādena viśeṣaṇabhūtā kriyaiva pākāṅgatvena vidhīyate | aṅgānāṃ ca pradhānenaikadeśakālakartṛtvaṃ vakṣyatejai. sū. ( 11-2-1 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | | tenāciranirmathitenādūranirmathitenānanyakartṛnirmathiteneti vaktavye pradarśanārthamaciragrahaṇam || 12 ||

taddhitopāttatvānmatvarthamya na lakṣaṇā | na cānekārthavidhiryena vākyaṃ bhidyeta | na ca samasteṣu karmasu tatprakhyānaśāstrasadbhāvaḥ | n ca yathā 'gnihotre samāso 'nabhivyaktastathā 'tra taddhitaḥ | sarvatra hyevaṃrūpā eva devatāvidhayo bhavanti | na ca śyenayāgavadviśvairdevaiḥ kasyacidvayapadeśaḥ | na ca phalapadāśravaṇādvājapeyavadvairūpyaṃ yajñeḥ, śakyate hi kevalayajyanuvādena devatā vidhātumityārambhaḥ | sarvatra ca nāmacintānusārānna barhirājyādivicāreṇa vyavadhānam | atha vā nāmadheyānyapi yaugikāni nirmanthyādiṣvaprāptārthatvādvidhiphalāni dṛṣṭāni vaiśvadevaśabdo 'pi tathā 'stvityanantaraṃ saṃbandhaḥ | tatra vikalpa iti guṇavidheḥ phalena pratijñānam | evaṃ hi śaṅkyate | yadyayaṃ guṇavidhirna tarhi karma vidhīyate | na cāpi dūrasthamanuvadituṃ śakyate tatra prakṛtāgneyādikarmānuvādenāśakyaṃ devatāvidhānamutpattivākyaśiṣṭadevatāntarāvarodhādata āha—vikalpastābhiḥ saha bhaviṣyati | na cādyāpi sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābhyāmautpattikabalīyastvaṃ kvaciddarśitamiti tulyabalatvaṃ manyate | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: viśve devā na ca prāptāḥ pratyekaṃ saṃhateṣu vā ||

div.p: yadi hi guṇaṃ na vidadhyāttataḥ samastameva vākyamanarthakaṃ syāt | viśvedevasaṃbandhaśca na prakṛtānāṃ pratyekamasti, na samudāye yenānūdyeta | na cā ' 'mikṣāyāgasya kevalasya yajinā grahaṇam | na ca vaiśvadevaśabdastadviṣayatveneṣyate | tasmātsaptasu yāgeṣu guṇavidhiḥ | tatraitatsyāt | eka eva śabdaḥ saptasu vidhirāmikṣāyāṃ cānuvāda iti vipratiṣidhyeta | tanna |
atrocyate | nāyaṃ prakṛteṣu guṇavidhirupapadyate | katham |

agnyādayo hyutpattivākye taddhitaśrutyā 'ṣṭākapālādīnāṃ devatā, viśvedevā vākyena | nanvatrāpyaṣṭākapālādisaṃbandhādvākyameva | na | taddhitena dravyaviśeṣasya kṛte devatāsaṃbandhe vākyena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamātrakaraṇāt | vaiśvadevaśabde 'pi tatheti cet | na | yāgalakṣitadravyasaṃbandhakalpanāviprakarṣāt | na tāvadvaiśvadeveneti prakṛtamaprakṛtaṃ vā dravyaṃ devatāsaṃbandhi śrūyate | tatra yajeteti sāmānādhikaraṇyādevaṃ tāvadvijñāyate vaiśvadevena yāgeneti | tataścānyathā yāgasaṃbandhānupapattyā tatsādhanaṃ dravyaṃ lakṣaṇayā devatā skandati | vākyena ca yāgamātrasaṃbandhe sati prakaraṇādidaṃ kalpanīyaṃ tenaivā ' 'gneyādinā yāgena vaiśvadevena yajeta nānyeneti | na tvagnyādividhau kācillakṣaṇāpekṣā prakaraṇāpekṣā veti vaiṣamyam | nahi prakaraṇaṃ dravyasyeti | yadā dravyasyāgnyādisaṃbandho vidhīyate na tadā prakaraṇāpekṣetyarthaḥ | atha vā yaddravyasya prakaraṇaṃ na tadvaiśvadevavākyenā ' 'śritam | bhāṣye tu dravyaśabdo vastuvācī | na hi śrautasyāgnyādidravyasya devatābhūtasya prakaraṇaṃ bādhakaṃ, vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ vā, dravyasya yatsaṃbandhitvena śrutamagnyādi tasya prakaraṇaṃ na bādhakamiti | prakṛtayajñibuddheśca na dūrasthānuvādena guṇavidhirviśiṣṭāpūrvakarmavidhānaṃ vā | viprakīrṇayāgaikīkaraṇācca samudāyānuvādo 'rthavān | na hi ‘vasante vaiśvadevena’ ‘prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena’ ityādi vidhānaṃ parasparasahitānāmaṣṭānāṃ haviṣāṃ samudāyapadādṛte 'vakalpate | tasmādekadeśasthairapi viśvairdevairupalakṣitānāṃ chatrinyāyena tatprakhyatayaiva sarveṣāṃ nāmadheyam || 14 ||

lg.l: saha vidhyanuvādau hi naikaḥ śabdaḥ samaśnute ||

div.p: atha vā yaduktaṃ nirmanthyādivannāmaiva sadguṇamapi vidhāsyatīti | tatrābhidhīyate | mithaśca nāmaguṇavidhyarthayorasaṃbandhaḥ | nirmanthyastu guṇavidhiriti || 15 ||
pūrveṇaikasūtramapi saṃbhavati | mithaḥ saha pradāne kriyamāṇe triṃśatsaṃpattyabhāvādanarthasaṃbandhaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |

tena sakṛttyāgaḥ kartavya iti satyāṃ sahapradānaśaktau nā ' 'vṛttiryuktā | saṃpratipannadevatātvācca sahapradānamaviruddhaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ tataśca triṃśattvavirodhaḥ | triṃśatpūraṇaṃ ca keṣāṃcidevaṃ, nava prayājāḥ, navānuyājāḥ, dvāvāghārau, dvāvājyabhāgau, aṣṭau pradhānāhutaya iti | apareṣāṃ tu sviṣṭakṛdvājinejyāgrahaṇādāghārau na gaṇitau | sarvathā tu pradhānāhutibhedadarśanasiddhiḥ || 16 ||

guṇavidhināmadheyavicāre paryavasite 'dhunā kevalaguṇavidhitvamevāsti na veti vicāryate | atha vā 'ṣṭākapālatvasya vaiśvānarasāmānādhikaraṇyāddvādaśatvāntargatestatprakhyatvena nāmadheyatvamāśaṅkya guṇavidhiḥ prasiddhayādibhiḥ prakṛtayajibuddhestatprakhyatvābhāvācca samarthanīya
stamapi nirākṛtyārthavādatā pūrvasiddhaivopasaṃhariṣyate | tatra pūrvavatāṃ vidhānenārthavattvamapūrvāṇāṃ nāmadheyatvāvadhāraṇāt ‘yadutpattāvapūrvam’jai. sū. ( 1-4-1 ) | iti | tasmādguṇavidhayo 'ṣṭatvādayaïti kecit | tadayuktam | na hyapūrvatvānnāmadheyatvaṃ siddham | apūtvāddhi yathaiva laukikārthāparijñānānna guṇavidhitvamevaṃ vaidikakarmābhidhāyitvaṃ sutarāmaprasiddhāmiti nāmadheyatvamapi na syāt | satyeva ca sarvatra laukike 'rthe samabhivyāhārādibhirnāmadheyatoktā | tasmādyathābhāṣyameva sūtrārthaḥ |
yadi hi vaiśvānarayāge 'ṣṭatvādayaḥ kutaścitprāptā bhaveyustataḥ saṃvādadvāreṇa nāmadheyatvamarthavādatā vā syānna tu prāptirasti kevaladvādaśatvavidhānāt | tathā hi |

na hi sattāmātreṇa saṃkhyā vyāpriyate kiṃ tarhi saṃkhyeyaparicchedena | dvādaśatvena ca kapāleṣu paricchidyamāneṣu nāṣṭatvādīnāṃ paricchedakatvamityavidyamānatā | yadyapi ca yathākathaṃcidastitvamāśrīyate tathā 'pyetāvanmātraṃ bhavedaṣṭau bhavantīti na tu yadaṣṭākapāla iti | saṃskṛtataddhito hyeṣaḥ, taddhitārthanimittaśca samāsastau ca sati samārthye bhavataḥ | sāmarthyaṃ cānyanirapekṣatve bhavati | sāpekṣāśca dvādaśatvenāṣṭatvādaya iti na dvādaśakapālo 'ṣṭākapālādiśabdābhidhānīyakaṃ labhate | tena svarūpasaṃkīrtanasyāsattvātprarocanamasaṃbaddhataramāpadyeta | na ca dvādaśatvavilakṣaṇo 'ṣṭatvādeḥ karmopayogaḥ saṃbhavati, saṃkhyātvāt | yadyapi cāṣṭatvastutyā dvādaśatvaṃ stūyate na tvaṣṭākapālastutyā dvādaśakapālasya stutiḥ | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoratyantabhedāt | api cāstyeva dvādaśatvasyā ' 'tmīyā stutiḥ ‘rjagatyaivāsmin’ iti | tasmāddvādaśatvena saha vikalpamānā guṇavidhaya evaite 'pi | sarvaṃ cedaṃ vaikalpikānekasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭavaiśvānaravidhānādekamevotpattivākyamiti na balābale viśeṣaḥ | tasmā
tsāmarthyamiti ca pūrvaprakṛtayogyāpekṣatvādvaiśvadevapūrvapakṣātideśaḥ | tadīyaṃ hi sāmarthyamasminsamāmnāye 'sti, na ca taduktaḥ parihāraḥ | tasmādvidhānārthā iti || 17 ||

lg.l: prakṛtāprakṛte ṣāge tathā dravye 'pi vā guṇaḥ |

div.p: prakṛte tāvadvādaśatvāvarodhānnāṣṭatvādayo vidhīyante | na ca dūrasthe, tadupādānaśabdābhāvāt | na ca karmāntaraṃ kevalāṣṭatvādiguṇakaṃ saṃbhavati | dravyadevatāsaṃyogapratyakṣayāgāśravaṇāt | etena puroḍāśe saṃkhyāvidhistredhā 'pi pratyuktaḥ | tathā 'ṣṭākapālādipuroḍāśavidhānam | na hi dvādaśakapālapurāḍāśāvaruddho yāgaḥ puroḍāśāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti | nāpyananūdite karmaṇi svaśabdenāprakṛte puroḍāśavidhānaṃ phalatatsādhanāsaṃbaddhaṃ kvacidupayujyate | nāpyavyāpārātmakatvāddravyaṃ vidhātuṃ śakyate | ata eva viśvajidādivadapi nādhyāhāreṇa phalaṃ kalpyate |

syādetat | vaiśvānarapadānuṣaṅgādaṣṭākapālādidravyadevatāsaṃbandhavidheryāgāntarasiddhiriti | tannāsti | prathamānteṣu dvitīyāntānanuṣaṅgāt | na ca vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ | anyathā 'pyupapadyamānatvāt | yadi hyanuṣaṅgavipariṇāmāvantareṇāṣṭatvādiśravaṇamanarthakaṃ syāttataḥ kiṃ vā na kriyeta, tattu stutyarthatvenopapannataratvānnānarthakam | tadā cānuvādatvādvipariṇatavibhaktisaṃbandhe 'pyadoṣaḥ | tasmānna puroḍāśavidhānam | na ca dvādaśakapāle 'ṣṭākapālādayaḥ puroḍāśāḥ svātmabhirvibhaktā vidyante | aṣṭatvādimātraviśeṣadarśanāt | te cāṣṭatvādayo na yāge nāpi puroḍāśe vidhīyanta ityuktam | na cāṣṭatvādīnāṃ dvādaśakapālenaikavākyatā tavopapadyate | nānāvidheyaprayojanavaśenārthaikatvābhāvāt | na ca nānāvidhānāṃ vibhajyamānānāṃ
sākāṅkṣatvaṃ vidyate | yadi caikaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettataḥ sarvaviśiṣṭaikabhāvanāvidhānānna vikalpaḥ syāt | aṣṭatvādīnāṃ ca guṇatvānna pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptyā pṛthaganuṣṭhānopapattiḥ | na ca saṃkhyānāṃ samuccayaḥ saṃbhavati | saṃkhyāntaropajananena sarvabhāvaprasaṅgāt | saṃkhyāntarānupajananasamuccayastu dvādaśatve 'ṣṭatvādyantarbhāvāt | tathābhūtānāṃ ca dvādaśatvavidhinaiva prāpteranuvādatvāpattiḥ | tenaitairbhinnairvākyaiḥ svatantrā vidhīyanta ityavaśyaṃ bhavatā 'bhyupagantavyam | tataśca dvādaśatvamutpattivākyaśiṣṭamitarāṇi tu vākyāntaraiḥ prakaraṇāpekṣairdurbalāni santi na saṃbandhyante | evaṃ tāvadvaiśvānarayāgo balavattaraguṇāvarodhānnāṣṭatvādīnpratīcchati | api cāṣṭatvādayo 'pi naivātisọdhāste 'pi hi puroḍāśenaikavākyabhūtatvānnaiva vaiśvānarayāgasya prāpnuvanti | tatprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā na tasya bhaviṣyanti | tathā cātadguṇāḥ kevalapuroḍāśasaṃbandhe prayoge syuranarthakāḥ | na hi taṃ—puroḍāśaṃ pratyarthavattā 'sti | atha vā kathamatadguṇā ityata āha—na hi taṃ—yāgamanyāvaruddhaṃ pratyarthavattā 'stīti || 18 ||

yadvidheyamavadhāryate tadeva stotavyaṃ dvādaśatvaṃ cātra vidheyaṃ tasmādyathākathaṃcittadeva stotavyam | tatsāmīpyācca śaknuvantyaṣṭādiśabdāstadekadeśapratītiṃ kartum | ekadeśastutidvāreṇa caikadeśī stuto bhavati | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati, īdṛśo 'yaṃ dvādaśakapālo mahābhāgo yasmin kriyamāṇe 'ṣṭākapālādayo 'pi saṃbhāvitā bhavanti te cāṣṭatvādayo brahmavarcasādisiddhipraśastāstasmātpraśasto 'yamiti | yattvastyeva dvādaśatvasyānyā stutiriti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kutaḥ |

sarvatra hyalpairbahubhirvā 'kṣaraiḥ stutayo dṛśyante, śrotṛprakārānekatvācca kvacitkāścidarthavatyo bhavanti | yathaiva keṣāṃcidvidhyuddeśamātreṇa pravṛttau sidhyantyāmanyārthā stutirāśrīyate tathaivālpastutyupapanne 'pi kārye mahāstutyāśrayaṇamiti || 20 ||

yaduktaṃ dvādaśatvāvarodhādanarthakamaṣṭatvādividhānaṃ stavanaṃ ceti | tannānarthakam | nityaṃ hi dvādaśakapālatā | yastu guṇaphalāni brahmavarcasādīni prārthayate tasyāṣṭatvādīni dvādaśatvopamardena nivekṣyante | tathā hi—

puruṣārthasiddhayartho hi sarvaḥ prayāsa iti tatpratyāsannaṃ vastu balīyo bhavati | dūre ca dvādaśatvaṃ puruṣārthasya tatsādhanayāgadravyasaṃskārārthakapālaparicchedāt | aṣṭatvādayastu tadāśritāḥ santaḥ sākṣād brahmavarcasādi sādhayantīti pratyāsatterbalīyāṃso bhavanti | tasmādarthavanta iti | nanu ca—

tatra kecidāhuḥ |audumbarādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyenātra pratyavasthānamiti | tanna yuktam | tatraiva dattottaratvāt | ato 'yamabhiprāyaḥ | ‘pūta eva sa tejasvī’ ityādinā phalamucyate | ‘gāyatryaivainam’ ityādistuteḥ prātyātmiko vidhiḥ | ‘yadaṣṭākapāla’ ityādibhiḥ sārthavādakaiḥ pratyekaṃ vihitānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyena pūta evetyādibhiḥ phalasaṃbandhaḥ kriyate || 21 ||

putre jāte dvādaśakapālamiti yadevopakrāntaṃ tadevāṣṭatvādīnāmante ‘yaddvādaśakapālo bhavati’ iti ‘yasmiñ jāta etām’ iti copasaṃhriyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tāvati ca nāṣṭatvādayaḥ pṛthag bhavituṃ labhante tadekavākyatā ca na stutyā vinopapadyate | arthāntaraparatāyāmānarthakyāt | yadi hi kartṛsaṃbandhīnyetāni bhaveyustatastasya kāraṇāni prayojakāni syuḥ | vaiśvānarasaṃbandhīni tvetāni | tasmādguṇārtho 'nyāsaṃbhavāditi stutyartho vidhīyate | pūta eva sa ityevamādīnāṃ ca tacchabdayuktānāṃ yasmiñ jāta ityanenāpekṣitatvānna pūrvaiḥ saha phalatvena saṃbandhaḥ | na cātrānupayogo yena balādāṃcchidya nīyeran | na cāṣṭatvādibrahmavarcasādīnāmebhirvibhāgena saṃbandhaḥ | yatra tu vibhāgo ‘gāyatryaivainam’ ityādau tatra stutitvamabhyupagatameva | ato yā nāma pūta ityevamādīnāṃ phalakalpanā sā yāgameva prati nāṣṭatvādīn | prathamopanipāte tu yāgasyāpi stutireva | evaṃ kāmakārarahitatvena phalavidhyasarūpatvāt | etaireva stūyamāne yadaṣṭākapāla ityādīnāmupapa
ttyarthatā | tasmānna guṇavidhaya iti siddham || 22 ||

tatsiddhiḥ | arthavādaprasaṅgāttadupakāriguṇavādāvidhitallakṣaṇaṃ tatra noktamidānīmabhidhīyate | nanu ca tatraiva ‘rūpātprāyād’
tatsiddhītyārabhya, iti guṇāśrayā ityantasyaikasūtratve 'pi bhāṣye pratyekaṃ prathamāntasūtropanyāso vyāravyāsaukaryārtha iti na virudhyate | ‘dūrabhūyastvāt’jai. sū. (1-2-1) iti nimittaṃ kathitam | satyaṃ kathitam, na tu lakṣaṇatvena | kathaṃ tarhi, iha siddhaṃ tatrodāhṛtārthavādalakṣyaviṣayavyavahārārthaṃ nītam | atra tu sarvagauṇavṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇamucyate | nanu ca sahacaraṇasthānādīnyanyānyapyakṣapādaprabhṛtibhirgauṇanimittānyuktāni | loke ca dṛśyate yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya, mañcāḥ krośanti, aśvasahastreṇāmuko rājā jita iti | tānyupasaṃhartavyāni | liṅgasamavāyenaivopasaṃhṛtānīti ke cit | chatrisamavetetarapratyayavaddhi yaṣṭisahacaritādipratyayo bhavati | atha vā gauṇyā vṛtteriha nimittamabhidhīyate na lakṣaṇāyāḥ | kiṃ cānayorbhedo 'pyasti | bāḍhamasti | kutaḥ—

tatra yathaivā ' 'kṛtivacanaḥ śabdastatsahacaritāṃ vyaktiṃ lakṣayati tathaiva yaṣṭimañcāśvādayastatsaṃbaddhapuruṣalakṣaṇārthā bhavanti | agnirmāṇavaka iti tu nāgnitvāvinābhāvena māṇavakaḥ pratīyate | kiṃ tarhi—

sarvatra ca tatsiddhikarādāviyameva prastaraprabhṛtau yajamānādiśabdānāṃ vṛttiriti ta udāhṛtāḥ | atrāpi ca sāmānādhikaraṇyādekatarasya nāmadheyatvaṃ, nimittābhāvādanekaśaktikalpanābhayācca tadanupapattyā kāryalakṣaṇādvāraṃ prayojanavattaratvena guṇavidhitvaṃ, aśaktervā tadasaṃbhavādarthavādatvamiti traya eva pakṣāḥ | tatra guṇavidhivādī manyate | na kā
citprastarayajamānayoritaretarasamabhivyāhāreṇa stutiḥ pratīyate | na ca stotumapi paraśabdaḥ paratra vartate | na ca pravṛttinimittamasti | na ca pravṛttasya prayojanamanyatkāryalakṣaṇātaḥ | tasmāt ‘yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ’ ityādivadanyataraḥ kāryalakṣaṇārthaḥ | tatrāpi ‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāt’jai. sū. (12-2-8) iti yajamānaśabdaḥ svārthavṛttaḥ prastaraśabdaḥ strugdhāraṇādikāryalakṣaṇārtha iti guṇavidhiḥ | atrocyate—

ekakapālavat ‘sūtravākena prastaraṃ praharati’ iti yajamāne prahriyamāṇe sarvatantravilopaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādekavākyagatottarasādanasarvahomavidhistutyarthaḥ saṃvādaḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ para
śabdasya paratra sāmānādhikaraṇyam |
kimarthaṃ ceti praśrottarabhāṣyaṃ vidhyarthavādacintopakrameṇa saṃvādasya stutyarthatvāvasāyādayuktamiva mattvā stutiprakārapraśnaviṣayatayā vyācaṣṭe—kimākāretyādinā |kimākārā vā stutiriti | yajamāno hi sarvāmyarhitastadaṃśatvādbarhiṣa upari prastaraḥ sādayitavyaḥ | svargatvena saṃstute cā ' 'havanīye sakalo yajamāna āropito bhavatyekakapālenākhaṇḍiteneti stutiḥ | guṇācca śabdavṛttiḥ | kathamaguṇavacana iti—vācakatvamabhyupetaṃ manvānasya praśnaḥ | siddhāntastu,
ajahatsvārthā hati. na jahāti śabdaḥ svamarthaṃ yāsu vṛttiṣviti vigrahaḥ | idaṃ ca ‘sarva evaite gauṇāḥ’ ityādibhāṣyasya, prasiddhārthaparityāgenāprasiddhaguṇavācitvarūpaparoktagauṇīlakṣaṇanirākaraṇaparasya vyākhyānārthaṃ veditavyam |ajahatsvārthāḥ sarvāḥ śabdapravṛttayaḥ pūrvaśaktyanusārasaṃbhave śaktyantarakalpane pramāṇābhāvāt | saṃbhaviṣyati cātra siṃhatvāvagatavyaktyupasthāpitaprasahyakāritvādyanekadharmapratyayāddevadattapratyaya iti pūrvaiva śaktirnimittamiti na saṃśayahetutvena vyavahārocchedakāraṇaṃ prasiddhahānāprasiddhakalpanamāśrayaṇīyam |
yadaparaṃ, samudāyavācinaḥ padasya lakṣaṇayaikadeśavṛttitvarūpaparoktalakṣaṇadūṣaṇārthaṃ, ‘na ca sarve guṇasamudāyavacanaḥ’ iti bhāṣyaṃ tadvayākhyāṃtumārabhate—anyeṣāṃ tvityādinā |anyeṣāṃ tu darśanaṃ sarva eva hi siṃhādiśabdā jātiguṇakriyāsamudāyavācinaḥ samastārthāsaṃbhave devadattādiṣu katipayaguṇakriyāyogādupacaryanta iti | tatrābhidhīyate—

bhavati tu jātimātre dṛṣṭe sarvakriyāguṇapratyastamaye 'pi prayogaḥ | pratyayaśca mukhyātma naiva na devadattādiṣviva siṃhaśabdādupacaritaḥ | sāmānyavācitā cā ' 'kṛtyadhikaraṇasiddhā
bādhyate | kriyāguṇānāṃ cā ' 'nantyānna śakyaḥ prativyakti saṃbandho 'nubhavitum |
na cāsāmānyāt sāmānyaṃ śakyate kalpayituṃ jātyantare 'pi kvacitkāsāṃcitsadbhāvāt |

na hyanabhihitaṃ siṃhatvaṃ guṇakriyāṇāṃ vyavacchedakaraṃ bhavati | apratīteḥ | abhihitaṃ cettu pratyayādevāśeṣaguṇakriyāvagamādabhidhānaśaktyanavasāya iti samudāyavācināmekadeśeṣu na gauṇatvasaṃbhavaḥ |
adhyāropitārthavṛttitvarūpaparoktalakṣaṇadūṣaṇārthamanyadbhāṣyaṃ, ‘nacāsati siṃha’ iti, tadvayākhyāsyati—kaścitpunarityādinā |kaścitpunarāha-samāropitatadbhāvo gauṇa iti | tasyaitanmatam | na kathaṃcana paraśabdastayā jātyā svanibandhanabhūtayā vinā 'tyantānabhidheyakriyāguṇamātradvāreṇānyatra vartitumarhati | na ca siṃhaśabdenāpravartamānena siṃho devadatta iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogo ghaṭate | kathaṃ tarhi—

siṃhādisadṛśakriyāguṇadarśanena hi devadattādayaḥ sāmastyaparikalpanayā sārūpyamāpadyante | tataśca svārtha eva śabdaḥ prayujyate | na caitāvatā mukhyaprasaṅgo 'rthasya, adhyāropitatvāt | yatra tu sa evārtho na samāropyate tatra mukhya ityadoṣaḥ | tatredamucyate | naitat, kalpanāyā aśakyatvāt | tathā hi—

yadā tāvadbhrāntyā mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ toyamadhyāropya śabdaṃ prayuṅkte, tadobhayormukhyārthādhyavasānarūpeṇe toyapratīterbhrāntimukhyatvam | athāpi vaktā vivekī sannitaravañcanārthaṃ prayuṅkte, śrotā ca na viviṅkte, tadā 'pyekasya vivekenādhyāropābhāvāditarasyāntyādhyavasānānnaikamapi prati gauṇatvopapattiḥ | yadā tu dvāvapyabhrāntau tadobhayoḥ sādṛśyādinimittāntarṇītavatyarthādhyavasānādāropābhāvaḥ | tathā hi—

yathaiva hyasadṛśānāmarthānāṃ tiktamadhurādīnāṃ na kathaṃcidapi pratītyabhāvātparamparādhyāropaṇamevaṃ sadṛśānāmapi vivekajñānaṃ nopapadyate | na hyarthādhyavasānādanyādṛśaṃ nāma jñānaṃ vyavahārāṅgaṃ bhavatīti | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: śabda eva yadā tāvadanimitto na vartate |

div.p: na cārtharahitā buddhirātmākāramātramanubhavantī jāyata ityuktaṃ śūnyavāde(a. 1 pā. 1 sū. 4) atratyavṛttikāramatānuvāde bhāṣya iti śeṣaḥ | | api ca—

sarvathā tāvadayaṃ gauṇamukhyavibhāgaḥ śrotṝṇāmarthaviśeṣāvadhāraṇe vyāpriyate | te ca padavelāyāmanadhyāropitasvārthavṛttyeva siṃhādipadamadhyavasāya devadattādipadasāmānādhikaraṇyānyathānupapattyā gauṇatāṃ kalpayanti | tatra caiṣāṃ svayamanāropyaiva siṃhatvaṃ tatsādṛśyādipratītirbhavati | sā ca kiṃ śabdādathārthādityanvicchatāmanvayavyatirekābhyāmākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyenārthāditi niścayo jāyate | katham—

lg.l: jāyate na tvabuddhe 'rthe siṃhaśabde śrute 'pi naḥ ||

div.p: yadā ca śrotṝṇāṃ svayamadhyāropābhāvastadā vaktaryapi naivaiṣāmevaṃ kalpanā bhavati, yathā nūnamanena siṃhatvamadhyāropitamiti | kathaṃ tarhi siṃhatvāvinābhūtānekakriyāguṇasamudāyo 'nena vivakṣitaḥ, yatnagauravabhayānna svairabhidhānairbravīti | na cāsya samastasya kiṃ cidekaṃ vācakaṃ padamasti tenāvinābhāvitayā kathaṃ nu siṃhatvāttatpratītirbhavediti tattāvadabhidhīyate | yataḥ sthitayā śabdaśaktyā puṃsāṃ vyavahāro na tadvaśena śaktyantaropajana iti | kiṃca—

paraparikalpitānāṃ gauṇīvṛttilakṣaṇānāṃ vedāprāmāṇyāpratipādakatve 'pi nāsmadabhimatasyeti niṣkṛṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇamāha—tasmādityādinā | tasmāt—guṇayoganimittāyāḥ śabdapravṛttergauṇatveneṣṭatvāt | guṇānāṃ svaśakyasiṃhādivṛttidharmāṇāṃ, devadattādirūpārthāntare, pravṛttiḥ—yogaḥ, prayojanaṃ—śabdapravṛttau nimittaṃ yasya śabdasya sa gauṇa ityarthaḥ | tattvaṃ tu, svasamānajātīyadharmavattvādhyāropitatvānyatarasaṃbandhena svaṃśakyavṛttidharmavattvaṃ gauṇīlakṣaṇaṃ vijñeyam |tasmādguṇapravṛttiprayojano gauṇa ityeva lakṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ nānyathā | nanvevaṃ sati khapu- ṣpādīnāṃ svārthāvinābhūtaguṇābhāvādgauṇaprayogābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, sāṃkhyādikalpitapradhānādiniṣedhe ca bauddhādervinā 'dhyāropeṇa prayogāsaṃbhavo 'nabhyupagate hi pratiṣedhānarthakyamabhyupagate tadvirodhaḥ syādadhyāropitaniṣedhe tvadoṣa iti | atrābhidhīyate | tavaivāyaṃ doṣaḥ | kutaḥ—

yattāvatkhapuṣpasthānīya ātmā, khapuṣpaṃ bhavatsiddhānta ityādiprayogaḥ | tatra kataratkhapuṣpamanyattvayā siṃhatvavadavadhāritaṃ yadadhyāropyeta | tena khapuṣpasvarūpameva tāvadadhyāropātmakamabhyupagantavyaṃ na caitasya loke gauṇatvapratītirmukhyārthāntarābhāvāt | prathamapratītatvāddhi khapuṣpādisvarūpaṃ na mukhyatvādapaiti | kathamasato mukhyatvamiti cet, tulyamidaṃ gauṇatve 'pi | yatra tvadhyāropyate sa gauṇaḥ, na yo 'dhyāropyate | khapuṣpaṃ vā ' 'ropyamāṇaṃ viṣayāntarābhāvātsvayamevādhyāropyate vā | tatraitatsyāt | vidyamānaghaṭādirūpaṃ tatrādhyāropyate na gauṇatvamiti | tadayuktaṃ, khapuṣpādau sadrūpapratyayānutpādāt | avaśyaṃ hi yādṛksaṃbandhakāle 'rtho 'nubhūtastādṛguttarakālaṃ grahītavyam | na ca śaśaviṣāṇādyarthaḥ sadrupeṇānubhūtapūrvaḥ, na cārthāntarasadrūpagrahaṇena khapuṣpādeḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate yayostadavayavayorarthasaṃbandho 'nubhūtastayornaiva gauṇatvaṃ mukhyātmanā 'vabodhāt | kathaṃ tarhi śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstītyucyate yadi tatsadrūpeṇa na pratītapūrvam | sadrūpratītasya vā kathamatyantapratiṣedhopapattiḥ | paśya—

tenaivādhyāropyata iti cet, na | adhyāropyasyāpyevameva pradeśāntarasadbhāvādhīnatvāt | na cānyasadbhāvenānyasyādhyāropaḥ sidhyati, asaṃbandhāt | kathamūṣarasadbhāvena toyarūpādhyāropa iti cet | pradeśāntare toyasadbhāvapratītervaiṣamyam | kathaṃ tarhi śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstīti prayogaḥ | pūrveṇaivābhāve 'vagate nāstiśabdo 'nuvādaka iti kecit |
atha vā sāmānyena prāgabhāvādiṣu nāstiśabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ śaśaviṣāṇaśabdena viśeṣyate na śaśaviṣāṇamavyabhicārāttenetyadoṣaḥ | atha vā yenāvayavārthau gṛhītau samāsācca rājapuruṣādivatsāmānyato dṛṣṭena ṣaṣṭhyarthasmṛtiḥ prasaktā, na ca kadācicchaśaḥ śṛṅgarahitatvenāvadhāritapūrvastasyaitatsaṃsargānusaṃdhānaṃ vāryate | atha vā vinaiva samāsena śaśamadhikaraṇatvena nirdiśya viṣāṇaṃ ca gavādigataṃ vinaidhyāropeṇānayoḥ saṃbandho nāstīti kathite tenaivānūbhūtasaṃbandhasya śaśaviṣāṇaśabdastamevābhāvaṃ gamayiṣyati | atha vā śaśamūrdhavartināṃ pṛthivyavayavānāmuparyupari cīyamānānāṃ dṛḍhadīrghasaṃniveśarūpeṇa pariṇatānāṃ nīcairvṛttākāreṇa yadavasthānaṃ sau 'sya vākyasyādhyāsamantareṇoktaviṣayaḥ saṃbhavatītyavirodhaḥ | tathā cā ' 'ha—

tena labdhamukhyārthānāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmanyatrāpi
sadrūpatvena yā prasiddhistato 'nyena prakāreṇa—asadrūpatvenāvasthānaṃ yasyetyartha: |prasiddhayanyathāsthāyinyarthe siddho gauṇaprayogaḥ | tava tu mukhyābhāvāt dūrībhūto gauṇaḥ | yadi ca svārtha eva gauṇatā tato 'rthāntareṇaiva vṛtteratyantābhāvaḥ syāt | na hyagniśabdo māṇavake gauṇībhūtastadadvāreṇa punaranyatra gauṇatāṃ pratipadyate tathā ca vakṣyati ‘na pratinidhau samatvāt’jai. sū. 6-3-14) | iti | ye 'pi pradhānatvādīnāṃ pratiṣedhāste 'pi nādhyāropanimittāḥ | kiṃ tarhi—

pradhānādiśabdā jagatkāraṇādiviṣayāstatraiva bauddhādibhiḥ paramāṇvādyātmakakāraṇābhyupagamāt | śarīrasaṃtānādyātmakakalpanācca tadvayatiriktakāraṇādiniṣedhaḥ kriyate, para
māṇuśarīrādiṣveva pradhānātmādiśabdavṛttiriti yāvat | tasmātsvārthābhidhānenaiva gauṇatvamityaduṣṭam | ataśca yajamānaḥ pratītaḥ svārthasiddhikaratvaṃ lakṣayati, prastaraikakapālāvapi ca pāramparyeṇa yajamānārthasiddhiṃ kuruta iti kāryāpattestacchabdena stūyete | etena jātisārūpyādīni vyākhyātāni |

jātiḥ | tatrā ' 'gneyādiśabdānāṃ brāhmaṇādiṣu mukhyatvameva yena kenacitsaṃbandhena taddhitotpādāt | devatāsaṃbandha eva vā 'sti na hi yadeva tyajyate tasyaiva kevalaṃ devatāsaṃbandhaḥ tyakturapi tenaiva saṃbandhena saiva devatā bhavati | yathā ca vakṣyati ‘bhavati puruṣasyāpi yaṣṭuḥ sā devatā’( a. 5 pā. 4 a. 6 sū. 19 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ | iti | tasmādanudāharaṇatvam | ato yatrāgnirvai brāhmaṇa ityādiprayogāstadudāhartavyam | agnirhi pratīto mukhaprabhavatvasāmānyena brāhmaṇādīnupasthāpa
yati | jātiriti cātra janmopādānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, yadyapi ca tathā vastu nāsti tathā 'pyarthavādāntare tathoktatvādiha tacchabdanimittatā pratipatsyate |

sārūpyam | nanu sarvatraiva sārūpyanimittaṃ gauṇatvam | satyamevam | iha tu cakṣurgrāhyaśabdavivakṣayā pṛthagupādānam | cākṣuṣaṃ hi yūpasyordhvatvamañjananimittaṃ ca tejasvitvaṃ taddvāreṇa yajamānādityaśabdābhyāṃ stūyate | yajamānasya hi paśudhāraṇe viniyuktasya nikhātasya ca svapadārthakaraṇavirodhaḥ | sahasraraśmestvaśakyameva yūpakāryamādhātum | yadi ca kaścinnāstikyāddāhapratikṛtimupādadyāttasyāpi gauṇatāpattirvidhiviṣayā syāttadvaraṃ stutāveva tadāśrayaṇamityavidhitvaṃ syāt |
praṃśasā | nanu sarvatra praśaṃsānimittatvaṃ guṇavādasyoktam | satyaṃ, phalamanyatra guṇavādasya praśaṃsā | atra tu guṇasārūpyādivatpravṛttinimittam | kathamiti cet—

na tāvanmahiṣādīnāṃ paśutvasvarūpābhāvaḥ śakyate vaktuṃ, pratyakṣavirodhāt | kāryapratiṣedhaḥ kalpyeta, tadapi tatra tatra vacanavihitatvānna śakyameva | na ca vikalpo, vaiṣamyāt | kalpyo hyatra vidhiritaratra kḷptaḥ stutyā vā 'rthavattvānnāgatyā tadāśrayaṇam | tulyaśca
mukhyārthatyāgaḥ, ‘paśavo goaśvā’ iti ca punarupādānamanarthakam | na ca paśutvaikārthasamavāyinaḥ kriyāguṇāḥ śakyāḥ pravivektum | atha gavāśvasamavāyino viśeṣāḥ pratiṣidhyeran, evamapi mandaṃ phalam | anyaśabdenaiva ca tāvānarthaḥ siddha ityanarthakam | avaśyaṃ cottarapadena pratiṣedhye 'rthe prathamamupāttena tatrānuvartitavyaṃ, viṣayarahitapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavāt | na ca praśastatvādanyadupādīyamānamupayujyate |śaknuvanti ca gavāśvādisaṃbandhāttadgataṃ prāśastyaṃ gamayitum | yadyapyapraśastatvamapi śaknuvanti tathā 'pi prakramāpekṣayā tadihānākāṅkṣitamiti prāśastyameva niṣidhyate | tatpratiṣedhamātramapi ca naivaupayikamiti taddvāreṇānyeṣāṃ praśastataratvaṃ kathyate | etaduktaṃ bhavati | gavāśvādīnapekṣya naivānyasya prāśastyaṃ vidyata ityevamanyagatapraśaṃsānimittaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | sā ceha prathamataramāśritetyananyaprayojanatayā paścādavagamyate | anyatra punaruttarakālamevaiṣā bhavantī nimittatvenocyate |

bhūmā | yadi ‘sṛṣṭīrupadadhāti’ ityākhyātapratyayabalādvidhirāśrīyate tatra na jātyā dharmaviśeṣeṇa vā kāścidiṣṭakāḥ sṛṣṭayo nāmānyābhyo vilakṣaṇā vijñāyante, yā evaṃvidhaliṅgairmantrairupadhīyante tā eva sṛṣṭayaḥ, tatropadhānamātramuddiśyaṃ mantreṣu vidhīyamāneṣu sakalaprāpteḥ pratyakṣavacanāviniyuktaliṅgaprakaraṇaviniyojyamantrānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmātprakaraṇapāṭhādeva sarvatra mantreṣu prāpteṣvekadeśānuvādaḥ sṛṣṭyabhidhānanimittārthavādārthaḥ | atra codayanti | cayanacodanayaivopadhānasya prāptatvālliṅgaprakaraṇānumitayā ca śrutyā mantraprāpteḥ pradeśānta
rasthārthavādānupapattirekavākyādhīnatvādarthavādapravṛtteḥ | tathā ca prathanārthavāde vyākhyātam | na cānyo guṇaḥ śrūyate yadarthatā kalpyeta tatra parisaṃkhyārthataiva prāpnoti | tataśca tadavasthamānarthakyamiti vācyaṃ punaḥśrutiprayojanam | tatra kecidāhuḥ | upadhānamevātra vidhīyate tanmāhātmyapradarśanārthaṃ ca mantragrahaṇam | itthamidaṃ praśastaṃ yadevaṃrūpairmantraiḥ kriyata iti | cayanenārthagṛhītamupadhānamiti cenna | saṃhatasthāpanenāpi cayanopapatteḥ | nanvaivaṃ saṃhatānāmevopadhānaṃ syāt | na | tasyeṣṭakāḥ pratyupādīyamānasya pratipradhānāvṛttinyāyasiddheḥ | api ca—
tataścādhvaryukartṛkatvaṃ ca labhyate | arthagṛhītāyāṃ tvaniyamaḥ syāt | na cāvaśyamupadhāna eva sarve mantrā viniyujyeran | aviśiṣṭasāmarthyā hi kecid grahaṇādyapi kuryuḥ | api ca—

ye tvaupānuvākyākāṇḍādhīnāsteṣāṃ vākyādṛte saṃbandha eva nāstītyarthavadeva vacanam | na cāvaśyamanena sūtreṇārthavādatvaṃ pratipādyate talliṅgāttalliṅgeṣu bhūyastvanimittaśabdapravṛttimātrakathanādato nātīva sṛṣṭināmavidhānamādartavyam |

bhāṣyakāreṇa tu vidhau lakṣaṇāṃ pariharatā 'nuvādatvamāśritam | ‘ekayā stuvate’ iti hyanuvākādyasyaivāsṛṣṭiliṅgatvādātmaparityāgenetaralakṣaṇārthatā syāt, tallakṣayitvā ca punarātmā 'pi pratipādanīya ityatigauravam, upadhānastutyarthatvena punaranuvādatvādaduṣṭā lakṣaṇā |

liṅgasamavāyaḥ | sṛṣṭivadeva prāṇabhṛdādiṣu codyaparihārāvalpaireva liṅgairbhūyasāmanevaṃ
liṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇamityudāharaṇabhedaḥ svārthāparityāgāccobhayatra lakṣaṇasyāpi grahaṇamupādīyamānatvāditi |
āha ca—

kiṃ punaratra saṃdehakāraṇaṃ, vidhau sāmānyagrahaṇamiti kecit | tadayuktam | tatra tāvanmātranirṇayāt | syādetat | kathaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ saṃbhavatīti, ghṛtavaditi vadāmaḥ | tatrāpi ca navapurāṇagavyamāhiṣādisaṃdehastadavasthaḥ | tena yathā 'tra ghṛtamātranirṇayādasaṃdeho viśeṣānabhidhāne 'pi sarvaiḥ kāryasiddhirevamihāpi snehanasamarthadravyamātragrahaṇādasaṃdehaḥ | tasmādarthavāde ghṛtaśravaṇātsaṃśaya ityapare | tathā 'pi na yuktaḥ, viśeṣapratipattyā nirṇītatvāt | na hi gaurānīyatāṃ śukla ityatra kaiścitsaṃdihyate | viṣama upanyāsaḥ |
katham—

lg.l: vidhau yadi viśeṣaḥ syātsaṃdehaḥ kasya vā bhavet |

div.p: yadi hyevaṃ bhavet ‘aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti’ ghṛteneti | tato naiva kiṃcidvicāryeta | atha tvañjanavākyavadihāpyevaṃ śrūyeta gāmānaya śuklaḥ praśasta iti tato 'styeva saṃdehakāraṇamityetadapyudāharaṇameva syāt | ato 'nyatra sāmānyamanyatra ca viśeṣa ityetasmātsaṃdehaḥ | kecicca saṃśayadarśanādeva vidhistutyorvākyāntaratvamācakṣate |

vākyabhede punarekaṃ sāmānye parisamāptamanyadviśeṣaparamiti yuktaḥ saṃdehaḥ | yattu ‘vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt’jai. sū. ( 1-2-1 ) iti tadaṅgapradhānavākyānāmiva paścātsaṃbandhasadbhāvābhiprāyeṇa | tathā hi—

na tvetadyuktamiva, ye hi padasaṃghātāḥ karmaupayikeṣvartheṣu paryavasyanti teṣāṃ nānāvākyatvaṃ yuktam | na tvarthavādānāmekavākyatvātprākprayojanalābha iti prathamamevaikavākyatā | durlabhataraśca saṃdehaḥ syādanyonyanirapekṣayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoritaratretaratra ca paryavasānāt | yadeva hi yatropāttaṃ tadeva tatrāsaṃdigdhaṃ gṛhyate sāmānyasamāptaścātra vidhiḥ paścādviśeṣaḥ syāt | mantravarṇavaditi cet, evamapi ( a. 6 pā. 8 a. 10 sū. 30 )tadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvātpaunaruktyaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādekavākyatāyāmevopakramopasaṃhārayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣayatvena vipratipatteravaśyaṃbhāvyekagocaratvācca kimadhīnā kasya pravṛttiriti jāyate saṃdehaḥ | kasya sāmañjasyamiti—yacchrutivṛttaṃ tatsamañjasaṃ na lakṣaṇāvṛttam | tatra ca—

vidhīyamānaṃ hi stotavyaṃ na tu stutyaṃ vidheyamaprāptārthaśca vidhiriti na śrautārthāt pracyavate | yadyapi tāvadarthavādopakramatvaṃ bhavettataḥ prathamajñānānurodhena kadācidvidhirvaśīkriyeta vidhyupakramaṃ tvidaṃ ‘aktāḥ śarkarāḥ’ iti | tasmānnirdiṣṭasāmānye yadyarthavādo na tādarthyaṃ pratipadyate tato 'narthako bhavatītyaśaktaḥ svatantrībhavituṃ, vinā 'pi cārthavādena vidhyuddeśaḥ samarthatvānna yuktastadvaśyaḥ kartum, arthavādastvagatitvādvidhivaśena vartate viśeṣaśca sāmānyamavyabhicārācchaknoti lakṣayituṃ, na sāmānyaṃ vyabhicārādviśeṣaṃ tasmādghṛtaśabdaḥ snehamātralakṣaṇārthaḥ |

lg.l: kāmaṃ vā so 'rthavādo 'stu sāmānyastho ghṛte vidhiḥ |
vinā stutyā vidhānaṃ tu snehadravyāntare bhavet ||

div.p: yathā aindreṇāpi mantreṇa somo gṛhyamāṇo na kevalaṃ tadartho bhaviṣyatyanyadevatyasyāmantragrahaṇopapatterevamanarthavādakaṃ tailavasayorvidhānaṃ, yatraiva cāṃśe stutirdṛśyate tatra vidhyuddeśasya prarocanāśaktirapagacchati, anyatra tvavihataśaktinā vidhānamiti sarvasnehagrahaṇam | ucyate—

yadyapi tāvadvidhiprakrame tailavasayorapyupādānaṃ, tathā 'pi prarocanāto vidhirghṛte dṛśyate netarayorityanupādātavye kalpayitavyā ca tadviṣayā vidheḥ prarocanāśaktiḥ kḷptā ca ghṛte | tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ kālpanikī vākyaṃ bhinatti ghṛte ca kḷptāṃ gṛhṇannitaratra ca kalpayan vairūpyeṇāpi vidhirbhidyeta | tasmādvidhyuddeśo 'pi tailādibhyo 'panīyate | yadyapi ca sāmānyaśabdaḥ syāttathā 'pi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | tatra sāmānyānyathānupapattyā yatra kvacanānuśrute viśeṣe 'pekṣite vākyaśeṣād ghṛta eva pratyayo bhavati, ghṛte ca śabdārthe yadi śrutyanurodhenātyantāśrutatailādityāgaḥ kriyate kiṃ virudhyate saṃdehamātraṃ hi tatra bādhitaṃ na tu pramāṇaṃ kiṃcit | kriyāmātrameva ceha coditaṃ dravyaṃ tatra na yāvatkiṃcit dravyamā
kṣipyeta yadi kaścidapi śrutileśo na syāt | ghṛtārthavādadarśanāttvavaśyakartavyāyāmaśrutadravyavidhikalpanāyāṃ nānyatra pramāṇamastītyaṅgīkṛtya ghṛtāñjanavidhirgamyate | tatra bhrāntyutpannatailādyākāṅkṣā nirmūlatvādbādhyamānā na duṣyetetyavirodhaḥ, tailādigrahaṇe ca lakṣaṇātrayaṃ syāt | kriyayā dravadravyeṇa ca viśeṣo ghṛtaśabdena ca sāmānyaṃ lakṣayitavyam | tasmādghṛtagrahaṇaṃ pramāṇamiti siddham |
asminnadhikaraṇe vṛttyantarodāhṛtamantravarṇopekṣaṇe bhāṣyakṛto 'bhiprāyamāha—vṛtyantare tviti | bhinnavākyatayā 'vagatapramāṇabhāvānāṃ mantrāṇāmapyatraiva saṃdigdhārthanirṇāyakatve vyavasthāpite ṣaṣṭhāntye paśucchāgādhikaraṇe nirṇeyārthābhāvena tadadhikaraṇamanarthakamāpadyeteti bhāvaḥ |vṛttyantare tvatraiva mantravarṇo 'pyudātdṛtaḥ | tatra tu ghṛtena kiṃ kariṣyata iti vaktavyam || 24 ||

lg.l: atha yatreti saṃdigdhe vākyaśeṣo na vidyate |

div.p:
devatāprasādābhayaprārthanādau saṃhatahastasaṃyogamātramañjaliḥ, ‘nāñjalinā vāri pibet’ ityādau vyākośaḥ | saktuhomacodanāyāṃ śabdātsaṃdehe satyasati cā ' 'kośasya vākyaśeṣe 'nyathānupapatterevā ' 'kośāśrayaṇam | nanvanenaiva nyāyena yathā śaknuyāditi vākyaśeṣādandhādīnāmājyāvekṣaṇādirahitaḥ karmādhikāraḥ syāt | na | asaṃdehāt, saṃdigdhanirṇayārthāttvevaṃ kalpanā bhavati | na cādhikāre saṃdehaḥ samastadharmopetaṃ yathā śaknuyāttathā kuryāditi vākyaśeṣāt | santi ca tādṛśasya kartāraścakṣuṣmadādaya iti na prayogacodanānyathānupapattiḥ | yatra tu yāvajjīvacodanādāvevaṃ bhaviṣyati tatra śaktikṛtāṅgatyāge 'pi
satyavaiguṇyaṃ pradhānasya coditamityāśrayiṣyāmaha eva | tasmādyāvadeva labdhātmako vidhistāvadyat kalpate tadvaidikaṃ, siddhe tu tatkalpanaṃ pauruṣeyatvādapramāṇaṃ sāmarthyādhīnatvādvākyaśeṣasiddheḥ | āha ca—

lg.l: tenaiva caitā na samāmananti sahasrabhāgāstu samāmaneyuḥ ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsabhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike prathamasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ |

div.p:
saṃbandhaṃ tāvallakṣaṇadvayasya karoti tatra prathame 'dhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttamityuktam | tatkutaḥ, naiva hi prathame 'dhyāye sūtrakāreṇa kiṃ cana lakṣaṇena pramāṇādeḥ svarūpamupavarṇitam | tannāma lakṣaṇamucyate yena tadvyatiriktebhyastasya svarūpaṃ vyāvṛttākāraṃ nirūpyate | na ceha pramāṇādīnāṃ lakṣaṇamuktam | anumānādīni tāvannaiva sūtritāni | pratyakṣamapi dharmaṃ pratyanimittatvenopanyastaṃ na lakṣyatveneti vyākhyātam | na ca śabdo 'pi kaściddharmapramāṇabhūto lakṣitaḥ, asminnevādhikaraṇe tasya lakṣyamāṇatvāt | yadapi ca vṛttikāreṇa sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pradarśitaṃ na tadadhyāyārthatvenopasaṃhartuṃ yuktam | sūtrādhyāyārthānupasaṃhārāt | kathaṃ ca samastalakṣaṇārthavyatirikta evārthe sūtrāṇi kṣīyeran | api ca vṛttikāreṇa yo 'pyuktaḥ ṣaṭkaḥ pratyakṣapūrvako 'parīkṣyatayā so 'pi naiva lakṣaṇagocaraḥ, lokaprasiddhārthāni hi tānyaparīkṣyatvenoktāni na prathamādhyāyaviṣayatvenopasaṃhāramarhanti | tasmādyatprathamādhyāye vṛttaṃ tadālocyaitadbhāpyaṃ neyam | tatra pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ tāvaccodanālakṣaṇāśrayaṇasya, vidhyāditattvanirṇītiḥ pramāṇenaiva sthitā | samasto hi prathamaḥ pādaścodanāsūtraparikaraḥ | tatra ca dharmasya codanālakṣaṇatvamuktam | ato 'vadhāritārthalakṣaṇaśabdasāhacaryātpramāṇaśabdaḥ pratipādyata ityevaṃ vyutpādya dharmaviṣaya eva vyākhyeyaḥ | satyapi prameyamātravācitve, asminśāstre jijñāsyatvena dharmaḥ prameyaḥ prakrānta iti sa eva gṛhyate | atha vā karaṇameva pramāṇaṃ tasyaiva lakṣaṇamuktam | yadyapi ca sarvapramāṇānāṃ tannoktaṃ tathā 'pi dharmapramāṇasya codanātvaṃ lakṣaṇamityetāvataivoktaṃ manyate | na cāvaśyaṃ sarvātmanaiva lakṣite lakṣaṇatvam | viśeṣarūpāṇāmānantyena sarvalakṣaṇābhāvaprasaṅgāt | api cautpattikasūtreṇa viśeṣo 'pyukta eva yenā ' 'gamaviśeṣo gamyate | atha vopanyastasya codanātmakasya pramāṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyakāraṇamityupasaṃhāraḥ | tathā yadyapi vidheridaṃ rūpamidamarthavādasyedaṃ mantrasyetyevaṃ noktaṃ tathā 'pi dharmaṃ pratyupayogābhidhānāttatvaṃ nirṇītam | avasarābhāvāttu tatsvarūpaṃ na nirdiṣṭam | śrutimūlatvaṃ vijñānasya smṛtiprāmāṇye tattvam | nāmadheyasya codanāntargatatvātpramāṇatvam | saṃdigdhārthanirṇaye vāvayaśeṣasāmarthyayoḥ prāmāṇya
mityevaṃ samastamadhyāyaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇamācakṣate | tanna prasmartavyamiti | avismṛtaprāmāṇyo hi bhedādipratipādanam ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 2 ) |aviśeṣādanarthakaṃ hi syāt iti kriyamāṇaṃ sahate | anyathā hyanarthakaṃ nāmetyeva pratyavatiṣṭheta | nanu pradhānāpradhānacintā tṛtīyacaturthayorviṣayaḥ kathamatropanyasyate | ke cidāhuḥ | iha dravyakarmaṇoruttaratra tu karmaṇāmeva guṇapradhānatvavicārādapaunaruktyamiti | tadayuktam | ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 3 ) |‘dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣu’ ityatra sarvābhidhānāt | tenaivaṃ vācyam—

karmabhedastāvadautsargiko lakṣaṇārthastadapavādatvenābhedaḥ | tadanuniṣpādinau tvapūrvabhedābhedau | tatra pratikarmabhedamapūrvabhedaprasaktau tṛtīyasiddhaḥ pradhānāpradhānavicāraḥ punarapavādatvenā ' 'rapsyate | satyapyavahantyādīnāṃ śabdāntarādibhirbhede karmākāṅkṣitadṛṣṭaprayojanaparyavasānānna kriyājanyāpūrvāntarotpattiḥ | yattu niyamāpūrvaṃ tatkriyākṛtaṃ na bhavatīti na tayā vyapadiśyate | tena yatraiva dravyādīni prati kriyāṇāṃ pradhānatvaṃ tatraiva tadbhedanimittāpūrvabhedasiddhiḥ | asya ca vivekārthaṃ yadguṇapradhānalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyate tadapavādārthaṃ dharmamātre tu ‘stutaśastrayoḥ’ iti cādhikaraṇadvayaṃ
dvyantaritaṃ tryantaritaṃ cādhikaraṇadvayamityarthaḥ | prastoṣyate | tataścā ' 'khyātadvaividhye vicārite prasaṅgāttṛtīyaṃ prakāramabhidhāyakatvaṃ pratipādayituṃ mantraprastāvaḥ, tallakṣaṇādīni tu prasaktānuprasaktena yāvatpādasamāpti | tataḥ śabdāntarābhyāsābhyāṃ bhedamuktvā paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇenābhyāsāpavādaḥ kariṣyate samudāyānuvādatvāt | tatastadapavādārthamupāṃśuyājāghārāgnihotrapaśusomādhikaraṇāni | tataḥ saṃkhyāsaṃjñāguṇairbhedaḥ | tāvacca guṇagato vicāro yāvatprakaraṇāntarādhikaraṇam | tatastannyāyānuvṛttirāśākhāntarādhikaraṇāt | tatra ca ṣaṭkātiriktabhedakāraṇavyudāsaḥ saṃjñābhyāsaguṇaprakriyāṇāṃ cā ' 'śaṅkānivṛttirityetāvān bhedalakṣaṇārthaḥ | eṣa eva cārtho 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyoṅgāṅgitvādyavadhāraṇārtham | na cānyasyedānīmavasaro 'stītyamevādhyāyasaṃbandhaḥ | kutaḥ—

prāktāvatpramāṇalakṣaṇādvedārthavicārātmakatvānna kasyacidbhedalakṣaṇādeḥ prastāva ityuttarakālamārambhaḥ | tatrāpi śeṣaśeṣitvaṃ prayojakāprayojakatvaṃ kramaśca bhinnānāṃ bhavatīti na bhedalakṣaṇātprāgārabhyate | tathā 'dhikāraḥ karmasvarūpe 'vadhārite tadyogyatayā śakyo nirūpayitumiti pañcāpi lakṣaṇāni pratīkṣate | tathottaraḥ ṣaṭko 'tideśaviṣayatvādupadeśajñānādhīnasiddhiḥ samastaḥ samastaṃ pūrvaṣaṭkamapekṣate | tataśca pariśeṣasiddho 'yaṃ bhedalakṣaṇasya saṃbandha ityatrā ' 'rabhyate | ṣaḍvidhaḥ karmabheda iti—sādhanabhedopacārāt | vakṣyamāṇasūtrakramānurodhānnāmadheyaṃ saṃkhyānantaraṃ paṭhitavyaṃ sadanādarādante paṭhitam | itikaraṇo hetvarthaḥ | ṣaḍvidhaḥ karmabheda etaiḥ kāraṇairiti yāvat | atha vā karaṇe bhedaśabdaṃ vyutpādya |sāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva śabdāntarādīni vyākhyeyāni | saṃjñāśabdāntarayoḥ saṃkhyāguṇayoścāpaunaruktyaṃ svasthāne vakṣyāmaḥ | sarvadā caiṣāṃ bhinnaviṣayatvānna śrutyādivadbalābalacintā bhaviṣyatīti tadbhedapratipādanamātraṃ tātparyeṇa | anyadupodghātaprasaktānuprasaktyādinā | tatra—

yathedamevādhikaraṇaṃ prakṛtānuniṣpādyapūrvabhedānusārasiddhyarthamupodghātatvena bhaviṣyati katarasmātpadātphalena saṃbadhyamānādapūrvabhedābhedāvanugantavyāviti | yadā niravayavau vākyavākyārthau syātāṃ tataḥ kiṃ pratipadaṃ dharma ityādirasaṃbaddha eva vicāraḥ syādata āha॔ vākye ca padānāmarthā iti | atrāpi codyate

yadi hi dharmasvarūpamabhidhīyeta tataḥ kiṃ padena padenocyata iti vicāro yujyate
lākṣaṇike tvayuktaḥ || taducyate—

na cātra yo dharmaḥ sa kiṃ padena padenocyata ityevaṃ vicāryate kiṃ tarhi yaḥ padena padenocyate sa kiṃ phalasaṃbandhottarakālaṃ vākyārthātmanā gamyamāno dharmo bhavati, athetarapadārthānugṛhīta ekaḥ padārtha iti | tathā ca sarvairekasya dharmatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati | sākṣātphalasādhanamātrasya dharmatvābhyupagamāt | na tu sarveṣāmekaḥ kaścidartho 'sti yaḥ sarvaireka ityevamāśrīyeta | yacca phalapadena saha saṃbadhyate tasyārthaṃ dharmamapūrvasādhanaṃ ca manyante | tena kiṃ sarvāṇi padāni phalena saṃbadhyante kiṃ vaikamiti vicāraḥ | kiṃ prāptaṃ, pratipadamiti | kutaḥ—

yadi hi viśeṣo gamyetedaṃ phalasaṃbandhayogyamidaṃ neti tataḥ kiṃcideva saṃbadhyeta, anavagamyamāne tu sarvāṇi padāni phalenaiva saṃbadhyante | yadi caikaṃ phalasaṃbandhītarāṇi ca tatsaṃbandhīnīti kalpyate tato vājapeyādhikara( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 ) |ṇanyāyenaikasya phalaṃ pratyupādānavidhānaguṇabhāvāditarattu pratyuddeśānuvādaprādhānyādvairūpyanimittavākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ | sarveṣāṃ tu phalaṃ pratyupādīyamānānāmaikarūpyāttantrasaṃbandhopapattiḥ | sarvaśca satisaṃbhave guṇamatilaṅdhya pradhānenaiva nityaṃ saṃbadhyate | tasmātsarveṣāṃ phalasaṃbandhāddharmatvaṃ, tatra tu kiṃ satrivatpratyekaṃ kṛtsnaṃ phalaṃ sādhayanti, atha darśapūrṇamāsavatsaṃhatya, tathā kiṃ vikalpena samuccayena vetyādi yatheṣṭaṃ kalpanīyam | tatra phalabhūmagarīyastvādekaśabdopādānābhāvātsatrivatpratyekaṃ sādhanaśaktyavagamātsarvebhyaḥ pṛthakphalamiti pakṣaḥ | atha vā 'ruṇādinyāyenaikavākyopādānātsaṃhatānāṃ phalam | atha vaikanirākāṅkṣatvānna tadānīmevetarasaṃbandhopapattistasmādvikalpa iti | atrābhidhīyate—

yadi hi phalasaṃbandhamātraparyavasāyyeva vākyaṃ bhavettataḥ kadā cidapi sarvāṇi phalena saṃbadhyeran | iha tu tāvanmātreṇāsiddherapūrvamanyatkalpayitavyaṃ taccānupapattipramāṇakaṃ, tatraikāpūrvakalpanayopapanne nādṛṣṭāntarakalpanāpramāṇamasti | yo hyanekānyapūrvāṇi kalpayati kalpayatyasāvekaṃ, taccetkalpitamarthavattvādvākyasya kṣīṇānyathānupapattirnāpūrvāntarasya pramāṇaṃ
anena ca adṛṣṭānumānasya prasaṅgo yasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sā 'lpīyasī bhaviṣyatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ sūcitaḥ | bhavati | tasmādekameva phalasaṃbandhi tasmāccāpūrvamitaratphalavadupakārītyadhyavasīyate | na cātra virodho bhaviṣyati nāmadheyatvena parihārāt | agatyā vā ‘daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi’ itivanmatvarthalakṣaṇāśrayaṇāt, arthākṣiptasādhyāṃśadvāreṇa vā dhātvarthairātmīyakaraṇagrahaṇasiddheḥ | evaṃ sthite kataradekaṃ saṃbadhyatāmiti sarvathā 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanāparihārādaniyamaprāptāvucyate—

na hyekasminvākye tadeva kadā citphalasaṃbandhātpradhānaṃ kadā citphalavadupakārādaṅgaṃ yujyate niyatarūpatvādaṅgāṅgibhāvasya | tasmānniyogenaivā ' 'khyātapadānnāmapadādvā 'pūrvapratītiḥ | kaḥ punarbhāvaḥ ke vā bhāvaśabdā iti | yāvantaḥ phalasaṃbaddheṣu vākyeṣvākhyātaśabdā yajatijuhotītyevamādayasteṣu pratyayārthaprādhānyātkartari ca lakārotpatteryāgādiviśiṣṭakartrabhidhānaṃ, kathaṃ cidvā viparyayātkartṛviśiṣṭayāgādyabhidhānaṃ manvānasya praśnaḥ |
kaḥ punarbhāva ityanenaiva bhāṣyeṇa bhāvanākṣepadvārā tadvāciśabdākṣepasiddheḥ ke punarbhāvaśabdā iti punarākṣepo 'yukta iti matvā tadabhiprāyamāha॔satyāmapītyādinā | ayamāśayaḥ | yadikaścidbhāvotpannalyuḍādipratyāntadhātuvācyasya bhāvatvābhyupagamenārthaparyanuyogaṃ pariharettaṃ prati śyenena yajetetyādyetadadhikaraṇaviṣayabhūteṣu vākyeṣu tādṛgbhāvaśabdābhāvādanya eva bhāvo bhāvaśabdāścābhibhatā iti pratyuttarasūcanāyobhayapraśna iti | na kevalaṃ bhāva evālaukikaḥ kiṃ tu bhāvaśabdā apītyapiśabdārtho jñeyaḥ |satyāmapi caikaparyanuyogenobhayaparyanuyogasiddhau yo 'yaṃ yajanamijyā yāga ityādyudāhṛtyaiva bhāvārthatāṃ bravīti tannūnaṃ ke 'pyalaukikā bhāvaśabdā apītyubhayapraśnaḥ | siddhāntavādī tu bhavaterṇijantāt pā. sū. ( 3-3-56 ) |‘erac’ ityacpratyaye kṛte bhāvanāvācinaṃ bhāvaśabdaṃ vyutpādyā ' 'khyātasya cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tatparatvaṃ kartrabhidhānapratiṣedhaṃ cābhipretyodāharati—yajati dadātī
ti | paraḥ punarbhavaterṇijantādanyena naiṣo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate, na cā ' 'khyātapratyayasyātra vyāpāro, dhātvantarārthatvāt | kāmaṃ tulyajātīyatvena dhātavo brūyuste 'pi tu yāgādivacanatvādasamarthā iti matvā ' 'ha—nanuyāgadānahomaśabdā iti | atrocyate—

yāvānevahyananyalabhyo 'rthaḥ śabdādnamyate sa sarvaḥ śabdārthaḥ | sarvatra cā ' 'khyāte dhātvarthaśca tadanuraktā ca bhāvanā vijñāyate | tasmādbhāvārthatvavyapadeśaḥ | tadvyatiriktāstu dravyaguṇaśabdā vijñāyanta eveti na pṛṣṭāḥ | tatra dravyādiśabdānāṃ niṣpannārthābhidhāyināṃ karaṇārthatvayogyatvātprāpnoti phalasaṃgatiḥ | sarvatra hi phalaṃ sādhyatvātsiddharūpaṃ sādhanamapekṣate na sādhyāntaraṃ, nāmārthaśca siddhatvāttadapekṣāpūraṇamartho nā ' 'khyātārthaḥ svayameva tāvatsādhyatvāt | tasmāddravyādibhiḥ phalamiti prāpte
anena pratipadādhikaraṇapūrvottarapakṣayossūtratvamuktaṃ bhavati |sūtreṇottaraṃ dīyate—

phalasaṃbandho heturapūrvapratipatteḥ | saṃbandhaścā ' 'kāṅkṣāpūrvakaḥ | sā ca bhāvaśabdebhyaḥ prasarpantī dṛśyate na dravyaguṇaśabdebhyaḥ | tasmādākhyātebhyo 'pūrvabhāvanā gamyate | tatra ca dhātvarthasya karaṇatvapratipattiḥ pratyāsatteḥ | atastenaiva phalakaraṇabhūtenānyathānupapattyā 'pūrvaṃ bhāvyata ityavadhāryate | kathaṃ punaryajyādīnpṛthakṛtya kevalapratyayavācya eva bhāvanārtho labhyate bhāvayediti | kutaḥ—
na ca dhātvantarārthaṃ yajyādayaḥ pratipādayanti | svārthamātravyāpṛtatvāt | ataḥ śabdarahitamevedamāropyate bhāvayediti | kiṃ ca |

tadyathā pikamānayetyukte yo nāmārthaṃ na pratipadyate tasmai kokilaśabdameva kevalaṃ prayuñjate na kokilaḥ pika iti, tathā 'tra yadyākhyātasya karotirṇyanto vā bhavatiḥ paryāyaḥ tatastadarthakathane tanmātrameva prayoktavyaṃ nā ' 'khyatapratyayo 'pi, na hi tadānīṃ vivicya jñāyate kenāṃśena kriyā pratyāyyata iti | atra tu bhāvayetkuryāditi vā punarapi liṅ prayujyata eva | ataśca yo 'naina yajateḥ pareṇārthaḥ pratipādito 'sau bhāvayaterapi pareṇa tenaivetyadhikāvāpa eva bhāvayatiḥ | tasmādavaidika iti | atrābhidhīyate | sarvatraiva tāvat—

iha kebhyaściddhātubhyaḥ parā tiṅvibhaktiruccāryamāṇā kartrātmalābhamātrameva vyāpāraṃ pratipādayati yathā 'stibhavatividyatibhyaḥ | aparebhyastu siddhe kartaryanyātmalābhaviṣayavyāpārapratītiḥ | yathā yajati dadāti pacati gacchatīti | dravyameva ca viśiṣṭaśaktyupetaṃ pracalitā
tmatattvaṃ viprakīrṇasvabhāvaṃ pūrvāparībhūtaṃ prathamāvasthātaḥ pracyutaṃ parāmavasthāmaprāptaṃ vyāpāraśabdavācyaṃ bhavati | tatra kadācitkartaivaivamavasthaḥ pratīyate, kadācitsiddhe kartaryanyaḥ | tadyadā karturevaiṣā 'vasthā bhavati tadā 'sau svayamevānyasmādātmalābhamapekṣamāṇaḥ paraniṣpattāvavyāpriyamāṇatvānna karotiśabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyate | yadā tu labdhātmako 'nyatra vyāpriyate tadā karotītyevamapadiśyate | tathā ca kiṃ karoti paṭhati gacchatīti sāmānyaviśeṣarūpeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogo dṛśyate, na tu kiṃ karoti bhavatyasti veti prayujyate | tasmāllabdhātmakakartṛvyāpāravacanāni karotyarthavantyākhyātāni | tatra ca kriyamāṇena kenacidavaśyaṃ bhavitavyam | kutaḥ—

lg.l: bhavatyarthasya kartā ca karoteḥ karma jāyate ||

div.p: karoternityaṃ sakarmakatvādyāvatkriyamāṇaṃ na labhyate na tāvadarthaḥ paryavasyati | sarvakārakāṇāṃ cāvāntarakriyāsu kartṛtvaṃ pratipadyamānānāṃ pradhānakriyāsu karmādivibhāgo jāyate | pratikriyaṃ yogyatābhedādavāntarākriyāvaicitryaṃ bhavati | tatrānvayavyatirekābhyāmidamavagataṃ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartā karoteḥ karma saṃpadyata iti | tathā hi—

lg.l: nityaṃ na bhavanaṃ yasya yasya vā nityabhūtatā |

div.p: ya eva hi pravṛttabhavanaḥ saṃbhāvitabhavano vā 'nyena prayujyate sa eva kriyamāṇatvenāvadhāryate nānyaḥ | tathā ca na kaścitkhapuṣpamākāśaṃ vā kurvannupalabhyate | yatrāpi pādau kurvityādiṣu niṣpannānāṃ karmatvaprayogo dṛśyate tatrāpyaniṣpannasaṃskārādivivakṣayā pādādiśabdaprayogādavyabhicāraḥ | satyapi ca karoteranekārthatve sarvatra gandhanāvakṣepaṇādau kiṃcidanutpannotpādanasāmānyamavagamyate | atha vā yadā 'syotpādanābhidhāyitvaṃ tadaiva viśiṣṭākhyātasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tadgatasyotpādyamānameva karma bhavatītyupapannam | tena bhavatikriyā tāvallabdhā | tataśca—

lg.l: karotyarthasya yaḥ kartā bhavituḥ sa prayojakaḥ |

div.p:
bhavatikarotyoḥ śaktibhedādviklidipacatyoriva niyataṃ prayojyaprayojakavyāpāravacanatvam | tatra ca kadācidabhidhīyamānakarmaśaktyā ' 'kṣiptaprayojyavyāpāro
ghaṭaṃ karotītyādau dvitīyābhihitayā karmākhyayā, śakyā, ākṣiptaḥ prayojyasya ghaṭasya, bhavanākhyo vyāpāro yasya dhātorityarthaḥ | karotimātraprayoge kathamākṣepa ityāśaṅkāyāmāha॔svayameveti | ghaṭo bhavatītyādau prathamābhihitakartṛśaktyākṣiptaḥ prayojyavyāpāro yasminnityarthaḥ | tathā ca prayojyaprayojakavyāpārayoranyataravācidhātuṣvitarapratītirākṣepeṇaiveti na tasminnapi śabdavyāpārakalpanāvasara iti bhāvaḥ | vā svayamevā ' 'kṣi
ptaprayojyavyāpāro vā kevalaṃ prayojakavyāpāra eva vivakṣyate kaṭaṃ karoti, odanaṃ pacatīti | kadācidākṣiptaprayojakavyāpāraṃ prayojyavyāpāramātraṃ, ghaṭo bhavati, viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti | kadācidubhau bhinnau samuccitya prayogaḥ, karoti kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ sa ca bhavati | kadācidupasarjanībhūtaprayojakavyāpāraḥ prayojyavyāpāraḥ kriyate devadatteneti svayameveti vā prayoge | kadācitpunaḥ samānapadaikadeśopāttopasarjanībhūtaprayojyakriyaḥ prayojakavyāpāro vivakṣyate tadā ca karotipacatyostādātmyenāśakteraprayogādbhūviklidyośca kevalaprayojyakriyāniṣṭhatvānna sākṣātpravartituṃ śaktirastīti vācakatvena dyotakatvena vā ṇijaparaḥ prayujyate bhāvayati vikledayatīti ca | tathā cā ' 'ha—
na ca teṣāmaṇyantānāmaśaktirityanyeṣāmaśaktyā bhavitavyam | anyeṣāṃ vā śaktirityeṣāmapi tadvadbhavitavyam | kutaḥ—
evaṃ karotyarthadvāreṇa sarvākhyāteṣu bhāvayatyarthaḥ siddhaḥ |
yattūktaṃ na vidhitvavyatiriktaṃ liṅādayo 'rthaṃ vadantīti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—

yadā hi sarvākhyātānuvartinī karotidhātuvācyā puruṣavyāpārarūpā bhāvanā 'vagatā bhavati tadā tadviśeṣāḥ sāmānyākhyātavyatiriktaśabdaviśeṣavācyā vidhipratiṣedhabhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānādayaḥ pratīyante | tathā ca sarvatra sāmānyataḥ karotyartho 'vagamyate, kiṃ karoti pacati, kimakārṣīdapākṣīt, kiṃ kariṣyati pakṣyati, kiṃ kuryātpacet, kiṃ na kuryānna pacediti | tatrārthātmikāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ liṅādiśabdānāṃ yaḥ puruṣaṃ prati prayojakavyāpāraḥ sā dvitīyā śabdadharmo 'bhidhātmikā bhāvanā vidhirityucyate | viśeṣataśceyamarthavādādhikaraṇe varṇitā yattu paryāyasthityatilaṅghanaṃ pratyayāparityāgādabhihitam | tatrocyate—

yadi hi kevalaḥ karotirbhāvayatirvā prayogārhau syātāṃ tataḥ kokilaśabdaprayoge pikaśabdavatpratyayo na prayujyeta, na tu kevalāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ, apabhraṃśatvaprasaṅgāt | tena yasmin kasmiścitpratyaye prayoktavye yasyaivārthaḥ kathyate sa evānuvādabhūtaḥ prakṛtyanugrahārthaṃ prayujyate nānyo 'bhyadhikārthāntarāpattiprasaṅgāt | nanu ca, ikśtipau dhātunirdeśe vihitāvatastadyuktau karotibhāvayatī prayujyeyātām | naitadasti | tathā sati śabdapadārthaktvānnaiva tāmyāmākhyātārthaḥ kathyeta | yattu kvacidarthe 'pi dhātumikśtibantaṃ prayuñjate yajiḥ, yajatiḥ, iti ca | tat, śabde 'bhihite lakṣaṇayā 'rthapratītirityavagantavyaṃ, na ceha kiṃcillakṣaṇāśrayaṇe prayojanamasti yenāvācakaḥ prayujyeta | tatrānyadevāniṣṭamāpadyeta kṛñbhuvau dhātū tiṅā 'bhidhīyete iti | tasmādarthaparatvasiddhyarthamākhyātapratyayasahitāveva prayujyete | yadi ca bhāvanaivaikā pratyayārthaḥ syātkarotibhāvayatī vā samastapratyayārthopādānasamarthau bhavetāṃ tataḥ kevalaprayogo 'pyāśaṅkyeta, na tu tadubhayamapyastīti karotibhāvayatibhyāṃ kathite 'pi bhāvanārthe kartṛsaṃkhyādipratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyaya uccāryate | yastu tatra bhāvanābhidhānāṃśaḥ sa prāptatvādanūdyate, anyathā hi bhāvanaivaikā pratyayārthaḥ karotibhāvayatī vā kartṛsaṃkhyādīnāmapyabhidhāyakāviti bhrāntiḥ syāt | nityaṃ ca pūrvāparībhūtā bhāvanā ' 'khyātenocyate | tatra yadi pratyayāntaraṃ prayujyate tataḥ karotibhāvayatibhyāṃ dravyavadupasaṃhṛtarūpocyamānā naivā ' 'khyātasadṛśī kathyeta | tasmādavaśyaṃ tadapi prayoktavyamiti | kiṃ ca—

yadi hyekāntenāsyāḥ pratyayārthatvamavadhāryeta tataḥ karotibhāvayatibhyāṃ pratyayapaunaruktyāśaṅkā syānna tu tadasti, ubhayasaṃnidhau gamyamānatvāt | kevalaprakṛtipratyayaprayogābhāvāddhi na viveko vijñāyate | śakyate hi vaktuṃ dhātusahitena pratyayenocyata iti | athavā pratyayānugṛhītena dhātunā, atha vobhābhyām | na ca śaktikalpanāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ, sarvathā 'rthāpattisāmyānna ca vivekajñānaprayojanamasti | syādetat, kṛdantāddhātorapratītestiṅauvyabhicāriṇyeva neti | tadayuktam | astividyatibhavatipareṣu pratyayeṣvapyadarśanāt | na vā kṛdanteṣvapyatyantaṃ bhāvanā nāsti kiṃcidapakṛṣyamāṇarūpapratīteḥ | kṛtyeṣu tāvadbhoktavyam yaṣṭavyamiti kiṃcinnyūnā ' 'khyātādgamyate | tatrāpi karmotpanneṣu dravyaprādhā
nyādbrāhmaṇo na hantavya iti bhāvotpannebhyo nyūnatarā | na hi tatra prayojakavyāpāraprādhānyam | ekatra dhātvarthaprādhānyādaparatra svavyāpāraviśiṣṭaprayojyaparatvāt | etena bhāvakarmotpannalakārāstiṅo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ | teṣvapi hi prayojakavyāpāraguṇatvapratītiraviśiṣṭā | ato na tiṅantānāṃ tulyakalpatvam | tathā ‘avyayakṛto bhāve bhavanti’ iti smaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi svasaṃvedyamīṣannyūnabhāvanāvijñānam | tai. saṃ. ( 2-6-1 )‘abhikrāmaṃjuhoti’ ‘darbhataruṇakenopaghātaṃ juhoti’ ‘abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣayanti’ ‘purā vācaḥ pravaditoḥ‘ iti sarvatra śrutyaiva bhāvanāntarasāpekṣā bhāvanā 'vagamyate | pakvaḥ pakvavānityapi nirvṛttarūpabhāvanopasarjanadravyapratītiḥ pratyakṣā | evaṃ pācakādiṣvapi draṣṭavyam | tathā ca sarvatra kārakāpekṣā dṛśyate | anyathā hi rụ̄dhitaddhitasamāsoṣviveyaṃ na syāt | na ca nirvyāpārāṇāmete vyapadeśā bhavanti | na cāsti sa vyāpāro yatra kiṃcidasanna janyate | tataśca siddhaḥ karotibhāvayatyorarthaḥ | śakyate ca sarvatra sāmānādhikaraṇyamapi darśayituṃ vinā 'pi pūrvāparībhūtatvena | tadyathā kiṃ kartavyaṃ paktavyaṃ, kathaṃkāraṃ juhoti abhikrāmam, kiṃ kṛtvājuhoti abhiṣutya, kiṃ kṛtavān pakvavān, kiṃ kṛtaṃ pakvaṃ, kiṃkriyo devadattaḥ paktā, keyaṃ kriyā pāka iti | na ca karotisāmānādhikaraṇyātiriktamākhyāteṣvapi bhāvanāpramāṇaṃ vidyate | tasmāddhātavo 'pi bhāvanāṃ na muñcanti | tathā cā ' 'huḥ
sarvadhātūnāṃ karotyarthavācittve vṛddhasaṃmatimāha॔tathā cā ' 'huriti | vibhajya senāṃ paramārthakarmā senāpatīścāpi puraṃdarotthaḥ | niyojayāmāsa sa śatrusainye karotirartheṣviva sarvadhātūn || iti | karotirartheṣviva sarvadhātūniti | yattvasyāḥ prādhānyaṃ tatkāmaṃ tiṅā 'bhidheyaṃ dyotyaṃ vā 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmastu na svarūpam | nanvevamapi yāgeneti dhātvarthe niṣkṛṣṭe tenaiva bhāvanā 'pyupātteti bhāvayediti punaḥ prayogo na prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | tathā hi | vdyarthasya jātorbhedenārthe kathyamāne yāgeneti viśeṣarūpaṃ karaṇātmanā niṣkṛṣṭam | itarattu bhāvanātmakaṃ sāmānyarūpaḥ śabdāntareṇa bhāvayedityanena kathyate | athavā kecitkaraṇāśakartṛsaṃkhyādayaḥ prakṛtipratyayayorbhedena vācyāḥ | bhāvanā tu samudāyāvyabhicārātsamuditayorevārtha ityapi śakyaṃ vaktum | tathā ca sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābhyāṃ bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyamevā ' 'śritaṃ na bhāvārthatvena pratyayāḥ kathitāḥ | śāstre tu sarvatra pratyayārtho bhāvaneti vyavahāraḥ | tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ—
yadyapyanyadvivekakāraṇaṃ nāsti tathā 'pi prādhānyaṃ pratyayārthadharmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nūnamiyaṃ pratyayārtha ityavagamyate—

na kevalametāvevānvayavyatirekau yau parasparaparityāgena lakṣyete tasminneva hi pade ‘tadāgame hi taddṛśyate’ ityanena nyāyena viveko 'vadhāryate | yattvastyādiparaḥ pratyayo 'pi bhāvanāṃ jahātīti tulyaṃ dhātusamudāyapakṣayorapyetat | sarvathā yatra pratīyate tatra tāvatpratyayārthatvaṃ niścīyate | anyatra tvayaṃ vicāra eva nāsti | kvacidvyabhicārasya cottaramuktaṃ ( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7 ) atreti śeṣaḥ |tadbhūtādhikaraṇe | atha vā naivātrāpi vyabhicāraḥ | kutaḥ—

yadyapi karturaniṣpannatvādvyatiriktabhāvayitavyābhāvādastyādiṣu prayojakavyāpāro nātīva lakṣyate tathā 'pi pratyayasāmarthyādbhāvayatītyavagamyate | kimityapekṣite cāniṣpanne kartaryanyatkiṃcidityakalpanādātmānamityeva saṃbadhyate kena, bhāvanena, kathaṃ, avayavajananādiprakāreṇeti | trayo 'pi tatra bhāvanāṃśā bhavanenaiva pūryante vyāpārāntarāsaṃbhavāt | tatra kecidavayavā bhāvanavyāpṛtāḥ prayujyante kecitsiddhabhavanāḥ prayojakāḥ | siddhabhavanāsiddhabhavanavarti ca sāmānyamubhayasaṃparkādbhāvanetyucyate | etena jāyate niṣpadyate sidhyatītyādīni vyākhyātāni | astiḥ punarjanisamānārthādbhavateruparitanīmavasthāmabhilapansattayā ' 'tmabhavanaṃ bhavadbhāvayatītyevamākhyātapratyayaṃ labhate | tatrāpi tu kālakṛtabhedapūrvottarasāmānyasattārūpeṇa pūrvavadeva prayojyaprayojakavyāpārakalpanā 'nusartavyā | satyāmapi tvevamādiṣu bhāvanāyāṃ niṣpannacetanakartṛviṣayatvādvidhipratiṣedhayorasaṃbhavaḥ | syādetat | dṛṣṭo vidhirapi ‘tasmātprāyaṇīyasyāhna ṛtvijā bhavitavyam’ ‘rathaṃtaraṃ bhavati’ ‘atrādhvaryuḥ syāt’ ‘ihokthyāni syuḥ’ iti | satyaṃ dṛśyate na tviha pūrveṇa tulyo bhavatyarthaḥ | siddho hi puruṣaḥ karmasaṃbandhanimittamṛtviktvaṃ bhavadanyaireva vākkāyamanovyāpārairbhāvayedityucyate | tathā rathaṃtarādiṣu satyapi śrutyā bhavanavidhisaṃbandhe tatra saṃbhavādanumīyamānā bhāvanaiva vidhīyate | yatra tvihāmuko bhavediti prayogastatra bhavatestiṣṭhatyarthavācitvātsaṃbhavatyeva vyatiriktaṃ bhāvayitavyamityevaṃ vijñāyate | sthānenānyatkiṃcidbhāvayediti | tena bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāpadeśamātreṣvevāpāramārthikaṃ bhavitṛvyāpārasya bhāvanātvaṃ na vidhyādiṣu | bhūtādikatha
ne 'pi yadā samastaṃ vyāpāraṃ dhāturevopādatte nāvayavakālādikṛtabhedāśrayaṇaṃ tadā vispaṣṭādvirodhāddhātvarthamātraṃ kartṛsaṃkhyādayaścā ' 'khyātapadārthatvenāvadhāryante na bhāvanā | na ca bhāvanāvyabhicāreṇa doṣa ityuktam | yattu kṛdanteṣvapi dhātavo bhāvanāṃ na vyabhicarantīti | satyaṃ dhātvarthā na vyabhicaranti taireva tu gamyamānatvādanabhidheyatvamapi śakyaṃ vaktum | tathā hi—

yathaiva bhāvapradhānatvādākhyāte tatsaṃbandhādeva guṇabhūtakārakapratītisiddherna kartṛkarmaṇorabhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyatyevaṃ kartādyabhidhānādeva tadanyathānupapattyā bhāvanāsiddheranabhidhānaṃ, gamyamānāpekṣayaiva ca karotisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yathā pacatiśabdasya devadattaśabdena, atathābhūtayaiva ca kārakasaṃbandho 'pyupapatsyate | atha vā bhāvanopasarjanadhātvarthaniṣpattyarthatvātkārakāṇāṃ dhātvarthenaiva saṃbandhasiddhiḥ | sa eva hi tāni svasiddhyarthamapekṣate bhāvanā 'pi ca tathābhūtānyeva tāni gṛhṇātītyaviruddhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | kṛtyānāṃ tu praiṣavācitvātsatyapi bhāvanānabhidhāne tāvatsvārthaparyavasānaṃ nāsti yāvadaṃśatrayaparipūrṇā bhāvanā na labdhā | kutaḥ—

na hi puruṣaḥ svavyāpāraṃ muktvā 'nyadanuṣṭhātuṃ śaktaḥ praiṣāścainamanuṣṭhāpayanti | te yadi tadvyāpāraṃ kathaṃcinnopādadyurna niyoktuṃ śaknuyurityevamapi bhāvanākṣepasiddhiḥ | yāvāṃśca brāhmaṇagataḥ kaścitpraiṣaḥ sa sarvaḥ prāptyabhāvādvidhireva bhavatīti vinā 'pi smaraṇena kṛtyānāṃ vidhāyakatvam | ayameva ca vidhipraiṣayorviśeṣaḥ |

tasmātpratyayārtho bhāvanetyupapannam | nanu ca yadi prayojakavyāpāro bhāvaneṣyate tataḥ pacāvadhiśrayaṇādīni, yajau ca mānasaḥ saṃkalpa ityādīnāṃ bhāvanātvaṃ ta eva dhātvarthā iti dhātuvācyaiva bhāvanā syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ—

sarvatra hyadhiśrayaṇādau karotītyapi sāmānyavyāpārāṃśaḥ pratīyate pacatyādivācyā viklittyadhiśrayaṇādayaḥ karmasthāḥ kartṛsthāśca | tatra yadaudāsīnyapracyutimātreṇa parispanda
rūpaṃ nirūpyate sā bhāvanā | ye tu tadanurañjanasamarthāḥ kartṛkarmagatā viśeṣāste tasyā eva karaṇetikartavyatāṃśayorniviśante | evaṃ tarhi dhātvarthasāmānyaṃ bhāvanetyetadāpannam | satyaṃ sādhyatayā sāmānyaṃ na tu gotvādirūpeṇa | katham—

bhāvanāyā hi svayameva pratipuruṣaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣau bhavataḥ | tathā tatkaraṇabhūte yāgādau samavetaṃ bhāvanākaraṇāṃśāpekṣitaṃ dhātvarthasāmānyaṃ nāma yatkarmaśabdenābhidhīyate | viśeṣaṇabhāvācca yāgādayo bhāvanāviśeṣā ityucyante na tadvyaktitvena | śāstrapradeśe tu kriyākarmaśabdau kadā ciddhātvarthe prayujyete kadācidbhāvanāyāṃ kadācittu pratyāsattyobhayannāpi prayogo na svarūpābhidhānena | kutaḥ—

lg.l: nāsau tenaiva rūpeṇa kathyate 'nyai padaiḥ kvacit ||

div.p:
bhāvanāśabdo hi niṣpannātmikāṃ sattvarūpāpannāṃ liṅgasaṃkhyāyoginīmabhidhatte na cāsāvākhyāte tādṛśyabhidhīyate liṅgasaṃkhyārahitarūpeṇa gamyamānatvāt | evaṃ dhātvartho 'pi veditavyaḥ | tathā karoti bhāvayatītyetābhyāmapi śrutyā tāvadanyādṛgevārthaḥ pratīyate kuñbhāvayatyarthakaraṇikā bhāvanā na caivaṃrūpā 'sau yajetetyādiṣvastītyaparyāyatvam | tatrānantarapratyayotthāpitabhāvanāntarabuddhimavivakṣitvā 'rthasaṃvādaḥ kartavyaḥ | tenādūraviprakarṣamātreṇaiṣa prayogo nārthasāmyenetyavasthitamananyaśabdavācyatvaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ | sā tu pratītamātraiva prādhānyādapekṣāntarānadhīnatvācca prathamaṃ tāvatsādhyāṃśamapekṣate bhāvayetkimiti | tatra yāvatī vidhyupetā bhāvanā tasyāṃ pūrvapratītamapi vidhitvaṃ tāvannā ' 'śrīyate yāvadaṃśatrayapūrṇā bhāvanā 'nuṣṭhānayogyā na bhavati | vidhitvaprakramācca prathamamevaitajjñāyate yādṛśairaṃśaiḥ pūrṇeyaṃ vidhānamarhati tādṛśaiḥ pūrayitavyeti | na ca buddhipūrvakārī puruṣaḥ puruṣārtharahitaṃ vyāpāraṃ vacanaśatenāpyukto 'nutiṣṭhati | na ca puruṣārthaḥ sādhyavyatiriktāṃśapātitvena kaiścitprārthyate tato 'bhyarhitatarasyānyasya sādhyasyāvidyamānatvāt | tatra yadyasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmapuruṣārthaḥ sādhyaḥ syāttataḥ puruṣeṣvapravartamāneṣu pratyayasya prayojakaśaktirbādhyeta | tena yadyapi samānapadopādānapratyāsatterdhātvarthaḥ sādhyāṃśapūraṇāyopaplavate tathā 'pyayogyatvānnirākriyate, na hi pratyāsattirevaikā saṃbandhakāraṇaṃ, yogyatvādyapi | tathā ca vakṣyati
yasya yenārthasaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ | arthato hyasamarthānāmānantaryamakāraṇam | ityādinā viśvajidadhikaraṇe pūrvācāryo vakṣyatītyevaṃ vṛddhasaṃmatimāha॔tathā cetyādinā | yasya yenārthasaṃbandha iti | kiṃ ca—

saṃbandhamātraṃ kṛtvā nivṛttavyāpārāyāṃ śrutāvanyatarāṃśaniveśo yogyatvādāśrayitavyaḥ | tadyadi sādhyāṃśādekapratyayopāttena pratyāsannatareṇa vidhitvena pracyāvyate tarto 'śāntareṇa nūnaṃ saṃpatsyata ityevaṃ pratīkṣyate | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: sādhyāṃśe puruṣāṇāṃ ca pratyayo na niyojakaḥ |
svayameva hi jānanti kartavyaṃ puruṣāḥ sadā ||

div.p: yatra hi śāstrādhīnā puruṣapravṛttistatra tatsaṃnikarṣaviprakarṣāvapekṣyete, sādhyaṃ punaḥ svargapaśuputragrāmādi prāgeva śāstrātsarve puruṣāḥ pratipadyante | tataśca bhāvayetkimityapekṣitamātre vinaiva tāvacchāstreṇaitāvadavagataṃ puruṣārthaḥ kaściditi | tatra viśeṣamātramanavagatatvādapekṣyate | tadapi ca na sādhyātmanā, kiṃ tarhi, etadbhāvanāviṣayatvena | tataśca dūrasthasyāpi svargādereva kṛtāspadasya saṃgatiḥ | dhātvarthasaṃbandhastvanapekṣitaḥ kriyeta vidhyānarthakyācca bādhyetatarāṃ śrutiḥ | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: svavākye vā 'nyavākye vā sa sādhyatvaṃ prapadyate ||

div.p: na cātra dhātvarthāderbhavanakriyāsaṃbandho 'vagataḥ svargādīnāṃ tu kāmaśabdopabandhādbhavanasaṃbandho vijñāyate | kutaḥ—

lg.l: svargo me syāditītthaṃ hi svargādiḥ prārthyate bhavan |

div.p:
tato 'vadhṛtasvargādisādhyāṃśā bhāvanā kena bhāvayedityevaṃ karaṇamapekṣate | tatra ca śāstrādhīnapravṛttitvāttatsaṃnikarṣādāvāśrīyamāṇe pramāṇāntarācca yogyāyogyatvayorajñānādvidhyavirodhāccātyantapratyāsattyupasthitadhātvarthātikramakāraṇābhāvātsarvaphalabhāvanānāṃ ca kenaciddhātvarthaviśeṣeṇa vinā 'nupapatteryāgenetyevaṃ vijñāyate | yadyapi ca yāgaḥ svayameva tāvadaniṣpannastathā 'pi svasādhananiṣpāditaḥ sansādhayiṣyati sarvameva ca kadācinniṣpannaṃ kadācidaniṣpannam | na ca prākchāstrapravṛtterniṣpattiḥ kvacidupayujyate phalasiddhikālamātropayogitvātkaraṇaniṣpatteḥ | pramāṇavaśācca trikālavarttināmapi sādhanatvāvirodhaḥ | tasmādyāgādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ taccāpūrvadvāreṇeti tacchabdebhyo 'pūrvapratītiḥ | ataścaivamapi sūtrārthaḥ saṃbhavati | ye bhāvārthāḥ—bhāvanāprayojanāḥ, karmaśabdāḥ॔yajyādayaḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeteti | nanu coktena karmakaraṇasaṃbandhanyāyena sakarmakadhātuyuktādevā ' 'khyā
tādbhāvanā 'vagatiḥ prāpnoti | tathā hi—
yadi vā sarvadhātūnāṃ sakarmakatvāpattiratha vā 'karmakebhyo bhāvanayā na bhavitavyam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kutaḥ—

odanaṃ pacati grāmaṃ gacchatīti dhātvarthāpavargalabhyamekaṃ karma, aparaṃ punarbhāvanākarma | tatra kadāciddhātvarthakarmaiva bhāvanākarmatvamapi pratipadyate pākenaudanaṃ bhāvayatīti | kadā citpunaḥ svakarmaviśiṣṭadhātvarthayuktā bhāvanā karmāntareṇa yujyate grāmagamanena svārthaṃ bhāvayediti, odanapākena ceti | taccaitaddhātvarthātparatastadavāpyamātratvena gamyamānaṃ dhātvarthāntaratirohitaṃ bhāvanākarmatayā sarvatrāvadhāryate | tacca prāyeṇaivaṃ kāmaśabdenaiva saṃbandhamāpadyate | sukhakāma āsīta, svāsthyakāmaḥ śayīteti | satyapi āsiśetyorakarmakatve yaḥ pratyayena karotyartho 'bhihitastatkarmatvena ca svādīnyavadhāryante | tena karoteḥ sarvadā sakarmakatvādakarmakākhyātānāmapi ca tatsāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanātkiṃ karotyāste, kiṃ karoti śeta iti siddhaivamādiṣvapi sakarmikā bhāvanā |
tasmātsakarmakākarmakayoraviśeṣādāsanena bhāvayedityapi prayogasiddhiḥ | kastarhi sakarmakākarmakayorbhedaḥ | ucyate—

āsanaśayanādau hi na niyamenā ' 'nantaryeṇa vedaṃ taditi vā karma nirūpyate, tenākarmakā abhidhīyante | pacigamyādīnāṃ tu viklidyattatsaṃyujyamānasākṣātsaṃbandhikarmāvyabhicārātsakarmakatvaṃ, na tu bhāvanāviśeṣaṇe kaścidviśeṣaḥ | seyaṃ bhāvanāṃ 'śadvayaparipūrṇā satī sarvakaraṇānāmupāyānanugṛhītānāṃ karaṇatvānupapatteḥ kathaṃ bhāvayeditītikartavyatāmapekṣate | sā ca pratyakṣādīnāmanugrāhakadarśanaśaktyabhāvādatyantaśāstragamyeti yathāsaṃnikarṣaṃ tadasaṃbhavādvā yathākathaṃcidupasthāpyamānā śāstrānusāreṇa śrutyādyupadeśena codanāsāmānyādyatideśena vā 'tyantādṛṣṭopakāradvāreṇānyathānupapattyā kalpyate | tataḥ paripūrṇatvādanuṣṭhātuṃ
yogyeti vidhīyate | tadvidhānāccārthāpattyā yāgādividhānamityupapannaṃ bhāvārthasūtram | bhavanti kecitkarmaśabdā yāgo yajanamijyetyudāhartavye tatsāmānādhikaraṇyasiddhaśyenaikatrikādyudāharaṇaṃ yāgādikaraṇatvacodanottarakālabhāvikarmaśabdatvena pāratantryātsujñānam | svatantrāṇāṃ kathaṃcidapi bhāvārthatvāśaṅkāsaṃbhavāt | yāgādayo hi svātantryeṇāpi kadā cidanumānādbhāvārthāśaṅkāviṣayāḥ syuriti | ke cidbhāvārthā na karmaśabdā yathā bhāvayetkuryāditi codāharaṇaṃ bhūtyādayastu prayojyavyāpāravacanatvānnaiva yathāvarṇitabhāvārthā ityanudāharaṇam | tatra yathākathaṃciṇṇijantavyutpattyā bhāvaśabda eko nīyeta netarau | tāvapi tu prayojyavyāpārāṃśena kathaṃcidaubhāvārthāvityudāhṛtau | atha vā dvitīyasūtrārthavyākhyānena bhāvanāprayojanatvamaṃśavācitvenāstīti vinā 'pi sakalārthābhidhānādbhavanti bhāvārthāḥ | kathaṃ punaramī na karmaśabdā yadā dhātumātraṃ karmaśabdatvenoktaṃ, nirviśeṣasya sāmānyasyānuṣṭhātumaśakyatvādakarmaśabdatvam | ato viśeṣavācināmeva dhātūnāṃ karmaśabdatvagrahaṇādacodyametat | yadi hi śyenacitrādarśapaurṇamāsaśabdāḥ phalaiḥ saṃbadhyeraṃstato yāgakaraṇatvābhāvāttatsāmānādhikaraṇyanimittanāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ prasiddhyādibhirguṇavidhitvameva syādataḥ sthita etasminnadhikaraṇe ityāha | kasmātpunaridaṃ tatraiva na nītaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇenāsaṃbandhāt | atha nāmadheyatvaṃ kasmādatra nā ' 'nīyate bhedalakṣaṇenāsaṃbandhāt | tasmādyathānyāsameva sthitayorarthātpaurvāparyasiddhiḥ | na caiṣāmarthinetiphalapadābhiprāyam | vivibhaktitvāditi | saṃbandhanimittākhyātavibhaktivigamādatha vā niṣpannārthābhidhāyisubvibhaktiviśeṣayogo vivibhaktitvam | tasmānna dravyādiśabdānāṃ phalasaṃbandha iti | āha ca—

lg.l: na ca dhātoḥ svatastatsyānnāmno vā parataḥ samam ||

div.p: yadi hi bhāvanāvacanasyaivāpūrvapratipādakatvamiṣyate dhātorvā pratyayanirapekṣasya tato nāmapakṣo durbalaḥ syādiha tu yathaiva dhātoḥ pratyayasaṃbandhānugṛhītasya bhāvanānurañjananimittaṃ karaṇavācitvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ nāmapadasyāpītyaviśeṣaḥ || 2 ||
yaduktaṃ yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadgataṃ tāvadvastudharmeṇa viśeṣaṃ darśayati | katham—

lg.l: nāmnaḥ phalena saṃbandhe parihāro na tasya ca ||

div.p:
ekasmādadṛṣṭe kalpite yadītarad dṛṣṭārthatvena tādarthyaṃ bhajate tato lāghavaṃ labhyate | asya tu tādarthyasiddhaye tato 'pi punaradṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata eva tato varaṃ phalenaiva sarvāṇi saṃbaddhāni | na ca saṃbandhavairūpyakleśāśrayaṇaṃ, nāmnaśca phalasaṃbandhe 'vaśyaṃ dhātvarthastadanugrahārtho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | sa ca svayaṃ niṣpādyaḥ siddharūsya nāmārthasya na śaknoti dṛṣṭe
nopakartum | na hi nāmārthastamapekṣate śabdaprayogavelāyāmeva niṣpannatayā gamyamānatvādapekṣaṇīyasya vā siddhatvenāyogyatvatprayujyate 'sminniti cābhidheya eva prayogaḥ | tadādhāraiva hi niṣpannarūpopalabdhiranutpannatve kriyārūpasya vaktavye vināśitvapradarśanaṃ niṣpannasyāpi kṣaṇikatvena punaḥ punarniṣpattyapekṣopapatteḥ | tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā—anyākāṅkṣā, niṣpādyatvena vā pradhānākāṅkṣā
niṣpādyatvena pradhānasya sato yā sādhanākāṅkṣā sā na vidyate niṣpādyatvābhāvādityarthaḥ | na vidyata ityadhyāhāraḥ | atha vā tebhyaḥ parā—dūre, ākāṅkṣetyarthaḥ | kutaḥ, bhūtatvādeveti | svarūpakathanārthamupanyastaṃ niṣpannatvādeveti | punarante tadeva hetutvenoddiṣṭaṃ sūtrakāreṇa || 3 ||

dhātvarthastāvatprakṛtyaiva sādhyātmako viśeṣatastvākhyātagatena dhātunocyamānaḥ | sa yadi phalasādhanatvena codyate tato 'siddharūpatvāttasya sādhanākāṅkṣau yāṃ satyāṃ nāmapadaṃ guṇavidhitvena nāmadheyatvena vobhayathā 'pi dṛṣṭenaiva tādarthyaṃ labhate | nanu nāmadheyapakṣe nāmapadamapi sādhyārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti dhātutulyaṃ syāt | na | tasya phalasaṃbandhe guṇavidhitvena siddhārthatvāt | api ca—

yadyapi vastusvarūpeṇa dhātvarthaḥ sādhyastathā 'pi nāmapadenocyamāno liṅgasaṃkhyāyogitvātsiddharūpo 'bhidhīyate | abhidhānakṛtā cā ' 'kāṅkṣotpattirna vastukṛtā | tasmādyuktā dhātorevā ' 'kāṅkṣā na nāmna iti | kiṃcā ' 'śritatvātprayogasya iti | adhunā śabdapratyāsattikṛto viśeṣo 'bhidhīyate | puruṣavyāpārātmikāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ dhātvarthopaśleṣo 'pi puruṣeṇā ' 'śritastadatikramahetvabhāvācca na nāmapadagraṇam | tasmādasti viśeṣaḥ || 4 ||
siddhaṃ kṛtvā 'pūrvaṃ tatpratipattyupāyaśabdaviśeṣavicāraḥ kṛtaḥ | tasya siddhatvamevāprasiddhamatastadeva tāvatpratipādanīyamityata āha—
vedavākyopāttasvargayāgādisaṃbandhānyathānupapattyā codanayaivāpūrvamapi coditaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pramāṇavat | tasmādastyapūrvamiti | atrāpare nipuṇaṃmanyāstannirākaraṇamāhuḥ—

vastvavabodhanārthāni pratyakṣādīni pañca pramāṇāni | tadyatra tāni na pravartante tadabhāvenābhāvātmanaivāvagamyate | na cāpūrve tāni pravartante | tasmātsarvapramāṇāpūrvatvādanvarthanāmaivāsadrūpamapūrvaṃ pratipattavyam | tatra pratyakṣeṇa tāvannāvagamyate, rūpādyanātmakatvena cakṣurādibhirasaṃbandhāt | nāpyanumānena, kenacilliṅgena sahādṛṣṭasaṃgatitvāt | na hi viśeṣataḥ sāmānyato vā 'sya kenacitsaṃbandho 'nubhūtapūrvaḥ | sarvatraiva ca vastusattābodhāyānumānamaparyāptamityuktaṃ
sattā ca nānumānena kasyaccitsapraṃtīyate ityanena pratyakṣasūtre ślokavārtike uktamityarthaḥ | prāk |

lg.l: padavākye na caitasya vācake śṛṇumaḥ kvacit |

div.p: āgamikatvamapyasya padena vocyamānasya syādvākyagamyasya vā | tatra padaṃ na tāvatkiṃcitsākṣādetasya vācakamasti | yattvapūrvamiti tadanvarthatvātsutarāmastitvaṃ bādhate | na ca pramāṇāntarānavagate 'rthe padaṃ pravartate | na ca svātantryeṇa pramāṇamiti sthitam | tathā ca vākyasyāvācakatvādevāprāmāṇyam | na ca kecitpadārthāḥ śrūyante yeṣāṃ bhedaḥ saṃsargo vā 'pūrvaṃ bhavet | ye 'pi śabdāntarādayaḥ śrutiliṅgādayaśca śabdaprakārāste 'pi ca svabhāvasiddhe vastuni bhede viniyoge vā kāraṇaṃ na sadbhāve kasyacidityapūrvaṃ pratyapramāṇam | upadeśānavagate cātideśo 'pi na pravartate | vidhipratiṣedhaviṣayatvācca samastasya vedasya na kvatidvastusvarūpapratipādanārthatvaṃ bhavatīti nā ' 'gamagamyamapūrvam | na cādṛṣṭapūrvasyādṛṣṭasadṛśasya copamānaviṣayatvam | kāmaṃ vā 'nupalabhyamānaśaśaviṣāṇādisārūpyādabhāvātmakatvopamānaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādasadrūpeṇopameyam |

dṛṣṭārthāpattistāvaddharmāstitvavadevātrāpi nirākartavyā | svabhāvādinā 'pi īśvaradaridrādivaicitryopapatteḥ | śrutārthāpattirapi kīdṛśī bhavati yatra pratyakṣeṇaivānupapattirdṛśyate | na ca kalpyamāno 'rthaḥ kena ciddhirudhyate, tadyathā ‘sruveṇāvadyati’ ityukte na ca kathaṃcidapi māṃsapuroḍāśādīni tenāvadātuṃ śakyanta iti | pratyakṣagamyatvāt | api ca tatrāpi prasakterevaṃ kalpyate dravāṇāmiti | na caiṣā kalpanā kena cidvirudhyate śrutahānyaśrutaparikalpanābhāvāt | apūrvaṃ tu na kadācitphalasādhanatvena saṃbhāvyate | yato 'nyakāraṇaniṣedhe sati tadviṣayā pariśeṣasiddhiḥ syāt |

na hi kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhamātreṇāpūrvanimittatā gamyate, śaśaviṣāṇādibhiranaikāntāt | api ca yadi tāvadapūrvaṃ yāgasya sādhyamiṣyate tataḥ śrutaṃ svargaṃ parityajyāśrutaṃ parikalpitaṃ bhavet | atha phalaṃ prati sādhanabhūtaṃ, tataḥ śrutayāgaparityāgātsaiva gatiḥ | na cā ' 'kārāntareṇa
sādhyasādhanabhāvarahitākārāntareṇa nāpūrvaṃ nirūpayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ | tannirūpayituṃ śakyate | tenā ' 'gamaprāmāṇyādyāgādeva phalena bhavitavyam | kathaṃ naṣṭaḥ sādhayatīti cet | yadi śāstrādevaṃ gamyate kiṃ bhavato virudhyate | dhriyamāṇena vā phalaṃ sādhanīyamityatra kiṃ pramāṇam | api cā ' 'kāśādīni nityāvasthitāni kasmātphalaṃ na sādhayanti | yadi ca śrūyamāṇātirekeṇāvasthāyitvasaṃbhavādapūrveṇa phalaṃ sādhyata iti kalpyate tato varamākāśādereva kalpitaṃ, tasya hi sthānasadbhāvāvapi tāvatprasiddhau kevalaṃ phalanimittatvamāśrayaṇīyam | apūrve tu sadbhāvaprabhṛti sarvaṃ niṣpramāṇakaṃ kalpanīyam | atha yāgasaṃbandhinā kenacidavasthitena phalaṃ dātavyamityabhiprāyaḥ | tathā satyapi—

lg.l: nimittatvaṃ varaṃ kḷptaṃ lāghavaṃ hi tathā sati ||

div.p: yadi yāgasya vināśitvādanyena tatsaṃbandhinā phalaṃ sādhyamānaṃ yāgena sādhitaṃ bhavati tato lāghavādatikrāntayāgenā ' 'tmanaiva varaṃ sādhayitavyam |

vināśini hi karmaṇi codite kiṃ dṛśyate, karma ca vinaṣṭaṃ śāstrapratyayācca kālāntare phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti niścīyate | yacca
yacceti-yacca-phalaṃ, yat-vinaṣṭaṃ. karma, pratītya-adhigamya, prāpyetyarthaḥ | yat, pratītyopajāyate tatra tasya nimittatvamityavadhāryate | tasmādabhāvanimittameva phalamastu | syādetat | na kvacidavastunaḥ sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti | taducyate | apūrvasya vā kva dṛṣṭaṃ yenātrā ' 'śrīyate tadavaśyakartavye laukikanimittadharmātikrame
yalloke tṛptyādiphalotpattinimittasya bhojanādeḥ kriyātvaṃ dharmo dṛṣṭastadatikrametyarthaḥ | kimapūrvanimittatvaṃ kalpyatāmutābhāvanimittatvamiti, kḷptābhāvanimittatvātilaṅghanena kālpanikāpūrvanimittatvaparigraho na yujyate | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: yadi caikāntato brūyuḥ śabdāḥ kālāntare phalam |

div.p: kriyāphalasaṃbandhapratipattimātracaritārthāsu codanāsvanupātte kālāntare karmasvabhāvādānantarye gamyamāne kuta etatkālāntarabhāvi phalaṃ tatsiddhyarthaṃ cāpūrvaṃ kalpyata iti | tatraitatsyāt | kṛte karmaṇyanantaraṃ phalamanupalabhya kālāntaraphalotpādadvāramapūrvakalpanamiti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—

lg.l: pūrvaṃ niścitya śāstrārthaṃ prayoge hi pravartate |

div.p: ( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 8 sū. 18 ) |‘nahyavidvānvihito 'sti’ iti tāvadavaśyaṃ yāvacchāstragamyaṃ tatsarvaṃ prāganuṣṭhānādavagantavyam | na ca tatkāle karmaphalakālaviyogajñānakāraṇamasti | yacca śāstrapravṛtti velāyāṃ tadantargatatvena nāvadhāritaṃ taduttarakālamevāvadhāryata iti kuta etat | api ca—

lg.l:
sarvakartṛṣvaśakta
sarveṣu padārtheṣu bahavaḥ kartārasteṣu madhye, kvacitpadārthe kasyacitkarturaśakteraparihāryatvādityarthaḥ |tvādvaiguṇyaṃ saṃpratīyate |

div.p: dṛśyata evānantaraphalānutpattikāraṇavaiguṇyamiti na kālāntaraphalasiddhyarthamapūrvaṃ kalpanīyam | anaikāntikī hi tadā 'rthāpattirvaiguṇyameva varamananubhūtamapi kalpayet | na ca janmāntaraphalotpattyarthamapūrvakalpanā || kutaḥ—

na hi svarganarakau nāma niratiśayasukhaduḥkhasvabhāvau deśaviśeṣātmakau vā yāvihaiva janmani nānubhūyeyātām | alaukikānāṃ jihāsopāditsānupapatteḥ | ye tu laukike prakṛṣṭe sukhaduḥkhe te karmānantarameva saṃbhāvyete ityaviśeṣaḥ
svarganarakayorapyauhikatvena paścāderaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ | | kiṃ ca—

‘brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ’ iti hi nivṛttiḥ śāstrārthaḥ | na ca tayā kālāntare kiṃ cijjanayitavyamiti nāpūrvakalpanāmapekṣate | hananasya tu narakapātaḥ phalaṃ, tadyadi tenā pūrvaṃ janyeta tato hananasyācoditatvāllaukikakriyājanyaṃ sadapūrvaṃ na vedamūlaṃ syāt | kalpitamapi ca tanniṣkriyatvānnaiva deśāntare śarīrādiprāpaṇasamarthamityanarthakam | na cāsyā ' 'śrayaḥ saṃbhavati, kriyāśrayasya puroḍāśādervinaṣṭatvāttadvyatirikte cā ' 'rambhānupapatteḥ | evamaṅgāpūrvāṇyapi nirākartavyāni | kiṃ ca—

na hi kalpitamapyaṅgāpūrvaṃ pradhānairasaṃbandhamānamupakartuṃ samarthaṃ, na cāmūrte pradhāne tadapūrve vā nipatituṃ samartham | yadapi na prokṣaṇādinimittaṃ dravyasamavāyi tadapi tanmātropakṣīṇatvādanyatrāsaṃcarannaiva phalasādhanasyāpūrvasyopakuryāt | atha tvaṅgāpūrvāṇyapi yajamānātmanyevāvatiṣṭheran, evaṃ sati puruṣārthatvāpatteḥ karmāṅgatvahāniḥ syāt | api ca yugapatprayogavacanena grahaṇādaṅgāpūrvairyugapadevopakartavyam | na ca paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ saṃbhavati | na caiṣāṃ kaścitsaṃbandhe heturasti | etena pradhānāpūrvāṇāṃ phale yaugapadyaṃ pratyuktam |
na cāpūrvasyotpattirabhivyaktirvopapadyate | kutaḥ—
evaṃ sāvannotpadyate | na cābhivyajyate | katham |

sarvābhivyaktīnāṃ trayānyatamasaṃskāradvāratvātsaṃskārāntaramavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaṃ tataḥ punaḥ
sa eva kleśa ityapramāṇatā | yadi ca kriyānantaramapūrvamupalabhyeta tato 'bhivyajyata iti brūyāma | yadi cāsya prāgastitve pramāṇaṃ bhavet | na tu tadubhayamapyastīti | sarvathā nāstyapūrvaṃ | na caitatsūtraṃ tatpratipādane vispaṣṭamityavyākhyānametat | atrocyate | yadidaṃ svamatiparikalpitaṃ vigrahavadivāpūrvaṃ bhavadbhirnirākriyate na tenāsmākaṃ kiṃcidvirudhyate | yato naitattādṛśaṃ kasyacidiṣṭaṃ, kiṃ tarhi—

pradhānakarmaṇāmaṅgakarmaṇāṃ vā prākkaraṇātsvargādiprāptyayogyāḥ puruṣāḥ kratavaśca svargakāryāyogyāḥ | tāmubhayīmapyayogyatāṃ vyudasya pradhānairaṅgaiśca yogyatopajanyata ityavaśyaṃ sarveṇābhyupagantavyam | asatyāṃ tasyāmakṛtasamatvaprasaṅgāt | saiva ca puruṣagatā kratugatā vā yogyatā śāstre 'sminnapūrvamityapadiśyate | yattu pratyakṣādigamyatvamasya nāstīti satyaṃ, śrutārthāpattivyatiriktairna gamyate sa tvadoṣaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam—

yena vākyena yāgātsvargo bhavati prayājādibhiśca pradhānopakāro bhavatītyetaccodyate tenāvaśyaṃ vinaṣṭānāmavinaṣṭānāmapi caiṣāṃ kā 'pi svakāryotpādanaśaktirastītyabhyupagantavyaṃ sarvabhāvānāmaśaktānāṃ kāryārambhābhāvāt | niyogataścātrātītānāmevaṃ śaktireṣṭavyā | kutaḥ—

yadeva hi karma gṛhītaṃ tadeva hi kṣaṇikasūkṣmāvayavatvātphalaṃ prati yugapadbhavitumasamarthaṃ kimuta yānyanekātmakāni darśapūrṇamāsaprabhṛtīni | yadā hi pūrṇamāso bhavati na tadā darśo yadā darśastadā pūrṇamāsaściravinaṣṭastathaikasminneva samudāye yadā ' 'gneyastadā 'gnīṣomīyopāṃśuyājau na staḥ, yadā tayorekastadetarau na vidyete iti yaugapadyāsaṃbhavaḥ | tadyadā darśapūrṇamāsastadavayavo vā kāṃcitpuruṣe śaktimanādhāyaiva vinaśyettataḥ prāgavasthātulyatvāduttarakarmaṇāṃ pūrvaiḥ saha rūpataḥ śaktito vā sāhityābhāvānna kevalakaraṇotkaścidviśeṣa iti sahitasādhyatvena śrutaṃ phalaṃ sāhityāsaṃpattyā nopapadyeta | na hi kevalo darśastatsādhanatvena śrūyate tadantyaṃ vā karma | niyogataśca karmānantaraphalotpattivādinā 'pi sarvakarmānte sā 'bhyupagantavyā | tataśca yasyaivā ' 'nantaryaṃ tadevaikaṃ sādhanaṃ prāpnoti netarāṇi ciravinaṣṭatvāt | atha tu sarveṣāmapūrvākhyāḥ śaktayastiṣṭhanti tataḥ svarūpāṇāmatantratvātteṣvasatsvapi śaktigatameva yaugapadyaṃ vyavahārāṅgatvādauvyāpariṣyate | tathā cā ' 'ha—

yānyapi ca laukikāni kṛṣighṛtapānādhyayanaprabhṛtīni karmāṇi kālāntaraphalatveneṣyante teṣāmapi svarūpāvasthānāsaṃbhavātsaṃskāraireva tiṣṭhadbhirvyavahārasiddhiḥ | te tvavaidika tvātsaṃskārā nāpūrvaśabdābhidheyatvena prasiddhāḥ | tena prāgevānuṣṭhānācchāstraśravaṇavelāyāmeva kṣaṇikānekāṅgapradhānaprayogasādhyaṃ phalaṃ viditvā śāstrapratyayādeṣā buddhirbhavati nūnaṃ kenāpyātmanā samastānyaṅgapradhānāni phalakālaṃ yāvattiṣṭhantīti | pratyakṣaṃ ca svarūpabhaṅgadarśanānna śaktivyatiriktātmāvasthānopapattiḥ | yattu śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅga iti | tanna—

yadi hyasaṃbandhinā kenacitphalaṃ sādhyeta tato doṣaḥ syāt | yāgāhitayā tu śaktyā sādhyamānaṃ yāgenaiva sādhitaṃ bhavati | sarvasādhanānāmiṣṭaphalapravṛttāvāntarālikavyāpārāvaśyaṃbhāvitvāt | atha vā sarvameva kāryaṃ dadhyādi kṣīrāderutpadyamānaṃ na sahasaiva sthūlenaivā ' 'tmanotpadyate | kiṃ tarhi, sūkṣmāṇi tāvadrūpāntarāṇyanubhavati | evaṃ svargādayo 'pyaṅkurādisthānīyāṃ tāvadapūrvāvasthāṃ pratipadyante tayā cotpadyamānayā ta evotpannā bhavantīti | etāvāneva
yadā ca sthāyyapūrvaṃ śaktyātmakatvātkarmaphalābhyāmanatyantabhinnaṃ tadā phalaṃ bhāvayedanenetthamiti trayāṇāmapi bhāvanāṃśānāṃ yaugapadyābhidhānamapi karmaphalakālayoravicchedādupapannaṃ bhavatītyāha॔ etāvānityādinā | cātra vartamānaḥkālo yadacyutiḥ karmasaṃkalpātprabhṛtyāsarvāntyaphalāvayavopabhogāt | āha ca—
yattu saṃbhāvanāpadamapūrvaṃ nā ' 'rūḍhamiti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ॔

lg.l: na saṃbhāvitaṃ sāmarthyarūpeṇa sthāyitvaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ |asaṃbhāvitasāmarthyasthāyitvaṃ codyate katham ||

div.p:
nūnaṃ vinaṣṭasyāpyetasya sāmarthyaṃ phalanirvṛttikālāvadhiṃ yāvadāsta iti hi yāvannāvadhāryate tāvadvināśinī kriyā codayitumevāśakyā | tasmātsaṃbhāvanā 'vadhāraṇā ca
prathamameva siddheti |
