yadi hyanāhitasaṃskārā eva yāgā naśyeyustataḥ prāgavasthātulyatvādatikrāntānatikrāntayāgayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ syāt | ātmatvaṃ tāvadaviśiṣṭamubhayoḥ | yāgatvamapi hi vinaṣṭākṛtayāgayostulyam | na ca kriyārahitasyāvasthāntaragatasya vā kartṛtvamavatiṣṭhate | kartṛśaktistiṣṭhatīti cet | na | tasyāḥ prāgapi yāgakaraṇādvidyamānatvenākaraṇatvāt | api ca yadi puruṣaḥ phalasādhanaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ śubhāśubhānāmaviśiṣṭa ityekarūpaphalaprasaṅgaḥ | tathaikena yāgena bahubhiśca tadatikramalakṣaṇalakṣitatvāviśeṣādbahuyājinaḥ phalaviśeṣo na syāt | etenaiva bahuprayogānuṣṭhāyinaḥ pratyuktāḥ | kartranabhidhāyiti vā ' 'khyāte kathamayamartho vijñāyate | yasya tvapūrvāṇi kriyante tasya pratikarma pratiprayogaṃ ca tadbhedādupapanne phalanānātvavaicitrye | kiṃ ca |

prayājādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatvātsvarūpasaṃnidhyabhāve bhavatpakṣe kartraiva pradhānopakāraḥ kartavya iti so 'pi cāpūrvābhāvātkartrātmana evopakārakastatra yena prakṛtau prayājādayaḥ kṛtāstasya vikṛtiṣu tadgatopakārasadbhāvādvinā 'pi tantramadhyavidhānena tatphalāvāpteḥ prasaṅgalakṣaṇamastīti na punaraṅgānyanuṣṭhātavyāni | tatra ‘prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhoti’ ityādīni nopapadyeran | nanvatyantakālabhedānnaitatprasajyate | vakṣyatyasyottaram ( a. 12 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 4 )‘arthasyāvikṛtatvāta’ iti | yadeva hi pratyāsannāni prati kartrātmakaṃ tadupakārarūpamiṣyate tadeva dūrasthāyāmapi vikṛtāvityaviśeṣaḥ | ete karmavināśapakṣe 'pi doṣāḥ prasaktavyāḥ | yasyāpi ca karmavināśādeva phalaṃ bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyastasyāpi śubhāśubhaikānekakarmatatprayogavināśānāṃ prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvānāṃ vā 'vastutvenāviśeṣātphalabhedavaicitryānupapattiḥ | tathā hi—

lg.l: eko rogo hṛto yasya yasya vā 'pahṛtā daśa |

div.p: yadi tu pratikarma vināśānāṃ vaicitryamiṣyate tathā sati vastutvāpattervastvantarābhāvāccāpūrvavastveva vināśaśabdenābhidhīyeta |

lg.l: na ca karmavināśebhyaḥ svargādi śrūyate phalam |

div.p: ‘yajeta svargakāma’ iti hi śrūyate na yāgābhāvaṃ pratipadyeteti | tatra bhāvāṃśasādhyasādhanasaṃbandhaniṣṭhe vākye yastatrābhāvāṃśasādhyasādhanasaṃbandhaṃ kalpayati tena vedastavidapramāṇīkṛtaḥ | kutaḥ | karmavināśaprabhavaṃ hi sadetanna kathaṃcitkarmasambandhīti śakyaṃ vaditum | atyantaviparītatvāt | na hyagnyātapaprabhavo dāhaḥ śaityasaṃbandhītyucyate | atha vā yathaiva yāgācchrutaṃ tadabhāvātkalpyate tathaiva svarge śrute tadabhāvaḥ phalamityapi kalpyeta | apūrvapakṣe 'pi tulyamiti cet | na | tasya karmaphalaśaktyātmakatvenātyantābhedāt | uktaṃ hyetatpurastāt | apūrveṇa kriyamāṇaṃ yāgenaiva kriyate, apūrve vā kṛte phalameva kṛtaṃ bhavatīti | na ca loke 'pi kaścidabhāvaḥ kāraṇatvena dṛṣṭaḥ | yadi tu kvacidudāhriyeta, śakyaṃ tatra bhāvāntaraṃ darśayituṃ na tvatrāpūrvādṛte tādṛkkiṃcidasti | yattvapūrvasyāpi naiva kāraṇatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tadayuktam | sarvatra śaktisāmānyopalambhāttadviśeṣamātratvāccāpūrvasya | yattu śāstreṇa kālāntaraphalaṃ nā ' 'śritaṃ prayogottarakālakalpanā ca śāstre 'ntarbhavati | tasmādānantaryameva coditamiti | tatra yathāśrutakṣaṇikānekakarmānantaryaṃ na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ prāk | svarganarakau ca niratiśayasukhaduḥkhātmakatvāddeśāntarajanmāntarānubhavanīyau na karmānantaraṃ saṃbhavata iti ṣaṣṭhādye vakṣyāmaḥ |

cirakālopabhogaphalātmakatvādgrāmādīnāṃ kriyānantaraṃ tādātmyāsaṃbhave sati yatraivāntarāle nimittaṃ kṣīṇaṃ tatraivāpahāraḥ prasajyetetyavaśyaṃ samastopabhogaṃ yāvadavasthitena kena cidbhavitavyam | tataśca prāgeva prayogāditthamavadhāraṇātkartṛvaiguṇyāśaṅkyā 'rthāpatteranaikāntikatvamityayuktametat | yattu pratiṣedheṣu na śāstragabhyamapūrvamityucyate |

yathā hi laukikānāmeva dravyādīnāṃ phalavidhyuttarakālaṃ vaidikatvādvedagamyā 'pūrvasiddhiḥ, evaṃ brahmahatyādīnāmanavagatanarakaphalānāṃ pratiṣedhottarakālabhāvinā vaidikatvenaiva narakaprāptisamarthā 'pūrvakalpanopapattiḥ | satyapi cāsya calanādikriyārahitatve kartṛsaṃbandhamātreṇa taddeśāntaraprāpaṇādikriyāsaṃbandhābhyupagamānniṣkriyatā 'nupālambhaḥ |

lg.l:
ātmavāde sthitaṃ
( a. 1-pā. 1-sū. 5 ) ityatra vṛttikāramatānuvāde pratyakṣavisaṃvādaparihāragranthe bhāṣya iti śeṣaḥ | hyetatkartṛtvaṃ sarvakarmasu ||

div.p: dvyavadānaprakṣepādīnāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ saṃkalpādidvāreṇā ' 'tmaiva kartetyavadhāritam | ataśca te pralīyamānāstatra svargādyupabhogaśaktimādhāya pralīyanta ityavirodhaḥ | kathaṃ vinaṣṭasya karmaṇaḥ śaktistiṣṭhatīti cet | atrābhidhīyate—

lg.l: tadvināśe tato na syātkartṛsthā tu na naśyati ||

div.p: kathamanyaśaktiranyatra samavaitīti cet | na | kriyātmanoratyantabhedābhāvāt | api ca—

yadā karmavināśāttadgatā śaktirapi niṣprayojanā bhavati, avaśyaṃ cāsau kalpayitavyā, tadā 'syāḥ svarūpavadevā ' 'śrayaviśeṣo 'pi kāryakṣama eva pramātavyaḥ | tathā 'ṅgāpūrvāṇā mapyātmāśritānāmevaikārthasamavāyena pradhānaiḥ saṃbaddhānāmapyupakurvatāmāśrayaśeṣatvābhāvādārādupakārakatvaprasiddhiḥ | yattu puruṣārthatvaṃ prasajyata iti | naiṣa doṣaḥ—

na cāmūrttānāmāśrayāśrayibhāvena na bhavitavyam | ātmasukhādivattadupapatteḥ | yattu vrīhyādisamavāyiprokṣaṇādinimittaṃ taṇḍulādidravyāvasthāsaṃcaraṇaparamparayā dauvyavadānaṃ yāvadgataṃ tatrāpi pradhānasyāpi kena cidaṃśena samavāyāttadīyāpūrvaniṣpattāveva vyāpṛtya nivartate | tenaiva caiṣāṃ nā ' 'rādupakārakavadaśeṣapradhānārthatvamabhyupagamyate | yathaiva caikārthasamavāyādaṅgapradhānāpūrvāṇāṃ saṃbandha evamaṅgāpūrvāṇāmanyonyaṃ pradhānāpūrvāṇāṃ ca vaktavyaḥ | tataśca yugapatkāryārambhasiddhiḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ kramotpattīnāṃ pradhānāpūrvāṇāṃ kramavarttibhirevāṅgāpūrvaiḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ cotpadyamānairyugapadupakartuṃ śakyam | kecittāvadāhuḥ | aṅgamadhyavartiṣu pradhāneṣu pūrvāṅgāpurvairniṣpannairāgāmibhiśca prakramavaśātpracalitāvasthairekaikaṃ pradhānaṃ svāpūrvaṃ sādhayati | ātithyābarhirvacca sādhāraṇyānnaikapradhānāpūrvaniṣpattau tānyapavṛjyante | kathaṃ punaranāgatānāmupakārakatvaṃ bhavati | ekāntāvadhāraṇādaubhojanapratyāsattau sthālīparimārjananiṣpattivaditi draṣṭavyam | nanu ca yadyanāgatāvastheṣveteṣu pradhānāpūrvāṇi niṣpadyante tato naivottarāṅgāṇi kartavyāni | kathaṃ na kartavyāni, yadā tatkariṣyamāṇatāsaṃbhāvanayā tāni niṣpannānyapi tadakaraṇānnāpavṛjyante | anye punarāhuḥ | ekaikamaṅgamitaretaranirapekṣamātmīyamātmīyaṃ tāvadapūrvaṃ karoti, tathā pradhānamapyāgneyādi yathāśrutasamastāṅgāpūrvālābhāttannirapekṣaṃ tadā 'nutpannapradhānāntaranirapekṣaṃ ca prathamakṛtasāmavāyikāṅgāpūrvamātrānugṛhītaṃ svāpūrvameva tāvatsādhayati | evaṃ yadā darśāpūrvāṇi tadaṅgāpūrvāṇyapi samastāni niṣpannāni tadā tadīyabrāhmaṇatarpaṇānantaramaparyāyavidhānādyugapatprayogavacanopasaṃhāraka
lpitamaṅgāni pradhānāni ca prati, tantrabhūtaṃ samastānyaṅgāpūrvāṇyapūrvātmakamekaṃ yugapanniravayaṃ pradhānopakāraṃ kṛtvā nivartante | tataśca tadvaśena pradhānāpūrvāṇyapyekaphalotpattiśaktibhūtaṃ saṃhatya sarvāṇyekamapūrvāntaraṃ janayitvā 'pavṛjyante | tattvāphalalābhādajaraṃ tiṣṭhati | yadi punaḥ pratibandhakarahitaṃ tadānīṃ phalamevotpadyate tato 'pi kiṃ kalpanīyamevāpūrvam | bāḍham | na hi tasmādṛte samastaphalopabhogasiddhirityuktam | atha kasmātprātyātmikānyevāṅgāpūrvāṇi pradhānopakārakatvaṃ bhinnāni ca pradhānāpūrvāṇi phalabījatvaṃ na pratipadyante | satyaṃ, na hi kaścidatra doṣaḥ | kiṃ tu—

pradhānānāṃ phalaṃ pratyaṅgānāṃ ca pradhānāni prati yugapadupādānādapekṣāvaśenaikāpūrvakalpanayā ca tatsaṃbandhopapatternetarakalpanāpramāṇamastītyekameva tāvadavadhāryate | tataḥ punaḥ kramavartibhiḥ karmabhistadaśakyaṃ yugapatkartumiti tatsiddhyarthaṃ prātyātmikāpūrvāntarakalpanā bhavati | sarvatra ca—

kecittvatra codayanti | yadi paurṇamāsyāṃ kṛtānyaṅgāpūrvāṇyamāvāsyāṃ yāvattiṣṭheyustatastaireva kṛtārthatvānnaivāṅgāni punaḥ prasajyeran | evaṃ ca sati
pañca prayājāstrayo 'nūyājā dvāvājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛdityekādaśa | sāṃnāyyasya saṃpratipannadevatākatvena saha prakṣepādāgneyena saha pradhānāhutidvayamiti trayodaśatvaṃ jñeyam |‘trayodaśāmāvāsyāyāma’ ityāhutisaṃkhyā bādhyeta | anye tu pariharanti | sāṅgayoḥpaurṇamāsyamāvāsyayoḥ kālāntarasaṃbandhātsarvairaṅgairdviḥ prayuktaiḥ samudāyadvayasyopakartavyamityavadhāraṇātpunaḥ prayogaḥ setsyatīti | atha vā, evaṃ vaktavyaṃ sāṅgā paurṇamāsyamāvāsyā 'sahitā svārthaṃ karotīti karaṇavibhaktiśruteravagamātpūrvoktenaiva nyāyena pradhānāpūrvatrayaṃ svāṅagāpūrvānugṛhītamekamapūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'pavṛjyate | tatpunarevaṃ niṣpannenaivāmāvāsyāpūrveṇa sahāparamapūrvamārabheta | tataśca nivṛtteṣvaṅgāpūrveṣvamāvāsyāyāṃ kriyamāṇānyaṅgāni na nirākariṣyanta ityadoṣaḥ | etayaiva ca diśotpattivirodhaḥ parihartavyaḥ | āha ca—

na cāmūrtasyāvaśyamavayavairna bhavitavyam | anayaiva hyarthāpattyā śakyate vaktuṃ sūkṣmāvayavarūpeṇa tatpratīyata iti | yadā 'pyatyantāsatāmanutpatteḥ prāgavadhṛtāstitvamabhivyajyate tadā 'pi pratipuruṣaṃ karmabhiḥ svīkaraṇātphalābhimukhakaraṇaṃ śabdādivilakṣaṇā 'syābhivyaktirbhaviṣyati | tathā hi—

tasmādastyapūrvam | sūtrasyāpi ca na prakṛtaupayikamanyamarthaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tenā ' 'rambhacodanaivāpūrvasyāpi codanetyayamevārthaḥ | yadi punaḥ phalavacanasāmarthyāttadeva na vinaṣṭamiti, apūrvakalpanāniṣpramāṇakatvaṃ manvāno varametadityāha | na hi karmaṇāṃ rūpamupalabhāmaha ityayuktaṃ, ( a. 6 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 12 )‘rūpaśabdāvibhāgācca’ ityatra pratyakṣopalabdhyabhidhānāt | yāgaprastāve ca sati tasyācalanātmakatvāt, yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatītyasaṃbaddham | atrocyate—
yadyapi karmasvarūpamupalabhyate tathā 'pi kālāntarāvasthānābhāvānna tadupayujyata iti nopalabhāmaha ityucyate |

na hi saṃkalpamātreṇa phalaniṣpattiḥ | samastātsamastetikartavyatākācca karmaṇaḥ phalaśravaṇāttatra dauvyavadānaprakṣepādīnāṃ grahaṇāsādanādīnāṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgaphalatvātsthāyitve tadāśrayeṇāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam | na cāsāvasti | na cābhivyaktaṃ rūpamupalabhyate | saṃkalpādīnāmapi saṃkalpāntarāditirodhānānnātra svarūpāvasthānopapattiḥ | avasthānaṃ cā ' 'tmasamavetasya vā syātpradeyadravyasamavetasya vā | na tāvadātmani calanaṃ samavaiti, sarvavyāpinaḥ saṃyujyamānaviyujyamānadeśāsaṃbhave calitumasāmarthyāt | kathaṃ sarvavyāpitvamasyeti cetsarvatropalabhyamāna
kāryatvāt | ahaṃpratyayena hi caitanyasvabhāvasyā ' 'tmano 'stitvamātramavagamyate na tu deśataḥ kālato vā viśeṣyate | tataśca—

sarvatra kāryopalambha iti॔ahaṃpratyayamevāviśeṣitaṃ vadati | sukhaduḥkhādyupalabdhirvā | na hi kva cidgataiste nopalabhyante | na caite śarīradharmā iti sthitamātmavāde | tatra yadyasarvagata ātmā bhavettato yadeva tadvatā deśena śarīraṃ yujyate tadaiva sukhādyupalabdhiḥ syānnānyatra | śarīramātrāntargatātmavādī tvāha—nanu tadeva deśāntarādāgamanasya liṅgam | ataśca viruddhahetutvamasyeti | kutaḥ—

yadi hi śarīrādbahirapi kiṃcidātmakāryamupalabhemahi śarīrāntare sukhaduḥkhādīnvā tataḥ sarvagatatvamadhyavasyema | yatastu svaśarīrāntarvartyeva kāryaṃ yatra yatra ca tadgatistatra tatra paryāyeṇopalabhyate taccharīrakāryavadeva tatsahitagatasyopapatsyate | anyathā hi śarīramapi sarvagataṃ syāt | tasmāccharīravadevāsya tatra tatra gamanāpatteḥ sutarāṃ sakriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ | saṃdeho vā 'stu sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvāt | āha ca—

tatrottaraṃ na hyasatyāgamane kiṃcidviruddhamiti | yeṣāṃ tu na tu tadeveti pāṭhaḥ teṣāṃ siddhāntavādyeva paryāyeṇa sarvatrā ' 'tmakāryopalambhanamāgamanaliṅgatve 'pyaviśiṣṭamāśaṅkyottaraṃ vadatīti granthayojanā | kathaṃ punaridamuttaraṃ na hyasatyāgamana iti | tathā hi—
pareṇāpi hi śakyaṃ vadituṃ na hi sati gamane kiṃcidviruddhamiti | atrābhidhīyate |
parisaṃkhyārūpeṇāsatyeva ' 'gamane na kiṃcidviruddhaṃ sati tu bahu viruddhamityāha | tadupavarṇyate—

lg.l: tataśca tairasaṃśliṣṭo na netuṃ śakyate kvacit ||

div.p: yadā mūrtānāmapi sūkṣmāṇāṃ candrādityaprakāśādīnāṃ na mṛtpiṇḍādibhiḥ saha miśratvamupapadyate, tannayanena vā nayanaṃ tadā ' 'tmanaḥ svabhāvenātyantāmūrtasya jñānasaṃtānasya vā bhūtairmiśratvaṃ bhavediti kuta etat | yo 'pi syādvādī baddhātmanāṃ śarīrādatyantavyatirekālābhādastyeva mūrtatvaṃ jīvasyeti brūyāttasyāpītaretarāśrayaprasaktirmiśratvānmūrtatvaṃ mūrtatvācca miśrabhāva iti | tasmānmuktāvasthānidarśanena lakṣaṇato 'syāmūrtatvānna śarīrasaṃparkanimittamūrtatvasiddhiḥ | tataśca śarīrādanyastenāsaṃpṛktaśca | asparśatvāccānākṛṣyamāṇaḥ śarīre gacchati tadgatākāśapradeśavadātmā paścānniḥsṛtastatraiva tiṣṭhet | na hi tasya vāyunā pṛthivyādibhirvā preraṇaṃ yena svatantraḥ paraprerito vā gacchet | jvālāprabhṛtīnāṃ tu sparśavattvādvāyunā preryamāṇānāmulmukādinā vā nīyamānānāṃ yuktaṃ gamanam | tena kevalaṃ śarīraṃ gacchadacetanaṃ syāt | sarvagatatve tu yatra yatra gamyate tatra tatrā ' 'tmānusyūtirastīti yuktā caitanyānuvṛttiḥ, yathā pūrvākāśapradeśatyāge sarvagatatvādeva pareṇāvakāśadānasiddhiḥ | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: aṇuḥ śarīramātro vā sarvathā 'pi na yujyate ||

div.p: jñānasaṃtatipakṣastāvannirākṛtaḥ | tatra nityaḥ sannātmā śarīrābhyantaravarttī |

lg.l: yadyaṇuḥ kalpyate tatra dehaṃ na vyāpnuyādasau |

div.p: yadā hyaṇumātra ātmā bhavati tadā yāvāneva pradeśaviśeṣastenādhiṣṭhitastanmātragatānāmeva sukhaduḥkhādīnāmupalabdhiḥ prāpnoti, tataścaikasminkṣaṇe śiraḥpādavedanānubhavo na syāt | atha laghusaṃcāritvāttatra tatropalabhyata ityucyate, na tatra pramāṇamasti | na ca kālabhedo lakṣyate, anavasthitasyopalabdhikālāsaṃbhavānnaikatrāpyupalabhyeta | tasmādakalpaneyam | śarīrāvayavānāṃ cāpariśoṣaṇaṃ puṣṭyādi cā ' 'tmādhiṣṭhitānāṃ bhavati mṛtāvasthāyāṃ viparyayadarśanāt | tatra ya evāvayavastenotsṛṣṭaḥ sa eva mṛtavacchuṣyet | atha śarīraparimita ārhatapakṣeṇābhyupagamyate tatrāpi bahvadṛṣṭaṃ kalpanīyam ||

sarve hyavayavasadbhāvādayaḥ pratyakṣādyaviṣayāḥ santa utprekṣāmātreṇa kalpyante | te śabdavaccehāpi pratyākhyeyāḥ | śarīramātrāvadhikānāṃ caiṣāmutprekṣitumapyānantyādaśakyaṃ, na caiṣāṃ dravatvādinā vinā kaścitsaṃśleṣaheturvidyate | na cāsaṃśliṣṭānāmekajīvārambhasāmarthyam | sarvasaṃyogānāṃ ca viyogāvinābhūtatvādghaṭāditulyaḥ kadācijjīvasya pradhvaṃso bhavet | gātracchede ca tadvartināṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ tato niḥsṛtyā 'vaśiṣṭe śarīrabhāge punaḥ praveśa ityetadapramāṇakam | yattu viyojitamātrāṇāṃ hastādīnāṃ sphuraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tadabhidhātapreritavāyunimittamiti na tāvatā jīvāvayavānugatirvijñāyate | tathā sati saṃkocavikāsāveteṣāṃ bhavata ityatra na kiṃcitpramāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | dīpaprabhāprabhṛtīnāṃ tu kathaṃcitpratyakṣatvādupapadyete | na ca pradīpaprabhāyāḥ saṃkoco bhavati śarāvādicchādane śeṣaprabhāvināśādanāvṛtā hi jvālā ' 'tmasamīpe prabhāmaṇḍalamārabdhuṃ samarthā nā ' 'cchāditā | etenaiva ca vikāso 'pi pratyuktaḥ | anya eva hyavayavāstatra pracīyamānā vistāraṃ janayanti na tāvatāmeva vikāsaḥ | sparśavatāṃ ca parasparadeśapratibandhāddeśāntaravyāptyā vikāso ghaṭate, jīvāvayavānāṃ tvamūrtatvātsarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāvighātānnityamaṇumātratvaprasaṅgaḥ syāt | kathaṃ caikasya jīvasya puttikāhastiśarīraparimitau saṃkocavikāsau yujyete | maraṇakāle cāntarābhavaśarīrasaṃcaraṇaṃ taccāsti, kena citpratibandhena sadapi na gṛhyate, tena ca śarīrāntare jīvanikṣepa ityādi niṣpramāṇakam | tasmātsarvagatatvam | yattu śyāmākataṇḍulamātrādipradarśanamupaniṣatsu tadvākyāntarapradarśitavibhutvasyaiva sataḥ sūkṣmagrahaṇagocaratvāt | yadapi dvaipāyanenoktam
bhārate iti śeṣaḥ | | aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niścakarṣa balādyama iti | tadapi kāvyaśobhārthaṃ vispaṣṭamṛtyuvyavahārapraśaṃsanārthaṃ ca prativratāpraśaṃsāpare vākye prajāpativapotkhedanādivaddraṣṭavyam | tathā hi tenaiva gītādiṣvanekaprakāraṃ sartagatatvaṃ varṇitam | nanu ca sarvagatatve vyomavatsarvaśarīreṣveka evā ' 'tmā prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | śarīrabhūyastvātpratiśarīraṃ ca sukhaduḥkhopalabdhivyavasthādarśanāt | itarathā hyekaśarīreṇaiva caritārthatvādanekaśarīravaiyarthyaṃ syāt | janmāntaraśarīravadadoṣa iti cet | na | tatra karmāntaravaśenopabhogāntarārthaṃ punaḥ punarārambhātsarvaśarīragatasukhādyupalabdhiśca pratiśarīraṃ syāt | anyadīyaiścendriyaiḥ śarīrāntaragatasyā ' 'tmīyatvādupalabdherandhabadhirādīnāmabhāvaḥ syāt | varṇaviśeṣavyavasthayā ca karmacodanābhedo na syāt | ekasyaivā ' 'tmanastena tena śarīreṇa saṃbadhyamānasya sarvavarṇopapatteḥ | ātmanānātve tvadoṣaḥ | sarveṣāmapi ca sarvagatatve mūrtirahitatvātsamānadeśavṛttyavirodhaḥ | tadapekṣayaiva ca caitanyātmakatvādyavibhāgāccopaniṣa
tsvaikātmyavyavahāraḥ | kathaṃ punarnānātve 'pi sarveṣāṃ sarvaśarīraiḥ saṃbandhādanyadīyasukhaduḥkhādyanupalabdhiḥ | ke cittāvadāhuḥ—

śarīraparimāṇātmavādino 'pi kilāyaṃ tulyo doṣastasyāpi garbhātmasamānadeśatvānmātṛkṣetrajñastadgatāni sukhādīnyupalabheta | tatra yastasya parihāraḥ sa sarvātmanāṃ sarvaśarīreṣu bhaviṣyatītyaviśeṣaḥ | yadyatropapattirucyeta na tu parapakṣasāmyāpattirevopapattistasya ca tava cobhayorapyanyena paryanuyogāt | api ca tasya tvagindriyaparimāṇatvādantaḥśarīrākāśe bāhyavadevā ' 'tmano 'nabhyupagamānnaiva garbhaśarīreṇa mātṛkṣetrajñasya prāptirasti yena tulyadoṣatā syāt | tasmādeva parihartavyam ||

yadi hyātmanaḥ sukhādīnāṃ ca samānadeśalakṣaṇa eva saṃbandha upabhogakāraṇamiṣyeta tato 'yaṃ doṣaḥ syāt | iha tu cakṣurādīnāmiva kṣetrajñayogyatālakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tatra yathaiva tvagindriyeṇa sparśasamānadeśānāmapi rūpādīnāmagrahaṇam, evamanyenā ' 'tmanā 'nyadīyadharmādharmopāttasukhaduḥkhādyagrahaṇam | tasmādātmavādoktasvasvāmibhāvavyavasthānādadoṣaḥ | evaṃ sarvagatatvātsiddhamātmano niścalatvam | atha dvyavadānasamavetamāsīttata āha—tadvinaṣṭamiti | na ca tasyāvināśaḥ | tadviparītadravyāntaropalambhāt | na cāsya grahaṇapratibandhahetuḥ kaścidasti yena na gṛhyeta | athārthāpattyā grahaṇapratibandhādi kalpyeta tathā 'pi satyapūrvādbahutaramadṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ ca kalpayitavyaṃ, tāvadavinaṣṭamāste, tathā na dṛśyate, tathā pratibandhahetuḥ, tasyāpyadarśananimittaṃ cetyevaṃ tasya tasyānyadityanavasthā, tathā kṣaṇikasya karmaṇaḥ sthānamanupalabdhikāraṇaṃ ca kalpyamityatigauravam |

evamanāśritakarmāvasthānakalpanāyām | athā ' 'tmāśritameva saṃyogavibhāgāvakurvadāsīt | tatrāpi dṛṣṭaviparyayādṛṣṭakalpane syātām | tasmādvaramapūrvakalpanameveti siddhaṃ mūlādhikaraṇaprayojanam | dravyādīnāṃ phalasaṃbandhe teṣāmadṛṣṭārthatvātkarmaṇāmiva pratinidhyabhāvaḥ | karmaphalasaṃbandhe tu dravyādeḥ karmotpattyā dṛṣṭārthatvātsamānakāryatvajñānādasti pratinidhiḥ | kathaṃ tarhi pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ prakrāntāparisamāptidoṣābhāvaḥ | samāpanīyameva karma yena kena ciddravyeṇa | sadṛśopādāne tu na yatitavyaṃ sadṛśādapi phalāprāpteḥ, karmaṇaścāvihitasādhanaviśeṣasyānapekṣitasadṛśatvādyena kena citsiddheḥ | na ca tatpūrvadravyasya pratinidhirityucyate | anyārthatvādasādṛśyācca | pūrvadravyaṃ hi phalāya pravṛttamāsīdidānīmānīyamānaṃ tu pratyavāyaparihārāya naimittikaphalāya vā pravṛttasya karmaṇaḥ siddhyarthamiti | nāmadheyasiddhirapi prayojanameva | sā tu pūrvoktatvānna pradarśitā || 5 ||

sarvatraiva dravyakarmasaṃbandhe karmaṇāṃ dravyeṇa vinā 'nutpatteḥ prathamaṃ tāvaddravyaṃ karmotpādayata, dṛṣṭopakāritvāttadarthamābhāsate | tatra kvacidbhūyaḥ karma parāvṛttya dravyasyopakaroti kva cidātmalābhamātramanubhavati | tadyadā ' 'tmalābhamātraṃ tasya dṛśyate tadā sākāṅkṣatvādadṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate | yadā tu kāryāntaraupayikena dṛṣṭenaiva taṇḍulanirvṛttyādinā dravyopakāreṇa nirākāḍkṣī bhavati tadānīmadṛṣṭakalpanāvasarābhāvādanyathaiva vidhānārthavattvopapatternādṛṣṭasādhanatvaṃ pratīyate || 6 ||
yaiḥ karmabhirdravyaṃ svarūpato dharmato vā na kartumiṣyate yathā prayājādibhistāni svasādhanāni prati pradhānabhūtatvādadṛṣṭārthāni bhavanti || 7 ||

yaiḥ punardravyamutpādyate yathā ' 'dhānenāgnayo 'vāpyante kriyante vā yathā varaṇenartvijaḥ saṃskriyante, yathā 'vahantinā vrīhayaḥ, peṣaṇena taṇḍulāstāni guṇabhūtāni prayojanavaddravyasaṃskṛterīpsitatvāt | yadā dṛṣṭārthamadṛṣṭārthaṃ cobhayathā 'pi tulyavadanuṣṭhīyeta tadā kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ |
taducyate | praiyaṅgave 'pi carāvatideśaprāpto vrīhisādhanaka evāvahantiḥ kartavyaḥ pūrvapakṣe | kutaḥ—

lg.l: pradhāne hi śrutaṃ dravyaṃ nāṅgadravyasya bādhakam |

div.p: siddhānte tu bādhyante | kutaḥ—
nanu ca pūrvapakṣe 'pi pradhānaprayuktavrīhyāśrayatvena prakṛtāvaprayojakatvātpraiyaṅgave carau pradhānenāgṛhyamāṇānvrīhīnavaghāto na labhate | naitadevam—

‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ ‘vrīhīnavahanti’ iti tulye codane, tatreyaṃ prayojikeyaṃ neti nāsti viśeṣahetuḥ | na ca vājinādivadavahanteranuniṣpāditvam | na ca
( a. 4 pā.1 a. 10 sū. 25 ) atratyanyāyānusāreṇetyarthaḥ | padakarmavatparaprayuktaprakṛtaikahāyanyadhīnanirākāṅkṣatvam | na caikadeśadravyatvamuttarārdhādivat | nāpi ‘puroḍāśakapālena’ itivadarthābhidhānakarmatvam | tasmādavahantirapi prayojakaḥ | na cāsminpakṣe niyogato yāgārthā eva vrīhayo 'havantavyāḥ | laukikairapi karmasidhyaviśeṣāt | na cātra prakṛtagrahaṇe pramāṇaṃ, prakaraṇasyāviśeṣakatvāt |

na cādhikārādviśeṣaḥ ( a. 9 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 19 ) |‘tulyeṣu nādhikāraḥ syāt’ iti nyāyāt | saṃskārapakṣe tu laukikānāmānarthakye nāsaṃskāryatvādapūrvasādhanaviśeṣaṇatvena kathaṃcitprakṛtagrahaṇaṃ kleśena bhaviṣyati | na cā ' 'rādupakārakatve 'vahanteryāgasyeva laukikaiḥsādhyamānasya kiṃ cidānarthakyamiti śrautatvādvrīhimātragrahaṇameva yuktam | dharmamātraṃ ca tadā 'vahantiḥ sarvauṣadhāvahantivatsakṛdeva ca kartavyo nā ' 'taṇḍulanirvṛtteḥ | pradhānavrīhīṇāṃ ca dalanādibhirapi taṇḍulībhāvaḥ syāt | sānnāyyopāṃśuyājāṅgatvamapi cāsya prakaraṇāviśeṣāttathā bhavatīti tadvikāreṣvapi prayoktavya ityādīni prayojanāni || 8 ||
srukparidhyagnipuroḍāśasaṃmārgāṇāmuttarottarapradhānapratyāsattibhedenodāharaṇapṛthaktvam | etaduktaṃ bhavati—

tatra pūrvapakṣavādī pūrvoktenaiva ‘yairdravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate’ ityanena pradhānakarmalakṣaṇenā ' 'ha— dravyeṇa niṣpāditaṃ karma na kiṃcittasya pratyupakurvaddṛśyate | tasmātpradhānakarma saṃmārgaprokṣaṇādīti || 9 ||

naiva hyetadguṇakarmalakṣaṇaṃ yad dravyacikīrṣā nāma, upakāralakṣaṇaśeṣatvapratiṣedhāt | tādarthyalakṣaṇaṃ hi śrutyādipramāṇakaṃ tat, na pratyakṣādyupakāranimittamiti vakṣyāmaḥ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 2 ) atreti śeṣaḥ | | kimarthaṃ tarhi dravyacikīrṣopanyastā | taducyate—

yatra dravyacikīrṣayā guṇabhāvastatra nāpūrvabhedaḥ pratipattavya iti yāvat | pūrvapakṣavādī tvetadeva guṇakarmalakṣaṇaṃ matvā saṃmārgādiṣu tadapaśyanpratyavasthitavān | siddhāntābhiprāyastu
sarvatra śrutyādibhiravadhṛte tādarthye paścādupakāradarśanaṃ tadabhāve 'dṛṣṭakalpanaṃ vā | tatrepsitatamatvavācinyā dvitīyayā dravyaprādhānyadvāreṇa kriyāśeṣatve pratipādite hantyādīnāṃ dṛṣṭārthatvānnairākāṅkṣyaṃ jātaṃ na tu saṃmārgādīnāmityadṛṣṭārthatā, na ca tāvatā pūrvāvagataśeṣatvahāniḥ || 11 ||
parastvāha—

tannāma pramāṇaṃ yuktaṃ yadaikāntikam | anaikāntikī ca prādhānye dvitīyā, guṇabhūtadravyopadeśe 'pi dṛṣṭatvāt ‘saktūn juhoti’ iti | tathā ‘prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhidhārayati’ ityantareṇāpi dvitīyāmājyaprādhānyaṃ dṛṣṭam | ato ‘vrīhīnavahanti’ ityatrobhayasaṃbhave 'pyupakāradarśanakṛtameva dravyaprādhānyaṃ na dvitīyākṛtam | na ca tatsaṃmārgaprokṣaṇādiṣvastītīhāpi dvitīyayā dravyamevopadiśyatāmiti || 11 ||
tiṣṭhatu tāvatprayogaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam ||

yadi hyācārasyaikarūpyaṃ bhavennaiva smṛtayaḥ prayatnena dhāryeran | sa eva tu saṃkīrṇatvādasphuṭaḥ smaraṇena pratipālyate | smaryate ca dvitīyāyāḥ prādhānyamarthaḥ | ‘karmaṇi dvitīyā’ ‘karturīpsitatamaṃ karmeti | tathā lokavedayoḥ prayujyate ghaṭaṃ karoti ‘vrīhīnavahanti’ iti |
yāni ca loke vyabhicārāśaṅkāsthānāni tānyudāharati taṇḍulānodanaṃ paca valvajāna śikhaṇḍakān kuru taṇḍulānadya juhudhīti | taṇḍulairbalbajairiti ca prayoktavye yā dvitīyā prayujyate tannūnaṃ tṛtīsamānārthā seti gamyate | tatrocyate—

yadā padārthāntarabhūtaudanaśikhaṇḍakasādhanatvena taṇḍulabalvajā vivakṣyante tadā tṛtīyāntapadabhājo bhavanti | yadā tu bhojanayogyaudanāvasthāpariṇatirūpeṇa taṇḍulā, mārdavotpattyarthaṃ ca śikhaṇḍakākāreṇa balvajā dṛśyante |

tathā vedavākyāvagataguṇabhāvāśca te dravyasādhanake 'gnihotre sukhaṇḍitāstiṣṭhanto ramaṇīyatvātkasyāścidbrāhmaṇyāḥ svakarmaśobhādarśanārthaṃ taṇḍulā homasaṃbandhitvenābhipretāḥ | saivaṃ preṣyati guṇakāmā vā yajamāna taṇḍulānadya juhudhīti, tadā dvitīyārthabhāktvaṃ bhavati | bhavati hi loke bahu prakārā vivakṣeti | guṇabhūte 'pyarthe kena citkāraṇena kaścitprādhānyāṃśo vivakṣyate tathā pradhānabhūteṣu guṇāṃśaḥ | kadā cidubhau kadā cinnobhau |

na ca yadvivakṣyate tacchabdenābhidhātavyamityasti pramāṇaṃ, vivakṣāsaṃpattyarthaṃ tu lakṣaṇādyupāyāntarāśrayaṇaṃ na svārthatyāgaḥ | tasmātprādhānyameva dvitīyārthaḥ | kathaṃ tu saktvādiṣu guṇatvamiti | taducyate—

dvitīyā tāvatkarmatvaṃ pradhānarūpamātmaśaktyā vadati, tattviha balavatā kāraṇāntareṇa virudhyamānatvānnā ' 'śrīyate | tena tu kārakaviśeṣātmakatvādyatkārakasāmānyamavinābhūtaṃ lakṣyate tadaviruddhatvādvivakṣyate | tatraitāvānartho vijñāyate homasya kārakaṃ saktava iti | na ca sāmānyaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ vyavahārakṣamamiti viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyati |
‘dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge’ iti bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇanyāyāt | kathaṃ punaḥ saktuprādhānyavivakṣā virudhyate | tatrā ' 'ha—

yasya hi dravyasya kva cidupayogo nirvṛtto bhaviṣyatīti vā 'vadhāryate tatsaṃskārārhatvātkarma prati pradhānyaṃ pratipadyate | yatpunarnopayuktaṃ nopayokṣyate vā tasya saṃskāro niṣprayojana iti tadvidhānavākyānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | tecāmī saktavo na homātprāgupayujyante nordhvaṃ, bhasmasādbhāvādbhasmaviniyogavacanābhāvācca | tatra samastaṃ vākyamanarthakaṃ bhavatu dvitīyā vā lakṣaṇāvṛtteti, sthitatvādvedaprāmāṇyasya lakṣaṇā grahītavyā | mukhyārthaprayogo hyautsargikatvādapavādadarśanena bhrāntitvaṃ pratipadyate | sarvatraiva lakṣaṇāśrayaṇamānarthakyaprasaṅganimittam | anyathā mukhyārthopapatteḥ |

tena virodhātsaktusādhanakahomavidhānaṃ prakaraṇasaṃbandhi gṛhyate | nanu saktūnāmapītihomavantaḥ saktavo 'pi jyotiṣṭomasyopakṛtyā 'rthavanto bhaviṣyantītyāha | siddhāntavādī tu cchalena homasādhanībhūtānāmevārthavattvamabhyupagacchati ko vā brūte neti | sarvatraiva ca ||
yathā homaḥ kriyātmakatvātkimityapekṣamāṇaḥ pradhānakathaṃbhāvenetthamanugrāhakatvena gṛhyate naivaṃ dravyam | na ca tasmādadṛṣṭakalpanā, kriyānirvartyatvādapūrvāṇām |

yatrāpi tāvaddravyaṃ sākṣātphalāya codyate yathā ‘godohanena paśukāmasya’ iti tatrāpyanyaprayojanakriyādvāramantareṇa nāpūrvaṃ bhaviṣyati | kimuta yadā na kasya cidaṅgatvena saktavaḥ śrūyante | na ca kiṃ citkalpanāpramāṇamasti | dvitīyeti cet | na hītyuttaram | dvitīyā hi saktūnāṃ prādhānyaṃ vadantī homaṃ tadarthaṃ kuryānna saktubhyo 'pūrvamiti pratipattim | tena dvitīyāprasādādbhaveddhomaḥ saktvarthaḥ | kathaṃ nāma homavyāptāḥ saktavaḥ syuriti | nānyasmai pnayojanāyāśravaṇāt | te cāmī bhavanti home kṛte saktavo homasaṃbaddhā iti prāgeva prayojanalābhātparyavasitā dvitīyā niṣprayojaneṣvavi, homaṃ praci prādhānyamātreṇa karmatvasiddheḥ | tatra siddhe vākyārthe paścānna puruṣasya kratorvopayujyanta iti jñātvā tadvacanādvā 'dṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta prādhānyajñānaṃ vā bhrāntiriti | tatrā ' 'ha—na ca tadvacanācchakyamanyatkalpayitumiti |

prādhānyāvivakṣaiva nyāyyā | tataśca tṛtīyārthasiddhiriti matvā mahābhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ tṛtīyāyāḥ sthāne dvitīyeti | tena vaiṣamyaṃ homasaṃmārgayoḥ, saktūnāṃ niṣprayojanatvena tadarthatvāt, puroḍāśādeścānyaśeṣabhāvena paryāgnikaraṇādisaṃskārārhatvāt | dṛ̣dhe ca śāstrārthe 'vasthite dṛṣṭopakārābhāve 'pyadṛṣṭakalpanā bhaviṣyati | loke 'pyadṛṣṭārthāḥ saṃskārā ācārādgamyante yathā grāmāntarādāgatānāṃ śāntyarthamagnilavaṇadadhyakṣataprabhṛteḥ śirasa upari bhrāmaṇaṃ śucideśapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca |

na cāsyānupapattirācāraprāmāṇyāt | tenādṛṣṭārthānāmapi tulyaśrutitvātsiddho guṇabhāvaḥ | nanvevaṃ sati sarvatra prayojanavattākṛtameva dravyaprādhānyamiti na vaktavyaṃ ‘tulyaśrutitvāt’ iti, darśayitavyaṃ vā yatra prayojanavattānirapekṣaṃ dvitīyākṛtameva prādhānyaṃ kevalatṛtīyākṛto vā guṇabhāva iti | taducyate | prādhānye tāvat ‘ainrdyā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata’ ityatra liṅgādindrārthatvāvagatergārhapatyaikavākyatvācca tatsādhanakendropasthānaprasaṅge kevaladvitīyākṛtameva gārhapatyaprādhānyam |

tathā ‘sūktavākena prastaram’ ityubhayoḥ prayojanavattvāviśeṣe kevalatṛtīyākṛtamevasūktavākasya prastarapraharaṇāṅgatvam | tena vibhāktibhirevāṅgāṅgibhāve 'bhidhīyamāne niṣprayojanatvamapavādo na tu prayojanasadasadbhāvenāṅgāṅgitvāmiti vivekaḥ | prayojanaṃ tvadhikaraṇasya na samyaganumanyante | tathā hi—

priyaṅgavo hyutpattivākyātkevalapradhānārthatvena jñāyamāna yuktaṃ yadaṅgeṣu na bhavantīti | śamīmayatvādi tu srugādimātrānuvādena vidhīyamānaṃ ( a. 3 pā. 7 a. sū. 2 ) |‘sarveṣāṃ vā śeṣatvasyātatprayuktatvāt’ ityanena vākyasaṃyogabalīyastvātprakaraṇagamyapradhānārthatvabādhenāṅgapradhānārthaṃ vijñāyate |
na cātra viśeṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cidupāttaṃ yena pradhānagatasrugādimātrapratītiḥ syāt, sadapi voddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇatvānna vivakṣyeta |

tasmātpūrvapakṣe 'pi yāni ca pradhānasaṃbandhīni srugādīni yāni cā ' 'rādupakārakasaṃmārgādisaṃbandhīni tāni sarvāṇi śamīmayītvādiyuktānītyayukto nānāvṛkṣasruksaṃmārgaḥ | syādetat | ( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 19 sū. 35 ) |‘mukhyārtho vā 'ṅgasyācoditatvāt’ iti vaikṛtaviśeṣāṇāṃ kevalapradhānārthatvānnehāṅgapradhānārthatā bhaviṣyatīti | tadayuktam |

‘yajñātharvaṇaṃ vai kābhyā iṣṭayastā upāṃśu kartavyā’ iti hi pradhānaireva kāmyaśabdopāttairupāṃśutvaṃ saṃbadhyamānamaṅgasyācoditamiti( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 19 sū. 34 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | vakṣyate, na cātra tādṛśaḥ pradhānasaṃyoga iti vaiṣamyam | nanu cā ' 'tideśikatvādaprāptāvastheṣvaṅgeṣu śamīmayītvādyupadiśyamānaṃ pradhānamātrārthaṃ bhavet | nārhatyevaṃ bhavitum | evaṃ hi sthāsyati |

avaśyaṃ cānekārthavidhyanupapatteḥ srugādīnyanuvaditavyāni | tena pratyakṣo 'pi sannupadeśo 'tideśaṃ tāvatpratīkṣate | tatra yāvatā kālena pradhānasrugādīni prāpnuvanti tāvataivāṅgasrugādīnyapītyaviśeṣaḥ | kiṃ ca ||

ya eva hi saṃmārgasrucāṃ varjanopāyastenaiva prayājādisrugvarjanamapi prāpnoti, na caitadiṣṭaṃ yuktyabhāvāt | yadyapi ca kiṃ citpradhānamātrasaṃbandhakāraṇaṃ bhavettathā 'pi saumikavedidakṣiṇānyāyena prasaṅgasiddherna prākṛtajātyupasaṃgraho yujyate | kiṃ ca—

paridhirityagniparidhānārthaṃ dravyamucyate | tathā homādyarthā juhvādayastatra saṃmārgasya ( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 11 sū. 26 ) |‘arthābhidhānakarma ca’ ityaprayojakatvamapi śakyaṃ vaktum | tataśca bāṇavatparidhiśravaṇe yadi tāvadaparihitāneva palāśādīnsaṃmārṣṭi, aparidhaya eva saṃmṛṣṭā bhaveyuḥ | atha tānapi paridadhīta , tataḥ kṛte paridhāne prākṛtārthatā na syāt | na ca tulyārthānāṃ samuccayo dṛṣṭaḥ | tasmānna paridhyantaramutpādanīyam | avabhṛthasya tvapūrvatvādyāvaduktamātraparyavasāyinaḥ sāṅgasya cāpsu coditasya kena saṃmārgo 'gnirvā prāpnoti yenotpādyeta | tasmādaprayojanānyetāni |

tasyodāharaṇaṃ tvekaṃ satyam | tatra hi ( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 22 sū. 42 ) |‘māṃsaṃ tu savanīyānām’ iti siddhāntātpuroḍāśamātreṇāsaṃbadhyamānaṃ tarasamayatvamasavanīyatvānna paryagnikaraṇapuroḍāśena saṃbadhyate | na hi savanīyāṅge savanīyaśabdaprayogaḥ | savanasaṃbandhiviṣayatvāt | savanīyāṅgasya cāsavanārthatvārthatvāttatrāpi tu vrīhimayatvaṃ durlabham | ‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ iti pradhānapuro
ḍāśamātreṇa teṣāṃ saṃbandhāt | evaṃ tarhyaniyatadravyakatā paryagnikaraṇapuroḍāśasyeti prayojanam | tadapyayuktam | tathā sati kāṃsya
ayaṃ cātra nyāyaḥ | gururaniyata pātrabhojī śiṣyastu niyatakāṃsyapatrabhojo gurucchiṣṭabhojī ca, tayorekapātrabhojane prasakte guṇabhūśiṣyānurodhena pradhānabhūtasyāpi guroḥ kāṃsyapātrabhojanameva nyāyyamavirodhāt iti |bhojinyāyena tarasamayaparyagnikaraṇanaiva śāstrārthopapatteḥ siddhāntārthāsadṛśakarmaprasaṅga | tasmātkathaṃ citprakṛtau vrīhimayapuroḍāśagrahaṇāttatsādhanatvaṃ śāstrakṛtatvātprāpnotīti vaktavyam |

tatrāpi tvekahāyanīnyāyenāprayojakatvāt tadabhāve lopaprasaṅgaḥ | tenaitadevaṃ prayojanamityāśrayaṇīyam | aniyatadravyakatvaṃ vā | na cātra kāṃsyabhojinyāyaḥ saṃbhavati | māṃsena puroḍāśatvānabhivyakteḥ | savanīyapuroḍāśe kathamiti cet | naivaṃ tatra puroḍāśatvamiṣṭaṃ, vacanādapuroḍāśātmakameva māṃsaṃ puroḍāśasya sthāne vidhayite yathā dhānādīnām | na hi kathaṃ cidapi māṃsena dhānādayo bhavanti | ataśca praiyaṅgavanyāyena pradhānamātre māṃsena puroḍāśo vivartitaḥ | paryagnikaraṇaṃ tu puroḍāśasādhanakameva | sattvaniyatadravyako vā kathaṃ cidvā prakṛtidarśanena vrīhiyavadravyaka iti sthitam | etāni ca prayojanāni sruksaṃmārgasya prakṛtau bahusādhanatvātkapiñjalanyāyena tritvasya śāstrīyatvātpātrāvivṛddhāvapi paśucāturmāsyeṣu tisra eva saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ pūrvapakṣe | siddhānte tu sarvāḥ, saṃskārasya pratipradhānāvartitvāt |

tathā ( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 ) atratyanyāyenotyarthaḥ |paśunyāyena vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvādeka eva saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ paridhiḥ pūrvapakṣe | siddhānte tu sarve | yatra ca paridhivivṛddhistatra viśeṣaḥ | evamekapuroḍāśe paryāgnikaraṇaṃ sarvapuroḍāśe ca vaktavyam | tathā 'pi ‘viśaye laukikaḥ syāt’( a. 7 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 30) | ityevam ‘agnimupanidhāya
stuvate’ itivallaukikāgnisaṃmārgakaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣe | siddhānte tu tasyāprayojanatvenāsaṃskāryatvātsarveṣāmāhavanīyādīnāmiti viśeṣaḥ || 12 ||

‘yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate’ ityasyāpavādatvena stotraśastropanyāsaḥ | stutireva stotraṃ, śastramapi saivāpragītamantrasādhyā, guṇaguṇisaṃbaṃdhakīrtanaṃ ca stutiḥ śiṣyate | sā ca prathamaṃ guṇaguṇibhyāṃ nirvartyate | tadabhāve śabdoccāraṇamātrasya stutitvāvyapadeśāt | tatra guṇānāṃ tāvadakarmāṅgatayā niṣprayojanatvādekāntena stutyarthatā | tannirvartitā tu stutiḥ kiṃ stutyasya smārakatvena śeṣībhavatyuta svaprādhānyenādṛṣṭārthā bhavatīti | kiṃ prāptam ||

lg.l: stotraśastrāṇi tena syuḥ saṃskārā devatāḥ prati s|| 13 ||

div.p: pramāṇāntaravirodhena dūṣaṇaṃ tāvaducyate | tathā hi—

yā yaddevatānāmasaṃyuktā stuticodanā bhāvaneti yāvat, codyamānatvāt, sā tadarthaparatvāttasminnasati na svārthaṃ karotīti tadvaśenendrīstutirmāhendragrahayajisaṃnidhimullaṅghya yatrendrastatra gacchet | tataśca kramasaṃnidhibādhaḥ | kramaścātra yathāsaṃkhyenottarāsu pāṭhaḥ |
saṃnidhistu rathaṃtaracodanayopasthānaṃ prakaraṇaparāmarśo vā || 14 ||
nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam—

ya eva hi abhivatībhirindraḥ stūyate sa eva māhendragraheṇejyate tatra satyevārthe kimityapakarṣaḥ syāt | na ca yāvatkarmāṅgabhūte 'rthe vidyate tatsarvaṃ mantreṇābhidhātavyaṃ, nyūnamadhikaṃ vā 'sau yadabhidhātuṃ samarthastadabhidhatte | tena nirguṇendraprakāśanaṃ guṇasyātantratvātprakaraṇalabhyatvādvā nirguṇadravyaprakāśanavadeva | na ca śabdamātraṃ devateti navamadaśamayorabhidhāsyate | tataśca ya eva mahendraśabdenārthaścoditaḥ sa evendraśabdenocyata ityarthāntaratvakalpanāpramāṇābhāvāt | tasmādutkarṣopalambhāvātsaṃskārakarmatvameva yuktamiti || 15 ||
naitadasti | nirguṇendrābhidhānādanutkarṣa iti | prasajyata evotkarṣaḥ | kutaḥ—

yadyavayavavyutpattyā mahāṃścāsāvindraścetyevaṃ mahendraśabdamanvācakṣāṇaistadvitānugamaḥ kriyeta,tata indra eva guṇamātraviśiṣṭo 'sya grahasya devateti gamyeta | na tvevamasti | samudāyaprasiddhibalīyastvenendravyatiriktarụ̄dhiśabdābhidheyamahendrapratīteḥ | tathā hi—
na cāsya mahattvamapekṣamāṇasyeti avayavavyutpattiṃ nirākaroti | katham—

pā. sū. ( 2-1-1 ) |‘samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ’ | pā. sū. ( 4-1-82 )‘samarthānāṃ prathamādvā’ iti ca samāsataddhitavṛttyorviśeṣaṇam | atastadabhāve naikayā 'pi bhavitavyam | yadi yugapatsamāsatāddhitāvanvākhyāyete tato naikatrāpi sāmarthyaṃ labhyate | kutaḥ—
ekārthībhāvalakṣaṇaṃ vyapekṣālakṣaṇaṃ vā sāmarthyamubhayathā 'pi sāpekṣasya nāvakalpate | katham—

avikṣipyamāṇau hi dvāvarthāvekatra lolībhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām | na ca vikṣipyamāṇau, nānātve buddhikāluṣyāt | yo hyavayavābhyāmekatropasaṃhṛtābhyāmubhayaviśiṣṭa eko 'rthaḥ pratipādyate so 'pi nirapekṣābhyāmeva | sāpekṣatve saṃśayarūpeṇaikatrānupasaṃhārāt | evaṃ tāvadaikārthyalakṣaṇasāmarthyābhāvaḥ |
na hi sāpekṣo vigatāpekṣaśabdena śakyo vaktumityubhayasāmarthyābhāvādubhayavṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ | evaṃ tāvadyugapadanvākhyāne doṣaḥ |
etadevābhipretyā ' 'ha—na ca taddhitārthe vṛttasyetyādi |

lg.l: taddhitārthe na vṛttasya vṛddhiḥ syāduttare pade |

div.p: mahaindra iti hi syānna cendraviśeṣaṇaṃ mahattvam | na hyupasarjanamabhibhūtasvārthavṛtti viśe ṣaṇāntaraiḥ saṃyujyate | na ca samāsārthe vṛttasyeti vākyabhedamātreṇaivocyate | tena kramavṛttirapi nāstīti pratipādya punaryugapadvṛttimeva doṣāntarābhidhitsayopanyasyati | ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 8 )‘aikaśabdye parārthavat’ ityanena nyāyenendraśabdasya mahattvataddhitārthau prati vairūpyanimittavākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ| vidhyanekavyāpārātmakaścāparo vākyabhedaḥ | tathā hi—

tasmānnendro devatā mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ | kiṃ tarhyavayavasaṃbandhānirapekṣādrụ̄dhiśabdāttāddhitotpattiḥ | ataśca siddhaṃ devatāntaratvam | na ca vṛtravadhottarakālaṃ mahattvābhidhānenendrasyaiva mahendratvaṃ bhavet | vedasyā ' 'dimattvaprasaṅgāt | ato nityarūḍhasyaiva stutimātrārthametat || 16 ||
vyapadeśabhedācca bhedaḥ | evaṃ ca mantrayorvyavasthā bhaviṣyati | itarathā vikalpe pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt | asati cārthabhede mantrabhedasyādṛṣṭārthatā prasajyeta |

lg.l: evaṃ vyākhyāyamāne tu rụ̄dhitve taddhite sati |

div.p: yathaiva hīndraśabdasya mahattvataddhitāvapekṣamāṇasya yugapatkrameṇa vā vṛttirna saṃbhavatyevameva somasyāgnimapekṣamāṇasya na taddhitasaṃbandhastadapekṣasya vā nāgninā saha samāsaḥ | tathā kramavṛttau punaruccāraṇe vākyabhedānnānyataratra vṛttasyānyatareṇa vṛttiḥ, somapadasya vairūpyaṃ, pratyayasyānekārthavṛttiriti doṣāṇāṃ sāmyenarụ̄dhitvaprasaṅgātsamastadvidevatyatvavyavahārocchedaḥ syāt |

na caiṣāṃ rụ̄dhitvaṃ śakyaṃ vadituṃ, sarvatra śāstre dvidevatyatvābhyupagamāt | tadyathā ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 15 ) |caturdhākaraṇendra( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 18 ) |pītapūṣa( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 15 ) eṣvadhikaraṇeṣvityarthaḥ |prapiṣṭabhāgāvicāreṣu sāpekṣāgnidevatyādīnāmaindrāgnāgnīṣomīyādīnāmāgneyādiśabdaiḥ kevalāgnyādidevatākairasāmarthyādagrahaṇamiti vakṣyati | rụ̄dhitve hi kasya kvāpekṣā bhavet |

tathā dvidevatatvasāmānyenaindrāpaupṇādīnāmagnīṣomīyaindrāgnaprakṛtikatvaṃ ( a. 8 pā. 1 a. 7 ) atreti śeṣaḥ |vakṣyate | tathā ‘medhapatibhyāṃ medham’ ityatra ( a. 9 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 35 ) |‘devatā tu tadāśīṣṭvāt’ ityarthadvayamāśrayiṣyate | tathā manotādhikaraṇe vakṣyati( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 22 sū. 42 ) atra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ | satyamagnīṣomau devatāprakṛtau tāvagniśca somaśca tatrāgniradevatā na tvasamaveta iti | tathā devatādvandvāśrayāṇi agnerītvaṣatvādīni
īdagneḥ somavaruṇayoḥ, agnestutstomasobhāḥ iti sūtrābhyāṃ iti śeṣaḥ |smaryamāṇāni na śakyāni bādhitum |

yadi ca vyākaraṇamevamādāvapramāṇaṃ tarhi devatātaddhitasmaraṇāprāmāṇyādagnīṣomādīnāṃ devatātvamapi na syāta | atha tatpratītirabhyupagamyeta sā tulyā 'rthadvayapratītāvapīti rụ̄dhitvābhāvaḥ | etenāśvakarṇādivadartharahitasamāsānvākhyānena svarasaṃskāraprasiddhyartha
magnīṣomīyādidvaṃdvasmaraṇaprāmāṇyakalpanaṃ pratyuktam | tathā hi—

mahadindraśabdayostāvadavaśyaṃ pṛthagarthābhidhānaśaktiḥ kalpayitavyā | tayośca guṇaguṇya bhidhāyitvādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyātmakatvamavadhāritam | tatra yāvadeva saṃhatāvuccāritau tāvadeva pūrvānubhūtārthasaṃbandhitayā viśiṣṭārthapratyayo jāyate | na cāsya nivartakaṃ kiṃcidasti | na ca samudāyasyāpūrvaśaktyantarakalpanāpramāṇaṃ vidyate | labdhātmikā ca samudāyaprasiddhiravayavaprasiddhiṃ bādhate | na cāvayavārtharahitārthāntaraprayogaṃ vispaṣṭamantareṇa tadātmalābhaḥ | kiṃ ca—

pratyakṣe 'pi tāvadarthe 'nekaśabdaśakteḥ kalpanā niṣpramāṇikā, kimuta yatrārthasadbhāvo 'pi kalpanīyaḥ | tadihendraśabdaprayogānyathānupapattyendrastāvadadṛṣṭo 'pi kalpyate, tatra yadipunarmahendraśabdaprayogānyathānupapattirbhavettato 'rthāntaraṃ mahendro nāma kalpyeta | yadā tu pūrvakalpitābhyāmeva mahadindrapadaśaktibhyāṃ prayogaḥ sidhyati, sa eva cārthaḥ kiṃ cidviśiṣṭaḥ pratyabhijñāyate, kastadā 'rthāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ śakṣyati | tasmādindra eva mahattvaviśiṣṭo mahendro nānya iti siddham | na ca samāsaṃ kṛtvā taddhite kriyamāṇe kasya cidasāmarthyaṃ samāsavelāyāṃ taddhitavelāyāṃ cāpekṣaṇīyārthāntarānupādānāt | na ca dviruccāraṇanimittavākyabhedaprasaktiḥ | sakṛduccāritaikapadopāttānekārthakathanāt | vṛttidvayātmakaṃ hi māhendrapadam | ekaikā ca vṛttirvākyārthe vartate | tatra yayorvākyayorarthau māhendrapadenopāttau tau tābhyāṃ nirbhidya kathyete | yaccātrāsakṛduccāraṇaṃ dṛśyate na tadvedavacanasyaiva | na hi kadā cidapyevaṃrūpo vedo 'sti mahāṃścāsāvindraśca mahendro devatā asyeti māhendraḥ | na caitadeva vaidikaṃ padamevaṃ vibhajyate | vibhāgasya pauruṣeyatvenāvaidikatvāpatteḥ | kiṃ tu—
vicitraśaktīni hi padāni ekānekapadārthapratīteḥ |

tathaiṣāmarthakathanaṃ kadācitpadenaivānyena kriyate kadācidvākyena, tenāpyekenānekena vā dvipadena bahupadena veti vaicitryam | tadyathā kaḥ pikaḥ kokilaḥ, ka aupagava upagorapatyam | upagunā vā svakāntāyāmutpāditaḥ | tathā pacatītyukte pākaṃ paragāmiphalamekaḥ kartā pūrvāparībhūtaṃ vartamānakāle nirvartayatīti kathyate | na caivaṃ kathayatāṃ vākyabhedaḥ prasajyate | na vā 'śabdārthatvamadhyavasīyate | evameva yadi māhendrapadopātto 'rthastadaspṛśadbhireva
śabdaśaktividbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ svavākyenaikenānekena vā kathyate kastatra vākyabhedaḥ, śatakṛtvo 'pi hi svavākyamuccāryamāṇaṃ na vedaṃ dūṣayati | na ca tadīyoḥ 'rthaḥ kathyamānaḥ pauruṣeyatvaṃ bhajate, avaśyaṃ cāneko 'rthaḥ puruṣaiḥ kathyamānaḥ krameṇa kathayitavyaḥ, so 'pi ca prakṛtipratyayapaurvāparyeṇetyevaṃ kathyate mahāṃścāsāvindraścetyādi | na caivaṃ sāpekṣatvam | ma. bhā. ( 2—1—1 ) |‘athavā bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa’ iti yadyapīndraśabdastaddhitāpekṣastathā 'pi mahattvaṃ prati pādhānyāllabhate samāsam | ataśca yugapadapekṣāyāmavirodhastathā 'pi tu vṛttiḥ krameṇaiva | kutaḥ—

tena yatraiva pradhānaṃ sāpekṣaṃ tatraitayaiva tāvadvṛttyā bhavitavyamiti samāsa eva prathamaṃ bhavati | yadi vā kṛtvā samāsaṃ tantreṇa vṛttiriṣyeta, tataḥ śuddha indrastaddhitasaṃbandhī śuddhaśca samāsabhāgiti nirguṇasyaivendrasya devatātvāpatterguṇānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ |

na cendramahattvayoryugapattāddhitārthe nipatitayoraruṇaikahāyanyādivatparasparaniyamo labhyate | na hyakriyāyāṃ yugapatsaṃnipāto nāpi viśeṣaṇavaśīkārasāmarthyam | satyapi ca dvandvadevatāpattiḥ | akṛtasamāsayośca mahadindraśabdayoranekatvādvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaprātipadikanimittataddhitasaṃbandhābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: ślokasyāyamarthaḥ | subaṃtatve mahadindraśadbayoḥ, ‘apratyayaḥ prātipadika’ ityanenāprātipādikatayā taddhitavṛtyayogādasubantatve ca samāsāyogādvṛttidvayayaugapadyavādinaste yugapatsubantatvāsubantatvavirodha iti |subantau yadi vaitau te, na prātipadikaṃ tataḥ |

div.p: tasmānna yugapadvṛttiriti kramavṛttyā samāsārthasyaiva devatātvam | ataścendra eva guṇasaṃyukto mahendro nārthāntaramiti pūrvapakṣa eva śobhana ityanyaduttaraṃ vācyam | taducyate—

lg.l: śrutyā hi devatā yāge samavaiti na rūpataḥ |

div.p: yadyapyabhinno 'rthastathāpi ( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 13 sū. 23 )‘vidhiśabdasya mantratve bhāvaḥ syāttena codanā’ iti mahendraśabdenaivocyamānasyāsmin grahayāge devatātvaṃ nānyathā | tatra sakalaparyāyeṇāpi bṛhadindrādiśabdenocyamānasya devatātvaṃ na bhavati kimuta nyūnenaivendraśabdena | tathā hi—
devatātvasya pratyakṣādyanavagamyatvāccodanaivaikaṃ pramāṇaṃ sā ca yaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatra yādṛśe cārthe vidadhāti, sa yadi tathaivānuṣṭhāne 'pi saṃpādyeta, tatastatpramito 'yamityavasīyate |

kiṃcidapi cedihānyathā jātaṃ nivṛttavyāpārāyāṃ codanāyāṃ pramāṇāntaraṃ mṛgyaṃ na ca tadastītyapramāṇatā yathā vakṣyati( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 6 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ | | ‘sa evāgniraṣṭākapālasya devatā nā ' 'jyasya’ iti | tena vyavasthāvaśādyathaivendre codite 'gnerdevatātvaṃ na bhavati, somasya ca codite na puroḍāśasya, abhiṣutasya ca na latāyāḥ, śuddhe ca na saguṇasya, tathaiva guṇavati codite na nirguṇasya | kutaḥ—

yadi hi taddhitasaṃbandhe devatoddiśyamānā syāttato 'syā guṇavivakṣā bhavet | iyaṃ punaravidhīyamānā devatātvameva na pratipadyata ityavaśyopādātavyā | tataśca vivakṣitaguṇatvāttadapāye na kathaṃ ciddevateti gamyate | yathā śuklavāsā bhojayitavyo ‘lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti’ ‘daṇḍī praiṣānanvāhaṃ’ iti viśeṣaṇarahitānāmakarmāṅgatvam | yadā te 'pyuddiśyante yo 'yaṃ śuklavāsāstamānayetyādau tadā vinā 'pi viśeṣaṇenā ' 'nīyante | tadiha yadyapi tāvaddevatā rūpeṇopakuryāttathā 'pi na guṇarahitā ' 'śrīyeta, kimuta yadā 'midhānopakāriṇī vidhigatavyatiriktābhidhānābhihitā naiva pratyabhijñāyate saiveyaṃ devateti |
samāsena ca vidhīyamānāyāṃ nānekārthavidhidoṣaprasaktiḥ | tatra māhendragrahagatā na kathaṃ cidindraśabdenocyate |

yā tu tenocyate sā tatra naiva devatetyanarthakamevāsyāḥ prakāśanam | ataśca ‘na śrutisamavāyitvāt’ ityayamapi sūtrārtho bhavati śrutisamavetaṃ devatātvaṃ bhaviṣyati tadadhīnajñānamityarthaḥ | tacca taddhitasaṃvāde sati jñāyate | tasmādasti devatābheda iti | kathaṃ tvaṃsmin pakṣe bhāṣyagamanikā | tadabhidhīyate |

pūrvapakṣavādī tāvadanutkarṣaṃ pragāthasya vadati, yaśca māhendrādgrahādindrābhidhānasamarthamantrānutkarṣaṃ vadati tenākarmāṅgabhūtārthaprakāśanavaiyarthyādindra evātra śuddho devatābhūtaḥ prakāśyata ityabhyupagataṃ bhavati |

tasya ca devatātvaṃ nābhyupagamamātreṇa sidhyati, nāpi pramāṇāntareṇeti ya etadgrahotpattivākye devatābhidhānaśaktastaddhitaḥ śrūyate ‘māhendraṃ gṛhṇāti’ iti tatsaṃyogādvijñāyate | sa ca yadi samāsānniṣkṛṣya kevalādindraśabdādutpādyate, tato mantrābhidheyasadṛśaṃ devatātvamuktaṃ bhavati |

siddhavaccaitamarthaṃ pūrvapakṣavādino 'bhipretaṃ manvāno niṣkṛṣya bravīti indro 'sya deva
tā—iti taddhitasaṃyogena jñāyate, na cāsya mahattvamapekṣamāṇasyākṛte samāse śuddhasyopasarjanībhūtasya taddhitasaṃyogaḥ, taddhitasaṃyogāpekṣasya veti—satyami sāpekṣapradhānasamāse prātipadikāvasthāyāṃ taddhitāpekṣā, na ca tadānīmasuvantatvātsamāsopapattiḥ | tena yatraiva pṛthagbhūtaṃ subantaṃ saṃbandhārhameva padāntaramapekṣate yathā rājapuruṣaḥ śobhana iti, tadviṣayamevait, ‘bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa’ iti draṣṭavyam |

akṛte ca samāse taddhitāpekṣāyāṃ vākyāttaddhitotpattirityabhyupetaṃ syāt | śuddhasya vā taddhitasaṃsparśādviśeṣaṇānantargatiprasaṅgaḥ | kramavṛttiḥ punarbhavato nābhipretaiva, pūrvaṃ taddhitasaṃbandhe pūrvoktāveva dravyaviśeṣaṇottarapadavṛddhiprasaṅgadoṣau |

na ca samāsārthe vṛttasya śuddhasya taddhitasaṃbandhaḥ | tenaikasminneva prayoge tantrasaṃbandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | tataśca ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 8 )‘aikaśabdye parārthavat’ iti tathaiva vairūpyadoṣaḥ |
vispaṣṭaścāyamanyo 'rtha iti prāksamāsādanekārthavidheḥ samāsapadalamyatvādvākyamedamāha | kṛte tu samāse naiṣa doṣaḥ | tasmānnendro devatā 'mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ śuddhaḥ kiṃ tarhi, viśiṣṭa eva |
atha vā nendro devatā kevalapadopāttaḥ śuddha ityabhiprāyaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi, mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ, samāsaprātipadikāttaddhitotpatteḥ |
na tvavayavasaṃbandheneti—nāvayaprasiddhinirākaraṇaparaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, nāvayavasaṃbandhena taddhitotpattirniṣkraṣṭumaśakyatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
tasmāddevatāntaramiti | satyapi dravyaikatve saguṇanirguṇāśrayaṇāddevatāntaratvam | āha ca—

yadapyucyate indrasya vṛtravadhottarakālamiti | pūrvaṃ sarvatra śuddhātmanaḥ pratipannadevatātvasya paścāttano 'yaṃ guṇaḥ stutimātropayogī na devatātve 'ntarbhavatīti manyate | asya tūttaraṃ gatārtham |

sthite ca devatāntaratve, śuddhasya devatāyāḥ prakāśanaṃ, śuddhena vā viśiṣṭasya, viśiṣṭacodanāyāmapi vā śuddhasya devatātvaṃ, śuddhaśabdoccāraṇe 'pi vā viśiṣṭe devatātvaṃ pratipadyata ityādi sarvamandhakāranirīkṣitaṃ sāhasamātreṇābhyupagamyeta, na caitadyuktam | ato yatra vidhimantrayordevatāsaṃvādastatra pragātho nīyeta | asmatpakṣe punaḥ—

lg.l: yāṃ kāṃ cidapyupādāya devatāṃ sādhitā stutiḥ |

div.p: yadi cā ' 'dimānanādirvā guṇaḥ kevalamindrastutyarthamevopādīyate na devatātve 'ntarbhavati, tato 'syopādānamevānarthakaṃ syāt | sarvā hi devataivamarthamabhidhīyate vidhīyate vā, kathaṃ nāma taduddeśena karma kriyeteti |
yadi cāvihite vihite ca guṇe kevalenendreṇa vyavahiyate tato nārtho guṇābhidhānena | kiṃ ca—

na hi grahasaṃbandha indrasya prāpto yena tadratendrānuvādena mahattvaṃ kevalameva stutyarthamucyeta | na ca mahānindraḥ prāpto yato guṇenopalakṣya vidhīyeta | tasmādaprāptavidherdevatāntaratā || 18 ||
pūrvavanmantravyapadeśabhedavyavasthā || 19 ||

vaśādidravyāṇāmartharūpopakāritvātpratyakṣalabhye viśeṣe sāmānyenāpi siddherna vidhi
śabdādaraḥ || 20 ||
balavatpramāṇavirodhe saṃskārapakṣastyajyeta, na ca so 'sti, liṅgabalīyastvādutkarṣasiddherityaparyudāsaḥ saṃskārapakṣasya |

anutkṛṣyamāṇa eva vā pragāthaḥ sannidhivaśādavayavadvāreṇa mahendramavirodhāya dṛṣṭārthatvāya ca prakāśayiṣyati, yathā 'gnīṣomīye manotāyāmagniśabdaḥ prakaraṇātsamāsasthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ sāhacaryātsomamapi pratipādayansamudāyārtho vijñāyate | ataścānutkarṣe 'pyadoṣa iti || 21 ||

na hi yamādīnāṃ grahāntareṣvapi devatātvaṃ yenendravadutkṛṣṭairmantraiḥ prakāśyeran | atasteṣāṃ tāvadvidhyānarthakyaprasaṅgādavaśyamadṛṣṭārthatvena bhavitavyam | tataśca tatsāmānyāditareṣu tathātvaṃ, tasmānna saṃskārakarmatvamiti || 22 ||
maṇḍūkasūktasyāgnau prayogaḥ, tatra maṇḍūkenāgnivikarṣaṇāmnānāt | akṣasūktasya rājasūye, tatra ‘akṣairddīvyati’ iti vidhānāt |

mūṣikāsūktasyaikādaśinyām, ‘ākhuste paśuḥ’ | ityupaśayasaṃbandhasaṃkīrtane sati taddvāreṇopaśayasyaiva stutiḥ | kuṣumbhakasūktādīnāṃ tu yadi kva cidviśeṣarūpeṇārtho nāsti tataḥ sāmānyavidhānenārthavattā bhaviṣyati |
vācaḥ stome sarvamantropadeśāt | tathā ' 'śvine sūryodayāvadhi samāptyasaṃbhave sarvāsāmṛcāmupadeśāt |
tatra vacanenaivā ' 'samavetārthamantravidhānasāmarthyādagateradṛṣṭārthāśrayaṇaṃ, na ca kvacidadṛṣṭārthatvena sarvatraiva dṛśyamānamapyarthaṃ projhjhyādṛṣṭārthatvakalpanā yujyate | tathā hi—
yaduktaṃ manotāyāmivāgniśabda indraśabdaḥ samāsārthaṃ lakṣayiṣyatīti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ | etasmādeva doṣāt | na hīndraśabdasya svārthamabhidadhataḥ kaścidvirodho yena śrutivṛttiṃ jahyāt |
sarvādṛṣṭārthānāṃ ca yathākathaṃ cillakṣaṇayā dṛṣṭārthatvāpādanasaṃbhavādayuktametat | yattūktamutkṛṣyatāmeveti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—

yadi hyekāntena prathamaṃ dṛṣṭārthatvamavadhāritaṃ syāt tataḥ kramasaṃnidhikalpyā śrutirbādhyeta, yatastu viniyogottarakālā prayojanakalpanā na tadvaśenaiva viniyogastena kramasaṃnidhibhyāṃ viniyukte dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na virudhyate | na cotkṛṣṭasya pragāthasyānyatra viniyogaheturasti |

liṅgaṃ hi devatāṃ prakāśayituṃ sāmarthyena tanmantraṃ svarūpe viniyuñjīta, tathā cātvā
narthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | karmasaṃbandhe tu na kaścidasya vyāpāraḥ | tadetalliṅgaṃ yadi sāmānyataḥ kena citkarmasaṃbandhaḥ | kriyate, tataḥ kathaṃ tasyopakariṣyatītyapekṣite yathā śaknotītyevamāśrayaṇāddevatāprakāśanadvāreṇeti viniyuṅkte |
na cātra sāmānyasaṃbandhakāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tasmādutkṛṣṭānāmānarthakyameva syādityadṛṣṭārthataiva nyāyyā | kiṃca—

lg.l: evaṃ ca saptamī ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyā stautiśaṃsatī |

div.p: guṇaguṇyabhidhānakriyāṇāmakṣarārūḍhatvātsaptamīśrutisaṃyogo ghaṭate | prakāśane hetukaraṇatvāttṛtīyāyuktāḥ kavatyādayaḥ śrūyeran | nanu stutāvapi kavatīnāṃ karaṇatvāttṛtīyaiva prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ—
prakāśanaṃ punaḥ paramārthatastāvadātmādhāram | karmatvapratipattyuttarakālaṃ ca vyāpyatvāddevatādhāram | tatra kavatīnāmaikāntikameva karaṇatvamiti vaiṣamyam |

api ca stauti śaṃsatīti stutibhāvanā pūrvāparībhūtā śrūyate | tasyāṃ ca dhātvarthaḥ karaṇabhūtaḥ śeṣāṇi ca kārakāṇi nityaṃ dhātvarthaṃ niṣpādayanti saṃbadhyante | tatra yadi mantrāḥ stotranirvṛttyarthā bhavanti tato 'pekṣitārthakaraṇācchāstradṛṣṭamarthaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭārthā bhavanti | prakāśanaṃ tu kurvanto 'coditakaraṇādadṛṣṭārthā bhaveyuḥ | tataśca varaṃ stutīnāmevā 'dṛṣṭārthatvam | kiṃ ca |
śrutyaiva ṣaṣṭhī pārārthyaṃ devatānāṃ bravīti naḥ |
na pradhānaṃ guṇāśceṣṭāḥ stutestena pradhānatā ||
devatāprādhānye hi prātipadikārthaparatvādavyatiriktārthaviṣayā ‘agnirmūrdhā’ ivatprathamaivaśrūyeta |
yadapi kiṃ citprathamāntaṃ tadapi yogyatāpūrvakaikavākyatvavaśena guṇasaṃbandhārthameva | yathā, indro yāto—jaṅgamasya, avasitasya—sthāvarasya ca rājeti |

na ca guṇānāmupayogo 'stīti tatprādhānyānāśrayaṇe stutyarthataiva yuktā | satyamiti granthacchedaḥ | tatrārthavādanyāyena śeṣapadānarthakyaprasaṅgātsatyapi pūrvatra prādhānyaparyavasānasaṃbhave stutyarthenaivaikavākyatā yuktā |
na caivaṃ stautiśaṃsatyoḥ prakāśanalakṣaṇārthatā bhaviṣyatīti stutereva prādhānyam || 24 ||
pṛthaktvaniveśinī dvidvādaśasaṃkhyā na prakāśanābhede sati śabdenocyate | sāmānyāvivakṣāyāṃ vā pratyṛcaṃ pratipadaṃ ca tannirvṛtterna dvādaśatve 'vatiṣṭhate | nanu ca stutāvapi tulyametat | tathā hi—

lg.l: na cānyathā vivakṣā 'sti yato dvādaśatā bhavet ||

div.p: atha stomavaśādṛksamudāyasādhyāḥ stutayo gaṇyante tathā prakāśanānyapītyaviśeṣaḥ | ucyate—

prakāśanārthatve hi pratyṛcaṃ pratipadaṃ ca tannirvṛttidarśanātkriyāsamāpterna kiṃ citkāraṇamasti, yena dvādaśatvaṃ paricchidyeta | apūrvārthatve tu teṣāṃ śāstragamyatvādyathoktastomasaṃpadaḥ prāṅnirvṛttipramāṇābhāvādṛksamudāyenāpūrvanirvṛttestaddvāreṇa kriyāsamāptyupalakṣaṇādapūrvāṇāṃ dvādaśatvena mtutidvādaśatvasiddhiḥ | na hi pratyṛcaṃ sarvastotrebhyo vā tatkalpanāyāḥ
kiṃ citpramāṇamasti yathā prakāśanasya darśanam || 25 ||
ṛcāmanūhyatvādāgneyagrahacodanayaivā ' 'gneyīnāṃ stutisādhanatvasiddheḥ ‘āgneyīṣu stuvate’ ityanarthakaṃ vacanam || 26 ||

sabandhasya bhedanibandhanatvātsaṃbandhavacanena stotraśastrayorbhedaḥ | sa ca prakāśanaikatvānna prāpnoti | nanu stutyekatvāditaratrāpi tulyametat | atha pragītāpragītamantrasādhanatvena bhedaḥ, tadvyaktidvāreṇa vā, sa pūrvapakṣe 'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ | tatrottaraṃ dvādaśatvavat | atyantabhedāddhi stotraśastrāpūrvayostaddvāreṇa kriyayorbhedamupacarya saṃbandhavacanam | na tu prakāśanaṃ svataḥ phalato vā bhidyate || 27 ||

yadidaṃ dvitīyāpratipāditakarmārhamabhidhānamidaṃ cāparaṃ prādhānye kāraṇam | pradhānakriyā hi kena cidrūpeṇepsitā ‘agnihotraṃ juhoti’ ‘ādhāramādhārayati’ itivadbhavati na saṃskārakriyā 'tyantaguṇabhūtatvāt |
atha vā stotraśastrasamākhyayorabhidhānatvaṃ tatprādhānyajñāpanārtham | itarathā hi prakāśanamityevaṃ samākhyā syāt | avahantyādivadvā naiva bhavet || 28 ||
yo 'yaṃ mantre phalāśīrarthavādaḥ sa stuteḥ pradhānatve ghaṭate sarvatra pradhānaviṣayatvātprārthanānām | tvatpakṣe tu—

iha mantrā udāharaṇam | kiṃ tadgatā bhāvanāvacanā brāhmaṇavadvidadhati neti saṃdehe śabdābhedādvidhāyakā ityāśaṅkya mantratvātprāptārthatvācca vidhitvāsaṃbhavena prayogakāleṣu brāhmaṇavihitānāmevārthānāṃ smārakā ityuttarapakṣaṃ uktaḥ | tathā hi—

lg.l: na copātto guṇaḥ kaścinna ca vākyāntare stutiḥ ||

div.p: smārakatvapratipakṣau hi vidhyarthavādau syātāṃ, tadiha svarūpaṃ tāvadanyataḥ kriyāyāḥ prāptaṃ guṇaphalanimittāni tu naivopāttāni yāni vidhīyeran |

na ca vākyāntarasthe paryavasitaprayojane vidhau stutirupapadyate | taduktaṃ prathanamantre | tasmātprakāśakā mantrā iti yadvyākhyāyate tatra vadāmaḥ | kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mantratvenā ' 'khyātaviśeṣāṇāṃ vidhiśaktistirodhīyate kathaṃ ca brāhmaṇatvenāsāvavirbhāvyate | dṛṣṭāśca mantragatā api vidhāyatā ‘vasantāya kapiñjalānālabhate’ ityādayaḥ |
tathā brāhmaṇagatā apyavidhāyakā yathā ‘yasyobhayaṃ havirārtimārchete’ ityādayaḥ | tasmānnāyamekāntaḥ | kiṃ ca—
na hyatra viśeṣaheturasti kiṃ brāhmaṇavihitamāsādyopahatavidhiśaktirmantraḥ smārako bhavatyatha vā viparyaya iti |

tatrobhayoranuvādatvāsaṃbhavādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvācca dvayorapi vidhāyakatvam | abhyāsācca karmabhedaḥ syāt | balavatpratyabhijñāyāścābhyāsādhikaraṇa evottaraṃ bhaviṣyati(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 2) atreti śeṣaḥ | | tasmānnaivamabhidhāyakatvasiddhiḥ | ye 'pyāhuḥ—
tairapi sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātraṃ vyapadiṣṭam | kutaḥ—
na hi viniyuktena na vidhātavyamiti kiṃ citpramāṇaṃ yadi svato vidhiśaktirastyeva | atha tvasau prathamameva nāsti vyartho viniyogopanyāsaḥ | na cobhayakaraṇe virodhaḥ | tathā hi—

lg.l: ‘mantratastu virodhe syāt’(a. 5 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 16) | ityatraitadvadiṣyate ||

div.p: ye ca vacanenānaviniyuktāste ca tvatpakṣe nirākaraṇahetvabhāvādvidhāyakāḥ prāpnuvantītyetadapyakāraṇam | na cātra mantropanyāsasya kaścisaṃbandha ityanyathā varṇyate | vividhamevā ' 'khyātaṃ guṇapradhānakarmatvenoktam |
athedānīṃ prastūyate kiṃ tāveva dvau prakārāvutānyo 'pyastīti | tatra na tṛtīyaḥ prakāro 'stīti matvā pūrvapakṣavādī vadatyaikārthyamiti | tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate || 30 ||
asti tṛtīyaḥ prakāro yadabhidhāyakatvaṃ nāma | paśya—

mantragatānāṃ brāhmaṇagatānāṃ cā ' 'khyātaśabdānāṃ yeṣāṃ śabdāntareṇa vidhiśaktirapagacchati teṣāmabhidhāyakatvam | tatra ‘na tā naśanti’ ityatra tāvadyacchabdopahito vidhāyako 'nuvādatvaṃ prārthayate | tathā ‘ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya’ ityāmantraṇavibhaktyā | dāmi gṛhṇāmītyuttamapuruṣeṇa | ‘yadi somamapahareyuḥ’ iti yadiśabdena | te caivamādayaḥ prāyeṇa mantreṣviti mantrā udāharaṇam | avidhāyakā mantrā iti ca prasiddhiḥ |

brāhmaṇe tu bhūyāṃsaḥ pratyayā vidhāyakāstena tadvidhāyakamiti prasiddham | alpe tvavividhāyakā iti tadahi nodāharaṇam | vidhāyakatvāvidhāyakatve tu tayoryathoktameva kāraṇamiti na mantratvabrāhmaṇatvayorvyāpāraḥ |

tatra tvetāvānvyāpāro dṛśyate | rūpādeva brāhmaṇagatānāṃ vidhitvanivṛttau satyāṃ nimittādipratyāyanārthatā | na hi teṣāṃ rūpaṃ karmasu prayogārham | mantragatānāṃ tu rūpamevopalabhya dāmi gṛhṇāmi nirvapāmīdāmidaṃ ca karomyagnīnvihara varhiḥ stṛṇīhi idamidaṃ ca kurvityādikaṃ śakyametaiḥ karma smartumiti viniyogabuddhirbhavati | kutaḥ—

na tāvadanuṣṭhānavelāyāmasmṛtaḥ kaścitpadārthaḥ śakyaḥ kartumityavaśyaṃbhāvinyā smṛtyā yogyasādhanamātrāpekṣaṇādyatkiṃcid brāhmaṇapadārthānusaṃdhānaṃ vā pūrvapadārthapratyavekṣaṇaṃ vā sūtragrantho vā ' 'tmīyagrahaṇavākyāni vopadraṣṭādi vā sādhanaṃ grahītumārabhyate |

tatrānanyaprayojanānmantrānprakaraṇe paṭhyamānānsāmānyena kimapyebhiḥ kartavyamityevaṃ prayogavacanena gṛhyamāṇānupalabhya yādṛśena vākyena smṛtiḥ kartumākāṅkṣyate tadrūpā eta iti viditvā liṅgaprakaraṇānumitayā śrutyā viniyoge satyabhidhānārthatā vijñāyate |
tataścopāyāntarāṇyapramāṇakatvānnivartante | niyamādṛṣṭasiddhiśca mantraireva smṛtvā kṛtaṃ karmābhyudayakāri bhavatītyavadhāryate | bhāṣyamapyatraiva yojanīyam |

nāsakṛdapyuccāraṇe tatpratyayāditi na prāptatvābhiprāyeṇocyate | kiṃ tu yacchabdopa
bandhādasyaiva mantrākhyātasyānyataḥ prāptamahaṃ bravīmītyevaṃrūpapratyayāt | śatakṛtvo 'pi hyevamādiruccāryamāṇaḥ svasāmarthyenaiva nāpūrvapratyayaṃ karoti tata eva pūrvaprāptabuddhyutpādāt || 31 ||

yathoktena nyāyena mantrodāharaṇasyātantratvātprāsaṅgikāmidaṃ pūrvasūtraprayuktamantraśabdārthalakṣaṇābhidhānamiti nāvaśyamidamarthato 'dhikaraṇaṃ pūrvam | śakyaṃ hi vākyamātramapyudāhṛtya vicārayitum |

bhāṣyakārastu sūtrakāroccāritamantraśabdādareṇa paurvāparyaviśeṣamāha | taccodakeṣviti | tat—abhidhānaṃ codakaṃ prayojakaṃ yeṣāmiti bahuvrīhiḥ | arthadarśanamātrārthaṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīkathanaṃ bhāṣye | adhyetṛvṛddhavyavahārāsiddhaṃ cedaṃ prāyikācihnayuktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lāghavārthamuktam |
dharaṇigatānekadravyapratyekanirīkṣaṇe punaḥ punaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kuṭilīkriyata iti tatsāmānyena pṛṣṭhākoṭābhidhānam | ślekaścaivaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ—

lg.l: ṛṣayo 'pi hi lakṣyāṇāṃ nāntaṃ yānti pṛthaktvaśaḥ |
sāmarthyaṃ ceti mantrāṇāṃ vistaraḥ prāyiko mataḥ ||

div.p:
ḍuleriveti | ḍuliḥ—kacchapaḥ | pratipunātuśabdamacchidreṇa pavitreṇetyanuṣaṅgaḥ |
sāmarthyaṃ—abhidhānaśaktiḥ | ye māṃ dugdhavantasta eva nirākṛtavanta iti dhenvāḥ paridevitam | amutaḥ somamāhara iti sauparṇopākhyāne vinatayā garutmānamṛtārthaṃ preṣitaḥ | karṇavantīṃ sūrmim | sūrmiḥ—sthūṇā || 32 ||
pariśeṣasiddhatvādbrāhmaṇalakṣaṇamavacanīyamiti | sūtramidamanārabhyamiti pratibhāti | tatra śeṣaśabdaprayogāllakṣaṇānabhidhānācca sūtravyākhyānamevedamiti draṣṭavyam |

kimarthaṃ punaḥ sūtramārabhyate | nā ' 'rabhyeta, yadi mantrabrāhmaṇātmaka eva veda iti sarveṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ bhavet | yeṣāṃ tvaprasiddhaṃ teṣāṃ tṛtīyādiprakāranirākaraṇārthaṃ dvairāśyameva vedasyeti pratipādayitumāha—śeṣe brāhmaṇaśabda iti | ekapuruṣakartṛkamupākhyānaṃ parakṛtiḥ | bahukartṛkaṃ purākalpaḥ | yātrānyathā 'rthaḥ pratibhātaḥ paurvāparyālocanena vyavadhāryānyathā kalpyate sā vyavadhāraṇakalpanā tadyathā pratigṛhṇīyāditi śrutaṃ pratigrāhayediti
kalpayiṣyate | vidhilakṣaṇamityatra brāhmaṇavācī vidhiśabdaḥ || 33 ||

sūryāya juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi, ityūhaḥ | tathā yatra yajamānasyā ' 'rṣeyaṃ vriyate sa pravaraḥ | yacca yajamānatatputrādīnāṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ, yathā subrahmaṇyāyāṃ devadatto yajata ityādi | teṣāmapi ‘taccodakeṣu’ ityasmāllakṣaṇānmantramadhyapātācca mantratvaprāptāvucyate—

lg.l: te mantrā nābhidhānaṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sthitam ||

div.p: kiṃ punarekasminpada ūhyamāne samastasyaivāmantratvaṃ, ūhitapadamātrasyaiva veti | samastasyaiveti prāptam | kutaḥ—
saṃpradāyakālāvagatarūpānyatvaṃ cetkenacidapyaṃśena jātaṃ na śakyate mantratvaṃ pratyabhijñātum |

athaikadeśe 'pi tatsadbhāvābhyupagamaḥ | tataḥ sarvatraiva mantrapadāviśeṣānmantratvaprasaṅga | tasmādekavarṇāpāye 'pi mantratvābhāvātsamastatatkāryanivṛttiḥ | tataśca yathaiva tadvināśe sarvāvayavavartini prāyaścittābhāvaṃ evaṃ mantracchandoviṣayatvena yāvantaḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ smaryante tairna bhavitavyamityekapadatadavayavohe tanmantragatasarvacchāndasopoddhāreṇa laukikaśabdaprayogaḥ kartavya iti | atra brūmaḥ | tāvanmātramevāmantra iti | kutaḥ |

na hi gorgaḍuni jāte viṣāṇe vā bhagne gotvaṃ tirodhīyate,tadabhivyaktisamarthāvayavāntarasadbhāvāt | kiyatyapi saṃsthāne dhriyamāṇe sarvā vijñāyante | sā ceyaṃ mantrākutirviśiṣṭasvaravarṇānupūrvyādyābhivyaktā na kiṃcidvikāradarśane naśyatīti pratyakṣamupalabhāmahe | tathā hi—

lg.l: yatra varṇavikāro vā varṇalopo 'pi vā smṛtaḥ |

div.p: yatra vacanādvarṇalopaṃ vikāraṃ vā kṛtvā prayogaḥ, ‘airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam’ ityādau, yatra ca svādhyāyakāladṛṣṭatraisvaryādiparityāgenaikaśrutyaṃ niyujyate na tatra kasyacinmantrabuddhirapaiti | syādetat, vacanasāmarthyādiha nāpaitīti |
tadayuktam | vacanena hi prayoktavyametaducyate na mantratvaṃ na naśyatīti | na hi vacanaviniyuktānāṃ vrīhyādināṃ mantratvaṃ bhavati, ataścāmantrāṇāmeva satāṃ vacanādviniyoga ityāpadyate |
na cārhati bhavitumamantratvaṃ, mantratvapratyabhijñānāt | ataścātrāpi kāmamirāpadādīnāmevāmantratvaṃ bhavatu na sakalasya vākyasya |

na ca teṣāmapi samastavedālocanena mantratvanirūpaṇādiha girāpadavānmantra iherāpadavāniha traisvaryavānihaikaśrutimāniti hyādita evāvadhāryate | yadyevamūhādīnāmapi mantra tvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatrāpi hi prakṛtivikṛtyālocanena śakyamevaṃ nirūpayitum | ihāgnipadavānnirvāpamantra iha sūryādipadavāniti | naitatsamānam | kutaḥ—

lg.l: nyāyena kalpyamāne tu na śakyaṃ tannirūpaṇam ||

div.p: vaidikaṃ hyālocyaivamavadhāraṇā bhavati, ihedṛśo mantra ihedṛśa iti | sūryādipadaprayogastu kāryavaśena nyāyātkalpyate, na ca mantratvaṃ nyāyagamyamiti vaiṣamyam |
nanu cātideśo 'pi vedaprakāra eveti sarvamūhādikaṃ vaidikam, itarathā hyapramāṇakameva syāt | na hyaṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ pratyakṣānumānādigamyaḥ | tasmātsūryerāpadayoraviśeṣa iti | atrocyate |

satyamūhasyāpi nāvaidikatvam | ata eva ‘anāmnāteṣvamantratvam’ ityucyate | vedabhāgo hi kaścitpratyakṣaḥ śrūyate, kaścidanumānādigamyaḥ | pratyakṣaśrutaścā ' 'mnāta ityucyate | tatra yatherāpadādīnāṃ viniyogaḥ śrūyate naivaṃ sūryapadādīnām |

nanu ‘sauryaṃ caruma’ ityetadeva śrutisamavāyitvāddevatāyāḥ sūryapadasya viniyojakaṃ śrūyate | naitanmantre sūryapadasya prakṣepaṃ bravīti | haviṣastyāgadakālamātre taduccākaṇābhidhānāt | yastuṃ mantreṣu tatprakṣepaḥ so 'tideśakṛto bhaviṣyati | na cātideśavacanaṃ nyāyalabhyatvādevā ' 'mnāyate | tasmādanāmnātaviniyojakatvādamantratvaṃ sūryapadādīnām |

nanvevaṃ sati pravaranāmadheyayoḥ pratyakṣopadeśānmantratvaprasaṅgaḥ | syādeva yadi tatsvarūpamāmnāyeta, vacanārthaṃ, tu jñātvā 'nāmnātayoreva pravaranāmnoḥ prayogānna mantratvanirūpaṇāyāmantargatiḥ | evaṃ tarhi yatrāpi sarvanāmayuktamantrāmnāne sati tasya sthāne 'nyapadaprakṣepaḥ kriyate tatrāpyamantratā syāt | tathā nāmeti kecit |

atha vā viśeṣāṇāmānantyādayugapatkālatvāccā ' 'mnātumaśakteḥ svarūpasya sarvanāmaprakāreṇā ' 'mnānamastyevetyaśūnyasthānatvānmantrasya śakyamevaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ kartuṃ yadatra padaṃ nivekṣyate tadvānayaṃ mantra iti | itarayā hi sarvanāmnāmaprayogārhatvādyadi viśeṣāmnānamevaitattenopāyeneti na gṛhyate, tatastadaṃśanyūnatvānmantrasvarūpasya vyarthameva sarvanāmāmnānaṃ syāt | pravaranāmadheyavadeva tu vidhānāttadavakāśasthapadaprayogaḥ kalpyate | tasmādevamādī nyāmnātānyeveti mantradharmaiḥ saṃbadhyeran | na tu pravarādīnāṃ mantrapāṭhakāle kaścidapi saṃsparśaḥ |

na ca brāhmaṇena rūpaṃ darśitaṃ yena pravacanalakṣaṇatvānmantratvādhyavasānaṃ bhavet | ataśca vikṛtiṣvabhidhānārṣacodakābhyāṃ sakale mantre prāpite yāvanmātramarthābhāvādvyāvartyānyatprakṣipyate tāvanmātrameva laukikam | avaśiṣṭaṃ tu tathā prāptameva kratvākāṅkṣitapratyabhijñāyamānamantratvaṃ ceti na prāyaścittacchāndasaprayogairvarjanīyamiti siddham || 34 ||

prasaktānuprasaktyāpatitamṛgādilakṣaṇābhidhānam | śabdārthasya vṛddhavyavahāragamyatvātkṛte 'pi tallakṣaṇe tanmūlamabhiyuktopadeśameva darśayati | kriyāpadānupādānāt ‘agniḥ pūrvebhiḥ’ ityaparyavasite 'rthe vṛttavaśena pādavyavasthā | nanu ca ‘agnimīḷe’ ityapi samastāyā ṛca evārthavattvānnaiva pratipādamarthaḥ paryavasyatīti na vācyam ‘arthavaśena pādavyavasthā’ iti |

kathaṃ na vācyam ‘agnimīḷe purohitam’ iti tāvatpratyakṣaṃ samāpto 'rtho dṛśyate | parayoḥ pādayorasamāpta iti cenna | ākhyātānuṣaṅgeṇa samāpteḥ siddhatvāt | tasmātsādhūktamihārthavaśeneti | etasya tu pradarśanārthatvānna vṛttavaśavyāvṛttirityaniṣiddhamṛktvam || 35 ||

teṣāmityanuvartate | atrāpi sa evābhiyuktopadeśopanyāsaḥ | prāthamyāt, yathā 'mlaṃ dadhīti | pūrvatraiva vācyaṃ sadanādarādihodāhṛtam | atha vā yathā 'nekadharmasamāhāre sati dadhiguḍavo rasaviśeṣamātramamlamadhuraśabdāvupādadāte | tathā sāmaśabdo gītimātramityatrodāharaṇam |
nanu ca pratyakṣagamyatvādrasaviśeṣasyābhiyuktopadeśo 'nuvādatvānnaiva pramāṇam |

naiṣa doṣaḥ | pratyakṣamevātra itikaraṇāvacchinnaṃ nidarśanam | etaduktaṃ bhavati | yathā 'mlaṃ dadhi madhuro guḍa ityetadvijñānaṃ pramāṇamevamabhiyuktopadeśa iti | gīterviṃśeṣaṇatvātpūrvatarapratyāyane satyākṛtivadabhidheyatvaṃ nirṇetavyam | āha ca—
śeṣe brāhmaṇaśabda itivatsamastaṃ vyākhyeyam || 37 ||

śeṣe yajuḥśabda ityetavdyāvartanārtho vāśabdaḥ | caturthaṃ mantrajātaṃ nigadaḥ syāt | dharmānyatvāt | yadi tāvat ‘uccairnigadena’ iti vidhistato yajurdharmabādho mā bhūdityarthāntaratvam | athānuvādaḥ sa naiva prāpnoti vyatirekeṇa vineti bhedaḥ
vyapadeśāca iti sūtrasya bhāvyaṃ spaṣṭhatvānna vyākhyātam | || 38 || 39 ||

‘ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya’ iti triṣveva mantratvasyopasaṃhārāt | vede ca mantrasāmānādhikaraṇyena nigadaśabdaprayogādyajuṣṭvāparityāgenaiva ca dharmaviśeṣavyapadeśabhedasiddheḥ pariśeṣasiddhayajurlakṣaṇayogācca yajūṃṣyeva nigadāḥ || 40 ||
nyāyaprāptoccairdharmānuvādatvajñānānna vidhānāditi vyākhyātam | yaṃ tvete 'rthaṃ vadanti tamupāṃśutvena śaknuyurvaktumiti vacanādityucyate || 41 ||

asti ca ‘agnīdagnīnvihara’ ityādivacanenārtho 'nyathā 'nuṣṭhānānupapatteriti dharmaviśeṣaprāptiḥ | tathā ca nigadaśabdāvayavavyutpattisiddhiḥ | vācanikamapi caupāṃśutvamanupakāratvenānaṅgatvānnigadavyatiriktayajurviṣayaṃ vijñāyate || 42 ||
brāhmaṇaparivrājakavadguṇena vyapadeśabhedaḥ || 43 ||
atiprasaṅgadvāreṇa guṇasya vyapadeśanimittatāṃ vyabhicārayati || 44 ||

na tāvadatiprasaṅgo 'sti nigadaṃ ninditvā ṛco vidhānāt | na hi tameva ninditvā tasyaiva vidhiravakalpate | na ca vyabhicāritvam | gadativaśena yajuṣṭve sati dharmaviśeṣasya vyapadeśabhedanimittatvāt || 45 ||
kecidetatsūtraṃ vākyalakṣaṇaparatvena vyācakṣate | tatrāpi kila laukikavaidikavākyalakṣaṇasaṃbhave hetuprasiddhivaśena laukikānāmevaitallakṣaṇam | kutaḥ—

laukikānāṃ hi vākyānāṃ pramāṇāntareṇārthastadekatvaṃ cāvadhāryate | tatra prasiddhena hetunā śakyamekavākyatvamavagantum | vaidikānāṃ punarananyapramāṇagamyatvātprāgvākyāttadekatvājñānādajñāte 'rthe tadekatvasiddhirnāstītyetallakṣaṇānupapatterarthāpattyā viparītaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam |
vākyaikatvādarthaikatvamiti | yathaiva hi dharmiṇā vākyena dharmyantaramarthaḥ pratipādyate tathaikavākyadharmeṇaikatvenārthaikatvam | āha ca—

atrābhidhīyate | vedavyākhyānapravṛttasya jaimineḥ kaḥ prasaṅgo laukikavākyalakṣaṇābhidhāne | vaidikavākyalakṣaṇasyāpi bhedalakṣaṇe
dvitīyādhyāya ithyarthaḥ | kaḥ prastāvaḥ | kimarthaṃ
prathamādhyāya evetyarthaḥ |pramāṇalakṣaṇa eva noktam | ekaśabdaśca na vaktavyaḥ, arthaikatvādvākyamityetāvataiva siddhatvāt | kathaṃ ca
mantrādhikāre tadasaṃbaddho 'rtho 'bhidhīyate | bhāṣyakṛtaśca praśliṣṭapaṭhiteṣu yajuḥṣvityupanyāsaḥ pramāṇavānapi vinā kāraṇenātikrāntaḥ | kiṃ ca—
ṛksāmayostāvatparimāṇaṃ prayogasamarthaṃ prasiddhamiti na kaścidvākyalakṣaṇādekavākyatālakṣaṇādvopakāro bhavati |

tathā brāhmaṇe 'gnihotrādivākyaiḥ sādhyasādhanetikartavyatāvatyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ niyukteṣu puruṣeṣvekānekavākyajñānaṃ kvopayujyate | nanvayamupayoga ekavākyatālakṣaṇajño vākyabhedaṃ parihariṣyati | nāyamupayogaḥ | kutaḥ—

padatadekadeśatatsamūhāvṛttiprasaṅgātmakastadvibhāgalakṣaṇo vā vākyaikatvanānātvajñānanirapekṣaireva doṣatvenāvadhāryate | vibhāgalakṣaṇe gamyamānasaṃbandhaparityāgo 'nekādṛṣṭakalpanā ca doṣaḥ | itaratrā ' 'vṛtteravedatvādaprāmāṇyamiti naikavākyalakṣaṇenārthaḥ | pauruṣeyavākye tu lakṣaṇanirapekṣasya lokasya vyavahārasiddheratyantānaupayikatvam |

yadi cārthaikatvena vākyaikatvamavadhāryate vākyasyārthapratyāyanārthatvāttatsvarūpaikatvajñānottarakālabhāvinā kiṃ vākyaikatvajñānena | vaktṝṇāṃ ca parapratyāyanārtho vākyaprayoga iti nā ' 'tmārthaṃ lakṣaṇajñānāpekṣā | śrotṝṇāṃ punaratyantānavagate 'rthe pravartamānaṃ puruṣavākyamapi na vedavākyādbhidyate | avagatārthaṃ tvanuvādatvādanādṛtyameveti naikānekajñānamapekṣyate |

kimarthaṃ na vaidikānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ noktam | yadi tvarthāpattyoktameveti | tanna | śrutyā tallakṣaṇamabhidhāyārthāpattyā laukikavākyasiddhirāśrayitavyā | na cārthāpattiḥ saṃbhavati | na hyetallaukikavākyalakṣaṇajñānamīdṛśena vaidikavākyalakṣaṇajñānena vinā nopapadyate |

na caitasyāpi vākyalakṣaṇatā siddhā, vākyaikatvavaśenārthaikatvalakṣaṇārthāpattyupanyāsāt | api ca kadācidvaidikavākyānāmapyetallakṣaṇam | atyantaviprakṛṣṭaṃ vā kiṃcidbhavedityāśaṅkitatvānna niyogato 'rthāpattiḥ | na ca parisaṃkhyā, sāmānyaviśeṣabhedānupādānāt |

yahi hi sāmānyenedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kvacidabhidhāya punaḥ kevalapauruṣeyasaṃbaddhamucyeta tataḥ parisaṃkhyāvaśena vaidikānāmidaṃ tāvanna bhavatītyetāvanmātraṃ gamyeta | na tu lakṣaṇaviśeṣo 'nekopaplavāt | evamapi hi viparyayakalpanaṃ saṃbhavati, arthānekatvādekaṃ vākyaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ cedvibhāge syāditi |
atha vā 'rthaikatvānnānāvākyatvamiti | tasmādakalpaneyam | kiṃ ca—
vākyaikatvāccārthaikatve 'vadhāryamāṇe 'vaśyamarthanirapekṣaṃ vākyaikatvamavagantavyam | na ca tasyāvadhitvena kiṃcitpaśyāmo varṇaśataṃ varṇasahastraṃ vā | tathā hi—
lokamantrabrāhmaṇeṣvavyabhicāryetadeva vākyalakṣaṇamiti sthitam | yattu na prāgvākyādarthatadekatvāvadhāraṇamastīti | atra brūmaḥ—
yadi hi vākyaṃ padavadvācakaṃ bhavettatastadekatvānekatvānuvartitā vākyārthasyābhyupagamyeta kadācit |

yadā tu pṛthagbhūtaireva padairitaretaranirapekṣaiḥ sveṣu padārtheṣūkteṣu tatsaṃsargādeva padavyāpārānapekṣo vākyārthapratyayo bhavati, tadvaśena ca tāvanti padānyekaṃ vākyamityavadhāryate, na tadā vākyatadekatvayorvyāpāraṃ paśyāmaḥ | tasmādavirodhaḥ |

yasminpadasamūhe śabdāntarādibhirna bhāvanāntaraṃ pratipādyate tasyaikavākyatvaṃ bhāvanāntarāpekṣayā tu nānātvam | taccaitadubhayamapyanyata eva jñāyata ityanimittaṃ vākyaikatvamarthaikatvasya | tasmādyathābhāṣyameva vyākhyātavyam |

bhedalakṣaṇe mantraprastāve ca tadbhedastāvadṛgyajuḥsāmātmako 'bhihitaḥ | tadavāntarabhedākāṅkṣāyāmṛksāmānāmadhyetṛsiddhe bhede lakṣaṇaṃ na kriyate | yajuṣāṃ tu praśliṣṭapaṭhitatvānna lakṣaṇādvinā bhedajñānamityāramyate |

nanu bhinnapratīkaviniyogāttadbhedaḥ setsyatīti | na tāvatsarveṣāmeva brāhmaṇe viniyogo 'sti | na ca ‘uttarādiḥ pūrvāntalakṣaṇam’ ityetadvedavacanam | nyāyena tu sūtrakārairevā ' 'tmīyabrāhmaṇaviniyogeṣvetaduktamiti nyāyasya lakṣaṇamucyate |

tatrāvayavavyutpattibalenā ' 'ha—yāvatejyata iti | sarvamantrāṇāmanena yajeteti hi prathamaṃ prakaraṇāmnānānumitavākyaviniyogo bhavati | tataḥ sākṣādyāgasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavāttadupakāriprakāśanena tairiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate | tenocyate—

vacanārhaṃ hi vākyaṃ kārye samarthaṃ ca tadarhaṃ bhavati na nyūnamadhikaṃ vā, tāvataiva cejyate | tattu kīdṛśamityekārthaṃ sākāṅkṣāvayavaṃ ceti lakṣaṇam | īdṛśaṃ cedekaṃ yajuryattato 'dhikaṃ tadvākyāntaraṃ yajurantaraṃ cetyuktaṃ bhavati |

evaṃ sarvatra purastātparastādvaikārthatvasamarthapadaparigrahaṇādasamarthapadavimokena ca bhinnāni yajūṃṣi kalpyante | tenaikavākyalakṣaṇoktau cārthādyajurbhedavākyabhedalakṣaṇayoḥ siddhiriti, etasmāccetkāraṇādityāha | kimudāharaṇamiti | abhidheyavācinamarthaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā lakṣaṇadvayasamāveśāsaṃbhāvanayā pṛcchati | tathā hi—

padasya hyākṛtirnāmaiko 'rtho bhavenna tu tadavayavānāṃ varṇānāṃ prakṛtipratyayayorvā vibhāge sākāṅkṣatvam, arthapratyāyanaśaktyabhāvāt, samūhāvayavāstu padāvi vibhāge parasparamākāṅkṣanti, na tveṣāmekārthatvaṃ, pratipadamarthabhedāt, samūhasya ca pṛthagarthāntarāprasiddheḥ | ato lakṣyābhāvādalakṣaṇametaditi |

prayojanavācyabhiprāyeṇa devasya tvetyudāhṛtam | nanviti paraḥ svābhiprāyaṃ prakaṭayati | yadā padārthavyatiriktaḥ kaścideko nirbhāgo vākyārtho nāsti tadā tattatpadārtha
dharmāveva sāmīpyavaśātteṣāṃ gamyamānau bhedasaṃsargau syātām | ata āha—tathā 'pyekārthatā na syāt | katham—

vyaktipadārthapakṣe sarvavyaktīnāṃ gavādipadenaivopāttatvādviṣayaśabdaiḥ śuklādibhiḥ kṛṣṇādivyavacchedamātraṃ vaktavyam | tatsaṃsargaḥ padārthāntargatatvānna vākyārtho bhavatīti tadupasarjanasteṣāṃ bhedo gṛhyate |

sa ca yathā śuklaśabdena gośabdasya kṛṣṇādibhyo bhidyamānatvādbhavati, evaṃ śukla śabdasyāpi gośabdenāśvādibhyo nivartitasya bhavati, vyavacchedyanānātvācca nāstyekatve pramāṇam | bhedasāmānyagrahaṇe vā sarvavākyārthaikatvaprasaṅgaḥ | yadā tu bhedavantaḥ padārthā eva vākyārthastadā siddhameva nānātvam | tathā—

ākṛtipadārthapakṣe śuklatvagotvayoḥ svarūpeṇābhihitayoḥ saṃnidhānāditaretarānurañjanamarthasiddhabhedaṃ vākyārthaḥ | sa ca gotve śuklatvasaṃsargaḥ śuklatve vā gotvasaṃsargaḥ sāmastyenaikaikavyaktyupasaṃhārādupalabhyata iti nānā |
yadyapi ca kathaṃciddvipade sa evobhayatrāpi saṃsarga ityekatvaṃ gamyeta, tathā 'pi bahupade yena yena pradeśena padadvayaṃ saṃsṛjyate tena tena saṃsargarūpeṇopalabdheranekatvam | kiṃ ca—

yāvaddhi prayojanaikatvaṃ nā ' 'śrīyate tāvatsvatantrāḥ padārthā naikatāmāpādayituṃ śakyanta iti pṛthageva bhedasaṃsargāvanubhavanti | tasmādapi nānā | yadyapi cāsmākamākṛtipadārthakatvānnaiva bhedo vākyārthatvenābhipretastathā 'pi pūrvapakṣavādinā vikalpamātreṇopanyastaḥ | siddhāntābhiprāyavivaraṇaṃ prayojanavācitvādarthaśabdasyopapannam |

evaṃ satyeka eva kaścitpadārthaḥ pradhānabhūtastadviśeṣaṇatvenetaropādānamiti sarveṣāṃ ca
tadbhedāttatsaṃsargāccaiko bhedaḥ saṃsargo vetyapi śakyaṃ vaditum | tasmātkarmasamavāyitvena dṛṣṭārthatvādaśeṣasavitrādipadārthaviśiṣṭanirvāpaprakāśanaṃ samastasya padasamūhasyaikaṃ prayojanamiti siddhamudāharaṇam | parastu nirvāpaprādhānyamajñātvā pṛcchati—nanvatra devasyeti | siddhāntavādyāha—yadi nirvapāmītyanuṣaṅgastata evaṃ, sa cānuṣaṅgastadguṇabhāvena bhavet, na cāsya guṇabhāvaḥ prayojanavattvāt | savitrādīnāṃ cākarmasamavāyādityekārthatvam |

atha kimarthamubhayaṃ sūtritāmiti | yeṣāṃ saṃhatānāmekaprayojanatvaṃ teṣāṃ tadaśaktervyastānāmekāntenaiva sākāṅkṣatvaṃ bhavatītyavācyaṃ tat | atha vā vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ saṃhataikaprayojanatvena vinā na bhavati pratyekakāryeṣu nirapekṣapravṛttisiddheḥ | ataḥ sākāṅkṣavibhāgenaivetarākṣepāttanmātramevābhidhātavyamiti |

pratyudāharaṇe darśayati—ucyata iti | puroḍāśa vibhāgaprakāśanamekaṃ prayojanaṃ nirapekṣāṇāṃ dṛṣṭam | nirvāpe dattottarā 'pi vibhāganānātvaparicodanā saṃhatya viśeṣaṇānupādānātpunaḥ punaḥ prayuktasyānuṣaṅgadoṣābhāvādupanyasyate | tatrottaraṃ na tāvannirapekṣasādhanabhedādapi kriyānānātvamiti vakṣyā2maḥ | sādhanaprādhānyaṃ tu pratyuktameva | etatkṛto
viśeṣaḥ karmānaṅgatvādanādaraṇīya iti sāmānyaprakāśanādekārthatvam | ‘tasminsīda’ ityasya pūrvāpekṣitve satyapi prayojanabhedādvākyāntaratvam | tasmātsaṃhatayoreva lakṣaṇatvam || 46 ||
yeṣāmadṛśyamānakarmasamavetārthatvena laiṅgikaviniyogābhāvena vacanādviniyogasteṣāṃ prāgdṛṣṭārthamantrāvadherekamantratvaṃ yuktam | tathā hi—

yadā hi bahvadṛṣṭakalpanā niṣpramāṇiketyekamadṛṣṭaṃ sarvebhyaḥ kalpitaṃ bhavati tadā pratyekaṃ tatsādhanaśaktyabhāvādvibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvamapyastītyekavākyatā | kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe pratīkabhedena viniyogaḥ “iṣeṃ tveti śākhāṃ chinatti” “ūrje tvetyanumārṣṭi” ityevamādiḥ | kathaṃ ca ‘klaptīrvācayati’ iti bahutvanirdeśaḥ | taducyate—

ādimadhyāvasānagrahaṇenaiko 'pi mantrastatra tatra viniyujyamāno 'pi na pīḍyate |
yāvadviniyogaṃ hi sakala āvartiṣyate khaṇḍasyāprayojanatvāt | kalpatāṃ kalpatāmiti ca punaḥ punaḥ prayogādekavākyatve 'pi bahuvacanāvirodhaḥ | ucyate | naitadevam |

tiṣṭhatu tāvatprayojanakalpanaṃ viniyogavākyaṃ vā | na hi taduttarakālaṃ svarūpanirūpaṇaṃ yuktam | ajñātarūpasya viniyogāśakteraviniyuktasya ca prayojanakalpanānupapatteḥ | tattannirapekṣaṃ tu rūpaṃ pāṭhādevāvadhāryate | tatkālāvadhṛtabhedābhedānuvartitvaṃ tu prayojanaviniyogayoḥ | pramāṇavaccānekamapi kalpanīyamityuktam | rūpopalabdhivelāyāṃ ceṣetvādinā na parasparasākāṅkṣatvamekaprayojanatvaṃ copalakṣyate | tataśca niṣpratidvaṃdve 'vadhārite bhede paścānna kiṃcidekatvāpādane kāraṇaṃ saṃbhavati | na ca prāganupalabdhaṃ sākāṅkṣatvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam | tena ca vinā yadyapyekaprayojanatvaṃ bhavettathā 'pyekāṅgavaikalyādekavākyatvābhāvaḥ, kimuta yadā rūpabhedādviniyogabhedastadbhedāccādṛṣṭārthatve 'pi prayojanabhedaḥ | tvatpakṣe 'pi cāvaśyaṃ yāvadviniyogaṃ tena tena bhavitavyam | iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ | tava samastānmantrānmama vyastebhyaḥ | na caiṣāmadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ, brāhmaṇopadiṣṭadṛṣṭārthasādhanatvāt | tadbalena caiṣāṃ yāvatā vinā coditakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ nāsti tāvadanāmnātamapi kalpanīyaṃ cchinadmītyādi | yadvā yathaiva "rathaghoṣeṇa māhendrasya stotramupākaroti" iti vacanādavācakaḥ syāpi viniyogamātrānusaṃghānena stotrābhimukhyacihnatvaṃ bhavati, evamiṣetvādīnāṃ chedanādismaraṇahetutvam | ubhayamapi caitatpramāṇavaditi sūtrakāraiḥ kaiścitkathaṃ cidāśritam | sarvathā 'traivamadhyavasātavyam | vikalavākyaprayogāsaṃbhavādavācakaprayogānupapatteścādhyāhāraḥ | atha vā yathāmnātaviniyogānusārāttādṛśenaiva smartuṃ saṃskārādhāne yatitavyam | tatrānuṣṭhātrabhiprāyādhīno 'nyataraparigraha iti dṛṣṭaprayojanabhedādapi siddho vākyabhedaḥ | kiṃ ca—

tathā ‘āyuryajñena kalpatām’ ityevamādīnāṃ nirākāṅkṣabhinnarūpopalabdhernaikatvā
pattiḥ satyapyekāryatve | na ca tadasti | āyuḥkalpanādīnāṃ bhinnatvāt | nirvāpavadabheda iti cenna | kḷptīriti mantrabahutvacodanāyāḥ pratyakṣatvāt | iha tāvadarthānāmakarmāṅgāpavādavivakṣāyāṃ satyāṃ mantroccāraṇamātraṃ prayojanam | tatra ca bavhyaḥ kḷptayaḥ śrūyante | tadbhedaścārthabhedamantareṇa na bhavatītyakṣaropasarjanabhūto 'rtho nānātvenā ' 'śrīyate | kḷptiviśeṣavacanaṃ ca dṛṣṭārthamiti mantrabahutvāpādanārthatvāt | yathā vibhāga iti | sakṛcchrutanirvāpavailakṣaṇyātklaptīnām | punaḥ punaruccāritaśabdo 'pi yathā vibhāgaḥ sādhanabhede satyapi na bhidyate, tathā kḷptibhedo 'pi na bhaviṣyatīti manyate | naitadevamityuttaram | iha sāmānyavivakṣānupayogāt | atha vā siddhāntavādyeva yathā vibhāge naitadevamiti svayamevaikavākyabhūtamuttaraṃ dadāti | nanu ca vibhāgavākyānāmapi bhedo 'styeveti nopanyasanīyam | evaṃ tarhi naivedaṃ prabhedapratipattyarthaṃ, kiṃ tarhi dṛṣṭāntena sahaikatvāpādanaparatvāttadīyavikalpāpādanāyopanyasyati | yathā vibhāge tathā 'tra vikalpaḥ kasmānna bhavatīti | naitadevamiti | samānaviṣayatve hi vikalpo bhavati, na ceha sāmānyavivakṣā yena vibhāgavadaikārthyaṃ bhavet | kḷptiviśiṣṭāyurādyāśāsanaparatvāt | vibhāge hi sādhanānāmaprayojanatvātsāmānyabhūtakriyāmātraprakāśanaparatvam | iha punarāyurādīnāmāśāsyatvena prādhānyāttadviśeṣaṇatvena kḷptyupādānaṃ na tvāyurādiviśiṣṭā sā prakāśyate, niṣprayojanatvāt | athāpi kriyāprādhānyaṃ tathā 'pi tadbhedaparatvānnānārthatvam | bhedaparatve ca pūrvoktameva dṛṣṭārthatvamucyate | atha
api cetyādi bhāṣyam, iha kḷptīriti pūrvabhāṣyeṇa punaruktamiva bhāsamānaṃ kḷptiśabdasya pūrvābhipretamantraparatvapakṣāpekṣayā 'rthaparatvarūpapakṣāntarābhidhānārthatvena vyākaroti—athavetyādinā | vā ‘kḷptīrvācayati’ iti naiva mantraparaḥ kḷptiśabdaḥ,
kathaṃ tarhi, kriyābahutvābhidhāna eva, śabdānāmarthatantratvāt | ataśca bahutvasaṃkhyayā karmabhedādviśeṣaṇakṛtabhedāśrayaṇācca mantrāṇāṃ tatparatve coditārthanirvṛttyā dṛṣṭārthatvātsiddhā bhinnārthatā | kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe vācayatītyucyate, śabdapadārthako hyayaṃ prayujyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | ubhayatra prayogāt | yathaiva hi śabdaṃ bruvantaṃ prayuñjāno vācayatītyucyate tathaiva ca yaḥ śabdenārthaṃ bravīti tasyāpi prayojako vācayatīti | tasmātkḷptikriyāśabdairyajamānaṃ vaktuṃ pravṛttamadhvaryurvācayatītyayamartho vijñāyate, tatprakāśanena ca bhinnā eva santo mantrā dṛṣṭārthā bhavantīti vākyabhedaḥ || 47 ||

jyotiṣṭome
tisṛṇāmiti—pūrvāhṇāparāhṇayorabhyasyamānamāgneya saumyavaiṣṇavayāgatrayamekopasat | tathāvidhānāṃ dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthāheṣu kartavyatayā vihitānāṃ tisṛṇāmupa sadāmityarthaḥ |tisṛṇāmapyupasadāmādāvāgneṃyī vihitā “agnimanīkaṃ” iti | tatra prathamāyāḥ krame “yā te agne 'yāśayā” iti nirākāṅkṣo mantra āmnāyate | uttarayostu, sākāṅkṣau “yā te agne rajāśayā” “yā te agne harāśayā” iti | tatra strīliṅgayacchabdanirdeśasya strīpadārthena kenacidvinā paripūrṇatā nāsti | na cāparipūrṇena vyavahāro 'vakalpate tatra tadanyathānupapapattyā 'vaśyaṃ paripūraṇasamartho vākyaśeṣaḥ kalpanīyaḥ | kutaḥ |

na hi vaidikavākyānāṃ pratyakṣamevaikaṃ pramāṇaṃ, tadvadeva hyanumānādīnyapi pramāṇāni | sarvapramāṇapratyastamaye ca ṣaṣṭhenābhāvaḥ paricchidyate | tadiha pratyakṣānupalabdhe vākyaśeṣe na tāvatyevoparantavyam | yadyanumānādīnyapi nivartiṣyante tata etāvānevāyaṃ mantra iti kalpayiṣyāmaḥ | atha tu taiḥ kaścidavagamyate tatastattatsahito 'yaṃ mantraḥ sakalaḥ prāktasmādūna ityadhyavasyāmaḥ | tadihārthāpattyā tāvatsāmānyataḥ kaścidasti śeṣa ityadhyavaseyam | tataścābhāvasyānavasarādūnamidaṃ vākyaṃ na prayogārham | tatra viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ
laukikaḥ kalpanīya uta vaidika eva pūrvamantrasthastanūrvarṣiṣṭhetyādiranuṣaktavya iti saṃśaye laukika ityāha | tathā hi—

yathaivā ' 'havanīyādayo vaidikāstannirdiṣṭakāryavyatirekeṇa na pravartante tathaiva vaidikaḥ śeṣo yatra vākye samāmnāyena viniyuktaḥ sa tannibaddhatvānnānyatra prayogaṃ kṣamate laukikaḥ punaranibaddhatvātsarvārthaḥ sarvākāṅkṣāpūraṇāyāpi niyujyamāno na virudhyate | tasmāllaukikaḥ | tatra yadi vaidikamapi racitatvāllaghutaraprayogaṃ racayitavyādavaidikāllaukikātmanā manvānaḥ prayuṅkte na kena cidvāryate | vaidikatvabuddhistu tatra na kartavyā | tathā hi—
yadi tvānantaryāviśeṣādrajāśayetyanenāpi saṃbandho 'bhyupagamyeta tato yathāniveśaṃ prayogātpurastādevāsya prayogaḥ prāpnoti | tasmādapi na vaidikaḥ śeṣa iti prāpte | ucyate—
