vaidikasya vākyasya vaidika eva śeṣaḥ pūraṇakṣamo na laukikaḥ | codanālakṣaṇadharmaniyamāt | yadā tu vedaḥ sarvātmanā 'nviṣyamāṇo 'pi tyaktavyāpāro dṛśyate tadā laukikamapyanujānāti | sā vā 'nveṣaṇā yathāsaṃnikarṣaṃ pravartate | tatra |

ekasminnarthe sākāṅkṣe 'bhihite prakṛtyā pratyayena vā tatsaṃbandhasamarthamarthāntaraṃ yadi vā tatraiva dṛśyate tato ramaṇīyam | atha na dṛśyate tataḥ pramādālasye parityajya prakṛtau pratyaye cānveṣṭavyaḥ | tayorapi cenna dṛśyate tataḥ purastātparastādvā 'nantaroccarite padāntare | na cedanantare labhyetaikāntaravdyantarādivyavahite | yadi tu svavākye na labhyeta tatastenaiva krameṇa prakṛte vākyāntare | vākyāntare 'pi tvalabhyamāno yathopasthāpyamānānusāreṇa
prakaraṇāntare | yadā tu tatrāpi na labhyate tadā loke | loke 'pi cennopalabhyeta tato nāstītyevamavadhāryā ' 'kāṅkṣābuddhiṃ bhrāntitvena parikalpya nirākāṅkṣīkartavyam | sarvatra ca |

tadiha rajāśayāharāśayāvākyayoḥ śeṣaḥ svapadasvavākyayoralabhyamānatvādvākyāntare nūnamityupasaṃhriyate | sa ca yādṛgākāṅkṣitastādṛgevaikānantaraṃ purastādupalabhyate 'nyasya vyavahitaḥ | yadyapi cāsau prathamamantre kṛtārthatvānna tāvākāṅkṣati tau tu tena vinā 'nupapadyamānāvātmasamīpe 'nyasyānāmnānādevaṃ puruṣaṃ prayuñjāte | sarvasamīpe sakṛtpaṭhitumaśakyaḥ pramāṇāntaralabhyatvācca punaḥ punaraśrāvito 'yamāvayorapyarthenā ' 'mnātaḥ śeṣo naikasyaiva saṃnidhiviśeṣanimittabhrāntyā kalpayitavya iti | yadyapi ca purastādāmnāyate, tathā 'pi yatpradeśavarttitvena tābhyāṃ kāṅkṣitastatraiva viniyujyate | kutaḥ |

sa hi sakṛdāmnāyamānaḥ sarveṣāmīpsite pradeśe na śakya āmnātumityekasya yathākramamāmnāta itarayośca yāvatā buddhiviṣayatāmāpadyate, tataśca gṛhītaḥ san svayamapi pradeśāntare sthātumasamarthastābhyāmapi cānyavṛttitvenānākāṅkṣitaḥ pūrvatra ca parastādbhāvitayā dṛṣṭasāmarthyaḥ parastādeva nivekṣyate | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu prathamadvitīyayormadhye pāṭhādaguhyamāṇaviśeṣaḥ śeṣa ubhayorapyānantaryeṇaiva saṃbandhītyutkvā tṛtīyasya vyavadhānādasaṃbandhamāśaṅkyārthitvāviśeṣādubhayoḥ samudāyāpādanenāvyavadhāne sādhite samudāyaśeṣatvameva tarhi prāpnotītyāśaṅkya tasyāprayogārhatvātprayogārhasamudāyisaṃbandhaḥ, tatrāpi tayoḥ prādhānyādanyathā ca nairākāṅkṣyānupapatteḥ pratyekaṃ sakalaśeṣasaṃbandhasiddhirityabhidhāya punarvyākhyānāntaramārabdham—api ca sākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhāviti | tatra kaiści
vdyākhyānavikalpa evetyāśritam | apare tu vadanti pūrvatrāparitoṣāduttaraṃ kṛtam | kiṃ kāraṇam |

lg.l: punaḥ pratyekanirmāṇe na ca hetuḥ pratīyate ||

div.p:
samudāyatvaṃ hyekakāryatvenaikaśabdopādānena vā bhavet, na cātraikamapyasti | nanvidamekakāryatvamekavākyaśeṣagrahaṇaṃ nāma | aho nu khalu mantrāṇāṃ kāryaṃ
mantrāṇāṃ kratvaṅgaprakāśanamevakāryaṃ nattvekaśeṇagrahaṇamityarthaḥ | vijñātam | apekṣā hi tatrobhayoḥ syāt | kathaṃ tatkāryamityucyate | śeṣaścāsau tayorna tadvaśena samudāyatvāpattiryuktā | paścādapi vā samudāyibhyāmeva tasya saṃgatiriṣṭetyādita eva samudāyatvaṃ na labhyate | yadi ca samudāyatvamāpannau tataḥ punaḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbandha iti rājaikaputrakrīḍā
ekaputrasyātyaṃtapriyattvena pitṛbhyāmanivāraṇādrājaputrattvena cānyairapyanivāraṇādatyantānyāyyā yathā tatheyamapīti dṛṣṭāntabhāgāśayaḥ | ' 'padyate | purastādeva ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti | tathābhūtena samudāyānantaryāt | na vā 'gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvaṃ, deśabhedanimittatantrabhedāt | prathamasya hyasau yathākāṅkṣite deśe sthito nottarayoḥ | tasmādidameva vyākhyānam |

lg.l: ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhānaṃ ca yogyatā ceti ca trayam |

div.p: yo hi bahūnāṃ saṃbandhitvena sakṛdāmnāyate tasyāvaśyaṃbhāvyekenā ' 'nantaryamiti na tadeva tadā saṃbandhakāraṇatvenā ' 'śrīyate | tatrāpyasmādeva kāraṇatrayātsaṃbandhasiddheḥ | saṃnidhiviśeṣāttu tadāśrayapratipattyā bhavati bhrāntiḥ | sā tu sākāṅkṣayogyasaṃnihitasaṃbandhyantaradarśanānnivartate | yathā dhātvarthādiṣu vidhibuddhirguṇādyupādānasāmarthyāt | evaṃ hi tatra jñāyate | sarvārtho 'yamāmnāyamānaḥ sarvasādhāraṇānantaryāsaṃbhavādvākyaikatvācca kasyacidekasya samīpe paṭhyate | tasmādakāraṇamānantaryamiti | saṃnidhiriti—buddhau viparivṛttiḥ | sā cā ' 'nantarye saṃbaddhapadavyavāye ca bhavati | saṃbaddhapadavyavadhirapyānantaryaprakāra eva | katham |

‘yā te agne rajāśayā’ ityanenāpekṣitaḥ śeṣaḥ parastādalabhyamānaḥ purastātparāvṛ
ttyā ' 'locyamāno labhyate tanūrvarṣiṣṭheti | yadā ca tatrā ' 'rūḍhastadā harāśayetyasyānantarībhūtaḥ punarevameva tṛtīyenāpi saha saṃbadhyate | tataḥ paraṃ tvanyasyānāmnānāttāvatyevopakṣīyate | sarvatraivamapekṣā purastātparastācca prasṛtaikatrā ' 'ruhyetareṣāmanantarībhavantī tāvadapekṣyamāṇā nigṛhṇāti yāvatkiṃcinna yogyamastyayogyaṃ copalabdham | tataḥ sarvamālocitamupasaṃhṛtya nivartate | yadyapi ca krameṇoccāraṇātsaṃnikarṣaviprakarṣau pratīyete tathā 'pi nityatvādvedasyānantare dūrasthe ca yugapadapekṣā saṃbandhaśceti paścādavagamānna prāmāṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ | evaṃ vākye padānāṃ prakaraṇe ca vākyānāṃ saṃbandho yāvatsākāṅkṣeṇa tatsaṃbandhārheṇa parasyāpyanantarīkartuṃ samarthena vyavadhānam | avyavadhāne vicchede 'pīti | virodhinā padenāvyavadhāne viprakṛṣṭatve bhavati saṃbandhaṃ ityarthaḥ | tasmādanuṣaṅgaḥ samāptiḥ | anuṣajyata ityanuṣaṅgaḥ | sa eva samāpyate teneti samāptiḥ |

yatra tāvaccheṣiṇaḥ sākāṅkṣāstatraivamatha yatra nairākāṅkṣyaṃ sarveṣu śeṣiṣvekaḥ śeṣaḥ
dvayorapyasaṃbaddhaiṃriti bhāṣyaṃ pūrvabhāṣyeṇagatārthamiva bhāsamānaṃ, vyavahitasyāpyanuṣaṃgābhyupagame sarvatra tatsaṃbhavānnādhyāhāraḥ kvacitsyādityāśaṅkānirāsārthattvenāsaṃbaddhapadāvyavāya evā ' 'kāṅkṣāvatva eva cānuṣaṅgo bhavati nānyatheti parisaṃkhyārtha draṣṭavyam |
sākāṅkṣaḥ paṭhyate | yathā ‘citpatistvā punātu’ ityeteṣāmante “acchidreṇa” ityādistatra kathamiti | kiṃ prāptam |
ucyate |

ānantaryaviśeṣeṇa hyayaṃ punātvityetena saṃbadhyate | sa caika eva triṣvapi vākyeṣu, tadekatvāccārthasyāpyekatvam | na ca kārakabhedāttasya bhedo bhavati | yena citpatyādisaṃbaddhādasyānanyatvaṃ vijñāyate | na cācchidreṇetyevamarthā kriyā, yena sakṛtsaṃbandhena saṃtuṣyet |

athocyata ekatve 'pyasyā yatkartṛviśiṣṭābhyāsādyaḥ karaṇasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate tadviśiṣṭaiva tena yojayitavyā | yathaikasyāpi jyotiṣṭomasya maitrāvaruṇagrahābhyāsaviśiṣṭasya payasā
śrayaṇaṃ coditaṃ nātiprasajyate, yathā cātraiva citpatyādayo, na sarve sarvatra bhavanti | ucyate |

aindravāyavādigrahābhyāsānāmadṛṣṭārthatvāttadbhedena śrayaṇavyavasthā yuktā | na hi tathā kiṃcitkāraṇamasti | karaṇasya kriyāṃ pratyupayuktatvāt | karaṇaprakāśanadvāreṇa saiva kriyā punaḥ prakāśyate | sā ca sarvatrāviśiṣṭatvātprakāśanamapekṣate | yathā ca vākpatyupādānāttatsamānavyāpāraścitpatirnivartate, naivamacchidrapavitrapratiyogikaraṇāntaraśravaṇamasti yenaitannivarteta, na ca kartṛprayuktaṃ karaṇam | yatastadbhedādvyavatiṣṭheta, kārakāṇāṃ kriyākṣiptatvena parasparasaṃbandhābhāvāt | nanvevamapi mantrāntaramatenāpi punātuśabdenāsya saṃbandhaḥ syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | darśapūrṇamāsabarhirdharmavadvyavasthāsiddhiḥ | iha prakramya punātuśabdasya yatkāryaṃ tatprayuktamacchidrādiviśeṣaṇaṃ mantratraye 'pi tadekamiti pratyakṣamavagacchāmaḥ | na mantrāntare, karmāntaragatadravyāntarasaṃskārārthatvāt | nanvevaṃ satyekakāryatvānmantravikalpaḥ prasajyeta |
vibhāgamantravadiṣṭāpattyā ' 'śaṅkāṃ pariharati kuto vetyādinā | samuccayaprāhakapramāṇābhāvādyukta eva vikalpa ityāśayaḥ | idantu ‘tribhiryajamānaṃ pāvayati’ iti vacanena dṛṣṭārthatve 'pi mantrāṇāṃ samuccayāvagateryājñikācārasatvācca praụdhivādamātraṃ vijñeyam |kuto vaivamādīnāṃ saṃkhyāyuktāvidhānādante samuccayaḥ | sarveṣu viparivṛttibhaṅgāsaṃnidhiḥ saṃbhāvyeta na mantrāntareṣviti viśeṣaḥ ||

sarvābhyāsāntābhihitenācchidreṇetyādinā 'nanyagatikatvādyadā punātuśabdaḥ svīkṛtaḥ, tadā punātvacchidreṇetyevaṃ kalpite saṃbandhe ya evānantaraḥ punātuśabdaḥ sa eva pūrvayorapīti karaṇasaṃbandhapradarśanavelāyāmanveti | kriyāḥ padārthāḥ santastāmapekṣamāṇāḥ sakaraṇikāmevā ' 'sādayantīti sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ | evaṃ vā 'nuṣaṅgeṇa prayoktavye ye tantreṇa prayuñjate teṣāṃ tadālasyamātraṃ purastātparastādvā vākyaśeṣasyānuṣaṅgatvāviśeṣe sati yatpurastādanuṣaṅge 'nvīyata iti kaiściducyate tadviśeṣaprasiddhimātramiti draṣṭavyam || 48 ||

‘saṃ te vāyurvātena gacchatām’ ityasya sākāṅkṣasyānantaratvādavadhāritaḥ śeṣo bahuvacanāntenāyogyenāsaṃbaddhastulyayogitvābhāvādyogyenāpi yajñapatinā nānuṣajyate | ataśca vaidikaśeṣāsaṃbhavādasti laukikasyāvakāśa ityubhayatrādhyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ | tatra tu yadyapi noccāryate gacchatāmiti tathā 'pyavaśyamanusaṃdhātavyaḥ, anyathā 'rthāparisamāpteḥ | tasmānnānuṣaṅga iti | prayojanaṃ tu, anuṣaṅge mantratvātprāyaścittam | laukikatve cāmantratvamiti |
prayojanaviṣaye vṛddhasaṃmatiṃ darśayati—āha cetyādinā |āha ca—

tatra śabdāntaraṃ tāvatspaṣṭatvātprathamamudāhriyate | ekānekākhyātapratyayasaṃbaddhāḥ sarve dhātavo yajati dadāti juhoti nirvapati gṛhṇāti stṛṇāti śaṃsati stauti ityevamādaya udāharaṇam | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu svatvaparityāgāṃśena yajatyāditrayaṃ pratyāsannārthatvātsutarāmabhinnamābhāsata ityudāhṛtam | tatra pūrvapakṣatraividhyadarśanātsaśaṃyopanyāso 'pi tadanuguṇaḥ pratibhāti | tadyathā tistro bhāvanāḥ kimekamapūrvaṃ kurvantyuta trīṇīti, tathā trayo dhātvarthāḥ kimekāṃ bhāvanāṃ viśiṃṣantyuta tistraḥ, tathā trayo dhātavaḥ kimekaṃ dhātvarthaṃ vadantyuta trīniti | kāryaśabdaścāpūrvabhāvanādhātvartheṣu upakāryatvāviśeṣeṇa prayujyate | bhāvanādhātvarthadhātavo hyeṣāmutpādanena viśeṣaṇena pratipādanenopakārakatvātsādhanatvenāmidhīyante | kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ ||

athavā pāramārthiko 'trāyamekaḥ saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ dhātvarthatrayānuraktaikā bhāvanā, athavā pratidhātvarthaṃ bhāvanābheda iti | bhāvanaiva dhātvarthānuraktā karmaśabdenocyate | tasyā eva śabdāntarādi bhedakaṃ bhaviṣyati, apūrvasyānabhidheyatvātkarmabhedānuniṣpādyeva taditi na
pṛthagvicāramarhati | prāsaṅgikastu dhātvarthaikatvopanyāsaḥ kathamaṇyasārvatrikaḥ sanyajyādiṣu bhaviṣyatīti nātīva tantrīkartavyaḥ | tataścaitadapi saṃśayakāraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ pratimāti kiṃ dhātvarthānpratyupādīyamānā bhāvanā pratyekaṃ samāpyate, atha vā te tāṃ pratyupādīyamānāḥ saṃhatya viśiṃṣantīti
viśiṣantīti—anena ca somena yajate ityādivākyeṣu dhātvarthaviśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhiruta jyotiṣṭomavākyāvihitānādṛtaghātvarthaviśeṣabhāvanānuvādena dhātvarthavidhiriti saṃdeho bhāvanābhedābhedasaśayakāraṇamityāśayaḥ sūcitaḥ | | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ saṃhatyeti | tatra samudāyaścikīrṣitaḥ samudāyādekamapūrvaṃ na vā 'śābdaḥ samudāya ityādiṣu punaḥ punaḥ samudāyaśabdoccāraṇādapūvaiṃkatvābhidhānācca tisṛbhyo māvanābhya ekamapūrvamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ | iyaṃ copapattiḥ ||
tadevā ' 'ha ||

dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā bhavatīti | tatrāpyekānekārthakalpanayorviśeṣaśceddhurulāghavaṃ prati na gamyeta tato 'nekopi kalpyeta, gamyate cāsau | tasmātsamudāyādekamapūrvam | tatraitatsyāt, kena bhāvanāsamudāyaścodito yasmādekamapūrvaṃ syādityata āha—na cāśābdaḥ samudāyo 'vayavaśabdaireva coditatvāt | atha veti—dhātvarthatrayānuraktaikamāvanāpakṣaparigrahaḥ | tasyāpyupapattiḥ ||

yadi hi dhātvarthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ bhavettato bhāvanā tānpratyupādīyamānā pratipradhānaṃ bhidyeta | bhāvapradhānatvāccā ' 'khyānaspa prakṛtipratyayośca pratyayārthaśeṣatvādaruṇaikahāyanyādivadyāgādibhiḥ saṃhatyaikā bhāvanā viśeṣyate | yadyapi pradhānānāṃ guṇānurodhenā ' 'vṛttirayuktā tathā 'pi kevalaprakṛtipratyayaprayogāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃ tāvaddhātusaṃvamdhārthaṃ pratyayaḥ punarāvartayitavyaḥ | yadi tu kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ krīṇātivacchrūyeta, tataḥ sakṛduccarita evāraṇādibhiriva dhātubhiḥ saṃbadhyeta, apadatvānna svatantraḥ śrūyata ityāvartate | dṛṣṭā ca viśeṣaṇasaṃbandhārthamāvṛttiḥ ‘āyuryajñena kalpatāṃ’ ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ‘payasā juhoti’ ‘aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti’ ‘maitrāvaruṇaṃ gṛhṇāti’ ityevamādiṣu | tathā 'nuṣṭhānābavṛttirapi jyotiṣṭomasyānekadravyadevatāsaṃyogasaṃpādanārthā dṛśyate | tasmādarthaikatvavaśena sarvamidaṃ vajatidadātijuhotividhānātmakamekaṃ vākyamekaṃ karmaikaṃ cāpūrvamiti | ayameva cātra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ sādhurna pūrvokto bhāvanāsamudāyāsaṃbhabāt | kutaḥ ||

yadi hi bhāvanābhedaṃ pūrvavādyabhyupagacchatyeva tataḥ sā bhāvayitavyāpūrvabhedādṛte naivabhidyata iti tadbhede 'pi siddhe kimanena kṛtaṃ syāt | api ca samudāyatvāpādanamekaśabdasaṃyogātsamudāyānuvādarūpeṇa vā bhavati yathā “ya evaṃ vidvānpaurṇamāsīṃ yanate” iti, phalādisaṃbandhena vā yathā “rājasūyena svārājyakāma” iti | na tvihaikamapi paśyāmo yena samudāyatvamadhyavasyema | nanu jyotiṣṭomenetyeṣa samudāyavacano bhaviṣyati | na | tasya yajisāmānādhikaraṇyena tanmātravacanatvāt | tasmānnaiṣa pakṣaḥ | evaṃ nu bhāṣyagrantho netavyaḥ | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ dhātutrayānuraktamindrāyudhamivaikaṃ karmeti | tatsiddhyarthā tviyamupapattiḥ | evamalpādṛṣṭakalpanā bhaviṣyatīti | karmabhede hi bahvadṛṣṭakalpanā niṣpramāṇikā 'bhyupagantavyā | tasmātsamudāyaścikorṣita ityādyekasyaiva karmaṇo 'vayavābhiprāyeṇoktam | ato yajetetyasya pūrvī bhāgo yajatyarthaṃ bravīti, uttaro bhāvayedityādi vigamanas | atha veti pramādalikhitamiti manyanye | śakyaṃ tvetatsamarthayituṃ, dve hyete pūrvapakṣopapattī bhāṣyakāreṇopanyaste | tatrānekādṛṣṭakalpanādoṣaṃ pūrvamupanyasya atha vetyupapattyantaramāha |
etaduktaṃ bhavati | kimekādṛṣṭakalpanopapattyā 'thavā śabdenaivaikāṃ bhāvanāṃ pratipādayāmaḥ | pūrvārdhabhede 'pi pratyayaikatvenābhinnārthapratītestaddarśayati | tathā dadātīti pūrvo dadātyarthamuttarastameva bhāvayediti | evaṃ pratibhāti tameva dhātvarthaṃ bhāvayediti | tattvayuktam | sarvatra dhātvarthabhāvyatvapratiṣedhāt | na caitatpūrvapakṣavādino 'pi kvaciduṣayujyate | tathā 'nuvadatīti na śakyaṃ vaditum | tasmādevaṃ vācyaṃ pūrvo dadātyartha uttaraḥ punaryo yajateḥ pareṇāṃśenoktastameva bhāvayedityevaṃ dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhārthamanuvadatīti | evaṃ juhotītyatrāpi | tathā ca yajetetyatraivaṃ nābhihitaṃ, na hi tatra pūrvataraprāptā bhāvanā 'sti yā 'nūdyeta | yadi dhātvarthabhāvyatvamabhidhīyeta tadaviśiṣṭaṃ tatrāpīti | na tadvarnamuttarayoreva brūyādato bhāvanaikatvapratijñānābhiprāyametat | tasmādekā bhāvanā 'pūrvaṃ ca | yadvā yajatiśabdena vihitamiti—dhātvarthaikatvaṃ vadati svatvatyāgāṃśasamatvāt | athāpi lakṣaṇayā dadāti juhoti yajetetyasyānuvādastathā 'pi karmāntaranimittādṛṣṭakalpanātaḥ saiva jyāyasītyāśrīyate | na vā 'nuvāde lakṣaṇā doṣaḥ | guṇavidhyarthastvanuvādaḥ | ekatrā ' 'treyaḥ saṃpradānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca pradeyaṃ vidhīyate | itaratra dākṣiṇāni vidhīyante | nanu nāmadheyatvānnaivāyaṃ guṇavidhiḥ | karmavidhānapakṣe hyetasya nāmadheyatvam | anuvāde tu vākyānarthakyaprasaṅgādekāntena guṇavidhiramyupagantavyaḥ | tadā ca yajatidadātijuhotaya iti dhātvabhiprāyakam | ekaṃ kāryamekaṃ dhātvarthaṃ tadetarattadarthamiti vā nyāyenaikamapūrvaṃ gamayantītyarthaḥ | tasmānna karmabheda iti || atrocyate ||

yadyapyeko bhāvanāvacanastadarthasya ca prādhānyaṃ, tathā 'pyanurañjakadhātvarthabhedādbhāvanāntaraṃ pratyetavyam | na hyekasyāstrayo dhātvarthāḥ sannipatituṃ samarthāḥ | na ca samuccayaṃ pratipadyante karaṇāṃśāvarodhitvena tulyārthatvādanyonyanirapekṣabhinnaśabdopādānācca | na hyeko dhātustrīn dhātvarthānupādatte | na caikasminpade dhātutrayaṃ parasparāpekṣaṃ pratyayaṃ pratyupādīyamānaṃ saṃbhavati “dhātoḥ” iti pratyayotpattau vivakṣitaikatvasaṃkhyatvāt | na caitatpadatrayamekavā
kyatāṃ gacchati | vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaikārthatvayorabhāvāt | na vaikāpūrvakalpanāta ekavākyatā ' 'padyate | ‘sameṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt’( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 15 sū. 47 ) ityatra pratyākhyātatvāt | na cāpūrvabhedābhedapūrvakau karmabhedābhedau | viparītābhyupagamāt | yadi ca kevalaiva bhāvanā kena cidupādīyeta tato 'ruṇādibhirivaikavākyagatairdadhyādivadvā bhinnavākyagatairekaivānūdyānūdya yugapadvā viśiṣṭavidhānanyāyena yāgadānahomairanurajyeta, na tvasyāḥ pṛthagutpattirastītyavaśyaṃ dadātyādīnāmekena samastairvotpādayitavyā | tatra yadi tāvatsamastairutpādyate, tata utpannāyāḥ punarutpattyasaṃbhavātsiddhaṃ karmāntaratvam | athaikena tāvadutpādyeta, tatrāpi vinigamanāyāṃ hetorabhāvādviśeṣo na jñāyate | yena kenacidutpattirapyetasyāḥ pratīyate tatastadvyariktena dhātunā nānurajyate | yenaiva hyekena dhātunā kṛtānubandhā bhāvanotpannā tasyaiva śrautatvena balīyastvānna padāntarasthairdhātvarthaiḥ saha vikalpaḥ saṃbhavatīti tataḥ pracyutaistaiḥ svapadapratipāditamavaśyaṃ bhāvanāntaramanurañjanīyam | evamekaikatra svapadopāttadhātvarthānurañjanamautpattikaṃ śrautaṃ ca, dhātvarthāntarānurañjanamutpannabhāvi vākyaprakaraṇalabhyaṃ ca | dadātirhi yajatyupanibaddhāṃ bhāvanāṃ niṣedhan svavākyānuccaritāṃ padāntarānuvartinīṃ prakaraṇādvākyācca prāpnuyādevaṃ yajatirapi tatra tatreti yojyam | nanu ca dadātipade 'pyasau punaḥ śrūyamāṇā saiveti pratyabhijñāyata iti na vaktavyaṃ vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ dadātisaṃbandho bhavatīti | satyaṃ bhāvanāmātrasaṃbandhaḥ śrutyaiva pratīyate | yāgānuraktabhāvanāsaṃbandhe tu na śrutivyāpāro yujyate | nanu caikatvādevāsyā evaṃ bhedavyavahāro na yuktaḥ | kena vā karmabhedapakṣe 'pi sāmānyaikatvaṃ nābhyupagamyate | nanvatra vyaktinānātve 'pi nāsti pramāṇam | kathaṃ nāsti | yadā bhinnadhātvarthasaṃnidhānādasau nānātvena pratiśabdamupalabhyate | nanu ca śabdavadeva paropādhiko bhedapratyayo na pāramārthiko bhāvanābhedaḥ syāt | naitadevaṃ, śabdasyāpi gakārādibhedaḥ pāramārthiko naiva kasyacidaniṣṭastadvadihāpi yāgādibhede siddhe śabdasthānīyamanuṣṭhānasāmānyaṃ nirūpyate | na ca yathā śabdasyārthāntarabhūtā dhvanayaḥ drutādibuddhimapāramārthikīṃ kurvantyevamatra yāgādayo 'dūravyatiriktāḥ | tasmādasti bheda iti | āha ca—

yasmātprakṛtipratyayayoḥ svārthābhidhāne smṛterācārācca nityavivakṣitakramatvena pūrvaprayuktaprakṛtyarthavyāpteṣu pratipattṛṣu pratyayāṃśaḥ saṃnipatan kṛtānubandhameva svārthaṃ vadati | tasmānna
kadācitpratyathārthaḥ śuddho labhyate | yathoktaṃ prātipadikāduccarantī dvitīyādivibhaktiḥ prātipadikārtho viśeṣaka ityāheti
( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7 ) | ityatra bhāṣyakāra ityarthaḥ | | prayogavākyaśeṣabhāvena hi samudāyasya sattāsaṃbandha iti | ekāpūrvakalpanayā hi samudāyānuraktabhāvanākalpanamāśritaṃ phalasaṃbandhanimittā vā 'pūrvakalpanā | prayogavākyaśeṣabhāvena votpattivākyānāṃ phalasaṃbandho bhavati na svarūpaiḥ | avadhṛtasvarūpāṇi ca karmāṇi prayogavākyena gṛhyanta ityavagate bhede na śakyānyekīkartum | na ca dadātijuhotyoḥ prayogavākyaśeṣabhāvaṃ paśyāmaḥ, yajeta svargakāma iti kevalayāgaśravaṇāt | na ca tena dānahomau labhyete | svārthatyāgapragaṅgādubhayāśrayaṇe vā yugapachrutilakṣaṇāpattirdoṣaḥ | tasmānna samudāyakalpanā 'sti | ataśca dhātvanyatvena padāntaratvātkevalaviśiṣṭatā gamyate | na ca jñānāntareṇa nivartate | na ca dhātvarthaikatvam | āsecanaparasvatvāpādanābhyadhikatvāt | na ca tyāgamātralakṣaṇā, svārthavṛttitvenāpi vākyasamavāyopapatteḥ | na ca dākṣiṇāni nāma guṇaḥ kaścitprasiddha iti sāmānādhikaraṇyānnā
madheyatvameva yuktam | ataśca vākyānarthakyaṃ mā bhūditi homo vidhīyate | dadātinā tu yāgamanūdya guṇe vidhīyamāne hiraṇyātreyasaṃbandhe vākyabhedaprasaṅgādguṇādapi bhedaḥ saṃbhavatītyatraikaguṇo nirguṇo vā 'nyo dadātirudāhartavyaḥ || 1 ||

śabdāntarādhikaraṇapratyudāharaṇarūpeṇābhyāsasya pūrvapakṣaḥ sukhamabhidhīyata iti tadanantaramārambhaḥ | tatra samidho yajati tanūnapātaṃ yajati ityādiṣu samidādiśabdānapoddhṛtya yajatītyetatpañjakṛtvo 'bhihitaṃ kimekasya karmaṇo vācakamathānekasyetyudāhṛtaṃ tadākṣipyate |

lg.l: guṇo vā nāmadheyaṃ vā samidādipadaṃ bhavet |

div.p: ṣaḍapi bhedahetavaḥ pṛthagbhūtāḥ svasāmarthyamātravyāpāraphalā darśayitavyāḥ | tadyāvadatra guṇanāmadheyayorbhedakaratvaṃ nāpanīyate na tāvadabhyāsasya parabhāgalābho 'stītyanyadudāhartavyam | na ca tatsaṃbhavati | kutaḥ |

lg.l: prayujyate hi vedeṣu nā ' 'khyātaṃ kevalaṃ kvacit |

div.p:
‘aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti’ ityevamādīni hi sarvāṇi parasparāsaṃgatyautpattikaguṇayogādbhidyante | ‘bhinne juhoti’ ‘skanne juhoti’ ityādīnyapi ‘phalaṃ cākarmasaṃnidhau’( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 25 ) ityanena nyāyena nimittaṃ pratyupādīyamānatvādbhidyante | nimittasaṃbandhaparatvācca nābhyāsānarthakyamityabhedakatvam | ye tu pañcaśāradīyeṣu
ahīnātmakaḥ pañcāhaḥ pañcaśāradīyo nāma | “tānparyagnikṛtāṃstānparyagnikṛtān” ityevamabhyāsamudāharanti teṣāṃ prākṛtaparyagnikaraṇānuvādaprasmaraṇasāmarthyaṃ tat | na vā 'tra yajatiḥ śrūyate yasyābhyāsādbhedaḥ syāditi na kiṃ cidudāharaṇam | yathodāhṛteṣveva tu samādhiḥ |

yānyupādeyārthāni nāmapadāni tāni tāvadākhyātaparatantratvāttadanusārīṇi santi tadvṛttiṃ pratīkṣante, taccetprakṛte niviṣṭaṃ nāmapadamapi tasyaiva guṇavidhirnāmadheyaṃ vā | atha tenāpūrvaṃ parikalpitamatastadgāmi nāmapadamityevaṃ bhedābhedayoravagatayoḥ paścādāgacchatsa
midādipadamakiṃcitkaratvādudāste | tena tadapoddhṛtyā ' 'khyātamātraṃ vicāryate | nanvevaṃ sati saṃjñāguṇayorabhedakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatra tau bhedakau yatrā ' 'khyātapadaṃ na vyāpriyate tathā codāhariṣyati “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” “vājibhyo vājinam” iti | vājine tāvannaivā ' 'khyātapadaṃ śrūyate, jyotirādāvapyākhyātasya guṇaphalasaṃbandhavyāpāreṇa prakṛtaniveśasaṃbhave sati tataḥ pūrvapravṛttayā saṃjñayaiva bhedo bhaviṣyati | yatrāpyākhyātasya svarasena prakṛtakarmaniveśopaplave sati tatrāsaṃbhavan guṇo vidhīyate tatrāpyasau bhedako yathā 'traivābhyupetyavāde vakṣyati sa eṣa devatāyāgasaṃbandho vidhīyamāna ityādi | taccā ' 'khyātasya bhedaśaktau vihatāyāṃ bhavatīti tadeva tāvatprathamaṃ parīkṣyate | kimekamapūrvamiti—phalataḥ karmabhedābhedopanyāso, yadvā kimekaṃ karmāpūrvaṃ codayatyuta pañcāpi karmāṇyapūrvāṇīti | kiṃ prāptam | ekamapūrvamiti | kutaḥ |
api ca |

lg.l: pūrvaṃ tenaiva śabdena buddhau karma niveśitam |

div.p:
yathaiva yajatiśabdaḥ sakṛtpratyakṣeṇāvagataḥ punaruccāraṇe sa eveti pratyanijñānānna bhidyate | tathā tadartho 'pi, yathā cātraiva buddhabodhanakṛtpratyakṣamanarthakamapi bhavanna śaknoti śabdāntaratvaṃ kartumevaṃ punaḥ śrutirarthāntaratvam | na hyānarthakyaṃ nāma kvacitpramāṇavarge 'ntarbhavati | yacca vedo 'vabodhayati tanmātrameva tatpramāṇavādibhirabhyupagantavyam | tadihaikaśabdenābhede vedenāvagamite yo 'nyatvaṃ kalpayati tena veda evāpramāṇīkṛtaḥ syāt | na ca pramāṇāvagatamānarthakyaṃ doṣāya | asti veyamapi gatiḥ | prayogavacanasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ śabdo 'rthamavadadhatsvayaṃ prayogitvena
mantravatkarmakālaprayojyatvamekaṃ prayojanamabhyāsasyetyarthaḥ | gṛhyata iti | atha vā ' 'bhīkṣṇyādi
pratipradhānaprayogamāvṛttirābhīkṣṇyaṃ nāma |dyotanārtho 'bhyāso bhaviṣyati | asti hi loke dvirvacanādatirekeṇāpi yāvatkṛtvo 'myaste vivakṣitārthapra
kāśanaṃ bhavati tāvatkṛtvo 'bhyāsaḥ | tathā ca pañcendro
indrasya tvaṣṭṛputravadhāttejo dharmamāviśadbalaṃ vāyuṃ rūpamaśvinau dehārdhamātmanyatiṣṭhattataḥ pāṇḍupatnyāṃ kuntyāṃ dharmeṇa nikṣiptaṃ tejo yudhiṣṭhiro 'bhavadvāyunikṣiptaṃ balaṃ bhīma indranikṣiptaṃ dehārdhamarjuno 'śvibhyāṃ mādryāṃ nikṣiptaṃ rūpaṃ nakulasahadevāviti pañcāpīndrāvayavaprakṛtitvādindrā eveti paccendropākhyānaṃ draṣṭavyam |pākhyāne vṛddhakumārīvaraprārthane patiṃ me dehīti pañcakṛtvo 'bhyāsaḥ śrūyate | na ca yathā devatāyāśchalaprā
chalamiti—arthāntaravivakṣayā prayuktasya śabdasyārthāntaraparikalpanayā pratyavasthānamityarthaḥ |hitvamevamiha kasyacit | yena patipañcakavatpañcayāgakalpanā syāt | atha vā sarveṣvapyuccāraṇeṣu vidhāvāśrīyamāṇe karmaikatvaṃ vijñāyate | yathā śākhāntarīyeṣu jyotiṣṭomādivākyeṣu | tena tulyārthānāṃ vaikalpikatvāttadeva karma kadācitsamidvākyenābhidhāsyate kadācittanūnapādvākyena | na hi samānakāryatvena vrīhiyavayorekasyā ' 'narthakyādarthāntarasādhakatvaṃ vijñāyate | atha vā tanūnapādādidevatāvidhānārthatvānnā ' 'narthakyam | karmavidhāne hi sati nāmadheyatvaṃ bhavedanuvāde tu nāmadheyavidhirna saṃbhavatīti guṇavidhitvam | tasmādapyakarmāntaram | yatrāpi ca pradeśāntare tāveva śabdārthau pratyabhijñāyete tatrāpi hi gṛhānnirgatasya punargṛhajanapratyabhijñāyāmivārthāntaratvamaśakyaṃ vaktum | kimutehānantaraviparivṛttyā balīyasyā 'varuddhāyāṃ buddhau | yadi ca pratyuccāraṇamarthānyatvaṃ bhavettadā 'nityavyaktiśabdārthatvaprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: vyaktyaikatve nirụ̄dhe ca kathaṃ karmāntaraṃ bhavet ||

div.p: yadyapi ca punaḥśrutyarthavattvāya pañcakṛtvo yāgo 'bhyasyeta tathā 'pi jyotiṣṭomavadevākarmāntaratvaṃ syāt | na cātrābhyāsaheturasti | vākyasaṃyogena devatānāṃ vaikalpikatvāt | tasmādeko yāga iti | evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ | ekasyāpi punaḥ śrutirevaṃ syādyathā śabdāntaraṃ bhedakaṃ tathetyarthaḥ | katham |
yadi hi viparivṛttiranuvādakāraṇaṃ syāttato na karmāntaramadhyavasīyeta | na tu viparivṛttikṛtamanuvādakatvaṃ, kiṃ tarhi |

yadā hi vidhāyakasya vidhiśaktirdhātvarthāduttāryate tadā 'nekavidhyaśakterdhātvarthānuvādaḥ prārthyate | tāṃ ca prārthanāṃ viparivṛttiḥ pūrayati | dhātvarthottāraṇaṃ ca vidhiśaktervidheyāntaropādānanimittaṃ yathā “vrīhibhiryajeta,” “dadhnā juhoti” iti | sarvatraivānekārthopādāne vidhiśaktyanekatvāsaṃbhavādekaṃ kiṃcidanūdyatāmityapekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ yadviparivartate tadityavadhāraṇaṃ bhavati | tataśca dadhyāderaprāptatvāddhātvartho 'nūdyate | yadā tu khalu naivānekaṃ vidheyamupādīyate tadā naiva tasminvākye 'nūdyatāṃ kiṃcidityapekṣyate | tataścāprāpte sāmānyānuvāde tatsiddhyapekṣiṇī viśeṣānuvādakāraṇabhūtā kiṃ viparivṛttiḥ kariṣyati | tasmānna yatprāptaṃ tadanūdyata iti lakṣaṇam | kiṃ tarhi, yadanūdyatāmityapokṣitam, tatprāptau satyāmanūdyate | naikāṅgavikalamanuvādatvāpekṣaṇena prāptibuddhimātreṇa vā | tatra yathaivānuvādāpekṣaṇe satyapi prāptyabhāvādviśiṣṭavidhānarūpeṇa vidhirbhavatyevaṃ prāptibuddhau satyāmapyanuvādatvānapekṣaṇādvidheḥ karmāntaratvaṃ satyapi dhātupratyayaikatvapratyabhijñāne | yattu balīyasyā viparivṛttyā śatakṛtvo 'pyukte tadbuddhirnnāpaitīti, pramāṇabalābalajñānātsarvaṃ saṃbhāvyameva tat | tathā hi |

vidhāyikā hi śrutiranyānākṣiptā dhātvarthabhāvanayoreva saṃniruddhā tatraivāprāptaviṣayasvabhāvaṃ vidhitvaṃ prasuvānā pañcamasthānākhyapramāṇakṛtāṃ prāptabuddhimupamṛdya vidheyatvakṣamaṃ karmāntaraṃ kalpayati | sa cedvidhiḥ śrutimanurudhyeta karmāntaramadhyavasyati, atha saṃnidhiṃ tato na karmāntaratvam | yatra punarvidhiśrutiranyatra vyāpriyate tatrāvirodhātsaṃnidhikṛtaṃ karmaikatvajñānaṃ bhavati | tasmādiha vidheyayāgavyaktiphalatvopāttasāmānyaikatvanimittaiva pratyabhijñānabhrāntiḥ | na hi vyaktipratyabhijñāne kiṃcitkāraṇamasti | yadatra paramārthena pratyabhijñāyate tadekatve na kaścidvivādaḥ | tathā hi |
nanu cātra yajiśrutyaivaikakarmavijñānānna vaktavyaṃ saṃnidhikṛtamevaikatvamiti | naitadevam |

lg.l: sa evetyanya eveti vyāpāro 'syā na vidyate ||

div.p: na hi yaḥ pūrvavihito yāgaḥ sa evāyamiti yajatiśabdo vadati | audāsīnyenaiva tvabhidadhāne śabde saṃnidhikṛtāmabhedabuddhimanabhijānatāṃ śrutinimittā pratyabhijñānabhrāntiḥ | nanu tava vyakteraśabdārthatvādabhinnaṃ sāmānyaṃ śrutyā vijñāyate | yenaiva vyaktiraśabdārtha stenaivānekakarmatāṃ śrutirbodhayatīti | katham |

yatsāmānyaṃ śabdārthabhūtaṃ tasyānanuṣṭheyatvenāvidheyatvātsarvatra vyaktaya eva vidhīyante | tatra samidho yajatītyekā vyaktirasādhāraṇā codyate tanūnapātaṃ yajatītyaparā | tasmātpañca vyaktaya iti siddham | yattvatra gakārādivad vyaktyākṛtibhedo nāstīti | satyaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu |

yathaiva gakārādīnāṃ varṇatvaśabdatvaguṇatveṣu satsu drutādibhedasya paropādhitvādgakārādirūpaikatvasiddhergatvādimātraṃ na kalpitam, tathā 'tra sattākarmayāgatveṣu samidyāgādiparyanteṣu satsu deśakālayajamānādibhedāddrutādivṛttisthānīyānna bhedaḥ | tathā hi |

na ca yatra pratyakṣeṇa kevalena bhedo 'vagamyate tadevaikaṃ bhidyate | śabdasyāpi prāmāṇyāviśeṣāt | ato 'tra śabdāntarādiṣaṭkāvadhireva bhedo 'vadhārayitavyaḥ | na hīṣṭipaśusomaikāhāhīnasatreṣu paropādhirbhedapratyayo viparyeti vā kadācit | tena tāsu vidheyarūpāsu vyaktiṣveva nityāsvabhivyañcakāni bhidyante | tebhyaśca phalasvarūpasiddhiryāgatvameva vaikamavāntarasāmānyaṃ nānyatkiṃcit | nanvekāhatvādīnyapyavāntarasāmānyānīṣyante | na, kālaviśeṣayogādeva daṇḍyādivadabhinnaśabdapratyayapravṛttisiddheḥ | ekena hyahnā yogādekāhatvam | dvyādibhirahīnatvaṃ prāgdvādaśāhāt, sa tu kathamapyubhayātmā, tadavadhikameva cā ' 'sahasrasaṃvatsaraṃ satatakālayoganimittaṃ satratvaṃ, havirviśeṣayogādiṣṭyāditvamiti siddham | athāpyavāntarasāmānyāni punaḥ kalpyante, tathā 'pyasmatpakṣāvirodhaḥ | evaṃ yadi jyotiṣṭomatvādīni deśakālādibhedācca tadvyaktayo 'tyantātirekiṇyo bhavanti tathā 'pyadoṣaḥ | tathā yadyapi devatoddeśadravyatyāgātmakatvātsarva evaiko yāgaḥ kalpyate teṣvapi
bhedapramāṇaistadanuṣṭhānanānātvāvagamādvyavahārasiddhiḥ | nanvevaṃ sati jyotiṣṭomagrahāmyāsavatsamidādiyāgābhyāseṣvakarmāntaratvaprasaṅga | sarvathā tāvadapūrvabhedāddharmavyavasthādīni sidhyanti, tathā 'pi tu yeha karmabhedabuddhirgrahayāgeṣu cābhyāsabhedaprasiddhiḥ, tatraitannimittaṃ, iha sakalayāgarūpānuṣṭhānabhedacodanāttatra punaḥ samastābhyāsātmakasya jyotiṣṭomasaṃjñatvādyadyapi pratyabhyāsaṃ yāgatvamasti na tu jyotiṣṭomatvamityabhyāse 'vayavabuddhirnetaratrāvayavyantararūpānupādānāditi viśeṣaḥ | etajjñānasya ca prayojanaṃ paśusomādhikaraṇe(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 6) vakṣyāmaḥ | tasmādabhyasitavyo yāga iti ca bhāṣyametatpakṣāśrayaṇenaiva | athavā bhinnāsveva vyaktiṣu sāmānyāpekṣamabhyāsavacanam | nanūktaṃ na śaknotyarthāntaraṃ vidhātumiti—vidhiśaktestanūnapādādidevatāvidhānākṣepe sati viparivṛtteravirodha iti manyate | tatra ‘tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram’(a. 1 pā. 4 a. 3 sū. 4 ) ityevaṃ samidādipadānāṃ kramaviniyuktaivaṃliṅgamantravarṇakalpitadevatāsaṃbandhadvāreṇa nāmadheyatve satyavidheyatvānnāsti vidhiśaktyākṣepa iti vaktavye devatāyāgasaṃbandhavidhānopanyāso 'bhyupetyavādena | yattāvadbhavānaprāptatvātprathamasya yāgavidhitvaṃ manyate tadayuktaṃ tasyāpi pradhānayāgānuvādatvāt | tatra samidādiśabdairdravyaṃ devatā vā vidhīyate | ubhayamapi cā ' 'gneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityādibhirutpattivākyairvihitena dravyadevatena virudhyate | avaśyaṃ caitadvākyakṛto devatāyāgasaṃbandhaḥ karttavyaḥ, sa ca yāgāntarādṛte na saṃbhavatīti pratipādite guṇavidhitve karmāntaratvamāpadyate | evaṃ pūrvatra karmaṇyuttarottaraguṇavidhyasaṃbhavātsarveṣāṃ karmāntaratvamiti vyartho guṇavidhyupanyāsaśramaḥ | guṇavidhitvamapi na tāvad dravyamīdṛśena śabdena saṃbhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ saktvadhikaraṇe( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 12) | viśeṣeṇa ca yajateḥ karmabhūtadravyasaṃbandho na ghaṭate, na vā 'yaṃ devatāvidhiriti navame vakṣyate | tasmātkarmavidhibhireva bhedasiddhiḥ || 2 ||
samastān darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇayāgavidhīnudāhṛtya kiṃ sarveṣāṃ pradhānatvamuta keṣāṃ cideveti bhāṣyakāreṇa vicāraḥ prastutaḥ | tatrābhidhīyate—

abhyāsalakṣaṇabhedānantarabhidānīṃ saṃkhyānimittaṃ bhedamavicāryaiva kathamayaṃ lakṣaṇānaupayiko 'rthaścintyate | kecidāhuḥ | ayamapi lakṣaṇārtha eva, anantaraṃ pradhānāpradhānāni parīkṣiṣyanta iti vacanāt | tattvayuktam | tatraiva
(a. 2 pā. 1 a. 1) ityatra bhāvanābhedānuniṣpādyapūrvabhedābhedasidhyarthaṃ dravyaṃ prati pradhānānyapradhānānīti vicāryata ityevaṃ vyākhyātatvādityarthaḥ | paryanuyujya vacanasyānyathaiva vyākhyānāt | apūrvabhedapratītyartho hi sa tṛtīyasiddho 'rtho 'tropanyasta ityuktam | ayaṃ tu karmaṇāmaṅgāṅgibhāvo na kathaṃ citsaṃbadhyate | mahatā prayatnenāyaṃ caturthe sādhayiṣyate (a. 4 pā. 4 a. 11 sū. 29)“darśapūrṇamāsayorijyāḥ pradhānānī”tyatrādhikaraṇe, sphuṭatvācca nānyathā tannetuṃ śakyate | tasmādihāvicāraṇīyametat | ya evaṃ vidvānityevaṃ saṃyuktau prakṛtānuvādāvatha vā 'pūrvakarmavidhī tatretare guṇavidhaya ityapi sarvaṃ yathopanyastenāpyadhikaraṇārthena na
cintādvayamekasminnadhikaraṇe na vaktumucitamityāśayaḥ |saṃgacchate 'tha tvetadeva vicāryate tataḥ pūrvaṃ nopanyasitavyam | api ca—

śabdāntaratvādabhyāsācca bhedastāvaducyate samapradhānatvamapyetābhyāmeva pratipādyata ityapūrvā yuktiḥ | na vā 'dhikaraṇadvayaśarīrasya viviktāḥ pakṣahetavo dṛśyante yena tantreṇa
vicāradvayamidaṃ prastutamityadhyavasyema | tasmādevaṃ samarthayitavyam | ihābhyāsalakṣaṇabhedātiprasaṅgāpavādārthamadhikaraṇe ārabhyamāṇe yathodāhṛtānāṃ madhye dve evodāharaṇe ‘ya evaṃ vidvānpaurṇamāsīṃ yajate’ ‘ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajata’ iti | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kimetau yajatiśabdāvapūrvayoḥ karmaṇorvidhāyakāvuta paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdābhyāṃ svābhidheyakālaviśeṣayuktakarmapratipādakābhyāṃ viśeṣyamāṇau prakṛtāneva kāṃścidyāgānanuvadata iti | tatretareṣāmāgneyādīnāṃ guṇātprayājādīnāmabhyāsādāghārādīnāṃ śabdāntaratvātsiddhe bhede 'dhikaraṇapakṣadvayaprayojanabhūtasamapradhānabhāvāṅgāṅgibhāvaviṣayatvenopanyāso nādhikaraṇaśarīraviṣayatvena | na hi samapradhānatvamaṅgāṅgibhāvaścādhikaraṇapakṣāvityuktam | tadiha paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktayorvidhātṛtvaṃ tadabhidheyakarmabhedaḥ samastāghārādīnāṃ samaprādhānyamityetattrayamuttarottaraphalatvenāvinābhāvasaṃbandhādekaḥ pakṣaḥ, tathā tayoranuvādatvaṃ tadbhāvyakarmābheda aāgneyādīnpratyādhārādīnāmaṅgatvamiti tenaiva prakāreṇāparastrikaḥ | tritayasya tritayasya ca svāṃśāvinābhāvādekasiddhyaivetaradvayasiddhirmavatīti pakṣadvaye 'pi yadeva sādhitaṃ tenaiveṣṭasiddhiṃ matvā phalabhūtastṛtīyastṛtīyoṃ 'śa upanyastaḥ | tatra cārthagṛhītāvapi bhedābhedau vispaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ punarante darśitau | kimarthaṃ punarādau vyavahitayoḥ samapradhānāṅgāṅgibhāvadvāreṇa bhedābhedayorupanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ | eṣā hyācāryasya śailīti kecit | tathā hi pūrvādhikaraṇayorapyapūrvabhedamevopanyastavān | atha vā yalliṅgadarśanaṃ vakṣyati vikṛtau prayājādayo dṛśyanta iti tatsākṣādbhedanirākaraṇāyāsamarthaṃ samapradhānabhāvaṃ nirākariṣyati, tannirākaraṇe ca satyavinābhāvādvidhibhedāvapi nirākṛtāveva bhavata iti tadupajīvanāyetthamupanyāsaḥ | kevalabhedopanyāse tu tadasaṃbaddhameva syāt | tatra dvedhā pūrvapakṣo bhaviṣyati | ekaḥ samaprādhānyadvāreṇā ' 'gneyādīnāṃ karmavidhitve satyeva paurṇamāsyamāvasyāsaṃyuktayostaddvyatiriktakarmavidhānāt, aparaḥ punastayoreva karmavidhitvamitareṣāṃ tu guṇavidhānārthatvamityevaṃ, prathamaṃ tāvaddvyatirekapakṣaṃ parigṛhṇāti śabdāntaratvādabhyāsācca samapradhānānīti | yadyapi caitau hetū sākṣātsamapradhānatvena na saṃgacchete tathā 'pi tatpratijñānena yo 'rthādbhedaḥ pratijñātastena saṃbandhādekavākyatvam | etaduktaṃ bhavati | ayāgebhyaḥ śabdāntaratvādyāgebhyaścābhyā
sādbhedastataśca samapradhānānīti | na ca samastānuvādasya kiṃ citprayojanamasti | na ca guṇaphalanimittānāṃ kiṃcicchrūyate yatra vidhivyāpārataḥ karmasvarūpavidhānamupekṣeta | na caiṣā saṃjñā keṣu citprakṛteṣu prasiddhā | vartamānāpadeśe 'pi ca sati prayogavacanārthavādapañcamalakārādīnāmanyatamena ‘samidho yajati’ ityādivadvidhiḥ | satyapi ca yacchabdopabandhe "yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla" ityādivat vidhiśaktyanavalopaḥ | na ca śākhāntarīyavadvidhivikalpaḥ | śākhāntarāṇāṃ puruṣāntaraṃ prati pratipādanenārthavattvāt | na tviha karmāntarakalpanādanyat prayojanamasti | na ca kasya cidanyasya vidheḥ stutiḥ saṃbhavati ekavākyatvābhāvāt | kiṃ punaranayoḥ karmaṇordravyadevatam | taducyate—

“sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyata”tai. brā. (3-3-5) iti sarvārthatvādyathaivoṣāṃśuyājasya dhrauvājyadravyakatvamevamanayorapi yāgayoḥ | tathā ' 'jyabhāgayoḥ krame catasro 'nuvākyāḥ paṭhyante | dve āgneyyau dve saumyau | te balīyasā vākyenāvacchidyānayoḥ karmaṇorvidhīyete “vārtraghnī paurṇamāsyāmanūcyete” “vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyām”tai. saṃ. (2-5-2) iti | na hi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdābhyāmetatkarmavyatiriktamanyadihocyate | nanu kālavacanāvetāviha prayujyete | kiṃ kālasya mantrasaṃbandhena | dṛṣṭaśca saptamīnirdiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pradhānabhāvastadyathā “yena karmaṇertsettatra jayāṃ juhuyāt” iti | tenānuvākyādvayasya tulyārthatayā vikalpyamānasyānurūpā yājyā 'pi kalpayitavyā | atha vā yugapadvidhānātsamuccaye sati dvidevatyakarmādhyavasāyād dve dve yājye api kalpayitavye | yadvaikaivāgnīṣomadevatyā | atha vā vārtraghnyorevaikā yājyā kartavyā tathā vṛdhanvatyoḥ | ataśca śrutivihitamantrakarmasaṃbandhānyathānupapattyā 'gnīṣomau devatobhayatrādhyavasīyate | ājyabhāgayostu purākalpasarūpeṇa vākyena devatā tāvatprāptaiva | ‘yasyai kasyai ciddevatāyai havirnirvapan ājyasyaiva nau purastādyajan’ iti | yājyāprāptiścābādhitaivānuvākyāgamaśca dāśatayībhyaḥ kartavya iti na kiṃ cidviruddham | tasmādasti karmāntaratve 'pi rūpamiti bhedo 'taśca samapradhānāni | bheda iti gṛhṇīmaḥ samapradhānatvaṃ tu na mṛṣyāmahe | kutaḥ |

lg.l: phalaṃ ca tadviśiṣṭebhya iti sāmyaṃ na yujyate ||

div.p: darśapūrṇamāsābhidhāne hi viśiṣṭayāgavācinī, tena tanmātrasyaiva phalatvāditareṣāṃ tatsaṃnidhānādaṅgatvena bhavitavyam | atrābhidhīyate—

sarvatra nāmayuktakarmavidhāne sāmānādhikaraṇyātkadācidyajyarthaviśeṣo nāmnā nirūpyate kadā cinnāmārtho yajinā | yo yatra pūrvataraprasiddhārtho bhavati sa itaraṃ svaviṣaye sthāpayati | yathā jyotiṣṭomenetyatra jyotirbhistrivṛdādibhiḥ staumairyogātprasiddhārthena nāmnā dakṣiṇīyādibhyo yaṃjirnivartya somayāge sthāpyate | tathā rājasūyenetyatra nāpa yāgāyāgaviṣayatvenopaplavamānaṃ prakṛtayāgaprasiddhena yajinā svaviṣayaṃ nīyate | tadiha prātipadikadvayasamāsadvivacanārthānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsapadopāttānāṃ na kvacitprasiddhirasti yayā yajestadviṣayatvaṃ vijñāyeta | yajiḥ punaryāgamātre prasaktaḥ sannadhikāreṇa prakṛteṣu sthāpitaḥ śaknotyaprasiddhaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaṃ svaviṣaye niyantum | tataśca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmityavivakṣitāvayavasamāsārthadvitvaṃ varṇalolībhā
samudāyaśaktyā—rụ̄dhyetyarthaḥ |vamātrarūpeṇa kevalakaraṇasaṃvādiprakṛtāśeṣayāganāmatvaṃ rājasūyaśabdavatpratipadyate | ‘supāṃ supo bhavanti’ iti bahuvacanasya sthāne dvivacanaṃ samastasamudāyagataikavacanasya vā | kathaṃ punardarśapūrṇamāsābhyāmityaprasiddham | yadā tāvat—

lg.l: vācyakālayujo yāgāḥ prakṛtāḥ santi ke cana |

div.p: tannāmāśeṣasvārthaparityāgenātyantaparānurodhivṛttiṃ bhajate yatra kaścidapyaṃśo 'prasiddhaḥ | iha tu darśena kālena paurṇamāsena ca saṃyuktā āgneyādiyāgā vidyante | dvitvayuktāścā ' 'jyabhāgādayasteṣāmayuktaḥ parityāga iti | taducyate |

yadyapyāgneyādiṣu svābhidheyakālayogātprātipadikaṃ varteta tathā 'pi teṣāṃ bahutvād dvitvānupapatterasamarthaṃ padaṃ, yatrāpi dvitvamastyāghārayorājyabhāgayorvā tatrāpi prātipadikasyātyantamaśaktiḥ | na cārthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarairvispaṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamasti, yena kena cidvarṇasāmānyādākhyāvikāranyāyena gauṇatvena vā tadviṣayatvamadhyavasīyeta | kasmātpunarimāvevāpūrvau pūrṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃjñakau dvau yāgau phalāya na vidhīyete | tathā hi |

lg.l: tāveva samudāyau dvau vidhāsyete phalaṃ prati ||

div.p: yadi kaściddarśapūrṇamāsaśabdayoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayośca vailakṣaṇyānna pūrvakarmapratyabhijñānaṃ phalavākye 'stīti brūyātsa vaktavyastulyaste doṣo 'yamiti | tavāpi hi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃjñakāveva samudāyau phalavantāviṣṭau | na ca tayoḥ prayogavākye 'sti śabdatvātpratyabhijñānam | atha tatra vinā 'pi saṃjñānusāreṇa kālayogādvṛttiriṣyate sa mamāpyastyeva kālayogaḥ "paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta" "amāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajeta" iti | naitadevam | evamapi hi—
na hyaṣṭānāṃ kālasaṃyoge satyavadhāraṇe heturasti, yenānayoreva phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāt | syādetat | eteṣāṃ madhye yayoḥ kayościtphalasaṃbandha iti | tadayuktam |

vinā viśeṣahetunā yāgatvakālasaṃbandhasāmye sati yāveva gṛhītau tatraivetareṣāṃ prādhānyaprāmāṇyabhājāṃ satāmaṅgatvāpādanād viruddhatā syāt | atha vikalpena sarveṣāṃ pākṣiko 'nugrahaḥ kalpyeta tatrāpi tasyaiva kadā citpradhānatvaṃ kadā cidaṅgatvamiti vipratiṣiddham | ubhayātmanāṃ cāṅgatayā pravṛtteḥ pradhānatvena ca nivṛtterāgneyādīnāṃ vikṛtigamane yāvajjīvaṃ saṃśayaprasaṅgaḥ | sarvasaṃkhyāśca kena cidavāntarasāmānyāvacchedena saṃkhyeyeṣu vartante | na vā 'pūrvayorāgneyādīnāṃ vā samastānāmekadeśe vā kiṃcidavāntarasāmānyaṃ dṛśyate yena dvitvamavadhāryeta | ya eva hi gṛhītastasyaiva yāgāntarāpekṣayodbhūtena bahutvena kevalātmāpekṣeṇa caikatvena dvitvaṃ bādhyate | tataśca dvivacanasyāprasiddhiḥ | siddhānte tu śabdadvayena samudāyadvayāpādanādasamudāyīkṛtayāgavailakṣaṇyādavāntaradharmayogātsaṃbhavati dvitvayogastadvaśena ca kālayogātkathaṃ ciddarthapūrṇamāsaprātipadikayorapi vṛttisiddhirityupapadyate yāgaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ na tu pūrvapakṣe samudāyatvāpādanābhāvātsaṃkhyāvṛttiriti prakṛtayāgamātra eva phalasaṃbandhaḥ | atha kasmādaṣṭāveva yāgāḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālagatadvitvāpekṣayā labdhaviśeṣaṇāḥ santo na vidhīyante | yathā siddhānte samudāyagatadvitvāpekṣayā ṣaḍ vidhāsyante | nedṛśenāsphuṭena prakṛtayāgamātrāvalambyā ' 'khyātaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum | na cātyantavyatirekātkālagatā saṃkhyā yāgasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśārhā bhavati | samudāyasamudāyinostvavyatirekādaviruddhaḥ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhānte | tasmātpūrvapakṣe yajivaśenaiva nāmapadavṛtteraviśeṣeṇa sarve yāgāḥ samapradhānāḥ | tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate | prakaraṇaṃ paurṇa
māsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktayorālambanaṃ syāt | prakriyata iti prakaraṇam | atha vā prakaraṇaṃ tayoḥ sahakāri bhavettataśca tanmātrapratipādyo 'rtho grahītavyaḥ | kutaḥ—

na hyanena yajinā paurṇamāsyamāvasyāpadābhyāṃ vā yāgamātre buddhiḥ kriyate | na ca prakṛtakarmagrahaṇaṃ tvatpakṣe 'sti | tatrājñātarūpe satyapūrve karmaṇi na kathaṃcitpravarteta | tataśca vākyamevānarthakaṃ bhavet | prakṛtagrahaṇe tu teṣāṃ dravyadevatāyogādetatkālavartitvācca rūpajñānādarthavattvam | nanūktaṃ matpakṣe 'pyasti dravyadevatamiti | satyam |

na hi māntravarṇikī devatā saṃbhavati | mantrāṇāṃ kramaviśeṣeṇā ' 'jyabhāgārthatvāt | na cāsya vākyena bādhaḥ | virodhabhāvāt | sarvatra hyavirodhena vākye niviśamāne virodhapakṣastyaktavyaḥ | iha
vārtraghnī paurṇamāsyāmanūcyete, vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyāmityanayorvākyayorityarthaḥ | ca paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau yadi karmavacanāveva syātāṃ tato na virodhaḥ parihriyeta | kālavacanatve tvanayoravirodhaḥ | sādhāraṇyāccāvirodhapakṣa eva samarthanīyaḥ | kiṃ ca |

yadi hi sarvalokaprasiddhaḥ kālo 'tra na samaveyāttatastadatikrameṇa karmaṇī gṛhyeyātām | api copapannatarā kālavacanatve saptamī, tasya sarvatraiva kālasyādhikaraṇatvānna karmaṇo 'dhikaraṇatvānupapatteryathā kathaṃ citkalpanīyaṃ syāt | yattu kiṃ kālasya mantrasaṃbandheneti, yadi tādarthyalakṣaṇa evaikaḥ saṃbandho bhavetsa cātrāsmābhirucyeta tata evaṃ yujyate vaktum | iha tvājyabhāgau prati tādarthye vyavasthite saṃkare ca prāpte kālabhedena prayujyamānayormantrayorvyavasthāmātraṃ kriyate vārtraghnī paurṇamāsīsthayorājyabhāgayorvṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāsthayoriti | kiṃ ca |

sarvatraivā ' 'kāṅkṣāpūrvakaḥ saṃbandho bhavati | ājyabhāgau ca prajñātāgnīṣomadevatyau tadabhidhānasamarthamantrākāṅkṣitvādayatnena mantrān gṛhṇītaḥ | tvatpakṣe tvapūrvayoḥ karmaṇorajñātadevatvānna mantrāpekṣā | tataśca mantratadviśeṣadvitvādikalpanādanapekṣitānekārthavidhiprasaṅgaḥ | punaśca māntravarṇikānekadevatākalpanā | na hyekasya karmaṇo 'nekayā devatayā 'nekayā 'nuvākyayā kāryamasti | punaścāśrutayājyākalpanāśrayaṇamājyabhāgayoścāśrutapuronuvākyākalpanam | yaccaikā yājyaikā cā 'nuvākyā bhaviṣyatīti | na tat | anuvākyāsamākhyābādhāt | api ca tvatpakṣe liṅgasyāviniyojakatvādvākye ca karaṇatvenā ' 'śrayaṇāt “vaiṣṇavīmanūcya” ityādivadadṛṣṭārthaprasakterna prakāśakatā, prakāśyenānapekṣitatvāt | māntravarṇikadevatākalpanātaśca varamārādupakārakatvam | ājyabhāgayoḥ punardvitvātprajñātadvidevatatvācca prakāśyākāṅkṣitāḥ prakāśakā mantrā liṅgakramaviniyuktāḥ santa ekāntena dṛṣṭārthatāṃ pratipadyante | tatra ca mantratadviśeṣadvitvādiṣu prāpteṣu kāladvāreṇa vyavasthāmātravidhānāllāghavaṃ vākyasya, na vā ' 'narthakyam | na hi saṃnidhānādvyavasthā siddhā | tasmānna devatāvidhirasaṃbandhāt | ataścārūpatvādakarmāntaratā | kiṃ punaḥ samastānuvādasya prayojanaṃ, paśya—
ucyate |

vākyadvayena hi samudāyadvaye kalpite darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiti dvivacanaṃ sidhyatītyarthavattvam | na hi vidhirevaikaḥ prayojanavāniti kaścinniyamaheturasti | avidherapi vidhiśeṣatvenārthavattvāt | na vā 'tra viprakīrṇānāmāgneyādīnāmetadvākyadvayamantareṇa dvitvasaṃkhyāyogitvaṃ saṃbhavati | etadeva cābhipretyāsya pakṣasya prayojanameva guṇapradhānatvamādita upanyastam | itarathā hi ‘aviśeṣādanarthakaṃ hi syāt’(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 2) ityasyottaramaparikalpyānuvādapakṣo durupa
nyāsa eva syāt | tasmādasti prayojanaṃ samastavākyānuvāde 'pītyadoṣaḥ | kathaṃ punaratyantabhinnānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudāyīkaraṇaṃ śakyaṃ, śakyamiti brūmaḥ |

yathaiva hyekadeśāvasthitānvṛkṣānālocya venamiti samudāyabuddhirbhavatyevamekakālayuktakarmasamudāyanāmadheyabuddhiḥ | tadgataikatvāvadhāraṇācca paurṇamāsīmityekavacananirdeśaḥ | samudāyivacanāveva caitau tallakṣitasamudāyagatasaṃkhyādvāreṇaikavacanāntatvaṃ bibhrāte | na samudāyayoreva nāmadheye bhavataḥ | tathā hi |

“paurṇamāsīṃ yajate” iti yajisāmānādhikaraṇyādyāganāmadheyametaditi gamyate | na cā ' 'gneyādīnāṃ samudāye yāgatvaṃ samavetaṃ, kiṃ tarhi | pratyekamāgneyādiṣu | tasmādyathaiveteṣu pratyekaṃ yajirevaṃ nāmadheyamapi | na ca samudāyotpattirekena kālena yuktā | āgneyādīnāmutpattikāle parasparānapekṣatvena samudāyatvānupajananāt | tataḥ kālavaśenāpi pratyekaṃ nāmadheyamiti śakyaṃ vaktum | yadi ca samudāyinairapekṣyeṇa samudāyayorete nāmanī syātāṃ tataḥ prayogavākyenāpi samudāyau phale vidhīyeyātāṃ, tato 'vayavānāmasādhanatvātsamudāyādekamapūrvam | ataśca pratyekāpūrvāṇāmabhāvātkarmabhedavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ | sarvadharmāṇāṃ caikāpūrvanibandhanatvātsaṃkīrṇavṛttitvaṃ syāt | na ca pratyekamitikartavyatayā ' 'gneyādayaḥ saṃbadhyeran | tataśca tadgatatantrāvṛttiprayogādivicārāsaṃbaddhatvaṃ bhavet | na ca pratyekavikāre sauryādau samastetikartavyatātideśaḥ syātsahasrādiśabdavaccāvayavavṛttyabhāvādekapuroḍāśā paurṇamāsī, sāṃnāyyarahitā 'māvāsyetyevamādivyavahārocchedaprasaṅgaḥ | saṃghātasyācoditatvātsaṃghātasya guṇatvādityevamādiṣu spaṣṭamevaṃprakārāṇāṃ samudāyivacanatvamabhyupagatam | itarathā hi sa eva śabdābhihitatvāccodyeta phalasaṃbandhācca pradhānaṃ bhavet | tasmādupasarjanībhūtasamudāyāḥ samudāyina evābhidhīyante | teṣāṃ tu bahutvād bahuvacanaprasaṅgena lakṣaṇayaikavacanayoga ityabhipretya samudāyaśabdatayā 'vakalpiṣyata ityāha | tathā ca bhavati hi bahūnāmekavacanāntaḥ samudāyāpekṣa iti—apekṣāmātrameva samudāyasya bravīti nābhidheyatvam | yūthavanaśabdāvapi yadā samudāyopasarjanasamudāyivacanau tadā sākalyena dṛṣṭāntau, yadā tu samudāyameva brūtastadā tannimittaikavacanalābhamātreṇa dṛṣṭāntatvam |
etena darśapūrṇamāsaśabdāvetatparyāyau vyākhyātau | tasmādasti samudāyadvitvāpekṣānimittaikatvadvayapratyayasiddhiḥ samudāyānuvādaprayojanam | yathā vakṣyati ( a. 4 pā. 4 a. 11 sū. 34 )‘pṛthaktvenābhidhānayorniveśa’ ityatra | taddvitvānusāriṇau hi darśapūrṇamāsaśabdau tadviṣayau bhavataḥ | asti ca paurṇamāsīpūrṇamāsaśabdayorbahu sārūpyaṃ, tatsāhacaryācca darśaśabdasyāmāvāsyāviṣayatvaṃ, viparyayahetutvena vā laghīyasyeva pratipattiryathā kāṇa iti cakṣuṣmān | tathā ca vakṣyati śakyate ca candramaso 'darśanāddarśa iti vaktum | tathā 'nvārambhaṇīyāvākyaśeṣe 'māvāsyādarśaśabdau samānādhikaraṇau darśayiṣyati, tena samudāyadvayopalakṣitānāṃ phalavattvāditareṣāmaṅgatvam | nanu caivaṃ satyanenaiva gatatvāccaturthe 'dhikaraṇaṃ nā ' 'rabdhavyam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sthite hyetasminprakṛtayajatimātragrahaṇāttatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, siddhāntastvetadadhikaraṇaprasādādbhaviṣyati’ itarathā tasya pūrvapakṣa eva syāditi prayojanatvenābhidhānam | idamaparaṃ samudāyānuvādaprayojanaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ‘paurṇamāsyā yajeta’ ‘amāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajeta’ iti kālasaṃyogaḥ | tatraitatsyāt | etadapi vākyamanarthakamutpattivākyādeva kālasaṃyogasiddheriti | ucyate |

utpattivākye hyanyoṃnyanirapekṣāṇāmāgneyādīnāṃ niraṅgānāṃ ca kālasaṃyogastadrūpatvenopādānāt | ayaṃ punastṛtīyāsaṃyogātkaraṇabhūtānām | teṣāṃ ca karaṇatvaṃ prayogavākyāditaraterayuktānāmaṅgasahitānāṃ cāvagatamiti tādṛśānāṃ tadanupādeyaṃ, kālaṃ pratyupādīyamānatvāt | samastarūpavivakṣāvaśena sāṅgastrikaḥ parasparasahitaścaikapaurṇamāsyā yukta ekayā cāmāvāsyayeti | yasmin kṣaṇa eko yāga ārabhya kriyamāṇaḥ samāptimanubhavati tasminnevetarāvityavadhāraṇātrikasya trikasya tantreṇa prayogaḥ siddho bhavati | autpattikakālānurodhe tu bhedenāṅgaviyuktānāṃ ca prayogaḥ syādityasti viśeṣaḥ | nanu caivaṃ sati samudāyadvayasyetaretarayuktasya karaṇatvānnā
nañ dvayaṃ samudāyadvayasāhityavivakṣādāṛdhyadyotakaṃ vijñeyam |ṅgasāhityavanna parasparatadvivakṣā 'pīti yathaivāṅgānāṃ tatkālavijñānamevaṃ paurṇamāsyā 'māvāsyā ' 'kṣiptā, amāvāsyayā ca paurṇamāsītyubhayorubhayatra prasaṅgaḥ, na votpattivākyaśiṣṭakālavirodhastatrāpyanuṣṭhānāt | na hi yaḥ paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāṃ karoti tenāmāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyā na kṛtā bhavati, tathā paurṇamāsī | na cotpattivākyena kālāntaraṃ niṣiddhaṃ, svakālapratipādanamātropakṣayāt | atrocyate—

lg.l: kālo yasya na vijñātaḥ svarūpaṃ ca na naśyati |

div.p: amāvāsya hyutpattikālanirākāṅkṣā paurṇamāsīsāhityalabhyaṃ paurṇamāsīkālaṃ na pratīcchatyevaṃ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālamityetayoḥ samudāyayoḥ kālāntarakaraṇe satyautpattikarūpavisaṃvādādadarśatvamapūrṇamāsatvaṃ ca syāt | aṅgānāṃ tvanirjñātakālatvena sākāṅkṣatvādutpattivisaṃvādābhāvāccāviruddhaḥ sāhityāpekṣalabhyaḥ kālaḥ | āha—
ucyate—

nanu dūrasthānyupakartuṃ na śaknuvanti | saṃnikṛṣṭasthairupakartavyamityetadvā kutaḥ | sarvatra vacanānusāreṇopakārānupakārāṃśau vijñāyete | tatra saṃnikarṣavacanābhāve viprakṛṣṭaṃ nopakarotīti na kiṃcitpramāṇam | nanu cānyenaiva vākyenaiṣa tantraprayogaḥ sidhyati, ‘ya iṣṭyā paśunā somena’ ityādīnāṃ tatrāpi karaṇavibhaktinirdeśādiṣṭeḥ svasamudāyisvāṅgasahitāyāḥ kālaṃ pratyupādānādīdṛśī vivakṣā labhyate | satyaṃ labhyate natviṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ sidhyati | tathā hi—

na tāvattrikasyeṣṭiśabdena grahaṇamityavadhāryate | tatra pratyekaṃ yāgatveneṣṭiśabdapravṛtterekaikasyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā prayoga iti na samyakprayogasiddhiḥ | atha samastānāmāgneyādīnāṃ kathaṃcidrụ̄dheḥ ‘pravṛttatvādiṣṭeḥ some pravṛttiḥ’( a. 8 pā. 1 a. 2 sū. 3 ) itivad grahaṇam | evamapi prayogavacanaikatvātsamudāyadvayasyāpi paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ vā 'nuṣṭhānaṃ syāt | tatra sa evotpattiśiṣṭakālavirodhaḥ | tadanurodhena vyavasthitavikalpāśrayaṇamiti cet | evamapi yathotpattyanurodhātpratyekānuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ | tathā 'ṅgānāṃ bhedena paurṇamāsyamāvāsye pratyupādānābhāvādyatra kva canaikatra pradeśe 'nuṣṭhānaṃ syāt | tasmānnaitadvākyaṃ tābhyāṃ tulyārthamiti prakṛtāvakiṃcitkaratvādvikṛtīreva sadyaskālatāyai gacchati | nanvanena tantraprayogaḥ sidhyet "same darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta" iti deśasyānupādeyatvātsāhityavivakṣopapatteḥ | tatrocyate |

lg.l: tena sarbairasāveko grāhyo na bahavaḥ samāḥ ||

div.p: bhedenāpi hi prayujyamānānāmananyadeśagamanamātreṇa deśatantratvasiddhiḥ | athetaretarayogavaśādyadaivaikaḥ samena yāgo yujyate tadaivetaro 'pīti tantratvamucyate | tathā sati ṣaṇṇāmapi yugapadupādānāttathaiva prayogaprasakteḥ sa eva virodhaḥ | yadi punarutpattivākyānurodhena pravartate tataḥ pratyekaṃ kālasaṃyuktānāṃ samaṃ prati sāhityaṃ saṃpādanīyamiti ṣaṭsveva paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsu prayogaḥ samāpyeta | aṅgāni ca tāvataḥ kālādanutkṛṣyamāṇāni prayoktavyānīti yatra kva canāntarāle kriyeran | atha vā pratipradhānāvṛtternyāyyatvādekaikaṃ pradhānaṃ sāṅgamapavṛjyeta | atha tu yāvatotpattikālo virudhyate tāvanmātraṃ parihāya yaugapadyena samasaṃbandhaḥ kartavya ityavadhāryeta tata ekasyāmeva paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ vā trikayoḥ prayujyamānayoryasya kasyacitsamīpe 'ṅgāni prayujyeran | atha vā tadardhamāsāntarāle yatra kvacanāhani | sarvo hyasau pradhānakālaḥ, pradhānakālābahirbhāvaśca saṃbhāvayitavyo nātyantasāmīpyamaśakyatvāttasmānnaitenāpyabhipretaprayogasiddhiḥ | anenaiva phalavākyamapi pratyuktaṃ, phalasyāpi deśavadevānupādeyatvātsarvānitaretarayuktānsāṅgānprati tantratve siddhe na prayogatantratvasiddhiḥ | viprakṛṣṭakālaireva hyekaṃ phalaṃ sādhyate | athocyeta phalaṃ bhavadbhāvayedetairitthamiti sāṅgāni pradhānāni yugapatphalabhavanakāle 'nuṣṭhātavyāni śrūyante | tataśca na viprakṛṣṭānīti | tatrāpi samudāyadvayasya yugapatprayogāpattirdoṣaḥ | utpattivākyānurodhena vā pūrvavadeva pratyekaṃ prayogādiyojanā | na ca phalabhavanakālo 'smatpratyakṣaḥ, so 'pi hi pradhānetikartavyatākālenaiva paricchidyate | tataścotpattikālālocanena yāvantaṃ prayogakālamaṅgapradhānāni vyāpnuvanti tāvāneva phalabhavanakālastādṛgeva tadviṣayaṃ yaugapadyamiti sarvathā ṣaṭsu paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsu dvayorvā sāṅgānāṃ cāpavargaḥ | ekasamudāyasamīpe vā 'ṅgaprayogo 'rdhamāsāntarāle vā yatra kvaciditi prasaṅgānnaitadvākyalabhyastrikasya trikasya sāṅgasya svakāle prayogo vākyāntarātsidhyatīti | tasmādarthavān “paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta” iti kālavidhiḥ | nanvevaṃ satyutpattau kālayogo 'narthakaḥ | kathamanarthakaḥ | paśya—

paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau svābhidheyakālayuktayāgānuvādāviṣyete | tadabhāve tu
naiva jñāyeta kā paurṇamāsī kā 'māvāsyeti | tadajñānādalabdhārthadarśapūrṇamāsapadāviśeṣitaprakṛtayāgamātragrahaṇāt sarvāṇi samapradhānānītyetadeva syāt | tasmādavaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ prathamaṃ kālasaṃyogena | ata eva vopāṃśuyājasyānutpattivākyamapi satpaurṇamāsīsaṃyuktamudāhṛtam || 3 ||

yadi caite karmāntare syātāṃ tata ādhārādīni samapradhānāni syuḥ | tataśca ( a. 8 pā. 1 sū. 2. )“karmaṇastvapravṛttitvātphalaniyamakartṛsamudāyasyānanvayastadbandhanatvāt” ityanena nyāyenā ' 'gneyādivatprayājādīnāṃ karaṇāṃśopanipātādvihitakaraṇayā vikṛtibhāvanayā kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣiṇyā tatpūraṇāsamarthānāmagrahaṇātprāptaprayājānuvādena kṛṣṇalavidhānaṃ nopapadyeta | tasmādāgneyaguṇatvaṃ prayājādeḥ kathaṃ syāditi samudāyānuvādau || 4 ||

paurṇamāsīmityekatvaṃ prātipadikārthagatameva bhaviṣyati na tallakṣitasamudāyagatam | pratyakṣaśrutaśca yajirdravyadevatāsaṃbandhātkleśenānumātavyo na bhaviṣyati | so 'pi vā 'nekastadapūrvamapyanekaṃ, samudāyānuvādatvācca vidhitvaṃ guṇavattaram | prayājādidarśanamapi ( a. 7 pā. 4 a. 1 sū. 5 )“yatra nityānuvādavacanāni syuḥ” ityevaṃ viśiṣṭavidhānena vā prakṛtisthaprayājaguṇavidhinā vā supariharaṃ manyamāna etāveva karmavidhī, śeṣā guṇavidhaya ityarūpatāparihāramāha—aṣṭākapālādivākyeṣu paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ karmavacanatvādvākyasiddhameva rūpavattvamiti || 5 ||
naite 'ṣṭākapālādayo guṇavidhayaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: prāpte karmaṇi nāneko vidhātuṃ śakyate guṇaḥ |

div.p: karmotpattivākye hi pratyayo bhāvanāmaprāptatvādvidhātumupakramate | sā ca yāvaddhātvarthakārakairna paripūryate tāvadanuṣṭhātumayogyeti na vidhitvaparyavasānaṃ, tatra bhāvanātmāṃśabhūtāvagatakārakasāmānyānyathānupapattyākṣiptaviśeṣopalipsāyāṃ svavākyoccāritakārakavibhaktyantapadapratītairviśeṣairbhāvanāmātrākāṅkṣibhirvākyādeva viśeṣyate | pratipadaṃ ca yāvatkiṃciddravyāśritaṃ jātiliṅgasaṃkhyādi tatsarvamekapadopādānalakṣaṇaśrutipratilabdhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamapratipannaparasparaśeṣaśeṣitvaṃ vibhaktiśrutyaiva kārakātmanā bhāvanārthatvaṃ pratipadyate | evaṃ yāvanti padāni saṃnikarṣaviprakarṣasthāni tāni sarvāṇyanuṣaṅgādhikaraṇoktena( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 16 ) mārgeṇānādṛtya saṃnikarṣaviprakarṣau yugapatsaṃnipatanti | tataḥ sarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭāmanuṣṭhānayogyāṃ bhāvanāmāsādya vidhiḥ samāpyate | sa caikenaiva prayatnena tāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ vidadhātīti nānekaśaktikalpanāpattidoṣaḥ | tathā hi—

viśiṣṭāyāṃ bhāvanāyāmādhāya śrautaṃ vidhitvaṃ yadyanyatrāpi śrutyaiva punarvyāpriyeta tataḥ punaruccāraṇadoṣamavaidikatvāpattyā labheta | ayaṃ punaḥ sakṛdvidhāya nivṛttavyāpāraḥ svārthānyathānupapattyā sarvaviśeṣaṇeṣu pratyekaniṣṭhāni vidhyantarāṇyāvirbhāvayan samāmnāyāvagataikarūpāparityāgenaivāsakṛduccāraṇaphale vartate |

viśiṣṭanimittatvādarthāpattiḥ paścādbhavantī yadyapi viśeṣaṇavidhīnuttarakālamavagamayati tathā 'pi tvākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyena( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9 ) viśeṣaṇānyanupādāya viśiṣṭavyāpārāsaṃbhavānnūnaṃ pūrvataraṃ viśeṣaṇavidhayo niṣpannāḥ | yatastadadhīnasiddhirviśiṣṭapratyayo dṛśyata iti | tena bahava evaite vidhaya iti pratyakṣārthāpattilabdhā yugapatkrameṇa vā vyāpriyanta ityanekavidhyantaraprasavasamarthaikaviśiṣṭavidhiprasādenānekaguṇavidhānamapūrvabhāvanāvidhipakṣe sulabhaṃ netaratra | katham |

yadā hi bhāvanā 'nyataḥ prāptā bhavati tadā tasyāḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇavatpratihataśaktirvidhāyakastāmavidadhāno na tatsaṃgatārthānekavidhivyāpāraprasavahetutvaṃ pratipadyate | viśiṣṭavidhāne hyarthāpattyā vidhyantarāṇi kalpyante | na cātra tatsaṃbhavatītyanupayuktaśrautavyāpārāvastha eva pratyayaḥ ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 )“ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu” ityanena nyāyena bhāvanāto 'vatīrya tatsaṃbaddhāni kārakāṇyupasarpati | tatra yāvantyekapadopāttaikakārakaviśeṣaṇāni jātiliṅgadravyasaṃkhyādīni tāni viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhinyāyenaiva tatkārakākṣepātsarvāṇi vidhīyanta iti prāptāyāmapi bhāvanāyāmanekārthavidhyupapattiḥ | yadā tvanekapadopāttānekakārakopanipāto bhavati tadā kārakāṇāṃ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvāttattatpadeṣvapyasaṃbadhyamāneṣu yadyekatra vidhirgacchati tadā netaratra gato bhavati, evamitaragamane 'pyanyagamanānupapattirasaṃbandhāt | evaṃ ca na bhāvanāvadekena vihitenetaradarthādākṣeptuṃ śakyate | tatrārthalabhyavidhyantaraprasūtāvasatyāmekānmakaḥ śrauto vidhirekatropakṣīyamāṇo yadyapyanyatrāpyastīti kalpyate tannāsakṛduccāraṇādṛte sidhyatīti pauruṣeyo 'nekoccāraṇaprasaṅgastaddarśayati—codite hi—prāpte karmaṇi, tadarthatvātguṇārthatvāt, tasya tasya—guṇasya, vidheye punaḥ punarupadiśyeta—uccāryeta, pratyaya ityarthaḥ | parasparasaṃbandhe cāsatīti bhāṣyamarthāpattimūlocchedapradarśanārtham | loke 'pi ca yatpradhānaṃ rājaprabhṛti kvacinnīyate tadātmanā 'vinābhūtānyamātyādīnyaṅgānyapyaśeṣāṇyākṣipati | yadā tu kaścidbhṛtyānāṃ kvacidnacchati tadā tadasaṃbandhīni bhṛtyāntarāṇi padamapi na calanti, tatrāvaśyaṃ prayatnāntaramāstheyaṃ, na ca tadekavyāpārasādhyamityaśakyaṃ sakṛcchrutāvupādātumiti | etamevārthaṃ prapañcayati, yadi hi paurṇamāsyuddeśenāṣṭākapālo vidhīyate tadā tatsvarūpotpattirapi tāvadanuktā satī kleśena labdhā kimuta padārthāntaravidhānaṃ, tadāha— bhavatisaṃbandhābhāvānnānena saṃbadhyate | athā ' 'gneyaḥ paurṇamāsyāmityatrāpi svarūpo
tpattikleṃśaḥ pūrvokta eva draṣṭavya iti tamapradarśyaivāṣṭākapālasaṃbandhābhāvaḥ pradarśitaḥ | evaṃ paurṇamāsīviśiṣṭānyatarānuvāde 'pyanūdyamānasyotpattiḥ paurṇamāsīsaṃbandho vidhīyamānasyāpyutpattiritaretarasaṃbandhaścetyatigauravam | paurṇamāsīpadatantratve 'pyubhayorutpattiḥ kartavyā parasparaṃ saṃbandhaśceti doṣau | na cāruṇaikahāyanīvatparasparaniyamasiddhirviśiṣṭavidhānadoṣāt | ato 'ṣṭākapālānanuraktayā paurṇamāsyā ' 'gneyaḥ saṃbandhate tadananuraktayā vā 'ṣṭākapāla ityasaṃbandhaḥ | etatparihārārthaṃ parasparasaṃbandhaṃ dravyadevatayoḥ prathamameva kurvan ubhayasvarūpotpattiranyatarasya cānyataratra vidhānamiti yugapadvidhīyamānaparasparasaṃbandhakleśamanubhūya punaḥ paurṇamāsīsaṃbandhakleśaḥ | tatparihārārthamanyataḥ siddhaṃ devatāsaṃbandhamanūdya kevalakarmasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati—atha kena cidagnaye saṃkalpita iti | tatra saṃkalpitaśabdavaśena kecidāhuḥ kenacidanuṣṭhātrā saṃkalpita iti | na tvetadyuktamiva | anyenārdhakarmaṇi tadīyasya haviṣo haraṇamiti | tasmāddhi ṇijantaḥ saṃkalpitaśabdaḥ kenacidvākyena
āgneyamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedrukvāma ityanena vākyenetyarthaḥ | rukvāmādiyuktena vihita ityarthaḥ | tatrā ' 'hāṣṭakapālasaṃbandhasiddhyarthamāgneyaśabde 'nūdyamāne paurṇamāsīgatasya kā devateti na jñāyate, yugapadupalakṣaṇavidhikalpane vākyabheda iti | anenaiva mārgeṇā ' 'kṛtyadhikaraṇa( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9 )mukhapradarśitairvacanavyaktiprakārairvākyabhedānantyaṃ prapañcayitavyam | tenāvaśyavidhātavyo 'tra dravyadevatāsaṃbandhaḥ | na ca sa pūrvaprāpte karmaṇi saṃbhavatīti ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 23 )‘guṇaścāpūrvasaṃyoga’ iti karmāntaratvam | karmāntaratve ca sati tadavasthaṃ
rūpāvacanamityanuvādatā | ataśca balādekavacanalakṣaṇādyāśrayaṇīyam | kiṃ ca |

aṣṭākapālo bhavatīti nāyaṃ puruṣavyāpāraḥ | na ca puroḍāśavyāpāramātraṃ vidhātuṃ śakyam | abhāvanāviśeṣātmakatvāt | tatrāvaśyakalpanīye puruṣavyāpāraviśeṣe yāgakalpanā ' 'patati, tatra yadyapi pratyakṣe labhyamāne na yuktamānumānikakalpanaṃ tathā 'pyatrāparipūrṇe vākye vākyāntarānapekṣiṇi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāvākyastho yajirasaṃnihita eveti nānumānaṃ pratibadhnāti | anumite ca sati “ya evaṃ vidvān” ityanuvādasarūpatvādanuvāda eva vijñāyate | kriyāsāmānādhikaraṇyācca yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityāderyacchabdādvilakṣaṇaḥ kartṛsamānādhikaraṇo 'yaṃ ‘ya evaṃ vidvān’ ityupabadhyamāno vidhisāmarthyaṃ nirundhyāt | tathā coktam—

karmabhede hi bhinnaviṣayatvātsāṃnāyyapuroḍāśasamuccaye sati saṃbhriyanta iti samastasaṃbharaṇaṃ prathamottarābhidhānaṃ cāvakalpate nānyathā, prathamapakṣe ca caturthamapyaparamastītyuttarāṇīti syānnottare iti || 7 ||
karmāntatpakṣe 'bhyadhikatvādnuṇavidhipakṣe nyūnatvātrayodaśacaturdaśatvānuvādavirodhaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: paurṇamāsyāṃ yadā tisro dve darśaviṣaye yadā |

div.p: tasmātsamudāyānuvādāviti siddham | āha ca—
idānīmadhikaraṇatrayeṇa samudāyānuvādāpavādaḥ kriyate | tatra ‘upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati’ iti tāvatsakalaḥ prāgukto nyāyo 'sti | kutaḥ |
teṣu tāvattavyapratyayenaikāntiko vidhiḥ | tatra yadīdaṃ yāgāntaraṃ kalpyate tataḥ prāptaṃ rūpājñānamadṛṣṭāntarakalpanaṃ ca | kiṃ ca |

yathopakramamupasaṃhārājjāmyupanyāsasyāṇāmitāyāścaikaviṣayatvādeta eva vidhayo gamyante | na hyantarālavākye tādṛgarthavādo vidhirvā spaṣṭo dṛśyate | samudāyānuvādaprayojanaṃ ca, kathaṃ nāma tai. saṃ. ( 2-5-2 )“upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan” ityatraikīkṛtānāṃ kālasaṃbandhe sati sarveṣāṃ prādhānyaṃ syāt | nanūpāṃśuguṇakamiti—kathaṃ dravyadevatāvyatiriktaṃ rūpatvenocyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sarvathā yena yāgāntarāddvyavacchinno yāgo nirūpyate tadeva rūpam | śakyate copāṃśutvenāyaṃ vyavacchinnarūpaḥ pratyetumiti | ata āha—naivaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdaḥ śaknotīti | yadi hyavayavārthabhedena guṇavidhirayaṃ kalpyeta tato yājaśabdasya ghañantatvādakṛtakutvasyāsādhutvaṃ syāt | avyutpannanāmadheyatve tu naiṣa prasaṅgaḥ | nanvevaṃ satīti—nāmadheyatve 'pyavaśyaṃ ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 3 sū. 4 )‘tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram’ ityevaṃ ‘viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ’ ityādibhirvihitaṃ tadguṇayogamāśritya prasiddhiravāptavyā tataśca tulyo doṣa iti | tatpariharati mā bhūdupāṃśuyājaśabdo yajatiśabdo bhaviṣyatīti | vidhau hyatyantamāñjasyena kāryaṃ nāmadheye tu yajiprāptānuvādarūpeṇa pravartamāne kiṃcitsārūpyānugame 'pyavirodhaḥ || 9 ||
karmacodanā ‘upāṃśuyājaṃ yajati’ iti na samudāyānuvādaḥ | kutaḥ |

yathā vaiśvānaravākye dvādaśakapālenopakramopasaṃhārābhyāmaṣṭatvādaya ekavākyatāmāpadyamānāḥ pṛthagvidhitvaṃ na pratipannāstathā 'trāpi ‘jāmi vā etaditi’ vidhyupakrame doṣasaṃkīrtanaṃ kasyacidvidhīyamānasyā ' 'kāṅkṣitaṃ tadapanayanadvāreṇa stutyarthamiti gamyate | jāmitā ca puroḍāśayorantarāle kasmiṃścidavidhīyamāne bhavatīti yadantarālakālasaṃyogena vidhāsyate tasyājāmikaratvaṃ praśaṃsetyavadhāraṇādupāṃśuyājamantaretyasya stutyarhatvena jñānādviṣṇvādiyukteṣu ca tadapekṣitājāmirūpastutisaṃkīrtanādanapekṣitaṃ vidhitvamanādṛtya stutyarthatā gṛhyate | na hi viṣṇvādisaṃyukteṣvantarālakālasaṃyogo 'sti yenopakramoktayā jāmitayā tadvidhistadgataṃ vā jāmitvaṃ stāvakatayā 'pekṣitaṃ saṃbadhyeta | antarālakālasaṃyuktasya punarvispaṣṭajāmyupakramavākyavidhānārhatvāttadvaśena cetareṣāṃ stāvakatvopayoge sati nānekādṛṣṭakalpanānubandhividhyabhyupagamo yuktaḥ | kiṃ ca |

karmotpannastavyapratyayo yāgopasarjanaviṣṇvādipradhānastatrārthānnikṛṣya yāgakartavyatā kalpanīyā, na cāsau yujyate, “antarā yajati” ityanena pratyakṣapradhānopadeśopapatteḥ | tatra yadyapi tāvadviṣṇvādiyuktāni pṛthagvākyāni bhaveyustathā 'pi tasminnevāntarālavihite yāge devatāṃ vidadhyurna karmāntarāṇi | na ca devatā 'pyevaṃvidhaiḥ samyagabhidhīyate | na hyete saṃpradānaṃ devatātvaṃ vā vadanti, kiṃ tarhi, karmopasarjanadravyavacanāstatra karmaśaktiṃ pradhānīkṛtya dvitīyātulyārthatā tāvallabdhavyā, na ca tāvatā devatātvaṃ sidhyati | tyāgārthatvāddhi yajateḥ paramārthatastyajyamānaṃ dravyameva karma bhavati | tatastenā ' 'pyamānā devatā paścātkarma saṃpadyate | tatra dvikarmalakṣaṇaprasaktau
‘prakramāttu niyamyeta’ iti ṣaṣṭhādhyāyadvitīyapādādhikaraṇasthabhāṣyoktenetyarthaḥ |‘samāptiḥ śabdārthaḥ’ ityanena nyāyena pūrvaṃ tyajyamānakarmatirodhānena parapūjyamānakarmāvirbhāvādekakarmatvādhāraṇena saṃpradānatvaśaktimabhibhūyaiva nirdeśo bhavati “viṣṇuṃ yajati” “viṣṇuryaṣṭavya” iti, na tu tatra devatātvamabhidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi, karmatvānyathānupapattilakṣaṇayaiva gamyamānaṃ niścīyate | nanu ca yajaterdevatā
pūjātmakatvāttadīyakarmadevatāśabdau paryāyāveti na vaktavyaṃ lakṣaṇayā gamyata iti | naiṣa sākṣāddevatāpūjāvacanaḥ | kutaḥ |

na hi devatāḥ stuvānastatpūjāvyāpṛto 'pi sankaścidyajata ityucyate | rūpāsamavāyitvācca nātithivaddevatā pūjyamānatāṃ pratipadyate | na ca yajistatpara iti navame vakṣyate | dānena vopādhyāyādiḥ pūjyamāno 'pi na karma saṃpadyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ | evaṃ tarhi tadvadeva nityaṃ devatāyāḥ saṃpradānatvenaiva nirdeśaḥ prasajyate | naitasyāstādṛśaṃ saṃpradānatvamapyasti, pratigrahītṛtvābhāvāt | api ca dṛśyate hi kvacitsaṃpradānanirdeśaḥ, “yo 'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajata” iti | sarvatheyaṃ devatā na vā 'nyaiḥ saṃpradānaistulyā, na ca karmabhirasādhāraṇairnaiva tvātmano kevalaṃ yajiviṣayaṃ karma saṃpradānaṃ vā bhavati | taccaitasyāḥ kriyāsādhanatvātsaptamakārakāsaṃbhavāccaivaṃ kalpyate | na hi devatāśabdavācyenā ' 'tmanā dhātvarthasaṃbandhitvaṃ pratipadyate | tena taduddeśatyāgāṃśena pratigrahītṛvyāpārādvinā 'pi kathaṃcitsākalpakalpanayā saṃpradānaṃ nirdiśyate | yadvoddeśagatamāpyamānatvaṃ tyāgāṃśe 'pyadhyasya sakalasya yajeḥ karmatvenocyate | tena yatra saṃpradānatvanirdeśastatraitaduktaṃ bhavati | parasvatvamivā ' 'pādayituṃ taduddeśena dravyaṃ tyajediti | yatrāpi karmanirdeśastatraiṣo 'rthaḥ, tyaktuṃ dravyaṃ devatāmuddiśediti | tathā ca kevaloddeśavyāpāreṣu tyaktṛtvarahiteṣu yajeti praiṣo bhavati | tadetadubhayamapi lākṣaṇikam | tatrāpi saṃpradānatvaṃ tyāgāṃśāvyabhicāritvādasamastātmaka
devatāyāḥ pratigrahītṛtvābhāvānna sāmastyena saṃpradānatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ |tvāddūṣitamapi satpratyāsannataraṃ devatātvasya | karmatvaṃ tu kriyāntareṣvapi vyāpyamānatvasaṃbhavātsavyabhicāramiti viprakṛṣṭataraṃ devatātvasya | na hi taddevatātvavatsakalaṃ yaji prati karmetyavadhāryate | paramārthataḥ punardevatāśabdena taddhitaśabdena vā devatātvamabhidhīyate, na kārakavibhaktyā kayācit | tathā ca |

ye hi vibhaktivācyā arthā bhavanti tadvibhaktisamarthebhya eva tebhyastaddhitavidhānaṃ dṛśyate | pā. sū. ( 4-4-76 )tadvahati, pā. sū. ( 5-1-37 ) tena krītaṃ, pā. sū. ( 5-1-5 )tasmai hitaṃ, pā. sū. ( 4-3-74 )tata āgataḥ, pā. sū. ( 4-1-92 )tasyāpatyaṃ, pā. sū. ( 4-3-53 )tatra bhava iti | na tu devatāyāṃ tasyā idaṃ tāmanena yajatīti vā nirdeśo dṛśyate | kathaṃ tarhi, sā 'myapā. sū. ( 4-224 ) devatā iti |
tasmānnūnamananyavācyo 'yamartha iti gamyate | tataśca sthitametanna ‘viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavya’ ityanena devatā 'pyabhidhīyata iti | tatra kleśena tāṃ kalpayitvā yajibhāvanā kalpanīyā | tataśca varamarthavādatvamevā ' 'śritam | antarā yajatīti tu yadyapyantarālasaṃbandhavidhiparatvānna svarūpavidhānārthamityāśaṅkyate tathā 'pyananyagatitvādviśiṣṭavidhānam | na hi yathetareṣāmarthavādatvenārthavattā tatheha kena citprakāreṇa | nanu ca samudāyīkaraṇenārthavattetyuktam | yathā naitenārthavattā tathā 'nyārthadarśanaṃ vyācakṣaṇā vakṣyāmaḥ | kiṃ ca
nanu ceti bhāṣyeṇa antarālavākye 'pyantarālavidhipratīteryāgavidhānāpratītāvāśaṅkitāyāṃ bāḍhamityādinā upāṃśutvāntarālasaṃbandhavidheyatvābhyupagamamātreṇa śaṅkāparihāramabhipretya bhāṣyasthaṃ saṃbandhaśabdaṃ ca lakṣaṇayā viśiṣṭaparamaṅgīkṛtya antarālādiviśiṣṭayāgāvidhāne vākyānarthakyāpatteḥ ‘natvantarālasaṃbandhasyānyatprayojanamasti’ ityuttarabhāṣyasūcitamananyagatikatvasya hetutvamurarīkṛtya parihāragranthāśayamupavarṇya asmiṃstu vyākhyāne ‘upāṃśutvādisaṃbandha’ ityasya ‘na tvantarālasaṃbadhasya’ ityanenānvayāpatteḥ ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyamityārabhya viṣṇvādisaṃbandho 'nūdyata ityantasya ‘yadīme 'pi vidhīyeran’ iti pūrvabhāṣyeṇānvayāpatterdūrānvayadoṣamālocya nanviti bhāṣyeṇa viṣṇvādivākyavihitayāgeṣvantarālaguṇavidhānārthamantarālavākyamiti śaṅkite viṣṇvādivākyānāṃ karmāntaravidhāyakatve 'pyekasminnantarālavākye upāṃśutvasyā ' 'diśabdopāttāntarālasya ca prāptakarmānuvodana vidhānāśakteḥ karmavidhyavaśyaṃbhāvādityevaṃ bāḍhamityādi ‘vidhātumarhatītyantena bhāṣyeṇa parihṛte punarviṣṇvādivākyaprāptopāṃśutvānuvādoṃ 'ntarālavākye bhaviṣyati, kathaṃ guṇanyāya iti kathamityanena pṛṣṭe jāmi vetyārabhya saṃbandho 'nūdyata ityantena bhāṣyeṇa viṣṇvādivākyānāṃ vidhāyakatvasyaiva nirākaraṇātkathaṃ tadvākyaprāptopāṃśutvānuvāda iti parihāre 'bhihite karmāntarānupasthiterantarakālarūpānupādeyaguṇasattvācca anupādeyaguṇasahakṛtānupasthitirūpaprakaraṇāntaranyāyenāpyantarālavākye karmavidhirityevaṃ, prayojanamastyato vidhānādityanena bhāṣyeṇa kathyata ityevaṃ yathānyāsaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātumābhate kiṃcetyādinā | |

yādṛśī hyākhyātena svapradhānā pūrvāparībhūtā bhāvanā 'ntarālamanupādeyaṃ pratyupāttā na tādṛśī viṣṇuryaṣṭavya ityādibhirūpasthāpyata iti notpattividhikalpanābhaṅgaḥ | tatra satyapītareṣāṃ karmavidhitve karmāntaraṃ syānna prakṛtānuvāda iti matvā ' 'ha—karmāntarasya vācakaḥ syāditi | devatāyāḥ punarupādeyatvātkarmoddeśena vidhiḥ saṃbhavatīti nānuvādabuddhirapaiti | karmavidhyamyupagame tu satyapi prakṛtasadbhāve tadrūpāṇāṃ prakṛtānāmabhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ | atha vā yadidamāgneyādibhyaḥ karmāntaraṃ codyate tasyopāṃśuyājaṃ yajatītyayaṃ
vācakaḥ syānnetareṣām | tasmādantarālānupādeyatvavaśenāsyaikāntike karmavidhitve satītarairarthavādaireva bhavitavyam | dhātvarthaṃ cānyatra vidadhatpratyayaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭavṛttirbhaviṣyati | sa tu vidhīyata upāṃśutvādisaṃbandha iti—upāṃśuyājaśabdaṃ guṇavidhiṃ manyate | yattvavācakatvamasminpakṣe kutvaprasaṅgāditi | tatrocyate | tulyametattvatpakṣe | kutaḥ |

vācyavācakatve 'vadhārite paścādvidhividheyatvamanūdyānuvādakatvaṃ vā kalpyate | tatrobhayorapi vācyavācakasaṃbandhaḥ sādhāraṇa iti tadgatau guṇadoṣāvapi sādhāraṇau | tena naiko
anyatarāvadhāraṇaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ | bodho bhavati | syādetat | anuvādatvamavācakasyāpi kathaṃciddṛṣṭaṃ na vidhitvamiti | taducyate | mamāpi hi |

na tāvadviṣṇvādiyuktena vihitam, arthavādatvāt | na ‘upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām’ ityanena | kālavidhivyāpṛtenānekavidhyaśakteḥ | tasmādutpattisthenaiva vidhīyate | tathā ca sūtrakāro vakṣyati guṇopabandhāt iti | jāmitvāpanayanaṃ ca sarvaprakāraṃ dravyataḥ svarato devatātaśca | jñāyata eva yathā viṣṇuryaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatiragnīṣomau veti—
yāge codite 'vaśyaṃbhāvinyāṃ devatāyāmaniyamaprasaktau kecidviṣṇvādayaḥ prādhānyaprasiddhyā vaicitryapradarśanārthaṃ saṃkīrttitāḥ | tena yadyapi paramārthena na yaṣṭavyāstathā 'pi stutiparatvādupādānaṃ guṇavādena kathaṃciducyate | śākhāntare vidhānātprāptā iti anudāharaṇādasphuṭamevamabhidhāya na hi kiṃcidasādhyaṃ syāt | na ca tasminsati daśame ‘tadvacca devatāyā syāt’ ityādi vicārtha ( a. 10 pā. 8 a. 16 sū. 53 ) | ‘viṣṇurvā syāddhautrāmnānāt’ ityādinā māntravarṇikatvaṃ jaiminirāśrayiṣyati | yadyapyaprāptiriti cehāpi svayamevā ' 'śaṅkā darśitā | yadapyuktamupāṃśudharmatvātprāptau “tasmādyatkiṃcitprājāpatyam” iti tadapyayuktam | vacanavyaktiviparyāsāt | na hyevaṃ vacanaṃ yadupāṃśu tatprājāpatyamiti | kiṃ tarhi | yatprājāpatyaṃ tadupāṃśviti | tena nopāṃśutvena prājāpatyatā labhyā | agnīṣomayostu vidhāyakamudāhriyata eveti—etadapi caturthītaddhitamantravarṇānātmakatvādavidhāyakam | yadi hi tāvagnīṣomāvabrūtāṃ tato 'smākaṃ kimiti hi vijānanto yajamānā na vayaṃ devatāyāṃ pravartitā iti kalpayeyuḥ | kālavidhiparatvācca na devatā 'pyanena śakyā vidhātuṃ, devatāparatve vā kālavidhiparityāgātpaurṇamāsīśabdenāpi nānūdyeteti pūrṇamāsaśabdenāgrahaṇādasati pradhānatve 'ṅgatvaprasaṅgaḥ | sūtrakāreṇa ca daśame 'māvāsyāyāmupāṃśuyājamanicchataitadeva paurṇamāsīkālavidhiparatvenopanyastam | atra samādhiḥ | māntravarṇiko devatāvidhiriti sthitam
viṣṇurvā syāddhautrāmnānāditi dāśamikopāntyādhikaraṇe sthitamityarthaḥ | | upāṃśuyājakrame hi vaiṣṇavaprājāpatyāgnīṣomīyāni yājyāpuronuvākyāyugalānyāmnāyante | taiśca tulyārthatvādvikalpamānaiḥ vaikalpikya eva devatāḥ prāpyante | tadeva hautraṃ
śākhāntaramityāha | ādhvaryave 'pi tu kvacidastyeva yājyānuvākyāmnānaṃ hautrarūpeṇeti tadabhiprāyaṃ vā śākhāntaravacanam | upāṃśuṃdharmatvaṃ cāsyaiva dyotanārtham | anyā hi devatā 'trānīyamānā ' 'tmīyaṃ dharmamuccaiṣṭvaṃ jahyātparadharmamupāṃśutvaṃ prāpnuyāditi viruddham | viṣṇuprajāpatyostu pratyāsannadharmakatvādavirodhaḥ | tathā, agnīṣomayostviti—vidhāyake devatāvidhyasaṃbhavādyathā saṃbhavagrahaṇena paurṇamāsīkālasya vidhāyake 'gnīṣomānuvādaḥ prāptimupodbalayati || 10 ||

yasyāyaṃ guṇa upabaddho dṛśyate kālavidhipare vākye upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajanniti | na tvetadeva guṇasyotpattivākyamayāgavidhipare satyanekārthavidhiprasaṅgāt | ata ‘upāṃśu yājamantarā’ ityanenaiva prāptasya saṃkīrtanamiti || 11 ||

“hṛdayamupāṃśuyāja”
śiro vā etadyajñasya yadāgneyaḥ pādāvagnīṣomīya iti pūrvottaraśeṣau | iti yajñapuruṣasya pradhānaprāyeṇāvayavena saṃstavātpradhānamityavagamyate | kathaṃ punarapradhānatvaṃ pūrvapakṣe prasajyate | ucyate |

tāvabrūtāmagnīṣomāviti yo 'gnīṣomadevatyaḥ sa evaikaḥ kālaviśeṣasaṃyuktaḥ pūrṇamāsagrahaṇena phale codyate | tatra vaiṣṇavaprājāpatyayorguṇabhāvātsakalopāṃśuyājaprādhānyavacanānupapattiḥ | nanu tavāpi vaikalpikadoṣatvāddevatāsu yadaivāgnīṣomīyadevatyastatadaiva prādhānyamiti nityavatpradhānatvasaṃkīrtanaṃ naiva ghaṭate | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

yadi hyagnīṣomayoreva paurṇamāsīsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate tato viṣṇuprajāpatipakṣe na syāt | ayaṃ punardevatopalakṣitasya yāgasya saṃbandhaḥ | sarvatra copalakṣaṇāpāye 'pyupalakṣyaṃ gṛhyate yathā vakṣyati, ( a. 10 pā. 8 sū. 69 ) |‘anapāyaśca kālasya lakṣaṇaṃ hi puroḍāśau’ iti | na vaika
syaiva karmaṇaḥ kadācitpradhānatvaṃ kadācidaṅgatvamityupapadyate | nānātve tvaviruddhaṃ syāt | na ca saṃbhavati tat | tasmādekakarmatvāya ‘upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati’ ityayameva vidhiḥ || 12 ||
ūrdhvamāghārayati taṇḍulairjuhotītyādibhirevaṃbhūtā evā ' 'vārā homāśca vihitā viparivarttante | na hi ‘viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavya’ ityādivaddravyaprādhānyena yāgahomabhāvanayorabhibhavaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: na caiṣāmekavākyatvaṃ na ca stutiparā śrutiḥ |

div.p: nopāṃśuyājavākyavadeṣāmekavākyatvabhiṣṭaṃ, na ca stutyarthatā, tenobhayapakṣe niścite vidhitve guṇamātraṃ vidhīyatāṃ tadyuktaṃ vā karmeti karmavidhānaṃ yuktam | kutaḥ |

na tāvaddadhyādiśabdaiḥ svayaṃ vidhitvamabhidhīyate | na ca pratyayopāttaṃ sadbhāvanādhātvarthavyatirekeṇa svatantrairdadhyādibhiḥ saṃbadhyate | na hi bhavati dadhnā yāditi
yādityetāvanmātrasya prayogānarhatvepi vidhyaryakasya liṅo yāsuḍāgamavidhānādvidhyabhivāyitvamabhyupetyoktam | | kiṃ tarhi dadhnā kuryāditi saṃbadhyate | homaṃ vā 'nena kuryāditi | sasmādyatprasādena dadhyādeḥ karttavyatā tāveva bhāvanādhātvarthau na vidhīyete iti kuta etat | na hi tadvidhyanapekṣaṃ kathaṃ cidapi guṇavidhānaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ, yadaiva hi darśayitumupakramyate tadaiva pūrvataraṃ bhāva
nādhātvarthavidhirbalādāpadyate | tasmāddhomadadhyādiviśiṣṭabhāvanaiva vidhīyate | tataśca tāsāṃ rūpavatīnāṃ
homāghārarūpaikajātīyānāmekapadepāttatvalakṣaṇaikadharmayogākhyena pracayena saṃpāditaḥ samudāya ityarthaḥ |pracayaśiṣṭaḥ samudāyo 'stītyagnihotraṃ juhotīti tadanuvādo vijñāyate | nimittaphalacodanayośca ekatvopajanaḥ samudāyānuvāde prayojanam | evaṃ ca sati dadhyāderminnakarmaviṣayatvādanyāyyo vikalpo na prasajyate | tathordhvamāghārayatītyādiṣu yadyapi dravyadevataṃ na śrūyate tathā 'pyupāṃśutvanyāyena vyavacchedakāraṇatvādūrdhvatvādibhireva rūpavattāyāṃ kalpitāyāmāghāramāghārayatītyarūpaḥ san svārthe viniyoktumaśaknuvannanuvādo bhavati | tasyāpi prayojanaṃ ‘indraūrdhvo adhvara’ iti mantraviniyoge,
caturgṛhatiṃ vā etadabhūt iti pūrvaṃ śeṣaḥ |‘tasyā ' 'ghāramāghārya’ iti ca dravyavidhāvekatvasiddhiḥ || 13 ||
api ca |

lg.l: yadā tadā viśeṣo 'sau ko 'syeti na nirūpyate ||

div.p: ādhāramagnihotramiti dvitīyānirdeśaḥ kriyepsitasya kārakasya yujyate | na ca juhotyādhārayatibhyāmātmaivāptumiṣyate | svātmani kriyāvirodhāt samudāyaḥ punarniṣkṛṣya śabdenārthāntarātmanocyamānaḥ śakyaḥ sādhyatvenābhidhātuṃ yathaudanapākaṃ pacatīti viśeṣaḥ sāmānyenepsitatamaḥ karmatvenocyate | nanu ca samudāyasya samudāyibhyo 'vyatirekānna kathaṃ citsādhyatvamavasīyata ityayuktameva karmatvam | na | avayavakriyāpracayasādhyatvātsamudāyasya | samastābhyo hi samudāyasyāvyatirekādevamupādānaṃ na syātpratyekarūpāttu samastarūpamarthāntaramiṣṭaṃ, na ca pratyekarūpairvinā samastarūpaniṣpattirityupapannamīpsitatamatvam | nanu caivamādayaḥ samudāyivacanatvenāvadhāritā iti samudāyināṃ svātmani kriyāvirodhastadavastha eva syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | samudāyivacanenāpi prātipadikena samudāyo 'pi lakṣaṇayā gamyate | tataścaikatvavatkarmatvaṃ samudāyasya pratyeṣyate | na ca sāmānyaviśeṣabhedenāpi bhavataḥ kriyātvakarmatve pākavatsaṃbhavataḥ | sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdayorbhedenānupādānāt | etacca paurṇamāsīmityatrāpi siddhānte yojyam | tasmāttadvadeva samudāyānuvādatvam || 14 ||

athocyeta
yadatra bhāṣyakārairetatsūtramāghāre prākaraṇikavākyāntareṇāpi rūpālābhenārūpatvopapādanaparatayāvyākhyātaṃ tacca tatpraravyādhikaraṇe vākyāntareṇadravyadevatālābhasyoktatvenāyuktamiva matvā svāyamāghārāgnihotravākyayorarūpatve 'pi vākyāntareṇa rūpalābhopapattervidheyatvāśaṃkānirākaraṇāyaitatsūtramityevaṃ vyākhyātuṃ śaṃkāṃ tāvadāracayati—athetyādinā | yathā ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 5 )“guṇastu śrutisaṃyogāt” ityatra pakṣe 'nyeṣāṃ guṇavidhitvādrūpalābha āśaṅkitastathā 'trāgnihotraṃ juhotītyutpattivākyatvena taṇḍulādisaṃyuktai rūpalābha iti | na | tatra svavākyagatapaurṇamāsyamāvasyāpadanimittatvādanuvādāśaṅkāyāḥ | na ceha taṇḍulādivākye 'gnihotraśabdo 'sti, yastvasti juhotiśabdaḥ sa sarvahomasādhāraṇatvānnāgnihotravidhipara eva | nanu ca prakaraṇādviśeṣo 'vagamyate ata āha—aprakṛtatvāccoti | na hyuttpattivākye asti karmaṇāṃ prakaraṇam | phalasaṃbandhottarakālatvena kathaṃbhāvātmakasya prakaraṇasya prayogavākyādhīnaprasūtatvāt | tatraitatsyāt, tadārūḍhasyaiva dravyadevatāsaṃbandho bhaviṣyatīti taducyate | anabhijñātarūpasya phale vidhātumaśakyatvāt | ataḥ prasiddharūpāṇyeva tena
grahīṣyante | nanu ca “tasyāghāramāghārya” ‘indra ūrdhvo adhvara ityāghāram’ iti ca dravyamāntravarṇikadevatāvidhau nāmaprayogādrūpaṃ vijñāsyate | na | āghāraśabdasya dhātvarthāvyatirekeṇāviśeṣaṇakatvāt | tatra nāmnā viśeṣaḥ pratīyate, yatra kaṃ cidviśeṣamupādāya nāmāni pravartante | atra punaḥ saṃnihitāvayavārthatvātsamudāyaprasiddhimantareṇā ' 'ghāraśabdaḥ kṣaraṇamātravācitvānna viśeṣe vartate | nanu ca prakaraṇādviśeṣo lapsyate | tatrāpi sūtram | na hyāghāraḥ prakṛtaḥ paraprakaraṇapātitvāt; darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇametatsakalaṃ nānyasya prakaraṇasyānyatrāvakāśaḥ | sannidherviśeṣāgama iti cedatrāpi sūtram; na vākyabalīyastvenātra prakṛtairapi saṃbandhāt, tadevaṃ vākyaprakaraṇayoravirodho yadi dravyadevatāsaṃyuktānyevotpattivākyānyabhyupagamyante yatra yaḥ kaścidrūpaleśo 'sti tatra nirūpite karmaṇi kena citprakārāntareṇa guṇāntarāṇi kalpante sarveṣu cordhvatvaṃ taṇḍulādi kiṃ cidrūpamasti na tvāghāramāghārayati, agnihotraṃ juhotītyanayoḥ | tasmātsamudāyānuvādau || 15 ||

karmacodane syātāmiti vaktavye 'ntaragrahaṇamupāṃśuyājādhikaraṇavanneyam | āghārayatijuhotyorananyākṣiptavidhiśaktitvātkarmaprayogavidhānameva śabdārtha ityavagamyate | na ca prakṛtāghārahomasadbhāvaḥ | prakṛtavākyasthānāṃ vidhīnāmaprāptadadhyādyākṣiptāyāṃ vidhiśaktau karmānuvādabuddhyanapāyāt | “na cedanyena śiṣṭā” iti vā 'pavādānna viśiṣṭavidhānanyāyaḥ
saṃbhavati |
nanviti bhāṣyeṇa dadhyādivākyeṣūpapadaśravaṇena kevalahomāghārakartavyatāvidhānāśaktāvapi homāghārasaṃbandhitayā dadhyādividhyabhyupagamātsaṃbandhasya ca saṃbandhidvayādhāratvātpratisaṃbandhibhyāṃ homāghārābhyāṃ vinā 'nupapatterarthāpatyā tayorapi prāpterāghārāgnihotravākyayoranuvādatvaṃ durnivāramityevamāśaṃkya naitadevamityādinā brūma ityantena samāhitaṃ tattāvadvedhā yojayati—taddarśayatītyādinā | bhāṣyasthasaṃbandhaśabdasya viśiṣṭavācitvaṃ vidhānaśabdasya ca saptamyantatvamabhipretyā ' 'dyā yojanā | dvitīyā tu saṃbandhaśabdasya yathāśrutahomāghārasaṃbandhaparatvaṃ vidhānaśabdasya ca tṛtīyāntatvamabhipretyeti vijñeyam |taddarśayati—asminhi sati vidhāne pratyakṣe na saṃbandhaḥ śaknotyarthādākṣeptumityarthaḥ | atha vā 'sminhi sati saṃbandhividhāvitareṇa guṇavidhānena saṃbandha eva kevala āśrīyate | tasmānnaitadvākyanirapekṣaiḥ saṃbandhavidhibhirarthādaparau kalpayituṃ homāghārau śakyete yadbalenānayoranuvādatvaṃ syāt | bhāvanādhātvarthāvujhjhitvā na vidhirdadhyādibhiḥ saṃbadhyata iti cetsatyametat | na vidhitvaṃ bhāvanāta uttāryate tadgacenaiva tu guṇaḥ saṃspṛśyate, guṇasya kārakavibhaktyā bhāvanāmadhyanikṣepāt | tenaitadupadiṣṭaṃ bhavati | sarvatraiva viśiṣṭavidhānottarakālaṃ kiṃ prāptaṃ kiṃ na prāptamityanveṣaṇāyāmaprāptamātraviṣayopasaṃhārādvidhirbhāvanādhātvarthayoranuvāda ityabhidhīyate | na tvādita eva tāvanūdya gūṇo dravyaṃ vā vidhīyata iti kadācidapi śāstrārthābhivyaktiḥ | tatra paścāttane vyāpāre mandabuddhipratipattyarthaṃ sthūlena nyāyena kathyamāne śāstrakṛtā evaitā vacanavyaktaya iti manyamānāḥ svayamivānyeṣāmapi bhrāntimutpādayitumaṣṭau śrutiprakārān paradaurbalyavataḥ keciddarśayanti prathamaḥ kila śrutiprakāro dhātvarthavidhānaṃ, dvitīyaḥ saguṇaṃ dhātvarthavidhānaṃ, tṛtīyaḥ kiṃ ciduddiśya dhātvarthavidhānaṃ, caturthastatraiva viśiṣṭavidhānaṃ, pañcamastu dhātvarthoddeśenānyasya vidhānaṃ, ṣaṣṭhastu dhātvarthanānyayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ,saptamaḥ punarddhātvarthaviśiṣṭena pratyayenānyayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ, aṣṭamastu muktvā dhātvarthamanyayoreva saṃbandha iti | tatra tāvadyaducyate “agnihotraṃ juhoti” iṃtyetaddhātvarthavidhānamiti | tadayuktam | na hi vidhirbhāvanāmutsṛjya dhātvarthe nipatati, na ca bhāvanāṃ muktvā 'nyatra puruṣaḥ pravartate | sā hi puruṣasya svavyāpāro dhātvarthastu kadā citkarmāśrito 'pi bhavati | yathā 'yameva prakṣepo dvyavadānāśritaḥ, na cānyadīyaṃ vyāpāramanyaḥ śaknoti kartumityavaśyaṃ bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvādeva dadhyādivaddhātvartho vidhātavyaḥ | idaṃ ca ( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 1 )bhāvārthādhikaraṇe 'bhihitaṃ yathā na dhātvarthaḥ sādhyatvena vidhī
