yata iti | na hyakaraṇabhūto 'sau sādhyāpekṣatvādvākyāntareṇāpi phale vidhātuṃ śakyeta | “somena yajeta” | ityatrāpi tadbhūtādhikaraṇoktena( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7 ) mārgeṇa dhātvarthakārakāṇāmaruṇaikahāyanyādivatparaspareṇāsaṃbadhya bhāvanāsaṃbaddhānāmuttarakālaṃ parasparopakāritvam | tathā ca saptamanavamādyayorvakṣyatīti na viśiṣṭadhātvarthavidhānam | bhāvanāṃ ca prati yāgasya karaṇatvād dravyaṃ prati karmatve sati, ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 8 )“aikaśabdye parārthavat” ityetadāpadyata ityayuktametat | tathā vrīhīnprokṣatītyatra na prokṣaṇena vrīhīniti kaścitsaṃbandhaḥ | tenobhayoḥ karotyarthasaṃbandhānna dhātvartho vrīhiṣu vidhīyate | yadi tu bhāvanābhiprāyeṇānyatra vidhānamucyate tatsarvatrāviśiṣṭam | na cāsya viśiṣṭavidhānāddurbalatvamastīti tṛtīyasthānaniveśo 'pyayuktaḥ | pakṣadvayoktamapi nirākaraṇaṃ “daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi” ityatrāpyāpadyata ityayuktamanyatra viśiṣṭadhātvarthavidhānam | dadhnā juhoti ityatrāpi na kadā ciddadhi home karotītyayamarthaḥ śabdenocyate | na hi homasyādhikaraṇatvaṃ śabdādvastuto vā siddhaṃ, na ca dadhnaḥ kartavyatā, nityaṃ karaṇātmakatvāt | iyamapi ca śrutirdvividhādapi viśiṣṭavidherbalīyasī, ekavidhisaṃbhave 'nekaśaktikatvānupapatterubhayapakṣabhāvinaśca viprakṛṣṭārthavidheraparyanuyojyatvātsaṃnikṛṣṭāsaṃbhavakṛtameva cāsya viprakṛṣṭasya grahaṇaṃ, tatrobhayāśrayaṇe yugapadvipratiṣiddhasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavāpattiragatyaiva gṛhyate 'nyatra viśiṣṭadhātvarthavidhā nānnātigurvyeveti na pañcame sthāne niveśayitavyā | kāmaṃ vā śuddhadhātvarthavidhānāttasya vā 'nyatra vidheranantarā kartavyā | yattu
prākāśo nāma suvarṇadarpaṇam |“prākāśāvadhvaryave dadāti” ityanena dadātidhātvarthe prākāśādhvaryusaṃbandho vidhīyata iti | tadayuktam | vacanavyaktyavivekāt | sarvatra hi yacchabdenānūdyamānamupanibadhya tacchabdayuktaṃ vidheyamupanīyate | tadiha yadi tāvadyaddadātītyatrādhvaryuprākāśayoḥ saṃbandha iti vidhīyate tataḥ sakaladānānuvādātsamastadakṣiṇāvikāraprasaṅgaḥ | pratyayasya cānekavidhiśaktikalpanā codite sati karmaṇyaparihṛtaiva | saṃbandho hi vidhīyamānaḥ saṃbandhinaṃ tāvadākṣipet, dhātvarthe tu punaḥ sa vidhātavya eva saṃbandhī | anyathā saṃbandhasyaiva saṃbandhī śeṣaḥ syāt | na kriyāyāḥ | tatraitatsyāddhātvarthānuraktaḥ pratyayo vidadhadavaśyameva tatra vidhāsyatīti | evaṃ tarhyuttarayorapi śrutyoratraivāntarbhāvādbhedenopādānaṃ vyarthaṃ, na hi “vāyavyaṃ śvetamālameta” “dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt” | iti dhātvarthānanuraktaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃbandhaṃ vidadhātīti | prakṛtiliṅgamātraphalaścā ' 'labhatiruccāryamāṇo na dravyadevatāsaṃbandhividhāvātmānurañjanena kiṃ cidupakaroti na cā 'sau saṃbandha ālabhatinā saṃpādayituṃ śakyo yāgaviṣayatvāddravyadevatayoḥ | yadi cānya
saṃbandhakaraṇe pratyayoccāraṇasiddhivyatiriktaṃ kiṃ cid dhātuḥ kuryāttato dadhīndriyasaṃbandhavidhāne kimiti homaḥ parityajyeta, kimiti vā prakaraṇalabhyo 'bhyupagamyeta | tasmānna dhātvarthe 'nyasaṃbandhavidhiḥ | pūrvavacca dhātvarthādhikaraṇatā kārakakarttavyatā ca nirākarttavyā | na ca dhātvarthe saṃbandhasyāpi prāgbhāvanāsaṃgatervidhirityuktam | evaṃ tāvanna dānamātre saṃbandhavidhiḥ | athādhvaryuviśiṣṭaṃ dānamanūdyatāmadhvaryurvā tidviśiṣṭaḥ | evamapi viśiṣṭānuvādādvākyabhedaḥ | śuddhādhvaryvanuvāde tu yadyapi saṃpradānaśruterarthāddānamākṣipyate tathā 'pi saṃpradānasaṃpradeyasaṃbandhasya dadātimantareṇānupapadyamānatvād dravyadevatāsaṃbandhādiva yajeḥ kalpanamiti na dhātvarthe 'nyasaṃbandha iti vacanavyaktiḥ saṃbhavati | avaśyaṃ cātra dānādhvaryvoścodakena prāptatvātprākāśāveva vidhātavyau | tatrārthātsaṃbandhavidhiriti na śrutitvopanyāso ghaṭate | vakṣyati
( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 10 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥ | caitajjāghanyadhikaraṇe yatrānyataradaprāptaṃ tatraivetaroddeśenetaravidhirarthātsaṃbandha ubhayaprāptāvanubhayaprāptau vā kevalasaṃbandhavidhānamiti | tisṛṇāmapi ca saṃbandhavidhiśrutīnāṃ pratyayavikṣepasāmyānna balābale kaścidviśeṣo, nāpi samavāyavirodhasaṃbhavo yatra tajjñānamupayujyata iti mandaphalaṃ kramagaṇanopanyāsasya | tasmātprastutādhikaraṇanyāyena sarvatra viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhireva tattvam | itarattu tatra tatra sthūlabuddhipratipādanopāyamātraṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa kṛtamiti draṣṭavyam | yacca sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhidhānaṃ tadbhāvanāstha eva vidhitve kārakāṇāṃ bhavanāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ pratīti mantavyam | kathaṃ punaḥ prāptā satī bhāvanā vidhīyate | viśiṣṭā na prāpteti tādātmyena vidhāsyate | phalataśca tadā viśeṣaṇārtho vidhiriti vyapadekṣyate | nanvevaṃ sati viśeṣaṇeṣvanavataranvidhāyako bhāvanādvāreṇāpūrvavidhivatprāptakarmavidhāne 'pyanekaṃ vidhātuṃ samartha iti ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 6 ) |“codite hi tadarthatvāttasya tasyopadiśyeta” ityasyāviṣayatvaṃ prasajyeta | naiṣa doṣaḥ | paśya ||

yadā hi bhāvanārūḍhaṃ vidhitvaṃ bhāvanārthatvenaiva gṛhyate tadā 'rthādviśepaṇavidhau sati avākyabhedaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ | yadā tu tadviśeṣaṇārthamityavadhāryate tadā bhāvanāyāḥ saṃnihitaproṣitatvādanekaviśeṣaṇayoge sati yadarthaṃ vidhitvamavasīyate tasyaivaikasya vidhānaṃ netarasya taddeśasyāpi cakṣuṣeva sparśāderiti vākyabhedo bhaviṣyati | sarvatra samānadeśamapi vidhitvaṃ phalataḥ pracalitamivaikatropasaṃhṛtaṃ darśitam tasmādavirodhaḥ | yastvabhyuditeṣṭiprākāśādividhiṣvanekārthavidhidoṣaḥ sa sarvapakṣeṣu tulyaḥ | yathā cāsmatpakṣe na bhaviṣti tathā
tadadhikaraṇeṣveva vakṣyāmaḥ | bhavedetadviśiṃṣyāditi | yadi sākṣādguṇo na vidhīyate tataḥ puruṣasya tatrāpravarttitatvāttatparityāgenāpyanutiṣṭhataḥ kṛtārthatā syāditi manyate | tatra kiṃ bhaviṣyatīti vākyalakṣaṇavidhyabhiprāyeṇa praśnaḥ | avyāpriyamāṇe iti—svābhiprāyavivaraṇam | sa eva vā svayaṃ karma
āśaṃkitā anyenāpṛṣṭha eva svayamanuṣṭhānaṃ nirūpayatīyarthaḥ |nirūpayati | tenaivābhiprāyeṇa punaḥ praśnottare guṇavacanasannidhiriti | tathā kathaṃ punariti | ( a. 1 pā2 a. 1 sū. 8 ) |tulyaṃ ca sāṃpradāyikam, ityabhiprāyeṇa |
asatitvarthe kimiti bhāṣyaṃ siddhānte 'pi dadhyadivākye vidherbhāvanārūḍhatve 'pi bhāvanāyāḥ svarūpeṇa prāptatvādguṇānuṣṭhānārthatvāvagaterayuktamivabhāsamānaṃ, madhyavratīkena pūrvapakṣaevā ' 'narthakyāpādanaparatayā vyācaṣṭe—asatīti | ( a. 2 pā. a. 3 sū. 6) |asati tvarthe kimiti | tvayaivaṃ kriyate yena tadānarthakyamāpadyate | matpakṣe tu satyarthe nānarthakyaṃ bhaviṣyati | evaṃ tarhīti | vākyena viśiṣṭāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ pravartamānaḥ śrauto 'pi vidhirvākyād bhaviṣyatītyucyate | parastu yatprasādena sa vidhīyate saiva tāvadvidhīyatāmiti śrutyarthe sati na vākyārtha ityāha— satyametaditi | vidhiśaktisaṃkrāntiṃ na cedanyena śiṣṭā iti ca darśayati | kathamiti sānuśayaḥ praśnaḥ svoktirvā | tasmāttatsaṃnidherguṇasya bhāvanānupraveśādvidheyatvamathavā guṇasannidheḥ śaktisaṃcaraṇam, bhāvanāghātvarthaprāpisannidhervā śrutyavirodhād guṇavidhānam |
juhoteriti spaṣṭamapi dhātūccāraṇamanavabudhya sakalākhyātānuvādābhiprāyeṇā ' 'ha—yadi juhotītyanuvāda iti | dadhiśabdeneti mā vocata iti | ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 ) |vājapeyādhikaraṇavadgranthacchāyā yojanīyā | pratyayo vidhireva dhātvartho 'nuvāda iti vivekaḥ | yadi vidhāyakāviti—bhāvanāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ kathaṃ vidhānamityabhiprāyaḥ | vākyārtho yastaṃ vidhātu- miti | dadhnaḥ padārthatvānnaiva vākyārthatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyetadapi dadhiviśiṣṭabhāvanābhiprāyameva | tasmātkarmāntaracodane iti—upāṃśuyājavadeva vyākhyeyam | juhotyāghārayatilakṣitāsādhāraṇārthaviṣayatvācca saṃjñopabandhasiddhiḥ | iha vidhīyamānatvena ca karmāntarebhyo vyavacchedaḥ | prakaraṇācca dravyadevataṃ lapsyata iti nārūpatvam | na cotpattivākye kathaṃbhāvonāsti phalasaṃbandhaṃ tu yāvatpratīkṣiṣyate | na cāvihitadravyadevatasya phalavidhyanupapattiḥ | homamātratayā vihitasya paścādapi tadgrahaṇāvirodhāt | iṣyate caivamādau saṃnidhivaśenāpyanuvādaḥ | prāptyapekṣo hyasau yathā kathaṃcitpratyabhijñānaṃ prārthayate | na ca paraprakaraṇe pāṭhādāghārasyāvāntaraprakaraṇalopaḥ | tasyāpi hyākhyātapratyayavaśena kiṃ kena kathamityastyapekṣā | tena śakyaṃ prakaraṇena dravyadevatavidhānam | bahūni cādṛṣṭāni tvayā kalpyāni | na ca taṇḍulādihomānāmūrdhvādyāghārāṇāṃ vā vihitā devatā 'sti | na ca devatāvaddravyam | sarve caite 'pūrvakarmavidhitvānnānyonyaṃ guṇavidhayo bhavanti | tato yathoktamemevāstu | yattu kriyāyāḥ karmatvanirdeśo na yujyata iti | atrocyate | bhavati hi kriyāṇāmapi saṃkalpādibhirāpyamānatvātkarmatvam | tena juhotyākṣiptasaṃkalpādyapekṣayā 'gnihotramiti dvitīyānirdeśādavirodhaḥ | nanu ca ‘yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti’ ‘yatsūryāya ca prajāpataye ca prātaḥ’ ityanayoranekaguṇatvāt ‘codanā vā guṇānāṃ yugapacchāstrāt’ ityetadāpadyate | tathā nāmeti kecit | evaṃ ca yathāpūrvamā
hutī juhuyātsāyamagnihotraṃ prātaragnihotramityevamādayo bhedavyavahārāḥ siddhā bhavanti | na cātra jyotiṣṭomasyeva grahābhyāseṣvavayavabuddhiḥ | ubhayatrāpi sākalyapratīteḥ | evaṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsavadubhayatra samastetikartavyatāvṛttirupapadyate | anyathā tu paśutantraviprakarṣanyāyena sakṛtkṛtaivopakuryāt | na caikakarmatve kiṃcitprayojanamasti | tasmāddvayorāhutyoḥ samudāyānuvāda iti | atrābhidhīyate |

yathaiva hi samudāyānuvādatvamavayavaśiṣṭasamudāyaikatvadvāreṇa bhavatyevameva prayogavākyagatam ‘agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāma’ iti bhaviṣyati | yathā ca ‘rājasūyena svārājyakāma’ iti vinā 'pyanyena samudāyānuvādena siddhirevamihāpīti |

nanvevaṃ satyāparāgnikānāmapi homānāṃ pradhānatvaṃ syāt | samudāyānuvāde vā kena teṣāmapakarṣaḥ | na hi yathā paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ prayājādibhyaḥ kālasaṃyogenāvacchedastatheha kenacitkriyate | nanvagnaye hotramasminniti viśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati | na | teṣāmapyagnidevatyatvāt | api caivaṃ satyaniṣṭaṃ tava prasajyeta | prātarāhuteragnisaṃyogābhāvādanagnihotratvenāṅgatvaṃ prāpnoti | tasmātsatyasati vā samudāyānuvāde na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | tathā yadyāparāgnikānāṃ homānāṃ bhedo yadi vā sarvāgniṣvekamevābhyastakarma kriyate sarvathā 'gnihotraśabdena saṃnidhyagnisaṃyogahomatvāviśeṣātphalasaṃyogena samapradhānatvam | tathā caikeṣāṃ sarvasāmānādhikaraṇyenāgnihotraśabdaprayogo
agnihotraśabdasya sarvaviṣayatvamāpādayannupapanno bhavatīti śeṣaḥ | gārhapatyānvāhārya5canayoścatasraścatasra āhutīrāhavanīye ca dve vidhāyā ' 'ha ‘ya evaṃ vidvānvirāṭsaṃpannamagnihotraṃ juhoti’ iti | tasmādananyaprayojanatvādagnihotraṃ juhotītyayameva karmavidhiḥ | tataśca taṇḍulādivākyavadeva gārhapatyādisaṃyogasya guṇārthatvānna karmabhedaheturasti | tadeva hi prakṛtaṃ karma tatra tatra pratyabhijānīmaḥ | kasmātpunarekakarmaviṣayatvāddadhyādivadevāgnayo na vikalpyante | kecidāhuḥ | adṛṣṭārthatvāditi | nirādhārasyāpi hi prakṣepasyāpratiṣṭhe 'pi dravye saṃbhavādadṛṣṭārtho 'gnisaṃyogaḥ | tacca sarvamadṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhāvanīyamityāvartate homaḥ | evaṃ tu sati padādibhirapyāhavanīyo na bādhyeta | atha tatra sakṛddhomaśravaṇādāvṛttibhayādbādhaḥ, ihāpi tattulyamiti vikalpaprasaṃgaḥ | tasmādvira ṭsaṃpannamityetasmādeva vacanāt ( a. 12 pā. 3 sū. 30 ) |‘saṃkhyāvihiteṣu tu samuccayaḥ’ ityanena nyāyena samuccayaḥ | anyathā hi |

satyapyagnisaṃyogasyādṛṣṭārthatve saptamīśravaṇādādhāratvapratipattidvāraṃ tadityavagamāttasya ca pratyakṣapratīterekenāvaruddhe karmaṇi nānyatsaṃbhavatīti vijñāyate | tenaikāntena vikalpaḥ prāpnotyeva | kasmātpunaḥ ‘tisra āhutīrjuhoti’ ityādivatsaṃkhyayā karmabhedo na bhavati | ‘tisra āhutīrityādiṣu | iyaṃ punaravadhārite kaṃrmaṇyupajāyamānā ‘ekādaśa prayājān’ itivadabhyāsenaiva pūryeteti na svarūpabhedāya prabhavati | tenaikameva sarvāgniṣvabhyastaṃ karmeti niścīyate | yattu sāyaṃprātarvākyayoranekārthatvātkarmavidhitvamiti | tatra brūmaḥ | ‘sāyaṃ juhoti’ ‘prātarjuhoti’ iti vākyāntaraprāptaḥ kālo devatāvyavasthāpare vākye saṃkīrtyate | nanvevamapi kālaviśiṣṭakarmānuvādādvākyabhedaḥ syāt | na | prakaraṇalabdhe karmaṇi kālamātre devatāvidhānāt | sa tu kālo na svarūpeṇa devatayā saṃbadhyata iti prakaraṇalabhyakarmānuraktaḥ saṃbadhyate | atha vā vidhīyamānasaṃpradānabhūtadevatākāṅkṣitaprakṛtahomaparyupasthāpanena kālasyopayogaḥ | na ca lakṣaṇayā labhyamāno homo vākyaṃ bhinatti | na ca sāyaṃkālenānyatra sthiṃto lakṣitaḥ | tena sāyaṃhomasyāgniprajāpatī bhaviṣyataḥ | evaṃ prātarhomasya sūryaprajāpatī iti siddham | nanvevamapi bhinnapadopātte dve dve devate vidadhatī vākye bhidyeyātām | na | ekakārakatvāditi kecit | kārakānyatve hi vidhervyāpārabhedo bhavati | ekakārakanibandhanaṃ tvarthasahasramapyekaprayatnasādhyamityuktam | atrābhidhīyate |

lg.l:
tathā 'pi tadanāvṛttaiḥ pratyayairna vidhīyate
ayaṃ cātra ślokārthaḥ | agnaye dātra itivadviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāṅgīkaraṇena prajāpatitvaguṇaviśiṣṭasyāgnerdevatātvādyadyapyekaṃ kārakaṃ tathāpyanekakārakapadopāttayoragniprajāpatirūpakārakayorvibhaktiśrutyā kriyānvayapratītestataḥ prāgviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvānavagamātpratyekaṃ vidhivyāpārāvaśyaṃbhāvādvidhāyakapratyayāvṛttiḥ syādeveti vākyabhedo durnivāraḥ | vastutastu prajāpateḥ svātantryeṇa devatātvaprasiddherviśeṣaṇatvābhāvena kārakaikyamapi nāstīti sudṛ̣dho vākyabheda iti | ||

div.p:
vibhaktyā hi kārakaṃ pratyāyyate | sā ca yatraikā 'gnīṣomādau tatra sakṛdeva pratyayasya vyāpāro bhavati | yatra punarbhinnavibhaktisaṃbaddhānekapadopāttamekamapi kārakaṃ bhavati yathā 'traivāgnaye ca prajāpataye ceti, tatra yugapatpratyavekṣaṇābhāvādavaśyaṃ bhedenāgniprajāpatī pratyayenā ' 'locayitavyau | kārakavibhaktirhi nāmapadārthālocanāya pratyayaṃ prayuṅkte sā
ca nānoccāritānāṃ naiva prayuṅkta ityāvṛttiprasaṅgaḥ | tasmānnaiṣa parihāra ityevamabhidhīyate | vākyadvaye 'pyasminprajāpatirevaiko vidhīyate | agnisūryayoḥ punarmantravarṇādeva prāptiḥ,
agnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāheti sāyaṃ juhoti | sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti prātariti vākyadvayenetyarthaḥ |vākyānta reṇaivaṃdevatyau mantrau vihitau | tābhyāmeva ca te devate prāpte satyau prajāpatividhāvaucityena stutyarthamupādīyete | yadapi ca ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 3 sū. 4 ) |‘tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram’ ityatraite vākye nidarśite tadapi mantravarṇaprāptidyotanārthatvena draṣṭavyam | evaṃ mantravidhyorna paunaruktyaṃ bhaviṣyati | anyathā ta
yadagnaye ca yatsūryāya cetivākyasyāgnisūryaprāpakatve tadarthaśāstratvākhyadoṣaparihārakaṃ yat, mantrādhikaraṇoktaguṇavidhiparisaṃkhyārthavādādyanyatamarūpaṃ prayojanaṃ tasmin kalpyamāne 'tikleśaḥ syādityarthaḥ |darthaśāstradoṣaparihāraprayojanaguṇavidhiparisaṃkhyārthavādādīnāmanyatame 'tikleśaḥ syāt | tasmāttatra vākyabheda iti siddham | yattu sāyaṃprātarhomayoravayavabuddhirnāstīti | dākṣāyaṇayajñādivatsakalakarmāvṛttiprajñānāttadityavagantavyam | nanvevaṃ sati sakalakarmaparicchedātmakatvena sāyaṃprātaḥkālayostulyārthatvādvikalpe sati sāyaṃ prātarvā 'gnihotraṃ hotavyaṃ nobhayatreti prāpnoti | naitadasti | yāvajjīvacodanayā tāvajjīvatā sāyaṃ hute punarjīvata eva prātaḥkāle sati samastanimittopajananānnaimittikahomakaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati | satyamevamapi sidhyati | ayaṃ tu viśeṣo yadā sāyaṃ prātarabhyasto 'yameka eva prayogo bhavati | tadā sāyaṃ home kṛte yadā nāma yajamānasya kadācidāpadbhavati tadā yathā kathaṃcitprātarhomaḥ kartavyaḥ prakrāntāsamāptinimittadoṣaparihārārtham | atha tu vasante jyotiṣṭomavatsāyaṃkāle samāptaṃ karma tato nāvaśyaṃ prātarhomaḥ kartavyaḥ | kiṃ ca |

abhyastaikakarmapakṣe tu kāladvaye 'pi prayatnenāvaiguṇyaṃ saṃpādanīyam | kathaṃ punarna vikalpa iti | vacanakṛtātsamuccayāditi brūmaḥ | ‘pravargyo vā eṣa’ iti hi prakṛtya bravīti ‘sa vai sāyaṃ ca prātaśca juhoti’ iti | bhedapakṣe 'pi caśabdātsamuccayaḥ | na ca samuccaye sati sāhityāpattirbhavati | anupādeyatvātkālasyetyavirodhaḥ | prāptayośca vacanāntareṇa kālayoḥ samuccayārthamevedaṃ vākyamiti na vākyabhedadoṣaḥ | tasmādabhyastamekaṃ karma | yattvaṅgānāṃ bhedena prayogo na prāpnotīti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kālaṃ prati hi karmopādīyamānaṃ vivakṣitāṅgasaṃyogaṃ bhavati | tena sāyaṃtanasya pradhānasya tatkālāṅgānyevopakurvanti
nānyakālāni | vaiguṇyāt | evaṃ prātastanasyāpītyāvartate | yattuṃ prayojanaṃ nāstīti | tatrocyate | kuṇḍapāyināmayane ‘māsamagnihotraṃ juhoti’ ityekakarmavidhānādeketikartavyatāpekṣaṇe sati sāyaṃhomasya prātarhomasya vā dharmā āgacchantītyekadharmayuktaṃ sakṛdeva prayujyeta | abhede tu yathāprakṛtīti || 16 ||

‘ādhārāgnihotramarūpatvāt’ iti sūtre tayoraṅgāṅgibhāvābhāvena, abhyarhitaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatītyasyāviṣayatvādalpāctaratvenā ' 'ghāraśabdasya pūrvanipāto yuktaḥ | asmiṃstu sūtre somasya prādhānyenābhyarhitatvātpaśoḥ pūrvābhidhānamayuktamāśaṅkya nyāyapradhāne cāsmin śāstre nyāyavyutpādanādaraviṣayasyaivābhyarhitatvāt paśuvākye ca pūrvapakṣasyātikliṣṭatvena nyāyavyutpādanādaraviṣayatvāṃtpaśoḥ pūrvanipāto yukta iti samādadhāti—paśorityādinā |paśorduṣpratipādanataratvātpūrvābhidhānam | dvau cātra śabdau samudāyānuvādatvenā ' 'śaṅkyete paśuśabdastadagnīṣomasaṃbandhānumitaśca yajiḥ | īdṛśaṃ hyetadvākyaṃ śrutānumitaikadeśaniṣpannaṃ yadagnīṣomīyeṇa paśunā yajeteti | tatra kiṃ hṛdayādīnāṃ paśuśabdo 'nuvādo 'vadyatyanumitānāṃ yāgānāṃ ca yajiḥ, utāpūrvaḥ paśuryāgaśca vidhīyate tatretare guṇavidhaya iti saṃdihyate | tathaindravāyavādivākyairdravyadevatāsaṃbandhānumitā yāgāstadgataśca somarasaḥ kiṃ yajatisomaśabdābhyāmanūdyate kiṃ vā dravyayuktaṃ karma vidhīyata iti |

kimavadyatigṛhṇātibhyāṃ coditānāmiti | anayoryāgaparyāyatvābhāvāttatsaṃbandhānumitānāṃ tadgatākhyātapratyayavihitānāṃ vetyetatpradarśanārthaṃ tadbhāṣyam | ālabhatirapi ca tadanumitayajyupalakṣaṇārthaḥ | atha vā 'vadyatau naiva yāgānuvāda ityupanyasyate, kathaṃ tarhi, tadākṣiptasya saṃsparśanasyā ' 'labhatiranuvādastaddvāreṇaiva ca pratyavadānaṃ devatāsaṃyogāttāvatāṃ ca yāgānāmanumānamuta paśusaṃyukta eko yāgo 'numīyata iti | tathā some 'pyayameva yāgo yaddevatoddeśena dravyagrahaṇamiti | tathā sati yathāśrutenaiva bhāṣyeṇa saṃdehopanyāsaḥ | tatra paurṇamāsīvadeva samudāyānuvādatvam | tathā hi |

na hyaindravāyavamityādidravyadevatāsaṃyogo 'nanumite yāge nirākāṅkṣī na bhavati | na cāparipūrṇaṃ vākyaṃ vākyāntaramākāṅkṣati yenānumānavelāyāṃ ‘somena yajeta’ ityayamanupraviśet | etadvihitasya vā devatāvirahādarūpasya satastairdevatā vidhīyate | yadā tu taiḥ kalpito yajistadā naiva yāgasya yāgāntaraṃ rūpaṃ bhavatīti balātprakṛtānuvādatvamāpadyate | yaścātra pakṣe viśiṣṭavidhyāśrayaṇadoṣaḥ sa bhavatpakṣe 'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ somadravyakayāgavidhānāt | api ca taveha caindravāyavādivākyeṣu ca | matpakṣe tu teṣveva kevaleṣviti viśeṣaḥ | kiṃ ca |
ekatraivedṛśe guṇe śrūyamāṇe vidhiśaktiḥ saṃkrāmatītyagnihotre 'bhihitam | ato na karmānuvādabuddhirapaitītyanuvādatvaṃ yajeḥ | tatra somaśabdena dravyameva gṛhṇātinā sāmānyākṣiptaṃ niyamyate |
athavā ‘somaṃ krīṇāti’ ‘somamabhiṣuṇoti’ ‘somaṃ pāvayati’ ityādibhiḥ prākaraṇikairguṇavākyaiḥ somarase kalpite gṛhṇāticodanāḥ pravṛttā iti |

somo na vidhīyate | tataśca svābhāvikakaraṇatvayuktayāgasāmānādhikaraṇyāt ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 3 sū. 4 ) |‘tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram’ iti nāmadheyī
dravye rūḍhatvātsomaśabdo yāganāmatvenānavabhāsamāno 'pi yāganāmadheyamānarthakyaparihārārthamaṅgīkāryamiti cvipratyanena sūcyate | bhavati | nanu jyotiṣṭoma ityaparaṃ nāmadheyamastyeva | yadīdamapyavagamyate kiṃ no bādhyate | tathā ca yājñikānāṃ
sa eṣa yajñaḥ pañcavidho 'gnihotraṃ darśapurṇamāsau cāturmāsyāni paśu somaḥ | ko yajñaḥ agniṣṭomo jyotiṣṭhoma ityādivyavahāroṣvityarthaḥ |vyavahāreṣu nāmadvayamupalabhāmahe | samastavākyānuvādasya tu tadeva prayojanaṃ yatprayogavākyagataikatvopajananaṃ nābha | tasmādanuvadi iti | bhavedatra dravyadevatāsaṃyogādevam | paśau tu ‘vatsamālabheta’ ityetatsadṛśena devatārahitahṛdayādidravyamātrasaṃyoginā 'vadyatinā kathaṃ yāgavidhānaṃ, kathaṃ vā hṛdayādyanuvādaḥ paśugrahaṇeneti vaktavyam | ucyate |

hṛdayādibhiḥ prakṛtidravye 'pekṣite mantravarṇācchāge labdhe tadantargataṃ paśutvaṃ tāvadanūdyate tatra tu devatāyāṃ vihitāyāṃ yāgo vidhīyatāṃ nāma | athavā ( a. 8 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 13 ) |‘sāṃnāyyaṃ vā tatprabhavatvāt’ ityanenaiva nyāyenāyamavadyatiḥ sārūpyātsāṃnāyyāvadyatiprakṛtiḥ | sa ca darśapūrṇamāsa yāgadravyasaṃskārārthaḥ prasiddhaḥ | tatra yadi hṛdayādīni yāgadravyāṇi tatastatsaṃyogabhāñji bhavanti nānyathā | tena yathaiva pūtīkānāmabhiṣavasaṃbandhe śrūyamāṇe tadarhatvānyathā 'nupapattyā yāgasaṃgatiraśrūyamāṇā 'pi gamyate, tathā 'tretyutprekṣyamāṇe yāgamanumāya tadanupapatteryāgo 'pyastīti gamyate, tathā 'numitānāṃ ca pratidravyamavasthitānāṃ samudāyo 'nūdyate | sādhāraṇaścāyaṃ tavāpyānumānikayāgābhyupagama iti naitenāsmatpakṣadaurbalyam | somayāgaikatve tulyārthānāmindravāyvādīnāṃ vikalpe sati kramasamuccayadarśanaṃ nopapadyate | paśya |
yathaikabandhanārthatvātpalāśakhadirādayaḥ |
tatsaṃbandhe vikalpante yāge 'smindevatāstathā ||
mama tu bhinnayāgaviṣayatvāddevatānāṃ yāgānāṃ cādṛṣṭārthānāṃ yugapadekaśabdena phale vidhānādupapatsyate | paśāvapi ‘hṛdathasyāgre 'vadyatyatha jihvāyā’ iti kramadarśanam ‘ekādaśa vai paśokhadānāni’ iti ca samuccayadarśanaṃ sadapi nopāttam | ekayāgatve 'pi samastapaśu sādhanatvena tadupapatteḥ | na hi hṛdayādiṣvasamuccīyamāneṣūtpattivākyaśrutena samastena paśuneṣṭaṃ syāt | yanmātraṃ tatra vacānāntaravaśenāpaneṣyate tanmātravyatiriktena sarveṇa yaṣṭavyamiti nyāyaḥ | some tu naivaṃ samastacodanotpattāvastītyudāhiṛyate | tasmātsamudāyānuvādāviti prāpte 'bhidhīyate ||

yadi paurṇamāsīvadaśeṣarūpapratyabhijñānaṃ bhavettato 'nuvādaḥ kalpyeta | yadi vā yajimātrasyānuvādatvamiṣyate tataḥ parityaktaviśeṣaṇo 'nuvāda ityavadhāryeta | atra punaḥ prakṛtā hṛdayādidravyakā rasadravyakāśca yāgāḥ | imau ca paśusomadravyakau, na caivaṃ sati pratyabhijñānamastītyanuvādatvāsaṃbhavaḥ | tatraitatsyāt, vikāreṣu prakṛtivadupacārāt, hṛdayādiṣveva rase ca paśusomaśabdau vartsyete iti tanna | vinā kāraṇena lakṣaṇānāśrayaṇāt | vispaṣṭe hi paraśabdasāmānādhikaraṇye satyananyathāsaṃbhave ca jaghanyavṛttiḥ śabdo bhavati |
na caitadubhayamapyasti | śakyaṃ hi mukhyapaśusomadravyaṃ yāgāntaraṃ vidhātum | na ca prakṛteṣvaniviśamānāvetau śabdau nopapadyete | tena yadyapi tāvadavadyatigṛhṇātibhyāṃ coditā yāgāstathā 'pi karmāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ | kasmātteṣveva yāgeṣu svadravyaprakṛtyapekṣeṣu paśusomau na vidhīyete | tatrā ' 'ha—śrutyā hi rasa aindravāyava iti |

paśustāvaddevatāvidhiparatvādanutpattivākye sati aśakya eva vidhātumiti naivopanyasyate | somalatā 'pi vākyavidheyā śrautarasavirodhe sati na saṃbadhyate | kathaṃ punaranupāttadravyaviśeṣeṣvaindravāyavādividhiṣu rasasya śrautatvam | adhikāralabhyo hyasau | tataśca vākyaprāptā lataiva balīyasī syāt | ucyate |

( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 23 ) |guṇaścāpūrvasaṃyoge, ityatrādhikaraṇe vistareṇābhidhāsyate, yathā taddhitaśrutyā vākyaprakaraṇādilabhyasya viśeṣasyaivāsya śabdavācyasya devatāsaṃbandhe kṛte ko 'sau dravyaviśeṣa ityapekṣāyāṃ vākyaprakaraṇādibhistadavāptiḥ kevalā na tu taireva devatāsaṃbandha iti | kiṃ ca |

tataśca guṇādapi te bhedaḥ prāpnoti |
prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu śrautarasavirodhāllatāyāḥ pradeyatayā vidhyayoge 'pi vrīhyādivatpradeyaprakṛtitayā vidhyupapatteḥ | śrutyā hi rasa ityādinā bhāṣyeṇoktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ śakyaparihāramityevaṃ parihāraprakāramupanyasyati—śakyamityādinā |śakyaparihāraṃ tvidam | kutaḥ |

vidhīyamānaṃ hi durbalaṃ viruddhaṃ bādhyate nānuguṇam | anuguṇaśca somo rasasya prakṛtyapekṣiṇastādarthyena saṃbandhāt | tadyathā ' 'gneyo 'ṣṭākapāla iti śrutivihite 'pyaṣṭākapāle
sati vrīhiyavau vidhīyamānau na virudhyete | puroḍāśāpekṣitaprakṛtirūpatvāt | na hi vrīhīn gṛhṇannaṣṭākapālaṃ na karoti | tena cātra na karmāntaratā | tathā 'tra na some gṛhyamāṇe rasaḥ parityakta ityavirodhātpūrvatraiva saṃbhavanna guṇo bhedakaḥ syāt | api ca siddhānte 'pyetattulyamanabhiṣutalatādānānabhyupagamāt | tatra yathā tava rasaprakṛtirlatā bhavati tathā pūrvapakṣe 'pi bhaviṣyati | api ca viruddhataraṃ tavā ' 'padyate | katham |

rasasya prakṛtyā vinā niṣpattyabhāvādākāṅkṣitaḥ prakṛtisaṃbandho vākyāntareṇāpi kriyamāṇo na virudhyeta | prakṛtestvavikṛtāyā eva sāmarthyādanapekṣitā vikārāpattirutpattivākyavirodhinī na yuktā vākyāntaraiḥ kartum | tasmādvrīhiyavavākyamudrāmudritatvādanuddhāṭyaiva guṇavidhitvaṃ samudāyānuvādamātraṃ nirākāryaṃ paśau tanmātreṇāpi siddheḥ | some tu vrīhivākyatulyatvāśaṅkāmadhikāṃ nirākartumuttaraṃ sūtraṃ prastotavyam |

atha vā bhaṅktvaiva pūrvopapattimuttarayaiva nirṇayaḥ |
dravyasaṃyogādityasya pūrvapakṣaparatve 'yamarthaḥ | hṛdayādivākyaṃ—gṛhaṇātivākyaṃ ca karmacodanā pratyetavyā | anyatrāsaṃbhavanniveśasya hṛdayarasādidravyasya saṃyogāt | tathā hi | paśusomavākyayorutpatticodanātve hi prakaraṇe—prakaraṇasāpekṣāvadyatigṛhṇātivākyeṣu dravyasaṃyogo—hṛdayarasādidravyasaṃskāro vidhīyamāno na yāgāṅgatvaṃ pratipadyate; utpattiśiṣṭapaśusomāvarodhena hṛdayādīnāṃ sādhanatvānupapatteḥ | na hi tasya, utpattiśiṣṭadravyasyāvadānagrahaṇādi saṃskārakaṃ bhavati nāśakatvāditi | bhāṣyakāramatarītyā siddhāntaparatve tvevaṃ sūtrayojanā—paśusomarūpāpūrvadravyasaṃyogātpaśusomavākyayoreva karmacodanā, yataḥ, dravyasaṃyogaḥ—paśuśabdaḥ somaśabdaśca, prakaraṇe hyanarthakaḥ—prakṛte hṛdayādāvanarthako lakṣaṇāprasaṅgāt | na hi hṛdayādivākyavihitayāga eva pradeyaprakṛtitvena paśusomavidhiḥ saṃbhavati | paśuvākye tāvat prāptakarmānuvādena devatāvidhiḥ prakṛtividhiśceti vākyabhedāt | somavākye tūttarasūtre vakṣyata iti |pūrvasūtreṇa vā pūrvapakṣaṃ parigṛhyottaraṃ tu sūtraṃ tuśabdasthānacaśabdamuttarapakṣe yojayitavyam | kathaṃ punardravyasaṃyogādityanena pūrvapakṣo 'bhidhīyate | taducyate | ‘hṛdayasyāgre 'badyati’ ‘aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti’ ityetāḥ kiṃ dadhyādivadguṇārthāḥ śrutayaḥ | tataścottarayorutpatticodanārthatvam | utaitā eva karmacodanā iti || kiṃ prāptaṃ naitāḥ pūrvavadnuṇārthāḥ punaḥ śrutayaḥ kiṃ tūtpatticodanāḥ | kathaṃ, dravyasaṃyogāt—hṛdayādidravyasaṃyogāttaireva vākyaiścodanā paśusomayoḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, itarathā hi prakaraṇena hṛdayādisaṃyogo yāgāṅgatvaṃ pratipadyeta, na cāsau tasya guṇārthena saṃbhavati,
utpattivākyaśiṣṭapaśulatāvirodhāt | atha vā pūrvoktena nyāyenānyata eva paśusomayoḥ siddhatvādasminprakaraṇe punaranarthako dravyasaṃyogastvatpakṣe bhavet | mama tu somaśabdo nāmadheyamagnīṣomīyavākyaṃ ca devatāvidhānārthamiti na kiṃcidanarthakam | tasmādavadyatigṛhṇātisaṃyuktaiva yāgotpatticodanā syāt || 17 ||

naivaitau samudāyānuvādau ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 4 sū. 10 ) |‘codanā vā 'prakṛtatvāt’ ityetasmādeva hetoḥ | kathaṃ prakṛtā na saṃbhavanti | yato 'vadyatigṛhṇātayo na yāgānāṃ codakāḥ, kiṃ tarhi, saṃskāramātravidhayaḥ |

tanmātraparyavasānāt | tanmātraparyavasāyini vākye niṣpramāṇakatvānnāśrutayāgakalpanaṃ śakyam | evaṃ hi sa kalpyamānaḥ kalpyeta devatoddeśena gṛhītaṃ dravyaṃ na yāvadyāgena saṃbadhyate na tāvattaddevatyaṃ kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti | tatra yadaivānyathānupapattyā yāgaṃ kalpayitumārabhate tadaiva saṃnihitaḥ pratyakṣo yajiraviśeṣātsarvāndravyadevatāsaṃyogānupapādayitumupatiṣṭhanyāgāntarakalpanāpramāṇaṃ niruṇaddhi | tasmiṃścāpramite kasya samudāyānuvādo bhaviṣyati | yaduktamāgneyādivannāparikalpite yajau vākyāntarāpekṣeti | tatra brūmaḥ |

āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavatīti na yāgādanyaḥ puṃvyāpāraḥ pratīyata iti prāktadanumānādaparipūrṇaṃ vākyam | iha tvaindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātīti grahaṇabhāvanāyāṃ puruṣo niyujyate | tatra
prāgapi yajyanumānādasti vidherviṣaya iti samāpyate vākyam | idaṃ tvanyat, yattataḥ paramapi kiṃcidapekṣyate | sarvameva hi vākyaṃ svārthe paryavasite arthāntarāpekṣāṃ na jahāti, na ca tāvatā tadasamāptaṃ bhavati | yā tvasāvapekṣā sā vākyāntareṇa pūrayiṣyata ityavagamānna vākyāntarasaṃbandhaṃ na sahate | tena yajyanumānavelāyāṃ prativākyaṃ ‘somena yajeta’ ityasyopasthānaṃ na virudhyate | ‘āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ’ iti tu bhavaterapuruṣavyāpārātmakatvātprāgyajerna kiṃcidvihitaṃ na kiṃcitpratiṣiddhamityasamāpte vākye vākyāntare cānapekṣite yajiranumīyamāno na vākyāntaragataḥ saṃbadhyata iti vaiṣamyam | atha yaduktamutpattiśiṣṭayoḥ paśusomayorna vākyāntaragatā vikārāpattiryukteti | tatra brūmaḥ |

yadyatrautpattikau paśusomau parityajyātyantavyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dravyaṃ vidhīyate tato virodhaḥ syādiha tu paśunaiva hṛdayādidvāreṇa yāgaḥ sādhyate | somena ca rasadvāreṇa | na cetikartavyatāsaṃbandhe kaścidvirodhaḥ | paśusomau hi yāgasādhanatvena codyamānāvitikartavyatāmākāṅkṣataḥ | tatra ca rasahṛdayādiniṣpattidvāreṇetyevaṃ kathaṃbhāvaḥ pūryate, tenānugrāhakatvānna tatkalpane virodhāpattiḥ | yattu prākaraṇikaiḥ krayādivākyaireva prāptatvādiha dravyasaṃyogo 'narthaka iti | tatrāpi acodakāśca saṃskārā ityevottaram | na hi te vidhayaḥ somasya paśorvā codakāḥ, kiṃ tarhi tayoreva saṃskārakāḥ |

tena coditasya dravyasya yathākathaṃcidupādānena yāgasādhanatve prasakte krayopāttenaivābhiṣavādisaṃskṛtena ca sādhayitavyamiti vidhīyate | na ca mantravarṇasyātyantāvihitacchāgaprāpaṇasāmarthyaṃ, paśucodanāvihitasya tu saṃdehāpanayanamātramupayujyate | na cāvadyatirekāntena yāgamanumāpayati | vinā 'pi tenaṃ khaṇḍanamātratayā loke vede copapatteḥ | dravyadevatāsaṃyogastu na kathaṃcidyāgādvinā sidhyatītyanumānavaiṣamyam | na ca sāṃnāyyāvadyatiḥ prakṛtau codito 'rthagṛhītatvādyatastaddharmaprāptirapi
prakṛtau sāṃnāyyāvadānasya ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’ iti vidhyākṣiptatvenāvidhayetvādavidhayesya ca prakṛtitvāṅgagrāhakatvayorasaṃbhavānna tato dharmātideśaḥ saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ | syāt | na cāsya yāgadravyārthatvamitikartavyatā, yena tadatidiśyeta | na cedṛśe 'rthe sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ prakramate | pūtikābhiṣavaphalacamasabhakṣayostu vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ tādātmyavijñānamityasamānatā | somavākye 'pi viśiṣṭavidhau pratyakṣopātte satyānumānikāsaṃbhavādevātulyatvam | na caindravāyavādivākye 'pyaṣṭākapālādivākyeṣviva guṇavākyatve 'pi vākyabhedaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
vidheyānekabhāve 'pi devatāgrahaṇātmanā
devatā, grahaṇaṃ cetyevaṃrūpeṇa vidheyānekatve 'pi prakaraṇalabhyayāgākhyakriyāntaraprasādena grahaṇakālikoccāraṇakarmatvasaṃbandhena devatāviśiṣṭa grahaṇavidhisaṃbhavānna vākyabheda iti ślokārthaḥ | |

div.p: śakyate hīndravāyvādiviśiṣṭagrahaṇabhāvanāvidhirāśrayitum | arthaprāpre vā grahaṇe samāsopāttaikadevatāvidhānamātramaviruddham | prakaraṇalabhyaśca pradhānasaṃbandha iti guṇavākyatve 'pyadoṣaḥ | tasmādeṣāṃ saṃskāratvādanyato yāgamapekṣamāṇānāmaviruddho 'nyena yāgavidhiḥ | evaṃ ca sati jyotiṣṭomenetyekavacanaṃ mukhyameva bhavati | na ca somaśabdaḥ kleśenānarthakaṃ dvitīyanāmatvaṃ pratipatsyate | na cā ' 'ghārāgnihotrapūrvapakṣasadṛśaḥ samastavākyānuvādo 'narthaka āśrito bhaviṣyati | tena codanā paśusomayoriti siddham || 18 ||

kramasamuccayayoḥ paśāvaparicoditatvādvṛttā kathā ( a. 1. pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 1 ) |‘paśorekahaviṣṭvam’ ityatrodbhaviṣyati kiṃ samastādavadātavyamuta pratyaṅgamutaikasmādathavā hṛdayādibhyaḥ parigaṇitebhya iti | some tu paricodanāparihāro 'bhidhīyate |

lg.l: vākyena yadi yāgasya śrūyeran devatāḥ pṛthak |

div.p:
yadyaindravāyavena yajeta, indravāyubhyāṃ vā yāgaṃ nirvartayediti śrūyeta tato 'nyonyanirapekṣairvākyaistulyārthatvena jñāyamānā vikalpabhājo bhaveyuḥ; imāḥ punargrahaṇasaṃbaddhāḥ śrutāḥ,
prakaraṇena yāgasaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyante | na ca prakaraṇavyāpāraḥ paryāyo yenānyonyanirapekṣāḥ saṃbadhyeran | sarvagrahaṇeṣu hi yugapaditikartavyatātvena gṛhīteṣu tadgatā devatāstanmātreṇāparyavasyantyaḥ prakaraṇinā yāgenā ' 'kāṅkṣitā yugapadeva saṃbadhyante | tatra nāma vikalpo yujyate yatretaretaranirapekṣāḥ samānārthe niyujyante | kiṃ kāraṇam |

na tviha prattyekaṃ jyotiṣṭomanirvartanasāmarthyamindravāyvādīnāmavagamyate, tādṛgviniyojakābhāvāt | satyapi ca pratyekaṃ yāganirvartanasāmarthye tadviśeṣajyotiṣṭomanirvṛttiryathāvacanaṃ vijñāyata iti naiva pratyekaṃ tulyārthatvam | pratyekaṃ tulyārthāśca vrīhiyavādayo vikalpante | vākyasaṃyogino hi te parasparanirapekṣāḥ svena svena vākyena viniyujyante | nanu ‘aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti’ iti vākyameva viniyojakamupalabhyate | ataśca ‘maitrāvaruṇam’ ityetasya pūrvanirapekṣameva devatāvidhisāmarthyaṃ vijñāyate | satyam | grahaṇaṃ pratyanyonyanirapekṣā vidhīyante na tu tatraikārthatvamadṛṣṭārthatvāt | kathamadṛṣṭārthatvamiti cet | ucyate |

lg.l: taddṛṣṭārthaṃ vinā tena yadi vā 'sau na sidhyati ||

div.p:
yadi hi prathamaṃ yāgena saṃbaddhāḥ satyo devatā nirvāpāvāhanādiṣviva grahaṇeṣu punaḥ śrūyeran yadi vā tābhirvinā grahaṇameva na nirvartete tatastatra śravaṇaṃ dṛṣṭārthamanāgatasmṛtirūpeṇa kalpeta | na tvindravāyvādayaḥ prathamaṃ jyotiṣṭome śrutāḥ | nāpi tadabhāvena grahaṇaṃ sidhyati | tatraivaṃ ca satyapi yaddevatāyuktaṃ grahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti śrūyate tatrādṛṣṭādṛte na
kiṃcitprayojanamasti | nanu ca yāgasyaitā devatā bhaviṣyantīti jñātvā vinā 'pi prathamaviniyogena tadviṣayasmṛtyarthatvaṃ vijñāyate | naitadasti | kutaḥ |

‘aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti’ ityetadvākyapravṛttikāle kiṃ prayojanamityapekṣā bhavati | tatra yadyapi prakaraṇavaśāditikartavyatātmakasya grahaṇasya yāgasaṃbandhaḥ kathamapi bhavatītyavadhāryate tathā 'pi devatānāmanyasaṃyuktatvādakriyārūpatvācca na prakaraṇena yāgārthatvaṃ vijñāyata ityavaśyaṃ yāgasaṃbandhanirapekṣaṃ tāvadgrahaṇaṃ prati prayojanaṃ kalpyamityadṛṣṭakalpanamāpadyate | tasmiṃstu śāstravelāyāmavadhārite yadyanuṣṭhānakāle dṛṣṭamapyanuniṣpādi bhavati kena tannivāryate | na tu tena śāstrapravṛttiḥ pratibadhyate | tena prativākyaṃ devatāsaṃyogānāmadṛṣṭārthatvātsamuccayaḥ | tatra ‘na ca yatsamitsaṃbandhena kriyate tat tanūnapātsaṃbandhena’ ityanena nyāyena
abhyāsādhikaraṇe bhāṣyakāroktanyāyenetyarthaḥ | bhedena śrutā devatā grahaṇasaṃbaddhā nopapadyate yadi grahaṇaṃ nā ' 'vartate iti pratidevataṃ somo grahītavyaḥ | eṣa tāvatsūtrārthaḥ | tadbhedāt—devatāsaṃyogabhedād, grahaṇakarmaṇo 'bhyāso devatāsaṃyuktagrahaṇasaṃskāryadravyapṛthaktvādanarthakaṃ hi—saṃyogāntaraśravaṇamananuṣṭhīyamānamanarthakaṃ syāt | tena grahaṇasya bhedaḥ saṃskāryaṃ dravyaṃ prati guṇabhāvāt | etaddevatāvanti grahaṇāni yāgaprakramātmakatvānna yāgādṛte devatārthaṃ dravyaṃ saṃskartuṃ śaknuvantītyevamapekṣite bhaviṣyati kaścidyāgo ya etāni dravyāṇi devatāsaṃbandhamāpādayiṣyatīti | yāgo 'pi cāvihitadevatākaḥ śrutiliṅgavākyairdevatāmalabhamānaḥ prakaraṇasya cedṛśe vastunyakriyātmake vyāpārābhāvādgrahaṇeṣu tāvadviniyojakaṃ bhavati | tāni cāparyāyavidhānādbhinnādṛṣṭasaṃbandhitvācca yugapadgṛhyante tadvaśena devatānāmapi samuccayasiddhiḥ | nanu prakaraṇagṛhītānāmapyekārthānāṃ puroḍāśavibhāgamantraprabhṛtīnāmiṣyata eva vikalpaḥ, satyamiṣṭo na tu tatra prakaraṇaṃ kevalaṃ vyāpriyate | liṅgānumitayā śrutyā pratyekaṃ vibhāgāṅgatve vijñāte darśapūrṇamāsavibhāgārthatvamātraṃ prakaraṇādbhavati vibhāgāntare 'pyānarthakyāt | tatra yadyapi darśapūrṇamāsau samuccayena gṛhṇītastathā 'pi na vibhāgadvāranirapekṣayoḥ sāmarthyamasti | yacca dvāraṃ tadvikalpenāvaruddhaṃ na samuccayagamyam, iha punarviparītametat | yānyeba hi dvārāṇi grahaṇāni teṣveva devatāḥ samuccitāḥ | tatra pratyekaṃ grahaṇayogyo 'pi dvārasamarpaṇavaśena pravartamānaḥ kimidānīṃ kariṣyati | nanu grahaṇānāmapi pratyekaṃ dravyaprakalpanarūpeṇa devatāsamarpaṇena ca pradhānopakārasāmarthyamastīti vibhāgamantravadvikalpena bhavitavyam |
bhavedevaṃ yadi pūrvaṃ nānādevato yāgo 'vagataḥ syāt | tatastadartho 'yaṃ dravyaprakalpanabheda ityavagamyate, na tvasāvevamavagata iti prakalpanabhedāmnānamadṛṣṭārthaṃ vijñāyate | avaśyaṃ ca guṇātprakalpanāni bhettavyāni | na hyekasminprakalpane yugapatparyāyeṇa vā devatāḥ saṃkalpayiṃtu śakyante | yaugapadyaṃ tāvatkramavartinyā vācā naiva śakyam, adevatābhūta eva samudāyaḥ saṃkalpitaḥ syāt | na hīndravāyvādisamudāye devatātvaṃ kena ciduktam, pratipadotpannaistaddhitaiḥ pratyekaṃ pratīyamānatvāt | na ca krameṇoddeśaḥ | katham |

lg.l: na caikāṃ devatāṃ muktvā taduddeśasya saṃbhavaḥ ||

div.p: yadi tu prāgūrdhvaṃ vā grahaṇāduddiśedacoditameva kuryāt | kiṃ ca |

yaddravyamindravāyubhyāṃ dātavyamiti saṃkalpitaṃ tasya tyaktaprāyatvādanīśo yajamānaḥ kathamiva vakṣyati mitrāvaruṇābhyāmetadeveti | tatraikāmuddiśya devatāntarasaṃkalpe kriyamāṇe pūrvadevatātastaddravyamācchinnaṃ syāt | pūrvasaṃkalpālocanena bā naivottaraḥ pāramārthikatvaṃ pratipadyata ityasatsaṃvyavahāramātramevānuṣṭhīyeta na codanārthaḥ | tenāvaśyaṃ yāvaddevataṃ grahaṇabhedaḥ kartavyaḥ | kiṃ ca |

devatoddeśasvatvatyāgātmako hi yāgaḥ | śakyate ca pūyamānāvasthenāpi somena krayottarakālaṃ vā sarvāvasthāviyuktenāpi nirvartayitumityaśeṣottarasaṃskāravidhānamadṛṣṭārtham | yatra tu puroḍāśādi dravyaṃ codyate tatra yāvadavahantyādividhānaṃ tatsarvaṃ tanniṣpattyarthatvāddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavati | na ca grahacamasasthena somena yaṣṭavyamityutpaticodanā, latāmātraparyavasānāt | tenā 'tmīyādṛṣṭabhedanirvṛttyarthamapi grahaṇāni samuccetavyāni ‘daśamuṣṭīrmimīte’ iti ca prakaraṇe parimāṇaṃ śrutam | ataḥ ‘somena yajeta’ ityetadvacanameva viśeṣyate daśamuṣṭinā somena yajeteti | sa ca niyataparimāṇenodakenābhiṣuto 'lpaparimāṇeṣu bhinneṣu grahacamaseṣu na grahaṇabhedamantareṇa śakyate grahītumiti bhedena gṛhyate | tathāvasthena ca yāgo nirvartayitavyaḥ | so 'pyanabhyastastathā 'vasthitaṃ na śaknoti sarvaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti
prayojanavaśenābhyasyate, tena tatrāpi sūtram | tadbhedāt—prakalpitasomabhedādyāgakarmaṇo 'bhyāsaḥ, svīkṛtadravyapṛthaktvādaśeṣamatyajyamānamanarthakaṃ syāt | ata utpattau sakṛcchrutasyāpi vākyāntaraprakalpitāvasthautpattikadravyaguṇatvavaśenānuṣṭhānabhedaḥ | taddhi dravyamavaśyaṃ yathāgṛhītameva dātavyam | punarekīkaraṇe pūrvakṛtagrahaṇabhedavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt | na ca yathāsaṃkalpitāḥ svairbhāgairdevatāḥ saṃbadhyeran | na ca tyāgakāle marvāḥ saṃkalpayituṃ śakyante, yenābhyāsabhītaiḥ sarvoddeśena sakṛdeva sarvaṃ dravyaṃ miśrīkṛtaṃ dīyeta | tathā kṛte 'pi ca bhāgasaṃkaraḥ prāpnotyeva | prakalpite ca māganānātve vacanādṛte 'vaśyaṃ parihāryā saṃkarāpattiḥ | tasmādyathāsaṃkalpitasya pradānātsarvadevatāsamuccaye satyupapannametata ‘daśaitānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahāngṛhṇāti’ ‘āśvino daśamo gṛhyate’ ‘taṃ tṛtīyaṃ juhoti’ iti | tena siddhamekakarmatvam | prayojanaṃ
pūrvapakṣe somavikāreṣvekasyaiva grahasya dharmaiḥ sakṛdanuṣṭhānena bhavitavyam | siddhānte tu prakṛtitulyamevānuṣṭhānamiti
vikalpe pūrvapakṣyupanyastakhādirādidṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyapradarśanārtham ( ‘saṃskārastu na bhidyeta’ ) ityetatsūtrasthaṃ bhāṣyaṃ spaṣṭārthatvānna vyākhyātam | || 19 || 20 ||

gato 'bhyāsāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ | saṃkhyayā bheda idānīmabhidhīyate | tatra ( tai. saṃ. 2-3-9 )‘tisra āhutīrjuhoti’ ‘dvādaśa dvādaśāni juhoti’ ityevamādaya utpadyamānakarmasāmānādhikaraṇyacoditāḥ svasaṃkhyāyuktā udāhartavyāḥ | sakṛjjuhotiśravaṇātkarmaikatve sati saṃkhyānugraho 'bhyāsena bhaviṣyatīti prāpte 'bhidhātavyam | utpadyamānasyaivātra homasya saṃkhyāsaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate notpannasya paścāt ( tai. saṃ. 6-3-7 ) ‘ekādaśa prayājān’ itivat | na ca pṛthaktvena vinā saṃkhyāyā ātmalābhaḥ saṃbhavati | na cābhyāsapūritā saṃkhyā samañjasā bhavati | agatyā hi sā niyataparimāṇaprayājopasadādiviṣayatvenā ' 'āśrayiṣyate | saṃbhavati cātra prāganavadhāritasaṃkhyāntaratvātsvarūpata eva bhedaḥ | tasmātkarmapṛthaktvaniveśinyevaiṣā nābhyāsapṛthaktvāśrayā ' 'śrayitavyā | tathā ca vakṣyati ( a. 10 pā. 5 a. 6 sū. 16 ) |‘āgamena vā 'bhyāsasyāśrutetvāt’ iti | nanu ca juhotiśabdātprathamameko homo 'vadhārita ityabhyāsena pūraṇameva prāpnoti | na | juhotiśabdāmihitasya karmaṇo 'sattvabhūtatvenāsaṃkhyatvāt | yā hi tatra juhotipade saṃkhyā, kartuḥ khalu sā bhaviṣyati na bhāvanādhātvarthayoḥ | tatra sakṛdāmnānavaśādarthādekasaṃkhyaṃ homamutprekṣitumārabhamāṇa eva svavākyaśrutayā saṃkhyayā vāryamāṇastatparicchinnamevāṅgīkurvansvarūpabhedaṃ sarvatra pratipadyate | tasmātkarmabheda iti | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa ‘saptadaśa prājāpatyān’ ityudāhṛtaṃ tatra dravyagatā 'pi saṃkhyā karmabhedaṃ karotītyetadduṣpratipādaṃ pratipādayāmītyanenaivābhiprāyeṇa | kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | ucyate |

yadi prajāpatireteṣāṃ devateti kṛtaikaśeṣeṇa sarvanāmnā nirdiśya taddhitaḥ kriyate tata eka eva saṃbandhaḥ saptadaśānāṃ dravyāṇāmekasyāśca devatāyā ityekakarmatvam | atha tu prajāpatirdevatā 'syeti prājāpatyaśca prājāpatyaśceti saptadaśakṛtva uccārya prājāpatyā iti sarūpaikaśeṣaḥ kriyate tataḥ saptadaśaiva dravyadevatāsaṃyogāḥ pṛthakpradarśitā iti pratisaṃyogaṃ yāgānumānātkarmabhedaḥ | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | ekakarmeti | kutaḥ |

yo hi prājāpatyaḥ prājāpatyaścetyevamekaśeṣaṃ karoti tenobhayoḥ prakṛtipratyayayorasāvabhyupagato bhavati | tasya ca nimittaṃ bahuvacanānyathānupapattiḥ | na ca tatprātipadike bahuvacanamupalabhyate yena tasyāpyekaśeṣaḥ kriyate | na ca tadekaśeṣamantareṇa pratyayārthasya darśayituṃ na śakyate | vigṛhyamāṇavelāyāṃ sarvanāmnā kathyamānatvāt | tasmātsakṛcchruta eva prajāpatirbahubhirdravyaiḥ saṃbadhyate | kiṃ ca |

kṛtvā 'pi hi taddhitāntenaiva caikaśeṣaṃ na tāvanmātreṇa mucyate | punaradṛṣṭāśrutāni karmāṇyapūrvāṇi ca kalpayitavyāni | na ca tāni yatheṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ labhyanta ityuktaṃ śabdāntarādhikaraṇe( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 1 ) | | yanmātreṇa vinā coditadravyadevatāsaṃbandhānupapattistanmātramevādṛṣṭāśrutamarthāpattyā kalpayituṃ śakyate nānyat | tenābhyadhikaṃ na labhyate | avaśyaṃ hyekādikrameṇa saptadaśa karmāṇyapūrvāṇi ca kalpayitavyāni | tatra prathamakalpanenaivānuṣṭhānatantratvavadagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvātsarvadravyāṇi yāgavanti jātānīti nopariṣṭādgantuṃ śakyate | kiṃ ca |

yadi hi dravyabhedātkriyāṇāṃ bhedaḥ syāttato hṛdayādibhedena dvyavadānabhedenāpi vā bhedaḥ syāt | na cārhati bhavitum | vakṣyati hi—( a. 6 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 12 ) |‘api vā 'vyatirekādrūpaśabdāvibhāgācca’ iti | prakṛtau ca kṛtsne paśau yāgasādhanatvena codite tathaivotsraṣṭavye prāpte hṛdayādyekādaśāvadānaprakṛtitvena paśunā yāgaḥ sādhayitavya iti vākyāntaravaśādavagamyate | tenāsau paśordharmo na yāgasya | ihāpi saptadaśānāṃ yāgasādhanatve 'vagate 'tideśena pratyekaṃ sarvadharmāḥ prāpyanta ityeko 'pi yāgaḥ saptadaśāvadānagaṇānatideśena gṛhṇanna vihanyate | tasmādekaṃ karmeti prāpte, ucyate |

na hyetadetāvatyeva vākyaṃ paryavasyati prājāpatyānpaśūniti, kiṃ tarhi, prakṛtivadityaparo vākyaśeṣaḥ | ekakarmatve cātra savanīyaḥ prakṛtirbhavet | tatra caiko 'vadānagaṇo yāgasya sādhanamāsīdityatrāpyeka eva prāpnoti | so 'pi vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyapaśuniṣpanna āsīditi tādṛgeva kartavyaḥ | tataścaikenaiva paśunā siddhattvānna paśvantarāṇi prajāpatinā saṃbadhyanta iti svapadopāttaṃ bahutvaṃ vākyaprāptaṃ ca saptadaśatvamubhayamapi nānuṣṭhīyeta | yadā tu saptadaśa yāgā iti buddhiḥ kriyate tadā pratikarmāvasāyibhiścodakaistāvanta evāvadānagaṇāḥ prāpyante | tatsiddhyarthaṃ cāśrutānāmapi saptadaśānāṃ paśūnāmāgamaḥ kriyate, kiṃ punaḥ śrutānāmupādānam | nanu ca pratyakṣaṃ yāgaikatvamutsṛjya na yuktamānumānikacodakānurodhena nānātvaṃ kalpayitum | paśya |

utpattivelāyāṃ hi karmaṇāmekānekatvanirṇayo bhavati | utpattiśca sarvatropadeśena gamyate nātideśena | na hyanutpanne karmaṇi kathaṃbhāvo bhavati | na ca tasminnasatyatideśaḥ pravartate | tasmāccirapravṛttabhedābhedajñānāvasarabhāvitvānnātideśavaśena bhedajñānaṃ yuktam | atrocyate |

lg.l: saṃdigdhe vākyaśeṣebhyo nirṇayaḥ ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 13 ) ityatra |prāksamarthitaḥ |

div.p:
nātrāsmābhiratideśenaiva karmabhedo 'vadhāritaḥ | kena tarhi | prājāpatyānityupadeśenaiva | sa tu dravyadevatāyajisadbhāvamātrarūpeṇa nirṇītaḥ | parimāṇaṃ pratyaniścitasāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ prāgupadiṣṭasaṃdihyamānaikaśeṣataddhitapaurvāparyarūpaḥ sannatideśātmakena vākyaśeṣeṇa tadgrahaṇānurūpasāmarthyena ca nirṇīyate | yadyapi ca paścāttano 'tideśastathā 'pi so 'tra bhaviṣyatītyādita eva jñātvā tadaviruddhārthavṛttitvamupadeśasyādhyavasīyate | tataśca yadyapi prajāpatirdevataiṣāmiti vigṛhya vākyārthonnayanaṃ prakramyate, tathā 'pyante visaṃvādadarśanād bhrāntyā mayā 'sau vigrahaḥ kṛta iti na buṃddhipūrvakārī nādhyavasyati | na cātraiṣa
yaścopadeśasyātideśānurodhavṛttitve saṃdigdhatvarūpo virodharūpaśca prakāraḥ so 'tra nāstītyarthaḥ | prakāro 'sti yenātideśa eva pūrvajñānānurodhena pravarteta | na hyasau prakṛtāvapaṭhyamānānsaptadaśāvadānagaṇānekasminkarmaṇi jñāpayituṃ samarthaḥ | nāpyekasyaiva gaṇasya saptadaśa prakṛtidravyāṇi
prāpayituṃ samartha ityanuṣaṅgaḥ | | na vā 'sau saṃdigdho yenopadeśānnirṇīyeta | na ca saṃdehāvasthatvādupadeśenaikāntiko 'tideśasya virodho yenaikagaṇaprāptirbādhyeta | na hyekakarmatvamupadiṣṭam | sarvatra cāvirodhasaṃbhave virodho nā ' 'śrīyate | śakyate cātra karmabahutvābhyupagamenāṃvirodhaḥ saṃpādayitum | tasmādevamupadeśavacanaṃ vyajyate | prajāpatirdevatā 'syeti vigṛhya saptadaśānāṃ tantreṇoccāraṇam | tataścā ' 'gneyāgnīṣomīyādivadeva bhinnairdevatāsaṃyogairbhinnā yāgāścodyante | yaduktaṃ, bhavati paśorayaṃ dharma ekādaśāvadānaṃ nāma | sa caikakarmatve 'pi pratipaśu bhetsyata iti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

prājāpatyapaśu yāgena bhāvayetkathamiti hyapekṣyate, na paśunā kathamiti, tyajyamānatvena dravyasya jñātaprakāratvāt | prakṛtāvapi caikapaśuniṣpannaikādaśāvadānagaṇasādhyatvaṃ yāgadharmo na paśoḥ | niṣphalatvāt | taddharmatvapakṣe hyavadānairasau saṃskriyeta | na ca tena prayojanam, vināśitatvāt | yāgena tu siddhenārthastatsaṃbandhinā 'pūrveṇa veti sarvamidaṃ tannirvṛttiprakāratvenā ' 'śrīyate | tasmānnaiko yāgo 'nekagaṇaṃ samartho grahītum | na ca tadagrahe 'nekapaśugrahaṇam | yadyapi cāvadānaprakṛterekatvaṃ saptadaśasaṃkhyayā bādhyata iti nānāpaśuniṣpanna eka eva gaṇo gṛhyatāmiti buddhirbhavet | tathā 'pyekādaśa paśava upayujyeranna saptadaśa | nanvekasminnapi yāge saptadaśabhiravadānagaṇairyakṣyata iti— anekādṛṣṭakalpanābhayātpaśuśabdenāvadānagaṇaṃ yāgapratyāsatterlakṣayitvā tatparicchedārthā saptadaśasaṃkhyā vidhāsyata iti manyate | naitadevam | lakṣaṇākāraṇābhāvāt | na hyasati virodhe lakṣaṇā yuktā | tenaitatsaṃkaṭamāpadyate—saptadaśa paśavaḥ kartavyā ekena cāvadānagaṇenaikapaśuniṣpannenaiko yāgaḥ sādhayitavya iti | na caitatkathaṃ cidanuṣṭhānaṃ śakyam | athānyatrāpi śrutā saṃkhyā 'nyatrāpi nīyate tato 'pūrvapratyāsannatareṣu varaṃ yāgeṣveva kalpitā | na cāvirodhasaṃbhavātkiṃcidapi codakasya bādhanīyamityuktam | pramāṇavaśāccānekādṛṣṭakalpanā 'pi nirdoṣā | kṛtsnavākyagamanikārthaṃ śṛṅgābhiprāyādyupanyāsaḥ | etaduktaṃ bhavati | ye saptadaśavarṇādibhedabhinnāḥ paśavasteṣāṃ kaścitprājāpatyaḥ kartavya iti | tatrā ' 'ha—te hi śyāmāstūparā
śṛṅgarahitā ityarthaḥ | ekarūpāḥ śrūyante tasmātsaptadaśa yāgā iti | prayo
janaṃ
yadyapi bhāṣyoktaṃ pūrvapakṣaprayojanaṃ ‘prajāpataye saptadaśa paśavaḥ saṃkalpyante’ iti pūrvapakṣopakramāt ‘eko yāgaḥ saptadaśabhiḥ paśubhirnirvartsyate’ ityupasaṃhārācca yāge sarvapaśusādhyatvasyaiva pūrvapakṣyabhipretatvāvasāyādekapaśusādhanatvasya paśvantarādṛṣṭārthatvasya ca pūrvapakṣyanabhimatatvāvasāyādayuktamiva bhāti tathā 'pi siddhāntabhāṣye 'bhihitasyāpyekapaśusādhanatvasyetarādṛṣṭārthatvasya cā ' 'pādyoktyarthatvenopapādayati yadyapītyādinā |yadyapi pūrvapakṣavādino nābhipretaṃ tathā 'pyekasyaiva sākṣādyāgasādhanatvamitare tatsaṃkhyāsaṃpādanārthamupādīyante, ityekasmādavadātavyam | tadvināśe cetare 'pyāvarteran | athavā 'rdhakṛteṣu saṃskāreṣu
ya eva kaścideko 'neko bā paśurnaṣṭastadā samastapaśvāvṛttiḥ | na tvekasminneva naṣṭe paśau, sarveṣāṃ yāgasādhanatvāviśeṣāditi tārtpayam |ya eva naṣṭastatraiva samastānāmāvṛttiḥ | nanu ca yathaiva saptadaśasu yāgeṣu saha kriyamāṇeṣu ekavināśe sati ( a. 6 pā. 5 a. 21 sū. 56 )‘ahargaṇe tu yasminnapacchedaḥ’ ityanena nyāyenetareṣu pratīkṣyamāṇeṣu sa evā ' 'vartate tathaiva dravyasāhitye 'pi syāt | naitadevam | tathā hi | saptadaśasaṃkhyaikārthasamavāyivyāsaṅgiyāgasādhanatvamiti tādṛśasyaivopākaraṇādibhirbhavitavyam | tatra yadeva dravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ tenaiva vinā yathāśrutasādhanavināśo jāta iti sarve saṃskārāstiṣṭhatsvapi dravyeṣu sādhanātpracyutā iti punarādita eva kartavyāḥ | tathā yasyāpyabhinavānītasya te kriyante tasyāpi te sādhanabhūtasya śrutāḥ | na ca saptadaśatvena vinā 'sya sādhanatvamastīti tatsiddhaye 'vaśyamitare 'pyapekṣitavyā iti | siddhānte tvanyonyanirapekṣasādhanatvaśaktiyuktānāṃ sahaprayogamātraṃ kriyata ityupapannā tanmātrāvṛttiḥ | nanvevaṃ sati pūrvapakṣanyāyena stotraśastreṣu ‘tāṃ caturbhirādatte’ ityādiṣu caikamantravināśe samastāvṛttiḥ prāpnoti | na | tatra pratyekaṃ sādhanatve sati vacanena samuccayāśrayaṇāt | yatkurvāṇā hi te mantrāḥ stotrādīni sādhayanti tatraiṣāṃ pratyekākāṅkṣānivartanasāmarthyam |
saṃkhyāyuktavacanaviniyuktānāṃ stotrādimantrāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ yadi vākyārthābhidhānaniṣpādanaśaktirvā, bhaviṣyattarhi vibhajyamānasākaṅkṣatve satyekārthatvāpatterekastotrādisādhanānāmaikamantryaṃ syādityabhiprāyaḥ |anyathā hyekamantrataiva syāt | bhinnaireva ca prātyātmikairmantrakāryaiḥ saṃhatya kāryāntaramārabhyate na mantreṣu vyāsaṅgi sādhanatvam | paśūnāṃ tu vyāsaṅgītyuktam |
mantrakāryāṇāṃ tarhi saṃhatyakāritvādekavināśe samastāvṛttiḥ syāt | naitadasti | sādhanavināśavyatirekeṇa kāryavināśābhāvāt | sādhaneṣveva puruṣasya vyāpāra iti tadvināśānurodhenaivānuṣṭhānamiti viśeṣaḥ || 21 ||

bahuvicāratvādguṇaprakaraṇabhedāvupekṣya saṃjñā tāvadudāhriyate | tatra ‘athaiṣa jyotiḥ’ ityādiṣvathaśabdaiṣaśabdayoḥ pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣatvātprakṛtahānyaprakṛtaprakriyākalpanadaurbalyādekasyāpi ca dākṣāyaṇayajñādivadvakṣyamāṇena guṇayogenānekanāmadheyatvasiddheḥ
yathaiva tṛtīyapāde ‘ayaneṣu codanāntaraṃ saṃjñopabandhāt’ ityadhikaraṇe ekasyaiva darśapūrṇamāsākhyasya karmaṇaḥ, ayanapadoktāvṛttyākhyaguṇayogena dākṣāyaṇayajñarūpasaṃjñāntaramiṣyate tathaiva ‘atha punarayam, ityādivakṣyamāṇabhāṣyoktadyotanādiguṇayogenaikasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya bahavaḥ saṃjñā upapadyante | ato na karmāntaratvamityadhyāhārya pañcabhyantaṃ pūraṇīyam | | na ca guṇaphalasaṃbandhapare vākye sati karmāntaraṃ karmānusāri cāpūrvaṃ tatsiddhyarthāni cātyantāśrutetikartavyatādīni kalpitāni bhaviṣyanti | kathaṃbhāvāpekṣayā ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ sahasradakṣiṇādi gṛhṇanna vārito bhaviṣyati | na ca karmāntaravidhāvathaśabdena pūrvāpekṣeṇa kiṃcitphalamasti | na hi kratuḥ kratvantaramapekṣate | na ca kratūnāṃ kramavivakṣeti vakṣyāmaḥ( a. 5 pā. 3 a. 12 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | | tena kramārthamapi nāthaśabdaśravaṇam | na ca saṃjñā bhāvanāṃ bravīti | nāpi dhātvartho yajatyādivattadupaśliṣṭaḥ, yena tadbhedabuddhiḥ syāt | na ceyaṃ vidhātrī śrutiryena vihite karmāntare puruṣaṃ pravartayet | na cāpravartite puruṣe bhedaḥ pratīto 'pi grahaikatvavadvivakṣyate | yastvatra vidhāyakaḥ
etena sahastradakṣiṇena yajeta, ityatra śrūyamāṇa ākhyātapratyaya ityarthaḥ | sa guṇādyākṣepānna karmasvarūpe nipatati | na cedasāvākṣiptastato 'bhyāsādeva bhedaḥ syānna saṃjñātaḥ | ‘phalasaṃbandho 'pi ca saṃnidhau tvavibhāgāt’ ityanena nyāyena( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 13 sū. 26 ) | na
karmāntarabuddhiṃ karoti | yadvā dadhigodohanādivatprakṛtakarmāśrayātsahasradakṣiṇāderguṇādevaitatphalamityadhyavasānādakarmāntaratvam | jyotirādiṣu tvayamaparo viśeṣaḥ | yajjyotiṣṭomanāmaikadeśatvena tadbuddhyanapāyaḥ | tathā ‘vasante vasante jyotiṣā’ iti tatra tatra prayogo dṛśyate | tasmācchabdāntarābhyāsasaṃkhyāpūrvakarmāyogyaguṇaprakaraṇāntarāṇāmabhāvādabheda iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

lg.l: anukte karmaśabde yā saṃjñā pūrvaṃ pravartate |

div.p: yā hyuptanne pūrvoccārita ākhyātaśabde saṃjñā pravartate, sā pūrvamevā ' 'khyātena bhedābhedayoranyataratra niścaye kṛte paścātpravartamānā na bhindyāt | iyaṃ punarutpatsyamānasaṃyuktā saṃkhyāvacca pṛthaktvaniveśinī | katham | sarvatraiva tāvadanekārthānekaśabdayoranyāyyatvādarthāntaradarśanātsaṃjñāntaramapekṣate | saṃjñāntaradarśanāccārthāntaratvaṃ, taccobhayamapi balīyasastadbādhakapratyabhijñānādbādhyate | yāvattu tādṛgbādhakavijñānaṃ nāsti tāvadanapoditamautsargikaṃ bhedajñānamāste | tadiha pūrvaprastutajyotiṣṭomavilakṣaṇamanantaram ‘athaiṣa gauḥ’ iti saṃjñāntaramuccāryamāṇameva pūrvasaṃbandhānubhavādṛte tatra buddhimanādadhadātmānurañjitapratyāyyārthāntarabuddhiṃ karoti | tatra prāgūrdhvaṃ vā saṃjñī syādityanviṣyamāṇe yāvantaḥ prāguccāritā yajatayaste sarve jyotiṣṭomabuddhāvavicchinnāyāṃ pravṛttatvāttadviṣayatvenāvadhāritā nārthāntaratvaṃ saṃjñāntarabhāktvaṃ vā labhante | yastu prastūyamānaḥ sa yadyapi phalaguṇopabandhādanyatra vyāpṛte vidhāyake tadvaśena na bhidyate tathā 'pyasaṃbaddhapadavyavāyanyāyena gośabde pūrvatrāniviśamāne tadbuddhāvananuṣajjamānāyāṃ prakaraṇavicchede jñāte 'rvāntarakaluvitāyāṃ ca buddhau nipatatsaṃjñāntasaviruddhaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomaṃ gantumaśaknuvanvicchinnānusaṃdhānādarthāntare vartate | tathā hi—

evaṃ ca sati athaśabdaḥ pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣaṇānantaryādyasaṃbhavātkarmāntarādhikārārtha evāvagamyate | eṣaśabdo 'pi saṃnihitapratyakṣavacanaḥ sanyathaiva ca pūrvaprakṛte tadrūpatvādvartate tathottare prastūyamāne 'pītyaviśeṣaḥ | prakṛtavicchedāprakṛtaprakriye ca saṃjñāśrutivaśādāśrīyamāṇe nirdoṣe | nāsābhimāḥ puna śrutaya iti | prathamoccāritatvānnaiva punaḥ śrutitvāśaṅkā 'stītyevaṃ varṇyate | notpanne
nāsāmimāḥ—iti bhāṣyaṃ punaḥ śrutitvāśaṅkānirāsārthatvenā ' 'bhāsamānaṃ grathamoccāritattvena punaḥśrutittvāśaṅkānupapattyā ' 'kṣipya ‘etena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeta’ iti guṇasaṃkrāntaśaktinā ' 'khyātena abhedāvadhāraṇānna saṃjñāyā bhettṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśaṅkāmākhyātasya viśiṣṭavidhitvopapatterabhedāvadhāraṇāśaktatvānnirākartuṃmabhedāvadhāraṇottarakālatvaṃ punaḥ śabdenocyate nā ' 'vṛttiṃrityāśayena samādadhāti notpanna ityādinā | ayaṃ cātra bhāṣyārthaḥ | yadyabhinnatayā 'vadhārite karmaṇi paścājjyotirādisaṃjñānāmimāni śravaṇāni syustato na bhidyurna tvākhyātenābhedaḥ śakyo 'vadhārayitumiti | karmaṇi punaḥ śrūyanta ityabhiprāyaḥ | samastameva ca vākyamanarthakaṃ bhavet | athaiṣa jyotiriti hyanuktvā 'pi śakyante sahasradakṣiṇādayo guṇā vidhātum | karmaikatvapakṣe ca dvādaśaśataprabhṛtīnāṃ sahasradakṣiṇādīnāṃ ca tulyārthatvādvikalpaḥ syāt, sa cānyāyyaḥ | karmāntaratve tu naiṣa doṣaḥ | na ca guṇātphalamavasīyate, saṃjñāvicchinnāśrayalābhāsaṃbhavāt | prastūyamānakarmasaṃbandhaśca saṃjñāguṇaphalādīnāṃ vākyena, pūrvakarmasaṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇena | tasmādapi karmāntaram | na ca
jyotirādīnāṃ jyotiṣṭomāvayavatvam | na hi kaṇvarathaṃtarāvayavo rathaṃtaramiti niścīyate | yattu ‘vasante jyotiṣā yajeta’ iti prayogo dṛṣṭa iti sa pramāṇāntarāvagamavaśādnauṇa iti draṣṭavyam | na ceha tādṛkpramāṇāntaramasti, yena tadviṣayatvamavagamyeta |
yo 'pi trivṛdādiṣu jyotiḥśabdaprayogaḥ so 'pi tatraiva vākye sāmānādhikaraṇyādaupacārika iti na sarvatra labhyate | tathā hi |
tasmānmukhyārthaparigrahādbhedikā saṃjñeti siddham || 22 ||

ataḥ paraṃ prākprakaraṇabhedādguṇanimitto bhedābhedavicāro vartiṣyate | cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve parvaṇi ‘vaiśvadevyāmikṣā’ iti dravyadevatāsaṃyogānumitaṃ yāgaṃ vidhāyocyate ‘vājibhyo vājinam’ iti | tatra saṃdehaḥ kiṃ tasminneva karmaṇi guṇavidhirutānenāpi dravyadevatāsaṃyogena yāgāntaraṃ kalpyate | tatrobhayamapi dravyadevataṃ pūrvatra vidhīyata iti pakṣaḥ saṃbhavannapi nopanyastaḥ | pramāṇāntaraprāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhānasya paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇe( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 6 ) asminniti śeṣaḥ | nirākṛtatvāt | tena vājinameva kevalaṃ kiṃ pūrvasminkarmaṇi tayā ca devatayā saṃba
dhyata uta devatāntareṇa yāgāntareṇa cāpūrveṇa saṃbadhyata iti | kiṃ prāptaṃ, pūrvatraiva vājinaguṇavidhānamiti | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
viśve devāḥ pratīyante tacca karmeha vājinam
vājinadravyaviśiṣṭamityarthaḥ | ||

div.p: vājino nāma kecana naiva devatāviśeṣāḥ prasiddhāḥ | na cāprasiddhāḥ padārthā vākyārthaṃ niṣpādayanti |

sarvatra samudāyaprasiddhāvalabhyamānāyāmavayavaprasiddhirgṛhyate | tadiha ‘vaiśvadevyāmikṣā’ ityanena vākyenā ' 'mikṣāvattayā vājino viśvedevāḥ kalpitāḥ | te ca vājinasaṃyogenāvagamyamānā na śakyāḥ parityaktum | te ca tena pūrvānumitena yāgenānuraktāḥ | tatra vājinasaṃyogānyathānupapattyā yāge kalpyamāne vājipadopāttayāgātikramakāraṇābhāvāttatsadbhāve cānyaviṣayārthāpattyanutthānātsa eva yāgastadevāpūrvaṃ saiva devateti niścayānna vyatiriktakalpanaṃ labhyate | tammāttatraiva karmaṇyāmikṣāvājinayorvikalpaḥ samuccayo vā | satyapi cotpattivākyaśiṣṭatve niṣkṛṣya yāgaṃ guṇāntaraṃ vidhāsyate | yadyapi ca dravyadevatāsaṃyogānumitatvādasau na niṣkṛṣṭaḥ śrutastathā 'pi kriyātmanā 'styevā ' 'numānikī vyatirekabuddhiḥ
dravyadevatānuraktatvenāpyanumitasya yāgasya kriyārūpatayā kārakarūpābhyāṃ dravyadevatābhyāṃ saṃbhavatyeva niṣkarṣa ityāśayaḥ | | yāgapadameva vā 'trānumīyate | tadā ' 'mikṣāparityāge 'pi na vinaśyati | vājiśabdo 'pi ca tadanumitayāgapratipattyarthamevoccāryate | na hi tannirapekṣo vājivājinasaṃbandho 'vakalpate | kārakāṇāṃ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvāt | tasmānna karmāntaramiti | atrābhidhīyate |

apūrvaḥ karmāntarasaṃyogānarho vā guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ kalpayati | vākyayoḥ samatvāt—itare
taranirapekṣatvāt | ubhau hi dravyadevatāmaṃyogāvātmavirodhenānyonyāvakāśamaprayacchantau pṛthakkarmaṇī vidhattaḥ | satyaṃ, pūrvatrāsaṃbhavanguṇo 'nyatkalpayati | kathaṃ nu pūrvakarmaṇā taddevatayā vā vājinaṃ na saṃbadhyate | tatkāryavartiguṇāvarodhāt | kathaṃ na samuccayaḥ | ( a. 12 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 9 ) |‘ekārthāstu vikalperan’ iti hi sthāsyatyetat | vikalpa evāstviti cet | na | atulyabalatvāt | taddarśayati—śrutyā viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ tadupāttasya ca karmaṇa āmikṣāsaṃbandhaḥ, vājinasaṃbandhastu vākyena | sarvatraiva tāvat—
āha | mantrasya tāvadavidhāyakatvālliṅgavacchrutito daurbalyaṃ bhavet | caturthītaddhitayostu ko viśeṣa iti vaktavyam | taducyate |

vaiśvadevīti hi śrutyaiva devatāsaṃbandhaḥ pratītaḥ | itaratra tu ‘vājibhyo vājinam’ iti padadvayasāmīpyādgamyate | nanvihāpyāmikṣāpadasaṃnidhānavaśenaiva dravyadevatāsaṃbandhaḥ pratīyata iti tulyaṃ vākyagamyatvaṃ bhavet | atha vaiśvadevīti śrutyā devatātvaṃ vākyena dravyasaṃbandhaḥ sa ihāpyaviśiṣṭaḥ | caturthīśrutyā devatātve 'bhihite vākyena dravyasaṃgatimātrakaraṇāt | atha dravyamātrasaṃbandhe taddhitāntenaiva kṛte viśeṣamātramāmikṣāpadasaṃnidherbhaviṣyatītyucyate | tadapyaviśiṣṭamitaratrāpi | vājibhya ityekapadenaiva saṃpradānaṃ bruvatā saṃpradeyādvinā tadanupapatteḥ sāmānyāpekṣe sati vājinapadasaṃnidhānena viśeṣamātrapratīteḥ | api ca bhavatu nāma taddhitaśruterdravyamātrasaṃbandhaḥ | tatra dravyamātraṃ vājine 'pyaviśiṣṭamiti na virudhyate | viśeṣayostvāmikṣāvājinayorvirodhaḥ | tayoścobhayatra vākyalabhyasaṃbandhatvādaviśeṣaḥ | tena vikalpaḥ prāpnotyeva | taducyate |

viśve devā devatā 'syā iti hi na sarvanāmnā dravyasāmānyamabhidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi, saṃnihito viśeṣaḥ, sa eva vyavahārakṣamo nānirūpitaṃ dravyamātram | ataḥ prātipadikena yo 'rtha upāttaḥ sa pramāṇāntaragamyasya dravyaviśeṣasya devatetyetattaddhitena śrutyaivocyate | tataścāntarṇītasaṃbandhadevatopasarjanadravyaviśeṣapratyaye padāntaranirapekṣeṇa taddhitāntena padena nirvartite kaḥ punarasau dravyaviśeṣo yasya taddhitena devatoktetyanveṣaṇāyāmayamityāmikṣāpadenopanīyate | tatra yadā tāvatprāgeva viśiṣṭapratyayātsaṃbadho 'bhihitastadā na lakṣyamāṇo bhavati | athāpi prakṛtipratyayayoḥ svārthavṛttayoreva nairantaryādantarāle saṃbandho 'vagamyamāno bhavati | tathā 'pyatraikapadasthatvātpadadvayasaṃnidhigamyādbalīyānvijñāyamānaḥ śrauta ityucyate | tenaitau dvau saṃbandhāveko dravyadevatābandho 'paro viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | tatra pūrvaḥ śrauta uttaro vākyalakṣaṇa iti viśeṣaḥ | ataśca naivātra nīlotpalādivadarthadvāraṃ vaiśvadevyāmikṣāśabdayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ, kiṃ tarhi ||

naivātra taddhitāntenaiko 'rtho 'bhihita āmikṣāpadenānyaḥ paścāttayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatā, taddhitāntavācyasya prathamapratīteḥ | kiṃ tarhi | taddhitāntasyānupayuktānabhidhānaśaktereva pratīkṣamāṇasyopapadena viṣayadānamātraṃ kriyate |

tenā ' 'bhikṣāpadasaṃnidhibalādvaiśvadevīśabda eva tāmabhidhatte | na cedānīmāmikṣāpadasyānuvādatvam, tena vinā taddhitāntasya taddhiṣayatvāpratīteḥ | na ca vākyārthatvaṃ taddhitāntapadārthasya pṛthagaprasiddheḥ | na hi dvau svatantrau padārthāvagṛhītvā vākyārthaḥ pratīyate | tenābhidheyopanayanamātrakāritvānna taddhitaśruterāmikṣāpadenārthaviprakarṣaḥ kriyate |
upapadasarvanāmataddhitānāmaikārthye pūrvācāryasaṃmatiṃ darśayati—tathā cetyādinā |tathā cā ' 'ha |
tena yaivā ' 'mikṣā saiva devatāsaṃbandhaṃ yāsyatītyevamuktā satī vaiśvadevīśabdenocyate | tena śabdayorevātra sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nārthayoḥ | itaratra tu—

lg.l: na prātipadikenoktaṃ na vibhaktyā haviḥ svataḥ |

div.p: vājibhya iti tu nātra prātipadikena vibhaktyā vobhābhyāṃ vā dravyasāmānyaviśeṣatatsaṃbandhānāṃmanyatamamapyabhidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi | prātipadikārthaḥ saṃpradānamityetāvanmātramityuktam | tatra na kathaṃciddravyasaṃbandhaḥ pade 'ntargata ityavaśyaṃ vākyenaiva vājinapadasāmīpyātpratyāyayitavyaḥ | api ca |

pā. sū. ( 4—2—24 )‘sā 'sya devatā’ iti asyapadārthe devatātaddhito vidhīyate; natvevaṃ tatsaṃpradānamasyeti caturthī vidhīyate, yenāsya padārtho 'pyupādīyeta | kiṃ tarhi, saṃpradānamātrameva tadabhidheyatvenoktaṃ tathā ca pratīyate | tena tvanyathānupapadyamānena saṃpradeyaviṣayamākāṅkṣāmātraṃ kevalamutpādyate | na caitāvatā 'bhidheyatvaṃ bhavati, sarvavākyarthānāṃ padārthatvaprasaṅgāt | ākāṅkṣayā tvetāvatkriyate | yena padāntaroccāraṇe sati saṃbandho jāyate | nirākāṅkṣatve punaḥ so 'pi na syāt | tena yadyapi caturthīśrutyā devatātvamuktaṃ tathā 'pi dravyasaṃbandho vākyenaiva | tatra cāsmākaṃ vivāda iti durbalo vājinasaṃbandhaḥ | kiṃ ca
bhāṣyasthaśrutivākyaśabdau yathāśrutārthaparatayā vyākhyāyādhuṃnā saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭārthaparatayā vyākaroti—kiṃcetyādinā | |
sarvaprakāramāmikṣāsaṃbandhasya saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ śrautatvam |

vājinasaṃbandhe ca viprakarṣādvākyīyatvaṃ tadyathā, yadyapi tāvaddravyaviśeṣasya taddhito na brūyāddevatātvaṃ, tathā 'pi sāmānyasya tāvadbravīti, na caturthyantena sāmānyamapyucyata iti viśeṣaḥ | yattu sāmānyaṃ vājine 'pyaviruddhamiti, tadayuktam | vaiśvadevīti hi strīpratyayena samānapadagatenaiva strīdravyaṃ kimapi saṃnihitamityavadhāryate | na ca vājinasya strītvaṃ saṃnidhirvā 'stātyanāśrayaṇam | api ca |

kartavyatāvacanamāmikṣāvākye 'pyadhyāhārātprayogavacanādvā labdhavyamiti na paryanuyu
jyate | ‘vājibhyo vājinam’ iti tu dadātimanadhyāhṛtya na śakyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratyetuṃ yathā vaiśvadevyāmikṣeti | kutaḥ |

na cātra sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ vā paśyāmaḥ | na ca vājibhyaṃ iti kārakavibhaktiḥ kriyāpadādanyena saṃbadhyate | na ceha tadupāttam | tatrādhyāhārakalpanādeko viprakarṣaḥ | tripadasaṃbandhagauravādaparaḥ | itaratrāpi yajikalpanādaviśeṣa iti cet | na | tasya saṃbandhottarakālānumeyatvāt | vaiśvadevyāmikṣeti hi niṣpanne saṃbandhe yajiranumīyate na tadadhīnā saṃbandhapratītiḥ | tava tu parasvatvāpādanāsaṃbhavātsa ca bhaviṣyatyarthasaṃbandhārtham | āditaśca dravyadevatāpadaikavākyatvasiddhaye dadātiriti viśeṣaḥ | kalpite ca dadātau kārakayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvāttena tāvatsaha saṃbandhaḥ | tata ekārthatvātparasparaniyama iti viprakṛṣṭatā | na tvāmikṣāyāṃ tadvatkiṃciditi saṃnikarṣaḥ | satyapi ca vājivājinayoḥ sākṣātsaṃbandhe vaiyadhikaraṇyādviprakṛṣṭatvam | vaiśvadevyāmikṣeti tu sāmānādhikaraṇyātsaṃni kṛṣṭatā | tathā ca vakṣyati
( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 sū. 12 ) atratyabhāṣyasaṃmati darśayati vakṣyatītyādinā |‘samarthatarāṇi hi samānavibhaktīni bhavanti durbalo vivibhaktiriti’ | kiṃ ca |

na hi taddhitavaddevatāyāṃ caturthyutpattiḥ smaryate | kka tarhi,
pā. sū. ( 2-3-13 ) caturtha saṃgadāne iti smṛtyeti śeṣaḥ |saṃpradāne | na ca saṃpradānasyaiva devatātvaṃ, mā bhūt ‘hiraṇyamātreyāya dadāti’ ityannā ' 'treyo devatā | yadi ca devatā saṃpradānaṃ syāttato yāgadānayorabheda eva myāt | pratigrahe vyāpṛtaṃ ca kārakaṃ saṃpradānaṃ bhavati | na ca devatāyāḥ pratigrahītṛtvaṃ saṃmavati | tenāvaśyaṃ yaḥ saṃpradānatvātprāgbhāvī datuddeśaḥ
taduddeśa iti—tasyāḥ devatāyā uddeśa ityarthaḥ | tathā ca pratigrahītatve sati tyajyanānadravyoddeśyatvarūpasaṃpradānatvavācinyā caturthyā tadekadeśabhūtaṃ, habissyāgakālīnavatudhyantapadoccāraṇakarmatvarūpaṃ devatātvaṃ lakṣaṇayaiva prati, pādyata ityāśayaḥ | sa caturthyā lakṣayitavyaḥ | yadvā parasvatvāpādanasaṃbandhottarakālabhāvyaiśvaryaṃ, tādātmyaprasiddherdevatātvasya | yadyapyanirākaraṇātmakasaṃpradānameva devatetyabhyupagamastathā 'pi sāmānyena vyabhicāriviśeṣalakṣaṇādvikṛṣṭatvam | api ca |

vājibhya iti rūpasāmānyātprasaktaṃ sadyāvatpañcamītvamapanīya caturthītvaṃ sādhyate tāvanmativikṣepaḥ | nanu taddhite 'pvanekāṣatyādyaryasaṃdehāttulyametat | viṣama upanyāsaḥ |
śabdasaṃdeho mayopanyrastaḥ, tvayā 'rthasaṃdehaḥ | sarvathā tāvattaddhitatvamasaṃdigdham | arthaḥ punaryogyatvāditarāsaṃbhavena devatātmako nirṇeṣyate | bhavatastu nirṇīte 'pi śabde caturthyarthānekatvādupapadakārakalakṣaṇasaṃdehādastyeva viprakarṣaḥ | tenārthasaṃdeha ubhayoḥ samatvānnaikaścodyate | śabdasaṃdehastvasādhāraṇatvāccoditaḥ | kiṃca |

yathā cotpattiśiṣṭasya balīyastvaṃ na ca kriyāmātraṃ niṣkṛṣya guṇāntaraṃ vidhātuṃ śakyate tathoktaṃ citrādhikaraṇe( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 2 ) vaiśvadevādhiraṇe( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 10 ) ca | vaiśvadevādhikaraṇanyāyena ca prakaraṇamapekṣitavyamaparaṃ vājinavākyena | kutaḥ |

vājinaṃ hi vinā yāgena bājibhirna saṃbadhyata iti kaṃcidyāgamapekṣate | tatra yadāmikṣāyāgasyaiva tadapyaṅgamiti kalpyate tatprakaraṇāt | tataśca yadyapi vākyenaivā ' 'mikṣāyāge viśve devā vidhīyante tathā 'pyanyanirapekṣavihitatvādāmikṣāyāḥ prakaraṇasāpekṣavākyavihitādvājinādbalīyastvaṃ bhavediti viśeṣaḥ | prakaraṇānapekṣayāgasaṃbandhe cānyeṣāmihāpratīterapūrvayāgaḥ saṃbandhī bhavatīti bhedaḥ | na caivamādīnāmanupāttapuruṣavyāpārāṇāmananumite yāge vākyāntarāpekṣā 'stītyuktamāgneyādiṣu |

vājina iti hyavayavaprasiddhyā viśve devāḥ pratyāyyante | vākyārthavaccāvayavārthau samuccitya saṃbandhaṃ kalpayitvā sā bhavantī śrutimātropanipātalabhyāyāḥ samudāyaprasiddherdurbalā bhavatīti durbalataraḥ saṃyogo vājinasya |

devatātvaṃ nāma yasyaiva śabdenoktaṃ tasyaiva yogyasyāyogyasya vā bhavatīti na jātinimittaṃ, yenāyaṃ bājiśabdo balādanyatra nīyeta | ataśca vājiśabdo 'śvānāṃ devatātvaṃ vadanvinā kāryeṇa durbalayā 'vayavaprasiddhyā viśvadeveṣu kalpyata iti viprakarṣaḥ |

sarve hyagnyādayaḥ puroḍāśādibhirannairvājino vijñāyante | tatrā ' 'mikṣāyāṃ tāvadannaśabdaḥ prayukto na puroḍāśādāvityekaḥ kleśaḥ | punarapi cā ' 'mikṣāmātragrahaṇe sati vaiśvadevyā ' 'mikṣayaiva tadvatāṃ grahaṇamityaparaḥ | tataśca svarasena śrutiranyatrāpi vartamānā satī prakaraṇenaiva viśeṣe sthāpayitavyā | na ca tatra kiṃcinnimittamasyi | guṇabhāvenopādīyamānatvāhevatāyāḥ | saṃskāryatve ca ‘vrīhīnprokṣati’ ityādiṣviva kathaṃcidapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāyāṃ prakṛtagrahaṇaṃ bhavet | na cātra tadasti | vinā 'pi tena karmaṇaḥ prayojanavattvopapatteḥ | kāmaṃ vājinasyaiva pratipattiḥ saṃskāro bhavenna devatāyāḥ | prakṛtagrahaṇe cāgnyādaunāṃ sadbhāvādanavadhāraṇam | atha viśvadeveṣu sarve saṃgṛhītā bhaviṣyantīti teṣāṃ grahaṇam | tadayuktam | sarvasaṃgrahasyāpramāṇakatvāt | bahuvacanaśrutyā sarvagrahaṇamiti cet | na | tasya triṣveva caritārthatvāt | na ca triṣvavadhāraṇajñānamiti cet | na | ( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 10 sū. 25 ) |‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat’ ityavadhāraṇahetusadbhāvāt | tasmānna viśvedevagrahaṇe kiṃcitpramāṇam | sākāṅkṣā ca devatā dravyeṇa saṃbadhyeta | sā cātra vājiśabdena dravyavatyevopādīyamānā nirākāṅkṣaiva pratyāyiteti na dravyāntarasaṃbandhaṃ kṣamate | tasmādatulyabalatvam | kiṃ ca

yadi hi vājinayāge 'pi viśve devā eva devatātvenābhyupagamyante tato 'vaśyaṃ nigamasthāneṣu viśvedevaśrutirevoccāraṇīyā | sā cātra vidhiśabde 'nuccāritatvādaśakyā labdhum | tatraivaṃ kleśena labhyeta | vājiśabdaḥ kiṃcidarthaṃ vadati | so 'pi rūpāsamavāyādviśvadevaśabdaṃ lakṣayati | tato 'sau vājinatyāgavelāyāmuccāryamāṇatvena vidhīyata iti kleśaḥ | tatrāpi cāryena śabdalakṣaṇāyāmaviśeṣātsarve devā niḥśeṣā devā ityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ prāpnuvantīti viśvedevaśabdo durlabhaḥ | na cānyaśabdoccāraṇe teṣāṃ devatātvaṃ bhavati | ( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 13 sū. 23 )‘vidhiśabdasya mantratve bhāvaḥ’ iti vakṣyati | vājinaśabda evātra puruṣaḥ śāstreṇa pravartita iti taduccāraṇenaiva vājinasya devatā saṃpādanīyā | tataśca yadyapi viśvedevārtha eveha vājiśabdenocyamāno devatā bhavati, itaratra viśvedevaśabdena tathā 'pi mahendranyāyena( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 16 ) apratyanyātrenetyarthaḥ | viniyogabhedādvispaṣṭaṃ devatāpṛthaktvamityaparo 'yaṃ dravyadevatāsaṃbandho vijñā
yate | na ca prāpte karmaṇyanekārthaguṇavidhānaṃ saṃbhavatītyupapannametat, guṇaścāpūrvasaṃyoge bhedaka iti || 23 ||
aguṇe tu karmaśabda iti pratyudāharaṇasūtram |

lg.l: tasminguṇavidhiḥ śakya iti karma na bhidyate || 24 ||

div.p: ‘agnihotraṃ juhoti’ iti prakṛtya ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ iti śrūyate | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ pūrvasmādidaṃ karmāntaramuta tasyaiva guṇātphalamiti | dvayameva purastādavasthitam | aguṇotpattau karmaṇi tatraiva guṇaḥ | saguṇotpattau tu prakārāntareṇa cāvidhīyamānānekaguṇasaṃgatau satyāṃ karmāntaratvamiti | tadihāguṇaśca karmaśabdo 'nekārthopādānaṃ ca vākye śrūyate | tena saṃbhavāsaṃbhavayoḥ saṃdehaḥ | tata etatsiddhyarthamidaṃ vicārayitavyam | kimiha homātphalamuta guṇāt |

kimarthaṃ punaḥ
godohanamiti—pātraviśeṣasaṃjñā |‘godohanena paśukāmasya’ ityetad vṛttyantarodāhṛtamatikramyate | bhedābhedayo
ranupayogāt | kratvarthapuruṣārthavicāre
caturthādhyāya ityarthaḥ | hi tasyaitasya vodāharaṇena kaścidviśeṣaḥ
kaścidviśeṣa iti—karmaṇaḥ phalasaṃbandhe dadhigodohamādeḥ—kratvarthatvātphalakāmanāṃ vinā 'nuṣṭhānam | vikṛtau cātideśaḥ sidhyati | guṇasya phalasaṃbandhe tu puruṣārthatvānnoktaprayojanāṃmityanuṣṭhāne viśeṣaḥ syāt | tathā 'pi kratvarthaṣuruṣārthacintā cartutha eva saṃgatā nehetyāśayaḥ | syāt | iha tu bhedābhedalakṣaṇe tadanuguṇamudāhartavyam | na ca praṇayanasya deśāntaraprāptisaṃskārātmakatvādbhedābhedayorviśeṣaḥ | yadi ca godohanātphalaṃ yadi ca tadvataḥ praṇayanādubhayathā 'pi tādṛgevānuṣṭhānam | iha punaryadi guṇātphalaṃ tataḥ sāyaṃprātarāhutyoreva dadhi prayoktavyam | atha homāttato naiyamikahomavyatiriktamaniyatakālaṃ dadhisādhanakaṃ homāntaraṃ sakṛdeva darvihomatvādapūrvaṃ kriyata ityasti bhedajñāne viśeṣaḥ | nanu ca homādapi phale ( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 13 sū. 26 ) |‘saṃnidhau tvavibhāgāt’ ityanena nyāyena svargayāvajjīvayoriva tadeva karma vidhīyate | naitadevam |

phalanimittādau hi vidhīyamānaṃ karmānutpannaṃ taiḥ saṃbandhuṃ na śaknotītyarthādutpattividhitvamapyanubhavitumupakramate | tatra yadi balīyasyā viparivṛttyā tādrūpyādapracyutayā pūrvakarmotpattirūpaṃ sthāpyate tatrotpādakaśaktivirodhātpratyabhijñānabalena tadeva karmādhyavasīyata iti na bhidyate | yadā tu pūrvakarmarūpātkiṃcidapyādhikyaṃ vijñāyate tadā naivāvibhāgajñānamastītyarthādutpattividhirbhavannanyena tadrūpotpattisamarthena vidhyantareṇānivāritaśaktiḥ satyapyanyaparatve 'nupādeyaṃ pratyupādānātkarma bhinatti | na ca ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt’ ityatrendriyaṃ pratyupādānāddadhiviśiṣṭahomāntarabuddhirbhavantī kenacittadrūpotpattimupasthāpayatā vāryate | kutaḥ |

‘agnihotraṃ juhoti’ iti homaḥ śuddha utpannaḥ, iha ca dadhiviśiṣṭaḥ śrūyate, tenāvibhāgādityasyābhedahetorasiddhatvādbhidyate | nanu ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ityastyeva dadhiviśiṣṭo homaḥ | na | tasyānutpattivākyatvāt | yena tāvadasāvutpādito na tatra dadhiviśiṣṭaḥ, yatra dadhisaṃbaddhastatra notpāditaḥ | tatsaṃnidherguṇārthena punaḥ śrutiriti ( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 13 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |sādhitatvāt | utpattivākyenaiva ca phalavākyasyotpādakatvaṃ pratibadhnatā karmāntaratvaṃ nirākri
yate na guṇavākyenānutpādakatvāt | utpattivākyenaiva ca sarvāṇi prākaraṇikāni guṇaphalanimittavākyāni saṃbadhyante na paraspareṇa | kutaḥ |

anutpannasya guṇādibhirasaṃbandhādutpattiḥ sarvairapekṣyate | na tu parasparāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃcitkāraṇamasti | saiva ca sarvatrānusyūtatvādasaṃbandhinā 'vyavadhīyamānā saṃbadhyate | guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasaṃbandhe sati ekenāpi vyavahitānāmananuṣaṅgānna kenacidekavākyatvamastīti na ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ ityatra ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ityetadupatiṣṭhate | vakṣyati caitat ( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 5 ) |‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ ityatrādhikaraṇe | tatraitatsyāt | saivotpattirvākyāntareṇa dadhimatī kalpitā 'nuṣajyamānā 'tra bhedabuddhiṃ nirākariṣyati | tadanupapannam | evaṃ hi sati—

utpattivākye tāvatkevale nirīkṣyamāṇe śuddhahomāvagamādapratyabhijñānam | atha prākaraṇikaguṇavākyānuraktamālocyate tathā 'pi
ādiśabdena—payo dadhi yavāgūśca sarpirodanataṇḍulāḥ | somo māṃsaṃ tathā tailamāpastāni daśaiva tu || ityādinā nirdiṣṭāni grāhyāṇi |taṇḍulādidravyaviśiṣṭatvānnaiva kevaladadhiyukte vākye 'sti pratyabhijñānam | atha dadhisadbhāvamātrāpekṣiṇīndriyakāmavākye satyapi taṇḍulādīnyanapekṣitatvādasattulyānyanāśritya kevalaṃ dadhi grahīṣyata iti | tathā sati tadevā ' 'patitaṃ bhavati | ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ityetadeva vākyaṃ kevalaṃ gṛhyata iti | nivāritaṃ caitat | api ca

yadyapi tāvaddadhyādīni nityaṃ home samuccīyeran tathā sati vicitramapi karmaikadeśagrahaṇena coditamiti kathaṃcitkalpyeta | dadhyādīnāṃ tu vaikalpikatvādekaikasyaiva daśame pakṣe homāṅgatvam | ataśca dadhivākye 'pyālocyamāme pākṣikaṃ dadhi dṛśyate | nityavacca tadindriyakāmahome śrūyate | tasmādapi na pratyabhijñāyate | na ca yadā dadhnā juhuyādityevamanuvadituṃ śakyate | phalasyāvidheyatvāt | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ | yadīndriyakāmasyadā nityaṃ kevaladadhiviśiṣṭaṃ homaṃ kuryāditi | na cāsau tādṛganyataḥ prāpta iti
bhidyate | nanu homarūpamātraṃ tāvatpratijñātaṃ tatpratyabhijñānāccābhedasiddhiḥ | yattu dravyaṃ na pratyabhijñāyate na tatkarmabhedakāraṇam | tasmāttadeva karma guṇamātrābhyadhikaṃ phale vidhīyate | naitadevam | kutaḥ |

dadhihomasaṃbandhaṃ homaphalasaṃbandhaṃ ca vidadhadvākyaṃ bhidyate | tenāvaśyaṃ viśiṣṭavidhiramyupagantavyaḥ | tataśca siddhaṃ karmāntaratvam | yathaiva cārthādaniyatānekadravyakatve prāpte kevaladadhiniyamādekārthavidhānaṃ, tathaiva parasparānapekṣaistaṇḍulādividhivākyairvaikalpikadaśadravyakatve kalpite taṇḍulādivyudāsena kevaladadhiniyamakaraṇāt | na hyasāvetasmādvākyādṛte kathaṃcidapi
evaṃ cavākyāntarato 'prāptadadhiniyamasyeva phalānvathasyāpi vidheyatvāvaśyaṃbhāvādaparihāryo vākyabhedo 'karmāntaratva iti śeṣapūraṇam |prāptaḥ, tena homātphale bhavati karmāntaratvam | ataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhyate |

samastameva ( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 1 ) |bhāvārthādhikaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ | tatra hyetadavasthitam—ākhyātaśabdāḥ phalapadena saṃbadhyante na dravyaguṇaśabdā iti | tasmātphalasya karmayogitvātphalaśrutau satyāṃ karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi guṇaḥ | katham |

tatra nāmāguṇe karmaśabde sati guṇo vidhīyate | yatra sa guṇo na bhavati | yatra cārthāntaraṃ na śrūyate | na ceha dvayamapi tadasti | dadhno vākyāntareṇaiva prāptatvāt, phalasya cābhyadhikasyopādānāt | ata āha—phalamiha śrūyate tacca karmaṇo nyāyyamiti | tatra kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalamiti praśnasya dvidhā pratibhāsaḥ | ekastāvanneti brūmaḥ | na hyetad dṛṣṭenānena sidhyatītyādernirākaraṇaparatvena siddhāntacchāyānusārātkimityetāvāneva praśnaḥ | kimityetannyāyyamityarthaḥ | itara āha—dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalamiti | tasyottaraṃ neti brūma iti | yadītyādi tāvatsvayamevā ' '
śaṅkya nirākaroti-yāvattasmānnaivaṃjātīyakeṣvetadbhavatīti | tatra tu kathaṃ tarhi homānnyāyyaṃ phalamityayabhaikāntikaḥ siddhāntavādinaḥ praśnaḥ | sa cā ' 'tmīyavacanopasaṃhārādanantaraṃ duḥśliṣṭaḥ pratibhātītyeṣaiva granthayojanā yuktatarā | tacca karmaṇo nyāyyamiti pūrvapakṣavādinā 'bhihite siddhāntavādī dadhipadānarthakyabhayena bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyāsaṃbhavācchabdasyāsāmarthyaṃ manyamānaḥ pṛcchati—kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kṛṣyādita ityanena nyāyena sāmānyato dṛṣṭena homātphalaṃ manyasa iti | yadyapi ca codanālakṣaṇadharmābhyupagamādanumānādīnāmīdṛśeṣvartheṣvasāmarthyaṃ sthāpitaṃ tathā 'pi vedārthanirṇaye teṣāṃ kāraṇatvāniṣedhāttadarthanirṇayārthamanumānopanyāsaḥ | paraḥ punarbhāvārthādhikaraṇavāsitāntaḥkaraṇa ākṣipannāha—mā me adhyāropamevaṃ dāḥ | śabde sati na hyanumānaṃ bravīmi | na caitena sāmānyato dṛṣṭenāsmadabhimataṃ sidhyati | asiddhānaikāntikaviruddhādidoṣaduṣṭatvādanumānasya | katham | yadi tāvaddhomaḥ phalavānphalavattayā dṛśyamānatvādityucyate tataḥ pratijñātārthaikadeśatvādasiddhatvam | atha kṛṣyādīnāṃ phalavattayā dṛśyamānatvāditi tato 'pyapakṣadharmatvam | atha vinaiva pakṣadharmatvādyadṛcchāmātreṇa kalpyeta tatastaddravyeṣvaviśiṣṭam | atha sādṛśyadvāreṇopamayā kalpyeta tacca sādṛśyaṃ phalavadbhiḥ kṛṣyādibhiḥ saha homasya kriyātmanā vidyate na dravyasyākriyātmakatvāt, iti | tatra dravyasyāpyastyeva kiṃcitsādṛśyamiti manasi kṛtvā yadi pratyāsannāvāntarasādṛśyāpekṣayā tannirākriyate tataḥ śakyaṃ pratyāsannatarāpekṣayā homasyāpi nirākartumiti manyamāna āha—homo 'pyasadṛśaḥ | sādhanasvarūpaphalabhedātkṛṣeḥ |

atha kiṃcitsādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate—taddravyasyāpi sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryamityādidharmabhedādastīti pūrvābhiprāyavivaraṇam | atha dravyādanyatsadṛśataramastīti—āpekṣikatvātsādṛśyasya susadṛśe 'pekṣite viprakṛṣṭaṃ visadṛśameva bhavati | tena kriyātve kṛṣihomavartinyapekṣite viprakṛṣṭatvātsadanityādiyuktaṃ dravyaṃ sadṛśamevetyucyate | tathā sati kriyāntaramapi
dṛṣṭārthabhojanagamanādyavāntarasādṛśyāpekṣayā kṛṣihomayorviprakṛṣṭatvādasādṛśyamevetyakāraṇaṃ syāt | āha ca—

na caitatsiddhamiti-upamānena sādharmyamātrānumānena vā sarvadharmaprāptiranumānoktavyāpyavyāpakabhāvanirapekṣā 'yuktā | sarvapadārthānāmekatvaprasaṅgāt | tathā coktaṃ
( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 2 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇetyarthaḥ |—na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasya śyāmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati | tathā hi |

yaddhi yasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ siddhe—dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi, taccetsādhye 'pi—pakṣe, kāraṇabhūtamiti gamyate bhavati tattasya sādhakamiti | ato vacanātkāryakāraṇayoreva gamyagamakabhāvo bhāṣyakārābhipreta iti kecinmanyante | tattvayuktam | akāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapyanityatvakṛtatvādīnāṃ gamyagamakabhāvaprasiddheḥ | kāryakāraṇayorapi ca na tathā kāraṇaṃ gamakaṃ vyabhicārabahutvādyathā kāryam | tasmālliṅgameva vyāpyatvena dṛṣṭaṃ sapakṣe vyāpakasyānyatra sādhyabhūtasya gamakatvasaṃbhāvanayā gṛhyamāṇaṃ kāraṇamityuktamiti draṣṭavyam | evaṃ ca ( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 3 )hetvadhikaraṇe vyākhyātam | tathā ca vivṛṇoti tasmātsadṛśamapi sādhakamasādhakaṃ veti parīkṣitavyamiti |

yadi tarhi parīkṣitena ca kāraṇenābhihitena kāryamidamabhidhīyate | ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ ityatra vākye yatkarma tatphalavatkarmatvāt kṛṣyādivat | karmasādhyaṃ vedaṃ phalaṃ phalatvādvrīhyādivat ityetadanumānāyātha yatkarma tatphalavaditi, pratisādhanābhidhānenā
naikāntikī
sapratisādhanasyāpi saṃdehahetutvena anaikāntikīkarotītyuktam | karoti, uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇāṃ—tantvādīnāṃ, tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ ca dravyāntaraṃ—paṭādi, phalaṃ dṛṣṭamiti | uparatagrahaṇaṃ ca karmavyatirekapradarśanārtham | evaṃ hi śaṅkayate kadācidihāpi karmanimittameva phalaṃ vadet | tena bravīti, indriyakāmavākye dadhi phalavaddravyatvāttantuvat | indriyaṃ vā dravyajanyaṃ phalatvātpaṭādivat | api ca kṛṣernādṛṣṭamiti hetorviruddhatvaṃ
sādhyadharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhanatvaṃ viruddhatvam | vadati | yathaiva hyayaṃ hetuḥ karmaṇaḥ phalavattvaṃ phalasya vā karmajanyatvaṃ sādhayati evaṃ dṛṣṭārthaphalatvam
dṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ phalaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ | | aśabdagamyaphalatvaṃ vā sādhayati | tasmānnaivaṃjātīyake
evaṃjātīyake—śabdekasamadhigamye | kāryakāraṇabhāve samastahetudoṣasaṅgādetadbhavati kvaciddṛṣṭādanyatrādṛṣṭasyāpi siddhiriti | yadyetadanumānaṃ tvayaiva nirākṛtaṃ kathaṃ tarhi homānnyāyyaṃ phalamityucyate | yadvā, itikaraṇānta eva praśnaḥ | ucyate | śabdenāvagamyate tatphalabhiti bhāvārthādhikaraṇopanyāsenottaram | tasmāddhomātphalamiti nyāyyam | dadhnaḥ phalamiti cānyāyyamityarthasiddhaṃ sadyaducyate tattulyabalavattvanirākaraṇārtham | kadāciddhi dvayamapi nyāyyaṃ bhavet | api ca dadhyubhayamasamarthaṃ kartumiti | na tāvatkarmānapekṣasya dadhnaḥ karaṇatvamasti | yena kevalaṃ phalasaṃbandhyeva syāt | ata ubhayatra vidhātavyaṃ, na ca tacchakyamiti | nanu kambalanirṇejanavaditi prāsaṅgikakarmasaṃbandhābhiprāyeṇa vastvasāmarthyanirākaraṇārthaṃ vā | tathā hi dadhyubhayamasamarthamiti—yathāśrutagṛhītena paravacanena vastvasāmarthyamevoktamiti dṛśyate |

na brūma ekasyobhayaṃ prayojanaṃ na yuktamiti | na vayaṃ vastusāmarthyamapahnumahe, kiṃ
tarhi | samarthe 'pi vastunyavihitādanuṣṭhānādavaśyaṃ dadhyubhayārthatvena vidhātavyam | na caitadasti, anekasaṃbandhakaraṇe vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt | saṃnikṛṣṭāsaṃbhavena viprakṛṣṭo 'rtho vidhīyate | tadiha dadhihomasaṃbandhe saṃnikṛṣṭe dadhiphalasaṃbandhe ca viprakṛṣṭe yugapadvidhīyamāne yugapadeva saṃbhavāsaṃbhavāvabhyupetavyau syātām | tasmādanyataraparityāge sati tvatpakṣasiddhirbhavatīti saṃnikṛṣṭavaśena
dadhiviśiṣṭahomasya phaloddeśena vidhau svapadārthasyeva saṃnikṛṣṭasyāpi vidhyupapatteḥ siddhānsyabhimato viprakṛṣṭārthavidhirna sidhyatītyabhiprāyaḥ | dadhyapi homena saṃbadhyate so 'pi phaleneti karmayukte sati phale siddhaṃ karmāntaratvamiti || 25 ||
yādṛśeṣu vākyeṣu dhātvarthātphalamiti bhāvārthādhikaraṇe sāṃdhitaṃ tairananugamyametat | katham |

bhāvanāsthameva vidhitvaṃ tādarthyabhedena tatra tatra saṃkrāmati | tadyadā dhātvarthasaṃkrāntyavasthāṃ phalavatīṃ bhāvanāmāsādayati tadā dhātvarthameva karaṇī karoti | anyacca tadarthaṃ bhavati | tacca ‘agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ’ ityādiṣu nāmno vidhiśaktyapahārāsamarthatvādavihatam | iha tu dadhipadamaśeṣanāmadheyalakṣaṇāsaṃsparśādavaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ saduttārayati
dhātvarthopanipatitaṃ vidhitvam | ataścā ' 'kāṅkṣitadhātvarthānuvādāyāṃ dadhyanuraktāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalamupalabhyamānaṃ dadhisādhanakamevāvadhāryate na homasādhanakam | nahyavidhīyamānānāmarthānāṃ sādhanatvaṃ saṃbhavati | na ca vidheyāntaropādāne sati atikrāntārthavidhānamavakalpata ityuktam
( a. 2, pā. 2, a. 5, sū. 16 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | | yathā ca dadhnā vidhyākṣepānna homavidhānaṃ tathā phalapadapratyavekṣaṇānna home dadhividhānam | kiṃ tarhi | phalabhāvanāyām | tasmāddadhnaḥ phalamiti | katamo 'tra śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnasya vakteti | dadhiphalapadayorbhāvanānabhidhāyakatvena sākṣādvidhiviṣayatvānupapatterākhyātapratyayāpekṣaṇe ca ( a. 2, pā. 1, a. 1 sū. 4. ) |‘āśritatvātprayogasya’ ityevaṃ dhātvarthatyāgāśaktestata eva phalena bhavitavyamiti manvānasya praśnaḥ | siddhāntavādī tu pratyayārthavidhitvaṃ
vidhitvam—vidhisaṃbandhaḥ, vidheyatetyarthaḥ | dhātvarthānuvādatvaṃ ca vibhaktaṃ paśyannāha—juhuyāditi | nanu śrutyā homasaṃbaddhameṣa itiparasya svābhiprāyavivaraṇam | puruṣaprayatnaśca vidhyupetā bhāvanocyate | satyaṃ bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena
bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena dhātvarthavidhipakṣe dadhipadānarthakyāpattestatparihārārthamekapadopādānalakṣaṇapratyāsattirūpāyāḥ śruteḥ śabdadharmatvena dharmirūpākṣaraśravaṇalakṣaṇaśrutito durbalāyā bādho nāyukta ityāśayaḥ |śrutibalīyastvādevamanyatrā ' 'śritam | iha ca ye bhavadīyaṃ pakṣamāśrayeraṃste śrutimapabādheraṃstarām | katham |

stokārthavidhisaṃbhave tāvadvidhāyako bahutarārthavidhānamupekṣate | homasya ca phalabhāvanākaraṇatvādbhāvayedindriyaṃ homenetyevamavasthitasya karaṇabhūtenaiva dadhnā samatvātsaṃbandhe 'nuprapadyamāne 'vaśyaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇā parigrahītavyā dadhimatā homeneti | na ca tasyāṃ kiṃcitpramāṇamasti | na ca dadhiśabdasyāsati pravṛttinimitte karmanāmadheyatvaṃ ghaṭate | so 'yamubhayasmādbhraṣṭo dadhiśabdo 'narthaka eva prāpnoti | tataśca śabdadharmasaṃnikarṣānugraheṇa dharmyeva śabdaḥ parityāgādbādhita iti bādhyetatarāṃ śrutiḥ | guṇasamabhivyāhārapakṣe tu na kasyacidbādhaḥ | tatraitaducyate | juhotīti śabdo bādhita iti tatparihārārthamāha—avaśyaṃ juhuyāditi vaktavyam | katham |
