pratyayastāvadavaśyameva dadhīndriyaviśiṣṭāṃ bhāvanāṃ vidhātumuccārayitavyaḥ | sa ca kevalaprayogāsaṃbhavāddhātuvyatiriktaprakṛtyanupapatteśca yataḥ kutaściddhātoḥ para uccārayitavyaḥ | tataśca yatra kvacana dhātāvupādātavye prāpte prakaraṇaprāptahomopādānamaṅgīkṛtam | dadhisaṃbandho 'pi cāsya prakaraṇādevā ' 'śrayāśrayirūpaḥ prāpto 'nuvadiṣyate | yathā ca na vibhaktervacanamevaikaṃ prayojanamiti grahādiṣu kārakamātrapratipattyarthamuccāryamāṇanāntarīyakatvādavivakṣitāmapi saṃkhyāṃ pratyāyayatīti vakṣyate( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 sū. 14 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | tathā 'tra pratyayānugrahārthamapi dhāturuccāryamāṇaḥ saṃbandhabalādavivakṣitamapi svārthaṃ pratyāyayati | na hi tasyārthapratyāyanamātramevaikaṃ prayojanamiti vaktavyam | nanūcyamāne 'pīti—pratyayānugrahārthaṃ dhāturuccāryamāṇaḥ svārthaṃ pratyāyayatīti | na cāsya grahaikatvavadavivakṣākāraṇaṃ kiṃcidasti | tasmādyathābhilaṣitakevalakarotyarthāsaṃbhavādasamarthametaditi | naiṣa doṣaḥ | satyapi homasaṃbandhe karotyarthā
napāyāttāvanmātreṇa prayojanasiddhiḥ | yastu homasaṃbandhakṛto viśeṣo nāsau kiṃcidviruṇaddhi | prakārāntareṇa vā bhāvanāṃ viśekṣyati | nanvevaṃ sati sa eva doṣa iti | aparityajyamāno 'pi homo balātkaraṇī bhavatīti manyate | siddhāntavādī tvāha— vākyāntarābhyastasya juhuyāditi śabdasyaitatsāmarthyaṃ yena taveyaṃ bhrāntirbhavati homa eva karaṇamiti | nipuṇatastu paśyatāṃ yathaiva pratyāsatteḥ sādhyāṃśamupadhāvannayogyatvātpracyāvyate tathā 'tra dadhipadānurodhena sādhanāṃśāt | yathā ca tatra pratīyamānaṃ bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvamaṃśāntare 'vasthitamevamihāpi guṇāśrayatvenāvasthāsyate | yathoktaṃ vṛttikāreṇahomāśrito guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti | kaḥ punarāśrayāśrayisaṃbandho nāma | kiṃ kena kathaṃbhāvavyatirikta utāvyatirikta iti | kecittāvadāhurvyatirikta evāyamiti | katham |

yatra dhātvarthakaraṇikā bhāvanā codyate tatrāṃśatrayeṇaiva samāpyate | yatra guṇaḥ karaṇatvena codyate | tena ca karaṇabhūtena phalamutpādayitavyaṃ nodāsīnena | tatrāsya kaṃciddhātvarthamakurvataḥ karaṇatvānupapatteḥ kaṃ dhātvarthaṃ sādhayatā tena phalaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti caturthamapekṣāntaraṃ jāyate | yaśca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyaḥ sa eva guṇasya karaṇatvopajananādāśraya ityucyate | tatra vākye 'nyasaṃbandhapare vākyabhedaprasaṅgātsvayamāśrayaṃ darśayitumaśaknuvanti | prakaraṇādagnihotrahoma āśrayo labhyate | tathālabdhaśca pratyayānugrahārthapravṛttenā ' 'lambhādivacca codanāliṅgabhūtena dhātunā 'nūdyate |

‘yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadarthamiti’ ca nyāyena dhātvartho nāmapadārthānugrahārtho 'dhyavasīyate | śakyate tvatra na caturthyapekṣā 'stīti vaktum | karaṇāpekṣaiva hyeṣā pravitatatarā jātā | dhātvarthena hi sā śīghraṃ nivartyate | guṇasya tu kriyāsaṃbandhottarakālaṃ karaṇatvaṃ niṣpadyata iti ciratareṇa | tasmāttisra evāpekṣāḥ | tena homopajanitakaraṇatve phalavati
guṇe 'vadhārite kathaṃbhāvāpekṣāyāṃ satyāmagnihotretikartavyataiva pūraṇī bhavatītyādisaṃsthādhikaraṇaviṣayaḥ paryavasite 'dhikaraṇārthe prasaṅgādabhidhīyate | tatra—anayā 'gnihotretikartavyatayeti | kecittāvadāhuḥ—agnihotramevetikartavyateti | tattvayuktam | karaṇavyatiriktatvāditikartavyatāyāḥ | homasya ca prāguktena nyāyena karaṇāṃśāvyatirekāt | ato 'gnipraṇayanādikaivāgnihotretikartavyatetyucyate | kuta etaditi | kathamadhātvarthasyetikartavyatāsaṃbandha ityabhimānāt | phalasādhanasya dadhna iti | yathaiva homasya karaṇatvāditikartavyatānugrāhyatvaṃ bhavati, evaṃ tata eva kāraṇāddadhno 'pīti | asyāścetikartavyatāyāḥ saṃnidhānāditi | ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 16 ) |saṃsthādhikaraṇavipratiṣiddhasamānavidhānatvābhyupagamāpatteścodanāliṅgasya ceti punaratideśanyāyopanyāsādasaṃbaddhatvam | yadi tāvatsaṃnidhānātsaṃbadhyate kiṃ codanāliṅgasadbhāvena | atha codanāliṅgasadbhāvaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa dūrasthasyāpyaviśiṣṭa iti vyarthā saṃnidhānavācoyuktiḥ | ata evaṃ vaktavyam | āśrayatayopasthitena homenopakārapradānakrameṇetikartavyatāyāḥ saṃnidhānādatideśanimittasya ca codanāliṅgasya juhotyarthasya darśanāt | yasmādeva cāyaṃ codanāliṅgatvena juhotyarthaḥ prakaraṇātprāpto 'nuvadiṣyate tasmādasyotpatteḥ phalaṃ vā prati pratyayo na vidhāyakaḥ | kena prāptasyānuvāda iti cedata āha—na cānyaddhomasyotpattivākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ nāstīti | kecittvanyathā 'sya vacanasyārthaṃ varṇayanti | na cānyaddadhiphalādindriyādagnihotrahomasya svargādiphalaṃ nāsti | svavākyena prāptatvāditi | tattvanāśaṅkitāprastu
homasyāvidheyatve 'bhihite phalavidhyāśaṅkānutthānā daprastutopanyāsāpattirityāśayaḥ | topanyāsādasaṃbaddhamiti pūrvoktameva jyāyaḥ | tasmānna karmāntaram | kiṃ tarhi | tasminneva karmaṇi dadhnaḥ phalaṃ homaścānugrāhakaḥ | athavā
tenaiveti—yenaiva kāraṇena dadhnaḥ phalamityuktaṃ tenaiva kāraṇena dadhiśabdasyāpramādapāṭharūpeṇa dadhihomobhayasaṃbandhādeva phalabhityanvayaḥ |tenaiva kāraṇena, dadhiśabdasyāpramādapāṭhātkevalācca dadhnaḥ phalasiddhyasaṃbhavādubhayatiraskāreṇa saṃbandhādeva phalamubhayośca dadhihomayostādarthyam | atra tu pūrvoktena
nyāyena dadhihomasaṃbandhakṛto vākyasyāsya caikavākyatvābhāvāddadhiphalasaṃbandhe cānirvṛtte homasaṃbandhaḥ prākaraṇiko nāstītyanenaiva vākye homasaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā phalaṃ prati vidhāvāśrīyamāṇe 'nekārthavidhānādvākyabhedaḥ syāt | ato dadhna eva phalamityeṣaiva vyākhyā yujyate | tathā ca samāptāvupasaṃhṛtaṃ tena dadhno homena saṃbadhyamānātphalamiti | tena athaveti vikalpamātrapradarśanārthaṃ draṣṭavyam | anye tu vadanti | eka evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ sopapattika ādita ārabhyopasaṃhriyate | tasmāddadhnaḥ phalam | ato dadhiśabdasya vivakṣitatvāditi ca pāṭhaḥ | athaveti tu pramādalikhitamiti | śakyaparihāraṃ tvidam | katham | yadaiva dadhnendriyakāmasya bhāvayediti saṃbadhyate tadaiva karaṇabhūtāddadhnaḥ phalamityavagamātkaraṇatvānyathānupapattikāritaḥ kriyāmātrasaṃbandho 'vagamyate | śaktirūpa eva ca kriyākārakayoḥ saṃbandha iti karaṇavibhaktyantargatatvātpratyayārthasya ca prādhānyātprātipadikārthopasarjanaḥ saṃbandha eva phalāya vidhīyate | tasmiṃstu vihite pūrvavadeva prakaraṇātkriyāviśeṣo homo lakṣyate | tatra tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhanyāyena kriyākārakasaṃbandhasya phalasaṃbandhe vṛtte ko 'sau kriyāviśeṣa ityapekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasaṃbandhaṃ kartuṃ prakaraṇena homa upanīyate | tenocyate dadhihomasaṃbandhaḥ phalāya vidhīyata iti | tataścāthaveti samyakpāṭha eva | samāptyupasaṃhārastvādyapakṣasya draṣṭavyaḥ | athavā 'syaiva saṃbadhyamānagrahaṇena dadhyupasarjanasaṃbandhanirdeśa ityadoṣaḥ | nanu dadhneti cendriyakāmasyeti ca padadvayavyāpārādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: anekavidhiśaktyā hi bhedo nāsti ca so 'tra naḥ ||

div.p: bahavo 'pi hyarthā yugapadekena saṃbadhyante | na ca tāvatā vākyaṃ bhidyate | anekavidhito hi vākyabheda uktaḥ | sa cātra nāstyeva | phalasyāvidheyatvāt | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ | yadindriyaṃ bhāvayedityanūdya taddadhneti vidhīyate | yo hi yadicchati sa tatkarotīti hīndriyaṃ bhāvayituṃ svarasata eva puruṣaḥ pravartate | tataśca tadaṃśayuktāṃ bhāvanāṃ pratyayo 'nūdya karaṇāṃśamātrayuktāṃ vidhatta ityekārthavidhānānna vākyabhedaḥ | tasmāddadhipadasyārthavattvāya guṇātphalamakarmāntaratvaṃ ceti siddham || 26 ||

idānīmasyāpavādārthamuttaramadhikaraṇamārabhyate | tatra viṣayaṃ tāvaddarśayati—‘trivṛdagniṣṭudagniṣṭomaḥ’ | ‘tasya vāyavyāsvekaviṃśamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta’ ityetamagniṣṭuṃtaṃ prakṛtya ‘vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam’ iti ca guṇaṃ ‘vidhāya punarbravīti ‘etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hyetena yajeta’ iti | tatrāpi pūrvavadeva saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ guṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ pūrvasmādvyatiriktaścodyate kiṃ vā pūrvasyaiva guṇādindriyavatpaśavaḥ phalamiti | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, samastenaiva pūrvādhikaraṇena guṇātphalamiti | tathā hi—

yastu revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhotpattividhānāttasya ca phalaṃ prati vidhānātpratyayāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabheda āśaṅkyate so 'pi nā ' 'śaṅkitavyaḥ | svayameva vedena tatphalasyopāttatvāt | revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ kṛtveti niṣpādite hi saṃbandhe yajeḥ pareṇa liṅā phalasaṃbandhaḥ kevalaḥ kartavyaḥ | tena nā ' 'vṛttidoṣo bhaviṣyati | tatrāpyādhāranirdeśādrevatīnāṃ parārthatā prādhānyādvāravantīyaṃ phalaṃ prati vidhīyate | guṇopādānavaśena dhātvarthāduttārito vidhāyakaḥ phalāya guṇaṃ vidadhadyadanyatrājñātaśeṣatvaṃ vidhatte | revatyaśca saptamīnirdeśādvāravantīyaśeṣabhūtatvātprayojanāntaramanapekṣamāṇā na phalena saṃbadhyante | tadguṇakaṃ tu vāravantīyaṃ dvitīyānirdeśādavagataprādhānyaṃ karotyabhihitāṃ bhāvanāṃ prati dhātvarthasthānīyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ
prayojanāpekṣatvātphalavattāṃ pratipadyate | athavobhayatiraskāreṇātrāpi saṃbandhādeva phalamiti vaktavyam | evaṃ ca sati viparivṛttiprāpto yajiḥ prakṛtārthābalambī vaitacchabdaḥ, tasmācca yajisamānādhikaraṇātparā ṣaṣṭhī phalavatā guṇena saha prakaraṇātprāptamāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhaṃ vadantī, pramāṇābhāvāccā ' 'śrayāntarāsaṃbandhāttannivṛtirūpapravṛtta evakāraḥ, pūrvoccaritena vacanāntareṇa ca prāptamagniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭaṃ vāravantīyamityādi sarvamakarmāntaratvānnityaprāptamanūdyamānaṃ na pratyayamāyāsayiṣyati | karmāntarapakṣe tu sarvamaprāptatvādvidhātavyam | na ca tallabhyate | kutaḥ |

tena kṛtvāśabdena revatīnāṃ vāravantīyasaṃbandhamātraṃ liṅā ca phalasaṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyata iti jyāyānguṇavidhipakṣaḥ | sarve caite 'nuvādā yajyanuvādenaiva tanmūlatvātpradarśitā bhavantīti na bhāṣyakāreṇa pratyekamupavarṇitāḥ | tasmānna karmāntaramiti prāpte 'bhivīyate |

lg.l: āśrayatvena gṛhṇāti yo guṇaḥ prakṛtāṃ kriyām |

div.p:
idaṃ tāvadvākyametasyaiva revatīṣvityādi yajimacchrūyate | sa ca yajiryādṛgatra śrūyate tādṛgyadi kutaścitprāptastataḥ śakyamakarmāntaratvamadhyavasātum | tadyathā—dadhihomasaṃbandhalābhādindriyakāmavākye
śakyamakarmāntaratvamaṣyavasātumityasyānuṣaṅgaḥ | | śrutaphalasaṃbandhamātre vākyena vidhīyamāne prakaraṇādevā ' 'śrayāpekṣāyāṃ labdho homasaṃbandha ityanūdyate | śaknoti hi dadhi sākṣādeva homaṃ nirvartayituṃ na tu revatīguṇakaṃ vāravantīyaṃ yāganirvṛttisamarthamadravyadevatātmakatvāt | tathā hi |

tasmātprakaraṇavaśena buddhāvupaplavamāno 'pi yāgaḥ sāmāśrayatvamayogyatvādapratipadyamāno na revatīvāravantīyavākye śakyo 'nuvaditum | prāptipramāṇābhāvāt | yattu vāravantīyasya sādhyatvenā ' 'śrayatvapratipattikṣamaṃ stotraṃ na tasya prakaraṇam | ātideśikatvādagniṣṭuti stotrāṇām | āha ca |

lg.l: stotraṃ ca prakṛtaṃ nāstītyāśrayo na pratīyate ||

div.p:
athocyeta yathā 'nena śakyate yāgaḥ kartuṃ tathā kurvadāśrayiṣyati | yathā ca śakneti yāga āśrayatvaṃ pratipattuṃ tathā pratipatsyate | sarvākhyātasahakāriśaktyanusāreṇāvagamāt | ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 ) |‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityanena nyāyenāṅgabhūtastotradvāreṇa ' 'śrayāśrayisaṃbandhaḥ setsyatīti | tadanupapannam | uktaṃ hyetat
audumbarādhikaraṇavārtika iti śeṣaḥ | |

‘saptadaśāratnirvājapeyasya yūpaḥ’ iti saptadaśāratnitvaṃ guṇatvena codyamānaṃ sākṣādvājapeyasyāsaṃbhavādyathā śaknoti tathopakariṣyatītyadhyavasānāttadaṅgapaśuyūpāṅgatvenāvadhāryate | yadi tathaiva vāravantīyamapi yāgāṅgatvena codyeta tatastatrāsaṃbhavāttadaṅgāni stotrāṇyupasarpet | idaṃ punaḥ phale vihitaṃ guṇabhūtāṃ kriyāmāśrayatvenāpekṣamāṇaṃ yadi yogyāṃ labhate tato gṛhṇāti | atha na labhate tato vākyādarthāntaratvaṃ pratipadyate | na caitadanyathā 'narthakaṃ bhavati | karmāntaravidhāne sutarāmarthavattvāt | atyantabhedācca yāgastotrayorna stotre sādhite yāgaḥ sādhita iti śakyaṃ vaktum | tatra yathaiva kratvantare śrutaṃ kratvantare kriyeta tādṛgevaitatsyāt | vājapeyasyeti tu sāmānyasaṃbandhamātravācinī ṣaṣṭhī
yāge 'pīti—paśuyāge 'pītyarthaḥ |pāramparyādyāge 'pyaviruddheti vaiṣamyam | yadyapi stotradvāreṇa kratorāśrayatvaṃ syāttathā 'pi sarvastotreṣu
prasajyamāneṣviti—āśrayatayeti śeṣaḥ |prasajyamāneṣvagniṣṭomasāmetyanarthakaṃ bhavet | tatrāgniṣṭomasāmni
agniṣṭomasāmni—agniṣṭomastotra ityarthaḥ | vākyenaivā ' 'śraye kalpyamāne vākyabhedaḥ, punarapi ca vākyenāgniṣṭomasāmamātrasaṃbandhe 'vagamyamāne yadyetasyaiveti viśeṣyate tato 'pi vākyabhedaḥ | etasyaiveti ca pūrvaṃ saṃbandhe tathaiva sarvatadīyastotrasaṃbandhāpatteragniṣṭomasāmeti viśeṣaṇātsa eva vākyabhedaḥ | ṛksāmasaṃbandhakaraṇakṛtaṃ cātigauravaṃ sthitameva | nanu cāsminnagniṣṭutyāśrayatvena labdhe
pūrvavidhinaiva śeṣamiti—prākaraṇikena ‘vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam’ ityanenaiva vidhinā vāravantīyasyāgniṣṭutsaṃbandhyagniṣṭomastotrasaṃbandhaprāpterna vākyabheda ityarthaḥ |pūrvavidhinaiva śeṣamavāpsyate | vāravantīyaṃ hi kratumāśrayadyatra sthāne sthitaṃ sādhayaddṛṣṭaṃ na tato 'nyatra bhaviṣyati | kraturapi ca tannānyastotragāmitvenāpokṣiṣyate | prakṛtakratvagniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhi vāravantīyātikramakāraṇābhā
vācca na kratvantarastotrāntarasaṃbandhāśaṅkā | naitadevam | yadi hi vāravantīyāgniṣṭomasāmavidhivākyaṃ revatīvākyenāpekṣyeta tata evaṃ vijñāyeta | na tu tadapekṣā 'sti | guṇādivākyānāṃ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvādityuktaṃ prāk | pūrvasaṃbandhavilakṣaṇaścāyaṃ kratorvāravantīyena saṃbandho na tatkalpitasthānaviṣayatvaṃ pratipatsyate | karmāṅgabhūtasya hi tasyaitatkratvagniṣṭomasāmatvaṃ vijñātam | idānīṃ puruṣārthabhūtatvādvedastāvanna tadeva sthānaṃ kalpayati | sāmānyato dṛṣṭakalpanāyāścaivaṃ jātīyakeṣvapramāṇatvamuktam | āha ca |

yadi vāravantīyamagniṣṭutyeva prathamamutpādyeta tato gatyantarābhāvādanuktamapi tadviṣayaṃ vijñāyeta | idaṃ punaḥ samāmnāyamātrādhīnotpatti tata eva gṛhītvā phalāya codyate | tatra kratvantarastotrāntarairetatkratvagniṣṭomasāmno na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | yadi ca vāravantīyasaṃskāraḥ kaścidvidhīyeta tataḥ kathaṃcidvrīhiprokṣaṇādiṣviva prakṛtapratyayo bhavet | na caivamasti | tasmānnāgniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhasiddhiḥ | nanu ca puruṣārthamapi sadetatkratumasādhayanna śaknoti puruṣārthaṃ bhavitumiti prāsaṅgikyāṃ kratusiddhau pūrvakḷptaṃ sthānaṃ labhyate | yathejyārthe
yathejyārthe, iti—abhyuditeṣṭau yāgārthayorapi dadhipayasoḥ ‘saha śrapayati’ iti prākaraṇikena vākyena taṇḍulaiḥ saha śrapaṇavidhānena prasaṅgātpraṇītākāryāpannatvena yathā taddharmāḥ prāpnuvanti tatheti dṛṣṭāntabhāgāśayaḥ | dadhipa yasī praṇītādharmānupalabhete | tatraivaitadbhavati yatra guṇabhūtā dharmā bhavanti | na cehāgniṣṭomasāmatvaṃ nāma vāravantīyasya guṇaḥ | prakaraṇagrahaṇe hi sati guṇatvamapi syāt | tadeva tvadyāpyasiddhāvastham | yadi tu kenacitprakāreṇāgniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandho 'vagamyate tatastaddharmāṃstasya praṇītādharmavannaiva kaścidvārayiṣyati | tasmānnaiṣo 'pi parihāro bhavatītyapūrvakarmavidhinaivaikavākyatvamupapādanīyam | tathā sati hi yadyapi sarvamaprāptaṃ tathā 'pi viśiṣṭavidhinā śakyaṃ vidhātum | kiṃ punaryadā nikāyitvātpūrvāgniṣṭuddharmeṣvatrādiśyamāneṣu bahveva prāptam | etacchabdastāvaddharmalakṣaṇayā 'nuvādo bhaviṣyati | na cānuvāde lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ | prastūyamānakarmavacanatvena vā ‘athaiṣa jyotiḥ’ ityādivanmukhyarūpeṇaiva vartiṣyate | tadā vāravantīyaṃ kratvarthabhūtamatideśenaiva prāpnotīti tadapyanuvadiṣyate | kṛtvāśabdakalpitarevatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭayāgamātravidhānāttu lāghavaṃ vidheḥ | nanvagniṣṭomasāmno revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandho yāgaścātra vidhīyata ityanyairviśiṣṭavidhibhirvaiṣamyaṃ vidhāyakasya syāt | tathā hi |

yānyekakriyāviśeṣaṇāni bhavanti tāni tayā vidhīyamānayā 'rthādākṣipyamāṇāni na vidhāyakavyāpāraṃ bhindanti | kriyāntaraviśeṣaṇe punarvidhīyamāne tayā kriyayā saṃbandharahitayā 'nākṣipyamāṇe 'vaśyaṃ vidhāyakasyā ' 'vṛttireṣṭavyeti vākyabhedaḥ prāpnotyeva | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaṃ niṣpādyottarabhāvanāpekṣo 'vasthitaḥ svaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kṛtvāśabdārthaḥ kratunā gṛhyate | ataśca svaviśeṣaṇākṣepa eva kratoḥ | sa tu tatsaṃbandhaṃ sākṣādanupajīvanguṇabhūtatvādaṅgeṣu nikṣipannatideśavijñātasthānavāravantīyavaśena revatīrapi tadviṣayāḥ kalpayati | tena yadyapyatra vākye 'gniṣṭomasāma na vidhīyate tathā 'pi kratuviśeṣaṇamapi tatra saṃkrāmatītyadoṣaḥ | ataśca prakṛtayāgasaṃbandhastvatpakṣe vāravantīyasya nāsti | paśya |

dadhigodohanādīni kriyayā vinā karaṇatvamalabhamānāni tāmapekṣante | vāravantīyaṃ punargāyatidhātuvācyakriyānmakatvādvinaiva kriyāntareṇa yāgavatphalabhavanasamarthamityanapekṣatvādyāgenāsaṃbadhyamānaṃ svatantrameva revatīṣu gīyamānamagniṣṭutprayogādbahireva phalaṃ sādhayet | tataścaitasyaiveti cāgniṣṭomasāmeti ca kṛtvāśabdaśca yajeteti ca sarvamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāt | tasmādyāgātphalam | sa ca pūrvavilakṣaṇaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatvātkarmāntaram | sameṣviti—ayogyatvādyāgaguṇayorāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhānapekṣatvābhiprāyam | kriyātmakatvādvā kriyāntarānapekṣatvamucyate | bhinnavākyeṣviti | pakṣadvaye 'pi guṇaphalasaṃbandhasya yāgāntaravidhānasya vā 'rthāntaratvātsetsyatyeva lakṣaṇato vākyabhede pūrvakratusaṃbandhe bhavatyeva kiṃcideva vākyarūpam | kratvantarasaṃbandhe tvatyantabheda ityabhiprāyaḥ |

na hyetasya revatyaḥ santi—ānantaryāttāvadeṣā vacanavyaktiḥ pratibhāti, etasya yā revatyastāsu vāravantīyaṃ kṛtveti | tatra yadyapi prakaraṇalabhyatvādetasyeti viśiṣṭānuvādo na vākyaṃ bhinatti tathā 'pi revatīsvarūpakartavyataiva tāvadaprāpteti nānūdyate | tatra revatyaḥ prayoktavyāḥ, tāsu ca vāravantīyamityeko vākyabhedaḥ, etacchabdavaiyarthyaṃ ca | atha tvetacchabdānugrahārthametasya revatyaḥ kartavyāḥ, tāsu ca vāravantīyaṃ, tacca phalāyeti vidhīyate yajiścānūdyata iti tathā 'pyarthatrayanimittavākyabhedābhyupagamenāgniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandho vidhātumanuvadituṃ vā 'śakyatvādubhayathā 'pi nāvakalpate | atha so 'pi vidhīyeta tathā sati pūrvasmādvidhyapagamādagniṣṭomasāmamātraprasaṅgādetasyaivetyanarthakaṃ, vidhīyamāne vākyabheda ityekā granthayojanā | athavā—yathākramāvasthita evaitacchabdo revatīviśeṣaṇaṃ sa tathābhūta evābhyupagamyate | tataścaivaṃ vacanaṃ vyajyate—etasya yā revatyastāsu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtveti | tattu kasya kratorityaviśeṣaṇādetacchabdasya ca revatīviśeṣaṇatvenopakṣīṇatvādetasyāgniṣṭomasāmeti na labhyate | tadvivakṣāyāṃ vā punarapi vākyabhedaḥ | ihaiva sarvāḥ pūrvapakṣavacanavyaktīrnirākṛtya siddhānte kathamavākyabheda iti praṣṭavye pūrvapakṣavādī vismitaḥ pṛcchati | tathā nāma saṃprati vihite sati anenā ' 'kāśa eveyanto vākyabhedā indrajālavadeva darśitāḥ | tataḥ pṛcchāmi tāvadetasya kathamavākyabheda iti | siddhāntavādī tvaprāptakarma vidhīyate | viśiṣṭavidhānopapattau satyāmekārthatvādityāha | nanvarthabheda iti—ktāntākhyātopāttabhāvanādvayaikavākyatvāsaṃbhavābhiprāyeṇa | neti brūma iti—guṇabhūtaikabhāvanāviśiṣṭapradhā
nabhūtabhāvanāntaravidhānābhiprāyam | revatīnāṃ vāravantīyasya ca saṃbandho na vihitaḥ syāditi—viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇānāmavidheyatvālliṅā tāvanna vidhīyate | kṛtvāśabdaśca naiva vidhau smaryate | tena yadyapi saṃbaddhā bhāvanā 'bhidhīyate tathā 'pi vidhyadhīnapravṛttitvātpuruṣaḥ satīmapi tāmasatīmiva pratipadyate | tena yāgabhāvanāmātraviśeṣaṇatvādrevatīvāravantīyayostadabahirbhāvamātreṇa prayoktavyayoranyonyaniyamapramāṇābhāvādekastotraviṣayatve tadekadeśaniyame cāsati revatīṣu ṛkṣvanyānyapi gāyatrāmahīyavādīni sāmāni prāpnuvanti | sāmāpi vāravantīyamanyāsvāvāpabhūtāsu
‘trīṇi ha vā yajñasyodarāṇi | gāyatrī bahatyanuṣṭap ca | atra hyevāvapanti’ iti vacanānurādheneti śeṣaḥ | gāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭupsu prāpnoti | tatra revatīṣu vāravantīyamiti saṃbandhapratītirvyarthā syāt | ato vāravantīyameva yathāvadhṛtasthānamuddiśya revatyo vihitā iti | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

lg.l: vidhitvaṃ yadyapi śrutyā na kṛtveti bravītyayam |

div.p:
sarvatraiva yatredaṃ kṛtvedaṃ kuryāditi śrūyate tatra yadi tāvattvāntadhātuvācyā kriyā 'nyata eva prāptā tato nimittārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati | atha tu na prāptā tata uttarasyāḥ karaṇaṃ pūrvanirvṛttyuttarakālatvena vihitaṃ tāmananuṣṭhāya
yatheti—yathā vihitaṃ tathetyarthaḥ |yathā kartuṃ na śakyata ityarthādavaśyaṃ kartavyā satī vihitavadvijñāsyate | na ceha revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaḥ prāgvidheḥ kutaścitprāpto yena nimittatayā ' 'śrīyeta | tasmādanuṣṭheya eva vijñāyate | yadi tarhyanuṣṭheyatvena saṃbandha upapannaḥ kathamuttarayā 'nuṣṭheyatvopāttayaiva saha saṃbadhyate | tadarthamāha—dvāvapyetāvarthau kṛtvetyeṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditumiti | kathamekenānekārthāvagatiriti cedata āha—dṛṣṭā hi kvacidiyamapi gatiḥ | yathā śoṇamānayeti | pramāṇāntaraprāpte 'pyānayatau rakto 'śvaścodyamāno na raktāśvaśabdābhyāmivābhihito vākyabhedaṃ janayati | tathā 'tra tvāśabdopāttā nirvṛttiḥ pūrvakālatvaṃ ceti | athavā |

( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 11 ) |“tatraikatvamayajñāṅgabhūtamarthasya guṇabhūtatvāt” iti dravyaviśeṣaṇānāṃ vidhyasaṃsparśo vakṣyate
( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | | revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhastu karoterviśeṣaṇam | sāmānyabhūtatvācca karotyarthastadrahito nānuṣṭheyatvaṃ pratipadyate | tena mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā
‘yasyobhayaṃ havirārtimārchet’ ityatra nityasyā ' 'rtimātrasya kādācitkatvavyāpyanimittatvāyogena yathā ' 'rterhavīrūpaviśeṣaṇamāvaśyakaṃ tadvaditi dṛṣṭāntabhāgāśayaḥ | viśeṣaṇamitivadyajibhāvanāviśeṣaṇasya karotyarthasyāvaśyaṃ revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭatā 'bhyupagantavyā | tathā ca kriyāviśeṣaṇānāmapi prayājādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇāni dravyadevatādīni darśapūrṇamāsādiṣūpayokṣyante | tasmānniṣpannasaṃbandhaviśeṣitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāmṛksāmayorniyamaḥ setsyati | kṛtvāśabdaścātra pratipattikramaniyamanirvṛttyartha eva draṣṭavyo nānuṣṭhānanirvṛttyarthaḥ | agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ prāgyāgādaprayogāt | ato naivaṃ vijñāyate revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ prayujya yaṣṭavyamiti | kiṃ tarhi, evaṃ kariṣyāmīti parikalpya yāgaḥ prakramitavya iti | nanvevamapīti | yāvadabhidheyaṃ vidhikalpanādanekārthatvānnaikavākyatvamiti manyate | naiṣa doṣa iti | na tāvadabhidheyanānātvenānekārthatvaṃ bhavatītyuktam | atha prayojanabhūtavidheyanānātvameva manyethāḥ | tatrocyate |

lg.l: viśiṣṭā bhāvanā sā ca yāga ityupalakṣitā ||

div.p: nanu revatyo 'pi vidhīyanta iti | yadi śrutamātrānupātyevānekārthatvaṃ bhavettata eṣa parihāraḥ syāt | ete tu sarve vidhīyamānatvātprayojanabhūtāstasmādanekārthatvamastyeveti | ucyate |

tadāha—na hyatrānekasya prayojanatvenābhipretasyānekaṃ padaṃ vidhāyakamiti | tathā hyavāntarakarmatvāttatkriyāṇāṃ na prāgyajibhāvanātaḥ paryavasānam | viśiṣṭavidhyuttarakālaṃ tu na kiṃcidapekṣyate | tasmātsiddhamekārthatvādekavākyatvam | guṇavidhitve coktā vākyabhedāḥ | athocyeta iti | etacchabdasamarthanārtham | siddhe 'pi karmāntaratve karmayuktaphalapakṣātpakṣāntaramiti nirākriyate | tatraiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ—revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā, etasyāṅgatvena yajeteti | kimevaṃ bhaviṣyati | prakaraṇaṃ tāvanna bādhiṣyate | etasyaiveti ca prakṛtagrāhi samīpasthitasaṃbandhipadamanugrahīṣyate | tatrocyate | na | paśukāmapadānarthakyaprasaṅgāt | taduparityāge vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ | na hyekasya kratuṃ phalaṃ ca prati yugapadvidhānamavakalpate |
athaivamityādi śaṅkābhāṣyaṃ guṇaphalānvayasyaivābhidhānātpunaruktamiva bhāsamānaṃ paramate vāravantīyasya revatīṣu pragāṇena vāyavyargādhāratvahānādāśrayavailakṣaṇyarūpadoṣāntaroktyarthatvena vyākaroti—athetyādinā |athaivamucyeta revatīṣu kṛteneti | prathamopanyastameva pakṣaṃ doṣāntarābhidhitsayā punarupanyasyatīti kecit |
agniṣṭudyāgasyaiva guṇāntaraviśiṣṭasya phalānvayābhidhānārthametadbhāṣyamiti svamatena guṇakāmatvāparityāgenaivārthāntaraṃ pradarśayitumāha—athavetyādinā |athavā naivam |

kathaṃ tarhi, guṇakāmeṣu yājñikānāṃ dvayī pratipattiḥ, keṣāṃcinmīmāṃsakavadeva guṇātphalam | apareṣāṃ tu guṇaḥ kratvartha eva tadvatastu kratoḥ phalāntarasaṃbandhaḥ | atraiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ | nityaṃ tāvadanena brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta | yadi tu paśukāmaḥ syāttato 'nenaiva revatyādiviśiṣṭeneti | tathā sati ca—

yāgaṃ hi phale vidadhatpratyayo na viprakṛṣyate | na cānutpattiparaḥ sannutpattimapi kalpayiṣyati | anekārthavidhānaṃ ca yathaivotpattividhau karmavidhānanimittaṃ labhyate, tathā phalavidhāvapi phaloddeśena karmavidhānādityevaṃ manyamāno vadati—atha revatīṣu kṛtena vāravantīyena paśukāmo yajeteti | stotradvāreṇa yāgasādhanatvopapatteḥ karaṇatṛtīyaivaiṣā | athavetyaṃbhūtalakṣaṇā | anenaivetthaṃbhūtena paśukāmo yajeteti | tatrottaram | naivaṃ śakyam | ṛgantarapragāṇādviśeṣahānādvaiguṇyamiti | yadi tadevedaṃ karma tatastasya vāyavyāsvagniṣṭomasāma vihitaṃ tadṛgantare revatyākhye gīyamānaṃ pūrvavihitavāyavyākhyaviśeṣahānādviguṇaṃ bhavet | nanvidānīmevā ' 'tmīye pakṣe bhavataiva tatra revatīṣu ṛkṣvanyānyapi sāmāni prāpnuvantyevaṃ paryanuyuktenābhihitam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kṛtveti nirvṛttaḥ saṃbandho yāgāyocyate | dvāvetāvarthau kṛtvetyeṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditumiti | siddhāntavādī tvapūrvakarmavidhāvanekārthavidhānaṃ śakyaṃ nānyatreti manyamāna āha—sati vacane matpakṣe śakyaṃ bhavatpakṣe tvasati vāravantīyagrahaṇamātreṇa labhyamānāsu revatīṣvaśakyamiti | paraḥ punarāha—vacanaṃ tarhi bhaviṣyatīti | tenaivābhiprāyeṇa | phale viśiṣṭakarmavidhānātkṛtvāśabdasya cāvidhāyakatvāt | yajiranuvāda—iti ca satyapi phalaṃ prati vidhāna utpattyavidhānābhiprāyeṇa | siddhāntavādī svābhipretānekārthavidhyanyathānupapattiphalaṃ kathayati—yadi vacanaṃ siddhaṃ tarhi karmāntaraṃ na pūrvasthaivāgniṣṭuto guṇavidhānamiti | nanu tato yajeteti yāgānuvādāditi vacanenānirākṛtatvādadyāpi svapakṣameva balīyāṃsaṃ manyate | naivaṃ śakyamiti siddhāntavivaraṇam | yadi hi revatīguṇakaṃ vāravantīyaṃ yāgaṃ
prati guṇatvena vidhīyate tato 'vaśyaṃ sa uddeṣṭavyaḥ | tataścoddiśyamānatvādeva phalapadaṃ na tena guṇena vā saṃbadhyata ityanarthakameva syātsaṃbadhyamānaṃ
saṃbadhyamānamiti-phalapadaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭena yāgena saṃbadhyamānaṃ yāgasya guṇaphalobhayasaṃbandhāpādakatvādvākyaṃ bhindyādityarthaḥ | vā vākyaṃ bhindyāt | guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vā 'pratyabhijñāyamānatvādekāntena karmāntaratvam |
yā 'pi ca pūrvaṃ ‘yadi tu paśukāmaḥ syāttato 'nenaiva revatyādiviśiṣṭena yajeta iti’ vacanavyaktirabhihitā sā 'pi pramāṇāntarāprāptaphalānvayānuvādāyogādayuktetyāśayenā ' 'ha—na cetyādinā |na ca yatpaśukāmo yajetetyaprāptatvādanuvādaḥ saṃbhavati | etena revatīvāravantīyavidhiṃ pratyasya nimittatvaṃ prayuktam | ataśca na vāravantīyaṃ kenacidbalavattareṇa pramāṇena revatībhiḥ saṃbaddhamiti viśeṣahānādviguṇaṃ bhavet | atha yāgasaṃbandho 'nuvāda iti | guṇādeva phale sati prakaraṇādavagataṃ yāgāṅgatvamasminvākye 'nuvadiṣyata iti | kaḥ punarāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhātpūrvanirākṛtādasya viśeṣo yenopanyasyate | sa ucyate | tatra hi ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 11 ) |‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityetannirākṛtam | aṅgatvajñāne tu tatsaṃbhavādagniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhaḥ sulabha ityabhiprāyaḥ | tannirākaroti—prakaraṇāddhi vākyaṃ balavattarāmiti | āśrayāśrayisaṃbandho hi phalasaṃbandhānuguṇatvātsaṃbhavangṛhyate | sa tu na saṃbhavatītyuktam | aṅgāṅgisaṃbandhastu kratukathaṃbhāvagrahaṇātsyāt | tacca nāsti | ( a. 3 pā. 3, a. 4 sū. 11 ) |“asaṃyuktaṃ prakaraṇāt” iti vakṣyati | saṃyuktaṃ caitatphalena | tasmādavirodhādguṇaphalaviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānam | tatraitatsyāt | satyapi karmāntaratve tadanugṛhītādguṇādeva phalamiti | tadvikalpya bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena pratyayasaṃnikarṣeṇa yāgaphalasaṃbandhāvagamānnirākaroti | tasmātkarmavidhiḥ | atha punarviśiṣṭe yāge vidhīyamāne kriyā
kriyāntarasyeti—kriyāntarasya yāgākhyasya viśeṣaṇena revatyādhāreṇa vāravantī. yena saha, agniṣṭomasāmnā—agniṣṭomastotrasya kathaṃ saṃbandha ityanvayārthaḥ |ntarasyāgniṣṭomasāmno
viśeṣaṇena kathaṃ saṃbandha iti | tatrottaraṃ vacanāditi | prāguktanyāyenā
ātideśikamiti—agniṣṭutprakaraṇe śrūyamāṇaṃ ‘vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam’ iti vacanaṃ karmāntare 'tidiṣṭamityarthaḥ | ' 'tideśikaṃ vacanaṃ draṣṭavyam | agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ kārya iti | na kiṃcidagniṣṭomākhyaṃ sāmāvasthitaṃ vidyate yasya vārantīyaṃ kāryāpannamiti kalpate | tena prākṛtayajñāyajñīyakāryāpattyabhiprāyeṇoktam | athavā 'gniṣṭomasāmna iti stotrasyaiva kārye tādarthyena vartiṣyata ityarthaḥ | tasmātsameṣu karmayuktaṃ phalaṃ syāditi siddham || 27 ||

jyotiṣṭome saubharamukthyānāṃ brahmasāma vihitam | punaśca tadeva ‘yadi rathaṃtarasāmā’ ‘yadi bṛhatsāmā’ iti ca nimittayorvihitam | tataḥ punaḥ ‘yo vṛṣṭikāmo yo 'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta’ iti nityasyaiva sataḥ phalatrayasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ | tathā ca vakṣyati evaṃjātīyakeṣu kāmeṣu ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 16 sū. 43 ) |‘nityasya samatvāt’ iti | kratvarthapuruṣārthaṃ caivaṃjātīyakaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyati ‘ekasya( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 5 ) | tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ iti | etadapi vakṣyati yathā vikalpenaitānyasya phalāni bhavanti ( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 11 sū. 28 ) |‘yogāsiddhirvā 'rthasyotpattyayogitvāt’ iti | tadevaṃ rūpaṃ saubharaṃ prakṛtya punaḥ śrūyate ‘hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt’ ‘ūrgityannādyakāmāya’ ‘ū iti svargakāmāya’ iti | nidhanamiti cāntyā sāmabhaktirabhidhīyate | tatraitadvicāryate | kiṃ saubharaṃ nirapekṣaṃ phalāni sādhayati, imāni vṛṣṭyādīni hīṣādinidhanaphalāni pṛthageva bhavanti, uta saubharasyaiva tattatphalaṃ sādhayatastatta
nnidhanaṃ niyamyata iti | yadyapi cātra karmabhedābhedau na stastathā 'pi prasaṅgādupanyasyete | athavā karmabhedābhedavatphalāpūrvabhedābhedāvapi lakṣaṇārthāviti saṃbandhaḥ | evaṃ cānuṣṭhāne 'pi viśeṣo bhavati | yadā vṛṣṭikāmena saubharaṃ prakrāntaṃ tadetarayorapi nidhanayoḥ svaphalaprārthanāvaśena prayogaḥ | api ca vṛṣṭiprārthanayorapi bhedaḥ kartavyo yadi nidhanādaparaṃ phalam | atha tu nidhananiyamastato hīṣeva prayoktavyamekaiva vṛṣṭiḥ prārthayitavyā | evamannādyakāmasvargakāmayorapi darśayitavyam | kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | kecittāvadbhāṣyakārakṛtena vacanavyaktidvayapratibhānena varṇayanti kiṃ hīṣādiśabdānāṃ vṛṣṭikāmādipadaiḥ saṃbandho 'tha nidhanapadeneti | yadyapi cottarayornidhanamiti na śrūyate tathā 'pyākāṅkṣāvaśenānuṣajyamānaṃ sarvasaṃbandhitvena kathyate | kiṃ tāvatprāptam—

yadi hi saubharaphalānyevaitānyabhaviṣyaṃstataḥ punarvacanamanarthakamāpatsthata | na hi vidheyaṃ tasya tadā kiṃcidapi labhyate | hīṣādīnāṃ śākhāntareṣu saubharanidhanatvena pāṭhādeva prāptatvāt | niyamārthā śrutiriti cenna | śrutiprāptānāṃ niyamena nivartayitumaśakyatvāt | sarva eva tāvanniyamo 'nyavyāvṛttiphalatvādanyāyyaḥ | tathā 'pi tu yatrārthākṣiptāvasthāni vastvantarāṇi bhavanti tatraikaśravaṇavaśenetarannivartate | na tviha hīṣādī
nāmarthātprayogaḥ, yenaikavidhānāditaranivṛttirgabhyeta | saubharaśrutyā hi tāni prāpyante | tatra na śakyaṃ vidhimātrapravṛttayā punaḥśrutyā gatyantare saṃbhavati bādhanaṃ kartum | asmatpakṣe tu kāmyatvādanyataradvacanaṃ kratvarthaprāptetarabādhenaiva bhaviṣyati | vākyāntarāvihitaṃ ca vṛṣṭihīṣādisaṃbandhaṃ vidadhadvākyamarthavadbhavati | vṛṣṭikāmaśabdaśca svārthatvena saṃbhavanna nidhanavyavasthāpare vākye saubharaviśeṣaṇārthaḥ kalpito bhaviṣyati | puruṣārthabhūyastvaṃ ca vidhyātmake vede puruṣapravartanasaukaryādiṣyate | tasmānnidhanādaparaṃ phalamiti || 28 ||
ucyate—

hīṣā vṛṣṭiṃ kuryāttāṃ ca nidhanabhūteneti vākyabhedaḥ | tadasaṃbandhe cā ' 'narthakyam | asmatpakṣe na kiṃcidanarthakam | sarvasya saubharasya vacanāntarairuktavṛṣṭyādikāmatvena tatpa
dānāṃ ca prāptatvāddhīṣādisaṃbandhamātre vidhīyamāne vākyabhedābhāvaḥ | na ca vacanamanarthakaṃ, nidhanaviśeṣaniyamārthatvāt | vinā 'pi ca guṇakāmatvenāstyevātra sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇo bādhaḥ, saubharaśabdasya sarva
sarvabhaktītisarvāsāṃ prastāvodgīthapratihāropadravanidhānākhyānāṃ bhaktīnāṃ yatsāmānyaṃ tadvacanatvādityarthaḥ |bhaktisāmānyavacanatvātsaubharaśrutyā hi parokṣavṛttyā nidhanāntaraṃ prāpnoti | idaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣaṃ, tasmādbalīyaḥ | yathā cārthādākṣipyamāṇaṃ śrautena nivartyate tathā parokṣavṛttyā 'pīti | athavā saubharaśabdavācyāyā gīternaiva kiṃcidbādhyate | akṣaravidhānenākṣarāntaramātrabādhanāt | yadi hi gītyantarāvayavo vidhīyeta tataḥ saubharāvayavo 'pi bādhyeta | stobhākṣarabādhastvayaṃ nidhanaviṣaya ityadoṣaḥ | tasmānnidhananiyamārthā punaḥśrutiriti | evaṃ tu vyākhyāyamāne 'sti kiṃcidvācyam | taducyate
hīṣiti nidhanamiti vyavahitakalpanādoṣādaniṣṭaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tathottarapakṣe 'pi—

nidhanānuvādena hīṣādividhāne phalapadamanarthakaṃ punaḥśrutivaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt | saubharagrahaṇenaiva hi nidhanamātrasaṃbandhaḥ prāpta iti na tanmātravacanenārthaḥ | tatra yadi vṛṣṭikāmāya yadyatsaubharaṃ tasya yannidhanamiti viśiṣṭamanūdya tatra hīṣpadaṃ prayuñjīteti vidhīyate tato 'nekasaṃbandhakaraṇādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | yadyapi vṛṣṭikāmasaubharatannidhanāni prāptāni
tathā 'pyanekeṣāmapi saṃnidhirastīti vyavacchedārthamavaśyaṃ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ | tataścānekārthatvamiti durbalaḥ siddhāntaḥ | pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇamapi na samyakkṛtaṃ, samāmnāyādeva hīṣādīnāṃ nidhanatvasiddheḥ |
‘yadyevamabhisaṃbandhaḥ’ ityādi—adhikaraṇasamāptiparyantasya bhāṣyasya pareṣāṃ vyākhyānaṃ ‘kecittāvadityārabhya punaḥ śrutiriti’ ityantenopanyasya, tatra ca ‘evaṃ tu vyākhyāyamāne’ ityādinā dūṣaṇamabhidhāya svamatena bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate—tasmādevamityādinā |tasmādevaṃ varṇanīyam |

atra hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāyetyevamevāvasthite saṃdehaḥ kiṃ sākṣātphalena hīṣaḥ saṃbandho 'tha phalalakṣitena sādhanaviśeṣeṇeti | tadā ca hīṣiti nidhanamiti, etatphalaṃ bhavatīti vacanavyaktiriva bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitā | vṛṣṭikāmāyeti saubharaviśeṣaṇamiti saubharasya nidhanavākye svapadenānupādānāllakṣaṇārūpeṇaiva viśeṣaṇatvam | na hīṣā saṃbandha iti phalasvarūpāsaṃbandhābhiprāyeṇa | tatra tathaiva vidhipunaḥśrutyapekṣaṃ vyākhyānaṃ, prayogavacanasāmarthyādeva siddhaṃ syāditi, aparā vyākhyā | yadi hi svārthapravṛttasyaiva saubharasya nidhanamātraṃ niyamyeta tatastatprayogavacanenaivopanītamātrahīṣādividhisiddhervidhyānarthakyaṃ bhavet | phalasaṃbandhapakṣe tu na prayogavacanaḥ samartha ityarthavattā | kiṃ ca

anyathā 'nena saubharaṃ prakaraṇāvagatamapi vṛṣṭisādhanaśaktiyuktaṃ lakṣyeta | na ca tadāśrayaṇe kiṃcitprayojanamasti | tathā śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ceti bruvato bhāṣyakārasyāpyetadeva vyākhyānamabhipretamiti gamyate | siddhāntastu—

sarvasyaiva saubharasyāyaṃ kāmasaṃyogaḥ pūrvokta eva pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ kīrtyata iti nāpūrvaphalapratipattiḥ | kimarthā tu prāptasya punaḥ śrutirityata āha—nidhanārthā punaḥ śrutiriti | kasmātpunaḥśrutyupāttena phalenaiva hīṣādayo na saṃbadhyante | tatrocyate |

hīṣā vṛṣṭiṃ sādhayediti hi gṛhyamāṇe 'vaśyaṃ kimāśritenetyapekṣyate | tatra yatsaubharaṃ prakṛtaṃ tattāvanna śaktamāśrayatvaṃ pratipattum | samastaṃ hi sāma saubharaśabdenocyate | na
ca taddhīṣā sādhayituṃ śakyaṃ, yathā dadhnā homaḥ | taddhi sakalaṃ homaṃ vyāptuṃ śaknoti | na tu hīṣā saubharaṃ vyāpyate | bahvakṣarasādhyatvāt | na ca tadasādhayata āśrayāśrayisaṃbandho 'vakalpate | yattu tena vyāptyā sādhayituṃ śakyate nidhanaṃ, na tasya prakaraṇamastīti na vākyādvinā ' 'śrayatvaṃ pratipadyate | tatra yadi vākyenaiva phalasaṃbandhastenaiva cā ' 'śrayalābhastato vākyaṃ bhidyate | tathā nidhanamātrānuvādena hīṣādisaṃbandhe prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā sarvasāmasaṃbandhaprasaṅge punaḥ saubharasya yaditi kathamapi viśeṣaṇīyaṃ, tatrāpi punarmatiḥ kleśanīyā | kiṃ ca |

na tāvatsaubharāvayavena nidhanena sādhitena prakaraṇalabhyasaubharaṃ sādhitaṃ bhavati | avayavasya saubharatvenāpratīteḥ | na ca yathā śaknuyāttathā ' 'śrayedityeṣā kalpanā 'stītyuktam | upetyāpi tvāśrayatvamanekaprastāvādibhaktini saubhare katamasyāṃ bhaktau hīṣādayaḥ prayujyantāmiti naiva jñāyate | ( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 10 sū. 25 ) |‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat’ iti prastāve vā prāpnuvanti | tatra nidhanamityanuvādo nāvakalpyate | athocyeta yathokthyādīnāṃ phalāya coditānāṃ prakaraṇājjyotiṣṭomamāśrayatāmasamastavyāpitvenānekāvayavatve 'pi sati vākyāntaravaśenānte niveśo bhavati | evamatrāpi phale vihitānāṃ hīṣādīnāmāśrayatvena saubharamupasarpatāṃ samāmnāyavaśena labdhasthānānāṃ nidhanatvamanuvadiṣyata iti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—

lg.l: hīṣādistu bahusthānaḥ kva syāditi na gamyate ||

div.p: yuktamukthyādīnāṃ pradeśāntareṣvadṛṣṭeralaukikatvācca kratvantaraniveśitvam | na hi teṣāṃ sthānāntaraṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam | na cāvijñātasthānaviśeṣāṇāṃ rūpāvadhāraṇaṃ phalasaṃbandho vā | na cānyatra vartamānānāṃ svarūpaprayukta ukthyādivyapadeśasaṃbhavaḥ | yo 'pi vacanāntareṇa sthānaviśeṣalābhaḥ so 'pi pṛthakkratvarthatvāvijñānādanayaiva phalacodanayā gṛhyata iti tadartha eva vijñāyate | hīṃṣādīnāṃ yaḥ punaḥ samāmnāyaprāptaḥ sthānaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ sa tāvatsaubharavidhānena kratvarthatvena saubharaphalārthatvena copayojitaḥ | idānīṃ tu phalaṃ prati svatantrasya hīṣo vidhānāllokavedasāmāntarabhaktyantaraprakṛtabhaktivartitvādiviśeṣo na jñāyate kvāvatiṣṭhatām | yadi hi prakṛta eva vihita iti vijñāyeta tatastasya jñātasthānatvātsaṃdeho na syāt | nanu caikatvācchabdasya ya evāyaṃ prakṛtaḥ syātsa eva lokādiṣvapīti tadgatagrahaṇe 'pi tadeva viśeṣasthānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti | naitadevam | kutaḥ—

na śabdaikatvena yatkiṃcitkārye sthānaṃ dṛṣṭasāmarthyaṃ tadevānyatrāpīti śakyate vaktum | na hi yat, devadattasya yudhyamānasya sthānamavagataṃ tadeva bhuñjānasyāpi bhavatīti gamyate | kāryaprayuktā hi sthānaviśeṣādayo na svarūpaprayuktāḥ | svarūpasya sthānāntare 'pyavibhāgāt | ataḥ kāryāntatvādekasyāpi sthānabhedaprāptiḥ | na ca yatsaubharāṅgabhūtasya hīṣaḥ sthānaṃ tadeva puruṣārthasyāpītyavadhāraṇaṃ śakyam | prāsaṅgikasaubharasādhanatvāditi cet | na, tasyaiva sthānaviśeṣalābhātprāgasiddhatvāt | itaretarāśrayaṃ hi syātsaubharasādhanatvena sthānaviśeṣastasmācca sādhanatvamiti | nanu yathā 'bhyuditeṣṭayāṃ madhyamāditaṇḍulā upādīyamānatve 'pi prakṛtā gṛhyante tathā 'tra hīṣādayo grahīṣyante | yuktaṃ tatra prakṛtagāmivibhajativākyāpekṣitānāṃ devatāsaṃyogavākyānāṃ tadviṣayatvādyacchabdopabaddhamadhyamādivibhāgasya ca prakṛtapratyayānatirekādanyeṣāmagrahaṇam | iha tu na hīṣādīnāṃ tādṛkkāraṇamastīti na laukikapratyayo nivartate | tasmānnaivaṃ vākyārthaḥ saṃbhavatītyayamaparaḥ parigṛhyate | yadā sarvaprakāramanviṣyamāṇo 'pi śrautaḥ phalasaṃbandho na labdhaḥ, tadā mā bādhitarāṃ śrutiriti prakṛtasādhanalakṣaṇā vijñāyate | tatraiṣo 'rtho bhavati | prakṛtāya vṛṣṭisādhanāya hīṣśabdo 'ṅgamiti | prakṛtagāmī ca vṛṣṭiśabdastatsādhanabhūtaṃ saubharameva lakṣayati nānyat | na cānyasādhanabhūtamapratīteḥ | satyāmapi ca hīṣādīnāṃ prāptau niyamārthatvādarthavadvākyamityuktam | te ca hīṣādayo yathābhūtāḥ saubhareṇā ' 'kṣiptāstathābhūtā eva niyamyanta iti vinā 'pi nidhanaśabdasaṃyogena siddhaṃ nidhanatvamanūdyate | taddarśayati—vṛṣṭikāmāya saubharamastyevetyādi | tadetadadhikaraṇaṃ guṇakriyāphalapratipādanaparayoranantarādhikaraṇayorubhayorapyapavādabhūtam | vṛṣṭyādiśabdenaivedaṃ phalaṃ sādhanalakṣaṇayeti pratipādanāt | yastu vākyabhedaścodita āsītsa nidhanasaṃbandhe sati śrutyā vā saubhare viśeṣaṇatvenopādīyamāne bhavet | na tviha tadubhayamapyasti | vṛṣṭikāmapadenaiva saṃbandhāt, prakaraṇalabhyatvācca saubharaviśeṣaṇatvasya | na ca prakaraṇalabhyā viśeṣā vākyaṃ bhindanti | tasmādadoṣaḥ | idaṃ tviha vicārayitavyaṃ bhavati | kiṃ yatra kvacana śākhāyāmadhītasya saubharasya vṛṣṭyādisādhanabhūtasya hīṣādayo niyamyanta uta yatra hīṣnidhanakaṃ paṭhyate tacchākhāgataṃ vṛṣṭikāmasya prayoktavyam | evamūrṅnidhanakam, ūnidhanakaṃ ceti sadṛśo vicāraḥ | tatrāniyamena sahasraśākhāgatasaubharaprayogavikalpe sati vṛṣṭikāmādinimitte hīṣādimātraniyama iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | yatra tannidhanakaṃ paṭhyate tacchākhāgataiva vṛṣṭikāmādeḥ samastā gītirupādātavyeti | kutaḥ |

sāmarūpaṃ hi samāmnāyādavagamyate taccālpenānyatvenāpratyabhijñānādanyadeva bhavati | tatra yadi śākhāntarīyāyāṃ gītau śākhāntarīyanidhanaṃ prayujyeta tato rūpānyatvaṃ syāt | na ca vacanādṛte aira
airavaditi—'na girāgireti brūyāt’ ‘airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam’ iti vacanabalādyajñāyajñīyasām‍no girāpadatyāgena irāpade gāne 'pi na prakṛte, iti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntārthaḥ |vadvikāraḥ | tacchākhāgatagītigrahaṇenāvirodhopapatteḥ sarvatrāsaṃbhavādvikārāśrayaṇam | asti cātra gatiḥ | vikalpaptāptau cāyaṃ niyamaḥ | samastasya ca sāmnaḥ padārthatvādvikalpaprāptirnāvayavānām | ato nānyadīyanidhanavidhānam | ata ekadeśaniyame sati kāṃsya
kāṃsyabhojinyāyeneti śiṣyācāryayoḥ sahabhojanaprāptau śiṣyasya kāṃsyabhojitvaniyamamaniyatapātrabhojyācāryo 'nurundhāno loke dṛśyata ityayaṃ nyāyo dvādaśādhyāye sādhayiṣyamāṇo 'trānusaṃdheyaḥ |bhojinyāyena samastaniyamaḥ | eṣo 'pi cātra vākyārthaḥ saṃbhavati | ubhayoḥ prāptayoḥ saṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyate | yadvṛṣṭikāmāya saubharaṃ yacca hīṣityevaṃ nidhanaṃ tadekatra saṃpādanīyamiti | tasmātsamastagītiniyama iti siddham || 29 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ||

div.p:
jyotiṣṭome prathamaṃ bṛhadrathaṃtare vaikalpike pṛṣṭhasādhanatvena codite tataḥ punaḥ śrūyate ‘yadi rathaṃtarasāmā somaḥ syādaindravāyavāgrān grahāngṛhṇīyāt’ ‘yadi bṛhatsāmā śukrāgrān’ iti | tatra saguṇaṃ karma śrūyamāṇaṃ saṃdihyate kiṃ karmāntaraṃ jyotiṣṭomāduta tasyaiva grahāgratāviśeṣavidhānaṃ prati rathaṃtarāvacchinnasya nimittārthaṃ
śravaṇamiti | tata etatsiddhyarthamidaṃ vicārayitavyaṃ kimayaṃ kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo rathaṃtarasya atha sattāmātrasaṃyoga iti | tatsiddhyarthamapyetaccintanīyam, kiṃ kratuviśiṣṭaṃ rathaṃtaramuta rathaṃtaraviśiṣṭaḥ kraturihā ' 'śrīyate | nanu ca yadiśabdopabandhādiha nimittaṃ pratīyate tasya coddiśyamānatvādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nāvakalpeta | bhavennimittārthatvametasya yadi yādṛgayaṃ pratyeṣyate tādṛśasya kutaścitprāptirvijñāyeta | aprāptipakṣe tu balādvidhānamāpadyate | nimittatvamapi ca yādṛśasyeha śrūyate yadi tādṛśo jyotiṣṭomastatastasyaiva guṇārthatvena śravaṇamiti saṃgaṃsyate | yadi tu tādṛṅ na bhavati tatastādṛśatvamāpādya nimittīkartavyaḥ | yatsaṃbandhācca prāṅnimittatvameva nopajāyate bhavati tannimitasyāpi viśeṣaṇaṃ yathā ' 'rtyadhikaraṇe
( a. 6 pā. 4 a. 6 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇeti śeṣaḥ | vakṣyate ‘mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇamiti’ | tasmānna viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣa iti | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ prakaraṇādrathaṃtarasāmatvasya bṛhatsāmatvasya ca vacanāntareṇa prāpteryadiśabdena ca prāptyapekṣatvanimittatvapratītergrahāgratāviśeṣasya ca prayogavacanena grahaṇādbalīyasā ca virodhinā guṇāntareṇānavarodhāt, ‘tatsaṃnidherguṇārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ’( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 5 sū. 15 ) | ityakarmāntaratvam | evaṃ siddhāntaṃ prāptaṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya sautraḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhyate karmāntaramiti | kutaḥ |

lg.l: viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavacchettṛ jyotiṣṭome ca nāsti tat ||

div.p:
( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 23 ) |‘guṇaścāpūrvasaṃyoge’ iti pūrvakarmāsaṃbaddho guṇo bhedaka ityuktam | iha ca bahuvrī
hyarthasadbhāvasya yadiśabdopabandhena nimittatvaṃ gamyate na rathaṃtarasattāyā upasarjanatvāt | na ca kratuviśiṣṭaṃ rathaṃtaramiha pratīyate |

yena tadeva nimittaṃ kalpyeta | na ca tat kratunā 'vacchettuṃ śakyate, anyatrāpi vidyamānatvāt | evaṃ hi tadavacchidyate yadi rathaṃtaramasyaiva sāmeti, na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati | tasmādavaśyamevaṃ kartavyaṃ yadi rathaṃtaramevāsya sāmeti | na caivamātmakatvaṃ jyotiṣṭomasyānyasya bā 'vagataṃ, yannimittaṃ bhavet | ato nimittapratītiṃ parityajya tadanyathānupapattyaiva kevalarathaṃtarasāmakakarmāntaravidhiradhyavasīyate | śakyaṃ hi tadapūrvaṃ kartum | na ca rathaṃtarasattāmātraṃ viśeṣaṇamavyāpakatvāt | na viśeṣaṇādṛte sāmarthyam | na ca sāmarthyena vinā samāso 'vakalpate | dṛśyate
asāviti - samāsa ityarthaḥ |vā 'sāvatreti pūrvasyātrāpratyabhijñānam | atha kasmātsa eva kevalarathaṃtarasāmakaḥ pakṣe na kriyate, na śakyamevaṃ kartum | sākṣādvihitastotrasaṃbandhisāmāntaravirodhāt | idaṃ hi kratusaṃbandhena śrutam ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 ) |‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityanena nyāyena stotreṣvavatarati, gāyatryādīni tu stotreṣu sākṣādvidhīyante tasmādbalavanti | kratvantare tu pratyakṣaśiṣṭaṃ rathaṃtaraṃ tebhyaścodakaprāptebhyo balavattaraṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ | evaṃ cānyapadārthavidhānāttatpradhāno bahuvrīhiranugrahīṣyate | anyathā hyupasarjanaparatvaṃ lohitoṣṇīṣādivākyavadagatyā parigṛhyeta | yadi ca grahāgratāvidhānena sahaitadekaṃ vākyaṃ tatastaccāpi rathaṃtaravidhānaṃ cānekatvādapūrvabhāvanāvidhinaiva nistīryate | somaḥ syāditi cā ' 'nantaryāttatkartavyataiva vijñāyate, rathaṃtarasāmatvakartavyatā tu vyavahitakalpanayaiva syāt | somaśabdena ca prakṛtiliṅgena jyotiṣṭomaprakṛtirevāyaṃ bhaviṣyati | tasmātkarmavidhiḥ | idameva bhāṣyakāro darśayati—yadi rathaṃtarasāmetyasya ko 'rtha ityādinā | grahāgratāviśeṣaścāsyaiva kratorvākyenāvāntaraprakaraṇena vā bhaviṣyati |

yadyapi mahāvākyeṣvavāntaravākyānyapramāṇaṃ tathā 'pyarthāsaṃbhavādavivakṣite mahāvākye 'vāntaravākyāśrayaṇādvidhiśakterabādhaḥ |
parityāgāditi yadiśabdeti pūrvaṃ śeṣaḥ |parityāgādvaramadhyāhṛtya pūraṇamiti matvā, atha vā yadi roceteti darśayati | tatkartavyatākṣiptāyāśca ruceḥ pramāṇavānevādhyāhāra iti na svamanīṣikāmātramabhihitam | adhyāhārādapi svapadavṛttireva vyavahitakalpanayā laghīyasī dharmamātrabādhāditi matvā yadi śāliṃ bhuñjītetyudāhṛtya pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayati | parastu dṛṣṭāntasyaivāsiddheḥ kathaṃ punariti pṛcchati | vyatyayena saṃbandhaḥ,
kāmapravedane hi liṅ icchāṃ pratyāyatīti siddhāntavivaraṇam | tatraiṣa vākyārtho bhavati | yadyaindravāyavān grahān grahītumicchedrathaṃtarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ kuryāditi | tataśca yadiśabdarahitaṃ somaḥ syāditi padadvayaṃ vidhāyakaṃ, grahān gṛhṇīyādityetattu yadyapyavidhāyakaṃ tathā 'pīcchārthatvādyo hi yadicchati sa tatkarotītyevaṃ vidhiphalaṃ lapsyate | atha vā icchāmātrayuktamupāttaṃ grahāgratvaṃ syādityeṣaiva liṅ vidhāsyati |

vinaiva vyavahitakalpanayā 'pyayaṃ pakṣo bhavan balavattara iti manvāno 'thavā hetuhetumatorliṅityupanyasyati | tatra somaḥ syāditi hetau liṅgṛhṇīyāditi vidhāveva | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati rathaṃtarasāmasomahetukānaindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyāditi | na cākriyamāṇe 'sau hetutvaṃ pratipadyata ityarthādvihito bhaviṣyatīti | atha vā
‘hetuhetumatorliṅ’ ( 3-3-156 ) iti pāṇinīyasūtrānurodhādityarthaḥ |hetumati gṛhṇīyāditi liṅ, somaḥ syāditi vidhāvanuktamapi ca somasya hetutvaṃ hetumadākṣepātsaṃnidheśca bhaviṣyati | tatrāpyeṣo 'rtho grahāgratāviśeṣakāraṇabhūtaḥ somayāgaḥ kartavya iti |

iti pakṣavikalpasaṃgrahaślokaḥ | sarvaṃ caitadavaiṣṭyadhikaraṇasiddhānta evopayokṣyata ityatra
prapañcitam |
bṛhadrathaṃtarasāmasaṃyogasya grahāgratvalakṣaṇāṅgarūpaśeṣānuṣṭhānavelāyāmabhūtatvāt—aniṣpannatvāt ityevam ‘saṃyogasyāśeṣabhūtatvāt’ iti sūtrāvayavavyākhyānārtham ‘api ca’ iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāsyati—kiṃcetyādinā |kiṃ ca |

prātaḥ savane hi grahagratā bhavati mādhyaṃdine rathaṃtaram, na cāniṣpannasya nimittatā yuktā | kāraṇaparyāyatvānniṃmittaśabdasya, mama tu naiva kiṃcinnimittam | atha vā kratuḥ | sa cā ' 'dita eva vidyate |
atha vā jagatsāmasaṃyogasya jyotiṣṭomaṃ pratyanaṅgabhūtatvāttatsāhacaryeṇa bṛhadrathaṃtarasaṃyogayorapyanaṅgatvātkarmāntaraprayojakatetyevamarthāntaraparatayā sūtravyākhyānārtham ‘api ca niḥsaṃdigdham’ iti bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—jagatsāmā cetyādinā |jagatsāmā ca na jyotiṣṭoma iti ( a. 10 pā. 5 a. 15 sū. 58 ) |‘jagatsāmni sāmābhāvāt', iti vakṣyate | ataśca ( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 23 ityetatsūtrāvayavaḥ ) |‘tatsāmānyāditareṣu tathātvam’ iti karmāntaratvamiti || 1 ||

pūrvoktaireva hetubhirjyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhirayaṃ na karmāntaram | ekasyaiva hi tena liṅgena rathaṃtarasāmatvena bṛhatsāmatvena ca grahāgratāvidhiprayojanārthamuccāraṇaṃ kriyate | guṇavākyatvāccākarmāntarapratyaye satyekatvaṃ vijñāyate | atha vā
rathaṃtarādividhānājjyotiṣṭomasya guṇavākyairevamātmakatvaṃ coditamiti nārthāntaratvaṃ pratīyate | tataśca karmaikatvam | yattu viśeṣaṇābhāvātsāmāntarasāpekṣaviśeṣaṇatvādvā rathaṃtarasāmeti samāso nāvakalpata iti | tatra brūmaḥ |

yadi hi rathaṃtaraṃ nityaṃ jyotiṣṭome 'nyasahitaṃ vā syāttato na vyavacchindyādapi, yatastvarathaṃtaro 'pi jyotiṣṭomaprayogo 'styeva tatastadvyavacchedamukhenāsti viśeṣaṇaphalam | yadi caivakāraṃ vinā viśeṣaṇabuddhirna bhavati tata evamasau darśayitavyo yadi rathaṃtaraṃ sāmāsyāstyeveti | bahuvrīheśca matvarthavartitvānmatupaścāstitvayogaviṣayatvānnaivakārasyāśrutasattāsaṃbandhakalpanā | yadvā yadi rathaṃtaraṃ sāmaivāsya bhavatīti | tatra ko 'rtha evaśabdasya | taddhi rathaṃtaraṃ yadyapi sarvadā sāma tathā 'pi yadā kratau na bhavati tadā taṃ prati sāmakāryāsattvādasāmaiveti | sattāpakṣe rathaṃtaraṃ sāmeti vakṣyate | avaśyaṃ ca kratvapekṣamevaitatsāmatvaṃ vaktavyam | rathaṃtarasvarūpe sāmatvasya nityaṃ paunaruktyāt | na ca rathaṃtarasya sāpekṣatvaṃ jyotiṣṭome, yena samāso na syāt | dvaṃdvanirdiṣṭeṣu hyekastotraviṣayeṣu caitadbhavati | kevaleṣu tu bhinnastotraviṣayasādhaneṣu pratyekanirapekṣameva sādhanatvamiti sāmarthyaṃ na vihanyate | yadvā paunaruktyādeva sāmaśabdastatsādhyastotralakṣaṇārthaḥ san rathaṃtaraparyupasthāpitaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ lakṣayati | athavā bṛhadrathaṃtarayoravāntaraprakaraṇādavāntarakāryayogācca virodhinoḥ spardhamānayoryathā 'vasthitānuvādasārūpyātsāmāntarāṇyanapekṣya parasparāvacchedenaiva viśeṣaṇatvasiddhiḥ | tenopapannaṃ rathaṃtaraviśiṣṭasya kratornimittatvam | athavā 'stu rathaṃtaraṃ kratuviśiṣṭaṃ nimittamiti | nanu ca tadeva na pratīyate | ucyate | satyaṃ na pratīyate kiṃ tu yadā samastakratusaṃyogābhāvādrathaṃtaraviśiṣṭaḥ kruturna gṛhītastadā vigṛhyamāṇe samāse yo viparīto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ pratīyate rathaṃtaramasya sāmeti sa grahīṣyate |

ṣaṣṭhyantatvācca kraturviśeṣaṇameva samāsābhivyaṅgyaviśeṣyatvabhāvāttathā vivakṣiṣyate | yadyapi ca kratvantareṣvapi vastusvarūpeṇa rathaṃtaramasti tathā 'pyatra tāvadvidyate tāvanmātreṇa ca viśeṣaṇatvopapattiḥ | svavākye cāsādhāraṇatvaṃ viśeṣaṇakāraṇaṃ na vastulakṣaṇaṃ mā bhūnnīlamutpalaṃ devadattasya gaurityevamādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇatvocchedaḥ | tathā hi |

lg.l: utpalasya ca nīlatvaṃ tasyaivocyeta yena tat |

div.p:
yadi ca vastuta evāsādhāraṇatvaṃ bhavennaiva śabdena viśeṣaṇamupādīyeta | na hyatra viśeṣaṇaphalamasti agniruṣṇa iti | tasmādavaśyaṃ vākyagatamevāsādhāraṇatvamāśrayitavyam | asti cātrāpi tat, jyotiṣṭomagatasyaiva rathaṃtarasya nimittatveneṣṭatvāt | prathamatarapratītaṃ ca rathaṃtaraṃ nimittatvenotsṛjya na nimittāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ vidyate | tasmādubhayathāpyadoṣānnimittamiti na yadiśabdaparityāgādīnāmāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam | na ca kāmapravedanahetumatpratītistāvadbhavati yāvannimittatvameva na pratītam | tatsaṃbhave ca nāpratītagrahaṇaṃ yuktamū | bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānāṃ cāniyamena loke vede ca nimittatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti rathaṃtarabhaviṣyatvamacodyam |
yadi tu niṣpannennaiva mimittena bhāvyamityāgrahastataḥ saṃkalpitatvena, ananuṣṭhitasyāpi bhojanasya saṃmārjanādāviva nimittatvopapattorityupapādayati—api cetyādinā |api ca yadekāntenāvadhāritaṃ tanniṣpannameva | jyotiṣṭomaprakrame cāvadhāritamekāntena rathaṃtaraṃ prayojyeta iti sarvavaikalpikānāṃ kratuprakramaevāvadhāraṇādavaśyamṛtvigyajamānairevamidaṃ kartavyamityavadhārya pravartitavyam | tadvaśena prayogakauśalābhyāsādisiddheḥ | na ca nimittaṃ naimittikasya rūpasaṃnidhānenopakaroti | kathaṃ tarhi | jñāyamānatvena | tasmādaprayuktamapi saṃkalpitatvādrathaṃtaraṃ nimittam | yadā tvekadeśasthenāpi tena viśeṣitaḥ kraturnimittaṃ tadā 'sau vartata evetyavirodhaḥ | na ca liṅaḥ kālaviśeṣasaṃbandhenotpattiryenānyataraviṣayameva nimittaṃ brūyāt | sarvathā hi śakyaṃ
darśayituṃ yadi rathaṃtarasāmā somo bhūto bhavati bhaviṣyati ceti | tatrehārthavaśenaivaṃ vijñāyate yadi rathaṃtaraṃ bhaviṣyatīti |

yattu jagatsāma sāmānyato dṛṣṭamuktaṃ, tadayuktam | tasyaivaṃjātīyakeṣvapramāṇatvāt | atha vā prakaraṇe dvitvabahutvayuktapratipadvidhānādiva
pratipadvidhānādiveti—'yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī iti dvayoryajamānayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt’ ‘ete asṛgramindava iti bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ’ iti vākyābhyāṃ dvibahuyajamānakatve nimitte stotrīyādyargrūpapratipatkāryoddeśena vihitayormantrayorniyataikayajamānake jyotiṣṭome niveśāsaṃbhavādyathā kulāyāhīnādāvutkarṣastadvadiheti dṛṣṭhāntārthaḥ | jagatsāmatvāsaṃbhavāttaditi vaiṣamyam, api ca tatrāpi naivāpūrvakarmotpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi, aprakṛtasya viṣuvato
viṣuvata iti | ekaṣaṣṭayadhikaśatatrayasutyātmake gavābhayane, aśītiśataṃ pūrvaṃ pakṣaḥ aśītiśatamuttaraṃ pakṣaḥ, madhyatanaṃ viṣuvatsaṃjñakamahaḥ | tasmiṃśca viṣuvati pṛṣṭhastotre, ‘vibhrāṭ bṛhatpibatu’, iti jagatīcchandaskāyāṃmṛci mahādivākīrtyaṃ sāmotpannam | atastasyaiva jagatsāmatvena śukrāgratvamiti | nimittatvena grahaṇam | tasmānnimittārthāni sarvāṇi śravaṇānīti || 2 ||

‘rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeta’ ityasya prakaraṇe ‘āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā’ ityādibhirdravyadevatāsaṃyogairaveṣṭisaṃjñakāmiṣṭiṃ vidhāya śrūyate ‘yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyā ' 'hutimāhutiṃ hutvā 'bhighārayet’ ‘yadi rājanya aindraṃ’ ‘yadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevam’ iti | tatra pūrvavadeva saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ rājasūyamadhyasthāyā evāveṣṭevarṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ prāptameva nimittatvenoddiśya tatra naimittikaṃ vidhīyate
utāprāptameva brāhmaṇāṃdisaṃbaddhaṃ prayogāntaramuddiśyata iti | tatsiddhyarthaṃ caitadvicārayitavyaṃ kiṃ rājasūye 'dhikārastrayāṇāmapi varṇānāmuta kṣatriyasyaiveti | tatsiddhyarthamadhikāriviśeṣaṇabhūto rājaśabdastathaiva
tathaiveti—trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ vācaka uta kṣatriyasyaivetyarthaḥ | vicāraṇīyaḥ | tato 'pyetadvicārayitavyaṃ kiṃ kṣatriyatvanimitto rājaśabda uta rājyakaraṇanimitta iti | nanu ca ‘etayā 'nnādyakāmaṃ yājayet’ iti varṇaviśeṣeṇāsaṃbaddhaṃ pṛthagrājasūyaprayogavacanādevāveṣṭervacanamastīti varṇatrayasyāpi prāptasya nimitārthameva śravaṇaṃ bhavet | naitadevam | tadā hi nirjñātakṣatriyakartṛkāyāḥ kartrantare vacanāntareṇāvidhīyamānāyāḥ pṛthak prayogakāraṇābhāvācca rājasūyamadhyasthāyā eva ( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 5 ) |‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ ityanena nyāyena sādhāraṇaṃ ca svārājyaṃ phalaṃ prātyātmikaṃ cānnādyaṃ vijñāyate |

pṛthagvā rājanyainaiva phalārthinā prayujyate na varṇāntarasaṃbandhaḥ | tadyathā 'dhyayādhānayornirjñātatraivarṇikakartṛkatvāttadadhīnasiddhīnāṃ karmaṇāmarthimātrasaṃbandhāvagame 'pi sati apaśūdraviṣayatvamevāvatiṣṭhate | yathā cātraiva svārājyakāmāviśeṣe 'pi rājakartṛkatvavaśena bhoktṛviśeṣo bhaviṣyati | tasmādrājasūyādhikāreṇaivaibhirvā vacanaiḥ prāptiriti dbāveva pakṣau | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva nimittārthāni śravaṇānīti | rājasūyādhikāraśca saha rājaśabdena trayāṇāmapi varṇānām, rājyakaraṇaṃ ca śabdapravṛttinimittamiti | tathā hi |

ubhayasaṃbhave tāvattraivarṇikaviṣayatā yuktā kalpayitum | evaṃ hi nimittapratītistatprakaraṇādīni ca na bādhyante | rājasūyādhikāraśrutiścānalpaviṣayatvena svarasātpravartamānā na nivartitā bhaviṣyati | tasmādrājyaṃ kurvantaḥ sarvatraivarṇikā rājānaḥ | tacca rājyaṃ janapadaparipālanaṃ nāma sarvalokaprasiddham | tataścoddharaṇaṃ rājye 'pi kaṇṭakoddhāraṇamabhi
pretam | āryāvartanivāsina iti—( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 9 )‘śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt’ ityasya pradarśanārtham | rājñaḥ karma rājyamityetadabhiyuktā upadiśantītyetadbuvatā nanu rājaśabdasyaiva prakṛtibhūtasya svātantryamabhyupagataṃ bhavati | tathā hi |

yathaiva gāmānayetyabhihite yadyapi vyavahartṛbhiḥ yo gauḥ sa ānetavya iti vacanaṃ kalpitaṃ tathā 'pi pārśvāvasthitasya yasya gotvamaprasiddhamānayanaṃ ca prasiddhaṃ sa chedanādibhya iva yūpamevaṃ pratipadyate ya āneṣyate sa nūnaṃ gauriti | tathaivātra yadyapi manvādibhiḥ pāṇiniprabhṛtibhiścaivaṃ smṛtaṃ yo rājā tena janapadādirakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam, yaśca rājā tasya karma rājyamiti |

tathā 'pi vayaṃ saṃdigdharājakāḥ prasiddharājyāśca santa evaṃ pratipadyāmahe yenaivaṃ smartṛbhiruktaṃ tena nūnaṃ bandhanasamarthe dravye yūpavat, rājyakaraṇasamarthadravyālambana eva rājā tairnirūpita iti | tacca rājyamaviśeṣeṇa catvāro 'pi varṇāḥ kurvāṇā dṛśyante | tasmātsarve rājānaḥ | tatra tu nyāyāntareṇa brāhmaṇādiṣu caritārthāyāṃ rājaśrutāvadhyayanādīnāmabhāve sati kāmaṃ śūdraḥ paryudasyeta na tvitaraparyudāse heturastīti trayāṇāmapyadhikāraḥ | nanu ca kṣatriyasaṃbandhena rājyaṃ vihitamanyāyenetarau kurvāṇau na rājānau syātām | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sarvathā tāvadrājyakaraṇāttābhyāmapi rājatvaṃ labdhaṃ tāvatā ca rājasūyacodanāyāḥ prayojanam | yau tu nyāyānyāyau tayoḥ puruṣadharmatvānnaiko 'pi kratunā gṛhyata ityaviśeṣaḥ | nanu janapadapuraparirakṣaṇavṛttimanupajīvatyapīti—siddhānta
bījopanyāsaḥ | ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 7 sū. 10 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |uktaṃ hyetadbarhirājyādiśabdeṣu yathaikadeśe 'pi jātinimittatve labhyamāne nimittāntaraṃ na kalpanīyamiti | paraḥ punaryaugikagrahaṇamatropakārakamiti pradarśayati—prakaraṇavaśādyadiśabdasamabhivyāhārācceti | na karmāntaraṃ vidhāyiṣyate iti-prayogāntarābhiprāyeṇa | atha vā yadā yadi śāliṃ bhuñjītetyādayo vacanaprakārā gṛhyante tadaikenaiva vākyena brāhmaṇasaṃbandho bārhaspatyābhidhāraṇaṃ ca na śakyate kartumiti mukhyameva karmāntaratvam | evaṃ tāvadubhayaprasiddhiṃ pramāṇīkṛtyoktam | idānīṃ tu rājyarahite prayogaḥ pramāṇameva na bhavatīti prastūyate sārvalaukikena prayogeṇāsārvalaukikasya bādhāt | api ca vipragītā iti tadeva
tadeveti—yaugikaprayogasya sārvalaukikatvābhidhānena siddhamavipragītatvamevetyarthaḥ | pratyayitāpratyayitatvena punarupanyastam | na hi sarvalokāsarvalokaviditatvavyatirekeṇa vipragītāvipragītatve vidyete | yadvā pūrveṇa prasiddheḥ sadasadbhāvamatramuttareṇa tu vigratipattyavipratipattī | bhavati cājñānaviparyayajñānayorbheda ityapaunaruktyam | tathā ' 'ryāvartanivāsināmiti-śāstrasthabalīyastvaṃ pūrvopakṣiptaṃ darśayati |

samīcīnatara ācāra iti-śabdaprayogo 'bhidhīyate | tasmātprāptānāmeva brāhmaṇādīnāṃ nimittārthaṃ śravaṇam | api ca ‘yadi rājanya aindram’ ityasaṃdigdhaṃ nimittārthamataśca tatsāmānyāditarayorapi tathātvamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

kṣatriyavacana evāyaṃ rājaśabdo na yaugikaḥ | sa hi rājyayogādvā bhaveddhātvarthānusāreṇa dīptiyogādvā | ubhayathā 'pi cānupapannaḥ | tadrahitarụ̄dhiśabdadarśanāt | ekadeśasthā 'pi rụ̄dhiravayavaprasirddhi bādhate | na cāvayavaprasiddhirapyatraikāntikī vidyate, na hi dīpyamāneṣvagnyādiṣu rājaśabdo vidyate | na cānabhiṣikte janapadaparipālanavyāpṛtepyāyuktake | nanu cā ' 'yuktakasya paraprayuktakāritvādṛtvija iva jayamānatvaṃ na rājatvaṃ bhaviṣyati | naivaṃ śakyam | parādhīneṣvapi keṣu cit pṛthivīśvarābhiṣikteṣu māṇḍalikeṣvapi prayogadarśanāt | tena tarhyavyabhicārātsa evābhiṣeko nimittaṃ prāpnoti | naivaṃ bhaviṣyati | kutaḥ |

tato 'bhiṣekasya nimittatvaṃ jñāyate | yadyasya svātantryaṃ bhavet | ayaṃ tu kṣatriyajātāveva smartṛbhirniyato vidhānavelāyāmeva lavanādivadbarhiḥśabdena, rājaśabdena saṃyujyate | tenaiva cobhayanimittatvaṃ samudāyaśabdanyāyenaitasyāniṣṭam | yadi hi jātyabhiṣekayoratyantasamuditayoreva prayujyate na tu kevalāyāṃ jātau jātyantarevā 'bhiṣeko vidhīyate tata ubhayaṃ nimittamiti kalpyeta | sa tvabhiṣekātprāgeva tatsaṃskārye prayuktaḥ ‘rājānamabhiṣecayet’ iti | tasmādrājajātāveva prajñāyate | na ca bhāvisaṃjñāvijñānaṃ bhūtatvenaivopapadyamānatvāt | agatyā hi sā 'nyatrā ' 'śrīyate | na caikasminnimitte siddhe nimittāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam | vinā 'pi tatkalpanena prayogopapatteḥ | abhiṣekanimittatve 'pi ca nyāyānusāriṇāṃ naivākṣatriyaviṣayatvaṃ sidhyati | yastu dharmaśāstrātikrameṇa kriyate na tasya nimittatvaṃ syāt | yathā śūdrakṛtasyā ' 'dhānasya nā ' 'havanīyādiprayoganimittatvam | api ca |

nityasya hi rājaśabdasya nityenaiva nimittena bhavitavyaṃ nityānityayoḥ saṃyogābhāvāt | sā ca nityatā vastvapekṣayā vā vidhyapekṣayā vā nirūpyate | tatra na tāvadabhiṣeko vasturūpeṇaiva jātivatkeṣucitsamaveto dṛśyate | tenāvaśyaṃ vidhānāpekṣameva nirūpaṇamāśrayaṇīyam | na ca vidhānamakṣatriye rājaśabdasyāstīti jātyavyabhicāra evā ' 'padyate | tataśca saiva nimittam | etena rājyanimittatvaṃ pratyuktam |
aiśvaryātmake rājye lipsayaiva pravṛttervidhiviṣayatvābhāvānnityatvānupapatteranityasyaivāgatyā, coraśabdapravṛttau steyasyeva, rājaśabdapravṛttau rājyasya nimittatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśāṅkāyāṃm | cāṭataskara rdurvṛttamahāsāhasikādibhiḥ | pīḍyamānāḥ grajā rakṣet kāyasthaiśca viśeṣataḥ | ityādividhidarśanādrājyasyāpi vidhiviṣayatā 'styeveti samādhānamāha—tadapi hītyādinā | vidhānātprabhṛti—vidhānata ityarthaḥ |tadapi hi vidhānātprabhṛti, abhiṣekavadeva kṣatriyatvasaṃbaddham | dṛṣṭaścānabhiṣikte 'pi, apālayati ca janapadaṃ, kṣatriye rājaśabdaprayogaḥ | tadvatyapi vā 'nyajātīye 'nabhidhānaṃ draviḍānām | tasmādapi na traivarṇiko rājā | tathā ca rājño 'patyaṃ rājanya ityaikāntikakṣatriyajātivacanasya rājanyaśabdasya rājaśabdaprakṛtitvamevānvācakṣate | anyathā traivarṇikānāṃ rājatvātsarveṣāṃ traivarṇikānāmapatyeṣu rājanyaśabdaprayogaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |

lg.l: rājanyaḥ kṣatriye rụ̄dho rājānaḥ sarva eva cet |

div.p: nanvevamapyanupapanna evāyamapatyapratyayaḥ | tathā hi |

yathaiva kākasyāpatyaṃ kāka evaṃ rājño 'patyaṃ rājetyeva syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | paryāya eva hi rājaśabdasya rājanyaśabdo 'nena prakāreṇānvākhyāyate sa tvekajātiviṣayatve sati tathā 'nvākhyātuṃ yujyate nānyathā | nanu ‘rājño 'patye jātigrahaṇam’ iti vacanātkṣatriyajātivacano bhaviṣyati | naitadevam | ihānyatamajātyanupādānādrājavanmanuṣyanātimātrādhikārāttadvacanatvaṃ syāt | nanu ca rājarājanyaśabdayostatra tatra karmabhedopadeśena smṛtividāṃ yājñikānāṃ ca bhedena prasiddhirdṛṣṭā | satyaṃ dṛṣṭā sā tu brāhmaṇaparibrājakanyāyena rājanyaśabdasyābhiṣiktaviśeṣagāmitvena sāmarthyalabhyatvāt | yattu prasiddhidvayasaṃbhave rājyanimittatvaṃ prakaraṇādibhyo vijñāsyata iti tannirākriyate |
tathā hi |

tadetaddarśayati—yadi tāvajjātiśabdo rājeti tatastasya karma rājyamityavayavaprasiddhisaṃbhavānna tannirapekṣaṃ śaktyantarakalpanamupapadyate | vinaiva tenā ' 'ryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogo na virotsyate | atha tu prathamameva rājyamiti pratipālanaṃ rụ̄dhirūpeṇābhidhīyate | tatastacchaktyanusāreṇaiva tatkartari rājaśabdaprayogasiddheḥ śaktyantarakalpanamantareṇaiva draviḍānāṃ rājyādhikārayogyeṣu kṣatriyeṣu prayogo na virotsyate | dākṣiṇātyatvasāmānyenā ' 'ndhrāṇāmiti bhāṣyakāreṇoktam | tasmānna tāvadubhāvapi rụ̄dhiśabdau nāpi yaugikau | anyatararụ̄dhitve tu rājaśabdasya tatkalpanā yuktā | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
ācārayorasaṃbandhe
asaṃbandhe—virodhanimittaka ityarthaḥ | saṃdehe sati nirṇayaḥ |

div.p:
rājyaśabdābhidheyaṃ paripālanādi karma kṣatriyasyeti manvādayaḥ smaranti | pāṇiniprabhṛtayo 'pi rājñaḥ karmedaṃ rājyamityevaṃ vyutpādayanti | ( pā. sū. 5-10-124 )‘guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmāṇi ca’ ityādhikṛtya svatantrarụ̄dhādrājaprātipadikātpratyayavidhiḥ | tatra ṣyañpratyayaṃ vidadhatītyatra vadanti | patyantapurohitādipāṭhādrājaśabdasya viśeṣavihitena yakā bhavitavyam | tathā ca yakpratyayasvara ihopalabhyate nā ' 'dyudāttatvam | tasmādrājaśabdādrājyaśabdavyutpattirna tu viparītetyetāvanmātraparameva bhāṣyaṃ draṣṭavyam | rājyaśabdāddhi
rājani vyutpādyamāne yalopāmnānaṃ vā rājaśabdādeśātmakaṃ vā smaraṇaṃ syāt | tasmādiyameva vacanavyaktī rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti na tvarthāpattyā rājyasya kartā rājeti kalpanīyaṃ, deśāntare vijñātatvādrājñaḥ | kalpitāyāmapi cārthāpattau manvādismṛtivaśena kṣatriyasyaitatkarmetyavadhāraṇātsa eva rājā vijñāyate | sakalaśca rājetiśabdo rājye 'nupraviṣṭa iti sa yaugiko yukto na tu rājyaśabdo rājanyanusyūtaḥ sakala ityayaugikatvam | satyamevaṃ rājyaśabdasya yaugikatvamupapadyate | yastu tatkāriṇi jātyantare rājaśabdaprayogaḥ sa kṣatriyatvābhāvānna prāpnoti | tena nā ' 'ryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogaḥ sakalo na virudhyate | yathā, na śūdrarājye nivasedityādīnāmāptaprayogāṇāṃ bādhaḥ syādityata āha—yogāllokaḥ prayuṅkta iti | prathamaṃ tāvadrājayogādrājyaṃ punastadyogādbrāhmaṇādiṣu rājaśabdopacāra iti | nanvevaṃ sati rājyayogādapi rājetyetadabhyupagatameva | naiṣa doṣaḥ | gauṇatvābhyupagamāt, mukhyatvābhyupagame hyadhikaraṇaṃ parāvarteta | gauṇatvaṃ tu mukhyena bādhitatvādabhyupagatamapi siddhāntaṃ na viruṇaddhi | tena tatkāryāpanne pratinidhinyāyena brāhmaṇādau rājaśabda iti draṣṭavyam | tathā ca darśayati—na tvevaṃ smaranti rājyayogādrājeti | taccaitadācārasya daurbalyādgauṇakalpanāśrayaṇamityevameva bhāṣyaṃ neyam | yattvaudameghiśabdādivatprakṛtyarthānumānaṃ taddraviḍaprayogeṇa pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate | atha rājyasya kartaivamabhidhīyata iti | nimittabhūto 'pi karmakartṛsaṃbandhastasya ca smaraṇamanumātavyam | rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti pratyakṣaṃ smaraṇaṃ
tasmādbalavattaram | para āha—yo yo rājyaṃ karotīti | sarvathā 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vācyavācakasaṃbandho vijñāyate | sa ca rājaśabdasyāvyabhicāreṇa rājyanimittatayā ca gamyate na tu rājakarmanimittatvena, smṛteḥ punaḥ śabdāpaśabdavibhāgamātraviṣayatvādaviṣaya evāyam | ubhau hi rājarājyaśabdau sādhū tasmādayuktaḥ smaraṇopanyāsa iti | tatrocyate | satyaṃ prayoga eva, na ca smṛteḥ kasya kiṃyoganimittatvamityeṣa vyāpārastathā 'pi tu sādhvasādhutvaparatayaivānvākhyānānnimittatvamavagamyate | rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti hi vyutpādane tadyoganimitte rājyamityarthāduktaṃ bhavati | tena smṛtibalīyastvādrājaśabda eva svatantra iti | prayogo 'pi ca draviḍeṣu vyabhicārītyuktameva | matpakṣe tu prayogasyātantratvādvyabhicāritvamadūṣaṇam | yatra tāvat prayogastatrāsti rājakarmatvam | tena prayuktasyānvākhyānakaraṇādaprayuktanimittānvākhyānābhāvāccādoṣaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: tena tasyaiva karmeti cintitādi na gṛhyate ||

div.p: janapadarakṣaṇaṃ hyasādhāraṇaṃ rājakarma tena rājyamityucyate | cintitanimiṣitādi tu rājñaścānyeṣāṃ cetyavyavacchedānna rājyaśabdābhidheyaṃ bhavatīti | tena sārvalaukikādapi pragogāt ( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 5 sū. 9 ) |‘śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt’ ityanenaiva rājaśabdasya kṣatriyavacanatvam | tulyaścāntyajanapadavāsināmapi dṛṣṭārthatvācchābdavyavahāre pramāṇabhāva ityuktaṃ ( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 5 sū. 10 ) |‘coditaṃ tu pratīyeta’ iti | tasmātkṣatriyasyaiva rājasūyo 'stīti brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāpakāṇi śravaṇāni | tataśca ‘etayā 'nnādyakāmam’ ityetadapi phalaṃ bahireva prayogādbhaviṣyatīti |
nanu caitayeti pratyakṣaviśeṣavacanātparokṣasāmānyapravṛttāṃ rājasūyacodanāṃ bādhitvā 'nnādyaphalatayaiva bhavitavyam | naitadevam | virodhābhāvāt | tathā hi |

na hyanekaphalamekasya viruddhaṃ prayogāntarasya vacanāntareṇaiva kalpitatvāt | samuccayena hyāvṛttidoṣo 'nyatrābhidhīyate | sā tvatrā ' 'vṛttirbrāhmaṇādisaṃbandhādrājasūyagrahaṇāccāvaśyaṃbhāvinī | yadi ca ‘etayā 'nnādyakāmam’ ityutpattivākyaṃ bhavettataḥ paścātpravartamānā rājasūyacodanā bādhyeta | na | dvayorapi hyāgneyādicodanotpāditeṣu karmasu pravṛtteṣu yugapatkālatvenāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvāttulyabalatvam | yathaiva hi rājasūyacodanā saṃnihitānālocya pravartate tathaivānnādyakāmacodanā 'pi, na hi tatrāveṣṭiḥ kenacidapi śabdenopāttā | na ca rājasūyeneti sāmānyaśabdaḥ paurṇamāsīśabdavat | prakṛtasamudāyaviśiṣṭasamudāyivacanatvāt | ata eva tatkṛtamapi na daurbalyaṃ labhate | iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ | ekena bahavo gṛhyante, anyenālpe | na ca tāvatā kaścidatiśayo 'sti | nanu caitayeti śrutyaiva pratyakṣavacanādasti viśeṣaḥ | syādviśeṣo yadyetacchabdaḥ phalena saṃbadhyate | yadi vā ‘athaiṣa jyotiḥ’ ityādivatprastūyamānaṃ brūyāt | pratyayasaṃnikarṣāttatrāpi yajiśabdagṛhītaivāveṣṭirannādyena saṃbadhyeta | etāvacca rājasūyayajāvapyastītyaviśeṣaḥ prakṛtamapi ca bruvannaitacchabda āgneyādivākyālocanādṛte naiva bravītīti | tataśca rājasūyayajirapi tāvatā yatnena śaknoti grahītumiti tulyabalatvam | nanvavāntarādhikārasyāsti viśeṣaḥ | ucyate | ayameva viśeṣo yadekatra bahūnāṃ grahaṇamaparatra cālpānām | grahaṇavelā tu tulyaiva | yadi caikāntikamatrākarmāntaratvaṃ syāttata evamucyeta | karmāntaramapi caitaditi darśitam | tataśca viṣayāntaratvādeva svārājyānnādyayoravirodhaḥ | karmāntaratve 'pi ca bārhaspatyādiliṅgadarśanātprakṛtāveṣṭiprakṛtitvameva pratipattavyam | rājanyasyāpi tulyapravṛtteḥ phalapadānuṣaṅgācca brāhmaṇavaiśyavadeva karmāntareṇa prayogāntareṇa vā saṃbandhaḥ | evaṃ ca tasyāpi
madhyenidhānavākyaṃ tantraprayoge satyupapatsyate || rājasūyamadhyasthāyāṃ tu dakṣiṇābhedātpratīṣṭi prayogānyatve madhyenidhānavidhiravarudhyeta | tasmātprāpakāṇyetāni śravaṇānīti siddham || 3 ||

‘vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta’ ityādiṣu prāptyaprāptyāśaṅkāyāṃ pūrvavadeva saṃdehaḥ | tatra yadi kathaṃcidapi prāptirasti tato vinā 'pi yadiśabdānnimittārthatvaṃ, tadā ca brāhmaṇavasantādisaṃbandhaḥ parasparaniyamātmakaṃ phalaṃ bhaviṣyati | atha tvaprāptistataḥ prāpakāṇi brāhmaṇavasantādiviśiṣṭasyā ' 'dhānasya, tadā ca pūrvatra pūrvatrotpattivākyaśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhāduttara uttaro guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ kalpayatīti trīṇyādhānāni bhaviṣyanti | svārthā eva vā 'gnaya ātmanepadanirdeśādvijñāsyante | śūdrasya cāprāptiḥ | nimittārthapakṣe tu sarvaṃ viparītameva | etena ‘vasante brāhmaṇamupanayet’ ityevamādīnyapi tulyahetutvādvicāritāni draṣṭavyāni | tatraitāvānsaṃkṣepārthaḥ
saṃkṣepeṇādhikaraṇārtha ityarthaḥ | |

ekastāvatpūrvapakṣaheturagnihotrādicodanābhirevā ' 'dhānaniṣpādyāhavanīyādisādhanatvādvinā 'nupapadyamānābhiḥ prāpitatvādbrāhmaṇādīnāṃmādhānaṃ nimittārthaṃ śrūyata iti | yadi tu
pratyakṣavacane sati sāmarthyamaprāpakamiti kalpyate tato 'smādguṇāpahṛtaśaktikādvidheranapahṛtaśaktiraparo nirguṇo vidhirasti ‘ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte’ iti | tena prāpteraprāpakatvamiti | siddhāntahetustu |

na tāvannityamarthasya
arthasyeti—arthāpatterityarthaḥ | prāpakamasti | upāyāntareṇāpi pratigrahādinā puruṣāntarāhitānāmātmanepadenāniyatānāṃ sulabhatvāt | pratyakṣavacane sati anyathānupapattipakṣe sati, arthāpattilabhyaśrutyaparigrahācca | ‘ya evaṃ vidvān’ ityapi vartamānāpadeśaḥ pratyakṣāyāṃ liṅi brāhmaṇādivākyeṣūpalabhyamānāyāṃ na vidhiśaktiṃ labhate | asti caitadupanyāsasya pratyakṣavidhiyuktodakopasarjanādisaṃbhā
saṃbhāravidhānārthatvamiti—saṃbhāravidhiśeṣatayā tatstāvakatvenārthavattvānnā ' 'narthakyabhiyā vidvadvākyasyā ' 'dhānaprāpakatvaṃ vaktavyamityāśayaḥ | kathaṃ stutiriti cet | ‘evaṃ saṃpannaṃ bhrātṛvyamavarti saha kurute’ ityarthavādasahitaṃ ‘ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte’ iti vākyaṃ ‘apa upasṛjati’ ityādiviśeṣavihitānāmudakādisaṃbhārāṇāṃ ‘atha saṃbhārānsaṃbharati’ iti yatsāmānyataḥ sthāpanavidhistasya śeṣaḥ | yo vidvānevamudakādisthāpanapūrvamagnimādhatte sa sthāpanarūpāṅgasāmarthyātsahāyasaṃpannamapi vairiṇaṃ vartanarahitaṃ kuruta ityevaṃ sthāpanapraśaṃsā jñeyā |ravidhānārthatvamityaprāptameva brāhmaṇādiviśiṣṭamādhānaṃ vidhīyata iti | kiṃ nimittasārūpyamiti—yadiśabdādyanupabandhābhiprāyam | brāhmaṇādīnāṃ vasantādividhibhiḥ samuccāraṇamiti—parapadasaṃbandhasaṃcāritāyāṃ vidhiśaktau nimittaphalatvāt | nanu brāhmaṇādīnāmādadhātinā 'pīti—aprāptau viśiṣṭavidhānopapattyabhiprāyam | itarastu prāptatvena vidheyatvaṃ nivartayati—na tvamīṣāmādhānasaṃbandho na vidita iti | kena prāpto vidita iti—prāpakākṣepaḥ | itarastu nirākaraṇamapaśyanbalīyāṃsaṃ ca pratyakṣavidhiṃ kimarthaṃ prathamamevopanyasyāmīti matvā kāmaśrutibhirityāha | kāḥ kāmaśrutaya iti—sakrodhaṃ prāpaṇaśaktāvākṣiptāyāṃ svarūpamevaiṣa na jānātīti manyamāno darśayati—agnihotrādiphalavidhaya iti | katha
manyaparābhiḥ satībhistatprāpitamityāśaṅkyārthāpattiṃ darśayati | tena ( a. 7 pā. 3a. 9 sū. 28 ) |‘karmaje karma yūpavat’ iti āhavanīyādigrāhibhiḥ karmabhirananyopāyatvādgṛhītamādhānamiti |
apiceti bhāṣyaṃ vasantādivākye viśiṣṭavidhāne vākyabhedāprasakterayuktamāśaṅkya viśiṣṭavidhānaprayuktagauravābhiprāyeṇa vākyabhedoktirityevaṃ vyācaṣṭe sarvaprakāretyādinā |sarvaprakārasaṃbhave ca viśiṣṭavidhirbhavatīti saṃbhavāpekṣayā vākyabhedamāha | evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ | ādhāne 'pi pūrvavadeva prāpakāṇi śravaṇāni | katham | asarvaśeṣatvāt | yadi hi sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣabhūtamādhānaṃ bhavettatastairākṣipyeta vā na vā | teṣāṃ tu ( a. 7 pā. 3 sū. 29 ) |‘rūpaṃ vā 'śeṣabhūtatvāt’ ityanenaiva nyāyenā ' 'havanīyādigrahaṇamātraparyavasānānna kaścidapyādhānāṅgatvapratipādane heturasti | yattu ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 5 sū. 15 ) |‘servārthaṃ vā’ iti vakṣyati tatsarvakarmārthāgnyarthatvāditi vyākhyāsyate | kimato yadyevamiti—aṅgāṅgamapyanyathānupapattyā śakyamākṣeptumiti manyate | siddhāntavādī tvanyathānupapadyamānatvādagnayaḥ kāmaśrutibhiḥ prāptuvanti
nā ' 'dhānamityāha | nanvādhānamagnīnāmabhyupāya iti | tatra nāma rūpamātraṃ gṛhyate yallaukikopāyasādhyaṃ bhavati vastraśakaṭādi | na cā ' 'havanīyādayo laukikopāyāstasmādavaṃśyameṣāṃ vedenaivopāyo 'pyākṣeptavyaḥ | sa tu nā ' 'dhānavyatirikto 'stīti tadapyākṣiptamiti | ucyate | na | anaikāntikatvāt | agnīnāṃ hi yācñākrayāpahārādayo 'bhyupāyāḥ santi | sarvaiśca tairāhavanīyādimātraprārthinyaḥ kāmaśrutayo nirākāṅkṣāḥ kriyante | tasmānnaikāntenā ' 'dhānaṃ prāptamityasti niyamavidheravakāśaḥ | tatraitatsyāt | naivopāyāntaropāttānāmāhavanīyāditvaṃ saṃbhavati saṃskāranimittatvāditi | tatrocyate |

yathaiva hi vrīhyādīnāṃ na tāvatkṛṣimantareṇotpattiḥ | atha ca na sarvapuruṣaistathaivā ' 'pyante | krayādibhirapi labhyamānatvāt | evaṃ tāvatprathamameka ādhānenotpādayiṣyanti | apare tu tasmādupāyāntareṇa prāpsyanti | tataśca yathā ghaṭādīn kumbhakāra utpādyotpādya vikrīṇāti dadāti ca tathaivaikaḥ kaścitpunaḥ punaragnīnādhāyāparebhyo dadyāt | ataḥ pratipuruṣamādhānaṃ pakṣe prāptaṃ pakṣe netyasti vidhānasya viṣayaḥ | pakṣe 'pi vā naiva prāptirastīti vakṣyāmaḥ | pratyakṣavidhipakṣe punarupāyāntarāṇi nivartante | tadā hyādadhītetyātmanepadenā ' 'dhātṛgāmyevā ' 'dhānaphalamiti gamyate | tasya ca phalamāhavanīyādi tadakarturna bhavatīti taṃ pratyanāhavanīyatvameva syāt | arthākṣepapakṣe tvānumānikyāḥ śruterātmanepadaparasmaipadavivekābhāvādakartṝviṣaye 'pyavirodhādupāyāntarāṇi na nivarteran |
ato 'vaśyameva vidheyametaditi | api ca satīṣvevā ' 'dhānaśrutiṣviti pākṣikīmapi prāptiṃ nirākaroti | pūrvameva hi vyākhyātaṃ niyamādīnāmaprāptavidhitvaṃ śrutasaṃbhāvanāyāmaśrutakalpanānavasarāt | santi cā ' 'dhānasya pratyakṣā śrutaya iti nānyāḥ kalpayituṃ labhyante | yadi hyetā na syustatrā ' 'dhānādṛte 'gnihotrādīnāmaśakyānuṣṭhānatvādvidhayo 'narthakā bhavantīti svasiddhyarthamādhānaśrutiṃ parigṛhṇīyuḥ | satīṣu tvaśrutakalpanābhayādyeṣāmetābhiḥ prāpitaṃ teṣāmeva kāmaśrutayaḥ prayojikā iti na kalpayanti | sarvapūrvoktadoṣaparihāreṇedānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhate | pratyakṣamanyadvidhāyakamastyādhānasya vacanam | yasminsati nimittārthānītarāṇīti ‘ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte’ iti | tatra pratividhatte saṃbhāravidhānārthā punaḥ śrutireṣeti | paraḥ punaḥ prakaraṇena saṃbhārasaṃbandhaṃ manvānaḥ pṛthagvākyatvamāpādyaitadevotpattivākyamityāha | na hyudakopasarjanādīnāmādhānenaikavākyatā saṃbhavati | bhavedatrārthabhede nānāvākyatvaṃ yadyādhānaṃ vidhīyeta | tadbrāhmaṇādisaṃ
yuktairvihitamiti guṇārthameveha
guṇārthameveti—stutivācinā guṇaśabdena ‘apāmupasarjanaṃ tu vidhīyate’ iti bhāṣyastho vidadhātiḥ stutiparo vyākhyātaḥ | punaḥ śrūyate | kuto nu khalu nirṇayaḥ kataradanayorutpattivākyamiti | taducyate |

yadi hyete dve api vākye vidhātṛṇī syātāṃ tataḥ samānaviṣaye satī spardheyātāṃ kataradvidhattāmiti | atra punarekaṃ vidhāyakamekaṃ stāvakam | na ca stāvakena brāhmaṇādisaṃyuktasya vidhāyakatvaṃ nivāryate tadānuguṇyāt | yadi tu ‘ya evaṃ vidvān’ ityapi vidhisarūpaṃ syāttato vihitasya punarvidhānānupapatterasmatpakṣaṃ nirundhyāt | liṅā tu vihitasya saṃbandhisaṃbhāravidhiprarocanārthaṃ tu stutisahitasya punaḥ śravaṇamityavidhāyakam | liṅā ca tāvaddhātvarthavidhānaṃ svapadenopāttatvācchrautam | prāśastyaṃ punarvākyena, tataścā ' 'numāniko vidhiriti viprakṛṣyate | nanvidamapi vākyamiti—brāhmaṇādipadārthāparityāgābhiprāyam | siddhāntavādī vadati, ādhānaṃ tāvacchutyā, śeṣaṃ vākyena nāma
bhavatu, svapadopāttāyāḥ stuterabhāvāt | ‘evaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyamavarti sahate’ ityādipadasaṃbandhenaiva stutiriti vākyam |
api cobhābhyāmiti pūrvapakṣabhāṣyaṃ nanvityādinā viśiṣṭavidhigauravābhiprāyeṇānūdya naiṣa doṣa ityādinā viśiṣṭavidhyanyathānupapattiprasūtairviśeṣaṇavidhibhireva teṣāṃ vidhisiddheḥ śrautavidhivyāpāranānātvābhāvātparihṛtamapi punarbrāhmaṇādijāteḥ kālavadanupādeyatayā nimittatveneṣṭatvātkālanimittayordvayoruddeśyatvāpatteḥ pratyuddeśyaṃ vākyaparisamāptilakṣaṇavākyabhedāśayena yaduktamityādinā anubhāṣya yadīmāvityanena jāternityatayā nimittatvāyogātkartṛtayaivānvayāvagateḥ kartuścānuddeśyatvānnoktarītyā vākyabheda ityevaṃ parihṛtam | tadetatsarvaṃ saṃkṣipya vyācaṣṭe kartṛkāletyādinā | bhāṣye guṇatvoktistu nimittābhāve 'nuṣṭhitasyāpi karmaṇo naiṣphalyāpattestasyāpi kriyopakāritvādaṅgatvopapattiriti na virudhyata iti jñeyam |kartṛkālaviśiṣṭapradhānādhānavidhānācca vākyabhedaparihārātsiddhaṃ prāpakatvam || 4 ||

yuktaṃ dadhnendriyakāmasyeti guṇātphalam | na hi tatra dadhyādīnāṃ homasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yena saṃjñālakṣaṇo bhedaḥ syāt | dākṣāyaṇayajñādīnāṃ tu yāgasāmānādhikaraṇyātpūrvayāge cāprayuktatvādātmarūpāvacchinnayāgāntarapratipādanamaviruddham | na ca kaściddadhyā
dibhistulya evaṃsaṃjño guṇaḥ prasiddhaḥ | tasmādbhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena phale yāgavidhānādyāgāntaram || 5 ||

vidhiśaktiḥ kriyāto
nottāriteti-dākṣāyaṇayajñapade lokaprasiddhyabhāve 'pi vaidikaprasiddhyā ' 'vṛttyādiguṇopādāne 'pi bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena dhātvarthasyaiva phalasādhanatvamiti na guṇaphalopabandha ityarthaḥ |nottāritetyabhiprāyaḥ || 6 ||
phalasyānupādeyatvānna ‘vrīhibhiryajate’ ityādivatkarmoddeśena vidhiḥ saṃbhavatītyavaśyaṃ karma tatra vidhātavyam | tataśca siddho bhedaḥ || 7 ||

satyapi phalaṃ prati vidhāne ( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 13 sū. 26 ) |‘saṃnidhau tvavibhāgāt’ ityanenākarmāntaratā | dadhyādivacca guṇaphalasaṃbandhapratyayātprakṛtayāgabuddheḥ | yattu guṇo na prasiddha iti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | ukthyādivatprakaraṇalabhyatvāt | evaṃvidhā ca
vākyāntareṇeti-dve paurṇamāsyau yajeta dve amāvāsye, saha kumbhībhirabhikrāmet, ityādiprākaraṇikavākyāntareṇetyarthaḥ |vākyāntareṇa guṇarūpavidhānādasti prasiddhiḥ | dadhyādivadevātrāpi vaiyadhikaraṇyenaiva saṃbandhaḥ | kiṃ ca |

tasmāddarśapūrṇamāsayorevāvasthāntararūpādvikārātphalaṃ na karmāntarāt | evaṃ ca prakaraṇavicchedo nātyantaṃ kṛto bhaviṣyati | yadyapi phalavataḥ kathaṃbhāvenāgrahaṇādetadviṣaye 'styeva praka
karaṇabādhastathā 'pyāśrayatvena saṃbandhāduttarāṇi ca vākyāni pratyanuṣaṅgasiddheranugraha ityucyate || 8 ||

triṃśatsaṃpatpūraṇaṃ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃkīrtanaṃ vā bhedaṃ bodhayati | na hi dārśapūrṇamāsikastriṃśadvarṣapakṣaḥ karmāntareṇa pūrayituṃ śakyate | na ca
niyamasyeti—nimittasyetyarthaḥ |niyamasyātideśaḥ | yena karmāntarasyevaitatpañcadaśavarṣapakṣavidhānaṃ syāt | na ca dākṣāyaṇayājitvena nimittena darśapūrṇamāsayoreva pañcadaśavarṣapakṣa upajāyate | saṃbandhābhāvāt | dve hi paurṇamāsyau dve amāvāsye iti cāsyānupapattiḥ || 9 ||

utpattisaṃyoge pūrvāsaṃbandhe ca saṃjñā bhettrī bhavati | na ceyamutpattisaṃyuktā ‘athaiva jyotiḥ’ ityāderiva prakramābhāvāt | saṃbhavati ca pūrvakarmāśritaguṇavācitvenaiveti na bhinatti | dākṣāyaṇayajñe hi vākyāntaravaśādavayavaprasiddheścābhyastatvamabhidhīyate | tena ca prakaraṇāddarśapūrṇamāsāśritenaiva phalaṃ sādhyate | dakṣa iti cotsāhī śīghrakārī yajamānaḥ, tadīyā ṛtvijo dākṣāḥ | steṣāmayataṃ—prayogo yajñāśritatvāddākṣāyaṇa ityucyate | sākaṃprasthāyīye 'pi sāṃnāyyamanavadāya kumbhībhyāmeva sākaṃ prasthīyata ityevamabhidhīyate | tasmānna prakṛtapratyabhijñānabādhaḥ || 10 ||

yadyapi karmoddeśena na phalaṃ vidhīyate tathā 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāvādakarmāntaratā | yathaiva hi karmaṇaḥ phalamiti bhāvārthādhikaraṇe( a. 2 pā. 1 a 1 ) | sādhitaṃ tathaiva ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 11 sū. 26 ) |‘atulyatvāttu vākyayoḥ’ ityatra guṇaphalasaṃbandhaparyavasāyitvamapyuktamiti saṃdehe sati padāntarānugrahārthaṃ guṇādeva phalaṃ na karmaṇa iti siddham || 11 ||

na kasyacidapi karmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe śrūyate ‘śvetamālabheta’ ‘caruṃ nirvapet’ iti | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kimanārabhyavādānāṃ prakṛtyarthatvātprākṛtayorevā ' 'lambhanirvāpayoḥ śvetacarū guṇau vidhīyete, kiṃ vā karmāntare yāvacchrute, uta yajimatī veti | tatrānārabhyādhītatvopanyāsaḥ saṃśayabījāpaunaruktyaprathamapakṣaparigrahatannirākaraṇārthaḥ | katham | yadi tāvadālambhanirvāpau prakṛtya śrūyeyātāṃ tataḥ prakṛtapratyayānuvṛttireva prasajyeteti karmāntarā
śaṅkā na syāt | anārabhyavāde tu sati śvetādiguṇasyopādeyatvātkadāciddūrasthānuvādena guṇo vidhīyate kadācidvā viparivṛttyabhāvātkarmāntaramiti jāyate saṃdehaḥ | tathā ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 6 sū. 17 ) |‘dravyasaṃyogāccodanā paśusomayoḥ’ ityanena gataprāyamivātra yajimatkarmavidhānaṃ lakṣyate | tattu prakṛtayāgābhāvādanuvādaśaṅkāyāmasatyāṃ śvetādeśca guṇasyautpattikadravyasaṃyukte 'pi karmaṇi vidhānopapatteḥ kathaṃ syāditi punarupanyasyate | pūrvapakṣaścānyayorālabhbhanirvāpayoraprakaraṇādavaśyaṃ prakṛtāveva grahītavyāvityevaṃ pravartate | tannirākaraṇamapi ca prakaraṇābhāvādasādhāraṇopalakṣaṇābhāvācca na prākṛtayorlaukikavyāvṛttarūpayoḥ pratītirastītyevaṃ bhaviṣyati | guṇavidhiviṣayatvāccā ' 'lambhanirvāpau guṇavidhiśabdenoktau
uktāviti | anena caivaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātaṃ bhavati | ālambhaviṣayo nirvāpaviṣayaśca yo guṇavidhiḥ sa dārśapūrṇamāsikālambhanirvāpaviṣaya iti | | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | yathaivāyaneṣu guṇasaṃbandhapare vākye karmavidhiśabdābhāvādakarmāntaratvaṃ tathehāpi bhaviṣyatīti caśabdenānvādiśyate | kva cāsau guṇavidhiriti viṣayāvadhāraṇārthamaprakaraṇagrahaṇam | atha vā yadyapyetāvatā pūrvavailakṣaṇyenāprakaraṇe śrūyate tathā 'pi karmaṇo vidhiśabdānavarodhādguṇārthaiva punaḥ śrutiriti | darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śakaṭeṣā sā śvetīkṛtyā ' 'labdhavyā, nirvāpaśca carau kartavyaścaruparimito vā | bhūtibrahmavarcasakāmayośca sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsāvityevaṃ prāptayoranuvādaḥ | tathā vāyavyamiti sarvavanaspatīnāṃ vāyudevatātvātkathaṃcidīṣāyā evānuvādaḥ | sauryamiti cā ' 'gneyasyaiva tejodevatyasāmānyādanuvādaḥ | tasmādguṇo vidhīyata iti || 12 ||

lg.l: tato guṇavidhitvaṃ syādvidheyau tvatra tau matau ||

div.p:
vāyavyapadaṃ pūrvavadevopekṣya phalapadaparigraheṇa tāvatpratyavasthīyate | yadi hyālambhanirvāpāvanūdya śvetacarū vidhīyete tataḥ phalapadamanarthakameva syāt | sarvakāmaprāptānuvāde 'pi pākṣikatvānnityavadgrahaṇaṃ virudhyeta | viśeṣaṇatve vākyabhedaḥ syāt | atha guṇaphalasaṃbandho vidhīyate tathā 'pyālambhādeḥ prakṛtasyā ' 'śrayasyābhāvādvākyenaiva tatsaṃbandhakaraṇe vākyaṃ bhidyeta | guṇaviśiṣṭālambhavidhāne tu na kaściddoṣaḥ | tenocyate karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāditi | karmātra vidheyatvena śrutimūlaṃ na guṇaḥ | sa hyacodanālakṣaṇa eva syāt | atha vā yāvaduktameva syānna yajimat | kutaḥ | karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāt | na hyacodito yajyartho 'dhyavasātuṃ śakyate | na ca tena vineha kiṃcinna sidhyati | ālambhanirvāpayoreva phalavattvena prādhānyopapatteḥ | na hi yadekatra guṇabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tenānyatra prādhānyaṃ vācanikamapi na pratipattavyamiti kiṃcitpramāṇam | yathāvacanaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāvau na svābhāvikau | vāyavyādiśabdaścātra sarvatra dravyāṇāṃ yathākathaṃciddevatāsaṃbandhopapatteranuvādaḥ | athavā yatkenacidvāyvādibhyaḥ saṃkalpitaṃ tadālambhādibhiryojyamānamabhyudayakāri bhavati | viśiṣṭavidhānācca na tatparigrahe 'pyatibhāraḥ | athavā vāyusūryāvevoddiśya spṛṣṭaṃ niruptaṃ vetyetāvataivepsitāvāptirbhaviṣyati | na cāvaśyaṃ yāga eva devatoddeṣṭavyā | yatra yatra hi codyate tatra tatroddiśyamānā na virudhyate | tasmādyatkiṃcicchvetaṃ vāyūddeśena spraṣṭavyamiti
itīti-iti vākyārtho yāvaduktacodanānusārādavasīyata iti śeṣapūraṇam | yāvaduktacodanānumārāt | guṇavidhipakṣe phalapadasaṃbandhe vākyabhedamabhidhāyedānīṃ tatparityāgamabhyupetyāpi bravītīti | athavā yo 'sau vidhāyakaḥ śabda ityādi | tasyābhiprāyo yadidamanāra
