bhyavādānāṃ prakṛtyarthatvamabhidhāsyate naitadvācanikaṃ, kathaṃ tarhi, dvārānyathānupapattikāritam | na cā ' 'lambhanirvāpāvanyatrānupapannau | loke 'pi vidyamānatvāditi | tatra yadi tāvallaukikavyāvṛttyarthaṃ vihitatvena viśeṣyate tato 'nyaviśeṣaṇābhāvālliṅaiva viśeṣṭavyau ya ālambhaḥ kartavyatayā codita iti | tāvatā copakṣīṇaśaktau vidhāyake guṇavidhānaṃ nopapadyate | na hyasau vidhātuṃ lakṣayituṃ ca sakṛduccaritaḥ samarthaḥ | kevaladhātvarthānuvāde ca loke 'pi guṇavidhitvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatra ca niṣphalatvādānarthakyaṃ, na caitāvanmātreṇaiva vinaiva prakaraṇādibhirvaidikālambhanirvāpagrahaṇamupapadyate | tasmātprākṛtapramāṇābhāvādapūrvayorvidhānamiti || 13 ||

vidhistāvaduttarottarapadānurodhena dravyadevatāpadasaṃbandhasaṃkrāntaḥ | sa cānyathānupapatterākṣiptayajikriyaḥ sanvidhīyate | na hyenamanyā kriyā saṃpādayituṃ samarthā | yadi devato
ddeśenāparityajanneva dravyamālabheta na tadvāyavyaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt | na ca prasiddhavāyudevatyamevaṃ spraṣṭavyamityavagamyeta | anuṣṭhānasaṃpādyatvāddevatātvasya | tenāvaśyaṃ vāyumuddiśya śvetaguṇakaṃ dravyaṃ dātavyamataścaṃ yajividhānametaditi niścīyate | tathā ca lakṣaṇaṃ kariṣyati ( a. 4 pā. 2 a. 12 sū. 27 ) |‘yajaticodanā dravyadevatākriyaṃ samudāye kṛtārthatvāt’ iti | tataścā ' 'lambhanirvāpau codakaprāptāvevānuvadiṣyete | tatrā ' 'lambhaviśiṣṭatvāditi gauravopanyāsaḥ phalgureva kathaṃ cidabhyupetyavādenopanyasta iti nātīvā ' 'dartavyaḥ || 14 ||

somāraudramityukte vinā 'pi yajatiśabdena pariśrayaṇavidhipare vākye yajatinā 'nūdya
māne yajatimatkarmavidhāyitvamevamādīnāmityavagamyate | agnīṣomīye 'pi cānenaiva yajimattvasiddhiḥ | pūrvaṃ caitāvadeva vicāritaṃ kiṃ prakṛtānuvāditvamuta vidhāyakatvamiti | siddhe tu vidhāyakatve kimātmakaṃ tatkarmetyetadadhikaraṇādhīnamevaitadityapaunaruktyam || 15 ||

lg.l: sūtreṣveva hi tatsarvaṃ yadvṛttau yacca vārtike |

div.p:
iti ye vadanti tānpratyucyate | na kiṃcitsādhanamapradarśitaviṣayaṃ svārthaṃ sādhayati | sūtrakāreṇa ceha hetumātramupāttam | na cārthaprakaraṇādibhirapyudāharaṇapratijñāsaṃśayahetūnāmanyatamamupalabhyate | tasmādagamake sūtre sati avaśyaṃ doṣapratisamādhānārthaṃ vṛttikārādimiryatitavyam | satyeva saṃbhave 'dhyāhārādivarjanamuktam
śāstrādau bhāṣyakāreṇeti śeṣaḥ | | sarvathā śiṣyaprajñāsaṃskāre sūtrakārādīnāṃ pravartamānānāṃ yenaiva tadanuguṇaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tadeva grahītavyaṃ nāsadgrahaḥ kartavyaḥ
kartavya iti—yuktigamye 'rthe puruṣaviśeṣasyānādaraṇīyatvādyuktiyuktaṃ, yadvṛttikārādibhiruktaṃ tatsūtrakārānupāttatvānna grāhyamityasadāgraho na kartavyaïtyāśayaḥ | | idaṃ sūtrakāreṇa nopāttamidaṃ vṛttikāreṇaitatpradarśanārthametadvarṇayanti
varṇayantīti—sūtrakārānuktasyāpyarthasya vṛttikārādyuktasya grāhyatvaprardaśanārthametadbhāṣyamiti yaduktaṃ tedatatpūrve 'pi vyākhyātāro varṇayantītyarthaḥ | | tadiha bhagavā
nupavarṣaḥ kilāgnihotre dhenudohādhikāre śrutamidaṃ vākyamudāhṛtavān ‘vatsamālabheta’ iti | tatra ca pūrvavadeva tredhā saṃśayamupanyastatvān | kiṃ prākṛta evā ' 'lambhe vatso vidhīyate tathā ' 'lambhamātramathavā yajatimadetatkarmeti | tatra
liṅaḥ prākṛtāgnīṣomīyapaśvālambhaviśeṣaṇatvābhyupagame vidhāyakābhāvāpatteriti śeṣaḥ |viśeṣaṇābhāvātprākṛtapratyayo nāstīti pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhameveti nopanyastam | tenaivānukrameṇa yajimadabhidhānabuddhau prasaktāyāmapavādo 'yaṃ kriyate | tatra bhoktṛsaṃyogapratyudāharaṇatvādgataprāyo 'pi pūrvapakṣaḥ śrotṛbuddhivaicitryātkriyate | yo nāma tārkikavāsanayā sāmānyato dṛṣṭena vedārthamunninīṣettasya tannivṛttirapradarśitāśaṅkā na śakyā kartumiti pradarśyate | tatra keṣāṃcitpūrvādhikaraṇa evā ' 'labhatiryajatiparyāyatvena prasiddho 'nyeṣāṃ yajyanumāpakatvena, tadubhayamatrāpi tathaiva manyante | tatrāpūrvayāgavidhānaṃ prāpte vā vatsavidhānamiti pūrvapakṣe dvaitam | siddhāntastu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhānyathānupapattyā pūrvamasmābhiryajiḥ kalpito nādṛṣṭapūrvaśaktyālabhatyabhidhānena,
vyabhicāryanumānābhāsena vā | na cehāsāvastīti yāvaduktatā | tathā ca dohanādisaṃskārakarmaprāyadarśanamupapadyate | dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ ca goprasnavanahetutvāt || 16 ||

‘vatsanikāntā hi’ iti prasnāvanārthaṃ ca vatsopacārasparśanavidhau hetuvannigado 'rthavāda upapadyate | māraṇārthatve tvālabhyamāne vatsapriyatvaṃ paśūnāmucyamānamasaṃbaddhameva syāt | yasmādasau mātuḥ priyo vatsastasmātsaṃjñāpanārthamālabdhavya ityasaṃbaddhameva syāt | itaratra punarvatsapriyā mātā putre cāṭukaraṇāttena vā kṛtacāṭunā saṃyujyamānā snehātprasnaviṣyatītyupapadyate | tasmādapi prayojanavatsaṃskārabhūtālambhamātravidhānametaditi siddham || 17 ||

pūrvamālambhasya pratyudāharaṇamidaṃ tu carudvāreṇa nirvāpasya | devatāśaṅkā cātrābhyantare 'dhiketyārambhaḥ | tatrautpattikameva carupuroḍāśādīnāṃ yāgāṅgatvam | sarvathā caitasyā ' 'tmīyatvaparityāgaḥ
parityāga iti-utpannasya carorvidhyānarthakyaparihārāya svatvatyāgaḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ | kartavyaḥ | ‘carumupadadhāti’ iti ca dvitīyānirdeśādupadhānaṃ pratipattiḥ | na cānyatrānupayuktasya pratipattiryuktetyākāṅkṣite yogyatvādyāgopayo
gitvameva vijñāyate | vākyaśeṣe ca bṛhaspatiḥ śrūyamāṇo yadi vidhyuddeśena na saṃbadhyate, ānarthakyameva syāt | tasmādāgneyaprakṛtikaṃ bārhaspatyacaruyāgaṃ nirvartya śeṣakāryāntarāṇyakṛtvopadhātavyaścarurityevaṃ prāptam | evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

‘naivāraścarurbhavati’ iti hyutpannamātrasyaiva prayojanāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ yāgāṅgabhūtāgnidhāraṇārthasthalanirvṛttiśeṣatvena pratyakṣavidhānaṃ dṛśyate ‘ yadenaṃ carumupadadhāti ’ iti | tathā nirākāṅkṣasya ca caroḥ śrutenāpi kāryāntareṇa saṃbandho na syātkimutāśrutenaiva yāgena | na ceyaṃ pratipattiriti prathamaṃ prayojanavattvānavagamāt |
sthaṇḍilaniṣpatyarthasyopadhānakarmaṇo 'rthakarmatve 'pi sthaṇḍilanirvartakatvādupadhānaṃ prati caroḥ prādhānyāddvitīyopapattirityāha—arthakarmaṇyapīti | vastutastu-carusaṃskārakamevopadhānam | na ceyaṃ pratipattiḥ | prāyaṇīyaniṣkāse upayuktasaṃskārāpekṣayopayokṣyamāṇasaṃskārabalīyastvasya sthāpitatvāt | ataḥ saṃskāravidhyanyathānupapattyā ‘adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīte itivaccaroḥ sāmarthyādyāgāṅgabhūtāgnidhāraṇārthasthaṇḍilaniṣpattyarthatayā viniyogakalpanāddvitīyā sūpapannaiveti |arthakarmaṇyapi copadhānaṃ prati prādhānyamasti, tenāsaṃskṛtasthalaṃ na nirvartayatīti dvitīyānirdeśāvirodhaḥ |

nīvārasaṃbaddhaḥ san bṛhaspatiścarāvanumātavyaḥ | tathā vākyaśeṣastho vidhyuddeśamanākāṅkṣitadevatāsaṃbandhaṃ netavyaḥ | taddhitacaturthīmantravarṇādibhiśca vinā kathamapi devatātvaṃ kalpanīyam | yāgādyanumānakleśaśca sthita eva | tasmādupadhānārthatvameva yuktamiti |
yeṣāṃ
yeṣāṃ ceti—anena ca bhāṣye bārhaspatyā nīvārā ityevaṃvidhavākyaśe ṣagrahaṇaṃ, bārhaspatyo bhavatīti taittirīyavākyasyāpi śākhāntarīyavākyasamānārthakatayā praśaṃsārthatvameve tyevaṃvidhatātparyeṇetyuktaṃ bhavati | ca ‘bārhaspatyo bhavati’ iti carusamānādhikaraṇena taddhitena vākyaśeṣe devatāśrayaṇaṃ teṣāmapi prathamamupadhānārthatve vidhyuddeśātsiddhe 'nākāṅkṣitatvāddevatā vidhātumaśakyeti vartamānāpadeśānurodhena yādṛśaṃ vayamasya bārhaspatyatvaṃ vartamānaṃ paśyāmastādṛśamevaitatpraśaṃsārthaṃ kīrtitamityavagamādya eva śākhāntarīyasya vacanasya ‘bṛhaspatervā etadannam’ ityetasyārthaḥ sa eva tai. sa. ( 5-6-2 ) |‘bārhaspatyo bhavati’ ityasyāpi taittirīyavacanasya niścīyate, tasmādeṣo 'pi na yajimadvacana iti yāvaduktatvasiddhiḥ || 18 ||

etenaivādhikāreṇotsṛjatirapi yajimadabhidhāno na veti vicāryate | ‘tvāṣṭraṃ pātnīvatamālabhate’ ityevaṃ yāgaṃ vidhāya punarāmnāyate ‘paṃryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatamutsṛjanti’ iti | tatra guṇavidhiruta karmāntaramiti vacanavyaktidvayapratibhānena saṃdehe sati vāyavyaścetālambhavadeva vidhiśakterdravyadevatāsaṃbandhaviṣayatvena karmāntaratvam | kiṃ ca |

yadi hyatrāpi pūrvavadevobhe viśeṣaṇe śrūyeyātāṃ tatastadeva karmeti vijñāyeta | na tvatra mahe
ndrasyevendrapragāthe kaścidapi pratyabhijñānaleśo 'stīti devatāntarasaṃyogādapi vājinayāgavadbhidyate | pātnīvatoddeśena cotsṛjyamānārthe vidhīyamāne paryagnikaraṇāvasthāviśeṣaṇādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | vyavahitakalpanayā cotsṛjatiḥ saṃbadhyeta | prāpta eva ca tasyotpattivākyenotsarga iti vyarthā punaḥśrutirbhavet | na ca paryagnikaraṇavidhānenātrārthaḥ | tasyāti deśenaiva prāptatvāt | na ca kevalapātnīvatatāvidhirvaikalpikaḥ śakya āśrayitum | utpattivākyaśiṣṭatvavirodhāt | na ca prākṛtakḷptopakārakevalaparyagnikaraṇapunaḥśrutyā gṛhamedhīyavadapūrvatā śakyā darśayitum | siddhavadupasarjanībhūtaparyagnikaraṇanirdeśāt | na ca paryagnikaraṇaśabdastadantāyā aṅgarītervācakaḥ | yena tanmātragrahaṇāśrayaṇāduttarakarmāvacchedo vijñāyate | na cāsau kālasya vaktā, yena paryagnikaraṇakāla evotsṛjatīti kalpyeta | na ca lakṣaṇāśrayaṇaheturasti | śrutyā 'pi vākyasamavāyopapatteḥ | sarvāṅgeṣu codakaprāpteṣu vacanāntareṇāniṣiddheṣu paryagnikaraṇavelāyāṃ samasteṣvanuṣṭhīyamāneṣu satsu naiva jñāyate kiṃ kriyatāmiti | sarvakaraṇe kālalopāttatkālakaraṇe cāṅgāntaralopāt | etenāvasthāvidhiḥ pratyuktaḥ | codakenaiva tāvat, paryagnikaraṇāvastha utsṛjyata iti prāpitam | athottarāvasthāparisaṃkhyocyate | tatra tridoṣatvamuktameva | tasmānna pūrvakarmaṇi kiṃcidvidheyamasya vākyasyeti karmāntarameva dravyadevatāsaṃyuktaṃ, devatāguṇasāmānyena ca pūrvaprakṛtikamagnīṣomīyaprakṛtikameva vā vidhīyata iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

pātnīvataśabdastāvanmanotāyāmivāgniśabdaḥ
agniśabda iti—dvidevatyāgnīṣomīya paśuyāgaprakaraṇe śrūyamāṇāyāṃ ‘tvaṃ hyagne grathamo manotā’ ityasyāmṛci yathā 'gniśabdenāgnīṣomāvucyete tadvadityarthaḥ | satyapyubhayaviśiṣṭatve śaknoti prakṛtaṃ yāgaṃ vaktuṃ ‘paryagnikṛtamutsṛjati’ iti prakaraṇāttasyaiva guṇavidhirvijñāyate | nanu ca sarve guṇavidhiprakārā nirākṛtāḥ | satyaṃ śeṣā nirākṛtāḥ | paryagnikaraṇāntāṅgarīti
pakṣastu na nirākriyate | yadyapyeṣa śabda
iḍāntādivaditi—‘iḍāntā ' 'tithyā saṃtiṣṭhate’ ityatra śrūyamāṇa iti śeṣaḥ |iḍāntādivattadantatvaṃ na bravīti tathā 'pi gamayituṃ śaknoti | na hi nirvṛttaparyagnikaraṇatā pūrvāṅgeṣvakṛteṣu saṃbhavati | tasmāttadupādānādevānuktā 'pi tadantatā 'vagamyate | kathaṃbhāvāpekṣī ca tvāṣṭraprayogavacanaḥ prakṛtau dṛṣṭasāmarthyaparyagnikaraṇāntāṅgakalāpasyātikramakāraṇābhāvānna prakṛtisthāni sarvāṇyaṅgānyapekṣate | tataścaitāvantyevāsyāṅgānītyavadhāraṇātsvarūpaprāptimātrasya ca codakenāpi siddheruttarāṅgāvacchedārthamevedaṃ vākyamiti phalena vyapadiśyate | tenocyate pūrvatvādavaccheda iti | evaṃ ca sati yāgāntarāpūrvāntarānumānādikleśo na bhavatīti | na ca parapadasaṃbandhavidhānaviprakarṣaḥ | paryagnikaraṇāntaviśiṣṭe tūtsarge vidhīyamāne yadyapyutsargasvarūpaṃ prāptameva tathā 'pi taduddeśenāṅgakalāpavidhānādanatyantaviprakarṣātsa eva vidheyatvenoktaḥ | tvatpakṣe tu ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ ityādiṣviva dhātoratyantapārārthyaṃ syāt | tasmādapyakarmāntaratvam | prakaraṇādeva ca paryagnikaraṇāntāṅgagrahaṇasiddheḥ pātnīvatagrahaṇaṃ nityānuvādatvādatantramiti
viśiṣṭānuvādeti—paryagnikaraṇāvasthāviśiṣṭapātnīvatānuvādalakṣaṇasya pātnīvatatvarūpeṇa caikadeśena, tvāṣṭrapātnīvatavyapadeśopālambhasya parihāra iti samāsārthaḥ |viśiṣṭānuvādaikadeśavyapadeśopālambhaparihāraḥ | tasmādguṇavidhiriti siddham || 19 ||
anārabhyādhītayoraṃśvadābhyagrahayorālambhādivat tredhā saṃdehaḥ | tadvadeva ca pakṣadvayaṃ nirākṛtya yajimatī codaneti pratijñāyate | kiṃ ca |

na hyetannāmadheyaṃ prakṛtau kasyacitprasiddhaṃ yasya punaḥśrutisāmarthyāddvirabhyāsaḥ kriyate | tasmādga़ṛhṇāticodanāsāmānyena jyotiṣṭomaprakṛtirekāho 'yaṃ codyata iti manyāmahe | na ca vatsālambhatulyatvam | ekatra yajateḥ pratyakṣatvādanyatra cāvyabhicāriṇyā saṃjñayā 'nyatve kalpite gṛhṇātinā samastajyotiṣṭomadharmaprāpterdravyadevatāsaṃbandhasiddhiḥ | ato yāgāntaratvamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

lg.l: grahaṇaṃ nāmadheyaṃ ca kevalaṃ yatra gamyate |

div.p:
devatā tāvaddūrabhraṣṭaiva | yad gṛhyamāṇaṃ dravyaṃ tadapi na kenacidupāttam | na hi jātyā guṇena ca vinā dravyamupalakṣayituṃ śakyam | na ca yāge 'navadhārite jyotiṣṭomavadbhāvo 'sti | yena somagrahaṇametaditi vijñāyate | na ca gṛhṇātirjyotiṣṭomaṃ na vyabhicarati | upādānamātravacanatvāt | na caite yāganāmanī, yena taṃ bhindyātāṃ, grahaṇasāmānādhikaraṇyāddhi tannāmatvamanayoḥ | iṣyata evāsmābhiratragrahaṇabhedaḥ | na ca tāvatā yāgāntaratvaṃ bhavati | dravyadevatāsaṃyoge 'pi caivaṃjātīyakānāṃ yajimattvaṃ nirākṛ
tam, ( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 6 sū. 18 ) |‘acodakāśca saṃskārāḥ’ iti | atra punastadapi na vidyate | yo 'pyadābhyavākye yajatiḥ so 'pi revatīvāravantīyapūrvapakṣanyāyena
gṛhītvāśabdārthe saṃkrātā vidhiśaktiryasya pratyayasyeti samāsārthaḥ |saṃkrāntavidhiśaktinā pratyayena vidhīyate | tasmādyāgamanūdya grahaṇavidhānamevaitat | aṃśoḥ kathaṃ yāgasaṃbandha iti cet | gṛhṇātisāmānyopasthitena jyotiṣṭomeneti kecit | astyeva tvanayostaittirīyāṇāṃ jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe punaḥ śravaṇaṃ tadanyatra prayojanatvātkarmaviniyogaṃ kariṣyati | yathā sāptadaśyasyānārabhyavādena sāmidhenīsaṃbandhitayotpatteḥ | prākaraṇikaiśca vacanairviniyogādarthavattvamevamihāpi draṣṭavyam | tena ( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 5 sū. 12 ) |‘saṃskāraścāprakaraṇe 'karmaśabdatvāt’ ityayameva pakṣaḥ || 20 ||

‘agniṃ cinute’ ityatrāpi tredhaiva saṃdehaḥ | kimapūrvayāgavidhiruta cayanamātravidhānamuta prakṛtivikṛtiṣu guṇavidhānamiti | tatrāṃśvadābhyavatprakaraṇe punarasaṃkīrtanātsaṃskāramātrasya ca kevalasya prayojanāsaṃbhavātsaṃjñayaiva kratvantaraṃ kalpyate | tathā ca phalaśravaṇam ‘ṛdhnotyeva’ iti | na ca guṇātphalamiti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ, prakṛtāśrayānupapatteḥ | tathā caikāntikasomayāgacihnānyupasadādīnyubhayatra saṃbaddhāni śrūyante | tathemāni vacanāni ‘athāto 'gnimagniṣṭomenaivānuyajati’ iti | tatra ‘agniṃ yajati’ iti ‘samidho
yajati’ itivat ( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 3 sū. 4 ) |‘tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram’ ityevaṃ siddhanāmadheyaviśiṣṭayāgavidhānaṃ vijñāyate | tasyaiva cāgniṣṭomādisaṃsthatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam | dvirātrādayaśca kālaviśeṣā vikalpyante | athavā saṃsthāvidhipare vākye yajatyanuvāda evamavakalpate yadyutpattivākye cinotiryajatimadvavacanastasmāduttarakāladṛṣṭena yajatisāmānādhikaraṇyenā ' 'dāvevāgniśabdaḥ kratunāmadheyamiti niścīyate | anuśabdaśca ya etenāniṣṭvetyanena prāptaṃ jyotiṣṭomātpaścādbhāvamanuvadati | yadvā 'gnimagniṣṭomādisaṃsthairyāgairanuyajatītyukte yadyagniryāga evamasāvanuyaṣṭuṃ śakyate | sarvatra hi tulyarūpāṇāṃ tulyadharmaṇāṃ vibhāge paurvāparyaṃ bhavati | tadyathā devadattamanugacchatīti | yadi devadatto 'pi gacchatyevamanugamanamavakalpate | tathā 'nuyajanamapi | tasmācchrutānumitetikartavyatāvatkratuvidhānametaditi | paścime tu vyākhyāne 'gniṣṭomādibhyaḥ paścātkriyamāṇo 'yaṃ tadaṅgameva bhavatīti phalaśrutirarthavādaḥ syāt | pūrvatra tu svatantratvāt ( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 6 sū. 18 ) |‘phalamātreyo nirdeśāt’ iti phalavidhitvātpuruṣārthamiti viśeṣaḥ || 21 ||

na hyagniśabda udbhidādivadyaugikaḥ | nāpi vākyabhedatatprakhyatadvyapadeśairyukto, yena karmanāmadheyatvaṃ vijñāyate | yattu tatprakhyamastītyuktaṃ, bhavettadyadi, kratvaṅgatvenāgnirvidhīyate, sa tu prāptakratvaṅgabhāva eva cayanasaṃskāratayā śrūyate | na ca tādrūpyeṇa kutaścitprāpta iti tatprakhyānyaśāstrāntarābhāvaḥ | tasmāddravyamevāgniriti | katamaddravyamiti—cayanasānādhikaraṇyavirodhābhiprāyeṇa praśnaḥ | siddhāntavādī tu ‘vrīhīnavahanti’ itivadvaiyadhikaraṇyenaiva saṃskāryasaṃskārasaṃbandhopapatteravirodhaṃ matvā ' 'ha—yadetajjvalana iti | tasmāda
gniśabdasya prasiddhārthagrāhitvāccinoteśca yāgābhidhānāśakterdravyadevatābhāvāccāgniṃ cayanena saṃskarotītyetāvāneva codanārtho 'vadhāryate | tathā ca dvitīyā samarthitā bhavati | karma nāmadheyatve tvagnihotravatkleśaḥ syāt | anuyajatīti śabdaḥ kathamiti cet | ucyate |

yadi hyayamagniśabdaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ syāttato duḥkhaṃ nīyeta | yadi vaiṣā karmaṇi dvitīyā syāt | ayaṃ tu vyadhikaraṇaḥ, karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā | atrāyamartho 'gnicayanamanvagniṣṭomādimiryaṣṭavyamiti | agniśabdaśca sāmānyavacano 'pi sannatra prakaraṇavaśāccayanasaṃkṛte vahnau pravartate | cayanasaṃskārottarakālaṃ yaṣṭavyamityarthaḥ | tena kratvaṅgabhāvopanayanārthatvenaivaitāni vacanāni | codakenaiva prāptānāṃ vikṛtiṣu punaḥśrutiḥ kimartheti cet | daśame vakṣyate ( a. 10 pā. 8 a. 11 sū. 27 ) |‘grahaṇaṃ samānavidhānaṃ syāt’ iti | na cāvaśyaṃ tulyajātīyayoreva paurvāparyaṃ bhavati | atulyajātīyayorapi paurvāparyaṃ bhavati | tathā pākamanubhuṅkta ityavirodhopapatteḥ | yattu devadatto yajñadattamanugacchatītyetattulyakarmatvaṃ gamyata iti | yuktaṃ tatra kartṛmātropādāne sati kriyāntarānupādānāt | iha punaragnisaṃskāropāttaṃ cayanakarmaiva vidyata ityasamānam || 22 ||

‘agneḥ stotram’ ityādiṣvagatyā ' 'śrayaṇaṃ jvalanena saṃbaddhaṃ sthalaṃ lakṣyate nāpi tadvānkratuḥ | na caikatra lakṣaṇāśrayaṇamiti sarvatraiva sā ' 'śrayitavyeti | tasmātsatyāṃ gatau dravyavacanatvameva yuktam | yastvatraivādhikaraṇe bhāṣyakārāntareṇāgneḥ phalavadaphalatvaprākṛtavaikṛtatvanityānityatvottaravedivikārāvikāratvavicāraḥ kṛtaḥ sa udāharaṇā
ntareṣvadhikaraṇāntarasiddha ihāsaṃbaddho 'pi smaraṇamātradarpeṇopanyasta ityupekṣitavyaḥ | tasmānnaivaṃjātīyako guṇo bhedaka iti siddham || 23 ||

gataṃ guṇalakṣaṇabhedaprasaktānuprasaktaṃ kīdṛśo guṇaḥ pūrvatrāsaṃbhavan bhinatti kīdṛśo vā tatraiva saṃbhavatīti | idānīṃ paryavasiteṣu pañcasu bhedakāraṇeṣu prakaraṇāntaralakṣaṇo bhedaḥ prastūyate | tatra tāvat |

yathaiva valabhyāṃ pāṭaliputre vā 'gnihotrādiśabda uccāryamāṇo nārthāntaraṃ pratipādayati, evaṃ prakaraṇāntare 'pi | na hi prakaraṇāntaraṃ tasyārthābhidhānaśaktimabhivyanakti | tadviśeṣitāśca yajatijuhotyādayo 'pi nārthāntare vartante | nārthāntareṇa vinā kiṃcidanarthakaṃ bhavati | na ca prāptavidhānaṃ teṣu na saṃbhavati | yāvajjīvādividhibhiḥ saha tulyabalatvena vikalpopapatteḥ | yo vai teṣāṃ kāmyaprayogastasyānavagatakālaviśeṣatvānmāsaparimāṇavidhānamityadoṣaḥ | prakaraṇasya ca vākyaṃ bādhakamiṣṭameva | atha vā dīkṣitatvānimittena pratiṣiddhānāmapi māsaparimitaḥ pratiprasavaḥ | sa tu prayogamadhya eva kriyate | atha vā tānyevāgnihotrādīni atra paryupasthāpya somayāgasahitāni satraprayogavacanena phale vidhīyante | na hi kevalabhojī devadatto 'nyaiḥ saha paṅktyāṃ bhuñjāno 'nyatvaṃ pratipadyate | na ca phalāntarasaṃbandhaḥ karmāntaratvena vinā na ghaṭata ityuktamaveṣṭyadhikaraṇe( a.2 pā. 3 a.2 ) | | na
cāvaśyamaṅgaireva kratvantaraṃ gantavyam | pradhānamapi hi aparipūrṇe karaṇāṃśe svaśabdena
svaśabdeneti—upadeśenetyarthaḥ | evaṃ ca ‘karmaṇastvapravṛttitvāt’ ityāṣṭamikanyāyena karaṇāṃśasyānatideśe 'pi upadeśataḥ prāptirna viruddhetyāśayaḥ sūcitaḥ | vidhīyamānaṃ na virudhyate | tasmādevamapi tānyevāgnihotrādīnīti prāpta ucyate |

yadi hi māsaḥ śuddho vidhīyeta tataḥ pūrvakarmānuvāde buddhirbhavedapi na tvetadasti | upasaduttarakālatvena śravaṇādvidyamānābhirupasadbhiḥ śakyaḥ kālo lakṣayitum | na ca naiyamike tāḥ svārthāḥ parārthā vā vidyante | yadi tu tāstaduttarakālatvaṃ māsaśca vidhīyeran, evaṃ sati anekārthavidhānādvākyabhedaḥ syāt | etasmādeva hetordīkṣitadānahomapākapratiṣedhena pratiṣiddhasya pratiprasavarūpeṇa vā satraikadeśatvena vā 'yaṃ vidhiḥ pratyuktaḥ | tatrāpi hyupasaduttarakālatvaṃ māsaścetyanekārthatvameva | karmāntaravidhāne tvenakārthatvamadoṣaḥ | tasmātkarmāntaramiti bhāṣyakāraḥ | idaṃ tviha vaktavyam | yadi vākyabhedaprasaṅgātkarmāntaratvamevaṃ tarhi sa eva bhedahetuḥ prāpnoti na prakaraṇāntaram | athavā guṇādevānekātmakatvena pūrvatrāsaṃbhavādbheda iti prakaraṇāntarānavakāśaḥ | tathā hi |
kiṃ ca |

‘māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajate’ ityādiṣu hi kevalamāsasaṃbandhavidhānānna vākyabhedaḥ prāpnotīti akarmāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatraitatsyāt | ihāpyupasadbhiścaritvetyanuṣaṅgādagnihotratulyatvamiti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

tatrānuṣaṅgo yukto yatra tena vinā na kiṃciduktaṃ bhavati | yathā 'traiva ‘māsaṃ vaiśvadevena’ ityādiṣu yāvadyajata iti nānuṣajjyate tāvanna kiṃciduktamityavaśyamanuṣaktavyam | iha punardarśapūrṇamāsādivākyāni tāvatsvapadaireva nirākāṅkṣībhūtāni | ‘upasadbhiścaritvā’ ityayamapi pūrvatraiva caritārthatvānna kiṃcidapekṣate | tatra na kaścidapi heturasti yenānuṣajjyeta | yastu vākyabhedaprasaktyarthamevānuṣaṅgāmicchetkuryādapi saḥ | tatra tu punaḥ punaścaritvetyasya vidhānādyāvadanuṣaṅgamupasadāmanuṣṭhānaṃ prāpnoti | aniṣṭaṃ caitat, vedābhyanujñānābhāvāt | athāgnihotrasyaiva purastātkṛtābhiḥ sarvānuṣaṅgārthasaṃpādanamityucyeta | tathā sati śabdoccāraṇamapyevamevāvasthitamagnihotrādīnāṃ pāṭhakramānurodhenopakariṣyatīti nārtho 'nuṣaṅgeṇa | tasmānnaitadvyākhyānamupapadyata iti evaṃ varṇanīyam |

iha tāvannaiva prakaraṇāntarasadbhāvādbhedo 'vagamyate | kiṃ tarhi | pūrvaprakaraṇavicchedāt | aviparivartamāne hi pūrvakarmaṇi kenāpi prakāreṇottarasya bhedaḥ pratīyate | na tu prakaraṇāntaraṃ sadapi kiṃcidupakaroti | tathā ca ( a. 2 pā. 3 sū. 25 ) |‘phalaṃ cākarmasaṃnidhau’ ityatra vakṣyāmaḥ | sarvatra ca vicchinnaprakaraṇasya karmaṇaḥ saṃbandhi dviprakāraṃ śrūyate | upādeyamanupādeyaṃ ca | tatra yadupādeyaṃ yathā ' 'havanīyapratipadādi
pratipaditi—stotrīyādyā ṛg ityarthaḥ | tatpradeśāntarasthoddeśenāpi śakyaṃ vidhātum | yattvanupādeyaṃ deśakālanimittaphalasaṃskāryātmakaṃ tasya pradeśāntarāvasthitasya karma prati vidhyaśaktereṣā vacanavyaktirbhavati tatraiva karma kartavyāmiti | paroddeśena ca karma vidhīyamānaṃ yadyanyena tadrūpameva vākyenopasthāpyate tatastadevetyakarmāntarabuddhirbhavati | atha tvīṣadapi tirodhānānnopatiṣṭheta tataḥ paraṃ vidhīyamānatvenaiva vihitādanyatvabuddhiḥ sthitā na śakyā 'panetumiti karmāntaratvaṃ bhavati | evaṃ hi sa vidhāyakastatropadiśati avidheyaṃ padārthaṃ prati mayaitatkarma vidhīyate | tacca svarūpeṇānutpannaṃ na śakyaṃ tatra vidhātumiti balādutpādyate | tadyadi kaścidevaṃvidhaṃ śaknotyutpādayituṃ tata utpādayatu, yāvadahamapyatra vidhiṃ karomi | atha notpādayati tato mayaivotpādite mā kaścityaścādāgatya mamāparādhaṃ maṃsteti | tenaivamācchoṣite yadi kaścittathāvidhamupanayati tato 'sāvapi tadeva deśādau vidhatte | atha nopanayati tataḥ sa evotpādayatyapīti nirūpyate | tadiha māsastāvaddūrasthahomānuvādena na śakyate vidhātum | na hi kaściddhomādyanurodhenādyaiva māsaṃ saṃpādayituṃ samarthastenātyantaṃ svatantramanupādeyaṃ māsameva prati homādiṣu vidhīyamāneṣu dūrasthairutpattividhibhirutpādanaśaktāvalupyamānāyāmidānīmevotpattiḥ kriyate | na cotpannasya
punaruktiḥ saṃbhavatītyapūrvavidhānaṃ vijñāyate | nanu cāgnihotrādipadenotpattisahacāriṇā tatkarmotpattāvapanīyamānāyāṃ māsasaṃbandhamātravyāpṛto 'yaṃ vidhirutpādakatvādvihanyeta |
yatra vākyāntaragatamapi saṃnidhānamātrādeva pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ na bhidyate tatra svavākyagatena nāmnopanīyamānaṃ na pratyabhijñāsyata iti kuta etat | ucyate |

saṃnidhānena hi yādṛgeva deśādivākyeṣu karmāvagamyate tādṛgevopatiṣṭhata iti na bhidyate |
nāmadheyaṃ punariti—ayamāśayaḥ | nāmnaḥ pūrvakarmopasthāpakatvasya pūrvakarmavācitvanimittakatvādākhyātasya ca pūrvakarmaviṣayatvaṃ vinā tatparatantrasya nāmnaḥ pūrvakarmavācitvānavadhāraṇātpūrvakarmopasthāpakatvānupapatternotpattipratibandhakatvamiti |nāmadheyaṃ punarāditastāvadākhyātaparatantrātvānnaiva bhedābhedayorvyāpriyate | tasmiṃścā ' 'khyātapravṛttipratīkṣiṇi avasthite ‘māsaṃ juhoti’ ‘māsaṃ yajate’ iti juhotiyajatipadamātrasaṃgatāvālocyamānāyāmanyasya juhotyādeḥ svavākyasvaprakaraṇeṣu aviparivartamānatvādapratyabhijñānam | kiṃ ca |

sāmānādhikaraṇyena hi sarvanāmadheyāni dhātvarthānāṃ nāmadheyatvenāvasthitāni na bhāvanāyāḥ | tena bhāvanānyatvānanyatvaparīkṣāvelāyāṃ satyapi dhātvarthaikatve bhāvanā tāvadananyapramāṇatvādākhyātapratyayāntareṇānupanīyamānā na kathaṃcitpratyabhijñāyata ityupapannaṃ prayojanānyatvam | athavā |

lg.l:
dhātvartho 'pi yathā ' 'khyāte 'sattvabhūtaḥ
asattvabhūta iti—subupāttaliṅgasaṃkhyānvayāyogyabhūta ityarthaḥ | pratīyate |

div.p:
asattvabhūto hi dhātvartho 'tra juhotinā vidherupanīyate | na ca tādṛśasyaiva dravyabhūtaliṅgasaṃkhyāyogyārthābhidhāyibhiragnihotrādipadairabhidhīyamānatvamityapratyabhijñānātso 'pi bhidyate | yatra tu prakaraṇāntare 'pi tathābhūto
tathābhūta iti—asattvabhūta ityarthaḥ | nopādāsyate bhāvanā vā tāvadanuraktātmanā
anuraktātmaneti—asattvabhūtadhātvarthānuraktātmanetyarthaḥ | na
vivakṣyate tatra tadeva karmaikena vacanena paryupasthāpyāpareṇa phale vidhīyata ityavagamātkāmamakarmāntaraṃ bhavatu | tadyathā ‘atirātraścaturvaṃśaḥ’ ‘prāyaṇīyamahaḥ’ ‘catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ’ ‘pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ’ ityādiṣu | yathā ca varuṇapraghāseṣu ‘avabhṛthaṃ yanti’ iti | yadā tu prakaraṇāntaragataphalādisaṃbaddhaṃ vidhitvamutpattimapi saṃspṛśya yāvadbalīyasyotpattividhiviparivṛttyā viprakarṣādanivāryamāṇaṃ bhinattīti niścīyate tadaivamādiṣvapi bheda evetyavagamyate | paramārthena tu—

lg.l:
nāmnā hi tadupādānamāsa
āsanopāyicodita iti—āsīran, upeyurityādicodanācodite satrādikarmaṇītyarthaḥ |nopāyicodite ||

div.p: nāmavilakṣaṇadhātuśravaṇe hi tadarthabhedo bhavati | satre tu yajyaśravaṇānnāmamātropanītaprakṛtayāgapratyabhijñānāttadbhāvanāmātrabhedaḥ | tasmātsādhūktaṃ prakaraṇāntare prayojanānyatvamiti | bhāṣyakāra upasadbhiścaritveti tallakṣitakālamevānupādeyarūpaṃ bhedahetutvena darśayatīti draṣṭavyam | athocyeta—upasado 'pi vidhīyanta ityādi cābhyāsādhikaraṇavadabhyupetyavādena samarthayitavyam || 24 ||

evaṃ ṣaḍapi bhedahetavaḥ paryavasitāḥ | saṃprati prakaraṇāntarasyaiva prakārāntarapradarśanaṃ kriyate | yo nāma prakaraṇāntarakṛtameva kālasaṃbandhakṛtaṃ vā bhedaṃ manyate nāsaṃnidhānānupādeyavastusaṃbandhamātrakṛtaṃ taṃ prati vispaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ ‘phalaṃ cākarmasaṃnidhau’ ityārabhyate | tattvametatsaptamaṃ bhedādhikaraṇam | tatra deśanimittayoranupādeyatvaṃ sujñānamiti pūrvādhikaraṇe siddhatvādihānudāharaṇam | pūrvatraiva tvevamādi darśayitavyam tadyathā—‘satrāyā ' 'gūrya viśvajitā yajeta’ ‘sāmyutthāne viśvajit’ ityādini nimitte |
deśe 'pi ‘dakṣiṇena tīreṇa sarasvatyā āgneyenāṣṭākapālena’ ‘śamyāparāsamīyāt’ ityādīni | yadyapyatrātirātrādivadeva yajyaśravaṇaṃ tathā 'pi prāgyajyanumānāttaddhitāntapadayuktavākyāparisamāptervākyāntarasyānapekṣaṇātkarmāntaratvam | phalasaṃskāryayostu tulyahetutvādiha vicāraḥ | tatra phalamudāhṛtameva | saṃskāryamapyudāhartavyaṃ ‘traidhātavīyā dīkṣaṇīyā’ iti | yajamānasaṃskārārthatvenopādānāt | anārabhya kiṃciditi—prakaraṇāntarāvarodhābhāvajñāpanārtham | tatra yāgoddeśenā ' 'havanīyādivatphalaṃ
āhavanīyādivaditi—‘yadāhavanīye juhoti’ ityatreti śeṣaḥ | vidheyam | śakyaṃ hi tatpuruṣeṇa darśapūrṇamāsasthenāpi kāmayitumiti matvā ' 'ha—prākṛteṣu phalavidhiriti | siddhāntavādī tu svargakāmādhikaraṇāsiddhaṃ ( a. 6 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 3 ) |‘pratyarthaṃ tābhisaṃyogāt’ iti phaloddeśyatvaṃ matvā vadati na śakyate phalaṃ vidhātumiti | vidhīyamānaṃ kriyāṅgatvādaphalameva prāpnoti | kriyā 'pi vā vidhīyamānā tādarthyaṃ pratipadyamānā niṣphalaiva syāt | na cobhayoruddiśyamānayorupādīyamānayorvā saṃbandho 'stītyekāntena phalamuddiśya karma vidhātavyam | tataśca pūrvavadeva siddho bhedaḥ | etena saṃskāryamapi vyācakṣīta | kiṃ ca |
tasmātkarmāntarāṇīti siddham || 25||

sarveṣāmevāsaṃnidhyaṃśapratyudāharaṇārthamidamārabhyate | phalagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanamātram | sarvāṇi tu deśādīnyapyuhartavyānīti | ‘same darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta’ ‘paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta’ ‘yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta’ ‘darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta’ ‘śeṣātsviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajati’ iti | sarvatra pūrvādhikaraṇena deśādīni prati vidhīyamānatvātkarmāntaratvaṃ prāptam | āha ca |

anūdyamānāni tvekāntenoddeṣṭavyāni karmāṇi | na coddeśyānāmuddeśyaiḥ saṃbandho 'vakalpate | deśādyuddeśena tu vidhīyamānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ svarūpānuvādakalpanaṃ yugapadvidhyanuvādadoṣādayuktam | tasmātkarmāntarāṇīti prāpte 'bhidhīyate—
agatyā hi tenaivotpattistenaiva ca viniyogaḥ kriyate | satyāṃ tu gatau viniyojakasyotpattividhyarthāpattyanutpādādanyenaivotpāditānāṃ ca viparivartamānānāṃ viniyogasāmarthyamātrameva jñāyate |

yadyapi deśādīnyanupādeyasvabhāvatvāduddiśyante tathā 'pyaprāptatvātteṣāmave jñāyate vidheyatvam | upādīyamānasya ca karmaṇastādṛśasyaivānyena paryupasthāpanādanuvādatvam | asaṃnidhāne tvaparyupasthāpanādvidhirnopādānamātrādityavirodhaḥ | tasmādabhedaḥ | viparivṛttireva cehāvibhāgaśabdenoktā | viśeṣeṇa tvaveṣṭāvetacchabdapratyayāditi | prayojane tu codayanti | karmāntare 'pi kilaitacchabdakṛtātsādṛśyapratyayādāgneyādīnyeva havīṃṣīti kathamanyahaviṣko
yāga iti | tattvacodyam | jyotirādivadetacchabdasya prastūyamānamukhyārthopapattau satyāṃ sādṛśyalakṣaṇānupapatteḥ | tasmātsuṣṭhūktaṃ karmāntare 'nyahaviṣko yāga iti | evamuktāni sāpavādāni ṣaṭ bhedakāraṇāni | vṛttyantare tu catvāryeva bhedakāraṇāni śabdāntarasaṃjñāguṇaphalānyudāhṛtāni | punaḥśrutisaṃkhyayoḥ śabdāntara evāntarbhāvātprakaraṇāntarasya ca phalādyanugrahamātrārthatvāt | tattvayuktamiva dṛśyate | na hi pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiḥ śabdāntaratvaṃ pratipadyate | nāpyekaśeṣeṇa tantroccāritāḥ saptadaśa prājāpatyaśabdāḥ saṃbhavanti | śabdaikatvapratyabhijñānāt | tathā coktam ( a. 1 pā. 1 sū. 15 ) |‘ādityavadyaugapadyam’ iti | ( a. 1 pā. 1 sū. 20 ) |‘saṃkhyābhāvāt’ iti ca | vakṣyati caivaṃjātīyakānāmekatvam ( a. 6 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 12 ) |‘api vā 'vyatirekādrūpaśabdāvibhāgādvā’ iti | tasmādaikaśabdye satyeva kāraṇāntarādbhedamapaśyataḥ śabdāntarakalpanaṃ tatrabhavato bhāṣyāntarakṛtaḥ | prakaraṇāntaratvācca vinā phalādīnāṃ bhedakatvamuktamapi na dṛṣṭaṃ ‘saṃnidhau tvavibhāgāt’ ( a. 2 pā. a. 5 sū. 16 ) |‘tatsaṃnidherguṇārthena punaḥśrutiḥ’ ityādau | tena pratyabhijñānanimittatvātphalādyanugṛhītaṃ prakaraṇāntarameva bhedakāraṇaṃ bhavedapyupekṣitam | phalaṃ ca prakaraṇāntarāntarbhūtatvena na nirīkṣitam | yadapi ( a. 2 pā.4 a.2 sū. 9 ) |‘ekaṃ vā saṃyogarūpacodanākhyāviśeṣāt’ ityekatve hetuviparyayacatuṣṭayamasya jñāpakamityuktam | tadapi prastute 'dhikaraṇe 'nyeṣāmasaṃbhavāditi nā ' 'locitam | tasmādyathoktāḥ ṣaḍeva bhedahetavaḥ | tatrāpi tu siddhānte saṃjñāśabdāntarayorguṇasaṃkhyayośca bhedo vaktavyaḥ sannokta ityabhidhiyate |
saṃjñā hi dravyarūpāpannāmapi kriyāmabhidadhānā vicchedamātrādbhinatti | saṃkhyā 'pi yugapadanekotpadyamānasamavetā pūrvāsaṃbhavadguṇāntarādbhidyata iti || 26 ||

‘āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavati’ iti śrūyate | kiṃ ya evāsāvubhayatrāpyacyutastasyaivaiṣā punaḥśrutiḥ kenāpi prayojanenātha karmāntaramiti saṃdehaḥ | tatra ‘saṃnidhau tvavibhāgāt’ iti satyapyanupādeyāmamāvāsyāṃ pratyupādāne tadeva karmeti siddhānte prāpte 'bhidhīyate |
prayogadvitvadvāreṇa ca karmadvitvapratijñānamevaitaddraṣṭavyamiti || 27 ||

tatra pakṣāntaramāha—avibhāgāttu karmaṇo dviruktena vidhīyata iti | yuktaṃ samidādiṣu pratyakṣayāgapunaḥśruterbhedakatvamiha tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhādasāvanumātavyaḥ | tacca dravyadevatamabhinnamupalabhyamānaṃ pūrvasaṃbandhānubhavavaśādekāntena tameva yāgaṃ bodhayati | dravyadevatamapyanyaditi cenna | avibhāgapratyayopalambhāt | yadi tu vyaktikṛto bheda āśrīyate sa prayogāntare tasyāpyāgneyasyāviśiṣṭaḥ | tasmādvaikalpikena vacanadvayenāmāvāsyāyāmāgneyavidhānam | athavā yugapatpravṛtteḥ ( a. 6 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 2 ) |‘yathā syātsattvadarśanam’ ityanena nyāyena tadeva karma, ekenetareṇa ca pratipādyate | na ca gamyate viśeṣaḥ katareṇa pratipādyate kataratpaunaruktyādanarthakamiti | kāmaṃ bhavatvānarthakyaṃ, tadeva hi yuktyā 'nviṣyamāṇamihopapannataraṃ
bhavennārthāntaravacanatvaṃ, śabdārthānityatvaprasaṅgāt | tasmātsakṛdeva prayoga iti | sarvaṃ tvidamabhyāsādhikaraṇe nirākṛtamapi saduttarasūtradarpeṇa viśrabdhamabhidhīyate na tu paramārthenā ' 'narthakyābhyupagamaṃ vedaḥ kṣamate || 28 ||

sarvathā punaḥśrutiprayojaneṣvatrānviṣyamāṇeṣu guṇasyāśravaṇātparisaṃkhyāyāśca tridoṣatvādarthavādārthatve 'bhyupagate kasyārthavāda iti vivicyāsaṃkīrtanānnūnamāgneyasyaiveti matvā vadati—sārthavādakena vihite kiṃ pradeśāntarasthenaikavākyatāmanāgacchatā 'rthavādeneti | vidhiśeṣatvaṃ hyarthavādānāmavasthitam | paricodanā tu pūrvapakṣābhiprāyeṇa kṛtā | tatra yathā stutā vā 'stutā vā saiva devatetyavivaraṇānna vijñāyate kiṃviṣayamiti | tattvetadatikrāntālocanena mahendrādhikaraṇe ( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 18 ) |‘guṇaścānarthakaḥ syāt’ ityatra sūtre 'bhihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭamiti dṛśyate | yathaiva hi mahattvaṃ devatānantargatamiti pakṣe kevalasyaivendrasya sādhanatvādvidhyu
vidhyuddeśe 'rthavāda iti—samāpte hi vidhivākye 'rthavādānvayopapattervidhivākyamadhye 'rthavādo 'narthaka ityāśayaḥ |ddeśe 'rthavāde 'vasthitamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti | tathaivedaṃ svatantrastutimātramiti manyate | tatrocyate |

lg.l: kartuṃ sahendreṇa punaḥ praśaṃsāṃ punaḥśrutiḥ samyagihā ' 'śriteyam || 29 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ||

div.p:
bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe 'dhvaryubrāhmaṇe vā śrūyata iti
bhāṣyakāroktāviti śeṣaḥ | nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyam | nanu kartṛdharmaḥ karmadharma iti śeṣalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādiha na saṃbadhyate | kecidāhuḥ | paryavasite lakṣaṇārthe tadīyo 'pi vicāraḥ pratyāsatteḥ kriyamāṇo na virudhyata iti | tattvayuktam | śākhāntare karmabhedavicārasyādyāpyaparyavasānāt | ata evaṃ saṃbandhanīyam | yathaiva bhedakāraṇāni karmasvarūpabhede vyāpriyante tathaiva prayogabhede 'pi | tadiha yāvajjīvaguṇasaṃyuktānāmagnihotrādīnāṃ kiṃ prayogā bhidyanta utaika evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīvakālaparimita iti | tatra yadi yāvajjīvakālaḥ karmadharmatvena vidhīyate tataḥ sāyaṃprātarvākyavaśena tatkālasamāpanamagnihotraṃ na śaknoti tāvantaṃ kālaṃ pūrayitumityarthājjyotiṣṭomavadabhyastarūpameva prayogaṃ pratipatsyate | yadi punarjīvanaṃ nimittatvenoddiśya karma vidhīyate tato yāvatkartṛbhāvini niyate nimitte vinā kāmasaṃbandhena codyamānamakaraṇe doṣaprasakteravaśyaṃ puruṣeṇa jīvatā svārthasiddhyarthamanarthaparihārāya vā kartavyamiti kartṛdharmo niyamo 'nena codito bhavatīti | tadā ca sāyaṃprātaḥkālayorjīvanasya ca saṃhatānāṃ nimittatvātpratidivasaṃ nimitte taptaryavasitaṃ karma punaḥ punaḥ kriyata iti prayogānyatvam | tena prayogabhedābhedāvevaitatphala
prayogabhedābhedaphalatvāditi pāṭhāntaram |tvādbhāṣyakāreṇopanyastāviti mantavyam | kiṃ prāptam |
ekaḥ prayogo 'bhyastarūpaḥ karmadharmo yāvajjīvakatā kālopadeśaścāyamiti | kutaḥ |

kālo hyuddiśyamānastannimittaścābhyāsaḥ karmāṅgaṃ bhavati | tataśca prakaraṇamanugṛhyate | nanu ca puruṣadharmatve 'pi tasyaiva karmaṇo jīvane vidhānānnaiva prakaraṇaṃ bādhyeta | satyamadhikāro na bādhyate kathaṃbhāvātmakaṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ kratudharmamapekṣamāṇaṃ puruṣadharme vidhīyamāne 'nyantaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati | yadyapi kālasyāpi nimittavadevānupādeyatvāttulyā vacanavyaktistathā 'pi phalataḥ kālavidhānaṃ yāgānuvādaśceti viparītaṃ kathyate | athavā jīvanaparimitakāladvāreṇābhyāsaścodayiṣyate | sa ca karmoddeśena śakyata eva vidhātumityevamupadiśyate | kartṛdharmapakṣe punarna kathaṃcitkarmoddeśaḥ | evaṃ caikaprayogatve sati dīrghasatraprayogasaṃstava upapanno bhaviṣyati | itarathā punaḥ pratidinaṃ paryavasānānna kathaṃcitsatrasārūpyaṃ bhavet | tasmātkarmadharmo 'bhyāsa iti || 1 ||
dharma ityanuvartate | tenaiṣā pratijñā kartṛdharmo 'yaṃ codyata iti | so 'pi ca niyamo na yāthākāmyam | kutaḥ |

iha hi yāvajjīvamiti yāvatkartṛbhavijīvanaṃ nimittabhūtaṃ śrutyaiva pratipāditam | juhotiyajatītyapi dhātvarthānuraktabhāvanāmātravācī pratyayāṃśaḥ śrauta eva | tadubhayamapi maptakṣe 'nugṛhyate | bhavatpakṣe tu jīvanena kālo lakṣyeta | juhotiyajatibhyāmapyabhyāsaḥ |
yatra hi vidhiḥ samāpyate sa codanārtho bhavati | bhavataśca jīvanadhātvarthaparityāgena kālābhyāsau vidhīyete | tena lakṣaṇāparyavasāyī vidhiḥ prāpnoti | tatraitatsyāt | yāvajjīvamiti yāvacchabdaḥ śrutyaiva kālaṃ bravīti | tadyathā—yāvaddohaṃ svapiti | yuktamatra kālagrahaṇam | vartamānāpadeśo hyayaṃ nātra kācinnimittāpekṣā | tena śrutivṛttaṃ dohanamatikramya kālo gṛhyate | yadi tvihāpi yāvaddohaṃ svapyādāsīta veti vidhīyeta tataḥ kena vā dohasya nimittatvaṃ vāryeta | yāvajjīvacodanāyāṃ tu na kiṃcidatikramakāraṇamasti | prāṇadhāraṇakriyāyā eva nimittatvopapatteḥ | na ca yāvacchabdaḥ kālavacanaḥ kvacitprasiddhaḥ | kriyāmeva tu samāptiparyantatvena viśinaṣṭi | kriyākālayorabhedānna lakṣaṇeti cet | atra vaiśeṣikānaparājitya parihārāyopasthātavyam | api ca satyapi kriyāṇāṃ kālatve kācidvyavasthā vidyate yato na sarvāsu kālapratipattirlokasya | tatra śeṣāḥ kriyā upalakṣaṇīkṛtya candrādityaparivartanakriyāsu kālavyahāro vyavasthitaḥ | tā evāvāntarakriyāparimāṇena pratyāsatteranyakriyāparicchedārthamupādīyamānenopalakṣyante | tathā hi |

kiyatā kālena gaurduhyata ityukte niyatānyeva muhūrtādīni paricchedakatvenopādīyante | tatparicchedaśca nāḍikālakṣaṇalavatruṭinimeṣādibhirvyāvahārikakriyāvyatiriktaireva kriyate | tadabhyāsavaśena tu vyāvahārikāṇāmapi prāyikaparimāṇajñānātparicchedakatvaṃ bhavati | na ca jīvanaṃ nāma nimeṣādivanniyataparimāṇaṃ, yena paricchedakatvasāmarthyātkālatvenā ' 'śrīyate | tasmādvyatiriktakālalakṣaṇā duṣpariharā | punaścābhyāsalakṣaṇā | katham |

anabhyastaṃ prayuñjāno yadi tāvadvitatya prayuṅkte jīvanaparimitasya kālasyāntarā kiṃcitkarmāvayavaṃ yadākadācitkurvāṇastato maraṇasyānirūpitakālatvādyadi kathaṃcidantyāyāmavasthāyāṃ samāpayenna ca mriyeta tadūne kāle samāpanādayathācoditāpattiḥ | athāsa
māpya mriyeta tathā 'pi prakrāntāsamāpanaṃ doṣaḥ syāt | na ca
sarvasvāravaditi—‘maraṇakāmo hyetena yajeta yaḥ kāmayetānāmayaḥ svargaṃ lokabhiyām’ iti vākyena vihite sarvasvārākhye karmaṇi ‘ārbhave prastūyamāna audumbarīṃ sadṛśena vāsasā pariveṣṭya brāhmaṇāḥ parisamāpayata me yajñamiti saṃpreṣyāgniṃ praviśati’ iti praiṣavidhānādyuktaṃ yajamānamaraṇānantaramapi kratusamāpanamityarthaḥ |sarvasvāravadvacanamasti | yena mṛte 'pi samāpyeta | sāyaṃprātaścodanaṃ ca yāvajjīvakāmyacodanāsamīpāmnāte satyau vinā pramāṇena kevalakāmyaviṣaye kalpanīye syātāmasminpakṣe | yadi tu tadanurodhena sakṛdeva prayujyobhayaṃ saṃbhāvitamiti manyeta | yathā ‘paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta’ iti codite tadekadeśakaraṇenāpi śāstrārthaḥ saṃbhāvyata iti na vyāpyate tathā jīvitaparicchinnakālaikadeśavartinoḥ sāyaṃprātaḥkālayoranuṣṭhānāccodanādvayamapyanuṣṭhitārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti | tatrocyate |

yadyapi tatrālpatvātkarmaṇaḥ pūrvāhṇacodanāvaśena vā paurṇamāsī na vyāpyate na kiṃcidduṣyati | sarvathā divasāntarāṇyatikramya paurṇamāsyāṃ tāvatkṛtaṃ karma tāvanmātraṃ ca śāstreṇoktaṃ na vyāptiḥ | itaratra punarjīvitavyatiriktakālāsaṃbhavādvyavacchedyaṃ na kiṃcidastīti vyāptāvasatyāṃ samastameva vākyamanarthakaṃ syāt | sāyaṃprātaścodanayorapi jīvanakālāntargateḥ siddhatvādyāvacchabdaśca samastajīvitāvadhiparigrahārtha ekadeśānuṣṭhāne bādhitaḥ syāt | ataḥ sāyaṃprātaścodanāmiśreyamabhyāsamanākṣipantī na śaknoti puruṣaṃ niyoktumityaparihāryā lakṣaṇā | nanu cārthādabhyāso jāyamānastvatpakṣavadeva na doṣaṃ janayet | tathā hi |

lg.l: sakṛdeva śruto homaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ |

div.p: atha yo 'yaṃ mama doṣaḥ sa tavāpi doṣa eva, vaktavyo vā viśeṣaḥ | ucyate |

mama jīvanasahitasāyaṃprātaḥkālopajane hi sakalaṃ karma kṛtvā nirākāṅkṣe puruṣe sati punarapi tādṛṅnimittasaṃbhavāddvitīyādiṣvahaḥsvanuṣṭhānam | tatra ca pratidinaṃ karmasamāpternābhyāsa iti śakyaṃ vaditum | tadyathā kāmye yaḥ phalabhūmārthī punaḥ punaḥ prayuṅkte na tasyābhyastarūpametatkarmetyevaṃ buddhirjāyate tathā 'treti | tava punarjīvitaparimitakālavidhānātkarmaṇo 'parisamāptasyaivaindravāyavādigrahābhyāsatulyamanuṣṭhānam | taccaitadyāvajjīvacodanākṛtamityāpannamabhyāsavidhānam | nanvarthādabhyāsa iti |
nanu vidheyatve 'pyabhyāsasya jīvanaparimitakālānvayānyathānupapattita eva pratīterdhātorabhyāsalakṣaṇāṃyāṃ pramāṇābhāva iti nanvityādinā ' 'śaṅkya śābdatvaṃ vinā 'bhyāsasya śābdavidhyanvayāyogenārthātpratītisaṃbhave 'pi dhātuvyāpārāvaśyaṃbhāvenāparihāryā lakṣaṇetyevaṃ samādadhāti—satyamityādinā |satyametattenaiva tu lakṣaṇā 'nyathā śrutireva syāt |
taditi—tasmādityarthaḥ |tadubhayataḥ śrutyanurodhena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā jīvanamuddiśya homayāgavidhānātkartṛkarmavidhirityupapannam || 2 ||

atipattiriti svadharmātikramo 'bhidhīyate | jīvanaparimitaśca darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kālaḥ | na ca tadatikramaḥ kathaṃcidapi saṃbhavati | prakrameṇa hi karmakālaṃ saṃspṛśadanatikrāntamityabhidhīyate | na ca kaścidapi pūrṇamāsayājī sannaprakramamāṇa eva jīvanamatilaṅghayati | na hyasau darśapūrṇamāsayājī syāt | atha svakālāparisamāpanamatipātanamucyeta tathā mṛtasya tadbhavatītyanarthakameva prāyaścittavidhānam | matpakṣe hi pratimāsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaprakramasamāptyorjīvane nimitte vidhānātsaṃbhavatyatikramastaduttarakālaśca prāyaścittaviṣayatvena | nanu pūrvapakṣe 'pi pratimāsamabhyāsābhyupagamāttadatikramanimittaprāyaścittavidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati | na śakyamevaṃ vaditum | yatra hi nimitte yaccoditaṃ tena tatra bhavitavyaṃ na
yatheṣṭam | iha ca paurṇamāsyamāvāsyātipattirnimittatvena śrutā, na cābhyāsastacchabdavācyaḥ | yathā na grahābhyāsaḥ kaścijjyotiṣṭomaśabdavācyaḥ | tena jīvitaparimitābhyāsasaṃyuktayoreva paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdavācyatvamiṣṭamiti nāvayavānāmatipātanaṃ nimittaṃ syāt | nanu ca paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdenātra kālo 'bhidhīyate, sa cāvayavaviṣaya evetyavayavātikramo nimittaṃ syāt | naitadevam | atipātanaṃ nāmātipadyamānasya bhavati | na ca kālasyātipannatvaṃ dharmo 'natipatteravidhānāt | yasya hi yāvānviṣayo 'natikramaṇīyatvena coditastasya tadatilaṅghanamatipattirityucyate | na ca kālasya karmānatikramaṇīyatvena coditaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, karmaṇaḥ kālaḥ | tasya hi so 'ṅgaṃ na tasya karma | tadeva ca tatsadbhāvāsadbhāvayoḥ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca bhavati na kālaḥ | tadeva cānuṣṭhānātmakatvādatikramānatikramau pratipadyate na kālaḥ | tasya svabhāvasiddhatvāt | tasmādyaḥ paurṇamāsīṃ svaṃ kālamabhipadyamānāmatipātayedityavadhāraṇātkarmaṇa eva nimittatvam | na cāvayavastacchabdavācya ityuktam || 3 ||

darśapūrṇamāsāviṣṭveti pūrveṇaiva nyāyenāśeṣābhyāsanirvṛttyuttarakālaṃ somayāgaḥ syāt | na ca mṛtenāsau kartuṃ śakyaḥ | atha tvasti somānuṣṭhānakālastata ekāntenaiva darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ jīvitakālo nāvaroddhavyaḥ | sa ca kartṛdharmapakṣe karmaprayogabhedānnāvarudhyate nānyathā | sūtramapyevamasti ceddarśapūrṇamāsavinirmuktaḥ somakālastato yathokta eva karmaprayogabhedaḥ syāt | kālaścetkarmabhedaḥ syādityasyāparā vyākhyā | yadi yāvajjīvikaḥ karmadharmakālaścodyeta tato darśapūrṇamāsamadhya eva somonyāni ca karmāṇi kartavyāni syuḥ | tataśca vitatasya karmaṇaḥ karmāntareṇāvicchede sati darśapūrṇamāsāviṣṭveti bādhyeta | athavā ‘eṣa svargāllokācchidyate etadyajñaśchidyate’ ityevamā
dibhiśca ninditamanuṣṭhīyeta | tasmādapi na kālavidhānamiti | muktakānyārthadarśanadvayaṃ
pūrvasūtragocarabhūtamiti—liṅgadaharśannācceti sūtragocaranityarthaḥ |pūrvasūtragocarabhūtaṃ darśayati | tadyathā | āhitāgnirvā eṣa sanniti dīkṣitasya dānādau niṣiddhe vidhyantaraśeṣabhūtaḥ parivedanasarūpārthavādo bhavati | etāvantaṃ hi kālamasāvagni hotrādidevatābhyo bhāgamadattvā tā anudhyāyinīḥ karoti nāyamasmabhyaṃ dadātītyevaṃ cintāyuktāḥ karotītyetanniyamapakṣe yujyate | kālavidhipakṣe tu kāmyatvādagnihotrasya yathe ṣṭaprayoge sati niyogato dātavyābhāvādanudhyāyinīvacanaṃ nopapadyate | tasmādapi niyamavacanam | etena jarāmaryavacanavidhānaṃ vyākhyātam | kāmyatvakalpanāyāmaprayogādapi nirmoke sati jarāmaraṇanirmokavacanavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ || 4 ||

yadetanmuktakamabhihitametadeva sūtrārūḍhaṃ karoti | niyamapakṣe hyetadevaṃ syāt | anityatvāttu bhavatpakṣe naivaṃ syāt | athavā yāvajjīvaśabdena kāle gṛhyamāṇe lakṣaṇādoṣa uktastamabhyupetyābhidhīyate satyāmapi lakṣaṇāyāmanityatvānnaivaṃ syāt | tannāma kālopalakṣaṇaṃ yuktaṃ yannityaṃ kiyatā 'pi kālenāvinābhūtaṃ, yadahaścandramā na dṛśyate tāmamāvāsyāṃ vidyādityādivat | na ca sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmeva jīvanaparisamāptiryataḥ
kutaścidvyasthitasvarūpā, yayā kālo lakṣyeta | tadetadevamāpadyate yadaivedaṃ bhavati tataścānityatvānnimittamevaitaditi siddham | kathaṃ tarhi niyatanimittatvānnityamityucyate, yāvaccharīrabhāvitvābhiprāyametadityadoṣaḥ || 5 ||

niyamaḥ sanpuruṣadharmatvānnātidiśyata iti ca vakṣyate( a. 8 pā. 1 a. 4 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ | | kālaḥ sannatidiśyeta | nanu kālo 'pi dvaiyahakālyavatsadyaḥkālatayā bādhyeta | naitadevam | yāvajjīvaṃ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayoḥ sadyaḥ kuryādityavadhāraṇaprasaṅgāt || 6 ||

kartṛdharmapakṣe yadidaṃ tvabhimataṃ yāvajjīvamiti kālaśāstramidaṃ nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatītyetāvatsūtram | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa vyapavargadarśanamuktaṃ tadyadi darśapūrṇamāsāviṣṭvetyetadevābhipretaṃ tataḥ punaruktam | athānyattadapyanudāhṛtatvānna jñāyate | tenānantarālocanayaivaṃ yojayitavyam | tvatpakṣe vikṛtīnāmapavargaḥ syāt | matpakṣe tu tāsāṃ vyapavargadarśanaṃ siddhānta upapatsyate | athavā nigamanasūtrametaditi vyākhyeyam | athavā sūtrakāreṇa kartṛdharmo niyamo 'yamityuktam | yāvajjīvaśabdasya tu kā gatiriti nābhihitamata āha | evaṃ sati kālaśāstrameva nimittaṃ syāt | athavā 'gnihotre darśapūrṇamāsayostāvadyāvajjīvagrahaṇātkartṛdharmaniyamatvaṃ bhavetpaśusomacāturmāsyeṣu tu katham | taducyate | tatrāpi vīpsāyuktaṃ kālaśāstrameva nimittaṃ syāt ‘vasante vasante jyotiṣā’ ityādi | na tāvadetatkāmyasyopadiśyate | sa hi yāvadicchamaṅgatvenaiva sthitatvānnaivaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate | athāpi naiyamikasya sakṛtprayogaḥ syāttatrāpi vīpsā 'narthikā bhavet | na ca vasanteyattāvadhāraṇāpramāṇamasti | tasmādyāvajjīvaṃ ye vasantāsteṣviti vijñāyate | saptamyapi ca ‘bhinne juhoti’ ityādivannimittārthā bhaviṣyati | tenocyate sarvatraivaṃjātīyake kartṛdharma
niyamāvadhāraṇātkālaśāstraṃ nimittaśāstraṃ pratyetavyam | etenaiva paśucāturmāsyādiṣvapi naiyamikatvasiddhiḥ || 7 ||

uktabhedakāraṇaṣaṭkavyatiri
vyatiriktakāraṇeti—śākhāntarākhyetyarthaḥ |ktakāraṇanirākaraṇārthamidamārabhyate | tatraiva
svābhiprāyamāha—tatraivetyādinā | kānicitkenacitprakārāntareṇā ' 'śaṅkaya pratiṣidhyante | tattu pratyudāharaṇaṃ praviviñcanto yojayiṣyāmaḥ | kathaṃ punaratra vedāntarāṇi nodāhriyante | kecidāhuḥ | śākhāntaraśabdena tānyapyudāhṛtānīti | na tvetadyuktam | kutaḥ |

yatra hi karma nirākāṅkṣamāmnāyate tatra tadbhedapratipattikṣamaṃ bhavati | yathā sarvāsvadhvaryuśākhāsu darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīni samastadravyadevatādiyuktatvādanyonyānirapekṣāṇi vidhīyanta iti bhedāśaṅkāṃ sahante na tvevaṃ vedāntare 'pi | tatra hi dravyadevatārahitaṃ karmamātraṃ prastutya stotraśastrayājyānuvākyādimātraṃ vidhīyate | na ca tāvatā 'sya nairākāṅkṣyaṃ bhavati | dṛṣṭārthānāmeva dravyadevatātatsaṃskārāṇāmabhāvāt | yattu tatra dravyadevatāyuktamāmnāyate tasyā ' 'dhvaryave guṇamātravidhānātsāṅkṣatvam | tathā ca vakṣyati( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 10 )‘bhūyastvenobhayaśruti’ iti | tasmācchākhāntarāṇyevodāharaṇam | tatra ca nāmabhedastāva- tkāraṇaṃ dṛśyate | tadyathā—kāṭhake 'gnihotre taittirīye 'gnihotra idaṃ paṭhyata ityādi | tathā
rūpabheda ekādaśakapālatvādi | vaiśvānaradvādaśāṣṭatvādivadāmikṣāvājinavacca na dvādaśatvai- kādaśatvayoritaretarasaṃkrāntirupapadyata iti guṇa eva bhettā | kārīryagnyaśvamedheṣvapi bhūmibhojanodakumbhāśvaghāsā guṇā eva santa itikartavyatāsthānīyatvena bāhyataratvātpūrvasmādbhedenopāttāḥ | pare 'nyaṃ dharmamācarantīti virodhiguṇāntarapradarśanārtham | aśvaghāsāderiti—pañcamyantaṃ madhye paṭhitamubhābhyāṃ saha saṃbadhyate | pūrveṇa tāvadaśvaghāsāderanyamuttareṇāpyaśvaghāsāderniṣpannamupakāramākāṅkṣatyaśvamedhādiriti | punaruktatvena punaḥśrutirbhedikoktā | nindāyāmapyuditānuditakālasaṃyogabhedādguṇa eva bhedakaḥ | uditahomavādino hyanuditahomaṃ nindantyanṛtavāditvena | ‘sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā’ iti hyanudite sūrye 'bhidhīyamānamanṛtaṃ jāyate| tasmāduditahomaḥ kartavya iti | itare punarāhuḥ, yaḥ pūjāṃ pūjyāya prathamameva gṛhītvottiṣṭhate sa sādhuḥ | yastvatikrāntaṃ vyāhṛtya pūjayati nāsau samyakpūjakaḥ | tasmādanuditahoma eva kartavya iti | tatraikatve vipratiṣi
ddhadharmasamavāyaprasaṅgaḥ | nānātve tu na kaścidvirodhaḥ | aśaktidvāreṇāpi guṇa evopanyastaḥ śākhāntarīyāṇāṃ guṇānāmekakarmaṇyupasaṃhārāśakterapūrvasaṃyogaḥ | samāptibhedo 'pi guṇa eva | nindayā gatārtho 'pi sanprāyaścittabhedaḥ punarupanyasyate | kadācidatra vaikalpikatvaparihāraṃ brūyāttattvabhyupetyocyate | vaikalpikeṣu hyubhayathā 'pyavaiguṇyaṃ bhavati | atra ca prāyaścittavidhānādubhayatrāpi vaiguṇyaṃ dṛśyate | na ca tatkarmaikatve ghaṭate | tasmādapi bhedaḥ | parihārasūtravaśena pañcānyārthadarśanānyucyante | yadi purā dīkṣitavantastato bṛhatsāmānamatirātramupeyuḥ | pūrvadīkṣāyāṃ rathaṃtarasya prayuktatvāt | atha na dīkṣitavantastato rathaṃtarasāmānamevopeyuriti | dvādaśāhe 'niṣṭaprathamayajñatvaṃ karmabhede bhavati | tāṇḍakavacanena jyotiṣṭomāntarasya prāthamyaniyame sati etacchākhāgatasyāniyamāt | ekatve tu sarvaśākhāsthajyotiṣṭomaprāthamyaniyamādadīkṣitānāṃ darśanaṃ na syāt | tathā yūpaikādaśinyāṃ
pakṣavedisaṃmānayorarthaprāptayorekaṃ
arthaprāptayoriti—‘ardhamantarvedi minoti’ ‘ardhaṃ bahirvedi’ itivacanena vedyagre vihitasya yūpamānasya daikṣātideśaparamparayā yūpaikādaśinīṃ prāptasya vedideśātikramāyogena vedisaṃmānasya | evaṃ vedyādhārasya śyenādipakṣyākārasthalāvayavabhūtapakṣadvayasaṃmānasya cārthaprāptayorityarthaḥ | ninditvetaraparigraho vacanāntaraprāptyasattvaṃ dyotayati | vacanāntare hi kimekasya nindayā, kiṃ vetarasya sphuṭavidhāne sati stutyā | tasmānnūnaṃ śākhāntarīyo rathākṣamātrāntarālavidhireṣāṃ nāsti | tataśca karmabheda iti | dve stotrīye virājaṃ daśakamatiricyete iti tisro 'tiricyanta iti ca jyotiṣṭomātirātraikatve sati upapannam | bhede tu yathāvidhi bhavatītyavirodhaḥ | puroḍāśisāṃnāyyidarśanaṃ dīkṣitādīkṣitasaṃdarśanenaiva gataṃ parihāraprakārāntaratvādudāhṛtam | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: sa ca prakṛtitaḥ prāptaḥ karmaikatve vṛthā bhavet ||

div.p: upahavyabhede tu niyamārthāyāṃ punaḥ śrutāvarthavattā | tasmādapi karmabhedaḥ || 8 ||

sarvabrāhmaṇavratyayamiti—ekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ brāhmaṇānekatve 'pi tadekaṃ karmetyabhiprāyaḥ | tadyathodgātṝṇāṃ pañcaviṃśaṣaṅviṃśabrāhmaṇayorjyotiṣṭomadvādaśāhau | saṃyoga iti—prādhānyātphalasaṃyogagrahaṇam | rūpamiti—pratyāsatterdravyadevatam | codaneti—sarvadhātvarthabhāvanāviṣayo vidhiḥ | jyotiṣṭomādi nāmadheyaṃ ca sarvaśākhāsvaviśiṣṭaṃ dṛśyate | tasmādiyataḥ pratyabhijñānakāraṇakalāpādabhedasiddhiḥ | na cānyaḥ kaścidbhedaheturasti | prakaraṇāntaravacchākhāntareṣu parasparāsaṃnidhānamiti cenna | tenaivetarāgrahaṇāt | yena hi pradeśāntare kiṃcitkarma gṛhītaṃ bhavati sa eva tatsadṛśamanyatropalabhamānaḥ śaknoti tato 'nyadetadityadhyavasātum | ekaśākhāviṣaye ca sarvaśākhādhyayanādevaṃ bhavati | śākhāntare punaranyaśākhāgatajyotiṣṭomādyanavabodhādapūrvavaducyamāneṣu na bhedabuddhirjāyate | yastarhi dve śākhe paṭhati tasya prakaraṇāntaranyāyena bhavitavyamekaśākhāgateṣu ca brāhmaṇāntareṣu | naiṣa doṣaḥ | śākhāntarādhyayanaṃ tāvadekasya puṃso naiveṣyate | kiṃ kāraṇam |

yathaivā ' 'kṛtiḥ prativyakti samavaiti tathaiva svādhyāyatvamekaikasyāṃ śākhāyām | ataśca ‘svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya’ iti karmāvabodhanaṃ pratyupādīyamānatvādvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaikā śākhā 'dhyetavyā | nanvevaṃ vedāntarasyāpyadhyayanaṃ na prasajyate | na | vacanāntareṇa pratiprasavāt ‘anayā trayyā vidyayā’ iti | tathā ‘vedānadhītya vedau vā’ iti mānavam | sākāṅkṣatvācca vedāntarāṇāmatulyakāryatvakāritaḥ samuccayo 'vagamyate | śākhāntareṣu tvanyonyanirapekṣasvataṃtrajyotiṣṭomādirūpapratītestulyārthatvanimitto vikalpaḥ | sākāṅkṣatvādeva
caikaśākhāgatabrāhmaṇāntarasamuccayāśrayaṇam | nanvekakarmatvādvikalpo vikalpāccaikakarmatvamitītaretarāśrayatvaṃ bhavet | na | pratyabhijñānamātreṇaikatve vijñāte saṃkhyāvaśena vikalpasiddheḥ | ataśca yo nāmātimedhāvitvādekavedagatāni śākhāntarāṇyapyadhīte sa samṛddhaḥ san vrīhiyavairapi miśrairyajeta | tasmādekaṃ karmeti || 9 ||

yadyapi tāvatkāṭhakādikaṃ nāmadheyaṃ syāttathā 'pyutpattisaṃyogābhāvānnaiva bhindyāt | idaṃ tu naiva karmanāmadheyam | anyāyo hyanekārthatvamityanena nyāyena granthanāmatve sati karmāṇi lakṣaṇayaiva prayogopapatteḥ | kathaṃ punaravagamyate granthanāmaitatkarmaṇyupacaryate na punarviparyaya iti | taducyate |

kāṭhakādiśabdo hi parasparāsaṃbaddheṣu bahuṣu karmasu prayujyate | sa yadi karmanāma syātkarmāntare na prayujyeta | na hi tatra lakṣaṇopapadyate | saṃbandhābhāvāt | sarvābhidhānaṃ tu vyaktivaddurupādam | tasmācchākhayaiva karmāṇi lakṣyante na karmabhiḥ śākhāḥ | tataśca saṃjñayā kāmaṃ śākhā eva bhidyantāṃ na karmāṇi | saṃbandhābhāvāt | tasmāttānyevāgnihotrādīni saṃbandhibhedādanyathā 'nyathā ca vyapadiśyante || 10 ||

prāyeṇa hetuviparyaye kāryaviparyayo dṛśyata iti kāṭhakādisaṃjñaikatvādekaśākhādhītāgnihotrāderekatvaprasaṅgaḥ | sādhyavyabhicāritvādiyamarthāpattisamā nāma jātiḥ pūrvapakṣahetora
siddhatvopālambhapradarśanārthamevābhihitā | sarvatra ca duṣṭe pūrvapakṣe
asaduttaratvaṃ jātirityabhidhīyate |jātīnāmuttaratvaṃ keṣāṃcidiṣṭam || 11 ||
yadyapi kāṭhakāderjāternityatvānnityaivā ' 'khyā tathā 'pi pravacananimitteyaṃ smaryate na ca karmāṇi procyante | śabdaviṣayatvātpravacanasya | tasmādapi na saṃjñayā karmabheda iti || 12 ||

na ca kapālasaṃkhyābhedādbhedaḥ | tatsaṃbandhidvārabhedānabhyupagamāt | tasmādekasminneva karmaṇi sādhanavikalpo bhaviṣyati | nanu cotpattivākyaśiṣṭatvādvikalpo nāstītyuktam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | ubhayorutpattivākyaśiṣṭatvāviśeṣeṇa tulyabalatvāt | kathaṃ punaranekavākyotpāditasyaikatvaṃ vijñāyata iti | tasyottarasūtre parihāraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ || 13 || || 14 ||
asaduttaratvaṃ jātirityabhidhīyate |
anubhāṣaṇasūtrametat | athavā punaruktatvaparihārārthamevaitat | punaḥśruterarthavādaguṇārthatvenānyārthatvāt || 15 ||

dvitīyavyākhyāne parihārāntaranivṛttyartho vāśabdaḥ | tatrānyārthā punaḥśrutirbhavati yatra tāvanmātrameva śrūyate | yatra caikavākyagataṃ vidheyāntaraṃ vidyate | na tviha tadekamapi | samastetikartavyatopetapradhānapunaḥśrutiśravaṇāt | etameva śrutisaṃyogāviśeṣaṃ manyate | na caiṣā punaḥśrutiḥ | kutaḥ |

pūrvoktena śākhādhyayanavikalpena yena kāṭhakamagnihotraṃ śrutaṃ nāsau kadācittaittirīyakaṃ śṛṇoti | śṛṇvannapi vā svaśākhayaiva pratipannatvāttaittirīyakapratipattyarthamevaitaditi kalpayitvā na punaḥśrutiṃ manyate | evamitaro 'pītaraditi sarva evaikaśrutisaṃyogāviśeṣādagnihotrādi pratipadyante | na ca tatra paurvāparyamasti yena jñāyetānayā śākhayā prathamaṃ vihite śākhāntarīye punaḥśrutirbhūtvā bhetsyatīti | āha ca |

tasmādyathaikaśākhākarma
ekaśākhāyāṃ karmeti pāṭhāntaram | deśāntarapuruṣāntarādiṣu punaḥ śrūyamāṇamapi pratipādyabhedānna punaruktaṃ bhavatyevaṃ śākhāntareṣviti |

nanu caikayā 'pi śākhayā samastapuruṣapratipādane sati, anarthakameva śākhāntaram | nānarthakam | na hi kaściddve śākhe adhīte | na ca puruṣāntaragataṃ tatpratipādanenārthavadanyānpratyanarthakaṃ bhavati | yastu te 'pi kila śākhinastāmevādhītya pratipatsyanta ityabhiprāyaḥ sa nityatvādvedasya tadadhyayanādhyāpanasaṃbandhānāditvādanupapannaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: śākhāṃ śākhāntaraṃ yuktaṃ nādhyetuṃ sadṛśe śrame ||

div.p: tasmātparakīyaśākhādhyayane 'pyastyeva puruṣāṇāṃ śrama iti yathāvasthitaśākhādhyayanameva | na ca vedaḥ punaruktādidoṣadvāraṃ paryanuyogamarhati | atrāntare bhāṣyakārasya sūtraṃ bhraṣṭam ‘vākyāsamavāyāt’ iti | tadevaṃ vyākhyeyam | naikasminpuruṣe śākhāntaravākyaṃ samavaiti || 16 || 17 ||

yadi pratiśākhaṃ karmabhedaḥ syāttata ekamūlābhāvādādita evā ' 'rabhya bhidyamānatvātsamastakarmākhyapuṣpaphalāntaratvādvṛkṣāntaravadvedāntarāṇyevocyeran | na śākhāntarāṇi | ekakarmamūlavidhiskandharūpatve satītikartavyatāyāḥ kvacitkiṃcidadhikamityālocya sārūpyādupapannaḥ śākhāntarabhedavyapadeśaḥ | athavā paunaruktyaparihārārthameva sūtram | tatra nāma punaruktatā bhavati yatra pūrvokto 'rthastasyaiva puṃsaḥ saṃnihito bhavati | na tviha śākhāntaragatasya saṃnidhānamityapunaruktatā || 18 ||

abhyupetyavādo 'yam | satyapi karmabhede ye tāvadvākyasaṃyuktāḥ śeṣāste 'gnihotrādimātroddeśena vidhīyamānāḥ sarvārthatvena jñāyanta ityavaśyopādātavyā iti naiva śākhāmātraparitoṣavyavasthā labhyate | na ca sūtrakārāṇāmapi kaścitsvaśākhopasaṃhāramātreṇāva
sthito yena pratiśākhaṃ karmavyavasthā
samarthyeta iti—etāvatā granthena caikamagrihotrādikarma pratyaṅgaṃ na śiṣyata ityevaṃ sūtravyākhyānārthaṃ yaccāgrihotrasya kiṃciditi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātaṃ jñeyam |samarthyeta |
pradhānānyapītyādivārtikaṃ tu na caikaṃ kaṭhādipuruṣaṃ pratyevāgnihotrādikarma śiṣyata ityevaṃ sūtravyākhyānārthaṃ na ca yatkāṭhaka ityādyabhāṣyavyākhyānārthaṃ jñeyam |pradhānānyapi prādhānyena yajamānaniyamaṃ prati, aprabhavantībhiḥ samākhyābhirarthimātramuddiśya vidhīyamānāni sarvaśākhāgatānyekaikaṃ puruṣamupatiṣṭhante | tatraikaphalatvādasamuccaye yena kenacitsādhyamāne phale 'nyeṣāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ | atha teṣāṃ vikalpenārthavattvaṃ, tadvaraṃ śākhāntarāṇāmeva
vyavasthiteti—vyavasthitaiḥ kaṭhādicaraṇairityarthaḥ |vyavasthitapratipadyamānānāmanākulataraṃ parikalpitamityapunaruktatā || 19 ||

asamāptivaditi vā chedaḥ | karmabhedapakṣe hi yāvadeva yeṣāṃ samāmnānaṃ tāvadeva teṣāṃ samāpyata iti na brūyuratrāsmākaṃ na samāpyata iti | anvāroho nāma sthalārohaṇamantrāḥ | teṣu maitrāyaṇīyānāṃ samāpyate nāsmākamityabhidhānādadhyetṝṇāmapi karmaikatvaṃ prasiddhamityavasīyate || 20 ||

anyonyanindayetaretaravidhāne tulyārthayoruditānuditatvayoḥ karmaṇi vikalpo bhavidhyati | tvatpakṣe 'pi cāsau karmaṇoḥ phalaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭaḥ | tathā śaktyaśaktī sarvapuru
ṣāṇāmavyavasthite | sarvaśākhāsvadhikavidhāvekaśākhāyāṃ ca stokāntaratvādaviśiṣṭe | keciccātra lāghavārthina evaṃ varṇayanti | ya eva kila vākyasaṃyuktāḥ śākhāntaravidhayasta eva saṃkīryante | ye tu prākaraṇikāsteṣāṃ vyavasthaiveti | kutaḥ |

śākhāntareṣu vikalpamāneṣu yathaiva pradhānaṃ vidhīyate 'rthinastadīyaḥ kathaṃbhāvastāmeva vyāpnoti na śākhāntarāṇi | ataścānyagatā guṇāḥ kathaṃbhāvena nāpekṣitāḥ prayogavacanenāmupasaṃhṛtā nāṅgaṃ bhavantīti nānuṣṭheyāḥ | tataśca vākyasaṃyuktānāmalpatvādvidhīyamānānāmastyupasaṃharaṇaśaktiriti | na tvetadyuktamiva | tathā hi |

prativedamapi ca prakaraṇaṃ puruṣasya dharmānupadiśati | na ca tadvedāntarasthaṃ pratyapramāṇam, tathā śākhāntare 'pi draṣṭavyam | karmadharmāścaite vijñāyante | tacca karma śākhāntareṣvapi tadevetyaṅgatvāviśeṣaḥ | yadyapi prakaraṇarūpamanyattathā 'pi śākhāntarasthenānenaite 'pi dharmā gṛhītā ityavadhāraṇānna svaprakaraṇagṛhītebhyo viśiṣyante sarvāsvapi ca śākhāsvadhikavidhayo na kathaṃcicchākhayā parimitā bhavantītyalpa evā ' 'yāsa iti nāśaktiḥ | samāptiścādhītāpekṣayopapannatvānna bhedaṃ kalpayati || 21 ||
anubhāṣaṇasūtraṃ sāmānyaparihārasūtraṃ vā || 22 ||
vaikalpikānāmādita evāṅgīkaraṇādāśritakramātikrame prāyaścittavidhirupapatsyate || 23 ||

ekatve 'pi samāptirliṅgatvenoktā | ‘samāptivacca saṃprekṣā’ iti samāptivacanaṃ nānātve 'pi | tatra nyāyānusāritvādekatvasyaiva sādhikā | tadvacanasyeyamupapattiḥ pūrvavattvāditi, ārambhāpetkṣatvāt | athavā śabdaprayogasya prasiddhipūrvakatvādyādṛśī vayaṃ samāptiṃ paśyāmastādṛśyāmayaṃ prayukta iti niścinumaḥ | sa ca vastunyasamāpte 'pi tacchākhāvijñeyapadārthasamāptau prayukta iti dṛśyate | tasmādavirodhaḥ || 24 ||

adīkṣitadarśanaṃ dvādaśāhe tavāpyanupapannam | tāṇḍake sarvaśākhāgatajyotiṣṭomānuvādena prāthamyavidhānāt | na hi tatrāparasyāpi jyotiṣṭomasyotpattirasti yasya niyamaḥ syāt | ata ādhvaryavāṇāmeva niyame, ubhayapakṣe same ca doṣe sati ubhābhyāmeṣo 'rtho varṇanīyaḥ, yadi dvādaśāhena purā didīkṣāṇā ādidīkṣāṇā veti | tasmādaviśiṣṭametat || 25 ||
atha yaduktamekādaśinyāṃ pakṣavedisaṃmānadarśanaṃ na syāditi | tatra brūmaḥ |

ekayūpa ekādaśa paśava ityasya vidheḥ śeṣo 'yaṃ yatpakṣasaṃmitāmityādi | ekādaśinyāṃ hi satyāmanyatarasaṃmānāśrayaṇātkleśo bhavet | tasmādekayūpa eva varamiti | pakṣasaṃmānaṃ tāvadatyantāprāptameveti nityānuvādaḥ | vedisaṃmānopadeśo 'pi praśaṃsārūpeṇaikayūpapraśastataratvajñāpanārthaḥ | rathākṣamātrāntarālatā ca yatraikādaśinī vihitā tatra bhaviṣyatītyavirodhaḥ | iha tu vedisaṃmānasya praśaṃsayā vidheyatvapratīteraśakyamanyastutyarthatvaṃ kalpayitum | ataḥ pakṣasaṃmānasyāprāptasyaiva vedisaṃmānastutyartho nityānuvāda iti samarthayitavyam | prākaraṇikatvāccāsyaivāgnau balīyastvamityanārabhyādhīto rathākṣamātrāntarālavidhistadvinirmuktā vikṛtīrgamiṣyati | sūtramapyevaṃ neyam | yadi hi
cayana ityarthaḥ |dravye vedisaṃmānaṃ na codyeta tato 'rthānāṃ—pakṣasaṃmānādivi
vidheyānāmityarthaḥ |dhīnāmavyavasthā syāt | sā ca rathāntarālatvena bādhyeta, na tvevamastītyavirodhaḥ || 26 ||
vaikalpike ṣoḍaśinyagṛhyamāṇe dvayoratirekaḥ | kriyamāṇe tvekaviṃśatipracayādṛgdvayādekātirekeṇa tisro bhavanti | tasmādavirodhaḥ || 27 ||

sārasvate hi dvādaśāhanyāyenaivobhayoḥ pakṣayorjyotiṣṭomapūrvakatvādavaśyamevaṃ vaktavyam | yadā puroḍāśinaḥ paurṇamāsīpakṣe tadopavasanti, yadā sāṃnāyyino 'māvāsyāpakṣe tadā vatsānapākurvantīti | bhavati hi kālabhedādapi kartṛbhedopacārastasmādapyadoṣaḥ || 28 ||

anubhāṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaparihāro
parihāra iti | atredamākūtam—upahavye bṛhadrathaṃtarapunaḥśruternāsmākaṃ pratiprasavaḥ prayojanatvenābhīpsitaḥ | yenopālabhyemahi | kiṃ tu, anyatkiṃcidityevaṃ sāmānyataḥ parihāra iti | vā || 29 ||

saṃsthāvyavasthārthā
saṃsthāvyavasthārthā veti—vākāraścārthe | evaṃ ca bhāṣyoktaṃ prayojanamupalakṣaṇaṃ vijñeyam | anyathā dakṣiṇāvyavasthāmātrārthatve saṃsthāpunaḥśrutyānarthakyāparihārāt | na ca vākyabhedaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ | atideśataḥ pūrvapravṛttyā viśiṣṭavidhyaṅgīkāreṇa tadayogāditi | vā bṛhadrathaṃtarayoḥ punaḥśrutirbhaviṣyati || 30 ||
śākhāntaravihitaprayājānuvādena saha homaṃ vadannanyaśākhādhītaṃ ca ‘kuṭarurasi’ iti mantramaśmādāne vidadhatsarvaśākhāpratyayatvaṃ darśayati || 31 ||
pratiśākhaṃ vā vidhipṛthaktvaṃ vyavatiṣṭheta | tathā sati hi kramabhedaṃ na yāsyanti svaśākhāvihitāḥ kriyāḥ | parimāṇaṃ ca tadvarti nānyatvaṃ pratipatsyate || 32 ||

yatra smārtāḥ padārthā na kramakālaparimāṇānurodhena bādhitāstatra śrautā bādhiṣyanta iti kuta etat | tenaiva
tenaiveti—śiṣṭākopādhikaraṇenaivetyarthaḥ | gatatvādavācyamiti cenna | sūtrakārasyātraiva prathamābhidhānāt | tatra hi kāraṇāgrahaṇamātramupapattiruktā | śeṣaṃ tviha siddhamasūtritamityapunaruktatvam |

lg.l: tasmāttadeveti mate na karma bhinnaṃ kathaṃcitpratiśākhamiṣṭam |

na kāraṇaṃ saptamamasti cānyadato
evamiti nyāyasudhāgṛhītaḥ pāṭhaḥ | uktena prakāreṇa śabdāntarādiṣaṭpramāṇikaiva bhāvanābhedasiddharna śākhāntarapramāṇiketyavemadhyayārthopasaṃhārārthaścaturthaścaraṇa iti jñeyam | yathoktaiva tu bhedasiddhiḥ || 33 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaścaraṇaḥ samāptaḥ ||

div.p:
tathā ca prathamasūtropāttapratijñāpiṇḍavyākhyāpradeśaprada
praddarśanāvasara ityarthaḥ |rśane dharmapramāṇasvarūpaviṣayalakṣaṇadvayārthaṃ codanālakṣaṇasūtreṇaikenaiva sūtritaṃ varṇayitvā kāni asya sādhanāni—aṅgānikāni ca sādhanābhāsāni—anaṅgānīti phalārthatvātadarthatvābhyāṃ kva puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ dharmasya kva vā puruṣo guṇabhūta ityādi yāvatkiṃcana mīmāṃsitavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ śeṣalakṣaṇenaiva vyākhyātam | śeṣaiḥ samastaireva lakṣaṇairityarthaḥ | iha lakṣaṇānāṃ bahutve 'pi yadekavacanaṃ kṛtaṃ tallakṣaṇatvasāmānyasaṃkhyāmātravivakṣayā |

bahuṣvapi hi lakṣaṇārtheṣu vivakṣiteṣu kramavaśādekastāvadaṅgatvarūpaḥ śeṣa etallakṣaṇagocaraḥ parārthatvahetukaḥ pratipādyate | samāsaśca dvedhā vigṛhya dvayorvākyārthayoḥ pradarśanīyaḥ | śeṣaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ ca, śeṣasya vā 'rthasya lakṣaṇamiti | ṣaṣṭhīsamāsamātrāśrayaṇena vā yathāvyākhyāyamānārtham |

sarveṣāṃ hi lakṣaṇāntarārthānāṃ prayojyāprayojyaprayojakāprayojakaṣaḍvidhakramaniyamaphalavatkarmaviṣayakartradhikārarūpāṇāṃ tāvadaṅgātmakaśeṣaviśeṣaprakāratvāllakṣaṇāntaragocarāṇāmapi śeṣalakṣaṇāntargatatvāvadhāraṇasthitiḥ | tathā hi—

ekaphalasādhanānāmarthānāṃ hyekaphalavadupakāropanibaddhānāṃ vaikaprayogavacanacoditānāṃ yaugapadyānuṣṭhānāśakteḥ sāmarthyenāṅgabhūtaḥ krama āpadyamānaḥ śrutyarthapaṭhanasthānamukhyaprāvṛttikakramākhyapramāṇaṣaṭkavaśena vyavasthāpyate |

lg.l: bhāvyānāṃ bhāvakaḥ kartā dravyaṃ ko nāma karmaṇām ||

div.p: vakṣyati hi ‘puru( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 5 )ṣaśca karmārthatvāt’ iti jaiminiḥ |
tatra tu—

tatrāthaśabda ānantaryapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣādhikārāṇāmekaṃ sarvānvā vivakṣitvā prayujyate | prāguktamedalakṣaṇānantaroktatvātpūrvaprakṛtamapekṣya śeṣalakṣaṇamārabhyate | kuta iti hetvapekṣāyāmata iti hetuvyapadeśaḥ |

lg.l:
vijñātumata etasya ta
tadānantaryamucyata iti pāṭhāntaram |danantaramucyate ||
ekatve nāpadiśyeta kaḥ śeṣaḥ kasya śeṣiṇaḥ ||
asmin hi sati sūtrokte nānyo bhāṣyakṛtoditaḥ ||

div.p: arthadvāro hyadhyāyādisaṃbandho na granthasvarūpāśraya iti saṃkṣepoktipiṇḍīkṛtavṛttavartiṣyamāṇādhyāyārthapradarśanapūrvaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇaiva saṃbandhaḥ pūrvādhyāyayorabhihitaḥ | iha tu sūtrakāreṇaivāthātaḥśabdābhyāmupanibaddha iti sa eva vyākhyātaḥ—nānākarmalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttamiti ca |

prathamādhyāyapratipādito hi pramāṇavivekavidhyarthavādamantrasmṛtiguṇavidhināmadheyavākyaśeṣārthakṛtasaṃdigdhavidhinirṇayapravibhāgaḥ pratyekaṃ bhedādilakṣaṇeṣu bhedenopayokṣyata iti prapañcenānubhāṣitaḥ | tathā cābhyāsādhikaraṇe( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 2 ) sthitavedapramāṇalakṣaṇabalenoktam ‘aviśeṣā
ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutiriti sūtrārambho jñeyaḥ |danarthakaṃ hi syāt’ iti | vidheyāntararahitaścānanyaparo vidhiḥ karmasvarūpameva vidadhatpūrvavihitādavaśyameva karmāntaraṃ karotīti vidhitvanirṇayaphalopajīvanam |

jāmitvājāmitvopakramopasaṃhāramadhyapātino hi ‘viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya’ ityevamādayo 'ntarālasaṃbandhavidhyekavākyatvenārthavādatvātpṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānā na devatāviśiṣṭakarmatrayavidhānārthā vijñāyante |

yacchabdāmantraṇottamapuruṣādyupahatavidhiśaktayo hi mantrā dharmasādhanatvenocyamā
ālokyamānā iti pāṭhāntaram |nā ‘devāṃśca yābhiryajate dadāti ca’ ityevamādibhirākhyātapadaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ śrutairapi na karmāntaraṃ kalpayanti |

lg.l: kaṭhena proktamityevaṃ tena( pā. sū. 4—3—101 ) proktamiti smṛteḥ |
granthaśca procyate nārthaḥ sa hyanuṣṭhīyate naraiḥ ||

ājyauṣadhādidharmāṇāṃ vyavasthāṃ sā
teṣāmarthādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |dhayiṣyati ||

div.p: tathā ca |

lg.l: śruterjā( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 1 | )tādhikāraḥ syādityasminnupayokṣyate ||

div.p: prathamādhyāyaprathamasūtre hi dharmajñānecchāyā vakṣyamāṇavyākhyeyatvenānupanyāsādantarānuṣṭheyatvamātramevopadeṣṭavyamityadhikārārthatvaṃ noktam | yadapi tadupasarjanatvena dharmajñānamupāttaṃ tadapyarthavyākhyānakaraṇātsvayameva śiṣyāṇāṃ bhavatīti na sūtrakārabhāṣyakāravyākhyātṛvacanopāttādhikārakarmatvenāvadhāritam |
ataḥ paraṃ śeṣalakṣaṇamadhikṛtaṃ tadādareṇa śrotavyam | yato 'dhyāyāntarāvakāśo 'dyāpi nāstīti | ataḥ śeṣalakṣaṇamadhikṛtaṃ veditavyamiti śakyaṃ vaktum |

saptamādiṣaṭkastāvadupadeśapūrvakātideśaviṣayatvādupadeśavicārārthaprathamaṣaṭkasamāptiṃ pratīkṣate | tathā 'dhikāro 'pi yathopadiṣṭakarmānuṣṭhānasāmarthyena karturavadhāryata iti kramaniyamaparyantopadeśajñānottarakālamārapsyate | tathā hi |

lg.l: bhāro yo yena voḍhavyaḥ sa prāgātolito yadā |
nanu jñeyā yathā śeṣāḥ śeṣiṇo 'pi tathaiva naḥ |

div.p: ucyate—

lg.l: jñātavyā ubhaye satyaṃ sūtraṇīyā na tūbhaye |
tatra sūtrāṇi śeṣāṇāṃ kiṃ kāryāṇyuta śeṣiṇām |
na tu tatkriyate tatra kartavyaṃ hi dvayaṃ bhavet ||
na sa śeṣamavijñāya jñātuṃ śakyeta kenacit ||

śeṣī tadviṣayatvena lakṣyate nāntarīya
yadvinā yadanupapannaṃ tattasya nāntarīyakamityucyate |kaḥ ||
śrutyādisamavāye ca vakṣya( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 7 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥte yadbalābalam |

div.p:
tasmāccheṣalakṣaṇameva samastatadgataprakāraviśiṣṭaṃ vaktumidaṃ pratijñātam ‘athātaḥ śeṣalakṣaṇam’ iti | tatra kaḥ śeṣa iti—svarūpābhidhānapratijñā | kena hetuneti—yenāsau śeṣa ityucyate | tasya ca kārakahetostaddharmasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyata iti pratijñāyate | tathā viniyogaprakārajñānaṃ kva śeṣiṇi kaḥ śeṣaḥ katamena pramāṇena katamatpramāṇāntaraṃ bādhitvā
vinā bādhena vā viniyujyate | tathā viniyojakaśrutyādiṣaṭkasvarūpajñānaṃ teṣāṃ balābalajñānaṃ ca | tatra prathame pāde tāvachrutiviniyogaḥ kiṃcicca prāsaṅgikam | dvitīyapādādau liṅgaviniyogaḥ | tṛtīyapādādau tadeva pramāṇadvayamupanyasyopakramopasaṃhāradvāreṇaikavākyatvena siddhāntasthāpanādvinā 'pi vākyagrahaṇena ‘prā( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 2 ) etatsūtrāvayavaḥyadarśanāt’ iti vākyaviniyogamuktvā prakaraṇakramasamākhyābhirviniyogaḥ sūtropanibaddha eva vakṣyate | tato balābalādhikaraṇam | tataḥ paraṃ ca śrutiliṅgavākyānāṃ prakaraṇena saha virodhāvirodhacintā tāvadyāvat ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 7 sū . 18 ) |‘tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ paśuvidhiḥ’ iti | tataśca
( caturṇāmiti—śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇānāmityarthaḥturṇāṃ krameṇa saha punaḥ saiva cintā yāvat ( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 8 sū. 18 )‘śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari’ iti | tata upoddhātapūrvakaṃ pañcabhiḥ saha samākhyāyā virodhāvirodhaviṣayavicāreṇādhyāyaparisamāptiḥ | etattātparyeṇānyadupodghātaprasaktānuprasakteriti vakṣyamāṇamanusaṃkīrtyate | pradarśitamucyamānaṃ sukhaṃ grāhayiṣyate | sarvaṃ caitaccheṣalakṣaṇapratijñayaiva piṇḍīkṛtaṃ pratijñātamiti na bhedena sūtritam || 1 ||
kiṃ ca |
śeṣaśabdasyānekādhikādyarthavacanatvādihāṅgaguṇadharmādiparyāyavācitvaparigrahārthaṃ hetuviśeṣābhidhānaṃ parārthatvāditi |
dvāvapi cārthau śrutyarthāpattibhyāmupāttāviti codanālakṣaṇasūtravadvākyabhedadoṣaṃ parihṛtya vyākhyeyam | tathāhi |

lg.l: na śeṣo 'nyaḥ parārthatvānna ca hetvantareṇa saḥ |

anyonyaniyamenaivaṃ pa
pakṣahetvoḥ parigraha iti-atrāyamanumānaprayogaḥ | prayājādiḥ śeṣapadavācyaḥ | parārthatvāt | yannaivaṃ tatraivaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ | yadyapyatra śeṣapadavācyatāvacchedakaṃ parārthatvameva pakṣatāvacchedakamiti hetuvyāpakasādhyasamānādhikaraṇo heturiti vyāptigrahakāla eva hetau sādhyādhikaraṇavṛttitve bhāsamāne samānasaṃvitsaṃvedyatayā hetvadhikaraṇavṛttisvasyāpi sādhye bhānātsādhyasiddhiranumitipratibandhikā saṃbhāvyate tathā 'pi sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvarūpasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyāghaṭitavyāptijñānasyaiva hetutvāṅgīkārāt | athavā vyatirekyanumānatvādasya sādhyābhāvavyāpakībhūtābhāvapratiyogitvarūpavyatirekavyāptijñānasyaivānumitihetutvāṅgīkārātpakṣatāvacchedakahetvoraikye 'pi na kācitkṣatiriti dik |kṣahetvoḥ parigrahaḥ ||

div.p: iha ca |
tadbhāvabhāvitvena tāvadyo yena vinā na bhavati sa tasya śeṣaḥ | tadyathā 'ṅkurastoyādibhirvinā na bhavati | ghaṭaśca mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrādibhiriti tayostāni śeṣatvena jñāyante | tatrocyate |

lg.l: svāminā ca vinā dāsā na bhavanti kadācana |
tathā gṛhādayasteṣāṃ śeṣaḥ svāmī ca neṣyate ||
prayojyo yasya yastasya sa śeṣa iti niścayaḥ |

div.p: na ca svāmī dāsena rūpasparśādibhirvā yathodāhṛtairanyonyaṃ prayujyate | yenātiprasaṅgaḥ syāt | na tvetadapi śeṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate | kutaḥ |

lg.l: nimittairna ca teṣveṣāṃ homānāṃ śeṣatā matā |

div.p: sarvatraiva phalavatpradhānavidheraṅgavidhayo 'ṅgāni pradhānebhyo 'tiricyanta ityetadevātirekalakṣaṇaṃ śeṣatvaṃ yuktamityukte 'bhidhīyate |
tasmādvidhyādivihitapradhānakathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāpūraṇasamarthavidhyantavihitatvalakṣaṇameva śeṣatvaṃ sūtrakārābhipretamityukte 'bhidhīyate |
yadi hi niyogato vākyaprakaraṇānteṣveva vyavasthitāḥ śeṣavidhayaḥ samāmnāyeraṃstata etadavyabhicārāllakṣaṇamāśrīyeta | na tvevamāmnāyante | triṣvapyādimadhyāvasāneṣu samāmnānāt |

aṅgavidhyupakrameṣu tāvadvākyaprakaraṇeṣu tadgatakiṃbhāvākāṅkṣitaprayojanakalpanāvelāyāṃ kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāyuktapradhānavidhidarśanāttadapekṣitopakārasiddhyarthatvena teṣāmavadhāryamāṇānāṃ vidhyādigatānāmapi śeṣatvamastīti na vidhyantavidhānamevaikaṃ śeṣalakṣaṇatvenāvakalpate |

na hyanupakurvātkiṃcidapyaṅgaṃ kasyacidbhavet | tasmādupapannamidaṃ lakṣaṇamiti | tathā copariṣṭādapi tatra tatra pradeśe bhāṣyakāro vakṣyati—‘yo yasyopakaroti sa tasya śeṣaḥ | upakāralakṣaṇaṃ hi śeṣatvam’ ityevamādi |
na tvetadapi ghaṭate | kutaḥ |
yathaiva hyaṅgāni pradhānānāmupakurvanti tathaivānuṣṭhāpanenopakārapratigrahaṇācca pradhānānyapyaṅgānāmupakurvantyeva | kutaḥ |
evamaṅgānāmapyanyonyāpādānaṃ darśayitavyam | tataścaikapradhānavikāreṣvekāṅgamane 'pi samastasāṅgapradhānagamanādaniyamaḥ prāpnoti |
na hi tadanugraharahitaṃ kiṃcitsidhyati | tataścārthimātraviṣayakāmaśrutiparigrahāt ‘vasante brāhmaṇam’ ityādīnāṃ nimittārthatvācchūdrādhikārādidoṣaprasaṅgaḥ |

lg.l: jñātaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣayituṃ kṣamam |

div.p: anavagataśeṣatvāvastheṣūpakārādarśanāttadadhīnāvadhāraṇaṃ śeṣatvaṃ na syāt | kalpita upakāre bhaviṣyatīti cet | na | prāgaṅgatvādupakārakalpanāpramāṇābhāvāt | yo hi yasya phalasya phalavato vā śeṣatvenāvadhārito bhavati sa kathaṃ tasyopakariṣyatītyapekṣite sati dṛṣṭamupakāramapaśyadbhistasmādadṛṣṭaḥ parikalpyate | yāvattu śeṣatvameva nāvagamyate tāvatkena pramāṇenādṛṣṭakalpanā syāt | tataścetaretarāśrayaḥ prasajyate | tathāhi |

dṛṣṭārthānāmapi cāvahantyādīnāṃ niyamānna kaścidupakāro dṛśyata iti na niyogato 'ṅgatvaṃ syāt | na ca prāsaṅgikatvācchāstreṇopakāraḥ pratipādyata iti | pratyakṣādibhirevopakāraṃ gṛhītvā śeṣatvaṃ gamyeta | tataśca śrutyādipramāṇakaṃ śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ naivānenā ' 'śrīyeta | tathā prāsaṅgikānyanyaprayojanānyaṅgānyanyārthānyapyanyasyopakārīṇīti tantriprayojakavaditarasyāpi śeṣatvaṃ gaccheyuḥ | tatra ( a. 5 pā. 1 a. 15 sū 28 )‘prāsaṅgikaṃ ca notkarṣet’ ( a. 9 pā. 4 a. 7 sū. 28 )‘prāsaṅgikeprāyaścittaṃ na vidyate’ ( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 14 sū. 34 )‘na vā 'pātratvādapātratvaṃ tvekadeśatvāt’ ( a. 6 pā. 4 a. 2 sū. 3 )‘api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syāt’ ityādinyāyavirodhaḥ | evametasminnapi pakṣe sarvaṃ tantraṃ vighaṭate | tasmāducyate ‘śeṣaḥ parārthatvāt’ iti |
āha—kiṃ tādarthyopakārayorbhedo 'pyasti | bāḍhamasti | kutaḥ |

uddeśamātreṇa tāvattādarthyaprasiddhiḥ | sā copakārāpakārayostulyā | tadyathā—maśa
kārtho dhūma ityapakāriṇyapi prayujyate | tathopakurvannapi prasaṅgyaprayojakayoṃrna tādarthyena vyapadiśyate | na hi kaścidapi śālikulyāsthamudakaṃ pibanmadarthametāḥ praṇītā ityadhyavasyati | tasmādanyattādarthyamanyaścopakāra iti vijñāyate | nanvevaṃ satyapakārako 'pi śeṣaḥ prāpnoti | loke tāvatprāpnotu nāma | vede punaranapekṣitatvānna bhaviṣyatīti | yo hi tādarthyenāvadhāritaḥ sa kimupakariṣyati, athāpakariṣyatīti saṃdigdhe śeṣibhirapakāro nāpekṣita iti taṃ parityajyāpekṣāsāmarthyādupakāraḥ kalpyate | nanu copakāranirapekṣaṃ naiva tādarthyaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum | kutaḥ |
na hi prayājādayaḥ sāmīpyamātreṇaivopakāranirapekṣāstādarthyaṃ pratipadyante | tasmādupakārapūrvakameva tādarthyamiti sa eva śeṣatvakāraṇaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

‘daśā
daśāpabitreṇeti—vastrakhaṇḍenetyarthaḥ |pavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi’ ‘vrīhīnprokṣati’ ityādiṣu tāvacchrutyaiva tādarthye 'bhihite 'ṅgatvamavadhāryopakāraḥ kalpyate | yatrāpi tu prayājādau tādarthyābhidhānābhāvādupakārapūrvakatvaṃ lakṣyate tatrāpyapekṣāmātrameva tasya, prathamaṃ na niṣpattiḥ | na hyanavagatāṅgatveṣu prayājādiṣūpakāradarśanaṃ kalpanaṃ cāstītyuktam | ato darśapūrṇamāsayorupakāramapekṣamāṇayoḥ prayājādiṣu copakāryamapekṣamāṇeṣvaniṣpannāvastha evopakāre prakaraṇāttādarthyaṃ tāvatpratīyate | tadanyathānupapattimātreṇopakārakalpanā | tenopakārāpekṣāmātramiha tādarthyapramāṇānumāne vyāpriyate | nopakārādeva śeṣatvaṃ tādarthyaṃ vetyanavadyam | evaṃ ca sati śrutyādīnyeva tādarthyapratipādanarūpeṇa śeṣasya viniyojakānīti tadvivekārthaṃ lakṣaṇamārabdhavyam | satyapi cāṅgapradhānādīnāmupakārasaṃkare 'tādarthyādasaṃkarasthitisiddhiḥ | tasmātparārthatvalakṣaṇameva śeṣatvaṃ nirdoṣam | yaḥ parasyopakāre vartata iti—pārārthyamevopakāreṇa phalenābhidhīyata ityavagantavyaṃ na tvatraiva lakṣaṇoktibhrāntiḥ kartavyā | tathā ca sphuṭī karoti ye parārthāste vaktāro bhavantīti | paraḥ punarupakāralakṣaṇa
bhrāntyā vadati—yathopādhyāyaḥ śiṣyāṇāmiti | satyaṃ vartata iti—tādarthyopakāra
vyatireketi pāṭhāntaram |vyatikaradarśanādihālakṣitaṃ śeṣatvamityupekṣyaitadudāharaṇamaikāntikapārārthyayuktamudāharatitadyathā garbhadāsa iti | sa hyutpattyaiva svāmyarthena prasiddhaḥ | anaṅvāṃśca vahanārthatayā | na tu svāmī tādarthyenāvagamyata iti vivekaḥ | parastu tatrāpyupakārakatvādastyeva kaścittādarthyaleśa iti pratyavatiṣṭhate—nanu garbhadāsasyāpīti | siddhāntavādī tvāhaātmana evāsau saṃvidadhāna iti | u
uddeśena hītiidamatrā ' 'kūtam | nirūpakatāsaṃbandhe yanniṣṭhoddeśyatāviśiṣṭakṛtikārakatvena vihitaṃ yat, tattvaṃ tadaṅ gatvamiti | ‘darśapūṃrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta’ ityanena darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ svarganiṣṭhoddeśyatāviśiṣṭakṛtikārakatvena vihitatvāllakṣaṇasaṃgatiḥ | atra ca lakṣaṇe kṛtikārakatvaṃ kṛtyanvitakartṛtvādyanyatamānvitatvam | vihitatvaṃ ca svaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakatvasaṃbandhena vidhiviśiṣṭatvam | ataḥ karaṇatvādīnāmeva kṛtyanvitatvādū bhāvanāyā eva ca vidhiviṣayatvānnāvyāptyādiśaṅkāvakāśa iti dik |ddeśena hi tādarthyaṃ vivicyate | na ca svāmino garbhadāsādyuddeśena tadupakārāya pravṛttiḥ | kiṃ tarhi, svārthasiddhiprayuktā, nāntarīyakatatsaṃvidhānādaśeṣatvam | yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyata iti—punaruktaśaṅkayopanyāsaḥ | nanu ca tadadhyāyoktenaiva lakṣaṇena gatārthatvānnātra vaktavyamata āha—tatrāpūrvārthatā vyāvartiteti | tatra kecidevaṃ vyācakṣate | tatra dṛṣṭārthānāmavahantyādīnāṃ śeṣatvamuktam | iha tu sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭārthānāmadṛṣṭārthānāṃ ca dravyaviṣayāṇāṃ karmaviṣayāṇāṃ ca śeṣāṇāṃ lakṣaṇamucyata iti | evaṃ tu sati etasyāpunaruktatā syāt | tatpunaretena gatārthamityapahṛtameva | tasmādevaṃ varṇayitavyam—atha tatra kiṃ vṛttaṃ yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyata iti | tadabhidhīyate |

sarvaviṣayavyāpi śeṣatvamiha
ihatyameveti pāṭhāntaram | labhyameva tatra nītamapūrvabhedanirākaraṇārtham | athavā pūrvoktaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvalakṣaṇamanamekṣyāpūrvavatsaṃprati kāraṇāntaranirāsena parārthatvalakṣaṇe śeṣatve 'bhihite ‘yaistu dravyaṃ cikirṣyate’ ityanenopakāralakṣaṇābhyupagamādvirodhamāśaṅkya pariharati | tatrāpūrvabhedakalpanānivṛttyarthamupakāradarśanamuktaṃ na śeṣalakṣaṇatvena | atra punaḥ sarvaśeṣāṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ lakṣaṇamevocyata iti bhinnaviṣayatvādavirodha iti || 2 ||

idānīṃ śeṣatvasya viṣa
lakṣyamityarthaḥ |yaṃ kathayati | tatra bādarimatena tāvattraya eva śeṣāḥ | dravyaṃ hi ( a. 6 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 1 )‘dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ’ iti svabhāvata eva śeṣabhūtaṃ niyamānniṣprayojanatvena kevalaṃ vyāvartyate | guṇo 'pyaruṇādiḥ kriyāyāḥ svasādhanabhūtadravyaparicchedasāmarthyādutpattyaiva śeṣaḥ | tathā saṃskāro 'pyavahantyādiryāgasādhanapuroḍāśādinirvṛttaye coditānāṃ vrīhyādīnāṃ svarūpeṇāyogyatvādavahatānāṃ yogyatvādavahatānāṃ yogyatvamāpādannutpattyaivāṅgaṃ bhavatīti | na tu yāgādāvautpa
autpattikamiti—svābhāvikamityarthaḥ |ttikaṃ śeṣatvaṃ dṛśyate | na ca śabdena codyate | yāgastāvatsarvakārakairanuṣṭhīyate | na cānyatra vyāpriyamāṇo dṛśyate | phala iti cet |
na | ciranirvṛtte yāge phalotpattipratīteḥ | nanu ca bhāvārthādhikaraṇe karaṇatvaṃ yāgasyoktam | satyamuktaṃ na tu sādhitam | svargakā
ṣaṣṭhādhyāyādyādhikaraṇamityarthaḥ |mādhikaraṇādhīnasiddhinā tena
tena—bhāvārthādhikaraṇenetyarthaḥ | nāmapadakaraṇatvamātranirākaraṇāt | ata idānīmasiddhāvasthenaiva karaṇatvena vyavaharati | phalamapi yāgaṃ prati sādhyamānatvātpradhānaṃ, puruṣaṃ prati tvasya śeṣabhāvo naivopāttaḥ | kāmyamānatvena sutarāṃ pradhānatvāt | puruṣa eva tu kāmaṃ dravyatvādyāge guṇatvena syāt | tasmāddravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣveva śeṣabhāva iti || 3 ||
gatārthametat || 4 ||

kāmapadopādānādeva phalasya puruṣārthatvaṃ gamyate | na hi kaścidbuddhipūrvakāryevaṃ kāmayate svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmiti | kiṃ tarhi, mamopabhogyaḥ syāditi | punaścā ' 'tmanepadanirdeśātkarturevopabhogyo nānyasyeti gamyate | tenopabhoktāraṃ prati phalamapi śeṣabhūtam || 5 ||

puruṣo 'pi yajetetyākhyātena guṇabhūta ākṣiptaḥ | audumbarīsaṃmānādau vihita iti śeṣaḥ | evaṃ catuḥsūtreṇādhikaraṇena samastaḥ śeṣatvaviṣayaḥ pratipāditaḥ | atra codyate | yattāvad ‘dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣu’ ityatra na tu yāgaphalapuruṣeṣu śeṣatvamityabhidhā
abhidhāyeti—na tu yāgaphalapuruṣā ityanena bhāṣyeṇetyarthaḥ |yānte
anta iti—kasya puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūta ityādineti śeṣaḥ | puru ṣasya śeṣitvanirākaraṇaṃ tadasaṃbaddham | yattu ‘pratyakṣaścāsya dravyatvātkarma prati guṇabhāvaḥ, iti | tadapi vyāhataṃ punaruktaṃ ca | pūrvamevābhihitatvāt | na ca yāgaphalābhyāṃ śeṣatvanirākaraṇavadbhyāṃ sahāsyā
asya—puruṣapadasyetyarthaḥ |tulyapravṛttitvāduccāraṇaṃ yuktam | tasmādasadetat | yadapya dhikaraṇasamāptāvuktam—athedānīmatra bhagavānvṛttikāraḥ pariniścikāyeti | tadapi prathamameva dravyaguṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ nirapekṣaśeṣatvābhidhānātkarmaphalapuruṣāṇāṃ ca dravyādīni prati prādhānye 'vasthite sūtraireva parasparāpekṣaśeṣatvapratipādanāduktārthamiti mandaphalaṃ dṛśyate | tenaivaṃ parihartavyam | asyādhikaraṇasya vyākhyānadvayaṃ kṛtam | tatra prathamaṃ tāvatsvamatena ‘śeṣaḥ parārthatvāt’ ityabhihite bādarimatamupakāralakṣaṇaśeṣatvābhiprāyeṇa dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣveva śeṣatvamityevaṃ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya jaiminimatameva siddhāntatvena varṇitam | tathā ca pūrvatra dṛṣṭopakārānukramaṇameva bhāṣye dṛśyate | tatra ca puruṣasya dravya
tvātpratyakṣameva kriyānirvṛttihetutvādiṣṭameva śeṣatvam | yāgaphalayostu na kiṃcitprati pratyakṣaṃ sādhanatvamupalabhyata ityaśeṣatvam | yattu na yāgaphalapuruṣeṣviti trayāṇāmapi bhāṣye saṃkīrtanaṃ na tatprakṛtaśeṣapadānuṣaṅgādevaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ teṣāṃ śeṣatvamiti | kiṃ tarhi, yatsiddhāntavādisaṃmataṃ tanna bhavatītyevaṃ saṃbandhaḥ | sarvatra hi pūrvapakṣavādinā siddhāntavādimataṃ pratiṣeddhavyaṃ na yatkiṃcit | śeṣatvameva hi asau tadabhipretameveti pratiṣedhati na svarūpamātreṇa | siddhāntavādinaścaitanmataṃ yaduta yāgaphalapuruṣāṇāṃ dvyākāratvaṃ kiṃcidapekṣya śeṣatvaṃ kiṃcidapekṣya śeṣitvamiti tadbādarimatānusārī bhāṣyakāraḥ pratiṣedhati | na tu
na tu yāgaphalapuruṣā iti bhāṣyārthaṃ pradarśayati—na tu yāgaphaletyādinā | yāgaphalapuruṣeṣu siddhāntavādisaṃmataṃ dvyākāratvam | yāgaphalayorekāntenaiva śeṣitvātpuruṣasya cātyantaśeṣatvāt | sarvathā ya evaika ākāraḥ pratiṣiddhastenevai tadvyākāratvanirākaraṇaṃ śakyamiti trayāṇāmapyetāvatā tulyadharmatvātsaha nirdeśaḥ | ‘karmāṇyapi jaiminiḥ, ityādibhirantarṇītadvyākārameva śeṣatvaṃ pratipāditam | pārārthyalakṣaṇaśeṣatvāṅgīkaraṇāt | nanvevaṃ sati puruṣasya dravyatvātpūrvapakṣavādinaivābhyupagamya śeṣatvaṃ, śeṣitve nirākṛte siddhāntavādinā tadeva pratipādanīyamiti na vaktavyaṃ ‘puruṣaśca karmārthatvāt’ iti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | tena hi yāgaphalayoraśeṣatvāttasya śeṣitvaṃ nirākṛtam | tataśca yāvadeva sūtra
sūtradvayeneti— ‘karmāṇyapi jaiminiḥ phalārthatvāt’ ‘phalaṃ ca puruṣārthatvāt’ iti sūtradvayenetyarthaḥ |dvayena yāgaphalayo śeṣatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ tāvadeva yāgopa
