‘yāgopasarjana’ miti—yāga upasarjanaṃ yasyeti bigrahaḥ |sarjanaṃ phalaṃ prati pradhānatvādumau prati kevalaṃ śeṣitvameva prasaktamiti pralīne dvyākāretva punaḥ śeṣatvapratiprasavārthamucyate ‘puruṣaśca karmārthatvāt’ iti | athavā pareṇopakāradvāreṇa śeṣatvamabhyupagataṃ tadayuktaṃ manyamānaḥ phalayāgayorivāsyāpi pārārthyakṛtameveti pratipādayiṣyannāha—‘puruṣaśca karmārthatvāt’ na tadupakaritvāditi | vṛttikāramatena sūtracatuṣṭayamanyathā vyākhyāsyannāha—‘athātra bhagavān’ iti | naivedānīṃ bādarimataṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ | kiṃ tarhi, ‘śeṣaḥ parārthatvāt’ iti sāmānyena lakṣaṇamuktvā tasyaiva viṣayapradarśanadvāreṇottaraḥ prapañcaḥ kriyate | tatra pūrvavyākhyāyāṃ dravyaguṇasaṃskāraṣveva śeṣatvābhityevamavadhāraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣe kṛtam | idānīṃ tu siddhāntarūpeṇaiva bādarimatamapratiṣedhenānumataṃ kṛtvā lakṣaṇaprapañcābhyāṃ śeṣatvaṃ varṇayiṣyate | dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣu śeṣatvamevetyavadhārayati | ataśca dravyaguṇasaṃskārāḥ śeṣatvena niyatāḥ śeṣitvaṃ na pratipadyante śeṣatvaṃ punaraniyatatvādyāgaphalapuruṣeṣvapyastveveti tatpratipādanārthānyuttarasūtrāṇyavaka
lpante | tasmādāpekṣikaśeṣaśeṣitvamātramevaibhiḥ sūtraiḥ pratipādyate | tathā ca bhāṣye darśitam | tataśca dviprakāra eṣa śeṣaviṣayo naiyamika āpekṣikaścetyuktaṃ bhavati | nanu ca dravyaguṇasaṃskārāṇāmapi svāṅgāni prati pradhānatvādyāgaṃ ca prati guṇabhāvādāpekṣikameva śeṣaśeṣitvam | tathā hi |

vrīhyādayo hyavaghātādīnprati pradhānabhūtāḥ puroḍāśanirvṛttiṃ prati guṇabhūtāḥ | tathā guṇaḥ saṃkhyādiḥ saṃkhyeyaṃ prati paricchedāccheṣaḥ | yeṣāṃ tu guṇānāṃ niṣpādyā sa tānprati śeṣiṇī | tathā saṃskāraḥ saṃmārgāvaghātādiragnivrīhyādeḥ śeṣaḥ svasādhanānāmidhmasaṃnahanolūkhalamusalādīnāṃ śeṣī | tasmānnāvadhāraṇaṃ sidhyatīti | taducyate—

dravyaguṇasaṃskārā hi phalavantaṃ yāgaṃ prati niyogataḥ śeṣabhūtāḥ | satyapi svāṅgāni prati śeṣitve taṃ prati nāstītyabhidhīyate | ata eva bhāṣyakāro 'pi ‘niyogato yajiṃ prati śeṣabhāvaḥ’ ityāha | na bra
na bravītīti—anyatheti śeṣaḥ |vīti niyataḥ śeṣabhāva iti | ‘āpekṣika itareṣām’ ityatrāpi yajiṃ pratītyanuvartate | tathā hyekaikasya dvau dvau prati guṇatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca dṛśyate | yāgasya tāvaddravyātmakaṃ nirvartakaṃ puruṣaṃ prati prādhānyaṃ phalaṃ prati guṇatā | yaśca phalaṃ prati guṇaḥ sa śakyate phalasya svāminaṃ puruṣamapi prati sutarāṃ guṇa iti vaktum | tathā yasya puruṣaṃ prati prādhānyaṃ tasya tadupasarjanaṃ phalaṃ prati sutarāṃ tadityapi śakyanirūpaṇam | evaṃ phalasya yāgaṃ prati prādhānyāttatsādhanaṃ puruṣamapi prati prādhānyaṃ, puruṣaṃ prati guṇatvāttadanuṣṭheye yāge 'pi guṇatvam | tathā puruṣasya phalaṃ prati prādhānyāttatsādhanaṃ yāgamapi prati pradhānatvam | yāgaṃ ca prati guṇabhāvāttatsādhye phale 'pi guṇatvam | natvevaṃ dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣviti viśeṣaḥ | yattvidaṃ pāramparyeṇāpi śeṣatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ coktam, idamarthalakṣaṇaṃ vastumātrarūpeṇetyavagantavyam | na vyavahārārtham | mā bhūdaṅgatvāṃśena vikṛtau phalapuruṣayorapi atideśātsiddhāntavirodhaḥ | tasmādetāvatprakāra eva vakṣyamāṇaprapañcaśeṣatvaviṣayasaṃkṣepa iti siddham || 6 ||

uktaḥ sahetuḥ saviṣayaśca śeṣaḥ | idānīṃ ‘kathaṃ ca viniyujyante’ ityayamaṃśo vicāryate | tatra triṣvadhikaraṇeṣu krameṇa saṃskāradravyaguṇānāṃ viniyogaḥ kathyate | tatrāpi kila prathame liṅgena dvitīye vākyena tṛtīye śrutyā viniyoga iti kecit | tattvācāryā necchanti | yadyapyatra vicitrapramāṇavyāpāraparāmarśastathā 'pi śrutiviniyoga evātra pāde, liṅgādiviniyogastu dvitīyapādātprabhṛti bhaviṣyatītyuktam | auṣadha dharmā ityādyapyetadadhikaraṇasādhyamapi siddhāntābhiprāyeṇoktam | nanu saṃyuktā evaita iti siddhāntavādī śrutibalena saṃśayamākṣipati | paraḥ punaḥ padāntarasaṃbandhakṛtaṃ vrīhyādisaṃbandhaṃ śuddhāvaghātavidhinā bādhyamānaṃ manyamāna āha—avaghātādayastu padārthā vidhīyante śrutyeti | taccaitadayuktamiva | kutaḥ |

lg.l: prayujyate padaṃ kiṃcidvinā na hi padāntarāt |

div.p:
na hi vrīhyādibhiḥ saṃbadhyamānā avaghātādayo nāvaghātādayo bhavanti | yadi hyevaṃ bhaveyustataḥ śrutiviruddhatvādvākyaṃ bādhyeta | atra punaḥ kevalānāmevāvaghātādīnāmanuṣṭhātumaśakyatvādavaśyameva saṃba
saṃbandhyantareṇa kāryamiti pāṭhāntaram |ndhyantare kāryāḥ | na hi bhavatpakṣe 'pi avaghātādayaḥ kevalāḥ kriyante | tatra prakaraṇalabhyadravyamātrasaṃbandhaḥ kleśāntareṇa kalpyeta | athāpi kiṃcidadhyāhṛtya saṃbandhaḥ kriyate tathā 'pi kleśaḥ | athā ' 'rādupakārakatvena pradhānasaṃbandha iṣyate tatrāpi viprakarṣaḥ | atha tu naiva kenacitsaṃbadhyate | tato vidhyānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmādasadetat | tenaivaṃ vyākhyeyam |

naivātrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaheturavaghātādayaḥ padārthāḥ svatantrāḥ śrutyā vidhīyante, vākyena vrīhyādibhiḥ saṃbadhyante | tacca śrutyā bādhyate | tasmātkevalavidhānātkiṃ sarvārthāḥ kiṃ vā dṛṣṭopakārasāmarthyena yathāsaṃyogameva mavantīti | kiṃ tarhi—

yadi hyeṣāṃ yathāśrutavrīhyādyarthatvamadhyavasīyate | tataḥ saṃyuktātvātsarve sarvatra na prāpnuyuḥ | ete punarnava
navamādyeti—yattatra prokṣaṇāvaghātādidharmāḥ kiṃ śrutarvīhitvādyavacchinnoddeśena vidhīyanta utāpūrvasādhanatvāvacchinoddeśeneti saṃśayya vrīhyādisvarūpasyāvaghātādivyatirekeṇāpi siddhatvāttadarthatve vidhyānarthakyāpatterlakṣaṇayā 'pūrvasādhanatvāvacchinnoddeśena vidhīyanta iti sādhitaṃ tatparāmṛśyate |mādyādhikaraṇanyāyena śrautaṃ vrīhitvamullaṅghyāpūrvasādhanatvena saṃbadhyante | tacca prakaraṇāpekṣāpūrvasādhanāṃśalakṣaṇāgamyatvādvākyagamyamiti manyamāna āha— vākyenaiṣāṃ vrīhyādisaṃbandho na śrutyā | yacca tadapūrvasādhanāṃśalakṣaṇātmakaṃ vākyaṃ tatprakaraṇāviśeṣādyathauṣadhe tathā ' 'jyasāṃnāyyayorapyaviśiṣṭam | evamutpavanavilāpanaśākhāharaṇādīnāṃ lakṣaṇayaivāśrutahavirantarasaṃbandho darśayitavyaḥ | tatra kimekaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prayojakamutānekam | yadā 'pyanekaṃ tadā 'pi kimapūrvamātramuta kiṃcideveti | yadyekamapūrvaṃ sarvāṇi vā sarveṣāṃ prayojakāni tataḥ saṃkaro dharmāṇām | atha tvanekamapūrvaṃ kiṃcideva prayojakaṃ tataḥ pratyekaṃ vyavastheti | tatra siddhāntenaiva tāvadupakramate ‘teṣāmarthena saṃbandhaḥ’ | yadyapi tāvatke
kevaleti—vrīhyādyuddeśyavācakapadavyatirekeṇa, prokṣati, avahanti, ityādirūpeṇetyarthaḥ |valapadavācyāḥ śrūyeraṃstathā 'pi kva kriyerannityapekṣite yatra kriyamāṇāḥ prayojanavanto bhavanti tatra kartavyāḥ | na caite saṃkīryamāṇāḥ sarvatra prayojanavanto dṛśyante | satyapi cāpūrvaprayuktatve dṛṣṭaprayojanadvāra eva saṃbandho 'vakalpate | athavā śāstreṇaiva yatra kriyamāṇāḥ prayojanavanto vijñāyante yada
yadapūrvasādhanatvamiti pāṭhāntaram |pūrvasādhanaṃ vrīhyādi
śabdaiḥ svābhidheyajātyekārthasamavāyi lakṣitaṃ tadarthatvenāvaghātādayo vijñāyamānāḥ saṃbandhābhāvādapūrvāntarasādhane 'lakṣite na bhaviṣyanti | nanu śrūyante sarve sarvatreti— apūrvaikatvādbhede cāsati lakṣaṇāniyamāparijñānātprayojanasya ca vidhyuttarakālalabhyatvānna taddarśanadvāreṇa vyavastheti matvā paricodanā | etadeva na jānīma iti | nāvaśyamekamevāpūrvaṃ prayojakamapūrvamātraṃ vetyabhiprāyaḥ | satyapi hyaviśeṣaśravaṇe ‘arthādvā
( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 14 sū. 25 ) kalpanaikadeśatvāt’ ityaviruddhaiva vyavasthā | athavaikāpūrvāpūrvamātraprayuktatvapakṣayoḥ saṃkaro nānapūrvaprayuktavrīhyādijātilakṣitasādhanasaṃbandhe tu vyavasthā | na caitayoranyatarasyāvadhāraṇam | ato na jānīmaḥ sarve sarvatra śrūyante neti || 7 ||

paraḥ svābhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti | phalasya hi sūkṣmasāmarthyarūpāvasthā 'ṅkurasthānīyā pūrvānutpannotpetarapūrvamityuktaṃ prāk
sūkṣmaśaktyātmakaṃ vā tatphalamevopajāyata ityādinā 'pūrbādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ | | tacca phalaikatvādekamevādhyavasīyate | tatsādhanatvaṃ cā ' 'jyauṣadhasāṃnāyyānāṃ sarveṣāmaviśiṣṭam | atastaduddeśena vihitānāṃ sarvadharmatvaṃ vijñāyate | yadyapi cā ' 'gneyādīnāmavāntarāpūrvāṇi prātyātmikāni bhaveyuḥ | tathā 'pi teṣāṃ niṣphalatvādyāgādisvarūpavadeva prayojakaśaktirnāstīti paramāpūrvameva prayojakamava dhāryate | bhinnāpūrvaprayuktatve 'pi prakaraṇagatāpūrvasādhanamātroddeśena vidhīyamānānāṃ śeṣāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇānupādānādupādāne ca vākyabhedaprasaṅgātsārvatrikavidhānamastīti sarvadharmatve hetuḥ | tatsiddhyarthaṃ ca ‘saṃyogato 'viśeṣātprakaraṇāviśeṣācca’ ityuktam | yadekasyāpūrvasādhanatvaṃ dharmasaṃbandhakāraṇaṃ taditaratrāpyaviśiṣṭam | yattu viśiṣṭaṃ vrīhitvādi tallakṣaṇā
mātraupayikatvādaniyāmakam | yadapi kārakatvaṃ lakṣyate tadapi sarveṣāṃ pradeyatvāda viśiṣṭam | tasmādapūrvāsaṃbaddhamapradeyamaprakṛtāpūrvasādhanaṃ ca varjayitvā sarve sarvatra kartavyāḥ | yo hyarthātprāpnotīti—acoditaḥ sansāmarthyena laukiprayojanena vā yaḥ prāpnoti sa tadvaśena vyavatiṣṭhate | athavā yatra pūrvataraprāptaprayojanadvāreṇa dharmāḥ prāpnuvanti na ca dharmebhya eva prayojanakalpanā yathā vikṛtiṣu, tatra yāvadarthatvaṃ bhavet | atra punaḥ prakṛtāvupadeśena, prākprayojanebhyaḥ svarūpamātreṇa kalpayiṣyamāṇaprayojanāḥ santo vidhīyante | tena naiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ, yatra prayojanaṃ tatraite | kiṃ tarhi | yatraite tatra dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanamiti | tasmātsarvadharmāḥ || 8 ||
dṛṣṭārthalopācchāstragamyārthalopādveti nigadavyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyam || 9 ||
yaduktamadṛṣṭakalpanānnaivetaratrāpyarthalopa iti | tatrābhidhīyate |

lg.l: adṛṣṭārthā agatyā syurdṛṣṭaṃ vā na bhavedyadi ||

div.p:
āmnānānyathānupapattyā hyadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyate | taccā ' 'mnānamanyathaiva dṛṣṭārthatayopapannamityarthāpatterasaṃbhavaḥ | taddarśayati | avaghātādīnāmanuṣṭhā
anena ca sautraṃ saha ceṣṭayeti padaṃ vivṛtaṃ jñeyam |nasahitaṃ phalaṃ vrīhiṣu dṛśyate | anyatra tu ceṣṭāmātram | na ca saphalaceṣṭānuṣṭhānasaṃbhave viphalānuṣṭhāne vidhiḥ puruṣaṃ ni
yoktuṃ śaknoti | na ca tenāniyujyamānaḥ phalakalpanānimittaṃ labhate | taditaretarāśrayaṃ bhavati || phalādvidhirvidheśca phalamityabhyupagamāt |

lg.l: na hyatraikamapi spaṣṭaṃ prasiddhaṃ vrīhiṣu dvayam |

div.p: tathotpavanādīnāmājyasāṃnāyyayoriti yojanīyam | tathā hi |

avaghātādinirvartyo hi tuṣakaṇavipramocanādirarthaḥ puroḍāśasiddhiṃ prati ṣaḍbhirapi vrīhipuroḍāśakratvapūrvādhvaryuyajamānairapekṣitaḥ | na hi tasmādṛte vrīhibhiryaṣṭuṃ puroḍāśo vā nirvartayituṃ śakyeteti | taddarśayati—prayojanaṃ ca teneti |
tataścāvaghāta ājyasāṃnāyyayorapi syāt | sati tu dṛṣṭe kālpanikāṃsabhavādyathārthameva vyavasthāsiddhiḥ | tathā hi |

athavā tata ete sarvatra vihitā bhaveyuḥ, yadi paramāpūrvaprayuktāḥ sarvāpūrvaprayuktā vā syuḥ | tadā caivaṃ te bhaveyuḥ | yadi bhinnāni vrīhyādikarmāpū
āgneyādijanyotpattyapūrvāṇītyarthaḥ |rvāṇi na syuḥ | yadi caiṣāṃ
eṣāṃ—utpattyapūrvāṇāṃ, prayojakaśaktiḥ—aṅgagrāhakatvaśaktirityarthaḥ | prayojakaśaktirna syāt | tāni tu prayojakaśaktimanti pratikarma bhinnāni vidyante | tatra bhedastāvadapū( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 2 )rvādhikaraṇe sādhitaḥ | yadyapi caiṣāṃ sākṣādaphalatvaṃ tathā 'pi svarūpasiddhyanthathānupapattyaiva prayojakatvaṃ bhaviṣyati | na ca niṣphalāni | tannāma niṣphalatvādaprayojakaṃ bhavati yadatyantaniṣphalam | tannirapekṣa vā dravyayāgādi svarūpavallabdhātmakam | āgneyādyavāntarāpūrvāṇi tu paramāpūrvasiddhyaṅgatvātpāramparyeṇa phalavanti | na
ca dharmebhyaḥ prāk siddhāni nirjñāto
na ca—nirjñāteti—āgneyādijanyāvāntarāpūrvāṇāmapyadṛṣṭarūpatvena tadutpatteranirjñātaprakāratvādityarthaḥ |pāyaparimāṇāni vā | tasmādātmalābhārthameva prayujyente yacca yeṣu dharmeṣu vidhīyamāneṣvapūrvamupatiṣṭhate tatteṣāṃ prayojakaṃ bhavati na yāvatkiṃcit | vrīhyādiśadbaiśca svakarmasādhyameva kevalamapūrvamupasthāpyate nānyat | asaṃbandhāt | tataścāvaghātādayastadevaikamapūrvaṃ prāpyārthavanto jātā na paramāpūrvaṃ karmāntarāpūrvaṃ vā 'pekṣante | taddarśayati | yasmādavahananādi ceṣṭayā saha śruteṣu vrīhyādiṣveva svāpūrvasādhanadvāreṇa vidheḥ phalaṃ dṛśyate tasmānnānyatra saṃkrāntiḥ | yadi tu tatrāpūrvaṃ na syāttato 'rthādadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta | vrīhyādiśadbairanupasthāpito 'pyupakāraḥ prayojakaḥ kalpyeta | asti tu tat | sūtramapyevam | viprayoge—taṇḍulādiniṣpādyasyāpūrvasya | prayojanābhāvātsāṃnāyyādisaṃbandho 'pi vyavahitaparamāpūrvadvāreṇa karmāntarāpūrvadvāreṇa vā śabdārthaḥ syāt | pratyāsannāpūrvasadbhāve tu na śabdastāvantaṃ khedaṃ sahate | tasmādapramāṇakaḥ sāṃnāyyādisaṃbandhaḥ | evaṃ tarhyāgneyādyapūrvasaṃbandhāviśeṣātsrugādīnāmavaghātādayaḥ prāpnuvanti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kārakāntaratvena teṣāmalakṣitatvāt | yathaiva hi pradeyatvāviśeṣe 'pi sāṃnāyyāderapūrvāntarasādhanatvādapratītirevamekāpūrvasaṃbandhe 'pi vrīhitvaikārthasamavetapradeyarūpakārakatvābhāvātsrugādīnāmagrahaṇam | yattu tasminnevāpūrve samānakārakatvenopakariṣyati tasya bhaviṣyantyeva dharmāḥ | yathā ya
yathā yavānāmiti— ‘vrīhīnprokṣati, avahanti’ ityādau vrīhyādipadenā ' 'gneyādyutpattyapūrvaniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāsamānādhikaraṇakāryatānirūpitapradeyaprakṛtitaṇḍulavyāpārakakāraṇatāsāmānyāśrayatvaṃ lakṣayitvā tadavacchinnoddeśenaiva prokṣaṇādayo vidhīyante | niruktoddeśyatāvacchekakoṭau prayojanābhāvādinā vrīhitvāderapraveśātkāraṇatāsāmānyapraveśācca dharmāṇāṃ yavasādhāraṇyasiddhiḥ | srugādivyāvṛttisiddhiśca, vivakṣitavyāpāreṇa niruktasādhanatāyāstatrābhāvāt | vrīhiyavayostu, āgneyādyutpattyapūrvaniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitā kāraṇatā—āgneyādiyāganiṣṭhā, tadadhikaraṇavartinī yā kāryatā—vrīhyādiniṣṭhakāraṇatānirūpitā, āgneyādiniṣṭhā kāryatā, tannirūpitā yā niruktavyāpārakakāraṇatā— vrīhiyavaniṣṭhā kāraṇatā, tatsāmānyāśrayatvasya sattvādavaghātādidharmaprāptyavighāta iti dika |vānām | sarvaṃ caitannavame vistareṇa vakṣyāmaḥ || 10 ||

avaghātādivadeva dravyāṇāmapi yathāsaṃyogaṃ viniyoge siddhe kimarthaḥ punarārambhaḥ | ucyate | evaṃ tāvattatra dṛṣṭaprayojanavaśena yathāsaṃyogaṃ viniyogaṃ pūrvapakṣavādī manyate | sa cātrāpi vinā dṛṣṭena prayojanena naivā ' 'śrayitavyaḥ | sati hi dṛṣṭārthatvenānyatrāprasaṅge na kaścidapi yathāsaṃyogaṃ vyavasthāheturasti | yathā ca tasya vrīhyādisaṃbandhādbhi
bhinnāpūrvamiti—viśeṣāpūrvamityarthaḥ |nnāpūrvaprayuktatvaṃ naivaṃ vedyuddhananādiṣvekaṃ kiṃcidapūrvaṃ prayojakam | eka eva ca tatra saṃyogaḥ
saṃyoga iti—saṃyujyate viniyujyate 'neneti saṃyogaḥ | viniyojakavākyamityarthaḥ | | iha tu dvau saṃyogau ‘etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni’ ityekaḥ ‘sphyenoddhanti’ ityevamādiraparaḥ | tayoścaiko vidhiraparo 'nuvādaḥ | tadyadi pūrvo vidhistataḥ sākṣādyāgasaṃbandhe ca( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 4 )turthādhikaraṇena vyāvartite saptadaśāratnitvavadānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣvevāvatarantyaṅgatvāviśeṣādyathāsāmarthyaṃ sarvārthānīti vijñāyante | tataścoddhananādisaṃyogānāmavayutyānuvādatvam | atha punaruddhananādisaṃyuktā eva vidhaya itaro 'nuvādastataḥ pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyenaiva yathāsaṃyogaṃ vyavastheti | kiṃ prāptam | apūrvabhedasaṃbandhābhāvāddṛṣṭārthatvāviśeṣācca yathāsāmarthyaṃ viniyogaḥ | evaṃ yajñāyudhasaṃyuktā vidhayo bhūtvā 'rthavanto bhaviṣyanti | ba
bahuvacanaṃ ceti—bhāṣyasthamiti śeṣaḥ |huvacanaṃ ca vidheyā
vidheyārthaśabdeti—vidheyārthasamarpakāṇāṃ sphyaśca kapālāni cetyādiśabdānāmityarthaḥ |rthaśabdabahutvābhiprāyam | itarathā tvekavākyatvādeka eva vidhiḥ | tasmādyathāsāmarthyaṃ viniyoga iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |
sphyāderutpattisaṃbandhaḥ kāryairuddhananādibhiḥ |
tatra yajñāyudhānīti prāptamevānukīrtyate ||

‘etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni’ iti vaiśabdasaṃyogādasyānuvādasārūpyam | na cātra bhāvanāvacano vidhāyako 'sti yo viniyuñjīta vidadhyādveti | bahutarāṇi ca vākyāni tvatpakṣe 'narthakāni bhaveyuḥ | na hyeṣāmanuvādatve kiṃcitprayojanamasti | sākṣāccaitāni svābhidhānairuddhananādiṣveva viniyujyante | parokṣavṛttyā yajñāyudhavākye | yajñaśabdasyāṅgalakṣaṇārthatvādāyudhaśabdasya ca yuddhasādhanavacanasya kriyāntarasādhaneṣvaupacārikatvāt | na cātra saptadaśāratninyāyo 'vakalpate | na hyatra vājapeyasyetivatsaṃbandhamātrābhidhāyinī yajñaśabdātparā ṣaṣṭhī dṛśyate | satyapi cā ' 'narthakyāttadaṅgāvataraṇe sāmānyaśāstrāṇi viśeṣaśāstrairuddhananādisaṃyuktairupasaṃhriyamāṇāni na karmāntaraiḥ saṃbadhyeran | tasmāduddhananādivākyaprāpitānāṃ satāṃ yādṛśaṃ vayaṃ yajñāyudhatvaṃ paśyāmastādṛśam ‘etāni vai daśa’ ityanenānūdyate | yattvapūrvabhedaḥ prayojako nāstīti | tatra brūmaḥ | kapālādīnāṃ tāvadastyeva puroḍāśādyapūrvabhedaḥ | itareṣāmapyuddhananādidvāratvādanyatra tatkṛtopakārābhāvādasaṃkaraḥ | tadyathā 'vaghātādayaḥ samānāpūrvanibandhaneṣvapi srugādiṣu kārakāntaratvānna kriyante | tasmādeteṣāmapi yathāsaṃyogameva viniyoga iti siddham || 11 ||

aruṇāśabdo guṇavacanaḥ, piṅgākṣyekahāyanīśabdau dvāvapi sāmānādhikaraṇyādekadravyavacanau | tatra guṇe saṃdehaḥ | kimekavākyagatenaiva dravyeṇa saha saṃbadhyata uta prakṛtena dravyamātreṇeti | nanu ca piṅgākṣyekahāyanīśabdayorapi guṇavacanatvānnaivātra vākye dravyamasti | kathaṃ guṇavacanatvamiti cet | ucyate |
gomānityevamādiṣu hi goṣu prātipadiṃkenāmihitāsu tadvatyarthe matupā 'bhidhātavye 'vaśyaṃ tāvatsaṃbandhaḥ pūrvataramabhidhātavyaḥ | kutaḥ |

viśeṣaṇaṃ tāvatsarvatra pūrvataramabhidhīyata iti sthi
ākṛtyadhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |tam | iha ca saṃbandho viśeṣaṇamiṣyate na gomātram | asaṃbaddheṣu pratyayānutpādāt | yadi gomātraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavettatastāsu prātipadikenābhihitāsu viśeṣyaṃ pratyayo 'bhidadhyāt | saṃbandhe punarviśeṣaṇe niyoga
niyogataḥ—niyamenetyarthaḥ |taḥ so 'bhidhātavyaḥ kenacit | na cāsya prātipadikamabhidhāyakam | ākṛtimātrābhidhāyitvāt | na ca prātipadikārtho ga
gamakaḥ—lakṣaka ityarthaḥ |makaḥ | vinā 'pi saṃbandhenopapadyamānatvāt | kevalagośabdoccāraṇe 'pi cāpratīteḥ | gomatpadoccāraṇe 'pi pratyayavelāyāmeva saṃbandhabuddhiḥ | ataśca ‘tadāgame hi taddṛśyate’ ityapi pratyayārthatvam | yacca viśeṣye vartate tena tatpratyāsannaṃ viśeṣaṇamupādātavyam | na ca prātipadikaṃ viśeṣye vartate tatastadviśeṣaṇabhūtaṃ saṃbandhamupādadīta | pratyayastu tatra vartata ityupādatte | sa cedupāttastenaiva saṃbandhipratyayasiddherabhidhānaśaktipratibandhādviśeṣyānabhidhānam | na ca viśeṣyapratyayātsaṃbandhapratyayo bhavati | prāksaṃbandhādviśeṣyatvābhāvātsiddhe ca viśeṣyatvena saṃbandhe na paścātkiṃcitprayojanamastītyapratītirevāsya prāpnoti | tasmātprathamatarapratyāyyatvātpratyayārthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | itaśca pratyayārthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ |

yathaiva śābaleyasya gotvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ yathā ca viśeṣaṇabhūtā jātirbhākpratyayena niṣkṛṣṭā 'bhidhīyata iti gopadasya saiva vācyatveneṣṭā | tathā devadattasya gomattvamityukte gavi pratipattyabhāvātsaṃbandhaniṣkarṣapratīteśca sa eva bhāvapratyayārtho 'dhyavasīyate | yaśca bhāvapratyayārthaḥ sa prātipadikasya viśeṣye vartamānasya nimittam | yacca nimittaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatvānmukhyamabhidheyaṃ, lākṣaṇikaṃ viśeṣyam | yadi ca matupā saṃbandho 'bhihitastataḥ prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha
saha—prakṛtyarthena sahetyarthaḥ | brūta iti gomatprātipadikādutpanno bhāvapratyayaḥ saṃbandhamabhidhātumarhati nānyathā | tasmādapi saṃbandho 'rthaḥ | etena sarve yaugikāḥ kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu vyākhyātāḥ | sarvatra hi bhāvapratyayaḥ saṃbandhamabhidhatte | rājapuruṣatvamaupagavatvaṃ pācakatvamiti | ata evaite yaugikāḥ, yatastena nimittena vartante |tasmānmatvarthaviṣayatvādbahuvrīherekahāyanyādiśabdaiḥ saṃbandho 'bhidhīyate | kiṃ ca |

ekaṃ hāyanamasyā iti ṣaṣṭhyantenānyapadārthaḥ pradarśyate | ṣaṣṭhyarthasya ca pratyayārthatvādiha prādhānyam | tadrūpadarśanā
tadupadarśanārthameveti paṭhāntaram |rthameva sarvanāmaprayogaḥ | kevalāyā vibhakteraprayogātsarvanāmārthapratītyabhāvācca | ṣaṣṭhyāśca svasvāmisaṃbandhavikārāvayavādisaṃbandho vācya ityetatprasiddham | ato 'pi saṃbandhābhidhānaṃ bahuvrīhiṇā |

vyaktidharmā hyete, piṅge akṣiṇī asyāḥ, ekaṃ hāyanamasyāḥ, citrā gāvo 'syetyevamādayaḥ | tāsāṃ ca vyaktīnāmanantatvena saṃbandhānupalabdhervyabhicārāccāvācakaḥ śabda ityuktam | na hyadya jātāyāṃ piṅgākṣyāṃ prathamaḥ prayogo bhavet | ato 'vaśyaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃcidvācyamāśrayitavyam | na ca tadiha saṃbandhādanyadupapadyate | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: tathā 'pi guṇa evāsau na dravyamiti gamyate ||

div.p:
tasmānna dravyaśabdaḥ kaścidatra vidyata ityanudāharaṇatvam | na cānyadudāharaṇaṃ saṃbhavati | sākṣāddravyavacanaśabdābhāvāt | sarvatra hi rụ̄dhiśabdānāṃ jātivacanatvaṃ yaugikānāṃ ca saṃbandhābhidhāyitvam | yastvekāntena dvavyavacanaḥ syāḍḍitthaḍavitthādiśabdaḥ sa naiva
vede pra
anena vaidikaśabdānāmeva vicāraviṣayatayā laukikānāṃ ḍitthādiśabdānāṃ vicārāviṣayatvamuktaṃ bhavati |yujyate | tasmājjātiguṇayorguṇayoreva bā niyamaḥ syāditi siddhāntoktāvapi yojayitavyam | athavā 'dhikaraṇameva nirviṣayatvānnā ' 'rabdhavyamiti | ucyate |

yadyekahāyanyādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ saṃbandho 'bhidhīyeta tato nodāhiyeran | na tvetaiḥ saṃbandho ' bhidhīyate | katham | atigauravāt | iha hi saṃbandhamātraṃ vā 'bhidheyaṃ kalpyeta tadviśeṣo vā | yadi tāvatsaṃbandhamātraṃ tataḥ sarvayaugikānāmekaviṣayopanipātātparyāyatvaprasaṅgaḥ | atha saṃbandhaviśeṣastatastasya sva
svata iti—pratiyogyanuyogibhyāṃ nirūpaṇīyasyeti pūrvaṃ śeṣaḥ |to viśeṣābhāvādavaśyaṃ saṃbandhikṛta eva bhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | saṃbandhyapi cānabhidhīyamāno na śaknotyabhidhīyamānaṃ saṃbandhaṃ vyavacchettumityavaśyaṃ so 'pyabhidhātavyaḥ | na caikasminsaṃbandhini saṃbandho 'vasthitaḥ | na ca tanmātreṇānyasmādvyavacchinnaḥ pratīyata ityubhāvapyabhidhātavyau | tatra gomānityekaḥ saṃbandhī gośabdenābhidhīyate | dvitīyasya na kaścidabhidhātā dṛśyate | tena matupā viśiṣṭaṃ saṃbandhamabhidadhatā tadvantaṃ santaṃ saṃbandhinamekamanuktvā 'bhi
saṃbandhidvayaviśiṣṭaṃ sabandhamiti pūrvaṃ śeṣaḥ |dhātumaśaknuvatā niyogataḥ so 'pyabhidhātavyaḥ | tataśca tamabhidhāya saṃbandhābhidhāyāmatigauravaṃ syāt | api ca |

yadā ca pūrvatarābhihitasaṃbandhipratītyaiva saṃbandho 'pyākṣiptastadā naiva pratyayenāpi so 'bhidhīyata iti śakyaṃ vaktum | tasmādarthākṣiptenaiva saṃbandhena bhavitavyam | yattvapratīte saṃbandhe viśeṣyaṃ na pratīyata iti | tatra brūmaḥ |

lg.l: viśeṣaṇaṃ ca gāvo 'tra na saṃbandhaḥ kathaṃcana ||

div.p:
devadatto hi gobhiravacchinno vivakṣitaḥ | tāśca prātipadikenopāttāḥ santyeva | yattu nāsaṃbaddhābhiravacchidyata iti | satyaṃ nāvacchidyate | tenai
tenaiva—asaṃbaddhasya viśeṣyavyavacchedakatvānupapattyākhyahetunaivetyarthaḥ |va tābhiḥ saṃba
saṃbandhākṣepaḥ—saṃbandhapratītiḥ |ndhākṣepo 'rthā
arthāt—arthāpattipramāṇāditi |
llabhyate sarvathā tāvadgomacchabdena goviśiṣṭo 'yamityetadabhihite kathamanavasthitāstā gāvastaṃ viśiṃṣantīti tāsāmevaiṣa vyāpāro na śabdasya | tathā hi |
na hi yena vinā 'rthātmalābho nāsti tattadabhidhātavyam | kiṃ tarhi | yāvatā vinā viśiṣṭabuddhirnotpadyate—gobhiścāpratītābhistadvati buddhirnotpadyate na saṃbandhenāpi | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: sa hi gobhirasaṃbaddhaṃ na gomantaṃ vivakṣati ||

div.p:
sarvatra hi vaktṛkramaviparyayeṇa śrotuḥ kramo bhavati | sa hi prathamaṃ tāvatkiṃcidviśeṣyaṃ vivakṣati tatastasya kenacidviśeṣaṇena vinā 'bhidhātumaśakterviśeṣaṇavivakṣāṃ karoti tataḥ śabdoccāraṇam | śrotā punaḥ prathamaṃ tāvacchadbaṃ śṛṇoti tato viśeṣaṇaṃ tato viśeṣyaṃ tatastadupapattyarthāni vastvantarāṇi prapadyate | tena yadyapi vaktrā pūrvaṃ saṃbandha ālocitastathā 'pi śrotā paścādevainaṃ grahīṣyati | na tvatra vaktrā 'pyasau pūrvaṃtaramavadhāriṃtaḥ | saṃbandhinoragṛhītayorgrahītumaśakyatvādatastadīyenāpi krameṇottarakālameva pratīyamānaḥ saṃbandho nārthākṣiptatvaṃ parityajati | vastudharmaścaiṣa yadasaṃbaddhā gāvo na viśiṃṣanti sa tāsāṃ vyāpāro na śabdasya | tena yaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ śaknuvanti viśeṣṭuṃ sa tathā 'vasthāsyate | saṃbandha
saṃbandhī cāsāviti pāṭho yuktaḥ |ścāsau viśeṣyatvaṃ pratipadyata ityarthātsaṃbadhyate |
tasmādapyanabhidheyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: rūpāntareṇa vaktavya iti nāsti ca lakṣaṇam ||

div.p: ṣaṣṭhīsaptamībhyāṃ hi yādṛk saṃbandhaḥ svapradhāno 'sattvabhūtaśca pratyāyyate na tādṛk matvarthīyena | na ca kṛdabhihito bhāvo dravyavadbhavatītyevamiva rūpāntaropādānaṃ kecidamidadhati | tatra kimasattvabhūtasaṃbandhābhidhānamāśrīyatāmuta saṃbandhyevārthalabhyatadviśiṣṭo 'bhidhīyatāmiti | taducyate |

yattu siddhe viśeṣye na paścātsaṃbandhapratyayena kāryamiti | satyaṃ nāsti | vinā 'pi tu tena nāntarīyakatvātpratīyata iti kiṃ kriyatām | yacca bhāvapratyayenābhidhānādasya matvarthatvamiti | atrāpi brūmaḥ |
gomato bhāvo gomattvamiti hi—

lg.l: sa eva gomato bhāva ucyate tvatalādibhiḥ ||

div.p: tatra yāstāvatprātipadikārthe viśeṣaṇaṃ gāvastāsāṃ tadvataḥ puruṣādatyantabhedādbhāvapratyayenāgrahaṇam | samavetaguṇagrāhī hi bhāvapratyayaḥ | na cā 'nyo 'bhidhīyamānastatra guṇaḥ saṃbhavati, yo nimittabhāvādbhāva ityucyeta | na ca puruṣa eva tasya bhāva ityevaṃ vyapadeśabhedaṃ labhate | tena bhāvapratyayaḥ ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 )‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityarthaprāptaṃ saṃbandhamavalambate | nimittatvamapi ca tasya vastulakṣaṇamastītyabhidheyanimittāsaṃbhave tadapi tāvadgṛhyatāmityevamāśrīyate | tasmādakāraṇametadyaugikānāṃ saṃbandhābhidhānaśaktikalpanāyām |

lg.l: saṃbandhasya ca bhāvatvaṃ vyākhyeyaṃ teṣu pūrvavat |

div.p: yadapyekaṃ hāyanamasya ityanyapadārthe ṣaṣṭhyarthaprādhānyātsaṃbandhe bahuvrīhiriti | tatrābhidhīyate ||

yadi tvanyapadārthaḥ ṣaṭhyanta eva saṃbandhī syāttato yathaiva rājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra ṣaṣṭhyantatvādrājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, prathamāntatvācca puruṣaḥ pradhānarūpeṇa samāsārtho bhavati | evameva citragvādiśabdairdevadattādiviśiṣṭā gāva eva pratīyeran | na citragoviśiṣṭo devadattādiḥ | tasmāccitrāṇāṃ gavāmayamitīdṛśe 'rthe bahuvrīhirvartate | yadyapyanyathā vigrahastathā 'pyuttarakālamīdṛgarthadarśanādevameva vigraho 'pi kartavyaḥ | tataśca saṃbandhaviśiṣṭābhirgobhirdevadattādirviśiṣṭa iti samāsārtho vijñāyate | yathaiva ca rājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra paṣṭhyāṃ
prayujyamānāyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ pradhānabhūto 'bhidhīyate, kṛte ca samāse nivṛttāyāṃ vibhaktau pūrvottarapadayoḥ pratyekaprayogadṛṣṭārthāparityāgātsaṃbandhādhikyasya ca sāmīpyāvagataviśiṣṭārthapratyayādeva siddherna saṃbandhaparaḥ samāso bhavati, evameva ṣaṣṭhyaprayogādeva bahuvrīhāvapi na saṃbandhaprādhānyam | tacca
tacca netyatra na ceti pāṭhāntaraṃ | na pūrvottarapadārthayornāpyanyatarasyetyanyapadārthabhūtadravyaprādhānyādhyavasānam | sa cānyapadārthaḥ saṃbandhī yogyatāvaśena jātidravyaguṇakriyāṇāmanyatamaḥ parigṛhyate | tadyathā |

sarvatra ca yogyatvātsamānādhikaraṇapadāntaropanīto 'nyapadārthaviśeṣo gamyate | tadihaikaṃ hāyanamasyā iti jāteranāditvānna viśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavatīti vyaktirāśrīyate | nanu vyaktīnāmānantyavyabhicārābhyāmanabhidhānamuktam | naiṣa doṣaḥ ||

yatra tāvajjātyaivānyapadārtha upalakṣyate tatra tayaivaikayā sakṛdgṛhītayopalakṣitā vyaktayo deśādibhinnā apyabhidhāsyanta iti sujñānaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | na ca tadupalakṣitābhyo 'nyatra prayoga ityavyabhicāraḥ | yatra tu vyaktibhireva vyaktyantarāṇi viśeṣyante tatrāpi mūlopalakṣaṇaṃ jātirevābhyupagamyate | sarvathā dūramapi viśeṣaṇamālāyāmanuvartamānāyāṃ prathamopalakṣaṇasyābhedātsaṃbandhadarśanamupapatsyate | sarvaprathamasarvāntyayośca śabdārthatvam | āntarālikānāṃ tu lakṣaṇāsiddhajñānatvādanabhidheyatvam | ataśca piṅgatvākṣitvābhyāṃ svavyaktayo guṇāvayavātmikā lakṣyante | tābhiravayavi dravyamupalakṣyate | tacca samāsārtho bhavati | sa punaḥ kimabhidheyo lākṣaṇika iti | prādhānyena pratīteḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ( pā. sū. 2—2—24 )‘anekamanyapadārtha’ iti ca smaraṇāddevatātaddhitamatvarthīyādibhirivābhidhīyata iti kecit | apare tvāhuḥ | yuktaṃ devatātaddhitādāvananyaprayojanatvācchabdādhikyāccānyapadārthābhidhānam | na ca tatra prātipadikārthena so 'rthaḥ śakyo lakṣayitum | vyabhicārāt | kevalācca prātipadikādapratīteḥ | bahuvrīhau tu pūrvottarayoḥ padayorvidyamānasvārthatvādanyasya cābhyadhikasya śabdāvayavasyābhāvātpiṅgatvākṣitvābhyāmeva ca dravyapratyayasiddherna śakyamabhidheyatvaṃ kalpayitumiti | na tvetadvyāpitvena śakyamāśrayitum | karmadhāraye hyetadvyāpitvena syātsarvathā lakṣaṇānimittopapatteḥ | iha tu citragurityevamādiṣu citragośabda
yoratyantavyatiriktārthābhidhāyitvāddevadattādiśabdaiśca na śrutyā lakṣaṇayā vā sāmānādhikaraṇyamavakalpate | prāgapi ca devadattādiśabdādanyapadārthapratīterna vākyārthatvakalpanā | na ca kevalaṃ samāsavelāyāṃ yau padārthāvavadhāritau tau devatādyarthasaṃbandhinau, yato vākyārtho devadattaḥ syāt | tasmādavaśyaṃ pratīteḥ smaraṇāccānyapadārtho 'sya vācya ityabhyupagantavyam | evaṃ ca prādhānyamaviruddhaṃ bhaviṣyati | ataścaivamādiṣu bahuvrīheranyapadārthābhidhānaśaktirdṛṣṭeti yatrāpi kathaṃcillakṣaṇā saṃbhavati tatrāpi pūrvakḷptaśaktyanapāyādabhidheyatvamevādhyavasīyate | tasmādupapannaṃ piṅgakṣyādīnāṃ dravyavacanatvam | yattvekahāthanīti vayovacana iti | tadanupapannam | vayaso lakṣaṇayā 'vagateḥ | ukṣādiśabdānāṃ hi vayovacanatvam | ekahāyanyādiśabdāḥ punaḥ kālaviśeṣayuktadravyavacanāḥ santo vayo lakṣayantaḥ pravartante | na hyekaṃ hāyanamasyā ityevaṃ vayo nirdiśyate | kiṃ tarhi | dravyam | tasya hyekaṃ hāyanaṃ jātasya na vayasaḥ | tasmādubhābhyāmapyetābhyāmātmaikadeśopāttaguṇaviśiṣṭadravyapratyāyanādupapanno 'yaṃ saṃśayaḥ kimaruṇimā kṛtsnaprakaraṇagatakrayāṅgadravyaśeṣatvena niviśate | athavā samānavākyasthākhyātapadapratyāyitakraya evaikahāyanyāmiti | atrāpyuddhananādivadākṣepaḥ | saṃyuktaśravaṇādasārvatrikatve prāpte taṃ pariharati | eṣa guṇaḥ krayeṇaikahāyanyā vā samānavākyopādānātsaṃbadhyeta | tatra tāvatkārakavibhaktinirdeśādanāśaṅkanīyatare sati dravyasaṃbandhe, krayasaṃbandhaḥ śrutibalīyastvādbhavet | na cāsāvamūrtatvānniṣkriyasya guṇasyopapadyate | yadi tvagatyā punardravye saṃbandha āśrīyate tatrāpyekahāyanyām ‘eekaśa
( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 8 )bdye parārthavat’ ityevaṃ krayāruṇimānau prati vairūpyaṃ syāt | bhinnavibhaktyarthayogaścāsannabhyupagantavyaḥ | kriyāsaṃbandhasya kārakavibhaktisādhyatvāt, guṇasaṃbadhasya ca ṣaṣṭhyadhīnatvāt | ataśca vākyagatena saṃbandhinā yogyatvābhāvādasaṃbadhyamānaḥ prakaraṇinā gṛhītaḥ sarvārthaṃ syādityāśaṅkyate | tena tarhyayamevārtho niścīyata iti krayasaṃbandho nā ' 'śaṅikatavyastadarthamāha—na cāśakanīyamarthaṃ pramāṇabhūtaḥ śabdo 'bhidhāsyatīti | yadetatsamānavākyopādānaṃ karaṇavibhaktinirdeśaścaitenāpi krayaikahāyanīviśeṣaṇatva
buddhirdṛ̣dhā jāyate | tena śabdaprāmāṇyādvastuvisaṃvādācca kiṃ samañjasaṃ kimasamañjasamiti jāyate saṃdehaḥ | tanna prāthamyācchabdānurodhena tāvatkriyāsaṃbandhamupanyasyati | vaidikaśabdasyātimārābhāvāt | tatra viniyogabalenāsya vastusāmarthyasadbhāvānveṣaṇe yatiṣyāmahe | tadyadi kenacitprakāreṇopapatsyate tataḥ kraya eva niveśamaṅgīkariṣyāmaḥ | atha tu na kathaṃcanopapatsyate tato vākyabhedamabhyupagamya prakaraṇadharmamenamadhyavasyāmaḥ | na cātra vākyabhedaḥ pratyayādyanyatamāvṛttilakṣaṇaḥ | kastarhi, vibhāgarūpaḥ | krayavākyasya bhedaṃ vibhāgalakṣaṇamabhyupagamyetyarthaḥ |

lg.l: aruṇāśabda evaṃ ca bhedo vākyasya gamyate |

div.p: pṛthakbhavadvākyaṃ bhedayatīti vākyabhedaḥ | tādṛśaṃ cābhyupagamya prakaraṇadharmādhyavasānam | etaduktaṃ bhavati yāvacchrutivākye vyāpriyete tāvatprakaraṇadharmatvaṃ nāsti | yadā tu vastuvisaṃvādādvihataśaktinī te nirvyāpāre bhaviṣyatastadā prakaraṇaviniyoga iti | kiṃ tāvatprāptamataāha—

vihitastu( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 8 ) sarvadharmaḥ syātsaṃyogato 'viśeṣātprakaraṇāviśeṣācceti | śrutivākyośca tāvadasāmarthyenaudāsīnyāt | kathaṃ puna
kathaṃ punariti—itikartavyatākāṅkṣātmakena prakaraṇena gṛhyamāṇamitikartavyatārūpameva syāt | kriyāyā eva ca karaṇānugrāhakatvarūpetikartavyatātvātkathamakriyārūpasyāruṇimnaḥ prakaraṇena viniyoga iti śaṅkāśayaḥ |rguṇasyākriyātmakasya sataḥ prakaraṇena grahaṇam | ucyate naivātra prakaraṇaṃ grāha
grāhakatvena—viniyojakatvena |katveneṣṭam | kathaṃ tarhi | aruṇayetyatra pade yā tṛtīyā tayā karaṇāni prakaraṇalabhyajyotiṣṭomāpūrvasādhanāni somaprabhṛtīnyanūdyāruṇaprātipadikārtho vidhīyate |
tasmātsarvakaraṇānyaruṇīkartavyāni |

yaducyate guṇavacanatvādaruṇāśabdaḥ krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyata iti tadākṣipannāha— nanu naivāyaṃ guṇavacana iti | rūparasādiśabdāḥ kevalaguṇavacanāḥ | tathā hi | yadā teṣāṃ dravyeṣu prayogastadā na matvarthīyena vinā pravartante | ye punaḥ śuklāruṇādiśabdāste kadācideva ṣaṣṭhyantadravyapadasaṃnidhānādbhāvapratyayarahitā guṇeṣu vartante | paṭasya śukla iti | nityaṃ guṇopasarjanadravyavacanāḥ | tathā cāntareṇāpi matvarthīyaṃ dravyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratipadyante | yathā śuklaḥ paṭo 'ruṇo ghaṭa iti | nanu ca matublo
‘guṇavacanebhyo matupo lugiṣṭaḥ’ iti vārtikāditi śeṣaḥ |pāmnānādeṣāmevaṃ vṛttirbhaviṣyati | naitadevam |

lg.l: śabdānāṃ na hi lopena vācyo 'rthaḥ pratipādyate |

div.p:
yathaiva kvibantādhunādiṣu prakṛtipratyayayoḥ pratyekamubhayārthābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ sadeva lopadvāreṇānvākhyāyate tathaivātra prātipadikameva matvarthamapyupādātuṃ samarthamiti matublopāmnānam | lakṣaṇayeti cet | na | kvibantādivadeva mukhyarūpapratīteḥ | na ca lakṣaṇāsu śāsreṇānvākhyānaṃ kriyate | rūpādīnāmapi ca lakṣaṇopapattermatupā vinā vṛttiḥ syāt | candanasya gandha itivaccāntareṇa bhāvapratyayaṃ goraruṇa ityapi prayogaḥ syāt | yathā ca gandhatvamityukte candanādisaṃbandhamapāsya tadviśeṣāṇāṃ gandhatvasaṃbandho bhavati | evamaruṇatvamityapi dravyasaṃbandho na syāt | rūpādiśabdavadeva cāruṇāderapi dravyasāmānādhi
karaṇyaṃ na syāt | yo hi manyate lakṣaṇayā 'ruṇādiṣu sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti tasya rūpādiṣvapi tathaiva syādaruṇatvādiṣu vā | na hi te kiṃcidapyadhikaṃ vadanti | etenāruṇatvādibhyo matublopaprasaktirvyākhyātā | kiṃ ca |

nanu ‘guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti’ ityevaṃ setsyati | na | rūpādiśuklatvādiṣvapi prasaṅgāt | api ca | guṇavacana iti na guṇābhidhānamātreṇocyate | kiṃ tarhi | guṇamuktvā yo dravye vartate | na hyanyathā vacanaśabdaḥ prayujyate | vaca
vacanameva—abhidhānameva |nameva svarūpaṃ śabdasyetyevaṃ guṇaśabdenaiva vyavahārasiddheḥ | ata eva rūpādīṃnāmagrahaṇam | etena matublopavākyaṃ vyākhyātam | tasmāddravyavacano 'ruṇāśabdaḥ, tasya ca kārakatvābhidhānopapatterekavākyatvasiddhiḥ | ato na sarvadharmatvamiti | tadetadapeśalamiti | ākṛ( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9 )tyadhikaraṇoktanyāyavisaṃvādādaśobhanamityabhiprāyam | tathā hi |

lg.l: sa eva tasya vācyo 'rtho guṇaṃ caiṣa na muñcati ||

div.p: ekāntadravyasaṃbandhini tāvadguṇe viśeṣaṇatvātpūrvataramabhihite tatsaṃbandhādeva pratīyamānasya dravyasya na śakyaṃ vācyatvaṃ kalpayitumityuktam |
nanu guṇāntarotpattikāle 'nyadeva dravyamiti na vyabhicaret |

yeṣāṃ
yeṣāṃ—naiyāyikānāmityarthaḥ | tāvatkāryadravyāṇyeva ghaṭādīni pacyante yathā paiṭharā
paiṭharāṇāṃ-piṭharapākavādinām |ṇāṃ tanmatenābheda eva |
pailū
pailūkānāṃ-pīluśabdavācyaparamāṇuṣu pākavādino vaiśeṣikāsteṣāmityarthaḥ |kānāmapi tu paramāṇuṣu vyabhicāraḥ | yādṛśaṃ tvasmābhirdravyamabhihitaṃ tādṛśasya sarvatra guṇamātrameva bhidyate na svarūpam | yāni ca ghaṭādīni dravyāntareṇa gairikādinā raktāni saṃyuktasamavetaguṇadvāreṇāruṇādiśabdairabhidhīyante, tatraikasyaiva dravyasyānekanīlapītādiśabdaviṣayatvāpatteḥ spaṣṭaṃ vyabhicāritvam | ataścā ' 'kṛtivyavahārāddūreṇa sthūlataro 'yamityapeśalatā | matublopaścātyantanirūḍhalakṣaṇāvaśādanvākhyāyate | yattu mukhyapratyayānnaivamiti | tatrocyate |

agnirmāṇavaka ityatrāgnimāṇavakayoratyantabhedātsādṛśyena śabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ pratyayavailakṣaṇyānnābhidhāteti sarveṇa jñāyate | ye tu jātiguṇavacanā bhūtvā dravyaṃ pratyāyayanti teṣāmabhidheyalakṣyamāṇavastunorvivekābhāvātpratītāvapyavivekaḥ sthita eva | sa kathaṃcidanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nipuṇaiḥ parīkṣakairapanīyata iti | lokasya tu mukhyabuddhireva | na ca parīkṣakāṇāmanabhidheyatvaṃ vadatāṃ lokavirodhaḥ | pratītamātravyavahārī hi loko 'bhidhānalakṣaṇāvivekamakurvannudāsīnāvasthaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabādhādisiddhyarthaṃ parīkṣakairvivekaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ na nānumanyate | tasmādavirodhaḥ | kathaṃ na rūpādiśabdeṣvapi tallakṣaṇayā matublopaḥ kathaṃ vā lakṣaṇāvṛttiḥ śāstreṇānvākhyāyata iti | atrābhidhīyate |

iha keṣucidartheṣvabhidhānavadeva lakṣaṇāśaktirapyanādikālapravṛttatvena nirụ̄dhāḥ, yathā śuklādiṣu | keṣucittu kriyate yathā rathāṅganāmā cakravāka iti | keṣucitpunaḥ kartumapi na śakyate, yathā śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu | kathaṃ punarihāviśiṣṭe saṃbandhe sati na lakṣaṇeti | tatrottaramabhidhānavaditi | yathā bhavataḥ samāne guṇaśabdatve śuklādīnāṃ guṇopasarjanadravyavacanatvaṃ na rūpādīnāmevaṃ mama lakṣaṇeti | tatraitatsyāt | abhidhānaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī | lakṣaṇā tu na saṃbandhādadhikaṃ nimittamapekṣata iti | ucyate | yadṛcchāśabdatva etadevaṃ syāt | tava tu śuklādīnāṃ samavetaguṇadvāreṇa dravye vṛttiḥ |
tattvaviśiṣṭaṃ rūpādiṣvapīti dravye vṛttiprasaṅga | tatrāvaśyaṃ guṇagataḥ kaścitsāmarthyabhedo 'ṅgīkartavyaḥ | yena te śabdāḥ kecideva guṇiparā bhavanti, anye guṇapradhānāḥ | evaṃ lakṣaṇāyāmapi bhaviṣyati ||

satyapi ca phalānumeye dṛśyamānārthapratyāyanasāmarthye, satyapi cāsmākamapyadṛṣṭaśa
śaktikalpaneti pāṭhāntaram |ktigauravatulyatve, abhidheyamātrapratyayena nivṛttavyāpāre śabde 'rthapratyaye cākṛtārthe sati kalpyamānatvādarthaśaktiḥ pramāṇavatī na śabdaśaktiḥ | tenādṛṣṭakalpanātulyatvena pakṣayostulyabalatvam | ataśca rūpādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāśaktyabhāvānmatupā vinā na dravye vṛttiḥ | tathā ca ‘rasā
pā. sū. ( 5-2-95 )dibhyaśca’ iti pratyayāntaranivṛtyarthaṃ matumniyamapunaḥ śrutiramumevārthaṃ dyotayati | na ca rūpādipratyayena na dravyaṃ pratyāyyate gamyate hi dhūmādinevāgniravinābhāvāddravyam | śabdasya tvatatparatvāllakṣaṇānadhyavasānam | pradhānatvāpradhānatvapratītistu dravyaguṇayoḥ svābhāvikī | nityaṃ hi rūpādiṣu svaprādhānyenābhidhīyamāneṣu dravyaṃ viśeṇatvenocyate śuklādiṣu viśeṣyatvena | ata eva cānādikālaprasiddhārthatvādasyā lakṣaṇāyā matublopāmnānenānugamaḥ | yā tvādimatī nātyantaprasiddhā nāṃsau śāstreṇānugamyate | vinā 'pi cānugamātsaṃbandhyantaravaśena sā kadācidupalabhyate | tadyathā madhuro rasaḥ snigdhaḥ śīto gururiti snigdhaśītatvādīnāṃ guṇāntaraviśeṣatvānna rasena saṃbandho 'stīti rasalakṣitena dravyeṇa saṃbadhyate | tasmācchaktiparyanuyogābhāvānmatublopabhāvā
śuklādirūpādiśabdayoriti śeṣaḥ |bhāvau | etena bhāvapratyayasadasadbhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyavaiyadhikaraṇyavyavasthā vyākhyātā | śuklatvādiśabdāśca bhāvapratyayaniṣkṛṣṭaviśeṣyabhūtaguṇavacanatvādgandhavadeva nityaṃ vaiyadhikaraṇyena saṃbadhyante |

lg.l: tathā ca śukla ityasya punaranyā dvirūpatā ||
paṭasya śukla ityatra niṣkṛṣṭo guṇa āśritaḥ |

div.p:
liṅgasaṃkhyādisaṃbandhaḥ svāśrayadvāreṇa pūrvavadevopapatsyate | tathā guṇavacanaśabdaśca dravyaprādhānye vartate vaiyākaraṇānāṃ guṇamuktvā guṇini vartamānatvāt | na hi vaiyākaraṇānāṃ vaiśeṣikavadguṇāḥ parisaṃkhyāyante | kiṃ tarhi, aṅgāṅgibhāvāpekṣayā guṇaguṇivyavahāraḥ | śuklādiśabdāścopasarjanībhūtamarthaṃ vadanti na rūpādiśabdā iti liṅgasaṃkhyāsaṃbandhāsaṃkaraḥ | bhāṣyakāreṇa tvetameva parihāraṃ manasi kṛtvoktaṃ, bhavati hi guṇavacanasyāpi strīliṅgatā yathā karūṇābuddhiśabdayoḥ | gandhādiśabdatulyāvapi caitau pradarśanamātraviśeṣādudāhṛtau | etaduktaṃ bhavati | ye 'pi tāvatsvapradhānaguṇavacanāste 'pi kathaṃcilliṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yujyante kiṃ punaryeṣu dravyaprādhānyam | evamanayā yuktyā 'ruṇeti guṇavacanaḥ | guṇavacanaścetkrīṇātinā na saṃbadhyata ityupasaṃhṛte paraḥ punarāha—atha yadi krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate tata ekahāyanyā saṃbadhyatāmiti | śakyate hi guṇavacanasya dravyasaṃbandhaḥ kartum | siddhāntavādī tu śrutyā kriyāsaṃbandhāvagamāddravyasaṃbandho vākyalakṣaṇo durbalatvādbādhyata ityetatpratipādayitumāha—tanna | kevalaṃ hi guṇamiti | dviprakāro hi nāmaśabdānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā | tatra yadobhābhyāmubhayārthopādānaṃ tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati | ṣaṣṭhyantadravyapadoccāraṇe tu vaiyadhikaraṇyena saṃbandhaḥ | tadiha kevalaguṇaguṇivacanatvādaruṇaikahāyānīśabdayoḥ śrutisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tāvanna vidyate | nāpi ṣaṣṭhīśrutira
tena vaiyadhikaraṇyenāpyanvayo nopapadyata iti pūraṇam |sti | tasmāttṛtīyāśrutibalīyastvānna dravyaguṇayoḥ saṃbandha iti | balābalakṛtaṃ saṃbandhanirākaraṇamavagamyāpramāṇakṛtatvābhiprāyeṇāyaṃ bravītīti matvaikavibhaktiyogādityāha | tadanupapannamiti-balābalapradarśanam |
prathamaṃ tāvatsvasāmarthyenāruṇaprātipadikasya guṇavacanatvaṃ gamyate | padāntarasaṃnidhānācca sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti balābalam | tatrā ' 'ha |

idānīṃ tṛtīyāśrutibalīyastvātkriyāsaṃbandhāvabodhāddravyasaṃbandhabādhaṃ darśayati | tatrāpyagatyaiva pratyavasthānam | nanu guṇasya kriyāsaṃbandhābhāvāditi | tasyottaraṃ tṛtīyā
narthakyaprasaṅgāditi | na hyagatyā 'nabhidheyo 'rthaḥ śakyaḥ pratyetum | na cātra lakṣaṇayā 'pi saktuṃ
‘saktūn juhoti’ ityatreti śeṣaḥdvitīyāvattṛtīyā 'rthavatī | kārakasāmānyasyāpyaniṣṭatvāt | parastvāha—liṅgasaṃkhyāvadāśrayadvāraprāptaṃ kārakamanūdya prātipadikārtho vidhāsyata iti | asti hyetadapi darśanaṃ yadguṇaśabdebhyo vinā 'pi kārakatvena kārakaviśeṣaṇatvāddvitīyādayo bhavantīti | naitatsāramiti | yadyapi kathaṃcidaruṇayetyasyaikahāyanīsaṃbandhayogyatvaṃ tathā 'pi kriyākṣiptāyāmekahāyanyām ‘aika( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 8 )śabdye parārthavat’ ityevamubhayasaṃbandhābhāve balīyasā krayasaṃbandhena guṇasaṃbandhanirākaraṇam | nahyatra kriyā
kriyāsambandhavibhaktiḥ—kārakavibhaktirityarthaḥ |saṃbandhavibhaktivadguṇasaṃbandhavibhaktiḥ ṣaṣṭhī
dṛśyate | nīlotpale tu śrutivirodhābhāvādvākyalakṣaṇo 'pi saṃbandho 'vagamyata iti vaiṣamyam | ye tu sāmānādhikaraṇyavikalpāstān ( a. 6 pā. 8 a. 10 sū. 35 | )‘niyamo vaikārthye hi’ ityatra ṣaṣṭhāntyādhikaraṇasūtre sarvāneva vakṣyāmaḥ | sarvathā lākṣaṇikaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti durbalam | na ca kārakaviśeṣaṇatvādguṇānāṃ kārakavibhaktiḥ | kiṃ tarhi, kārakatvādeveti | etadapi paśvekatvavivakṣādhikaraṇe( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 | ) vakṣyate | āha | satyamevametaditi | punarapi śrutivirodhaparihārārthameva yatate | katham |

sarvatra tu bo
bādhita iti pā. |dhite padārtha iti ko 'yamupanyāsaḥ | ucyate |

aruṇāśabdastāvadavaśyameva kenacidguṇinā saṃbandhanīyaḥ | ekahāyanīśabdasyāpi kriyāsaṃbandhātsvātantryamapanītam | tatra padāntarasaṃbandhe 'pi sakṛtpravṛttāyāḥ kimavaguṇṭhanenetivattasya tāvatyeva śrutipīḍeti | ato guṇapadenāpi saṃbadhyatāmiti | naitadastīti— abhyupetya dravyaguṇasaṃbandham | yā
yāga ityatra kraya iti pāṭha ucitaḥ |gagatadravyasaṃbandhanirākaraṇātkrīṇā
krīṇāteḥ prāk, navarṇasya, anyatheti padasya vā pūrvaṃ śeṣo 'pekṣitaḥ |tervidhyanuvādayaugapadyāśrayaṇavirodhaḥ | yatra tu kriyāviśeṣaṇāni sarvāṇi bhavanti tatra viśiṣṭavidhānādakleśo bhavati | yatra tu kriyā vidhīyate dravyasya ca kiṃcittatra pratyayāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vākyabhedamabhyupetya niyamābhāvo bhavatītyucyate | viśeṣaṇaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ bhavati | na ca vidhīyamānāvasthaḥ krayaḥ prasiddha iti prakaraṇagataikahāyanīmātrasaṃbandhaprasaṅgaḥ | katamā punaranyā
jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa ekahāyanī | sarvathā tāvadvākyena tasyāmapi guṇaḥ prāpyate | yadi tu sā na vidyate kiṃ kriyatāṃ dakṣiṇā tu vā kācidbhaviṣyati | anūbandhyāyāṃ vā | athaveddiśyamānatvādavivakṣitaliṅgasaṃkhyaikahāyanamātragrahaṇātsavanīyāgnīṣomīyayorapyekahāyanayorgrahaṇādaniyamaḥ | sadṛśanyāyeṣu vodāharaṇāntareṣveva tadbhaviṣyati | tadyathā ‘daśamuṣṭīrmimīte’ ityatra somamānādanyeṣāmapyaṅgeṣṭinirvāpamuṣṭīnāṃ daśasaṃkhyatvaprasaṅgaḥ | paraḥ punarekahāyanīvairūpyābhyupagamavādalabdhaprasaraḥ śaṅkate—nanvapūrvo 'pi vidhīyamāno manasi viparivartamānaḥ prasaṅgādeva viśeṣyata iti | naitadevamityuttaram | yāvadyāvaddhi padārtho viśeṣyate tāvattāvacchruteḥ svarasabhaṅgaḥ | tena sakṛtpravṛttāyāḥ kimavaguṇṭhanenetyevamekena kenacidviśeṣitaḥ pareṇāpi viśeṣyatāmityabhyupagantavyam | na cā ' 'narthakyam | prakaraṇe 'rthavattvāt | tatrāpyevameva saṃbandha iti cet | na | vākyāntaraprāptadravyānuvādena guṇāvidhau vairūpyaprasaṅgābhāvāt | bhavatpakṣe 'pi svarūpataḥ somaṃ ca prati kraye vidhīyamāne dravyaṃ ca prati viśeṣaṇatvenānūdyamāne vairūpyaṃ bhavati | evamekahāyanyapi krayaṃ guṇaṃ ca prati vairūpyānnaiva saṃbadhyate | pūrvaṃ tvabhyupetyavādamātreṇāṅgīkṛtam |
tadidānīṃ tatraiva parasya duṣṭāśā mā bhūditi nirākriyate | tenāyameva paramārthaḥ | kārakaṃ vibhaktyā 'nūdya prātipadikārtho vidhīyata iti | pare tvavivakṣitakārakaṃ guṇamātraṃ prakaraṇayuktaṃ prayogavacanenāgṛhītam ( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 )‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityevaṃ dravyeṣvavatīrṇaṃ sarvārthaṃ manyante | tattu praka
prakaraṇena—itikartavyatākāṅkṣātmakenetyarthaḥ |raṇenānitikartavyatātmakaguṇagrahaṇābhāvādānarthakyatadaṅganyāyasya ca krayāṅgaikahāyanyāmupapannataratvena pūrvapakṣamūlābhāvaprasaṅgādupekṣaṇīyam | tasmātpūrveṇaiva nyāyena kṛtsne prakaraṇe niveśa iti | evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

arthaikatveti—vākyaviśeṣopalakṣaṇam | aikakarmyāditi—punastadeva hetutvenopadiṣṭam | athavā vākyārthaikatve yatraikavākyatā saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ | tatra sarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaikabhāvanāvidhiḥ | tādṛśīṃ kṛtvā kṛtārtho bhavatīti parigrahātsarvaniyamo bhavati | yathā devadattaḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyāmodanaṃ pacatītyukte sarveṣāmekapākaviṣayatvam | evamihāpi kevalayostāvaddravyaguṇayoranuṣṭhānameva nāstīti na vidhīyate | kriyāntarasaṃbandhamapi krīṇāteḥ paraḥ pratyayo na śaknoti kartum | dravyasaṃbandhe tu sarvatra vidhīnāmeva śaktyabhāvaḥ | sarvatra hi bhāvanātadviśeṣaṇārthātirikte 'rthe vidhivyāpāro nāstītyuttarādhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ | tṛtīyānirdeśācca dvayorapyaruṇaikahāyanyoḥ parasparamanapekṣya svasādhyakriyāmātrāpekṣiṇorvākyena tadviśeṣakrayasaṃbandho vijñāyate | kutaḥ |

lg.l: kriyā 'pi na vinā kaiścitsādhyate kārakaiḥ kvacit |

div.p: yathaiva dravyeṇa vinā kriyānupapatterekahāyanīṃ krayo gṛhṇāti—

tasmātso 'pi kriyāṅgamiti | tathā ca ‘dravyagu( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 3 )ṇasaṃskāreṣu’ iti guṇagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam | nanu nānta
yadvinā yannopapadyate tattasya nāntarīyakamityucyate |rīyakatvāddravyagrahaṇe guṇānuṣṭhānātpṛthakprayatnābhāvānna dravyavadguṇāpekṣā yuktā | tathā hi |
ucyate |

lg.l: karmaṇyapi kṛte pūrvaṃ na dravyeṇa prayojanam |

div.p: yathaiva hi tvayoktaṃ dravyagrahaṇenaiva guṇo 'pi kaścidgṛhīta eveti na pṛthagupādānaṃ prayojayati tathā kriyopādāne 'pi yatkiṃciddravyamupāttamiti nāpekṣitavyam | atha tu prāgupādānāddravyaviśeṣāpekṣā bhavati taditaratrāpi prāgdravyopādānādbhavatyevāpekṣā kiṃguṇakaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhṇāmīti | sarvathā tvetāvānatra viśeṣaḥ | prajñānottarakālamapi kriyāyāṃ dravyaṃ vyāpāryate | guṇastu prajñānānna pṛthag dravyavyatirekeṇa vyāpriyate | tāvataiva caritārthatvāt | na ca tathā vyāpṛtasyāvyāpṛtatvam | anekaprakāratvādvyāpārāṇām | paricchedakāle tvasyādhikavyāpāratvaṃ vivicyate | tathā hi |

tenātra yadi tāvadveda eva kaṃcidviśeṣaṃ dāsyati tatastenetyavadhārayiṣyate | yadi tu na dāsyati tato 'rthākṣipta eva yaḥ kaścitpramāṇavānbhaviṣyatītyavagame sati vidhīyamānasyāruṇāderaṅgatvaṃ bhavati | sarvatra ca śabdādacodite 'rthe'arthādvā( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 14 sū. 25 ) kalpanaikadeśatvāt’ ityevamajñānasaṃśayavyudāsa iṣṭaḥ | tadihāruṇatvena kriyāṃ sādhayediti vispaṣṭe codite śabdāntarāṇāmadhyāhārādīnāmabhāvādyathā śaknuyādityupabandhe sati tatsādhanabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ paricchi ndatetyetāvadavadhāryate | kutaḥ |

krayagatastāvadvidhistṛtīyopanītaṃ kathaṃcidaruṇimānaṃ na muñcati | sa ca nānyena prakāreṇa tadaṅgatāṃ bhajate | na caikasvarūpaiva sarveṣāṃ sādhanatā | na ca svasamavāyinyeva kevalā calanātmikā vā kriyā sarvatreṣyate | na ca pradhānākriyāyāḥ sarvāṇyeva sākṣātsādhanāni bhavanti | avāntaravyāpārādhīnatvātsaṃbandhasya | aruṇādīnāṃ ca yogyatvāddravyapariccheda eva svavyāpāro vijñāyate | tatraiṣāṃ kartṛtvāditaratra karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyati | tenāruṇapadādetāvadavagataṃ kiṃciddravyaṃ paricchindatā 'ruṇaguṇena krayaḥ sādhayitavya iti | tathaikahāyanyā 'pyanyathā sādhanatvāsaṃbhavātkenacidguṇena me paricchedaḥ kartavya ityetāvadapekṣyate | tatra guṇo yatkiṃciddravyaparicchedyamāśrayatvenāpekṣitumārabhate | dravyamapi yaṃ kaṃcidguṇam | ubhayāpekṣālakṣaṇaśca saṃbandhaḥ śīghraṃ nirvartyate | na ca dravyāntaraguṇāntarāṇāmatra vākye sāpekṣatvaṃ pratīyate | tena naṣṭāśvadagdharathavadvinā 'pi ṣaṣṭhyā 'nayoreva saṃbandhaḥ | saṃnihitātikramakāraṇābhāvādapyevameva vijñāyate | kiṃ ca |

lg.l:
krayaścāvagata
avagatadravyaguṇa—iti | avagatau dravyaguṇau yasyeti vigrahaḥ |dravyaguṇaḥ prādhānyasaṃmataḥ |

div.p:
yannāma guṇo 'nyathānupapatteraśrutaṃ dravyamānayati tatkrayaḥ śrutaikahāyanīdravyakatvānna pratīcchati | tathaikahāyanī yaṃ guṇamaśrutamānayati tamapi kraya eva śrutāruṇimaguṇatvānnecchati | yadi hyasāvaniyatadravyaguṇaḥ syāttato yatkiṃcidapyānīyamānaṃ saheta | nirapekṣadravyaguṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhe naiva yathācoditaḥ kraya ubhayaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyate |
aśrutā ca pradhānasya sata āvṛttirāpadyeta | vikalpe vā punarviśiṣṭavidhirbādhyeta | pradhānatvādeva ca guṇadravyābhyāṃ dravyāntaraguṇāntarākṣepaṃ krayaṇaṃ niruṇaddhi | kāṃsyabhojinyāyena vā 'mukhyo 'pyaniyamaṃ vārayet | kimuta mukhya eva san | na vā 'śrutakalpanayā vinā 'nupapattiḥ | śrutayoreva parasparasaṃbandhena paripūrṇatvāt | evaṃ ca svavākyagatamapi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ samarthitaṃ bhaviṣyati | na cātra śrutivirodhaḥ | yathā vakṣyati | ‘na śrutirbrūte vākyārtho na’ iti | tathā hi |

kraya eva hi dravyaṃ gṛhṇannevamapekṣate ko guṇa etatparicchetsyatīti | guṇamapi gṛhṇannapekṣate kiṃ dravyametasyā ' 'śrayo bhaviṣyatīti | tenaiva tayoḥ krayavaśenānyonyānuguṇyaṃ pratipadyamānayorapi na parasparāṅgāṅgitvaṃ bhavati | yastu manyate paricchedakatvādguṇasya dravyāṅgatvaṃ pratīyata iti | sa vaktavyo guṇasyāpi krayamanyathā sādhayituśamaknuvato dravyamāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyamānamaṅgamiti | tasmātkrayāṅgabhūtayoreva nāntarīyakaḥ parasparopakāro bhavannaṅgatvamāpādayatīti draṣṭavyam | yastu prakaraṇe niveśaṃ manyate tasya kena guṇo vidhīyata iti vaktavyam | krayavidhinā tāvatsaha naiva saṃbandha iṣṭaḥ | prayogavacanastvakriyātmakaṃ dūrādūpekṣate | na cāruṇapadasyaivaṃ vidhiśaktirasti | yadyapi kārakatvena dravyāṇi pratīyante tathā 'pi tatpadānyavidhāyakānyeva | ye 'pi tatsaṃbandhikriyāviṣayā vidhayaste 'pi paryavasitāḥ saṃprati pratīyamānā api na vidhātuṃ samarthāḥ | na caiṣāṃ dravyaviśeṣaṇeṣu vyāpāraḥ | tasmānna kathaṃcitprakaraṇe niviśate | ekārthāstu vikalperannityaviśeṣapratīteḥ | avāntaravyāpārānekārthatvamagṛhītvā vadati—yadyekakāryatā kimiti vikalpo na bhavatīti | siddhāntavādī tvāha—naitenāsmatpratipakṣaḥ kṛtsnaprakaraṇaniveśaḥ sidhyati | krayasaṃbandho vā bādhyate | tasmātsiddhāntāntaradūṣaṇatvānnigrahasthā
namiti | na ca vikalpaḥ, nānākāryatvāditi—avāntaravyāpārabhiprāyeṇa | parastu pradhānakāryanānātvamevoktamiti matvā ' 'ha—nanvidānīmevoktamiti | taccā
taccāpīti—viruddhoktiprasaṅgādanyadapi viruddhamiti pradarśayati |pi viruddhaṃ yatpūrvamuktamamūrtatvānniṣkriyo guṇa iti | nanu pūrvapakṣavādinā tadu
taduktaṃ—niṣkriyatvaṃ guṇasyoktamityarthaḥ |ktamidānīṃ siddhāntavādī na sakriyatvaṃ bravītīti yukto virodhopanyāsaḥ | ucyate |

lg.l:
saṃdehaḥ kriyate sarvaḥ sādhāraṇapade sthi
sthitairiti pā. |taḥ |

div.p:
athavā pūrvapakṣavādinā taddhetu
taddhetuttvenoktamiti—guṇasya niṣkriyatve 'mūrtatvaṃ hetutvenoktamityarthaḥ |tvenoktam | hetuścobhayasiddho bhavati | yadi cāyamasiddho bhavettatastadānīmevodbhāvyeta, yatastu nodbhāvitastato 'bhyupagataḥ | tathā sati cedānīṃ siddhavadarthaikatvābhidhānātsakriyatvamabhidadhato vipratiṣiddhamāpadyate | naitadviruddham | na ca vikalpa iti | śaktibhedanimittāvāntaravyāpārānyatvāt | taddarśayati—dravyaṃ sākṣātsādhanaṃ, guṇasta
tatparicchedārtha iti—kriyāsādhanadravyaparicchedārtha ityarthaḥ |tparicchedārtha iti | parastvetāvataiva tadetarattadarthamitivadruṇasya dravyārthatvaṃ manyamāna āha—yadyevaṃ na tarhi guṇaḥ kriyāmabhinirvartayatīti | naitadevamiti—dvāramātratvaṃ tāvaddravyasya darśayati | parihṛte doṣadvaye vastukṛtamekahā
yanīdvāratvamapaśyanvākyenaiva dvāradvārisaṃbandhakaraṇādvairūpyāpattiṃ codayati—evaṃ tarhīti | na brūmo 'ruṇāśabda iti—sāmarthyakāritamekahāyanīsaṃbandhaṃ darśayati | nanvevamapi vākyaṃ bhidyeteti—niyamanirākaraṇārthamāha | satyapi krayasaṃbandhe pratikārakaṃ kriyānyatvādarthabhedanimitto vākyabhedo 'styeveti | tathā ca lokavedayordṛṣṭamityudāharaṇadvayam | pratyekaṃ devadattādiṣu bhojanaṃ, pituḥ pitāmahasya vā 'somapatvaṃ vrātyapaśornimittatvenocyamānaṃ sāhityāvivakṣayā siddham | tatra na pibediti saṃbandhaḥ paśuyāgasabandhaścobhayamapyudāharaṇam | naitadasmatpakṣasya bādhakamiti—vikalpapakṣavadevāsaṃbandhopanyāsaḥ | paraḥ punarāha—satyameṣa na doṣa iti | kriyāprādhānye tu tadvaśīkṛtaviśeṣaṇasamu
dāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ | gargaśatadaṇḍanahomābhiṣavabhakṣavaditi parihāraḥ | nanu daṇḍasya daṇḍyasaṃskāratvādbhojanādivatpratigargamāvṛttiḥ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

yathaivādhvaryvādīnāṃ dakṣiṇā parikrayārthā karmasaṃyogāt | evaṃ rājñāmapyarthadaṇḍo naimittikī paripālanavṛttiḥ | tāṃ tāṃ ca prati tatra tatrāparādhe nimitte śatādīnyupādīyamānatvādvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyāni bhavanti | yaścāsāvaparādho gargakṛtaḥ sa ekakartṛko 'nekakartṛko vā rājñaḥ śatādānanimittaṃ bhavati | tatkāle cāparādhināmapādānatvenāvasthānātsamastagargāpādānakaṃ rājñā śataṃ grahītavyamityagavate sati pratyekaṃ grahaṇe satyekena śatenāparādhaniṣkriye kṛte śeṣamaśrutaṃ brahmasvaharaṇaṃ syātsaṃkhyāntaraṃ ca vṛ
vṛddhāviti—anekaśatagrahaṇe śataṃ daṇḍyantāmityatraikavacanārthānanuṣṭhānācchrutivirodhāpatteriti yāvat |ddhāvāpadyeta |
tasmātsamudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ | paraḥ punarabhihite 'pi hetuvirśeṣe dṛṣṭāntadvayātsaṃdehamupanyasyati | krayasya yāgasādhanasomaprāptyarthatvena bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇanyāyena vidhāyakalāghavena ca prādhānyād dravyaguṇayośca pūrvahetuviparyayeṇa viparītatvāditara ekavākyatvapratiyorapi niyamaḥ sidhyatīti nārtha ekavākyatveneti | siddhāntavādī vadati | vākyabhede sati ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭakrayapratītyabhāvādyathāśrutapratyekasaṃbaddhakrayānuṣṭhāne sati guṇenāpi yatkiṃciddravyaṃ gṛhyeta dravyeṇāpi yaḥ kaścidguṇaḥ | na hi tadā
tadānīṃ—vākyabhedapakṣe |nīmanyonyāsaṃnidherarthākṣepapratibandhaśaktirasti | na caikā kriyā guṇadravyavaśīkārasamarthā syāt | aruṇaguṇakrayo hyaniyatadravyakatvātkimiti guṇopasthāpitaṃ yatkiṃciddravyaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt | ekahāyanīkrayo vā yaṃ kaṃcidguṇam | athāpi vākyāntaraśiṣṭāni krayadravyāṇyeva guṇa āskandati tathā 'pi teṣu vāsaḥprabhṛtiṣu daśasvapi prāpnoti | tasmādviśiṣṭaikakrayasiddhyarthaṃ vaktavyamekavākyatvam | ataśca niyama iti siddham || 12 ||

evaṃ yathāsaṃyogaṃ śeṣaviniyogaḥ sthitaḥ | idānīṃ tadviśeṣacintā | kimekasya grahasya saṃmārga uta prākaraṇikagrahamātrasyeti | yathā caikatvayuktaṃ tathā dvitvabahutvayuktamapyudāhartavyam | ‘yasya puroḍāśau kṣāyataḥ’ ‘yasya sarvāṇi havīṃṣi naśyeyurduṣyeyuḥ’ ‘prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhidhārayati’ ityādi | sarvatra ca kiṃciduddiśya kriyā vidhīyate | tatroddiśyamānasya kiṃ saṃkhyā vivakṣyata uta neti saṃśayaḥ | nanu ca vedavākyeṣvayukto 'yaṃ vicāraḥ | kutaḥ |

yāni puruṣapraṇītāni tāni puruṣavivakṣādhīnavacanatvātsaṃbha
saṃbhavati pramādo 'bhiprāyāntaraṃ ca yeṣu tāni | pramāṇāntaragamyo 'rtho yeṣāṃ tāni | saṃbhavatpramā dābhiprāyāntarāṇi ca tāni pramāṇāntaragamyārthāni ca saṃbhavatpramādābhiprāyāntarapramāṇāntaragamyārthānīti vigrahaḥ |vatpramādābhiprāyāntarapramāṇāntaragamyārthāni bhavanti | tatra pratīto 'pyartho vakturanabhipretatvādavivakṣāṃ labheta | sā ca dvedhā vijñāyate | yadvā vaktaiva kathayatyanyaparaṃ mamedamabhipretaṃ pramādena vā | tasmādetāvanmātramiha na grahītavyamiti | yadvā pramāṇāntaravaśenānyathārthe 'vadhārite vaktranapekṣāḥ śrotāra evābhiprāyāntaraṃ pramādaṃ vā 'dhyavasyanti | na tu vedavākyeṣvabhiprāyāntaraṃ pramādo vā kasyacidasti | na ca vaktā, yo 'nyathātvaṃ kathayetsarvapuruṣāṇām | ‘uktaṃ tu ( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 8 sū. 29 )śabdapūrvatvam’ iti kevalaśrotṛtvāśrayaṇāt | na ca pramāṇāntaragamyo 'rthaḥ | yatastadvaśena svayameva śrotāro 'nyathātvaṃ pratipadyeran | vivakṣāvivakṣe ca vaktṝṇāṃ pratyayaviśeṣāvicchānicchāviśeṣau vā | tena vivakṣitamavivakṣitamiti dvayamapyetadvaktrabhāvādanupapannam | ataḥ śrutāśrutayoreva kevalayoratra grahaṇāgrahaṇe | nātaḥ paraṃ kiṃcitkāraṇamasti |
ucyate |
ekatvaṃ tāvadatrāsaṃśayamuktam | tacca grahasaṃbandhītyetadapyasaṃdigdham | iha tu sarvārthānām—

prakṛtipratyayaśrutyoḥ svasvārthābhidhātṛtvam | padasya kārakavibhaktīnāṃ ca viniyojakatvam | liṅloṭtavyapañcamalakārāṇāṃ tu vidhisāmarthyam | tatrānuṣṭhānakāle vidhiśrutyadhīnaḥ puruṣaḥ | sa hi yatra tayā pravartyate tatrābhihite 'nabhihite vā viniyukte 'viniyukte vā tulyavatpravartate | yatra tu vidhinā na niyujyate tatrābhihite viniyukte 'pi na pravartate | na hyasāvanuṣṭhānaṃ prati
tayoḥ—abhidhātṛviniyoktṛśrutyormadhya ityarthaḥtayorekayā 'pi preryate | idamihāsti, asyedamiti caitanmātrapari
paricchedāt-nirṇayāt |cchedādviṣayakartavyatābuddhyanutpatteḥ | tenābhihitaviniyuktasyāpi vidhimanuṣṭhānaṃ ca pra
pratītyalakṣaṇīkṛtyetyarthaḥ | vidhijñāpanaprayojanakaṃ, anuṣṭhānajñāpanaprayojanakaṃ ca vacanamaṅgīkṛtya vivakṣāvivakṣe bhavata iti tātparyārthaḥ |tītya vivakṣāvivakṣe vidhitsitāvidhitsitacikīrṣitācikīrṣitātmike bhavataḥ |
nanvidamapīcchayā vinā naivopapadyate | ucyate | naivātra pāramārthikīmicchāṃ vadāmaḥ | kiṃ tarhi |

yathaiva kūlaṃ pipatiṣatītyevamādau pātakālapratyāsattericchāmupacaryaivaṃ vyapadeśo bhavati tathā pauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu parigrahāparigrahau vivakṣāvivakṣayoḥ phalatvena prajñātāviti tāvabhipretyāyaṃ vivakṣāvivakṣopanyāsaḥ | kathaṃ śrutasyāparigrahaḥ syāditi cet | naiṣa doṣaḥ | vidhyadhīnaḥ parigraha iti prāgevoktatvāt |

puruṣasthānīyo hi vede vidhāyakaḥ | puruṣecchāsthānīyaṃ
vidhitvaṃ—ayamatra pravartatāmityākārakaḥ preraṇākhyo liṅniṣṭho vyāpāraviśeṣaḥ |vidhitvam | ato yadvidhi
tvena saṃspṛṣṭaṃ tatkartavyaṃ netaradityavadhāraṇādvidhivyāpārasaṃsparśaparimāṇamanveṣṭavyam | kathaṃ punastulyāyāṃ samānavākyagatoktipratītau kiṃcidvidhiḥ saṃspṛśati kiṃcinneti | taducyate |

yadyasmadabhiprāyānurodhenābhidhānaviniyogaśrutivaśena vā liṅādayo vidadhyustataḥ sarvaṃ vidhīyeta | te tu svaśaktimanurudhyamā
anuvartamānā iti pā. |nāḥ kiṃcideva vidadhati na sarvam | tathā hi |

śru
śrutyā—samānābhidhānaśrutyetyarthaḥ |tyā tāvatprayojanabhāvanā vidhīyate | tadanyathānupapattestva
arthāt—viśiṣṭavidhyanyathānupapattirūpādarthāpattipramāṇādityarthaḥ |rthātkā
kārakāntarāṇīti—dhātvartharūpakārakaṃ tu padaśrutyaiva vidhīyate na tvarthādityevaṃ tātparyeṇa kārakāntaretyuktam |ntarāṇi | yastu śruto 'pyartho bhāvanākārakatadāśrayatvena nāvadhāryate tatraikamapi vidhitvaṃ nāstītyanuṣṭhānaṃ pratyanaṅgatvam | tena saṃmārgādyanuṣṭhāne kiṃ grahaikatvādyapi kartavyamuta neti jāyate saṃdehaḥ | tatra yadyekatvādi kārakatvena bhāvanāviśeṣaṇaṃ tato vidhisaṃsparśādvivakṣitaṃ bhaviṣyati | atha dravyaviśeṣaṇaṃ tato na vivakṣitamiti | tadetadaprasiddhālaukikavedavākyārthavyākhyānaprakārakaraṇāśakteḥ pauruṣeyavākyavyākhyāsādṛśyāpādanārthamantarṇītopamānagauṇavṛttyāśrayaṇena phalasāmānyadarśanādvidhiśaktyaśaktyadhīnaparigrahāparigrahayoreva vivakṣitāvivakṣitavācoyuktyuccāraṇaṃ mandabuddhiśiṣyapratipādanārthaṃ granthakārāṇāṃ vyākhyātṝṇāṃ cānyatrāpi vedaviṣayamevameva gamayitavyam | athavā |

lg.l: yastu śaktyā parityakto na vyācikhyāsyate sa taiḥ |

ataḥ pūrvasa
pūrvasamāvṛtteti—saṃvatsaravācisamāśabdena kālalakṣaṇātpūrvakāle vṛttāḥ—saṃjātā ye vyākhyātārasteṣāṃ yadiṣṭaṃ tadarvācīnena vyākhyātrā vivakṣitamityucyata iti kārikārthaḥ |māvṛttavyākhyātriṣṭaṃ vivakṣitam ||

div.p: tasmādvyākhyātṛgatameva vivakṣitāvivakṣitatvamupanyasya vicārakaraṇādvede 'pyavirodhaḥ |

tathā ca nakṣatreṣṭivākyaśeṣe 'bhihitaṃ ‘ye hi janāḥ puṇyakṛtaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti teṣāmetāni jyotīṃṣi yannakṣatrāṇi’ | tathā ca manunā 'pi svargaṃ lokaṃ gacchannabhihitaḥ, tejomū
evaṃ yaḥ sarvabhūtāni brāhmaṇo nityamarcati | sa gacchati paraṃ sthānaṃ tejomūrtiḥ patharjunā | iti pūraṇam |rtiḥ patha
padyarjuneti—ṛjumārgeṇetyarthaḥ |rjuneti |

lg.l: ijyate vāriṇā nityaṃ yaḥ khaṃ brahmeti coditaḥ ||
tathargvedādayo dehāḥ proktā ye 'pi pṛthak pṛthak |

div.p: kiṃ tāvatprāptam—

sarvatra vidhipratiṣedhātmakatvādvedasya yāvatkiṃcicchrūyate tatsarvaṃ tatsaṃbandhitvena gamyate | tatra yena prakāreṇa vidhipratiṣedhaviṣayaṃ bhavati tathā sarvātmanā yojanīyam | tatraikastāvatpakṣaḥ | satyapi dravyaviśeṣaṇatve yathaiva dravyādiviśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhāvarthādviśeṣaṇeṣu vidhirbhavati | na tvanyathā viśiṣṭā vihitā syādityevamekatvaviśiṣṭagrahaviśiṣṭasaṃmārgavidhyanyathānupapatterarthāpattyantareṇaikatvavidhānam | evaṃ viśeṣaṇamālāyāmapi satyāṃ saṃyuktasaṃyogapāramparyeṇa sarvavidhipratyayaḥ | parasparasaṃbandhiṣu guṇeṣvekasminvihite 'nyo vidhīyata ityuktam | athavā yadi nāma dravyaviśeṣaṇaṃ yāvadvidhipratyayo na gacchettata ekayaivārthāpattyā sarvaṃ vidhātumiṣyate | tato yathā daśāpavitratadekatvagrahasaṃ
mārgāṇāṃ bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvam, evaṃ grahaikatvasyāpi pratipādanīyam | nanu caikapadalakṣaṇayā śrutyaikatvaṃ grahaviśeṣaṇaṃ gamyamānaṃ na yuktaṃ vākyena bhāvanāviśeṣaṇamāpādayitum | naiṣa doṣaḥ | virodhābhāvāt | grahasaṃbandhāvicchedenaiva hi bhāvanāsaṃbandho 'vakalpiṣyate | bhinnaviṣayatvādvā virodhābhāvaḥ | yadi hyubhayatrāpi tādarthyalakṣaṇa evā ' 'śrayāśrayiviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyarūpo vā saṃbandhaḥ syāttataḥ samānaviṣayatvaṃ pratīyeta | na tvevamapyasti | grahaikatvayorāśrayāśrayirūpeṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvādbhāvanayā ca saha śeṣaśeṣitvābhyupagamāt | tena grahāśritenaikatvena saṃmārgabhāvanāṃ kuryādityevamavagamayiṣyāmaḥ | tādarthyasaṃbandhe ca bhāvanāṃ prati nirvṛtte 'ruṇaikahāyanīnyāyena paścāttano viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | so 'yaṃ padena pratyāyyate | athavā yadaikatvaṃ svārthatvena graho nopajīvituṃ samartha ityavadhāritaṃ bhavati tadā 'sau tadbhāvanāṃ vākyenāpi gacchanna nivārayati | yadvā sutarāṃ prerayati | bhāvanārthaṃ hi sadetadvidhinā gṛhyamāṇaṃ paścādapi tāvanniyamyamānaṃ māṃ paricchetsyati | anyathā tu mayā 'gṛhītaṃ vidhinopekṣitaṃ tāvadbhāvanāyā na mama syāt | athavā grahārthamevaitadastu | tacca grahārthatvaṃ yena prakāreṇopapadyate sa darśayitavyaḥ | tatra yadi grahaḥ svarūpamātreṇa bhāvanāyāmanupraviśettata ekatvaṃ paścādbhaviṣyadagṛhītaṃ bhāvanayā bhāvanāgataṃ na syāt | grahasvarūpasyaiva syāt | ato 'sāvekatvapuraḥsarameva tatsamānadeśaṃ vā pṛthakpadopāttāruṇādivadevā ' 'tmānaṃ pratipadyate | kutaḥ |

evaṃ ca sati bhāvanāpraviṣṭaṃ tadvidhinā 'pi saṃspṛśyamānaṃ dravyaguṇayorniyame sati grahasya jātaṃ bhavati | atha śrutibalīyastvādasya dravyasaṃbandha ucyate | tadevātyantaviparītam | prātipadikopāttaṃ hi dravyaṃ samānapadopāttatvena pratyāsannaṃ syāt | iha tu samānavibhaktyupādānādekatvaṃ kārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ śīghrataraṃ gamyate | kārakaṃ ca vibhaktipratipāditamāvirbhūtapūrvāparībhūtabhāvanaikadeśa ityuktam | pratyayārthatvādetadeva pradhānam | sarvaṃ ca saṃbhavatpradhānagāmi bhavati | tena grahaścaikatvaṃ cobhayamapi kārakībhūtaṃ vibhaktiśrutyaiva bhāvanāyāṃ prakṣipyata iti vidhīyate | tattu viśiṣṭavidhānāt | vakṣyati hi ‘śabda( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 15 )vattūpalabhyate tadāgame hi taddṛśyate tasya jñānaṃ yathā 'nyeṣām’ iti | yathaiva daśāpavi
treṇa śruto nānyena kriyate, saṃmārgaśca śruto nāvaghātaḥ kriyate, grahasya śruto nāgrahasya kriyate, tathaikasya śruto nānekasya kartavyaḥ | sarveṣāṃ caiteṣāṃ pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyena parasparaniyamaḥ | tasmādupādīyamānapaśvādivadevoddiśyamānasyāpi saṃkhyā vivakṣitā | puṃpaśuśceti prasaṅgādudāhṛtam | na tvatra liṅgamapi tulyanyāyatvātsaṃkhyāvicāreṇa vicāritaprāyamevetyudāhiyate, mā bhūt ‘liṅga( a. 6 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 6 )viśeṣanirdeśātpuṃyuktamaitiśāyanaḥ’ ityasya punaruktatā || 13 ||

iha tāvat ‘tulya( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 10 )śrutitvādvetaraiḥ sa dharmaḥ syāt’ ityevaṃ dvitīyānirdeśātprayojanavattvācca grahaprādhānyaṃ saṃmārgasya ca guṇabhāvo vijñāyate | tatrāpi grahatvasya saṃmārgānarhatvādvyaktayaḥ saṃskāryatvenāvatiṣṭhante | tāsāṃ sā
sākṣāt—grahapadaśaktyetyarthaḥ |kṣātpratyāyanābhāvādgrahatvaṃ lakṣaṇatvenā ' 'śritam | eṣa codanārtho 'vagamyate | yadgrahakāryaṃ tatsaṃmārgeṇa saguṇaṃ bhavati | tatra ya eva na saṃmṛjyeta tasyaiva kāryaṃ viguṇaṃ bhavet | ataḥ sarve saṃmārjanīyāḥ | yadi tu saṃmārgaguṇatvena yāgāṅgapaśuvad grahaścodyeta tata ekenaiva siddhe kārye nāparo gṛhyeta | na hi tadānīṃ grahāntareṣvagṛhyamāṇeṣu kasyacidvaiguṇyaṃ dṛśyate | śāstrārthasya nirvṛttatvāt | prādhānyapakṣe tu pratipradhānaṃ śāstrabhedādekasminnapyasaṃskriyamāṇe tadgataśāstrabādhaprasaṅgaḥ |

lg.l: abādhite tu vijñāne yo 'nyo na kriyate tathā |

div.p: tasmādgrahatvāpūrvasaṃyogāviśeṣātprakaraṇāviśeṣācca sarvapratyayaḥ | nanu caikavacanaṃ śrūyata iti—avivakṣākāraṇamapaśyannāha | tatrottaram |

ta
taditi—tasmādityarthaḥ |dekasminvākye prakṛtipratyayapadaśrutipratipāditānāṃ bahūnāmarthānāṃ ko vidhiviniyogābhyāṃ parigṛhītaḥ ko vā tyakta iti cintāyām |

lg.l: vihito viniyuktaśca kaḥ ko neti vicāryate ||

grahā
grahādīnāmiti—grahatadekatvasaṃmārgāṇāṃ madhye grahasaṃmārgayostāvat, evamaṣṭapakṣī vicāraṇā kāryā | kiṃ graha eva bhāvanāṃ viśinaṣṭi kiṃ vā saṃmārga eva uta graho vā saṃmārgo vā | athavā grahaśca saṃmārgaśca | āhosvidubhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ | atha samudāyo vā | athavā grahaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃmārgaḥ, saṃmārgaviśiṣṭo vā graha iti |dīnāṃ ca kiṃ ceha niyogena nirūpaṇā ||

div.p: tathā |

lg.l: saṃmārgaṃ prati saṃhatya pratyekaṃ vā samāgame ||
sakṛcca tādṛśīṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnāṃ kartā kṛtī bhavet ||
tatrāpi tu grahasyaiva saṃmārgaḥ kiṃ vidhīyate |
graheṇa vā viśiṣṭāṃ kiṃ saṃkhyāṃ prati vidhīyate |
kriyāṃ vā pratyupādānaṃ kiṃ grahasyaiva gamyate ||
yāṃ yāṃ sa vacanavyaktiṃ vidheye racayiṣyati |
vākyabhedena tāṃ tāṃ tu siddhāntī dūṣayiṣyati ||
vidhāyakaśca naikena vidhinā tau hi sidhyataḥ ||
vidadhaddvau hi saṃbandhau yugapadvā krameṇa vā |
na śakyate vidhātuṃ cedekatvaṃ na grahīṣyate ||

ataḥ śu
‘somāraudraṃ ghṛte caruṃ nirvapecchuklānāṃ vrīhīṇām’ ityatropādīyamānaviśeṣaṇaiḥ śuklādibhirityarthaḥ |klādibhistulyaṃ naitadanyairviśeṣaṇaiḥ ||

div.p: tatra dravyaviśeṣaṇaṃ tāvannirākriyate | taddhi svarūpaprakṣepeṇa vā bhavedanekatvanirākaraṇena vā | tatra svarūpaprakṣepaviśeṣaṇaphalaṃ tāvatsarveṣvapi saṃmṛjyamāneṣu saṃbhavatyeva | katham | yo hi bahūn grahānsaṃmārṣṭi saṃmārṣṭyasāvekam | ataśca grahatvasaṃbandhena prāpta ekavacanena cāpratiṣiddhaḥ kimiva dvitīyādeḥ saṃmārgo na kriyeta | tatraitatsyāt | prātipadikādevaikasminnanekasmiṃśca grahe saṃmārjanīye prāpte punarekavacanaśrutirguṇārthavādatvenāsaṃbhavantī parisaṃkhyārthā bhaviṣyatīti | naitadevam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: parisaṃkhyeṣyate tatra na tvihaivaṃ punaḥ śrutiḥ ||

div.p: tacca nānāvākyatve satyeva bhavati | iha tvekenaiva vākyena prāptiḥ parisaṃkhyā ca kriyata ityuktam | taccātyantamevānupapannam |
prātipadikena hi sarvagrahasaṃbandhaḥ prāpyate | pratyayaikavacanena tatraiva pade nivartyate | na caitadutprekṣitumapi śakyate |

lg.l: tatraiva ca kṣaṇe prāptistatraiva ca nivartanam |

div.p: kiṃ ca |

lg.l: nirdoṣatvaṃ hi tatrāsyā vidhāne sati labhyate |

div.p: samānavākyapadapūrvabhāgāvasthitaprātipadikaprāpitasarvagrahasaṃmārgajñānapratyākhyānena tadadhīnātmalāmapratyayapratipādyāyāḥ parisaṃkhyāyāstridoṣatvamaparihāryam | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa nirdoṣaparisaṃkhyāviṣayaṃ pradarśayateṣṭāniṣṭavacanavyaktidvayaṃ pradarśitam—ityaścābhidhānīmiti | netyādatta iti | mantrasya rūpādevā ' 'dāne prāptatvāditi ca kāraṇamuktam | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: svapadārthe śrute śīghraṃ na nāmārthe tathā śrute ||
mantro 'pi raśanāṃ śīghraṃ yathā yāti sphuṭaśrutām |

na cā ' 'dāne 'sti mantrasya rū
rūpāt—sāmarthyādityarthaḥ |pātprāptiḥ kathaṃcana |
prayojanaṃ vidheḥ kiṃ syādasyeti tu nirūpaṇe |

so 'ya
śīghrāpahṛte 'rthe mantharānarthakyamityatra lokaprasiddhiṃ pramāṇayati—so 'yamityādinā |mābhāṇako loke yadaśvena hṛtaṃ purā |
bhavatyā kiṃ prabhutvena niruddhā laiṅgikī śrutiḥ ||
sa mā prāpattayetyevaṃ pratyakṣāṃ tvaritā śrutiḥ ||
tadidaṃ ( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 4 sū. 34 )parisaṃkhyeti sūtre 'sminnupavarṇitam |

tataśca bhā
yadbhāṣyakāreṇa ‘ityaśvābhidhānīmādatte’ ityasminvākya ityaśvābhidhānīmiti vacanavyaktyantaramāśritaṃ tatra yathāśrutatvādaro na kāryaḥ | kiṃtu viśiṣṭādānabhāvanāvidhyuttarakālīno yo 'ruṇaikahāyanyoriva mantrāśvābhidhānyoḥ parasparaniyamastatparā vacanavyaktyantaroktiḥ | evaṃ ‘nā ' 'datte’ ityanena ādadātisaṃbandhabodhakavacanavyaktinirāsaścā ' 'dānasāmānyānvayanirāsārthaḥ | tathā liṅgenaivā ' 'dāne mantraprāptyuktiśca saṃbhavamātrābhiprāyetyevaṃ bhāṣyatātparyaṃmāha—tataśca bhāṣyetyādinā |ṣyakāreṇa yadihoktamacintitam |

div.p: na caikatvasaṃbandhamātravidhiḥ śakyaḥ | saṃmārgagrahasaṃbandhamātravidhānopakṣīṇaśaktitvādvidhāyakasya | yathaudanopaghātanivāraṇavidhipare vākye śrutānāmapi śvamārjārādīnāmavidhīyamānatvādaviśeṣaṇatvam | kutaḥ |
tathā cā ' 'ha |
na tvidamatrodāharaṇaṃ ghaṭate | kutaḥ |

sthitasiddhāntodāharaṇamapi paśuprakaraṇe śrūyate ‘yadyapi caturavattī yajamānaḥ pañcāvattaiva vapā kāryā’ iti | yadavattaṃ tatpañcasaṃkhyaṃ kāryamityetadvidhipare vākye vapāgrahaṇamavivakṣitaṃ vākyabhedaprasaṅgāditi daśame vakṣya( a. 10 pā. 7 sū. 73 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥti |
tatra śvamārjārādisaṃbandhāvivakṣodāharaṇaṃ ghaṭate | iha tu |

bahutvasyāvivakṣitatvāt | nanu saṃmārṣṭīti—ayameva grahaikatvasaṃbandhamapi vidhāsyati | na | śrutivipratiṣedhāt | na hyeko vidhāyakaḥ śaknoti saṃmārgabhāvanāṃ ca vidhātuṃ grahaikatvasaṃbandhaṃ ca | tatra virodhe sati saṃnikarṣabalīyastvātsaṃmārgabhāvanāvidhāna āśrīyamāṇe vidhyantarānupapatteragrahaṇamekatvasya | yattūktaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇamapi vidhīyata iti | tadanupapannam |

lg.l: yadi tāvadgrahaḥ saṃkhyāṃ kriyāthai na prayacchati |

div.p: yadā hyekatvaviśiṣṭamātmānaṃ graho bhāvanāyāṃ prakṣipati tadā 'vaśyaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pūrvataraṃ prakṣeptavyam | na hyanyathā viśiṣṭena viśeṣitā syādityevaṃ bhāvanā 'pyekātvaviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇatī naikatvamagṛhītvā tadviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṃ śaknoti grahītum | tadyathā śabdo jātyādiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyamabhidadhanna viśeṣaṇamanabhidhāya viśiṣṭe vartate | tenāvaśyaṃ bhāvanāviśeṣaṇaṃ tāvadekatvamityāśrayaṇīyam | taccopariṣṭānnirākariṣyāmaḥ | śuddhadravyaviśeṣaṇatve tu bhāvanā 'pi grahamātreṇa saṃbaddhā | na saṃkhyayā | saṃkhyā 'pi grahamātreṇa saṃbaddhā na bhāvanayā | tatra viśiṣṭavidhinā bhāvanāviśeṣaṇamātrākṣepaparyavasāyinā nārthāntarākṣepaḥ śakyaḥ kartum | na hi bhāvanāṃ viśiṃṣatastasya tadekatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam |

lg.l: na caikatvaviśiṣṭaṃ taṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti bhāvanā |

svarūpā
svarūpeti—grahaviśeṣaṇībhūtāyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ grahasvarūpeṇa—bhāvanāviśeṣaṇena, vyavahitatvādityarthaḥ |ntaritatvāddhi sā saṃkhyāṃ naiva paśyati ||

div.p:
nāpi bhā
bhāvanāviśiṣṭasya—bhāvanāṃ prati viśeṣyabhūtasyāpi grahasya, nāpyekatvaṃ viśeṣaṇamityadhyāhāreṇa pūraṇam |vanāviśiṣṭasya mā bhūtpunarapi bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvameva | na hi bhāvanā 'vi
śi
aviśiṣṭamiti—ekatveneti śeṣaḥ |ṣṭaṃ grahaṃ viśeṣṭuṃ śaknoti | tasmānmaulikena vidhinā 'nākāṅkṣitatvānna dravyaviśeṣaṇākṣepaḥ saṃbhavati | tathā
ayaṃ cāpara ityādi—śakyamāśrayitumityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāsyati—tathā satītyādi—grahaṇamantena | satyapi cedvidhirabhyupagamyeta tatpratyayāvṛttimantareṇa tadanupapattervākyabhedaḥ syāt | abhyupetyāpi tu, saṃmārgavelāyāṃ naikatvamādartavyam | svatantrasya grahasyaivaikatvasaṃbandhavidhānāt | na hi vidhīyamānāvasthaḥ krayo guṇena saṃbadhyamānaṃ dravyaṃ viśinaṣṭītyuktamaruṇādhikara( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 )ṇe | tasmāttāvanna dravyaviśeṣaṇabhūtasya grahaṇam | athaitadekatvaṃ saṃmārgabhāvanāyāścodyate tathā 'pi na guṇatvena nāpi pradhānatvena saṃbhavati | tatra prādhānyaṃ tāvadanupapannam | amūrtasya saṃskartumaśakyatvāt | na ca dravyasaṃskāreṇa tatsaṃskāraḥ | anyatvā
dravyāditi śeṣaḥ |t | grahasya vā 'yamekatvadvāreṇa vidhīyate | tasya ca svayameva vihitatvātpunarvidhānānarthakyam | anuṣṭhānakāle 'pi ca grahasyā ' 'tmīya eva saṃmārgaḥ pratyabhijñāyata iti naikatvanimittabuddhiḥ syāt | evaṃ guṇabhāvo 'pi nirākartavyaḥ | kathamaruṇatvasya guṇatvamiti cedata āha |

lg.l:
krayadra
krayadravyeti—somakrayāṅgabhūtaikahāyanīdravyaparicchedadvārā ' 'ruṇyaṃ guṇo 'pi krayāṅgamiṣyate | grahasya tu niṣphalasaṃmārgāṅgattvāsaṃbhavānna tatparicchedadvāraikatvasya grahāṅgatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti kārikārthaḥ |vyaparicchedādguṇo 'pi guṇa iṣyate |

div.p:
anaṅgamāśrito hi guṇo 'pyanaṅgameva syāt | nanu pradhānabhūtamapīti | yaddravyasyā ' 'dau nirvartakatvaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ taddvāremaikatvaṃ saṃmārgasyopakariṣyati | pradhānabhūto 'pi ca graho guṇabhūtadravyadharmaṃ kriyāṅgaguṇaparicchedyatvaṃ pratipatsyate | na hi śeṣamāśritaḥ śeṣaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | upakāriṇamāśrita upakārotīti sarvatra sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ | śeṣatvaṃ tu śrutyādipramāṇakameva bhaviṣyatīti | siddhāntavādī tu vastunyupapadyamāne 'pyanekārthatve vidhiśabdasyāsāmarthyādvyavahito vā guṇo vā hātavyo bhavatītyevamekatvaparityāgaṃ
vadati | na
atrocyate | na brūma ityādi tasmānnaitatkiṃcidapi kartumityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ siddhāntavādītvityārabhya—parityāgaṃ vadatītyevamantena saṃkṣepato vyākhyāya kriyāviśeṣaṇatvapakṣa ekatvasya vivakṣānirāsabhāṣyamākṣipati—natvityādinā | tvetadevamavivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhati | katham |

lg.l: saṃmārgeṇa tu saṃbandho na dvedhā 'pi nirākṛtaḥ ||

div.p: yattāvaduktamamūrtatvātsaṃskartuṃ na śakyata iti | tatprātipadikārthe 'pi grahatve tulyam | jāteramūrtatvāt | athāpi vyaktidvāreṇāsyāḥ saṃskāraḥ sa saṃkhyāyāmapi tulyaḥ | atha vyaktau kṛto jāteḥ kṛto bhavatīti tathaikatvasyāpi | tathā yadi jātirdravyalakṣaṇārthā tathaikatvamapi | atha jātermūrtatvaṃ dravyāvyatirekaṃ cā ' 'śritya sākṣādeva saṃskāra ityucyate | tadapyekatvasyāviśiṣṭam | yadapyuktaṃ na ca dravye kriyamāṇaḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ kṛto bhavatīti | tadapi tvatpakṣe jāteraviśiṣṭam | atha grahaśabdasya vyaktivācitvātparihāra ucyate | tata ākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyo bādhyeta | na hyanekadeśakālavartijyotiṣṭomaprayogasthagrahavyaktisaṃbandhānubhavo 'sti | adya dṛṣṭeṣu graheṣu prathamaḥ śabdaprayogo na syāt | ato 'vaśyaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃcidupalakṣaṇamāśrayitavyam | na ca tadgrahatvādanyatsaṃbhavatīti tadeva viśeṣaṇatvātpūrvamabhidheyamāpadyate | na cā ' 'kāravacanatvaṃ grahaśabdasya | pratigrahamavayavasaṃniveśasya kiṃcinnyūnātiriktāvayavatvena bhinnatvāt | na ca tatsāmānyaṃ dravyāntarebhyo nivṛttaṃ teṣu teṣu cānuvṛttaṃ grahatvādanyadasti | tasmāttadeva vācyam | yattu grahasya kriyamāṇaḥ saṃmārgastadīyatvāvadhāraṇenaikatvaviṣayo vijñāyata iti mandaphalā ca punaḥ śrutiriti | tatrābhidhīyate |

ayamevaikatvasaṃbandhādviśeṣo yadekasminkriyate | anyathā hi grahamātrasaṃskāraḥ syāt | tasmāddravyaguṇayorniyamasiddherastyaruṇāśabdasyevaikatvasaṃbandhasya pṛthakprayojanamiti saṃskāryatvopapattiḥ | guṇatvapratijñānaṃ tu praṇītādharmavadbhāṣyakāreṇaiva pratipāditam | mandayuktika evāyamabhyupagamo yadguṇamevā ' 'śritena guṇenopakartavyamiti | kutaḥ |

asaṃbaddheṣu kriyamāṇā guṇāḥ kriyāṃ na paricchindyuriti kriyāsaṃbandhinamāśrayanti |
na tu tadgataguṇapradhānatvayoḥ kaścidviśeṣa iti tayorupekṣā | yathā ca kriyāsādhanaṃ kisaṃkhyametadbhaviṣyatītyevamapekṣyate | tathaiva pradhānamapi kiṃsaṃkhyaṃ yasya mayopakartavyamiti | etāvacca saṃbandhe kāraṇam | api ca |

kriyayā hi pradhānasyopakartavyaṃ guṇenāpi | na ca sādhanagato 'sau tathāgatāṃ yāti | yathā pradhānagataḥ ko nu khalu mama pradhānasyopakurvantyāḥ kiṃcidanugrahaṃ kuryāditi | mahāṃścāyamanugraho yatpradhāneyattāvadhāraṇaṃ nāma | yajamānasaṃskārāṇāṃ ca yāgaguṇabhūtakartraṃśātirekeṇa phalapratigrahaṇayogyapuruṣakaraṇādbhoktṛtvāṃśapātināmapi yāgāṅgatvaṃ vakṣya( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 2 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥte | sa evātra nyāya ityaviruddhaṃ pradhānāśrayiṇāṃ guṇatvam | evaṃ sthiteṣu tu yadvidherasāmarthyamityuktaṃ tadupādīyamāneṣvapi paścādiṣvaviśiṣṭam | tatrāpi hi dravyadevatāyāgaviśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhipare vākye yadi liṅgasaṃkhyāsaṃbandho 'paraḥ | kriyāyāṃ dravye vā vidhīyate tato vākyaṃ bhidyeteti śakyaṃ vaditum | atha tu viśiṣṭavidhānādavākyabhedaḥ | sa saṃmārge 'pyaprāptatvādaviśiṣṭaḥ | tadihaitāvāneva viśeṣo 'vaśiṣyate yadagraha uddiśyamānaḥ paśurupādīyamānaḥ | na caitāvatā kiṃcitsidhyati | anyathā paśugrahasaṃbandhamātrabhedenāpi vivakṣitāvivakṣitatvasiddhiḥ syāt | api cāsminneva vākye grahamuddiśya saṃmārge vidhīyamāne 'pi daśāpavitratadekatvādīnāṃ vivakṣā 'bhyupagamyate | na ca vākyabhedaḥ | tathā grahaikatve 'pi bhaviṣyati | yastu padāntaropādānādviśeṣaṃ brūyātta
tasya sarvatreti—yadi kaścidyatkiṃcidvailakṣaṇyamātreṇātulyanyāyatvaṃ brūyāttadā tasya tulyanyāyaviṣayābhāvānna kvacidapyanumānāṅgaṃ dṛṣṭānto nāpyupamānavyavahārāṅgamupamā sidhyedityāśayaḥ |sya sarvatra yaḥ kaścidviśeṣo 'stīti na kvaciddṛṣṭānto nopamā | tulyanyāyānāṃ viṣayābhāvāt | kiṃ ca |

tasmādgrahaikatvamapi vivakṣitam | asti hyuddiśyamānasyāpi grahasya vidhisaṃsparśaḥ | anyathā hi vinā 'pi graheṇa saṃmārge kṛte tatkṛtaḥ śāstrārtho bhavet | atha prāptatvādgrahasyāvidhānamucyeta | tadayuktam | saṃmārgaṃ pratyaprāptatvāt | atha jyotiṣṭome prāpteravidhirucyate | sa paśvāderapi loke prāptatvātprāpnoti | athāsau yāge 'prāpto vidhīyate | tadgrahasyāpyaviśiṣṭam | atha saṃmārgasya jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇābahirbhāvādgrahāvidhānamucyeta | tatpaśuyāgasyāpi
lokāntargatatvādaviśiṣṭam | śakyaṃ hi yo graha itivadyaḥ paśurityapi vaktum | uddiśyamānatvāttu yā 'tra grahasyāvidhānāśaṅkā sā vidhyanuvādayoruddiśyamānopādīyamānayoścātyantabhedādayuktā | tathā hi |
tasmādviśiṣṭasaṃmārgavidhyākṣepādgrahatvavadekatvasyāpi vidhisaṃsparśe satyarthādguṇapradhānabhāva ityekatvaṃ niṣprayojanatvādguṇabhūtaṃ grahaśca prayojanavattvātpradhānabhūtaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: padabhedo na ca nyāyyaḥ prakṛtipratyayau prati ||

div.p:
ekasminneva ca pade yugapaduccarite grahānuṣṭhānaṃ prati vidirāśrīyate naikatvamiti vipratiṣiddham | na ca vibhaktiḥ padāntaram | svātantryeṇāniyatapūrvāparatvena cāprayujyamānatvāt | gamakatvātpadamiti cenna | dhūmāṃdiṣvatiprasaṅgāt | ekasminnapi cā ' 'khyātādipratyayenaiko 'rthaḥ pratīyata iti pratyarthaṃ padatvaprasaṅgaḥ | padamiti ca laukikaḥ śabdaḥ sa yatra lokena prayujyate yatra ca smartṛbhiḥ smaryate na tato 'panetuṃ śakyate | ‘supti
pā. sū. ( 1-4-14 ) |ṅantaṃ padam’ iti ca smṛtiḥ | tatraiva ca padaśabdaḥ prayujyate | tasmātprakṛtipratyayasamudāyaḥ padaṃ nāvayavaḥ | abhyupetyāpi tu |
avivakṣāyāṃ śabdasyāśrutasamatvamāśrīyate |

tadiha yadi tāvatsaṃkhyāparityāgādvibhaktiḥ parityaktā tataḥ karmatvaparityāgo 'pi prāpnoti | tataśca grahasya saṃskāryatvaṃ hīyeta | pra
yathā ‘prayājaśeṣeṇa habīṃṣyabhighārayati’ ityatra prayājanirvṛttirūpakṛtaprayojanatvātprayājaśeṣasya saṃskāryatvamiṣyate | tadvadatrāpibhaviṣyatītyāśayaḥ |yojanavattvātsaṃskāryatvamiti cenna | kārakavibhaktimantareṇa kriyāsaṃbandhābhāvāt | na hyavibhaktikasya graha ityetāvataḥ saṃmārṣṭītyanena saṃbandho 'vakalpate | tato 'vaśyaṃ karmatvaṃ vivakṣitavyam | ataścā ' 'dṛtāyāṃ
vibhaktāvekadeśaparityāgābhāvātsaṃkhyāvivakṣā durnivāretyaśakyaḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃmārgaḥ | tethā hi |

lg.l: na hyekasminpade yuktaḥ prakṛtau pratyaye 'pi vā |

grahaṇāgrahaṇaṃ yuktamarddhaku
ardhakukkuṭipākavaditi—kukkuṭyā ardhaṃ pacyatāmardhaṃ prasavāya dhāryatāmiti kenacidukte kathaṃ vaikasya vastuno 'rdhasya pāko dhāraṇaṃ vā prasavāyārdhasya śakyate kartumityevaṃrūpamardhajaratīyaṃ lokapravādāyātamatra dṛṣṭāntārthaḥ |kkuṭipākavat ||

div.p:
atra
evamākṣiptaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ samādhātumārabhate—atretyādinā | pratividhīyate |

yadā hi grahaikatvoddeśena saṃmārgo vidhīyate tadoddiśyamānayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvātpratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptilakṣaṇastāvadeko vākyabhedaḥ | upādeyanānātve punaḥ sarvaviśiṣṭabhāvanāprayojanatvādekakāryatve satyāñjasyenaivaikavākyatvaṃ syāt | asminneva ca pakṣe pradhānabhūtakriyāvaśīkārādviśeṣaṇānāmanyonyaniyamasiddhiḥ | uddiśyamānānāṃ punaravaśīkṛtatvātpratyekaṃ kriyāgrahaṇasāmarthyātkriyaiva vaśīkṛtā tairākṛṣyata ityekaikasyānyonyanirapekṣasya kartavyatā 'vagamyate | tadiha graha ekatvanirapekṣaḥ saṃskartavyaḥ, ekatvamapi grahanirapekṣaṃ saṃskartavyam | tatra yadi tāvadgrahagatamevaikatvaṃ saṃskriyate tataḥ sāpekṣakaraṇādubhayornirapekṣasaṃbandhāvadhṛtaṃ prādhānyaṃ vihanyeta | atha dravyāntaragatam | tanna jñāyeta kimiti | na hi grahavatkiṃcidekaṃ nāma prakaraṇe paśyāmaḥ | yadeva hyekaṃ tadevānyāpekṣayā 'nekam | na cāvacchede kāraṇaṃ kiṃcidasti | yenānyanirapekṣatvenaikamavadhāryeta | nanutpattau yadekavacanāntaśabdacoditaṃ tadekaṃ bhaviṣyati | na | teṣāmapi bahutvātkimiti nirūpaṇāśakteḥ | atha sarveṣāṃ kasmānna bhavati | na | tatrāpi coditahānyacoditakaraṇāpatteḥ | tathā hi |

guṇabhūtena hyekenaikatvayuktena kriyā sādhyamānā nānyamapekṣata iti yatkiṃcidapyupādāya śāsrārthaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt | prādhānye punaryadevaikatvayuktaṃ na gṛhyeta tasyaiva vaiguṇyaṃ prasajyeta | yadi tvanyadapi saṃskriyeta tato 'nekaikatvasaṃnipātātsaṃkhyāntaropajane sati śrutaikatvaparityāgenānekasaṃskārācchrutaṃ hīyetāśrutaṃ ca parigṛhyeta | vīpsārthaśca kalpyetaikaikaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti | jātyuddeśena śuklādiguṇāntaroddeśena vā saṃskāre vihitena saṃskṛtāvapi na jātiguṇāntarāpattirbhavati | tathā hi |
tatraitatsyāt | sarveṣvapi saṃskriyamāṇeṣvanuṣṭhānavelāyāmekaika eva dṛśyate | tasmādavirodha ityucyate |

na hi kaścidapi yugapadanekaṃ grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi | tataśca vivakṣite 'pi tādṛśameveti mandaṃ vivakṣāphalam |
nanviti—sarvagrahasaṃmārge 'pi pratyekamanuṣṭhānasiddhiraketvavivakṣāphalaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekadeśyāśayaḥnanu yugapatsaṃmārgavirodha eva phalaṃ bhavati | naitadasti | pratyekaṃ gṛhyamāṇānāṃ tadvadeva saṃskāre sati yaugapadyaprasaṅgabhāvāt | abhyupetyavādamātraṃ caitatsvatantraikatvāpratīteḥ | ataścaikatvāṃśasaṃbandhasyānavadhāraṇenāśāstraviṣayatvātkevalagrahaparameva śāstraṃ vijñāyate | yadyapi ca dravyāntaragatatvena tadvivakṣitameva tathā 'pi grahasya tāvadavivakṣitamiti siddhaḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃmārgaḥ |

atha tu guṇabhūtamekatvaṃ vidhīyeta tatra dvitīyā tāvadguṇabhāvaṃ naiva bravītīti vyākhyātaṃ ( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 12 )saktvadhikaraṇe | sā yadyavivakṣitepsitārthā kārakamātralakṣaṇārtheti vivakṣyate tataḥ sa eva tāvadeko doṣa ityekatvavacca grahasyāpi guṇatvaprasaṅga | atha grahasya prādhānyamekatvasya ca guṇatvaṃ parigṛhyeyātāṃ tathā 'pi sakṛduccāraṇe guṇapradhānatvaśrutilakṣaṇāśrayaṇādvibhaktivirūpyādinimitto vākyabhedaḥ | tatraitatsyāt | aikarūpyārthamekatvavadgrahasyāpi tāvadguṇatvamevāvagamayet | tataḥ prayojanavattāvaśena grahasya prādhānyam | na cārthādbhavacchabdasya vairūpyamāpādayatīti | tatra brūmaḥ |

sarvaiva śabdapravṛttirasaṃbhavādviprakarṣaṃ pratipadyate | nāsmadicchāmātreṇa | tadiha yadi tāvacchrutivaśātprādhānyaṃ parigṛhyate tatastadevaikam | athāsya kathaṃcidasaṃbhavaṃ kalpayitvā lakṣaṇā ' 'śrīyate | tataḥ punaḥ saṃbhavakalpanāvirodhātsatyapi prayojanavattve śāstravaśena guṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ | yugapatsaṃbhavāsaṃbhavaparigrahātprādhānyaguṇatvayoḥ prādhānyāllocanena vikṣepācca śabdakleśaḥ | prathamaṃ hi śrutivaśātprādhānyaṃ pratīyate tatastadujjhitvā madhye guṇatvaṃ tatastasyāpyasaṃbhavādante punaḥ prādhānyamiti vikṣepaḥ | paścāttanamapi ca prādhānyamavaśyaṃ śabda evā ' 'ropayitavyam | na hyartho nāma kiṃcitpramāṇam | kiṃ tarhi | śabdaśaktikalpa nāhetuḥ | ataścānekakalpanānimitto hyastyeva vākyabhedaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: avaśyaṃ bhāvinaṃ prāpya na śabdo 'nyatra vartate ||

div.p: yadyapi ca grahasya prādhānyaṃ prayojanavattayaiva siddhaṃ tathā 'pi dvitīyā tadāpādayantī satī nānuvādamātramapi labhamānā 'rthāntare varteta | tadyathā ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt’ ityatra prakaraṇaprāptamapi santaṃ homameva dhāturanuvadati na vidhānārthamapyanyadeva gamanādi dhātvarthāntaraṃ bravītīti | tataśca grahasya prādhānyānuvādādekatvasya ca guṇabhāvavidhānādaparo vākyabhedaḥ | śrutyā cāvaśyaṃbhāvini grahaprādhānyavidhāne labhyamāne ko jātucidarthātkleśena kalpayiṣyati |
