tasmācchabdasāmarthyādubhayatra prādhānyaṃ grahītavyam | tatra cānirūpaṇādavivakṣetyuktam | bhāṣyamapyeteṣveva vākyabhedeṣu yojayitavyam | nanu ca ‘agnestṛṇāni’ ityatra dvitīyāsaṃyogābhāvādyathoktavākyabhedābhāvādekatvavivakṣā syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadyapyeṣā ṣaṣṭhī viśeṣaṇatvādguṇabhūtamivāgniṃ pratipādayati tathā 'pi saṃbandhāntarābhāvādaṅgāṅgisaṃbandha eva jñāyate | tatrāpyagneḥ prayojanavattvāttṛṇāpacayasya tadabhāvādrājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra yathā rājā puruṣasya svāmyevamagnistṛṇāpacayasya svāmītyetadeva gamyate | yadyapi caiṣā pañcamī syāt | tathā 'pyagnyapādānakasya tṛṇāpacayasya phalābhāvādavaśyaṃ ‘madhyātpūrvārdhācca dviravadyati’ itivadavivakṣitaguṇārthā kāryavaśenāgniprādhānyaṃ lakṣayantī pravartate | tataścāgneḥ
prādhānyamekatvasya ca guṇabhāva ityādi pūrvavadeva yojanīyam | tṛṇānītyetadapi bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti vyākhyeyam | tathā ‘bhinne juhoti’ ityādiṣu | yadi tāvadbhinnaikatvayorniyogavikalpasamuccayādibhirnimittatvaṃ saptamyocyeta tataḥ pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāpteḥ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvaḥ | athaikatvamupādeyatvena pratipādyeta bhinnamanupādeyatvena tato yadyapi guṇatvapradhānatvavirodho nāsti tathā 'pi pūrvavadeva virodhaḥ | ekavākyatve nānārūpatvaṃ nāmetyavivakṣā | satyāṃ cā ' 'kāṅkṣāyāṃ vivakṣyeta | sā copādīyamāneṣvākāṅkṣopajāyate noddiśyamāneṣu | uddiśyamāne hi prātipādikārthasaṃbandhimātrāpekṣitvānna saṃkhyākāṅkṣā | pramāṇāntarādeva vijñātasaṃkhyatvāt | ato yādṛśaṃ grahādi pramāṇāntare 'vadhṛtaṃ tādṛśyasya saṃmārgādaya iti niścīyate | sarvalakṣaṇeṣu pratītimātraupayikatvādanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvam | yathā yo 'yaṃ śuklavāsā dṛśyate tamānayetyādiṣu vāsaḥprabhṛtīnām | tatra yāvatā vinā 'nuṣṭhānaṃ na sidhyati tāvadupādātavyamiti grahādimātraṃ parigṛhyate | nanu bahuṣu vivakṣiteṣu bahuvacanamiti—avivakṣito 'pyavidyamāno 'rtho na śakyo vaktumiti manyate | tatra vedasya nityatvādyathoccaritārthānveṣaṇamātre puruṣāṇāṃ vyāpāra iti na karteva paryunuyujyate | tena prātipadikārthānugrahārthā vibhaktiriti draṣṭavyam | kārakapratītiparā vā satī nāntarīyakatvātsaṃkhyāṃ pratipādayati | yathā prakāśanārthaṃ prajvālito 'gnirindhanaṃ bhasmī karoti, evamatrāpi ( a. 11 pā. 1 sū. 42 )‘prathamaṃ vā niyamyeta’ ityevaṃ karmatvapratipādakamekavacanam | ‘yasya puroḍāśau’ ityādiṣu cā ' 'dhikārikaṃ havirubhayatvavaddvivacanam | anyathā hi ( a. 12 pā. 2 sū. 25 )‘mukhyaṃ vā’ iti kadācidāgneyagrahaṇābhrāntiḥ syāt | api ca grahaḥ prātipadikārtha iti—yadā 'nviṣyamāṇamapi kriyāsaṃ
bandhitvaṃ na ghaṭate tadā tulyāyāmavivakṣāyāṃ varaṃ dravyaviśeṣaṇamevedamityabhiprāyaḥ | tataśca saṃmārgastena vinā 'pyaviguṇaḥ | jātisaṃkhyā caiṣā pratyekaṃ saṃmṛjyamānavyaktigatā vā samarthanīyā || 14 ||

paśau punardravyasya niṣprayojanatvātsaktuvadavivakṣitepsitārthayā dvitīyayā kāraka sāmānyaṃ lakṣayitvā tadviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇadravyakarmasaṃyoganyāyena
ṣaṣṭhādhyāyādyādhikaraṇanyāyenetyrarthaḥ karaṇatvena guṇabhāve 'vagamite sarveṣāmeva jātidravyaṃsaṃkhyāliṅgānāṃ bhāvanāṃ yāgaṃ ca pratyupādīyamānatvādavairūpyeṇa viśiṣṭaikabhāvanāvidhānādarthāpattilabhyaviśeṣaṇavidhyantarāvirbhāvāccaikavākyatvasiddhiḥ || 15 ||

ekatvavadeva grahatvasyāpi pradarśanārthatvāccamaseṣvapi saṃmārga ityupanyasya pradarśanārthatve pramāṇābhāvādvākyena ca saṃbandhopādānādgrahādavacchidya śrutyā kevalasaṃmārgavidhānātpūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ | iha tvavaghātādivadeva bhaṅgo
bhaṅgoddhārau—ākṣepaparihārāvityarthaḥ |ddhārau ka
kartavyaviti—‘vidhīyate 'vaghātādiḥ śrutyā vrīhyādisaṃgataḥ’ | ityādi teṣāmarthādhikaraṇasthavārttikoktaprakāreṇetyarthaḥ |rtavyau | nanvevaṃ sati tenaiva gatatvādadhikaraṇameva nā ' 'rabdhavyam | satyaṃ nā ' 'rabhyeta yadi grahādhikaraṇenāvivakṣākāluṣyabuddhirna syāt | evaṃ tvekatvavivakṣāsaṃtrāsitaḥ sarvamevāvivakṣitaṃ manyate | athavā ' 'gneyādyapūrvāṇāṃ karmabhedādbhede sati yuktā 'vaghādīnāṃ vyavasthā | jyotiṣṭomakarmaṇastvekatvādekāpūrvasādhanayorgrahacamasayordharmasaṃkara ityabhiprāyaḥ | saṃskārādveti cāpūrvasādhanaprayuktatvena pratipradhānāvṛttikriyopapādanārtham || 16 ||

yathāsthūlaṃ tāvaduttaram | grahāsaṃbandhe sati saṃmārgavidhānābhāvādavaśyaṃbhāvitvācca saṃbandhyantarasya na kevalasaṃmārgavidhānam | athavā grahaśabdena yadapūrvaṃ lakṣitaṃ tatprayuktatvādvyavasthā | nanvapūrvasaṃyogāviśeṣādityekāpūrvābhiprāyam | satyapi tu karmaikatve tadapūrvābhede ca grahacamasābhyāsānāmayugapatkālatvātsvarūpasāhityamekasminkarmaṇyapūrve vā na saṃbhavatītyavaśyaṃ pratyabhyāsamavāntarāpūrvabhedena bhavitavyam | vinā 'pi cābhyāsena yāgasvarūpasiddheradṛṣṭārtha evābhyāsaḥ | tataśca grahaśabdopasthāpitapratyāsannāvāntarāpūrvātikramakāraṇābhāvādvyavasthāsiddhiḥ | avaghātādivadeva ‘pha( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 10 )laṃ tu saha ceṣṭayā’ ityeṣo 'rtho
yojayitavyaḥ | na caikatvavivakṣāvadgrahatvavivakṣāyāṃ vākyabhedo bhaviṣyatīti pūrvādhikaraṇena bhramitavyam || 17 ||

yadi saptadaśāratniḥ, vājapeyasyeti vidhīyate, yūpaśabdo yathākathaṃcittadanuvādaḥ | tataḥ ṣoḍaśipātre niveśaḥ | athāpi yo vājapeyasya saṃbandhī sa saptadaśāratniriti vidhīyate tathā 'pyevam | atha yo yūpaḥ sa saptadaśāratniriti vacanavyaktiḥ, vājapeyaśabdo yathākathaṃcidviśeṣaṇaṃ prakaraṇaprāptānuvādo vā | tatastadaṅgapaśuyūpasyedaṃ parimāṇamiti | kiṃ prāptam |

sākṣātkarmaṇaḥ saptadaśāratnitvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti tadaṅgadravyaṃ gṛhyate | yatra yadeva sākṣātsaṃbandhi tadeva grahītavyam | yadyapi paśurapi vājapeyaprakaraṇāntargata iti tatsaṃbandhe 'pi prakaraṇādanatireko bhavatyeva, vājapeyasya taddhi bhavati | tathā 'pyaṅgapradhānānāṃ bhinnakathaṃbhāvayogitvādvājapeyakathaṃbhāvenāgrahaṇātprakaraṇabādho 'bhidhīyate | vājapeyasyeti ca ṣaṣṭhīśrutyā saṃbandho bhavati | bhavatastu yūpasāmānādhikaraṇyādvākyena syāt | na ca vājapeyaśabdavelāyāṃ kaścidvirodho yena lakṣaṇā ' 'śrīyate ‘gu( a. 9 pā. 3 a. 5 sū. 15)ṇe tvanyāyakalpanā’ iti tadvaraṃ
yūpaśabda eva lakṣaṇā | tasmādūrdhvapātra eva niveśa iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

yo hi prakaraṇamavyavahitasaṃbandhaṃ cānujighṛkṣati tasya yūpaśabdo 'narthakaḥ syāt | ūrdhvapātraṃ lakṣayiṣyatīti cenna | asati sāmānādhikaraṇye 'nyathā saṃbhave vā lakṣaṇābhāvāt | asmatpakṣe punarna kiṃcillakṣaṇāvṛttam | ṣaṣṭhyāḥ saṃbandhamātravācitvenānaṅge 'pyupakārakamātrāpekṣayopapannatvāt | na hyasāvaṅgāṅgisaṃbandhamevaikaṃ bravīti | anaṅgamapi sa yūpastadaṅgapaśvarthatvādupakārako vājapeyasya | yattvānantaryeṇa ṣaṣṭhīśrutirviniyojiketi, tadyūpa śabdenāpi sahāviśiṣṭam | ataśca saptadaśāratnividhipare 'nūdyamānatvādyādṛśaṃ vayaṃ vājapeyasya yūpaṃ paśyāmastādṛśasya grahaṇamiti paśuyūpāśrayaṇam | asti tveṣā 'pi jijñāsā yadi vājapeyasya sākṣādyūpaḥ syāditi | yadā tu se nopalabdhastadā pakṣāntaramavalambitam | kiṃ ca |

sākṣāttāvanna saptadaśāratnitvaṃ yujyata ityuktam | saṃbandhimātramapyanirdiṣṭaṃ, vājapeyasyetyetāvanmātreṇa na jñāyeta | yūpaśabdārthastvatatsaṃbandhitvāddūrabhraṣṭaḥ | tasmādyathoktamevāsya viśeṣaṇatvam | adhikāraprakaraṇaprāptamanuvadiṣyati | vakṣyati hyetat ‘ā( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 3)rā
dapīti cenna | tadvākye hi tadarthatvāt, ityatra yathā prakaraṇavaśena tadupakārimātre dharmā vidhīyante na sākṣādaṅgeṣveva kevaleṣviti | tasmānna kenacitpramāṇena virodha iti || 18 ||

evaṃ saṃskāradravyaguṇā vicāritāḥ | idānīṃ yatkarmaiva karmasaṃbandhitvena śrūyamāṇamarthātsaṃskāratvaṃ pratipatsyate tadvicāryate | tatrābhikrāmamiti ṇamulā vīpsārthopādānādabhikramyābhikramya kimapi karotītyapekṣite paraśca juhotiḥ prakṛtaprayājagrāhī dṛśyate | tatkimabhikramaṇaṃ tenaiva saṃbadhyata uta prakṛtamātreṇeti | saṃbandhaśravaṇe ca sati saṃśayākṣepaparihārāvaruṇādhikaraṇavaddraṣṭavyau | karmaṇo 'mūrtatvādvākyena ca svasaṃbandhopādānāt | anenaiva viśeṣeṇa punarārambhaḥ | yattatra samānādhikaraṇaṃ dravyamupāttaṃ tadviṣayaniyame ca tatsādhyākriyāsaṃbandhasyopapattitvam | iha tu tasyaiva sādhyatvam | apekṣitaśca guṇaḥ paricchedakatvena vijñātakriyāsaṃbandhaprakāraḥ | ta tvatrābhikriyā | nānābhūtāni ca tatra kriyāntaradravyāṇi | atra punaḥ sarvakarmasu sa evādhvaryuḥ kartetyapunaruktatā | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ sarvārthamiti | kutaḥ |

na tāvadabhikramaṇena homaṃ karotīti vaktuṃ śakyam | ato na prayājaiḥ saṃbadhyate | tataścāruṇādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣavadvākyabhedaḥ syāt | nanvanenaiva hetunā 'nyatrāpyanaminiveśa ityaruṇācodyameva | parihāraścā ' 'khyāte karturguṇabhūtatvādbalāddhomasaṃbandhā
abhikramaṇasyeti śeṣaḥ |patterna juhotinā gṛhītena prayājādīnāṃ kartrā saṃbandhaḥ | anyatra tu prakaraṇagṛhītasya pradhānabhūtasya kartuḥ saṃbandho na virotsyate || 19 ||

sarvathā tāvadabhikrāmamityetatpadaṃ na kri
kriyāntaramantareṇeti—abhikrāmamiti ṇamulo dhātusaṃbandhādhikāravihitatvāditi śeṣaḥ |yāntaramantareṇa nirākāṅkṣī bhavati | na hyetaddravyasaṃbandhaṃ kathaṃcidapi bravīti | tasmātprakṛtaprayājagrāhiṇā juhotinaikavākyatvāttādarthyaṃ vijñāyate | śaknoti ca kartṛpratyāsattikaraṇena tadupakartum | apekṣitā cā ' 'havanīyapratyāsattiradhvaryoḥ prayājaiḥ | aruṇatvavadeva vā 'rthāddravyasaṃbandha iti karturupasarjanatve 'pi na kaściddoṣaḥ | evaṃ copakārarūpeṇa karmāpi karmasādhyaṃ bhavatītyetadapi
siddham | ya
evaṃ tāvadbhāṣyamanusṛtyādhikaraṇamāracayya tatra ca pūrvapakṣasyātiphalgutayā, aruṇādhikaraṇena gataprāyattvāścānyathā 'dhikaraṇamāracayati—yadā tvityādinā | idamākūtam—abhikramaṇasya svavākyopāttakriyānvaye 'pyaṅgabhāvanāyā aphalatvenetikartavyatākāṅkṣātmakaprakaraṇābhāvājjuhotinā prayājahomamātragrahaṇe pramāṇābhāvānmahāprakaraṇopasthitasarvahomānuvādenābhikramaṇavidhānātprākaraṇikasarvahomāṅgatvamabhikramaṇasya tatkartṛsaṃskāradvārā yuktam | sūtrārthastu kartṛguṇe—abhikramaṇe, karmāsamavāyāt—prayājakarmaṇyasamavāyāt, tadvākyaikavākyatā na syāditi | evaṃ prāpte siddhāntastu nābhikramaṇaṃ prākaraṇikasarvahomāṅgam | kiṃ tu prayājahomāṅgameva | kutaḥ | prayājāvāntarādhikāropasthitasyaiva juhotinā 'nuvādāt | na cāṅgādhikāro 'prāmāṇika iti vācyam | bhāvanāsvābhāvyena sarvatretikartavyatākāṅkṣātmakaprakaraṇasyāpaṅnotumaśakyatvāt | paraṃ tu sā 'gaṅbhāvanetikartavyatākāṅkṣā pradhānādhikāreṇa pratibaddhetyaṅgagrahaṇāsāmarthyānna parasparāṅgatvaprasaktiḥ | yatra tvanyāniveśyaṅgasaṃbandhānupapattirūpottejakaṃ tasyāḥ saṃbhāvyate, yathā 'traiva, prathamataḥ ‘atihāyeḍo barhiḥ prati samānayate juhvāmaupabhṛtam’ ityanena prayājoddeśena samānayanaṃ vidhāya madhye 'bhikramaṇamāmnāya punaḥ śrūyate ‘prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṣyabhidhārayati’ iti | tatra tu prathamāṅgenottejitāyā yāvaduttarāṅgasaṃbandhamanusyūtāyāḥ prayājabhāvanetikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāḥ pradhānādhikārāpekṣayā balīyasyāḥ sattvāttayaiva madhyapātyabhikramaṇasyāpi grahaṇatsiddhaṃ tasya prayājahomamātrāṅgatvamiti | sūtrārthastu—sākāṅkṣaṃ—saṃdaṃśenābhivyaktākāṅkṣābhikramaṇavākyaṃ prayājaikavākyaṃ syāt | na hyādyottejanamātreṇābhivyakteḥ samāptirasti | lāghavādantimanāśyatvābhyupagamāditi |dā tvatisthūlatvānnaivābhikrāmamityetatpadamātravicchedena pūrvapakṣaḥ | kriyate | kathaṃ tarhi | yajjuhotīti samastaprakaraṇajuhotyanuvādenābhikramaṇavidhānādavāntaraprakaraṇasya cābhāvānmahāprakaraṇaviniyogāśrayeṇa pūrvapakṣāśrayaṇam | tadā ‘kartṛguṇe tu’ abhikramaṇe 'vāntaraprakaraṇāparyupasthāpitaprayājakarmāsamavāyāttatprakaraṇaikavākyatvābhāvamātrameva vākyabhedaḥ syādityuktvā ‘sākāṅkṣaṃ tviti’ avāntaraprakaraṇameva prayājacodanāprasṛtakathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāsaṃbandhadvārā tadekavākyatvena siddhānto 'bhidhīyate | yadapi ‘asamāptaṃ hi pūrveṇeti’ tanna vākyāsamāptyabhiprāyeṇa | kiṃ tarhi | asamāptaṃ hyavāntaraprakaraṇaṃ pūrveṇa prayājasvarūpaguṇavidhinetyarthaḥ |

siddhe karmaṇāṃ karmasamavāye 'dhunā 'vāntaraprakaraṇamahāprakaraṇayoḥ kataradviniyojakamityupavītamudāhṛtam | tatra sāmidhenyanuvākavibhāgapradarśanaṃ sāmidhenīprakaraṇasadasadbhāvivekārtham | nanu darśapūrṇamāsayoreva prakaraṇamiti—mahāprakaraṇagrastatvānnaivāvāntaraprakaraṇānyāvirbhavanti | athavā 'gnisamindhanaprakāśanadvāreṇa dṛṣṭasaṃskārārthatvānna tāsāṃ prakaraṇamiti manyate | naitadevam |

yathaivāṅgavākyāni paripūrṇasvārthāni santi darśapūrṇamāsavākyenaikavākyatāṃ yānti na cā ' 'tmarūpaṃ jahati, evamaṅgabhāvanāḥ svāṅgaparipūrṇāḥ paramabhāvanāyāṃ saṃbadhyante | na tadadhīnatvena tāsāṃ svadharmanivṛttiḥ | saṃskāro 'pi cāpūrvārthatvāttatsiddhyupāyamapekṣamāṇaḥ prakaraṇī bhavati | dṛṣṭārtheṣvapi niyamādṛṣṭasiddhyarthaṃ kathaṃbhāvāpekṣotpatteḥ prakaraṇasadbhāvaḥ |

lg.l: dṛṣṭe 'pi ca phale naiva sā 'pekṣā na pravartate |

div.p:
tasmādevaṃvidhānāmapyaṅgānāmavāntaraprakaraṇena bhavitavyam | ataśca yadyapi dṛṣṭārthākāṅkṣā dṛṣṭenaiva pūryate | agnisamindhanaprakāśanaṃ bhāvayetkena—sāmidhenyanuvacanena, kathaṃ, viva
vivakṣāprayatneti—vivakṣāprayatnādikrameṇopajanito yo varṇagrahaṇasāmarthyakaraṇarūpaḥ śrotrasaṃskārastadanugṛhītenetyarthaḥ |kṣāprayatnābhidhātādikramopajanitavarṇagrahaṇasāmarthyakaraṇaśrotrasaṃskārānugṛhīteneti, tathā 'pi niyamādṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ setsyatītyanuvartata evā ' 'kāṅkṣā | sā ca śāstracoditenādṛṣṭārthenaivopāyena pūryate | tasmādasti sāmidhenyanuvacanasyopavītādigrahaṇasamarthamavāntaraprakaraṇam | evaṃ tarhi tasya saṃnikarṣeṇa balīyastvāttadaṅgatvenaiva bhavitavyamiti kuto mahāprakaraṇaviniyogāśaṅkā | ucyate | satyametadevaṃ syāt | yadi tasya nivitpadavyavadhānena prakaraṇavicchedāśaṅkā na syāt | evaṃ tarhi vicchinne tasmiñjitaṃ mahāprakaraṇeneti | naitadevam | kutaḥ | kāmyasābhidhenīkalpasaṃkīrtanenāvicchedasaṃdehādavispaṣṭaṃ mahāprakaraṇam | kiṃ tāvatprāptam |

yathā darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe pūṣādyanumantraṇānyasaṃbaddhānyapi na purastātprakaraṇaṃ vicchindanti tathā nivitpadānyapi na vicchindyuḥ prakaraṇam | athavā 'vāntaraprakaraṇena nividāmapi sābhidhenyanuvanacanāṅgatvānnaivāsaṃbaddhapadavyavāya ityupapannamupavītamapi tadaṅgamevetyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

lg.l: na hi kāmyaiḥ punaḥ kalpaiḥ saṃdhātuṃ sā hi śakyate ||

div.p:
tāvaddhi prakaraṇamanuvartate yāvadviniyogārhaṃ paśyati | asaṃyuktaṃ ca prakaraṇena vini yujyate | tadiha nivitpadāni tāvalliṅgena sāmidhenībhistulyānyagnisamindhane viniyujyante ‘deveddho manviddha’ iti | tatra yadya
agniriti—agnisamindhanamityarthaḥ |gniḥ sāmidhenyaṅgaṃ bhavettatastaddvā
taddvāreṇa-sāmidhenīphalaprakāśanadvāreṇetyarthaḥ |reṇa tānyapyaṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ | athānaṅge satyapyaṅgatā kalpyate tataḥ sāmidhenīnāmapi nivitpadāṅgatvaṃ kaścitkalpayet | tena nivitsu tāvatprakaraṇaṃ nānuvṛttam | kāmyāstu kalpāḥ śrutyaiva puruṣā rthatvenāvagatā iti naiva sāmidhenyanuvacanena gṛhyante | yadi punarnivido 'ṅgaṃ bhaveyustato godā(a. 4 pā. 1 a. 2)henanyāyenā ' 'śrayagrahaṇādapi tāvatkāmyeṣu prakaraṇānuvṛttiḥ syāt | athāpi kāmyānāmaṅgatvaṃ bhavettathā 'pi pūṣādyanumantraṇavatprakaraṇābādhaṃ nividāṃ kathaṃcidanusaṃdhānenādhyavasyema | na tvanyataradastītyasatyavāntaraprakaraṇe mahāprakaraṇena sarvārthatā | nanu ca yadi vicchinne prakaraṇe kāmyāḥ kalpāḥ śrūyante tata ekaviṃśatyā pratiṣṭhāṃ bhāvayetkimāśritayeti prakaraṇenā ' 'śraye 'nupanīyamāne sākāṅkṣatvādaparipūrṇatā prāpnoti | atha vākyenā ' 'śraya upanīyeta tataḥ prāpte karmaṇi saṃbandhadvayakaraṇādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | tatra yadi
vākyabhedo 'bhyupagamyeta krathaṃcidvā parihniyeta tato revatīvāravantīyasaubharādiṣvapyevameva vākyena prakṛtāśrayadānātsiddhāntahāniḥ | athā ' 'śrayalābhārthaṃ kathaṃcidanuvarteta prakaraṇaṃ tata upavītamapi tathaiva prāpnotīti sarvathā saṃkaṭametat | ucyate |

naivātraikaviṃśatyāderguṇātphalam | kiṃ tarhi | revatīvāravantīyādivākyavadevānenāpi viśiṣṭaṃ karma vidhīyate | tataśca bhā( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 1 )vārthādhikaraṇanyāyena dhātvarthātphalam | ata ekaviṃśatyādivīśiṣṭenānuvacanena pratiṣṭhādi sādhayet | kathamiti—anubrūyāditi śabdasāmānyātsaṃkhyāpratyāsatteśca sāmidhenyanuvacanavaditi gamyate | tataśca saṃkhyeyānāmṛcāmanyeṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ prāptiḥ | yadyapi cātra karmāntaratvākarmāntaratvayoḥ phalaṃ nāsti tathā 'pi vākyamevamavakalpata itītthaṃ varṇitam | na tvevaṃ satyetānyanuvacanāntarāṇi darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmagṛhītatvātpṛthageva prayoktavyāni | na tāvadetenāsmatpakṣo nivartyate | sarvathopavītasya sarvārthatvasiddheḥ | na ca svatantraḥ prayogaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
na ta
kratuprayukteti pā. |syānyaprayuktatvātsvātantrye sati labhyate ||

div.p: yo hi nigadaḥ prāk sāmidhenībhyaḥ prayujyate sa nivitpadavadeva na sāmidhenyaṅgam | tadanantaratvena cocyamānāsvanubrūyāditi vidhirna svatantrāṇām | tadyadi pṛthak prayogaḥ syāttataḥ sāmidhenyaṅgamātragrahaṇāditareṇa nigadena vinā 'nuvacanatvaṃ vihanyeta | kiṃ ca |

ekaviṃśatyādibhistāvadavaśyaṃ sāmidhenyaḥ saṃkhyātavyāḥ | tāścāgnisāmindhanaṃ prakāśayantyaḥ sāmidhenya ityucyante | sa cāgniḥ paraprayuktastābhiḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ | tena
‘arthābhi( a 4 pā. 1 a. 11 sū. 26 )dhānakarma ca’ ityasya prakṛtivadanupraveśātprākṛtasya sāmidhenīkāryasyāgnisamindhanaprakāśanasyaitenaiva prasaṅgataḥ prāpterarthātprayogamadhyapātisamindhanādhīnatvam | nanvevamapyeṣāmeva kāmyānāṃ kalpānāṃ sarveṣāmantyasya vopavītamaṅgaṃ syāt | naitadevam | kutaḥ |

sarvāsveva vikṛtiṣu yatprākṛtāṅgamadhye na paṭhitaṃ tadakḷptopakāratvātprākṛtairnirākāṅkṣīkṛtai prakaraṇe paścādāgacchatsaṃnidhiviṣayo bhavati | sa cāvirodhe viniyuṅkte, virodhe tu videvanādivatprakaraṇena bādhyate | tasmātkṛtsnadarśapūrṇamāsārthamupavītamiti siddham || 21 ||

( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 )‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityasyāpavāda ārabhyate | vāraṇavaikaṅkatāni homārthānyaho
mārthāni ca pātrāṇi yajñagāmitvena vihitānyādhānaprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā katamasya yajñasya bhavantiti ‘ānarthakyā(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 )ttadaṅgeṣu’ iti pavamānahaviḥṣu vijñāyante | tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

prakaraṇagamyā pavamānahaviṣāmādhānārthatāṃ bādhitvā vākyenāgnyarthatā vijñāyate ‘yadāhavanīye juhṇati’ iti | tatra
evamupapāditaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyamākṣipati—tatra codyata ityādinā | codyate | yadyasmādvākyādāhavanīyaḥ pavamānahaviṣāṃ saṃskāryo bhavati tataḥ samānavākyanirdeśādagnihotrādīnāmapi prāpnoti | atha teṣāṃ phalavattvādāhavanīyo 'ṅgaṃ tataḥ pavamānahaviṣāmapyaṅgameva syāt | na hyekaṃ vākyaṃ phalavatāṃ guṇabhūtamaphalānāṃ ca pradhānabhūtamāhavanīyaṃ vaktuṃ samartham | vidhyanuvādoddeśyopādeyaguṇapradhānānāṃ yugapadvirodhāt | saptamī caikatra dvitīyārthaṃ lakṣayati | anyatra svārthameva vadatīti virodhaḥ | tathā ca viśvajidādīnāmaśrutaphalānāmaṅgatvaprasaṅgaḥ | sarvaṃ cāyuktametat | niṣpannaścā ' 'havanīya u
upadiśyata iti—phalavadagnihotrādikarmaṇāmiti śeṣaḥ |padiśyate | phalavatkarmānurodhena ca bhāvyāhavanīyasaṃjñā
vijñāyate | ta
evamākṣiptaṃ bhāṣyaṃ paramatena samādhātumārabhate—tasmādityādinā |smātkilaivaṃ varṇanīyam | dve hyete vākye tulyarūpe | pavamānahaviṣprakaraṇa ekamaparamanārabhyavāde | tatra prākaraṇikena niṣpādyamānatvātsaṃskārāpekṣiṇa āhavanīyasyāphalānāṃ pavamānahaviṣprabhṛtīnāṃ saṃskāratvena vidhānam | anārabhyavādena tu niṣpannasya sataḥ sarvakarmāṇyuddiśyādhikaraṇatvena vidhānam | tasmādavirodha iti | vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ | kimanenāśrutavākyakalpanākleśena | anyathā 'pyetadupapadyata eva | bhavantu nāma pavamānahavīṃṣyādhānāṅgam | tathā 'pi na tatra pātrāṇi bhavanti | vājapeyasya yūpa iti hi yūpagrahaṇādvyavahitasaṃbandhe 'pi ṣaṣṭhyupapattestathā kalpitam | na tvihaivaṃ kiṃcidasti | yattu yajñāvacaragrahaṇaṃ tatprakṛtayajñābhāvādanārabhyavādarūpeṇa sarvatra vidadhāti | taccaitatpūṣādyanumantraṇanyāyenaiva setsyatīti nārtho 'dhikaraṇena | sūtraṃ tu pūrva
pūrvasyaiva—saṃdigdhe tu vyavāyāt’ iti sūtrasyaiva śeṣatayetyarthaḥ |syaiva padotta
padottaratvena—śaṅkāpadottaratvenetyarthaḥ |ratvena neyam | nanu nividāṃ sāmidhenyaṅgatvānna vyavadhāyakatvaṃ syāt | ata āha—guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvāditi | tadvyākhyātam | tathā hi |

yathā
yathāsaṃyogamiti—ājyabhāgakramāmnātasya vārtradhnīvṛdhanvatīmantracatuṣṭayasya kramāvagatājyabhāgasaṃbandhābādhena niveśārthamityarthaḥ |saṃyogaṃ niveśārthamārambhaḥ | kutaḥ saṃdeha iti | saṃyogasyaiva dvedhā pratibhānāt |

lg.l: tulyakakṣau hi saṃbandhau viruddhau na vilakṣaṇau |
guṇā(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 12 sū. 22 )nāṃ ca parārthatvādityanenāpi hetunā |

div.p: tasmādājyabhāgakramaṃ bādhitvā vākyena pradhānārthatve prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

amāvāsyāyāṃ tāvatsaumī naiva vidyamānārthā | na hyamāvāsyāyāṃ somaḥ pradhānadevatā | paurṇamāsyāmapyagnisahitasya coditatvātkevalasya prakāśanaṃ mahendrādhikaraṇe nirākṛtam | na cāgnīṣomayordvayorapi prayogaḥ, ‘puronuvākyāmanvāha’ ityekakarmaṇi vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvāt | athāprāptamapi dvitvaṃ vidhīyate tato mantraviśeṣasya dvitvasya ca vidhānā dvākyaṃ bhidyate | ājyabhāgayostu kālakṛtaṃ vyavasthāmātraṃ sukaramityukta
paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |m |

kramaviniyogo 'nantaramavasthitaḥ | idānīṃ tadapavādaḥ kriyate | muṣṭyoḥ karaṇaṃ vāgyamaśca yājamānam | āvedanamādhvaryavam | tatra kathamaṅgāṅgibhāva āśaṅkyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | ādhvaryaveṣvapi prayoktṛtvena yajamānasya kartṛtvāt | athavā yattatra dīkṣitasyā ' 'vedyamānaṃ tasyāṅgatvenetarau saṃdihyete | kasmātpunastulya ānantaryai pūrvasyaivāṅgatvamucyate na parasya | kecidāhuḥ | aniyamapradarśanārthameva prāthamyātpūrvopādanam | athavā sarvabhāvanāsu kimityupakāryāpekṣaṇaṃ prathamamutpadyate | sarvāpekṣaṇeṣu ca purastāduccaritasya granthānuguṇyātpūrvamālocanaṃ bhavati | tena muṣṭikaraṇavāgyamābhyāṃ kiṃ kartavyamityapekṣite ‘dīkṣitamāvedayati’ ityupatiṣṭhate | na ca tadatikrame heturasti | śakyate ca tasyāpi parataḥ prayojanavattvaṃ kalpayitum | atastadarthatvameva yuktam | evaṃ hastāvanejanasyolaparājistaraṇārthatvam | ū
‘ulaparājiṃ stṛṇāti’ ityatrolaparājiśabdārthamāha—ūdhvaiṃrityādinā | utpūrvasya lunāteḥ kapanpratyayānta ulapaśabdaḥ | ulapaiḥ—ūrdhvalavanayogyasugandhyādikaṭhinatṛṇaiḥ kṛtā rājiḥ—rekhāparaparyāyarājyākāratvamityarthaḥ |rdhvaistṛṇaidīrghaṃ vedimadhye staraṇamulaparājistaraṇaṃ pratyetavyam | sarvatra ca yogyatvamavāntaraprakaraṇamekavākyatvaṃ ca mahāprakaraṇadbalīyāṃsi viniyojakāni | tasmā
tsarvaṃ pūrvasamāmnātamuttarasamāmnātasyāṅgam | yogyatvābhāvāttu muṣṭikaraṇavāgyamayoḥ parasparāṅgatvaṃ nopanyastam | na hyubhayoḥ pradhānārthayoranyonyāpekṣā | tenāyogyamātramatikramya na dūraṃ gantavyamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

na hi dvayorākhyātayoḥ kenacidupabandhena vinaikavākyatvaṃ saṃbhavati | yatprakaraṇaṃ bādheta | yogyatā punaranantarārthatve ca samā | yadvā sarvārthatve yuktatarā | bahuṣu hi padārtheṣvavadhānamupayujyatetarām | ekastu yathākathaṃcidapi kriyate | na cāvāntaraprakaraṇamiha vidyate | yadi tāvatpūrvasya kathaṃbhāvastata uttaramevāṅgaṃ prāpnoti | na caivaṃ bhavitumarhati | sādhyāṃśasyāparipūrṇatvāt | na cottareṇāsā
asau—kathaṃbhāva ityarthaḥ |vakḷptaprayojanāvasthena śakyaḥ pūrayitum | evaṃ tasyāpyuttareṇeti yāvatpradhānaṃ prāptam | yadyevaṃ tato yo 'ntarāle guṇa
guṇakāma iti—‘godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet’ ityādivākyavihito godohanādirityarthaḥ |kāmastena saha sarvamādhastyamaṅgaṃ saṃbadhyeta, naiva pradhānaṃ yāvatprāpnuyāt, avāntarakathaṃbhāvasya niṣpannatvāditi | ucyate |

lg.l: yadi nāmāsya vijñātau syātāṃ vākyagatau guṇau |

div.p: pradhānakathaṃbhāvastvabhito 'nyasaṃbandhamātramuktvā yāvadantaṃ gacchatītyanuṣaṅgādhikaraṇe vyākhyātam | nanvevaṃ sati sarvāvāntaraprakaraṇoccheda eva prāpnoti | ucyate |

lg.l:
para
paraprakaraṇasthānāṃ—darśapūrṇamāsādiprakaraṇasthānāṃ prayājādīnāṃ, śrutyādibhistribhiḥ kasmiṃścidaṅge jñāte, punaśca taireva pramāṇairaparasminnaṅge jñāte, saṃdaṃśena-saṃdaṃśasaṃbhavena tadiṣyate—avāntaraprakaraṇamiṣyate | na sarvatreti kārikārthaḥ |prakaraṇasthānāmaṅge śrutyādibhistribhiḥ |

div.p: sarveṣāṃ hi prayājādīnāmaṅgaṃ kiṃciduktvā punaḥ parāmarśo 'stīti tatparyantāvāntaraprakaraṇakalpanā bhavati | anyathā hyavyavasthaiva syātsarvaśeṣāṇāṃ parasparaśeṣatvaprasaṅgāt | yatra punaḥ saṃkīrtanaṃ nāsti tatra sarvaṃ pradhānārthamevādhyavasātavyam | tasya tu kiṃ kevalasyātha sāṅgasyetyatra vivekaṃ ‘prakara( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 1)ṇaviśeṣādasaṃyuktaṃ pradhānasya’ ityārabhya vakṣyati | tadiha yogyatayā muṣṭikaraṇādīnāṃ sāṅgapradhānārthatvaṃ niścitam | yadi tvāvedayituṃ staritumiti ca śrūyeta tataḥ ‘tumunṇvulau kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyām’ ityekavākyatayā viniyogo bhavet | na tvevamasti | tasmātsarvārthatvamiti || 24 ||
itaścā ' 'nantaryamapramāṇam | yata ekavākyatālakṣaṇameṣu pratyekaṃ dṛśyate na sarveṣu | tasmādapi nānyonyārthatā || 25 ||
yathāsaṃyogaṃ dharmavyavasthoktā | sa tu saṃyogaḥ kimekadeśenāpi bhavatyuta samastenaiveti vicāraḥ | kiṃ caturdhākaraṇavidhāvāgneyaśabdena dvidevatyo gṛhyate na veti | gṛhyata iti brūmaḥ | kutaḥ |

yadyapyagniradevatā na tvasamavetaḥ | samavetatvaṃ copalakṣaṇakāraṇaṃ na devatātvam | na cātrāgniḥ kāryayogī | yenātyantamādriyeta | kiṃ tarhi | upalakṣaṇārthaḥ | na copalakṣaṇāni yathāśrutānyevopāṃśuyājāntarālakālalakṣaṇārthapuroḍāśadvayavatkāryeṣvāśrīyante |

upalakṣaṇakāryayormithaḥ saṃbandhābhāvātsādhāraṇatvam | bhāṣyakāreṇa tvetadevānuṣajyoktaṃ mithasteṣāmasaṃbandhādacodanā syāditi | bhavati caivaṃvidhānāṃ sādhāraṇatvaṃ tathā ca prāśitre dṛśyata iti || 26 ||

uddiśyamānaṃ tāvadvivakṣitamityuktam | na cāgnīṣomīyaindrāgnayorāgneyatvamasti | na hyatrāgnisattāmātramupalakṣaṇam | kiṃ tarhi | taddhitopāttaṃ devatātvam | agniḥ punastadviśeṣaṇam | yāṃ coddiśya dravyaṃ tyajyate sā devatā | na ca dvidevatyo 'gnimuddiśya tyajyate |

lg.l: taddhitārtho 'tra liṅgaṃ hi samarthānāṃ ca taddhitaḥ |

div.p: āgneya iti yo nirapekṣāgnidevatyaḥ so 'bhidhīyate | na ca dvidevatye nirapekṣo 'gnirdevatā | tenāyaṃ taddhito nāgnīṣomādigatāgniśabdādutpadyata iti na tadarthasya devatātvamāha | yatra tvasau nirapekṣo devatā sa śakya āgneya iti vaktum | yattu prāśitravaditi | tatrocyate | deśaviśeṣalakṣaṇārthā 'sminnāgneyaguṇaśrutiḥ | sāmānyavākyena sarvatra prāśitrāvadāne prāpte mastakavirogaviśeṣavidhānārthametadvacanamiti vaiṣamyam |
taṃ caturdhā kṛtvā puroḍāśaṃ barhiṣadaṃ karoti iti |
atrocyate |

lg.l: viśeṣe sthāpyate sā tu nityaṃ śākhāntarīyayā ||

div.p:
prāśitre 'pi tatheti cet | na | guṇārthatvāt | mastakaṃ virujyeti guṇaparatvādaśakyaḥ sāmānyavidhirupasaṃhartum | idaṃ tu nirguṇaṃ punarvacanaṃ śaknoti sāmānyaṃ svaviṣaye sthāpayitum | dūrasthatvādaśakyo 'syopasaṃhāra iti cet | na | yasya
yasya yenārthasaṃbandho dūrasthenāpi tasya saḥ | arthato hyasamarthānāmānantaryamakāraṇam | iti ślokapūraṇam | yenārthasaṃbandha iti nyāyāt | tena—

lg.l: gatamātraṃ ca tattena viśeṣe sthāpyate dhruvam ||

div.p: athavā viśeṣeṇa prāptatvātsāmānyamanūdyate barhiṣattvakaraṇāvidhānārtham | atha tadapi prāptaṃ tataḥ kramārthaṃ śravaṇamiti vaktavyam | ataścā ' 'gneyasyaiva caturdhākaraṇamiti siddham | yadi tu tatra kevalāgnidevatyo nābhaviṣyāditi—lakṣaṇārthā guṇaśrutirityetasyaiva vyākhyā | kevaladevatyābhāve hi manotāyābhivāgniśabda ubhau lakṣayet | tadarthā vā guṇaśrutirbhavet | asti tvekadevatyastasmāttasyaiva caturdhākaraṇam | yadyapi copalakṣaṇaṃ kāryayogi na bhavati tathā 'pi tenānupalakṣitaṃ na śakyaṃ grahītumityekadevatyasyaiva grahaṇamiti siddham || 27 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ ||

div.p:
idānīṃ liṅgaviniyogaḥ stūyate | liṅgaṃ nāma mantrāṇāmarthapratyāyanasāmarthyam | tacca
mukhye gauṇe ca kenacitprakāreṇa vidyate | tatra viniyogaḥ kiṃ mukhya evārthe bhavatyuta gauṇe 'pīti saṃdehe naiva gauṇo nāma kaścidastīti manvāna āha—kaḥ punarmukhyaḥ ko vā gauṇa iti | tatsiddhisūtre tu siddhe gauṇe tannimittabhedaḥ svārthāparityāgavṛttitvaṃ ca vyākhyātamityayamarthādvicāraḥ pūrvaṃ pratyetavyaḥ | tatra ca |

lg.l:
śā
pā. sū. ( 5-3-103 ) |khādibhyo ya ityevamivārthe mukhya ityayam |

div.p: paraguṇānāṃ paratrābhāvādavaśyaṃ guṇebhya āyāta ityevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ gauṇatvamityataḥ sarva eva śabda uccarite 'bhidhīyamānatvādananyagatiḥ śabdaśaktikalpanāṃ kurvannarthāntareṇāvyavahitatvātprathamameva mukhamiva bhavatīti mukhyaḥ | tatra paraparikalpitāni tāvadgauṇatvakāraṇānyupanyasyannāha—athocyeta | yasminnirupapadādityādi |

lg.l:
pa
parādhīnā śabdapravṛttiryasminnarthe sa gauṇa ityarthaḥ |rādhīnapravṛttiśca gauṇo nityaṃ pratīyate ||

div.p: na hi yathā kevalādagniśabdājjvalanapratyayo bhavatyevaṃ māṇavakapratyayaḥ | padāntarādhīnatvāt | yatrāpi padāntaraṃ na śrūyate tatrāpyarthaprakaraṇādilabhyaṃ tadeva vyāpriyata ityavyabhicāraḥ | tadeva ca sāmānyaṃ nāma pravṛttiheturguṇa iti | naitadevam | kutaḥ |

yathaiva cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśā
prakāśāpekṣitatve 'pīti pā. |nugrahāpekṣitve 'pi rūpamartho, yathā vā muktasaṃśayasya mukhyasya varṇakramamātrāgrahaṇasaṃskārasmṛtisaṃbandhānubhavādyapekṣitvaṃ tathā 'tropapadamapi naiva vinā sāmarthyaṃ nāmāpekṣituṃ śakyate | apekṣyamāṇamapi ca dyotakatvenetikartavyatāsthānīyatvānna mukhyatāṃ vihanti | tena vinā 'pyupapadena sa tasyārtho bhavatyeva | kathaṃcittu nābhivyajyate | tadyathā gavādiśabdānāṃ pṛthivyādiḥ | athopapadasya dyotakatvaṃ parityajya tulyakalpatocyate | yasmānnityaṃ māṇavakāgniśabdasamudāyādasyārthasya pratītirato 'śvakarṇādivatsamudāyavācyatve satyavayavasya gauṇatvamiti | taducyate |

lg.l: na cāsau samudāyārthaḥ śakyo vaktumiha tvayā |

div.p: tatra samudāyaprasiddhirbhavati yatrāvayavārthau tirodhāya tyaktabhedaḥ samudāya eva pratīyate | gamyate tvatrāgniśabdasya paiṅgalyaṃ māṇavakaśabdasya ca piṇḍasvarūpaṃ viviktaṃ vācyam | ata ubhāvapi prātyātmikayorapi vācakatvānmukhyāviti | idānīmavayavānusāreṇaiva samudāyārthatvaṃ samarthayamāna āha—anugatasvārthapadadvayagamyatvānnīlotpalavadvākyārthaḥ | ataśca tasya padārthapratyāyyatvācchabdaṃ prati pūrvavadeva gauṇatvamiti | tannirākaroti |

na tvatra tadīyo mukhyārtho 'gnitvamasti | na ca bhavataḥ paiṅgalyaṃ vācyam | asmatpakṣābhedaprasaṅgāt | tasmānna vākyārthaḥ | tena jvalane māṇavakasya ca paiṅgalye tulyavacchabdapravṛttiriti mukhyatvam | māṇavakasyeti bhāṣye paiṅgalyavyatirekajanitā ṣaṣṭhī | nābhidhātṛvyatireka
janitā | na hi māṇavakasvarūpamagniśabdādgamyate | na hi paryāyatve māṇavakaśabdaḥ prayujyeta | athocyeta yaḥ suṣṭhu prasiddha iti muktvopapadavyāpāraṃ yatkṛtaṃ tasyā ' 'śrayaṇamanāśrayaṇaṃ ca te eva mandasuṣṭhuprasiddhī gauṇamukhyavibhāgāya darśayati | tatrottaram |
idānīṃ śrotṛgataprasiddhibhedamūlaṃ vaktṛgataṃ bahvalpaprayogitvaṃ vibhāgārthaṃ darśayati | yasya ca bahuśaḥ prayoga ityādi | tannirākriyate |
ihāpi ca gośabdasya pṛthivyādau mandasuṣṭhuprasiddhiprayogau darśayitavyau | tathā cā ' 'huḥ |

lg.l: na cātra maṇḍakā mukhyā gauṇā vā khaṇḍamodakāḥ ||

div.p:
idānīṃ viśeṣaṃ kathayati | satyapi tāvanmāṇavakasāmānādhikaraṇye 'ruṇāśabdanyāyena, sati sādṛśye 'bhidhānādasati cānabhidhānādanyatrāsādṛśyavati vṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanādviśeṣaṇatvādavaśyaṃbhāviprathamapratyāyane sādṛśyameva prathamaṃ pratyāyayitavyam | na cānavaga
te 'gnau tatpratīyata iti prathamataramagnerabhidhānam | tataśca tatsaṃbandhādeva śeṣa
śeṣapratīteḥ-avaśiṣṭārthapratīterityarthaḥ |pratītervyakti
vyaktivaditi-ākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyenetyarthaḥ |vadanabhidheyatvam | santi caivamādiṣu kānicidrūpādisāmānyānītyuktam | tasmādasti gauṇamukhyavibhāga ityārambhamadhikaraṇam | ete ca tatsiddhisūtroktaiḥ saha nava gauṇapakṣā draṣṭavyāḥ |

evaṃ ca sati gauṇyā vṛttyā pūṣādiśabdairagnyādyabhidhānādanutkarṣo bhaviṣyati | anyathā yatra pūṣādayastatra nīyeran | tathā 'gnyādiśabdaiḥ sūryādyabhidhānādavikāre satyārṣacodako 'nugrahīṣyate | ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

lg.l: mukhyena ca kṛtārthānāṃ na gauṇe śrutikalpanā ||

div.p:
( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 6 sū. 31 )‘api vā prayogasāmarthyāt’ ityanena hi nyāyenābhidheye tāvadviniyogāya mantrāḥ śrutiṃ parikalpayanti | tatra yadi jahatsvārthā gauṇī vṛttirbhavettatastulyavadubhayatrāpi śrutiḥ kalpyeta | yadi tu gauṇamapi vadatā pūrvataraṃ svārtho 'bhidheyastadā tadatikramakāraṇābhāvāttadviniyogaśrutau kalpitāyāṃ nirākāṅkṣeṣu mantraprakaraṇasvādhyāyādhyayanavidhiṣu na punaḥ śrutikalpanaheturastīti na viniyogaḥ | kiṃ ca
‘api ca gauṇasyetyādi—mukhye ca viśeṣaḥ’ ityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—kiṃ cetyādinā bādhyatentena | |
api ca |
tenaiṣa sūtrārthaḥ | yasmādarthābhidhānasaṃyogānmantreṣu śeṣabhāvastasmādautpattikenaivārthenaiṣāṃ saṃyogaḥ syāt | kutaḥ | tenaivāvyabhicāritayā nityasaṃyogāt || 1 ||

acodite—pūṣādau, darśapūrṇamāsayorthanmantrā na viniyujyante yuktameva tat | saṃskārasya saṃskāryaparatvālliṅgena ca prakaraṇabādhāt | kathaṃ punareṣāmutkṛṣṭānāṃ vaidikaiḥ karmabhiryogaḥ | kathaṃ vā kratvaṅgasāmānyaviniyogamantareṇa liṅgaṃ devatāyāmeva kevalāyāṃ viniyojakamiti | taducyate |
yāgānumantraṇasamākhyā hyeṣāṃ yāgasaṃbandhādṛte 'nupapadyamānā yāgasāmānyāṅgatvaṃ gamayati |

apavāda ārabhyate | niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāmityaindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti | yadyapi mantrārtho 'gnāvapyupapadyate tathā 'pi taddhitaśrutyaivendrābhidhānasāmarthyamatra mukhyamiti vijñā
vijñāyata iti—iti kṛtvā bhāṣyakṛdudāharaṇaṃ yuktamityadhyāhāraḥ |yate | keṣāṃcittu ‘kadācana starīrasi’ ityeṣā ṛk paṭhyate | tatra pūrvavadeva saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ mukhyatvādindro 'bhidhātavya uta vacanasāmarthyādgauṇo gārhapatya iti | satyapi ca saṃyuktaśravaṇe 'ruṇāvadaśakteḥ saṃdeho yojanīyaḥ | tatra dravyaparicchedadvārā 'pi krayasaṃbandho labdhaḥ | iha tu śabdārthasaṃbandhasyautpattikatvenāśāstrahetutvādatyantāśaktatvam | na hi kathaṃcidindraśabdo gārhapatyaṃ bravīti | abhidhānaṃ cedaṃ coditam | upatiṣṭhata ityātmanepadanirdeśāt | mantrakaraṇavyāpārābhidhāne hyetat | na cābhidhānaṃ muktvā 'nyatra mantraḥ karaṇaṃ bhavati | tena ‘aindryopatiṣṭhate’ ityetāvatā tāvadindropasthānaṃ vijñāyate | gārhapatyamiti ca dvitīyayā 'gneḥ prakāśyatvam | tatra kiṃ samañjasaṃ kimasamañjasamiti jāyate saṃśayaḥ | na hīndropasthāna eva sādhanāntaraṃ gārhapatyo jñāyate | kiṃ prāptam | pūrvādhikaraṇenendropasthānamiti | kathaṃ dvitīyeti cet | saktuvatsādhanāntaramadhikaraṇāpādānādi lakṣayiṣyati | śaknoti virodhādīpsitatamatvamavivakṣyamāṇaṃ kārakamātraṃ lakṣayitum | tatra ca ‘dravyā( a. 6 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 1 )ṇā karmasaṃyoge’ ityanena gārhapatyasyāṅgatvaṃ
bhaviṣyati | yadvopasthānaviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhādgārhapatyaśabda indralakṣaṇārtha iti kecit | etaduktaṃ bhavati | vibhaktirvā lakṣaṇāvṛttā prātipadikaṃ śrutivṛttam | prātipadikaṃ vā yajñasādhanasādharmyāllakṣaṇārthaṃ dvitīyā mukhyeti | athavopasthānaviśeṣaṇamityatra dhātvarthamātramuktam | ekakarmaviṣayatvaṃ hi gārhapatyamantrayorvipratiṣiddham | ya
yasya—prakāśanasyetyarthaḥ |sya mantraḥ karaṇaṃ na tasya gārhapatyaḥ karma | ya
yasyāsau-samīpasthitergārhapatya ityarthaḥ |syāsau karma na tasya mantraḥ karaṇam | dvau ceha prakṛtipratyayasamūhena vyāpārāvupāttau | prakṛtyā samīpasthānaṃ pratyayena prakāśanam | tatra prakā
prakāśane-samīpasthitiviśiṣṭaprakāśana ityarthaḥ |śane yādṛśaṃ gārhapatyasya kārakatvaṃ tādṛśaṃ vyākhyātam | idānīṃ mukhyameva karmatvaṃ prakṛtyarthaṃ pratyucyate | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati | gārhapatyaṃ samāsīdannindraṃ prakāśayediti | yadyapi ca pratyayārthaprādhānyāttatkarmatvaṃ yuktaṃ tathā 'pyayogyatvāttato nivṛttaṃ saṃbandhā- tprakṛtyarthamupasaṃkrāmati | tasmānmukhyameva kāryaṃ mantrāṇāmityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ | vacanādayathārthatvaṃ mantrāṇāmiti | kutaḥ |

gārhapatyastāvaddvitīyayā pradhānasya pratyayārthasya karmeti śrutyā gamyate | tenaindryā sa prakāśayitavyaḥ | tatra yadyayathārthatvaṃ vacanānurodhena saṃjātaṃ tathā nāmetyadhyavasātavyam | avaśyaṃ bhāvi hyatra brāhmaṇasya mantrasya vā gauṇatvaṃ | tatra brāhmaṇasyātyantāprāptavidhitvātprathamapravṛtteścānanyapramāṇake 'rthe gauṇatvamayuktam |

lg.l: virodhinaṃ svārthamatītya mukhyaṃ yukto hi gauṇārthanimittabhāvaḥ ||

na cā
yadapyatra brāhmaṇavākye gārhapatyaśabdavācyo 'vayavayogādindraḥ syādityuktaṃ tadapi rụ̄dhyā yogabādhānna yuktamiti kārikārthaḥ |vayavasaṃbandhādindro gṛhapateryataḥ |

div.p: nanu ca mantro 'pyaśakya eva gārhapatye viniyoktum | tathā hi |
na hi vacanaśatenendraśabdaḥ śakyo gārhapatyābhidhānasamarthaḥ kartum |

lg.l:
na vā 'deṅgu
pā. sū. ( 1-1-2 ) | ata-eṅ ca yathā paribhāṣayā guṇo naivamagniḥ paribhāṣayendra ityarthaḥ |ṇavacchāstrādindro 'gniḥ pāribhāṣikaḥ |

div.p: atrocyate |
tasmādanyathānupapattergauṇamabhidhānamiti siddham || 4 ||

evaṃ tāvanmukhyaṃ kāryaṃ mantrāṇāmiti sāpavādamavasthitam | ataḥ parametadvicāryate ka utsargasya viṣayaḥ ko 'pavādasyeti | tatra ‘haviṣkṛdehi’ iti yā haviḥ karoti yajamānasya patnī tadāhvānaprakāśanasamartho mantraḥ, sa kiṃ tatraiva viniyujyeta, avahantisaṃyogasya kālārthatvenāvirodhāt | athavā vacanādayathārthaṃ pūrvatarapratītāvaghātāṅgameveti | yadi haviṣkṛdehītyanenāvaghnannāhvayatīti vidhīyate tato 'vaghātāṅgatvam | athāvaghnannetenā ' 'hvayatītyevaṃ saṃbandhya rūpādeva prāptamāhvānakāle mantramanūdya tririti vidhīyate, tato 'vaghnannityasya svakālalakṣaṇārthatvānnāyathārthaṃ vacanamiti yathārtha eva mantraḥ | kiṃ
prāptam | avahantiśrutyanugrahādāhvayateśca mantrarūpādeva prāptatvādavahantereva haviṣkaraṇe kartṛtvaṃ kathaṃcidastītyayathārthatvam | guṇayogātpratyāyanaṃ ca || 5 ||

avaghnannityatra hi dhātvarthopasarjanaḥ kartā lakṣaṇārthayuktaḥ pratīyate | ‘lakṣa
pā. sū. ( 3-2-126 ) |ṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ’ iti śatṛpratyayāt | tena na kvacicchrutipị̄dhā | tasmātsarvametadanūdya tririti vidhīyate nānyat | vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt |

lg.l:
sa
sakṛduccāraṇāditi kārikāyā ayamarthaḥ—trirabhyāse vihite yaḥ sakṛduccāraṇakālādadhikaḥ kālastrirabhyāsena jāyate so 'sminvākye 'rthāpattipramāṇena vidhīyate | anyathā tatrāpi śrautavyāpāratve vākyabhedāpatteriti |kṛduccāraṇādyo vā trirabhyāsena jāyate |

div.p: tathā ca ‘yāvajjī( a. 2 pā. 4 a. 1 sū. 1 )viko 'bhyāsaḥ’ ityatra kālābhyāsayoranyonyavidhihetutvaṃ vyākhyātam || 6 ||
atha yaduktaṃ hantireva haviṣkṛdbhaviṣyatīti | tatrocyate |

lg.l:
guṇā
guṇābhāvāditi—acetane 'vaghāta āhavānādiviṣayatvalakṣaṇaguṇābhāvāddhaviṣkṛtprakāśakasya mantrasya tatra viniyogābhāvo yadocyate tadā ‘liṅgācca’ iti sūtre liṅgapadenā ' 'mantraṇādiyogyatvarūpaṃ patnyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ mantrasya patnyāhavānāṅgatvenā ' 'śrīyate na tu strīliṅgatvena stutirityarthaḥ |bhāvāddhaviṣkṛttvamantrābhāvo yadocyate |

div.p: athavā padottarametatsūtram |
cetanavatyāṃ tu patnyāmarthavat | tasmānna rūpādevāvaghātāṅgatvamiti || 7 ||

evaṃ ca vāgityartharūpeṇaikāntikenaiva strītvena saṃstavo bhaviṣyati | anyathā 'nupātta
strīliṅgakriyādipadenānekāntāvyaktaliṅgena śabdadharmatayā kathaṃcitkalpyaḥ syāt | tasmādāhvanāṅgatvamiti || 8 ||
avaghātamantrāntaravirodhaścānyāyyaḥ syāt | āhvāne tvayamevetyavirodhaḥ || 9 ||

atideśasūtratvātsarve pūrvasūtrārthā yojayitavyāḥ | pūrvatrānuvāde kālārthatvamuktam | idānīṃ vidhānārthe 'pīti viśeṣaḥ | trirabhyāsaparatvācca tatra mantropadeśo na jāto na tviha tatheti pūrvapakṣe bījam | utthānenāgniridhyata iti—anenotthānaṃ prakāśyata
iti pratipādyate | yadā 'yamutthānāṅgaṃ bhavati tadā praiṣābhāvātparādhikāro nā
nāstīti—( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 11 sū. 22 ) ityanena nyāyenetyarthaḥ |stīti prāptakālatāyāṃ loṭaṃ kalpayitvā 'dhvaryukatṛkāṇyevāgniviharaṇādīni bhaveyuḥ | ataśca tadīyamutthānaṃ teṣāṃ kartṛtvena | vivakṣyamāṇamagnīdityādibhiḥ śakyaṃ prakāśayitum | evaṃ ‘vrataṃ kṛṇuta’ iti vāgabhidhānaṃ vāktṛpyatvitivadātsyādhāratvādvāco yadāsyasya vratakaraṇe kartṛtvaṃ tacchakyaṃ vācyevopacarituṃ tatra vrataṃ kartuṃ prāptaḥ kāla iti | tālvādyādhiṣṭhānabhe- dācca bahuvacanam | guṇābhāvāt-mantraguṇābhāvādityetadevādṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgamukhenottaram | na hi madhyamapuruṣaḥ parapreṣaṇamantareṇopapadyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ | liṅgamapi kiṃcidanveṣṭavyam | vidhikopaśca vāgvisarjane ‘yāḥ paśūnāmṛṣabho vāca’ iti mantrāntarāmnānāt || 10 ||

devatāprakāśastrugdhāraṇābhyāṃ kṛtā
kṛtārthatvāditi—sūktavākaprastarayoriti śeṣaḥ |rthatvādaṅgāṅgibhāvāpekṣā nāstīti kālārthatā | sarvatra
sarvatra ca—darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajetetyādāvityarthaḥ | ca kṛtārthayoḥ saṃbandhe kālārthatvaṃ sthāsya( a. 4 pā. 2 ) atreti śeṣaḥti | tṛtīyāṃ cetthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇārthāṃ manyate | prasta
prastarasya ceti bhāṣyatātparyamāha—prastaretyādinā | yadyapi prastare kṛtārthatvābhidhānaṃ nāṅgatvanirākaraṇārtham | siddhāntino 'pyanabhipretatvāt | tathā 'pi yadi kaścitpraharaṇasya sūktavākāṅgatvaṃ tatprakāśyadevatāṅgatvaṃ vā brūyāttadā kālārthapūrvapakṣāsiddheḥ praharaṇasya ca prastarakṛtārthatvamantarā tadarthatvāyogādityeva praharaṇasya prastarārthatvapratipādanadvārā sūktavākāṅgatvanirākaraṇārthameva taditi veditavyam |rakṛtārthatvābhidhānaṃ ca pratipādyamānapradhānatvādasya sūktavākāṅgatvaṃ tadvācyadevatāṅgatvaṃ
vā na ghataṭa ityasya pratipādanārtham | tathā
evaṃ prastaraprādhānyapratipādanena praharaṇasya pratipattitvāvagateḥ pratipatteśca devatayā kāryābhāvāddavetāprakāśakasya sūktavākasya praharaṇāṅgatvaṃ na ghaṭata ityevamarthaṃ ca prastarasyopayuktatvābhidhānamiti prayojanāntaramāha—tathetyādinā | sadevatasya sūktavākasyāpi tadaṅgatvamiti || 11 ||

‘sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharati’ iti pratyakṣātkriyāsaṃbandhātkaraṇatvaṃ gamyamānaṃ na śakyamutstraṣṭum, kārakavibhaktibalīyastvāt | evaṃ ca śrutivṛttaḥ sūktavāka eva kāryeṇa saṃbhantsyate | anyathā tallakṣitaḥ kālaḥ saṃbadhyeta | tathā cāṅgatve sati sādharmyādyājyāśabda upapatsyate ‘sūktavāka eva yājyā’ iti | kiṃ punarasya pāramārthikameva yājyātvamutopacāramātram | kaścātra viśeṣaḥ | sati yājyātve taddharmairbhavitavyam ‘āsīno yajati’ ‘anavānaṃ yajati’ ‘yājyāyā adhi vaṣaṭkaroti’ ‘puronuvākyāṃ ca prathamaṃ prayuṅkte’ ityādibhiḥ | atha stutimātraṃ tato naiṣāṃ kaścidādartavya iti | kiṃ prāptam | bhavitavyaṃ dharmaiḥ | yayejyate sā yājyā | sūktavākena cejyate | tasmādasti yājyātvam | tatraitatsyāt | astrīliṅgatvādanṛci strīpratyayo na prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | samidādiyājyāsvanṛkṣvapi yājyātvaprasiddheḥ | athocyeta, ādhvaryaveṣu darvihomasādhaneṣu satyapi yāgakaraṇatve yājyātvaṃ na dṛṣṭamato naitadekāntikaṃ kāraṇamiti | yatraiva yājyāśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ saiva kevalā yājyā | tena tarhi ‘sūktavāka eva yājyā’ ityatrāpi prayogadbhavitavyaṃ dharmaiḥ | na cāsyaupacārikatvam | mukhyakāraṇasaṃnidheḥ pratyakṣatvāt | api ca sāmānyaśabdo 'yaṃ yājyeti | sa na śakyo lakṣaṇamantareṇa prayogato viviktaviṣayo 'vadhārayitum | tatraitallakṣaṇaṃ syāt | hautreṇa yenejyate tadvastu yājyeti | tathā sati sūktavāke 'pi prasaṅgaḥ | tasmānmukhyamevāsya yājyātvamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

lg.l: yena mantreṇa yāgāṅgaṃ hotā yajati devatām |

div.p:
prakṛtau hi sarvameva tādarthyotpattyā vastu nirūpyate | yājyā
‘kiṃ punarasya pāramārthikameva yājyātvam’ ityādinā prasaṅgāccintāntaraṃ prastutya parābhimataṃ ca yājyātvaṃ pradṛṣya nirduṣṭaṃ svābhipretaṃ yājyātvaṃ nirvākti-yājyātvaṃ cetyādinā tattvaṃ tu hotupravacanavihitejyamānadravyasaṃbandhyuddeśāṅgabhūtadevatāprakāśakamantratvaṃ yājyātvaṃ mājñikaprāsiddhyavagataṃ vijñeyam |tvaṃ ca tyajyamānahavirdravyadevatoddeśārthavihitamantratvenāvadhāritam | na ca sūktavākastyajyamānaprastaradevatoddeśārthamutpannaḥ | iṣṭadevatābhidhānasvarūpatvāt | liṅgaṃ śrutyā bādhyata iti cet | na | śruterlīṅgaviniyogābhyanujñāmantareṇāgnisekādivadasāmarthyāt | tathā cottarasūtre vakṣyāmaḥ | tena svatastāvanna yājyātvam | na cānyā kācidevaṃviṣayā yājyā 'sti | yasyāḥ kārye vartamāno yājyādharmāllaṁmeta | prākca yasya yāgatvamavadhāritaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ paścāccodyamānaṃ yājyetyavagamyate | na tvatra prāksūktavākasaṃbandhātkenacidyāgatvamavadhāritam | taditaretarāśrayaṃ prāpnoti | yājyāyogādyāgo yāgasaṃbandhādyājyeti | athaivaṃ parihriyeta | vinaiva tāvadyājyāvyapadeśena sūktavākamātratayā gṛhyamāṇo yāge viniyujyeta tato yājyātastadabhidheyadevatāsaṃbandhalabhyayāgatvapradhānapraharaṇasaṃbandhādyājyātvaṃ labhyata iti | taducyate |

lg.l: yenotpattau na yājyātvaṃ viniyoge ca labhyate |

div.p: yo hi yūpādiśabdo na kvacitprasiddhaḥ sa evaṃ prasiddhiṃ labhate | ayaṃ punaryājyāśabda utpattivelāyāmeva viniyogavelāyāṃ vā 'rthaṃ labhamāno nottarakālabhāvamapekṣate | य़e 'pi ca yājyādharmāste 'pi prathamasiddheṣu yāgeṣu labdhātmāno nedaṃ kleśena labhyamānaṃ yājyātvaṃ pratīkṣante | yadi tu vikṛtirbhavettataḥ paridhikhalevālyoriva yūpatvaṃ, kāryeṇa yājyātvamadhyavasīyeta | prakṛtistviyaṃ nātra kāryapūrvakaṃ dharmanirūpaṇamato 'pi na yājyādharmāḥ | tathā ca ‘sūktavāka eva yājyā’ ityevakāra upacāraṃ dyotayati | ayājyāyāṃ hi yājyopacāre satyevamupapadyate na mukhya eva yājyātve | mukhyāyāṃ tvāhutau naivakāraḥ prayuktaḥ | tadāhutiḥ pāramārthikī |

lg.l: ayājyā eva nigadā ṛcaiva yajatīti hi |

div.p: tatsaṃbandhāttu sūktavāko yājyātvena stūyate | na cobhayoḥ stutiḥ | atyantaṃ nirālambanatvaprasaṅgāt || 12 ||
yattviṣṭadevatāsaṃkīrtanena sūktavākasya kṛtārthatvānna bhūyo viniyogaḥ saṃbhavatīti | tatrābhidhīyate |

yattvasya svasāmarthyena devatāprakāśanasādhanattvaṃ, prastarapraharaṇe 'pi viniyujyamānasya tannaivāpagacchati | tatrāpi prakārāntareṇānupayujyamānatvāt | iha hi yadiṣṭadevatābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ tatsūktavākenetyanayā śrutyā sahāvirodhaṃ prārthayate | śrutirapi ca prastarapraharaṇānabhidhāyinaṃ santamasati sāmarthye viniyoktumaśaknuvantī sāmarthyāntaraṃ cānutpādayantī yadayamabhidhātuṃ samarthaḥ kathaṃ nāma tadevābhidadhanmadarthaṃ kuryādityevamapekṣate | sarvatra kriyāṃ tatsādhanaṃ vā 'bhidadhanmantro 'ṅgabhāvaṃ gacchati | tatrāpi prathamaṃ tāvadiyaṃ gatiḥ, yatprasiddhaṃ śeṣiṇi rūpaṃ tanmantreṇābhidhātavyamiti | yadā tvasāmarthyāttādarthyaṃ na pratipadyate tadā 'rthādviparyayo bhavati yadayamabhidhatte tannṛnamasyāṃ kriyāyāmastīti | na hyanyathā tasya śrutamaṅgatvamupapadyate | tasmātsūktavākenetyanayā śrutyaitatpratipādyate | yattvamabhidhatse tadevābhidadhānaḥ prastara
praharaṇaṃ sādhayeti | mantro 'pi cetthameva bravīti | iṣṭadevatābhidhānaṃ kurvannahaṃ yatkaroni tatsarvaṃ karomīti | tatra yadīṣṭā devatāḥ pūrvayāgasaṃbandhinya eva kevalā bhavanti tato na kiṃcitpraharaṇasya kṛtaṃ syāt | atha tu tā evāsyāpyaṅgabhūtāstatastatprakāśanadvāreṇa sūktavākena prastaraḥ prahṛto bhavati | na ca tāsāṃ devatātvādanyena prakāreṇopayogo vijñāyata ityatrāpi devatātvam | ataśca prastaradravyasya haviṣṭvasaṃkīrtanādagnyādīnāṃ ca devatātvādyāgo 'yaṃ vijñāyamāno ‘ha
(a. 4 pā. 2 a. 4 sū. 10)raṇe tu juhotiḥ'iti prakṣepādhikatvāddhoma ityavadhāryate | tasmādavirodhaḥ śrutiliṅgayoḥ | evaṃ ca sūtramihāpi sa devatārtha eva | kutaḥ | tābhirasyāpi harateḥ saṃyogātkālārthatā 'pi ca prasaṅgādbhaviṣyatyeva | mantrapāṭhakrameṇa sūktavākasya jñātakālatvāt | yadyagniridaṃ havirajuṣatetyevamādyeva śrūtyeteti | prāgapi saktavākeneti śruterastyevaikadeśasya praharaṇaṃ prati sāmarthyamiti darśayati | yadyapi ca sādhāraṇaṃ mantrasya sāmarthyaṃ tathā 'pi śrutyanugrahārthaṃ prastara eva ‘yadanena haviṣā’ iti nirdeṣṭavyaḥ | athavā ' 'dita evā ' 'rabhyedaṃśabdena prastaranirdeśaḥ | puroḍāśādīnāmapratyakṣatvāt | ajuṣatetyanarthakamiti cet | na | pūrvasevitaprasiddhidvāreṇa stutyarthatvāt | ata upapannamaṅgatvam || 13 ||
anubhāṣaṇaṃ paricodanā vā || 14 ||

kathamapradhānakarmaṇaḥ sūktavāko 'gnyādayo vā 'ṅgamityata uttarasūtraṃ paṭhati—sviṣṭakṛdvadubhayasaṃskāraḥ syāt | ācāryaśailyā dve sūtre manyāmahe | yathaiva sviṣṭakṛtpratipattiryāgaśca tathā 'yamapi bhaviṣyati | yathā ca tatra mantrāṇāmaṅgatvaṃ tatheha | na hi pratipattitvena yāgatvaṃ virudhyate | dravyadevatāsaṃbandhena hi yāgo bhavati | tasya ca svarūpāvadhāraṇottarakālaṃ pratipattyarthakarmatvādivicāre sati ‘utpattau(a. 4 pā. 2 a. 7 sū. 19) yena saṃyuktam’ ityanena lakṣaṇena pratipattitvam | na ca tāvatā kaściddoṣaḥ | tena yāgapratipattyātmakatvamubhaya saṃskāraśabdenocyate | athavā yagā sviṣṭakṛddravyasaṃskārārthaḥ, sviṣṭakṛto 'gneḥ kṛtārthatvena śeṣatvāt | atha ca yāgatvaṃ na jahāti | evamubhayoḥ kṛtārthayoḥ saṃskāraḥ | parasparaniyamāccādṛṣṭaṃ sādhayanyāgo bhaviṣyati | athavā sviṣṭakṛtyapi ‘ayāḍagnikagneḥ priyā dhāmāni’ ityevamādibhiriṣṭadevatāprakāśanamastītyubhayasaṃskāratvenaiva dṛṣṭāntaḥ | na ca pratipattermantro 'ṅgaṃ na bhavati | niṣprayojanasya tvaṅgaṃ neṣyate | pratipattistu dṛṣṭārthatvena sutarāṃ prayojanavatī | niyamādṛṣṭasiddhyarthaṃ cāpekṣate vaidikāni sādhanānītyaviruddhaṃ sūktavākagrahaṇam || 15 ||

adhikā
adhikāramupajīvayanniti—anena ca aindrayadhikaraṇāpavādatayā śrutiviniyuktasyāpi sūktavākasya mukhyārthaviniyogasya pūrvādhikaraṇoktasyā ' 'kṣepasamādhānārthatayā saṃgatiḥ sūcitā bhavatiramupajīvayanvicārayati | kimubhayordarśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sakalaḥ sūktavākaḥ prayoktavya uteṣṭadevatānurodhena niṣkarṣa iti | kiṃ prāptam | ekaikatra sakala iti | kutaḥ |
tataścāsūktavākenaiva prahṛtaḥ syāt || 16 ||

evamādīnāmapakarṣa ityuktaṃ stutaśa(a. 2 pā. 1 a. 5)strādhikaraṇe pūṣādyanumantraṇeṣu cokta(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 2) ityatreti śeṣaḥm | yadyetāni kevalapraharaṇāṅgabhūtāni devatāntarāṇi bhaveyustata ubhayatra sakalaḥ prayujyeta | ta eva tvihāpyagnyādayaḥ pratyabhijñāyanta iti na bhedaheturasti | ataśceṣṭadevatāprakāśanopajīvitvādaprayojakaṃ praharaṇaṃ sūktavākasya pradhānaprayuktadevatāśrayatvāttu tadadhīnaṃ vijñāyate | tāni ca pradhānāni yathādevataṃ prayuñjate nāviśeṣeṇa | tasmādapakarṣa iti || 17 ||
sūktavākaśabdaḥ kathamiti cedata āha || 18 ||

dvau hi prastarapraharaṇaprayogau | bhinnakālapaurṇamāsyamāvasyādhīnatvāt | ataścobhe prati kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaśabdaḥ—tayorubhayorapi sakalasūktavākaḥ sādhanam | prakaraṇasyāvibhaktatvādvijñāyate | yadā tu bhedena praharaṇamātramālocyate tadā prāya
prāyaṇīyodayanīyaikādaśinīvacceti—dvādaśāhe śrutena ‘aikādaśinānprāyaṇīyodayanīyayo’ rālabheran’ iti vacanena dvaṃdvopāttetaretarayuktaprāyaṇīyodayanīyopalakṣitakāle kartavyatayā vihitānāmekādaśapaśuyāgānāṃ yathā prāyaṇīye pañcodayanīye pañcāvaśiṣṭasyāpi saṃnidhānādudanīya evetyevaṃ vibhajya viniyogaḥ (a. 10 pā. 6 a. 4) ityatra vakṣyate | yathā vā loke 'pi cāturvidyebhyaḥ śatai deyamityādau caturvedaviddeyatvenoktasya śatasyaikaikavedavide caturthaścaturtho bhāga ityavayavaśo viniyogaḥ prasiddhastadvatsūktavākasyāpi darśapūrṇamāsakālikapraharaṇadvayānvayo 'vayavaśaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ |ṇīyodayanīyaikādaśinīvaccāturvidyadhanavaccāvayavaśaḥ saṃbandho bhavati | tasmācchrutiliṅgaprakaraṇānāmavirodha iti sūtram | tadidānīṃ bhāṣyakāro dūṣayati—naitadevam | na hi sāpekṣāṇāmitikartavyatayā saṃbandha iti | kutaḥ |

lg.l: ubhe prati tataḥ kṛtsnaḥ sūktavāko bhavedayam ||

div.p:
pradhānāni hi phalaṃ prati vidhīyante netikartavyatāyām | atasteṣāṃ phale vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ netikartavyatāyām | itikartavyatāṃ hi prati tā uddiśyamānāni bhavanti | avidhīyamānāyāstasyā guṇatvābhāvaprasaṅgāt | sā cedvidhīyate dvayoranyonyaṃ prati vidhānāsaṃbhavādasaṃbandhādavaśyaṃ pradhānoddeśena bhavitavyam | tataścoddiśyamānānāṃ dva
‘darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta’ ityādau darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiti dvaṃdvāvagamitamityarthaḥ |ndvāvagamitamitaretarasāhityaṃ na vivakṣyate | tena pratyekamitikartavyatāvākyasamāpterekaikaṃ pradhānaṃ samastetikartavyatāyuktama
vagatam | tathaivānuṣṭhāne 'pi prāpte sakṛtkṛtānāmevaikakālavartināṃ pratyekaṃ kārtsnyamastīti tantreṇānuṣṭhānaṃ bhaviṣyati | tadihāpi pratyāgneyādi pradhānaṃ mā nāma sūktavāka āvartiṣṭa | prayājādivattu paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ ca sakalena bhavitavyam | itarathā vā prayājādayo 'pi vibhajyaiva prayujyeran | na cedaṃ pramāṇavat | ataḥ śrutibalīyastvālliṅgaṃ bādhitvā gauṇatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ tadviṣayaṃ vā praharaṇasya devatāntaramadhyavasyāmaḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ samudāye phalasādhanatvena codyamāne sādhanatvarahitānāmavayavānāmitikartavyatāsaṃbandha iti | ucyate |

yāgatvaṃ hi pratyekaṃ samavetaṃ, tadvācinā ca dhātunaikaikasyetarānavekṣasya sādhanaśaktiravadhāryate | nanu samudāyavācināmaviśeṣitatvāddhāturapi samudāyalakṣaṇārtha eva bhavet | na | nāmna eva ca dhātvadhīnatvena pratyekavṛttitvāt | taduktaṃ paurṇamā(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3)syadhikaraṇe | tena sahāpi nāmnetaretarayuktatvamātrameva dharmo 'bhyadhiko na samudāyaḥ phalavān | nanvevamapi yathaiva sādhanatvabhitaretarayuktānāmevaṃ tadanugrahārthatvāditikartavyatā 'pi tathaiva syāt | na | tasyaiva sāhityasyoddiśyamānatvenetikartavyatāṃ pratyavivakṣitatvāt | ekamapi hi vastu lakṣa
lakṣaṇataḥ—upādeyoddeśyagatatvarūpalakṣaṇabhedādityarthaḥ |ṇataḥ kvacideva vivakṣyate na sarvatra | kathamekasya yugapaduddiśyamānopādīyamānatvamiti cet | apekṣāhetubhedādīdṛśānyapi bhavantītyukta
ācāryo mātulaśceti dravyaikatve 'pi sidhyati | apekṣāhetubhedena vyavahāraḥ pṛthakatā || ityādinā stutaśastrādhikaraṇa uktamityarthaḥ |m | nanu vairūpyādvākyabhedaḥ syāt | ko vā pradhānoddeśenetikartavyatāṃ vidadhataḥ prakaraṇāmnānānumita
anumitasya—prayājādibhirdarśapūrṇamāsāvupakurmādityevaṃ rūpasyetyarthaḥ |sya śru
śrūtāt—‘darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo vajeta’ ityasmādityarthaḥ |tādvākyāntaratvaṃ necchati | nanu cāyabhitaretarayogaḥ phalārthamapi vivakṣyamāṇa itikartavyatāsaṃbandhavelāyāmapi balātprasajyamāno na śakyate vārayitum | satyaṃ pratītito na śakyate | vidhitastu śakate | katham | iha hi viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhyuttarakālamavāntaravidhiṣu kalpyamāneṣu karmaṇaḥ phalasādhanāṃśe puruṣaḥ pravartyamānaḥ karmasāhitye 'pi paśvekatvavatpravartitaḥ pradhānetikartavyatāsaṃbandhāṃśe pradhānāni pratyapravartyamānatvāttadīyasāhitye 'pi pravartito 'ṅgāni tu sahitāni prati niyuktaḥ | tasmāditikartavyatāṃ prati grahai
katvavatpradhānasāhityamavivakṣitam | na hyekenaiva pradhānaśabdena pradhānānyaṅgārthamuddiśatā tatsāhityamupādātuṃ śakyam, vacanavyaktibhedāt | tasmātpratyekamitikartavyatā | taddarśayati—saṃnidhānāviśeṣāt | sādhanatvena ca sarveṣāṃ nirdeśādekasyā
yadi kasyacitpradhānasyetikartavyatāntaraṃ nirāṃkāṅkṣīkaraṇasamarthaṃ sākṣādvacanopadiṣṭaṃ bhavettadā tavdyatiriktānāmeva pradhānānāmitikartavyatākāṅkṣātmakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavet | na tvetadastītyevamabhidhānārthaṃ yadavacanācceti bhāṣyaṃ tadadhyāhṛnya vyācaṣṭe—ekasyāpītyādinā |pi cetikartavyatāntarānupadeśāt | asya
‘asya prakaraṇaliṅga gasya’ iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākaroti—asya ca kathaṃbhāvetyādinā | ca kathaṃbhāvarūpasya prakaraṇasāmarthyasyāviśeṣādekaikasya kṛtsnamanyonyanirapekṣasya prakaraṇamiti | tataśca ‘vacanāditi cet’ ityayameva pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate | evaṃ ca bhaṅktvā sūtramatrocyate | naitadevamiti—svayamuttarapakṣamabhidhatte | na tāvadgauṇatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ devatāntaraṃ vā yuktam | purastānnirākaraṇāt | ato yathārthaniṣkarṣe sati sūktavākaśabda upapadyeta | sūktavākabahutvāt | na hi bhinnakarmagatabhinnadevatāprakāśanasamarthānāmanyonyanirapekṣanānāprayojanayuktānām ‘agniridaṃ havirajuṣata’ ityevamādīnāmekavākyatālakṣaṇamasti | tasmātpurastātparastāccānuṣaṅgayuktā bahava ete sūktavākā īdṛśā draṣṭavyāḥ | ‘idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī’ ityārabhya ‘agniridaṃ havirajuṣatāvīvṛdhata maho jyāyo 'krata—asyāmṛdheddhotrāyāṃ devaṃgamāyām’ iti yāvatsamāptiḥ | tataḥ punaḥ ‘idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī’ ityārabhya ‘soma idam’ ityuktvā ‘asyāmṛdheddhotrāyām’ iti samāpyate | tena pratidevataṃ bhinnānāṃ sūktavākānāṃ samānaprayogabhājāmāmnānavattantreṇa katipayānāṃ pāṭhaḥ | yena kenacittu prahṛte sūktavākena prahṛtaṃ
bhavati | jātivatpratyekaṃ sūktavākatvasya sūbhāṣitayogātmakasya samāptatvāt | tatropapanne sūktavākaśabde yadanyadevatāvācīnyanyatra na prayujyante na tatra śrutiḥ pīḍyate | kiṃ tarhi | liṅgavākyābhyāṃ prakaraṇam | tacca nyāyyameveti niṣkṛṣya prayogaḥ | idamapi tu na yu
sūktavākanānātvamabhyupagamya bhāṣyoktamapi kṛtsnopadeśaparihāraṃ yathāśrutaṃ dūṣayitumupakramate— idamapi tu na yuktamityādinā | ayamāśayaḥ | yathaiva ‘vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśa kapālaṃ nivepetputre jāte’ iti jāteṣṭimupakramya ‘yasmiñjāta etamiṣṭhiṃ nirvapati’ ityādinā jāteṣṭhyaivopasaṃhārādekavākyatvaṃ pratyakṣamavagamyate tathaivātrāpi, upakramopasaṃhārayostantrapadayogenaikavākyatvasyāvagamādvākyanānātvamayuktamiti |ktamabhihitam | tantrapadairvaiśvānaravākyavadekavākyatāyāḥ pratyakṣatvāt | na hi pratipadaṃ parasparākāṅkṣā saṃbandho vā bhavati | kiṃ tarhi | kenacidekena saṃbadhyamānāni sarvāṇyekavākyatāṃ gacchanti | tadyayā ‘aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā’ iti paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhānāmapi krīṇātinā 'bhisaṃbandhādekavākyatvam | evamihāpi ‘yadanena haviṣā ' 'śāste’ ityādibhiḥ saṃbandhādekavākyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati | asti ceṣṭadevatāprakāśanaṃ nāmaikaṃ prayojanaṃ tantrapadavaśena sākāṅkṣāvayavatvam | tasmādyadyāpi tāvadarthataḥ pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptistathā 'pi śabdataḥ siddhamevaikavākyatvam | kimuta haratiṃ pratyupādīyamānatvena samudāye vākyaparisamāptyaṅgīkaraṇāt | yadi ca bhinnāni vākyāni bhaveyustata upasadda
kṣiṇādimantravatprayogakāle devatāpadaprādhānyādbhedenaiva prayogaḥ prāpnoti | prastarapraharaṇe ca vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvāttāvatā kṛtārthatvādekadevatyasyāyaṃ kasyacitprayogaḥ prāpnoti | tasmātsamastamekaṃ vākyam | ataśca vaktavyaḥ kṛtsnavacanasya parihāraḥ | sa ucyate |

lg.l: bindau ca samudāye ca toyaśabdo yatheṣyate |

div.p: sūktavāko hi sāmarthyataḥ prayojanataścedṛgavadhāryate | prayogamadhyavartidevatāpadasahitamabhitaḥ śrūyamāṇatantrapadopetamiṣṭadevatāprakāśanaṃ kurvadvākyaṃ sūktavākaḥ | tataścaikasmindevatāpade sati anekasmiṃśca prākṛte vaikṛte ca tantrapadamadhyasthe sakalaḥ sūktavākaḥ | prayogāsaṃbaddhadevatāpadasāhitye tu duruktavāko bhavati | tena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayoḥ svadevatāpa dopetaḥ sūktavāko yuktisahitena pāṭhenānuṣaṅgādipūritamantravadavadhārita ityasamavetārthapa daprayoge 'satyasūktavākatvātsutarāṃ śrutipīḍā syāt | ataśca haratirapi yathā vidyamānasūktavākasādhyatvātkṛtsnenaiva sādhito bhavatītyadoṣaḥ |

bhāṣye 'pi ca yāvaddevataṃ sūktavākasaṃbhavādekasyāpi bahutvamabhihitamiti draṣṭavyam | tathā sū
ayaṃ cātra sūtrārthaḥ | prakaraṇasya—prakṛṣṭakaraṇasyāvayavaśaktirūpasya, avibhāgāt—pratyabhijñānādrụ̄dhikalpanānupapatteḥ, ubhe prati, avayavaprayoge 'pi kṛtsnasūktavākaśabdārtho nānupapanna iti |tramapyubhe prati svadevatāpadasāhityamātreṇa kṛtsnasūktavākaśabdaḥ prakaraṇāvibhāgātkalpita ityevameva gamayitavyamiti sarveṣāmavirodhaḥ || 19 ||

yena krameṇaindrāgnādīni kāmyāni karmāṇyāmnātāni tenaiva krameṇa taddevatyāni kāmyasamākhyāyuktāni yājyāpuronuvākyāyugalāni | tāni kiṃ kramamullaṅghya taddevatyakarmamātrārthāni liṅgādbhavantyuta kenacitprakāreṇa tāsveva kāmyāsviṣṭiṣu yathākramaṃ viniyujyanta iti | udāharaṇabahutvaṃ hi sūtropāttaviśeṣaṇaviṣayaprakalpanārtham | tatra liṅgātsavorthartva prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

liṅgaṃ hi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ kuryāt | na ca tatsvarūpaprayuktatve phalamasti | yajñasaṃbandhitā tadanuraktadevatāsaṃbandhitā vā naitāvatā vākyaprakaraṇādirahitena śakyopādātum |
na ca jñāyate kvāṃśe viniyoga iti | tenāvaśyaṃ samākhyā tāvadāśrayaṇīyā | tayā hi yajñasaṃbandhaḥ kāryaviśeṣaśca sidhyati | ijyate 'nayeti yāgasaṃbandhaḥ | tasyāśca haviḥpradānārthatvātkāryāviśeṣo 'pyavadhṛtaḥ | tataśca kena yajñena saṃbandha iti liṅgāttaddevatyeneti vijñāyate | nanvevamapīṣṭaṃ na sidhyatyeva | kathaṃ na sidhyati | yadā kāmyaṃ yājyākāṇḍamityetāvatyā samākhyayā kāmyeṣṭiviṣayatvaṃ niyatam | api ca | yadyapi samākhyā yajñamātrasaṃbandhaṃ kuryāttathā 'pi balīyasā krameṇa bādhyetaiva | tasmātkāmyeṣṭiyuktamevaitatsamāmnānamiti | kimarthamubhayaṃ sūtritamiti | kramānugṛhītena liṅgenaiva kāmyeṣṭiviṣayatvasiddherathavā kāmyaṃ yājyākāṇḍamityetāvataiva sarvaṃ siddhamiti manyate | tatrābhidhīyate | satyam | aindrāgnādiṣu liṅgakramamātreṇāpi sidhyedṛcāṃ yājyānuvākyātvādanyatrāviniyogāt | yāni tvāgneyādīni karmāṇi ‘agnaye vratapataye’ ityevamādicoditāni tatra sthānadvayamṛcāmagniprakāśane sāmidhenītvaṃ yājyānuvākyātvaṃ ca | sāptadaśyāmnānāccāsti sāmidhenīnāṃ dve ṛcau pratyapekṣā | tatra yadi yājyāsamākhyā viniyojikā nā ' 'śrīyeta tataḥ sāmidhenīṣvapi liṅgakramāvupapadyete iti | pratha
‘sāmidhenīkārye 'pi’ iti bhāṣyasthāpiśabdamevakārārthaparatayā vyācaṣṭe—prathamātikrama ityādinā |mātikrame kāraṇābhāvāttatraiva viniyogaḥ pāpnoti | samākhyayā tu tannivartitaṃ bhavati | tena tarhi tanmātramevāstu nārtho liṅgakramābhyāmiti | taducyate | yadyatreṣṭiparimitā evātyantaṃ taddevatyāścāmnāyeraṃstata etadevaṃ syāt | iha tvanyadevatyasya svānurūpayājyānuvākyā
pūritasya karmaṇaḥ krame yā āgneyya ṛcaḥ paṭhyante tāḥ samākhyayā kevalayā viniyujyamānā yājyākārye viniyujyeran | na cāsti saṃbhavaḥ | viliṅgatvādanyābhyāṃ talliṅgābhyāṃ bādhitatvāt | tenāviniyoga eva syāt | liṅgakramāśrayaṇe punaḥ samākhyāyāṃ nivṛttavyāpārāyāṃ tābhyāṃ viniyoge sati sāmidhenīṣu prayogaḥ siddho bhavati | taṃ viṣayaṃ darśayati—āgnivāruṇyā iṣṭeryājyāpuronuvākye paṭhitvā saumāraudrīṇāmiṣṭīnāṃ yājyāpuronuvākyāṃsvanāgatāsu manorṛcaḥ paṭhyante | tāḥ sāmidhenīṣu dhāyyā bhavantīti | tathā pṛthupājavatyāvapi draṣṭavye | tatrāpi pūrvasyāḥ sāmidhenīkramamatikramya yājyāpuronuvākyottarakālapāṭhāduttareṣṭiviṣayatvaṃ vijñāyate | yadi ca kramo nā ' 'śrīyeta tato liṅgasamākhyāmātreṇa prathamamaindrāgnayugalaṃ dvitīyasyāmaindrāgnyāṃ viniyujyeta dvitīyaṃ ca prathamāyām | krame tu sati samākhyātaḥ pūrvataraṃ tena kratusaṃbandhakaraṇāttatsaṃniruddhameva liṅgaṃ śrutiṃ kalpayatītyakramaviniyogaḥ parihṛto bhavati | tasmātsamyak sūtritamiti || 20 ||

jyotiṣṭome prathamamāgneyyaindryādayaḥ stotraśastrādisādhanatvena ‘agna āyāhi vītaye’ ityevamādayo viśeṣarūpeṇā ' 'mnātā vihitāśca | punaśca sāmānyena ‘āgneyyā ' 'gnīdhramupatiṣṭhate’ ityādiṣūpadiśyante | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ tadvyatiriktā grahītavyā uta tā vā, anyā vā 'thavā tā eveti | granthātrayaḥ pakṣāḥ pratibhānti | na
bhāṣyagranthātparābhimataṃ saṃdehamupanyasya dūṣayitumārabhate—na tvihetyādinā | tvihāprakṛtā evetyasya pakṣasya pramāṇamasti | mahatā hi prabandhenāviśeṣagrahaṇaṃ pratipādyate na kevalāprakṛtaniścayaḥ | yena hi pramāṇenā ' 'gneyīśabdāviśeṣeṇāprakṛtā gṛhyeraṃstenaiva prakṛtā api | na ca kiṃ
citkāraṇamasti yena prakṛtāḥ parityajyeran | na ca bhāṣyakāreṇa trayaḥ pakṣāḥ pradarśitāḥ | kiṃ tarhi | aviśeṣapakṣa evā ' 'dāvapiśabdarahitenāprakṛtaśabdena parigṛhītaḥ | yenāprakṛtā eveti bhrāntirbhavati | yattu tatra pramāṇaṃ tadaviśeṣapakṣameva sādhayati | tathā ca parastādvivṛtamaprakṛte 'pi pratyayo bhavati prakṛtamapyupādadīranniti ca | yadi tvavaśyaṃ tṛtīyo 'pi pakṣaḥ samarthanīyastata etāvatī śrotriyopapattiḥ | prakṛtasya kāryāntaropayogena yā
yātayāmatvāditi—yathā pakvasyaudanādeḥ prahare gate sati gatarasatvādyātayāmatvamucyate tadvadanyadapi gatavīryaṃ yātayāmamityucyate |tayāmatvādagrahaṇam | athavā sāmānyavidhānamidam | tāni tvāgneyīviśeṣavidhānāni parihṛtya ca viśeṣavidhiviṣayaṃ sāmānyaśāstrāṇi pravartante | yadi tu tatrāpi viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ nasyāttatastadapyanenaiva tulyamityudāharaṇatvena gṛhyeta | tasmādaprakṛtā eva grahītavyāḥ | a
etāvatā praụdhyā bhāṣyamaprakṛtaparatvenāpi saṃyojyādhunā svamatenāviśeṣapakṣaviṣayatayā saṃyojayitumupakramate—athavetyādinā |thavā ' 'gneyādiśabdairaviśeṣapratyayo jātaḥ | na cānyatprakṛtagrahaṇakṣamaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ | prakaraṇasya grāhakatvenāviśeṣakatvāt | saṃnidhilakṣaṇalaukikaprakaraṇasya ca yaugikaśrutijanitāviśeṣapratyayena bādhyamānatvāt | tasmātsarvapratyayaḥ | upadiṣṭopadeśo hi na nyāyya iti | iha upadiṣṭasyaivetyarthaḥ | evaṃjātīyakasyeti—viśeṣaṇarahitasyetyarthaḥ | kathaṃjātīyakasyeti—asti vinā 'pi viśeṣaṇena viśeṣagrahaṇapramāṇaṃ prakaraṇāmiti siddhāntavādī manyate | paraḥ punaḥ svābhiprāyeṇaiva siddhāntavādyābhimatāṃ viśeṣa
viśeṣagrahaṇopapattimanabhimatāmiti—yayā ' 'gneyyā stotrādi karoti, ityevamākhyātapratyayavihitatvarūpopadiṣṭatvopalakṣaṇarūpāṃ prakṛtagrahaṇopapattiṃ paramārthataḥ siddhāntyanabhipretāṃ tadabhimatāṃ parikalpyeti samuditārthaḥ |grahaṇopapattimanabhimatāmeva parikalpya katham | yadi talliṅgaṃ tasyopalakṣaṇatvenetyāha | na cātropari vakṣyamāṇadevatāliṅgābhiprāyeṇa liṅgapadaṃ yuktam | kiṃ tarhi | ākhyātapratyayasāmarthyaṃ tadvihitatvaṃ vā | tadupakṣīṇaśaktau tasminvidhyabhāvaprasaṅgopanyāsāt | nāsau sāmānyena liṅgeneti—agninā cihnena, sarvāsu pratīyamānāsu sphuṭena viśe
ṣaṇena vinā na śakyo mantraviśeṣaḥ pratipattumityabhiprāyaḥ | tadiha yadi viśeṣaṇamiṣyate tato dārśapaurṇamāsikanirvāpālammanyā( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 5 ) atratyabhāṣyoktanyāyenetyarthaḥyena kartavyatāvacanena liṅgena viśeṣṭavyam | taddhyakarmāṅgabhūtebhyo dāśatayebhyo nivṛttamata eva viśeṣaṇam | tathā ca darśayati—yenānenaivaṃliṅgenaitatkarotīti ( kartavyam ) | yenānenaivaṃliṅgena—agniliṅgenendrāliṅgena vā, kiṃcitkarotīti—ākhyātapratyayavihitatvenopalakṣitenā ' 'gnīdhropasthānamiti, tato vidhāyakasyopalakṣaṇatvenopakṣīṇatvānnopadiṣṭo bhavati | athopadiśyetā ' 'gneyyādinā karotīti tato na viśeṣito bhavati | tataścāviśeṣitāgneyīmātragrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ | tenopadiṣṭasyaiva tadupalakṣitasya punarupadeśa ityapramāṇakam | tasmātkartavyatāvacanavarjitakevalāgnyādidevatopalakṣaṇasāmarthyātpunardāśatayā api grahītavyā iti | nanu prakaraṇasāmarthyāditi—siddhāntābhiprāyeṇoktam | liṅgaṃ prakaraṇābdalīya iti—liṅgaśabdenātra devatāsaṃbandhādyaugikī śrutirabhidhīyate na sāmarthyamātram | upariṣṭādvahuprayogagato 'pi liṅgaśabda evameva yaugikaśrutivacano vyākhyeyaḥ | āha | virodhe satīti—yadi prakṛtamanāgneyaṃ gṛhṇīmastato virodho bhavet | prakṛtāgneyagrahaṇe tu dvayamapyanugṛhyate | tathā tadbha
gauraśva iti vā śrutyā yadgo tvādyavabodhitam | viśeṣe yadi tatra syāttatra syācchrutibādhanam || jātivyaktī gṛhītvaiva vayaṃ tu śrutilakṣite | kṛṣṇādi yadi muñcāmaḥ kā śrutistatra bādhyate || ityādinā tadbhūtādhikaraṇasthaślokavārtike ( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7 ślo. 347—348 ) śrutivākyayoravirodha uktaḥ | tannyāyena prakṛte 'pi śrutiprakaraṇayoravirodha ityāśayaḥ |tādhikaraṇe śrutivākyayoraviruddhatvamuktam | naitadeva
āgneyyādiśabdānāṃ vyaktivācitvena jātivācigavādiśabdavaiṣamyādvirodhaparihārāsaṃbhavopapādanārthaṃ naitadevamiti bhāṣyamityāha—naitadevamiti |miti |
dāśatayānāmapi vikalpena prāptānāṃ na yuktaḥ prakaraṇānurodhena bādhaḥ | tasmānnobhayamanugrahītavyamiti | sāmānya
ucyata iti bhāṣyābhiprāyamāha—sāmānyasyetyādinā | āgneyyādiśabdasya jātivācitvābhāve 'pi vaiyākaraṇavatsaṃbandhavācitvābhyupagamānmantradevatāsaṃbandharūpasya sāmānyasya ca pratimantravyakti viśrānterjātivācitvapakṣa iva virodhaparihāraḥ sulabha ityāśayaḥ |sya pravivyakti samāpteḥ prakṛtāyāmapi vyaktau samastapadārthasaṃbhavānna kaścidvirodha iti matvā ' 'ha—talliṅgavattā 'nenānugrahītavyeti | tasmālliṅgayuktasya vākyasya sāmānyaviṣayatvātprakaraṇena tadākāṅkṣitaviśeṣasamarpaṇādasati samavāyavirodhe na yukto bādhaḥ | itarastu vyaktyabhidhānābhiprāyeṇa dāśatayaprāptinivartanādvirodhaṃ samarthayate | nanu vyaktirapadārtha ityabhiprāyapratyādeśaḥ | parastvāha | etadeva na vijānīmastalliṅgavattā sāmānyabhūtā 'trāṅgaṃ naveti | yadi hi gavādiśabdavavdyaktyabhidhānasaṃbhavastataḥ sāmānyacodanāyāṃ satyāmaśrutavyaktigrahaṇānuṣaṅgiṇī prakṛtavyaktigrahaṇe 'pyadoṣo 'tha tu devatopalakṣitā vyaktireva śabdārthastataḥ prakṛtagrahaṇe sati śrutijanitapratyayaikadeśabādhaḥ syāt | sā ceha vyaktireva sādhanaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nāma kiṃcit | kiṃ punaridānīmākṛtyadhikaraṇoktasāmānyāpahnavaṃ bhāṣyakāraḥ karoti | neti
brūmaḥ | tasyāṅgatvāsaṃbhavamātramāheti kecit | tadayuktam | tathā sati vyaktīnāmaśrutatvādaparigrahe 'pi doṣābhāvāt | ataḥ prakṛtāpekṣayā sāmānyamapahnūyata iti vaktavyam | vyaktiśabdo hyayaṃ yaugikatvānna jātiśabdatvaṃ pratipadyate | na cātra jātiḥ kācitpratīyate | nānārūpāsu nānācchandaskāsvapi ca devataikatvamātreṇā ' 'gneyyādiśabdaprayogāt | na hi ‘agna āyāhi vītaye’ ‘agniṃ hotāraṃ manye dāsvantam’ ityetayordevatāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcitsāmānyaṃ dṛśyate | devatāsaṃbandhamevaiṣa na vyabhicarati | vyabhicarati tu ṛgjātiṃ, dravya
dravyakarmādiṣvapi prayogāditi—‘yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ’ ‘śiro vā etadyajñasya yadāgneyaḥ āgneyo vai brāhmaṇaḥ’ ityādāviti śeṣaḥ |karmādiṣvapi prayogāt | ato devataivātra samānetyāha | saṃbandhastu samānaḥ sannapi nābhidheyatvenārthasiddhatvādbhāṣyakāreṇopanyastaḥ | tasyā eva ca devatāyāḥ samānatvādvyaktyānantyādidoṣanivṛttiḥ | pūrvābhihite 'pi ca viśeṣaṇe prakṛtipratyayayoḥ śaktibhedātpratyayena viśeṣyābhidhānamaviruddham | yatra tu tāvāneva śabda ubhayatra vyāpārayitavyastatra viśeṣyānabhidhānaṃ, yathā gavādau | na cātra viśeṣaṇābhidhānamātrasyāgniśabdasya kadācidapi viśeṣyeṣu prayogo nāpyāgneyīśabdasyāgnau yato viśeṣyaṃ yāvannīyeta | yadi ceha viśeṣaṇamātramabhidhīyeta tatastasyaiva kāryakṣamatvānnaiva viśeṣyaṃ parigṛhyeta | tasmādvyaktaya evātrābhidheyāḥ | tadu( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥktaṃ piṅgākṣyaikahāyanīśabdayoḥ | tataśca pakṣe prakṛtamapyupādadīran | nanvetaduktamiti—ādyapakṣābhiprāyeṇa | nanu tvayaiva yātayā matvādidoṣāttasyānupādānamuktam | parastu madhyamapakṣaṃ parigṛhyā ' 'ha | kevalaprakṛtagrahaṇe hi pratyayasya yugapadvidhilakṣaṇavyāpārādvirodho 'bhihitaḥ, matpakṣe tu na niyogataḥ sa evātrā ' 'gnīdhrādyupasthāne | kiṃ tarhi | aviśeṣavacanena sa cānyaścetyavirodhaḥ | nanve
tadduṣyatīti—vinā kāraṇena prakaraṇapīḍāmasahamāno vadati | parastu devatāliṅgayuktaśrutibalīyastvamevottaraṃ dadāti | api ca | na liṅgaṃ—yaugikaśrutyātmakaṃ, prakaraṇaṃ cānugrahītavyamiti—lokasyātisaṃmugdhāṃ vācoyuktiṃ nirākartumupanyasyati | sarvapramāṇavyavahāreṣveva na pramāṇamanugrahītuṃ puruṣāḥ prameyeṣu pravartante | kiṃ tarhi | ātmānam | tataḥ kimiti cedata āha—etadato bhavati | bahuṣvapyekarūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ kvacidanugṛhītamiti kṛtārthatvānna puruṣārthaupayikānyapi santyarthāntarāṇi na gṛhyante | sakṛtprayukte vā kāmye phalabhūmārthināmapi na bhūyaḥ prayogo bhavet | tasmātpramāṇānugrahamanāhatyā ' 'tmānugrahārthaṃ tatra tatra pravartitavyamityaviśeṣagrahaṇasāmarthyam | liṅgapratyayaviruddhatvā- diti-atrāpi liṅgaśabdastasminneva prayukta iti draṣṭavyam | sū
sūtramiti—‘āgneyyā 'gnīdhram’ ityayaṃ mantravidhiḥ, adhikāre—adhikṛtamantraviṣaye, atadākhyeṣu-tadbhinneṣu cāvagantavyaḥ | yadi paraṃ prakṛtānāṃ śiṣṭatvānnirākāṅkṣatvamālocyate tato 'stu tadbhinneṣvevetyevaṃ vyākhyeyamityarthaḥ |tramapyatadākhyaprāpaṇaṃ karotīti nātadākhyamātraniyamārthamiti vyākhyeyam | tadākhyeṣu tvasaṃvāda eveti na parāmṛśyante || 21 ||
adhikārākhyo 'dhikṛtasaṃjñaka iti | athavā tatrā ' 'khyāyata ityevaṃ tadākhyaḥ | tadīyatvena vā ya ākhyātaḥ sa grahītavya iti | kutaḥ |

‘āgnethyā ' 'gnīdhram’ iti hi nā ' 'gnīdhrasvarūpaprayuktamupasthānam | nāpi svatantraṃ puruṣārtham | phalāśravaṇāt | ato 'vaśyamevamāśrayitavyaṃ jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasiddhyarthamāgnīdhropasthānaṃ karotīti | tataśca jyotiṣṭomakāryaviśeṣavidhānametaditi niścīyate | sa ca
viśeṣaḥ sāmānyaprāptau satyāṃ śakyo vidhātuṃ nānyathā | tatra yadi dvāvapi sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃbandhāvidameva vākyaṃ kuryāttato vākyaṃ bhidyeta | nanu cānena viśeṣamātramāgnīdhrasaṃbandhaḥ kriyate | prakaraṇātsāmānyasaṃbandhaḥ setsyatīti | satyaṃ prakaraṇātsidhyati na tu śrutimakalpayitvā | sā ca śrutiḥ kḷptāyāṃ satyāṃ kalpayituṃ na śakyate | nanu viśeṣe vidhīyamāne 'rthādeva sāmānyamantarbhaviṣyati | na | arthasyā
arthasyāpīti—śrutārthāpattyākhyasya pramāṇasyāpi śrutikalpakatvena prakaraṇatulyatvamityarthaḥ |pi prakaraṇatulyatvāt | yadi tvāgnīdhrasaṃbandhe kṛte bhojanādivattṛptirjyotiṣṭomasaṃbandho nāntarīyakatvenānuniṣpādī syāttataḥ śāstraṃ nā ' 'yasyet | ayaṃ tu dravyasvarūpeṇa saṃbandhasya niṣphalatvātprathamataramāśrīyate | na ca śāstrādṛte tadupapadyata ityastyevāśrutakalpanākleśaḥ | kiṃ ca |

tenāvaśyaṃ prakaraṇānumitaiva śrutiḥ kalpayitavyā | sarvatra caivamādāvarthāpatteḥ prāmāṇvam | sā cānyathānupapattyā bhavati | tadyadīdaṃ viśeṣasaṃbandhavākyaṃ sāmānyasaṃbandhaśrutimakalpayannopapadyeta tataḥ kalpayet | upapadyate tvasya kḷptasāmānyasaṃbandhāsvṛkṣu svārthamātravidhānam | tāvatā ca siddhārthatvānna gurvī kalpanāmavalambate | taddarśayati— na jyotiṣṭomaṃ prati mantrasya vyāpāravidhānamupapadyate | anyata eva prāptatvāt | yathā vasantādiśrutibhiḥ prāpterna kāmaśrutaya ādhānākṣepasamarthā ityāhitāgnīnevādhikurvanti | tathaitāḥ prāptajyotiṣṭomasaṃbandhādhikāriṇya ityabhiprāyaḥ | itarathā yadi tāvadaprakṛtā eva gṛhyante tato gatyantarasaṃbhave sati vedenānabhyupagataḥ sannatibhāro niṣpramāṇaka āpadyeta | athāviśeṣagrahaṇaṃ tathā 'pyekatra prāptasāmānyasaṃbandhānuvādena viśeṣamātrakaraṇādaparatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣaprāpaṇādvairūpyanimitto 'pi vākyabhedaḥ syāt | prakṛtagrahaṇe na kaściddoṣaḥ | evaṃ ca pratyāsatteḥ pratyayaviprakaṣoṃ na bhaviṣyati | nanu ca prakaraṇe 'pi yathābhilaṣitaḥ sāmānyasaṃbandho naiva kasyacidasti | yadyapi syāttathā 'pi kāryāntare viniyukta ityādi virudhyeta | ucyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kāryāntaraviniyuktānāmeva grahaṇāt | nanvevaṃ sati sāmānyasaṃbandhaprāptivācoyuktirna ghaṭate | kathaṃ na ghaṭate, yadā sarvaviśeṣeṣu sāmānyamantargatam | tena yattatra viśeṣarūpaṃ tadvi
śeṣāntare 'nupayujyamānatvādavivakṣitaṃ kṛtvā taddvārasiddhasāmānyāśrayaṇamaviruddham | yastu bhāṣyakāreṇa vākyabhedo darśitaḥ sa sarvaviśiṣṭavidhāneṣu tulyaḥ | yāgaṃ kuryāttaṃ ca somenetyapi śakyaṃ darśayitum | apūrvakarmavidhānācca nāyamanyebhyo viśiṣṭavidhānebhyo nyūnataro vijñāyate | siddhānte 'pi cānyaliṅgānāśrayaṇāt, taccaivaṃliṅgenetyetadasttheva | na hyavidhīyamānaḥ prakṛto 'pyevaṃliṅgamupasthānāṅgam | tasmādyathākathaṃcitpūrvokta evātra vākya
vidhigauravameva bhāṣye vākyabhedatvenopacaritamityāśayaḥ |bhedo yojayitavyaḥ | tatra, upasthānaṃ ca kuryāditi—etajjyotiṣṭomakāryaviśeṣapradarśanaṃ, taccaivaṃliṅgeneti—prakaraṇanira
prakaraṇanirapakṣesyāprāptajyoteṣṭomasaṃbandhasya devatākhyacihnopalakṣitamantramātrasya jyotiṣṭomānvayapradarśanārthamityarthaḥ |pekṣāprāptajyotiṣṭomasaṃbandhadevatāliṅgopalakṣitamantramātrapradarśanārtham || 22 ||
atha vākyabhedaṃ parihartuṃ yathāśrutāgnīdhrādyupasthānasaṃbandhamātramityucyate | tatrā ' 'haanarthakaścopadeśaḥ syādasaṃbandhātphalavateti |

nanu prakaraṇājjyotiṣṭomasyopakārakaḥ syāditi—anyataḥ sāmānyasaṃbandha siddhiṃ manyate | na tvasāvapyavidhīyamānaḥ saṃbhavatīti darśayati—yadyupasthānajyotiṣṭomasaṃbandho vivakṣyeta tatastenaikavākyatāmiyāt | yadā tu khalu tamavidhāyopasthānamanūdya viśiṣṭavidhānena vā mantrasaṃbandho vidhīyeta tadā laukike niṣphale śuddha evopasthāne mantraḥ prāpnotyananumitaśrutiprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā | na hi tadā prakaraṇādviśeṣapratyayaḥ | asmatpakṣe tu prathamameva jyotiṣṭomena svīkṛtatvānnānyatra prāptirityarthavattā
lāghavaṃ ca | athavā ' 'gnīdhrādīnāṃ karmāṅgabhūtānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ ca karaṇānāṃ saṃbandhe vidhīyamāna upasthānamapyanūdyata iti laghutaram || 23 ||

yattu yātayāmatvātsāmānyaviśeṣabādhādvā na prakṛtagrahaṇamiti | tanna | vaca
vacanāditi—kuśā darvyādayo mantrā brāhmaṇāścabahuśrutāḥ | na te nirmālyatāṃ yānti viniyojyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ || ityasmādvacanādityarthaḥ |nādyātayāmavidhānādguṇabhūtamantrāvṛttyā ca samuccaye sati virodhābhāvādubhayamapyadoṣam | tathā, yenaivaṃliṅgenaivaṃ kuryādityeṣā 'pi vacanavyaktirnā ' 'śrīyate | sarveṣāṃ kvacidupadiṣṭatvenāviśeṣaṇatvāt | yattu pratyayena viśeṣṭavyamiti | tadanyathaiva viśeṣasiddherasaṃbaddhādhyāropaṇamātrameva śobhate | tathā hi |
tasmādarthāpattipratibandhamātreṇaiva prakṛtapratyayasiddhiḥ || 24 ||

samastānuvākodāharaṇaṃ kāni padāni kva samarthānīti vakṣyamāṇaviṣayavivekārtham | atra sūktavākavadeva prātaḥsavanādiśabdāstatsāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃstutāśca vasumadgaṇādayo gāyatracchandaḥprabhṛtaya indrapītādayaśca krameṇa yathāsavanaṃ niṣkṛṣya prayoktavyāḥ | idaṃ tu vicāryate | kiṃ samasto 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇa eva viniyoktavyaḥ, uta grahaṇāvekṣaṇasamyagjaraṇeṣvapi yathāliṅgamiti | tatra bhakṣasya coditatvādbhakṣayāmipadasya ca tatprakāśanasāmarthyādādyantapadasaṃdaṃśagṛhītetarapadānāmananyagāmitvāt ‘tataścā(a. 9 pā. 1 a. 11 sū. 37)vacanaṃ teṣāmitarārthaṃ prayujyate’ itivad grahaṇādīnāmapi coditabhakṣaviśeṣaṇatvenaikapradhānārthānāmekavākyatvāttatraiva viniyoga ityukte, paricodanā | ‘bhakṣe hi mā viśa’ ityasya bhakṣaṇe 'pyupapattiḥ | ‘ehi vaso’ ityādestu sadhyāsamityevamantasya grahaṇārthatvam | yadyapi ‘sadhi hiṃsāyām’ iti pāṭhātsa
ghyāsamityasya grahaṇārthatā na vispaṣṭā | tathā 'pi bāhukaraṇakatvānnirvapativadgrahaṇapratītiḥ | asti
kriyāvācitvamākhyātumekaiko 'rtho nidarśitaḥ | prayogato 'numantavyā anekārthā hi dhātavaḥ | ityādismṛtyeti śeṣaḥ | cānekārthatvaṃ dhātūnām | grahaṇakṛtaiva vā hiṃsā vivakṣyetetyadoṣaḥ | tathā ‘nṛcakṣasam’ ityāderavekṣaṇārthatvaṃ yadyapi ‘cākṣiṅ vyaktāyāṃ vāci’ iti smaryate tathā 'pi prayogeṣu prakāśanamātrārthatā gamyate | tena nṛṣu yaḥ khyātaḥ sa nṛcakṣāstamavakhyeṣamiti ‘cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ’ ityatra khyeñ ityupasaṃkhyāyate | tenāvekṣaṇārthatvam | ‘hinva me gātrāṇi’ iti samyakpariṇataḥ śaknoti gātrāṇi prīṇayituṃ nāmeścādhastādagantumiti samyagjaraṇārthatā | tasmālliṅgāvirodhādayuktamakevākyatvamiti | taducyate | sarvāṇyetāni bhakṣaṇasya prāgūrdhvaṃ ca vartamānāni viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavanti | tena viśiṣṭabhakṣaprakāśane 'rthādviśeṣaṇākṣepādekārthatvāvirodhaḥ | yadyapi ca grahaṇādīnāṃ svaprādhānyāparityāgācchrautatvācca bhedena prakāśanaṃ yuktaṃ, taṃthāṃ 'pyecoditaprakāśane na kiṃcitphalamastīti coditaśeṣatvameva yuktataram | taduktaṃ nirvāpamantre | tasmālliṅgamaviruddham | tathā ca samākhyā 'nugrahīṣyate | tatra caudayanti | sā nāma samākhyā viniyoktrī yuktā yā veda eva paṭhyate | bhakṣānuvākasamākhyā tvasa
māmnānātkathaṃ viniyokṣyata iti | taducyate |

yathaiva vedasya vaktṛdoṣarahitatvātprāmāṇyam, evaṃ laukikasyāpi padasyānāditvāviśeṣāt | na cātrāndhaparamparānyāyaḥ | abhidhānābhidheyayoḥ sarvapratyakṣatvāt | na hyāgnihotrasvargādisādhyasādhanabhāvavadanuvākasyāpratyakṣatvam | ato bhakṣānuvākaśabdavācyo 'yamityetattāvatpramāṇam | ataśca prakaraṇe paṭhyamānamanuvākamālocya samākhyā hṛdayamāgacchati | sā ca bhakṣasyānuvāka ityevaṃ vigṛhyamāṇā bhakṣasaṃbandha ityevaṃ manasi nidhāpayati | tataścobhayorbuddhāvupaplavamānayorapekṣāvaśena tadeva saṃbandhasāmānyaṃ viśeṣasaṃbandho bhavati | bhakṣo 'pi hi smārakamapekṣate | anuvāko 'pi prakāśyam | asti cobhayorapi yogyatvamiti | tathāvasthitayoḥ prakāśyaprakāśakayoḥ prayogavacanena vidhānam | taināpi bhakṣārthatvamiti || 25 ||

paricodanoktenaiva mārgeṇāpakarṣaḥ kartavyaḥ | śrutiprādhānyānugrahāt | grahaṇā
grahaṇādivacca—grahaṇādiprakāśanārheṇa |divacca rū
rūpeṇa—sautrarūpaśabdoktena |peṇa sāmarthyā(tprakaraṇena)tmakena liṅgena vākyasya bādhitatvāt | nanu bhakṣaṇaikavākyatvamapi liṅgakṛtameva | satyam | tathā 'pi śrutiviprakarṣāddaurbalyam | grahaṇādyabhidhānasāmarthyena hi śrutimanumāya śīghraṃ viniyogaḥ kriyate | itareṇa punarekavākyatā | tato lakṣaṇādvāreṇa bhakṣaṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ tataḥ śrutyanumānamiti viprakarṣaḥ | tena bhakṣasya pratyā
sannatareṇa mantrādinā 'varuddhātvādeteṣāmapi ca svayamanyatrāpravṛtterapakarṣaḥ | nanvarthaprāptānāṃ prakāśanaṃ niṣprayojanam | kathaṃ niṣprayojanam | yadā tānyapyaprakāśitāni naiva śakyante 'nuṣṭhātum | tannāmārthaprāptaṃ na prakāśyate yadevameva vinā prayatnena niṣpadyate | grahaṇādīni tu sarvāṇi pṛthakprayatnasādhyāni tānyasmṛtāni na śakyante kartumityavaśyaṃ smartavyāni | bhakṣavidhirapi tānyacodayitvā na śaknoti svārthamanuṣṭhāpayitumiti tānyapi codayati | ato mantrasvarūpātteṣāṃ copadeśātsamyagjaraṇatanmantrayoścopadeśādevāpakarṣo 'rthasyaiva coditatvāt | tena yadyapyanudāhṛtatvātpratyakṣopadeśo 'tra na śakyo vaktuṃ tathā 'pyadoṣaḥ | samyagjaraṇaṃ tu vamanavirecanayoḥ prāya( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 15 ) ityetrati śeṣaḥścittāmnānātpratyakṣopadiṣṭameva draṣṭavyam || 26 ||

grahaṇādīnyakṛtvā bhakṣānuṣṭhānāśaktesteṣu pṛthakpuruṣasya śāstrasya ca vyāpāro yujyate | na tvevaṃ bhakṣaṇādanyastṛptau vyāpāra iti nārthastatprakāśanena | tasmātprārthanāyāṃ prāptakālatāyāṃ vā loṭamanvākhyāyaikavākyatāmāpādya tṛptiviśiṣṭabhakṣaprakāśanārthaḥ sakala ityabhyupagamyate || 27 ||
indrapītasyeti somasāmānādhikaraṇyādanaindrāṇāṃ viliṅgatvātprakṛtau cohābhāvādamantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇamiti || 28 ||

anaindreṣvapyūhena prayogo vikṛtitvāt | samāne 'pi karmaṇi pradānebhedātprakṛtivikārabhāvo bhaviṣyati | dhruvacamasāścaindrāḥ prakṛtibhūtāḥ | kathamavagamyate | grahaṇamantreṇa somasyendrapradānaviṣayatvāt | bhavati hi sādhanavaśena sādhyasya niyamaḥ | tadyathā ' 'havanīyādivaśenāgnihotrādeḥ | yatra ca somastatra sarve taddharmāḥ | tenaindrāṇi pradānāni dharmavanti | itarāṇi tvadharmakatvādatideśena grahīṣyanti | tataśca siddha ūhaḥ | tathā ca siddhavat ‘namati’ ityanūdya ‘anuṣṭupchandasaḥ’ iti veśeṣavidhānamupapatsyate | saṃsthānāṃ ca vikāratvamadyāpya siddhamiti darśanaṃ manyate | vikāratve tvanyathā 'styevoha ityadarśanameva syāt | nanu
saṃsthā vikārabhūtaivetyaliṅgaṃ vipariṇāmadarśanam | neti brūmaḥ | agniṣṭomāntānāṃ hi pradānānāṃ samānavidhānatve saṃsthānāṃ vikāratve 'pi prakṛtivadvikṛtāvapyavikṛtasyaivopakārakatvasaṃbhavātkuto vipariṇāmadarśanam | aindrāṇāṃ tu prakṛtitve tārtīyasavanikeṣvapyagniṣṭomādiṣu vipariṇata evetyupapannaṃ vipariṇāmadarśanam | (viśiṣṭa
maitrāvaṇabrāhmaṇācchaṃptipotṛneṣṭracchāvākāgnīdhnāḥ ṣaḍ̣dhotrakāḥ |padākṣepaścaiṣa vipariṇāmavyapadeśaḥ | na vidhinā 'nuṣṭupchandaḥ śabdākṣepa iti |) tasmādyathādevatamūha iti || 29 ||

evaṃ pūrvapakṣastha evādhikaraṇe kṛtvācintayohaviṣayatvaṃ cintayati | huteṣu camaseṣu saśeṣeṣvevābhyunnītāḥ somāḥ punarabhyunnītā ityucyante | teṣāṃ tu yathā punarabhyunnītatvaṃ yathā cohacintāviṣayatā tathā vibhajya darśayati | santi daśa camasāsteṣāṃ ye madhyataḥkariṇāṃ brahmādīnāṃ catvārastairhoturvaṣaṭkārānuvaṣaṭkārayordvirdvirhutaṃ
hotrakacamasaistu sakṛdvaṣaṭkāra eva hutaṃ, sarveṣu cendro devatā | tataścamaseṣu saśeṣeṣveva somo 'bhyunnīya hūyate | kathamavagamyete tatsarvaṃ praiṣeṇa darśayati | tatra dvitīye home hotrakā nānādevatā yajanti | maitrāvaruṇo mitrāvaruṇau ‘mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmaha' ityādiyājyabhireva darśayati | tatra yadaite camasā hutvā bhakṣaṇārthamānīyante tadā dvau dvau śeṣau dṛśyete | pūrvahomaśeṣaścaindra uttaraśca mitrāvaruṇādidevatyaḥ | tasyopalakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prasthitadevatā—atikrā
atikrāntaḥ—atikrāntayāgānvayaḥ | anena ca bhāṣyasthaṃ prasthittapadaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam |nto 'pīndra upalakṣayitavya uttarāśca bhitrāvaruṇādyā indramitrāvaruṇapītasyetyevamutendramitrāvaruṇādāya eva kevalā iti | kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | kiṃ devatāntarasaṃcāreṇa pūrvadevatāsaṃbandho 'panīta uta neti | yadyapanītastataḥ kevalamitrāvaruṇādyupalakṣaṇam | athānapanītastata indro 'pyupalakṣaṇīya iti | kiṃ prāptam | siddhāntenaiva tāvadupakramaḥ ‘sarveṣāmupalakṣaṇam dviśeṣatvāt’ iti || 30 ||

āśrāvaṇapratyāśrāvaṇādibhiḥ pradānakāle devatāntarasaṃvādādasya dravyasyāpanītā pūrva
devatā | na ca prakṛtāvapanītadevatāsaṃbandhopalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam | tasmādihāpi na kartavyamiti || 31 ||
athavā nāpanītamindrasya devatātvam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: devatāṃ yāṃ yaduddiśya dravyaṃ svatvena gṛhyate |

div.p:
