śāstralakṣaṇo hi devatāsaṃbandhaḥ śāstreṇaiva grahaṇavelāyāṃ devatārthatvaṃ prakramyate | yacca prakramyate tadeva samāpyate nānyat | iha ca vacanātsaśeṣeṣu camaseṣvanyaduttaradevatārthaṃ dravyaṃ grahītavyamiti gamyate | tatra camasopalakṣaṇatvenopapannaḥ śeṣaḥ | yadā ca grahaṇavelāyāmasya devātārthatvaṃ nāvadhṛtaṃ tadā pradānavelāyāṃ yathāgṛhītahomātsaṃnihito 'pyasāvasaṃkalpitatvānna devatārtho bhavati | na vā 'sya tadānīṃ saṃkalpāntaramasti | vacanābhāvāt | na cetarasaṃkalpena prasaṅgātsaṃspṛśyate | vibhaktavelāyāṃ saṃkalpitvāt | na ca pradānakāle punaḥ saṃkalpāntaramasti | sakṛtsaṃkalpitasya punaḥ saṃkalpayitumaśakyatvāt | na hyekameva dravyamasakṛttyajyate | tasmānna pradānakāle saṃkalpo 'stīti | yadyapi tāvaddevatā pratyakṣaṃ bhuñjīta tathā 'pi haṃsa ivodakātkṣīraṃ paścāttanameva sā somaṃ vivicya bhuñjīta, kimuta yadoddeśamātropakāriṇī devatā punarabhyunnītasyaivoddiśyate na pūrvaśeṣasya | tena punarabhyunnīte dīyamāne pūrvaśeṣaḥ kevalamutsṛjyate na tu dīyate | yastu bhakṣaṇavelāyāṃ
tadekadeśaḥ kaścitso 'napanītendrasaṃbandhitvāttathaivopalakṣayitavya iti || 32 ||

pūrvāpavādārthamārambhaḥ | dvidevatyānāmaindravāyavādīnāṃ śeṣā ādityasthālyāṃ nikṣipyante | tato 'pi punarāgrayaṇasthālyāmāgacchanti | tataśca pātnīvatagrahaṇaṃ śrūyate ‘upāṃśupātreṇa pātnīvatamāgrayaṇātgṛhṇāti’ iti | tasya hutaśeṣe bhakṣyamāṇe pūrvavadevendravāyupatnīvatpītasyaivamādyu
vāyvindravāyumitrāvaruṇāśvipatnīvatpītasyetyevamūhaprakāra ādiśabdena sūcitaḥ |palakṣaṇaṃ kartavyamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ || 33 ||
naitatpūrveṇa sadṛśam | kutaḥ |
āgrayaṇaprāpteṣu hi dvidevatyeṣu patnīvatsaṃkalpaścodyate | tatra yadyapi tāvalparakīya evaṃ saṃkalpastathā 'pi prasaṅgasiddhiramivāryā kimuta yadā so 'pi saṃkalpanīyaḥ śruta eva | tathā hi |

yadā hyāgrayaṇaṃ pātnīvataṃ karotīti śrūyeta tataḥ saṃnihito 'pyanāgrayaṇatvācchāstravalena śeṣaḥ kathaṃcitsaṃkalpādapanīyeta | atra punaḥ ‘āgrayaṇādgṛhṇāti’ iti śrūyate | nā ' 'grayaṇasyā ' 'grayaṇamiti vā | tadyathā vṛkṣātparṇaṃ patatītyukte kaṅkakurarādipatramapi pratīyate | vṛkṣasyāpādānamātropakṣīṇatvāt | evamihāpyāgrayaṇādapetatvaṃ patnīvatsaṃbandhakāraṇaṃ nā ' 'grayaṇatvam | samānadeśayośca saṃpā
saṃpātaḥ—dvidevatyaśeṣaḥ |tāgrayaṇayorya evāpauti sa evā ' 'grayaṇādapeta iti śakyate vaktum | tāvacceha nimittam | yattu tanmiśrādanāgrayaṇādapyapaiti na tatpratiṣedhe vidhau vopayujyate | na hyanāgrayaṇādapeto na pātnīvata iti vacanamasti | yadi vā 'yamarthaḥ syāttato yo 'pyāgrayaṇastato 'paiti so 'pyāgrayaṇānāgrayaṇāpetatvādapātnīvataḥ prāpnoti | tasmādāgrayaṇādevetyasyāśakyatvādapramāṇakatvāccāvaśyamevamāśrayitavyam | āgrayaṇāttāvadapeta iti | tacca saṃpātasyāpyaviśiṣṭamityupapannaṃ devatāsaṃbandhitvam | na ca pūrvadevatārthatvamanapanīyottarasaṃbandho 'vakalpata ityupapannaṃ pūrṇakabhojanavadanupalakṣaṇam | nanu yo 'sau pūrvadevatārthastasyaivāyamavayava iti—bhūtapūrvagatyabhiprāyam | ācāryastu svayamevainamabhyupagamayāmīti manvānaḥ parihasati tāvat | na hi hutasyāvayavo dṛśyata iti | na hi hutādanyattasyā devatāyā vidyate tasyāpanītatvādityabhiprāyaḥ | parastvavyutpannābhiprāya āha—nanu prakṛtāvapīti | saṃkalpavelāyāṃ tatra devatāvyapadeśa ityuttaram | itara āha—atrāpyevamevā ' 'sīditi | siddhāntavādī vadati | etadeva prakṛtivilakṣaṇamiti | na cāpanītasya tatropalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam | iha tu
sphuṭamapanītatvamuktam | tasmātpatnīvānevopalakṣaṇīya iti siddham || 34 ||
tasminneva pātnīvate patnīvatā saha pātṛtvanirdeśānmāntravarṇikaṃ tvaṣṭurdevatātvamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ || 35 ||
naivopalakṣayitavyastvaṣṭā | kutaḥ |

vidhau hi kevalaḥ patnīvāndevatā nānyasahitaḥ | taddhitenāsau codyate | na ca taddhito 'nyasāpekṣādutpadyate | tenāpi māntravarṇikī durbalā | na ca mantravarṇasya taddevatātvakalpanayā vinā karmānaṅgatvam | patnīvadabhidhānena tatsiddheḥ | na ca tvaṣṭurabhidhānamanyathā nopapadyate | stutyarthamātratvenopapadyamānatvāt | ata eva ca mantrārtho bhavati
yastvaṃ tvaṣṭrā sahitaḥ sa somaṃ pibeti | itarathā pātṛtvenaiva tāvatkīdṛśaṃ devatābhidhānaṃ, devatāyā uddeśamātropakāritvāt | kiṃ punaryadā tatrāpi sāhityamātraśravaṇātkevalamutprekṣā | na cāsāvaikāntikī | vinā 'ṣi kāryayogitvena sahaśabdaprayogāt | tadyathā | sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī | tatra hyetāvānevārtho vijñāyate satsvapi daśasu putreṣu saiva vahatīti | tasmānna tvaṣṭurdevatātvamavagamyate | ato nopalakṣayitavyaḥ || 36 ||

adhikaraṇātideśo 'yam | etāvatā tu viśeṣeṇātulyatvāśaṅkā | yena ya evāsāvagnirdevatābhūtaḥ sa evātra trayastriṃśaddeveṣu bhoktṛṣu pariveṣṭṛtvena viniyujyata | tena mantravarṇātteṣāmeva prādhānyena devatātvaṃ vijñāyate | guṇabhūto 'gniḥ | pūrvatra ca sahatvamātrābhidhānādatulyatvena tvaṣṭā nirākṛtaḥ | tadiha viparītamatulyatvam | patnīva
patnīvattvasya devatāguṇamātratayā davatātvapratipādanamātrārthā taddhitayuktā codanā ‘pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇāti’ itītyarthaḥ |ttvaguṇamātradevatātvapratipādanamātrārthā ca taddhitacodanā | sā yathā ‘agnā i patnīvāḥ’ iti mantravarṇātprāpnuvatā 'gninā guṇinā na virudhyate | evaṃ trayastriṃśatā 'pi devaiḥ | aviśiṣṭo
hi teṣāmapi mantravarṇaḥ ‘patnīvatastriṃśataṃ trīṃśca devān’ iti | na ca codanayā devatāntaraṃ pratiṣiddham | yena mantravarṇagamyaṃ neṣyate | na ca mātravarṇikyāṃ coditāparityāgena gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ kaścidvirodhaḥ | na ca pramāṇāntaragamyāyāṃ taddhitasya sāpekṣatvam | yadi sa eva triṃśadapekṣaṃ patnīvantaṃ vidadhyāttataḥ sāpekṣadoṣaṃ pratipadyeta | mantrasya tu sāpekṣamapi vadato naiva kaścidvirodhaḥ | samuccayāśrayaṇāccāvirodhitvam | kathaṃ tulyārthayoḥ samuccaya iti cet | na syātsamuccayaḥ | yadi mantreṇobhayaparāmarśo na kriyate | sa tu codanāvagatamagnimaparityajanneva pariveṣṭṛtvena na siddhaṃ devatātvamabhidadhattrayastriṃśato devatātvamāha | tasmātsamuccaye sati sarveṣāmupalakṣaṇam | tanmantravyākhyānena darśayati—yājyāmabhidadhadevaṃ hyagneragnīdadhyeṣaṇaṃ karoti | sanmānapūrvako niyogo 'dhyeṣaṇam | tadevaṃ kriyate āyāhīti | chandasi ‘vya( pā. sū. 1-4-82 )vahitāśca’ iti vyavahitasyā ' 'ṅaḥ prayoga aibhiriti | upari vakṣyamāṇatrayastriṃśatā devaiḥ sahaikarathārụ̄dho 'śvavibhavādvā nānārathārūḍhaḥ | tataścārvāgāgatya tāṃśca patnībatastriṃśataṃ devān, ‘anuṣvadhaṃ-svadhāṃ-annaṃ somākhya
anu—upalakṣaṇīkṛtya |manu, āvaha | tataśca mādaya—saṃtarpayetyarthaḥ | tena sphuṭameṣāṃ bhoktṛtvamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ | trayastriṃśato nopalakṣaṇīyā iti | kutaḥ |

pātnīvatacodanārthasmaraṇahetunā mantreṇa na śakyamacoditamagneḥ pariveṣṭṛtvamitareṣāṃ ca moktṛtvaṃ prakāśayitum | ato mantrasya parārthatvānna codanāmatikramya svātantryeṇa trayastriṃśatprakāśanasāmarthyamavakalpate | vidhānasāmarthyaṃ tu dūrabhraṣṭameva | na ca triṃśato devatā
tvameva smārayati coditāgnyaiśvaryaprakāśanaparatvena trayastriṃśatprakīrtanāt | katham |

lg.l:
a
aprasiddhetikārikāyā ayamarthaḥ—yasyānyato 'prasiddheśvaratvasyāgnerdātṛtvaṃ kīrtyate tasyaiśvaryārthaṃ taddātṛtvaṃ kīrtitaṃ pratīyate | na hi tasye dātṛtvakīrtanasya mukhyo dātṛtvarūpo 'rthaḥ saṃbhāvanārha iti navarṇamadhyāhṛtya jñeyaḥ |prasiddheśvaratvasya dātṛtvaṃ yasya kīrtyate |

div.p:
yadi hyaprattāvasthameva dravyaṃ tvaṃ dehīti mukhyamevocyate, tataḥ pratāraṇameva syāt | atha tu tvamevātra dātā svāmī na vayaṃ svāmina ityetatparaṃ bhavati | yathā loke kaściducyata kiṃ tvayi bhavati nimantrite tvayaivānye nimantraṇīyā iti | tato vākyaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ bhavati | coditakaraṇācca dṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavati | mādāyasvetyapi mukhyasya ma
madasyāsaṃbhavāditi—śabdarūpatvāddevatāyā vigrahādipañcakābhāvāditi śeṣaḥ |dasyāsaṃbhavādetebhya ityetallakṣayati | dātṛtvamapyagrerdṛṣṭārthameveti saṃpradānalakṣaṇārthaṃ vijñāyate | vispaṣṭaṃ ca taddhitena yadanyanirapekṣamavagataṃ tanmantrānurodhena bādhitaṃ na syāt | kathaṃ punaḥ pātnīvatamiti codite 'gnirdevatā 'vagamyate na punastrayastriṃśaddevatā syāt | ata āha—patnīvāṃścā
gniriha gṛhyate, na trayastriṃśat, agne patnīvanniti sāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt | nanu triṃśatā 'pi saha sāmānādhikaraṇyamasti ‘patnīvatastriṃśatam’ iti | satyamasti | tathā 'pyatrāgniḥ patnīvāngṛhyate | taddhitanirdeśena hi prātipadikārthasya saṃkhyāviśeṣābhivyaktirbhavati | tatra prā
prātipadikārthānanyatheti | ayamāśayaḥ—niḥsaṃkhyapratipadikārthāyogātsaṃkhyāyāṃ kalpyamānāyāṃ niyatakramatvātsaṃkhyānāmekādikrameṇa kalpyatvādekatvakalpanenānupapattau parihṛtāyāṃ dvitvādikalpane pramāṇābhāva iti |tipadikārthānanyathāsaṃbhavādekavacanāntena vigraho bhavati | patnīvāndevatā 'syeti | triṃśacca nityaṃ bahuvacanāntaḥ | tasmānna tebhyastaddhita iti devatāttvābhāva iti || 37 ||
anuvaṣaṭkāradevatāyāścodanayā mantravarṇena ca devatātvamaikāntikam | tasmādupalakṣaṇīyā iti | evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate |
na hyeṣā prakṛtāvupalakṣitā | na ceha prākṛtakāryāpannā | tasmānnopalakṣayitavyeti || 38 ||

sthi
indrapītādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣaprayojanasyānaindrasobhakṣaṇānāmamantrakaṃtvasya ‘yathādevataṃ caṃ’ iti sūtreṇa kṛtamākṣepamapekṣyetyarthaḥ |tāduttaram | na yathādevatamūhaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | anaindrāṇāmamantrakameveti | kutaḥ |

yadi hyabhyāsāḥ pṛthakkarmāṇi bhaveyustataḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ syāt | na tvevamasti | na caiṣāṃ somo dharmā vā kenacidvihitāḥ | yena tu prakāreṇaiko gṛhṇāti tena sarve | yathā vakṣyati ‘tadvatsa( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 9 sū. 30)vanāntare grahāmnānam’ iti | na ca mantravaśenaindraviṣayatā somasya | pratyakṣatā śrutyā sarvaviṣayatvabodhāt | na ca yathā 'nārabhyavādenā 'havanīyaḥ sarvahomārtha iti tadrahitakarmāntarābhāvādāhitāgneradhikāraḥ, evamiha mantraḥ sarvasomārthaḥ | prakaraṇapaṭhitaḥ sāmarthyādindrārthaṃ prakāśayiṣyati | anyastu tenāprakāśita eva grahīṣyate māsyate vā | athavā vivekābhāvātsarvasminneva gṛhyamāṇe saṃkalpamātreṇa vyavasthāsyate | athavā subrahyaṇyāvanmukhyatayendraprakāśanārtho bhavati | tatprabhṛtaye devatāsamudāyāyetyarthaḥ | athavā vidhiśabde vasumattvasyābhāvāttadguṇaprakāśanaṃ vyarthamiti vasumattvenetaradevatāsahitāyetyetadabhidhīyate | tasmātsarvatra samānavidhānaḥ somaḥ | tataśca vikāratvābhāvaḥ | yattvanu
‘yalliṅgamuktam, iti bhāṣyamasaṃbandhipadavyavāyāttata utkṛṣyādhunā vyākaroti-yattvityādinā | jagatīcchandasa iti padasthāne 'nuṣṭucchandasa iti padaprakṣepa kārya ityarthaḥ |ṣṭupchandaso vināma—vidhānādvikṛtitvamiti
tatsamānavidhānatve 'pi tṛtīyasavanatvājjagacchandastve prāpte viśiṣṭavidhānatvenopapatsyate | athavā saṃsthānāṃ vikāratvādupapanna evātroha ityadarśanameva | tasmādaindreṣveba bhakṣaṇamantro mānagrahaṇavacca na tadvaśena bhakṣaniyama ityanyeṣāmamantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam || 39 ||
atha yatrānyasahita indro devatā tatra kimindrapītavyapadeśo 'sti neti saṃdehe 'stīti brūmaḥ | kutaḥ |

āgneye hi yajamānasaṃkalpo viśeṣaṇatvena saṃkīrtyate | sa ca taddhitenānyanirapekṣāgniviṣaya upātta iti sāpekṣaṃ na pratipādayati | atra punarindrapīta iti saṃpradānavyāpāro viśeṣaṇam | sa cobhayorapi saṃkalpyamānayoḥ pratyekaṃ kenacidaṃśena vidyate | yasya ca yāvānvyāpāraḥ sa tena pātetyupalakṣyate | tenaindrā
‘yasya hyavayavāntaram’ iti bhāṣyaṃ pūrvabhāṣyeṇāsaṃbaddhatvādutkṛṣya byākhyeyatāṃ matvā kathamubhābhyāṃ peye, ekasya pātṛtetiśaṅkānirāsārthatayā ‘tasyendrāgnibhyām’ iti bhāṣyaṃ tāvadādau vyācaṣṭe—tenaidrāgnasyetyādinā |gnasyendrāgnibhyāṃ pibadbhyāmardhamindrapītamarddhamagnipītamiti śakyaṃ vaditum | na ca
hutaviṣayatvātpītatvavyapadeśasya kevalendradevatye 'pi hutaśeṣasya nendrapītatvamiti śaṅkānirasārthaṃ ‘yasya hīti’ pūrvamupekṣitaṃ bhāṣyamadhunā vyācaṣṭe-na ca vartamānasyetyādinā | vartamānasya sākṣādindrapītatvamiti hutāvayavadvāreṇa vyapadeśaḥ | na ca tasyeyattāniyamo 'sti, etāvatā pītena vyapadeṣṭavya iti | tasmādviśeṣaṇopapattermantravadbhakṣaṇamiti || 40 ||

satyaṃ yadi devatāvyāpāraḥ pātṛtvamiha viśeṣaṇaṃ syāttata aindrāgno 'pi gṛhyeta | na tvasmākaṃ devatā pibati | kiṃ tarhi | saṃkalpaviṣayatvenaivopayujyate | na ca miśrasaṃkalpe 'nyataravyapadeśaḥ saṃbhavati | taddhitavatsamāsasya sāpekṣeṣvapravṛtteḥ | tasmādāgneyacaturdhākaraṇavadeva kevalendradevatyaviṣayatvānnaiva vyapadeśa ubhayadevatyaḥ saṃbhavatīti mantranivṛttiḥ | anenaiva ca viśeṣeṇāsyāpunaruktatvam | yatpūrvapakṣavādī na devatātvamiha viśeṣaṇaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, saṃpradānagataṃ pātṛtvaṃ, tacca pratyekamapyastīti manyate | siddhāntavādī tu mukhyapātṛtvāsaṃbhavāddevatātvamevānena lakṣyata ityāpādayati | yadyapi ca mukhyaṃ pātṛtvaṃ devatāyāṃ bhavettathā 'pi dravyasya tatpītatvamaśakyaṃ vaktum | katham |

lg.l: yo hi tāvaddhutaḥ somaḥ sa naivamabhidhīyate |

div.p: camasastho hīndrapītatvena vyapadiśyate | na cāsāvindrapītaḥ hutaviṣayatvādindrapītavyapadeśasya | tasmādavaśyavidyamānadharmābhidhānādindrāya saṃkalpita indrapītaḥ pratyetavyaḥ | tataścā ' 'pannaṃ devatātvamevopalakṣaṇamiti | na ca hutasomagataṃ pītatvaṃ tatropacarituṃ śakyam | ātmadharmeṇaiva saṃkalpenābhidhānopapatteḥ | ekadeśe 'pi hi hūyamāne sarvamidaṃ dravyaṃ devatoddeśena tyajyamānaṃ yāgaṃ sādhayati | ato 'sau nirvapateriva yajirevātra pibaterarthaḥ | tenaindrayāgasādhanādindrapītapratyayasāmarthyānmantranivṛttiḥ || 41 ||

idamapavādādhikaraṇam | tatra pūrvavadeva tāvatsāpekṣamāyatracchandaḥsādhanake samāsābhāvādgāyatracchandastvānupapatteryatra kevalā gāyatryupayuktā sa eva mantreṇābhidhātavyo nānya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate || 42 ||

lg.l: sāpekṣasyāgrahastatra na tu yatrāpi nāsti tat ||

div.p:
u
gṛhyata iti—idrapītaśabdaḥ savanaparatayeti śeṣaḥ |ktaṃ hyetaccaturdhākaraṇe 'pi | yadi kevalāgnidevatyaḥ prakaraṇe na syāttataḥ sāpekṣadevatyo 'pi gṛhyeteti | tadiha kevalendradevatyasadbhāvādindrapītatvaṃ sāpekṣendradevatyānnivṛttaṃ na tu kevalagāyatracchandastvaṃ kasyacidasti | trayāṇāmapi vedānāṃ kvacitsādhanāṃśa chandontarāṇāmavaśyaṃbhāvitvāt | ato rathaṃtarasāmatvamiva nānāchandaskāsveva gāyatracchandastvam | ata eva nityasāpekṣeṣu naitadbhaviṣyati sāpekṣamasamarthamiti | tasmānnānāchandaske 'pi mantra iti siddham || 43 ||
sthitāduttaram | anindrapīteṣvapyavikṛta eva mantraḥ prayoktavyo nāmantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: tasya yo 'nyo 'pi saṃbandhī sa evaṃ vyapadiśyate ||

div.p:
naivamabhisaṃbandhaḥ indrapītasya somasyeti | kiṃ tarhi | indrapītasya prātaḥsavanasya yaḥ saṃbandhīti | na ca prātaḥsavanaśabdaḥ somasamānādhikaraṇaḥ, kratubhāgavacanatvāt | tadgatasomavācitve ca prātaḥsavanīyasyeti prasaṅgāt | ataḥ savanasyendrapītasyeti ca samānādhikaraṇe somasaṃbandhavyatirekajanite ṣaṣṭhyau | somasyeti tu vyadhikaraṇā somaviṣayā 'vayavavyatirekanimittā ṣaṣṭhī | tena padāntarasāmarthyātsaṃyogaprakaraṇāviśeṣācca prayoktavya eva eṣa mantraḥ | kasmādevaṃ gṛ
prāyaścittāmnānāditi—‘vi vā eṣa indriyeṇa vīryeṇarṣyate yaḥ somaṃ vamiti | tasmātsomendraṃ caruṃ nirvapetsomavāminaḥ’ ityādineti śeṣaḥ |hyata iti cet |
soma iti—indrapītaśabdenābhidhīyamāna ityarthaḥ | anena ca ‘bhaktyā hyapītaḥ’ iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam |some bhāktatvaprasaṅgāt | pūrvasaṃkalpito hi samudāya indrapīto mukhyastasya cāyamavayava upacārādevamabhidhīyate | na caitadyuktam | tasmātsarvasomānāmindrapītasavanasaṃbadhitvānmantravadbhakṣaṇamiti siddhamiti || 44 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ |

div.p:
evaṃ liṅgaviniyogamupavarṇya saṃprati vākyaviniyogaḥ prastūyate | tatrodāharaṇam | ‘uccairṛcā kriyate’ ityādi vākyam | ‘tadyadi ṛkta ulbaṇaṃ kriyate gārhapatyaṃ paretya bhūḥ svāheti juhuyāt’ ‘yadi yajuṣṭo yadi sāmataḥ’ ityādi ca | tatra kimṛgyajuḥsāmaśabdairuccaistvopāṃśutvadharmavidhau mahāvyāhṛtyagnitrayasaṃbaddhahomavidhau ca pūrvotta
pūrvottarapadeti—upakramopasaṃhārasthapadetyarthaḥ |rapadasaṃbandhanirapekṣābhidhānaśrutivaśena ‘teṣāmṛ( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 10 sū. 35 )gyatrārthavaśena pādavyavasthā’ ityevaṃlakṣaṇānāmṛgādijātānāṃ grahaṇamuta samastamantrabrāhmaṇātmakānāṃ vedānāmiti | kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | ekavākyopakramopasaṃhāraśrutyorvipratipatteḥ | upakrame hi vedāḥ śrūyante | upasaṃhāre tu ṛgādijātāni | tatra yadi vopakramasthavedapadamavayavabhūtajātalakṣaṇārtham | athavopasaṃhārasthamṛgādijātaṃ sabrāhyaṇakasamudāyalakṣaṇārthamiti samañjasāsamañjasayoḥ saṃdehaḥ | sa ca ‘aktāḥ śarkarāḥ’ itivadākṣepaparihārābhyāṃ samarthanīyaḥ | evaṃ tarhi tenaiva
tenaiveti—aktādhikaraṇenaivetyarthaḥ | gatatvānnaitadārabdhavyam | nāyamupālambhaḥ | saṃdigdheṣu hi vākyaśeṣasya tatra prāmāṇyamuktam | iha punarvidhyuddeśavartināmṛgādiśabdānāṃ niḥsaṃdigdhamantrabhedajātavacanatvādasaṃdigdha eva vidhyuddeśaḥ | tena vyavadhāraṇakalpanayā 'nyatarapakṣāvadhāraṇaṃ kāryamityārabhyate | kiṃ prāptam | tadīyapūrvapakṣanyāyenaiva vidhyuddeśaśrutibalīyastvājjātādhikāra iti | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: yathā ca dravyasāmānyaṃ kriyā vā na virudhyate |

div.p:
na kathaṃcidṛgādiśabdena brāhmaṇaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam | śaknoti tu vedaśabda ekadeśe 'pi vartituṃ, samudāyaśabdānāmekadeśeṣvapyupalabdheḥ, yathā grāma āyāta iti | tathā cādhyetārastatraiva sutarāṃ prayuñjate vedamadhīmahe vedo vartata iti | na ca brāhmaṇamadhīyānāstathā
vadanti | kiṃ
api cetyādi bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—kiṃ cetyādinā | ca |

ṛco hi tā eva kāścittriṣvapi vedeṣu paṭhyante | tathā yajūṃṣi | tatra yadi vedatvaṃ dharmasaṃbandhahetutastādṛśeṣu na jñāyate ko dharmaḥ kriyatāmityanyāyyo vā vikalpa āśrīyate | vedāntaravyapadeśasya tulyabalatvāt | jātipakṣe tu naiṣa doṣaḥ | na hyekasminvarṇasamūhe jātidvayaṃ samavetam | jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇaṃ caivamanugrahīṣyate | anyathā vedasya samasteṣṭipaśvekāhāhīnasatraviṣayatvādyāvadvedānusārī dharmaḥ prakaraṇamullaṅghya sārvatrikaḥ syāt | nanu jātādhikāre 'pi vedavajjātasya prakaraṇāntareṣvapi bhāvāttulyametat | atha prakṛtajātātikramakāraṇābhāvādiha vyavasthā, sā vedapakṣe 'pyaviśiṣṭā | yāvanprakaraṇe veda ityavadhāraṇāt | naitattulyam | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
mantra
mantrabrāhmaṇetyādiślokadvayasyāyamarthaḥ— ‘vidhirvidheyaṃ tarkaśca vedaḥ’ iti kātīyānāṃ vidhiśabdoktasya brāhmaṇasya vidheyaśabdoktānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ tarkapadoktasya ‘yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante’ ityādyupaniṣadbhāgasya ca vedatvasmṛtestatsamūhe kāṭhakādyākhye kratuviṣaye vedatvaṃ vyāsajya vatate | pādasamūhe ekavākyabhūtamṛgjātaṃ, padasamūhe yajurjātamavacchedarūpabhaktyavayavātmakaparvasamūhe sāmajātaṃ ca paryāpya vartata iti |brāhmaṇatarkāṇāṃ samūhe kāṭhakādike |

dvi
vicchinnayatnavyaṅgyaiśca nityaiḥ sarvagatairapi vyatiriktapadārambho varṇairnātropapadyate || anārabdhe ca gośabde gośabdatvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet | ityādinā ślokavārtikoktagośabdatvanyāyaṃ prakṛte 'tidiśatiddhivarṇe cetyādinā |varṇe ca pade jātirgośabdatvaṃ na kalpitam |

div.p: yathaiva hi vākyatvaṃ nāma jātirbhinnasthānakaraṇaprapannābhivyaṅgyakramavadvarṇātmakapadasamūhe 'ntyavarṇe vā vilakṣaṇāvayavapadārthasaṃbandhapratyayākāṅkṣāvyavadhānādbhramaṇatvādinyāyena kalpayituṃ ta( a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥdbhūtādhikaraṇe nādhyavasitam | tathaivarktvayajuṣṭvasāmatvāni kramavadvarṇasvarāśrayāṇi na śakyāni kalpayitum |
loke 'pi caiṣaiva jātijātaśabdārthaprasiddhirityevameva vyākhyeyam || 1 ||

kimidaṃ prāyadarśanāditi—nedamanyaiḥ prāyadarśanaistulyamiti paśyanpṛcchati | ‘prāya( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 4 sū. 12 )vacanācca’ ityatra hi pradhānaprāye yatrānyāni pradhānāni tatra vacanādityuktam | tathā ‘viśa( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 6 sū. 16 )ye prāyadarśanāt’ iti saṃskāraprāye yatrānye saṃskārā godohanādayastatrāsya darśanamiti | na tviha yatrānye vedāstatraiṣāmṛgādīnāṃ darśanamityapi śakyaṃ vaktum | na hyetadvyatiriktā vedāḥ santi, yeṣāṃ madhyapāte saṃkīrtyeran | ato neha prāyadarśanamastīti | tatrottaramāha—vedaprāye vedopakrame—vedabuddhijanitasaṃskāravyāpte
manasi, ime śabdāḥ śrūyante | taddarśayati—prajāpatirvā idamekaṃ āsīt | yattu
‘kuta etaditi’ bhāṣyamavatārayati—yattvityādinā | vidhyuddeśabalīyastvādarthavādapadastho vedaśabdo 'vayavaviṣayo bhaviṣyatīti | tatra brūmaḥ |

ye hi vidhyuddeśātparastādarthavādāḥ śrūyante teṣāmasti daurbalyam | ye purastācchrūyante te mukhyatvādbalīyāṃso bhavanti | sarvasyaiva hi śabdasya svārthātilaṅghane virodhaḥ kāraṇam | sa ca pratiyogini dṛṣṭe virodho vijñāyate | tadiha yadā ‘trayo vedā asṛjyanta | agnerṛgvedaḥ’ ityādi śrūyate na tadā jātavacanānāmṛgādīnāmuccāraṇamasti | yaddarśanena vedaśabdo 'vayavalakṣaṇārtho bhavet | atastena tāvacchrutivṛttenaiva vyāptā buddhiḥ | athedānīmṛgādiśabdāḥ svārthaparāḥ santo na saṃbadhyanta iti balāllakṣaṇāṃ pratipadyanta iti | tena satyapi vidhyuddeśaga
ṛgādiśabdānāmiti śeṣaḥ |tatve daurbalyaṃ ‘mukhyaṃ vā( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 8 sū. 25 ) pūrvacodanāllokavat’ ityevamitarabalīyastvāt | nanu ‘paurvāpa( a. 6 pā. 5 a. 19 sū. 54 )rye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat’ ityanenotpannamapyarthavādānmukhyavedajñānaṃ bādhitvā vidhyuddeśajñānameva gṛhyeta | naitadevam |

ye hi bhinnavākyagatāḥ parasparanirapekṣā virodhino 'rthāḥ śrūyante teṣāṃ pūrvasyottarānupamardenaiva labdhātmakatvāduttarasya pūrvopabhardena vinā ' 'tmalābhānupapatteḥ paurvāparyabalīyastvanyāyo bhavati | yatra tvekavākyatayā parasparāpekṣāṇāṃ śravaṇaṃ na tatraitadbhavati | tatra hyākāṅkṣāvaśenaikavākyatā bhavati | pūrvapratīte cottaramātmānuguṇamadhikaṃ vā 'kāṅkṣati | ataśca yadanadhikamananuguṇaṃ vā tadanapekṣitatvānnaiva tasminvākye 'sti | na cāvidyamānena
pūrvabādhaḥ śakyata iti pūrvabalīyastvaṃ bhavati | tadiha vidhyarthavādayoḥ samānaviṣayatvādyāvadevārthavāde vedāḥ saṃkīrttitāstāvadeva kimapyeṣāṃ vidhāsyata ityetadavadhṛtam | tataśca kimeṣāṃ vidheyamityetāvanmātramapekṣate | na tu kasya kiṃ vidhāsyata iti | tenottarasmādavayavādapekṣitamātraṃ gṛhyate | vidheyaṃ cāpekṣitaṃ na vidhiviṣaya ityuccaistvādimātraṃ saṃbadhyate na tvṛgādayaḥ | tataścāvivakṣitatvānnaivaiṣāṃ vidhyuddeśe 'stitvamiti nārthavādaṃ bādhante | arthavādastha eva tu vidhyuddeśaviṣayatvenāpi vedo 'vadhāryate | tasmādvedalakṣaṇārthatvamṛgādīnām | vedaśca vyāpakatvāda
ahetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ—vyāpyatvarūpahetulakṣaṇaśūnya ityarthaḥ |hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ sanna śaknotyevāvayavaṃ lakṣayitum | ṛgādayastu niyamyatvātsamudāyaṃ lakṣayanti | yathā cānyatrārthavādānāmanuvādatvāllakṣaṇāvṛttiradoṣastathā 'trārthavādāvagataviṣaye vidhāvṛgādiśabdānāmanuvādakatvāllakṣaṇāyāmapyadoṣaḥ | tenaiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ, yasmādevamete vedā jātāstasmādeṣāmuccaistvādi kartavyamiti vaktavye tamevārthasiddhamaṅgīkṛtya ṛgādaya uccāryante | anyathā hyasaṃbaddhameva syāt | vidhyarthavādayornānāviṣayatvāt | tasmādvedādhikāra iti || 2 ||

lakṣaṇā 'pi ca yā dṛṣṭapūrvā tasyāmeva śīghratarabuddhirbhavati | ṛgādayaśca vede dṛṣṭapūrvāḥ | taddarśayati—ṛgbhiḥ prātariti | triṣveva tāvatpādeṣu vedaśabdasāhacaryādṛkśabdasya vedaviṣayatvaṃ jñātam | caturthe tu vedairaśūnya ityavaśyamṛkśabdaḥ sabrāhmaṇake vede prayukta iti gṛhyate | yastvadhyetṛṇāṃ vedaśabdaprayogo mantreṣu dṛṣṭa iti | satyamasti | atrāpi lakṣaṇā tathā 'pi tu ‘śāstra( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 9 )sthā vā tannimittatvāt’ itītaraiva jyāyasī || 3 ||

ya
‘dharmopadeśācca’ iti sūtramasaṃbaddhapadavyavāyāpattyā svasthānādutkṛṣya ‘trayīvidyākhyā ca tadvidi’ iti sūtraṃ tāvadādau vyācaṣṭe—yadi cetyādinā |di ca laukikenāpi prayogeṇa kāryaṃ so 'pyasti veda ṛgādīnām | katham | ṛgyajuḥ sāmāni tāvattrayītyeva prasiddhāni | tataśca trayī vidyā 'syetyevaṃ trayīvidyaśabdavyutpattiḥ | sa ca vedatrayādhyāyini prayujyate na jātatrayavidi | chandogeṣu jātatrayajñeṣvapyaprayogāt | atastrayīvidyaśabde trayīśabdo vedeṣu prayukta iti tatsamānādhikaraṇānāmṛgādiśabdānāmapi tadviṣayatvaṃ vijñāyate | tasmādapi vedeṣu ṛgādiprasiddhiḥ|| 5 ||
anubhāṣaṇametat || 6 ||

na pāṭhamātreṇa, vedāntaravyapadeśo bhavati | yadyena vedena vidhīyate tattenaiva pramāṇena kriyata ityucyate | tataśca yasyaiva mantrasya yatra vidhānaṃ sa eva tena vyapadekṣyate | yadi
tūbhayatra vidhāsyate tatrobhayatra ‘bhūyastvenobhayaśruti’ ityādi nāsti tatrāgatyā vikalpo grahīṣyate || 7 ||
bādheteti vā pāṭhaḥ || 8 ||

jātadha
‘liṅgacca’ iti sūtrānantaraṃ paṭhitamapi ‘dharmopadeśācca na hi dravyeṇa saṃbandhaḥ’ iti sūtraṃ pūrvapakṣanirāsāthaṃtayā saṃprati vyākhyāsyati—jātadharmapakṣa ityādinā |rmapakṣe ‘ṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma gāyati’ ityṛksāmayoraviyogādṛgdharmeṇaiva sāmadharmasiddhervṛthā punarupadeśaḥ | na hi kaścitsāmādhārabhūtāmṛcaccairuccārayansāmānyanyathoccārayituṃ samarthaḥ | vedādhikāre tvanyadṛgvedena vidhīyate | anyacca sāmavedenetyarthavadupadeśadvayam | anṛkprajāpatihṛdayādyarthamitaratrāpi bhaviṣyatīti cet | na | tasya jyotiṣṭomāṅgatvāt | prakaraṇe hyayaṃ stotrasāmnāmupadeśaḥ | na ca teṣāmanṛkkāṇāṃ prayogaḥ | alpaviṣayatvācca mandaparihṛtamevā ' 'narthakyam | tasmādapi vedādhikāra iti siddham || 4 ||

idānīṃ yatra vedāntarīyasya pradhānasya vedāntarīyamaṅgaṃ bhavati tatrāṅgamya vedadharmaḥ katamaḥ kartavya iti saṃdehe prāptyātmakatvāddvyapadeśa
vyapadeśadharmāṇāmiti—vedavyapadeśanibandhanakoccaistvādidharmāṇāṃ pratyātmaniyatotpattividhiviṣayatvādityarthaḥ |dharmāṇāṃ yasya yatra samāmnānaṃ tadīyo
dharmaḥ syāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

avaśyaṃ kartavye 'nyataradharmātikrame guṇadharmo 'tikramitavyaḥ | tathā hi—pradhānamaviguṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati | tacca guṇasyāpi kāryam | so 'pi hi tadarthameva pravartate | yadi tvātmīyadharmānurodhena pradhānaṃ viguṇaṃ kuryāttato 'sya yadarthaiva pravṛttistadeva hīyeta | tatsvarūpe saguṇe jāte yadyapyaṅgaṃ viguṇameva tathā 'pi tatra guṇatvasyācikīrṣitatvānna kaścidvirodhaḥ | tasmādādhānasya yājurvedikatvāttadaṅgabhūtānāṃ sāmnāmupāṃśutvaṃ kartavyamiti | nanu yāvanmātramādhānasya yajurvedavihitaṃ tanmātrasyaivopāṃśutvamityavagamātraiva sāmagānasya prāpnoti | pradhānamātraṃ cāṅgāntarāṇi ca yājurvedikāni | tena teṣāṃ kevalamupāṃśutvamiti | naitadevam | vakṣyati hi—‘aṅgā( a. 11 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 8 )ni tu vidhānatvātpradhānenopadiśyeran’ iti | tathā ‘vidhestve
( a. 11 pā. 1 a. 2 sū. 16 )kaśrutitvādaparyāyavidhānāt’ iti | tasmātpradhānaprayogavacanaparigṛhītatvādanyatrāpyutpannānāmaṅgānāṃ yatraiva pradhānaṃ tatraiva vidhiḥ | ataśca sāṅgasyaiva pradhānasya yājurvedikatvādupāṃśutvenaiva bhavitavyamiti | evaṃ tarhi svayamevāṅgānāṃ yājurvedikatvādupāṃśutvaṃ na guṇapradhānadharmavirodhadvāram | yacca sāmagatamupāṃśutvaṃ tadaṅgavartitvāduccaistvena tulyam | naitattatra vartamānaṃ pradhānasyeti śakyaṃ vaditum | nāpi tadgate bādhite pradhānadharmabādhaḥ | na hi tadā pradhānamupāṃśu na kṛtaṃ syāt | atha kenacitprakāreṇāṅgadharmo 'pi pradhānasyābhidhīyate tata uccaistvamapi pradhānadharma eva syāditi punastulyabalatvam | ucyate |

yadi hi yajurveda evaiṣāmutpattiḥ syāttatsvarūpanimittamevopāṃśutvaṃ syāt | eteṣāṃ
tu sāmavedotpannānāṃ svarūpata uccaimtvaprasaṅge pradhānasaṃsparśanimittamupāṃśutvamiti pradhānadharmatā | nanu yajurvedena sāṅgaṃ kuryādityupabandhātsāṅgasyaivopāṃśutvamityavadhāraṇādastyevāṅgasvarūpasaṃsparśa iti | na | sāṅgakathanenaivāprādhānyanirdeśāt | upasarjanabhūtāṅgaṃ hi pradhānamevaṃ nirdiśyate | tena pradhānameva yājurvedikamupāṃśutvaṃ tu taddharma eva sannaṅgānyupasarpa nnevaṃ kathyate | na tvevameva codanā 'pyasti | tataḥ pradhānadharmo 'yamaṅgaṃ prāpto 'tikramyeta | pradhānena hi svadharmo 'ṅgeṣu vikṣiptaḥ | sa yatraiva bādhitastatraiva pradhānaṃ viguṇaṃ na tvevamuccaistvaṃ pradhānadharma ityavadhāryate | na hyaṅgadharmāḥ pradhānāni saṃkrāmanti | nanvevamapyaṅgadharmaḥ sākṣātprāpnoti | pradhānadharmaḥ punaḥ paradvāreṇa parokṣa iti viparītaṃ balābalaṃ prāpnoti | satyaṃ, sākṣātprāptāṅgadharmaḥ śīghrataramavagamyate | prayogavacanagrahaṇottarakālaṃ tu paścāttana eva pradhānadharmaḥ ‘pau( a. 6 pā. 5 a. 14 sū. 54)rvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat’ ityevaṃ bādhate | nanu yājurvedikajyotiṣṭomādyaṅgānāṃ stotraśastrādīnāmapyanenaiva nyāyenopāṃśutvaṃ pāpnoti | satyaṃ prāpnoti | vacānāttu sarvatra svarāntaralābhaḥ | katham | darśapūrṇamāsayostāvadvedadvayavihitaṣvaṅgeṣu nānāvedasvare prāpte guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyena yājurvedikapradhānadharma upāṃśutvaṃ prāpnoti | tato vācanikaḥ svaro bhavati ‘mandrayā ' 'jyabhāgāntaṃ’ ‘paraṃ madhyamayā’ ‘uttamayā 'nuyājādi’ iti | tathā vikṛtīnāmiṣṭipaśubandhādīnāmetasminneva prākṛte svaratraye prāpnuvati pratyakṣopadeśavaśena pradhānavedasvaraprasaktau ‘tadraha( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 24 sū. 51 )ṇādbā svadharmaḥ syāt’ ityanena nyāyena prayogavacanasya codakāpekṣitvena durbalātvāccodakaprāpitasvaragrahaṇameveṣṭama | evaṃ jyotiṣṭomāṅgānāmapi dīkṣaṇīyādīnāṃ prākṛte svare prāpte pratyakṣopadeśavaśena bādhyamāne codakabalīyastvena punarupasthite jyotiṣṭomasya yājurvedikatvātkḷptopakāraprākṛ
apekṣiyāvadaṅgāmnānena kṛtsnavidhānatvājjyotiṣṭomasya dharmākāṅkṣāvirahādinā 'ṣṭame darśapūrṇamāsavikāratvasya nirākaraṇādityabhipretyā ' 'ha—prākṛtadharmāgrahaṇācceti |tadharmāgrahaṇācca guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyenaiva tadgatopāṃśutvadharmaprasaṅge sati ‘yāvatyā vācā kāmayeta tāvatyā dīkṣaṇīyāyāmanubrūyāt’ ityete svarā guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyabādhenaiva sāṅgānāṃ prāptāḥ | tathā
tatheti—prāpte satītyadhyāhāryam | tata iti vā pāṭhāntaraṃ svīkāryam | jyotiṣṭomasya vācanikasavanavibhāgavihitamandramadhyamottamoccāraṇāvadhāraṇāttadaṅgānāmapi sarveṣāṃ prākṛtatulyamandramadhyamottamoccāraṇānyeva pradhānadvāreṇa prāptāni | tato ‘yatkiṃcitprācīnamagnīṣomīyāttenopāṃśu caranti’ ityupāṃśutve sāṅgānāṃ dīkṣaṇīyādīnāṃ prāpte pradhānamātravācidīkṣaṇīyādiśabdoddeśena vihitāḥ
pradhānamātreṣvete svaraviśeṣā bhavanti ‘yāvatyā vācā kāmayeta tāvatyā dīkṣaṇīyāyāmanubrūyāt’ ‘mandraṃ prāyaṇīyāyām’ ‘mandrataramātithyāyām’ ‘upāṃśupasatsu’ iti | tatropāṃśutvasya pūrveṇaiva sarvavyāpinopāṃśutvavidhinā prāpptatvāddīkṣaṇīyādisvarapraśaṃsārtho nityānuvāda eva | agnīṣomīye tu savanavibhāgasvareṇaiva ‘mandrayā ' 'jyabhāgāntam’ ityādiprākṛtasvarapratiprasavaḥ | savanavibhāgatulyaṃ vā sāṅgaṃ prayogaṃ tredhā vibhajya mandramadhyottamoccāraṇasaṃpādanaṃ kāryam | etenānūbandhyāvabhṛthodayanīyodavasānīyāsvapyuccāraṇaviśeṣā vyākhyātāḥ | sutyākālasavanīyādīnāmapyevaṃ svare prāpte prātaḥsavanādyantargatatvādyathāsavanameva svarā bhavanti | nanu savanaśabdānāṃ somayāgāvayavavacanatvāddīkṣaṇīyādyaṅgavattadīyasvarābhāvaprasaṅga iti cet | na | saptamīnirdeśena tatkālapra yujyamānatvamātrāśrayaṇāt |

lg.l: yadi ṣaṣṭhī bhavedatra savanebhyaḥ parā tataḥ |
ityukte naiṣa doṣo 'sti yataḥ ṣaṣṭhyā vinā 'pyayam |
yadi vā stotraśastrādi kṛtsnaṃ sutyāṅgameva naḥ |

div.p:
etena sarve jyotiṣṭomavikārā vyākhyātāḥ | kva punaridānī nānāvedasvarasyāvakāśo bhaviṣyati | ucyate | ‘tadgra( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 24 sū. 51)haṇādvā svadharmaḥ syādadhikārasāmarthyādavyaktaḥ śeṣeḥ’ itiva
itivatkalpanīya iti—yathaiva śyenādāvaiādgātrādisamākhyāprāptasya kartuḥ prākṛtāṅgavyatiriktāpūrvāṅgaviṣayatvaṃ kalpyate tadvadihāpi nānāvedasvarasyāpūrvāṅgaviṣayatvaṃ kalpyata ityāśayaḥ |tkalpanīyaḥ | yatprākṛtasvarāṅgayuktāyāṃ vikṛtau vedāntarīyamapūrvamaṅgaṃ codyata iti | nanu tatrāpi guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyena pradhānadharmabhāva eva | evaṃ tarhi yā vikṛtiryāsminvede bhavati tasyāḥ śeṣeṣvaṅgeṣu yathāprakṛti prāpteṣu yattasminneva vede 'ṅgantaramapūrvaṃ codyate sa viṣaya iti | so 'pi pradhānadvāreṇaiva labdhatvāt | tadeva tarhi pradhānaṃ viṣaya iti | na | tasyāpi prākṛtāvaruddhatvāt | na, tarhi pradhānadvāreṇāpūrvasyāṅgasya prāptiriti tadeva viṣaya iti | naivamapi yaḥ pradhānasya dharmastasyaiva tatrāpi bhāvāt | api ca tredhā vibhakteṣu yajñabhāgadharme ca svare sthite yadapūrvamapi tadbhāgapāti bhavati | tasya na yūpāvaṭastaraṇabarhimtulyatvamiti bhavitavyameva prākṛtena dharmeṇa | tasmādapi nāsti viṣayaḥ | prakaraṇāmnānaṃ cātyantamevānarthakaṃ syāt | atra samādhiḥ | ‘upāṃśu yajuṣā’ iti tāvatsarvadarvihomeṣvarthavat | ṛksāmavedayora
ṛksāmavedayārepīti—ṛksāmavedanimittakayoḥ svarayorityarthaḥ |pi kāmyanaimittikeṣvaṅgeṣvarthavattā | ‘mandraṃ prātaḥsavane’ ityādi hi nityatvādanityaiḥ kāmyanaimittikairasaṃbadhyamānaṃ nityāṅgaviṣayameva bhavati | tena yadṛgvedasāmavedābhyāṃ kiṃcitkāmyaṃ naimittikaṃ vā codyate tatsarvamuccaiḥ kartavyam | ta
evaṃ sāmavaṃdavihita pravargyāṅgamahāvīrabhedananimittakamaṅgamudāharati—tathetyādinā |thā ‘taṃ bhinnamabhimṛśedyadṛte cidamiśriṣa’ ityādi | evaṃ yājurvedikamapyupāṃśutvamudāhartavyam | tathā yāni sutyottarakālānyaṅgāni teṣu savanagrahaṇābhāvādyathāvedameva svara ityavabhṛthasāmādīnāmapyuccaistvasiddhiḥ | anyathā hi yatheṣṭaṃ prayogaḥ syāt | dīkṣaṇīyādiparisāmasu tu ‘prācīnamagnīṣomīyāt’ ityanenopāṃśutvam | pravargyasāmnāṃ punaḥ ‘uccaiḥ pravargyeṇa’ ityevamuccaistvam | ādhānasāmnāṃ tu yājurvedikapradhānavidhivihitatvādevopāṃśutvam | ‘ya evaṃ vidvānvāmadevyaṃ gāyati’ ityādīni yajurvedavākyānyeva | tasmādihānudāharaṇam | tatra
kecidāhuḥ—svarūpotpattimātrāpekṣayā tena kriyata iti na kārakahetvabhiprāyeṇopanyāsa iti | tattu na yuktam | evaṃ sati hyutpattiviniyogabalābalacintaiva kriyate na guṇamukhyavirodhacintā | tatra ca viniyogādhīnatvādanuṣṭhānasya tadbalīyastvamityeṣa nirṇayaḥ syāt | tasmātsāmavedaśākhāyāmapi kasyāṃcidastyeṣāṃ vidhirata udāharaṇamityapare | tadā tu yajurvedapunaḥśrutermandaṃ phalaṃ syāt | athāpi śākhāntaravidhivadāśrīyeta svaravikalpaśca pūrvapakṣe kriyeta yadyudāhriyeta | anudāharaṇāttu naitadupapadyate | tasmādutpattiviniyogayoreva guṇamukhyatvamityevamadhikaraṇamārabhyate | yatra vedāntarotpannaṃ vastu vedāntareṇa viniyujyate tatra kimutpattivedadharmaḥ kartavya uta viniyogavedadharma iti | utpattipūrvakatvādviniyogasyotpattivedadharma iti prāpte | viniyogavedadharma iti gṛhyate | kutaḥ | utpa
utpatteḥ—pāṭhākhyāyā utpatteḥ | tadarthatvāt—vidhānārthatvāt |ttestadarthatvādviniyujyamānasya ca svarāpekṣitvāttadānīmeva yaḥ svarovagamyate sa eva codito notpattisthaḥ | tatkāle vidhānābhāvāt | athavā naivātra vyatikramaśabdena bādho virodho vā 'bhidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi | vyabhicāro 'nyatrānyatra ca vṛttiḥ | tenaivaṃ cintyate | yatrotpattiviniyogau vyatikrāntau, anyatrotpattiranyatra viniyogastatra kataravedasaṃyogo bhavatviti | tathaivotpattisaṃyoge vikalpe vā prāpte viniyogavedasaṃyogaḥ prādhānyādityuttaram | athavaivaṃ cintā | yatrānyatra ca pradhānamanyatra cāṅgaṃ tatrāṅgasya kena vedena vyapadeśo 'stviti | tataśca tathaiva pradhānavedena vyapadeśa iti nirṇayaḥ | asmiṃstu pakṣe ‘tadgra( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 24 sū. 51 )haṇādvā svadharmā syāt’ ityetadbādhitvā pradhānasamākhyāta eka eva prakṛtau vikṛtau ca kartā prāpnoti | atha tu codakabalīyastvādaṅgavedasamākhyātavartṛgrahaṇaṃ, tataḥ svaro 'pi tathaivetyayuktaṃ pradhānasvaragrahaṇam | ata utpattiviniyogāpekṣayaivaiṣa vicāra ityeṣaiva vyākhyā śobhanā | tathaivā ' 'dhānodāharaṇaṃ samarthitaṃ bhavati | yadi tu guṇamukhyavyatikramo 'ṅgapradhānadharmavirodho vyākhyāyate tataḥ ‘aṅgagu( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 27)ṇavirodhe ca tādarthyāt’ ityanena sahāpaunaruktyaṃ saṃpradhāraṇīyam || 9 ||

idānīṃ yāni vedāntareṣu śrūyante pradhānāni tāni kena vyapadeṣṭavyānīti vicāryate | tatraiṣa nirṇayo yatrotpadyante na yatra guṇārthaṃ śrūyante | kiṃ prāptam | śākhāntaravatsarvatrotpadyante | tataśca dharmavikalpaḥ | atha
vedabhede śākhāntaravadadhyetṛbhedābhāvānnityaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣūtpatyānarthakyāpatterniyāmakābhāvena cānyataratrotpattyanirṇayādityabhipretya pakṣāntaramanudhāvāti—athavetyādinā |vobhayatra svarūpasya guṇānāṃ ca śravaṇātkadācitkiṃcidutpattyartham | evaṃ vikalpaprāptāvucyate |
sa tu jyotiṣṭomādeḥ katama iti |

yajurvedajyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīyādiketikartavyatā bahvī | tasmāttatrauvāsyotpattiḥ | ataścāsau yajurvedena kriyata ityucyate | tena pramīyamāṇatvāttena pramāṇena kriyata ityarthaḥ | athavā tenaiva vyāpāreṇānuṣṭhānamapi tenaiva kriyata iti vyapadiśyate | na tvetadbhūyastvavyākhyānaṃ yuktam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: tadalpaṃ bahu vā tasya pratītau na viśiṣyate ||
sa tādṛg bahuralpo vā vahni gamayati dhruvam ||

div.p: tathehetikartavyatā liṅgatvenopanyastā | sā yatrāpyalpā tatrāpi kartavyatayā vinā 'nupapadyamānā śaknotyeva gamayitum |

tatra yadi vedāntarasthapradhānānuvādenālpā vidhīyata iti | ucyate | śakyaṃ vaktuṃ bahvyapi tathaiva vidhāsyata iti | tatraitatsyāt | alpā sukhaṃ vedāntarasthasya vidhīyate | bahvī tu duḥkhamiti | naitadevam | bavhṛcāmapi vākyabahutvasya kṣamatvāt | tasmādakāraṇamityevaṃ varṇanīyam | iha dravyadevatākriyaṃ karmasvarūpatvenāvadhārya tacca yajurvede sakalamāmnāyate | vedāntare tu kriyāmātraṃ saṃkīrtya stotraśastrādīni paṭhyante | tataśca dravyadevatākāṅikṣatvamapanītamityaśakyaṃ svatantrakriyāvidhānam | tathā ca śākhāntarādhikaraṇe vyākhyātam | yajurvede tu samastasvarūpāmnānādvinā 'pi stotrādibhiḥ śakyate yāgo nirvartayitum | vacanasāmarthyādadṛṣṭārthānāṃ stotrādīnāṃ grahaṇam | ato 'yaṃ sūtrārtho yadubhayavedaśruti karma tadrūpabhūyastvena sāmastyena nirākāṅakṣīkaraṇasamarthena nirṇetavyamiti | ṛksā
tripvapi vedeṣu jyotiṣṭomāmnānātsūtra ubhayagrahaṇamapyayuktamityāśaṅkya tadabhiprāyamāhaṛksāmavedayośceti |mavedayośca tulyadharmatvāttadgatabhedopādānaṃ niṣphalamiti matvobhayaśrutītyuktam || 10 ||

evaṃ tāvacchrutiliṅgavākyāni pradhānajñeyasaṃkīrṇaviviktaviṣayāṇi pratyudāharaṇaṃ vyā
khyātāni | tatra vidhiviniyogābhidhānātmikāyāḥ śruterviniyogasāmarthyātmakasya ca liṅgasya kevalapadaprayogābhāvātpadāntarasaṃnidheravaśyaṃbhāvitvādvākyamantargataprāyameveti na sākṣādgrahaṇena sūtritam | athavā ‘vedo vā prāyadarśanāt’ ityupakramopasaṃhāravaśenaiva vedadharmatvāvadhāraṇādidameva vākyāviniyogasūtramiti na pūrvāntargatimātreṇa vākyasya viniyojakatvaṃ vyākhyeyam | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa ‘aruṇayā’ ityudāhṛtaṃ, śakyaṃ tatrāpyaindrīvaṃttṛtīyāśrutireva viniyojiketi vaktum | atha kriyāmātrasaṃbandhe śrutyā kṛte viśeṣasaṃbandho vākyenetyabhiprāyaḥ | sa aidryā
eendryāmapīti—‘aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate’ ityatrāpītyarthaḥ |mapi tulyaḥ | tatrāpi hyaindryetyupasthātavyamātrāpekṣaṇādgārhapatyamiti ca sādhanamātrāpekṣitvādviśeṣasaṃbandho vākyenaiva | tasmādubhayatrāpi tadantargatiḥ śakyā darśayitumityubhayoḥ śrutivākyayorubhayamudāharaṇam | idānīṃ balābalacintā pratyāsannetyuttarāṇyapi trīṇi pramāṇāni svarūpeṇa viniyogasāmarthyena ca darśayati | tatra prakaraṇaṃ viniyogājñānasaṃśayaviparyayāṇāmanyatamenopanyasyati sma | yāva
sūtrādhīnajñānasya puṃsaḥ sūtrakāraiḥ kathanātprāksaṃśayājñānaviparyayāḥ svābhāvikā ityupapādayati—yāvaccetyādinā |ccānyanna kathyate tāvadajñānaṃ bhavati | athavā sadapi prasaṅgābhāvānnā ' 'khyātaṃ syāditi saṃdeho 'thavā naivākṣaraśravaṇatatsāmarthyānusaraṇakāṅikṣatayogyārthapadāntarasaṃnidhānebhyo 'nyaḥ śabdaprakāro 'sti | tasmānna prakaraṇādīni pramāṇāntarāṇīti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargaṃ sādhayetkathamityetasyāmākāṅkṣāyāmavicchinnāyāmaśrutaprayojanāni karmāṇi paṭhyante ‘samidho yajati’ ‘tanūnapātaṃ yajati’ ityevamādīni | tataśca darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kutaścidanugrahasiddhyā bhavitavyam | prayājādīnāṃ ca kenacitsādhyena | na ca darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ siddhamupakāraṃ svapadasvavākyasvaprakaraṇaprakaraṇāntareṣu pratya
yadyapi bhāvagocarāṇāṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdārthāpattirūpāṇāmupakāraprāpakatvānirāsenaiva śabdasyāpi tannirāsaḥ saṃpadyate | tathā 'pi punarniṣedho laukikaśabdābhiprāyeṇeti jñeyam |kṣādipañcakena pratyakṣādipañcakāvagatena vā śabdenopalabhāmahe | tathā prayājādīnāmavaśyaṃ cobhayenāpi kutaścidbhavitavyam | yadi tu kenacitprakāreṇa nāvagamiṣyāmastato nāstītyavagamiṣyāmaḥ | asti ca pramāṇaṃ prakaraṇam | na hyatyantasaṃnikarṣa evaikaṃ saṃbandhakāraṇam | yathā yathā hi saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ na labhyate tathā tathā viprakṛṣṭe vedaśaktiḥ saṃcarati | tadihopakārakakalpanāpramāṇam | saṃnikṛṣṭamalabdhvā viprakṛṣṭamapyanujñātamityubhayākāṅkṣāvaśenaivaṃ vijñāyate yaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāvupakāramākāṅkṣataḥ sa nūnamebhiḥ prayājādibhiḥ kriyate | yacca prayājādayaḥ prayojanamapekṣante taddarśapūrṇamāsopakāra iti | na hyubhayorapyanyatsaṃnikṛṣṭataramasti | yaccānyatkalpyate | tasyānyena saha saṃbadhya nirākāṅkṣībhūtasya neha saṃbandhākāṅkṣā vidyate | tena na prayājādīnāṃ viśvajidādivatphalakalpanam | nāpi darśapūrṇamāsaphalānuṣaṅgaḥ | ubhayākāṅkṣālakṣaṇasaṃbandhābhāve hyanyatarākāṅkṣālakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate na saṃbhave | tasmānnaṣṭāśvadagdharathavadeva parasparaniyamaḥ siddhaḥ | asaṃyuktagrahaṇaṃ kimartham | śrutiliṅgavākyaiḥ saṃyuktānāṃ dvitvabahutvayuktapratipadvidhānapūṣādiśabda—taccheṣāṇāṃ prakaraṇaviniyoganivṛttyartham | prakaraṇavirodhinā vā 'saṃyuktamiti draṣṭavyam | avirodhisaṃyuktānāṃ ‘vrīhinprokṣati’ ‘barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi’ ‘aruṇayā krīṇāti’ ityevamādīnāṃ prakaraṇasthavrīhibarhiḥkriyaiḥ saṃbadhyamānānāṃ prakaraṇasamāveśopapatteḥ | tattu sāmarthyasiddhatvātsūtrakāreṇa noktam || 11 ||
pūrvavadeva kramasamākhyayorapyajñānādibhirupanyāsaḥ kartavyaḥ |

vinā 'pyanuṣṭhānadeśasāmyena yāvati pradeśe brāhmaṇe pradhānaṃ paṭhyate tāvatyeva mantreṣu mantraḥ | tayoścāṅgāṅgayapekṣāvelāyāṃ yathāṃsakhyanyāyena samānadeśatvādbuddhau saṃnidhānaṃ bhavati | prathamasya hi pradhānasya mantramanvicchannavaśyaṃ mantrasamāmnāyamādita ārabhyā ' 'locayati | tataśca prathama eva mantraḥ prathamaṃ hṛdayamāgacchati | na cāsyātikrame heturastīti sa eva gṛhyate | tathā mantrasya śeṣiṇamapekṣamāṇasyānayaiva prakriyayā ' 'dyena śeṣiṇā saha saṃbandho bhavati | tataśca tannirākāṅkṣatayā dvitīyādīnāmapyevameva dvitīyādibhireva yogena bhavitavyam | tatrā ' 'gneyādyanumantraṇānāmāgneyādiliṅgatvāttenāpi vyavasthā sidhyatītyavyaktaliṅgamupāṃśuyājakramādhītaṃ ‘dabdhirnāmāsi’ ityudāharati | nanu cāsya prakaraṇātsarvārthatvaṃ vijñāyate tacca balīya ityanyatrāpi viniyogaḥ prāpnoti | atra kecidāhuḥ | upāṃśuyājagrahaṇāddvayamapyanugṛhyate tasmāttadgrahaṇamiti | śakyaṃ tu vaktumananugrāhya eva kramaḥ prakaraṇapratyayaviruddhatvāditi | śeṣasya hi sarvārthatvaṃ pratipra
pratipradhānāvṛtteriti—pratipradhānaṃ guṇāvṛtternyāyalabhyatvātprakaraṇātsarvārdhatve nāśrutābhyāsakalpanā mantrāṇāmāpadyata ityāśayaḥ |dhānānāvṛtteḥ prakaraṇāvagataṃ na śakyaṃ bādhitum | tatraitāvaduttaraṃ bhavati | ye 'nye śeṣiṇa āgneyādayaste vispaṣṭaliṅgaiḥ kramaprakaraṇavadbhirmantrāntarairavaruddhatvānnainamapakṣente | na ca vikalpaḥ | aspaṣṭāliṅgatvena vaiṣamyāt | adṛṣṭārthānāṃ samuccaya iti cenna | prakṛtayāgapratyavekṣaṇena
dṛṣṭā
mantramuccārayanneva mantrārthatvena saṃsmaran | śeṣiṇaṃ tanmanā bhūtvā syādetadanumantraṇam | ityabhiyuktaprasiddhisiddhaṃ lakṣaṇamabhipretyā ' 'ha—dṛṣṭārthatvāditi | yanmantroccāraṇena śeṣimanā bhūtvā śeṣiṇaṃ mantrārthatvena saṃsmaransyāttadetadanumantraṇamiti ca kārikārthaḥ |rthatvāt | satyapi cādṛṣṭārthatve nirapekṣāṇāṃ gatyantare sati samuccayānāśrayaṇāt | āgneyādibhiḥ kṛtārthairupekṣitaḥ sannagatyā punasteṣveva bhavet | asti cāsya gatirupāṃśuyāja iti | kiṃ ca |

lg.l:
na vā vijñātaliṅgānāṃ prakriyā
prakriyeti—prakaraṇamityarthaḥ | viniyojikā |

div.p: ‘dabdhirnāmāsi’ ityaspaṣṭaliṅgo 'yam | na cedṛśaṃ santaṃ prakaraṇaṃ viniyoktuṃ kṣamam | ayaṃ tvasiśabdo yuṣmadarthaviṣayatvātsaṃnihitamabhimukhaṃ vā 'bhidhatte nānyam | upāṃśuyājaśca saṃnihito 'bhimukhaścetyabhidhānasāmarthyaṃ kramādupāṃśuyājaviṣayaṃ vijñāyate | tataśca liṅgena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyata evetyadoṣaḥ | kāmyayājyākāṇḍakramastu vyākhyāta eva | anuṣṭhānadeśakramo 'pi paśudharmāṇāmagnīṣomīyārthatvena bhaviṣyati || 12 ||

ādhvaryavādisamākhyānāṃ veda eva prayoga iti na laukikatvacodyaṃ kriyate | tatrādhva
ryurvṛttamātramevāpekṣate | kiṃ mayā kartavyamiti | tadapekṣamāṇasya ca yadi na kutaścidviśeṣo 'vagamyate tato yatkiṃciditi bhaviṣyati | tathā ' 'dhvaryavasaṃjñitaṃ karma, ko me kartā bhaviṣyatītyevameva śeṣamapekṣate | tatra śabdajñasyā ' 'dita evaiṣotprekṣā pratyekaṃ bhavati yadasyādhvaryoḥ karma tadādhvaryavaśabdavācyaṃ bhaviṣyati | tathā 'pyasyā ' 'dhvaryavasya yaḥ kartā tasyādhvaryurnāmeti prakṛtervā vikārastadanurūpo 'numīyate vikārādvā prakṛtiḥ | yadyapi śabdāntaraṃ vikāra ityubhāvapyetau parasparanirapekṣau nityasaṃbandhau ca tathā 'pi nityāyā eva śabdapravṛtternityaḥ saṃbandho nimittamiti sarva yaugikānāmevamanvākhyānam | na hi rājyaśabdasyāpyādimatī pravṛttirityu( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 2 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥktam | nimittanaimittikabhāvastvanāditve 'pi śabdārthayorivehāviruddhaḥ | tatra kecidvadanti | prāgetasmātsamākhyāviniyogādadhvaryvādhvaryavayorasaṃbandhādaśakyaṃ yaugikatvaṃ samākhyāyā vijñātum | atha tu prathamaṃ siddhe saṃbandhe paścātsamākhyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ | tato na samākhyā viniyojikā syāt | ataḥ parasparanirapekṣayoreva rụ̄dhyoḥ sārūpyādupatiṣṭhamānayoreṣa viniyoga iti | na tvetadyuktam | na hi rụ̄dhānāṃ sārūpyādupasthāpanasāmarthyaṃ dharmasaṃbandhe 'pyasti | yathā kaṇvarathaṃtare rathaṃtaradharmānnirā( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 23 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥkariṣyati kimutātra kriyākartṛsaṃbandhe | pācakādyudāharaṇaṃ vā yuktaṃ syāt | tasmādyaugikatvamevābhyupagantavyam | yattu prākprayogātpramāṇaṃ nāstīti | satyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāstīti | samākhyayaivānumīyamānaṃ bhaviṣyati | vede hi prathamameva kriyākartṛsaṃbandho niṣpannaḥ | tasminsati samākhyā pravṛttā | vayaṃ tu taṃ saṃbandhaṃ pramāṇāntareṇāpratipadyamānāḥ samākhyādarśanena pratipadyāmahe | tena jñāyate pūrvaṃ samākhyā paścātsaṃbandha iti | vastutastu prathamameva saṃbandhaḥ | sa cāpratīto 'pi sattāmātreṇaiva samākhyāṃ pravartitavān | yadi hyeṣā ' 'dimatī syāttataḥ prayoktuḥ prathamaṃ saṃbandhāvagatyā bhavitavyam | na ca sā tathā bhavatīti na paryanuyujyemahi | nityasaṃbandhāśrayaṇe tatra nityaprayuktayā samākhyayā nūnaṃ kaścidasti saṃbandha iti pratipādite 'nyathānupapattyā śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ paścādvijñāyate | tasmādyaugikyaiva samākhyayā viniyoga iti siddham || 13 ||
idānīṃ ṣaṇṇāmapi śrutyādīnāṃ balābalaṃ vicāryate | tacca bhinnaviṣayāṇāṃ na saṃbhavatīti samavāya ekārthopanipāto viṣayatvenodāhṛtaḥ | tatra kecidāhurvirodhagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti | kutaḥ |

eka eva hyaruṇādiḥ śeṣaḥ śrutyā sāmānyakriyāsaṃbandhī, vākyena tadviśeṣasya krayasya, prakaraṇena jyautiṣṭomikasya | satyapi vācanikaprakaraṇasamavāye parasparānugrahanimittatvādavirodha iti balābalavicāro na bhavati | nirviśeṣasāmānyānupapatteḥ | krayasvarūpamātraprayuktatve cānarthakatvādapekṣite hi śrutivākyābhyāṃ vākyaprakaraṇe | tasmātkartavyaṃ virodhagrahaṇāmiti | na vā kartavyam | kutaḥ |

aruṇādau tāvannaiva pramāṇasamavāyo 'sti | na hyekatra saṃbhavamātraṃ samavāyaḥ | kiṃ tarhi viṣayaikatvam | iha cāruṇasya kriyāsaṃbandhaḥ śrutyā | tasya tu śrutikalpitakriyākārakasaṃbandhasya bhūyo 'pyapekṣāvaśena krayaviṣayatvam | tāvatā ca prayojanānavāpterapekṣāntare satyapūrvasaṃbandhavataḥ krayasya jyotiṣṭomārthatvamiti viṣayanānātvam | ataśca sarveṣāṃ viniyojakatvamaviruddham | na cātra viprakṛṣṭagrahaṇe saṃnikṛṣṭasya bādho dṛśyate | na hi krayaṃ gṛhṇannaruṇāyāḥ kriyāsaṃbandhaṃ bādhate | nāpi jyotiṣṭome kurvan krayasaṃbandham | yatra tvekaḥ śeṣastāvāneva ca saṃbandhāntaravirodhinaikena pramāṇenānyaśeṣyartho vijñāyate | pareṇa tadabādhānupapattinā śeṣyantarārthaḥ | ekasaṃbandhe ca kṛtārtha- syā ' 'kāṅkṣābhāvātpunarviniyogāntarānupapattiḥ | tatra pramāṇayoḥ parasparāpahāryasamānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyaḥ | tathā yatra śeṣabhede 'pyekasminneva śeṣiṇi tulyopakāranibandhana ekena pramāṇenānyaḥ śeṣaḥ sādhanatvena pratīyate | anyenāparaḥ | na caikasādhitopakāraḥ śeṣī śeṣāntaramapekṣate | tatrāpyekaviṣayāpahāritvātsamavāyaḥ | sa ca virodha eva sati bhavatīti samavāyagrahaṇenaiva siddho virodhaḥ | yatra punaḥ spaṣṭa eva śeṣabhedo yathā ‘samidho yajati’ ityādiṣu | yatra vā tasyeva kiṃcidādhikyaṃ bhavati yathā 'ruṇāyāṃ vyākhyātam | tathā yatra śeṣibhedo yathā ' 'gneyādiṣvaṣṭākapālādīnām | yatra vā tadgatamādhikyaṃ yathā darśapūrṇamāsāṅgānāmevopakārabhedastatrāpi viṣayānyatvādasama
vāya iti | yacca śrutyā viniyujyate, yacca samākhyayā, tatsarvaṃ tulyam | yastu sarvāṅgajanya ekaḥ pradhānopakāraḥ, tatraiṣāmaparyāyavidhānādekameva pramāṇaṃ śeṣatvaṃ ceti vyāpārabhedādasamavāyaḥ | tathā yatra sa eva śeṣastasminneva śeṣiṇi saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena ca pramāṇena viniyujyate tatrāpyekasyaiva pramāṇatvenetarasya prayojanāntarārthatvādasamavāya iti | tasmādvirodhaviṣayameva samavāyagrahaṇam | tatra ṣaṇṇāmapyekatraiva balābale kathayitavye kramavartitvādvāco yugapadaśakterekaikasya saṃpradhāraṇā | yattu dvitīyopādānaṃ tatpratiyoginā vinā balābalakathanāśaktestenocyate—dvayordvayoriti | ekārthavartitvādvāca ityasyāparā vyākhyā yeyaṃ balābalavāgeṣā pratyekaṃ śrutyādiṣu samavaiti na samudāye | tā
tāni hi—ityasya granthasyāyamāśayaḥ | balābalaṃ prati śrutyādīnāṃ prādhānyātpratipradhānaṃ guṇāvṛttinyāyena balābaloktirāvartanīyeti |ni hi śeṣaviniyogenārthavanti na balābalam | atastasyāḥ pratipradhānavṛttitvādayaugapadyenaikaikasya saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ dvitīyopādānaṃ virodhabalābalabādhānāṃ pratiyoginyanupapattiṃ darśayitumasaṃbhavāt—dvayordvayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇetyuktam | tatraikaikasya pañcabhiḥ pañcamiḥ saha vicāre kartavye yadekaikena saha kriyate tadbādhitabādhyasya bādhakabādhakena bādhasya sujñānatvāt | yāni hi śrutibādhyairliṅgādibhirbādhyante tāni śrutyā bādhyantetarāmiti na tayā saha saṃpradhārayiṣyante | tatra prathamaṃ tāvatkramaprāptaṃ śrutilaṅgayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇamiti | kimihodāharaṇamiti—kevalapadaprayogābhāvātsarvatra vākyatve sati na śrutiliṅgayoḥ svasāmarthyātireko lakṣyata iti manyamānasya praśnaḥ | vakṣyamāṇavivekābhiprāyeṇā ' 'ha—aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti | kimi
‘atra cintyate’ itibhāṣye nyūnatāṃ parihariṣyanvakṣyamāṇabhāṣyālocanayā ca dvikoṭikasaṃśayaparatayā bhāsamānamapi cātuṣkoṭikasaṃśayopalakṣaṇatayā vyākaroti—kimindrasyaivetyādinā |ndrasyaivopasthānaṃ kartavyamutendrasya
gārhapatyasya vā 'thavā samuccitayorathavā gārhapatyasyaiveti | yadi liṅgaṃ balīyastata indropasthānam | atha tulyabalatvaṃ virodhaśca tato vikalpaḥ | atha tulyabalatve 'pyavirodhastataḥ samuccayaḥ | atha virodhaḥ śrutibalīyastvaṃ ca tato gārhapatyasyaivopasthānamiti | yattu siddhavadgārhapatyārthatvāṅgīkaraṇena ‘vacanāttvayathārthamaindrī syāt’ ityuktaṃ tadiha sthāpayiṣyamāṇaśrutibalīyastvābhiprāyeṇa | tenaiva sarvavākyatvābhiprāyeṇa śrutiliṅge 'rthe vākyatvabhrāntyā punaḥ pṛcchati—kā punaratra śrutiḥ kiṃ liṅgamiti | tatrottaraṃ gārhapatyaśabdaśravaṇaṃ mantrasāmarthyaṃ ceti | paraḥ punarāha—yadyevaṃvidhapadasamūhātmake śrutiliṅge hanta tarhi vākyaṃ nāma na kiṃcidapyasti | taducyatām, atha vākyaṃ nāma kimiti | siddhāntavādī tu tathaiva śakyavivekajñānatvaṃ manyamāna āha—saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati padāni vākyamiti | yadyapi ca na saṃhatānāṃ kaścideko 'bhidheyastathā 'pi gamyamānābhiprāyeṇoktam | athavaikalakṣyamāṇārthaprayuktatayā saṃghātatvamāpāditāni yadā svārthamabhidadhati tadā tadbhūtānyeva santi vākyatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti | yadyevaṃ tata ubhayorapyudāhṛtayormantrabrāhmaṇayorvākyalakṣaṇayogādvākyayoriyaṃ saṃpradhāraṇā na śrutiliṅgayo- riti | yadi vā 'vaśyaṃ śrutiliṅgayorvirodhaḥ samarthanīyastataḥ śrutiliṅgavākyāni lakṣaṇato vivektavyānīdaṃ nāma teṣāṃ parasparamantaramiti | tadabhidhīyate |
nanu sāmarthyapūrvakatvāduktividhiviniyogānām | ‘aindryā gārhapatyam’ ityatrāpi śabdasāmarthyamasti | ‘kadācana starīrasi’ ityatrāpi cendrābhidhānamityaviśeṣa eva śrutiliṅgayoḥ prāpnoti | tathā hi |
satyamubhayatrobhayamapyasti |

yā hi ‘aindryā gārhapatyam’ ityeṣā śaktistayaitānyeva padāni pratyarthaṃ loke viniyuktāni na mantra aindro gārhapatyāṅgam | anyatra gatayā śaktyā 'nyasyāviniyogāt | svasāmarthyapravṛttaustu brāhmaṇapadaiḥ śaktyā śaktyanapekṣamaṅgatvamabhidhīyate | na cātra sāmarthyaṃ prathamaṃ gṛhyate | nivṛttābhidhānānyathānupapattyaiva tasya gamyamānatvāt | tena jñāte viniyoge śaktiḥ kalpyata iti nāsau viniyogakāraṇam | yadyapi vastutaḥ prathamaṃ vidyate tathā 'pi pramāṇataḥ paścādgṛhyata iti kārakahetutve satyapi jñāpakatvenākāraṇamityucyate | yadi tu pauruṣeyamidaṃ bhavettathā sati vakturabhidhānaśaktijñānaṃ viniyogābhidhānātprathamataraṃ bhavet | na tvevamasti | vedasyāpauruṣeyatvāt | tasmātsarvapuruṣāṇāṃ pratipattṛtvātpaścāttanaṃ śaktijñānamityakṣaraśravaṇakṛta evāyaṃ gārhapatyāṅgatvapratyayaḥ | ‘kadācana starīrasi’ ityatra punaryadyapīndraśabdenendro 'bhidhīyate tathā 'pi viniyogo nābhidhīyata iti śruteravyāpāraḥ | na hyatra kasyacicchabdasya śravaṇādindrasya śeṣitvaṃ mantrasya śeṣatvaṃ pratīyate | yathetaratra dvitīyāśravaṇādgārhapatyasyepsitatamatvamaindryāśca tṛtīyāśrutyā karaṇatvam | kevalaṃ tu mantrasyābhidhānasāmarthyādviniyogayogyatā dṛśyate | na ca tāvatā viniyogo 'bhihito bhavati | na ca vihitaḥ | mantrasyāvidhāyakatvāt | brāhmaṇavākye tvavidhānaṃ vidhānaṃ cobhayamapi niṣpannam | nanu mantrasyāpyabhidhānapūrvakameva sāmarthyakalpanam | satyamevam | na tu tadviniyogasyābhidhānam | kiṃ tarhi | arthasvarūpamātrasya | anyaiva ca tena prathamaṃ tadabhidhānaśaktiḥ kalpyate | anyā ca tadbalena viniyogaśaktiḥ | katham |

lg.l:
viniyoge 'pyasau śa
asau śakto na hyaśakta itipadābhyāṃ karmotpannaniṣṭhāntābhyāṃ śakyāśakyāvabhidhīyete |kto na hyaśakto niyujyate ||

div.p: tataśca dvitīyasāmarthyādviniyogaḥ kalpayiṣyate | na prathamāt | prathamena hi viniyoganirapekṣamindrābhidhānamātraṃ kṛtam | ata ihedṛśo vivekaḥ pratipattavyaḥ |

avidyamānamevaindryā gārhapatyābhidhānasāmarthyamabhihitaviniyogavidhānātkalpanīyam | viniyogastu prathamameva kḷptaḥ | indraṃ prati tu sāmarthyaṃ kḷptamālocya viniyogo 'bhihito vihito vetyetatkalpanīyam | vākye punaḥ—

lg.l: arthaṃ prati na sāmarthyaṃ na ca śeṣatvamucyate |

div.p:
kathaṃbhāvadeśasāmānyayaugikarūpāṇāṃ tu prakaraṇakramasamākhyānāṃ vivekaḥ sujñāna eveti na pṛṣṭo na nirūpitaḥ | tadetatsarveṣveva vākyeṣu samavetaṃ viviktaṃ ca dṛśyata iti | na hi kiṃcidapi vākyaṃ śabdasāmarthyenārthābhidhānena padāntarasaṃnidhānena nā vinā vidyate | vivekaśca puroditaḥ | kvacitkasyacitpūrvatarapratīteḥ | tadṛrśayati—iha tāvatkadācana starīrasīti | na viniyogo 'bhidhīyate na padāntarasaṃnidhervā gamyate | kiṃ tarhi | etasyāmṛcīndraśabda indrābhidhānasamartho vidyate, śeṣāṇi ca padāni tenaikavākyatāṃ gatānīti samasto mantra indrābhidhānasamartho gamyate | so 'pi cendraḥ karmāṅgatvādabhidhānārha ityasatyapi vacane bhava
bhavatyabhidhīyatāmitisthāne bhajatyabhidhīyatāmiti pāṭho yuktaḥ |tyabhidhīyatāmityutprekṣā | gārhapatye punarvinaiva mantra
sāmarthyena viniyogaṃ brāhmaṇamabhidhatte iti balābalaṃ cintayitavyam | atra kecidāhuḥ | evaṃ tarhi liṅgavākye ityetasmātprāgayaṃ grantho yojayitavyaḥ | ‘athavā nātraikavākyatvādindraprādhānyam’ ityādiḥ | kutaḥ |

yatra vākyadvayametadityupanya
upaṃnyastamiti—‘yadyevabhidamapi vākyam’ ityādinā bhāṣyeṇetyarthaḥ |staṃ tatraivaitadyujyate vaktum ‘athavā nātraikavākyatvādindraprādhānyaṃ gārhapatyaprādhānyaṃ vopasthānasya’ iti yathā hyubhayatrāpyekavākyatvavyāpāranirākaraṇamavakalpate | anyathā tu mantrasya liṅgaviniyojyatve pūrvapakṣavādinaivābhyupa
abhyupagata iti—‘evaṃ tarhi liṅgavākye virudhyamāne’ itipūrvagranthenetyarthaḥ |gate punastadanapekṣamindropasthānamapyekavākyatvakṛtamevetyāśaṅkya
āśaṅkya nirākaraṇa miti—‘athavā nātraikavākyatvādindraprādhānyam’ ityādyuparitanagranthenetyarthaḥ | nirākaraṇamasaṃbaddhameva syāt | tasmātpramādādutkṛṣṭasya granthasyāpakṛṣya vyākhyānaṃ kartavyam | na tvavaśyametadādartavyam | bhavatyeva hi brahvīnāṃ paricodanānāṃ madhye paricodanāparihārakāle 'pi pūrvaparicodanāparihāraḥ | api ca | yadā ‘athavā nātraikavākyatvāt’ ityetatprathamamuktaṃ tadā 'pi punaḥ | ‘evaṃ tarhi liṅgavākye’ ityatra vākyagrahaṇamasaṃbaddhameva syāt | tato yathānyāsamavasthite 'bhyupetyavādamātreṇa pūrvapakṣavādinaikatra liṅgatvamuktamato 'sya vākyatvānuśayaśeṣamapanayāmītyevamāha—‘atha vā nātraikavākyatvāt’ iti | yadvā brāhmaṇagatamevaikavākyatvamakāraṇaṃ vivakṣanprasaṅgānmantre 'pyuktavāniti vyākhyeyam | tatra vākyaṃ hyetadaindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata ityasyābhiprāyaḥ—yadaindryāstṛtīyāśrutyā śeṣatvamātramanavagataśeṣiviśeṣaṃ pratīyate | yattu gārhapatyamiti dvitīyayā kimapi prati śeṣitvamātraṃ na tasya liṅgena saha kaścidvirodhaḥ | padāntarasaṃbandhe hyasati yathārthamevaindryāḥ karaṇatvaṃ syāt | gārhapatyasya vā yāṃ kāṃcidāgneyīṃ prati śeṣitvaṃ bhavet | parasparasaṃnidhānaṃ tūbhayorindropasthānaṃ bādhate tacca vākyamiti | naitadevamiti-gārhapatyābhidhānaśrutiṃ tāvadupanyasyati | parasparasaṃnidhānamapi
hi śrutiṃ pīḍayitvā śakyamavirodhena netum | yadi tu gārhapatyaśabdo gṛhapetarayamityeva mindramabhivadet, yajñasādhanatvena vā lakṣayedagnisamīpaṃ vā tato liṅgāvirodhenaiva tatsaṃ nidhirupapadyate | yatastvayaṃ samudāyāprasiddhyabhidheyāparityāgena vartate tato virudhyata iti śrutivirodhaḥ | athavā nātraikavākyatvāditi—vibhaktiśrutivirodhopanyāsaḥ | yadi hi saptamyarthaṃ vā tṛtīyārthaṃ vā dvitīyā vadettato 'pi naiva virodhaḥ syāt | yatastvīpsitatamatvamāha tena virudhyate | liṅgavirodhastu prāgukta evaikavākyatvavyāpāranirākaraṇamātrārthamupanyasyate | kathaṃ punaryathoktena nyāyenobhayathā virodhasaṃbhave śrutiliṅgavirodha eva parigṛhyate na vākyavirodhaḥ | ucyate |

yacca śīghrataraṃ viniyuṅkte tasyaiva pratiyoginā saha virodho lakṣyate | nanu ca śrutimātraṃ ca virudhyata ityuktam | kathaṃ na virudhyate, yadā pratiniyatāvetau śrutivākyasaṃbandhāvekaḥ śeṣaśeṣirūpo 'nyo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyātmakaḥ | tatra ca śrutirevaṃ vadati vākyalabhyasya viśeṣasyaivaṃvidhaṃ śeṣaśeṣitvamiti | liṅgaṃ tu śeṣaśeṣisaṃbandhenaiva saha virudhyate na vākyagamyena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena | ataśca niṣpratidvaṃdvinā vākyena yadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadā śrutyā saha liṅgavirodha upalabhyamāno vicārayitavyaḥ | athavā yadaivaindryetyuktaṃ tadaiva tadarthaśāstranyā( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 4 sa. 31 ) ityatroktena nyāyeneṃtyarthaḥyenendravyatiriktaḥ ko 'pyupasthātavyaḥ sa ca liṅgamyendravirodhītyetatpratīyate | tasmācchrutiliṅgayorevaiṣa virodha ityupapanno vicāraḥ | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | sarvapramāṇāni tulyabalānītyavagantavyam | kutaḥ |

sarvatra pratyakṣādāvapi dvayyeva gatiḥ pramāṇasvarūpaṃ pramāṇābhāsaṃ ca | na tatra yatpramāṇaṃ tatkadācidapi pramāṇābhāso bhavati | yo 'pi tadābhāsaḥ so 'pi naiva pramāṇaṃ bhavati | nityaṃ ca pramāṇābhāsabādho na pramāṇasyaiva | na ca tatra bādhyasya prāmāṇyamabhyupagatam | bādhanākṣamatvā tpramāṇasya | śrutyādiṣaṭkasya ca samastasya svaviṣaye prāmāṇyaṃ sthāpitam | na caiṣāṃ viṣayāntarasaṃcāro 'sti yatra daurbalyamāśaṅkyate na caitadupasthāpitaṃ jñānamanutpannaṃ śakyaṃ ca veditum | na cotpannasya svarasabhaṅguratvāduttareṇa vināśaḥ | na ca saṃskārāpanayanam | smṛtihetoḥ saṃskārasya sarvatrānucchedāt | nāpyanuṣṭhānākhyātphalādviniyogaḥ śakyate kartum | anuṣṭhānapratyayasya dṛḍhatvāt | tasmātsarvatra tulyabalatvādvikalpaḥ |

lg.l: na hi pūrvamabādhitvā pareṣāṃ janma labhyate ||

div.p: śrutyādīnāṃ hi pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ śīghrataraṃ pravartate | tena paścāttanasya tadupamardenaivā ' 'tmalābhena bhavitavyam | ataśca viparītabādhaprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃ ca |

lg.l:
śrutyādinā samarthasya viniyogo
viniyogo 'pi kalpate iti vyākhyānānusārī pāṭhaḥ | asmiṃstu pāṭhe yadyapi śrutyā viniyogaḥ pratīyate, tathā 'pyaśaktasya viniyogo nāvakalpyata iti, apiśabdasvārasye jñeyam | 'vakalpate |

div.p:
utpattikāle yasyānyaviṣayasāmarthyamavadhṛtaṃ na tasya tadviniyogakāle parāvartayituṃ śakyate | viniyogastu sāmarthyānusārīti yuktamadhyavasātum | evaṃ yasya yena saha saṃbandha ekavākyatayā na vidyate na tasya tadviṣayā śaktiḥ kalpyate | saṃbandhe sati tadanyathānupapattyaiva śaktisiddhiriti vākyasya balīyastvam | tathā sarvatraikavākyatvamākāṅkṣāmūlam | atastasyāmupalabhyamānāyāṃ tadekāntena pratīyate | tadabhāve tu naitadastīti pūrvatarabhāvitvādākāṅkṣātmakaṃ prakaraṇameva jyāyaḥ | tadvirodhinī tu yā 'nyena sahaikavākyatāvagatiḥ sā bhrāntiḥ | tathā sarvākāṅkṣāḥ saṃnihitāvalambinyo bhavanti | na hyasaṃnihitamapekṣituṃ saṃbandhuṃ vā śakyamato yatra saṃnidhistatra sarvamiti balīyastvam | samākhyā
punaḥ pratyakṣameva saṃbandhaṃ vadati | tasmādviparītaṃ balābalam | athavā virodhe satyetaccintyate | na ceha virodhaḥ | ubhayatrāpi viniyogopapatteḥ | ataḥ samavāye 'pi sarveṣāṃ prāmāṇyamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | śrutyarthaviprakarṣātparaṃ parameṣāṃ bādhyata iti | kutaḥ |

yadi śrutivalliṅgādīnāmapi svatantrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamabhaviṣyattata etadupāpatsyata teṣāṃ tu smṛtivicchrutyanumānadvāraṃ prāmāṇyam | śrutireva hyatraikaṃ pramāṇam | sā tu grahaṇopāyaṣaṭkānurodhena ṣọdhā 'vatiṣṭhate | kathaṃ punareṣāṃ svātantryeṇa prāmāṇyaṃ na bhavati | ucyate | ‘coda
( a. 1 pā. 1 sū. 2 )nālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma’ iti sthāpitam | tathā cokta( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 1 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥm ‘aśabdamanapekṣaṃ syāt’ iti | tatra pratyakṣagṛhītāni yānyakṣarāṇi viniyu़ñjate sā śrotravṛttitvāt śrutirityucyate | yatra tvaviniyojakānyakṣarāṇi pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā viniyojakānyarthā pattyā kalpyante tatra liṅgādīni bhavanti | tataścaivamarthaviprakarṣo bhavati | aindrīviniyogaṃ hi prati śrutiliṅgayoḥ saha prasthi
prasthitayoḥ—pravṛttayormadhya ityarthaḥ |tayoryadā śruterviniyojakānyakṣarāṇi dṛśyante tadā liṅge smaraṇasamarthāni tato, yāvatteṣāṃ prakaraṇāmnānānyathānupapattyā viniyojakāni kalpayitumārabhyante tāvaditaraiḥ pratyakṣairviniyogaḥ pratyāyitaḥ | tasmiṃśca pratīte mantro 'pi prakaraṇinaṃ prati nirākāṅkṣībhūtaḥ | prakaraṇyapi mantraṃ prati | tathā sati prakaraṇāmnānasyānyathā 'pyupapadyamānatvānnendrābhidhānaśrutikalpanāyāmarthāpattiḥ prabhavati | na ca śrutimantareṇa viniyogaḥ sidhyati | bahudhā varṇitaṃ caitatpura
purastāditi—anuṣaṅgādhikaraṇavārtika ityarthaḥ |stāt, yathā sākāṅkṣe vedārthe yatkalpyate tadvaidikaṃ netaraditi | tasmācchrutirbalīyasī | na hi tasyāḥ kiṃcidanyadapekṣaṇīyamasti yathā liṅgasya śrutirevam | āha ca |

śrutyādīnāṃ hi pūrvaṃ pūrvamuttarottaranirapekṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ balavadbhavati paraṃ paraṃ tu pūrvādhīnaprāmāṇyaṃ na śaknoti tasyaiva bādhaṃ kartum | na hi śrutimananumāya liṅgādeḥ prāmāṇyamadhyavasīyata ityuktam | nanvetadapyuktaṃ nāsamarthaṃ viniyujyata iti | satyamuktam | ayuktaṃ tūktam | kutaḥ |

viniyogottarakālaṃ hi kathametatsādhayiṣyatītyapekṣite yathā śaknotītyavadhāraṇā bhavati | tatra yadyapi svarūpeṇa tadviṣayā śaktirna dṛśyate tathā 'pi viniyogadarśanādevānumīyate | taduktam ‘va( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 3)canāttvayathārthamaindrī syāt’ ityatra | nanu ca prāgavidyamānasāmarthyasya viniyogo na saṃbhavatīti pūrvataraṃ sāmarthyamanumātavyam | tataśca pratyakṣālliṅgāddurbalatvāpattiḥ | satyam | pūrvabhāvitvena tatkalpyate na tu pūrvameva gamyate | na hyaviniyuktāyā aindrayā gārhapatyābhidhānasāmarthyapratipattikāraṇamasti | nirvṛttaviniyogānyathānupapattyā pūrvamapi vidyamānaṃ paścādevānumīyate | nanvevamapi tulyo 'rthaviprakarṣaḥ | tathā hi |
sarvathā hyadṛśyamānānumānena pratyayaviprakarṣo bhavati | taccobhayatrāpi samānam | satyametāvatsamānaṃ na tu tadbalābalaṃ pratyupayujyate | kutaḥ |

liṅge hi prāgbhāvinā śrutyanumānena vinā viniyogābhidhānābhāvāddūratvaṃ bhavati | śrutau punaravagate viniyogābhidhāne yasmādetadevaṃ tasmānnūnaṃ kimapi sāmarthyamastīti paścātpravartamānamanumānaṃ na viniyogapratyayavikṣepaṃ karoti | sahaprasthitayorhi pramāṇayoryena viniyogadeśaścireṇa prāpto bhavati sa vikṣepo daurbalyakāro bhavati | avadhārite tu viniyoge yadyapi paścādanumānasahasraṃ bhavati na tathā 'pi kaścidviprakarṣaḥ | etena liṅgavākyādiyugalāni vyākhyeyāni | sarvatra hi parasya pūrvamananumāya viniyogānupapattiḥ | pūrveṇa tu kṛte viniyoge parasya nāntarīyakaṃ sadbhāvamātrakalpanamiti pratipattiḥ | āha | śrutestāvatpratyakṣatvena liṅgadbalīyastvaṃ yuktam | atha liṅgavākyādīnāmanumīyamānaśrutitvādaviśeṣe sati kiṃkṛtaṃ balābalamiti | taducyate |
śrutimātrānumānāntarito hi liṅgasya śrutyarthaḥ | vākyasya punarliṅgaśrutyanumānavyavahitaḥ | katham |

lg.l:
vā
vācakeneti ślokasyāyamarthaḥ | prayogāsamavetārthavācināṃ tatsamavetārthavācakenaikavākyatvātteṣāṃ samavetārthābhidhānaśaktiṃ kalpayitvā paścādviniyogābhidhāyinī śrutiḥ kalpyata iti |cakenaikavākyatvādihātadvācināṃ satām |

div.p:
sarvatra hi mantre kiṃcideva padaṃ karmasamavetamarthaṃ vadati | yathā ‘agnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi’ ityagninirvapāmipade | śiṣṭāni tvasamavetārthābhidhāyitvādaprayogārhāṇi santi dṛśyamānaikavākyatānyathānupapattyā 'numitasāmarthyābhidhānāni santi svārthamupasarjanīkṛtya tadviśiṣṭasamavetārthaprakāśanena prayogārthatvaṃ pratipadyante | tataśca śrutimanumāya viniyujyante | taccāvirodhe sati sarvamabhyanujñāyate | yadā dṛśyamānaikavākyatvayormantrayoḥ pṛthak pṛthak prakāśayitavyāvarthau karmasamavetau dṛśyete tadobhayorapi bhedena prakāśakāpekṣaṇātprakāśakayośca prakāśyāpekṣaṇādviniyogāya prasthi
prasthite sati—prasthāne satītyarthaḥ |te sati yasya yatra kḷptaṃ sāmarthyaṃ sa tatra śīghrataraṃ prāpnuvannānyatraikavākyatayā netuṃ śakyate | nāpyanyebhyastatrā ' 'gacchadbhyaḥ so 'vakāśaṃ dadāti | katham |

samudāyo hi viniyujyamāno nāvayavānaviniyujya viniyoktuṃ śakyate | tatra pūrvottarayorbhāgayorekavākyatvaṃ pratyakṣam | naikārthābhidhānasāmarthyam | bhinnārthābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ tvarthapratyayadarśanātsiddham | tatra samudāyāvayavaviniyogāya vākyasāmarthyayoḥ sahaprasthitayorasamarthaviniyogāsaṃbhavādyāvadvākyena pūrvo bhāga uttarārthābhidhānasamartha uttaro vā pūrvasamartha ityanumīyate tāvatpratyekabhāgavartinā sāmarthyena pūrvasyāpi svārthe parasyāpi svārthe śrutiranumitā | tataśca yāvaditaratra viniyojakaṃśrutyanumānāya prayatyate tāvadiha viniyoge siddhe nirākāṅkṣatvātprakaraṇāmnānasya na kaścidapi hetuḥ śrutyanumāna ityanupajātamūlo viniyogo bādhyate | mantrasyāpi hi pūrvasya pūrvatrārthe śīghraṃ viniyoga uttarasya cireṇa | tathottarottarasya śīghraṃ pūrvasya tatra cireṇa | śīghraviniyuktaśca mantraściraviniyogaṃ nā ' 'driyate | tathā 'rtho 'pi prathamāvagatamantrāvaruddho netaraṃ gṛhṇāti | svaprādhānye ca saṃbhavati na paropasarjanatvaṃ pratipadyate | tasmālliṅgaṃ balīya iti bhittvā vākyaṃ viniyoga iti | nanvevaṃ sati ‘nirvapāmi’ ityādenā kḷptasāmarthyena śīghrataraprāptenāvaruddhe 'rthe viprakṛṣṭaprāptānāṃ ‘devasya tvā’ ityādīnāṃ bādhādaviniyogaḥ prāpnoti | na caiṣāṃ bhinnaprayojanatvātsamuccayaḥ | tathā satyekavākyatvābhāvāt | avaśyaṃ caitairyathākathaṃcinnirvāpa eva prakāśayitavyo nānyaprakāśanaṃ, karmānaṅgatvaprasaṅgāt | ataḥ samānaviṣayatvātsamavāye sati vākyaprāpyapadāntarabādhena bhavitavyamiti | atrocyate |

yāni hyasamavetārthavacanāni tāni yadi svatantrī kriyante tato 'narthakāni bhavanti | tena kḷptasaṃbandhairnirākāṅkṣīkṛto 'pyartha itareṣāṃ sākāṅkṣatvātpunastatprakāśyatvaṃ pratipadyate | yathā prakaraṇapūritānāmapi krameṇa punastaddharmaprāptirbhavati | yathā prakṛtau nirākāṅkṣībhūtā dharmā vikṛtīrgamiṣyanti | tathā ca kḷptau vyākhyā
anuṣaṅgādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |tam | tasmādevamādīnyapi saṃbadhyante | yeṣāṃ tu prakāśyo 'rthaḥ samaveto dṛśyate, teṣāmanabhidheyenāsaṃbadhyamānānāmapyarthavattā 'stīti nā ' 'narthakyanimittamavakāśaṃ labhante | sarveṣāmeva ca śrutyādīnāmānarthakyapratihatānāṃ durbalairapi bādhyatvamiṣyate | tadyathaḥ—vrīhyādīnāṃ prokṣaṇādīnprati śrutyā śeṣitvaṃ prāpnuvadapyatilaṅaghya prakaraṇalabhyāpūrvasādhanatvakṛtaḥ saṃbandho bhaviṣyati | tenā
tato 'vasthitamiti pā. |vasthitaṃ vākyālliṅgasya balīyastvam | tathā ca bhakṣānuvāke darśita( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 9 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥm | vākyaprakaraṇayoḥ prakaraṇamarthaviprakarṣāddurbalam | tathā hi |

prakaraṇe hi svārthaparipūrṇānāmaṅgāṅgivākyānāmupakāryopakārakatvākāṅkṣāmātraṃ dṛśyate | vākye tu pratyakṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tataśca sahaprasthitayoryāvatprakaraṇenaikavākyatā kalpyate tāvadvākyenābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ, yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ tāvadiha sāmarthyena śrutiryāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvaditaratra śrutyā viniyogo 'bhihita iti vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne mūlābhāvādvihate ka
aṃkalpitamapi śeṣatvamiti pā. |lpitamapi śeṣatvaṃ niṣpattimagatvā 'ntaraiva vilīyate | tasmādvākyaṃ balīyaḥ | tathā kramaprakaraṇayoḥ kramasyārthaviprakarṣaḥ | katham |

kramo nāma nirapekṣāṇāṃ satāṃ pāṭhānuṣṭhānadeśasāmyamātram | yadi tvākāṅkṣāvataḥ saṃnidhāvāmnāyeta tataḥ prakaraṇameva syāt | atra ca prāyeṇa mahāprakaraṇopanipātinyo vikṛtaya udāharaṇam | tāsu hi yatprākṛtāṅgamadhyapātitvena notpannaṃ tatpurastātparastādvā 'vasthitakramabhāgbhavati | prakaraṇasya kḷptopakāraiḥ prākṛtairvyāvartitatvāt | tatra yannivṛttākāṅkṣasya kasyacitsamīpe paṭhyate 'nyasya cā ' 'kāṅkṣā tatastadubhābhyāṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ yāvatkramavato nivṛttamasatīmākāṅkṣāmupajanayati tāvatprakaraṇavatā sahaikavākyatāṃ
gacchati, yāvaccetaratraikavākyatā bhavati tāvatprakaraṇinaṃ pratyupakārasāmarthyakalpanā | yāvaditaratrāsau tāvadiha śrutyanumānaṃ yāvaditaratra śrutiranumāsyate tāvadiha siddhe viniyoge 'numānabījahīnenākḷptaśruti sarvamapramāṇī bhavati | tathā kramasamākhyayoḥ krame vedakalpitamevāṅgāṅginordeśasāmānyanimittaṃ parasparaparyupasthāpanam | sarvatra hi kenacidabhinnadeśena saṃbandho 'vakalpate | na ca samākhyānavataḥ kiṃciddeśasāmānyaṃ vedakḷptamupalabhāmahe | yena saṃbandhābhimukhyasaṃbhavaḥ | nanu ca samākhyā saṃbandhamevābhidadhānā pravartata iti śrutitulyā prāpnoti | naitadevam |

lg.l: anya eva hi saṃbandhaḥ kalpyate yaḥ samākhyayā |

div.p: arthānāṃ prathamaṃ kenacitprakāreṇānavagatasaṃbandhānāṃ samākhyā pravartate | sā ca śeṣaśeṣitvaṃ tāvannaiva pratipādayati | kenacitsaṃbandhenopapadyamānatvātsaṃbandhamātramapi naivābhidhatte | na hi yaugikaiḥ saṃbandho 'bhidhīyata ityuktam | samākhyānyathānupapattyā 'numīyate | saṃbandhamātrasya caitadrūpaṃ kiṃcidabhinnameṣāmastītyavagamaḥ | tataścā ' 'pannaṃ kramājjaghanyatvam | na hi kiṃcittatra sāmānyamanumātavyaṃ deśasāmānyasya pratyakṣatvāt | iha tu tatpadasyāpratyakṣatvādānumānikatvamiti viprakarṣaḥ | samākhyā hi yāvatkiṃcitsāmānyamastīti kalpayati tāvatkrameṇa nūnamanayoḥ kācidapekṣā 'sti yenetthaṃ samānadeśau paṭhitāviti prakaraṇaṃ kalpyate | yāvacca kiṃcitsāmānyamapekṣāṃ kalpyati tāvaditaratraikavākyatā kḷptā | tathā yāvadihaikavākyatā bhavati tāvaditaratropakārasāmarthyasiddhiḥ | yāvaccehopakārasāmarthyakalpanā tāvaditareṇa śrutirutpāditā | tataśca yāvadiha śrutimanumātumupakramate tāvaditaratra viniyoge siddhe nirākāṅkṣībhūte prakaraṇapāṭhe sarvametatpracitamapyaparipakvavicchedādāmasasyamiva lūnaṃ nirbījaṃ bhavati | tasmādarthaviprakarṣāttu paraṃ paraṃ bādhyata iti siddham | āha ca |

tasmānnaitadālambanaṃ yuktaṃ yat kvaciduttareṣāṃ prāmāṇyamiṣṭam | tasmādbalavadvirodhe 'pi tena bhavitavyamiti | yattu pramāṇābhāso bādhyate na pramāṇamiti | tatra brūmo 'yamapi pramāṇābhāsa eva | katham |

nahi yatra viṣaye bādhastatraiṣāṃ pramāṇatvam | kiṃ tarhi | pradeśāntare kevalānāmupala kṣitaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭarūpeṇātrāpi pratibhāti | tattu balīyasā 'pahṛtaviṣayatvātsīdatīti paścādbhrāntitvenādhyavasīyate | athavā yastatrāsya vyāpāra āsīttamihāpi prakramata eva | sa tu javavatā 'nyena viṣaye 'pahṛte mūlacchedādyadā taṃ na gacchati ta
tatkiṃ kriyatāmiti | tattadā, balavatā viṣayāpahāreṇa durbalaṃ pramāṇābhāsatāṃ yātītyāśayaḥ |tkiṃ kriyatām | tena mṛgatṛṣṇādivadevāprāpya pramāṇameva bādhyate | anutpannameva ceha śrutyabhāvāccheṣajñānaṃ bādhyate | āntarālikajñānamithyātvakalpanayeti notpattisāmānyena tulyabalatvam | ataśca jñānasaṃkarocchedanādirūpo bādho naivā ' 'śaṅkitavyaḥ | yo 'pi cotpannabādhastamapi phalaviyogātmanopapādayiṣyāmaḥ | evaṃ tāvaddvayordvayorvirodhe varṇitam | arthasiddhatvāttu bhāṣyakāreṇetaraiḥ saha na pradarśitaṃ vyākhyātṛbhistvevaṃ prapañcayitavyam | yathā śrutivākyayorvirodhe, aruṇādivākyasāmarthyādānantaryasā
ānantaryasāmānādhikaraṇyābhyāmiti—tābhyāmavagatādvākyasāmarthyādityanvayato 'rthaḥ |mānādhikaraṇyābhyāmekahāyanyādiśeṣatvaṃ prāpnuvattṛtīyāśrutyā krayasaṃbandhitvena vijñāyate | dvitīya
niḥśreṇyā rohaṇaprāptaṃ prāptimātropapādi ca | ekamevaphalaṃ prāptumubhāvārohato yadā || ekasopānavartyeko bhṛmiṣṭaścāparastayoḥ | ityādinā vṛddhaślokopapāditaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ viṣayānusāreṇa prakṛte yojayati—dvitīyasopānetyādinā |sopānabhūgatārohakayoriva hyatra yāvadvākyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpayati tāvacchrutyā viniyogaḥ kalpita iti mahadantaram | śrutiprakaraṇayorvirodhe prakaraṇādekaviṃśatyādyanuvacanānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsāṅgatve prāpte śrutyaiva pratiṣṭhākāmādiṣu puruṣārthāvadhāraṇātprakaraṇabādhaḥ | anuvacanānāṃ ca kriyātmakatvāditikartavyatārūpatvātprakaraṇagrāhyatvena tadvirodhodāharaṇatvam | ‘tisra eva sāhrasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasya’ iti tu dvādaśatvasyākriyātvādanitikartavyatātmakatve sati kathaṃbhāvarūpaprakaraṇagrāhyatvānupapatteḥ saṃnidhimātreṇa prakaraṇakalpanāpūrvakasaṃbandhādhyavasānācchrutisthānavirodhodāhaṇatvaṃ yuktamityeke | tattu naivamāśritam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: yadi dravyagatā saṃkhyā svatantrā vā bhavediyam |

div.p: śrutikramavirodhe kimudāharaṇamiti |

lg.l: saha dharmairna sā yāti krameṇa paśuśeṣatām ||

div.p:
śrutisamākhyayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇam | pauroḍāśikamiti samākhyāte darśapūrṇamāsakāṇḍe paṭhito mantraḥ sādhāraṇe prakaraṇe vartamānaḥ krameṇa cānunmīlitaliṅgenāviniyujyamānaḥ puroḍāśasyaiva vā prāthamyātprāpnuvan, śrutyā sāṃnāyyārthaśākhāṅgatvena vidhīyate ‘iṣe tveti śākhāṃ chinatti’ iti | tatrāpi yāvatsamākhyayā kiṃcitsāmānyaṃ kalpyate tāvacchrutyā viniyuktatvātprakaraṇavākyasāmarthyaśrutiṣvakalpitāsveva bādhaḥ | evaṃ liṅgasya prakaraṇādivirodha udāhartavyaḥ | tatra prakaraṇavirodhe tāvatpūṣānumantraṇānyudāhartavyāni | yāvacca prakaraṇenaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiḥ | tathā yāvaditaratra prakṛtāgnyādiprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ tāvadiha viniyoga iti bādhaḥ | liṅgakramayorvirodhaḥ stutaśastrādhikaraṇe darśitaḥ ‘arthena tva( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 14 )pakṛṣyeta’ iti | sthitodāharaṇamapi yathā 'bhyanujñāpanābhyanujñayoḥ prajñātakramayoḥ ‘upahūta upahvayasva’ ityevaṃ mantrāvāmnātau | tau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ ‘upahūta’ ityanujñāpane
‘upahvayasva’ ityanujñāyām | na tu tathā sāmarthyamastīti viparītaṃ śeṣatvam | yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga ityakalpitaliṅgaśrutipadakasyaiva kramasya bādhaḥ | tathā parivyāṇakaraṇakriyamāṇānuvādinoḥ ‘parivīrasi’ ‘yuvā suvāsāḥ’ iti vā 'gnīṣomīyaparivyāṇāṅgatve prāpte liṅgātsavanīyāṃrthādvitīyaparivyāṇāṅgatvamapi | kathaṃ na manotā, agnīṣomīyakramabādhanasamarthena liṅgenā ' 'gneyasavanīyapaśuyāgāṅgamiti cet | na | ‘vacanā( a. 3 pā 2 a. 2 sū. 3 )ttvayathārthamaindrī syāt’ itivad balavattaraśrutikṛtaviniyogakalpitalakṣaṇādvāreṇāgnīṣomīyāṅgatvāt | evaṃ hyāha ‘yadyapyanyadevatyaḥ paśurāgneyyeva manotā kāryā’ iti | anayā hi śrutyā liṅgenotkṛṣyamāṇā manotā vāritā | dvidevatye 'pyekadevatyaiva na kevalāgnidevatyatvenāgnīṣomīyāduttāraṇīyetyarthaḥ | yadvaivakāraṃ svasthānādapanīya yathākramaṃ kāryaivetyatra saṃyojanā kāryetyavadhāryate | liṅgasamākhyāvirodhe tu bhakṣānuvāṃke grahaṇādivākyāni samākhyānādbhakṣāṅgatvena saṃbandhasāmānyādikalpanayā bhakṣāṅgatvaviniyogāya prasthitāni liṅgena grahaṇāvekṣaṇasamyagjaraṇeṣu viniyujyanta iti sthi( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 9 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |tam | yājyāsamākhyābādhena ca manorṛcāṃ pṛthupājavatyośca liṅgena sāmidhenītvena viniyoga ( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 7 ) ityatreti śeṣapūraṇamityuktam | vākyakramayorvirodhe parivyāṇakaraṇakriyamāṇānuvādiparivīrasiparivītapadavyatiriktapadānāṃ ‘yuvā suvāsā āgāt sa u śreyān’ ityevamādīnāṃ liṅgaviniyuktaparivītapadaikavākyatvātsavaṃnīyaparivyāṇe viniyogaḥ | vākyasamā
vākyasamākhyayorvirodha iti—bhakṣānuvākagatasadhyāsabhityāderliṅgādgrahaṇādau viniyoge 'vagatatadekavākyatāpannaśeṣapadānāṃ samākhyayā bhakṣāṅgatvaprasaktau vākyādgrahaṇādyāṅgatvamityāśayaḥ |khyayorvirodhe bhakṣānuvāka eva saṃdhyāsamityevamādiṣu grahaṇādau viniyujyamāneṣu tadekavākyagataśeṣapa
śeṣapadāvṛttiriti—āṅo 'rvāgarthakatvāccheṣapadānāṃ bhakṣaṇādarvāganuṣṭhīyamāneṣu grahaṇādiṣu vṛttiḥ—viniyoga ityarthaḥ |dāvṛttirudāhartavyā | tathā ' 'dhvaryavādisamākhyānājjyotiṣṭomādipradhāneṣu tadartheṣveva prāpnuvatsu svargakāmādyekavākyatvādarthimātraviṣayatvaṃ vijñāyate | na
kartradhikaraṇe niṣetsyamānamākhyātasya karturanabhidhānamaparyālocyāsya śrutisamākhyodāharaṇatvaṃ śaṅkate—nanvityādinā |nu ca śrutirevaiṣā bhavet | nātra kasyacicchabdasya śravaṇādetadvijñāyate | liṅā karturanabhidhānāt | kiṃ tarhi | padadvayasaṃnikarṣādevaitallakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyāvadagamyate | tasmādvākyenaiva samākhyā bādhyata iti | prakaraṇasamākhyayorvirodhe pauroḍāśikasamākhyātabrāhmaṇāmnātānāṃ prayājādīnāṃ
prakaraṇātsāṃnāyyopāṃśuyājārthatvamityudāharaṇam | evaṃ tāvadekasya śeṣasyānekaṃ śeṣiṇaṃ prati nīyamānasya virodha udāhṛtaḥ | etayaiva tu diśā 'nekasya śeṣasyaikaṃ śeṣiṇaṃ prati nīyamānasya virodha idānīmudāhartavyaḥ | tadyathā śrutiliṅgayorvirodhe ‘aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate’ iti mantrakara ṇakavyāpāravidhāne kṛte liṅgātkasmiṃścidāgneye mantre śeṣatvena prāpnuvati śrutyaindrī viniyujyate | tadavaruddhe copasthāne netarasyāvakāśo vidyate | śrutivākyayorvirodhe yajñāyajñīyapragāthaikavākyabhūtagirāpadaprāptāvirāpadavidhānamudāharaṇam | tathā viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrutyā ' 'mikṣaiva, śeṣo hi teṣāṃ vākyena vājinaṃ taddurbalapramāṇatvāttayā śrutyā nirākṛtam | śrutiprakaraṇayorvirodhe pratiṣṭhākāmadarśapūrṇamāsaprayoge prakaraṇātpañcadaśasaṃkhyasāmidhenyanuvacane 'ṅgatvena prāpte śrutyaikaviṃśatisaṃkhyānuvacanāntarāṅgatvāvagamātprākaraṇikanityānuvacanabādhaḥ | śrutikramāvirodhe—
tathā ‘yajamānasya yājyā’ ityudāharaṇam | ṛtuyājeṣu hi hautrasamākhyayā hotuḥ prāptā yājyā yajamānakartṛkatvena kartṛsaṃbandhavācinyā ṣaṣṭhīśrutyā pratipādyate | liṅgavākyavirodhe—

lg.l: pūrvaṃ syonaṃ ta ityādi sadane sābhidhāraṇe |
ekaikasya tu liṅgena tacca saṃprati gṛhyate ||

div.p:
liṅgasya prakaraṇakramasamākhyāvirodhe nirvāpādiṣu li
liṅgeneti—liṅgapramāṇaprāpitenetyarthaḥ |ṅgena devasya tvetyādinā prakaraṇaprāptamantrāntarabādhaḥ | prathamasya kāmyasyaindrāgnasya kramātsāmidhenīkāryaprāptasya yājyānuvākyāyugalasya liṅgena bādhaḥ | samākhyayā manorṛcāṃ somāraudriyeṣu yājyānuvākyātvena prāptānāṃ somarudraliṅgabhiryājyānuvākyābhirbādha ityudāharaṇāni | vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhe ‘pūrvedyuramāvāsyāyāṃ vediṃ karoti’ ityudāharaṇam | prakaraṇena hi havirabhivāsanottarakālaṃ yadvidhānaṃ tasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti | abhāvāsyāsamabhivyāhāreṇa tu pūrvedyuḥ | na cātra śrutitvam | na hi saptamī śeṣaśeṣisaṃbandhaṃ vadati | yattvadhikaraṇatvamabhidhatte tattatkarmaṇo 'nupapannameva | tasmātpadasaṃnidhānenaiṣa saṃbandhaḥ | sa ca śīghrataraṃ bhavatītyuktam | vākyakramayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇam | jyotiṣṭome kāmyanaimittikeṣu pratipatkalpeṣu pratīkagrahaṇātpādamātraṃ śrutyā viniyujyate | tatra dvitīyapādātprabhṛti yathāsaṃkhyakrameṇa nityānāmevarcāṃ prasaṅgaḥ | tadyathā ‘vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti rājanyāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt’ ityatra ‘pavamānāyendave | abhi devāṃ iyakṣate ‘ityetāveva dvitīyatṛtīyapādau prāpnutaḥ | vākyācca ‘marutvate ca matsaraḥ | viśvā dadhāna ojasā’ iti | nanu vibhaktibhedādatra liṅgavirodhaḥ syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sarveṣāṃ somaliṅgatvādvibhaktibhedena tvekavākyatvameva nopapadyate | tadyāvadākāṅkṣāpūrvakamekavākyatvādi kalpyate tāvaditareṇā ' 'nantaryātsamānaviṣayatvācca sāmarthyādi kalpayitvā viniyogaḥ kṛta iti balīyastvam | vākyasamākhyayorvirodhe ‘tasmānmaitrāvaruṇaḥ’ preṣyati cānu cā ' 'ha’ iti hautrasamākhyāte pravacane praiṣānuvacanamāmnātam | tasya kartṛviśeṣākāṅkṣiṇaḥ samākhyayā hotā prāpnoti | vākyena maitrāvaruṇaḥ | ekena ca kṛtārthasya na kartrantarāpekṣā bhavati | tatra śīghrataraprāpte maitrāvaruṇe prakaraṇakalpanāṃ yāvatpāptā samākhyā bādhyate | na cāyaṃ śrutivirodhaḥ | ākhyātapadena karturanabhidhānānmaitrāvaruṇapade ca kārakavibhakti prayogābhāvāt | prakaraṇakramayorvirodhe girāpaderāpade eva stotrāpekṣayodāharaṇam | agniṣṭomasā
agniṣṭomasāmna iti—agniṣṭomastotrasyeyartthaḥ |mnaḥ krameṇa girāpadaṃ prāpnoti prakaraṇādirāpadam | tacca balīyaḥ | pūrvaṃ tu sāmāpekṣayodāhṛtamāsīdityasaṃkīrṇaviṣayatvam | pra
prakriyeti—prakaraṇamityarthaḥ |kriyāsamākhyayorvirodhe ‘tasmānmai
trāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cā ' 'ha’ ityetadeva jyotiṣṭomaṃ pratyudāharaṇam | tasya hi samākhyayā hotṛkartṛkaṃ praiṣānuvacanaṃ prāpnoti | prakaraṇāttu maitrāvaruṇakartṛkaṃ nirṇīyate | praiṣānuvacanasvarūpāpekṣaṃ ca pūrvatrodāharaṇamiti bhedaḥ | kramasamākhyayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇam | kāmyayājyākāṇḍādhītayoraindrāgnayugalayorubhayorapi vikalpena karmadvaye 'pi prayogaḥ samākhyānurodhena prāpnoti | kramabalīyastvāttu prathamasya prathamaṃ dvitīyasya dvitīyameveti vyavasthā | liṅagaṃ tu pakṣadvaye 'pi tulyārthāmiti kramasamākhyayoreva virodhaḥ | evaṃ śeṣaikatve śeṣyekatve ca śrutyādisamavāyaścintitaḥ | yathā caiṣāmarthaviprakarṣādvijātīyaiḥ saha balābalamevaṃ sajātīyairapi yatra hetusāmānyaṃ tatra darśiyitavyam | tadyathā śrutereva tāvatsāmānyaviśeṣādibhāvena śeṣaviṣayaḥ samavāyaḥ | ‘puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā’ karoti’ ityaviśeṣaśravaṇādagnīṣomīyādāvapi prāpnuvat ‘āgneyaṃ caturdhā’ iti tu viśeṣaśravaṇena viśeṣe caturdhākaraṇamupasaṃhriyate | tathā śeṣisamavāye ‘yadāhavanīye juhoti’ iti saptamīśrutyā juhotisāmānādhikaraṇyenāvabhṛthe 'pyāhavanīyaḥ prāpyamāṇo viśeṣasaṃyuktayā ‘apsvavabhṛthena’ ityanayā bādhyate | saṃdigdhāsaṃdigdhatvena ca balābalaviśeṣo bhaviṣyati | evaṃ paurvāparyavirodhāṅgaguṇavirodhādiṣvapi śrutidvayamudāhartavyam |

tathā liṅgadvayavirodhe ‘syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi’ ityevodāharaṇam | dve hi tatra liṅge | parasparaikavākyatāgamanasāmarthyātmakamekamarthābhidhānaśaktirūpamaparam| etacca śrutyanumānasya pratyāsannam | viprakṛṣṭamitaradvākyādapi jaghanyatvādi
ityuktamiti—liṅgavākyayorvirodhodāharaṇapradarśanāvasare bhāṣye ‘tadeṣo 'rthaviprakarṣaḥ, yat ‘syonaṃ te’ ityasya pratyakṣaṃ sadanakarmaṇo 'bhidhānasāmarthyaṃ tanmukhyam’ ityādinoktamityarthaḥ |tyuktaṃ bhāṣye | vākyayorvirodhe ‘pañcadaśa sābhidhenīranubrūyāt’ ‘saptadaśa vaiśyasya’ ityetadudāharaṇam | ubhayatrāpi hi samānādhikaraṇyādekavākyatve kṛte viniyoge sati nimittaviśeṣasaṃyogātsāptadaśyaṃ balīyo bhavati | prakaraṇayorvirodhe ‘abhikrāmaṃ juhoti’ ityudāharaṇam | mahāprakaraṇena hyasya darśapūrṇamāsārthatā | avāntaraprakaraṇena tu prayājārthatā | tacca balīyaḥ | tatra hi pratyāsatterananubhūte mahāprakaraṇasaṃsparśe pūrvataraṃ vākyasthānīyaḥ saṃbandho 'vakalpate | kramayorvirodhe kāmya eva yājyākāṇḍe paurvāparyapratyāsattikrameṇa tayorevaindrāgnīyayo
ryugalayoraniyamenoṣṭidvaye 'pyaniyamena prāpnuvatoryathākhaṃkhyakrameṇātyantadeśasāmyena pratyāsannatvādviniyogo bhavati | samākhyayostu virodhe sāmānyaviśeṣasamākhyayoḥ sūtrabaddha eva bādho bhaviṣyati ‘tasyopa( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 21 sū. 41 )deśasamākhyānena nirdeśaḥ’ iti | śeṣaśeṣisamavāyaśca pratyekaṃ vivicyodāhartavyaḥ | evaṃ tāvatpratyakṣeṣu śrutyādiṣu vicāritam | etayaiva diśā 'numānādigamyeṣvapi sajātīyavijātīyasamavāye vicāra
