vijātīyasamavāyo vicārayitavya iti pā. |yitavyam | tatra ca pratyakṣagamyānāmānumānikairānumānikānāṃ cā ' 'numānikaiḥ saha pūrvoktenaiva mārgeṇa sajātīyavijātīyabalābalaṃ vyākhyeyam | tadyathā 'tideśaprāptāḥ śrutyādayaḥ pratyakṣairvikṛtiṣu bādhiṣyante | viparīto 'pi ceha bādho bhavati | pūrvaṃ pūrvamapi hyānumānikaṃ pareṇa pareṇāpi pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate | yathā kṛṣṇaleṣu sāmarthyenāvaghātaḥ | sarvavastuviṣayaṃ ca sāmarthyaṃ, liṅgaṃ kevalaṃ mantragatamevāvagantavyam | tathā ca yānyapyanyārthadarśanānyananyagatīni teṣāmapi liṅgatvamabhidhāsyate | kā punaratra liṅgasya prāptirananyathāsaṃbhava ityādi | yatra punaḥ śrutirānumānikī liṅgaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ tatra katham | yathā smṛtivaidikaliṅgavirodhe | tatra smṛterbhūlāntaramapi saṃbhāvyate na tu liṅgasyeti tadeva balavadityanusartavyam | sarvatra durbalasyāpi pramāṇasya bādhe yadi kiṃcidanarthakī bhavati tato viparīto bādho yojayitavyaḥ | taduktaṃ ‘vrīhīnprokṣati’ ityatra śrutimutsṛjyāpūrvasādhanatvagrahaṇamiti | tathā—

lg.l: tadā 'pi viparītatvaṃ śiṣṭā( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 3 )kope yathoditam ||

div.p: sarvapramāṇānāmevārthadvāraḥ parasparavirodho na svarūpanimittaḥ | tatra yadā padārthataddharmaviṣaye pramāṇe virudhyete tatra yadyapi pramāṇato 'nyādṛśaṃ balābalaṃ tathā 'pi prameyānurodhena tadāśrayaṇātsvarūpadurbalenāpi balavadbādhyamānaṃ tadānuguṇyaṃ pratipadyate | taduktamācamanādayaḥ padārthāsteṣāṃ guṇaḥ krama iti | tathā ca loke—
evaṃ sūtraṃ śrutiliṅgavirodhopapādanāntaṃ ca bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam | idānīṃ sādhyaśeṣamanukramiṣyāmaḥ |

svata eva mantrarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutyanumānamantareṇaiva viniyogabuddhirbhavatīti śrutitulyatvam | nahi vijñānasya vijñānasya ca viśeṣa upalabhyata iti—mantrāmnānavelāyāmindrārthatvaṃ jñātaṃ śrutyuccāraṇakāle 'pi gārhapatyārthatvamityubhayorlabdhātmanoraviśiṣṭatvam | na hyavijñātarūpo mantraḥ śrutyā śakyo viniyoktumiti śrutyā prathamaṃ rūpanirūpaṇaṃ kartavyam | ataśca tadavadhāraṇavelāyāmindropasthānapratyayo jāto na śakyo nivartayitumiti manyate | nanu liṅgasya bhaṅgurasyeva rūpaṃ sivicikitso hīti—śrutau dṛśyamānāyāmanumānāsaṃbhavādbhaṅguratvam | savicikitso hi tvayaṃ vikṣepajanmatvāt | na hyasya svataḥ prāmāṇyamityabhiprāyaḥ | paraḥ punaḥ pratyayotpādanamaikāntikaṃ gṛhītvā savicikitsatvaṃ saṃdehaviparyayānadhyavasāyānāmanyatamaṃ manyamāna āha—naitadyuktaṃ yato liṅgātsavicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ | tasya śruteśca naiva saṃpradhāraṇā 'stīti | kimiyamaindrī bhavati na bhavatītyaniścayaḥ | tasya śrutyavirodhe 'pyapramāṇatvānnaiva tayā saha balābalacintā | yatastu nirvicikitsu ekāntenaitaddevatyo 'yaṃ mantra iti pratyayaḥ sa śrutyā saha tulyabalatvādvikalpitumarhati | nanu naiva kadāciditi—pūrvavadeva kadācinnirvikṣepa iti manyate | itarastu svābhipretameva savicikitsatvaṃ gṛhītvā ' 'ha— evaṃ hi sati naiva liṅgaṃ nāma kiṃcitpramāṇamabhaviṣyāditi | siddhāntavādī tu vadati—yadi savikṣepapratyayotpādanamātreṇa kupitaṃ liṅgaṃ prāmāṇyameva muñcati kāmaṃ mā bhūtpramāṇaṃ bhavati tu saṃśayo liṅgaparijñāteṣvartheṣviti | kathaṃ punaḥ savikṣepatvaṃ parityajya saṃśaya eva savicikitsatāmudāhiyate | kathaṃ vā liṅgaparijñātatvaṃ siddhavadabhidhīyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | liṅgaparijñātatvaṃ tāvadavirodhavelābhiprāyam | saṃdigdhatvaṃ virodhavelāyām | etaduktaṃ bhavati | yadāvirodhakāle liṅgasyāvagataṃ viniyojakatvaṃ tanna
tathaiva sarvatraivāvatiṣṭhate | kiṃ tarhi | saṃdihyate | anyatrāvirodhādviniyogo 'ṅgīkṛtaḥ sa iha kiṃ tathaiva bhavatyatha kenacidvyāvārtiṣyata iti | ya
vastutastu śrutivirodhe liṅgasyāprāmāṇyameva na tu prāmāṇyasaṃśaya ityevamabhidhānārthaṃ ‘yadi veti bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—yadi vā vispaṣṭamityādinā |di vā vispaṣṭamevāprāmāṇyamiti—tāvadeva saṃdeho bhavati yāvatpratyakṣā śruternopalabhyate | tasyāṃ tu satyāmitarakalpanānupapatteraprāmāṇyam | liṅge hi sāmarthyamātraṃ pratyakṣama | na ca tāvatā viniyoga ukto bhavati | na cānuktasya kriyāyāṃ prāmāṇyamasti | yathā—satyapi sāmarthye viprarājanyau na vaiśyastomaṃ kurutaḥ | tasmānna liṅgaṃ viniyojakamiti | parastu virodhaviṣayamaprāmāṇyābhidhānamajñātvā sārvatrikamevedamuktamiti bhītaḥ prāmāṇyamārgaṃ darśayati—prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāne yamarthamāmanantīti | tadetat ‘api vā pra( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 6 sū. 31 )yogasāmarthyānmantro 'bhidhānavācī syāt’ ityatra ‘aviśi( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 4 sū. 32 )ṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ’ ityatra ca varṇitam | athavā siddhāntavādinā 'pi virodhe sukhataramapramāṇatvaṃ vakṣyāmīti manyamānena prathamaṃ svatantrameva tāvadaprāmāṇyaṃ darśitam | tathākṛte svayamevaitasya śrutyanumānadvāraprāmāṇyakalpanamāpatsyate | tataśca mama sujayo bhaviṣyati | tatretareṇa virodhaviṣayamanādṛtya prāmāṇyaṃ tāvadastīti nirūpya tulyabalatvamamihitam | abhyu
‘avirodhātkhalvīpa’ itīdaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—abhyupagamyāpītyādinā |pagamyāpi balābalamavirodhādabādhaḥ | tadyathopadeśātideśābhyāṃ prayājādyupakārasya prakṛtivikṛtyarthatvādavirodhaḥ | sakṛccoditasyāsakṛtkaraṇe 'pi pradhānānurodhena guṇānuvṛtteḥ
sarvatreṣṭatvāt | indraśabdasya gārhapatye gauṇatvādavayavaprasiddhervendre mukhyatvātsamudāyaprasiddhervirodha iti cet | na | prayogabhedena parihārāt | yugapadupādiśyamānaṃ hyetatsaṃbhavāsaṃbhavāśrayaṇādvirudhyate | prayogabhede tu sati gārhapatyābhidhānavelāyāṃ yajñasādhanatvaṃ vā guṇanindatikriyākhyaiśvaryayogaṃ vā 'ṅgīkṛtya pravartsyate | indrābhidhānakāle tu mukhya ityavirodhaḥ | tasmānnāsti bādha ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ | śrutirliṅgādbalīyasī | kutaḥ |

yattu prakaraṇātsāmārthyāccāṅgatvānumānamuktaṃ tacchabdenāsaṃspṛṣṭamīdṛśeṣvartheṣvapramāṇamityuktam | parastu sārvatrikameva liṅgasyāśābdatvamuktamiti manyamāno na tarhi viro
dhādbādhaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | apramāṇatvādeveti vivakṣanyadyevamityāha | siddhāntavādī tu yathā prathamaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā liṅgasya prāmāṇyamuktamāsīttathedānīṃ svayaṃ pratipādayati | bhavati hi prakaraṇādeṣo 'rtho yathā śaknuyāttathā yāgasyānenopakuryāditi | na ca svārthābhidhānādanyathā śaknotyasāvupakartumiti tatra viniyogaścodito bhavati | parastu madīyamevāyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ mārgamāyātaḥ kvedānīṃ gamiṣyatītyutsāhenā ' 'ha—yadi śrutimūlo na śrutyantareṇa bādhituṃ śakyaḥ | tena yadi tāvadaśābdo 'yamarthastato naiva pramāṇam | atha śābdastatastulyabala iti | siddhāntavādī tu dvayamapi pariharati—nāpīti | ānu mānikyāḥ śruteravirodhe satyātmalābhādvirodhe cānutpādāt | yatra hi pratyakṣayā śrutyā mantro na viniyogaṃ prati nirākāṅkṣīkṛtastatrāsya viniyogasiddhyarthaṃ yāvatkalpyate tatsarvamāmnānānyathānupapattimudrāmudritatvādvaidikaṃ bhavati | yatra vispaṣṭamevāvagatamanena gārhapatya upastheya iti tatrā ' 'mnānaprayojanena sādhye prayogopakāre vijñāte naitāvatkalpyamānaṃ vedaḥ sahate 'nenendropasthānaṃ kartavyamiti | tasmāddurbalaṃ liṅgam | kiṃca—

svatantrayā śrutyā nityameva gārhapatyopasthānaṃ coditaṃ, liṅgena svatantreṇendropasthānam | tatrānyatarāśrayaṇe satītaraccoditaṃ sanna kriyate tadapekṣayā cetaradacoditaṃ satkṛtam | tadakaraṇamapyacoditam | śrutahānyaśrutakalpanayośca tulyo doṣaḥ | pra
śrutahānyaśrutaparikalpanayostulyadoṣatvopapādanārthaṃ ‘ubhayatra hi’ iti bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe-prasiddhibādhāditi | tadevopapādayati—coditasyeti | śrutahāne coditasya kartavyatāprasiddhiratikramaṇīyā | aśrutaparikalpanāyāmacoditasyākartavyatāprasiddhiratikramaṇīyetyāśayaḥ |siddhibādhāt | coditasya kartavyatāprasiddhiritarasyākartavyatvaṃ tadubhayamatikramyeta | tasmāttāvanna vikalpaḥ | yastu virodhaparihārārthaṃ samuccayo 'bhihitastatra brūmo 'styeva virodhaḥ | katham |

lg.l:
liṅgaṃ sākā
sākāṅkṣasādhyārthamiti— sākāṅkṣābhyāṃ mantraprakaraṇābhyāṃ sādhyo viniyogarūpo 'rtho yasyeti vigrahaḥ |ṅkṣasādhyārthe tayaikāntādvirudhyate ||

div.p:
eko 'yaṃ mantra ekaṃ ca prakaraṇam | sakṛccā ' 'mnātasyaikarūpyeṇa bhavitavyam | tatra śrutiviniyogavelāyāṃ mantraprakaraṇinornirākāṅkṣatvaṃ bhavedvā na vā | tadyadi tāvannāsti tato viniyoga evāsiddhaḥ | na hi viniyuktasyā ' 'kāṅkṣā yujyate | atha tvasti tataścā ' 'kāṅkṣādhīnasiddhitvāllai
laukiketi pā. |ṅgiviniyogānupapattiḥ | yugapadbhāvāśrayaṇe hyastyākāṅkṣā nāsti veti vipratiṣiddhaṃ syāt | evaṃ satyapi tu yadi pramāṇayostulyapravṛttitvaṃ
kṛtasāmarthyayorvākyaprakaraṇayoriti—mantravākyasya kṛtayāgopakārākhyaprayojanatvaṃ prakaraṇasya ca kṛtayāgāṅgatvabodhākhyaprayojanatvamityarthaḥ |
bhavettato viśeṣāgrahaṇānna jñāyeta kena prathamataraṃ nirā
nirākāṅkṣīkṛta iti pā. |kāṅkṣa iti | yugapadevobhābhyānirākāṅkṣīkriyamāṇa ubhayārtho bhavet | asti tu pramāṇayorviśeṣaḥ | śruteḥ śīghratarapravṛttitvāt | atastayā viniyukte mantre na liṅgasyāvakāśo 'stīti śrutibalīyastvasiddhiḥ |

liṅgavākyayorvirodhe ekaṃ tāvadidamudāharaṇam | jyotiṣṭome hautrapravacanādhītāḥ praiṣā vākyena maitrāvaruṇasya vidhīyante ‘tasmānmaitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cā ' 'ha’ iti | teṣāṃ madhye kaścitpraiṣa evaṃ paṭhyate ‘praśāstaryaja’ iti | so 'yaṃ svasā marthyena maitrāruvaṇaṃ niyuṅkte | tatra yadi vākyaṃ balīyastato maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyet | ātmani ca praiṣāsaṃbhavāddhotā yajet | atha tu liṅgaṃ balīyastato mantreṇa maitrāvaruṇo niyoktavyaḥ | na cā ' 'tmanaivā ' 'tmānaṃ niyoktumarhatīti pareṇa viniyoktavyaḥ | sa ca ‘teṣā( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 10 sū. 21 ) yato viśeṣaḥ syāt’ ityevaṃ vijñāyate | sāmānyasamākhyayā pūrvamayaṃ hotureva prāpitaḥ sanvākyena bādhita āsīt | tadyadā vākyaṃ liṅgena bādhyate tadā samākhyayaiva pratiprasūtayā hotṛkartṛkatvaṃ vijñāyate | praiṣārthakārī tu maitrāvaruṇo vijñāyata eva | yadyapi ‘tasmānmaitrāvaruṇaḥ’ ityetadbrāhmaṇaṃ tathā 'pi padasaṃnidhimātrātmakatvenāśrutitvātpratyāsannatara
śrutikalpanena liṅgena bādhyate | yadi hi maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyettataḥ praśāstṛśabdo hotaryanarthakaḥ syāt | nanu ca maitrāvaruṇo 'pi preṣyamāṇo ‘hotā yakṣat’ ityādirevārthaśūnyaḥ syāt | gauṇa iti cenna | praśāstṛśabde 'pyevaṃ prasaṅgāt | api ca paścāttanatvādupajātavirodhaḥ praśāstṛśabda eva varaṃ gauṇo na prathamoccārito vinaiva virodhena hotṛśabdaḥ | tasmālliṅgayorevaiṣa virodho na liṅgavākyayoriti | atra brūmaḥ | sarvathā tāvadanayoranyatarasya virodhe gauṇatvaṃ kalpanīyam | tatra praśāstṛśabdasya hotaryatyantamanimittaḥ prayogaḥ | hotṛśabdasya tu hotṛkāryāpannamaitrāvaruṇe 'sti nimittam | sarva eva pradhānartvigvacanāstatpuruṣeṣu prayujyamāna dṛṣṭā na tu viparyayaḥ | tasmātpraśāstṛliṅgatvānmantrastameva viniyuñjīta | na caitadvākyamatyantamanarthakameva bhavati | praiṣāntareṣu caritārthatvāt | ato 'sminviṣaye bādhyeteti | ‘syo
evaṃtāvalliṅgavākyayorvirodhe svābhimatamudāharaṇaṃ pradarśya, adhunā bhāṣyoktamudāharaṇaṃ dūṣayitumupakramate—syonaṃ ta ityādinā |naṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi’ ityatrodāharaṇe codyate |

satyapi vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatve 'rthabhedādbhinnavākyatvenaite pu( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 14) ityatreti śeṣaḥrastātpratipā
pratyudāhṛta iti pā. |dite | tasmānna samudāyasyaiva sadanābhighāraṇe puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpane ca samuccayena vikalpena vā viniyoga āśāṅkitavyaḥ | tatra kecidāhuḥ | naivātra sakalena vākyena saha vicāraḥ kiṃ tarhi aṃśenaiva saha | athavā |

‘tasminsīda’ ityetatkṛtaṃ sākāṅkṣatvamāśrityaikavākyatvenodāhṛtamidameva pradhānakāraṇam | śakyate hi tadvaśena yatheṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇāviśeṣyabhāvaṃ kalpayitvaikārthatvenaikavākyatvam | yadyathā—pūrvasya tāvaduttareṇa saha yadahaṃ ghṛtasya dhārayā sumukhaṃ tava sadanaṃ kalpayāmi tasminnevamitikartavyatāke pratitiṣṭha tvamitītikartavyatāviśiṣṭapuroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanamekaṃ prayojanam | athavā puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanaphalaṃ sadanābhidhāraṇaṃ karomītyevaṃ viśiṣṭaphalasadanakaraṇaṃ prakāśanaṃ prayojanamiti śakyamekavākyatvam | yattu purastādarthanānātvānnānāvākyatvamuktaṃ tadiha sthitaṃ liṅgabalīyastvena | yadi hi liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ saṃbhavadanyataraviśeṣaṇatvenaikavākyatvaṃ parityajyobhayoḥ pratyekaṃ svaprādhānyaṃ liṅgāvagatamāśritya
viśeṣaṇabuddhitiraskāreṇa prayojanabhedādvākyabhedo bhavati | tenāyaṃ viniyogadvāreṇa vākyātmalābhasya liṅgaprādhānyasyātra balābalavicāraḥ | tatrāpi pra
pratīteriti—sākāṅkṣāvayavatvenā ' 'patato vākyātmalābhapratīterityarthaḥ |tīterlabdhātmake vākye sati bādhakapratyayasadasadbhāvavicāra iti draṣṭavyam | kiṃ prāptam | tulyabale iti | tadā
tulyabalatvapūrvapakṣe 'nuṣṭhāne viśeṣaṃ darśayati-tadā cetyādinā laiṅgikaviniyogapakṣe vibhajya prayogaḥ | vākyīyaviniyogapakṣe vikalpenopastaraṇasādanayormadhye 'nyataratra samuccayena vobhayatra samudāyaḥ prayoktavya ityarthaḥ | cedṛśaṃ karma, kadācidvibhajya mantrau prayoktavyau, | kadācitsamudāyo 'nyataratra, kadācitsa ebobhayatreti | kathaṃ punarayamitthamanavasthitaḥ śāstrārtho bhavati | sarvathā yadi pramāṇata evamavagamyate kiṃ no bādhyate | liṅgavākyatulyabalatvālocane sarvametatpratibhāti | yadā tu śrutivalliṅgātpramāṇāntaratvādvākyameva bādhakamityavadhāryate | tadā niyata eva samudāyaprayoga ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

sarvastāvadādita ārabhya viniyogaṃ nirīkṣate | tadiha kalpayāmyanto 'sya na kadācitparatrāpekṣā dṛśyata iti tāvati paryavasānaṃ niścitya prayojanākāṅkṣānivṛtterabhidhāraṇāṅgatvenā ' 'śrīyate | tenaiṣa tāvatpratiṣṭhāpanaṃ yāvanna kadācinnīyate | na ca parasyaitena vinā 'narthakatvāpattiḥ | yatastadbhayena nīyate | so 'pi hi pratiṣṭhāpanāṅgatvenārthavān bhaviṣyati | yadyapi ca tacchabdaḥ pūrvāpekṣastathā 'pi prakāśitaṃ nirvṛttaṃ ca pūrvavākyārthamālocya bhinnasyāpi pravartamānasya na kaścidvirodhaḥ | tadyathā ‘tapte payasi dadhyānayati’ iti saṃskāravidhāne paryavasite ‘sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā’ iti vākyāntareṇaiva dravyadevatāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate | tasmādbhedena viniyogasya pratyāsannataraśrutitvānnetaretaraviṣayasaṃkrāntirvidyate | evamupastaraṇe ‘tasminsīda’ ityasya nāsti sāmarthyamiti pūrveṇaiva gatārthaprāyaṃ sannirūpaṇadāṛdhyārthaṃ punaḥ parāmṛśyate | yaccaikatroktaṃ tasyetaratrābhāvaṃ
darśayitvā punarātmadharmamupanīyetaradharmānirākaraṇamiti grantho nirākulīkartavyaḥ | pūrvaḥ prastāvaḥ pramāṇasadasadbhāvābhyāṃ, madhyamaḥ śaktyaśaktibhyāmantyaśca dṛṣṭārthatvādṛṣṭārthatvā
bhyāmiti vivekaḥ | tasmādvākyālliṅgaṃ balīya iti siddham | kiṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nāmeti | sarvatra siddhavatprakaraṇena vyavahāro na caitatkvacinnirūpitapūrvaṃ tadihāpi tāvadasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyatām | nirjñātasvarūpasya hi balābalaṃ sujñāyata iti | atha vā naivāsya vākyakramābhyāṃ bhedaḥ | sākāṅkṣapadasaṃnidhimātraṃ hi vākyamityucyate | tacca prakaraṇe 'pyaviśiṣṭam | na ca vākyasya padeyattāyāṃ pramāṇamasti | vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣasaṃhanyamānaikaprayojanamātropalakṣaṇatvāt | tena vākyamevaikamalpapadamaparaṃ bahupadam | avāntarārthavaśīkṛtānāṃ mahāprayojanavaśena mahāsaṃghātāpatteḥ | vakṣyati hi vākyaṃ hyekaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ sahadharmāṇāmiti | athavā saṃnidhyātmakaḥ krama ityucyate | sa ca prakaraṇe 'pyavaśyaṃbhāvī saṃnidhiḥ | ataḥ kramādapyabhinnaṃ prakaraṇamiti manyate | tadidānīṃ ta
tattveti—yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kartavyasyetyādibhāṣyatrayeṇeti śeṣaḥ | tatra cā ' 'dyaṃ bhāṣyaṃ lakṣaṇoktyartham | dvitīyaṃ ca lakṣaṇopapādanāyāvayavavyutpattyartham | tṛtīyaṃ rụ̄dhitvaśaṅkānirāsāya yaugikatvamupapādayituṃ paryāyoktyarthaṃ ca veditavyamityāśayaḥ |ttvabhedaparyāyairnirūpayati | tatra tattvaṃ tāvaducyate—kartavyasyetikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti | kartavyamiti sādhyabhūtamapūrvamathavā vidheyatvānuṣṭheyatvābhyāṃ bhāva eva pratyayavācyo 'bhidhīyate | sādhyāṃśopanipātātsvargādiphalaṃ kartavyamiti cenna | tasya kālāntarabhāvitvena prayogāsamavāyitve sati tatsiddhyarthāpūrvasyaiva kartavyatvāvadhāraṇāt | tenā
apūrvasya kartavyatvaṃ bhāvārthādhikaraṇabhāṣyasaṃmatyā draḍhayati—tenāpūrvamityādinā |pūrvaṃ kṛtvā nānyatheti | tathā ‘ya( a. 9 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 1 )jñakarma pradhānaṃ taddhi codanābhūtam’ iti tasyaiva prayojakatvaṃ vakṣyate | ‘pha( a. 9 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 4 )ladevatayośca’ ityupanyasya nirākariṣyate | tatra
kathamityanugrahopāyākāṅkṣaṇamākāṅkṣeti ghañantaṃ vyākhyāyate | yadvetikartavyatāmākāṅkṣatītikartavyatākāṅkṣaṃ bhāvāpūrvayorevaikaṃ, tasya yadvacanamiti samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyante | vacana- miti—śabdena pratyāyanam | etaduktaṃ bhavati vasturūpeṇa vidyamānā 'pyākāṅkṣā na prakaraṇamityabhidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi | pratīyamānā | sā 'pi ca kartavyatārthopasarjanatvena gṛhyamāṇā, na svātantryeṇa | tenā ' 'kāṅkṣā 'bhidhīyamānā prakaraṇamākāṅkṣāvatī vā bhāvaneti draṣṭavyam | idānīmavayavavyutpattyātmakena bhedena kathayati | tatra praśabdastāvatprārambhamāha | karaṇaśabdaḥ kriyāṃ prakaraṇaṃ prakriyetyarthaḥ | kā punariha kriyā gṛhyate tāmāha—vacanakriyāyā arthābhidhānakriyāyā iti yāvat | bhāvanābhidhānakriyāyā hi prayogavākyapravṛttirārambhaḥ | phalakaraṇāṃśapūraṇaṃ padadvayamātrasādhyamitikartavyatālābhastvanekavākyāntarāyattasiddhiḥ | atastatsamastālocanāpekṣayā kathaṃbhāvaḥ prakaraṇamabhidhānavidhānakriyayorārambha ityucyate | karaṇaśabdaśca kriyāmātravācyapi sannāgamaviṣayaḥ prayujyamāno 'bhidhānākriyāyāṃ vartate | sa eṣa vidhyādiriti paryāyakathanam | ādyanta
dṛṣṭāntatayā 'ntaśabdopādānam |yoḥ saṃbandhiśabdatvātkimapekṣyā ' 'ditvamityata āha—vidhyantāpekṣa iti | vidhyanto nāmetthaṃbhāvarūpamitikartavyatāvadhāraṇam | tasya cānekāṅgavākyatadarthatatprayojanālocanamadhyasya kathaṃbhāva ādirityācāryāṇāṃ vidhyāditvena prasiddhiḥ | tatra ca svapadagaṇena kiyatyapi prayojane 'vasitānāmeva vākyānāṃ punaḥ kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena saṃbandha iti vākyādviśeṣaḥ | tatrā 'ditaḥ kvacidapi prayojanaleśe vibhajyamānānāṃ vṛttirnāsti saṃbandhenaivārthalābhaḥ | krameṇa tu saha vailakṣaṇyamanantarameva vakṣyāmaḥ | tasmātpramāṇāntaraṃ prakaraṇam | kimihodāharaṇamiti | tenaikavākyatānayanābhiprāyeṇa pṛcchati | siddhāntavādī tu vidhāyakasmārakatvena bhinnavṛttitvānmantrabrāhmaṇayorna kathaṃcidekavākyatā ghaṭata iti sūktavākamudāharati | liṅgāddevatāpadeṣu niṣkṛṣṭeṣu taccheṣāḥ kimutkṛṣyantāmatha tadrahitā api prayujyantāmiti | prakaraṇena tāvatsarvaśeṣā ubhayatra prāpnuvanti | liṅgamapi sādhāraṇam | dvivacanaikavacanayorubhayatra vidyamānārthatvāt | nanu cā ' 'tmīyenaiva śeṣeṇavaruddheṣu devatāpadeṣu śeṣāntaramanavakāśameva syāt | satyam | evamapi tu vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodho naivāpaiti | prakaraṇena hyapanītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayojyaḥ prāpnoti vākyenetara iti vākyabalīyastvādeva tadāśra
yaṇam | asakṛdvā prakaraṇena tāvatprayogaḥ prāpnoti | vākyena tu yathādevatāpadānusārātsakṛditi virodhaḥ | kḷptasaṃbandhatvācca vākyaṃ balīyaḥ | kathaṃbhāvena hi, itthaṃ yajeteti prakaraṇinā saha saṃbandhamanumāya yāvadāmnānaṃ śeṣaprayogaḥ | tathā kḷptaprayogaśeṣairātmīyairdevatāpadaiḥ saha punaḥ saṃbandhakalpanamiti viprakarṣaḥ | tasmādbādhaḥ | tataśca devatāśeṣāṇāṃ nityamevāpakarṣo na pākṣikaḥ | sarvadā vā viniyoga iti siddham | atha kramaprakaraṇayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇamiti | yathāsaṃkhyalakṣaṇakramavirodhodāharaṇāsaṃbhavātpurastātparastādvā ' 'mnātasya saṃnidhilakṣaṇenāvāntaraprakaraṇena prāpternaiva kiṃcidudāharaṇamiti viparyayadṛḍhatvenājñānasaṃśayāvatikramyāpi praśnaḥ | śakyaṃ tvihāvāntaraprakaraṇatvaprasaṅganirākaraṇamityabhipretyodāharaṇopanyāsaḥ | rājasūyaprakaraṇe 'bhiṣecanīyasyopari ‘śaunaḥśepamākhyāpayati’ ‘rājanyaṃ jināti’ ‘paṣṭhauhīṃ dīvyati’ ‘abhiṣicyata’ ityevamādīnyāmnāyante | teṣāṃ cāṅgatve naiva
naiva kasyaciditi—caturthādhyāyacaturthapādādyādhikaraṇanyāyenaivāṅgatvasya nirṇītatvāditi śeṣaḥ | kasyacitsaṃdeho vipratipa
vipratipattiḥ—viparyayaḥ |ttirveti śeṣiśeṣasaṃbandhaniścayārthāmidaṃ vicāryate, kiṃ samastarājasūyasyaitānyaṅgāni, utābhiṣecanīyasyaiva atha vikalpaḥ samuccayapakṣāsaṃbhavāditi | prakaraṇasya kramasya ca balābalādetadvijñātavyam | nanu cābhiṣecanīyasyāvāntaraprakaraṇātprāptiriti mahāprakaraṇaṃ bādhyeta | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadyanirākāṅkṣīkṛte 'bhiṣecanīye teṣāṃ pāṭhaḥ syāttato 'vāntaraprakaraṇamavagamyeta | sa tu prāgeva videvanādibhyaḥ prākṛtairdharmairnirākāṅkṣīkṛtaḥ | satyāmapi pratyāsattāvakḷptopakārānetānupakārāpekṣaḥ kraturullaṅaghya prakṛtimapekṣate | tayā ca yogyopakārapradānena pūrite kathaṃbhāve nivṛttaṃ prakaraṇam | samīpāmnātadharmānarthakyāpattibhayādeva punarutpādyeta tataśca kramatvaṃ bhavati | nirākāṅkṣasya hi sata ākāṅkṣā yāvadabhiṣecanīyasyotpādyate
tāvadrājasūyakathaṃbhāvena pratyakṣeṇa siddho viniyogaḥ | tadīyo hi kathaṃbhāvaḥ pavitrā
pavitrāditi—rājasūye pavitrākhya ādimaḥ somayāgaḥ | antimastu kṣattrasya ghṛtiriti |dārabhya kṣattrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanusṛtaḥ śaknoti videvanādīni saṃspaṣṭum | ato nāstyatrāvāntaraprakaraṇamabhiṣecanīyasya | yasyāṃ tu vikṛtau prākṛtaṃ kiṃcidaṅgaṃ saṃkīrtya tasya purastātparastādvā vaikṛtamaṅgamāmnāyate tatra kathaṃbhāvagṛhītāṅgamadhyavartitvātprakaraṇapāṭho vijñāyate | na ceha tadastīti kramasyaiva vyāpāraḥ | saṃnidhāvāmnātena paripūrṇenāpīti—vākyārthapūrṇatvābhiprāyam | anekasyā ' 'mnāyamānasya saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānamātraṃ hi krama iti—kenacitsaṃnidhānasya nāntarīyakatvaṃ darśayati | yo hi bahūnāmarthenā ' 'mnāyate tasya sarvapradhānapratyāsannapradeśāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃbhāvinī kenacitsaha pratyāsattiḥ | na tu prakaraṇapāṭhasyevaṃ nāntarīyakatvam | ataḥ saha pravṛttayoḥ kramaprakaraṇayoḥ prakaraṇasya śīghrataraṃ śrutyarthaprāptiriti balīyastvam | kramasamākhyayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇamiti | atrāpyajñānasaṃśayakṛtapraśnānantaraṃ yaugikatvātsamākhyāyāḥ śrutivacchābdaṃ saṃbandhahetutvamiti balīyastvaṃ manyamānasya viparyastamateḥ praśnaḥ | pauroḍāśikamiti samastameva darśapūrṇamāsakāṇḍamabhidhīyate | tatra sāṃnāyyapātraśundhanakrame śundhadhvamiti mantraḥ paṭhitaḥ | sa ca prakaraṇālliṅgācca dārśapaurṇamāsikapātraśundhanārtha iti sāmānyenāvadhārite tadvi
śeṣe jijñāsāyāṃ saṃdihyate | kiṃ samākhyayā puroḍāśapātrārtho bhavatyatha krameṇa sāṃnāyyapātrārtha iti | yataradbalīyastena viniyokṣyate | tulyabalatvādvikalpo virodhābhāvādvā samuccayaḥ | kramasya ca dṛṣṭabā
dṛṣṭabādhasyeti—śrutyarthaṃ prati viprakṛṣṭasyetyarthaḥ |dhasya saṃbandhānabhidhāyinaścādṛṣṭabādha
adṛṣṭabādhayetiśrutyarthaṃ prati saṃnikṛṣṭayetyarthaḥ |yā saṃbandhābhidhāyinyāca samākhyayā bādha iti prāpte | arthaviprakarṣātsamākhyā bādhyata iti brūmaḥ | tathā hi |

kaḥ punaratrārthaviprakarṣa iti—samākhyāyāmantarṇītasaṃbandhasaṃbandhyabhidhāyitvānna saṃbhavatīti manyate | nirjñāte prakaraṇena kenāpi sahaikavākyatve iti—prakaraṇāvi rodhinaṃ kramaviniyogaṃ kevalasamākhyāpratiyogitvena ca darśayati | kathaṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ na virudhyate | yadā tena sarvārthatvaṃ jñāyamānamitsṛjya kramavaśena kevalasāṃnāyyārthatvaṃ vijñāyate | naiṣaṃ doṣaḥ | yadi hyaprakṛte vayaṃ kramaviniyogamabhyumagacchema tata evaṃ syāt | iha tu prakaraṇena darśapūrṇamāsānyatarārthatve 'vadhārite tadviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ kevala eva kramo vyāpriyata ityavirodhaḥ | nanu sarvārthatvenāvadhāraṇādyataḥ kutaścidapi nivṛttau prakaraṇaṃ bādhyate | na cāvaśyaṃ sarvārthatvaṃ prakaraṇenāvadhāryate | mantrasyaikenāpi saṃbadhya kṛtārthatvāt | prakaraṇināṃ ca mantrantaraipyarthasiddheḥ | sāmānyaviniyogaśrutimātrameva ceha kramātpūrvataraṃ niṣpadyate | tatra tāvadviśeṣaśrutimekaikaṃ prati kalpayati tāvatkrameṇāpi kalpitaiveti prākaraṇikī viśeṣaśrutirupasaṃhriyate | samākhyā punaḥ kramaviparītārthatvādvirudhyate | viprakarṣācca durbalā | sarvo hi saṃbandhaḥ kenacidavāntarasāmānyena bhavati | na ca mantrapuroḍāśayostadvadakḷptaṃ kiṃcidasti | yathā sāṃnāyyena saha deśasāmānyam | laukikastu śabdaḥ samākhyeti—makṣānuvāke parihṛtamapi sadvaidikasaṃbandhaviprakarṣārtha
mupanyasya
upanyasyate iti-na tvasyāḥ samākhyāyā avaidikatvena vaidike 'rthe prāmāṇyāyogoktyarthamityāśayaḥ |te | parastu liṅgānirākaraṇoktenaiva mārgeṇa mūlotkartanenaiva samākhyāṃ nirākṛtāṃ manyamāna āha yadyevamityādi | siddhāntavādi tu bhakṣānuvākoktamevottaraṃ darśayati |

lg.l: tataḥ syādapramāṇatvaṃ sa tu vaidika eva naḥ ||

div.p:
pauroḍāśikaśabdo mantrabrāhmaṇayorapaṭhitatvādavaidiko nāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ | sa ca śabdaḥ syāvaidikatve 'pyanādisaṃbandhatvādvidyamānasmṛtimūlatvācca pramāṇam | pauroḍāśikaśabdo 'sya vācaka iti naitadatīndriyam | śabdārthavyavahāriṇāṃ vṛkṣādiṣviva pratyakṣatvāt | saṃbhavati hi sarveṣāmanyata upalabhya prayogaḥ | ta ddarśayati—bhavati cāsminnarthe puruṣaḥ pramāṇam | yathā sāṃnāyyakrama āmnātaṃ prakaraṇamekavākyatvaṃ vedaśabdaścāyamiti | sarvatra hi puruṣāntarasthadarśanapūrvikā puru
ṣāntarāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ | samānadeśāmnānaṃ prakaraṇapāṭhaṃ padānāṃ parasparasaṃnidhiṃ saṃbandhaṃ vā na vedo vadati | kiṃ tarhi | puruṣeṣvāmanatsu tathā dṛśyate | tairapyevamanyebhyo dṛṣṭamityanāditve 'pi sarveṣāṃ darśanasaṃbhavāt | andhaparamparānyāye nivṛtte bhavati prāmāṇyam | anya
anyathā hīti—atīndriyatva ityarthaḥ | anena ca ye tvanindriyaviṣayā ityetadbhāṣyaṃ viparātāpādanenaindriyakatvadṛ̣dhīkaraṇārthatayā vyākhyātaṃ vijñeyam |thā hi vedāvedaprakaraṇāprakaraṇādīnyapramāṇakānyeva bhaveyuḥ | anekapuruṣasthatvācca nātra kasyacitsvātantryaṃ yaddoṣeṇa doṣāśaṅkā syāt | tasmādbhavatyevānyatra prāmāṇye 'rthaviprakarṣādatra bādhaḥ | sa coktaḥ sūtravyākhyāyām | eva
tadeteṣāmityadhikaraṇārthopasaṃhārabhāṣyaṃ pratyakṣānumānādibādhaprakārāntaraprātipādanaparāta, atha yattatretyādibhāṣyātprāgapakṛṣya vyākhyāsyatievameteṣāmityādinā |meteṣāṃ yathābhāṣyamavasthitānāṃ śrutyādīnām |

idā
‘atha yattatra’ ityārabhya ‘na tanmithyā’ ityantasya bhāṣyasyā ' 'kṣepapū rvametadadhikaraṇoktaśrutiliṅgādibādhaprakāroktyarthatayā parābhimatāṃ vyākhyāṃ dūṣayitumārabhate—idānīmityādinā |nīṃ bādhasya svarūpamākṣepadvāreṇa kathayati—atha yattatra tatrocyate dvayordvayorvirodha idamanena bādhyata idamaneneti | śrutyā liṅgaṃ liṅgena vākyamityādi | tadbādhakaviṣayaṃ prāptaṃ bādhyetāprāptaṃ vā | tadyadi tāvadaprāptaṃ tataḥ samavāya eva nāstīti kiṃ bādhyeta | samavāyasiddhyarthaṃ tvatha prāptaṃ bādhyate tata ubhayorapi prāptaprameyatvāttulyabalatvamiti na bādhasya prāmāṇyam | tatrottaram |

yathaiva mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānānyutpannāni mithyātvakalpanayā bādhyante hānopādānādipha
laviyogācca bādhyavyapadeśaṃ labhante tathā liṅgādinā jñānamapyutpannaṃ sacchrutyādijñānenānuṣṭhānarūpātphalādviyujyamānaṃ bādhiṣyate | na tvetadapyupapadyate | kuta—

tatra nāma praśno bhavati yatprathamaṃ noktam | etāni tu liṅgādīnyarthaviprakarṣādananu mitaśrutīni bādhyanta iti jñānatvānnaiva praśnamarhanti | yadyapi ca pṛcchyate tathā 'pyapasiddhāntenottaraṃ na dātavyam | ananumitaśrutibādhena hyaprāptabādha sthitaḥ | sa idānīṃ prāptabādhopavarṇanena pratyuddhriyeta vinopapattyā | yaducyate sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamānatvāditi | talliṅgādīnāṃ sākṣādapramāṇatvātpramāṇabhūtāyāśca śruteravidyamānatvādanupapannam | atha tu tāmanumāya prāptiriṣyate tato labdhātmakatvādānumānikyāḥ śruteḥ pratyakṣāyāśca na kaścidviśeṣa iti tulyabalatvameva prāpnoti | yadi vā mithyātvakalpanarūpabādhābhyupagamādvirodhe sati tatkalpanādviparītabādhaprasaṅgaḥ | katham—

śrutyādau śīghrataratvātprathamaṃ pravṛtte liṅgādīni pravartante | tatra yadi prāptabādhasiddhyarthaṃ paścātpravartamānamapi liṅgaṃ śrutimanumāpayati tataḥ sā tulyaviṣayasaṃniviṣṭāṃ pūrvāmabādhitvā nā ' 'tmānaṃ labhata iti mṛgatṛṣṇādiṣviva mithyātvaṃ kalpayantyeva jāyamānā bādhikā syāt | tasmānnaiṣa śrutyādiṣu grantho ghaṭata iti | yadyapya
adhikaraṇāntopasaṃhārāditi—balābalādhikaraṇasya bādhagranthānta upasaṃhārādityarthaḥ |dhikaraṇāntopasaṃhārāttadviṣayaḥ pratibhāti tathā 'pi sāmarthyātpūṣādyanumantraṇavadutkṛṣyate | vijñātaprakāratvānnaivāyamatha yattatra tatreti śrutyādiṣu bādhaḥ saṃbadhyate | kiṃ tarhi | bādhādhikārādihā ' 'cāryasya yāvantaḥ śāstropanibaddhā bādhabhedāste sarve hṛdayamanuprāptāḥ | teṣāṃ ca na śrutyādisadṛśo bādha upapadyate | sarvatra caikarūpeṇa bādhamārgeṇa bhavitavyam | ato yadi vā tadīyaḥ prakāraḥ śrutyādiṣvastu śrutyādiprakāro vā teṣu | tatra śrutyādigatastāvatsaṃpratyeva kathita iti kiṃ tena pṛṣṭena | ye tvetadvyatiriktāsteṣu kathāmiti manyamāno vadati | atha yattatra tatrocyata idamanena bādhyate—pratyakṣeṇānumānaṃ, mṛgatṛṣṇādi
pratyayāśca, yathāsvaṃ ṣaḍbhirapi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇābhāsaḥ, śrutyā smṛtiḥ, āptāvigītasmṛtyā 'nāptavigītasmṛtiḥ, adṛṣṭārthayā dṛṣṭārthā, śrutiprabhavayā liṅgādiprabhavā 'rthavādaprabhavā ca, smṛtyā 'pyācāraḥ, so 'pyabhiyuktatarācāreṇa, saṃdigdhamasaṃdigdhena, durbalāśrayaṃ balavadāśrayeṇa, upasaṃhārasthamupakramasthena, atyantādṛṣṭārthaṃ niyamādṛṣṭārthena, ārādupakārakatvaṃ sāmavāyikatvena, anekārthavidhānamekārthavidhānena, anekaśabdārthatvamekaśabdārthatvena, bahubādho 'lpabādhena, vedāntarotpannaṃ vedāntaravihitatvena, paraśākhāvihitaṃ svaśākhāvihitena, nityaṃ naimittikena, dviprakāramapyetatkratvarthaṃ puruṣārthena, anārabhyādhītaṃ prakaraṇādhītena, paurvāparyeṇa virodhe pūrvaṃ pareṇa prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtena, prayogavacanāśritaṃ codakāśrayeṇa niṣprayojanaṃ saprayojanena, brāhmaṇakramo mantrakrameṇa, devatāśrayaṃ dravyāśrayeṇa, paścādāmnātaṃ pūrvāmnātena, alpaṃ bhūyasā, gauṇaṃ mukhyena, sāmānyavihitaṃ viśeṣavihitena, sāvakāśaṃ niravakāśena, aṅgaṃ pradhānena, aṅgadharmaḥ pradhānadharmeṇa, tatsarvameva kiṃ prāptaṃ bādhyate, atha śrutyādivadevāprāptamiti | tadyadi tāvacchrutyādivatsāmānyaviśeṣātideśaupadeśikādiṣvapyaprāptabādhastato 'vaśyaṃ liṅgādāviva śruterviniyojakasya śāstrasyābhāvo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | tathā sati tasyaikatvādvirodhaviṣayavaditaratrāpyabhāva iti sārvatrikabādhaprasaṅgaḥ | athāvirodhāpekṣayā sadbhāvo 'bhyupagamyeta tata itaratrāpi sadbhāva eveti tulyabalatvāpattiḥ | viśeṣaśāstrādyanupamardena cā ' 'tmalābhābhāvāttadabhyupagame viparītabādhaprasaṅgaḥ | na hyekasyaiva śāstrasya kiṃcitprati sadbhāvaḥ kiṃcitpratyasattvamiti yujyate | tena dadhi brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāya, prakṛtivatkuryāccharamayaṃ barhirityādau pratibrāhmaṇaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ ca śāstrābhāvādekaṃ śāstram | tadyadi śaratakrālocanena kuśakauṇḍinyayornāstītyavadhāryate tataḥ prayājādimāṭharādiṣvapyapravṛttiḥ | atha teṣvasti tataḥ kuśakauṇḍinyayorapi bhavitavyam | atha tau prati nāstītarānpratyastītyetadapyekavastuni vipratiṣedhānniṣpramāṇakam | na cātra pratipattṛbhedo vidyate | yena saṃba
saṃbandhagrahaṇādavirodha iti pā.ndhagrahaṇāgrahaṇava
saṃbandhagrahaṇāgrahaṇavadavirodha iti—jñānaṃ hi puruṣādhāraṃ tadbhedānna virotsyate | puruṣāntarasaṃsthaṃ ca nājñānaṃ tena bādhyate || ityādisaṃbandhākṣepaparihārasthaślokavārtikoktanyāyenetyarthaḥ |davirodhaḥ syāt | na ca sakṛdgṛhyamāṇatvācchāstrabhedo 'vagamyate | yenānyasyaiva sattvamanyasya cāsattvamityabhidhīyeta | vyaktipakṣe ca kadācidetadbhavet | ākṛtipakṣe tu yāgagatavyāpārātideśapakṣe ca viṣayaikatvādyugapadekameva śāstraṃ pravartate | etenaivotkālanabādhanaṃ pratyuktam | brāhmaṇaprakṛtivacchabdayostulyahetutvena kiṃcidvarjanāsaṃbhavāt | tathā ca ‘tadvarjaṃ tu( a. 3 pā. | 6 a. 1 sū. 3 ) vacanaprāpte’ ityuktvā ‘na coda( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 1 sū. 8 )nārthakātsnyāt |’
ityuttaraṃ dāsyati | pauruṣeye 'pi tāvadvākye hṛdayā
hṛdayārthatayeti—vaktṛhṛdaye vidyamānatayā varjenarūpo 'rtho bhavedityarthaḥ |rthatayā, vinā śabdavyāpāreṇaiva tadvarjaṃ mayā prayuktamityevamīśvarājñānurūpeṇa bhavenna tvetadvede 'vakalpate | na ceha sāmānyaśāstrātparato viśeṣaśāstrāṇi kalpyante | yena sāmānyaśāstrasya tatprakṛtitvamātramāśritya viśeṣaśāstrāpekṣayā sadasadbhāvavirodhaḥ parihriyeta | tasmā
yadyaprāptamiti bhāṣyārthamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi |davaśyaṃbhāvinyaikarūpye nābhipretabādho 'vakalpate | atha kathaṃcitprāptabādhameva mithyātvakalpanayā ' 'śrityaivamādiṣvavirodha ityucyate tata evaṃ śrutyādīnāmapi prāptabādho 'ṅgīkartavyaḥ | tatra coktam | ato na bā
na bādhamārgaikarūpyamiti—anena ca yadyapi sarvatra bādhaikarūpyamucitaṃ tasya cāsaṃbhavānna kvacidvede bādho ghaṭata ityevaṃ praśnabhāṣyāśayo darśitaḥ |dhamārgaikarūpyaṃ ghaṭata iti | taducyate |

yathaivaite purastādbādhagocarā bhedā varṇitā naiteṣvaikarūpyamaṅgīkṛtaṃ tathā 'tra na bādhaprakāranānātve 'pi gamyamāne kaścidvirodhaḥ | tatra śrutyādiṣu tāvadyathokta evāprāptabādhaḥ | na ca tatra kiṃcidvirudhyate | tadviṣayaprāptyantarānabhyupagamāt | ye 'pyetacchāyānupātino 'rthaviprakarṣādeva smṛtyādibādhā bhavanti te 'pi hetusāmarthyakathanācchrutyādibādhenaiva vyākhyātāḥ | ye tu pramāṇatadābhāsanityanaimittikakratvarthapuruṣārthapaurvāparyaprākṛtavaikṛtasāmānyaviśeṣaniṣprayojanasaprayojanālpabhūyastvasāvakāśānavakāśāṅgapradhānataddharmabādhāsteṣvidamuktaṃ prāptaṃ bādhyata iti | kathamiti | śrutyādivailakṣaṇyavismitasya praśnaḥ | uttaramāha—sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamānatvāditi | darśitametadbrāhmaṇaprakṛtivacchabdayoḥ | yattu prāptasya jñānasyānutpādocchedasaṃskāravicchedānāmaśakyatvānnāsti bādhanamiti | tatrā ' 'ha—naiva nivartate | kiṃ tarhi | mithyājñānametaditi pratyayāntaraṃ bhavatīti| śāstrāntaraṃ hyananyagati dṛṣṭvā mṛgatṛṣṇādivadeva sāmānyāpahṛtabuddhermameyaṃ bhrāntiḥ pūrvametadviṣayaparikalpanayā jātetyadhyavasyati | tasmātprayājādimāṭharādiprāptivelāyāmupajātā 'pi kuśakauṇḍinyabuddhirbhrāntiriti niścitya phalavimuktatvānubaddhamarthaṃ śāstraṃ vā bādhituṃ manyate | kiṃ nu khalvamithyājñānasya rūpa
miti—yadyutpannā api pratyayāḥ pratyayāntarairitthaṃ nirākriyante tato 'nyatrāpi ka āśvāsa iti manyate | tatkathayati | yasyānveṣaṇe 'pi kṛte bādhakapratyayāntaraṃ notpadyata iti | yattu kāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ dvitīyamupalakṣaṇaṃ tallokaviṣayatvānna vede saṃbhavatīti nopanyastam | prāsaṅgikamuktvedānīmadhikaraṇamu
adhikaraṇamupasaṃhṛtyeti—anena ‘tadetepāmiti’ bhāṣyasyādhyāyārthopasaṃhāraparatābhrāntirnirastā veditavyā |pasaṃhṛtyādhikaraṇāntaramārabhyate || 14 ||
nanvadhyāyādau yāvānarthaḥ pratijñātaḥ sa sarvaḥ paryavasitaḥ | kimidānīmavaśiṣyate, yena caturthalakṣaṇaṃ nā ' 'rabhyate | taducyate |

tatra prakaraṇasya tāvacchrutiliṅgavākyaiḥ saha virodhāvirodhau saṃpradhā(a. 3 pā. 6 a. 7) ityataḥ prācīneṣvadhikaraṇeṣviti śeṣaḥryeti | jyotiṣṭome śrūyate ‘tisra eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryā dvādaśāhīnasya’ iti | tatra sāhnaśabdena tāvadahnā samāpyamānatvāt ‘sahaivāhnā saṃsthāpayanti’ ityevaṃ jyotiṣṭomo gṛhyata iti tryupasattvaṃ tasya | dvādaśāhīnasyeti tu dvādaśopasattvaṃ kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasyāthāhīnasya dvādaśāhāderiti saṃdihyate | yadyahīnaśabdaḥ kathaṃcijjyotiṣṭome 'pyupapadyate tataḥ prakaraṇasyāvirodhāttasminneva niveśaḥ | athāhīna ityahargaṇanāmadheyaṃ tataḥ śrutyā saṃyuktatvādasaṃyuktagrahaṇasvabhāvena
prakaraṇenāgrahaṇam | asti hi tadānīṃ śrutiprakaraṇayorvirodhaḥ | kiṃ prāptam | siddhāntenopakramaṃ vāśabdena vyāvartya prakaraṇājjyotiṣṭomārthatvamiti pratijānīmahe | na ca śrutivirodhaḥ | prakaraṇādevāhīnaśabdasyāpi jyotiṣṭomagāmitvāt | asti ca nañsamāsānvākhyānena tadabhidhānasāmarthyam | ato yadyapi ‘ahnaḥ khaḥ kratusamūhe’ ityevaṃ vyutpādyamāno 'hargaṇavācyahīnaśabdo bhavati tathā 'pi virodhaparihārārthamahīnaguṇayogādeva jyotiṣṭomārthaḥ samarthanīyaḥ | sa hi kṛtsnavidhānātsarvaprakṛtitvācca na kutaściddhīyate | na cainaṃ kecidapi ṛtavaḥ prakṛtitvena jahati | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ dakṣiṇayā kratukaraṇairvā na hīyata iti | tadasaṃbaddham | dakṣiṇākratukaraṇapratipattinimittānupādānādyathāruci vikalpanāyāṃ vā 'navasthitasamāsārthaprasaṅgāt | sahasradakṣiṇādikratubhyaśca dakṣiṇābhirhīnatvātkratuka
kratukaraṇairiti—āgneyādikratupaśubhirityarthaḥ |raṇairapi vikārabhūtokthyādisaṃsthābhyo 'gniṣṭomasaṃsthasya nyūnatvāt | tasmādvidhyantadānenāyaṃ na kaṃcijjahāti, kenacidvā na hīyata ityahīnaḥ | prakaraṇasāmarthyādanena guṇayogenocyata iti gauṇo na gauṇavṛttyāśravaṇāt || 15 ||

lg.l: asaṃyogācca tenāsya yā saṃkhyā tena saṃgatā |

div.p:
yattu guṇāttatra pravartsyatīti tadvikalpya nirākaroti | yadi tāvadgauṇa ityupacārātpravṛtto 'bhidhīyate tato na prakaraṇānurodhena śrutyarthaparityāgo yuktaḥ | na cedamarthavādārthaṃ
yenaikāho 'pi praśaṃsitumahargaṇavadupacaryate | na cāsya śabdāntaraṃ nāsti yena siṃhaguṇasamūha ivetthaṃ kleśena pratipādyate | tasmādaupacārikatvaṃ tāvadayuktam | na ca nañsamāsenāvayavavyutpattiḥ | samudāyaprasiddhyā tannirākaraṇāt | na ca nañsamāsasya lakṣaṇamasti | nañsamāse hi satyavyayapūrvapadaprakṛtisvarasattvādādyudāttatvaṃ syāt | madhyodāttastvayaṃ paṭhyate | tena khapratyayāntatādhyavasānam | tathā hi sati ‘āyannādiṣūpadeśivadvacanaṃ svarasiddhyartham’ ityevamīnādeśa āśrīyamāṇe pratyayādyudāttatvenekāre svaraḥ sidhyati | tasmādahargaṇanāmadheyametat | api ca—

sāhnaśabdenaivadvādaśatvasaṃbandhe 'pyavakalpyamāne 'hīnapadopādānādasya śāstrasyārthāntaravācitvaṃ vijñāyate | prakaraṇādvā tritvadvādaśatvayoḥ saṃbandhe labdhe dvāvapi sāhnāhīnaśabdāvanarthakau syātām | arthāntaratve tvahīnasya sa tāvadavaśyopādatavyaḥ | tataścā ' 'nantaryāttritvasyāpi tatsaṃbandha eva prasajyata iti vyavasthārthaṃ sāhnagrahaṇamapyarthavat | tasmādapakarṣa iti | na tu
evaṃ yathābhāṣyaṃ tāvadadhikaraṇaṃ vyākhyāya tatra svābhiprāyaṃ vaktumārabhate—na tvityādinā | kilaitadyuktam | paraprakaraṇe 'nyadharmavidheranyāyyatvāttena vā 'saṃbandhapadavyavāyavicchinnasya prakaraṇasya punaranusaṃdhānakleśād ‘dvādaśopasadaḥ’ iti ca dvādaśāhaprakaraṇe vihitatvāttatprakṛtitvena sarvāhīneṣu tatprāpteḥ | atastritvamevāsminvākye sarvadoṣarahitvādvidhīyate dvādaśatvaṃ tvahīnasaṃbandhivākyāntarādeva prāptamaucityarūpeṇāsya stutyarthaṃ nivītādivadanūdyata iti | kathaṃ tarhyadhikaraṇaṃ netavyam | taducyate |

etaduktaṃ bhavati | kiṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'hīnastasya tedaṃ prakaraṇādaṅgaṃ vidhīyate | athāhargaṇastasya ca prāptamevānyārthamanūdyata iti | nanvevaṃ satyahargaṇasaṃbaddhamapyetajjyotiṣṭomasyaiva stutyarthamupayuktamiti prakaraṇavirodhavicārābhāvaḥ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | pūrvapakṣe hi dvādaśatvasya vidhīyamānasya prakaraṇaṃ grāhakaṃ bhavatītyanugṛhyate | siddhānte tvahargaṇa
saṃyuktasya prakaraṇaṃ neṣṭamiti bādhyeta | anyattvetat, yattathā satyapi prakārā
prakārāntareṇeti—prakaraṇasyāviniyojakatve 'pidvādaśatvasya prakṛtajyotiṣṭomasaṃbandhitritvastutyarthatvenetyarthaḥ | ayamāśayaḥ | uktarūpeṇa ‘dvādaśāhīnasya’ ityasya va kyāntaraprāptāhīnasaṃbandhidbādaśatvānuvādakasya prakaraṇapāṭhārthavattve 'pi prakaraṇasya viniyoga eva prāmāṇyādbiniyogābhāve prakaraṇabādho bhavatyeveti |ntareṇa prakaṇa evopayuktamiti | yadā tu dvitvabahutvanyā
dvitvabahutvanyāyeneti—anantarādhikaraṇavakṣyamāṇanyāyenetyarthaḥ |yenotkarṣo 'pi kathaṃcidāśrīyate, śākhāntaravidhau ca satyapi śākhāntarīyasya prayojanāntararahitasya vidhitvamupapadyate tadā yathābhāṣyameva śakyaṃ samarthayitum | sarvathā ‘dvādaśāhīnasya’ ityetattāvadahargaṇaviṣayatavātprakaraṇādutkṛṣyata iti siddham || 16 ||

pūrvavadeva vicāraḥ | etāvattu bhidyate | pūrvatra pradhānāntareṇa prakṛtāsamarthaśabdābhidheyena saha saṃbandha āsīdiha tu guṇena yajamānadvitvādinā kathaṃcidāśaṅikataprakṛtasaṃbandhena | tatra pūrvanyāyenaiva siddhāntopakramaṃ sūtram | na tāvadiha yajamānadvitvabahutve vidhīyete | siddhānuvādena nimittīkṛtya pravṛtteḥ pratipadvidhiparatvāt | anekavidhau ca vākyabhedāt | avihitatvācca na jyotiṣṭome yajamānadvitvabahutve vidyete | kulāyādiṣu tvekāheṣvahīneṣu ca pratyakṣavihite vidyete | ‘rājapurohitau yajeyātām’ ‘etenaiva dvau yājayet’ ‘etenaiva trīnyājayet’ ‘eko dvau bahavo vā 'hīnairyajeran’ iti | tasmādutkarṣaḥ || 17 ||

prakaraṇājjyotiṣṭome niveśaḥ | na cāhīnavadaprakṛtayajñasaṃbandho 'sti | yajamānadvitvādisaṃbandhastu nimittamātraupayikatvānnāṅgāṅgibhāvāya prabhavati | na ca taddvāreṇa kratusaṃbandho ghaṭate | lakṣaṇāprasaṅgāt | na hi śrutyopayuktānāṃ lakṣaṇayopayogāntaraṃ yujyate | dvitvādisvarūpasaṃbandhe tu vidhirevānarthako bhavet | phalakalpanāyāśca prakaraṇasaṃbandhakalpanā jyāyasī | yattu nimittaṃ prakaraṇe nāstīti | taducyate 'rthādbhaviṣyati | na hi vihitamevaikaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati | arthaprāptasyāpyupapadyamānatvāt | asti caikāśaktipakṣe dvitrādiyajamānaprāptiḥ | na cādyāpi yajamānaikatvavivakṣāmavadhārayāmaḥ | satyāmapi ca vivakṣāyām ‘api(a. 6 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 2) vā 'pyekadeśe syāt’ ityanena yathaivāśakteranyatkiṃcidaṅgaṃ hāpyate tathaiva yajamānaikatvamapi kadācitparihāpya dvau bahavo vā yajeraṃstataścāsti nimittam | athavaitadeva pratipadvidhānaṃ dṛṣṭvā 'ryād dvibahuyajamānakartṛśrutiṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ | sā caitasminneva pakṣe bhavati na pratipadantarapakṣeṣviti naikatvacodanā virotsyate || 18 ||

prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ prakṛtapratipattyartham | aupadeśikatvādvā 'tyantānatikramārtham | ātideśikaṃ hyarthavaśena bādhyetāpi | pratyakṣavihitaṃ tvetatkāmye nitye ca | yajetetyekavacanaśravaṇāt | na cāsyāvivakṣāyāṃ kāraṇamasti | yathā ca vivakṣā tathā ṣaṣṭhe pratipāda( a. 6 pā. 2 a. 2 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥyi
ṣyate | yadapyaśaktikṛtaṃ hāpanaṃ tadapyeko yathā śaknuyādityupabandhādanyāṅgaviṣayaṃ vijñāyate | śaknoti hi dakṣiṇāparimāṇaṃ parityajyaiko 'pi nirvartayitum | utpattiprayogacodanāsthatvācca saṃkhyānugraha eva yuktaḥ | tasmādekayajamānakatvānna prakṛtau nimittamastītyutkṛṣye | yattvidameva vacanaṃ sāmarthyādākṣepsyatīti | tanna | anyathā 'pyupapadyamānatvāt | yadi hyetannimittamanākṣipadanarthakībhavettata ākṣipet | kathaṃ caitadanarthakaṃ bhavedyadi prakṛtāvivānyatrāpi dvitvabahutve na syātām | nanu te anyatra na staḥ | kulāyādau vidyamānatvāt | iha ca siddhavannimittatvenopādānādvākyabhedaprasaṅgācca nārthā dākṣepamarhataḥ | patnyabhiprāye tu dvitve nityatvānnimittopādānānarthakyam | bahubhya iti ca virūpaikaśeṣaḥ, svarasataḥ puṃbahutvapratītau satyāṃ vidhirniṣpramāṇaḥ kalpyeta | ‘kṣaume vasānau’ ityatra tvagatyā patnyāṃ dvitīyaśabda iṣṭaḥ | na hi dviyajñavaddvipuruṣakamādhānaṃ kvacidvihitam | ekadvipatnīkaprayogāvarodhācca nityayāḥ pratipada ānarthakyaṃ bhavet | viṣamaśiṣṭavikalpo vā 'bhyupagamyeta tasmādapyutkṛṣyate | yattu kratusaṃbandho nābhihita iti naiṣa doṣaḥ | pratipacchabdādeva kratugāmitvapratītau satyāṃ dvitvādinā viśeṣapratipattisiddheḥ | yajamānaśabdo vā 'nyathānupapattyā yajñamupasthāpayiṣyati | tasmādvyatiriktasaṃyoge satyasti prakaraṇavirodhastatra ca śruterbalīyastvam || 19 ||

utkarṣabuddherapavādaḥ prastūyate | ‘jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti’ iti guṇapradhānatvavacanavyaktidvayātsaṃdehaḥ | yadi jāghanīṃ saṃskāryatvenodiśya patnīsaṃyājāḥ saṃskārakā vidhīyante tataḥ saṃskāryasya prādhānyātsvasthānāparityāge sati yatra jāghanī tatra patnīsaṃyājā na yatra te tatrāsau | sā ca lokasthā niṣprayojanatvānna saṃskriyata ityagnī ṣomīyagatā kṛtārthatvātsaṃskartavyā | yadi tu patnīsaṃyājoddeśena jāghanī vidhīyate tataḥ prakṛtānuvādabuddhyanapāyāddarśapūrṇamāsayoreva jāghanīvidhānam | kiṃ prāptam | ārādupakārakatvātsāmavāyikatvasyābhyarhitatvādanyatra dhātvarthavidhānādvidhipratyāsatterekadeśadravyāṇāṃ cāprayojakatvāttathā sati ca paraprayuktakṛtārthagrahaṇena pratipattilakṣaṇāpatteragnīṣomīyajāghanīsaṃskāravidhānādutkarṣa iti | sā tatsaṃbaddhā kartavyetyucyata iti cchedaḥ | paraṃ ca karmaka
karmakathanamiti—karma-anuṣṭhānaṃ kathyate 'neneti vyutpatyā, evaṃ satītibhāṣyamanuṣṭhānaviśeṣapradarśanārthamityarthaḥ |thanamevaṃ satītyādi | yadi punaḥ, ucyate evaṃ satīti yojyate tataḥ paricodanācchāyāpatteḥ | na ca tadyuktam, uttarānabhidhānāt | tasmādātmavacanatvenaiva yojyam | nanvevaṃ sati pratipadādivadevotkarvātprakṛtau patnīsaṃyājānāmakaraṇaṃ prāpnoti | prāpnuyādevam | yadi paśau patnīsaṃyājā na syuḥ | te tvatideśaprāptāstatra vidyamānā eva kevalaṃ jāghanīsaṃbandhitvena vidhīyante | naiva tarhyutkarṣa iti vaktavyam | satyam | na kasyacitpadārthasyotkarṣa idameva tu vākyaṃ vikṛtau kāryaṃ kurvadutkṛṣyata ityucyate || 20 ||
na vā 'sya vidherutkarṣa iti | kutaḥ |

sarvatraivaṃvidhe vākye guṇe vidhiśaktiḥ saṃcaratītyuktam | patnīsaṃyājāścānantaravihitā manasi vartanta iti na vidhātuṃ śakyante | na ceha sthitena paśugatapatnīsaṃyā jānuvādo yuktaḥ | tadbuddhyabhāvāt | na ca jāghanyāḥ kālādivadanupādeyatvaṃ, yenemaṃ vidhimākarṣet | saṃskāryatvāditi cet | na | tṛtīyāvagataguṇatvātikramapramāṇābhāvāt | yadi ca kṛtārthāṃ jāghanīṃ pramtutyāyaṃ vidhiḥ pravarteta tathā 'pi tāvatkadācitprayājaśeṣavaddvitīyārthe tṛtīyeti vyākhyāyeta | sā tvapūrvā vidhīyate | tasmānnotkarṣamarhati | na ca prakaraṇabaddhatvādete patnīsaṃyājā utkarṣaṃ sahante | vākyabalīyastvāditi cenna | vākyasyāpyevamāderadhikṛtāpekṣitvena prakaraṇāddurbalataratvāt | yadi hyetadeva patnīsaṃyājānāmutpattivākyaṃ bhavettataḥ prakaraṇādācchindyāt | ete tu vākyāntarotpattitvātsaṃvidhivaśena yāvatā kālenaitena vākyena saṃgṛhyante tāvatā darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmapi śakyā grahītum | na ca jāghanyāḥ phalavattvaṃ vijñātaṃ, yenaiṣāṃ prayojanākāṅkṣāmapanayet | ato
yāvadasau kimarthetyālocyate tāvatphalavaddarśapūrṇamāsaprasūtena kathaṃbhāvenāṅgatvamāpāditam | na cehāpūrvayāgavidhānaṃ, yajimātratvenāśravaṇāt | patnīsaṃbaddhayāgaśravaṇaṃ hyetat | tatra yadi jāghanyuddeśena ca karma vidhīyate patnyaścāsya vidhīyante tato 'nekārthavidhānāt ‘aika( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 8 )śabdye parārthavat’ iti vairūpyalakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ syāt | alpārthavidhisaṃbhavācca na viśiṣṭavidhānena parihāro ghaṭate | tasmādviśiṣṭaṃ yāgamuddiśya dravyaṃ vidhīyate | nanvevamapi viśiṣṭānuvādātsutarāṃ vākyaṃ bhidyeta | naiṣa doṣaḥ | prakaraṇaprāpteḥ patnīśabdasyātantratvāt | yathaiva ‘abhikrāmaṃ juhoti’ iti sāmānyaśabdo 'pyadhikārātprayājaviṣayo bhavati tathaiva yatsaṃyājayantītyetāvataivādhikṛtāḥ patnīsaṃyājā; pratyeṣyante | tasmādanutkarṣaḥ || 21 ||
yaduktam ‘ekadeśa(a. 4 pā. 1 a. 13 sū. 28)dravyaścotpattau vidyamānasaṃyogāt’ aprayojaka iti | tatrocyate || 22 ||

sa nāmāprayojako bhavati yasya prakṛtagrahaṇādvinā 'rtho na jñāyate | yathā ‘uttarārdhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyati’ iti | jāghanīśabdastu hṛdayadiśabdavadākṛtivacanaḥ | sā cāntareṇāpi paśūpādānaṃ paraprayuktapaśūpajīvanaṃ vā śakyopādātum | ‘rūpaṃ vā(a. 7 pā. 3 a. 11 sū. 29) 'śeṣabhūtatvāt’ iti yathākathaṃcidutpannā yena kenacidupādāya śakyā 'nuṣṭhātum | na ceyamavayavabhūtā loke na pracarati | māṃsavikrayiṇo hi pratyaṅgavibhaktāneva paśūnvikrīṇate | tatra śakyā jā
ghanī krayādinopādātum | na cāvaśyamiyaṃ chāgādeva grahītavyā | jaghanāvayavamātratvena śravaṇāt | agnīṣomīye 'pi hṛdayādīnāṃ saṃbhavatyeva lokādupādānam | tathā satyapi tu teṣāṃ bhedenaiva jātiviśeṣa utpattiprakāraśca saṃjñapanādirniyata iti krayādyanāśrayaṇam | na tviha tathā śāstrakṛtā niṣpattiḥ | prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsapratipattyartham | tasmāddārśapaurṇamāsikapatnīsaṃyājāṅgabhūtenā ' 'jyena saha vikalpyamānā jāghanīti siddham || 23 ||

iha vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhāvirodhacintā | jyotiṣṭome somābhiṣavādhāratvena phalakadvayamāmnātam | tatprakṛtya śrūyate ‘dīrghasome saṃtṛdyādbhṛtyai’ iti | bhittvā
bhitveti—dvayoḥ samībhūtayoḥ phalakayoḥ saṃśleṣārthaṃ bhedanena saṃśleṣapradeśaṃ tanūkṛtyaikasyoparyaparaṃ sthāpayitvā kīlādinā saṃśleṣayediti yāvat | saṃghātayedityarthaḥ | tatra dīrghasomaśabdaḥ kiṃ prakṛtāveva kathaṃcidupapadyate tataścāvirodhaḥ prakaraṇasya, atha dīrghakālasatrāhīnagrāhitvādanupapadyamāna utkarṣediti saṃśayaḥ | ete cātra pakṣā bhaviṣyanti | kiṃ śuddha eva jyotiṣṭome niveśo dīrghayajamānake vā 'thavokthyādisaṃsthāsvevāthavā satrāhīnayorevāthavā 'gniṣṭomānyamātra iti | kiṃ prāptaṃ, dīrghasomaśabdasyeṣṭipaśudarvihomāpekṣayā prakṛtāvevopapatteḥ, saṃtardanaprayojanasya ca dāṛdhyasya saṃbhavāt, asaṃtardanavidhinā ca saha vrīhiyavavadvikalpasiddheḥ prakaraṇānugrahāyānutkarṣa iti | krayaṇavadvikalpa ityupariṣṭā( a. 12 pā. 4 a. 3 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥtsamuccayasthāpanātpūrvapakṣeṇa dṛṣṭānta iti vyākhyeyam | na cāvaśyaṃ sarvatra siddhānta eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati | yasya kasyacinnidarśanasya pratipattikāraṇatvasiddheḥ | asaṃtardanavākyamanupanyasyaiva vā 'narthalopadṛṣṭāntaḥ krayavaditi samarthanīyaḥ |
tatraivaṃ yojanā bhavati | nanvalpakālatvātsomasya prakṛtau mandaphalaṃ saṃtardanam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | krayaṇavadarthatvāt | yathā 'lpamūlyatvātsomasya vāsaḥprabhṛtīnāmekena kenacitkraye siddhe śeṣāṇi vacanasāmarthyāddīyamānāni tasyaivā ' 'natasya sutarāmānatiṃ kurvantīti na luptārthāni bhavanti | svānatātkrītaḥ somo 'bhyudayakārī bhavatīti ca śāstrārtho vijñāyate | tathā 'tra satyapyasaṃtṛṇṇayorapi prakṛtābhiṣavakṣamatve vacanasāmarthyāddṛḍhatarakṛto 'bhiṣavaḥ śreyaskara ityavagamādaluptārthatvam | tasmādanutkarṣa iti || 24 ||
vākyakṛtādvā dīrghesomasaṃyogādutkarṣaḥ | kutaḥ |

na hīṣṭipaśudarvihomāpekṣayā somasya dīrghatvaṃ yuktaṃ vijātīyatvādanupāttatvācca | sarvatra pratiyoginyupāte dīrghahrasvādivibhāgo bhavati | na cātreṣṭayādaya upāttā yānālocya jyotiṣṭomo dīrgha ityucyeta | nanu somayāgabhedo 'pyanupātta eva | yadyapyanupāttastathā 'pi tulyajātīyatvaṃ tāvadastyapekṣākāraṇam | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvācca somatve sati dīrghatvamupādīyamānaṃ somāntarasya vyavacchedārthameva vijñāyate | teṣāṃ kaḥ punardīrghaḥ kuto vā dīrgha ityapekṣite jyotiṣṭomastāvanna kutaściddīrgha iti tato 'nye gṛhyante | teṣāṃ ca prāthamyātsa evāpekṣākāraṇaṃ bhavati || 25 ||

yathākathaṃciddīrghasomaśabde 'vakalpyamāne na yuktaḥ prakaraṇabādhaḥ | sa ca kartṛdvāreṇopapatsyate | na ca svaragataḥ kaścitsamāse viśeṣo 'sti | ubhayathā 'pyantodāttatvāt | ataḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa iti || 26 ||

kratuta eva dairghyaṃ samānādhikaraṇasamāsa ityarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | evamubhayoḥ svārtha eva vādo bhaviṣyati | anyathaikasya paraviśeṣaṇatvātsvapradhānabhūtārthavādānupapattirbhavet | evaṃ ca bahusomābhiṣavāddṛḍhatvākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ dṛṣṭārtho 'yaṃ vādo bhaviṣyati | anyathā mandatvāddṛḍhatvākāṅkṣāyāstadanupapattiḥ syāt | tathā ‘dhṛtyai’ ityarthavādo 'sumevārthaṃ dyotayati | tasmādyatra phalakayordāraṇaśaṅkā tatraivaitādvidhānam | itarathā dīrgheṇa kartrā viśeṣaṇamatyantādṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavet | dīrghe hrasve ca kartari karmaṇastulyarūpatvāt | bā
bāhyaṃ ceti—dīrghasya yajamānasya soma iti tatpuruṣapakṣe karturyāgāsamavāyitvādbahiraṅgatvamityarthaḥ |hyaṃ caitatkartrā viśeṣaṇam | sva
svato viśeṣaṇamiti—karmadhārayapakṣe dairdhyasya yāgasamavāyitvādantaraṅgatvamityarthaḥ |to viśeṣaṇaṃ tvantaraṅgam | tasmādutkarṣaḥ || 27 ||

paricodanāpadottarabhūtametatsūtram | mā nāmāgniṣṭomasaṃsthāyāṃ niveśo 'bhūdukthyādiṣu tvagniṣṭomāpekṣayā dīrghasomaśabda upapatsyate prakaraṇaṃ cānugrahīṣyate | tasmāttisṛṣvapi saṃsthāsu niveśa iti | prakaraṇāviśeṣaḥ saṃsthādhikaraṇenādyāpi na nirākṛta ityeva yuktam | athavā 'styeva saṃsthānāṃ prakaraṇam | tatra yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagniṣṭomārthatā saṃbhavati teṣu nityānityasaṃyogavirodhādyāvartate | saṃtardanasya punarnityenāgrahaṇātkevalānityaviṣayatvaṃ na virudhyate | tasmātsaṃsthāsu niveśa ityukte 'bhidhīyate |

satyapyatra karmakālayordīrghatve tāvānevātideśaprāpto daśamuṣṭiḥ somo 'bhiṣūyate | dhāraṇasya tu tulyatvāddṛṣṭārthatvārthavādayoranupapattiḥ syāt | pra
ukthyādiṣu vā 'rthasya vidyamānatvāditi sūtrasthabhāṣyatātparyārthamāha—pradānetyādinā |dānavivṛddhyā nyūnapātrāgrahaṇācca somavṛddhirbhaviṣyatīti cenna | daśamu
aviśeṣātstutirvyartheti ceditisūtrasthabhāṣyābhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti—daśamuṣṭītyādinā |ṣṭitriparvaparimāṇayoḥ śābdatvātpradāna vivṛddhistoyādivṛddhyā saṃpādanīyā | tasmādaviśiṣṭaṃ dhāraṇamityutkarṣaḥ || 28 || || 29 || 30||

syādvā tenaiva hetunā saṃsvāsu niveśaḥ | pradānavivṛddhyā ca pradeyavivṛddhau satyāmarthavāda upapatsyate | toyena vivṛddhiriti cenna | somasādhanakatve sati vacanādvinā
dravyāntaraprakṣepānupapatteḥ | tasmātsoma eva vardhanīyaḥ | sa ca sthaulyabahuparvatvayorasaṃbhavāddīrghaparvā grahīṣyate | tathā sati pradānavivṛddhiryathoktaṃ ca parimāṇaṃ saṃbhāvitaṃ bhaviṣyati | prakaraṇadīrghasomaśabdau copapatsyete | śakyaṃ cedānīṃ latādairdhyeṇāpi somo dīrgha iti vaktum | anityatvāditi—niyataparimāṇatvasyāniyatatvāditi manyate | śakyaṃ hyupāyāntareṇa pūrvaparimāṇamatikramitumityarthaḥ | na tvetadyuktam | satrāhīneṣvasaṃbhavāt | ataḥ ‘avaśiṣṭānaṃśūnabhyūhet’ ityabhyūho yo 'niyataparimāṇastadabhiprāyaṃ ‘syādanityatvāt’ ityetadvyākhyeyam | saṃsthādhikaraṇanyāyenaiva vā prakaraṇavirodhaṃ brubāṇasya nityenāgrahaṇādityanityatvamuttaramabhidhīyate | tṛtīyasavaneṃ 'śureko gṛhyata ityatra vivadante | tasyāpi tata eva somādupādānādato 'trāpi viprakṛṣṭaparvatvamātrameva kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam | tasmādapi saṃsthāsu niveśa iti | na tvatra saṃsthāsvevetyavadhārayitavyam | kutaḥ |

yathaiva ‘ya etenāniṣṭvā 'nyena yajeta’ ityetanna saṃsthāsveva sthāsyati | kiṃ tarhi | agniṣṭomavyatirekamātre | tathā dīrghatvamapyagniṣṭomātiriktamātrāvalambanamaśakyaṃ prakaraṇena saṃsthāsveva sthāpayitum | prakṛtivacchabdapūrṇatvācca na tāsāṃ prakaraṇamasti | na hyetad gṛhītaṃ prākṛtaṃ kiṃcidaṅgaṃ punaruccārya vidhīyate | prathamopadiśyamānajyotiṣṭomadharmamadhyapātitvāt | itaśca na saṃsthānāṃ prakaraṇamasti | katham |

yadi hi saṃtardanamukthyādīnvidhāyāvāntaraprakaraṇe śrūyeta tataḥ syādapi prakaraṇagrahaṇam | idaṃ tu saṃ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 16 )sthādhikaraṇanyāyena tadagrāhyairjyotiṣṭomadharmairantaritatvānna saṃsthākathaṃbhāvānuṣaṅgeṇa saṃspṛśyate | tasmānna prakaraṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vā saṃsthāsu viniyojakam | kiṃ tarhi | vākyameva | tacca dīrghasomatvāviśeṣātsatrāhīneṣvapi tulyamiti sarvadharmatā || 31 ||

pra
taptaghṛte payaḥprakṣepaḥ pravṛñjanam | tacca yasminkarmaṇi vartate sa pravagyaḥ | tasya ca bahvīṣu śākhāsvanārabhyādhītatvājjyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtyeti bhāṣyamayuktamāśaṅkyāvyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhasahakṛtadviruktatvanyāyena jyotiṣṭome saṃbhavantaṃ pravargyamityevamarthaparatayā paramanena bhāṣyamavatārayati— pravargyo 'nārabhyetyādinā |vargyo 'nārabhya kaṃcitkratuviśeṣamāmnāyate | ‘yatpravargyaṃ pravṛñjanti’ iti | sa ca vākyasaṃyogena kratusaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyate ‘purastādupasadāṃ pravargyeṇa caranti’ iti | sa ca ‘pra( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 1 sū. 2 )kṛtau vā dviruktatvāt’ ityevaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ gacchati | tatra hyupasadaḥ pratyakṣavihitāḥ santi | vikṛtau tu yāvadanu
anumānena—atideśenetyarthaḥ |mānena tā gamiṣyanti tāvatpravargyo 'pi yāsyatyeveti nārtha upadeśena | tenā ' 'ha—jyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtya śrūyata iti | yadvā kauṣītakibrāhmaṇe jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa eva svakramasthasya pravargyasyotpattistadā tadviṣayaḥ śravaṇopanyāso yathāśruta eva bhavati | taṃ pravargyaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate ‘na prathame yajñe pravṛñjyāt’ iti | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ prathamayajñagrahaṇena sarvasaṃsthaḥ sarvaprayogāvasthaśca jyotiṣṭomo gṛhyata uta prathamaprayogamātramiti | tatra kiṃ prāptam | yajñaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāt ‘eṣa vāva prathamo yajño yajñānāṃ yajjyotiṣṭomaḥ’ iti ca prayogātprathamaśabdasya jyotiṣṭomaparyāyatvaṃ vijñāyate | ‘ya etenāniṣṭvā’ iti ca sarvayajñebhyaḥ prathamaṃ prayujyamānatvena vidhā nodatasyaiva grahaṇam | tathā ca prakaraṇamanugṛhyate | nanu ca tadīyaprathamaprayoge 'pi prakaraṇānapakarṣādastyevānugrahaḥ | kathamanugraho yadā dīkṣitamahodānapākādipratiṣedhavadayaṃ sarvaprayogaviṣayaḥ prāpnuvanvākyenaikaprayoganibandhanaḥ kriyate | na hi tadā prakaraṇena kiṃcana vyāpriyate | jyautiṣṭomikaprayogāśrayaṇasyāpi vākyakṛtatvāt | yadīhānyaḥ kaścitpratha
maprayogārhaḥ syānnaivaiṣa pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭoma evāvatiṣṭheta | tadabhāvāttu yadi pariśeṣādidaṃ vākyaṃ saṃyuktaprāthamyānurodhena jyotiṣṭomagāmi bhavettataḥ prakaraṇasya kimityavadhāraṇādbādhaḥ prasajyetaiva | tasmātprakaraṇānugrahārthamapi prathamaśabdopāttādisaṃkhyāyuktamidaṃ jyotiṣṭome syāditi || 32 ||

lg.l: tata evaṃ bhavedeṣa prayogasya tu vācakaḥ ||

div.p:
prathamaśabdena hi yatkarturapravṛttapūrvasyā ' 'dyaṃ pravartanaṃ tadabhidhīyate | na karma kiṃcit | tadyogāttu karmaṇi pratītiḥ syāt | sā 'pi ca tatprayogagatasyaiva | na hi dvitīyādīnprayuñjānaḥ kaścitprathamaṃ yajata ityucyate | na caivamayajamānasya prathamayajño nāma bhavati | tataśca pūrvābhihitaprāthamyaguṇalakṣaṇayā tadvati gṛhyamāṇe 'rthaviprakarṣaṃ āpadyate | tatra ca sa āśrīyate yatra tena vinaikavākyatvaṃ nāvakalpate | yathā ‘eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānām’ ityatra | na tviha prāthamyasya pratiṣedhanimittatā na saṃbhavati | yena pūrvapratītaṃ sattadullaṅaghya tatprayogastho 'pi tāvatkraturgṛhyeta | prayogāntarasthastu dūraviprakṛṣṭa eva | nanvevaṃ sati yasya kasyacitprathamaprayogo nimittaṃ prāpnoti | prāpnuyādyadi vidhireṣa syāt | ayaṃ tu pratiṣedhatvātprāptimapekṣamāṇo laukikavyāpārebhyo vaidikebhyaścādhyayanādhānāgnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādibhyaḥ pravargyaprāptyabhāvānnivartamānaḥ sāmarthyena somaṃ gacchati | tatrāpyanārabhyavādanyāyena jyotiṣṭomaṃ, prathamaśabdācca tasyā ' 'dyaṃ prayogam | evaṃ ca sajātīyatvena pratyāsatteśca tasyaiva dvitīyādiprayogāpekṣaṇaṃ yuktataraṃ bhaviṣyati | itarathā tu dūrasthayajñāntarāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ viprakṛṣṭataratvaṃ bhavet | tasmātprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyena prathamaprayogaviṣayatā siddhā | tatra tu keṣāṃcittaittirīyādīnām ‘agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti’ iti punarvidhānamasti | tadyadi tāvad dvitīyādiprayogaviṣayaṃ kalpyate tataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvātpūrvavacanenaiva siddhervidhānānarthakyam | tasmādādyaprayogaviṣayamevaitat | tataśca pratiṣedho
bādhyamānaḥ kratvantaraprathamaprayogaṃ sāvakāśatvād gacchatīti kecit | tattu na yuktam | agniṣṭomasyāpi saṃsthārūpasyānyatra vidyamānatvāt | na ca prāthamyaṃ sāvakāśam | ‘ya etenāniṣṭvā’ iti kevalajyotiṣṭomaviṣayatvāt | prathamaṃ hi yajanaṃ prathamaṃ yajño na caitadanyasya kratorasti | tasmājjyotiṣṭomasyaivātirātrasaṃsthasya pratha
prathamāhāre—prathamaprayoge |māhāre pratiṣedho 'gniṣṭome vidhirityapare | vihitaścātirātrasyāpi pākṣikaḥ prathamāhāraḥ ‘tasmātprathamaṃ yajamāno 'tirātreṇa yajeta’ iti | so 'yaṃ sāmānyenobhayoḥ saṃsthayoḥ pratiṣedho 'gniṣṭome tu viśeṣavidhiḥ sa balīyān | etadapi na yuktam | agniṣṭomasyāpi bahuprayogāntarakratvantaragāmitvena sutarāṃ sāmānyarūpatvāt | ato 'tirātraprathamāhāre nityaṃ pratiṣedho 'gniṣṭome tu vihitapratiṣiddhatvādvikalpa iti kecit | atra punaścodayanti | yadyeṣa pratiṣedhastata evaṃ syāt | paryudāsāstvevaṃvidhā iti daśame vakṣyate ‘a( a. 10 pā. 8 a. 1 sū. 4 )pi tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syāt’ iti | na cāsāvagniṣṭomavākyaśeṣo bhavati | yadi hyaprathamayajñe 'gniṣṭome pravṛṇaktīti kalpyeta tatastasmādeva sāmānyaśāstrātprāptatvādagniṣṭomayuktavidhyānarthakyamāpadyate | tena sāmānyavidherevaiṣa śeṣo yatpravargyaṃ kurvanti tadaprathamayajña iti | tataścātirātraviṣayatvameva phalato bhavati | na caika eva śeṣa ubhayorvākyayoḥ saṃbhavati | ekasaṃbandhenaiva kṛtārthatvāt | tasmādagniṣṭomavidhernirapavādatvānnityameva tatra bhavitavyamiti | ucyate | syādetadevaṃ yadyayaṃ paryudāso bhavenna tvayaṃ paryudāsaḥ | vākyaśeṣatvānupapatteḥ | tatrāgniṣṭomavākye tāvadbhavataiva prati pāditam | atirātravākye 'pi yadi tadīyakathaṃbhāvapūraṇavelāyāmetaducyeta tataḥ śeṣo bhavet | na tu tathoktam | saṃsthānāmasamānavidhānatvādavāntaraprakaraṇe ca pratiṣedhāśravaṇāt | na hyanekajyautiṣṭomikavākyāntaravyavahitātirātraprakṛtivacchabdasyaiṣa śeṣo 'vakalpate | tasmāt ‘na tau paśau’ itivatpratiṣedha evāyaṃ vijñāyate | nanu pratiṣedho 'pi sanprakṛtiviṣaya eva prāpnoti | prāpnuyādyadi vikṛtāvapi nopapadyeta | sa tu prāptimātrāpekṣitvādupadeśamatideśaṃ vā 'nādṛtyobhayatrāpi pravartate | śakyaṃ tviha vaktuṃ ‘prakṛ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 1 sū. 2 )tau vā
dviruktatvāt’ iti | nanu ca tulyārthatva etadevaṃ yuktam | asti cehārthabhedaḥ | prakṛtau vaikalpikatvādatirātre ca codakaprāptasya nityapratiṣedhāt | naitadasti | vakṣyati hyetat ‘pratiṣedhaḥ( a. 10 pā. 8 a. 1 sū. 1 ) pradeśe 'nārabhya vidhāne ca prāptapratiṣiddhatvādvikalpaḥ syāt’ iti | ya
niruktasūtrārthaṃ varṇayati—yasya śāstrādṛta ityādinā |sya śāstrādṛte prāptirnāsti tasya prāptimanabhyanujñāya pratiṣedhāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃ pratiṣedhenaiva tadviṣayo 'pi vidhiraṅgīkartavyaḥ | sa cedaṅgīkṛtaḥ śāstratvāviśeṣāttulyabalatvam | ataḥ sarvathā 'tirātre vikalpena bhavitavyam | tasmāddviruktatvādupadeśātideśayośca prāptikālavaiṣamyātprakṛtyarthataiva varamiti | nanvevaṃ sati ‘agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti’ ityanenaiva prakṛtividheḥ siddhatvādanārabhyavādo 'narthakaḥ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | tenotpattiranena viniyoga ityevaṃ vyāpārabhedāt | athavā 'nārabhyavādo 'gniṣṭomavyatiriktaviṣayo bhaviṣyati | nanvagniṣṭomavākyenopasaṃhniyate | na śakyametadupasaṃhartum | tannāma viśeṣavacanenopasaṃhriyate yatkratusaṃyogāyāsamarthaṃ kathaṃcitparokṣavṛttyā saṃyujyate | yathā sāptadaśyam | ayaṃ tu sākṣādyajñasaṃbandhasāmarthyānnopasaṃhāramarhati | ataśca vikṛtyartho bhaviṣyati | tathā sati ca ‘na prathamayajñe’ ityanārabhyavādaśeṣa upapadyata ityatirātraprathamāhāre nityamaprayogo 'gniṣṭome ca kevalavidhisaṃsparśānnityaṃ prayogaḥ | na hi tadvākyaśeṣo 'pyayaṃ bhavatītyuktam | etāvattvihāvadhārayituṃ śakyam | nāyamanārabhyavādaḥ prakṛteranyatra gacchati | yadi gacchettata iṣṭipaśubandhānapi gacchet | na ca gantumarhati | ‘purastādupasadām’ iti sthānaniyamasya tatrānupapatteḥ | ato yatropasadastatra gacchati | tataśca prāptikālavaiṣamyātprakṛtau tāvattāḥ santītyantareṇāpi vacanaṃ gacchetkimuta yadā vispaṣṭameva vacanaṃ, sphuṭasāmānyasaṃbandhasyāpi caivamāderupasaṃhāra iti vyākhyātaṃ catu( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 15 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥrdhādhikaraṇe | tasmādutpattiviniyogābhyāmevāpunaruktatvam | evaṃ sati yeṣāṃ prakaraṇa eva pravargyapāṭhastaiḥ saha saṃgatārthatā bhaviṣyati | yadi tarhi dvayorapyekavākyatvena ‘agniṣṭome pravṛṇākti’ ityayamartho niṣpannastato ‘na prathamayajñe’ ityetasyāprathamayajñe 'gniṣṭoma ityevaṃ pravartamānasya na kaściddhirodha iti paryudāsānnityamevākaraṇena bhavitavyam | ata evaṃ varṇanīyam | anārabhyavādasya prakṛtyarthatāyāṃ siddhāyām ‘agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti’ ityetasyānanyaprayojanatvātpratiṣiddhapratiprasavārthatā gamyate | nanu naivāyaṃ pratiṣedha ityuktam | agniṣṭomayuktavākyārthavattvāya pratiṣedha iti brūmaḥ | na hyanena saha paryudāso 'vakalpata iti darśitam | na cānārabhyavādo 'nagniṣṭomārtho yatastadviṣayaḥ paryudāso 'vakalpate |
tena dva
dvayorapīti—paryudāsāgniṣṭomavākyayordvayorapītyarthaḥ |yorapyetayoragniṣṭomaviṣayatvam | ataśca yadyapyayaṃ paryudāsastathā 'pyubhayoḥ sāmarthyādvikalpenaiva bhavitavyam | kutaḥ |

tataśca yasmādvikalpādbibhyadbhiḥ paryudāsa āśrīyate sa tasminsatyapyāgata iti varaṃ śabdasvarasalabhyaḥ pratiṣedha evā ' 'śritaḥ | tena prathamāhāre 'gniṣṭome vikalpaḥ | tatrāpi yadā keṣāṃcidīdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ ‘kāmaṃ tu yo 'nūcānaḥ śrotriyaḥ syāttasya pravṛñjyāt’ iti tadā pratiprasavavacanasya vikalpakāriṇaḥ kartṛviśeṣagāmitvāttadviṣaya eva vikalpo 'nyeṣāṃ nityamevābhāvaḥ | kathaṃ punaraśrotriyasya karmaṇi pravṛttiryena tadviśeṣaṇatvena śrūyate | satyaṃ prāptasya punarvacanaṃ tāvanmātraphalamanarthakamiti sāmarthyātprakarṣagatirvijñāsyate | yathā 'bhirūpāya kanyā deyetyatrābhirūpatarāyeti gamyate | anūcānagrahaṇaṃ tu brāhmaṇasyānuvacanasaṃbandhāt kṣatriyavaiśyanivṛttyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati | tadetadatirātre 'pyevameva prāpnoti | tatra na prathamayajña iti pratiṣedhādanagniṣṭomatvena ca pratiprasavābhāvānnityameva na kartavyaḥ | vikṛtyantareṣu prathamaprayogānupapatternityameva karaṇam | nanu tatrāpi na prathamayajña ityatideśādagniṣṭomasvarūpasya ca pratiprasavanimittasyābhāvatprathamaprayogeṣvabhāva eva prāpnoti | naitadevam | prathamaśabdasyāviśeṣitasya sarvādye pravartamānasyānyatrāpravṛtteḥ | tasmātkevalajyotiṣṭomaprathamaprayogaviṣaya eva caiṣa pratiṣedha iti siddham || 33 ||
saṃtardanādinyāyenaiva vākyaprakaraṇavirodhe sati vikṛtyarthatvaṃ siddhamuttaravivakṣārthaṃ prārabhyate || 34 ||

ta
etatsṛtrasthabhāṣyasya spaṣṭārthatvādavyākhyāya pūrvapakṣasūtramātraṃ paṭhitaṃ veditavyam |tsarvārthamaviśeṣāt || 35 ||

yadi kaścidvadellaukikapiṣṭopādānenāpi puroḍāśasiddhernaikāntenārthākṣepa iti taṃ pratyucyate | artho nāma prākṛta upakāraḥ | tasya prakṛtau peṣaṇaṃ sādhanamāsīdatastena pū
pūrvataraprāpteneti—carāvatideśena piṣṭasiddhyākhyopakāraprāptimantarā pevaṇopadeśāyogāttadarthaṃ pūrvatarapravṛttenātideśenaiva peṣaṇasyāpi prāptisiddherupadeśavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ |rvataraprāptenoktaṃ puroḍāśe peṣaṇam | paśau ca pradhānavaiguṇyaṃ syāt | taddhi hṛdayādyākṛtikena tataścāvattena sādhayitavyam | na ca piṣṭe tadākṛtikādavadīyeta | punastadākārakaraṇe 'pi mṛdgavayādivadgauṇādavadīyamāne vaiguṇyameva | ‘utsādanadeśādavadyati’ iti ca śrūyate | na ca hṛdayādeḥ piṣṭasya jñāyeta katareṇa pradeśenedaṃ paśorutkṛttamiti | tasmāccarāvapratiṣi
ddhamanarthaprāptaṃ ca peṣaṇamiti tatraiva vidhīyate | nanu ‘adantako hi’ iti hetvaviśeṣātpaśupuroḍāśayorapi prāpterdvyavadānāni taccheṣāśca piṣṭvā dāsyante | na ca prāptivipratiṣedhau bhaviṣyataḥ | ucyate | dvyavadānasya pradānaprakramatvānnāntarā peṣaṇena vyavadhānaṃ yuktam | hetuvannigadasya ca stutimātrārthatvaṃ vakṣyate | tena svakramasthasyaiva ṣeṣaṇasya vidhiḥ | upanītamātrameva ca peṣaṇaṃ puroḍāśe 'nuvādabudhdyā gṛhyate carau ca nivartamānaṃ pratiprasavatvena | paśau punaratyantāprāptavidhitvena | na caitānyekasyaiva vākyasyaitāvanti rūpāṇi vijñāyante | tatrāvaśyamaikarūpye 'bhyupagantavye lāghavādarthavattvācca pratiprasavatvamevāvadhāraṇīyam | evaṃ siddhaṃ kevalacaruviṣayatvam || 36 ||

ca
etatsūtrasthaṃ bhāṣyaṃ suspaṣṭaṃ matvā śaṅkāsūtrasya pāṭhamātraṃ kṛtaṃ veditavyam |rāvapīti cet || 37 ||
na carāvarthavipratiṣedhaḥ | katham |

audanapiṣṭakacaruprayuktasya caruśabdasyānekārthatvamanyāyyamityubhayasāmānyavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate | tayośca sāmānyamanavasrāvitāntarūṣmapakvatvam | tasmādavipratiṣedhaḥ |
pakṣoktaṃ prayojanamiti | mandaṃ phalamuktam | etāvānsamādhiḥ | a
aviśeṣe 'pīti—etadadhikaraṇacintāyāḥ paśupuroḍāśayoraviśeṣe 'pi puroḍāśe peṣaṇasya pakṣadvaye 'pi sattvena peṣaṇasya puroḍāśārthatvanivṛttirna cintāyāḥ prayojanaṃ, kiṃ tu paśvarthatvanivṛttiriti samuditārthaḥ |viśeṣe 'pi na puroḍāśārthatvaṃ prayojanam | kiṃ tarhi | paśvarthatvamiti || 38 ||

idānīṃ kimanyasahite pūṣaṇi devatāyāmaindrāpauṣṇe carau peṣaṇaṃ bhavatyutaikasminneveti saṃdehe catu( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 15)rdhākaraṇendra( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 17 )pītanyāyātsiddhāntenaiva tāvadupakramate | pūṣetyekasaṃyogaśravaṇāttathābhūta evārthe syāditi || 39 ||
itaścaikadevatye | kutaḥ |

lg.l: piṣyādardhaṃ samastaṃ vā dvidevatye carau bhavān |

div.p:
ardhapeṣaṇe hi piṣṭoṃ 'śaḥ śīghrataraṃ sidhyatītaraścireṇa | tatra piṣṭapākānantaramudvāsane satītarasyā ' 'matvaṃ bhavet | tatpākapratīkṣaṇe 'pi vā piṣṭasya vilayanādacarutvaṃ syāt | pākavaiśadyena hi piṣṭakacarurapi carurbhavati | na caitadasminpakṣe bhavati | atha taṇḍulānpūrvaṃ
prakṣiṣya paścātpiṣṭaṃ nikṣipettato yauga
yaugapadyamiti—piṣṭataṇḍulabhāgayordvayorapyekayāgasādhanatvenaikahaviṣṭvātkṛtsnasyāpi haviṣaḥ śrapaṇayaugapadyavidhānāttadarthasya nikṣepasyāpi yaugapadyamatideśeneha prāpyamāṇaṃ bādhyetetyāśayaḥ |padyaṃ gamyamānaṃ bādhyeta | pūṣānurodhena tvaindre 'pi bhāge piṣyamāṇe bhāgasaṃkarādanyadīye bhāge 'nyasmai dīyamāne vaiguṇyaṃ prāpnoti | nanu caitatsarvaṃ dvidevatyeṣu bhavato 'pi samānam | tathā hi |
sa cāṅgīkṛto miśrasya haviṣo miśradevatoddeśena yugapaddāne virodhābhāvāt | ucyate |

asmatpakṣe punaḥ pūṣadevatyayāgāpūrvaprayuktaṃ peṣaṇam | na ca taddvidevatye tathāvasthitamityapravṛttireva | havirantareṣvapi ca dvidevatyeṣvevaṃprakāratvameveti devatā guṇabhūtā | na ca guṇānurodhena pradhānamāvartanīyamiti sakṛddānābhyupagamātsarvasminsaha kriyamāṇe saṃkaradoṣānāśrayaṇam | bhavatā punarasmadabhyupagamena dvidevatye peṣaṇaṃ vaktumaśaknuvatā 'vaśyaṃ devatānimittatvamabhyupagantavyam | tataśca devatayoḥ prādhānyādekaikā svabhāgamasaṃkīrṇaṃ prārthayata iti tathaiva dānamanuṣṭheyam | āditaścaika eva bhāgaḥ peṣaṇārha ityavadhāritam | tataśca paktidoṣaḥ syāt | atha taṇḍulātmako 'pi bhāgaḥ pākasāmyārthaṃ piṣyate | tatra brūmaḥ | yāvadanutpannabhāgavivekaṃ havistāvatkiyānkasya bhāga ityanavadhāraṇātsaṃkaradoṣo na jāyate | kalpite tu viveke vacanādṛte punarekīkaraṇānupapatterasaṃkīrṇadānaṃ prāpnoti | tatrānyasya bhāgādanyasmā avadīyamāne vaiguṇyaṃ bhavati | pātrabhedena pakṣyatīti cenna | carumiti yāgaṃ pratyupādīyamānatvena vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyasya pātrakṛtabhedāśrayaṇe śāstrabādhaprasaṅgāt | ato na kathaṃcidapi pratiṣiddhadharmakaṃ dvidevatye peṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na kartavyam || 40 ||
sadvitīye 'pi vā pūṣaṇi syādeva peṣaṇam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: haṃviṣo yadi pauṣṇasya tadyāgāṅgasya vā bhavet |

div.p:
pūṣasadbhāvanimittametatpeṣaṇam | na ca tadviśeṣitavastunimittam | vyāsaṅgitvācca devatātvasya dvidevatye pūṣaviśiṣṭatā na syāt | na tu pūṣā tadbhāgo vā nāstīti | yathā manotāyāṃ vakṣya( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 22 sū. 42 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥti ‘tatrāgniradevatā na tvasamavetaḥ’ iti | tenāsatyapyatra pūṣṇo devatātve samavāyamātreṇopalakṣaṇatvād dvayoddeśenāpi ca tyajyamānasya ‘sa( a. 10 pā. 3 a. 13 sū. 53 )maṃ syādaśrutatvāt’ ityanena nyāyenārdhaṃ pūṣṇo bhāga iti gamyate | tasya peṣaṇe kriyamāṇe yadi tāvatkāṃsya
kāṃsyabhojivaditi pā. |bhojinyāyenāmukhye 'pītyevamitarabhāgapeṣaṇamapi kriyate tathā 'pi na kiṃcid duṣyati | athāpi kimetenāśrutena kṛtenetyevamardhamātrapeṣaṇamevādhyavasīyate tathā 'pi kenacitkauśalena pākasaṃpādanādyugapannikṣepapātraikatvayorvā guṇatvādvaraṃ bādha iti nirū
nirūpyeti—pāke doṣābhāvamupapādyetyaṃrthaḥ |pya kāryameva peṣaṇamiti | atha yaduktaṃ catu( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 15)rdhākaraṇendra( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 17 )pītavaditi | tatrābhidhīyate |

tenā ' 'gneyendrapītaśabdābhyāṃ samarthāgnīndragrāhibhyāṃ dvidevatyāgrahaṇaṃ yuktamiha punaḥ pūṣapadasyāsamāsabhāktvātprapiṣṭabhāgaśabdayośca sāpekṣe 'pi pūṣaṇi sāmarthyāvidhātānnakiṃcid duṣyatītyupalakṣaṇatā || 41 ||

‘adantako hi’ iti heturdevatādharmatvaṃ darśayati | na ca sadvitīyasya pūṣṇo dantā jāyanta iti hetusāmyādyuktaṃ peṣaṇam | tathā ca somāpauṣṇe nemapiṣṭatānuvādo 'nyatra ca dvidevatye ‘ardhaṃ piṣṭamardhamapiṣṭaṃ dvidevatatvāya’ iti devatādharmatvadarśanamavakalpiṣyate || 42 ||

vidhitvānnemapiṣṭatvamaliṅgaṃ viparyayasādhanaṃ cetyata āha—yadyetadvacanaṃ bhavettato 'nekārthavidhyasaṃbhavānnemapiṣṭatvaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ caruṃ voddiśya vidhīyeta, somāpauṣṇaṃ vā | tatra ya evoddiṣṭastasyaivetareṇa viśeṣṭumaśakyatvātsārvatrikatvapratīteḥ sarvapeṣaṇaṃ prāpnoti | tataścānyatarapadānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | tadyadi tāvadyaścaruḥ sa nemapiṣṭa iti vidhīyate tataḥ sarvacaruviṣayāvadhāraṇe sati somāpauṣṇaśabda ekadeśānuvādo 'narthakaḥ syāt | atha somāpauṣṇamātramuddiśyate tato 'pi sarvapeṣaṇameva taddevatyaṃhavirmātrapratītyā paśupuroḍāśayorapi grahaṇāt | tataśca pūrvavaccaruśabdānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ | taṃ prati—hi somāpauṣṇamaviśeṣitaṃ prati ṣepaṇasya śāstravattvaṃ viśeṣaṇārthābhāvāt | etasminpakṣe carāvapeṣaṇaṃ bhavati | nanvarthaprāptatvātpuroḍāśasyāvaktavyaṃ paśoścārthavipratiṣedhādi( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 14 sū. 36 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥtyuktamiticenna | atra tayorubhayorapyaprasaṅgāt | sarvapeṣaṇe hi prāpte puroḍāśasyārdhapeṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate | tāvatā 'pi ca kathaṃci
tpuroḍāśo niṣpadyate | hṛdayādīnāmapyutsādadeśaikadeśavarjaṃ piṣyamāṇānāṃ nārthavipratiṣedho bhavati | na cātyantākṛtirnaśyet | na cotsādadeśamohaḥ syāt | itarotsādadeśasya spaṣṭatvena ca piṣṭo 'pi san pūṣabhāga upalakṣyate na sarvapeṣaṇavanmuhyeta | athavā 'sminpakṣe vācanikatvādadṛṣṭārthe peṣaṇe satyapiṣṭādevāvadīyeta | na hi tadaitaddevatānimittaṃ peṣaṇaṃ syāt | tasmātsārvatrikatvaprasaṅgānna pariśeṣasiddhaṃ caroḥ peṣaṇamiti tacchrutiranarthikā prāpnotyeveti carudevatāsaṃbandhavidhipare vākye nemapiṣṭatvamanūdyata ityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam | ataśca liṅgatvasiddhiḥ || 43 ||
ekasminneva pūṣaṇi devatāyāmetatpeṣaṇaṃ bhavenna sadvitīye |

lg.l: na hyeṣa devatādharmo na tadbhāgasya gamyate |

div.p:
na tāvaddevatāyā bhāgo 'sti yasyaiṣa dharmaḥ kalpyeta | na hi taduddeśatyāgamātreṇa bhāgo bhavati | kiṃ tarhi | parigraheṇa | karmasādhano hi bhāgaśabdaḥ | bhajyata iti bhāgaḥ | sevyata ityarthaḥ | tena yaṃ yo bhajate sa tasya bhāgaḥ | na ca haviraṃśaṃ devatā bhajate | bhoktṛtvasya navame niṣedhāt | athāpi bhajettathā 'pi tasyāḥ prayojakatvaṃ tatraiva nivārayiṣyate | tena devatāvadbhāgadharmatvānupapatteryāgadvārā 'pūrvadharma evāyaṃ navamā( a. 9 pā. 1 a. 1 )dyanyāyena devatā( a. 9 pā. 1 a. 4)dhikaraṇanyāyena ca vijñāyate | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu devatādharmatvanirākaraṇapareṇa yāga
dharmatvamabhihitamiti draṣṭavyam | kathaṃ tarhi prakaraṇāntare samāmnāto yāgadharmo bhaviṣyatīti | vākyasaṃyogasya devatāviṣayatvātprakaraṇena ca vinā 'pūrvasādhanatvalakṣaṇāmupapatterna kathaṃcidyāgenāpūrveṇa vā saṃbandha iti manyamānasya praśnaḥ | tatra vākyasaṃyogā- dityukte pareṇa svābhiprāye vivṛte bhāgaśabdenaiva mukhyārthāsaṃbhavādyāgopādānamiti darśayati | parasvasvīkaraṇātmakasya bhāgarūpasyāvidyamānatvādyastaduddeśena tyajyamānatvanāmāṃ 'śo vidyate tena yāgo lakṣyate | sa caikadevatye pūṣaviśiṣṭo bhavatīti tadbhāgavyapadeśo ghaṭate | dvidevatye punarvyāsaṅgī miśraḥ saṃkalpo 'nyatareṇa vyapadeṣṭumaśakya iti | yathaivaindrāgnasya puroḍāśasya grahasya cā ' 'gneyendrapītaśabdābhyāmagrahaṇaṃ tathaindrāpauṣṇādeḥ pūṣabhāgatvena | yadyapi caivaṃvidhaśabdoccāraṇādiha samāsopālambho nāsti tathā 'pyartha eva bhāgaśabdagrāhyo na vidyata ityapravṛttiḥ | yadyapi ca dvayorarthayordevatātvaṃ pratipadyamānayoḥ samudāyaprasiddhyarthatvenāvayavāvupayujyete tathā 'pi saṃkalpasyānyatareṇāvyapadeśādanupalakṣaṇatvaṃ siddham || 44 ||
yattu ‘adantako hi’ iti hetunidarśanāddevatādharmatvamiti | tatrocyate | hetuvannigadārthavādatvādasya yāgadharmapraśaṃsārthatvamapyaviruddhamityakāraṇatā || 45 ||

nemapiṣṭādiṣu prāptyabhāvādvacanaṃ bhaviṣyati | viśiṣṭavidhānācca vākyabhedābhāvaḥ | aruṇaikahāyanīvacca parasparaniyamādasarvaviṣayatvam | aviśiṣṭavidhiṃ cāpekṣya viśiṣṭavidhirdurbalo bhavati na tvatrāsāvasti | tasmādaliṅgamityekadevatāviṣayatvamiti || 46 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ ||

div.p:
sa eva śrutyāditritayasya prakaraṇena saha virodhāvirodhavicāraḥ | tatra ‘nivītaṃ
manuṣyā
nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāmityatreti—upavītaprācīnāvītavākyayorvakṣyamāṇasarvapakṣāsaṃbhavānnivītavākyamātre vicāraḥ kriyata iti dhyeyam |ṇām’ ityatraite pakṣā bhavanti, kimayaṃ śuddhamanuṣyadharmaḥ karmayuktamanuṣyadharmo vā 'tha śuddhakarmadharmaḥ | athavā prakaraṇe yanmanuṣyapradhānaṃ karmānvāhāryapacanādi, tasya dharma utāprakaraṇe yā manuṣyapūjā ' 'tithyātmikā tasyāṃ niveśa iti | yau tu vidhyarthavādapakṣau tau śeṣalakṣaṇe 'naupayikau pra
pramāṇalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt—prathamādhyāyaviṣayatvādityarthaḥ |māṇalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādvidhivānnigadārthavādamadhye ca nirṇītatvādiha naivopanyasanīyau | yastu bhāṣyakāreṇopanyāsaḥ kutaḥ sa kṛtvācintānyāyeneti draṣṭavyam | na hi vidhitvamanabhyupetya manuṣyadharmādipakṣa upapadyata iti | vidhiriti kṛtvā prathamaṃ prastutya paścāllakṣaṇānurūpaṃ vicāryānte pūrvāvasthitamevārthavādatvamupasaṃhariṣyati | pareṣvapyadhikaraṇeṣvetadyathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojayitavyam | tatra ‘vidhi
( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 19 )rvā syādapūrvatvādbādamātraṃ hyanarthakam’ ityanenaiva tāvadvidhiḥ | ahīnādyadhikaraṇanyāyena ca ṣaṣṭhīśrutyā manuṣyadharmaḥ | teṣāṃ svatvena tatpratīyate na manuṣyāstadaṅgatvena | guṇavibhaktinirdeśābhāvāt | arthādeva ca tatprāptau satyāṃ naiva manuṣyagrahaṇaṃ kriyate | kṛtaṃ caitat | ato 'pi manuṣyadharma ityavagacchāmaḥ || 1 ||

nivītaṃ kecidgalaveṇikābandhaṃ smaranti | kecitpunaḥ parikarabandham | tatra galaveṇikābandho yuddhādanyatra na prāpnoti | parikarabandhastu sarvakarmasvavyagratākaratvātprāpta iti tadāśrayaṇenānuvādamāha | sa tu kiṃprayojana i
‘arthavādo vā prakaraṇāt’ ityasminsūtra upavītastutyartha iti vakṣyata ityarthaḥ |tyuttaratra vakṣyate || 2 ||

vidhirevāyam | kutaḥ | pūrvavattvāddhyanuvādo bhavedatyantaprāptāvityarthaḥ | na cāyamatyantaprāptaḥ | tena vinā 'pyavyagratāyāḥ śakyatvāt | kaṇṭhabandhaḥ punaḥ prāyeṇāprāpta evetyasti niyamavidheravakāśaḥ || 3 ||
sati vidhitve karmadharmaprāyapradeśāmnānātkathaṃbhāvasaṃsparśātkarmadharmaḥ || 4 ||

dvedhā saṃbhave tādṛśī pramāṇagatirāśrayaṇīyā yā pramāṇāntaraṃ na bādhate | yajurvedāmnānācca nivītāderādhvaryavasamākhyopabaddhaṃ vākyam | tatra yadi karmadharmo 'yaṃ tataḥ kartṛviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ samākhyayā 'dhvaryuniyamātsamākhyā 'rthavatī bhaviṣyati | manuṣyadharmāṇāṃ tu na samākhyā niyāmiketi vakṣyāmaḥ | tatrāsau bādhyeta | itarathā 'nugrahīṣyate | tasmādapi karmadharmaḥ || 5 ||

prathamaṃ tāvanmanuṣyadharmabalīyamtvena karmadharmatvaṃ nirākaroti | tathā hi sukhaṃ sūcitaḥ pakṣaḥ parigrahīṣyate | śrutyā hi prakaraṇasamākhye bādhitvā manuṣyadharma eva prāpnoti | taducyate | sarvānugrahārthamayaṃ pakṣo 'stu | manuṣyāṇāmiti tatpradhānakarmavyatirekajanitā ṣaṣṭhī na nivītaṃ gṛhṇāti | tadapi ca prakaraṇādanvāhāryadānādi pratīyate nānyat | ata eṣa vākyārtho yadiha manuṣyāṇāṃ karma tatra nivyātavyamiti || 6 ||
prakaraṇarahitamanuṣyapradhāno vā syāt | kutaḥ |

yathaiva ‘upavītaṃ devānām’ ‘prācīnāvītaṃ pitṝṇām’ iti ca parasparanirapekṣadevapitṛpradhānakarmaṇyeṣa vidhirevaṃ tadbuddhyanuvṛttermanuṣyāṇāmityapi tatpradhānakarma pratyeṣyāmaḥ | kathaṃ gamyata iti—pṛṣṭe manuṣyāṇāmiti ṣaṣṭhyantena saṃbandhāt— ityetāvatyuttare datte manuṣyāṇāmeva prāpnotīti punaścodayati | athavā sama
samasta eva ceti—‘kathaṃ gamyata ityādinā—na manuṣyapradhāne ‘ityevamanta ityarthaḥ |sta eva caukaḥ praśnaḥ |
satyamevaṃ prāpnoti | phalakalpanāprasaṅgagauravāttu parityajyate | tasmāttadīyakarmavyatirekādeva ṣaṣṭhī | tatsaṃbaddhasya nivītasya nāsaṃbaddhaphalakalpanā bhaviṣyati | manuṣyagrahaṇaṃ ca tatpradhānakarmapratipattyarthamiti nānupāttasaṃbandhāpattiḥ | na ca tasminsati prakṛtaikavākyatā ghaṭate || 7 ||

sarvathā nātraiko 'pi pakṣo nirdoṣaḥ | prakaraṇasaṃbandhe vākyasaṃbandhabādhādanvāhāryādisaṃbandhe vākyabhedātprakaraṇasya ca viśeṣakatvānupapatterātithyādisaṃbandho 'tyantanirmūla eva | ṣaḍbhirapi śrutyādibhirasaṃsparśānmanuṣyasaṃbandhena tadanumīyate | tacca na yuktam | tasyā api ṣaṣṭhyā nivītapadasaṃbandhivyatirekajanitatvapratīteḥ | na hya
anupāttāḥ saṃbandhino yeṣāṃ saṃbandhākhyānāṃ vyatirekāṇāṃ tairiti vigrahaḥ |nupāttasaṃbandhivyatirekairvibhaktaya utpadyante | tasmānmanuṣyārthataiva prāpnoti | tatrāpi ca prakaraṇasamākhyāvādhaphalakalpanāprasaṅga | sati ca gatyantare na yuktaṃ tadāśrayaṇam | asti caudu( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 2 )mbarādhikaraṇasiddhamarthavādatvaṃ gatiḥ || 8 ||

‘upavyayate’ ityanena ca vidhinaikavākyatvaṃ nivītaprācīnāvītayordṛśyate | taccānuvādadvāreṇa stutau satyāmavakalpate na vidhau | na hyaṅgāṅgitvarahitayorubhayoḥ svatantrayoḥ parasparāsaṃbaddhayorvidhīyamānayorekavākyatā bhavati | vacanavyaktibhedāt | anyā hi pradhānavidhestāvanmātropasaṃhāriṇī vacanavyaktiranyā ca stuteḥ parāṅgabhāvānugatarūpā | na cātra vidhāyako dṛśyate | sa yadi vā 'dhyāhartavyo 'thavā ' 'tithyādigatasyāpyaṅgatvāya parikalpyeta | na ca tatkalpanaṃ yuktam, avihitasyānaṅgatvādanaṅgasya ca prayogavacanenāgrahaṇāt | va( a. 3 pā. 4 a. 4 sū. 13 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥkṣyati hi na cāvihitamaṅgaṃ bhavatīti | tatrāṅgatvādvidhirvidheścāṅgatvaṃ kalpyata itītaretarāśrayatvaṃ prāpnotīti | pratyakṣeṇa ca vidhinā yathākathaṃcidekavākyatāyāṃ saṃbhavantyāṃ na parokṣaikavākyatā yuktā | tathā sati cānekādṛṣṭakalpanā syāt | tasmādaucityena stutiḥ | yathā nivītaprācīnāvīte manuṣyāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca praśaste tathopavītaṃ devānāmiti | loke 'pi caivaṃ dṛśyate | yathā vasiṣṭhasyārundhatī, yathā śaśāṅkasya rohiṇī
yathā nalasya damayantī, tathā devadattasya yajñadatteti | viparyayeṇa vā stutiriti | tayoḥ pitṛmanuṣyaviṣayatvena devānpratyayogyatvādupavītameva devānāṃ praśastam | ataśca devakarmaṇi darśapūrṇamāsākhye tadeva kartavyamiti || 9 ||

ataḥ paraṃ ṣaṭsūtrāṇi bhāṣyakāreṇa na likhitāni | tatra vyākhyātāro vivadante | kecidāhurvismṛtāni | likhito granthaḥ pralīna ityapare | phalgutvādupekṣitānītyanye | anārṣeyatvādityapare | tathā ca ‘digvibhāgaśca tadvat’ iti nivītādhikaraṇātideśastadānantaryādupapadyata iti | vṛttyantarakāraistu sarvairvyākhyā
anena ca prakṣiptatvākhyamanārṣeyatvamupekṣābījaṃ parābhimataṃ nirastaṃ veditavyam |tāni | santi ca jaiminerevaṃ prakārāṇyapyanatyantasārabhūtāni sūtrāṇi | vyavahitātideśāśca ‘pānavyāpacca(a. 3 pā. 4 a. 12 sū. 32 ) tadvat’ ityādiṣvāśritāḥ | tasmātsūtramātraṃ vyākhyeyam | tatra kaiścittrīṇyadhikaraṇāni kalpitāni | aparaiścatvāri | prathamaṃ tāvadidaṃ cintyate | yadetatpūrvādhikaraṇe darśapūrṇamāsayorvidhīyamānatvenopavītamudāhṛtaṃ tatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ taddarśapūrṇamāsayorevāvatiṣṭhate 'thavā sarvakarmārthamiti | ye tvadhikaraṇatrayaṃ samarthayante | teṣāmevaṃ saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoravasthānaṃ vidhiścātha sarvakarmārthatvamanuvādaśceti | kiṃ prāptaṃ sarvadharmaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |

mṛtāgnihotre hi pitṛdevatye śrūyate ‘prācīnāvītī dohayet | yajñopavītī hi devebhyo dohayati’ iti | tadyadi sarvārthamupavītaṃ tato 'yaṃ pitrye 'gnihotrasaṃbandhī nityavadyajñopavītānuvādo 'vakalpate | na cāyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsasthasyaivānuvādaḥ | viprakṛṣṭatvāt | hetuvannigadārthavādānarthakyācca | yadi hi tasminneva karmaṇyanyāvasthāyāṃ dharmo bhavati tataśca tadavasthāparijihīrṣayā hetuvannigado 'vakalpate | na tu kratvantarasthaṃ parihartavyamatyantaviprakarṣeṇaivāprasaktatvāt | na ca devebhya iti bahuvacanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoravakalpate | vaikalpikendramahendraikadevatyatvātsāṃnāyyasya | agnihotre tu sāyaṃprātardevatālocanenopapannaṃ bahutvam | tasmādagnihotrasthopavītānuvādānyathānupapatteḥ sarvadharmatvamiti || 1 ||

na vā sarvadharmaḥ | kutaḥ | prakaraṇāddarśapaurṇamāsārthatvapratīteḥ | atha yaduktaṃ liṅgadarśanāditi | parihṛtaṃ tat | tasyaivaitaddarśanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsasthasyeti | saṃnikṛṣṭānuvādāsaṃbhave ca viprakṛṣṭānuvādo 'pyāśrīyate | yathāprāptyapekṣo 'hi sa bhavati | bahuvacanaṃ cāvivakṣitam | athavā prakṛtivikṛtidevatālocanenopapatsyate | tataścāyamartho bhavati | yasmāddevayuktakarmāntaradharmo 'yamataḥ pitrye 'gnihotre na kartavya iti || 2 ||

tadevodāharaṇam ‘upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute’ iti | tatra vidhiranuvāda iti saṃdehaḥ | kathaṃ punaranavadhārite vidhitve sarvārthatvadarśapūrṇamāsārthatvavicāro vṛttaḥ | siddhena vyavahārādidamarthato 'dhikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ draṣṭavyam | kiṃ prāptamanuvāda iti | kutaḥ |

‘nityodakī’ ‘nityayajñopavītī’ iti hi sarvadā yajñopavītaṃ prāptaṃ kratāvapyasti | na caiṣa vidhisarūpaḥ śabdaḥ | tasmādanuvāda iti | evaṃ ca nivītaprācīnāvītābhyāmavailakṣaṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |

na hi samastānuvādavākyasya kiṃcitphalamasti | nivītaprācīnāvītasaṃkīrtanamapi ca vidhīyamānopavītastutyarthatvenaivārthavadbhaviṣyati | vartamānāpadeśānāmapi ca tadābhāsatvātprayogavacanārthavādapañcamalakārebhyo vidhiśaktirvyākhyātā | tasmādvidhiḥ | yattu smṛtereva prāptamiti | tatrāpyapūrvatvādidamevottaram | anya eva hyasau puruṣadharmaṃ prāpto 'nyaścāyamapūrvaḥ kratudharmo vidhīyate | tasmānnānuvādaḥ | asya ca prayojanaṃ kartradhika(a. 3 pā. 4 a. 4)raṇe vakṣyāmaḥ | e
‘vidhirvā syādapūrvatvāt’ iti sūtraṃ ṣaṭsūtrīmadhikaraṇacatuṣṭayena vyākhyātṛmatarītyā siddhāntaparatayā vyākhyāyādhunā vyadhikaraṇavādimatarītyedamevasūtramudāharaṇāntare pūrvapakṣaparatayā vyākhyātumārabhate—evaṃ vetyādinā |vaṃ vā | yattu mṛtāgnihotre śrūyate ‘prācīnāvītī dohayet | yajñopavītī hi devebhyo dohayati’ iti | tatraivaṃ vicāryate kimidamhīnasthitamiva dvādaśatvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsagatameva stutyarthamuktam | uta jīvadagnihotre vidhānārthamiti | kiṃ prāptaṃ tataḥ pūrvavadeva sūtraṃ vyā
khyātavyam | evaṃ ca sati prakaraṇabahuvacanayoranugraho bhaviṣyati | tasmātsatyapyanuvādasarūpatve 'rthavattvāya prayogavacanādibhyo vidhitvaṃ kalpanīyam | etasmiṃśca vyākhyāne sthitaṃ tāvadaparyavasitamityevamuttaramadhikaraṇamārabdhavyam || 3 ||
