tasminneva mṛtāgnihotre śrūyate | ‘ye purodañco darbhāṃstāndakṣiṇāgrāṃstṛṇīyāt’ iti | kecittu mahāpitṛyajñe śrūyata ityudāharanti | tatra ‘ye purodañcaḥ’ ityatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ vidhiranuvāda iti | kiṃ prāptam | tataścaśabdenānvādiśyate 'yamapi vidhirapūrvatvāditi | prāptipūrvako hyanuvādo bhavati | na cāsya puruṣārthatayā 'pi prāptirasti | na cāsya stutyarthatā 'pi yujyate | hiśabdādyaprayogāt | tasmātsiddhavaduktānyathānupapattyaivāsyāpi vidhitvamiti || 4 ||
ācāraprāptasyodagagratvasya dyotakamātraṃ liṅgadarśanametanna vidhiḥ | kutaḥ |

yacchabdayogādākhyātatadviśeṣarahitatvācca sphuṭamihānuvādatvamavadhāritam | tadyayākathaṃcidapi prāptau satyāṃ nātikramitavyam | asti cātra prāptiḥ ‘agravanti prāgagrāṇyudagagrāṇi vā 'pavargavanti prāgapavargāṇyudagapavargāṇi vā’ iti smṛteḥ | tasmāttatsamānārtha evāyaṃ siddhavadanuvādaḥ | tathaiva ca stutyarthaḥ | purā hyetaduktaṃ na tu sāṃprataṃ mṛtāvasthā yāmiti | sthitādapyetadevottaram | hiśabdavadākhyātena yataḥ kutaścitprāpterapekṣitatvāt | prakaraṇe ca tadabhāvātkimanavagamyamānameva vidhitvaṃ kalpitamuta yatratatrasthā prāptirāśrīyatāmiti | tatra prāptyāśrayaṇamapekṣitaṃ na tu vidhitvamiti | tadeva jyāyaḥ prakaraṇabahuvacanayoścoktam | astyeva cānyo 'tra vidhiriti nā ' 'narthakyam | tasmādanuvāda iti nitye 'gnihotre dohe vinā 'pyupavītenāvaiguṇyam || 5 ||

idānīmevaṃvidhaśabdābhāve 'nuvādatvasyātiprasaktasyāpavāda ārabhyate | tatraiva diṣṭagatāgnihotre mahāpitṛyajñe vā śrūyate ‘aghastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati’ iti | tatra ‘upari hi devebhyaḥ’ ityatra pūrvavadeva vidhyanuvādatvasaṃdehe hiśabdayogādvartamānāpadeśādvidhyantareṇa caikavākyatvādācārataśca prāpteranuvāda iti prāpnoti |
kathamācārataḥ prāptiriti cet | ucyate |

lg.l: yatra kvacana ca prāpte samittatra niyamyate ||

div.p: devārthasya sruci prakṣiptasya haviṣa āhavanīyadeśaṃ nīyamānasyāvaśyameva hasto vā 'nyadvā kiṃciddravyamācārādupari dātavyam | tatra pratyāsatteḥ saminniyamyate |'srugdaṇḍe samidhamupagṛhyānudravati’ iti cāsyāpi vidherācārāpekṣitārthavidhānādetadeva phalaṃ vijñāyate | tasmādupari dhārayatīti prāptasyopavītāderivānuvādaḥ | sato vā liṅgadarśanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

lg.l: dhāraṇe vidhireva syānna hi prāptiḥ kutaścana |

div.p:
satyamācārātpracchādanaṃ kartavyaṃ na tu tatra samitpakṣe 'pi prāpnoti yā saṃnidherniyamyeta | hastādyeva hi tatra yogyatvātprāpnuyānna samit | nanu ca somacamasādīnāṃ vacanasāmarthyādyā kācidānatyarthatā bhavatyevamatrāpi yā kācitpracchittirbhaviṣyatīti | bhavedevaṃ yadi tadīyadakṣiṇāsaṃyogavadihāpi pracchādanasaṃyogaḥ śrūyeta | na tu śrūyate | upasaṃgrahamātravidhānāt | yadi somacamase 'pi dakṣiṇāsaṃyogarahitaṃ dānamātramaśroṣyata tato naivā ' 'natyarthatvamāśrayiṣyata | srugdaṇḍa iti ca deśaniyamātsutarāṃ haviṣaḥ prāgasau (tai. saṃ. 6-1-1)dhārayi
tavyā | tenopari dhāraṇamaprāptam | na cāprāptaṃ hetuvannigadena vartamānāpadeśena vā 'nuvadituṃ śakyam | ato 'sya vyavadhāraṇakalpanayā 'nuvādasarūpatvaṃ bhaṅktvā vākyaṃ bhittvā vidhitvamāśrīyate | pitrye home 'dhastāt srugdaṇḍasya samiddhārayitavyā | daive ca punarupariṣṭāditi | vidhitve caivamādīnāmuktaḥ kalpanāprakāraḥ | tasmādvidhiriti || 6 ||
digvibhāgaparuṣiditaghṛtādīnāṃ nivītādhikaraṇavatsarve prakārā avagamayitavyāḥ | kā punaratrātuṃlyāṃ ' 'śaṅkāyāṃ vyāvartayitumatideśaḥ kriyate | kimarthaṃ vā 'dhikaraṇadvayamārabhyate | taducyate |

svābhāvikaṃ digādīnāṃ sarvakriyāṅgatvaṃ na nivītavadapūrvaṃ vidhātavyam | tatra manuṣya saṃbandhe 'pi niyamaphalamātrakalpanameva na kriyāphalakalpanā | tadapi ca laukikīnāmeva kriyāṇāmavighnasamāpanamapekṣāvaśātkalpyate nānyatsvargādi | tenaivamābhāti | yāvatkiṃ cinmanuṣyāḥ svārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhanti tatra pratīcyudīcī cāṅgaṃ bhavati | yāvacca darbhalavanaṃ tadantarā kartavyam | yāvanmīyate tatpūrṇena mātavyam | yāvacca snehakāryaṃ tatsarvaṃ vilīna
anena śrutivākyasthaniṣpakvaśabdo bhāṣyasthāyutaśabdaśca vyākhyāto vijñeyaḥ |navanītena niṣpakvāyutaśabdavācyena kartavyam | nairṛtaraudrayośca vidagdhatvāśrṛtatve kartavye iti | tenātrāpi pūrvatulyatvaṃ sādhayitavyamityārambhaḥ | tatra ‘manuṣyadharmaḥ śabdasya tatpradhānatvāt’ iti vinā 'pi ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśādabhajanteti manuṣyasaṃbandhāttādarthyam | itareṣu ṣaṣṭhyeva | tathā ‘apadeśo vā’ iti saukaryātprāptirabhidhīyate | pūrvāhte hi pṛṣṭhata ādityaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ vyāpriyanta iti pratīcīprāptiḥ | tathā 'ntarālavanapūrṇayoraprayatnasādhyatvātprāptiḥ | tathā vidagdhe kṛṣṇatvādekavarṇanirṛtyākhyapṛthivīsaṃbandhaprāptiḥ | aśṛte ca
rogadatvādraudratā | niyogatastvaprāpteḥ sarvatra niyamavidhiḥ | prakaraṇasamākhyābhyāṃ ca karmadharmaḥ sarvapramāṇānugrahārthaṃ prakaraṇe manuṣyapradhāne niveśaḥ | vākyena prakaraṇasamākhyayorbādhātphalakalpanābhayāccā ' 'tithyādau niveśaḥ | tenāpi saha saṃbandhapramāṇābhāvātprakaraṇe saṃbhāvinaścānutkarṣātprācīnavidhiśeṣatvāccārthavāda iti siddhāntaḥ | samyakśrutayathāviditaviṣayānyaviṣayastutivivekasiddhiḥ || 10 || 11 ||

tenaiva śrutyāditrayasya prakaraṇena saha virodhāvirodhavicāraprastāvena darśapūrṇamāsādiprakaraṇagatāḥ pūrvamanavadhāritakratvarthapuruṣārthapadārthaviṣayā ‘nānṛtaṃ vadet’ ityevamādayaḥ pratiṣedhāḥ sāmarthyāprāptānṛtavadanādīni pratiṣedhanta udāharaṇam | teṣu saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ
kratvarthāḥ puruṣārthā iti | tataḥ sarvapratiṣedhānāṃ pravṛttiviṣayatvāttadavadhāraṇādhīno nirṇaya iti saiva prathamaṃ vicārayitavyā kimarthā satī pratiṣidhyata iti | yadarthā cāsau nirdhārayiṣyate tadarthapratiṣedho vijñāsyate | na hyanyārthāyāḥ pratiṣedho 'nyārtho bhavati | anākāṅkṣitatvāt | sarva eva yo yadarthapravṛttaḥ sannivāryate sa tadarthameva pratiṣiddho bhavatītyavadhāryate | tasmātpravṛttikaimarthyacintā | pravṛttīnāmapyabhidhāyakākhyātavaśenaidamarthyaṃ nirūpyata ityākhyātaśabdāścintayitavyāḥ, kimarthāḥ punaḥ pravṛttīrupādātuṃ śaknuvantīti | tāvacca pratiṣedhairudāsitavyaṃ, yāvadākhyātanirṇayo va jātaḥ | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati | ye puruṣārthapadāntareṇāsaṃbaddhāḥ prakaraṇagatā vidhayaste kimarthāṃ bhāvanāmabhidadhatīti | tataścaitasminnaiva kāle ‘samidho yajati’ ‘tanūnapātaṃ yajati’ ityevamādayo 'pi sarva udāharaṇam | kiṃ kratvarthaṃ ‘samidho yajati’ uta puruṣārthamiti | tathā kiṃ kratvarthaṃ vadeduta puruṣārthamiti | yadarthaṃ ca vadanaṃ tadarthasyaivānṛtapadaṃ viśeṣaṇam | pratiṣedhavelāyāṃ ca tatparo vidhiriti śeṣamavadhāritaidamarthyamanuvaditavyam | tataścaika
ekatreti—vidhāyakaliṅo niṣedhaparatva ityarthaḥ |traivaṃ vacanaṃ vyajyate yatpuruṣārthamanṛtavadanaṃ tanna kuryāt | a
aparatratviti—avidhāyakanao niṣedhaparatva ityarthaḥ |paratra tvevaṃ yatkratvarthamanṛtaṃ vadettanneti | tataścaitasya sarvasyā ' 'khyātanirūpaṇāyattatvāttadgato 'yaṃ vicāro bhaviṣyati | kimākhyātena kartā 'bhidhīyate neti | tatra yadyabhidhīyate tataḥ śrautatvātprayojanākāṅkṣiṇī bhāvanā prakaraṇagamyakratvarthatvabādhanena puruṣārthā bhavati | atha nābhidhīyate tataḥ śrutivirodhābhāvātprakaraṇena kratvarthatā | nanu satyapi karturabhidhāne bhāvanāpradhānatvādākhyātena tāṃ pratyupādīyamānasya śrauto 'pi saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇānuṃguṇatvādaviruddho naiva kratvarthatāṃ bādhate | virodhinau hi tulyakakṣau saṃbandhau parasparaṃ bādheyātāṃ na guṇapradhānabhūtau | tadyathā ‘daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi’ ityatra daśāpavitropasarjanasya saṃmārgasya grahaṃ pratyupādīyamānasya naivamāśaṅkā bhavati kiṃ daśāpavitreṇa saṃbadhyatāmuta graheṇeti | tathā 'trāpi guṇabhūtakartṛkāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ kratuṃ pratyupādīyamānāyā na kaścidvirodhaḥ | yadi tvākhyātena kartuḥ prādhānyamucyeta tataḥ prakaraṇagamyena kratuprādhānyena virodhaḥ syāt | yadi vā karturiva kratorapi guṇatvaṃ syāttata ubhayoḥ śeṣayoḥ śeṣisamavāyavirodho lakṣyate | na tu tadubhayamapyasti | ataḥ śrutyā karturguṇabhāvātprakaraṇena ca kratoḥ prādhānyānnānāviṣayatvenāsamavāyādavirodhaḥ | tadabhāvādabādhaḥ syāditi | naitadevam |

yadyapi prathamaṃ sādhakamapekṣamāṇā kriyā kartāraṃ guṇatvena gṛhṇāti tathā 'pi tasyāḥ prayojanākāṅkṣāvelāyāmapi kartraiva saṃnihitastāṃ nirvartayituṃ samarthaḥ | so 'pi ca sādhakatvaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ kimayaṃ mamopakaripyatītyevamapekṣate | tayoścaikaśabdopāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhe nirvartamāne viprakarṣādyāgasaṃbandho na gṛhyate | na ca sā
sāmavāyikatve—saṃnipatyopakārakatva ityarthaḥ |mavāyikatve saṃbhavatyārādupakārakalpanā yuktā | tadyathā ‘agnīṣomīyasya vapayā pracaryāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśupuroḍāśamanunirvapati’ ityatra satyapi taddhitena devatopasarjanatvopādāne yāgasya prayojanākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāmagnīṣomayoreva saṃnihitayoḥ saṃskāryatvaṃ vijñāyata iti na pa
na paśoriti—paśupuroḍāśayāgasya paśuyāgīyadevatāsaṃskārakatvena saṃnipatyopakārakatve saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭāntarakalpanāgauravāpādakatvenā ' 'rādupakārakatvakalpanamanyāyyamiti bhāvaḥ | paśoḥ paśuyāgasya | kalpyata iti-paśupuroḍāśayāga iti pūrvaṃ śeṣaḥ |śorārādupakārakatvena kalpyate | na hi pūrvaṃ guṇatvamuttareṇa prādhānyena virudhyate | avaśyaṃbhāvinyāṃ prayojanakalpanāyāṃ kasyacitprādhānyamevamatrāpīti | athavā ' 'khyātena kartā kevalamabhidhīyate guṇapradhānabhāvastvarthādyatheṣṭaṃ yathāyogyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti | tenobhayoḥ kriyākartrorapekṣāsaṃnidhiyogyatvairanyonyaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvāvupapatsyete |

na hyasyautsargikasya nyāyasya smaraṇasya vā 'pavādabhūtaṃ nyāyāntaraṃ smaraṇāntaraṃ copalabhyate | tena kṛttaddhitāntavadeva pratyayārthaprādhānyaṃ prāpnoti | tataśca śabdenaiva dhātvarthasya śeṣatvamuktaṃ nātikramituṃ śakyate | nanu sāmānyamutsṛṣṭaṃ pratītiviśeṣeṇāpodyeta | tathā hi |

dvayostāvatpradhānayorguṇayorvā sarvatraiva saṃbandho nāvakalpate | tatrāvaśyaṃ kalpanīye guṇapradhānatve yathāpratīti vyavasthā 'vadhāryate | tatpratītiśca yathā 'nyatra prakṛtyarthopasarjanapratyayārthaviṣayatvenopalabhyate tathā 'tra pratyayārthopasarjanaprakṛtyarthaviṣayā sarvasya svasaṃvedyā | na ca tato 'nyadbalavatkāraṇamasti | tasmādaprasaṅgaḥ kartuḥ pradhānatvasyeti | ucyate |

lg.l: autsargiko na ca nyāyo matpakṣe hi nivartsyati ||

div.p:
bhāvapradhānatvādākhyāteṣu na kadāciddhātvarthasya nityaṃ karaṇabhūtasya prādhānyamiti sthitam
bhāvārthādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ | na ca dhātvartha eva bhāva ityuktam | nanu pratītivaśātkartṛprādhānyaṃ tāvannivṛttam | satyaṃ nivṛttaṃ na tu bhavatpakṣe | kiṃ tarhi, asmatpakṣe | yo hi bhāvameva pratyayārthaṃ vadati tasya prakṛtipratyayārthaprādhānyanyāyo laukikī pratītirubhayamapi na virudhyate | yasya tu kartaiva śuddhaḥ pratyayārthastasya naiva kenacidbhāvopādānamiti tatprādhānyānugamalakṣaṇaṃ na syāt | lakṣaṇata eva kartuḥ prādhānyaṃ prāpnoti | tacca pratītiviruddham | tatra yadi pratītiranugantavyā tatastadanusāryeva pratyayārthalakṣaṇaṃ praṇetavyam | tacca bhāvapratyayārthavādibhireva praṇītaṃ netaraiḥ| atastairatikrāntāyāṃ laukikaprasiddhāvabhidheyatvavatkartuḥ prādhānyamabhyupagantavyamiti kriyāyāstādarthyaprasaṅgaḥ | āha | tatraitatprasajyate tatra tādarthyasaṃbandhameva śrutirupādatte | prakṛtipratyayārthayoḥ punarapetatādarthyaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamātraṃ pratīyate | tatra yadyapi viśeṣaṇatvena dhātvarthasyopasarjanatā tathā 'pi rājapuruṣa ityādiṣviva kadācidaṅgāṅgibhāvo viparītaḥ syāt | tathā hi |
api ca |

tathā ca paśvekatvapuṃstvādiṣu samānapadopādānalakṣaṇaśrutisaṃbandheṣu vākyena kriyārthatvenāvadhāryamāṇeṣu va( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 15 ) ityatra bhāṣyakṛtetyarthaḥkṣyate ‘na śrutirbrūte vākyārtho neti’ | tenātrāpi śakyaṃ vaktuṃ na śrutirbrūte prakaraṇārtho neti | api ca |

prādhānyenābhidhānaṃ tātparyeṇābhidhānaṃ na śeṣitvena | tadiha yadi kartṛtvaparamākhyātaṃ tataḥ sutarāṃ guṇatvamabhihitaṃ bhavati | na hyakurvankartetyucyatai | yaśca yatkaroti sa tasyaikāntena guṇabhūtaḥ | tenāsyānupapannaṃ śeṣitvena prādhānyam | etadaudāsīnyābhidhānapakṣe 'pi vaktavyam | yattūktamabhidhīyate kevalaṃ pratyayena kartā guṇapradhānabhāvastvarthādbhaviṣyatīti | tatrāpi yadi vastumātratvena kartā 'bhidhīyate, tata audāsīnyāvasthānādyatheṣṭamaṅgāṅgibhāvaṃ
pratipadyeta | sa tu kartṛrūpatvena guṇātmanaivābhidhīyata iti nāstyaudāsīnyāvasthānam | yadapyuktaṃ guṇatvenābhihito 'pi dvitīyayā ' 'kāṅkṣayā punaḥ prādhānyaṃ pratipatsyata iti | tadapi śrutivirodhādayuktam | ākhyātena hi śrutyaiva guṇaparyāyātmanā kartṛtvamabhihitaṃ tatpaścādvyāvartayataḥ śrutivirodha āpadyeta | na ca tatkalpanāmantareṇā ' 'narthakyaprasaktiḥ, yata evaṃ kalpyeta | prakaraṇena prayojanasaṃbandhasiddheḥ | yathaiva cānabhihite kartari niṣpratidvaṃdvaṃ prakaraṇaṃ viniyogāya paryāptaṃ bhavati tathaivaṃrūpeṇābhihite 'pyavirodhaḥ | na caika eva pratyayaḥ sakṛduccaritaḥ śaknoti guṇapradhānatve yugapadabhidhātum | tatraikasminnāśrīyamāṇe yadi prādhānyamāśrīyate tataḥ kriyāguṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvamutsṛjya tayā ' 'pyamānatvena karmatvaprasaṅgāttatraiva lakārotpatteryagātmanepadādikaraṇādanyarūpa eva śabdaḥ syāt | athocyeta sarvaḥ kartā kiṃcitprayojanamanuddiśya kriyāyāṃ na pravartate | tataśca dvayātmakameva kartṛtvaṃ sādhakarūpaṃ kriyāphalasvāmirūpaṃ ceti | ubhayarūpeṇābhihite satyākāṅkṣādvayaṃ prasṛtaṃ kriyāto nirvartayiṣyata iti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

yadyapi svāmitvena vinā kartṛtvaṃ nopapadyate tathā 'pi pramāṇāntaralabhye tasminnākhyātairanuṣṭhātṛtvāṃśamātramabhidhīyate | tathā ca svāmitvapratipādanārthāstatra tatra svargakāmādiśabdāḥ prayuktāḥ | tasmādguṇatvameva kevalaṃ kartṛtvam | a
ataśceti—ito 'pītyarthaḥ |taścaitadevam | tathā hi |

vyāpi hi kartṛlakṣaṇamaṅgīkartavyam | na ca phaloddeśasya vyāpitvam, acetaneṣvabhāvāt | sādhakatvaṃ tu vyāpi | tena tadevā ' 'śrayitavyam | tasmānnaiva puruṣārthatā yukteti | tasmānnā ' 'rabdhavyam | atrābhidhīyate | yadyapi śrutyā śeṣatvaṃ nābhihitam | tathā 'pi yadeva tadviśeṣaṇatvenopasarjanatvaṃ tadeva śeṣatvamapyāpādayati | tena hyekaṃ tāvattādarthyamabhidhānātmakamupāttameva | kevalamanuṣṭhāne 'pi tadevāṅgīkartavyam | rājapuruṣādiṣvapi śabdārthavṛttyā rājādīnāṃ guṇatvameva prāptaṃ pramāṇāntaravaśena tu viparītaṃ kalpyate | tacca saktva( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 12 )dhikaraṇe darśitam | na caitāvatā śabdārthatvaṃ bhavatītyuktameva | yaśca vastuto 'pi tatra rājño guṇatvāṃśastamevopādāya śabdaḥ pravartate | asti cāsau | katham |

tatra yadā rājaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣo vivakṣitastadā śabdārthānuguṇyādekāntena vastugatamapyupakārakatvaṃ vivakṣitavyam | yadā punarupakāryatvaṃ vivakṣyate tadā tasya viśeṣyalakṣaṇāpatte rājājñākaratvenopakārakabhūtāḥ puruṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavantīti puruṣarājaśabda eva prayoktavyaḥ | prayogadvayasya vidyamānasya tāvadvyavasthāhetāvarthadvaye saṃbhavati kimiti vakṣyamāṇakriyopayogāpekṣayā vivakṣābhedamātreṇa kliṣṭāṃ vyavasthāmāśrayiṣyāmahe | tena bhūtaṃ nimittamālocya śabde prayujyamāne rājapuruṣa ityatropakārāṃśakṛtaṃ śeṣatvameva vivakṣitamiti gamyate | yatrāpi gogarbhadāsādisvāminyatyantāvidyamānameva śeṣatvaṃ tatrāpyupakārakatvasaṃbhavādupacaritamiti draṣṭavyam | athāpyevamādīnāṃ mukhyatvasiddhyarthamupakārakatvamevopasarjanatvaṃ na śeṣatvam | tathā 'pi śeṣasyaivaṃ phalavattvādetatpratyāsannataraṃ na śeṣiṇa iti śeṣatvapratipattyarthatvameva vijñāyate | pācakādāvapi sarvatra tatkṛtavṛttilābhādupakārakatvasadbhāvātkriyāṇāmupasarjanatvaṃ na nirvartyatvenāvasthānātprādhānyam |

nanvevaṃ sati ‘prokṣitābhyāmulūkhalamusalābhyām’ ityatrāpi prokṣaṇasya dravyārthatvaṃ prāpnoti | kasya vaitadaniṣṭam | nanvevaṃ sati hantipiṣiprayuktatvāpūrvaprayuktatvavicāro virudhyate | kathaṃ nāma virudhyate | yadā 'nyadevatatprayuktatvamanyacca tādarthyam | avasthite hi dravyārthatve kāryaprayukto hi dharmaḥ kimanantarakāryeṇa hantinā piṣiṇā ca prayujyatāmuta vyavahitenāpūrveṇeti | yo 'pi ca tādarthyavicārastatra so 'pyevamevolūkhalamusalāparityāgenaiva draṣṭavyaḥ | kiṃ yattayorhantipiṣisādhanatvaṃ tadarthametatprokṣaṇamuta yadapūrvasādhanatvaṃ tadarthamiti |

lg.l: tirohitaṃ ca karmatvaṃ na gṛhṇīyādapi kriyām |

div.p: kṛdantābhihitāni kārakāṇi tirohitatvānna śaknuyurapi nāmārthatvena kriyāṃ grahītum | suptiṅantasthāni tvāvirbhūtatvācchaknuvanti | yattu paśvekatvādivadapetatādarthyasaṃbandho na kratvarthatvena virotsyata iti | tatrocyate |

kārakopasarjanībhūtasya dravyasya pratyāsattimātreṇa saṃkhyādayaḥ śeṣāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ | te tvatyantapratyāsannapradhānabhūtena kārakeṇāpahṛtya kriyāyai nīyante | na tvevaṃ dhātvarthānāṃ
kenacidbalavattareṇa pramāṇena kratvarthatvamavagamyate, yena kartṛtvaśeṣatā bādhyeta | yattu kartṛtvasya guṇātmakatvātprādhānyābhidhāne sati sutarāṃ guṇatvaṃ prāpnotīti | tadasat | kutaḥ |

yadyapyanuṣṭhātṛmātrātmakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tathā 'pi tadbuddhivipūrvakāriṇāṃ phalasaṃkalpanamiśram | tādṛśānāmeva vaidikeṣu karmasvadhikāro nācetanānām | vidhiyuktāścaitāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ | pratiṣedhānāmapi vidhipratyayasaṃbandhādhīnatvāt | na ca puruṣārthakartavyatāmantareṇa vidhiḥ saṃbhavati | tenāvaśyamanuṣṭhātṛtvenocyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kimapi mamaiṣā kriyā sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vopakariṣyatītyadhyavasyati | sākṣādupakārake ca saṃbhavati na pāramparyopakārakalpanā labhyate | na ca saṃskārānarhaḥ kartā | kratuphalādhāratvena saprayojanatvāt | kastasyopakāra iti cet | sarvathā tāvatsāmānyenopakāramātramavadhāritam | tāvatā ca kratvarthatvaṃ vyāvartitam | tadviśeṣāvadhāraṇaṃ ca yatheṣṭaṃ kalpayiṣyate | na tadatropayujyate | tasmānna kratvarthatā | yadyapi ca prādhānyāṃśaḥ kartṛtvavacanenānabhihitastatra cānantargatastathā 'pi tadanyathānupapattyaiva pratyāyitatvātsaṃbadhyate | yathā svargakāmādiśabdena puruṣaviśeṣavacanenānuktamapi svargasya sādhyatvaṃ kalpayiṣyate | tathā svāmitvamapi buddhipūrvakāriṇaḥ puruṣasya phalalipsayaiva kartṛtvapratītyā pratipatsyate | tatra yathaiva devatāyāḥ karmaṇā 'bhipreyamāṇāyāḥ prādhānyaṃ yāgasādhanatvapratipattyarthameva jñāyate na prādhānyasvarūpaparyavasāyitvena, tatheha guṇatvaṃ prādhānyasiddhyarthameva draṣṭavyam |

lg.l: bhāvanāyāṃ tu śeṣasya dhātvarthaḥ kiṃ na te guṇaḥ ||

div.p: yasyāpi kartā pratyayārthastenāpyavaśyaṃ pratītivaśādbhāvanā 'bhyupagantavyā | tataścaikapratyayopādānātprādhānyācca saiva kartāramaṅgī karotīti na dhātvarthāṅgatā bhavatīti | sa tu bhāvanāyāṃ vyāpṛtastāmanyathā kartumaśaknubandhātvarthamevāṅgī karoti | na cobhayātmakatvaṃ vipratiṣiddhaṃ, viṣayānyatvādeva | yadi dhātvarthameva prati guṇatvameva kalpyeta tataḥ sakṛdupādāne vipratiṣiddhamiva syāt | iha tu bhāvanāṃ prati guṇatvaṃ dhātvartheṣu prādhānyamisyavirodhaḥ | svabhāvaścobhayātmakaṃ vastu, yadi tathaiva śabda upādatte kiṃ tatra vipratiṣiddham | athavaikaṃ śabdādekaṃ sāmarthyādityavirodhaḥ | sarvathā 'sti tāvatkartuḥ prādhānyaprasaktiriti puruṣārtho dhātvarthaḥ prāpnoti | athaṃ cāparo viśeṣaḥ |

śabdārthavastvarthātmanobhayaprakārasyopasarjanatvasyāyaṃ vivekaḥ | pācakaṃ rājapuruṣaṃ vā ' 'nayetyatra puruṣasyā ' 'nayanasaṃbandhinaḥ pācako rājā vā śabdārthamātratayopasarjanatvaṃ pratipanna iti śeṣatvaṃ yāvanna gacchedapi | vadedityevamādiṣu tu kartuḥ kāryāntarasaṃbandhānupādānānna śabdārthopasarjanatvamākāṅi‏kṣatamiti pariśeṣādvastvarthopasarjanatvameva śeṣatvamavadhāryate | tasmādastyabhidhānapakṣe dhātvarthānāṃ puruṣārthatve pramāṇamiti | nanvevaṃ satyanabhidhīyamāno 'pi samānapadopāttabhāvanālakṣitaḥ prakaraṇātsa eva pratyāsannataraḥ śaknoti dhātvarthasya prayojanākāṅkṣāṃ nirvartayitumityabhidhīyamānapakṣatulyatvaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

lg.l: sa śabdo lakṣaṇāṃ yāti yaḥ śrutyā nopayujyate |

div.p:
abhidhīyamāno hyagamyamānaviśeṣayā śrutyā tantreṇopātto yadyatkāryamupatiṣṭhate tattatsarvaṃ nirākāṅkṣīkartuṃ samartha iti na kvacicchāstrārthatvāddhīyate | lakṣyamāṇaḥ punarādita eva naiṣa śāstreṇokta ityevaṃ tāvatpratīyate | na ca tenānukta ādartavyo bhavati | tadyadi lakṣaṇābījaṃ śāstraṃ tatropasaṃhariṣyate | tataḥ śāstrārthatvamadhyavasāya pramāṇī kariṣyate | sarvameva śāstraṃ yadā śrutyarthaḥ karmaṇi nopayujyate tadā lakṣaṇārthamātmānaṃ prāpayati | śrutyartha eva ceha bhāvanopayujyate | na ca yugapacchrutilakṣaṇāvṛttyupayogitvamavakalpate | tasmādyathaiva pūrvo dhāvatītyukte saṃbandhitvādaparo gamyamāno 'pi na kāryeṇa saṃbadhyate tathehānyapare 'pi śabdabalātsaṃbandhī kartā gamyata eva kevalamityavadhāraṇānnopayogitvena gṛhyate | yā cāsau pratītiḥ sā guṇatvenāpyupayukteti na punaḥ prādhānyakalpanāmapi karoti | tadā ca bhāvanā kartāramātmasiddhyarthamananyathāsaṃbhavamātreṇopasarjanīkṛtameva gamayati na pradhānabhūtamiti niṣpramāṇikaiva prādhānyapratipattirbhavet | na hi taṃ pradhānabhūtaṃ bhāvanā gamayituṃ samarthā | tena yadaiva kartā pradhānatvaṃ pratipattumārabhate tadaiva kimetasya
pramāṇamityanviṣyamāṇe śabdo bhāvanā cobhayamapyudāsīnam | na ca tato 'nyatpramāṇamasti | tasmādarthavānabhidhānānabhidhānavicāraḥ | kiṃ prāptam | prāyeṇa vāco 'nṛtavādinītvādyatpuruṣasyā ' 'tmārthe vadane 'nṛtaṃ prasaktaṃ tasyaiṣa pratiṣedhaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyavāyaparihārārtho vidhīyata iti | kutaḥ |

samānapadopāttena hi kartrā saṃbandhaḥ śrautatvātprakaraṇaṃ bādhate | yo 'pi vidhivyāpāraḥ so 'pi puruṣārthadharmapakṣe 'tyantāprāpto vidhīyamāno 'rthavān | kratvarthapakṣe tu prayogavacanenaivopanītamātradhātvarthavidhānātprātyātmiko vidhiranarthakaḥ syāt | taddarśayati—itarathā vadanaṃ bhavatītyetāvatyarthe sakartṛkaṃ sāvidhikaṃ ca padaṃ vadanamanutiṣṭhedityevaṃrūpamanarthakaṃ syāt | tasmādvidhayastāvatpuruṣārthāḥ | tataśca pratiṣedhānāmapi tadanusāritvātpuruṣārthatvasiddhiḥ | tata ātmopakārāya puruṣo nānṛtaṃ vadediti śāstrārtho 'vadhāryate | sūtramidānīṃ yojayati | sa cāyamarthaḥ puruṣasya prāgeva darśapūrṇamāsādhikārādupanayanasamakālameva smṛtitaḥ prāptastena puruṣasya saṃyogātkratusaṃyuktavadanaṃ nityānuvādaḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ puruṣārthatāyāṃ kratusaṃyuktagrahaṇam | ucyate |
yadetattatkratusaṃyuktamabhipretaṃ, kratusaṃyuktaṃ vā samāmnātaṃ, prakaraṇādvā yatkratusaṃyuktaṃ prāptaṃ tatpuruṣārthabhūtatvānnityānuvādaḥ syāditi | nanveṣā śrutistasyāḥ smṛtermūlamiti |

yadi tu smṛteḥ svātantryeṇa prāmāṇyaṃ bhavettatastadvaśena śrutirnityānuvādo bhavedapi |
tasyāstu mūlabhūtā śrutiravaśyaṃ kalpanīyā | tatkimanyāṃ kāṃcitkalpayitveyamanuvādī kriyatāmuteyameva mūlaṃ bhavatvityasyāṃ pratyakṣeṇopalabhyamānāyāṃ nānyasyāḥ kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti | dvayaṃ hi tathā niṣpramāṇakamāśrīyeta | śrutaparityāgāśrutakalpanābhyupagamāt | tasmānnityānuvādo neti | yattvatrottaraṃ darśapaurṇamāsayoriti hi smaryeta | upanayanakāla eva cāsyopadeṣṭāro bhavanti | api ca puruṣadharma ityupadiśanti | tasmānnaiṣā smṛtirataḥ śruteriti | naivaitatpaurvāparyeṇa saṃbaddhaṃ dṛśyate | tathā hi |

lg.l: tataḥ smṛtisamānārthā neṣṭā mūlaṃ kathaṃ śrutiḥ ||

div.p:
yadi hi kratvarthā satī śrutirmūlatvenābhyupagamyate tata ubhayormūlamūlinoraikarūpyasvābhāvyādasyāścātadrūpatvānmūlatvaṃ na syāt | iyaṃ tu yataḥ prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā puruṣārthadharmatvena sthāpitā tenopanayanasamakālameva prāpnuvatī kimiti śrutiḥ smṛtermūlaṃ na bhaviṣyati | kimiti vā darśapūrṇamāsayoriti smaryate | kā copanayanakālapuruṣārthatvopadeśayorviruddhatā | tenāyuktaṃ mūlatvanirākaraṇamiti | naiṣa
bhāṣyakārābhiprāyāvijñānavilasitamākṣepaṃ samādhātumārabhate—naiṣa doṣa ityādinā | doṣaḥ | katham |

yadyatra kevalapuruṣadharmatvameva pūrvapakṣaḥ syāttato 'yamasaṃbaddho grantho bhavet | iha tvetadgranthānyathānupapattyaiva trayaḥ pakṣāḥ kramavanto hṛdaye vṛttikārasya viparivartamānā gamyante | tatra prathamaṃ tāvatsūtranirapekṣaḥ kevalapuruṣārthatvapakṣaḥ | tasmiṃśca naiva smṛtirupanyasyate | yadi tvavaśyamupanyasitavyā tato mūlamūlibhāvābhyupagamenaiva netavyā | tasmiṃstu vidhyanuvādavikalparahite parigṛhīte sūtrapadāgamitaṃ paśyannanuvādatvasamarthanārthaṃ kratuyuktapuruṣadharmapakṣaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā ‘sa cāyamartha upanayanakāla eva pratiṣiddhaḥ’ iti bravīti | tatra parastameva kevalapuruṣārthatvapakṣamaṅgīkṛtya mūlatvapratipattyā 'nuvādatvamākṣipati | siddhāntavādī tu ‘naiṣā tasyā mūlam’ iti bruvannimaṃ pakṣaṃ parigṛhṇāti | naiva kevalapuruṣārthatvaṃ mayā 'ṅgīkṛtaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, ‘prakara( a. 3 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 15 )ṇaviśeṣādvā
tadyuktasya saṃskāro dravyavat’ ityanena kratuyuktapuruṣadharmo 'mikramaṇavadvijñāyate na sārvatrivakaḥ | evaṃ śrutiḥ prakaraṇaṃ cobhayamapyanugrahīṣyate | tataśca smṛtiraviśeṣeṇa pravṛttā naṃ viśeṣasthayā śrutyā mūlato nirākāṅkṣīkartuṃ śakyata ityavaśyamātmānurūpaśrutyantaraṃ mūlaṃ kalpayati | tasmiṃśca kalpite tadarthaikadeśāntargatatvāddarśapūrṇamāsayajisthaḥ pratiṣedho 'nuvādī bhavati | yo hyupanayanādārabhyānṛtaṃ varjayati varjayatitarāmasau darśapūrṇamāsasthaḥ | tasmādupanayanamaraṇāntarālavartitvāddarśapūrṇamāsayornityaprāpta eva puruṣasyānṛtavadanapratiṣedho 'nūdyate na mūlatvam | ‘api ca puruṣadharma ityupadiśanti’ ityetadapi kevalapuruṣadharmopadeśitvena smṛteḥ pū
kratuyuktapuruṣadharmatvapakṣeṇaivetyarthaḥ |rveṇaiva yojayitavyam | athavā 'nenaiva pakṣānta
pakṣāntaramiti—śuddhapuruṣadharmakratuyuktapuruṣadharmapakṣābhyāṃ pakṣāntaramityarthaḥ |raṃ parigṛhyate | naivātra kratvarthapuruṣārthopanyāsaḥ kriyate | kiṃ tarhi | darśapūrṇamāsayoranṛtavadanapratiṣedhaḥ śrūyate | sa kimaprāptavidhiruta prāptānuvāda iti | kiṃ prāptaṃ, smṛtikṛtātsaṃyogānnityānuvāda iti | nanu cānya eva smārtaḥ saṃyogaḥ puruṣārtho 'nyaścaiṣa kratvartha iti | satyamevam | tathā 'pi nityānuvādaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: puruṣaṃ hi parityajya nānṛtaṃ prāpyate kratau |

div.p:
yadyapi puruṣārthātpratiṣedhātkratvarthaḥ pratiṣedho viṣayāntaraṃ bhavati tathā 'pi prasaṅgopanatārthatvānna vidhitvaṃ pratipadyate | na hi puruṣaḥ svārthaṃ cānṛtaṃ varjayiṣyati kratvarthaṃ ca vakṣyatīti saṃbhavati | tasmātpuruṣārthapratiṣedhāntarālapātitvātkratorapyastyeva pratiṣedha iti nityānuvādatā | na caitasminpakṣe mūlamūlibhāvāśaṅkā | smṛtau puruṣadharmatvopadeśāt | atha
athavā ' 'dita eveti—ayamāśayaḥ | ‘sa cāyamarthaḥ’ ityanena bhāṣyeṇa kratuyuktapuruṣadharmatvāśayatvenānuvādatve 'bhihite tadāśayamavijñāya puruṣadharmatvāśayena ‘nanveṣā śrutiḥ’ ityanena kṛtāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ kratuyuktapuruṣadharmatvāśayatvena ‘naiṣā tasyā mūlam’ ityanena parihāramabhidhāya api cetyādigranthamapi kratuyuktapuruṣadharmatvapakṣa eva ‘satyaṃ brūyātpriyaṃ’ brūyānna brūyātsatyamapriyam | priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ’ || iti smṛtau | śuddhapuruṣadharmatvopadeśādityevaṃ paratayā saṃyojya ‘api ca’ ityādigranthasya kratvarthatvānuvādarūpapakṣāntaraparigrahārthatayā vyākhyānapakṣe 'pi kratvarthatvānuvādāyogāśaṅkāparihārārthatvena ‘naiṣā tasyāḥ’ ityādita eva bhāṣyaṃ yojayatīti |vā ' 'dita evā ' 'rabhya darśapūrṇamāsayoriti hi smaryetetyādi samastamevottaram | ato mūlāntaraprabhavasmṛtyarthānuvādamātrameva kratupraśaṃsārtham | anyārthaprasaktairapyevamādibhiḥ kraturyujyamāno bahvaṅgatvena praśastaḥ pratibhātītyarthavādatā || 12 ||

kevalapuruṣārthatvapakṣe tāvadbhāpyakāraḥ saṃyogāntaraṃ varṇayati | smṛtau hi ‘satyaṃ brūyāt’ iti | dharmāya satyaniyamaḥ śrūyate | ‘nānṛtaṃ vadet’ iti tvanṛtapratiṣedhaḥ | bhinnau caitāvarthau | na cānyacchrūyamāṇamanyasya śrūyamāṇasyānuvādo bhavati | tasmādvidhiḥ | nanu dvayyeva puruṣasya vākyapravṛttiḥ, satyavacanamanṛtavadanaṃ ca | tatra yadā satyaṃ niyataṃ tadā 'rthādevānṛtaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavatītyanuvādatvaṃ prāpnotyeva | naitadevam | kutaḥ | saṃyogāntarādeva | sa nāmānuvādo bhavati yo 'tyantasamānā rthatvenāvadhāryate | asti ca vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ phalabhedādarthabhedaḥ | katham |

‘satyaṃ brūyāt’ ityasyāṃ hi bhāvanāyāṃ prayojanākāṅkṣā sarvavidhīnāṃ puruṣārthaphalatvātsvargādinā nivartyate | tenaiṣo 'rthaḥ, sati vacanadvayena vyavahāre satyavacanena vyaharannabhyudayena saṃbadhyata iti | tatra satyaṃ bruvāṇasya svargo bhavati | anṛtavādinastu na guṇo na doṣaḥ | tathā ‘nānṛtaṃ vadet’ ityanenāpi pratiṣedhenānṛtavadanānnarakaprāptirbhavati | satyavadanāttu na doṣo na guṇaḥ | tasmādarthabhedādubhayorapyapunaruktatayā vidhitvam | āha | bhavedetatsaṃyogāntaram | yadi smṛtau satyaṃ brūyādityetāvanmātramevocyeta | tasyāṃ tu satyavacanāvidhivadanṛtapratiṣedho 'pi bhedena smaryate | tasmānna saṃyogāntaramiti | ucyate |

lg.l:
pra
prajāpativratasthatvāditi—yathava ‘nekṣetodyantamādityam’ ityādeḥ prajāpativratāntagartatvādupakramasthavrataśabdānurodhādvekṣaṇābhāvasaṃkalpavidhiparatvaṃ tathaivātrāpi ‘satyaṃ brūyātpriyaṃ brūyānna brūyātsatyamapriyam | priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ’ | ityasyāṃ smṛtāvupasaṃhāre 'nuṣṭheyakriyābācidharmaśabdānurodhena ‘nāṃnṛtaṃ vadet’ ityanena niṣedhāyogātparyudāsasyaiva vidhirāśrayaṇīya iti ślokatātparyārtheḥ |jāpativratasthatvātatrānīkṣaṇayuktitaḥ |

div.p:
ananṛtaṃ hi vadedityevaṃ hi tatrāpi niyamyate | tataścāstyeva saṃyogāntaram | na hi dārśapūrṇamāsike kaścitparyudāsaheturasti vrataśabdaprayogo vikalpaprasaktirvā | śāstra
prāptapratiṣedheṣu hi vikalpo nārthaprāptipūrvakeṣviti vakṣya
(a. 10 pā. 8 a. 1) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |ti | tasmādvidhiriti | ya
etāvatā yathābhāṣyaṃ kevalapuruṣārthatvapakṣe saṃyogāntaratvaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā yadi tāvadvrataśabdavyatirekeṇa dharmaśabdavyatirekeṇāpi ca ‘na saṃśayaṃ prapadyena nākasmādapriyaṃ vadet’ | nāhitaṃ nānṛtaṃ caiva ‘ityādismārtaniṣedhasadbhāvena śuddhaparuṣārthatvapakṣe na saṃyogāntaramiti kaścana pratyavatiṣṭhattadā kratuyuktapuruṣārthatvapakṣe saṃyogāntaraṃ vyākhyeyamityavemabhiprāyeṇā ' 'ha—yadā tvevamityādinā |dā tvevaṃ pratyavasthīyate yathā prajāpativratavyatirekeṇāpyevamādaya pratiṣedhāḥ smṛtiṣu santīti tadaivaṃ saṃyogā
saṃyogāntaramiti—saṃyujyate— viniyujyate 'neneti vyutpattyā phalasaṃbandhabodhakavidhyantaraṃ niṣedhasyetyarthaḥ |ntaraṃ vyākhyātavyam |

nanvetenaiva hetunā sāmānyaprāpnyapekṣayā viśeṣasyānuvādatvaṃ yuktam | naitadasti | pūrvavadeva phalabhedāt | yo hi smārto 'nṛtapratiṣedhastenaitāvadavagatam | ātmadoṣaparihārāya puruṣeṇa nānṛtaṃ vaditavyamiti | tatra yadā darśapūrṇamāsastho 'pi tadatikramaṃ karoti tadā bāhyātikramavadasya svayaṃ pratyavāyamātraṃ syānna karmaphalapratibandhaḥ | na hi śuddhapuruṣadharmātikramaiḥ kratavaḥ pratyavayanti | tathā hi |

kratavo hi svasaṃbandhinau vidhipratiṣedhāvapekṣamāṇāstadatikrame sati viguṇā bhavanti | ye puruṣagatā vidhipratiṣedhāste kratvantaragatā ivāsya sadasadbhāvayoraviśiṣṭāḥ | na hi teṣu guṇabuddhirutpannā, yenātikrame vaiguṇyabuddhiḥ syāt | tena darśapūrṇamāsayoranṛtaṃ vadan, narakaṃ ca prāpnuyāt, darśapūrṇamāsaphalaṃ cāvikalamevā ' 'pnuyāditi ca smṛtyarthaḥ | śrautaḥ punaḥ prakaraṇayuktapuruṣa
puruṣadharma iti—kṛtveti śeṣaḥ | atra—śraute niṣedha ityarthaḥ | eṣo 'rthaḥ—vakṣyamāṇa ityarthaḥ |dharma ityatraiṣo 'rtho vijñāyate | varjitānṛtavacanakena puruṣeṇa kṛtau darśapūrṇamāsau phalaṃ sādhayata iti | prakaraṇasāmarthyāddhi puruṣagatamapūrvasādhanatvaṃ lakṣayitvā 'nṛtaṃ pratiṣiddham | atastadatikrame darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvameva vaiguṇyānna syāt | na tu puruṣasyaiva kaścitpratyavāyaḥ | na hi tadānīṃ pratyavāyaḥ kalpyamānaḥ svatantrapuruṣasaṃbandhitvena kalpayituṃ śakyate | tasmādasti saṃyogāntaramiti vidhiḥ | evaṃ śuddhakratudharmepakṣe 'pi kratupuruṣapratyavāyaviśeṣātsaṃyogāntaraṃ vyākhyeyam | tena nityānuvādastāvanna bhavati | yastu kratudharmatvatadgatapuruṣadharmatvayorviśeṣa
viśeṣaḥ—prayojanaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ |stamupariṣṭādvakṣyāmaḥ | ubhaya
thā 'pi vidhisiddheridānīṃ nopayujyata iti nocyate | parastvāha | gṛhṇīma etadvidhiriti | pūrvoktenaiva kāraṇena puruṣadharma iti vadāmaḥ | ubhāvidānīṃ pūrvapakṣāvāsāte | yaśca puruṣamātradharma eva satyavidheḥ saṃyogāntaratvena yaśca kratuyuktapuruṣadharma iti | tatrāpyuttaram |

lg.l: yā tu tebhyaḥ pratītiḥ sā saṃyogāntarato bhavet ||

div.p:
sarvatraiva tāvacchabdāduccaritādaneko 'rtho gamyate | na ca tāvatā sarva evābhidheyo bhavati | tadbhāvabhāvitvānyathānupapattyadhīnatvādvācakaśaktikalpanāyāḥ | sa nāmārtho 'bhidhīyate yatra śabdasya vācakaśaktiḥ kalpyate | kva cāsavadṛṣṭā satī kalpyate yatra tatkalpanāmantareṇa pratītiprayogau nāvakalpete | yatra tvanyaviṣayayaiva śaktyā 'kalpitayā tayā 'nyatrāpi tau sidhyatastatrānupalabdhyā śaktyabhāvaḥ pratīyate | yathā ' 'kṛtiśabdānāṃ vyaktau siṃhādiśabdānāṃ ca māṇavakādau tadiha pacatyādiśabdoccāraṇādiyanto 'rthā gamyante, bhāvanādhātvarthakartṛtatsaṃkhyāpu
puruṣaḥ—prathamamadhyamottamapuruṣasaṃjñakākhyātavācyo 'rthaḥ |ruṣopagra
upagrahaḥ-kriyāphalasyā ' 'tmaparagāmitvavibhāgākhyaḥ | parasmaipadātmanepadarūpa iti yāvat |hakālaviśeṣāḥ | teṣāṃ tu kaḥ śābdaḥ ko 'rthāditi vibhāgo na jñāyate | lakṣaṇaṃ caitāvadyo 'rthānna gamyate sa śabdārtha iti | bhāvanāyāstāvanna śabdavyatiriktaṃ pratyāyakaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tatra kālādīnāṃ vyabhicāri tvāt | saṃbhavanti hi vinā 'pi bhāvanayā kālasaṃkhyādayaḥ | kartṛdhātvarthābhyāmavyabhicārādgamyata iti cenna | kṛdantavadaprādhānyapratītiprasaṅgāt | yadi kartrā dhātvarthena ca bhāvanā gamyeta tataḥ pācakādiśabdeṣviva tirohitasvarūpā gamyeta | prādhānyapratyayāttu śabdārthatvādhyavasānam | na ca tayā kālādayaḥ pratipadyante | kālāntarasaṃkhyāntaradhātvarthāntarapuruṣopagrahāntareṣvapi dṛṣṭatvāt | evaṃ kālasaṃkhyādīnāṃ parasparavyabhicārādevā
gamakatvaṃ vācyam | yādṛśaśca guṇabhūtaḥ kartā 'trāvagamyate na tādṛśena vinā bhāvano papadyata ityarthāpattyā 'numānena vā śaktā gamayitum | kārakāntare 'pi saṃbandhena vyabhicārādaśakteti cet | na | anyasaṃbandhamātrātmakavyabhicārānabhyupagamāt | dvidhā hyekaḥ saṃbandhyanekena saṃbadhyate | kaścitsaṃbandhyantaraṃ parityajan, kaścitpūrvāparityāgena | tatra yaḥ parityajyānyatrānyatra vartate sa vyabhicārādagamako bhavati | yathordhvatvaṃ sthāṇupuruṣayoḥ | na ca tatrānyasaṃbandhaḥ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicārasya | kiṃ tarhi | tena vinā 'pi pravṛttiḥ | yastvanyatrāpi vartamāna pūrvāvagatasaṃbandhyaparityāgenaiva vartate yathā śiṃśapātvaṃ vṛkṣatvapārthivatvadravyatvasattveṣu | na tasyānaikāntikatvaṃ, sarveṣu pratyāyanaśaktyavidhātāt | bhāvanā ca kārakeṣu vartamānā na vikalparūpeṇa vartate | kiṃ tarhi | sarveṣu yugapat | na cedṛśaṃ vyabhicāritvamucyate | anyatrāpi vṛttau pūrvāparityāgāt | ataḥ sarvakārakāṇyasaṃśayaṃ gamyante | yatrāpi nāmākarmakatvātsaṃpradānāpādānayostu bāhyataratvādapratītyā vyabhicāra āśaṅkyate, tatrāpi teṣāmeva na tu kartuḥ kadācit | na hi kvacitkartṛrahitā kācitkriyā vidyate | tanmūlatvātkriyāpravṛtteḥ | tadavyabhicāreṇa veha sutarāṃ prayojanam | yāvaditarāṇi vyabhicaranti tāvatkevalakartṛpratyāyanasāmarthyamasyāḥ sphuṭataraṃ vyajyate | samarthanīyaṃ evaṃ ce
eṣo 'rthaḥ—bhāvānāyāḥkārakāntaravyabhicārarūpo 'rthaḥ |ṣo 'rthaḥ saṃkhyā
saṃkhyāsaṃbandha iti—ghaṭanīye iti śeṣaḥ |saṃbandhe karturasādhāraṇatāsiddhyartham | āsitiṣṭhatyādiṣu karaṇānapekṣaṇāccalanapatanādiṣu cā ' 'dhārānāśrayaṇādakarmakeṣu karmābhāvāt, āsanasthānavacanādiṣu saṃpradānāpādānābhāvātkarttaiva sarvabhāvanāsvekāntasaṃnihita ityasādhāraṇatvena tiṅvācyayā saṃkhyayā saṃbhantsyate | kartṛviśiṣṭā ceha saṃkhyā gamyate na kārakāntaragateti sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣam | tatra yadi kaścidvadetsamāne sarvakārakāṇāṃ gamyamānatve kasmātkartraiva saṃkhyāsaṃbandho na karaṇādibhirapīti | sa vaktavyo yathaiva bhavata iti | sa ced brūyānmama kartā saṃkhyā caikena śabdenopāttau parasparaṃ niyamyete iti tenānabhidheyebhyo bāhyebhyo nivṛttā saṃkhyā kartaryeva vartiṣyata iti | tatraivaṃ pratyavastheyam | atha samāne kārakatve kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavataḥ kartaivābhidhīyate na kārakāntarāṇīti | tatrāvaśyaṃ phalāvagamyā śabdaśaktireva śaraṇaṃ pratipattavyā yatastadviṣayā buddhirutpadyata iti | sā cāsmatpakṣe 'pyaviśiṣṭā |

samāne bhāvanayā kārakopasthāne kaḥ śaktiniyame heturiti cet | uktaṃ yastava samāne kārakatve kartrabhidhāne śaktiniyamaheturiti | na ca śaktayaḥ paryanuyujyante yathākāryaṃ vyavasthayā 'nugantavyā ityu
(a. 2 pā.1 a. 1) ityatra—śaktayaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ nānuyojyāḥ svabhāvataḥ tena nānā vadantyarthānprakṛtipratyayādayaḥ || ityādinetyarthaḥktam | api ca | bhavatā kartrabhidhāne śaktiṃ kalpayitvā bhūyastadgatasaṃkhyābhidhāne śaktiḥ kalpayitavyā | nanvekapratyayopādānādeva tatsiddherna kalpanāntaramāśrayiṣyate | kutaḥ svalvanekaśaktikalpanayā vinā niyamaḥ sidhyati | avaśyaṃ hyetadapi kalpanīyaṃ yatsamāne saṃkhyābhāktve 'bhihitasyaiva saṃkhyāmāha nānabhihitasya | śaktyā hi vinaitadeva viparītamapyucyeta yataścābhidhīyate kartā tata evāsya na vaktavyā saṃkhyā varamanabhihitānāmetāvatā saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛta iti | na cābhihitatvaṃ kevalaṃ vyavasthākāraṇaṃ bhavati | tenaiva pratyayenābhihitānāmapi bhāvanākālopagrahapuruṣaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhābhāvāt | prādhānyapratītā bhāvanaiva sutarāṃ saṃbadhyeta | yadi tvayogyatvāttadasaṃbandho 'bhidhīyate tadgamyamāneṣu kārakāntareṣvapyaviśiṣṭam | athocyeta | asti teṣāṃ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhayogyatvaṃ yena śabdāntarābhihitayā saṃbadhyata iti, tadbhāvanādiṣvapi bhāvanādiśabdāvihiteṣu samānam | atheha teṣāmasattvabhūtatvādayogyatvamiti | tadayuktam | asattvabhāvasyaiva paryanuyuktatvāt | na hi saṃkhyādisaṃbandhāyogyatvādanyadasattvabhūtatvam | tatraitadevābhyupagantavyam | tādṛśena śabdenābhihitā saṃkhyā bhāvanādayo vā na parasparaṃ saṃbandhuṃ śaknuvantīti | tacca tulyam | etadabhihitāyāḥ kārakāntarasaṃbandhāyogyatvāt | kathamayogyatvamiti cet | śabdaśaktivaśena bhāvādiṣvivetyuktam | nanu cā ' 'khyātābhihitasaṃkhyāyogyatvaṃ karmaṇo dṛṣṭamiti tasya saṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti | yathā pacyata odana iti | naitadasti | kutaḥ |

yo hi manyate karmaṇaḥ kvacittiṅabhihitasaṃkhyārhatvaṃ dṛṣṭamato 'nyatrāpi tena mavitavyamiti, tasya kvacittiṅantābhidheyatvadarśanātsarvatrābhidheyatvamapi syāt | atha tatkathaṃ cidvyavatiṣṭhate tataḥ saṃkhyā 'pi tathaiva vyavasthāsyata ityacodyametat | tatraitatsyāt | kartṛviśiṣṭā saṃkhyā 'bhidhīyamānā na śakyā kartāramanabhidhāya vaktumiti | ucyate |

agṛhītaviśeṣaṇe tadanuraktā viśeṣyabuddhirnopajāyata iti tadgrahaṇamādartavyam | na tvanabhihitaviśeṣaṇatvena kiṃcidduṣyati | yadi nāmānabhihitamapi viśeṣaṇaṃ kenacidanyena pratyāyyamānaṃ viśiṣṭapratyayotpādanāya paryāptaṃ bhavati kiṃ tatrābhidhānānurodhena | asti ceha bhāvanayaiva pratyāyitasya karturviśeṣaṇatvaśaktiriti nābhidhānamapekṣate | sarvatra viśiṣṭapratyayeṣu caitadavasthitam | na cedanyena śiṣṭā iti | tatra viśiṣṭapratyaye jāte viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ kiṃ śabdenopāttaṃ kimanyeneti parīkṣāyāṃ yatra yatra viśeṣyamanyataḥ sidhyati tatra viśeṣaṇe śabdavyāpāro yatra viśeṣaṇamanyato labhyace tatra viśeṣye | sarvatra ca viśiṣṭapratyayādevārthāpattyaikasya dvayorvā 'vayavayorviśeṣaṇaviśoṣyayorvyāpāraḥ śabde kalpyate | sā cānyathānupapattirūpatvādananyalabhye viṣaye bhavati | tadiha viśeṣaṇabhūtaṃ viśeṣyabhūtaṃ vaikatvaṃ tāvannānyato labhyate yenānabhidheyaṃ kalpyeta | yadi hi kartā tatpratipādayituṃ śaknuyāttata ākṛtinyāyena sa evābhidheyaḥ | itarattu vyaktivadgamyamānamityāśrīyate | tasya tu vyabhicāreṇāśaktatvādekatvamapyabhidheyamevā ' 'śrayaṇīyam | tataśca tava saṃcaritāyāmabhidhānaśaktau gamyamānalakṣaṇāpannaḥ kartā satyapi viśeṣaṇatve nābhidheyaḥ saṃpadyate | yadā tvekatvameva viśeṣaṇaṃ tadā 'pyavaśyaṃ tadeva prathamataramabhidhātavyam | taccedabhihitaṃ kṣīṇaśaktiḥ śabdaḥ kartāramanyataḥ sidhyantamapekṣate | sidhyati cāsau bhāvanāta iti nābhidhānaśaktikalpanāheturbhavati | yattvanyānyapi kārakāṇi pratīyante, na taiḥ pratītairapratītairvā kaścidupakāro 'nupakāro vā bhavati | sarvathā tāvadyaḥ prārthitaḥ kartā sa pratītaḥ | yadi tvanyadapi pratīyate kiṃ no bādhyate | tena hyapratītena vayaṃ bādhyemahi, nābhyadhikapratyayena | pratītānyapi tu karaṇādīni śabdaśaktivaśātkartrabhilāṣiṇyā saṃkhyayā na grahīṣyante | na hi tayā yadyatpratītaṃ tattad grahītavyam | sarvatra hi pratītyapekṣāyogyatvādi grahaṇe kāraṇaṃ bhavati | tadatrobhayasiddhena saṃkhyāyāḥ kartṛgāmitvena kārakāntarāṇyanapokṣitatvādayogyatvācca saṃnihitānyapi na saṃbandhitvaṃ pratipadyante | na ca teṣāmapi tiṅabhihitasaṃkhyābhilāṣo vidyate | sarvatra subabhihitasaṃkhyāparicchedyatvāt | na caiṣā saṃkhyā sāmānyarūpeṇa pratītā satī saṃbadhyantarampekṣate | kathi
kathito hīti—dṛṣṭā yathā hi sākāṅkṣāḥ padārthāḥ kevalāḥ kvacit | svātantryeṇa gṛhītaśca viśiṣṭārthāvabodhakāḥ | prakṛtipratyayau naivaṃ kadācidapi lakṣitau | prakṛtyarthānurakto hi pratyayārthaḥ sadeṣyate || (a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7 sū. 25) atratyaślokavārtikasthābhyāṃ 356—357 ślokāḥ bhyāmiti śeṣapūraṇam |to hi padavākyayorviśeṣaḥ paurvāparyaniyamāt | tadyāvadeveha
dhātvarthaḥ pratītastāvadeva kā 'pi bhāvanā kartā ca kaścidbhaviṣyatītyavadhāryate | tataśca pūrvatarapratīte kartari saṃkhyā kevalaivābhidhīyamānā viśeṣaṇatvaṃ viśeṣyatvaṃ vā pratīpatsyate |

satyapi kārakasaṃbandhāviśeṣe bhāvanā pūrvaṃ tāvatkartāramapekṣate gṛhṇāti ca | tadadhīnatvādhitarakārakasamabadhānasya | kartṛvyāpārasāmānyarūpaiva cāsau tameva viśiṣataḥ paryupasthāpayati | kārakāntarāṇi tu dhātvarthasaṃbandhitvātsarvajaghanyetikartavyatātmakavyāpāranibandhanatvādvā bahiraṅgatarāṇi bhavanti | na ca kiṃcitkāraṇamasti, yena prāthamyaprādhānyopasthitakartratikrameṇa kārakāntarāṇi saṃkhyā gacchet | api ca | yasya kārakasyāvāntaravyāpāraṃ dhātuḥ prādhānyenā ' 'ha—sa karteti | vyākaraṇe 'pi kārakāntarāṇi kartāramevā ' 'virbhūtarūpaṃ jñāpayanti | tena sa eva saṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate | abhihitavacca viśeṣarūpeṇa pratīyate | kārakāntareṣu tādṛgarthābhāvādanādareṇa sadapi gamyamānatvamasagiva pratibhāti | paramārthanirīkṣaṇavelāyāṃ tvavinābhāvāttānyapi bhāvanayā tulyavadupamthāpyanta iti nātyantamanādṛtāni | na
evaṃ sati—pūrvatarapratītiprādhānyābhyāṃ kartustiṅupāttasaṃkhyānvaye 'ṅgīkriyamāṇā ityarthaḥ |nvevaṃ sati ‘odanaḥ pacyatāṃ tvayā’ ityādiṣu karmasaṃkhyābhidhānaṃ na prāpnoti ti | kutaḥ |

mātraudanavyāpāro dhātunā prādhānyenopādīyate yataḥ karmaṇo viśeṣapratītasya saṃkhyocyeta | mā bhūttasyaiva kartṛlakṣaṇāpannatvātkarmatvamutsṛjya kartṛtvam | akartṛtvādeva ca na tadvyāpāro bhāvanā | tena tathā 'pi na viśeṣarūpeṇa karmaṇaḥ paryupasthānam | avaśyaṃ ca puruṣavyāpāra eva prādhānyena vaktavyaḥ | anyathā hi paravyāpāre 'sya niyoga eva na bhavet | ākhyātapadena cākalpitaṃ kartṛtvaṃ padāntaropāttasyāpi nā ' 'virbhavet | tataśca tvayetyapi tṛtīyā na syāt | tadvyāpāreṇa vā 'nabhibhūtavyāpāraṃ karma tenānāpyamānatvātkarmatvaṃ hitvā ' 'virbhūtavyāpāratayā kartṛtvena pratipadyeteti svasaṃbandhatyāgena kartṛsaṃkhyayaiva saṃbadhyeta | tena pacatiśabdavadeva pacyata ityevamādyabhihitā 'pi saṃkhyā 'nabhibhūtatvātkartureva prāpnoti na karmaṇa iti | ucyate |

lg.l:
na cobhayāśraya doṣamekaścodyo vicā
vicārayanniti—anena ca dvayaśritamapi doṣameko bhrāmayituṃ paryanuyujyeta | mīmāṃsakastu punarvicārakuśalatvādabhrāmayitumaśakya iti sūcitaṃ vijñeyam |rayan ||

div.p: sarvathā |

tadyadi mama karmotpannalakāreṣvapi kartureva saṃkhyā prāpnoti tavāpi tarhi tatra kartrabhidhānena bhavitavyama | atha tatra tava kathaṃcitkarturanabhidhānaṃ tadvanmamāpi tatsaṃkhyānabhidhānamityadoṣaḥ | tadetadava śyamāvābhyāmevaṃ parihartavyam | savatraiva tāvadīpsitatamanvādvastulakṣaṇaṃ kārakāntarebhyaḥ karmaṇa prādhānyaṃ bhāvyāṃśena ca tadvyāpārasya bhāvanāntarga tatvam | tatra yadā tatprādhānyamākhyātenaiva darśayāmīti vivakṣyate tadā satyapi kartuḥ śabdārtharūpeṇa liṅdhātubhyāmabhidhīyamānapradhānabhūtasāmānyaviśeṣarūpavyāpāratve tāvatā ca kartṛtvalābhe 'parasya vastulakṣaṇasya prādhānyasya vivakṣitatvātkarmaṇi tatsaṃkhyāyāṃ vā lakārotpattiḥ | yadā tu khalu tadvidyamānamapyavivakṣitatvāddhātuviśeṣavaśena vā naiva tadastītyavagamyate śabdārtharūpaprādhānyamātre vivakṣā bhavati, tadā supā karmaprādhānyābhivyaktimaṅgīkṛtya kartāri tatsaṃkhyāyāṃ vā lakāra utpadyate | karaṇādīnāṃ tu na vastulakṣaṇā nāpi śabdalakṣaṇā prādhānyavivakṣā 'stīti nityameva bāhyaśabdopādeyatvam | kecitpunarāhuḥ | yadaivaṃvidhaṃ śabdasāmārthyamavagamyate yathā 'yaṃ kartureva saṃkhyāṃ śaknoti vaktumayaṃ karmaṇa eveti tadā 'ntareṇāpi bhāvanopasthāpanaṃ saiva saṃkhyā 'nanyaviṣayatvenābhihitatvātkartāramupādāsyate | tadyathā śoṇaśabdo 'nyenānupātte 'pyaśce tadgataṃ guṇaṃ vadannātmanaivāśvatvamapi gamayati | tathā ca satyanenaiva nyāyena sarve gavādayo 'pyanabhidheyāḥ prāpnuvanti | katham |

etāvatī cecchabdaśaktiḥ kalpitā tadgatamevaiṣā guṇaṃ bravīti | kiṃ tataḥ paraṃ śaktyantarakalpanayā | pūrvayaiva vyavahāropapatteḥ | ayaṃ tvevamādiṣvekaśabdopāttatvena saṃbandhaniyamo na śabdaśaktivaśena | tataḥ kartṛsaṃkhyādiṣvapi ta
tadeveti—yadeva gavādiśabde supā kevalasaṃkhyābhidhānamabhyupagataṃ tadevetyarthaḥ |devābhyupagantavyamityanabhidheyatvahāniḥ | tatrāpare manyante |

kathaṃ hyaśvatve 'nucyamāne tadavacchinnaraktatvapratyayo jāyeta | raktatvāviśiṣṭo hyasau guṇo gama
gamayiṣyatīti—guṇinamaśvamiti śeṣaḥ |yiṣyatīti cenna | gavādiṣu vyabhicārāt | aikāntikaṃ hi gamakaṃ bhavati | na ca raktatvamaśvatvāvyabhicāri | dravyamātraṃ tvaikāntikatvādgamayenna tadviśeṣam | tasmādubhayorapyaśvatvaraktatvayoranyonyavyabhicāritvenāgamakatvādvastvantaropasthāpitānyataragrahaṇāsaṃbhavācca śoṇaśabdābhidheyatvamabhyupagantavyam | na hi tatra vastvantarasādhāraṇyenāśvatvamevaikāntikaṃ kenacidgamitam | kartuḥ punaraikāntikaṃ bhāvanayopādānaṃ viśeṣarūpeṇa cetyuktam | athavā 'stu śoṇaśabdenāśvatvaikārthasamavāyiguṇamātrā
abhidhānāmiti—tathā 'pi saṃkhyāyāḥ kartraikāntikatvābhāvena na śoṇadṛṣṭāntena kartṛgamakatā yukteti śeṣapūraṇaṃ jñeyam |bhidhānam | kathamanavagataviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhiriti cet | ucyate |

yadi hi raktatvamātramayaṃ brūyāttato 'śvatvena viśeṣaṇamākāṅkṣecchaktyantaraṃ vā, yena tade kārthasamavāyyeva raktatvaṃ vadet | eṣa tu yathaiva sattāguṇatvayoravācakastathā raktatvamatikramya śoṇatvaṃ nāma raktāvāntarajātiṃ vadati | sā cāśveṣveva vidyate na gavādiṣvityaśvatvaṃ pratīyate na raktatvādivatsaṃśayo bhavati | kīdṛśaṃ punastadgavādiraktatvātirekeṇa śoṇatvaṃ yadaśceṣu samavetamanyatra cāsamavetamiti | ucyate |

sarvajātiṣu tāvatsvavyaktimātrānusāriṇaḥ kṛṣṇaśuklaraktatvādayo vilakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyante | tatra kvacitsato viśeṣasya vācakaḥ śabdo nāstīti pramāṇāntaragamyaviśeṣamaṅgīkṛtya sāmānyamātreṇābhidheyatvam | kvacitpunaḥ śoṇādiviśeṣaśabdāsadbhāvādviśeṣarūpeṇābhidhānam | tathā kvacidapabhraṃśena kaścidviśeṣaḥ pratideśamabhidhīyate | yathā rauhiṇikā gauriti | na kadācidaścāyāṃ śāṭyāṃ vā raktaguṇāyāmevamabhidhānaṃ bhavati |
tasmājjātyantarāṇyeva śoṇatvaka
aśvatvaikārthasamavāyiśuklāvāntarajātiḥ karkatvam |rkatvagaura
manuṣyatvaikārthasamavāyiśuklāvāntarajātirgauratvam |tvādīnyaśvamanuṣyādisabandhīnyabhidhīyamānāni teṣvapi pratyayamādadhati yathā gotvaṃ sāsnādimatsviti na vācyatvamāśaṅkayam | etenaiva kumā
manuṣyatvaikārthasamavāyinī bālyāvāntarajātiḥ kumāratvam | uṣṭratvaikārthasamavāyinī ca sā karabhatvam | hastitvaikārthasamavāyinī ca sā kalabhatvam | aśvatvaikārthasamavāyinī ca kiśoratvam | gotvaikārthasamavāyinī ca vatsatvam | mahiṣatvaikārthasamavāyinī ca bālyābāntarajātirbarkaratvam |rakarabhakalabhakiśoravatsabarkarādayo viśiṣṭajātisaṃbaddhabayoviśeṣavacanatvena manuṣyoṣṭrahamtyaśvādīnāṃ grahaṇe satyapyavācakā iti vyākhyātam | tathā hi |
atha yaduktaṃ gavādiṣvapi tadgatasaṃkhyādimātrābhidhānādeva jātiviśeṣasiddheranabhidheyatvaṃ prasajyata iti | tatra brūmaḥ |

yadi hi śoṇatvādivadgavāśvagatānāmekatvādīnāmapi pratyakṣeṇa viśeṣo lakṣyeta tata evaṃ kalpyeta | yadi ca yathā śoṇaprātipadikamavibhaktāvayavaṃ guṇāśvatvayorvācakamāpadya mānamanekaśaktikalpanābhayādanyataravācitvenādhyavasīyamānamaśvatvasya vyabhicāritvenāgamakatvādavyabhicāriguṇavacanatvenāvadhāritamevaṃ gotvasaṃkhyayorapi samānaśabdābhidhānabhājoranyatarasyāvyabhicāritayā vācakatvamavadhāryeta | na tu tadasti | saṃkhyāyāstāvatsarvatra paricchedātmakatvānna kaścidbhedo dṛśyate | na ca tāvāneva śabda ubhayorvācakatvena saṃbhāvyate | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ prātipadikena jātyabhidhānādvibhaktyā ca saṃkhyābhidhānāt | na cānekaśabdasyānekārthakalpanādoṣaḥ | yadi tatrānekasya śabdasya śaktyanekatvaṃ na kalpyeta tato 'nyatarasyānarthakatvameva bhavet | na ca saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyayoravyabhicāritvaṃ, yenānyataraducyamānamitarasya gamakaṃ syāt | tathā hi |

lg.l: na kvacicca na saṃkhyeye saṃkhyā saiva pravartate ||

div.p: nanu ca liṅgaṃ prātipadikenaivocyamānaṃ pratijātaṃ vilakṣaṇamavyabhicārirūpeṇa pravartamānaṃ śoṇatvāditulyaṃ syāt | naitadevam |

yadyapi ṭābādayaḥ strīliṅgasya dyotakatvānna bhedena vācakā bhavanti | pūrvasyaiva ca śaktyantaramāvirbhāvayanti tathā 'pi prāk ṭābādibhyo yacchabdarūpaṃ tasyāpratītāvasthe liṅge jātiṃ prati śaktiḥ kalpitā na paścādapanetuṃ śakyā | tathā yatra vibhaktisaṃbandhāt puṃstvaṃ napuṃsakatvaṃ cābhivyajyate tatrāpyevameva jātyabhidhānaṃ yojyam | yatra tu prāgeva vibhaktestannivṛttau vā satyāṃ śuddhādeva prātipadikādanyataraliṅgapratyayo bhavati yathā hastī nā devadattaḥ śrīḥ sarit toyaṃ vārīti, tatra tathātvābhyupagame 'pi na kiṃcidviruddham | athavā vinā 'pi śabdavibhāgenārthapratītāvutpādyamānāyāṃ sarvasvasaṃvedyena vibhāgena prathamataraṃ jātiṃ pratipadyate | kiṃca |

tena kāmaṃ liṅgameva jātigamyaṃ bhavenna jātirliṅgagamyā | nityaṃ copasarjanībhūtamaivetadgamyamānaṃ nārhati prādhānyena pratīyamānāyā jāterabhidheyatvaṃ vārayitum | na ca gopaśvādiśabdeṣvanyataraliṅgābhivyaktirjātivadasti | tasmājjātistāvadabhidheyā | sā yatra liṅgaṃ na vyabhicariṣyati tatra gamiṣyatyapi | yatrāpi vyabhicāre satyanyataḥ pratīyate tatra tadeva gamakaṃ tadanugṛhītā vā jātiḥ prātipadikaṃ veti yatheṣṭaṃ kalpyate | tasmānna śoṇāditulyatā | pacatyādiśabdeṣvapi yadi saṃkhyā sarvakārakāntaravyāvṛttarūpā kartṛmātrānusāriṇī śoṇatvavadupalabhyeta tatastayā nāma kartā gamyatāṃ, tāvatā 'pyanabhidheyo bhavatyeva | yadā tu pūrvoktena nyāyena saṃkhyābhedo na labhyate, prativastu cānantānyekatvādijātyantarāṇi na śakyante kalpayituṃ tadā bhāvanādhātvarthābhyāmevopādānamādartavyam | kiṃca |

yadi śoṇasyāpi kaścidanyo 'śvamupanayennaivāsau svayaṃ kliśyet | saṃkhyāyāśca bhāvanādhātvarthāvupanetārāviti na svayamāyasyati | bhāvanopasthāne cokto viśeṣaḥ | tasmādanabhidheyasyaiva karturviśeṣyatvaviśeṣaṇatvopapatterapramāṇamabhidhānaśaktikalpanamityavagacchāmaḥ |
evaṃ nyāyenāvadhārite kaścidāgamavirodhaṃ darśayannāha—prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta ityācāryopadeśātkartā śabdārthaḥ karma cetyavagamyata iti |

lg.l:
laḥ ka
laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhya iti | pā. sū. ( 3—4—69 ) |rmaṇīti sūtreṇa caśabdātkarttarīti ca |

div.p:
nanu sūtrārthenaivā ' 'gamavirodhe darśite prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthamityetasaṃbaddham | kathamasaṃbaddham | yadā pūrveṇa nyāyena kartuḥ prādhānyamapi pūrvapakṣavādinā darśayitavyaṃ tadetadabhidhānaṃ prādhānyaṃ cobhayamapi smṛtisiddhaṃ darśayati | yasmātprakṛtipratyayau saha brūtaḥ pratyayārthaśca kartā karma ca smaryate, tasmātkriyāviśiṣṭayostayorabhidhānādastyeva śrutiprakaraṇa virodha iti | tatra ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca’ ityatra tāvadekāntenābhidheyatvena kartṛkarmaṇorupādānam | ‘ka
pā. sū. ( 3—1— 68 ) |rtari śap’ ityatra punarekamabhidheyatvadarśanam | anyattu kartarīti parasaptamī | na ca śabdasaṃniveśe kartā paratrāvasthitaḥ saṃbhavatyataḥ ‘ā( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 )narthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ iti śabde kāryaṃ vijñāyate | tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ—kartṛvācini sārvadhātuke pratyaye paratrāvasthita iti | sarvathā tāvatpratyayārthaḥ kartetyuktamācāryaiḥ | tasmādayuktamanabhidheyatvānumānamiti | taducyate |

tatra nāmā ' 'gamavirodho yukta udbhāvayituṃ yatra nyāyāgamau samānaviṣayau bhavataḥ | iha tu nyāyasyānya eva viṣayaḥ kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ gamyamānamiti | anya eva vyākaraṇasmṛterekārthaprayuktānāṃ kaḥ sādhuḥ ko 'pabhraṃśa iti | na cānyaviṣayeṇānyaviṣayasya durbalasyāpi bādho yuktaḥ | kimuta vācyagamyamānaviṣayatvena pratyakṣameva sarvasvasaṃvedyasya | tena yadyapi kartā śabdārtha ityevamācāryā vadeyustathā 'pi svaviṣayādanyatra vadanto nā ' 'dartavyā bhaveyuḥ | te tu naiva tathā vadanti | nanu pratyakṣameva sūtramudāhṛtam | satyaṃ na tu śāstrasvarūpamālocya | kiṃ tarhi | ekadeśālocanena | na ca tāvanmātreṇa śāstravirodhodbhāvanaṃ śakyam | kutaḥ |

yadi śāstraikadeśālocanena tadviruddhatvamabhyupagacchatā śāstravirodha udbhāvyate tataḥ ‘surā na pātavyā’ ityasyāpyekadeśena pānaṃ hi vihitamakurvan śāstraviruddhaṃ kuryāt | tathā
bhinnavākyeṣu ‘yāvajjīvamagnīhotkaṃ juhoti’ ityādimātrā
mātrāpekṣayeti—‘dīkṣito na juhoti na pacati’ ityādyapavādairekavākyatvasattvepītyarthaḥ |pekṣayā dīkṣito 'pyajuhvan pratyaveyāt | vyākaraṇe 'pi ‘mide
pā. sū. ( 7—3—82 ) |rguṇaḥ’ ityetāvanmā
etanmātra iti—pā. sū. ( 1—1—5 ) ‘kṅiti ca’ iti sūtrāntaraikavākyatvāparyālocana ityarthaḥ |tre dṛśyamāne bhinna ityatra guṇākaraṇaṃ śāstraviruddhaṃ syāt | tasmānnaikadeśena virodha udbhāvanīyaḥ | āha ca—

viśeṣeṇa tu vyākaraṇe | tatra hyekaikasminpade prāyeṇāṣṭādhyāyī vyāpriyate | tena ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca’ ityasvaikadeśāntaraparipūrṇasya yo 'rthastena saha virodhaḥ parihartavyaḥ | iha
kiyadbhirekadeśāntaraiḥ ‘laḥ karmaṇi’ iti pratyayavidhiḥ paripūrṇo bhavatīti viśeṣāpekṣāyāmāha—iha cetyādinā | caitāvatā pratyayavidhiḥ paripūryate | pā. sū. ( 3—1—1 ) |pratyayaḥ | ( 3—1—2 )paraśca | ( 3—1—3 )ādyudāttaśca | ( 3—1—4 )anudāttau supsitau | ( 3-1-91 )dhātoḥ | ( 3—1—92 )tatropapadaṃ saptamīstham | ( 3—1—93 )kṛdātiṅ | ( 3—1—94 )vā 'sarūpo 'striyām | ( 3—2—123 )vartamāne laṭ | ( 3—4—67 )kartari kṛt | ( 3—4—69 )laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ | ( 3—4—77 )lasya | tibādayaḥ | ( 1—3—12 )anudāttaṅita ātmanepadam | ( 1—3—77 )śeṣātkartari parasmaipadam | yuṣmadasmadupapadādiṣu madhyamādayaḥ | ( 1—4—101 )tiṅastrīṇi trīṇi prathamamadhyamottamāḥ | ( 1—4—102 )tānyekavacanadvivacanabahuvacanānyekaśaḥ | ( 1—4—21 )bahuṣu bahuvacanam | dvayekayordvi( 1—4—22 )vacanaikavacane iti | parāṇi ca saṃjñāparibhāṣādirūpeṇa lopāgamavarṇavikārādiśāstrāṇi sarvāṇyekaṃ vākyam | ekavākyatā ca sati viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāve bhavati nānyathā | so 'pi ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena vā bhavati samānavibhaktyantānāṃ, vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā | kriyākārakarūpaḥ śeṣaśeṣirūpaśca | tadihānaupayikatvādavayavānta
rāṇyupekṣya lādeśāḥ kartari karmaṇi ca bhavanti | ekasminnekavacanam | dvayordvivacanam | bahuṣu bahuvacanamityeteṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavaiyadhikaraṇyapravṛttiśca cintyate | tatra tāvadbahudvayekaśabdāḥ saṃkhyāvacanāstāmanabhidhāya saṃkhyeye vṛttyasaṃbhavādityākṛtyadhika( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9 )raṇe sthāpitam | pātañjale 'pi ca keṣu bahuṣviti praśnapūrvakamupakramya tatra doṣānabhidhāya saṃkhyāvacanatvamevāvadhāritam | bahutve dvitvaikatvayoriti vivaraṇāt | kathamantareṇa bhāvapratyayaṃ bhāvapradhāno bhavati nirdeśa iti pṛṣṭe bhavati yadā prathama eva guṇaḥ svaprādhānyena vivakṣyata iti vyākṛtam | tathā hi |

yatra guṇaḥ prathamameva svapradhāno vivakṣitastatrānutpādyaiva bhāvapratyayaṃ vinā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃbaddho bhavati paṭasya śukla iti | yatra tu dravyopasarjanatvena ca na nipkarṣo vivakṣyate tatra sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati śuklaḥ paṭa iti | yatra punarupasarjanatvena vivakṣitvā paścānniṣkarṣavivakṣā bhavati tatra yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne ‘tvatapā. sū. ( 5—1—119 ) |lau’ iti bhāvapratyayotpattiḥ | svaprādhānyavivakṣāyāṃ tvasāvanaṅgatvād guṇa eva na bhavati na taddvāreṇa dravye śabdaniveśaḥ | tena nāsau tadā tasya dravyasya śabdaprayogaṃ bhāvayatīti bhāvapratyayena nābhidhīyate | pūrvameva niṣkṛṣṭatvānniṣkarṣakāriṇaḥ pratyayasya niṣphalatvaṃ syāt | tadā tarhi nityaṃ saṃkhyeye ṣaṣṭhyaiva bhavitavyam | satyameṣa utsargaḥ | kadācittu yathaiva guṇavacanaḥ śabdo guṇopasarjanadravyapratipipādayiṣayā tacchabdasamānādhikaraṇo bhavatyevameva guṇyupasarjanaguṇavivakṣāyāṃ guṇaśabdānurodhena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati | tulyo hi heturabhedopacāralakṣaṇayoḥ | tathā 'pi tveṣa prayogo na pracura iti na śīghramitaravatpratibhāti | yadā tu nāma kathaṃcidāpatati tadaitena nyāyenānusartavya iti kathyate | tasmādastyantareṇāpi bhāvapratyayaṃ pratyayayogyavastupradhāno nirdeśaḥ | evaṃ ca sati ‘dvyekayoḥ’ iti dvivacanaṃ samarthitaṃ bhaviṣyati | anyathā hi |

saṃkhyeyapradhāne hi nirdeśe dvau caikaśceti kṛte bahuvacanameva prāpnoti | saṃkhyāprādhānye ti dvitvaikatvayoḥ prādhānyādātmīyasaṃkhyānirdeśo bhavati dvyekayoriti prayogaḥ | kasmā
tpunarviśiṣṭameva bhāvapratyayena na nirdiśyate | vaktṛvivakṣāyā bahupakāratvāt | a
evaṃ nu sūtrakārasya pāṇineḥ śūnyahṛdayatāpatteḥ svamatena mahābhāṣyasūcitameva prayojanaṃ pradarśayati—athavetyādinā |thavā yadi bahutve bahuvacanamiti kriyeta tato yathā vaipulyaṃ mahattvaṃ vā śabdasyārthaḥ, bahuḥ samudro bahurodana iti | yacca triprabhṛtīnāṃ dvitvātirekasāmānyaṃ tayorubhayorapyaviśeṣeṇa bahuvacanaṃ prāpnoti | tatra bahuṣvityucyate | kathaṃ nāma bhedanibandhanasaṃkhyāvācyeva bahuvacanaṃ syāt | ataśca bahurodana ityekavacanaṃ siddham | yastu saṃkhyāprādhānyapakṣe tadeke manyanta ityekatvaprādhānyādekavacanaprasaṅgaścoditaḥ so 'nyatvavācyatvena parihṛtaḥ | tasmādbahutvādiṣu bahuvacanādīnīti siddham | evaṃ ca sati tiṅvidhāne lādeśatvātkartari tibityekaṃ vacanam | ekavacanasaṃjñatvanāccaikatve tibityaparam | tatra yadi vā 'nayoḥ parasparamasaṃbadhya tipaiva kevalena saṃbandhaḥ syāt kartari tibekatve veti | athavaikasminkartarīti pratipannaviśeṣaṇāviśeṣyatvayostibviṣayatvam | ta
tatra na tāvadityādinā ‘tatra naivaṃ bhavati’ ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākṛtaṃ vijñeyam |tra na tāvadaviśeṣitayostipā saṃbandhaḥ | kutaḥ |

yadi hi svatantrameva kartaryekatve cānyonyanirapekṣavākyabhedena tibvidhānamiṣyate tataḥ prayogakāle tadvadeva nairapekṣyamiti dvibahuṣvapi kartṛṣu prāpnoti | kārakāntaragate 'pi vaikatve | tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasaṃbandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | sa caikavibhaktyantatvatsāmānādhikaraṇyena | tatrāpi śrautatvābhāvādekasya lakṣaṇāvṛttirvibhaktivipariṇāmena vā vaiyadhikaraṇyasaṃbandhaḥ | sāmānādhikaraṇye tāvadavasthitasaṃkhyāprādhānyānurodhena kartṛśabdo lakṣaṇāmabhedopacāraṃ vā bhajate naikaśabdaḥ, | saṃkhyeyapradhānyaprasaṅgāt | tataśca sāmānā
sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhamarthamiti—sāmānādhikaraṇyoktyā vivakṣitaṃ kartṛsaṃbandharūpamarthamityarthaḥ |dhikaraṇyasaṃbandhamarthaṃ mukhyayā vṛttyā darśayitumupasarjane ṣaṣṭhī prayuktā karturekatva ityartha iti | athavā bhinnārthaviṣaye sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na bhavati | na ca vyadhikaraṇayorekavibhaktyantayoḥ ṣaṣṭhyā vinaivaṃjātīyakaḥ saṃbandho 'vakalpate | na ca saṃbandhamantare
ṇābhipreto 'rthaḥ sidhyati | tadā 'vaśyaṃ kartavye 'nyataravibhaktivipariṇāme tenaiva nyāyena saṃkhyāprādhānyānnityaṃ ca viśeṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhīprayogādevaṃ vipariṇāmena kathyate karturekatva iti | dūrāpagataścātraikatvasya vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ | arthāntarabuddhiprasaṅgāt | yadi caikatvasya kartari karmaṇi cetyucyate tato 'nya evārtha āpadyeta | ekatvaṃ yaḥ karoti yacca tasya karmeti | tasmātkarturekatva ityevamādinā darśite kartṛkarmaviśiṣṭā ekatvādayaḥ pratyayavācyāḥ śāstrānugatā ityavirodhaḥ | evaṃ ca vyākhyāyamāne yallaukikena nyāyena bhāvanātaḥ prāptatvātkārakānabhidhānamavagataṃ tadapyanugataṃ sūtrairbhiviṣyati | sūtrākṣarāṇi ca ‘dvyekyoḥ’ ityevamādītyetadapekṣya niyamyamānāni viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvādinyāyānugatāni bhaviṣyanti | laukikanyāyānugataśca sūtrārtha ityasyāparo 'pyabhiprāyo yathā loke kartṛkarmaviśiṣṭasaṃkhyāpratipattiriyamevaṃ vyākhyāyamāne 'nugatā bhavati | anyathā hi svātaḥtryeṇetaranirapekṣalakṣaṇavyākhyāne lokaprasiddhiviparītaparasparāsaṃbaddhasaṃkhyākārakamātravācitvagrāhī sūtrārthaḥ syāt | na kevalametāvanmātram | kiṃ tarhi | sva
svagotreṇeti—vyākaraṇagotreṇānusṛto yo 'yaṃ nyāyo vyākhyāprakārastenāpi varjitāni sūtrākṣarāṇi bhavantītyarthaḥ |gotreṇāpi sūtrākṣarāṇi nyāyāpetāni syuḥ | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā tu vyākhyāne sarvaṃ nyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati | tatraitatsyāt | tvayā mīmāṃsakena vacanavyaktikuśalena bhūtvā svamanīṣikayaivamucyate | na tu vyākaraṇasaṃpradāya evamavasthita ityata āha—āgamo 'pi cāyameva yadā ekatvādayo vibhaktyarthāstadā karmādayo viśeṣaṇatveneti | dvābhyāmapi vākyakārabhāṣyakārābhyāṃ bahuvacanavārtike 'nabhihitavārtike ca dvāvapi karmatvādyekatvādivācyatvapakṣau dūramanusṛtyānte nirdoṣatayā 'vadhāritam | karmādiviśiṣṭā ekatvādayo vibhaktyarthāḥ | itarathā yeṣu keṣucidbahuvacanaṃ prāpnoti | anabhihitādhikāraśca na kartavyaḥ syāt | anyatrāpyabhihite 'bhidhānābhāvāttiṅkṛttaddhitasamāsābhihiteṣu karmādiṣu kaḥ prasaṅgo dvitīyādīnāṃ yenānabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyeta | anabhihitānāṃ tu karmādīnāmekatvādiṣu dvitīyādaya iti naitadanuktaṃ gamyate | na hi nyāyena teṣāmabhihitānāmanabhihi
tānāṃ ca kaścidviśeṣo dṛśyate | tadetadvārtikopasaṃhāre spaṣṭaṃ bhāṣyakā
patañjalinetyarthaḥ |reṇoktam ‘ekatvādiṣu vibhaktyartheṣu kartavyo 'nabhihitādhikāraḥ karmādiṣu tvanarthaḥ’ iti | nanvetadapyasti | yadā karmādayo vibhaktyarthāstadaikatvādayo viśeṣaṇatvenetyetatpūrvapakṣavacanatvādanupanyasanīyaṃ sadabhyupetyavādenopanyastam | etaduktaṃ bhavati | yadā 'pi karmādayo viśeṣyabhūtāḥ prādhānyena vibhaktyarthāścintyante tadā 'pyekatvādaya eva viśeṣaṇatvenāvasthitāḥ santo 'bhidhīyante | anabhihitānāṃ viśeṣaṇatvānupapatterviśeṣasya cānyata eva siddheḥ | bhavati hī
īdṛśyāmiti—viśeṣaṇasyānyato 'siddhiḥ, viśeṣyasya cānyataḥ siddhirītīdṛśyāmityarthaḥ |dṛśyāmavasthāyāmupasarjanaparatvaṃ vidheryathā lohitoṣṇīṣādiṣu | athavā 'rthaśabdena prayojanamabhidhīyate | yadā 'pi te prayojanam—tādarthyena vibhaktiḥ prayujyata ityarthaḥ | yadvobhayorvacanayorutsṛṣṭa
unsṛṃṣṭayoriti—anirdiṣṭaviṣayaviśeṣayorityartha |yoryathāsaṃbhavaṃ niveśādekaṃ tiṅviṣayaṃ yatpūrvamudāhṛtam | aparaṃ tu subviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati | tatra karmādīnāṃ vibhaktyarthatvābhyupagamāt | nanu ca samānatvādbahuvacanādiśāstrasyaikarūpye sati yathaiva tiṅā karmādiviśiṣṭasaṃkhyābhidhānānna kārakābhidhānaṃ jātaṃ tathaiva supāmapi prāpnoti | tataśca ‘yatka(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6) atratyaṃ bhāṣyamraṇābhidhāyinyā vibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati’ | ‘tadāga( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 5 sū. 15 ) |me hi taddṛśyate tasya jñānam’ ityādivyavahāravirodhaḥ syāt | tatra kecidāhuḥ | ekamapi śāstraṃ prayojanavaśātsaṃbandhibhedena bhidyamānamanyathā ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvapratipattestiṅkṣuṃ viśeṣyatvena saṃkhyāṃ ca vakṣyati | supsu viśeṣaṇatveneti | athaitenāparitoṣaḥ, tato 'nyathocyate |

śāstre hi kāryavaśenānabhidheyasyāpyabhidheyatvaṃ pāribhāṣikamāśrīyate | na ca tāvatā loke tathaiva prasajyate | na ca karmādayonabhidheyā evetyetacchāstre 'bhihitam | kiṃ tarhi | ekāntābhidheyaikatvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ tāvadbhavantītyetadvyākhyātameva | tasmādviśeṣaṇatāmevaite pratipatsyante | tadyatra na śāstreṇa na nyāyenābhidheyatvaprāptistatrānabhidheyā vijñāsyante | yatra punaḥ śāstroktāṃ viśeṣaṇatāmanabhidhīyamānāḥ pratipattuṃ na śakṣyanti tatra nyāyalabhyāmananyagatitvādabhidheyatāmapi pratipatsyante | arthāpattyā vā śāstreṇāpyabhidheyatayoktā bhaviṣyanti | tatra tiṅkṣu bhāvanopasthānādviśeṣaṇatvasiddhernāvaśyamabhidheyatvamaṅgīkartavyam | supsu punaḥ prātipadikārthānāmekatvādīnāṃ cākārakeṣu kārakāntareṣu ca vyabhicārādanyatarapratipādanaśaktau vihatāyāmanyasya ca bhāvanādhātvarthādergamakasyānabhidhānānna kiṃcidupasthāpakamastīti svayaṃ kārakamanabhidhāya tadviśiṣṭasaṃkhyābhidhānānupapatteḥ kārakamapyabhidheyaṃ bhavati | nanu ca kevalakārakapadaprayogābhāvādavaśyaṃbhāvyākhyātapadābhihitabhāvanopanītānāmeva kārakāṇāṃ tiṅkṣviva saṃkhyāsaṃbandho 'vakalpiṣyate | kathamavakakalpate | yadā vākye svaniyatapadakrameṣu kadācidākhyātaśabdātprathamaprayuktena subantena vṛkṣamiti kārakapratyayo janyamāno nābhidhānamantareṇa sidhyati | nanu tatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandhātprākkārakatvānupapattestāvatkārakavibhaktyā notpattavyaṃ yāvatkriyāsaṃbandho nopadarśitaḥ | tataśca kriyāpūrvakatvaṃ saṃpratipadyata iti | satyam | vakturevaṃ, śrotā punarthaḥ prathamameva vṛkṣamiti śṛṇoti na tena kriyā tatsaṃbandho vā 'nyataḥ pūrvamavadhāritaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | śabdamātrātkārakaṃ pratipadyānumānenārthāpattyā vā vaktrā pūrvatarasaṃkalpitāṃ kriyāṃ pratipadyate | anyathā hītaretarāśrayatvaṃ syāt | kutaḥ |

lg.l: kriyayā kārakaṃ gamyaṃ kārakeṇa kriyā tathā |

div.p:
dvayoḥ saṃbandhinoravaśyamekasyetaranirapekṣaṃ pratītimūlamabhyupagantavyam | tadiha yadi kriyāgamyaṃ kārakaṃ tataḥ kriyā kena pratyāyyata iti vaktavyam | na ca tāvadvṛkṣaprātipadikaṃ kriyāyā vācakaṃ, śākhādimajjātimātravacanatvāt | nāpi prādipadikārtho gamako, vinā 'pi kriyayopapatteḥ | athocyeta | na jātucitkaścinniṣkriyaḥ saṃbhavatyato 'stitiṣṭhatyādikā kācidekāntenā ' 'kṣiptā kriyā bhaviṣyati | athavā ‘astirbhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣo 'prayujyamāno 'pyastīti gamyate’ ityevaṃ sakriya
sakriyatvāditi—sarvasya prātipadikārthasya sakriyatvātkriyākṣepadvārā kārakākṣepasiddherna pūrvoktetaretarāśrayāpattiriti śaṅkābhiprāyaḥ |tvātkārakākṣepaḥ setsyatīti | tadanupapannam | kutaḥ |

sāmānyena hyatrāstyādikriyā kācitprātipadikārthenā 'kṣipyeta | na cāsau sarvakārakākṣepe samartheti karmādīnāmanyatprāpakaṃ mṛgyam | na ca vibhaktiḥ kriyāṃ bravīti yayā karmā ' 'kṣipyeta | na ca saṃkhyā kriyākārakaviśeṣākṣepasamarthetyuktam | ato na kārakapratītiṃ muktvā 'nyatkriyāyāḥ pratyāyakamasti | tatra yadi kārakasyāpi kriyā pratyāyikeṣyate tataḥ sphuṭataramitaretarāśrayeṇobhayorapi nirmūlatvamāpadyate | tasmādihānanyagatikatvāttkārakaṃ vibhaktivācyaṃ tatsaṃbandhācca tadanurūpakriyākṣepa iti vaktavyam | yadā tarhi kriyāpadapūrvakaṃ kārakapade prayujyate tadā tatsaṃbandhayogyāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ pūrvatarapratītatvena kārakapratyāyanasāmarthyādvibhaktibhiḥ, saṃkhyāmātramabhidhīyeta | satyamevamapi prāpsyadyadi nityamākhyātopakramāṇyeva vākyāni prāyokṣyanta teṣāṃ tvaniyamenaiva prayogaḥ sarvadā sthitaḥ | gāṃ paśya paśya gāṃ ceti | tasmānnānabhidheyatā | nanvevamapyabhidhānaśakterapyaniyamena bhavitavyam | na śakyamevaṃ bhavituṃ yadā hi subantapūrvaprayogāpekṣayā kalpitā vācakaśaktistadā kimasau prayogāntare 'panetuṃ śakyate | na hyanityaḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhaḥ, śaktidvayaniyamaśca saṃbandha ityu
pratipattāvupādānātsāhitye ca vivakṣite | niyamyate yadekasyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ so 'rthaśabdayoḥ || 13 || ityādinā ślokavārtike saṃbandhākṣepavāda uktamityarthaḥ |ktam | athocyeta | ākhyātapūrvaprayogāpekṣayā vibhakteḥ śaktyabhāve 'vadhārite 'vaśyaṃbhāvini caikarūpye 'tyantamaśaktireva bhavatviti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: asatyāstu phalaṃ tasyāḥ prārthitaṃ durlabhaṃ bhavet ||

div.p:
sarvatraiva yasya kasyacitkāryasya sadasadbhāvadarśanādviruddhasadasadbhāvātmakatvānabhyupagame satyaikarūpyaṃ parigṛhyate | tatsadbhāvaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ | satāmapi pratibandhātkāraṇāntarābhāvādanyato vā siddheḥ kāryānārambhāvirodhāt | asataśca kāryavelāyāṃ devairapyaprāpteranimittakāryotpādaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ saṃba
vidyamānasya cārthasya dṛṣṭamagrahaṇaṃ kvacit | na tvatyantāsato 'stitvaṃ kaṃcitpratyupapadyate || 33 || ityādinā ślokavārtike saṃbandhākṣepaparihāra uktamityarthaḥ |ndhanityatve | tasmātkalpitā vācakaśaktirnāmapūrvaṃ tāvatprayoge vyāpariṣyate | vipa
viparyaye—paśya gāmityādyākhyātapūrvaprayoga ityarthaḥ |ryaye punarudāsiṣyate | labdhātmakatvādvā śrautatve sati anumānapratyayaṃ nirākurvantī kāryamārapsyate | ataśca siddhāḥ supāṃ karmādayo 'pyarthāḥ |
tiṅāṃ tu niyatapaurvāparyavaśādekāntena dhātvarthabhāvanābhyāmupasthāpitayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ paścātsaṃkhyā 'vagamyata iti na kadācidapi kārake viśeṣame vācakaśaktikalpanāvasaraḥ | tataśca nityānumeye kartṛkarmaṇī iti siddham |

athātra kaścidanumānakuśala āha—nanu kartṛdvitvāddvivacanaṃ karturekatvādekavacanaṃ kartṛbahutvādbahuvacanam | tena nūnaṃ kartā śabdārtha iti | ko 'bhiprāyaḥ | kartṛviśeṣapratyāyanārthaṃ yaḥ śabda ucyate devadattādistena saha pacatyādīnāṃ prayujyamānānāṃ tadanuvartanaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ dṛśyate | tattu sāmānādhikaraṇyādbhavati | sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca dvayorapyekaviṣayatve kalpyeta | tena yadi hi devadattādayaḥ sāmānyataḥ pacatiśabdenābhihitāstatastaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ labhyate | lakṣaṇayā ' 'kṛ
( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9 )tyaru( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 )ṇādhikaraṇoktanyāyena bhaviṣyatīti cet | na | taṇḍulasthena pākena lakṣayitumaśakya
vikledanadhātvarthavādimate tāvattaṇḍulasamavetasya pākasya devadattaniṣṭhena kartṛtvenaikārthasamavāyābhāvāllakṣaṇāśaktiṃ vadati— aśakyatvāditi |tvāt | tatsamavetameva hyekatvādi lakṣayituṃ śakyate nānyasamavāyi | tatraitatsyāt | adhiśrayaṇādayo 'pi devadattasamavetāstasya pākatvenocyanta iti | satyamucyante na tu taddvāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati | gotvāruṇatvādīni hi viśeṣye svātmānurūpapratyayotpādanānmatublopābhedopacāranimittatāṃ pratipadya śabdaṃ pravartayanti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kārayanti natvevamadhiśrayaṇādirūpāpanno devadatto gamyate yenābhedopacāramanublopau syātām | ato yathā daṇḍādiśabdā devadattādisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na pratipadyante daṇḍo devadatta iti, yathā vā 'dhiśrayaṇādayaḥ pāko vā devadatta iti prayogo na bhavati tathā pacati devadatta ityapi na syāt |

lg.l:
tatpadābhedavartitvātpaktapakvā
pakvādiśabdavaditi | anena ca ‘karturekatvādekavacanam’ ityādibhāṣyoktamanumānamevaṃ vivṛtaṃ vijñeyam, pacatiśabdaḥ kartṛvācī, devadattādikartṛpadābhedavartitvāt’ paktṛśabdavat | pacyetaśabdaḥ, karmavācī, odanādikarmapadābhedavartitvāt, pakvaśabdavat, iti |diśabdavat ||

div.p:
abhedavartitvaṃ hi tatpadasāmānādhikaraṇyamasaṃdigdhavācakeṣu kṛdanteṣu paktā devadattaḥ pakva odana ityādiṣu dṛṣṭam | yatra ca kartṛkarmavacanatvaṃ nāsti tatra sāmānādhikaraṇyama
dṛṣṭaṃ yathā pākādiśabde | kiṃ ca
‘nanu karturekatvādekavacam’ ityādibhāṣyoktena sākṣāddhetunā 'numānaprayogāntaraṃ darśayati— kiṃ cetyādinā—pacatiśabdaḥ, kartṛvacanaḥ, kartṛgatasaṃkhyāviśeṣānuvartanāt, paktā devadatta iti vākyasthapaktṛśabdavat | pacyateśabdaḥ, karmavacanaḥ, karmagatasaṃkhyāviśeṣānuvartanāta, pakka odana iti vākyasthapakvaśabdavaditi cānumānaprayogo draṣṭavyaḥ | |

pacati devadattaḥ pacato devadattayajñadattau pacanti devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrādaya iti yaiva kartṛvācini devadattādiśabde saṃkhyā saivā ' 'khyāte 'pi dṛśyate | yatra cāsau dṛśyate sa vācako dṛṣṭo yathā paktā devadattaḥ—paktārāvityādi | tathā karmaṇyapi pacyata odanaḥ pacyete odanaśākau pakva odanaḥ pakvau śākaudanāvityādīni pakṣadṛṣṭāntodāharaṇāni vaktavyānīti | kiṃ ca |

itaśca vācako yenānabhihitādhikāravihitakārakavibhaktipratibandho dṛśyate pacati devadattaḥ pacyata odana iti | yadi hi vācakatvaṃ na syāttataḥ ‘a
pā. sū. (2—3—1)nabhihite’ ‘ka
pā. sū. (2—3—2)rmaṇi dvitīyā’ ‘kartṛka
pā. sū. (2—3—18)raṇayostṛtīyā’ iti ca vibhaktiprāptirna kenacitpratibadhyeta | yathā pacyate devadattena pacatyodanamiti | yatastu khalu pratibandhastenāvagamyate paktṛpakvasādharmyeṇaiva vācakatvam, sādharmyādanyadvaidharmyaṃ tadevaṃ darśayitavyam | yatra ca vācakatvaṃ nāsti tatra kārakavibhaktipratibandho 'pi nāsti, yathā pacyate devadattena pacatyodanamiti |

lg.l:
itaśca
‘nanu kartuḥ’ ityādibhāṣyaṃ prayogāntaraparatayā vyācaṣṭe—itaścetyādinā | ayaṃ ca ślokatātparyārthaḥ| pacatipacyateśabdau, kartṛkarmabodhakau, kartṛkarmaviśeṣabodhakatvāt, yat yadviśeṣabodhakaṃ tat tadbodhakam, yathā śadbaviśeṣākārabodhakaṃ śrotraṃ śadbabodhakamiti | bodhakaḥ śabdastadviśeṣāvabodhanāt |

div.p:
yadi pacatiśabdādibhiḥ kartṛkarmaṇī nocyeyātāṃ kathaṃ tadviśeṣaḥ saṃkhyā 'bhidhīyate | tannābhidhatte tadviśaṣemabhidhatta iti hi vipratīṣiddhametat | na hi śrotraṃ
śadbasāmānyamagayattadviśeṣamakāraṃ gamayati | na ca śabdasyābhidhātṛtvādanyādṛśaṃ bodhakatvaṃ bhavati | bhāvanayā hi gamyamānatve 'rtha eva bodhakaḥ syānna śabdastasmādapi vācakatvam | kiṃ ca |

itaścābhidhīyete viśeṣaṇaiḥ saṃbadhyamānatvādiha śobhanaḥ pacati śobhanaḥ pacyate | yatrānayorviśeṣaṇasaṃbandhastatrābhidheyatvamapi dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śobhanaḥ paktā ramaṇīyaḥ pakva iti | yatra tvabhidheyatvaṃ nāsti tatra viśeṣaṇasaṃbandho 'pi na dṛṣṭo yathā śobhonamāsyata iti | na ca gamyamānasya viśeṣaṇasabandho yathā dhūmaśabdādagneravagatasya na jvalanādibhiḥ saṃbandha iti | tadetatsarvaṃ ‘nanu karturekatvādekavacanam’ ityādinaiva darśitatvādbhāṣyakāreṇa na prapañcitam | tadgatasaṃkhyāyogyatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyādibhirvinā nopapadyate | tasmādabhidhānapakṣa eva nyāyya iti |

atrābhidhīyate | yattāvaduktaṃ vācakaḥ pacatyādiśabdaḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāditi | tatra yadi vācakaśaktyā 'stitvamanumīyeta tataḥ pūrvoktenārthāpattibhaṅgena sarvapramāṇānupapatteranupalabdhivirodhaḥ | sarvaśaktīnāṃ cārthāpattirevaikaṃ pramāṇam | sā cehānyathā 'pyupapatternirākṛtā | anumānavirodhaśca | nābhidhātā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ pacatyādiśabdastadatya
tadatyanteti—kartṛkarmabhyāmatyantamavinābhūto yo bhāvanārūpaḥ pratyayārthastadabhidhāyitvādityarthaḥ |ntā vinābhūtārthābhidhāyitvāt | yo yadatyantāvinābhūtārthābhidhāyī sa tasya na vācakaḥ, yathā śiṃśapāśabdo vṛkṣatvaniyataśiṃśapā
śiṃśapātvasyeti—vācako na vṛkṣatvasyeti śeṣapūraṇam |tvasya | tathā
kartṛkarmaṇonarabhidheyatve prayogamāha—tathetyādinā | kartakarmaṇī tiṅā nābhidhīyete, tiṅvācyayā bhāvanayā kadā 'pyatyajyamānatvāt, yat tiṅvācyena na tyajyate tanna tenābhidhīyate, yathā kartṛkarmatvāśrayabhūtadevadattaudanādidravyamiti | tathā kartṛkarmaṇī tiṅā nābhidhīyete, tiṅaḥ kartṛkarmaviṣakavyāpārābhāve 'pyabhidheyabhāvanāvinābhāvena pratīyamānatvāt,yadvyāpārādvinā 'pi ca pratīyate, tanna tenābhidhīyate | yathā śiṃśapāśabdavyāpārādvinā 'pi pratīyamānaṃ vṛkṣatvamiti ca tātparyārthaḥ | kartṛkarmaṇī nābhidheye tiṅā, tadabhidheyāparityāgāt | tadvyāpārādvinā 'pi ca pratīyamānatvātdravyatvavat | tasminneva śiṃśapāśabde vṛkṣatvavat | kārakatvādākhyātānabhidhānaṃ karaṇādivat | tiṅśabdasyāvācakatvamākhyātatvādāsyata ityādivadityebamapi śakyaṃ vaktum | nanvacandraḥ śaśītivadetallaukikaviruddhamanumānam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadi vayaṃ pratyāyyatvaṃ pratyāyakatvaṃ vā nihnumahi tato lokaviruddhaṃ brūyām | vācyavācakaśaktipratiṣedhastvayaṃ kriyate | na ca tena lokaprasiddhivirodhaḥ | pratyayotpādamātreṇa kṛtārthasya
lokasyābhidheya
abhidheyeti—gavādibdānāṃ gotvādijātirabhidheyo 'rthaḥ | gamyamāno 'rtho vyaktiḥ, prādīnāmupasargāṇāṃ dyotyo 'rthaḥ—gamanādistiṣṭhatītyādidhātvarthaḥ’ yogarụ̄dhānāṃ paṅkajādiśabdānāṃ viṣayaḥ padmatvādirityarthaḥ |gamyamānadyotyaviṣayarūpārthacatuṣṭayavivekānādārāt | yadi tu lokaprasiddhaṃ pratyāyyapratyāyakatvamātraṃ sādhyeta tataḥ prāguktena bhāvanādvārapratītyabhyupagamātsiddhasādhanam | lokavirodho 'pi tavaivā ' 'padyeta | kutaḥ |

śeṣā api pratijñādoṣāḥ pū
pūrvokteneti—vaktavyaścaiṣa kaḥ śabdo nāśitvena prasādhyate || 318 || triguṇaḥ paudgalovā 'yamākāśasyāthavā guṇaḥ | varṇādanyo 'tha nādātmā vāyurūpo 'rthavācakaḥ || 319 || padavākyātmakaḥsphoṭaḥ sārūpyānyanivartane | ityādinā śabdanityatvādhikaraṇe ślokavārtikoktena mārgeṇetyarthaḥ |rvoktena mārgeṇa varṇasphoṭajātyādiśabdavikalpanayā śaktidravyakārakavikalpena vyatirekāvyatirekapraśnena ca vaiyākaraṇaṃ prati yojayitavyāḥ | tathā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śrautaṃ lākṣaṇikaṃ vā heturucyate | śrautaṃ tāvadubhayorapyasiddham | kasmāt | asmākaṃ bhāvanāmātrābhidhānāt | tava śaktimātrakārakatvābhyupagamāt | devadattādiśabdo hi dravyavacano na śaktiṃ bravīti | kārakaṃ cābhidadhatpratyayaḥ śaktimātrarūpeṇābhidadhyānna dravyarūpeṇa tasmākārakatvāt | yasyāpi hi dravyaṃ kārakaṃ tenāpi śaktirviśe ṣaṇatvenāvaśyamabhyupagantavyā | tadra
tadrahiteti—nirvyāpārasya dravyasya kārakātvāyogācchaktivyatiriktasya ca vyāpārasyāsaṃbhavādityarthaḥ |hitadravyavyāpārāsaṃbhavāt | tataścā ' 'kṛtya(a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9)dhikaraṇācchakterevābhidhānamiti dravyaśabdena saha sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattiḥ | śaktivacanastu naivā ' 'khyātasamabhivyāhṛtaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti yena saha śrautaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt | sa hi kārakavibhaktyanto bhavet | na cedānīṃ kārakavibhaktiḥ prayujyate | yasya
yasya tu śaktyanabhyupagantuvaiśeṣikasyetyarthaḥ | tu dravyaṃ kārakaṃ tasya yad dravyaṃ kenacitkārakātmanā 'vadhāritaṃ tasya jātivat tattvāpāyāt yāvatsadbhāvaṃ kārakāntarāvivakṣā prāpnoti | śaktipakṣe 'pyaviśiṣṭamiti cet | na | ekadravyāśritānāṃ tāsāmāvirbhāvatirobhāvavivakṣāvaśena tathā tathā 'bhidhānāt | dravyasya tvekātmakatvādapekṣākāraṇarahitasya na vivakṣāntaraṃ prāpnoti |

yathaiva pācakādiśabdeṣu dravyaprādhānyātsattvarūpapratyayo bhavatyevaṃ suptiṅanteṣvapi syāt | tataśca yathaiteṣveva pācakaṃ brūhi pācakena kṛtaṃ pācakāya dehīti kārakāntara
yogo bhavatyevaṃ pacatyodanamityādiṣvapi prāpnoti | tasmācchaktimaddravyakārakapakṣe 'pyavaśyaṃ niṣkṛṣya śaktimātraṃ suptiṅbhyāmabhidheyameṣṭavyam | tathā sati hi |

tena kārakāntarāyogo liṅgasaṃkhyārahitatvaṃ ca dravyapradhānakṛtavailakṣaṇyena siddham | tataścāvasthitaṃ śrutisāmānādhikaraṇyesyobhayorasiddhatvam | atha lakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyamaviśeṣitaṃ vā hetustataḥ siṃho māṇavaka ityadiṣvantareṇāpi vācyavācakabhāvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamityanaikāntikatā | yacca śrautaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tasya ko 'rthaḥ | samānamadhikaraṇamiti samānaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ | na hyanyathā śabdasyārtho 'dhikaraṇaṃ bhavati | sarvaśabdānāmanadhika
anadhikaraṇatvāditi—bhīmāṃsakamate śabdasya dravyatvābhyupagamāddravyasya cānāśrayatvādityarthaḥ |raṇatvādākāśādhikara
vaiyākaraṇamatenā ' 'ha—ākāśeti |ṇatvādvā | vācyasya tu viṣayatvapratipattyā 'dhikaraṇatvamucyate | tadapi ca lakṣaṇādinivṛttyarthaṃ mukhyatvena viśeṣyate | tataśca mukhyayā vṛttyā samānādhikaraṇaṃ—samāno viṣayaḥ, samānāmabhidheyamiti yāvat | tataścaivaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati | vācakaḥ pacatiśabdo devadattasya, tacchabdasamānārthatvāddevadattavacanatvādityarthaḥ | tataścānityaḥ śabdo 'nityatvāditivatpratijñātārthaikadeśo hetuḥ syāt | tadbhū
(a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7) ityatra padāni tāvadvarṇā vā svarūpainaṃ kadācana || 10 || ityārabhya, na ca vastvantarārambhaḥ padārthaistadanugrahāt || 46 || ityantena granthena ślokavārtike 'bhihitena nyāyenetyarthaḥtādhikaraṇoktena ca nyāyena ṣaṣṭhā(a. 6 pā. 8 a. 10 sū. 36) | atratyabhāṣyoktena ca nyāyenetyarthaḥntavakṣyamāṇena ca śabdayo stadbuddhyorarthayorarthabuddhyorityādibhirvyavahāra
vyavahārakāle—anumānavyavahārakāla ityarthaḥ |kāle sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vikalpa sarvaprakāramasiddhatvaṃ gavāśvādiśabdāviśeṣādvā 'naikāntikatvamudbhāvanīyam | anumānavirodhoktaireva hetubhirmukhyasāmānādhikaraṇyanirākaraṇādasiddhatā nirṇetavyā | sapratisādhanatā ca vaktavyā | dṛṣṭānto 'pi yadi tāvacchaktyabhidhānatvena tataḥ sādhyavikalatā | na hi pācakādiśabdāḥ śaktiparāḥ | kiṃ tarhi | śaktyantarāyogitvācchaktimatparā ityuktam | sati ca śaktiparatve tathaiva mukhyasāmānādhikaraṇyātmakameva hetuvikalatvam | pācakādiśabdavadeva pradhānabhūtaśaktyanabhidhānaprasaṅgātsiṣādhayiṣitadharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhanatā | athavā yadā mukhyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamasiddhaṃ tadetaradavācakeṣveva dṛṣṭamiti viruddhatā | na ca
lakṣaṇāyāṃ gauṇatve vā vācakatvamastīti tatsi(a. 1 pā. 4 a. 12 sū. 23)ddhisūtre ‘arthābhidhā(a. 3 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 1)nasaṃyogāt’ ityatra ca sādhitam | tena vipakṣa eva nāstītyevaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum | evaṃ pareṣvapi sādhaneṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojayitavyam | tadgatasaṃkhyopādānamapi śaktigatatvena tāvadasiddham | na hi śaktyātmakakārakāśrayāḥ saṃkhyāḥ kenacidiṣyante | dravyāśritatvāttāsām | atha tu yadgatāmasau saṃkhyāmupādatte tasyaiva pratidravyasya vācaka iti pratijñāyate | tataḥ pūrvābhyupagamavirodhaḥ | na hi kaścidvaiyākaraṇa ākhyātasya dravyavacanatvamicchati | yadi tu vācyalakṣitagatasaṃkhyābhedopādānamabhedopacārādvā gauṇamevaitaddhetustataḥ siṃho devadattaḥ siṃhau devadattayajñadattau siṃhā devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrā ityādibhiravaikāntikam | pācakādau yāvati pacatikartrabhidhānaṃ tāvati saṃkhyābhedopādāyitvaṃ nāsti vibhaktivācyatvātsaṃkhyāyā iti hetuvikalatā | yatra tu vibhaktau tadasti tasyāṃ kartrabhidhānābhāvātsādhyavikalatā | tena tṛtīyāntameva kiṃcitpadamudāhartavyam | tatrāpi tu sarve sāmānādhikaraṇyavaddoṣāḥ saṃbhavantītyasādhanatvam | idamaparamanaikāntikatvam | gośabdo na bravīti dravyam | atha tu tadgatasaṃkhyābhedamupādatte | naivaiṣa vipakṣa iti yadi vedadākṛ(a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9)tyadhikaraṇamasmai vyākhyātavyam | kataradatrānumānaṃ bādhitumarhatīti—sapratisādhanatāṃ yathoktāṃ darśayitvā yathā ' 'kṛtivacane śabda iti parakīyasyānaikāntikatāmudbhāvyā ' 'tmīyena nirṇayaḥ kṛtaḥ | yadapi ca kārakavibhakteḥ pratibandhanaṃ tadapi yadi tāvatsarvasyāstato 'siddham | prathamāyā apyabhihitakārakavibhaktitvāt | atha yasyāḥ kasyāścittato 'nabhidhāyakeṣvapyapavādeṣu tadastītyanaikāntikatā | ‘ubhapā. sū. (2-3-66) |yaprāptau karmaṇi’ iti parisaṃkhyānātkarmagatā ṣaṣṭhī na tāvatkartāramabhidhatte | atha ca kṛdantābhihitākriyāsaṃbandhikartṛvibhaktiḥ ṣaṣṭhīṃ pratibadhnāti | yattvanabhihitādhikārokte dvitīyātṛtīye prāpnuta iti | tadanupapannam | kutaḥ |

lg.l: saṃkhyāyāṃ kārake vā dhīrvibhaktyā hi pravartate |

div.p:
pacati devadatta ityatra kartṛtvaṃ tāvadbhāvanayaiva bodhitam | yā 'pi saṃkhyā sā 'pi tiṅā | kimanyadavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ vibhaktirutpadyeta | kathaṃ punaranekakārasaṃnipāte sati kartṛtvameva bhāvanayā devadattasyāvagamitaṃ na kārakāntaratvamiti | yogyatāvaśeneti kecit |
devadatto hi pākasya kartṛtvayogyo na karaṇatvādiyogyaḥ | na cākārakasya sata ākhyātena saṃbandho 'vakalpate | tasmātkartṛtvaṃ gṛhṇātīti | na tvetatkāṣṭhāni pacantītyatra saṃbhavati | na hi tāni kartṛtvayogyāni | kiṃ tarhi | karaṇatvārhāṇīti prasiddhametat | athocyeta naivātra kāṣṭhānāṃ kartṛtvam | kiṃ tarhi | karaṇatvabhevedamuktena nyāyena kartṛtvavatsvāṃ vibhaktiṃ notpādayati | eṃ sthālī pacatītyadhikaraṇatvaṃ saptamīm | taṇḍulāḥ pacantīti karmatvaṃ dvitīyām | kuśūlaḥ pacatītyapādānatvaṃ pañcamīm | brāhmaṇāḥ pacantīti saṃpradānatvaṃ ca caturthīm | sarvatra yogyatvasya nirṇayakāraṇatvāditi | tadanupapannam | kartṛpratīteḥ sarvasya svasaṃvedyatvāt | āha | naiveyaṃ kartṛtvapratītirnānākārakapratītireva tu satī tiṅvācyakartṛtvāprasiddhivāsanāvaśena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyabuddhyā ka
kartṛvaditi pā. |rtṛpratyayavadābhāsate | yastu nipuṇaḥ paśyati tasya bhavatyeva tatra tatra kārakavivekaḥ | tathā hi |

yaṃ hi vyāpāraṃ sādhayantī sthālyadhikaraṇatvaṃ pratipannavatī kartṛtvenāpyabhidhīyamānā tameva pratipadyate | tasmādvaramadhikaraṇatvenaiva sthālyucyata iti kalpitam | lakāravācye tu sati kartaryadhikaraṇādiṣu lakārānutpādātsāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattestiṅā ca saṃkhyānabhidhānātsaptamyādiprasaktau satyāṃ prathamāsiddhyarthaṃ tiṅabhidhānārhakartṛtvameṣāmucyata iti balādabhyupagamanīyaṃ syāt | anabhidhāne tu yasyaiva tiṅuktasaṃkhyāsaṃbandho vivakṣitastadeva siddhaphalatvātphalabhūtāṃ vibhaktimanutpādayadapi gamyate śiṣṭāni punarutpādayiṣyanti | nanvevaṃ sati sarveṣāṃ bhāvanayā gamyamānatvaṃ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhayogyatvaṃ cāstīti sarvadaiva dvitīyānutpādaḥ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadyapi kārakāṇi svarūpato gamyamānatvāt tadarthaṃ vibhaktiṃ na prayojayanti tathā 'pi tiṅupāttā saṃkhyā kena saṃbadhyopayujyata iti śeṣasaṃkhyārthamavaśyaṃ vibhaktyantarāṇi prayoktavyāni | nanu tiṅupāttaivāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvātsarvaiḥ saṃbadhyate | kathamekā satī śaknoti saṃbandhum | saṃbadhyamānāyāṃ ca saṃkhyāntaropajana eva prāpnoti | vikalpaḥ syāditi cet | iṣṭa evāsau | yathāprayogaṃ tu vyavasthito na prayogāntarakālaṃ yatheṣṭakalpanayā | yadeva prathamāntamāditaḥ prayuktaṃ tadeva tiṅvācyasakhyāyegyatvena vivakṣitamityavagamya śeṣeṣu yathāsvaṃ vibhaktyantarāṇi prārthyante | yadā tarhi bahuvacanaprayogastadā sādhāraṇyavibhavāccheṣeṣu vibhaktyantarāsaṃbhavaprasaṅga | iṣṭa evaiṣo 'pi yadā sarvāṇi tulyakalpatvena vivakṣyante yathā kāṣṭhādīni pacantītyatra |
