yadā tu khalu kartṛmātragatameva bahutvaṃ vivakṣyate, kārakāntarāṇi ca śrutyaiva gūṇabhūtāni darśayitavyāni tadānīṃ prāthamyaprādhānyābhyāṃ kartaryevaṃ saṃbhavāttadatikramakāraṇābhāvācca na kārakāntarāṇi gacchatīti kartṛṣveva līyate | kārakāntarāṇāṃ ca svavibhaktibhireva saṃkhyā 'bhidhīyate | yadyevaṃ tataḥ sarvadaiva tiṅabhihitayā saṃkhyayā kartā nātikramitavyaḥ | katha tarhi sthālī pacatīti prayogaḥ | ucyate | kiṃ punaratra yuktaṃ kiṃ kutaścitkāraṇātkartāramatikramyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃkhyayā ' 'śritam | athavā tatsaṃkhyārhaṃ kartṛtvameva sthālyāṃ vivakṣyata iti | kartṛtvavivakṣā yukteti manyāmahe | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
mukhyatvasya vivakṣā tu yatheṣṭaṃ na
nanviti—yasmādityarthaḥ | yasmātkartṛtvasya vivakṣā yatheṣṭaṃ yujyate tasmānmukhyātikrame— kartratikrame na kiṃcitkāraṇaṃ dṛśyata iti ślokārthaḥnu yujyate ||

div.p:
sarvatraivārthadvaye saṃbhavatyanyatararūpavivakṣā yuktā | saṃbhavati ca sarvakārakāṇāṃ svavyāpārāpekṣayā kartṛtvamiti pu
svavyāpāre ca kāṣṭhādeḥ karaṇatvādyasaṃbhavaḥ || 66 || ityādinā ślokavārtike vākyādhikaraṇa ityarthaḥ |rastātpratipāditam | na hi pradhānakriyāgataṃ kārakavaicitryaṃ svavyāpāraviṣayātkartṛtvādvinopapadyate | tasmāttadeva vivakṣitamiti nyāyyaṃ na kārakāntarasaṃkhyābhidhānamiti | evaṃ ca sati yatkarmasaṃkhyā 'pi kvacidabhidhīyate tatroktaṃ kāraṇam | na ca tadanyatrāstīti vyavasthā | tadā tvanabhihitādhikāro 'pyevaṃ kariṣyate | anabhihite karmaṇa ekatve dvitve bahutve cetyādi | kutaḥ |

na hyupasarjanasya viśeṣaṇasaṃbandho yujyate | viśeṣyāstvekatvādaya eva punarviśeṣaṇāntarasaṃbandhaṃ sahante pradhānatvam | tathā ca samāsādhikāre 'pyuktaṃ ‘bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsaḥ’ iti | tasmādekatvādiṣvanabhihiteṣviti saṃbandhaḥ | etasmiṃstu vyākhyāne kṛtaḥ kaṭa iti śabdayorapi dvitīyā syāt | ubhayatrāpi karmaikatvasyānabhihitatvāt | athaprathamayaivābhihitatvānna bhaviṣyatītyucyate | tadayuktam | prāgeva prathamotpattestatprasaṅgat | api ca kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāraṃ darśanīyamityatrāpi kaṭadvitīyayaivābhihitatvādbhīṣmādiṣvabhāvaḥ prasajyate | nanu karmādivibhaktya
vibhaktyarthasya viśeṣaṇamanabhihitatvāmiti vādina ityarthaḥ |rthavādino 'pyaviśiṣṭametat | na | tasya tiṅkṛttaddhita
samāsairanabhihiteṣviti parisaṃkhyānāt | na ca kaṭadvitīyā tiṅadiṣvantarbhūtā yatastayoktānāṃ paryudāso bhavet | nanu mamāpi parisaṃkhyā bhaviṣyati | bhavet | yadi kṛdādīnāmapi saṃkhyā vācyā syāt | na tvete saṃkhyāyāṃ smaryante | nāpi vadanto dṛśyante | tena tiṅaḥ kevalasya grahaṇamupapadyate netareṣām | karmādayastu sarveṣāmarthā iti vaiṣamyam | ataḥ kṛtapācakādiśabdebhyaḥ prāpnuvantyeva dvitīyādaya ityanyaḥ parihāro vaktavyaḥ | sa caivaṃ saṃbhavati | yarhi karmādiviśeṣaṇamanabhihitādhikāraḥ | tathā hi |

yasya ca karmādayo vācyā yasya ca tadviśiṣṭā ekatvādayastayorubhayorapyanabhihitatvaṃ karmādiviśeṣaṇam | anabhihite karmarṇi dvitīyā 'nabhihite vā karmaṇi ye ekatvādayo vartante teṣu dvitīyet | yadyapi copasarjanaṃ karmādayastathā 'pi viśeṣaṇena saṃbadhyante | samāsasthaṃ hyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇairna saṃbadhyate | vākyasthaṃ tu ‘ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ’ itivat saṃbadhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamevamādi | evaṃ ca vṛttivākyayorviśeṣo bhaviṣyati | vākyasthāśca karmādayaḥ | ataḥ satyapyupasarjanatve śaknuvanti samānavibhaktikānabhihitādhikāraveśeṣyatāṃ pratipattum | tata
labdhābakāśaḥ pūrvapakṣī punaḥ śaṅkate—tataścetyādinā |śca pacati devadatta iti tiṅādibhiranabhihitasya kartuḥ saṃkhyāmabhidhātuṃ tṛtīyā prāpnotyeva | gatārthatvā
saṃkhyāyāṃ kārake vā dhīrbibhavatyā hi pravartate | ityādivārtikena dattottaratvānna tṛtīyāprāptirityarthaḥ |daprāptiriti cenna | bhīṣmādabhiranekāntāt | uktaṃ hyetatkaṭadvitīyayokte 'pi karmaṇi bhīṣmādibhyastadutpattiriti | yadi ca tṛtīyā gatārthatvānnotpadyate tataḥ prathamāvācyā 'pi saṃkhyā gataiveti kāmaṃ sā notpadyate | kevalaprātipadikaprayogāsaṃbhavāttadutpattiriti cet | na | evaṃ sati yathāvihitatṛtīyāprasaṅgāt | na caiṣa nyāyena prasaṅga āpāditaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | āgamena | na cā ' 'gamavirodhe nyāyaḥ kāryakṣamo bhavati | tasmā
siddhāntī śaṅkāṃ samādadhāti—tasmādityādinā |danabhihitaśabda eva lakṣaṇayā viśeṣātmanā 'navagatatve vartate | pacatipacyateśabdābhyāṃ ca saṃkhyāsaṃbandhādarādviśeṣarūpeṇa kartṛkarmaṇī gamyete | tasmāttatadvibhaktirnoṃtpatsyate | kārakāntarāṇi na kadācidevaṃ viśeṣarūpeṇa pratīyanta iti svavibhaktīrutpādayanti | kārakatvāviśeṣe 'pi ca yathā kartṛkarmaṇoreva
viśeṣapratītiḥ saṃkhyāsaṃbandhaśca bhavatīti tathokta
yallakṣaṇo hi bhavataḥ kartā sannabhiśrīyate | ityārabhya—karaṇādīnāṃ tu na vastulakṣaṇā | nāpi śabdalakṣaṇā prādhānyavivakṣā 'stīti nityameva bāhyaśabdopādeyatvamityantena granthena prāguktamityarthaḥ |m | yattu bhāvotpannalakārapakṣeṇa vyabhicāro neha pacyate neha bhujyata ityādiṣu pacimātravivakṣāyāṃ kartṛkarmaṇoranāśrayaṇādbhātvarthabhāvanayorāśaṅgayate tataścāgamakatvamiti | tatrocyate |

yathaivātra kriyāyā anaikāntikatvādanyatrāgamakatvāmāpādyate tathaiva śabdasyāpi karmānabhidhānāt, odanaḥ pacyata ityatrāpyanabhidhātṛtvaprasaṅga | atha vyabhicāryapyasau kenacidanugṛhītaḥ sannabhidhāsyati tathā mamāpi tadartho gamayiṣyatītyaviśeṣaḥ | tacca sarvatra sakarmakākarmakaśyanbikaraṇetaravikaraṇopapadaviśeṣajñānādana
abhidhātṛtvavadramakatvaṃ na virudhyata iti pā |bhidhātṛtvavadramakatvaṃ vivicyata ityanupālambhaḥ | itarathā teśabdasya bhāvakartṛkarmasu triṣvapi darśanaṃ yateśabdasya śyanvikaraṇātmanepadīyayakyaṅkyaṅpratyayeṣu cāviśeṣa ityatyantasaṃśayahetutvamevābhidhānapakṣe 'pi syāt | tasmāttadbhūtā(a. 1 pā. 1 a. 7)dhikaraṇoktenaivānvayavyatirekabhaṅgaparihāreṇa pakṣadvayamapi samarthanīyam | tataśca viśeṣahetubhiḥ śakyo gamakatvapakṣo nirṇetum | athavā mukhya evānabhihitaśabdaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi pacati devadatta iti tṛtīyā notpadyate | paryudastatvāt | kathaṃ paryudastatvam | tiṅā 'bhihitatvāt | kimarthaṃ tarhi purastādanabhidhānakleśaḥ kṛtaḥ | lokavedārthaṃ na vyākaraṇārtham | kiṃ lokavedavyatirekeṇāpi vyākaraṇavyavahārāḥ santi | bāḍham | na hi vṛddhiguṇaśabdau lokavedayorādaijadeḍāṃ vācakau dṛṣṭau | bhavatu saṃjñāparibhāṣāṇāmalaukikatvam | prakṛtipratyayārthāstu na lokavedavyatiriktāḥ prayujyante | kathaṃ na prayujyante yadā ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca’ iti vedalokayoratyantamasanneva lakāraḥ kartṛkarmābhidhāyitvena kathyate | nanu lādeśānāmatra lakāragrahaṇena grahaṇaṃ yuktam | sthānini vā 'rthādeśanamādeśārtham | naitadyuktam | kutaḥ |

lakāraṃ śrūyamāṇamutsṛjyā ' 'deśā gṛhyanta iti śrutibādhaḥ | athāpi lakārasyaiva vācyāḥ karmādayo 'pyucyante tathā 'pi tenānabhidhīyamānāḥ santaḥ prāgādeśotpatterna śakyāstathā 'dhyavasātum | ante ca nyāyavirodhaḥ sthita eva | ataśca kasmiṃścidasa
mañjase 'vaśyakalpanīye varamabhidheyatvameva pāribhāṣikaṃ kalpitamekāntasyā ' 'śrayaṇīyatvāt | na hi kathaṃcidapi lāvasthāyāmapāribhāṣikamabhidheyatvaṃ saṃbhavati | tena ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca’ ityādeśadvāreṇa lokavedārthamarthādeśanamuta svaśāstre vyavahārārthamiti parīkṣāyāṃ yadi lokavedayostiṅgacyatvaṃ yuktyā 'vakalpayiṣyate tatastādarthyaparikalpanaṃ yuktam | athānavakḷptistataḥ svaśāstrārthatvamiti | tatra tu lokavedārthatvasya pūrva nirākṛtatvāt | pariśeṣataḥ svaśāstrārthatā | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati | pāṇinermama kartṛkarmaṇī lakārābhihite draṣṭavye iti | kiṃ punarasya prayojanaṃ yadā na lokavedayoste tathopalabhyete | yadyapi ca tatra nāsti prayojanaṃ svaśāstre tvasti | kathaṃ nāmānamihitādhikāreṇa lakāraprayoge tayoramihitatvāśrayaṇātparyudāsaḥ syāditi | tasmādyadyapi paramārthato nābhidhīyete tathā 'pi śāstre 'bhihitavadāśrayaṇādabhihitādhikārāvihite vibhaktī na lakṣyete iti parihṛtaḥ kārakavibhaktiprasaṅga | yattu tadviśeṣābhidhānāditi | tacchiṃśapādaśabdairanaikāntikam | śiṃśāpāśabdo hi na tāvadvṛkṣatvapārthivatvadravyatvasattāprameyatvajñeyatvānāmabhidhāyako 'tha ca tadviśeṣameva śiṃśapāmabhidhatte | tena yathā 'sya sāmānyamanabhidhāya viśeṣābhidhānaśaktirna virudhyate yathā ca cakṣuṣaḥ sāmānyamanityatvamagṛhṇato 'pi rūpagrahaṇaśaktirna virudhyate | yathā ca bhavato 'pi dravyamanabhidhāyaiva tiṅā tadviśeṣaḥ kartṛtvamucyate tathā mama kartrabhidhānādṛte tadviśeṣasaṃkhyābhidhānaṃ draṣṭavyam | yadyapi gamyamānasya viśeṣaṇasaṃbandho nāstyatastatsaṃbandhadarśanādābhidhānamiti | tadapyākṛ(a. 1 pā. 3a. 9)tyaru(a. 3 pā. 1a. 6)ṇādhikaraṇayorubhayathā 'pi darśanānnirākṛtam | api ca madhuro rasaḥ snigdhaḥ śīto guruścetyanenānaikāntikatvam | atra hi madhurarasasya guṇatvāda guṇāntaraiḥ śītādibhiḥ saṃbandho nāvakalpata ityetatpratipāditaṃ dravyaṃ saṃbadhyate | na ca kathaṃcidapi rasaśabdasya dravyavacanatvam | tathā 'śvasahasreṇa nagaraṃ muṣitamiti gamyamānānāmeva (sādināṃ) moṣakriyāsaṃbandhaḥ | yattu kvacidbhūmādau rūpādau vā na dṛśyate na tāvatā sarvatra sthitiḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate | tasmānnābhidheyaḥ kartā | tataśca śrautatvābhāvānna prakaraṇaṃ bādhyate | yattu karmadharmapakṣe darśapūrṇamāsavidhinaiva vihitatvāt prātyātmiko vidhiranarthakaḥ syāt | tasmātpuruṣārthateti | tatra brūmaḥ |

lg.l: vinā ca tena dhātvartho na kratvaṅgaṃ pratīyate ||

div.p:
vidhirahito hi dhātvarthaḥ svayameva sādhyatāṃ pratipadyamāno 'napekṣitaprayojanatvānna
śakyate darśapūrṇamāsakathaṃbhāvena grahītum | na ca tenāgṛhītaḥ prayogavacanena vidhātuṃ śakyate | tasmādavaśyaṃ prātyātmikena vidhinā sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vā puruṣopakāritvaṃ bodhayitvā dhātvarthaṃ karaṇīkṛtya tadatiritta prayojanasādhyāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃnihitadarśapūrṇamāsopakārasaṃbandhe tayā 'ṅgatvaṃ kalpayitavyam | anyathā cetaretarāśrayaṃ syāt | aṅgatvādvidhirvirdheścāṅgatvamiti | tasmādarthavānaṅgavidhiḥ | ataśca vadedityanenaitāvadavagataṃ darśapūrṇamāsopakāraṃ vadanena sādhayediti | tato 'nṛtapadasāmarthyādevaṃ bhavati yadvadanena kuryāttadanṛteneti | punaśca nañsaṃbandhādyadanṛtavadanenopakuryāttanneti vacanaṃ vyajyate | tasmāddarśapūrṇamāsopakārāya vadato yadanṛtaṃ prasajyate tatpratiṣedho vidhīyate | tataśca yāvatkarmārthaḥ saṃvādastatra sarvatrānṛtaṃ varjanīyam | tena yavamayaḥ puroḍāśaḥ kartavya ityevamādāvadhvaryumuktvā saktvarthaṃ me yavā bhaviṣyanti | tasmādvrīhimayaḥ kriyatāmityevaṃ na visaṃvaditavyam | saṃkalpasyeti—ca tatpūrvatvādvadanameva pratilakṣayati | athavā svena bacanenādhvaryumeva saṃkalpaṃ kārayitveti dviṇijantasya rūpaṃ draṣṭavyam | āha | yadā smṛtiprāptanityānuvāde, saṃyogāntarācca vidhau, nānṛtaṃ vaditavyamityayamaṃśastulyaḥ kiṃ tadā cintāyāḥ prayojanamiti taducyate |

smṛtau ca yadanṛtavadananimittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ tadeva kartavyaṃ yadyanuvādaḥ | vidhau punarasya yājurvedikatvād bhreṣasya yajurvedato yajño vinaṣṭa ityanvāhāryapacane bhuvaḥ svāheti hotavyam | smṛtestvanyataramūlatvānavadhāraṇānna vedabhreṣanimittaprāyaścittāvadhāraṇaṃ syāt | evaṃ mūlamūlibhāvābhyupagame 'pi smṛ
smṛtyaiva tadartha iti'—nānṛtaṃ brūyāt’ ityanayā smṛtyā niṣedhārtho vidheyatayā 'numṛta ityarthaḥ |tyaiva tadarthastadatikra
tadatikramaścānusṛta iti—‘gāyatrīmanṛte japet’ ityanayā ca niṣedhātikramaśca prāyaścittanimittatayā 'nusṛta ityarthaḥ |maścānusṛta iti tadīyameva prāyaścittam |
nanu tavāpi yājurvedikatvajñānāttadveda
tadvedaprāyaścittamiti—‘yadi yajuṣṭo bhuvaḥ svāhetyanvāhāryapacane hotavyam’ ityanena bihitamityarthaḥ |prāyaścittameva bhavet | naitadasti | etaddhyāhavanīyādiviṣayatvādāhitāgnyadhikāramavalambate | anṛtapratiṣedhaśca puruṣamātradharmatvādanāhitāgnerapyavasthitaḥ | tenāsya tāvadaśyaṃ smārtaṃ prāyaścittamapekṣaṇīyam | taccedapekṣi tamekatvānnimittasyā ' 'hitāgnerapi tadeva yuktamiti vaidikaprāyaścittābhāvaḥ | kiṃ ca |

‘yadyṛkto yajña ārttimiyāt’ iti hi sarve bhreṣā yajñasaṃbandhino nimittatvena śrūyante | jyotiṣṭoṃmasaṃbandhinaśca prakaraṇādāsan | tatra ‘veda( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 8 )saṃyogānna prakaraṇena bādhyeta’ ityanena nyāyena vākyabalīyastvātprakaraṇaṃ tāvadatikramyeta | na tu yajñasaṃbandhaparityāge heturasti | tasmādavagatavedaviśeṣamūleṣvapi puruṣadharmeṣu na tannimittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kartavyam | yadā tu phalakalpanābhayāt prakaraṇācca kratuyuktapuruṣadharmā bhavantyevaṃjātīyakā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ | śuddhakratudharmatvaṃ ca siddhāntastadobhayatrāpi yājurvedikayajabhreṣanimittameva prāyaścittamiti prayojanāntaraṃ vaktavyam | taducyate |

sarve hi samidādayaḥ kratvantaragatāḥ stotraśastrajapādayaśca pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ puruṣasaṃskārāḥ | te ca ‘yāja( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 2 sū. 4 )mānāstatpradhānatvātkarmavat’ ityanenādhikaraṇena yājamānāḥ syuḥ | tatra samidādīnāṃ yāgātmakatvād dravyatyāgavyāpāreṇa dīkṣaṇīyādivadubhayathā 'pi yājamānatvāt | tadvadeva ca yajamānavivṛddhāvapi tantreṇa prayoga iti na kaścidviśeṣo dṛśyate | ye tu stotraśastrajapādayaste guṇabhūtakartṛkarmaniyamasamartho pradhānaniyamānadhikṛtāṃ pradhānaudgātrādisamākhyāṃ bādhitvā dantadhāvanādibadyajamānakartṛkā bhaveyuḥ | yajamānavivṛddhau ca sādhāraṇadravyatyāganyāyena tantratvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti pratiyajamānaṃ bhidyeran | pratiṣedheṣvapi ca yadā vidhyaṃśa evamavadhāritaḥ kratuyuktapuruṣopakāryanṛtavadanamiti tadā 'syaivānṛtaviśiṣṭapratiṣedhādayamartho bhavati yajamānenā ' 'tmasaṃskārārthamāśīḥprayogādiṣu yaducyate tatra vaikalpikāvadhāraṇe svarūpoccāraṇe vā mṛṣātvaṃ na kartavyamanyatra tvanyeṣāṃ ca yatheṣṭavāditvamiti | śuddhakratudharmapratiṣedhe tu yāvatkratau kiṃcidvadanaṃ yajamānasyartvijāṃ
vā 'nṛtaṃ prasajyate tatsarvaṃ na kartavyaṃ kratusaṃbandhitvāviśeṣāt | ataśca yathaiva yajamānena vrīhimayaṃ saṃkalpya na yavamayo dātavyastathaivādhvaryvādibhirapyanyataraṃ pa
anyataraṃ pakṣamiti—ṣoḍaśigrahaṇatadabhāvādirūpavaikalpikānāṃ prayogārambhe 'dhvaryvādibhiranyatarapakṣāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā punaḥ pakṣāntaragrahaṇena na vitaṃvaditavyamityarthaḥ |kṣaṃ kariṣyāma ityuktvā na lāghavādivaśena punarvisaṃvaditavyam | yadapi ca punaḥ saṃskārārthaṃ kiṃcittadapi kratvarthāṃśenaiva varjayitavyam | nanu ca pratiṣedhārthe guṇabhūtaḥ puruṣastata ādhvaryavasamākhyā niyāmiketi praṇītāpraṇayanādivadadhvaryureko 'nṛtapratiṣedhamavalambate | satyamavalambeta yadi pratiṣedhārtho 'nuṣṭheyo bhavet | ayaṃ tvanuṣṭhānābhāvātmakatvānna kartṛviśeṣamapekṣate | śru
śrutyeti—niṣedhyapadasāhacaryalakṣaṇayetyarthaḥ |tyaiva ca pratiṣedhaḥ prāptyā
prāptyā—niṣedhyaprāptyetyarthaḥ | saṃbaddhaḥ | sa
saḥ—niṣedhyo 'rtha ityarthaḥ | yatra prāptastatra svasāmarthyena gacchanna śakyate samākhyayā vārayitum | nanu vadedityetāvādvidhyaṃśamātramālocyamānaṃ samākhyā niyaṃsyati | tataśca pratiṣedho 'pi tadanusāritvānniyato bhaviṣyati | naitadevam | paryavasite hi śāstrārthe tatkarturapekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ samākhyā 'vatarati | na ca vadedityetāvataḥ śāstrārthatvaṃ vijñāyate | pratiṣedhasaṃbandhāddhi tadanuvādatvena sthitam | na cānūdyamānasya śrutamapi viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti grahā( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 7 )dhikaraṇe sādhitam |
kimuta samākhyayeti—yadātadāpadādhyāhāreṇa yojanā ayamāśayaḥ | niṣedhyamātre śāstrārthāparyavasānātkartrapekṣānupapatterniṣedhānvaye cānuvādyatvānniṣedhyasya, grahaikatvādhikaraṇanyāyena śrutanopi kartrā viśeṣyatvāyoge kimu vaktavyaṃ samākhyānikena kartrā viśeṣyatāyāmiti |kimuta samākhyayā vidhīyamānapadārthakartṛviśeṣasaṃbandhamātra eva vyāpriyate |
tasmādasti sarvatra prayojanamataḥ samyagvicāritamiti siddham || 13 ||

pūrvatra śrutyā saha prakaraṇaṃ virudhyate na virudhyata iti vicāritam | idānīṃ liṅgavākyābhyāṃ saha vicāryate | tatra jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇavihitasya tīrthasnānasya darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇavihitasya jṛmbhikānimittasya mantroccāraṇasya kimarthatvaṃ punaḥ syāditi nivītādhikaraṇavadeva pakṣā racayitavyāḥ | teṣāmapi sāravattaratvādanantarādhikaraṇe traya upanyastāḥ puruṣamātradharmaḥ prakaraṇayuktapuruṣadharmaḥ kratudharma iti | ta evātrāpyanuvartante | tatra
‘kiṃ tāvatprāptam’ iti bhāṣyaṃ kiṃ tāvādityetāvatā kiṃ tāvadyuktamiti pṛṣṭe prāptamityanena—yatpūrvādhikaraṇena prāptaṃ tadyuktamityevaṃ śuddhakratudharmapakṣoktyarthatayā vyākhyāya sūtropānyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhyata ityevaṃparatayā vyacaṣṭe-tatretyā, vinā | pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva prakaraṇāt kratvarthatve prāpte pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhyate |

snānaṃ tāvadyogyatayaiva malāpakarṣaṇa rthatvātpuruṣārthaṃ gamyate | tīrthaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca sukhāvataratvād duḥkhāvatarahradādi vyāvartayat puruṣasyopakaroti na kratoḥ | yadapi ca sma
smaraṇamiti-'asnātāśī malaṃ bhuṅkte’ ityevaṃrūpamityarthaḥ |raṇaṃ bhojanādipūrvabhāviniyamarūpeṇa tadapi tadarthasyaiva niyamādṛṣṭaṃ puruṣagāmyeva karoti | tenāvadhāritaprayojanena saṃbadhyamānastīrthaniyamo 'pi puruṣārtho vijñāyate | tatrāpyekaṃ tāvaddṛṣṭameva prayojanamavataraṇasukham | athāpyuddhṛtodakādinivṛttirūpo niyamo na dṛṣṭaṃ sādhayatī
tyadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyate tathā 'pyastyeva phalaṃ ‘tīrthameva hi sajātānāṃ bhavati’ iti | na caivaṃ vākyāt puruṣasaṃyuktasya prakaraṇamīśvaram ‘asaṃyu( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 11 )ktaṃ prakaraṇāt’ iti sthitatvāt | tathā yadyapi brūyādityanena kartā nopāttastathā 'pi jañjabhyamānaśabdaḥ kṛdantatvāt ‘kartapā. sū. ( 3—4—67 ) |ri kṛt’ iti cānanyaparasmaraṇātkartṛviśeṣaṇaṃ puruṣamupādatte | tena svavākyopāttena saṃyuktaṃ mantrābhidhānaṃ prakaraṇagrāhyatvaṃ na pratipadyate | puruṣasaṃyogo cāstyeva tatphalam | prāṇāpānayorātmani dhāraṇāccirajīvitvam | tasmātpuruṣamātradharmā evaṃjātīyakā iti || 14 ||
puruṣadharma ityetāvadgṛhṇīmaḥ | yattu puruṣamātradharmastataścotkarṣa ityetadasahyam | kutaḥ |

lg.l:
bādho na yujyate kartuṃ na ca
na ca dūretisaṃnihitasya kratūpakārākhyasya phalasya saṃbhave viprakṛṣṭasya svargākhyaphalasya kalpanāṃ na ca yuktetyarthaḥ | dūṃrātphalaśrutiḥ ||

div.p:
puruṣamātrasaṃyogo hi vinā kāraṇena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyeta | nanvitaratrāpi liṅgavākye bādhyeyātām | satyaṃ bādhyeyātāṃ yadyapuruṣeṇa saṃbandho 'bhyupagamyeta | vayaṃ tu prakaraṇagatapuruṣadharmaṃ bruvāṇā na kiṃcidapi bādhiṣyāmahe | na prākaraṇike jañjabhyamāne snātari ca sakalaśabdāṃrtho yogyatvaṃ vā nāsti | nanvaviśeṣabuddhirbalavatpramāṇaprabhūtā durbalapramāṇamūlayā viśeṣabuddhyā na yuktā nivartayitum | eṣā tāvadavaśyameva nivartanīyā | na hyaviduṣo 'samarthasya vā 'dhikāraḥ saṃbhavati | nanvevaṃ prakaraṇaṃ viśeṣakamabhyupagataṃ bhavati | naitadevam | grāhakamevātrāpi prakaraṇaṃ, yenoddiśyamānajaññabhyamānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ pratipadyate |
na hi tasyaiṣa vyāpāro 'vakalpate | ka
kathaṃbhāvasyetyaṃbhāvādanyenāsaṃbandhāditi—kathamiti prakārākāṅkṣārūpasya prakaraṇasya itthabhityupāyetikartavyatādyaparapayārthaprakārarūpādanyena viśeṣyādinā 'nanvayādityarthaḥ |thaṃbhāvasyetthaṃbhāvādanyenāsaṃbandhāt | yo 'pi prakaraṇagṛhītapuruṣamapekṣamāṇaḥ prakaraṇādviśeṣalābhaṃ manyate tasyāpi vyāvṛtte prakaraṇavyāpāre tadgṛhītatvāpekṣā bha
bhavatīti—itirnipātatvādyadyapitathā 'piśabdārthakā | tathā ca yadyapi prakaraṇagṛhītatvāpekṣā bhavati tathā 'pi vyāvṛtebādhite, prakaraṇavyāpāre naiva prakaraṇaṃ viśeṣakaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ yojanayā 'ryo jñeyaḥ |vatīti naiva tadviśeṣaṇamavakalpate | kathaṃ tarhi prakṛtapuruṣapratyayaḥ | ucyate | vinaiva viśeṣaṇatvenātra prakaraṇasthapuruṣagrahaṇasiddhiḥ | tathāhi |

lg.l:
tadvadetadapītyevaṃ phalāya
amena ca ‘kiṃ tu phalaṃ tatra kalpanīyam iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātaṃ jñeyam | prakṛtaṃ gatam ||

div.p:
yathā hi vrīhyādi prokṣaṇādibhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaṃ na ca tāvatprakaraṇena viśeṣyate | atha cā ' 'narthakyabhayādviprakṛṣṭaphalakalpanāpramāṇābhāvācca kratusādhanatvena prayojanavattvācca prakṛtaṃ gṛhyate tathā 'tra phalakalpanābhayātpratyāsattyanurodhena prākaraṇikajañjabhyamānagrahaṇaṃ kriyate | na hi tatsaṃbhave 'nyaphalakalpanāpramāṇaṃ labhyate | nanu ca kḷptamevānayoḥ phalamityuktam | satyamuktaṃ na tvīdṛśena śabdena phalamucyate | kāmaśabdopabandhābhāvāt | etadeva ca nātra vidhāyakaṃ śabdamupalabhāmaha ityāha | phalavidhānaṃ hīdṛśena śabdena na kriyata iti vakṣyā( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 1 ) ityatretyarthaḥmaḥ | itarathā punarbrūyādityatrāpyastyeva vidhivibhaktirityayuktameva vidhāyakābhāvavacanam | na hi dhatta ityetasyāvidhāyakatvādupālambho bhavati | sarvatraiva phalāṃśasyāvidheyatvāt | tasmādyathottameva yojanīyam | ‘dravyasaṃ( a 4 pā. 3 a. 5 sū. 1 )skārakarmasu’ ityanena cārthavādatvaṃ vakṣyate | ‘pha( a. 4 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 3 ) |laṃ tu tatpradhānāyām’ iti ca kāmapadopabaddhāyāṃ tadarthatvam | āha |
puruṣasya saṃskārakamiti gṛhṇīma iti saṃskāraśabdoccāraṇātkratuyuktapuruṣadharmatvamabhyupagacchati | na hi svatantraḥ phalavattvātsaṃskāra ityabhidhīyate | darśapūrṇamāsārveva kurvata ityetanneti—ko 'bhiprāyaḥ | sarvathā tāvajjañjabhyamānadharmatvenaiṣa gamyamāna ānarthakyena laukikānnivartyeta | yastu jyotiṣṭomādau jañjabhyamānaḥ sa dārśapūrṇamāsikavadeva, saprayojana ityaśakyo varjayitumiti | ataḥ kratumātrayuktapuruṣadharmo bhavati | asyottaraṃ gụ̄dhābhiprāyam | saṃskṛtena tu tena prayojanaṃ nāstīti | kutaḥ |

yadi sarvatra vihitaḥ sannanarthakatvena laukikānnivartyeta tata etadevaṃ syāt | na tvasāvevaṃ nivartayituṃ śakyate | na hi pravṛttāni śāstrāṇi kena cinnivartyante | kiṃ tarhi | ādita evaiṣāṃ pravṛttipratibandho 'vadhāryate | sā caivaṃ pratibadhyate | yadi ‘dravyasaṃkhyāhetusamudāyaṃ vā’ ityadhikaraṇanyāyena svarūpasaṃgatāvanarthakatvājjañjabhyamānaśabdenāpūrvasādhanatvaṃ lakṣyate | tallakṣaṇāṃ ca na prakaraṇādṛte labhyate | na ca darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvaṃ muktvā 'nyasya prakaraṇamasti | tasmāttadapūrvasādha
anena ca ‘saṃskṛtena tu tena nāsti prayojanam’ iti bhāṣyaṃ saṃkṛstena tu puruṣeṇa sādhyaṃ prayoja kībhūtamapūrvaganyatra nāstīti vyākhyātaṃ vijñeyam |naṃ yo jañjabhyamānastasyaivaiṣa saṃskāraḥ | evaṃ tīrthasnānamapi vaktavyam | etau ca paricodanāparihārau sūtrakāra eva vakṣyati | ‘ārādapīti cet’ ‘na tadvākyaṃ hi tada
2( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 4 ) |rthatvāt’ iti | yattu prayogavacanena siddhervidhyānarthakyamiti | tatrā ' 'ha | varaṃ tasyānuvādatvaṃ na ca niṣphalapuruṣamā
tradharmavidhānamiti | iha bhāṣyakāreṇaṃ nirantarayordvayoradhikaraṇayorekasyāḥ paricodanāyāḥ parasparaviruddhaparihāradvayamuktam | ‘aṅgaṃ satprayogavacanena gṛhyate | na cāvihitamaṅgaṃ bhavati’ ityekaḥ | evaṃ satyanuvādo bhaviṣyati, ityaparaḥ | tatra kasya satyatvaṃ kasyānṛtatvamiti vivektavyam | yathā tāvatpūrvatra vyākhyātaṃ tathā vidhitvameva satyam | anuvādābhidhānaṃ tvabhyupetyavādamātramiti ga
iti keciditi śeṣaḥ |myate | śakyaṃ
etadadhikaraṇoktasyaiva parihārasya satyatvamiti vadatāṃ pareṣāṃ matamanusṛtyā ' 'ha—śakyamityādinā | tvanuvādatvaṃ samarthayituma | kutaḥ |

‘vidhe( a. 11 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 16 )stvekaśrutitvādaparyāyavidhānāt’ ityatra sarveṣāmevāṅgānāmekaprayojanakalpanayaikaṃ vidhiṃ vakṣyati | sa ca prayogavacanena vidhīyamānānāṃ bhaviṣyati | prātyātmikavidhīnāṃ paryāyapravṛtteḥ | puruṣaśca yena pravartyate sa vidhiḥ | aṅgapradhānavatyāṃ ca bhāvanāyāṃ yugapatpuruṣaniyogaḥ | tasmāt prātyātmikānāmanuvādatvam | atrā
svābhiprāyamāhaatrābhidhīyata ityādinā |bhidhīyate | dvāvapyetau granthau sādhū | katham | pūrvastāvat ‘na cāvihitamaṅgaṃ bhavati’ ityanayā copapattyā na viruddhaḥ | uktaṃ hyetadvidhāvanāśrīyamāṇe dhātvarthamātrasya sādhyatvānniṣprayojanatve sati na śakyamaṅgatvaṃ kalpayituṃ tena tāvadvidhiḥ | atha cānuvādaḥ katham | pū
pratyātmibavākyārthālocanavelāyāṃ vidhitvaṃ prakaraṇakalpitāṅgavākyaikavākyatāpannapradhānavākyārthatryaṃśabhāvanāvidhivelāyāṃ prayogavidhisiddhapuruṣapravṛttyanuvātvamityevaṃ virodhaparihārāśayaṃ vadati—pūrveṇetyādinā |rveṇa vidhinā 'ṅgatvaṃ prakalpya prayogavacanaṃ yāvannīyate tāvantaṃ ca kālamasau vidhirūpe ṇāvatiṣṭhate | prayogavacanagrahaṇe tu sati tadnatavidhisaṃsparśādeva puruṣapravṛttisiddheranuvādatvam | ataḥ prāk prayogavacanasamarpaṇādvidhitvena vinā na vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti vidhiḥ | uttarakāle tu tata eva pravṛttisiddheranuvāda ityubhayamapi sādhūktam || 15 ||
prakaraṇe 'hīnasyātyantamavidyamānatvādvākyasaṃyuktadvādaśopasattvaṃ prakaraṇenānugṛhyamāṇamutkṛṣyata ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ || 16 ||

śaṃyāviti brāhmaṇāvagoraṇādipratiṣedhavākyopalakṣaṇam | tatra pūrvavadeva pakṣāḥ | teṣāmapi prākaraṇikaṃ saṃbandhadvayamapyekīkṛtya nirdiṣṭau kratudharmaḥ śuddhapuruṣadharmaśceti dvāveva pakṣau | samastena cānṛtavadanapratiṣedhanyāyena kratvarthasyāvagoraṇasya prasajyamānasya pratiṣedhaḥ | kā ca tatra prasaktiḥ | catu
caturbrāhmaṇeti—brahmādhvaryuhotrāgnīdhrākhyāścatvāra ṛtvijo darśapūrṇamāsayorityartha | bhahāpiṭharaparimitasyāpyanvāhāryasyā ' 'natijananāsāmarthyadyotanāya catuḥśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ |rbrāhmaṇasādhyatvāddarśapūrṇamāsayostadānatyarthaṃ sāmadānabhedadaṇḍeṣu prasajyamāneṣvanvāhāryadānenā ' 'nabhayediti
iti niyama iti pā. | gamyate | yadā tanmātreṇa
nā ' 'namanmi tadā punaryathā dānādānatirbhavati tathā prayatyamāne laukikopāyaprasaktau satyāmayaṃ daṇḍaprakāro 'vagoraṇādiḥ pakṣe prāpnoti sa pratiṣidhyate | na kartavyaṃ, tena, tadvyatirekopāyāntarāśrayaṇaṃ kāryamityuktaṃ bhavati | tathā prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

yacchabdastāvacchrutyaiva puruṣamupādatte | na ca prakaraṇayuktapuruṣadharmaḥ | na hyeṣa kaścitsaṃskāraḥ | kiṃ tarhi | narakaparihārārtho 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ | sa ca puruṣagata eva | narakapātaḥ saṃkīrtito na tu kratugataḥ | yasya ca pratyavāyastacasya tatparihārārthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | ‘śatena yātayāt sahasreṇa yātayāt’ iti śataguṇaṃ sahasraguṇamanubhavedityarthaḥ | atha vā saṃkhyeyāntarānupādānādupari saṃvatsaragrahaṇādihāpi saṃvatsaraśatena yātanāṃ nistaretsahasreṇetyevaṃ saṃbadhyate | niṣedhaphalaṃ ca pradarśanamātreṇaiva saṃbadhyate na vidhiphalavatkāmapadopabandhamapekṣate | na hi kaścitsaṃtyaktavyamarthaṃ kāmayate | na cānyaḥ kaścittasyopādānaprakāro 'sti | tenānubhavedityetāvataivopādānaṃ vijñāyate | taccehāvikalamasti | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa liṅpradarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ tatphalasyāvidheyatvādasaṃbaddham | yadapi tāvadiṣṭaṃ tadapi na vidhīyate yattvaniṣṭaṃ tatra puruṣapravṛttyasaṃbhavādatyantaviparīta eva vidhyupanyāsaḥ | tasmādaniṣṭaphalopādānamātreṇaiva tadviṣayaniṣedhasiddheraniṣṭaphalasya ca puruṣagāmitvātpuruṣadharmatā | tathā ca ‘so 'bravītkiṃ me prajāyā iti’ prajāmātrānugraha eva śaṃyunā prārthitaḥ | devaiśca yatkāmayasa ityukte śaṃyunā brāhmaṇamātrameva tebhyaḥ parīttaṃ paripālanāyopakṣiptam | taiśca brāhmaṇamātramevoddiśyānugrahaḥ pratta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ samarthito bhaviṣyatīti || 17 ||

‘nāsyā annamadyāt’ iti vākyāntaramapi sadanyārthadarśanaupayikatvātsahodāhṛtam | malavadvāsāḥ—ṛtumatī strī | tatsaṃvādapratiṣedhe 'pi ta eva pakṣāḥ | tatra yacchabdajañjabhyamānaśabdatulyopādānaśabdābhāvātsaṃvādasya ca kratau puruṣo cāviśeṣaprasakterabhihitenānṛtavadanapratiṣedhanyāyena ‘patni patnyeṣa te lokaḥ’ ityādeḥ kratvarthasya saṃvādasya pratiṣedha iti prāpte 'nyathā pratyavasthīyate |

lg.l: na hi prāgaparuddhāyāḥ prāptirasti kratuṃ prati ||

div.p:
‘tāma
‘yasya vratye 'hanpantyanālambhukā syāt’ iti pūrva śeṣaḥ | tai. brā (3—7—1) |parudhya yajeta’ iti hi sāmānyataḥ sarvasmādeva kratvanuṣṭhānādasau nivartitā kathaṃ saṃvāde prasajyeta | puruṣasya tu svātantryatsarvakālasaṃvāde prāpte niṣedhamyārthavatā | yadi ca smṛtirevamarthā vidyate tato mūlamūlibhāva evābhyupagantavyaḥ | na hi kenacinni ttyānuvādatvamuktam || 18 ||
itaśca puruṣamātradharmaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: prāyovacananirṇeyaṃ saṃdigdhaṃ vastu varṇita(a. 2 pā. 3 a. 6) ityatreti śeṣaḥm |

div.p: ‘nāsyā annamadyāt’ iti ‘abhyañjana vai striyā annam’ iti vākyaśeṣādupagamanapratiṣedhaḥ | tathā hi | lāṭānāmapyabhyañjanaparyāyāntaravācyalakṣaṇamupaganaṃ prasiddham | tacca na kadācicchabdādarthādvā kratvartha prasaktam | puruṣārthaṃ tu sarvaprāṇiprasiddham | yadarthā ca prāptistadarthaḥ pratiṣedhaṃ ityuktama | brahmacaryavidhānācca na ṛtukāle puruṣārthasyāpi satastatprasaktiryena svakāle niṣidhyate | tasmādullaṅaghya tāvatprakaraṇameva tāvatpuruṣadharmo bhavati | tataśca tatsāmānyāditareṣu tathātvamiti saṃvādatādarthyasiddhiḥ || 19 ||

idānīmaprakaraṇādhītāni śrutiliṅgavākyāni prakaraṇasamavāyaṃ gacchanti neti vicāryate | ‘tasmātsuvarṇa hiraṇyaṃ bhārthaṃ durvaṇo 'bhyaṃ bhrātṛvyo bhavati’ ityevamādiṣu saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ karmasu hiraṇyadhāraṇamanūdya suvarṇatā vidhīyate | vāsaḥparidhāne ca śobhanatvamuta viśiṣṭavidhānarūpeṇa nityaḥ puruṣadharmo vidhīyata iti | tatrānekārthāvidhibhayātkarmasthāhiraṇyavāsonuvādena suvarṇaśobhanatvavidhiprāptāvucyate puruṣadharma iti | kutaḥ |

lg.l: karṇaṇā saha saṃbandhe pramāṇaṃ tu na vidyate ||

div.p: prakaraṇāmnānasya hyetadeva prayojanaṃ kathaṃ nāma tadaṅgatvaṃ vijñāyeteti | yadyaprakaraṇādhītasyāpi karmāṅgataiva syāttataḥ prakaraṇāmnānamanarthakaṃ bhavet | yatastu vedenaiva prakaraṇāprakaraṇāmnānavivekaḥ kṛtastato 'vagamyate nūnaṃ prakāṇādhītānāṃ puruṣadharmatvamiti || 20 ||

yadyapi tāvadviśiṣṭavidhānaṃ tathā 'pi karmaśeṣa eva syāt | anyathā hi phalaṃ kalpyeta | nanu kratusaṃbandho 'pi kalpayitavya eva | satyaṃ pramāṇavatī hi tatkalpanā | karmaṇaśca sāmānyena prayojanākāṅkṣāyāṃ karmaivopatiṣṭhate | tena tatsaṃbandhaḥ pramāṇavān, na svargasaṃbandhaḥ | evaṃ ca manyate | yathā yāgadānahomānmuktvā nānyatpradhānakarmatvaṃ pratipadyate | na ceha yāgāditvamasti saṃpradānādyabhāvāt | ata autpattikenāṅgatvena karmaśeṣatvam | athavā dhāraṇametacchruyate | taccotpattyaiva dhāryamāṇaśeṣabhūtam | na ca laukikasya niṣprayojanatvātsaṃskārārhatvam | ataḥ karmāṅgabhūtayorvāsohiraṇyayorvidhiḥ | athavā tata evānekārthavidhidoṣātsati ca saṃbhave balādguṇe vidhiśaktisaṃcāraṇāddhiraṇyadhāraṇaṃ ‘hi raṇyaṃ hastena bhavati’ atha gṛhṇāti’ ‘hiraṇyaṃ haste saṃpradāya ṣoḍaśinā stuvate’ ityevamādivākyavihitamanūdya suvarṇatā vidhīyate | ‘vāsaḥ paridhatte’ iti caitadvihite vāsasi śobhanatvam | evaṃ ca sūtrakārāṇāṃ ‘hiraṇyamiti jātarūpaṃ pratīyāt’ ityādiparibhāṣaṇasyaitadeva mūlam | anyathā rajatajātarūpasādhāraṇe sati hiraṇyaśabde 'nyatarāvadhā raṇamūlamanyatkalpyaṃ syāt | ‘adravyatvāt’ iti ca nātra dravyaṃ vidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi | tadviśeṣamātravidhānametat | ataśca yatra dravyaṃ tatrānena gantavyamiti |
ayāgānāmapi prādhānyadarśanānna kiṃciddevatāgrahaṇeneti || 21 ||

karmāṅgatve cāsyāḥ kriyāyā ādhvaryavasamākhyā viniyoktrī bhaviṣyati | puruṣadharmatve bādhyeta | yadā 'pi hiraṇyānuvādena suvarṇatā vidhīyate tadā 'pi tadvidhivaśavartitvādakriyātmakatvācca naiva samākhyā vyāpriyata iti vaidikatvasāmānyaṃ vedasaṃyogasyārthaḥ |
tena yo nāma vadellokato 'pyastyeva vāsohiraṇyadhāraṇaprāptiratastadanuvādenāpi śakyaṃ guṇavidhānamiti so 'pi vyāvartito bhavati || 22 ||

pūrvaṃ dhāraṇasya svābhāvikameva saṃskāratvamityupanyastam | idānīṃ tatraivopacayaheturucyate karmatvanirdeśāditi | tatra hiraṇyamityamantatvadarśanād dvitīyārthasaṃyogāditi ca bhāṣyadvrīhīnitivat dvitīyeyamiti bhrāntirbhaviṣyati kṛtyapratyayena tvabhihitatvānnātra karmaṇi dvitīyotpannā prathamaiveyam | dvitīyārthastu bhāryamiti ṇyatpratyayenokta iti dravyaparatvābhidhānam | ata eva bhāṣyakāreṇāpi dvitīyārthasaṃyogādityuktam | anyathā dvitīyāsaṃyogādityevāvakṣyam | tasmātsaṃskāratvātkarmaśeṣatvaṃ dhāraṇasya || 23 ||

karmasaṃbandhastāvanna kenacitkriyate | sarvo hyanārabhyavādo vākyasaṃyogenāṅgaṃ vidhatte, liṅgena vā kenacidavyabhicāriṇā | tadiha vākyasaṃyogastāvannāstyeva hiraṇyadhāraṇamapi vyabhicārādaliṅgam | tadeva kartavyātāvacanena viśeṣyate | yadi kartavyatāvacanaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ tataśca tadvyāpāropakṣayādavidhāyakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | tena dravyasvarūpasaṃbandhamātrameva pramāṇavat | tatra cā ' 'narthakyamiti na saṃskāratā | na cehāpūrvasādhanatākāritaḥ saṃbandho 'vakalpate | prakaraṇalabhyatvādapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāyāḥ | tasmādbhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇanyāyenaiva hiraṇyasādhanakaṃ vāsaḥsādhanakaṃ ca dhāraṇaṃ paridhānaṃ ca kartavyam | kiṃ prayojanamityarthākṣiptenāpi tāvatkartrā saṃbandha iti puruṣopakārakalpanā | suvāsaseti bahuvrīheranyapadārthapradhānatvādvimpaṣṭameva puruṣaprādhānyam | nanvevaṃ sati phalaṃ kalpyam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sāmānyataḥ puruṣārthatve 'vadhārite tasya sukalpyatvāt | svargādyutpatteśca kriyātmakatvādanyatra vedamūlatvādubhayamapi sādhāraṇaṃ paryupasthāpakamiti karmopasthāpananivṛttiḥ | api ca svavākyagatameva
bhrātṛvyadurvarṇatākaraṇaṃ rūpadhāraṇaṃ phalamubhayatrāpi śrūyate | satyapi cārthavādasarūpatve pārārthyānavadhāraṇādevaṃjātīyakeṣu phalavidhitvaṃ vakṣyati (a. 4 pā. 3 a. 8 sū. 18)‘phalamātreyo nirdeśāt’ iti | tatra hi kḷptasaṃbandhasyaiva kāmatvamātraṃ parikalpya kriyāyāstādarthyamadhyavasātavyam | anyatra kratusaṃbandhātprabhṛti sarvaṃ kalpanīyam | tasmātsarvakāmādipadasaṃyogavadihāpi phalena saṃbandhādviśiṣṭavidhānācca karmopadiśyate | tathā ca smṛtiḥ—‘na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ syāt | dhārayedvaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ śubhe raukme ca kuṇḍa
na jīrṇabalavadvāsā bhavecca vibhave sati || iti srātakavrakaprakaraṇāśrātasya ślokasyottarārdho jñeyaḥ |la’ ityādi sūpapatsyate || 24 ||

iha vākyāvadhāritakarmaśeṣatvānāṃ tadviśeṣasaṃbandhaścintyate | pūrvapakṣavādī tatra paśyannapyāhavanīyasaṃyogaṃ homānāṃ prādhānyāttadvaśenā ' 'havanīyapravṛtteḥ kṛṣisevādīnāmapi ṛddhisādhanakarmatvāviśeṣācchakyate yena karmaṇā ṛddhimicchedityevamupalakṣaṇaṃ kartumiti manyamāna āha—sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣo jayādiriti | tena sevādinā 'pi ṛddhimicchannāhavanīye jayādīñjuhuyāt | na cā ' 'havanīyasyaite na prayojakāḥ | homamātroddeśenā ' 'havanīyavidhānāt | tenānāhitāgnermā nāma bhūvan | āhitāgninā tu varṇānurūpaṃ laukikamapi karmānutiṣṭhatā kartavyāḥ | evaṃ cānārabhyavādasvaraso na bhagno bhaviṣyati | na caivamādayaḥ
sākṣātkarmasaṃbandhinaḥ prakṛtyarthāḥ sthārayanti | kāmaṃ vā punaruktabhayādvikṛtiṃ varjayeyuḥ | kṛṣyādiṣu tu na kācitpunaruktatāśaṅketyavarjanameva yuktam || 25 ||
vyavatiṣṭherannete homā vaidikeṣveva na sarvatra bhaveyuḥ | kutaḥ |

karṣaṇaṃ hi bhūmau kriyate rājakule ca sevā | jayādayaśca homatvādavihitādhikaraṇāntarā ekāntenā ' 'havanīye kartavyāḥ | tatra vinā vacanenāṅgapradhānavaideśyamāpadyamānaṃ vaiguṇyaṃ janayait | asti caiṣāmanyo viṣayo yatrāviguṇā bhavanti | tasmiṃśca sati nārthāpattyā vaideśyamabhyanujñāsyate | na ca śāstreṇānabhyanujñātaṃ kṛtaṃ phalaṃ dadāti | ataḥ saguṇasaṃpādanāyaivānāhitāgnīnāmaviduṣāmamanuṣyāṇāṃ caite na bhavanta | tathā karmāntarāṇāmapi | nanu kṣetramevā ' 'havanīyaṃ nītvā hoṣyate | na | tathā 'pi vilekhanahomayordeśabhedāparihārāt | sāmīpyamātraṃ hi tatrānugṛhyeta na tu samānadeśatvam | na hyekaikasminvidāraṇa āhavanīyaṃ nikṣipya hotuṃ śakyate | na ca tāvatā 'pi samānadeśatvaṃ bhavati | homāstviti ca hetuvyapadeśaḥ | yato 'mī homāstasmādvyavatiṣṭheran || 26 ||

itaśca vaidikānāmeva jayādiḥ śeṣo yataḥ samākhyānugraho bhavati | darśapūrṇamāsādiṣvadhvaryurvidyate | tadaṅgabhūtāḥ santa ete tatkartṛkatāṃ pratipadyante | kṛṣyādīnāṃ tu ṛtvi
gabhāvādbhedena ca jayādīnāṃ varaṇādīnā
ādipadena dakṣiṇādānamadhupakaṃyo parigrahaḥ; nāto bahuvacanānupapattiḥ |manāmnānādapūrvatvā
apūrvatvāditi—jayādīnāṃ darvihomatvāddarvihomānā cā ' 'ṣṭamikanyāyena prakṛtirāhityākhyāpūrvatvānnātideśenāpi varaṇādīnāṃ prāptirastītyarthaḥ |ccodakena prāptirnāsti | yadi ca tadarthamevādhvaryurvriyate tataḥ kartṛbhedo 'pyāpadyate | na hi kṛṣimadhvaryuḥ karoti | tena
ādhvaryavamiti samākhyānādyo 'dhvaryuḥ sa jayādi kuryāt, iti jayādividhivākyasya śeṣo 'vagataḥ so 'pi niruktavyavasthāyāmanugṛhyeta | samākhyānādyo 'dhvaryurjayādīnāṃ śeṣo 'vagataḥ so 'pītyevaṃ dvedha sūtrārthaṃ darśayati—tenetyādinā | samākhyānādyo vākyaśeṣo 'dhvaryuṇā kartavyamadhvaryurvā yaḥ kartṛtvena śeṣabhūtaḥ sa evamanugṛhīto bhavatīti vyavasthāsiddhiḥ || 27 ||

vaidikalaukikapradhānasaṃbandhavicāraprasaṅgādyatra nimittānāṃ laukikavaidikatvāśaṅka tāni vicāryante | tatra yāvato 'śvānpratigṛhṇīyāditi yāvacchabdopabandhādaśvapratigrahāṇāṃ nimittatvam | tatra saṃdihyate kimaśvapratigrahamātrasyātha laukikasyaivātha vaidikasyaiveti | kaḥ punarlaukiko 'śvapratigrahaḥ ko vā vaidika iti—loke pratiṣedhādvede ca pratigrahītavyamityevamavidhānādubhayatrāpyaśvapratigraho nāstīti manyamānasya praśnaḥ | itaro vidhipratiṣedhanirapekṣasvarūpamātraṃ darśayati, akarmāṅgabhūtadānāśrayapuruṣārthatvābhimato laukikaḥ karmāṅgabhūtadānāśrayastu vaidika iti | kiṃ prāptam | aviśeṣābhidhānāduddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇāsaṃbhavāccāśvapratigrahamātraṃ nimittamiti | tathā prāpte laukikapakṣaparigrahaḥ | bhāṣyakāreṇa tvaviśeṣapakṣamanābhāṣya tuśabdārthavattvāya siddhāntopakramaḥ kṛtaḥ | vaidikatvasāmānyātphalakalpanābhayācca vaidika iti | naimittikaṃ hi vidhīyamānaṃ nimittamapi vaidikameva buddhau
saṃnidhāpayati | tenaiva nirākāṅkṣībhūtatvānna laukikena saṃbadhyate | phalaṃ ca tatra kalpanīyam | itaratra tu saṃbaddhasya kratorupakāraḥ sukhenaiva kalpiṣyata iti prāpte 'bhirdhāyate | lokike syāditi | kutaḥ |

lg.l: śrūyate doṣasaṃyuktaḥ sa ca doṣo 'sti laukike |

div.p:
varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti pāpena grahaṇaṃ yasminnaśvapratigrahe sa nimittaṃ pratīyate | tadapi ca pāpagrahaṇaṃ prāptamanūdyate | yadi hi vidhīyate tataḥ kadācidetadvākyasāmarthyādeva vaidike 'pi syāt | na tu vidhīyate, sarvaphalānāmavidheyatvāt | na ca tatra karmavidhānaṃ, vidheyasya karmaṇaḥ vāpaphalatvāsaṃbhavāt | na cehāśvapratigrahaḥ pratiṣidhyate, tadaśravaṇāt | nimittasaṃbandhamātropayogācca | tasmādatyanta
atvantasaṃbandhāditi—doṣapratiṣedhayoravinābhāvākhyasaṃbandhadityarthaḥ |saṃbandhādyatra pratiṣedhastatra doṣaḥ | sa ca laukikasya pratiṣedho ‘na kesariṇo dadāti nobhayatodataḥ pratigṛhṇāti’ iti | nanvayamapi pratiṣedhaḥ sāmānyenaiva śrūyate | satyaṃ tenaiva tu laukikasyeti brūmaḥ | itarasya viśeṣavidhisaṃspṛṣṭasya pratiṣedhaviṣayatvāsaṃbhavāt | ataśca doṣasamabhivyāhṛtatvādiṣṭirapi laukikaviṣayā syāt | nanu ca nimittabhāvāduddiśyamāno 'śvapratigraho na doṣeṇa viśe
na viśeṣṭu śakyata iti—viśiṣṭāvyutpannanibandhanavākyabhedāpatteriti śeṣaḥ |ṣṭuṃ śakyata iti vidhīyamāneṣṭestutimātrapare doṣasaṃkīrtana vaidiko 'pi nimittaṃ bhavet | ucyate |

lg.l:
doṣa
doṣanirghātaḥ kāryaṃ yasyā iṣṭeriti caturbāhyārtho jñeyaḥ |nirghātakārtheṣṭisāmarthyāllaukikāṅgatā ||

div.p:
nahyevaṃ kriyate doṣāvānyo 'śvapratigra
tannimitta, iyamiṣṭiriti śeṣapūraṇam |haḥ | kiṃ tarhi | nimittavelāyāṃ tāvatsāmānyamātrameva gṛhyate | yadā tviṣṭibhāvanāyāḥ prayojanākāṅkṣā bhavati tadā 'nyasya svargādeḥ karmopakārakasya vā saṃnidhyapekṣayorabhāvādasya ca doṣasya samānavākyopāttatvena pratyāsattesvarūpeṇa karmānapekṣitatvena phalatvaprattipattyasaṃbhavātpuruṣaupayikaṃ vidhisaṃbandhārhaṃ nirghātama
pekṣamāṇasyāpanīyamānatayā karmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ | ekena ca nairākāṅkṣye saṃbhavati na prayojanāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam | ataśca yatra doṣanirghātātmakaṃ phalaṃ tatreyamiṣṭiḥ | yatra ca doṣastatra nirghāto 'pi pratiṣedhānusārī | sa ca pratiṣedho laukikasyetyantareṇāpi viśeṣaṇamarthavaśāttasyaiva nimittatvam | etaddarśayati—varuṇapramocanaṃ tvidaṃ karma tallaukike bhavitumarhati | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa doṣaṃ pradarśayatoktaṃ sa ca laukike 'śvapratigrahe śūdrādanyasmādvā pāpakarmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇe bhavatīti | punaśca vaidike 'pyetatsamānamiti manyamānena nanu vaidike 'pyapratigrāhyātpratigṛhṇataḥ pāpagrahaṇamastīti codayitvā parihāra uktaḥ | bhavedetadevaṃ yadi pratigrahīturiṣṭiḥ syātsā khalu dāturiti | sa laukike 'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ | tathā hi |

lg.l: laukike 'pi tu yo dātā śūdrādirna sa doṣavān |

div.p: yadi vaidike dāturiṣṭiriti kṛtvā satyapyapratigrāhyāyājyayājananimitte pratigrahītṝṇāṃ pāpe doṣarahitanimittamucyate | tato laukike 'pi śūdrādibhya upādāne duṣyatyapi pratigrahītari dātustaddvāreṇāduṣṭatvāddoṣarahitameva nimittam | ayeha pratigrahītṛvyāpāro nimittaṃ sa ca duṣṭa iti gṛhyate tattulyaṃ vaidike 'pi | atha vaidike dāturlaikike pratigrahīturiṣṭiriti kalpyate tatrāpyupapattiviśeṣo vaktavyaḥ | kiṃ ca |

na hyapratigrāhyānpratigṛhṇannevaṃ viśeṣṭuṃ śakyate | yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti | sarvadravyapratigrahāṇāṃ dātṛdoṣeṇa duṣṭatvāt | tenaiṣa granthaḥ pūrvaṃ pratigrahītṛvyāpāropanyāsātpaścācca dātṛvyāpārāśrayaṇādasaṃbaddhaḥ | tatra kecidāhuḥ | anapekṣyottarādhikaraṇasiddhāntaṃ pratigrahītureveṣṭirityatra vicāritam | loke 'śvanāṃ pratigraha eva tāvat ‘nobhayatodataḥ pratigṛhṇāti’ iti pratiṣiddhaḥ | kimuta śūdrādimya upādānam | yajñe tvasāvṛtvijāṃ punaḥ prasūtaḥ | tatraitatsyāt | dānamātraṃ yajñe vihitaṃ na pratigraha iti | tadayuktam | dānavidhānenaiva prāk parasvatvāpādanadaparyavasyatā tasyā ' 'kṣiptatvāt | api ci | sarvatra
samāptividhānaṃ siddhāntaḥ | tena dadyāditi sāmarthyagṛhītaḥ svatvaparityāgaṃ parasvatvāpādanameva vidhatta iti pratigrahavidhānam | api ca |

lg.l:
mantra
‘ka idaṃ kasmā adāt’ ityādiko mantraḥ | ‘agnīdhe agre dadāti’ ityādividhivihitakramaviśeṣaprāṅmukhatvādirniyamaśca jñeyaḥ |vānniyamairyuktaḥ karmamadhye 'ṅgasaṃgataḥ |

div.p: yadi pratigraho na vidhīyeta kathaṃ tasyetikartavyatā vidhīyeta | kimiti vā tasminnakṛte karmavaiguṇyaṃ syāt | atra vadāmaḥ |

na hi dadyādityasya pratigṛhṇīyādityayamartho bhavati | bhavedapi sāmarthyāt, yadi tadākṣepamantareṇa dānavidhirnopapadyeta | sa tu lobhaprāptapratigrahabalenopapadyamāno na śaknotyākṣeptum | na hi vidhiśatenāpi tathā puruṣaḥ pravartate yathā lobhena | yadyapi ca samāptiścodyate tathā 'pi dātṛvyāpāra evāsau parasvatvāpādanaṃ nāma | dvau hi tatrāpi vyāpārāvekaḥ pratigrahītuḥ svīkaraṇamaparo dātuḥ tatsamarthācaraṇaṃ samarpaṇādirūpam | tanmātrameva vidhāsyate nāparam | tena yathā somakraye vidhīyamāne 'rthāllobhena prāpto vikrayo na vidhīyate na ca karmāṅgaṃ bhavatyevamiha pratigraho na vidhāsyate nāpyaṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati | yadapītikartavyatāvidhānaṃ tadarthaprāptānuvādenaiva bhaviṣyati | yadā vṛttyarthaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratigṛhṇīyāttaditthamitthaṃ ceti | nanvevaṃ sati pratigrahasya puruṣārthatvānmantrādīnāmapi puruṣārthatvameva prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | prakaraṇasāmarthyādevamitikartavyatākapratigrahāvasānaṃ dānaṃ kratorupakarotītyadhyavasānāt | tena pratigrahasaṃbandhe 'pi dānasyaivetikartavyatā | tacca vidhilakṣaṇamiti netavyam | tatra codiṃte 'pi pratigrahe gavādīnāṃ pratiṣedhā 'pi nāstīti na kaściddoṣaḥ | aśvapratigrahasya tu pratiṣiddhatvādyo nāma pratiṣedhamatikramya grahīṣyati taṃ parīkrīya yajamāna ārtvijyaṃ kārayiṣyati | yathā ‘brahmahā 'śvamedhena yajeta’ iti | yo lobhātpatitayājanamaṅgīkṛtya yājayiṣyati tadapekṣaṃ vidhānam | na tu tadvidhānānyathānupapattyā yājanamitareṣāmapi vihitamiti kalpyate | tathehāśvapratigrahasyāvidhānamiti draṣṭavyam | ataśca yathaiva loke doṣastathā vede 'pīti na taddvāreṇa viśeṣaviṣayatvaṃ gamyate | kecitpunarāhuḥ | laukikapakṣe pratigrahīturiṣṭirvaidikatve tu karmāṅgatvāddātuḥ | pratigrahaścobhayatrāpi doṣavānavihitatvātpratiṣiddhatvācca | dānaṃ puna
rvaidikaṃ vihitamato yathābhāṣyameva parihāraḥ | athavobhayatrāpi dāturiṣṭiḥ | tatra dānaṃ laukikaṃ pratiṣiddham | tathā ca dakṣiṇādhikaraṇe vakṣya(a. 10 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 37) ityatra bhāṣyakāra ityarthaḥti | aśvā upakārakatarā bhaveyuryadi teṣāṃ dānapratigrahau na pratiṣiddhau syātāmiti | viśvajityapi sarvasvadāne pratiṣiddhatvādaśvādīnāmadānamiti vakṣya(a. 6 pā. 7 a. sū. 4) | ityatra bhāṣyakāra iti śeṣaḥti | pauṇḍarīke 'śvasahasramiti tu pratyakṣopadeśājjyotiṣṭome caikasyāśvasyāvaśyaṃ vidheyatvātsāmānyaprāptaniṣedhabādhānna doṣo vijñāyate | tasmādya eva loke bhrāntyā bhitra
mitradāyādineti | mitrasya dāyena—dānena ādiḥ—ādānaṃ svīkārastena prayojanenetyarthaḥ |dāyādinā vā dadāti tasyaiveṣṭiḥ, yo vā vikrīṇīte | vikraye 'pi hi svatvaparityāgaparasvatvāpādānasadbhāvātsakalo dadātyartho vidyate | na hyadṛṣṭārthameva kevalaṃ dānaṃ vijñāyate | dānatve dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalakalpanāvasarāt | yadyapi ca tasya vikrayaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ tathā 'pi sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñayoḥ samāveśādavirodhaḥ | tathā ca loke vikrīya vaktāro bhavanti, asmābhirdhānyaṃ dattamiti | krītvā vadantyasmābhirdhānyaṃ gṛhītamiti | tasmātso 'pi dadātiriti nimittam | nanu ca vāso 'śvā bhūmiriti deyadravyamadhyāmnānānnāśvadānaṃ duṣyet | yatra tadvihitaṃ tatranaiṣa dokṣyati | deyadravyāṇi hyetāni smaryante na tu dānameva vidhīyate | tatra dānavidhāyivākyāpekṣatvādyatrāśvo vihitastadgatamevedaṃ deyasmaraṇam | yāni tu gavādīni sāmānyato 'pi na pratiṣiddhāni tāni dānamātracodanāyāmapi bhaviṣyanti | tasmānna laukike 'śvapratigraho nimittam || 28 ||
yadyeṣā doṣanirghātārthā bhavettato laukike kalpyeta na tu tadarthā | kutaḥ |

karmavidhānavākye yo doṣaḥ śrūyate sa nirghātyatvenāvadhāryate | yaścātra doṣa upātto nāsau laukikasya satyapi pratiṣiddhatve kutaścitpramāṇādgamyate | jalodaraṃ hyatra varuṇagra
haṇarūpeṇopāttam | naca kasyācidvaidyakasaṃhitāyāṃ laukiko 'śvapratigraho nidānaṃ śrūyate | nāpi pratyakṣānumānādibhirgamyate | na ca vākye ‘na kesariṇo dadāti’ ‘nobhayatodataḥ pratigṛhṇāti’ iti śrūyate | nāpyetasya vākyasya tatpratipattau vyāpāro, vidyamānānuvādena tatra nirghātārthakarmavidhimātraparatvāt | yastu doṣaḥ pratiṣedhavākyānnarakapātātmakaḥ kalpitaḥ sa iha nopātto varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇātītyanenābhidhātumaśakyatvāt | atha pāpamātraṃ vṛṇotīti varuṇastadguhṇātīcyevamabhidhīyate tato yā tāvadbaruṇagṛhītaśabdasya jalodaraviṣayā samudāyaprasiddhiḥ sā parityaktā | yā tvavayaprasiddhiḥ sā vaidike
vaidike 'pīti—nimitta iti śeṣaḥ | vaidike nimitte 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe 'pi dānanimittatvapakṣe dravyatyāgādaduḥkhadarśanaṃ, pratigrahānimittatvapakṣe ca rakṣaṇādinā duḥkhadarśanamityabayavārthaḥ | 'pi, tyāge duḥkhadarśanāt | pratigrahe ca rakṣaṇapoṣaṇādinā kleśātkiṃcidvaruṇātmakaṃ vidyata ityevaṃ saṃbhavatīti na śakyaṃ taddvāreṇeṣṭerlaukikaviṣayatvamavadhārayitum | rakṣaṇapoṣaṇādinā kleśeneti—pratigrahītṛvyāpārasya nimittatvenānivāritatvādevaṃ bravīti | athavā dāturapi prāk parasvatvāpādanādeva kleśo 'stīti gamayitavyam |

tasmādubhayathā 'pi laukikāśvapratigrahaṇagato 'yaṃ doṣo na prasidhyatīti mukhyopapātābhāvādarthavādo 'yaṃ vijñāyate | tatra purastādupākhyānopāttaṃ prajāpatirvaruṇāyāśvamanavat’ ityarthamidānītane 'pi kāle rūpakadharmeṇādhyāropva praśaṃsati | yathaiva prajāpatirvaruṇena gṛhīta āsīttathā 'dyatve 'pyaśvapratigrahaścejjātaḥ sa eva varuṇagrahaṇadoṣo bhavati | yathā ca prajāpatervāruṇīṣṭistata unmocanyāsīttathā 'dyatve 'pyasāvunmocanī vijñāyate |
tasmādraruṇagrahavyādhigṛhīteneva tena tadvimocanāyāvaśyaṃ kartavyeṣṭirityetāvānartho viva kṣitaḥ | tataśca vākyopāttaphalābhāvādadhyāhāreṇa vā svargaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ karmāṅgabhāvo vā | tatra svargasaṃnidhikārāṇābhāvādvaidikakriyātvasāmānyenāśvapratigraheṇa ca saṃnidhāpanātkratusaṃbandhaḥ sukalpaḥ | vaidiko hyaśvapratigrahaḥ karmāntaḥ pātīti nimittatvena pratīyamānastaddeśavartikathaṃbhāvāpannamaṅginamupanayannubhayoḥ sākāṅkṣatvādaṅgāṅgisaṃbandhaṃ kalpayati | tasmādyajñe pratīyeteti siddham || 29 ||

tatraivedānīmidaṃ vicāryate kiṃ pratigrahīturiṣṭiruta dāturiti | kathaṃ punaryo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti vispaṣṭe pratigrahītṛsaṃbandhe sati saṃdehaḥ | upakrame dātṛprasiddheḥ | ‘prajāpatirvaruṇāyāśvamanayat’ iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ | yadi tarhi vākyaśeṣāddātuḥ pratīyate ‘(a. 1 pā. 4 a. 13 sū. 24)saṃdigdheṣu vākyaśeṣāt’ ityanenaiva gatārthatvādadhikaraṇaṃ nā ' 'rabdhavyam | ucyate |

lg.l: vidhyuddeśena nirṇīte kiṃ tu śeṣaḥ kariṣyati ||

div.p:
yatra vidhyuddeśaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ, tatra vākyaśeṣānnirṇayo na virudhyate | yatra tvasaṃdigdhastatra tadbalīyastvādvākyaśeṣabādhenaiva bhavitavyam | ata iha yadyapi ‘prajāpatirvaruṇāyaśvamanayat’ iti prajāpatirdātā saṃkīrtito varuṇaḥ pratigrahītā | punaśca ‘sa svāṃ devatām’ iti prajāpatireva samānavibhaktyantaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenopāttaḥ | svā ca tasya devatā varuṇaḥ, pūrvaṃ saṃpradānatvenopāttatvāt | nā ' 'tmā, kartṛtvasaṃpradānatvayorvirodhinorekatra kalpane 'nyatarasya gauṇatvāpatteḥ | nāpi prajāpatervaruṇo dātā, vibhaktivyatyayaprasaṅgat | tena prajāpatiraśvaṃ dattvā varuṇaṃ prāpta ityarthaḥ | sa tathābhūtaḥ paridīrṇaḥ | udara
masya śvaya
śvayathunāḥ—jalavṛddhyetyarthaḥ |thunā vidīrṇam | ‘sa etaṃ vāruṇaṃ catuṣkapālamapaśyattaṃ niravapat’ iti prajāpatereva tacchabdena parāmarśāt | tanniravapaditi ca kartṛtvanirdeśaḥ,tasyaivāvakalpate na varuṇasya | saṃpradānatvena sthitatvāt | na varuṇasyā ' 'tmoddeśena yāgaḥ saṃbhavati | na hyātmane saṃkalpyamānaṃ tyaktaṃ syāt | tena prajāpatinā 'śvaṃ dattvā varuṇāya, varuṇagṛhītena vāruṇeṣṭayā tadunmocanamātmanaḥ kṛtam | ato 'nyo 'pi dattvaivaṃ kuryāditi dāturiti vijñāyate | kiṃ ca |

lg.l: pradhānasya ca yaḥ kartā svāmī dātā sa vājinām ||

div.p:
tathā 'pi vidhyuddeśārthavādayorvipratipannārthatvāt, saṃdehābhāvena ‘saṃdigdheṣu(a. 1 pā. 4 a. 13 sū. 24) vākyaśe ṣāt’ ityanenāgacchadanyatarabādhena vyavadhāraṇakalpanayā 'nyatakaviṣayaṃ vākyamupakramopasaṃhārā
upakramopasaṃhāracintayā—upakramopasaṃhārabalābalacintayetyarthaḥ |cintayā kathamapi kleśena gamayitavyamityārambhe sati kiṃ tāvatprāptam | arthavādasya vidhyuddeśādhīnapravṛttestaccheṣatvācca vinā ' 'narthakyaprasaṅgāt | vidhyuddeśasya ca tena vinā 'pi svārthasiddheḥ | yacca vidhīyate tasya stutiryasya stutirna tasya vidhānaṃ, vidhinaiva stutyapekṣāyāḥ kṛtatvāt | tasmāt ‘aṅgaguṇa(a. 12 pā. 2 sū. 27)virodhe ca tādarthyāt’ ityanenaiva nyāyenārthavādasyāsamañjasattvaṃ nyāyyam | nityaṃ cārthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntarāvagatārthaviṣayatvamato 'pi tadgatameva lakṣaṇāśrayaṇaṃ yuktaṃ na vidhigataṃ, vidhīnāmanyenātyantāprāptaviṣayatvena śrutānyathātvakalpanasyāpramāṇakatvāt | yathā ca ‘ūrgudumbaraḥ’ ‘ādityo yūpaḥ’ ityādayo 'rthavādā nīyante tathā 'yaṃ na yāsyatīti ko hetuḥ | tasmādvispaṣṭā 'pi purastādarthavāde dātṛvyāpārastutiḥ ‘āpo vai śāntāḥ’ itivatsaṃbandhidvāreṇa pratigrahītṛviṣayā 'vadhārayitavyā | tena dānapratigrahakarmaṇorbhedātpratigrahasaṃbandhitvena śrutametatkarma dāturacoditamiti manyāmahe | tuśabdasya sthāne caśabdaḥ, kiṃ ceha bhavata itivadgamayitavyaḥ | yajamānaṃ vā 'myāḥ kartṛtvenācāditaṃ vijānīmaḥ | tatkarma ceṣṭernimittattvenācoditamiti sūtrārthaḥ || 30 ||

sā khalviṣṭirārtvije syāt | yajamāne syādityarthaḥ | sa hyṛrtvijāmayamityevamārtvijo 'bhidhīyate | athavā ‘svāmisa(a. 3 pā. 7 a. 18 sū. 38)ptadaśāḥ karmasāmānyāt, iti yajamānasyāpi brahmā divaddatviktvaṃ vakṣyati | tena śakyaṃ yājamānamapi pradānamārtvijamityabhidhātum | athavā svāmikarmārtvijayoḥ katarasminsyāditi saṃdigdhe yatra liṅgaṃ sāmarthyātmakamavakalpate tatreti sūtrārthaḥ | kathaṃ punaryajamānavyāpāro nimittamiti liṅgena gamyate | taducyate |

pūrvādhikaraṇenaivaitatpratipāditaprāyaṃ yadatra dāturiṣṭiriti | yadā hyaśvapratigrahavataḥ karmaṇo 'ṅgamevetyavadhāritaṃ tadā 'ṅgapradhānānāmekadeśakālakartṛkanyāyādya eva kratoḥ kartā tenaiveyamapi kartavyā | yaśca kratoḥ kartā sa ‘svāmika(a. 3 pā. 8 a. 1 sū. 1)rmaparikrayaḥ’ ityevamaśvarasya dātā | tasmādisaṃdigdhameva dāturiṣṭayā bhavitavyam | etaddhyaṅgasya sāmarthyaṃ yatpradhānenaikakartṛkaṃ
sadupakāraṃ śaknoti kartuṃ na bhinnakartṛkam | tena pradhānavadevetaraistasyāmapyārtvijyaṃ kartavyaṃ na yājamānamiti | evaṃ siddhe 'pi, vākyopakramopasaṃhāraviradhakṛtabhrāntisaṃśayavyudāsamātrārthamuttaramadhikaraṇamārabdhavyam | tasyāpi ca vākyasaṃbandhopakramopasaṃhārasyedṛśameva sāmarthyaṃ yaddāturvidhatte | na hyetāvadeva vākyaṃ ‘yāvato 'śvānpratigṛhṇīyāttāvataścatuṣkrapālanvāruṇānnirvapet’ iti | kiṃ tarhi | anyo 'pyupakramaḥ ‘prajāpatirvaruṇāyāśvamanayat’ ityādirasya vidyate | sa ca dāturiṣṭiṃ pratipādayatītyuktam | nanvetadapyuktaṃ vidhyuddeśabalīyastvādbādhyate 'sāviti | naitadasti | kutaḥ |
yadi labdhātmako 'tra pratigrahītṛviṣayo vidhyuddeśo bhavettato vicāra eva na kriyeta na tvasau labdhātmakaḥ | kutaḥ |

satyapi pradhānaguṇabhāve vidhyarthavādānāṃ pūrvāparoccāraṇakṛto 'nyo viśeṣo bhavati | sarvatraiva tāvat ‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat’ iti ca śrutiliṅgādhikara(a. 3 pā. 3 a. 7)ṇanyāyena ca pūrvaṃ vijñānamanupajātapratidvandvi dvitīyavijñānāntarānutpattyavasthatvādāñjasyenā ' 'tmānaṃ labhate | paścāttanaṃ tu pūrvavijñānāvaruddhajñānaviṣaya upajāyamānaṃ satyāṃ virodhāvasthāyāṃ tadānuguṇyātiriktena rūpeṇotpattumeva na śaknotīti, anyathātvamapi pratipadyate | tadiha
vidhyarthavādatvakṛtaṃ viśeṣaṃ pūrvapaścādbhāvitayā 'nāśrityopakrasopasaṃhārayordātṛpratigrahītṛviṣayatvena vipratipadyamānārthatvāttathā sati caikavākyatvāsaṃbhavātpṛthaktve cobhayorapi parasparasaṃnidhivaśenākalpitavidhyantaraprarocanāntaraśaktyoḥ sākāṅkṣatvenāparipūrṇāthoyorānarthakyaprasaṅgādavaśyaṃbhāvyekavākyatvavaśena samānaviṣayatve kalpyamāne 'nupajātavirodhāvasthapūrvāvadhāritadātṛgāmitvaparityāgāsaṃbhavāduttaramalabdhāvasthameva pratigrahītṛjñānaṃ gauṇagṛhṇātikalpanayā dātṛviṣayatvenādhyavasīyate | kiṃ ca |

prajāpatirvaruṇādaścaṃ pratyagṛhṇātsvāṃ devatāmapādānabhūtāṃ varuṇameveti bahvabhamañjasaṃ syāt | mama tu gṛhṇātireva kathaṃcitprayojakabyāpāre vartayitavyaḥ | yattu vidhirarthavādādbalavattaraṃ iti | satyam | yo vidhiḥ sa balīyān bhavati | na tu pratigrahīturiṣṭiriti vidhiḥ | sarvatra hi vākye yatpūrvapadairanavagatamapekṣitaṃ ca taduttarapadebhyaḥ parigṛhyate, netaratpratīyamānamapi | tadyathā ‘satrādudavasāya’ iti ktvāpratyayenaivottarasyāṃ kriyāyāmudavasānavadanyonyanirapekṣā bahavaḥ kartāro 'vadhāritāḥ | uddiśyamānatvāccāvivakṣitasāhityā iti ‘pṛṣṭhaśamanīyena yajeran’ ityatra satyapyupādīyamānatve saṃhatabahukartṛpratyayaḥ pūrveṇānapekṣitatvādavivakṣito bhaviṣyati | evamiha yāvadeva ‘prajāpatirvaruṇāyāśvamanayat’ ityarthavādena dāturvaruṇānirmocane hetutveneṣṭiḥ praśasyamānā 'vagatā tāvadeva tasya kimapi vaktavyamitīyameveṣṭirvidhāsyata ityavadhāryate | tataśca pūrvāvadhāritavidhiviṣayaḥ puruṣo vidhyanumānābhimukhastanmātramevocyamānaṃ prārthayate nādhikam | tulyā ca viṣayāvabodhane vidhyarthavādayoḥ śaktiḥ | yattvarthavādasya vidhiśaktirnāsti tāvanmātraṃ vidhāyakādgṛhyata eva, na tu tāvatā sarvameva tadgataṃ vivakṣyate 'napekṣitatvāt | ato nimittārthaṃ liṅuccāraṇaṃ dhātumantareṇa na saṃbhavatīti yatra kvacana dhātau prayoktavye dātṛvyāpārārthagṛhīto gṛhṇātiḥ prayukta iti draṣṭavyam | anyathā hi yasmātpurākalpe dāturevaṃ vṛttaṃ tasmādadyatve 'pi pratigrahītṛbhirevaṃ kartavyamityasaṃbaddhameva vākyaṃ syāt | tasmādvidhyuddeśenaivetthaṃ pravṛttena dātā ' 'śrita ityavirodhaḥ | tadetat ‘śruterjā(a. 3 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 1)tādhikāraḥ syāt’ ityatra prapañcitam | nanu ca tenaiva gatatvādiha nā ' 'rabdhavyametat | satyaṃ, gataprāyametat | bhāṣyā
bhāṣyāntarajanitabhrāntyeti—bhāṣyāntarakāraiḥ sautrārtvijaśabdasyartvikkartṛkapratigraddavācitvamaṅgīkṛtya pratīgrahīturiṣṭisiddhāntakaraṇāttannimittabhrāntinyudasanāya punarārambha ityarthaḥ |ntarajatibhrāntyapanayārthaṃ tu punarārambhaḥ |
itarathā
yadyapyatra sūtrakārāṇāṃ bhāṣyāntarajanitabhrāntyapanodanārthamārabho nocitaḥ | paraṃtu bhāṣyakṛta eva sūtravyākhyārthamārambho yukta ityevaṃ matvā prakārāntareṇa paunaruktyaparihāraṃ vaktumārabhate— itarathetyādinā | hi śakyamidaṃ sūtradvayaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇe 'pi vyākhyātum | yo nāmā ' 'lambhanirvāpavallokavedayokaśvapratigrahāviśeṣādanekānte sati na niyogataḥ karmāṅgatvaṃ gamyata iti manyamāno vadet, yājñe 'pyacoditametatkarmabhede sati nirṇayakāraṇābhāvāditi, tasyottaraṃ ‘sā liṅgādārtvije syāt’ iti | yadṛtvigbhyo 'śvadānaṃ tatra syāt, vaidikatvayajñiyatvaliṅgaviśeṣāt, nimittatvopayuktasyāpi liṅa eva liṅgatvāt | vaidiko
vaidika iti—pratigraha iti śeṣaḥ | hi liṅsaṃbaddho
liṅsaṃbaddha iti—liṅā vighātṛvidheyabhāvākhyasaṃbandhena saṃbaddha ityarthaḥ | dṛṣṭo na laukikaḥ | athavaitadeva codyaṃ vinā sūtreṇa kṛtatvātsūtradvayamapyekīkṛtya parihāro varṇanīyaḥ | yasmādacoditaṃ laukikaṃ na tatra nimittatvena buddhiriti pūrvavadeva yojyam | tatraitatsyādekamidaṃ karma yathā vaidikaṃ sannimittaṃ bhavatīti tathā laukikamapi saṃbhavatītyata āha | naitat | kutaḥ | karmabhedāt | asti hi coditācoditatvakṛto deśādibhedakṛtakarmavyaktikṛto 'pi karmabhedo yena nimittavyavasthā bhaviṣyati | pratiṣiddhatvācca laukikasyābhāva eva vedasiddhāntena | ato yasyāsaṃdigdhaḥ sadbhāvastasthaiva nimitatvam | na cāvaśyamasya nimittārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ saṃbandhamātraparyavasānāt | ataścāśvadānasyaiveyamitikartavyateti prayojanavattvena vaidikaṃ gamiṣyati | tasmānnācoditena saṃbandha ityevaṃ saṃbhavatyapi vyākhyāne 'rthavaśenādhikaraṇāntarakaraṇam | gṛhṇātiśabdaśca prayojakakriyāyāmadṛṣṭapūrvo dṛ̣dhāṃ bhrāntiṃ kurvallaṁkṣaṇāvṛttyā netavyaḥ | prayojakavyāpāre prayojyavadupacārāt | athavā hetukartaryapi kartṛtvamasti | tatra yadā hetutvaṃ vivakṣyate tadā hetumadvyāpāre vivakṣite 'pi ṇijutpadyate | kartṛtvamātravivakṣāyāṃ vinaiva ṇicā yo 'śvapratigrahaṃ yathākathaṃcinnirvartayati sa pratigṛhṇātīti śakyate vaktum | yathā ṣaṅbhirhalaiḥ kṛṣatīti vilekhanavacanaḥ sankṛṣiḥ ṣaṅḍhalopādānasāmarthyādvilekhitṛviṣayāsaṃbhavāttatprayojakavyāpāre vartate | na hi halaṣaṭkenaikaḥ kartā vilekhituṃ śaknoti | tena ṣaṇṇāmeva vilekhitṝṇāṃ yaḥ saṃvidhānena prayojakaḥ sa tadvyāpāreṇa kṛṣerapi kartā bhavatītyevamabhidhīyate | tadvadarthavādavaśena vartamāno gṛhṇātiḥ, tatprayojakavyāpāre vartiṣyate | vicitraśaktayo hi dhātavaḥ prayojyaprayojakobhayavyāpāravacanatvena bhāvā(a. 2 pā. 1 a. 1)rthādhi
karaṇe darśitāḥ | teṣāṃ sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānātkadācitkācitprasiddhivyatirekeṇāpi śaktirabhivyajyate | tasmāddadātyarthe pratigṛhṇātiśabdaḥ prayukta iti dāturiṣṭiḥ | evaṃ sthite keciccodayanti | yathā kila bhaitrāyaṇīyānāṃ ‘sa eṣo 'śvaḥ pratigṛhyate’ ityekarūpopakramopasaṃhāravidhinā vispaṣṭameva pratigrahīturiṣṭiriti gamyate | tatra ca vadanti nyāyena tāvadvayaṃ balīyāṃso yadi tu vacanāntareṇa jīyāmahe kiṃ kriyatāmiti | sa tu niṣkāraṇastrāma iti paśyāmaḥ | katham |

yathodāhṛtena tāvattaittirīyaśākhāvākyena dāturiṣṭiḥ siddhā | sā na nyāyāntareṇāpanīyate na vacanāntareṇa | yadyapi pratiṣedhavacanaṃ syāttathā 'pi vihitapratiṣiddhatvādvikalpo bhavenna svīkṛtanyāyavyudāsaḥ | yattu pratigrahīturvidhāyakaṃ tadyadi tāvatkarmāṅgavaśena vinā 'pyupakramaviśeṣātpūrvavākyārthānusārtheva bhavati tatastenāpi dātureva | atha tu svātantryātpratigṛhṇātivaśātpratigrahītustataḥ pūrvavākyāccā dāturityubhau kariṣyatastatpratigrahītṛgatā ca karmāṅgatvābhāvātpuruṣārthā satī laukike 'pi syāt | yastu ‘ārtvije syāt’ ityetatsūtraparaḥ sanpūrvavākyenāpi pratigrahītureva vadati tena tatkartṛkāyāḥ karmāṅgatvāmavādṛtvijāmitareṣāṃ ca puruṣārthaphalakalpanātulyatvena laukike 'pi prāptau satyā kena pramaṇena ‘tasmādyajñe pratīyata’ ityetadabhidhīyata iti vaktavyam | tasmādanena tāvaddāturiti siddham || 31 ||

ayamapyanārabhyavāda eva | somendraṃ caruṃ nirvapedyaḥ somaṃ vamati iti | tatrāpi pūrvavadevādhikaraṇadvayamapi vicāryate | laukikasomapāne rasāyanādyarthaṃ kṛte vamanena vyāpanne somendrayāga uta vaidike, utobhayatrāpi | tatra tadvadityanena sāmānyapakṣo ‘doṣāttvi
ṣṭirlaukike syāt’ ityayaṃ cātidiśyate | athavā 'dhikaraṇadvayamapi siddhāntarūpeṇādhikaraṇadvaye 'pyatidiśyate, kenacidviśeṣeṇa pūrvapakṣaracanā | tatreha tāvadvaidikena pānena dravyapratipādanasya kṛtatvānna kadācid bhreṣe punaḥ pratisamādhānāpekṣā 'stītyanarthakamiṣṭivighānam | laukike tu vamanena vyāpanne rasāyanaguṇābhāvādindriyeṇa vīryeṇa ca vyṛddhiḥ saṃbhāvyate | na jalodaravadatyantāsaṃbhāvanā | tatsaṃyoge ca śrūyamāṇeṣṭistatsamādhyarthaiva vijñāyate | tasmāttatra syāditi || 32 ||

taireva
tairevoti—pūrbādhikaraṇāsiddhāntasādhakahetubhirevetyarthaḥ | vaidikatvasāmānyādibhirvaidike bhavatīti kasmānnocyate | na hi vamane vaidikatvaṃ saṃbhavati | acoditatvāt | ato ya eva doṣo laukikagāmitve hetuḥ sa eveha vaidikaviṣayatve syāt | tathā hi |

na ca tāvallaukikapānavyāpadi doṣo 'sti | vamanārthameva pānāt | athāpi bhavati tathā 'pi vaidyakenaiva tasya pratisamādhānamiti na vaidikopāyāpekṣā | vaidike tu pāne samya
gjaraṇa
hinva me gātrā ityādi mā me vāṅnābhimatigā iti samyagjaraṇaprakāśakamantrapāṭhādityarthaḥ |pāṭhājjaraṇā
samyagjaraṇarūpānteti pāṭho vyākhyānasaṃbhata iti bhāti |ntā pratipattiravaṃdhāritā | sā ca vamanena vyāpadyate | tataśca pradhānaphalavaiguṇyāśaṅkāyāṃ tatsamādhānārtheṣṭirvijñāyate | atha tvayaṃ phalārthavādastataḥ sutarāṃ phalakalpanābhayāllaukikānnivṛttirgamyate | vaidike tu vamanena pānaṃ pratyāyitam | tena kratusthasyeṣṭiraṅgamiti sukaraḥ saṃbandhaḥ || 33 ||

aśvapratigraheṣṭivadeva karmāṅgatvātsvāmikartṛkatve siddhe 'pi tasya kipātmīyaṃ vamanaṃ nimittamutā ' 'rtvijamapīti vicāryate | kiṃ prāptam | viśeṣānupādānādubhayatrāpi syāt | yathā ca svāmivamanena pratipattivināśastathā ' 'rtvijenāpi ubhayordravyasaṃskārātmakatvāt | tasmādyadi doṣanirghātārthametatkarmāthāpyapūrvopakārārthamubhayathā vamanadvaye 'pi kartavyam || 34 ||
yadyapi tāvadārādupakārakatvaṃ tathā 'pi svāmivamane bhavitavyam | kutaḥ |

‘yaḥ somaṃ vamati sa nirvapet’ iti yacchabdatacchabdayogādyāgavamanayorekaḥ kartā gamyate | tatra naimittikaṃ tāvatsvāmikartṛkatvenāsaṃdigdham | tenāsaṃdigdhena saṃdigdhaṃ vamanaṃ nirṇīyate | tadapi svāmikartṛkameva sannimittamiti | na ca svatantrameva nimittaṃ,
śuddhenā ' 'khyātena nimittapratyayānutpādāt | yacchabdopabaddhaṃ tannimittaṃ pratipādayati | tena cetsaṃbaddhaṃ pūrvataraṃ samānakartṛkatvaṃ paścānnimittatvapratītiḥ | athartvijo devatārthamṛtvikparikrayārtha ca dravyaṃ tyajanti | tatasteṣāṃ svātmani parikrayavirodhādavaśyaṃ tairapyanye 'dhvaryvādayo varītavyāḥ | ādhānagatena tvātmanepadenāgnīnāmādhātṛvyatiriktapuruṣasaṃbandhābhāvātsvātmārtheṣvagniṣu yaṣṭavyam | tataśca yadi tāvadvāntasomakarmopakārabuddhyā kurvanti tato deśakālakartṛbhedādviguṇaṃ na tena pradhānena gṛhyate | na cā ' 'hatya deśādibheda āmnāyate | yena tatsadbhāve 'pyavaiguṇyamāśrīyeta | svāmivamanena ca kṛtārthatvānnānenaiva śāstreṇa deśāntarādīnāmanujñānam | kathaṃ vaikameva śāstraṃ svāmivamanapakṣe samānadeśāditvamāśrayedṛtvigvamane ca tadbhedam | atha tvātmārthabuddhyaiva te prayuñjīran | evamapi kratvarthenāvadhāritasya punaḥ puruṣārthatvābhāvāttādarthyena kriyāmāṇasyā ' 'narthakyameva syāt | atha tvetatsiddhyarthaṃ puruṣārthataiva śāstreṇā ' 'śrīyate tathā sati upasthitakratutyāgādasaṃnihitasvargādikalpanācca viprakarṣaḥ | sadṛśaṃ laukikavamane 'pyetaditi na yājñe syāt | tacca pūrvameva nirākṛtam | tasmātsvāmivamane syāt | atha tvadhvaryvādivamane 'pi svāmyeva dravyaṃ tyajettathā sati tadeva bhinnakartṛkatvamāpadyate | tatsamarthane vā 'śrutaṣaṣṭhyarthakalpanā sāmānādhikaraṇyabādhaśca | tathā kalpanāyāṃ ca svāmivamanasyānimittatvaprasaṅgaḥ | ubhayāśrayaṇe vā vairūpyanimitto vākyabhedaḥ syāt | yaḥ somaṃ vamati yasya somamṛtvigvamatīti cā ' 'śrayaṇādanyataraparigrahe tu svāmivamanagrahaṇaṃ yuktam, śabdasāmañjasyāt | evaṃ tāvadārādupakārakatve yadā tu vākyaśeṣopanītayāgaśeṣadravyapratipattiniyamabhreṣopajanitaphalalābhāyogyatvaṃ tena pratisamādhīyata iti kalpyate, tadā yajamānaphalotpatteratyantādṛṣṭatvātta
tadāśaṅketi—phalalābhāyogyatvāśaṅketyarthaḥ |dāśaṅketi tenaiva pratisamādhāneṣṭiḥ kartavyatyasaṃdigdham | yattu dakṣiṇālābhātmakamṛtvijāṃ phalaṃ tatsati cāsati vamane labhyamānaṃ dṛśyata iti nirāśaṅkatvādanapekṣitapratisamādhānaṃ neṣṭiṃ gṛhṇāti | yadā 'pi prakṛtakarmakartṛniyamāṃśena bhakṣayitṛsaṃskārārthaṃ bhakṣaṇam, ataśca tadbhreṣe karturvaiguṇyamupajātaṃ, dravyasaṃskārasya tadupayogātmakasya nivṛttatvāditi kalpyate tadā 'pi tadbhreṣakṛtayājamānaphalavighnaprasaṅgāttannivṛtyarthatvādyattacchabdanirdeśācca yajamānavamana eva bhavitavyam | etenāpūrvasaṃskārārthatvamapi vyākhyātam | yadā 'pi hi somavamanānna vihitākaraṇaṃ nāpi pratiṣiddhasevanamāpadyata iti kṛtvā doṣanirghātārthatva
miṣṭeranāśritya naimittikaṃ karmāṅgaṃ tadā 'pi ca yacchabdena puruṣasyopāttatvājjañjabhya( a. 3 pā. 4 a. 5 ) atratyanyāyenetyarthaḥmānanyāyena prakaraṇagatapuruṣasaṃskāratā 'dhyavasīyate, tadā 'pi ‘yājamā( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 2 sū. 4 )nāstu’ ityanenaiva tatkartṛkatā | vamanasamānaviṣayatvācca yajamānavamanameva nimittam | yattvadhvaryvādivamane 'pi dravyapratipattibhreṣaḥ, kartṛsaṃskārādvināśo vā samādhimapekṣata iti | yadyapyapekṣate tathā 'pyavidhānānna grahīṣyate | sarveṣu ca kratvarthapuruṣārthapakṣeṣu cartvigvamane 'vidhānamityuktam | ataśca yadi tadvamanamaduṣṭameva tatastūṣṇīmevā ' 'sitavyam | atha duṣṭaṃ tataḥ sāmānyavihitaṃ kiṃcitkartavyam | na cātra kratvarthādyanyatamapakṣāvadhāraṇaprayojanamastīti nātīvāvadhāraṇe yatitavyam | athāpi tattvajñānaṃ prayojanaṃ tato jañjabhyamānapakṣaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ | tathā ca sūtrakāraḥ svāmino vā tadarthatvādityāha || 35 ||
vyṛdhyata iti sa vaktavyo yasya somapānādṛddhiḥ prārthyate | tadvaiguṇyācca vyṛddhirāśaṅkyate svāminaśca tadubhayamapīti tasyaiveṣṭiḥ || 36 ||

aṣṭākapālādiśabdaiḥ samastaṃ dravyaṃ devatārthamavagamitamāhavanīyaprakṣepeṇa ca haviṣo devatārthatā bhavati | ‘yadāhavanīye juhvati’ iti vidheḥ ‘agnimukhā vai devāḥ’ iti cārthavādāt | evaṃ ca sati tataścetkiṃcidapyapanīyeta tadā 'nyacchrutamanyatkriyeta | tasmātsarvaprakṣepaḥ | kiṃ punarayaṃ pūrvapakṣavādī śeṣakāryāṇāṃ sviṣṭakṛdiḍāprāśitraśaṃyuvākakālabhakṣaca
turdhākaraṇānāṃ vidhiṃ na paśyati | satyaṃ na paśyatīti kecit | na tvetadyuktamiva | na hyevaṃ kvacitpūrvapakṣo na bhavet | ataḥ paśyannevānenābhiprāyeṇa mantrayata iti vaktavyam |

lg.l: bhaveyuḥ śeṣabhājo hi niḥśeṣe tu prayojakāḥ ||

div.p: yadi hi dvyavadānamātre hute puroḍāśādayaḥ saśeṣāḥ kriyante tadā ‘uttarārdhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyati’ ityevamādicodanāvaśena ‘e( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 13 sū. 28 )kadeśadravyaṃ cotpattau vidyamānasaṃyogāt’ ityevaṃ sviṣṭakṛdādīnāmaprayojakatvaṃ bhavati | yadā tu khalu sarvapradānamavagabhyate tadā vidyamānasaṃyogāsaṃbhavāccoditaikadeśānuṣṭhānānupapattyā śakyamekadeśyutpādanamadhyavasātumiti sviṣṭakṛdādyarthaṃ puroḍāśāntarāṇyutpādyeran | śeṣaśabdaḥ ‘śeṣātsvikṛṣṭate samavadyati’ ityādiṣu kathamiti cet | ucyate |

yathaiva ‘ājyena śeṣaṃ saṃsthāpayati’ iti pūrvakarmaṇaḥ paryavasānādadhike pūrvasadṛśe vā śeṣaśabdaḥ prayujyate | yathā ca ‘tataḥ śeṣeṇa viśiṣṭadeśajātyādimanto janma pratipadyante’ iti svargaphalakarmaṇo niḥśeṣopayogādanyaphalasya cānyatra vyāpārāsaṃbhavāttato 'nyeneti vaktavye tataḥ śeṣeṇeti gautamācāryeṇoktam | evamihāpi yatpradhānahavirbhyo 'nyaddhavistenaivānyatvenā ' 'dhikyena vā bhaviṣyati | athavā guṇatvena vā śeṣādityevamabhidhāsyate | śeṣaśabdo hyupayuktetaradvidyamānaṃ bravīti | na ca pradhānahaviṣāṃ kiṃcidvidyate | anyeṣāṃ ca sarvametadrūpamasti | tasmāddravyāntarāṇi gṛhyeran | yathā vakṣyati ( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 13 sū. 29 ) |‘nirdeśāttarayānyadarthāditi cet’ iti | athāpyatyantaṃ śeṣaśabdānurodhaṃ kṛtvā teṣāmeva kiṃciccheṣyate | tathā 'pyastyevānyadvicārasya prayojanaṃ nāvaśyaṃ pakṣoktenaiva prayojanena bhavitavyam | idamapi saṃbhavati | yadā pradhānavākyādaśeṣapradānaprasaktau satyāṃ śeṣakāryavaśena śeṣāḥ sthāpyante, tadā yathaiva pradhānaṃ tasya haviṣaḥ prayojakamevaṃ sviṣṭakṛdādīnyapīti | tadarthāvadānanāśadoṣāpahāreṣvapi pradhānavadeva havirantaraḥ mutpādyeta | yadā punaḥ pradhānacodanākṣiptasyaiva śeṣasya sviṣṭakṛdādīni grāhakāṇi bhavanti
tadā teṣāṃ paraprayuktadravyopajīvanādayaprayojakatve sati nāśadoṣāpahāreṣvapyakriyā siddhā bhavati | tasmātsatyapyubhayoḥ pakṣayorasarvapradāne 'sti prayojanamityarthavānvicāraḥ || 37 ||

yadyāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityevamādyeva bhavettataḥ sarvapradānamevāvadhāryete | atra punastasmātpuroḍāśāderniṣkṛṣya kiṃcideva hotavyaṃ śrayate ‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ ‘madhyātpūrvārdhācca dviravadyati’ ‘aṅguṣṭhaparvamātramavadānaṃ bhavati’ ‘dvyavadānaṃ juhvati’ ityevamādivākyālocanena hi kiṃcideva hotavyamavagatamataḥ śeṣayitavyaṃ kiṃcit || 38 ||

yadyetāni vākyānyutpattivākyāvagatamaśeṣahomamabādhamānāni na niviśeran, yadi caitāni pradhānasya pratyāsannatarāṇi bhaveyustato bādheran | etāni tu saṃskāravākyāni avirodhenaivopapadyante | śakyate hyaṅguṣṭhaparvamātrairmadhyapūrvārdhoddhṛtairdiśaḥ pravṛttairavadānaiḥ saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya niḥśeṣaṃ haviḥ pradātum | ataḥ sarvavākyavaśenaivaṃ śāstrārtho bhavati | yadaśeṣaṃ havirjuhoti tadevamupāyamiti | tena na kasyacidbhomaḥ pratiṣidhyate | tasmātsarvapradānaṃ kartavyam | yattu yathāśrutetikartavyatāko yugapanna śakyate kartumadvyavadānahomaprasaṅgāditi | jyotiṣṭomavadabhyasitavyo homaḥ | tadarthatvāt | devatārthatvādyāgārthatvādapūrvārthatvādvā kṛsnasyāṣṭākapālasya | naikadeśamātrahomenotpattivākyārthasaṃbhāvanā bhavet | athavā 'vadānasaṃskārasya dravyārthatvāt || 39 ||
naitadasti | punaḥpunardviravakhaṇḍanaṃ tadvāṃśca homo 'bhyasitavya iti | kutaḥ |

‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ ityetasya saṃskāratvādyāvatsaṃskāryaṃ dhriyate tāvadāvṛttirbhavatviti śakyate vaktum | homasya phalabattvāt ‘yaistu dra( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 7 )vyaṃ na cikīrṣyate tāni pradhānabhūtāni’ ‘dra( a. 6 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 1 )vyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ’ iti ca prādhānyāvagamādekena dvyavadānena nivṛttasya na dravyamastīti na punarāvṛttiryuktā | tasmiṃścānāvartamāne 'rthābhāvādavadyatirapi nā ' 'vartate | kārye hi pravartamānaṃ dravyaṃ saṃskāraṃ gṛhṇāti nodāsīnam | na ca dvyavadānavyatiriktasya haviṣaḥ kāryamastīti na saṃskāramapekṣate | tasmātso 'pi nā ' 'vartate | yadi hi dravyārtho homo bhavettatastadvaśena svayamāvartetākhaṇḍanaṃ cā ' 'vartayet | atadarthasya nā ' 'vṛttiḥ | na caiṣa vākyārtho yajjuhotīti hyūmānasya dvirakhaṇḍanamupāyo vidhīyata iti | na hi juhotiśabdena dravyamupādīyate | na caiṣa karmaṇi lakāro yato hūyamānānuvādatvaṃ pratipadyate | kriyāyāmeva tvidaṃ dvyavadānaṃ vidhīyate | yo 'pi yajjuhotīti yacchabdāddravyapratyayo bhavati so 'pi yacchabdasyāvaidikatvātkriyāviśeṣaṇabhūtasyānuvādatvapradarśanārthaṃ vyākhyātṛbhiruccāritasya paramārthānālocanādbhaviṣyatītyupekṣaṇīyaḥ | yattu jyotiṣṭomavadutpattivākyāvagatasya samastadravyaprāptyarthabhāvartiṣyata iti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

āgneyacodanāyā hyānumāniko homasaṃbandhaḥ sarvapuroḍāśāvayavasāmānyapravṛttaśca sa
yāvanneva nirvartate tāvadastyeva ‘dvyavadānaṃ juhoti’ ityanena niṣkṛṣya saṃbandha kalpitaḥ | tasmiṃśca siddhe nā ' 'numāniko 'vakalpate | tena yatsāmānyapravṛttamāgneyatvaṃ taddvyavadānacodanayā sāptadaśyamiva prākaraṇikairdvyavadānaviṣayamevopasaṃhriyate | tatraiṣo 'rtho vijñāyate dvyavadānamāgneyaṃ karoti | ato 'vayavāntarāṇāmacoditatvānna homaprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃ ca |

taddhitena hi tādarthyamātramuktaṃ na pradānam | dvedhā 'pi ca tādarthyaṃ bhavati pradānena pradānārthadravyasādhanatvena vā | tathā hi | ‘vrīhibhiryajeta’ iti vacanānna tāvadvrīhayaḥ sākṣātpradīyante 'tha ca pradeyaprakṛtitvādevamupadiśyate | tasmādyadyapi puroḍāśaḥ samastaḥ sākṣānna pradīyate tathā 'pi dvyavadānaprakṛtitvādāgneyo bhaviṣyati | tena dvyavadānenaiva tāvaddīyamānena tasyā ' 'gneyatvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati | dvāveva ca tau vyākhyāprakārau | eko devatāsaṃbandhasya dvyavadāne saṃkrāntiriti | aparaḥ punaridameva puroḍāśasyā ' 'gneyatvaṃ dvyavadānaṃ tato gṛhyata iti | tasmānna sarvahomaḥ || 40 ||

evaṃ ca śeṣaśabdo mukhya evopayuktetaravidyamānavacano bhaviṣyati | uttarārdhādiśabdaśca nāvayavividhikalpanārthāpattikleśamāśrayiṣyati | atrābhidhīyate | yattāvadukaṃ sāptadaśyavadāgneyatvaṃ dvyavadānamātra upasaṃhṛtamiti | tanna ghaṭate | katham |

lg.l:
sāmā
sāmānyavidherudāharaṇaṃ puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā karotīti |nyavidhiraspaṣṭaḥ saṃhrayeta viśeṣataḥ |

div.p:
sāpta
aspaṣṭasya tu bidherudāharaṇaṃ darśayati—sāptadaśyaṃ hītyādinā ||daśyaṃ hi sāmidhenīnāmuktamanārabhyavādena na kratūnām | tasya tu kratusaṃbandhastaddvāreṇā ' 'numānikāḥ kalpyaḥ | na ca pratyakṣasaṃbandhe satyānumānikaḥ kalpyata iti yukta upaptaṃhāraḥ | na tvaṣṭākapālasyāsphuṭo devatāsaṃbandhaḥ | taddhitaśrutyā 'bhihitatvāt | sa hi dvyavadānasyaivā ' 'numānikaḥ syāt | utpattivākye ca karmaṇo 'ṣṭākapālena saṃbandhaḥ śrūyate | dvyavadānena punarutpannavākye | tatraitatsyāt | karmasaṃbandho 'ṣṭākapālasyā ' 'numāniko dvyavadānasya pratyakṣastadbhāve vā ' 'numānikakalpanaṃ na saṃbhavatīti | naitadyuktam | evaṃ sati ‘dvyavadānaṃ juhoti’ ityetadevotpattivākyamabhyupagataṃ bhavet | yadi hyaṣṭākapālavākyaṃ juhotivākyenopasaṃhṛtaṃ tato 'nenaiva karmotpattiḥ kriyeta | tataścā ' 'gneyavākye ‘codite hi ta( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 6 )darthatvāttasya tasyopadiśyeta’ ityevaṃ vākyabhedaḥ prāpnoti | na cānanumāya yāgamāgneyādivākyānāṃ vākyāntarāpekṣā tatsaṃbandho vā 'vakalpata ityuktam | ato yadyapyānumānikaḥ saṃbandhastathā 'pi svārthaparyavasāyitvānyathānupapatteḥ prathamataramanumita iti siddhe saṃbandhe na śakyaṃ pratyakṣaśatenāpyanyathātvaṃ kartum | na ceha sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ saṃbhavati | avayavāvayavinoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavyavahārābhāvāt | aṣṭākapālacodanayā hi pratyakṣameva samastaḥ puroḍāśa upadiśyate | dvyavadānacodanayā 'pi, tatastulyabalatvam | nanu dvyavadānavyatiriktāvayavaprāptiḥ sāmānyena puroḍāśaśabdena kriyamāṇā durbalā syāt | ucyate |

ākṛtiśāstrāṇyākṛtāvasaṃbhavanti vyaktilakṣaṇārthāni bhavanti | tāni vyaktiṣu parokṣatvāddurbalāni jāyante | na tvavayavivyaktiḥ karma sādhayituṃ na śaknoti | yatastacchabdasyāvayavalakṣaṇārthatā kalpyeta | atha vinaiva kāraṇena lakṣaṇāśrayaṇam | tato 'vayavaśāstrasyāpyavayavāntaralakṣaṇārthatvāddaurbalyaṃ syāt | tasmādyathaiva dvyavadānaṃ svāvayavanirapekṣamātmanaiva kevalena vidhīyate tathaivāṣṭākapālasya dvyavadānamavayavāntarāṇi cānapekṣya pratyakṣavidhānātprāptistatprāptau ca yadā 'vayavāntarāṇyanuṣajyante ko vārayati | na tu tāni svamahimnā saṃbadhyante tatparā vā codanā | na cātyantamavayavāvayavinorvyātireka iti yadā ' 'locyate tadā 'vayavāntarāṇyapi pratyakṣāṇyeva bhavanti | tenāṣṭākapālaco
danā dvyavadānacodanāvaśenaivaṃ karma prāpnoti dvyadānaṃ dattvā punaḥ śeṣapradānam | athavā vikalpaḥ kadācitsakalasya pradānaṃ kadāciddvyavadānamātrasya | athavā 'ṣṭākapālasyotpattiḥvākyaśiṣṭatvādābhikṣāvadbalīyastve sati dvyavadānaṃ tena saha bādhavikalpasamuccayānna pratipadyata iti ‘guṇaścā( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 23 )pūrvasaṃyoga’ ityevaṃ karmāntaraṃ kalpayet | yataḥ kutaścicca dravyāntarādupādīyeta, aṣṭākapālasaṃbandhābhāvāt | pūrvakarmasaṃbandhe 'pi ca punardravyāntarādevotpannasyāṣṭākapālena saha vikalpasamuccayāvupanyasitavyau | athavā kṛtsnapuroḍāśagrahaṇe 'vadhārite dvyavadānacodanāyāśca guṇaparatvātkarmāntaravidhyaśakteraṣṭākapālaviṣayatvāvagamātsaṃskārasya yāvatsaṃskāryamāvṛtteḥ pradhānasya ca yathāśrutaguṇasaṃpādanāya jyotiṃṣṭomavadāvṛtteriṣṭatvāt ‘upā( a. 3 pā. 4 a. 14 sū. 39 )yo vā tadarthatvāt’ ityayameva pakṣaḥ prāpnoti niravadānapramāṇābhāvāt | niraṃvadānāśrayaṇe cātyantaduṣṭā parisaṃkhyā syāt | na hyatra niyama upapadyate, sarvapuroḍāśāvayavānāṃ nityavatprāpteḥ | yadi hi katamo 'vayavaḥ prakṣipyatāmityevaṃ niyamāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ madhyapūrvārdhadvyavadānaṃ vidhīyate tataḥ syānniyamārthatvam | nityaprāpte tvavayavini dvyavadānapunaḥśruteravayavāntaranivṛttiparatvādasvārthagrahaṇamityā
ādipadena svārthaparityāgaprāptabādhayoḥ saṃgrahaḥ |didoṣatrayamaparihāryaṃ syāt | tatra hi tatparihartuṃ śakyate yatra parisaṃkhyāyamānaprāptiśāstramakḷptamutprekṣābhimukhaṃ vartate | na cātrāṣṭākapālaśāstramakḷptam | na ca kḷpte sati doṣaparihāraḥ saṃbhavati | tasmānna niravadānam | yadi ca niravadānaśāstrādāgneyatvaṃ yāgārthadvyavadānaviṣayamupasaṃhriyeta tataḥ śeṣāvayavānāmadevatārthatvānna svatvamapetaṃ syāt | tataśca ‘bha( a. 3 pā. 4 a. 17 sū. 50 )kṣārtho vā dravye samatvāt’ ityādiṣu yadṛtvigbhiḥ sāmyādasvāmitvaṃ yajamānasya tatra tatrocyate tatsarvaṃ virudhyate | tatraitatsyāt | devatoddeśasaṃbandho dvyavadānasyaiva tyāgaḥ punaḥsamastasya haviṣaḥ | tyāgakṛtā ca svatvanivṛttirna devatāsaṃbandhakṛtā | tasmādaviruddhaṃ tadabhidhānamiti | tadasat | kutaḥ |

devatāyai hi dātuṃ dravyaṃ tyajanti na vibhavena | tatra yaddevatārthādanyadadhikaṃ tadgṛhāvasthitadravyāntaravadaparityaktam | na cātra tyāgasya bhedena vidhānamasti | devatāsaṃbandhakaraṇavidhinaiva hyasāvarthāpattyā ' 'kṣipyate | sā cārthāpattiryāvatā vinā devatāyai dānaṃ na saṃbhavati tāvatyevāvasthitā nānyatra | na hi śeṣadravyaparityāgādvinā 'nupapattiḥ | sarvatra ca samāptividhānamiṣyate tenāpi yāvata eva yāgasamāptyaṅgatvaṃ tāvata evā ' 'kṣiptasya yāgavidhirnāvayavāntarāṇām | ato yathā caturmuṣṭayatiriktānāmanāsi sthitānāṃ
brīhiyavānāṃ na nirvāpavelāyāmatyāgādasvatvamevamihāpi nāvayavāntarāṇāṃ tatsyāditi | athocyeta nirvāpavelāyāmanupajātamadhyapūrvārdhādivibhāgaṃ dravyamanabhipretatyāgamapi balātparityaktavyam | na hi tadānīṃ vijñāyate kebhyo vrīhibhyo dvyavadanaṃ niṣpatsyate kebhyo neti, agamyamāne viśeṣe yāneva na tyajettebhya eva kadācidavadīyeta | tatra tyaktānāmadānādatyaktānāṃ ca dānādayathāśrutakaraṇaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmātsarvatyāga iti | naitadevam |

lg.l: na hi sāmānyaśāstreṇa vyavahāre kṛte sati |

div.p: yadā hi sāmānyaśāstraṃ pravṛttavyavahāraṃ bhavati tadā na śakyaṃ kenāpi vyāvartayitum | tadyadi samastāṣṭākapālanirvṛttyarthā vrīhayo devatoddeśena niruptāste sarve dātavyatvena prakrāntāsteṣāṃ ya eva na dīyeran, tatraiva prakrāntāparisamāpanadoṣo bhavet | tataśca sarvapradānameva prāpnoti | yadi tu dvyavadānaśāstreṇa viśeṣṭumiṣyate tata ādita evaivamavadhārayitavyam, aṣṭākapālanirvṛttyartheṣu caturmuṣṭiṣu ye dvyavadānanirvṛttyarthāstānagnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti | yadyapi ca viśeṣo na gamyate tathā 'pyeteṣāṃ madhye ye 'tra dvyavadānaṃ sādhayanti tāvanto na mameti śakyaṃ saṃkalpayitum | tadyathā loke kaścidbahudravyasamudāye 'vasthite kaṃcidabhidhatta itastvaṃ yāvattṛpti gṛhāṇeti | tatra na tadavayavaviśeṣo gamyate 'tha ca na sarvatyāgo 'dhyavasīyate tathehāpi draṣṭavyam | yattu tāvanmātrameva na nirupyate tatra ‘caturo muṣṭīnnirvapati’ ‘aśvaśaphamātraḥ puroḍāśo bhavati’ ityādivacanasāmarthyādīdṛkparimāṇādgṛhītaṃ dvyavadānaṃ devatārthātāṃ pratipadyata ityavagamyate | yattadanyattattadanugrahārthaṃ nādhikatyāgārthamiti draṣṭavyam | ato yathaiva ‘anaso 'dhinirvapati’ ityukte nirvāpaparicchedārthamupātteṣvapi śakaṭasthiteṣu vrīhiṣu na svatvamapauti tathaiva dvyavadānāpādānabhūte puroḍāśe 'pīti svatve sati śakyāḥ parikrayādayastena kartumiti samatvavacanavirodhaḥ | etena dvyavadānaprakṛtitvādevāṣṭākapāla āgneyaḥ kṛto bhavatītyeṣo 'pi pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ | tatrāpi śeṣaparityāgānupapatteḥ | na ca vrīhivatpuroḍāśasya prakṛtitvaṃ yuktam | vrīhayo hyanadanīyā vākyāntaraśiṣṭāśca prakaraṇādutpattivākyaśiṣṭaprakṛtidravyāpekṣapuroḍāśāvaruddhayāgānuvādena vidhīyamānā na śaknuvanti prakṛtitvapratipattimantareṇa yāgasādhanatvaṃ pratipattum | aṣṭākapālastvadanīya utpattivākyaśiṣṭaśca śaknoti sākṣādyāgaṃ sādhayitum | na ca pūrvataraprāpte prakṛtyapekṣiṇi dvyavadāne codyate | tasmānna tatprakṛtitvena yāgaṃ sādhayati | kastarhi sarvapradānasya parihāraḥ | ucyate |

yadyāgneyādicodanayaiva haviḥprakṣepo 'bhidhīyate tato dvyavadānacodanayā parisaṃkhyātumaśakyatvātsarvaprakṣepaḥ prāpnoti | tadā ca tayā ' 'gneyacodanayaiva prakṣepaścodyena yadā yāgahomayorabhedaḥ | tayostu bhedaḥ śabdāntarādhikaraṇanyāyasiddhaḥ | ‘tadu
( a. 4 pā. 2 a. 10 sū. 28 )kte śravaṇājjuhotirāsecanādhikaḥ syāt’ iti sūtrakāreṇocyamānaṃ tatraiva samarthayiṣyāmahe | yathā devatoddeśena svatvatyāgamātraṃ yāgo devatoddiṣṭatyajyamānasvatvadravyaprakṣepo juhotiḥ | tatra ye doṣā darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādiṣvahomatvādāhavanīyo na bhavedityādayastānapi tatraiva parihariṣyāmaḥ | ubhayośca bhede sati ‘āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ’ ityanena tāvadvākyena yāvatā vinā 'ṣṭākapālasyā ' 'gneyatvaṃ na bhavati tāvadeva codyate | tasya ca svatvaparityāgadevatoddeśau kevalāvantareṇā ' 'gneyatvaṃ na jāyate na prakṣepamapi | tatra yadi vākyānta
vākyāntaramiti—avadānaprakṣepavidhāyakamiti śeṣaḥ |raṃ na syāttata īdṛśaṃ ka
karmeti—anuṣṭhānamityarthaḥ |rma bhavet | supakvamavikalamaṣṭākapālamā
ācaritaḥ śrutāviti kvacitpāṭhaḥ |cārataḥ śucau deśe nidhāya devatāmuddiśya nāyaṃ mameti saṃkalpaḥ kartavyaḥ | tatparipālanārthaṃ ca punaḥ kadācidapi na svatvaṃ dravye baghnīyāt | yadi hi baghnīyāttataḥ pūrvasaṃkalpaṃ vināśayedanṛtaṃ ca vadet | yo hi prathamameva jānāti punarapyahamatra svatvamādhāsyāmīti tasya na mamaitaddevatāyai tvetaditi saṃkalpa eva na bhavet | tena devatoddeśatyāgottarakālaṃ yadasya bhavati tadbhavatvityavadhārya na kaścidvyāpāro voḍhavyo bhavet | tathā prāpte tu vākyāntarāṇi bhavanti ‘upastṛṇāti’ ‘dvirhāviṣo 'vadyati’ ‘abhidhārayati’ ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’ ityevamādīni | taistāvadidamavadhāryate dvyavadānaṃ haviṣo hotavyamiti | sarvāṇi caitāni prakṛtadravyālambitvāttadupādāya pravartante nāpūrvadravyagrāhitvena | tathā hi | ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’ ityatra homasyāprāptatvānna tamuddiśya dravyaṃ vidhīyate | caturavattaṃ ca pūrvavā
pūrvavākyakalpitamiti—‘upastṛṇāti’ ‘dvirhaviṣo 'vadyati’ ityādivākyavihitamityarthaḥ |kyakalpitaṃ prayojanāpekṣamasti | tasmāttasyānena prakṣepamātraṃ śakyaṃ vidhātumiti na caturavattaviśiṣṭahomavidhānamavakalpate | homasyāpi ca tryaṃśasya samāptiparyantatvātsarvāntyeṃ 'śe prakṣepe codyamāne tyāgataddevatoddeśayoḥ kimapūrvayorarthāpattyā vidhiḥ kalpyatāmuta kutaścitprāptayorevā ' 'śraṃyaṇaṃ kriyatāmiti | tatrā ' 'gneyyadhika( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 8 )raṇanyāyena lāghave sati gauravasyāpramāṇakatvādavagatatyāgoddeśāṃśadvayānyaṣṭākapālādīnyena gṛhyante | na ca teṣāmautpattikaṃ yāgasādha
natvaṃ virudhyate | prakṣipyamāṇānā
nāmapi tadyāge, iti pāṭhāntaram |maṃgniyāgasādhanatvāvighātakatvāt | devatāntarasaṃbandhena hi yāgaviparītakriyāsaṃbandhena vā virodhaḥ syānna tvasāvasti | tenaiṣo 'rtho bhavati, aṣṭākapālena yatra kvacitpradeśe sthitena yajeta tadīyaṃ ca dvyavadānaṃ yatra kvacitprakṣipediti | tatra ‘vedyāṃ harvīṣyāsādayati’ ‘barhiṣi’ iti vacanāttatra sthitena puroḍāśenejyate | ‘yadāhavanīye juhoti’ iti vacanāttatra dvyavadānaṃ hūyate | sa tu homaḥ kiṃ pūrvasmādyāgādarthāntaramitikartavyatā bhavati, uta tasyaiva yāgasyāṃśāntaravivṛddhyā rūpāntaraṃ jātamiti cintanīyam | tatraiva rūpāntaropajananamiti brūmaḥ | karmāntaratve hi dravyāntaraṃ devatāntaraṃ ca nāriṣṭhahomādivatprāpnoti | yathoktena nyāyena sa eva yāgaḥ pracitataro juhotitvamāpadyate | na caitāvatautpattikayajirūpavighāta āśaṅkyo juhoteryajiviśeṣatvāt | sāmānye hi kaścidviśeṣo bhavatyapi | na tu niḥsāmānyaḥ kaścidviśeṣa upapadyate | tataśca yathā vṛkṣamānayetyukte śiṃśapāmityavirodhātpaścāducyamānaṃ na virudhyate tathā yajetetyukte juhotitvāvirodho 'vagantavyaḥ | so 'yaṃ yāga eva dvyākāraḥ samastena puroḍāśena kriyate | dvyavadānena juhotyavasthānītaḥ śeṣeṇa tu sāmānyarūpa ekasminnapi ca kṣaṇe dvyākāro 'pi niṣpadyate | yadaiva hi dvyavadānamāhavanīye nikṣipyate tadaiva yājyānuvākyābhyāṃ samastaviṣayadevatāsaṃkalpotthāpanaṃ kriyate | tena naivaṃ bhramitavyaṃ yasmājjuhūsthaṃ dvyavadānamāśrā
āśrāvaṇamiti—devatāyai dravyaṃ dātumābhimukhyena yajamānaṃ śrāvayetyarthakaḥ ‘āśrāvaya’ ityāgnīdhraṃ pratyadhvaryuṇocyamānaḥ praiṣa ityarthaḥ |vaṇa
pratyāśrāvaṇamiti—yadāśrāvayitavyatvenādhvaryuṇoktaṃ tadāśrāvitamastvityarthakaḥ ‘astu śrauṣaṭ’ ityāgnīdhreṇocyamāno mantra ityarthaḥ |pratyāśrāvaṇābhyāṃ tyāgāyoddhṛtaṃ ca tasmāttadeva kevalaṃ devatāyai saṃkalpitaṃ netaraditi | vidvadbhyāmadhvaryuyajamānābhyāṃ vedārthamanusṛtya samastaparityāgadevatoddeśau yathārhaṃ kartavyau | adhvaryuṇā dvyavadānaprakṣepo 'tirikto 'nuṣṭheya iti | na caitāvatā yāgasya vairūpyamaśobhanaṃ mantavyam | vacanasāmarthyādīdṛśasyaiva śobhanatvapratīteḥ | yathā kasyacitpuruṣasyaikaḥ pādaḥ purastādgata iti na tāvatā kiṃciṃdvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhavati | tathā 'tra dvyavadānapāde 'dhikamapi prakṣepāṃśaṃ gate satyutpattivākyaśiṣṭaṃ yāgasādhanatvaṃ samastenāṣṭākapālena pratipannamevetyavirodhaḥ | tasmāddvyākāramevaitatpradhānaṃ draṣṭavyam | athavā yastatra yāgastasya prādhānyaṃ yastu prakṣepaḥ so 'ṅgameva | tathā hi |

yadyapi tasminneva dravye homo 'pyāśritastathā 'pi prokṣaṇādivadasyāṅgatvamaviruddham |
na hi samānadravyāśrayatvena sarvasya prādhānyaṃ bhavati | saṃskārā
saṃskārāṇāmapīti—saṃskāratvenāṅgabhūtānāmapītyarthaḥ |ṇāmapi pradhānadravya
