dravyavartitvena pradhānatvāpatteriti pāṭhāntaram |vartitvopapatteḥ | saṃskārāśca kecitprathamameva pradhānebhyaḥ kriyante kecidūrdhvaṃ kecidyugapat | tatra kecidāhuḥ | parastātsaṃskāro 'yaṃ homaḥ | nirvāpavelāyāmeva devatoddeśatyāgātmakatayā yāgasya nirvṛttatvāt | tadayuktam | na hyanadanīyāvasthairvrīhibhiḥ puroḍāśasādhanako yajiḥ śakyaḥ sādhayitum | yadi ca nirvāpavelāyāmeva yāganirvṛttirbhavettathā sati taduttarakālaṃ nāśadoṣāpahāreṣu dravyāntaraṃ nopādīyeta | tatra ‘nirdeśādvā( a. 6 pā. 4 a. 1 sū. 1 ) 'nyadāgamayet’ ityādi virudhyate | bhāṣyakāro 'pyupākṛte paśāvā( a. 9 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 36 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥha ‘parakīyo 'sau rakṣyate kālena devatayā saṃbhantsyate’ iti | tena nirvāpavelāyāmetasyai dāsyāmītyetāvanmātraṃ saṃkalpatyāgaḥ kevalaḥ kriyate na yāgaḥ | sa tu pūrvanirvṛttatyāgāpekṣayā yathāśrutetikartavyatākadevatoddeśarūpaḥ prakṣepavelāyāmeva nirvartate | tatra tasminneva kṣaṇe samastena puroḍāśena yāgaḥ sādhyate | tasmādhanaikadeśaśca dvyavadānaṃ yāgasyāṅgena prakṣepeṇa saṃskriyate | tadupala kṣitatvādeva yāganirvṛtteḥ prākprakṣepādanirvṛttayāgāvagamānnāśādiṣvanyadravyāgamanam | satya pi homasya saṃskārakatve nāprayojakatvam | nirvṛttayāgabhāvitvāttu sviṣṭakṛdādīnāṃ sphuṭamevāprayojakatvaṃ bhaviṣyati | yadi vaiṣa prakṣepaḥ pradhānaṃ bhavettato darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu juhotivyavahāra eva syāt | vikṛtiṣu ca pradhānānāmanatideśājjuhotāvasati aprakṣiptānāmeva sauryādīnāṃ dānaṃ syāt | aṅgatve tu teṣāmapyāhavanīye prakṣepaḥ setsya ti | ye tu juhoticodanotpattayasteṣu pūrvārdhabhūto 'pi yajirātmā vā bhaviṣyati | athavā teṣāmapi so 'ṅgam | tatra hi tyāgadevatoddeśāvapi tenaivā ' 'kṣipyete | yajaticodanotpattiṣu punaḥ siddhayostyāgadevatoddeśayorjuhotiḥ pravartamānaḥ ‘āhavanīye yūpaśakalā hotavyāḥ’ itivatprakṣepamātravacano vijñāyate | tataśca siddhamaṅgatvam | evaṃ ca sati puroḍāśo yāge śrūyate na home | so 'pi dvyavadānasya vihito na samastapuroḍāśasyeti tanmātrasya | samastasya puroḍāśasya devatāṃ pratyutsṛṣṭatvādvinā 'pi prakṣepādasvatvavyavahāra upapadyate | na ca parisaṃkhyādoṣo bhaviṣyati | niravadānācca śeṣasiddhiḥ |

yadā ' 'havanīye prakṣepeṇa, akṣapito haviḥśeṣaḥ pratipāditastadā śeṣakāryāṇi sviṣṭakṛdādīni kathaṃ kriyantāmiti vicāryate | tatrārthakarmatvaṃ manyamāna ekasmādityāha | satya
yadi śeṣakāryairityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—satyapītyādinā |pyarthakarmatve yadi tadarthamevaitāni dravyāṇyutpannāni bhaveyustataḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃbhāvanāya paśavavadānānāmivaikasmā
naikasmāditi pāṭho bhavitumucitaḥ |dapi sidhya
sidhyatīti—śeṣakāryamiti śeṣaḥ |ti yāge sarveṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyeta | tattu nāsti aprayojakatvāt | atastuṣopavāpakapālavadekenaiva siddhiḥ || 42 ||

yaśca pradhānānāmevādṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa ekadravyaniṣpāditaiḥ śeṣakārthaiḥ sidhyatīti na dravyāntaramapekṣate | sakṛcchabdaśca sakṛdavadānābhiprāyaḥ | itarathā tu sarvāvadāne 'pi tantreṇa prayogātsakṛttvopapatteravaktavyataiva syāt | athavā tataḥ śeṣakāryāṇi sarvebhyaḥ kriyeranyadi saṃskārakāṇi bhaveyurna tvetāni saṃskārakāṇi | kutaḥ | saṃskā
saṃskārāntaraiḥ-paryagnikaraṇādibhirityarthaḥ |rāntaraireva saṃskṛtatvāt | ayamapyavirodhādbhaviṣyatīti cet | tatrāpyeṣa sūtrārthaḥ | saṃskāra
saṃskārakramasyeti—saṃskārāvasarasyetyarthaḥ |kramasyātikrāntatvāt | yāvaddhyakṛtaprayojanaṃ dravyaṃ bhavati tāvatsaṃskāramapekṣate pradhānanirvṛttyuttarakālaṃ tu kṛtaṃ saṃskārairiti saṃskārāṇāmanavasaraḥ || 43 ||

‘yaistuṃ( a. 2 pā. 1 a. 3 sū. 8 ) dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate’ ityevaṃ saṃskārakarmāṇyetāni | tatrāpi ‘utpattau yena( a. 4 pā. 2 a. 7 sū. 19 )’ saṃyuktam’ iti pratipattayaḥ | tāśca sarvaiḥ kṛtārthatvāviśeṣādapekṣitāḥ | yadyāpi caitābhirdravyāṇi na prayokṣyante tathā 'pi dravyaireva tāsāṃ prayuktatvātsarvaviṣayatā | nivṛtte 'pi ca pradhāne tadīyānāṃ satāmeṣāṃ kā pratipattirbhavatvityapekṣite śakyaḥ pratipattiniyamo vidhātum || 44 ||

‘sakṛtsakṛt’ iti sviṣṭakṛdavadānavīpsā sarvebhyo 'vadāne saṃskārapakṣe vā 'vakalpate nānyathā | pra
evaṃ tāvadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇāntaraparatayā sūtrāṇi vyākhyāya tatra caitādṛśaviṣaye pratipattikarmatvasya caturthādhyāyadvitīyapāda eva vyavasthāpayiṣyamāṇatayā paunaruktyāpatteraparitoṣātsvayaṃ tāvatpūrvādhikaraṇaprayojanakathanārthatayā sūtrāṇi vyākaroti—prayojanetyādinā |yojanasūtrāṇi caitāni | yadi nāma śeṣakāryavaśena pūrvapakṣe 'pyasarvapradānaṃ kiṃ bhavati tadā vicārasya prayojanamiti | tatra yaḥ pūrvamasmābhirabhihito 'rthastatraivaṃ sūtraṃ yojyam | pūrvapakṣe havīṃṣi śeṣakāryāṇāmaprayojakānītyekasmātkriyeran | balāccāpahāṃraḥ pradhānebhyaḥ, sakṛtkṛte samastaḥ kṛta iti saṃskṛtatvānnānyato 'pi kartavyaḥ | siddhānte tu sarvahaviṣāṃ prayojakatvāviśeṣātsarvebhyaḥ | liṅgadarśanaṃ ca paurṇamāsyādhikaraṇavatprayojane 'vasthitasiddhāntaṃ dyotayati || 45 ||

yāthākāmyamityasyaiva buddhisāmānādhikaraṇyena strīvivakṣāyāṃ ‘ṣidgaurā
pā. sū. ( 4—1—41) |dibhyaśca’ iti ṅīṣi kṛte ‘halasta
pā. sū. (6—4—150 ) |ddhitasya’ iti ṣyaṅyakāre lupte yāthākāmī bhavati || 46 ||

śeṣanimittakaṃ hi vihitāvaśyakartavyatānimittaṃ ca śeṣakārthaṃ prathamasya tāvatpāṭhakramānusārātpūrvamāpatati | na ca tadā kaścidvirodha iti kriyate | tasmiṃśca kṛte nivṛttavyāpārā codanā na nimittī bhavatīti virodhādakaraṇam || 47 ||

puroḍāśasya caturdhākaraṇe ‘idaṃ brahmaṇaḥ’ ityādinirdeśaḥ śrūyate | kathaṃ ca tattadbrahmādivyapadeśyaṃ bhavati yadi tebhyo na dīyate | tena dānaṃ vihitam | tattu kimṛtvijāṃ yatheṣṭaviniyogārthaṃ parikrayāyā ' 'mnāyate, atha bhakṣyamāṇaśeṣapratipattyarthamiti | parikrayārthamityāha | na hyatra ‘yajamānapañcamā iḍāṃ prāśnanti’ itivaddravyaprādhānyaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ vā śrūyate | tasmāddravyāṇāṃ karmaśeṣatvātkarmayuktebhyaśca dānādantareṇāpi parikrayaśrutiṃ dakṣiṇādānavatparikrayārthamiti || 48 ||
‘eṣā vai darśapūrṇamāsayordakṣiṇā’ iti dakṣiṇā hyṛtvijāmutsāhakāriṇī parikrayasya caitadrūpam || 49 ||
na caiṣa vibhāgaḥ parikrayārthaḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: parikrayo hi sarvatra svena dravyeṇa kalpate |
devatārthe parityakte svāmitvaṃ na ca kasyācit ||

div.p: samastasya puroḍāśasya devatoddeśena tyaktatvādasvāmī yajamāna iti brahmādibhiḥ samaḥ | tatra yathaiva teṣāṃ dātṛtvaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā yajamānasyāpi | tena hi parikrīṇānaḥ punastad dravyaṃ svī kuryāt | tatra paurastyaḥ saṃkalpo vinaśyet | tasmāttāvanna parikrayaḥ | kathaṃ khalu bhakṣārthamiti | taducyate |

brahmādibhirbhāgānāmupakurvadbhirna kiṃcid dṛṣṭa
brahmādibhirityādibhāṣyasya kartṛsaṃskāramātrārthatvoktyarthatayā ke ṣāṃcidvyākhyānagamanikā ‘dṛṣṭāmityanena kartṛsaṃskāramātrārthatvaṃ na vadati’ ityādirūpā paṅkti pralīneti bhāti |mityuktaṃ vadati, dravyakṣapaṇasyāpekṣitasya dṛṣṭatvāt | bhāgaistu brahmādīnāmupakārakairityanenāpi sutarāṃ parikraya
āpadyate | na cāvaśyaṃ bhakṣaṇenaiva teṣāmupakriyate | gṛhānayanādinā 'pyupakāropapatteḥ | sarvatra ca dravyasaṃskārārthatāṃ bhakṣasya va( a. 12 pā. 1 a. 16 su. 3. ) ityatreti śeṣaḥkṣyati | vratādibhirnivṛttyanabhidhānāt | puruṣasaṃskārā hi vratairnivarteran | tata evaṃ vaktavyam | satyaṃ bhāgānāṃ pratipattiḥ, tathā 'pi tu prakṛtakartṛniyamasya prayojanāpekṣāvelāyāṃ dṛṣṭe sati adṛṣṭadaurbalyāddṛṣṭa eva kartṛṇāṃ sāmarthyarūpaḥ saṃskāraḥ kalpyate | kartṛsaṃskāraśca sarvāntaraṅgo bhakṣaṇaṃ nāma | gṛhamapi ca nītvā yāvadbhakṣaṇaṃ na kriyate tāvattadanupayogādanupakāraḥ | tenāvaśyaṃ sūdūramapi gatvā bhakṣaṇe paryavasitavyam | tatra prathamātikrame kāraṇābhāvādyogyatāvaśena ca vyādeśadvāraprakrāntabhakṣasamāpanasyāvaśyaṃ kartavyatvādbrahyādīnāmeva bhakṣaṇenopakartavyamiti gamyate | śeṣasyāpi ca kṣapaṇāpekṣasya bhakṣaṇakṛtameva kṣapaṇaṃ yogyatayā 'vadhāryate || 50 ||
dakṣiṇeti—prāsaṅgikopakārāpekṣayā, brahmaṇa ityādinirdeśasārūpyādvā bhaviṣyati | tasmādbhakṣārtho 'yamupadeśa iti siddham || 51 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaścaraṇaḥ ||

div.p:
( a. 3 vā. 4 a. 15 sū. 44 )‘sarvebhyo vā kāraṇāviśeṣāt’ ityasyātipra
atiprasaktasyetikvacinnāti |saktasyāpavādaḥ kriyate | tameva tāvatpūrvaṃ pakṣaṃ smārayati | tathā ca ‘sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ’ ityanuvāda upapadyate | niḥśeṣahavirviṣayatvāt || 1 ||

purākalpai ca yatkāraṇaṃ sviṣṭakṛdarthe 'vadāne saṃkīrttitaṃ tadājye 'pyaviśiṣṭam | yaddevebhyo havirasau vahati tasya tena bhāgaḥ prārthitaḥ | ājyamapi copāṃśuyājadevatābhyastenāvaśyaṃ voḍhavyam | ataśca tato 'pyasya bhāgena bhavitavyam || 2 ||

ekasminniti—kasmiṃścitkarmaṇītyarthaḥ | athavā yuṣmadabhiprāyeṇa, ekasminhaviṣi sviṣṭakṛtyavadīyamāne sati samavattaśabdo 'nyasahitādavadīyamānavacano nāvakalpeta | matpakṣe tvājyamapi tatrāvadīyata ityavakalpiṣyate | kva punaridaṃ śrūyate tadabhidhīyate ‘ādityaḥ prayāṇīyaḥ payasi caruḥ, ityeko yāgaścoditaḥ | punastatraivoktam ‘ājyasthainaṃ carumābhipūryā ' 'jyabhāgāḥ pathyādayaścatasro devatā yaṣṭavyāḥ’ iti | te ca dravyasāmānyādu
pāṃśuyājavikārāścatvāro 'pi yāgāḥ | ādityaścarurāgneyavikāraḥ | tatra ‘agnaye sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati’ iti śrūyate | tadyadi carorekasyātideśena sviṣṭakṛtprāptastato 'vadyatī tyeva syāt | yadā tu prakṛtāvājyādapyupāṃśuyājadravyāṃtsviṣṭakṛttadā 'trāpi yaṣṭavya ityubhayoścarvājyayoravadāne samavattaśabdaḥ samarthito bhavati | tasmādapi santyājye śeṣakāryāṇīti || 3 ||

‘avadāyāvadāya dhruvāṃ pratyabhidhārayati’ ‘sviṣṭakṛte 'vadāya na pratyabhidhārayati’ iti dhruvāta evāvadāyeti pratiśabdāddṛrṣṭāthatvāccāvagamyate | yadapi sviṣṭakṛte 'vadīyate tadapi dhruvāta eva, yena tadarthe 'vatte dhruvāyāḥ pratyabhidhāraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate | ‘na hi tataḥ parāmāhutim’ iti hetuvacanātpūrvāṇi pratyabhidhāraṇāni sviṣṭakṛdarthānīti darśayati | tataśca tatsāmānyāditareṣu tathātvamiti sarvaiḥ śeṣakrāryairbhavitavyam || 4 ||
sati pradhānadravyaśeṣe śeṣakāryāṇi kriyante | na copāṃśuyājahaviḥśeṣo vidyate, sarvādānāt | kathaṃ sarvādānamiti cet | taduttarasūtreṇā ' 'ha || 5 ||

dhruvāyāṃ tāvannopāṃśuyājasya śeṣo vidyate | dhrauvasyā
asaṃyuktotpatteriti—‘caturdhruvāyāṃ gṛhṇāti’ iti vākyeneti śeṣaḥ |saṃyuktotpatteḥ sarvājyakāryārtha
mādānāt ‘sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate’ iti vākyāt | taittirīyāṇāṃ tu katipayopastaraṇābhighāraṇādikāryānukramaṇāttanmadhye copāṃśuyājasyāpi saṃkīrtanāttāvatāṃ sādhāraṇam ‘upastṛṇannabhighārayannājyasya yajan’ iti vākyādgamyate | sādhāraṇeṣu ca pariṣadvanopahāragoṣṭhībhojanādiṣviyaṃ sthitiḥ | yadekasya bhāge 'payātite tāvanmātrameva tasya | avaśiṣṭaṃ tu tatsamānabhājāmavadhāryamāṇaṃ na pūrvaśeṣa ityevamakṛtārthatvena pratipattimapekṣate | yadā tu sarvaiḥ samānabhāgbhiryathāyogamuddhṛtā bhāgā bhavanti tadā tasya sādhāraṇyānuguṇaiva pratipattyapekṣā bhavati | tadihopāṃ
sādhāraṇeṣu cetyādinopapāditaṃ sārbatrikaṃ nyāyaṃ prakṛtodāharaṇe 'tidiśati—tadihetyādinā |śuyājārthe bhāge 'panīte na kaścidapi tadīyaḥ śeṣo vidyate | śiṣṭasya parastādbhāvyupastaraṇābhighāraṇādigṛhītatvenākṛtārthatvāt | kṛtārthapratipattayaśca śeṣakāryāṇi na svayamevākṛtaprayojanamapi dravyaṃ prayuñjate | tasmānna dhruvāyāṃ śeṣo 'sti | yastu samastakāryanirvṛttyuttarakālaṃ sādhāraṇaḥ śeṣo bhaviṣyati tasya tasya samiṣṭayajurākhyaṃ pratipattyantaramāmnātam | yadā tvidamapyupastaraṇādivadevārthakarmāvadhāryate tadā sutarāṃ śeṣābhāvaḥ | śakyaṃ tu taittirīyavākyāpekṣayotpattāvanyasaṃyogātsamiṣṭayajuṣaśca juhoticoditatvenāyajñatvātpratipattitvamavadhārayitum | niḥśeṣatvena cāsāvavasthiteti śeṣakāryāntarāṇi bādhate | tasmāddhruvāyāṃ tāvannāsti śeṣaḥ || 6 ||

tatraitatsyāt, yatkevalopāṃśuyājārthe juhvāmavattaṃ tasyaiva grahamacamaseṣviva somanya
śeṣo bhaviṣyatīti | tadanupapannam | kutaḥ | tasya samastasya ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’ iti homasaṃyoyāt | u
( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 7 ) | ‘ityatra’ tataśca kiṃcidijyāyāṃ viniyujyeta | tadanyatra śrutamanyatra kṛtaṃ bhavet’ ityādinā bhāṣyakārairityarthaḥktaṃ hyetadupadhānārthe carau nānyatra śrutamanyatra viniyoktavyamiti tasmānna juhvāṃ śeṣa upapadyate || 7 ||
atha yaduktaṃ camasavatsatyapi homasaṃyoge śeṣo bhaviṣyatīti | tatparihartavyam || 8 ||

naitatsobhena tulyam | tatra hi grahacamaseṣu, haviḥprakalpanamātre kṛte yathā na sarvahomastathā ‘some 'vaca( a. 3 pā. 5 a. 5 sū. 19 )nādbhakṣo na vidyate’ ityatrādhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ | tena codanāvirodhaṃ tatra vakṣyamāṇaṃ pariharatāṃ na sarvahomo bhaviṣyati | śeṣakāryānyārthadarśanaṃ ca ‘somasyāgne vīhītyanuvaṣaṭkaroti’ ityādi, ‘sarvataḥ parihāramāśvinaṃ bhakṣayati’ ityādicamasasamākhyā ca na virotsyate | anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syāt | athavā na tatrāsamastahome sati kāciccodanā virudhyata ityavirodhādasarvahomaḥ | iha tu virodhaḥ syāt | ayameva cāvirodho heturiti sūtragamanikā | yathā tu bhāṣyakāreṇa pūrvaṃ camasamanudāhṛṃtya ‘camasavaditi cet’ iti sūtramupanyastaṃ tathā paricodanāsūtrameva homasaṃyogānaikāntikatvapradarśanārthaṃ kalpayitvā parihāro vaktavyaḥ | tatra vacanāntarakṛtatvāccheṣaḥ syādatra vacanāntararahitatve satīti viśiṣṭasya hetoravyabhicārāt | athavā 'vattatvāttu juhvāmityetadeva tuśabdasthāne caśabdaṃ kṛtvā pūrvapakṣavādipratyavasthānaṃ vyācakṣāṇaiścamaso dṛṣṭānto dātavyaḥ | paraṃ cā 'nubhāṣaṇa
sūtraṃ vaktavyam | etaduktaṃ bhavati | avattatvāttu juhvāṃ camasavaccheṣo 'stu | tasyottaraṃ, tasya ca homasaṃyogāditi gatārtham || 9 ||

yastu sarvebhya iti | prāptyapekṣo 'nuvādaḥ | tatra yādṛśaṃ vayamiha sarvatvaṃ paśyāmastādṛśasyaivānuvāda iti manyāmahe | sarvatraiva ca paramasarveṇa vyavahārābhāvādadhikṛtāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdo gṛhyata iti na virodhaḥ | tena yeṣāṃ śeṣasadbhāvena pratipattikāryādhikāro 'sti, ye vā vidyamānatvena prakṛtaśeṣāḥ, tebhyaḥ sarvebhya iti gamyate || 10 ||

pūrvavadeva samavadyateranuvādatvādyathāsaṃbha
yathāsaṃbhavamartho 'pīti, pā. |vamājye 'pīti carāvavadīyamāne saukṣmyāttadavaya
tadavayavasyānusyūtasyācikīrṣītamiti, pā. |vasyācikīrṣitamapyavadānaṃ balādbhavati | tadetatsaṃsṛṣṭadravyajātidvayamapekṣya saṃśabdo 'nuvādaḥ || 11 ||

antyaṃ yattu kāraṇaṃ sviṣṭakṛdartho 'rthavāda ityuktaṃ, tadasmatpakṣe 'pyupapadyata eva | arekārthatvāt | ‘sviṣṭakṛte 'vadāya’ iti tāvadyatastasyāvadānaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ vā saṃbhavati tādṛśamiti gamyate | puroḍāśādibhyaśca tasyāvadānaṃ, dhruvātaścopastaraṇāmidhā
raṇe | na caturthyantena dhrauvamevāvadānaṃ saṃbadhyate | sā hi devatārthadravyāntarāvadāne 'pyupastaraṇābhighāraṇopayogitvātpratyābhighāraṇamapekṣata eva | tena prāk sviṣṭakṛtaḥ parastādapi dhrauvopayogo 'stītyavatte 'vatte pratipūrayitavyā, tataḥ paraṃ tu na kiṃcitkāryamiti nārthaḥ pratipūraṇena | na hyetatpratipūraṇaṃ pūrvasyāvadānasya saṃskārakamadṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgāt | arekastūttarakāryārthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ | tasmādantareṇāpi sviṣṭakṛdarthatvaṃ tadavadhikārekārthatvenopapanno 'rthavādaḥ || 12 ||

amāvāsyāyāṃ nityaṃ sviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ sāṃnāyyādavadīyate | tadguṇavikāraśca sākaṃprasthāyīyaḥ | ata ihāpyavadātavyamityetāvatā viśeṣeṇātulyāśaṅkāyāmatideśaḥ kriyate | tadvadevāśeṣatvānnaivaṃ syāt | sarvadānādaśeṣateti | evaṃ hyatra sarvadānaṃ, homārthe prasarpataḥ saha kumbhībhiriti, anavattasyaiva dohasya kumbhīmyā saheti vidadhadaśeṣahomaṃ vidadhāti | ato na śakyaṃ kiṃciccheṣayitum || 13 ||

tadvadityanuvartate | sautrāmaṇyāṃ surāgrahāḥ payograhāścā ' 'śvinādaya āmnātāḥ |
teṣāṃ pṛthak prakalpanamātrātmakatvāccamasavatsarvahomaprāptirnāstīti viśeṣāśaṅkāyāmatideśā
atideśāditi—pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyātideśādityarthaḥ |ttatrāpi yathāgṛhītānāṃ homārthenā ' 'dānena saṃbandho yathopāttānāṃ ca homena śrūyate ‘yathāgṛhītān grahānṛtvija upādadate | uttare 'gnau payograhān juhvati dakṣiṇe surāgrahān’ iti || 14 ||

ananyaśeṣabhūtaśca pratiṣedho 'nuvāda ‘ucchinaṣṭi na sarvaṃ juhoti’ iti | ucchinaṣṭīti vidhiḥ | tadanuvādastu niṣedhaḥ, aśeṣahomaprāptyā śeṣakāryanirvṛttiṃ darśayati | vācanikasya ca śeṣasya pratipattyantaramarthakarma vā 'nyadastīti ‘ta
tato 'pīti—ayamāśayaḥ | ‘brāhmaṇaṃ parikrīṇīyāduccheṇasya pātāram | yadi na vindedvalmīkavapāyāmavanayet | tato 'pyavaśiṣṭaṃ śatātṛṇṇāyāṃ vikṣārayanti’ iti vācanikapratipattyantaravidhānenā ' 'tideśikapratipattyantarabādhānna sveṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ kartavyamiti | valmīkavapā-valmīkaṃcchidram | śatātṛṇṇā—śatacchidrā kummī |to 'pi’ iti sviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ na kartavyamiti || 15 ||

idānīṃ satsu śeṣakāryeṣu tadviśeṣāścintyante | tatra sarvapṛṣṭhāyāmanyonyanirapekṣacaturthyantaparikalpitaiḥ ṣaḍbhirguṇairbhinnadravyadevatāsaṃyogairdevatāntarāvaruddhayāge devatāntarāsaṃbhavādguṇena bhedakena ṣaṭ karmāṇi | teṣu keṣāṃcidbhinnānyeva havīṃṣi | anyeṣāṃ punareka eva rathacakramātraḥ puroḍāśa āmnātaḥ | sa yadā 'ṅgīkriyate tadā vicāraḥ, kiṃ karmabhedāccheṣakāryāṇāṃ bheda uta dravyaikatvāttantramiti | nanu caikādaśavicāro 'yaṃ tatra nirṇeṣyate ‘eka( a. 11 pā. 4 a. 12 sū. 12 )dravye saṃskārāṇāṃ vyākhyātamekakarmatvam’ ityatra | ata iha na vicāraṇīyam | ucyate |

yadyapyayamekādaśānuguṇo vicārastathā 'pyatra śeṣakāryaprasaṅgāccheṣaśeṣivicārātmakatvācca ka़riyate | tatra caikadravyatvāttantratvaṃ sidhyati yatra dravyaṃ tadavasthitameva sarvakarmaṇāmupakaroti | bhedakaraṇe ca prayojanāntaraṃ na dṛśyate na ca kartuṃ śakyate | khaṇḍaśastvasya pradhānopayogitvaṃ tadupakāradvāraśca saṃskāraḥ pradhānabhedādbhedaṃ pratipadyamāno na dravyaikatvāttantrīkartuṃ śakyate | bhavati caikadeśe pratipādite 'pyekadeśāntarapratipādanam | avadānadeśānāṃ bhinnatvāduttarārdhadakṣiṇadeśabhedo 'pyastītyāvartanīyaṃ sviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ gamyate || 16 ||
sakṛtkaraṇam | kutaḥ |

karmasaṃskārapakṣe hūyamānasaṃskārapakṣe vā tadbhedādbhedo bhavet | śeṣasaṃskārastvayam |
sa ca śeṣaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ | tasya ca dakṣiṇottarārdhe gṛhyete | na pradhānāvadānadeśaḥ | tasya prakṛtāvacoditatvāt | tataśca śakyamagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvaṃ vaktum | yadyapi hyekapradhānoddeśenottarārdhaṃ gṛhṇīyustathā 'pi tathā coditārthasaṃpattyā pradhānāntarāṇyapi kṛtārthāni bhaveyuḥ | tasmāttantram | yattu pratipādyaṃ vibhavatīti, pratipattyantare caturdhākaraṇe tadupayujyate || 17 ||

‘some 'vacanādbhakṣo na vidyate’ iti sāmānyena bhakṣavicāraṃ kṛtvā viśeṣavicāro 'yaṃ kartavya āsīt | yattu prathamataraṃ kriyate tatpūrvādhikaraṇāpavādatvena śīghrataropasthānāt | pūrvavaddhi dravyaikatvātsvṛdbhakṣite kṛtaḥ śāstrārtha iti nyāyātprāpte, vacanādadvirbhakṣaṇaṃ ‘dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati’ iti | bhavanti cedṛśānyapyadhikaraṇāṃni yeṣāṃ nyāyena pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā vacanena siddhānto bhavati | na tvetadyu
evaṃ tāvadbhāṣyamanusṛtyādhikaraṇāntaraparatayā sūtraṃ vyākhyāyaḥ tatra cāsvarasodbhāvanapūrvakaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā vyākhyātuṃ dūṣaṃṇaṃ tāvadādau darśayati—na tvetadityādinā |ktam | saṃdehābhāvāt | tatra vaitatkriyate yatra nyāyena pratipādito vacanādbādhitaḥ, tadabhāvātsamānanyāyeṣūpakariṣyati | sa ceha nyāyaḥ pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva pradarśita iti mandaphalo vicāraḥ | tasmānnaivaṃ varṇanīyam | kiṃ tarhi | sarvapṛṣṭhāyāmeva pratikarma sviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ kartavyaṃ pradhānabhedāt | tathā hi | siddhavatpradhānabhedamaindra
aindravāyavasaṃskārahetumiti-aindravāyavasya saṃskārabhūtabhakṣaṇabhedahetumityarthaḥ | idamatrā ' 'ktam | yathaiva caturgṛhītānyājyāni bhavanti | na hyatrānūyājān yakṣyan bhavati ityatrānūyājasāmānyābhāvarūpahetuvidhibalena caturthacaturgṛhītanivṛttiparyavasitena caturgṛhītabahutvarūpasādhyena, anuyājasāmānyābhāvarūpahetorvyāptiḥ kalpyate tadvadihāpi ‘dvirhyetasya vaṣaṭkaroti’ iti hiśabdaśrutyā śeṣakāryabhede pradhānabhedasya hetutvenopādānāttadanyathānupapattyā vyāptikalpanāvaśyaṃbhāvādāvartanīyameva sviṣṭakṛdiḍamiṃti |vāyavasaṃskārahetumāha ‘dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣa
yati | dvirhyetasya vaṣaṭkaroti’ iti | tasmādyāvadvaṣaṭkāraṃ śeṣasaṃskāra ityuktottare datte dṛṣṭāntamanubhāṣya sūtreṇa parihāro vaktavyaḥ | aindravāyave tu sakṛdbhakṣaṇe prāpte vacanāddvirbhakṣo na pradhānabhedanimittaḥ | hetvadhika( a. 1 pā. 2 a. 3 )raṇe hetornirākṛta
nirākṛtatvāditi—| ‘tena hyannaṃ kriyate’ itivat ‘dvirhyetasya vaṣaṭkaroti’ ityatrāpi vartamānanirdeśādvartamānakālikasya ca vaṣaṭkārabhedasya hetutvāsaṃbhavāllaṭo bhūtakālalakṣaṇāvaśyaṃbhāvāllakṣaṇāyāśca ‘na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ’ ityanena niṣiddhatvādityādi yuktyā nirākṛtatvādityarthaḥ | ‘na hyatrānūyājān yakṣyan bhavati’ ityatra tu lakṣaṇākāraṇābhāvāddhetuvidhireveti vaiṣamyam |tvāt | evaṃ ca sati pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣeṇaiva satā somabhakṣasāmānyavicārasmāraṇānna kramakopo bhaviṣyatīti || 18 ||

aindravāyave tāvadviśiṣṭavidhānādapi bhakṣo bhavet | athetaragrahagate camasasthe ca some saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ bhakṣo 'sti neti | tatrāpi ‘sarvataḥ parihāramāśvinaṃ bhakṣayati’ ityādiṣvaindravāyavanyāya eva syāt | idaṃ tu sarvathā tatrāpi vicāryate kiṃ prāpte bhakṣe viśeṣaṇamātraṃ vacanena vidhīyata uta viśiṣṭavidhānametaditi | kaścātra viśeṣaḥ | sa yadi vācanikastato yāvadvacanameva kartavyo 'tha tvanyataḥ kutaścittata ekadeśasthamapi liṅgaṃ sthālīpulākanyāyena samastadyotakaṃ bhaviṣyati | trayaśceha pakṣāḥ saṃbhavanti | kimanyārthadarśanānāṃ prāptyāpekṣatvādavidhānācca naiva bhakṣa uta prāptyabhāvādanyārthadarśanānyeva vacanīkṛtya yāvadvacanaṃ bhakṣa uta samākhyāvaṣaṭkārahomābhiṣavanimitto 'pi bhakṣa iti | kiṃ prāptam | ājyasākaṃprasthāyīyasautrāmaṇīgrahaṇavatsamastahomasaṃyogāccheṣa eva nāsti kutaḥ punarbhakṣa iti | na cātra prakṛtitaḥ prāptirna ca pratyakṣopadeśaḥ | yo 'pyupadeśa iva so 'pyanyaparatvādasamarthaḥ | tasmānnāsti bhakṣa iti || 19 ||
yadyanyārthadarśanāni bhaveyustato 'nyatrāpi prāptiḥ syādvacanāni tvetāni | tasmādyathopadeśaṃ bhakṣo 'yaṃ nānyatreti || 20 || 21 ||

gṛhṇīma etadyathopadeśamiti | sa tu samākhyādibhedabhinna upadeśo 'nusartavyo na tu śrutaviśeṣamātraniṣṭhaḥ | tatra camaseṣu tāvad yadyapi brāhmaṇagataḥ pratyakṣopadeśo nopalabhyate tathā 'pi praiṣagatayā samākhyayā 'numīyate | hotṛcamasatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ hi dravyanayana preṣaṇaṃ na kathaṃcidupapadyate yadi teṣu hotrādayaḥ somaṃ na camanti | katham | camasa iti, adanārthasya camerauṇādike 'dhikaraṇasādhane 'sanpratyaye kṛte praiṣavelāyāṃ bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānāṃ kvacitsaṃbandhe 'pekṣyamāṇe bhūtavartamānayoradarśanādbhaviṣyattvamanumīyate | na hyanyathā hotuścamasaḥ praitvityetasyānuṣṭhānaṃ śakyate | tasmāccamitavyaṃ hotrādibhiḥ | somaśeṣavantaścamasāḥ preṣitā iti tasyaivāpekṣitapratipattiviśeṣasya pratyāsatterbhakṣyatvaṃ gamyate | saśe
ṣaścamaso hūyate ‘alpaṃ juhoti’ iti vacanāt | na cānyadodanādidravyaṃ pratīyate, yasyacamanāccamasatvamupapadyate | na ca taccamanasya karmāṅgabhāvaḥ syāt | tatra prakaraṇaṃ bādhyeta | praiṣo 'pi cotkṛṣyeta | somacamasasamākhyāṃ ca bādhyeta | yadi caudanādi bhakṣyeta tata ucchiṣṭena pātreṇa punarhomo na kriyeta | śuddhyarthaṃ tatra takṣaṇādyāśrayaṇe yasya hotṛcamasatvādyavadhāritaṃ tasya vināśāddravyāntaraṃ tatsamākhyaṃ na bhavatīti samākhyātadravyasādhanakahomavidhānabādhaḥ syāt | etena camasāntaropādānaṃ pratyuktam | tadutpādane ca śrutacamasasaṃkhyātikramaḥ syāt | na ca vacanasāmarthyāducchiṣṭena hotuṃ śakyam | vacanasyāntareṇāpyācārabhaṅgaṃ somabhakṣe sāvakāśatvāt | somabhakṣe 'pi sarvametattulyamiti cet | naitadevaṃ ‘na somenocchiṣṭā bhavanti’ iti śruteḥ | tasmāccamasibhirbhakṣayitavya soma iti | bhāṣyamapyanenaiva krameṇa netavyaṃ na yathālikhitam | upapattyantarāṇāmupapattyantaravyavadhānena kliṣṭatvāt | tasmāccābrāhmaṇasya somabhakṣaṇaṃ pratiṣedhati | yadi ca ‘pra yajamānasya’ iti samākhyayā na somabhakṣaḥ prāpyate tataḥ phalacamasavidhau ‘sa yadi somaṃ bibhakṣayiṣet’ iti na somam’ iti ca pratiṣedhanasaṃkīrtanaṃ nāvakalpeta | tasmādasti camasināṃ somabhakṣa iti || 22 ||

idānīṃ vaṣaṭkārahomābhiṣavabhakṣānanuktvaiva prasa
smṛtasyopekṣānarhatvaṃ prasaṅga iti kathyate |ṅgātsamākhyābhakṣaviśeṣānusaraṇameva tāvatkaroti | tasminneva praiṣe ‘prodnātṝṇām’ iti śrūyate | tatra caturdhā saṃdehaḥ | kimeka evodgātā bhakṣayeduta sarvartvija uta stotrakāriṇa āhosviccatvāro 'pi chandogā iti | kecittu dvitīyacaturthayoḥ pakṣayorekatvamicchanti | sūtradvaye 'pi sarvaśabdaprayogāt, lakṣaṇāyāśca pratyāsatteḥ kevalacchandogaviṣayatvāt | kutaḥ saṃdehaḥ |

tatra pāśādhikaraṇanyāyena ‘guṇe tva( a. 9 pā. 3 a. 5 sū. 15 ) etatsūtrāvayavaḥnyāyyakalpanaikadeśatvāt’ iti prātipadikārthaprādhānyāt ‘udgātāraṃ vṛṇīte’ iti cotpattāvekatvādekasmā evodgātre camaso dātavyaḥ śrūyate | tasmādeko bhakṣayet | prātipadikārthāsaṃbhavino bahuvacanasyāvivakṣitatvāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ || 23 ||

na yukto 'tyantaṃ bahutvatyāgaḥ | pāśamantrasya prakaraṇe bahutvaṃ na ka
na kathaṃciditi—ekapāśakatvādaikṣapaśuyāgasyeti hetupūraṇam |thaṃcitprakāreṇāstītyavivakṣā yuktā | atra punarlakṣaṇāyāmupapadyamānāyāṃ nāvivakṣopapadyate | tasmātsarvartvijāmeṣa camasaḥ | athavā 'vāntarasaṃbandhātsarvacchandogagrahaṇamiti vyākhyeyam || 24 ||

yasmādbahuvacanasyodgātṛvyatiriktaiḥ saha prātipadikenānupāttatvātsaṃbandho nāvakalpate | na ca nirnimittā lakṣaṇā 'vakalpate | na ca lakṣaṇayā vinā ' 'narthakyam | avayavaprasiddhyā stotrakāriṣūpapadyamānatvāt | tasmādgītisaṃyogātrayaḥ stotrakāriṇo bhakṣayeyuḥ || 25 ||

na tāvatsamudāyaprasiddhau saṃbhavantyāmavayavaprasiddhiḥ prātipadikasya yuktā | na cāvayavaprasiddhirapyatra stotrakāriṣu vidyate | gātārau hi prastotṛpratihartārau nodgātārau |
tena bahuvacanamanupapannameva | dvitīyaṃ sāmnaḥ parvotpūrvasya gāyaterabhidheyamiti— bhaktiriti vaktavye pramādātparvaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ | tasmānna varaṇanimittā udgānanimittā vā bahava udgātāraḥ saṃbhavantīti vedasaṃyoganimittāḥ kalpyante | chandogapravacanaṃ hyaudgātraśabdenābhidhīyate | tatpravacanasthaṃ karma | tatsaṃbandhācca puruṣāḥ pravaktṛtvenānuṣṭhātṛtvena caudameghinyāyenodgātāra ityanumātuṃ śakyate | nanu caiṣa nyāyo 'veṣṭaya( a. 2 pā. 3 a. 2 )dhikaraṇe nirākṛtaḥ | tathā hi |

smaranti hi, udgāturidamityaṇpratyayaṃ na tu tasya karteti pratyayalopam | tasmānnaudgātraśabdādeṣo 'nugantavyaḥ | tathā ca varaṇanimittamiti vakṣya( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 9 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥti | tenāyuktamidaṃ vyākhyānamiti | ucyate |

yathaiva ta
tatra—aveṣṭayadhikaraṇa ityarthaḥ |tra ‘yogāllokaḥ prayuṅkte’ ityārabhyaivaṃ vyākhyātam | prathamaṃ jātinimitto rājā | tatastatsaṃbandhātpālanaṃ rājyaṃ, tatsaṃbandhādapi brāhmaṇādiṣu sthānāpattyā vā 'numānena vā rājaśabdastathaivātrāpi varaṇādeka evodnātā | tatastatsaṃyogātkarmapravacanayoraudgātraśabdastadyogādapi stotrakāriṣūdnātṛśabdaḥ | sa ca śabdasyānekārthatvāsaṃbhavā
dgauṇaḥ | mukhyāsaṃbhavācceha gauṇatvāśrayaṇaṃ pūrvamevauktam | kevalaṃ tu nimittaṃ noktam | bhavedidānīṃ pravacanaṃ saṃbandhātmakaṃ kathitam | tasmādavirodhātsarvacchandogānābhayaṃ bhakṣa iti | na
evaṃ tāvadyathābhāṣyaṃ sasubrahmaṇyānāṃ caturṇāmudgātṛcamase bhakṣaṇaṃ prasādhyādhunā subrahmaṇyasya tāvadbhakṣaṇe tathā pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyata ityetadupapādayitumārabhate—na tvetadityādinā | tvetadyuktam | bhakṣaṇavelāyāṃ hi ye vyāpriyante tatsaṃnihitāśca praiṣakāle te bhakṣaṇena saṃbadhyante | na ca subrahmaṇyasya tasminkāle kaścidvyāpāro 'to nāsya sadasyantarvedyāṃ vā saṃnidhānamasti yena bhakṣe 'dhikṛtaḥ syāt | tatra yathaiva pravacanasaṃyoge satyapyanyeṣāmakarmasaṃyuktānāṃ chandogānāṃ bhakṣo na bhavati, evaṃ subrahmaṇyasyāpīti manyāmahe | kapiñjalavacca triṣveva bahutvaśrutiravasthā( a. 11 pā. 1 a. 7 sū. 42 ) atratyanyāyenetyarthaḥsyate | na ca bhakṣaḥ kartṛsaṃskāro yena yadvarjanabhayātsarvatrāvadhāryate | dravyasaṃskāro 'yamiti tatra tatra sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ | tasmādupapattyantaraṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya stotrakāripakṣaparigraha evāyamiti samarthanīyam | etaduktaṃ bhavati | sarve tvanena śabdenābhidhīyante na stotrakāriṇa eva kevalāstathā 'pi tu yathoktātkāraṇādekadeśe subrahmaṇyavarjaṃ pravartate yathā ‘viniṣadyodgātāraḥ sāmnā stuvanti’ ityatra | athavā sarve tvityavāntarapūrvapakṣaṃ parigṛhya ‘kāraṇādekadeśe syāt’ iti sūtrāntaraṃ stotrakāripakṣe niyoktavyam || 26 ||

gataḥ samākhyābhakṣaḥ | idānīṃ vācanikamevānugacchati | tatra ‘yathācamasamanyāṃścamasāṃścamasino bhakṣayanti | athaitasya hāriyojanasya sarva eva lipsante’ ityetadvacanaṃ
kiṃ prakaraṇādaśeṣaviṣayaṃ sat, grāvastuto 'pi bhakṣaṃ prāpayatyuta svavākyopāttacamasiviṣayatvānneti saṃdehe, tenaiva tāvadabhiprāyeṇa na vidyata ityāha || 27 ||
na śakyaṃ sarvaśabdo vinā kāraṇena prakṛtakartṛmātravacanaḥ sannekadeśe sthāpayitum | ato hāriyojanaṃ grāvastudapi bhakṣayet || 28 ||

pūrvapakṣābhiprāyavivaraṇam | yathācamasamanyāniti punaḥśruterna kiṃcitprayojanamastyanyadataḥ sarvaśabdaviśeṣaṇatvāt | athaśabdaivakārābhyāṃ sutarāṃ teṣveva pratyayaḥ | ye hyanyatra pratyekarūpeṇopāttāsteṣvevakāro bhavati | tasmānna grāvastutpratyetavyaḥ || 29 ||

na yuktaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ puruṣamātragāmī sannadhikāreṇa viśeṣitaḥ punaścamasiśabdena prayojanāntaraupādhikena satā viśeṣṭum | yāvadyāvaddhi śabdo 'lpaviṣayī kriyate tāvattāvat
śrutirbādhyate | tasmāccamasino na pratyekaṃ camasasaṃbandhārthamupāttāḥ | te 'pi cālpaviṣayatvena pratipādyante hāriyojanasya mahāviṣayatvena praśaṃsāṃ kartum | ato hāriyojane sarva evetyetadeva siddham || 30 ||

idamaparaṃ vacanaṃ ‘vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ’ iti | tatkiṃ vaṣaṭkāraṃ nimittīkṛtya prāthamyaviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhatta uta bhakṣaṇamanūdya prāthamyamātraṃ vidhatta iti vicāraḥ | kiṃ prāptam | ‘nacedanye( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 6 sū. 9 ) etatsūtrāvayavaḥna śiṣṭāḥ’ iti kathaṃcidanuvādatve saṃbhavati viśiṣṭavidhānānupapatteḥ, prāthamyasya cāprāptatvāttadanuvādena bhakṣavidhānāsaṃbhavādevaṃ vacanaṃ vyajyate yo vaṣaṭkarturbhakṣaḥ sa prathama iti | nanu cāprāptatvādbhakṣo 'pyanuvadituṃ na śakyate | samākhyayā prāptatvādanuvādo gamyate | asti hi tasya
tasya—vaṣaṭkarturhotrāderityarthaḥ | samākhyayā camaseṣu bhakṣaḥ, sa śakyo 'nuvaditum | teṣāṃ
teṣāṃ ca—camasināṃ madhya ityarthaḥ | ca yo yadā vaṣaṭkaroti sa tadā prathamo bhakṣayet | tatraitatsyāt | graheṣu camasāntareṣu ca prāptyabhāvādanuvādo nopapadyata iti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | na hyavaśyaṃ yadeva sarvatra prāptaṃ tadevānuvaditavyam | sarvānuvādānāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prāptyapekṣatvāt | na ca grahacamasāntarāṇāṃ vaṣaṭkartṛbhirabhakṣyamāṇānāṃ kiṃcinna sidhyati | pratipattiriti cet | vedavihitapratipattya bhāve laukikapratipattisiddheḥ | vakṣyamāṇa
vakṣyamāṇeti—anantarādhikaraṇavakṣyamāṇahomābhiṣavarūpa nimittadvāreṇa grahādiṣu bhakṣaṇopapattirityarthaḥ |nimittadvāreṇa vā bhakṣaṇopapattiḥ | athocyate |
samākhyayayā viprakṛṣṭā prāptirna śakyate śīghrapravartinyā śrutyā 'nuvaditum | ataḥ prāptyabhāvavelāyāṃ śrutiḥ pravartamānā yatra yatra vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ tatra tatrāviśeṣeṇa vidhāsyatīti | tadayuktam | tatra hi saṃnikarṣaviprakarṣāvapekṣyete yatra virodhaḥ kaścit | iyaṃ tu śrutiranekārthavi
vidhikleśeti—śrūyamāṇavidhinā prāthamyaviśiṣṭabhakṣaṇāntaravidhane viśeṣaṇavidhānārthaṃ vidhyantarakalpanākleśa ityarthaḥ |dhikleśabhayādyathākathaṃcidapi prāpnuvantaṃ bhakṣaṃ pratīkṣate | yadā kenacidapi pramāṇena nāsti prāptirityavagamyate tadā viśiṣṭavidhānamaṅgī karoti | tathā ca prakaraṇādiprāptārthānuvādena śrutayo guṇānāṃ vidhātrya iṣṭāḥ | tasmātprāthamyamātrānimittatvānna vaṣaṭkāro bhakṣakāraṇamiti prāpte | ucyate |

yathaiva ‘tryaṅgaiḥ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajati’ ityatra nāṅgānyanūdya tritvaṃ vidhīyate | kiṃ tarhi | pūrvaniṣpannaḥ samāsārtho vidheyo bhavati | tathehāpi paripūrṇasya padasya padāntarayogādekadeśaniṣkarṣe ca sāmarthyābhāvādaśakyamevānuvadituṃ yo vaṣaṭkarturbhakṣa iti | na hi prāksamāsādbhakṣasya vaṣaṭkartṛsaṃbandho yuktaḥ | sāpekṣatve sati samāsānupapatteḥ | nanu ca ‘bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsaḥ’ iti satyapi vaṣaṭkartṛsaṃbandhe samāso 'vakalpiṣyate | bhavedetadevaṃ, yadi bhakṣa evaikaḥ sāpekṣaḥ syādiha tu prāthamyamapi vaṣaṭkartṛsaṃbandhitvātsāpekṣam | na hi prāthamyasya bhakṣo nimittam | kiṃ tarhi | vaṣaṭkartṛtvamato vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathama ityevaṃ saṃbandha āpadyeta | tataśca vispaṣṭamasāmañjasyaṃ syāt, yo vaṣaṭkarturbhakṣa iti cānūdyamāne viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣaḥ, bhakṣamātreṇa vaṣaṭkarturanākṣepāt | vaṣaṭkartṛtvasya ca kriyāntareṣvapyanaikāntyāt | anyatarānuvāde tu sarvabhakṣāṇāṃ prāthamyaṃ vidhīyeta sarvavaṣaṭkartṛvyāpārāṇāṃ ca | taccāśakyaṃ kartum | ato vaṣaṭkartṛprāthamyāviśiṣṭāpūrvabhakṣavidhānametat | tayośca parasparaniyamādatyantasamānaviṣayatvam | ato yāvati viṣaye vaṣaṭkārastāvatyeva prathamabhakṣaḥ | kathaṃ punarvaṣaṭkāro nimittabhūtaḥ sannupādīyate kathaṃ cānupādīyamānasya niyamo 'vakalpate | ucyate |

na ca vaṣaṭkartṛtvamanupādeyam | na hyatra yadiśabdasaptamyādikṛtaṃ nimittatvam | kiṃ tarhi | vaṣaṭkartari kriyāṅgatvenopādīyamāne 'rthānnimittatvaṃ bhavati | tasmādadoṣaḥ |
nanu ca ‘tasmā
tasmāditi | ṛk sāmovāca mithunīsaṃbhavāveti | so 'bravīnnavai tvaṃ mamālaṃ jāyātve vedo mama mahimeti | te dve bhūtvocatuḥ | so 'bravīnna vai vāṃ mamālaṃ stho jāyatva iti | tāstistro bhūtvocatuḥ | so 'bravītsaṃbhavāmeti’ ityevamupakramo jñeyaḥ |dekaṃ sāma tṛce kriyate stotrīyam’ iti samāsasthāmapyṛcamanūdya tritvavidhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā prāthamyavidhānamapi setsyati | na | tatrāpi samāsārthasyaiva vidhānābhyupagamāt | sarvastotrasāmnāṃ hi tṛcā evopādīyante | tatra yadi sakalaḥ samāsārtho na prāptaḥ syāttataḥ sarvavidhirbhavet | sarvatra carmaḥ sāmacodanayaiva pāṭhakrameṇa ca prāptā dṛśyante | tena ‘na ceda( a. 1 pā. 4 a. 6 sū.9 )nyena śiṣṭāḥ’ ityevaṃ na vidhīyante | ‘vapaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ’ ityatrāpi yāvadvaṣaṭkāraṃ samāsārtho vidhīyate | tatra yadyṛgvadeva sarvatra bhakṣaḥ prāptaḥ syāttato vidhiśaktyā mucyeta | sa tu navasu camaseṣu graheṣu cāprāpto nimittatvena copanīto na hātumanuvadituṃ vā śakyate | yadi tu ṛcāmapi kvacidaprāptirbhavettataḥ samāse viśeṣābhāvādbhavedeva vidhiḥ | sarvastotrasāmasu tu tāḥ prāptāḥ | api ca tritvamṛcāṃ vidhīyate | tāśca pradhānatvātsāpekṣatve 'pi samasyante | natviha prāthamyaṃ bhakṣamātrasaṃbandhītyuktam | tasmādvaṣaṭkāranimittaṃ bhakṣaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā bhūyaḥ samākhyābhakṣaḥ kartavyo na tasyaiva prāthamyamiti siddham || 31 ||

kimetāvadbhireva nimittairbhakṣaḥ | netyucyate | homābhiṣavābhyāmaparo bhakṣaḥ | katham | evaṃ hyāha ‘havirdhāne grāvabhirabhiṣutyā ' 'havanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ paretya sadasi bhakṣānbhakṣayanti’ iti | tatra homābhiṣavau tāvatsaguṇau prāptau na vidhīyete | dīkṣā
dīkṣāvākyavaditi | ‘adhvaryurgṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayati, tata udgātāraṃ tato hotāraṃ, tatastaṃ pratiprasthātā dīkṣayitvā 'rdhino dīkṣayati—brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prastotāramudgātuḥ, maitrāvaruṇaṃ, hotuḥ, tatastaṃ neṣṭhā dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyino dīkṣayati—āgnīdhnaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratihartā ramudgāturacchāvākaṃ hotuḥ, tatastamunnetā dīkṣayitvā pādino dīkṣayati—potāraṃ brahmaṇaḥ subrahmaṇyamudgātuḥ, grāvastutaṃ hotuḥ, tatastamanyo brāhmaṇo dīkṣayati brahmacārī vā ' 'cāryapreṣitaḥ’ ityevaṃ satrātmakadvādaśāhaprakaraṇapaṭhitavākyavādityarthaḥ |vākyavatkra
mārthā śrutiriti cet | tacca nāsti | arthādevāsya kramasya siddhatvāt | na hi hutasyābhiṣavaḥ saṃbhavati, na ca bhakṣitasya homaḥ | āhavanīyadeśācca sada āgacchantapratyañca eva pratipadyante | hotrādīnāṃ ca sadasi karmapravṛteravaśyaṃ vaṣaṭkārasamākhyānimittabhakṣārthaṃ sadaḥ somā ānetavyāḥ | adhvaryuṇā copahavo dātavyaḥ | tena sadasītyanūdyate | kevalaṃ tu bhakṣaṇamaprāptaṃ vidhīyate | tatra hutvā 'bhiṣutyetyetadupādānasyaitatprayojanaṃ kathaṃ nāma tatsamānakartṛko bhakṣaḥ sidhyediti | na hi nirjñā
nirjñāteti—homasya phalārthatvena, abhiṣavasya somasaṃskārārthatvena ca nirjñātaprayojanayorityarthaḥ |taprayojanayorhomābhiṣavayorbhakṣaṇāṅgatvaṃ saṃbhavati | bhakṣasya ca somasaṃskāratvamavagatameveti nāṅgatvārthamitarasaṃbandhaśravaṇam | ataścārthāddhomābhiṣavayornimittatvaṃ jñātam | ato homābhiṣavakāryapi somaṃ bhakṣayediti || 32 ||

atha yatra nimittasaṃpāto bhavati tatra kimanyanimittako bhakṣaḥ samuccīyate, atha vikalpyate, athavā bādhyata iti | tulyārthatvādvikalpaprāptāvabhidhīyate | praitu hoturityādinā viśeṣasaṃyogādaviśeṣaśāstraṃ homābhiṣavasaṃbaddhaṃ graheṣu caritārthaṃ śakyaṃ bādhitum | ataḥ śeṣe tatsyāditi || 33 ||

syādvā prāptirnimittatvāt | vaṣaṭkaraṇādinimitte sati pratyakṣopadeśenaiva vaṣaṭkārādisaṃbandhena prāptiḥ | na ca tasya sāmānyena pravṛttiḥ | vaṣaṭkṛteṣu someṣu viśeṣarūpeṇaiva
pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt | kāmaṃ vā samākhyā viprakṛṣṭatvāddurbalā syāt | sā 'pi tvanavakāśatvādavaśyamaṅgīkartavyā | tathā sati ca prāptimātre 'sau vyāpriyate nānyannivartate | saṃbhavati hi sāvayavasya dravyasyānekenāpi bhakṣaṇaṃ, viśeṣatastiktakaṭukasya somasya | śrūyate ca ‘alpaṃ bhakṣayet’ iti | na ca niḥśeṣabhakṣaṇe 'lpatvamavakalpate | saśeṣe ca pratipattyapekṣiṇi bhavati bhakṣāntarasyāvakāśaḥ | tasmātsamāveśaḥ kartavya iti | || 34 || 35 ||

ekasminpātre 'neko bhakṣayitā sādhitaḥ | idānīṃ tadgatāḥ kramādiviśeṣāḥ pratipādyante | tatrādhvaryau prathamaṃ bhakṣayati na samarpaṇabhūyastvena prayogo vikṣepsya
vikṣepsyata iti | adhvaryorhomakartṛtvena taddhasta eva pātrasattvena svīyaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ tena kṛtvā 'nyasmai dāne 'rpaṇapratyarpaṇādigauravaṃ nā ' 'padyata iti bhāvaḥ |te | anyathā punaradhvaryuṇā samarpite punarapi tasmai samarpaṇādvikṣepaḥ syāditi matvā kramādadhvaryuḥ pūrva ityāha || 36 ||

balavati pramāṇe vihite durbalopanyāsaḥ kliṣṭo bhavatīti mantravarṇaṃ tāvadupanyasyati | tatra grāvastutiparo mantro hautrakāriṇāṃ prathamaṃ bhakṣaṃ darśayati | ete vadanti—abhiṣave kriyamāṇeṃ śabdaṃ kurvanti, śatavatsahasravadabhikrandanti—vadanamevottareṇābhikrandanena viśeṣitaṃ, haritobhirāsabhiḥ—somasaṃparkānnīlākṛtairmukhaiḥ | viṣṭvī
viṣṭvī—yajñaṃ prāpyeti vedabhāṣye |—karmaṇi, grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ—
śobhanakāriṇaḥ, sukṛtyayā—sukṛttvena, hotuścit—hoturapi, pūrve haviradyaṃ—hoturyatprathamamadanīyaṃ, tadāśata—bhuktavanta iti bruvan vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣa iti darśayati | evaṃ ‘hoteva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhi’ iti | yathā hotā prathamaṃ pibatītyupamānātprasiddhirgamyate || 37 ||

‘vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ’ iti viśiṣṭavidhānaṃ pūrvamevoktam | apūrvatvācca nānekavidhidoṣaḥ | samāsaścādhikaḥ samāsenaikapadībhūtaikakārakavidhānāt ‘tasya ta( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 6 )syopadiśyeta’ ityetannāsti || 38 ||

yathānimittaṃ naimittikopanipātāt ‘vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti’ iti prathamaṃ hotṛvyāpāro nimittaṃ paścādadhvaryorhomaḥ | nanu ca tasyāpyabhiṣavaḥ prathamataramāsīt | satyamāsīt, na tu tāvato nimittatvamubhābhyāṃ vā | na hi tayordharmaśāstramityevaṃ sahitayornimittatvāt | yasya ca nāma ‘hotuścitpūrve haviradyamāśata’ ityetasmāddhotureva kevalasya prathamaṃ bhakṣabhrāntistasyāpyetena sūtradvayena vaṣaṭkartṛmātre hotṛśabda iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati || 39 ||
‘tasmātsomo nānupahūtena’ ityetasyārthakathanārthamuttaravivakṣārthaṃ caitatsūtram || 40 ||
tadupahvānaṃ kena kartavyamata āha—‘upahūta upahvayasva’ ityaneneti | ubhayoranujñāpyānujñāpakayorvyāpārapradarśanārthaṃ sakaloccāraṇam | sarvathā laukikena tāvanna kartavyamityarthaḥ || 41 ||
vadanamiti vā pāṭhaḥ | samastameva praśnaprativacanayorekatra vā laukikaḥ prayoga iti prāptāvucyate | arthakrameṇa pāṭhakramaṃ bādhitvopahūta ityevamabhyanujñāyāṃ prayoktavyaḥ || 42 ||

div.head: ekapātrāṇāmanujñāpya bhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
div.p:
yadyetadatyantāprāptaṃ vidhīyeta tato yataḥ kutaścitprārthyeta | laukikameva tvetanniya
myate | tasya yādṛśe viṣaye prāptiḥ sā na nivāryate | samānapātrāṇāṃ tu ‘sa( a. 10 pā. 3 sū. 53 )maṃ syādaśrutatvāt’ ityanena nyāyena samavibhāge sati vaiṣamyaprasaktāvanujñāpya kāryam | satyapi somenānucchiṣṭatve tatkṛte cādṛṣṭadoṣābhāve pratyakṣeṇaiva sahabhojanādvyalīkotpatterupapatteranujñāvasaro bhavati | tasmādekapātrāṇāmiti || 43 ||

jyotiṣṭome ṛtugrahejyāsu yajamānasaptamānāṃ yājyāprayogārthe varaṇamāmnātam | teṣu yajamānasya yājyā, tasyāśca pakṣadvayaṃ vihitaṃ hotre pratyarpaṇaṃ svayaṃ voccāraṇam | tatra yadā svayaṃ yajati tadā kiṃ vaṣaṭkārastannimittaśca bhakṣo 'panīyate neti saṃdehe, nāpanayo vacanābhāvāt | anyāpanaye ca nānyasyāpanayaḥ | asaṃbandhāt | yājyāmātrasya hyapanayanaṃ śrūyate na vaṣaṭkārabhakṣayoḥ | tasmādyathā yājyāyā apanaye satyapi hoturvaraṇaṃ nāpanīyate tathā bhakṣo 'pīti | nanu ca yadā svayaṃ yajate tadā naivāpanayo bhavati
‘yajamānasya yājyā’ iti vacanāt | yadā tu so 'bhipreṣyati tadā 'panayo 'ta evaṃ vicārayitavyaṃ kiṃ yājyāpanaye yajamānādbhakṣo 'panīyate neti | ucyate |

hautrasamākhyayā hi prāk ‘yajamānasya yājyā’ iti hyato vacanātsarvaṃ hotuḥ prāpitam | tatra vacanena yājyāmātraṃ yajamānasaṃbandhi kṛtaṃ, vaṣaṭkārādayastu hotustadavasthā eva | yadi punaryajamānādapanaya iti vyākhyāyeta tatastasya yājyāmātraṃ prāpitaṃ sadapanīyata iti vaṣaṭkārādiprāptyabhāvādapanayāśaṅkaiva na syāt | tasmāt ‘yajamānasya yājyā’ ityanena yājyāmātrāpanayādvaṣaṭkārasya ca yājyāto 'tyantavyatirekādaṅgāṅgitvābhāvācca yajamānena prayujyamānāyā upari hotā vaṣaṭkṛtya bhakṣayet | vaṣaṭkāranimitto hi bhakṣo na yājyānimitta ityanapanītaḥ || 44 ||

yadi ‘yajamānasya yājyā’ ityetāvanmātrameva śrūyeta tataḥ kadācinnāpanīyeta bhakṣaḥ | iha tvevaṃ śrūyate ‘svayaṃ niṣadya yajati’ iti | vaṣaṭkāreṇa ca
rarthaḥ samāpyate tāvannāvānitavyam | ekakartṛkatve ca yājyāvaṣaṭkārayoridamupapadyate nānyathā | tasmādyatra yājyā tatra vaṣaṭkārabhakṣāvapītyantareṇāpyekatvamaṅgabhāvaṃ cāpanayo vijñāyate || 45 ||
yattu pravaravaditi | tatrocyate |

tannāma nimittāpanayādapanīyate yadapanetuṃ śakyate, anyatra ca yojayitum | na ca pravarasya yājyāpanayavelāyāṃ hoturapanayanaṃ śakyam | nāpi yajamāne 'tikrāntakālasya karaṇātsaguṇaṃ varaṇam | bhakṣasya tu dvayamapi śakyaṃ, tasmādiha dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyam | i
evaṃ tāvadyathābhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā 'nyathā vyācikhyāsurādau bhāṣyaṃ tāvadākṣipati—idaṃ tvihetyādinā |daṃ tviha vaktavyam | kimiti tatra pravarāpanayo na śakyate, yadā sarvavaikalpikānyādita evānyatarato 'vadhārya prayoga ārabhyate | śakyaṃ hi pravaravelāyāmeva niścetuṃ kiṃ yajamāno yājyāṃ vakṣyati, uta hoteti | tathā niścite cānyatarasya varaṇaṃ kariṣyate | yadi hyetadyājyāvacanamurukra
urukramaviṣṇuyāgavaditi— | vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbhrātṛvyavān | taṃ barhiṣadaṃ kṛtvā śabhyayā sphyena ca vyūhet, idamahamamuṃ cāmuṃ ca vyūhāmīti | yaṃ dviṣyāttaṃ dhyāyet | yadadho 'vamṛdyedyacca sphya āśliṣyet, tadviṣṇava urukramāyāvadyati’ iti vākyena, adhovarmadanasphyāśleṣayornirmitte vidhīyamānorukramaviṣṇuyāgavadityarthaḥ |ma
viṣṇuyāgavannaimittikaṃ bhavettataḥ prāṅ nimittopajananādanavadhṛtasadbhāvaṃ sanna kārayedapi pravaraṇam | nityaṃ caitacchaknoti prathamameva svānusāri varaṇaṃ niyantum | yadapi hoturna śakyamapanetum | kathametaddhoturapanīyeta, yadā tasyā ' 'tmīyayājyārthamavaśyakartavyameveti | na kiṃcidetadarthaṃ pṛthagvaraṇaṃ yasyāpanaya āśaṅkyeta | śakyaṃ hi yājyāsahasrārthamapi tantreṇaikameva varaṇaṃ kartumadṛṣṭārthaṃ ca | ataḥ samastajyotiṣṭomaprayogārthaṃ prathamameva vṛte sati kriyata iti, agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvādapi tantram | yadapi yajamānasya bhraṣṭāvasaraṃ kriyamāṇaṃ viguṇaṃ bhavatīti tadapi ‘guṇa( a. 10 pā. 2 sū. 63 )lope ca mukhyasya’ ityanena viruddham | na ca tatra prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ kaścitprayogaviśeṣo bhavati | yadapi yathāśrutameva prakṛtau kartavyamiti | tatsarvaśaktya( a. 6 pā. 3 a. 1 )dhikaraṇena viruddham | śakyameva yathākālaṃ saṃpādayitumityuktam | ata evaṃ sūtraṃ netavyaṃ, kāraṇāntareṇaitatprasiddhimaṅgīkṛtya nānyasyāpanaye 'nyasyāpanaya ityetāvatā pūrvamudāhṛtam | idānīṃ tu bravīti ‘pravṛttatvātpravarasyānapāyaḥ’ yājyāntarārthaṃ pravṛttatvādityabhiprāyaḥ | tena yajamāvo 'pi yadi vakṣyati yadi ca preṣyati tathā 'pītarārthaṃ bhavitavyameva pravaraṇena | etāvatā tu vaiṣamyaṃ yadasau na vaṣaṭkārabhakṣavadetadyājyānusāraṃ pratipadyata iti || 46 ||

yo 'yaṃ jyotiṣṭome rājanyena vaiśyena ca nimittena naimittikaḥ phalacamasaḥ śrūyate, nyagrodhastibhīḥ—nyagrodhāṅkurān nyagrodhaphalāni vā, tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhanyunmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchet, iti | sa kiṃ bhakṣavikāra utejyāvikāra iti saṃdehe, bibhakṣayiṣediti śrutisaṃyogāttamiti prakṛtagrāhiśrutisaṃyogātpunarapi bhakṣaśrutisaṃyogādānantaryaśruteḥ samāna
vākyopādānācca bhakṣo bhūtvā tatsamānasthānaṃ bhakṣagatameva somaṃ vikuryānna yāgagatam | na hyanyatra śrutamanyaviṣayasya bādhane samartham | yāgasaṃbandhaścāsya prakaraṇādvijñāyate | tacca durbalam | evaṃ cotpattivākyaśiṣṭaḥ somo yāgādarthakarmaṇo na nivartiṣyate | pratipattibādhe tu vinā 'pi tāvacchrutyā mando 'parādhaḥ kimuta śrutāveva satyām | tasmādbhakṣavikāraḥ || 47 ||

liṅgadarśanena tāvadbhāṣyakāra upakramate | sati hījyāvikāratve saumikabhakṣasaṃbandho 'sya labhyate | tataśca tatsthānāpattyā nirākṛtatvāt | ‘na girā gireti brūyāt’ i
itivaditi—‘airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam’ ityanena pāṭhaprāpte mantra harāpadavidhāne girāpadanivṛttyā yathā ‘na girā mireti’ niṣedho nityānuvādastathā ‘na somam’ ityayamapatyirthaḥ |tivat ‘na somam’ ityanuvādaḥ setsyati | liṅgaṃ tvetannāsatyāṃ yāgasaṃbandhaprāptau sādhakamiti manyamāna āha | kathamasati yajisaṃbandhe tadvikāratvamiti | itarastu darśayati | ‘sa yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet’ nyagrodhastibhīrāhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhanyunmṛjya tābhiryājayediti saṃbadhyate | na hyavaśyaṃ paratraiva śrutenā ' 'khyātena saha saṃbandho bhavati | na ca pāṭhāpekṣayā pūrvakālatvaṃ ktvāśabdenocyate | bhavati hi gacchati bhuktvetyapi gamanamapekṣya bhojanasya pūrvakālatvam | ato vākyenaiva yajisaṃbandhaḥ | satyapi yājaya
tisaṃbandhe yajisaṃbandha evāyaṃ draṣṭavyo ‘grāmakāmaṃ yājayet’ itivat | aṅgakartuḥ prāptatvādeva niṣphalatvena cānupadeśyatvāt | evaṃ ca sati ‘tamasmai bhakṣam’ iti ‘na somam’ iti cobhayamapi prāptamanuvadiṣyate | na tveṣā yojanā 'vakalpate | katham |

‘sa yadi somaṃ bibhakṣayiṣet’ ityetadvyavadhāne sati yājayatisaṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ ‘tamastai’ iti ca sarvanāmnaḥ śrutyaiva prakṛtagrahaṇasāmarthyamānantaryaṃ ca bādhyeyātām | ‘sa yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet’ ityasya yadiśabdasaṃbandhādupahata
upahatā vidhiśaktirna phalacamasasaṃyoge vidhatta iti pā. |vidhiśaktirna phalacamasasaṃyo
phalacamasasaṃyogāmiti— phalacamasaviśiṣṭayāgamityarthaḥ |gaṃ vidhatte | nimittatvena copayoge sati nirākāṅkṣībhūtasya sataḥ punaratyantaviparītaṃ vidhitvaṃ kalpanīyam | tābhiryājayediti cātyantāśrutatṛtīyārthaḥ kalpyeta | tamasmā iti ca prādhānyena nirdeśo 'vagamyamāno 'pahnūyeta | prayacchediti cānanyapare vispaṣṭe vidhau sati nānuvādatvāṅgīkaraṇaṃ yuktam | na ca yājayatiśabdādupasarjanībhūtaṃ yajiṃ niṣkṛṣya phalacamasasaṃbandho yuktaḥ | sarveṇa ca jyotiṣṭomena saṃbandhātsamastaṃ somaṃ bādhitvā tenaiva yāgaḥ kriyeta sarvaṃ viruddhaṃ caitat | bhāṣyakāro 'pi yājayitumiti gamyata ityāha, na yājayedityanena saṃbandham | sūtrakāro 'pi ca ‘saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt’ | iti hetumāha, na yājayatisaṃbandhāditi | tasmādayuktametat | anye tu yāgo hi prakṛto 'stītyato vacanādyāgasaṃbandhānavakḷptiṃ manyamānāstamasmai prayacchetkimarthaṃ prakaraṇādyājayitumiti gamyata iti varṇayanti | teṣāmapi tu samastasomavikāratvaṃ tacchabdopanītasvavā
kyāvagatabhakṣasaṃbandhabādhastamiti ca pulliṅganirdeśo na ghaṭate | bhakṣyavyavahitena ca prayacchedityākhyātena saṃbandhaḥ | tasmādbhakṣasaṃyogāparityāgenaiva siddhānto 'pi vyākhyeyaḥ | katham |

lg.l: apūrvo vaiṣa codyeta bhakṣaḥ prakṛta eva vā |

div.p:
yadi tāvadapūrva eva bhakṣaścodyate tato 'pyārādupakārakatvaṃ na bhavati | adṛṣṭakalpanātprakaraṇaviniyogaviprakarṣādasaṃbaddhopakāritvācca | tathā taṃ prayacchediti dvitīyayā vispaṣṭaṃ saṃskāryatvaṃ gamyate | anyathā hi teneti prāpnoti | tasmātsaṃskāraḥ | saṃskārasya caiṣa svabhāvo yadupayuktamupayokṣyamāṇaṃ vā dravyamavalambate | tatrāpi bhakṣitasya punarupayogāsaṃbhavādupayuktasaṃskāratvameva jñāyate | tena phalacamasaḥ saṃskārabhūtaṃ bhakṣamupasarpanneva śakyo niyoktuṃ yadi kvacidupayogaṃ gacchasi tato bhakṣaṇena saṃskriyase nānyatheti | sa copayujyamānatvaṃ prārthayamānaḥ prakaraṇādyāgopayogitvaṃ pratipadyate | tatrāpi yāvatyanupayujyamāno yajamānabhakṣasaṃskāryatvaṃ na pratipadyate tāvataiva yajñabhāgenārthāpattyā saṃbadhyata ityavadhāraṇādyajamāna camasābhyāsenaivaikena saṃbadhyate | na hi grahacamasāntareṣvanupayujyamānasyāsya yajamānabhakṣatvamanupapannam | ataḥ somo 'pyanugrahīṣyate | yadvā jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇena saṃbaddho 'yaṃ bhakṣaśabda uccāryamāṇaḥ prakṛtaṃ somabhakṣamevāvalambate | sa ca yāgopayuktadravyaśeṣasaṃskāratvena prajñāta iti phalacamasamapi tādṛśameva saṃskartuṃ śaknoti | na tvasāvidānīmanyaprayojanaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum | na ca tasya karmāntaratve kiṃcicchabdāntarādi kāraṇamasti | api ca ‘sa yadi somaṃ bibhakṣayiṣet’ iti svavākyopāttenaiva somabhakṣaṇena saṃbandho vijñāyate | anyathā hi tadupādānaṃ vyarthameva syāt | na ca ‘na somam’ ityanuvādo 'vakalpate | yadi bhakṣāntaramevedamārādupakārakaṃ codyeta tataḥ samānakāryatvābhāvānnaiva somaṃ nivartayet | anivartite ca tasminna pratiṣedhānuvādaḥ syāt | na ca vidhiryu
vidhiriti—vidhitvaṃ ca prakṛte 'nuvādapratiyogitvarūpaṃ vidhiniṣedhasādhāraṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ, na tu niṣedhapratiyogitvarūpam | tasya niṣedhe 'saṃbhavāditi |ktaḥ | vākyabhedānekādṛṣṭakalpanāprasaṅgāt |
asaṃbaddhaṃ ca vākyaṃ bhavet, yadi somaṃ bhakṣaṇena saṃskartumicchettataḥ phalacamasabhakṣaṇamārādupakārakaṃ kuryātphalacamasaṃ vā saṃskuryāditi | yadā tvayamartho gṛhyate, yena bhakṣaṇena yathābhūtaṃ somaṃ saṃskartumicchettena tathābhūtameva phalacamasaṃ saṃskuryāditi, tadā 'rthāpattyā yajamānacamasayāgāmyāmasaṃbandhaḥ kṛto bhavati | tasmādijyāyāmayaṃ somavikāra iti siddham | saiṣā vyavadhā
vyavadhāraṇeti—vākyānyathātvakaraṇamityarthaḥ |raṇakalpaneti | yathaivāśvapratigraheṣṭayāṃ ‘yāvato 'śvānpratigṛhṇīyāt, iti śrute pratigrāhayediti vyavadhārya kalpitaṃ tathaivātra ‘bhakṣaṃ prayacchet’ iti śrute yāgasādhanaṃ prayacchediti kalpyate | etena ‘pūtīkānamiṣuṇuyāt’ ityādīni vyākhyātāni || 48 ||
homānuvādena darbhataruṇakavidhirijyāvikāratve 'vakalpate || 49 ||
saṃdigdhayāgasādhanonnayanaikavākyatā caitattulyatve 'vakalpate nānyathātve || 50 ||
somapratiṣedhānuvādaśca liṅgamiti vyākhyātam || 51 ||

daśapeye ‘śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somān bhakṣayanti | daśa daśaikaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpeyuḥ’ iti | tatra rājanyacamaso 'pi kiṃ brāhmaṇaireva daśabhirbhakṣayitavya uta rājanyairiti saṃdehaḥ | kaḥ punaḥ saṃdehahetuḥ | kecidāhuḥ | vacanavyaktibheda iti | yadi hi daśa daśaikaikamiti vidhistatastulyajātīyeṣu sarvatra vihiteṣu ‘śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ’ iti yathāprāptānuvādo brāhmaṇagrāmavadbhūmnā bhavatīti rājanyā daśa | atha punaḥ ‘śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ’ iti vidhiḥ ‘daśa daśaikaikam’ ityanuvādastato vidhau gauṇatvāsaṃbhavātsarvatra brāhmaṇaireva bhakṣayitavyamiti brāhmaṇā daśa | kiṃ tāvatprāptam, anuprasarpeyurityasya vidhisāmarthyādbhakṣayantīti cānuvādasāmarthyāddaśadaśaikaikamiti vidhau sati ke daśetyapekṣāyāṃ tulyajātīyeṣu saṃkhyāvṛttisvābhāvyādbrāhmaṇacamaseṣu brāhmaṇā rājanyacamase rājanyā daśeti gamyate | sāmānyāditi ca-daśasaṃkhyāṃ codayitvā nivṛttavyāpāre śāstre tatpūraṇārthamaśrutāsu vyaktiṣūpādīyamānāsu yāsāṃ kiṃcitpratyāyakamasti tā grahītavyāstulyajātīyānāṃ ca sāmānyaṃ gamakaṃ vidyate na jātyantarānugatānām | athavā sāmānyāditi—viṣayasāmānyāt, ‘arthaikatve dravya( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 sū. 12 )guṇayoḥ’ iti hi phalacamasaṃ pratyupādīyamānayoḥ kṣatriyatvadaśatvayoḥ parasparaniyame sati yāvati viṣaye daśatvaṃ tāvati rājanyatvamityavagamyata iti balāddaśa rājanyā vijñāyante | athavā sāmānyāditi—tulyakāryaṃ tulyajātīyaṃ ca tulyasya bādhakaṃ bhavati | tadyadi rājasūyacodanāto rājanyatvaṃ prāptaṃ prakṛtitaścaikatvaṃ, tatra daśatvaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ sāmānyādātideśikatvāccaikatvaṃ bādhate na jātiṃ, bhinnakāryatvāt | tataścānivṛttajātireva yajamānacamaso daśatvena yojayitavya iti daśa rājanyā bhavanti | nanu ca daśatve vidhīyamāne yadekaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpantīti
viśiṣṭānuvādādvākyaṃ bhidyate | naiṣa doṣaḥ | camasamiti dvitīyāntaṃ kevalamanūdyate | tāvatā tu saṃskāryatvaṃ gamyate | na ca camasānāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ muktvā 'nyaḥ saṃskāraḥ | tena sa evānuprasarpaṇaśabdena lakṣyate | tanna ca pratyekameva bhakṣaṇaṃ prāptamiti tadapyanūdyate | tasmānna vākyabhedaḥ || 52 ||
na vā rājanyā bhakṣayeyuḥ | kutaḥ |

lg.l: anyathā tadupādānaṃ gauṇaṃ vyarthaṃ ca te bhavet ||

div.p:
tulye na brāhmaṇaśabdena sarvacamaseṣu brāhmaṇāḥ pratipādyante | te na kutaścidapi vyāvartayitavyāḥ | na ca gauṇatvakāraṇaṃ kiṃcidasti | pramāṇāntareṇa vispaṣṭarājanyānupādānāt | samastameva caitadanarthakaṃ punaḥśravaṇaṃ bhavet | asmatpakṣe punaḥ prayogavacanādibhyo vidhiśaktimanumāya brāhmaṇaśate vihite ‘daśadaśaikaikam’ iti vibhāgārthā punaḥśrutiḥ | athavā ‘samaṃ syā( a. 10 pā. 3 sū. 53 )daśrutitvāt’ iti nyāyena daśa daśa prāptā mukhyayaiva vṛttyā 'nuvadiṣyante | brāhmaṇaśatena ca daśa daśakairavasthitena daśasvapi camaseṣvavaruddheṣu na kaścidrājanyānāmavakāśo vidyate | tasmādbrāhmaṇā da
daśeti—rājanyacamasaṃ bhakṣayeyuriti śeṣaḥśeti | na tviyaṃ vyākhyā ghaṭate | yadi hi ‘śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ’ ityeṣa vidhiḥ syāttato 'tideśaprāptabhakṣānuvādādviśiṣṭavidhānāsaṃbhavenānyataratra vidhīyamāne yadi śataṃ vidhīyate brāhmaṇā ityanarthakaṃ siddhāntahāniśca | brāhmaṇavidhau tu śatamityanarthakam | atha yacchataṃ bhakṣayantītyanūdya brāhmaṇā vidhīyante, kena śataṃ prāptamiti vaktavyam | atha yadbrāhmaṇā bhakṣayantītyanūdya śataṃ vidhīyate tato rājanyavyāvṛttyā brāhmaṇaśruterviśeṣaṇatvādviśiṣṭānuvādādvākyabhedaḥ | rājanyacamase
na ca kiṃcitkṛtaṃ syāt | tatraikaikamityasya rājanyacamase 'nuvādāsaṃbhavāttatrānye rājanyā daśa vidhīyerannitaratra ca brāhmaṇaśataṃ navasu camaseṣu na vidmaḥ kena vibhāgena syāditi | atha somasaṃbandhāt, brāhmaṇā iti prāptānuvādaḥ kalpyate tathā 'pi phalacamasavyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭānuvādo doṣo 'styeva | phalacamase ca punarapi na kaścidvyāpāra iti pūrvavadeva prasaṅgaḥ | na ca somaśabdabrāhmaṇaśabdayorarthāntare 'pi phalacamase rājanye vā prayoga iti kiṃcitpramāṇam | aviśeṣitabhakṣānuvāde paśupuroḍāśādibhakṣeṣvapi śataprasaṅgaḥ | na hyasau pradhānena viśeṣyate | ‘sarveṣāṃ
( a0 3 pā0 7 a0 1 sū0 2 ) vā śeṣatvasyātatprayuktatvāt’ ityevamaṅgapradhānārthatvapratīteḥ | somaśabdaścātyantamevānarthakaḥ syāt | atha somānityetāvanmātramanūdya śataṃ vidhīyate tataḥ krayādārabhya yāvānsomasaṃskāraḥ sa sarvaḥ śatena kartavyastatra bhakṣayatiranarthaka eva syāt | atha bhakṣayatau śatabrāhmaṇasaṃbandho vidhīyate tathā puroḍāśādiṣvapi prasaṅgāt | somaśabdānarthakyamastyeva | some tu brāhmaṇaśatasaṃbandhavidhānamakriyāśabdatvādevāśakyam | punarapi phalacamase stibhīrūpatvenāsome rājanyaprāptirnaiva vāryate | tenaitadvākyamanupapannam | tathā ‘daśadaśaikaikam’ ityasyāpyanupahatavidhiśakteḥ svatantravidhitvāvadhāritasyānuvādatvaṃ niṣphalamapramāṇakaṃ ca | kathaṃ hi pūrveṇa vartamānāpadeśaḥ sanvidhiḥ syādayaṃ cānuvādaḥ | na ca nimittatvādibhirvinā 'nekākhyātaikavākyatvaṃ ghaṭate | na ca yadiśabdādirahitasya nimittatvādipratītirasti | na ca ‘daśa daśaikaikam’ ityatra kācitstutiḥ pratīyate | yena tadartho 'nuvāda ekavākyatvaṃ copapadyeta | tasmātpṛthagbhūtasya vākyasya samastānuvādatvamayuktamiti kiṃcidvidhātavyam | tatra yadi tāvacchatasyāniyamaprasaṅge daśa daśeti vidhīyate, tataśca ekaikamityanupapannaṃ, vidhā
vidhāna iti—ekaikamityasyāpi vidhāne vidheyānekatvaprayuktavākyabhedāpatterityarthaḥ |ne vākyabhedaprasakteḥ | vaṣaṭkartṝṇāṃ cānekacamasaprāptau satyāmanuvāda
anuvādatvāsaṃbhavāditi—ekaikamityasyeti śeṣaḥ |tvāsaṃbhavādgraheṣvapi pūrveṇa
pūrveṇa prāptatvāditi—‘śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somān bhakṣayanti’ ityanena pūrvatanavākyenāviśeṣādgraheṣvapi bhakṣaṇasya prāptatvādityarthaḥ | prāptatvāccamasaśabdo 'narthakaḥ | viśiṃṣaṃśca vākyaṃ bhindyāt | na ca daśa daśaikaikamityanuvādaḥ saṃbhavati | śatasyāpi camasasaṃskārārthamupādīyamānasya praticamasaṃ sāmastyena prāpteḥ | kartṛsaṃskārārthe hi sati dakṣiṇāvadvibhāgaprāptyā ‘samaṃ syāt’ iti daśa daśaikamiti prāpnuyāt | tatra satyapi vidhau parisaṃkhyā
syāt | anekasminnapi vā daśa daśa bhakṣayitāraḥ prāpnuvanti | ekasminnapi vā camase daśānāṃ daśānāṃ prasaṅgaḥ, śatasyaiva daśadaśakairgaṇaiḥ sthitvā camase bhakṣaṇaṃ syāt | tasmādvākyadvayamasmin vyākhyāne 'nupapannamiti, evaṃ vyākhyeyam | dve apyete vākye vidhāyake, tatsarūpatvāt | tatrāpi ‘daśa daśaikaikam’ ityetadeva pūrvapakṣavatprathamamāśrīyate | yathoktena nyāyena kramāntarasyānupapatteḥ | anuprasarpantītyanena tāvadatideśaprāptabhakṣopalakṣaṇasaṃbandhādyathā phalacamasabhakṣeṇa yāgopalakṣaṇamuktaṃ, tena yaccamasamanuprasarpantīti, anyatarasya sākāṅkṣatvādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamaṅgīkṛtyānuvādo, daśa daśeti vidhiḥ | camasaprādhānyācca pratyekaṃ daśatvabhedādvīpsā bhavati | tataḥ pūrvaṃ śatamitareṇa vākyenānūdya yacchataṃ somān bhakṣayanti tadbrāhmaṇā iti vidhiḥ | na hi vidhisaṃbhave samastavākyānuvādatvaṃ yuktam | brāhmaṇaśabdasya ca gauṇatvam | śatamātrasaṃbandhena ca kṛtārthatvādatantrameva somaśabdo bhakṣayatiśceti na viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣaḥ | nāpi somaśabdādyāgasādhanamātralakṣaṇayā phalacamasapratipādane 'pi doṣaḥ | tena saṃkhyāpūraṇārthaṃ yāvadaśrutarājanyakalpanā prakramyate tāvadbrāhmaṇaśrutyā saṃkhyāntaraṃ vidhāya nairākāṅkṣyaṃ kriyate | na caivaṃ sati graheṣu prasaṅgaḥ | daśa daśetyasya camasaviṣayatvāt | rājanyacamase 'pi daśakaprāptau satyāṃ brāhmaṇadaśakenaivāvarodha iti dravye saṃskṛte kṛtārthatvādyajamānasya naiva bhakṣaṇena bhavitavyam | tasmādbrāhmaṇā
daśeti—rājanyacamase bhakṣayitāra iti śeṣaḥ |daśeti siddham |

yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa brāhmaṇarājanyānāṃ sahabhakṣaṇavipratiṣedhasya
uttaraṃ dattamiti—pūrvaṃpakṣagranthe kecidāhurityādinā kṛtāyāḥ śaṅkāyā iti śeṣaḥ |‘na somenocchiṣṭā bhavanti’ ityuttaraṃ dattaṃ tatra keciccodayanti | phalacamase somatvābhāvātkathamanucchiṣṭatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti | na tveṣa doṣaḥ | sthānāpattyā somadharmalābhāt | vakṣyati hi ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 13 sū. 36 ) |‘naimittikamatulyatvādasamānavidhānaṃ syāt’ ( a. 9 pā. 2 a. 12 sū. 40 ) |‘dharmasyārthakṛtatvāt’ iti ca | nanu puruṣadharmo 'yamanucchiṣṭatvaṃ na yuktaṃ sthānāpattyā 'nyatra kalpayitum | na kalpyeta, yadi puruṣadharmo 'yaṃ syāt, na tvayaṃ puruṣadharmaḥ, phalakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt | somabhakṣaviṣaye cocchiṣṭatvaprasaṅge 'nucchiṣṭatvamabhihitam | sa ca karmadharma iti sthitam | ato yathaiva somaḥ saṃskriyamāṇaḥ karturucchiṣṭatāṃ nā ' 'pādayati, evaṃ tatkāryāpannaḥ phalacamaso 'pi | tasmātpūrvayaivopapattyā brāhmaṇalābhasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ || 53 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyādhyāyasya pañcamaḥ pādaḥ |

div.p:
idānīmanārabhyādhītānāṃ prakṛtiliṅgasaṃyuktānāṃ prakaraṇasaṃbandhe sati kiṃ prakṛtiprakaraṇasaṃbandha uta sarvārthatvamiti vicāraḥ | tatra śrutyādiṣaṭkābhāve 'pyaśvapratigraheṣṭivatkratusaṃbandho yojayitavyaḥ | sruvādyuddeśena hi, atra khādiratvādīni vidhīyante | te ca sruvādayaḥ ‘sruveṇāvadyati’ ‘sruveṇā ' 'dhāramādhārayati’ ‘sruveṇa pārvaṇau juhoti’ juhvā juhoti’ ityādibhirvākyaiḥ karmāṅgatvena pratipāditāḥ | tatsaṃbandhitvena copanītamātrāṇyeva khādiratvādīni sruvasaṃsparśinā kratukathaṃbhāvena gṛhyante | na hi teṣāmanyatphalamastīti caturthe vakṣyāmaḥ | na ca nirvyāpārājjātiviśeṣātphalotpattiravakalpate | na ca vyāpārasaṃbandhajananārthā kācitkriyā prastutā dṛśyate | nāpi vākyopāttā | na cātra sruvādirvidhīyate, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt | ataḥ sruvādyanuvādena vidhīyamānānāṃ khādiratvādīnāṃ sruvādisvarūpe 'nya
anyathā—kāṣṭāntareṇetyarthaḥ |thā 'pyupapadyamāne 'narthakaṃ vidhānamiti tadupaplāvitakarmasaṃbandho vijñāyate | tatrānārabhyavādatvādeva sruvādisaṃbandhasya prakṛtivikṛtiṣvaviśeṣātsarvārthatvamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ || 1 ||

sarvavidhīnāmaprāptasvaviṣayatvādyatra pramāṇāntareṇa prāptirnāsti tatra khādiratvādyupadeśaḥ | prakṛtau ca na kutaścitprāptiḥ | vikṛtiṣvaṅgāntarārthamavaśyakalpanīyenātideśena khādi
ratvādyapi prāpnotīti nopadeśamapekṣate | tena dviruktasyāsaṃbhava ityāha | tava dviruktatvādadviruktatvādvā mameti sūtram || 2 ||

prāpteriti vā pāṭhaḥ | satyaṃ dviruktatvamanyāyyaṃ, tatra kuta etadatideśaprāptatvādupadeśo vihanyate, na punarupadeśasiddhamatideśa eva prāpayediti | yuktaṃ ca padārthaviprakarṣādatideśo na syāt | saṃnikarṣāttu pūrvatarapravṛttopadeśāśrayaṇam | athocyeta, sāmānyaviṣayatvādupadeśo durbala iti | tadatideśe 'pi sarvāṅgaviṣayatvādaviśiṣṭam | tasmātsa rvārtho 'nārabhyavāda iti || 3 ||

sthitāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ codayati | yadyatideśādupadeśo balavānevaṃ sati tenaivopadeśenāvaruddhatvādatideśo naiva syāt | kutaḥ | śaknoti hi prakṛtivikṛtisādhāraṇaṃ khādiratvaṃ prākṛtopakārasādhane dṛṣṭaśaktitvādvikṛtiṃ nirākāṅkṣīkartum | tataśca prayājādidarśanaṃ virudhyate | tasmādatideśavinirmuktāyāṃ prakṛtāveva niveśo yukta iti || 4 ||

naitāvatā śakyaṃ sarvārthatvaṃ vyāvartayitum | na hyekasminnaṃśe 'tideśo bādhitaḥ sarvatraiva bādhito bhavati | tadyathā śaraiḥ kuśeṣu nivartiteṣvapi na prayājādayo nivartyante |
samānaviṣayamātre hi bādho vijñāyate | tena khādiratvādiprāptyaṃśamātrādatideśo nivartate | na ca khādiratvamakriyātmakatvācchaknoti vikṛtiṃ nirākāṅkṣīkartum | yugapacca prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ pravartamānamaśakyaṃ kḷptopakāratvena nirūpayitum | sākāṅkṣaṃ tu tat, sruvaprāptyabhāvāt | na cātideśābhyanujñāmantareṇa sruvaprāptiḥ saṃbhavati | na caitadvākyaṃ sruvasyāpi vidhāyakam | pradhāna kriyānupādāne sati viśiṣṭavidhāne 'nupapadyamāne vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt | tasmādanārabhyavādavidhiprāpite sruvasya khādiratve tadvarjamatideśaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ || 5 ||
atra tārkikaḥ kaścidāha prakṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ saṃkṣepavistārābhyāṃ vidhīyamānatvātprayājādivaditi || 6 ||

na tāvadīdṛ
īdṛśe 'rthe—śabdaikasamadhigamye 'rtha ityarthaḥ |śe 'rthe 'numānasya gatirityukta
uktamiti—tarkapāde pratyakṣasūtre ślokavārtike | ‘tasmādadṛṣṭapūrvatvātkenacidvastunā saha | dharmasya nānumeyatvamasādhāraṇavastuvat || 99 || ityādinoktamityarthaḥ |m | api cānumānamapyetanna bhavati |
anaikāntikatvāt | vikṛtāvapi saṃkṣepavistārābhyāṃ vidhirupalabhyate | tatraitatsyāt | ekena vihitatvātsaṃkṣepavistārayoranyataro naiva vidhāyaka iti | tadapi prakṛtau tulyamiti hetorasiddhatā | tenāvaśyaṃ vidhyanuvādanirapekṣaṃ saṃkṣepavistārābhidhānamātraṃ heturvaktavyaḥ | sa cānaikāntika ityuktam | evaṃ vā | svagotreṇa sūtradvayaṃ gamayitavyam | iti cet—tatsarvārthatvaṃ paśyasi, tadayuktam | yatra hi pātrāṇāṃ viniyogotpattistatra tadaṅgaṃ jātirvidhātuṃ śakyate | na ca vikṛtāvutpattiḥ | ataḥ pātraśūnyāyāṃ tasyāmaśakyā jātirvidhātum | prāptivaiṣamyāt | yadi hi prakṛtivikṛtyostulyavatpātrāṇi prāpnuyustataḥ sarvāvasthoddeśena jātividhānamavakalpeta | na tvevam | tasmātprakṛtyarthataika yukteti | tatrottaraṃ ‘na tulyatvāt’ iti | sarvathā 'nāramyavādaḥ prāptimapekṣate | tatra yā copadeśena prāptiryā cātideśena prāptiḥ sā sarvā 'pi prāptitvena tulyā | yadyapyupadeśātideśayoḥ saṃnikarṣaviprakarṣau vidyete tathā 'pi tau svaviṣaya eva balābalaṃ kuruto nānāramyavādena saha | anārabhyavādo hi pātradvāreṇa kratugāmitvāddhiprakṛṣṭataraḥ | tasmātsarvārthaḥ | tadvarjaṃ cātideśaḥ || 7 ||
‘prakṛtau vā dviruktatvāt’ ityetadeva nyāyyam | yattu tadvarjaṃ yāpayiṣyatīti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

padārthātideśapakṣe śāstrātideśapakṣe vā tadbhedātkadācidbhedo bhavet | yāgagatastu vyāpāro 'tidiśyata iti daśame vakṣyāmaḥ | sa ca niravayaktvādyugapadatidiśyate | anena cā ' 'tmasiddhayarthaṃ yugapadeva prayājādyapūrvāṇi gṛhyante | taiśca prathājādayaḥ | prayājādibhirapi svaśāstrāṇi | tena prakṛtivadityevaṃrūpasthātideśasyaikatvā
tsarvāṅgeṣvaviśiṣṭasya sarvatra pravṛttirapravṛttirvā, naikadeśeṣu | śarairapi kṛśāḥ prāptā eva bādhyanta ityuktaṃ balābalādhikaraṇe | tadyadi tāvadanārabhyavādānurodhena svādiratvādivivaye 'tideśaḥ parityajyate tata evāṅgantareṣvapīti sarvanivṛttiprasaṅgaḥ | tatra cokta
uktamiti—‘na codanaikārthyāt’ iti sūtre ‘na ca khādiratmavakriyātmakatvācchaknoti vikṛtiṃ nirākāṅkṣīkartum’ ityādinetyarthaḥ |m | atha keṣāṃcitprākṛtānāmanurodhena tadviṣayo 'tideśaḥ pramāṇaṃ kriyate, tataḥ svādiratvādiprāptirapyaviśiṣṭeti sphuṭaṃ dviruktatvaṃ prāpnoti | yāgagatavyāpārāpekṣitvācca svaprakaraṇāmnānamapyatikramya vikṛtayaḥ prākṛtaṃ tāvadagṛhṇantīti sarvatra sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ | tenāpyanārabhyavādādatideśaprāpteḥ prāthamyam | avaśyaṃ ca prakṛtiṣu sruvādiprāptirapekṣitavyā | yāvatā ca yatra na sruvādayaḥ prāpnuvanti tāvatā khādiratvādayo 'pīti nopadeśaviṣayatvaṃ ghaṭate | na caiṣāṃ kratusaṃbandho vispaṣṭaḥ | so 'pyanyathā 'nupapattyā sruvādidvāreṇa kalpayitavyaḥ | sarvārthatvavādī ca prakṛtisaṃbandhaṃ tāvadabhyupagacchati | tena ca parihṛta ānarthakye vikṛtisaṃbandho niṣpramāṇakaḥ | pramāṇavattaro hyatideśena kratusaṃbandhaḥ | yeṣāṃ tu kratusaṃbandha eva pratyakṣaste 'nārabhyavādā api sarvārthā eva | yathā ‘eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñamanvāyattaḥ’ ityevamādayaḥ | tasmātkhādiratvādi prakṛtyarthamiti siddham || 8 ||

apavādādhikaraṇametat | tatra pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva sāmidhenīsāptadaśyānārabhyavādasya prakṛ
tyarthatve, prakaraṇādhītena pāñcadaśyena saha vikalpa iti viśeṣāśaṅkāṃ nivartayati | kathaṃ punaḥ prākaraṇikena viśeṣavidhinā sahātulyabalasya vikalpo 'bhidhīyate | āha |

tulyapramāṇako hi viśeṣo bādhako bhavati na durbalapramāṇakaḥ | na ca kratuprayogādanyatra sāmidhenyo vidyante | tasmātkratuprayogaprāptistulyā | tataśca kiṃ prakaraṇamadhikaṃ kariṣyati | dvayostulyabalayoḥ pramāṇayorvirodhe sati balavattareṇa nirṇayaḥ kartavyaḥ | na ca prakaraṇaṃ vākyādbalavattaram | ato yāvatprakaraṇavyāpāro naiva bhavati tāvadvākyadvayena tulyabalena vikalpo 'vadhāryate | tena nyūnabalaṃ yadyapi prakaraṇasahasramapi ca sahāyī bhavati tathā 'pi na tadanurodhaḥ kartavyaḥ | tasmātprakṛtyarthaṃ sāptadaśyamiti prāpte brūmaḥ |

sābhidhenīsvarūpaprayuktatve 'narthikā saṃkhyetyavaśyaṃ yāgātpūrvasādhanatvakāritaḥ saṃbandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | na ca yāgāpūrvasādhanatvaṃ prakaraṇādṛte lakṣayituṃ śakyate iti nava
navama iti—navamādhyāyādyādhikaraṇa ūhopoddhātavicārāvasara iti śeṣaḥ |me vakṣyāmaḥ | tena prakaraṇānugrahaviśeṣātpāñcadaśyaṃmapūrvasaṃbandhapramāṇapratyāsatterbalīyaḥ | vidhirapi hi pūrvaṃ prayojanavati puruṣaṃ niyuṅkte | sāptadaśyācca pāñcadaśyaṃ śīghrataraṃ prayojanavadavadhāryata iti vidhikālavaiṣamyādatulyabalatvam | api ca, kratumaviguṇaṃ kartuṃ puruṣaḥ pravartate na sāmidhenīḥ | kratvaṅgatve ca sāptadaśyasya na kiṃcicchrutyādi pramāṇamupalabhāmahe, yathā pāñcadaśyasya prakaraṇam | tasmādetatpāñcadaśyaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ darśapūrṇamāsayośca vākyaprakaraṇābhyāmavadhāryate | sāptadaśyaṃ tu kevalaṃ
sāmidhenyarthameva | tasyedānīmānarthakyaparihārāya svādiratvādivatkratusaṃbandhaḥ kalpyate, yadi tvasau pratīcchet | na tvasau saṃkhyāntarāvaruddhaḥ sanpratīcchati | tatra sāmidhenīnāmubhayathā 'pyavaiguṇyaṃ bhavati | kratoḥ punaḥ pāñcadaśyena | tataśca kāṃsyabhojivadamukhye 'pyavirodhaḥ syātkimaṅga punaryatrāṅgaguṇavirodha eva spa
spaṣṭa iti—tadā ‘ aṅguṇāvirodhe ca tādarthyāt ‘ (a. 12 pā. 2 a. 11 sū. 27) ityanenaiva nirṇayo bhaviṣyatīti yāvat |ṣṭaḥ | tasmātkratvavaṣṭambhadarpitena pāñcadaśyenotkālitaṃ sāptadaśyam | kliṣṭena yāvadatideśena pāñcadaśyaṃ (naiva) vikṛtīḥ prāpnoti tāvadaupadeśikena sāptadaśyena prathamatarāvaruddhatvāttābhyo nirākṛtaṃ kevalaprakṛtiviṣayatvenaivāvadhāryata iti vyavasthāyāmuktāyāmucyate—

na ca sāmidhenīṣvanatidiṣṭāsu taddvāreṇa sāptadaśyaṃ vikṛtīranupraveṣṭuṃ śaknoti | yadā tu sāmidhenyo 'tideśena prāpsyante tadā pāñcadaśyamapi kḷptopakārasaṃbandhaṃ tābhireva saha pūrvataramākramya prakṛtāviva sāptadaśyabādhakaṃ bhaviṣyati | tasmādyāsveva paśumitravindābvarakalpādau sāptadaśyaṃ prakaraṇavihitaṃ tāsveva tadatideśaprāptapāñcadaśyabādhena niviśate |

lg.l: evaṃ ca da(a. 10 pā. 8 a. 9) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |śame 'pyetadviviktaṃ sthāpayiṣyate |
vikṛtau ca na yatrāsti sāptadaśyapunaḥ śrutiḥ || 9 ||

pāñcadaśyamabādhitvā hyātmānaṃ na labheta tat
taditi—naimittikaṃ sāptadaśyanityarthaḥ | |
ruddheṣu tena sarveṣu prayogeṣu śrutaṃ hi tat ||
kiṃ ca prayogasāmānye nityaṃ sarvaṃ vidhīyate |
kriyate tatpramāṇaṃ ca paraṃ prakaraṇaṃ matam ||
śrutyaiva puruṣārthe hi śīghraṃ kartā pravartate |

naimittike śru
śruta iti—‘naimittikaṃ tu prakṛtau’ ityadhikaraṇasūtra iti śeṣaḥ |te yacca kāmyameva vicāritam
vicāritamiti— bhāṣyakārairiti śeṣaḥ | |
camasaḥ khādiratvaṃ na kratvarthaṃ hi vidhīyate |
bādhyeta phalalobhena nityaṃ kāmyena tatra cet |
asti svārthe viśeṣo hi kratoḥ prakaraṇaṃ prati ||
tena gṛhṇāti hi svārthaṃ na tu kāmyaṃ kathaṃcana |
na hi prakaraṇaṃ tasya viniyogakṣamaṃ matam ||

div.p: iti prāpta ucyate—

lg.l: hetavo 'tra trayaḥ pūrvā vyākhyātā eva saṃmatāḥ ||
evaṃ siddhe balīyastve niveśaḥ prakṛtau sthitaḥ ||

ataḥ ka
kamipadeta—‘godohanena paśukāmasya’ ityevaṃ kamipadasamabhivyāhārātphalapadavaiyarthyaparihārārthaṃ paśūddeśenaiva godohanavidheyatvāvagaternāsya punaḥ praṇayanoddeśena vidhiḥ saṃbhavatītyāśayaḥ |mipadākṣepānnāsya praṇayane vidhiḥ |
ucyate, yo guṇaḥ kāmyaḥ kratvarthena na gṛhyate ||
kratvarthaṃ karma gṛhṇāti sa eva svārthasiddhaye ||
nirvyāpāro guṇaḥ kāmaṃ na sādhayati kaścana ||
karaṇatvaṃ na tasyāsti niṣkriyasya phalaṃ prati |
tenāvaśyaṃ kriyā kācit grāhyā yā sapramāṇikā ||
tasyāṃ ca camasaḥ pūrvaprāpto 'nyo vidyate guṇaḥ ||

div.p: bhinnaprayojano 'pi hi kāmyo guṇo 'vāntarakāryaikatvādvirodhiguṇāntarajñānamithyātvāvadhāraṇasamarthaḥ | tathā hi—

lg.l: prāsaṅigakīṃ kratoḥ siddhiṃ kāmyo hi kurute guṇaḥ |
gṛhṇanti na ca siddhārthāḥ kratavaḥ svaguṇaṃ tadā ||
tadgṛhītvā guṇaḥ kāmyaḥ prayuṅkte na kriyāntaram ||

div.p:
tathā praṇayanamapi nirvartyamānameva godohanasyā ' 'śrayatvaṃ pratipadyate nānyatheti paśukāmaprayoge 'nyārthena satā godohanena nirvartitatvānna camasamupasaṃgṛhṇāti | kāryārthaṃ hi sarvatra sādhanagrahaṇaṃ na svarūpamātrasaṃbhāvanārtham | tatra yathaiva prasa
prasaṅgeti—anyata upakāralābhaprayuktāṅgānanuṣṭhānaṃ prasaṅgaḥ | paśuyāgārthamanuṣṭhīyamānaiḥ prayānādibhiraṅgaistanmadhyapātipaśupuroḍāśāderupakāralābhānna punastadarthamanuṣṭhānamiti yāvat |ṅgalakṣaṇe 'nyārthairevāṅgairupakriyamāṇāḥ paśupuroḍāśāda
ādipadena ‘agnīṣomīyasya puroḍāśamanu devasuvāṃ havīṃṣi nirvapati’ iti śruticoditānāṃ paśutantramadhyaṣātināmanunirvāpyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaḥ |yo na svāṅgānyupasaṃgṛhṇanti | na taddhānyā kiṃcidvaiguṇyaṃ bhavati | tathā 'tra camasahānyā neti draṣṭavyam | utpattiprāptamapi vidhyanupasaṃgṛhītaṃ naivāṅgaṃ bhavati | na cānaṅgamagṛhṇato doṣaḥ | sutarāṃ vā na tadgrahaṇe vaiguṇyaprasaṅgaḥ | na ca siddhasya pradhānasya praṇayanasya guṇānurodhenā ' 'vṛttiḥ | na caikāntena camasaḥ praṇayanasyā
ṅgam | na cātra camasena kṛte godohanena punaḥ karaṇamāśaṅkyate | kiṃ tarhi | godohanena kṛte camasasaṃpādanārthā pṛthakkaraṇaśaṅkā | kathaṃ punargodohanaprāptirbalīyasī na camasaprāptiriti | taducyate—

prayogamātre hi camaso, godohanaṃ viśeṣe | pūrvaprāptaścāsau tadabādhena labdhātmā | naivaṃ godohanam | sāvakāśaścāsau netarat, dūre cāsau puruṣārthasya | godohanaṃ tu saṃnikṛrṣṭārthaṃ, puruṣārthā ca sarvaśāstrapravṛttiḥ | yaśca tādarthyātādarthyakṛto viśeṣo nāsau tantramiti vakṣyati, ‘arthasyā(a. 12 pā. 1 a. 1 sū. 4)vikṛtatvāt’ iti | mando hyeṣa viśeṣaḥ, kratvarthenaiva kratvartho viśeṣādivihitena bādhitavyo nānyārtheneti | tenobhayoḥ saṃnidhivaśātparasparaśaktivilopānniyamaḥ | praṇayanasyāpyanyatra prayoge siddhātmakasya svasādhanopasaṃhāraśaktilopaḥ | godohanasyāpi praṇayanāntarakalpanāśaktividhātaḥ | paśukāmaprayogavyaṃtirikteṣveva camasasya śāstrīyatvam | tasmāttadvikāro godohanam | yathā tu vikṛtau camasa eva bhaviṣyati tathā 'ṣṭame vakṣyati ‘nivṛ(a. 8 pā. 1 a. 14 sū. 24)ttirvā karmabhedāt’ iti | tena prakṛtāvevaitadvikārakamiti || 10 ||

anārabhyavādaprastāvenāgnyādheyasya prathamaṃ tāvadanārabhyavādatvameva pratipādyate | prakaraṇena tāvatpavamāneṣṭyarthatvaṃ prāpnoti | śrutyā tu śuddhāgnyarthatvam | ataḥ ‘prakara(a. 3 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 15)ṇaviśeṣādvā tadyuktasya saṃskāro dravyavat’ itīṣṭyarthāgnisaṃskāratvācchrutivākyaprakaraṇairaviruddhairiṣṭyarthāgnyarthatvamavadhāryate | śuddhāgnyarthatve ca niṣprayojanatvāttaddvāreṇaivāgnyādhānagrahaṇasāmarthyam | tasmādiṣṭyarthaṃ sāmānyābhidhānam | api ca prakaraṇādeva pavamāneṣṭiviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam || 11 ||

yadyārādupakārakamādhānaṃ bhavettataḥ prakaraṇādiṣṭyarthamiti gamyeta | vākyasaṃyogāttu dvitīyānirdiṣṭāgnisaṃskārārthametat | evaṃ ca sati yadyagnayaḥ pavamāneṣṭyarthā bhaveyustatastaddvāreṇā ' 'dhānamapi tadarthaṃ bhavet | tāstu niṣphalatvādagnyarthā ityuktam | ataśca ‘guṇā(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 12 sū. 22)nāṃ ca parārthatvāt’ ityanenaiva parasparānaṅgatvam | na hi dvitīyāśrutiḥ prakaraṇena bādhyate || 12 ||
‘tenainaṃ punarnavaṃ karoti’ iti cāgnisaṃskārārthatāṃ darśayati || 13 ||
siddhe 'nārabhyavādatve svādiratvādivadeva prakṛtyarthatvamagnidvāreṇa prakṛtyanupraveśāt || 14 ||

sūtrāttāvadiyaṃ buddhirbhavati, yadi prakṛtikāla ādhānaṃ kriyeta tataḥ prakṛtyarthaṃ bhavet | svakāle tu vasantādau kriyamāṇamagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvātsarvārthaṃ vijñāyate | tathā cānu
ṣṭhānasādhāraṇyamasyaikādaśe vakṣyati ‘dravyasyā(a. 11 pā. 3 a. 2 sū. 2)karmakālaniṣpatteḥ prayogaḥsarvārthaḥ syāt’ iti | prakṛtyarthatve ca darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomārthametadbhavet | tanna ca pradhānavaśavartitvādvasante paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayośca kriyeta | tathā ca sati vasante paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāmādadhītetyetāni vacanānyanarthakāni bhaveyuḥ | tasmātsarvārthatvamiti | na tvetadyuktam | na hyādhānasya prakṛtyā vikṛtyā vā saṃbandhe kiṃcitpramāṇamasti | prakaraṇe sati yatpavamāneṣṭayarthaṃ na jātaṃ tadvinaiva śrutyādiṣaṭkenānyakarmārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kuta etat | nanvevaṃ sati pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva gatametat | satyaṃ gacchet, yadi pavamāneṣṭivaddarśapūrṇamāsādīnyāpi niṣphalāni bhaveyuḥ | teṣāṃ tu phalavattvāt ‘guṇānāṃ ca(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 12 sū. 22) parārthatvāt’ ityeṣa nyāyo nāstīti śakyamagnidvāreṇa karmāṅgatvaṃ kalpayitum | niṣphalasyā ' 'dhānasyāvaśyakalpanīye prayojane 'gnidvāreṇa svādiratvādivatkarmārthatvamāpadyate | śaknuvanti hi prayogamadhyasthā vahnayaḥ karmāṇyupasthāpayitum | yathaiva prokṣaṇādīnāṃ vrīhyādisvarūpamatikramya, khādiratvādīnāṃ ca sūtrādisvarūpaṃ, karmāpūrvaprayuktatvaṃ kalpitaṃ tathā ' 'dhānasyāpyagnisvarūpātikrameṇa kalpayitavyam | yadi cāgnisvarūpamātraprayuktamevā ' 'dhānaṃ bhavettataḥ karmāṇyanāhitenāpyagninā sidhyeyuḥ | taiśca puruṣasya saguṇaiḥ kāryaṃ nāgnibhiḥ | tenāvaśyaṃbhāvini karmasaṃbandhe prakṛtyarthatvamadviruktatvādupanyaratam | yattu svakālatvaṃ tadupadeśātideśaprāptasya yūpacchedanavatprayogasādhāraṇyārthamiti na sarvārthatvaṃ gamayati | yadapi vasantādigrahaṇaṃ tadapyaprāptaviṣayamarthavadbhaviṣyati | na hi darśapūrṇamāsārthasyā ' 'dhānasya vasantakālatvaṃ prāptaṃ, pratyardhamāsaṃ prayogaprasakteḥ | nāpyagnihotretaradarvihomārthasya paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālaprāptiḥ | na ca prayogasādhāraṇyaṃ svakālavacanādṛte sidhyatīti nānarthakatvam | ata evaṃ vyācaṣṭe | na kasyacitkarmaṇo 'ṅgamādhānaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, dvitīyāsaṃyogādagnyarthameva | te tu ‘agna(a. 3 pā. 7 sū. 39)yaśca svakālatvāt’ ityanena sarvārthā bhaviṣyantīti taddvāreṇa sarvārthatvami
tyucyate | svakālatvādityapi svātantryāmnānādityarthaḥ | yattvitarānārabhyavādavaditi | tatrābhidhīyate—

lg.l: na tu karmāṅgabhāve hi pramāṇaṃ kiṃcidasti te ||

div.p: khādiratvādīni sruvādibhiḥ saṃyuktānyapi tatsvarūpaprayuktatvaṃ na pratipadyante | sruvādiśabdānāmākṛtivacanatvāt | vinā 'pi khādiratvādimirupapatteśca | akhādiro 'pi hi tadākārayuktaḥ sruvaśabdavācyo bhavatyeva | tatra prākkarmārthatvānna jātiniyamasya prayojanamastīti yuktaṃ svarūpātilaṅghanam | iha tvāhavanīyādiśabdānāṃ saṃskāranimittatvānnā ' 'dhānādvinā pravṛttirupalabhyata iti śabdapravṛttinimittatvenaivārthavattā vijñāyate | yattu tena vinā 'pi karmāṇyaviguṇānyeva bhaveyuriti | naiva tadabhāvena tatkṛtaṃ vaiguṇyaṃ bhavati | kiṃ tarhi | āhavanīyādyasaṃbhavakṛtam | yadi hyādhānamakurvatastāvanmātrameva na syāttato naiva vaiguṇyaṃ bhavet | tadabhāve tvāhavanīyādayo 'pi na bhavanti | te caikāntena karmaṇāmaṅgam | atastatkṛtā vaiguṇyaprasaktiḥ | yadi cāgnimātreṇa karmāṇi saṃbadhyeraṃstatastatsvarūpasyāntareṇāpyādhānaṃ niṣpatteratatprayuktatā bhavet | ‘yadāhavanīye juhoti’ ityevamādicodanārthaḥ punarna kadācidādhānamantareṇa saṃbhāvyate | tena karmāṇi kurvatā, tadapyavaśyaṃ kartavyam | tasmādagnyartham | yattu ‘dravyasyā(a. 11 pā. 3 a. 2 sū. 2)karmakālaniṣpatteḥ’ iti sā kṛtvā cinteti tatraiva vakṣyate | etena pavamāneṣṭīnāmapyagnyarthatvaṃ vyākhyātam | āśaṅkāśeṣaścottareṇādhikaraṇena vyāvartyate || 15 ||

‘ta(a. 10 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 6)syāṃ tu syātprayājavat’ ityetadadhikaraṇanyāyena pavamānahaviḥsaṃskṛtāgnisādhyatvaṃ tāsā
tāsāṃ—pavamāneṣṭīnāmityarthaḥ |masti nāstīti vicāraḥ | tanna ‘iṣṭiṣu da(a. 8 pā. 1 a. 4 sū. 11)rśapūrṇamāsayoḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt’ ityevaṃ
pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtitve siddhe yathaiva prayājādīnyatidiśyante tathaiva pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛtāgnivartitvamapi | nanu cā ' 'havanīyādayaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ pratyakṣaśrutā evāṅgatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti na vaktavyaṃ prakṛtita iti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yatraiva pratyakṣeśrutyā juhotistatra prakṛtisamakālamāhavanīyasaṃbandho 'vakalpate | yatra punardravyadevatāsaṃbandhādyajimātre kalpite ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’ iti prakṛtito homaḥ prāpnoti tatra dvārasya prākṛtatvādāhavanīyenāpi prakṛtita eva bhavitavyam | ataḥ sādhūktaṃ prakṛtita iti | nanu yāḥ saṃskārārthaṃ kriyante tāsāmapyanyāḥ prāpnuvanti, tāsāmapyanyā ityanavasthā prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sarvānavasthānāṃ sāmarthyena vyavasthānāt | yāvatyo hyagnikālaṃ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyādikaṃ nātikrāmanti tāvatyaḥ kariṣyante || 16 ||

yannāma prayājādi prakṛteraṅgaṃ bhavati tadatidiśyate | na tu pavamāneṣṭayaḥ karmāṅgamitvādhānanyāyena sādhitam | ato ‘rūpaṃ vā(a. 7 pā. 3 a. 11 sū. 29) 'śeṣabhūtatvāt’ ityāhavanīyādisvarūpamatidiśyate neṣṭayaḥ | ārambhaṇīyā tvaṅgamiti kṛtvā 'dhikaraṇā
adhikaraṇāntaramiti—daśamādhyāyaprathamapāde iti śeṣaḥ |ntaramārapsyate | tadīyaścaiṣa nyāyo 'trāpi bhaviṣyati | satyapi cāṅgatve yāvanna vidhīyante tāvanneveṣṭayaḥ prakṛtau dṛśyante | yāvacca kiṃ kena kathaṃbhāvaistadbhāvanā na pūryate tāvadvidhirna pravartate | tena pavamāneṣṭirahitāyāṃ prakṛtau tābhiritikartavyatā gṛhyamāṇā tadvyatiriktavākyavihitaiva kevalā grahītuṃ śakyate | anyathā hyekasminvākye vihitavadapekṣaṇamavihitavacca vidhānamiti svarūpavipratiṣedhaḥ syāt | tasmādyādṛgāhavanīyaḥ prākpavamāneṣṭibhyastādṛgeva tāsāṃ prāpta iti niṣpannasyā ' 'havanīyasya prayojanamapekṣamāṇasyopadeśenātideśena vā 'ṅgatvaṃ
śakyaṃ kalpayitum | etāstu tanniṣpattyarthā eveti na tatkṛtamupakāramapekṣante | na cānapekṣitamupadeṣṭumatideṣṭuṃ vā śakyate | tasmādādhānamātrasaṃskṛtenāgninā saṃbaddhavyā iti siddham || 17 ||

idānīṃ sthānasya prakaraṇena saha pūrvaiśca virodhāvirodhau cintyete | jyotiṣṭome 'gniṣṭomasaṃsthe trayaḥ paśava āmnātāḥ, agnīṣomīyaḥ savanīyo 'nubandhyaśceti | te sarve kathaṃbhāvairdharmānapekṣante | tathaupavasathye 'hani, agnīṣomapraṇayanottarakālamupākaraṇādayaḥ paśūdharmāḥ paṭhyante | teṣu caturdhā saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ trayāṇāmapi paśūnāmarthenā ' 'mnāyante 'tha savanīyārthenaivā 'tha savanīyāgnīṣomīyārthenātha kevalāgnīṣomīyārthenaiveti | kiṃ prāptam | tatra ‘sthānācca pūrvasya’ ityevamādisūtrasaṃgatyarthamasūtraṃ tāvatpūrvapakṣaṃ karoti sarvārthā iti | yadi tvayameva pakṣaḥ sūtreṇa parigṛhyeta tata uttarasūtrāṇyasaṃgatānyeva bhaveyuḥ | yadā pūrvasūtreṇaiva sarvārthatvaṃ pratijñāyate tadā kimanena ‘sthānācca pūrvasya’ iti | prakaraṇāvibhāgādeva hi pūrvasyāpi siddhiḥ | ‘śvastvekeṣām’ ityapi prakaraṇābhāvakathanenāpratijñātakevalasavanīyārthatā vyāvartyamānā kathaṃ saṃbadhyeta | evaṃ tadanusāritvāduttarasūtrāṇāmapyasaṃgatiḥ | athavā sautra eva pūrvapakṣe kevalasavanīyārthatvamasūtritaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ kṛtvā ‘śvastvekeṣām’ ityādi saṃbandhanīyam | tattu
tattviti—athavetyādinoktaṃ kevalasavanīyārthatvapūrvapakṣasyotsūtratvāśrayaṇena sūtrasaṃgatyupapādanamityarthaḥ | bhāṣyakāreṇa nā ' 'śritaṃ, sarvādyaḥ pakṣaḥ sukhamasūtraḥ kriyate |
sautrapakṣāntarāle tu tatsaṃgatyarthamasūtrapakṣāśrayaṇaṃ sūtrakārasya śūnyahṛdayatāmāpādayati | tasmādādya e muktakaḥ pakṣaḥ | tasyopapattiḥ, paśudharmā hi jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe kenicidapi paśuviśeṣeṇāsaṃyuktāḥ śrūyante | katham |

dīkṣāsu hi somakrayasamīpe 'gnīṣomīyaḥ samāmnāyate | tasya ca yadyapi vacana
vacaneti—‘sa eṣa dvidevatyaḥ paśuraupavasathye 'hanyālabdhavyaḥ’ iti vacanasāmarthyādityarthaḥ |sāmarthyātpaśudharmasamīpe 'nuṣṭhānaṃ bhaviṣyati | tathā 'pi prakaraṇena naiva vyāpṛtaṃ, sarvakaraṇānāmutpattideśānatirekāt | savanīyānāmapi sutyākālamutpattivākyam | aupavasathye tu guṇārthaiva śrutiḥ | na ca tayā prakaraṇaṃ bhavati | anubandhyā tu dūrasthaiva | somānte kriyamāṇatvāt | tasmādavāntaraprakaraṇavākyasaṃyogābhyāmapratibaddhena jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇenāgnīṣomīyasya sthānaṃ viprakṛṣṭārthaṃ bādhitvā jyotiṣṭomārthāstāvadeva ityetatkalpyate | tasya ca somadravyakatvānna paśudharmaiḥ kiṃcitprayojanamiti ‘ānarthakyā
(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18)ttadaṅegaṣu’ ityevamaṅegaṣvevāvataranto 'ṅgatvāviśeṣāttriṣvapyavataranti | satyapi tadaṅgatve yogyatvābhāvānna dīkṣaṇīyādiṣvavataraṇam | satyapi ca yogyatve sāmānyasaṃbandhābhāvānna tadanaṅgapaśūnām | tasmāttrayāṇāṃ samānaṃ vidhānamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | syādetadevaṃ, yadi jyotiṣṭomadvāreṇa prakaraṇāviśeṣaḥ syāt | asti tu viśeṣaḥ savanīyānāmaupavasathye 'hanyutpatteḥ | ‘āgneyamajamagniṣṭoma ālabheta’ ‘aindrāgnamukthye dvitīyam’ ityādinā hi paśudharmasamīpe savanīyā utpāditāḥ | tasmātkevalasavanīyārthā eveti || 18 ||

kathaṃ punaridaṃ śrutiliṅgādhi(a. 3 pā. 3 a. 7)karaṇaviparītamabhidhīyate | na hi tatraivamiṣṭaṃ prakaraṇādvidevanādayo rājasūyārthāḥ sthānāccābhiṣecanīyārthā iti | tathā śrutyaindrī gārhapatyārthā liṅeganendrārtheti | yuktaṃ tatra prakaraṇāmnānena balīyasā pramāṇena nirākāṅkṣīkṛte jaghanyapramāṇānutthānātsamuccayānāśrayaṇam | na hyatra punaḥ kalpanayā vinā śeṣasya na kiṃcitsidhyati | nāpi śeṣiṇāmindrāgnyādīnām, upāyāntareṇāpi smṛtisiddheḥ | iha punaḥ satyapi savanīyasaṃbandhāddharmāṇāṃ nairākāṅkṣye 'gnīṣomīyasya paśudharmairvinā siddhayamāvātprāptyantaramavaśyaṃ kalpanīyamubhayoravipratipatteḥ | na caitasya tadā darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtitvaṃ bhavet | yo hi prakṛtibhūtaḥ paśūnāṃ sa darśapūrṇamāsavikāro bhavati | itare tu prāṇidravyakatvasāmānyāttadvikārāḥ | tatra kiṃ sarva
savanīyārthāniti—dharmāniti śeṣaḥ |nīyārthāṃstataḥ
sata iti pā. | sārūpyadvāraprabhavenāti, deśenāgnīṣomīyo gṛhṇātyathopadeśagandhena kenaciditi, upadeśāntargatatvātkrameṇa viniyogo yuktaḥ | ṣaḍvidhopadeśapratyastamaye hyatideśaḥ kalpyate | tasmādyathaivānyatropadeśātideśābhyāṃ prakṛtivikṛtyarthatvaṃ yā
yāga gatasyeti—yāgāṅgabhūtasyetyarthaḥ |gagatasya vyā
vyāpārasyeti—itikartavyatāsamūhasyetyarthaḥ |pārasya tathaiveha sthānaprakaraṇābhyāmubhayārthatvam | anubandhyāyāstu sarvopadeśābhāvādatideśenaiva prāptirbhaviṣyati | tasmādanupālambhaḥ sūtrasya || 19 ||
yaduktaṃ sthānādagnīṣomīyārthā iti | etadgṛhṇīmaḥ | yattu prakaraṇātsavanīyārthā iti, ethanna mṛṣyāmahe | kutaḥ |
