‘āśvinaṃ grahaṁ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyā ' 'gneyaṃ savanīyaṃ paśumupākaroti’ iti hi savanīyānāmutpattiḥ śva iti caupavasathye 'hani sthitaḥ sutyāṃ bravīti | kaḥ punarguṇa iti—svavākye saṃyogābhāvātpṛcchati | taddarśayati | sarvānsavanīyānanukramya nindā śrūyate ‘yathā vai matsya’ iti | yathā vai kila matsyo jale vicaran, anavadhāritagatiḥ prekṣakajanamavadhūnute kimito gataḥ kimagata iti, evamevaite paśavaḥ kva kriyantāmityevamaprajñāyamānāḥ kartṛjanamavadhunvate | tena paśukīrtana tāvadevamarthaṃ na vidhānārthamiti gamyate | sā 'pi nindā parataḥ praśnaśeṣatvena nītā | tadebhiḥ paśubhiḥ savanīyasamākhyātaiḥ kathaṃ savanāni paśumanti kartavyānīti | so 'pi pratipraśnarūpavidhyantaraśeṣatvaṃ pratipadyate ‘vapayā prātaḥsavane caranti’ iti | tasmādetadguṇārtheyaṃ punaḥśrutiḥ | na ca sā prakaraṇabuddhiṃ karotīti | kiṃ punastacchva āmnānamiti—āśvinagrahaṇānantaryaguṇārthatvāttadapi notpattisamarthamiti manyate | bhāṣyakāreṇa kevalasyā ' 'gneyasya śva āmnānaṃ darśitaṃ netareṣām | tatra kecidāhuḥ | pradarśanārthatvādasyā ' 'gneyagrahaṇamavivakṣitatvātsarvārthamiti manyamāneneti | vākyāntarāṇyevaṃrūpāṇi draṣṭavyānītya
apara iti—āpastambānuyāyina ityarthaḥ | āpastambasūtre tāvadukthyasaṃsthāyāṃ sutyādina eva sarveṣāṃ kratupaśūnāmāmnānāttanmūlatayā vākyāntarakalpanāvaśyaṃbhāvāditi yāvat |pare | sarvathā tu kevalāgneyapradarśanamevopayujyate | yadyapi hyaindrāgnādīnāmaupavasathya evotpattistathā 'pi teṣāmanityo
anityottarasaṃstheti—kāmyā ata evānityāstisra ukthyaṣoḍaśyatiratrasaṃjñakāḥ saṃsthā ityarthaḥ |ttarasaṃsthārthatvānnaiva śaktirnnityavadāmnātānpaśudharmān grahītumityagnīṣomīyasthānameva balīyaḥ syāt | yastu nityatvena grahaṇasamarthastasya prakaraṇābhāva ukta eva | tasmānna savanīyārthā iti || 20 ||
idānīṃ kataratsavanīyānāmutpattivākyamityetatparijñānādhīnā 'dhikaraṇasiddhiḥ | tatra pūrvapakṣavādyāha, iti cet—savanīyaprakaraṇābhāvaṃ manyase | tadayuktam | kutaḥ |

‘vapayā prātaḥsavane pracaranti’ ityanenaiva vacanenotkṛṣṭe pradhāne pradhānadeśatvādaṅgānāmupākaraṇādiṣvapyutkṛṣṭeṣu kālāniyame prāpte sati, āśvinagrahaṇānantaryaṃ vidhīyate | tena tadeva guṇārthaṃ śravaṇam | itarathā hi vākyaṃ bhidyeta, parivyāṇopākaraṇayoḥ kālavidhānāddravyadevatāyuktasya ca yāgasya vidheḥ | nanu cātideśaprāptameva parivyāṇaṃ tasminneva kāle yāge vidhīyamāne 'nūdyeta | satyamatideśena prāptaṃ na tu tadidānīṃ kriyate | yūpasādhāraṇyena ‘tatkā(a. 11 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 6)lāstu’ ityevamagnīṣomīyakālakṛtādevopakarasiddheḥ | evaṃ tarhi sādhāraṇyādeva prāptaṃ vidyamānamanūdyeta | na śakyaṃ tadanuvaditumapratyabhijñānāt | tannāmānvataḥ prāptamanūdyate yattādrūpyeṇa prāptaṃ pratyabhijñāyate | na ca pūrvedyuḥ kṛtasyā ' 'śvinagrahaṇottarakālaṃ vartamānatvenānuvādo bhavati | na hi tadā 'sau parivyayati | na ca pūrvakṛtasya paryagnikṛtādiśabdavadīdṛśena śabdenānuvādaḥ | pūrvottarakālakarmāvadhidvayaparicchinnatvāt | evaṃ tarhyasmādvākyātprāptamanūdyatāṃ ‘sa āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvopaniṣkramya yūpaṃ parivyayati’ iti | tadapi nāsti pratyabhijñānābhāvādeva | yadetadaprākṛtaṃ savanīyaparivyāṇam, etasya śuddhasya śravaṇādraśanāyāśca prākṛtaparivyāṇanibandhanatvādyena kenacidvāsaḥprabhṛtinā karaṇo sati trivṛtvānuvādo na prāpnoti | tatrānekārthavidhānādvākyabhedaḥ | tadā caivaṃ bhāṣyagranthaḥ | itarathā hi parivyāṇasya kālo vidhīyeta—yatsaṃbandhitvenopāttaṃ trivṛddravyaṃ kālo vidhīyeta | upākaraṇasya ceti—upākaraṇakālo dravyadevatāviśiṣṭaṃ ca karma vidhīyetetyarthaḥ | tasmādasya guṇārthatvādasti pūrvedyuḥ savanīyānāṃ prakaraṇamiti || 21 ||

yadā hi pūrvedyuḥ sāṅgānāṃ savanīyānāmāmnānaṃ tadā tatraiva sarvānuṣṭhāne prāpte vacanādvapāpracārādimātramutkṛṣyeta nopākaraṇādīni | ‘tadā(a. 5 pā. 1 a. 12 sū. 24)di vā 'bhisaṃbandhāt’ iti ye vapāhomottarakālāḥ padārthāstatsaṃnipātino vā tanmātrasyotkarṣo bhavenna prāgbhāvināmupākaraṇādīnām | yāni cājñātakālānyaṅgāni teṣāṃ pradhānakālatvaṃ vakṣya(a. 11 pā. 3 a. 1 sū. 1) ityatreti śeṣaḥte | paśvaṅgāni tvavadhāritapūrvedyuḥkālatvānna pradhānakālaṃ gacchanti | tasmādvapāpracāreṇānutkṛṣṭasyānenaiva vākyenotkarṣaḥ kartavyaḥ | tataśca guṇavākye sati anekārthavidhānādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | utpattivākye na doṣaḥ | tasmādetadutpattyarthamiti | na tviha bhāṣyakāreṇa vidheyānekārthatvaṃ darśitam | evameva tu guṇārtha etasminvākyaṃ bhidyetetya- mihitam | śakyastviha pūrvedyuḥ prāptopākaraṇotkarṣamātravidhānādvākyabhedaḥ parihartum | tatra kecidevaṃ samarthayante | yathā kila ‘āgneyyā ' 'gnīdhram’ iti jyotiṣṭomasaṃbandhe tadviśeṣe ca vidhīyamāne 'nekārthatvamuktamevamiha vapāpracāreṇānutkṛṣṭasyopākaraṇasyotkarṣaśca kartavyaḥ, tadviśeṣaścetyanekārthatvamiti | na tvidamāgneyīvākyasadṛśam | tatra hi saṃbandhaviśeṣapare vidhau sāmānyasaṃbandhaprāptimanyato 'pekṣamāṇe kāsucidāgneyīṣu tatsadbhāvāditaraviṣayasāmānyasaṃbandhaṃ pratyanyathānupapattiḥ kṣīyate | atastu vedenānabhyupetaṃ tadvidhiṃ kalpayato vākyabhedo bhavati na tviha tādṛkpratipakṣo 'sti | yataḥ sāmānyenotkarṣaprāptiṃ dṛṣṭavā viśeṣaparasyārthāpattikopaḥ kalpyeta | tatrāpi cettadarthāpattirbādhinī pratipakṣabhūtā sāmānyaprāptirnābhaviṣyannā ' 'gneyīmātrapramāṇaṃ nirākariṣyata | prāpte 'pi karmaṇyekapadopāttānekārthavidhiḥ śoṇādyudāharaṇaistatra tatra pratipāditaḥ | tena yadyapi ‘āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā’ ityanena dvayamapi prātaḥsavanamāśvinagrahottarakālatvaṃ ca vidhīyeta tathā 'pi vidhāyakasyaikapadānusārāt ‘tasya ta(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 3 sū. 6)syopadiśyeta’ ityetadāpattirnāsti kimutātraikavidhāne 'rthādevetarasiddheḥ | ata eva bhāṣyakāreṇānekavidhidūṣaṇe 'bhihitaṃ na cāneko 'rthaḥ parasparāsaṃbandhe sati śakyo vidhātumiti | jānāti hyasau yathā saṃbaddhānāmarthānāmekasminvihite 'nye vinaivā ' 'yāsena prāpnuvanti | tena yadyekasminvihite 'rthādarthasahasramaparamāpadya te na kaścidvirodho vidherāyāso vā dṛśyata ityāśrīyate | tasya tvanyathā 'pyupadyamāna tvamevaivau nirākaraṇopāyaḥ | na cehāsti sa pakṣo yatraiṣa vidhiḥ sutyāprātaḥsavanasaṃbandhāvakṛtvā ' 'śvinagrahaṇānantarthaṃ vidadhyāt | tasmādadoṣaḥ | na caiva
tveṣa doṣaḥ, yasyānekadravyadevatāviśiṣṭakarmavidhānam | api ca jyotiṣṭomasutyāprātaḥsavanaviśeṣakālasaṃyogo 'paraḥ kalpanīyaḥ | sarveṣu cotkarṣāpakarṣeṣu sāmānyaviśeṣarūpo 'nekavidhidoṣo 'stīti prāptakarmaguṇavidhyasaṃbhavātkarmāntaravidhitvaprasaṅgaḥ | tadyathā ‘māhendrasya stotraṃ pratyabhiṣicyate’ ityatrābhiṣecanīyasya mādhyaṃdinasavanamāhendrastotrakālavidheranekārthatvamevaṃ ‘tiṣṭhantaṃ paśuṃ prayaja
prayajanti, iti kvacitpāṭhaḥ |ti’ ityādiṣvapi yojanīyam | api caikasminpadārthe 'nuṣṭhīyamāne vidhīyamāne cārthāntaraṃ dvedhā ' 'padyate | kiṃcitprayatnāntarasādhyaṃ kiṃcittadanuniṣpādyam | yathā bhakṣavidhau grahaṇādayastṛptiśca | tatra yatprayatnāntarasādhyaṃ, na ca tasminnakṛte vihitakaraṇaṃ śakyamityavadhāryate tatrārthāpattilabhyaṃ vidhiśaktyantaraṃ kalpyate | yā ca yāvatī ca śāstrīyā sā 'vagatirbhavati | yattvanuniṣpādi bahvapi puruṣasya śāstrasya ca vyāpārāntaramantareṇaiva sidhyati na tena kaścidāyāso bhavati | na cehā ' 'śvinagrahaṇānantarye vidhīyamāne 'nuṣṭhīyamāne vā sutyāprātaḥsavanādisaṃbandhe bhedena vyāpāritavyam | tena nātra kaściduṣkarṣasāmānyaṃ vidhatte | śrutamātrāśvinagrahaṇārthamātre vihite yadi tadantargatatvātsutyāprātaḥsavanāharbhāgaviśeṣamuhūrtanāḍikākṣaṇalavanimeṣakālatvadravyasattvādayaḥ prasajyante kiṃ kriyatām | api ca śiṃśapāmānayetyatrāpi vṛkṣatvadravyatvasattādyākṣepādvākyabhedaḥ syāt | ataḥ pūrvedyuḥ prāptasyopākaraṇasya kālāntaramātramāśvinagrahaṇānantarthaṃ vidhīyata ityadoṣaḥ | anye tu dvayoḥ parivyāṇopākaraṇayorutkarṣādvākyabhedaṃ samarthayante | tadapi tu supariharaṃ, kevalaparivyāṇotkarṣādeva ‘tadā(a. 5 pā .1 a. 12 sū. 24)di vā 'bhisaṃbandhāt’ ityevamupākaraṇotkarṣasiddheḥ | tatraitatsyāt | prakṛtiprāpto dharma utkṛṣyamāṇastadādyutkarṣaṃ karoti nāpūrva iti | tadayuktam | ‘kṛta(a. 5 pā. 2 a. 10 sū. 21)deśāttu pūrveṣām’ ityatrāprākṛtānāmapi videvanādīnāmapakarṣavarṇanena ‘tathā(a. 5 pā. 1 a. 16 sū. 29) 'pūrvam’ ityasya viśiṣṭaviṣayatvavyākhyānāt | athavā ‘sa āśvinaṃ graham’ ityetadvākyaprāptaparivyāṇāntarānuvādādavākyabheda iti | athocyeta | aviśeṣitasādhanakatvāttatra trivṛtvānuvādo na saṃbhavatīti | tadayuktam | evaṃ hi siddhāntavādyapi pūrvapakṣavādinā coditaḥ svayaṃ parihāraṃ vakṣya
raśanāsādhāraṇyādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |ti so 'syāpi bhaviṣyatīti | nanu ca tasyāpūrvakavidhānādanekārthavidhirupapadyate nāsyeti | naiṣa viśeṣaḥ | yatra hyekakriyāviśeṣaṇamanekamupādīyate tatra taddvāreṇa tadvidhiḥ sulabha iti viśiṣṭavidhānanyāyaḥ | yatra punaḥ svaviśeṣaṇāviśiṣṭā
kriyā vidhīyate, vākyāntarakaprāptasya kriyāntarasya viśeṣaṇaṃ, tatrāvaśyāvartanīyo vidhipratyayaḥ | devatādiviśiṣṭo hi yāgo vidhīyamānaḥ svaviśeṣaṇamevā ' 'kṣeptuṃ samartho nāvidhīyamānaparivyāṇaviśeṣaṇam | tenāpūrvakarmavidhiṣvapyetadvivektavyaṃ, katarattadviśeṣaṇaṃ kataradanyaviśeṣaṇamiti | tasmādayamubhayapakṣa bhāktvānnaikasya codayitavyaḥ | tatrāvaśyaṃ siddhāntavādinobhayoḥ parivyāṇayoḥ sādhāraṇī raśaneti parihāro vaktavyaḥ | vakṣyati hi ‘raśa(a. 3 pā. 6 a. 10 sū. 31)nā ca liṅgadarśanāt’ iti | yadyadetasya yūpasya parivyāṇaṃ tasya tasyaiṣā vākyena vijñāyate | tathāprāptānuvādānna vākyabhedaḥ | athavā yattrivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyopākarotīti pūrvedyuḥ prāptamupākaraṇasya parivyāṇānantaryamanūdyā ' 'śvinagrahaṇānantaryaṃ vidhīyate | varaṃ ca vākyabhedādvayavahitakalpanāśrayaṇam | tasmādevaṃ varṇyate | avaśyaṃ tāvatsavanīyānāmekenotpattirekena ca guṇo vidhātavyaḥ | tatra pūrvedyustanasya tāvanna kaścidutpattivākyatve heturasti | nanvitarasyāpi nāsti | yadyapyevaṃ tathā 'pi vika
vikalpasamuccayāsaṃbhavāditi—kadācidekasyotpattividhitvaṃ kadācidanyasyetyevaṃ vikalpasyāṣṭadoṣaduṣṭatvācchākhyāntaranyāyābhāvāccobhayatrotpattirityevaṃ samuccayatya cāsaṃbhavādityarthaḥ |lpasamuccayāsaṃbhavātkenacidviśeṣeṇānyatarasminnāśrayitavye viśeṣo 'bhidhīyate | purastā
purastāditi—prakaraṇāntarādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |detadeva sthitaṃ yathopādeyo guṇastirohitakarmānuvādena śakyo vidhātuṃ nānupādeyaḥ | sa hi kuṇḍapāyināmayane homasyeva balātkarmāntaratvamāpādayati | tadiha vapāpracāra upādeyaḥ sutyākālasthasavanīyānuvādena śakyo vidhātuṃ, kiṃ punaḥ prātaḥsavanaśrutyā taddeśasavanīyapratyabhijñāne sati | śvastane punarāmnāne nirjñātaprayojanatvādāśvinagrahaṇena sahāṅgaṅigasaṃbandhābhāvātkālārthe saṃyoge tasyānupādeyatvātkarmoddeśena vidhyanupapatteravaśyaṃ kāloddeśena karma vidheyam | athāpyāśvinaṃ pratyaṅgatvena vidhistathā 'pyaṅigano 'nupādeyatvādeṣaiva vacanavyaktiḥ | ataśca guṇavidhyanupapatteravaśyaṃ prakaraṇāntaranyāyenotpattividheranyenānantareṇāpratibandhādutpattāvavadhāryamāṇāyāṃ karmāntaraṃ syāt | tenāsya tāvatkālāpekṣayotpādakatvaṃ siddham | ataścetarasya pariśeṣasiddhaṃ guṇavidhitvam | na hi tasya kiṃcidbhedakāraṇam | ata eva vapāpracāreṇotkarṣo 'sti nāstīti vicāritam | sati hi vapāpracāreṇotkarṣeṃ pūrvasyaiva prātaḥ savane viparivṛtteḥ kālaṃ pratyupādānaṃ pratyabhijñānātkalpyeta |
‘yathoktaṃ saṃnidhau tva(a. 2 pā. 3 a. 13 sū. 23)vibhāgāt’ iti | kāle ca karmaṇi vidhīyamāne pratyayasya, saṃnikṛṣṭe 'rthe vyāpāro bhaviṣyati | vapāpracārakālasya punaḥ savanīyotpattikriyātaḥ kriyāntaraviśeṣaṇatvādduṣpratipādo viśiṣṭavidhiriti vākyabhedaḥ syāt | asmatpakṣe punaryathaikavākyatvaṃ bhavati tathoktam | evaṃ ca parivyāṇasyāpi prakaraṇalabhyo 'ṅgabhāva ihānuvadiṣyate | anyathā punarviprakṛṣṭatareṇa krameṇa prāptimapekṣyānūdyeta | tasmādayamevotpattividhiḥ | kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe bhāṣyakārasya vākyabhedopanyāsaḥ | ucyate |

vākyaṃ bhidyeteti | ‘na tenaikavākyatāmiyāt’ yathā ‘ka(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 10 sū. 19)rtṛguṇe tu karmāsamavāyādvākyabhedaḥ syāt’ ityatrāsatyapi lakṣaṇato vākyabhede parasparāsaṃbandhābhiprāyeṇoktaṃ ‘sākā(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 10 sū. 20)ṅkṣaṃ tvekavākyam’ ityatra ca saṃbandhamātrābhiprāyaṃ tathehotpattyarthatve sati tadekavākyatāṃ yāti na guṇārtha ityucya
‘artheneti cet’ ‘na śrutivipratiṣedhāt’ iti sūtradvayasthaṃ bhāṣyaṃ suspaṣṭamiti na vyākhyātaṃ vārtikakṛdbhiḥ |te || 22 || 23 || 24 ||

sarvaṃ savanīyaprakaraṇaṃ nirākṛtya pūrvoktanaiva hetunā siddhāntaṃ nigamayati | yadvā 'vāntaraprakaraṇenābādhyamānaṃ sthānabādhenaiva mahāprakaraṇaṃ sarvārthatvapratipādanayā 'vasthitaṃ tannivṛttyarthastuśabdaḥ | yadyapi prakaraṇaṃ sthānādbalavattathā 'pyupāṃśuyājānumantraṇanyāyena liṅgānugṛhītakrama evātra balīyānvijñāyate | yogyatayā hi paśudharmāḥ paśuyāgamapekṣante na somayāgam | na cānapekṣitāḥ prakaraṇena grahītuṃ śakyante | tadaṅgāvataraṇena cātra viprakṛṣṭataraḥ śruto 'rthaḥ | na ca ṣaṣṭhīpratipādyātsaṃbandhādvinā ' 'narthakya
ānarthakyatadaṅganyāya iti (a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9) atratyanyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ |tadaṅganyāyo 'stītyuktam | nanu cāvihitadharmāntaraḥ sākāṅkṣa evāgnīṣomīyaḥ pradeśāntarādihā ' 'nīyamānaḥ saṃnihitāndharmānprakaraṇenaiva gṛhṇātīti na vaktavyaṃ sthānācceti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yatra hi prākṛtairaṅgaiḥ pūryamāṇāyāṃ vikṛtau tanmadhye 'pyapūrvāṇi kānicitprakṣipyante tatra vikṛtau prakaraṇagrahaṇaṃ bhavati | atra pradeśāntara utpanno 'gnīṣomīyaḥ prākṛtaistāvanniṣpratidvandvaiḥ kḷptopakāraiśca nirākāṅkṣīkṛtaḥ | tata ihā ' 'nītaḥ sannananyaprayojanāndharmānsākāṅkṣānpaśyannanumitakathaṃbhāvaḥ saṃbadhyate | sthānasya caitadeva lakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmāṇāṃ sākāṅkṣatvena pradhānasyotpādya kathaṃbhāvaṃ, saṃbandhaḥ | tasmātsūktaṃ sthānāttviti || 25 ||

sarveṣāṃ dvayorvā samānavidhānatve savanīye paśupuroḍāśadarśanaṃ nopapadyate | puroḍāśayāgasya hi devatāsaṃskārārthatvaṃ vakṣya(a. 10 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 20) ityatreti śeṣaḥti | sa ca liṅgādagnīṣomāveva saṃskartuṃ śaknoti nāgnim | na ca samānavidhānatvenohaḥ siddhāntavatsaṃbhavati | tasmātpuroḍāśadarśanādātideśikāḥ savanīyasya dharmā iti || 26 ||

satyaṃ devatāsaṃskārārthaḥ sanna prāpnoti, na tvayaṃ kevalastadarthaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | ‘suṣiro vā etarhi paśuḥ’ ityupakramya cchidrāpidhānārtho 'pi | ataśca vinā 'pi devatāṃ savanīyasya cchidraṃ pidhātuṃ puroḍāśaḥ kariṣyate | tena samānavidhānatve 'pyadoṣa ityukte sūtreṇottaramāha—na cchidrāpidhānārthenāsya codanā | vidhivannigadānāṃ hetuvannigadānāṃ caivaṃjātīyānāmarthavādatvenoktatvāt | na hi cchidrāpidhānaṃ kratunā 'pekṣitaṃ, nāpi puroḍāśayāge kṛte dṛśyate | tasmānnaitatprayojanamiti yathoktameva liṅgadarśanaṃ siddham || 27 ||
evaṃ kramasyāvirodhaṃ darśayitvedānīṃ virodhaṃ darśayati | śākhāharaṇādīnāmaupavasathye deśasāmānyadavāntaraprakaraṇādvā dadhyarthatvaṃ prāpnoti || 28 ||

pradhānaṃ dharmadeśe kriyamāṇaṃ kramaṃ pratipadyate | paṭhyamānaṃ cāvāntaraprakaraṇam | dadhiyāgastvamāvāsyāyāṃ paṭhyate kriyate ca | tasmāttulyaṃ payasā | dadhitvasiddhayarthāstu keci
ttasya dharmāḥ pūrvedyuḥ kriyante | na ca te śākhāharaṇādīnāṃ grāhakāḥ ‘guṇānāṃ ca(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 12 sū. 22) parārthatvādasaṃbandhaḥ’ iti sthitvāt | tasmādubhayasaṃyuktasya śākhāharaṇādervacanātpūrvedyuḥ karaṇaṃ na dadhyarthatvādityadoṣaḥ || 29 ||

grahadharmāṇāṃ prātaḥsavanasya ca samānadeśe samāmnānamanuṣṭhānaṃ cetyanenātulyāśaṅkāyāṃ tulyatvamāpādyate | prakaraṇaṃ tāvatsavanatrayopetasya jyotiṣṭomasya samānam | na ca prātaḥsavanasya niṣphalasyāvāntaraprakaraṇam | na ca prakaraṇavirodhi sthānaṃ viniyojakaṃ bhavati | tasmātsavanāntaragrahāṇāmapi dharmāḥ syuriti | etenā ' 'gneyāgnīṣomīyādipuroḍāśadharmasādhāraṇyamuktam || 30 ||

agnīṣomīya iti—paśāviti śeṣaḥ |agnīṣomīye yūpaparivyāṇamāmnāya punaḥ savanīye ‘sa āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā’ ityāmnātaṃ, tacca nirguṇapunaḥśravaṇātkarmāntaram | ubhayośca kenaciddravyeṇa bhavitavyam | yacca parivyāṇadravyaṃ sā raśanā loke vede ca prasiddhā | tenobhayatra tādarthyādeva rāśanā prāptā | sā ca kiṃmayī kiṃdharmā cetyapekṣite 'gnīṣomīyasya sthānānumite prakaraṇe trivṛddarbhamayīprapiṣṭānāṃ kartavyetyāmnānādviśeṣaḥ pratīyate na savanīyaparivyāṇasya | tasmāditarapaśudharmavadeva raśanetikartavyatā 'gnīṣomīyārthaiveti | tathā prāpte liṅgadarśanātsādhāraṇītyāha | na hi savanīyotpattivākye trivṛttvānuvādo raśanādharmasādhāraṇyādvinopapadyate | kā prāptiriti cettāmāha—vākyasaṃyogādraśanāmātrasya, sthānādagnīṣomīyasya | vākyaṃ ca tasmādbalavattaramiti | nanu ‘na tadvā(a. 3 pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 4)kyaṃ hi tadarthatvāt’ ityuttaraṃ vakṣyati | tenāgnīṣomīyāpūrvaprayuktatvādvyavasthā syāditi | naitadevam | na hyeṣā sākṣātpaśusaṃbandhinī | kiṃ tarhi | ‘yūpā(a. 4 pā. 4 a. 9 sū. 23)ṅgaṃ vā tatsaṃskārāt’ iti vakṣyati | tenedṛśamekavākyatvametat | yūpaparivyāṇasādhāraṇasādhanasyaite dharmā iti | tathā cāgnīṣomīyasthametadyūpaparivyāṇameva ca yūpaikatvātsa
vanīyasthaṃ yūpaparivyāṇam | dvayamapi cāpūrvasādhanamiha pratīyate, na tu darśapūrṇamāsavarhiriva piṇḍapitṛyajñe bhaviṣyati | tasmādbarhirdharmavaiṣamyātsādhāraṇā raśanādharmāḥ || 31 ||
prasaṅgādvākyaprakaraṇavirodhāvirodhau vicāryete | tatra sthānaṃ bādhitvā prākaraṇikagrahārthā grahadharmā iti pratīteranārabhyādhītārthatvamaśakyaṃ pratyetuṃ, tenāsaṃyuktamityāha || 32 ||

prakaraṇasyāviśeṣakatvājjyotiṣṭomāpūrvasādhanasyaivaita ityevaṃ surāgra
surāgrahādibhya iti—sautrāmaṇīnāmakapaśuyāge samāmnātā ye surāgrahāḥ payograhāśca tebhya ityarthaḥ |hādibhyo nivartamānāḥ prakaraṇe vyavatiṣṭhante | yeṣāṃ tvaprakaraṇādhītānāmapi tadasti te pūrveṇaiva nyāyena vākyasaṃyogāddharmavanto bhavitumarhanti | aṃśvadābhyādīnāmapi dharmavattā || 33 ||
maitrāvaruṇādiśrayaṇādīnāṃ prākaraṇikasarvārthatvabādhena vākyādvyavasthā | atra tu prākaraṇikavyavasthābādhena vākyātsarvārthatvamityadṛṣṭāntaiḥ || 34 || 35 ||

adhikaraṇadvayena kāryaprayuktatvāddharmāṇāṃ sādhāraṇyamuktam | phalacamaso 'pi ceṣṭayavikāratvātsomakārye vartate | tasmāttasyāpi somadharmavidhiḥ sādhāraṇo yathā ‘vrīhīnprokṣati’
ityevamādiryavānāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | yuktaṃ yadvrīhidharmāḥ yaveṣu kriyante | dvayorapi vaikalpikatvenānityayostulyarūpatvāt | somadharmāḥ punaḥnityavajjyotiṣṭomāpūrveṇa gṛhītāḥ | te nityameva dvāramāśrayitumarhanti | somaśca nityo na phalacamasaḥ | brāhmaṇapakṣe vidhānābhāvāt | yadi sarvasomopamardena phalacamaso bhavettato rājanyavaiśyapakṣayorabhāvātsomo 'pyanitya iti tulyatā syāt | sa tu yajamānacamasamātrānnirākṛto 'pi grahacamasāntareṣu saṃbhavānnityaḥ | tena dharmāstaṃ na vyabhicaranti | tatprayuktāḥ phalacamasasyedānīṃ kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīti | kāryāpattyeti brūmaḥ | āha | kiṃ kāryāpattirupadeśātideśābhyāmanyā, etayorevāntargatā vā | atirikteti kecinmanyante | na tu tathā sati pramāṇatvādhyavasānam | ato 'tideśāntargatireva vaktavyā | kathaṃ punaḥ prakṛtāvevātideśaḥ kalpyata iti cet | satyaṃ nāvakalpate yatra karmadharmātideśo bhavati | na hyekasya karmaṇaḥ svata eva prakṛtivikārabhāva upapadyate | dravyadharmātideśastvayam | samāne 'pi ca karmaṇi dravyabhedaḥ pratyakṣaḥ | yathā ca karma sākāṅkṣaṃ karmāntarāddharmāngṛhṇāti tathā dravyamapi | tasmātphalacamasenejyāṃ bhāvayetkathamanantaraṃviparivṛtterdravyasārūpyātsomavadityavagateratideśasiddhiḥ | kiṃ bhavati prayojanaṃ yadobhayorapi pakṣayoḥ somadharmāḥ kriyante | satyapyubhayatra karaṇe yathaivānyatraupadeśikātideśikayoḥ guṇakāmapravṛttyapravṛttā prayojanaṃ bhavatastathehāpi draṣṭavyam | nivṛttivaddravyabhedādityapi hi śakyaṃ vaktum | ye hi somasyābhiṣavamānādiṣvāśritāḥ phalasādhanatvenāvagatāste kathaṃ phalacamasasthāḥ sādha
sādhayiṣyantīti—guṇajanyaṃ phalamiti śeṣaḥ |yiṣyanti | kratusādhanatvena phalacamasaḥ pravartamāno ya eva tadaṅgapātinaḥ kratvarthena kriyante tāneva śaknoti grahītuṃ na phalārthān | ataḥ siddhā tannivṛttiḥ | a
ūhopīti—‘indrāya tvā vasumate somaṃ gṛhṇāmi’ ityādi somapadaghaṭitamantre somapadasthāne phalacamasapadaprakṣepaḥ vartavyo bhavati yadyasa mānavidhānamiti siddhāntaḥ | yadi sāmānavidhyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣastadā ‘vrīhīṃṇāṃ megha’ ityasyeva yavaprayoge somapadaghaṭitamantrasya lopo bhavatītyarthaḥ |nenaivoho 'pi
kartavya ityuktaṃ bhavati | samāne 'pi hi karmaprakaraṇe dravyasāmānavidhyabhāvātkāryāpattipuraḥsaraṃ prāpnuvataḥ somapadasyāśaktervikriyā vijñāyate || 36 ||
pratinidhāvapyayameva nyāyaḥ prāpnoti || 37 ||

yadi nīvārāḥ svenaiva mahimnā karmasādhanaṃ bhaveyustataḥ kāryāpattyā dharmaiḥ saṃbadhyeran | na tu teṣāṃ sādhanatve kiṃcitpramāṇamasti | ye hi tāvadvrīhidharmāḥ katipayā dṛśyante tadupāditsayā puruṣaḥ pravartamāno nāntarīyakatvānnīvāratvamupādatte na karmāṅgatayā | vrīhi dharmāḥ punarvīhiśabdena pratyakṣeṇaiva coditā iti samānavidhānāḥ | na hi nīvārebhyo vrīhibuddhirvyāvartata iti vakṣyati ‘samā(a. 6 pā. 3 a. 11 sū. 27)nyaṃ taccikīrpā hi’ iti | tenā ' 'ha tadvadevāsau pravartata iti || 38 ||

aśāstracoditaśca pratinidhirarthātkriyate | tasmādapi niṣpramāṇakamasya kāryāpannatvamiti kecit | na tu pratinidhiraśāstralakṣaṇaḥ | pradhānasamāpticoditatvāt | yadi vā 'śāstralakṣaṇaḥ syānnaiva kriyeta | na ca tadakaraṇātkaściddoṣaḥ syāt | ata evaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ sūtram | aśāstralakṣaṇatvānnīvāratvasya kāryāpattirnnāsti | ye tu vrīhidharmāḥ pradhānacodanayā sakaladharmāsaṃbhavācca vrīhicodanayā vikalā āśritāste 'rthāntaratvābhāvānna kāryāpannāḥ || 39 ||
yadyaśāstralakṣaṇatvānnīvāraṇāṃ kāryāpattirnāsti | pūtīkānāṃ tarhi śāstralakṣaṇatvādanityatvācca phalacamasavatkāryāpattiprasaṅga iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

lg.l: tataḥ syātkāryavartitvaṃ na tvevaṃ sā pravartate ||

div.p:
somanāśe hi pratinidhyapekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pūtīkā vidhīyante naṃ yāgasādhanāpekṣāyām | ato 'yaṃ pratinidhiniyama eva bhavati, yatsakalasomadharmāsaṃbhave vikalānsomadharmānutpādayettatpūtīkagatāniti | vakṣyati hi ‘niya(a. 6 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 16)mārthaḥ kvacidvidhiḥ’ ‘tanni(a. 6 pā. 3 a. 4 sū 17)tyaṃ taccikīrṣā hi’ iti ca | ataśca naivātra pūtīkatvaṃ karmāṅgaṃ, kiṃ tarhi, somadharmopalakṣaṇārtham | tena śrutilakṣaṇasyāpi pūrveṇāviśiṣṭatvamiti | tenehāpi tadeva cintāyāḥ prayojanam | ataśca
tadāśrayasya tadbuddhyanapāyādguṇakāmaiḥ pravartitavyam | anye tvāhuḥ | sakalavyaktyāśrayiṇo hi guṇakāmā vaikalyādiha na pravartante | nityasya hi karmaṇo 'vaśyaṃ prakramātprakrāntasya ca sarvasyāvaśyasamāpanīya
samāpanīyatvāditi—(a. 6 pā. 2 a. 3) atratyanyāyenoti śeṣaḥ |tvātkiṃciddharmavaikalye 'pyavaiguṇyābhyanujñā yujyate | yathā tu kāmyānāṃ pratinidhibhiḥ prakramo nāsti tathā guṇakāmairna pravartitavyam | yadi tu prakrānte kasmiṃścidguṇakāmakalpe dravyanāśe sati pratinidhīyate tatastasyāvaśyasamāpanīyatvādvikāreṇa pratinidhinā vā tulyaṃ samāpanamityūhānūhāveva prayojanam || 40 ||

anekagrahacamasayāgābhyāsātmakaścatuḥsaṃstho jyotiṣṭomo 'vadhāritaḥ | sarvasaṃsthāsu tu jyotiṣṭomarūpamanusyūtam | yathaiva devadattasya rathānopaveśanagamanaśayanādyavasthābhede 'pi devadattatvaṃ nāpaiti tathā jyotiṣṭomātmanaḥ saṃsthāntaropajanāpāye tattvaṃ nāpaiti | saṃsthānāṃ ca virodhādanyonyaṃ samāveśo nāsti | jyotiṣṭomarūpaṃ tu sarvatrāviruddhamanuvartate | sa ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ phalāya coditaḥ ‘jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta’ iti | tathokthyādisaṃsthānāmapi ‘paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt’ ityādi phale vidhānam | tamevaṃvidhaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ | te saṃdihyante, kiṃ sarvasaṃsthajyotiṣṭomoddeśenā ' 'mnātā uta kevalāgniṣṭomasaṃsthoddeśeneti | na tvayamupanyāso yuktaḥ | na hi dharmasaṃbandhavelāyāmuddiśyamānasya jyotiṣṭomasya kācitsaṃsthā viśeṣaṇatvena śrūyate | yadyapi kathaṃcicchrūyeta tathā 'pyuddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇatvānna vivakṣyeta | na cokthyādigrahaṇāṃśena jyotiṣṭomasya grāhakatvaṃ, phalasādhanabhāvāddhi tatrokthyādaya evetikartavyatāvanto bhavanti | jyotiṣṭomastatrā ' 'śrayatvenopasarjanabhāvānna dharmagrahaṇayogyo vijñāyate |
‘jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmaḥ’ iti caitadvākyagatasya jyotiṣṭomasya dharmasaṃbandhaḥ sarvasaṃsthāsvaviśiṣṭa ityagniṣṭomasaṃsthamevetyayuktam | ata evaṃ vaktavyam | kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasyaivaitaddharmāmnānamutokthyādīnāmapi saṃsthānāmiti | taccaivaṃ samarthanīyametadeva granthenoktamiti | yadyapi saṃsthābhirdharmā gṛhyante tathā 'pi tāsāṃ svayamakriyātmakatvājjyotiṣṭoma evā ' 'śrayatvāddvāraṃ bhavatīti kiṃ sarvasaṃsthaṃ prakṛtyetyāha | kiṃ dvārabhūtaṃ phalavantaṃ ca prakṛtyota phalavantamevetyarthaḥ | yadā ca kevalajyotiṣṭomārthatvaṃ tadā tadasādhāraṇatvātpariśeṣādvā 'gniṣṭomasaṃsthasyaiva jāyata iti tatsaṃsthasya vyapadeśaḥ | ukthyādiṣu hi yadyapi jyotiṣṭomasyāpi grāhakatvamasti tathā 'pi tanna vyajyate kimuvathyādigṛhītā dharmā etasya dvāratvādbhavantyutā ' 'tmīyaphalasādhanatvāditi | agniṣṭomasaṃsyā cāsya nijamaṅgam | atastatsaṃstho gṛhṇannayaṃ gṛhṇātīti śakyate vaktum | tasmātsamyagupanyastam | dharmasādhāraṇyaṃ copadeśātideśābhyāṃ pakṣadvaye 'pyabhyupagamyata eveti vidhānagrahaṇam | kiṃ prāptam | jyotiṣṭomena saha samānaṃ saṃsthānāṃ dharmavidhānam | kutaḥ | prakaraṇāviśeṣāt | jyotiṣṭomo hi phalavattvādupajātakathaṃbhāvastadanuvṛttisaṃnidhau samāmnātāndharmān gṛhṇāti na jyotiṣṭomatvena | taccokthyādīnāmeteṣveva dharmeṣu sarvamaviśiṣṭam | upadeśāsaṃbhave cātideśo bhavati | tasmādupadeśa eva sādhāraṇa iti || 41 ||

ājyaśeṣasya pratipattiṃ vidadhattulyavatsaṃsthākratuprakaraṇasaṃbandhitvena kīrtayati | yadyagniṣṭomo juhoti yadyukthyastenaiva śeṣeṇa paridhimanakti | yadyatirātraḥ, etadeva homayajuḥ, yamagne pṛtsu martyamiti japanhavirdhānaṃ pratipadyeteti | ato vijñāyate sarvo 'ṅgavidhiḥ sādhāraṇa iti | sāmānyato dṛṣṭamivāyuktamuktam | yadi hi vākyavaśena kiṃcitprakaraṇāmnātaṃ saṃsthābhiḥ saṃbadhyate tataḥ kimasaṃyuktasaṃbandhenāpi yuktaṃ bhavitum | na hi ‘dvādaśāhīnasya’ ityādiṣu śeṣadharmāṇāmapyahīnārthatvamāśaṅkitam | yāvadvacanaṃ
kṣayitvādvacanānāmityevaṃ vyācaṣṭe | yadi hi sāmānyavihitamagniṣṭomasaṃsthasyaiva syādvinā 'pi tadupādānena tadaṅgatvasiddhernātrāgniṣṭomaṃ saṃkīrtayet | yatastu saṃkīrtayatyato manyāmahe nūnamaviśeṣitamagniṣṭomasya na labhyate | taccaivaṃ na labhyate yadi saṃsthānāmapi sādhāraṇa prakaraṇam | kevalajyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇapakṣe tu punaḥśrutiranarthikā syāt | tathokthyādīnāmapi yadi prakaraṇamasti tato 'nyataranirdhāraṇārthaṃ yadiśabdopabaddhaṃ grahaṇaṃ yuktam | aprakṛtatve tu ‘dvādaśāhīnasya itivadvinaiva yadiśabdena saṃbandhaḥ syāt | na hi jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe sthitasyaivaṃ vādo yujyate | yadi jyotiṣṭomastata etat | yadi dvādaśāhastato 'mukamiti | anekasaṃnihitāpekṣaṃ hyetadvacanaṃ bhavati | ato 'pi samānaṃ prakaraṇam | aparaṃ liṅgam | ‘āgneyamajamagniṣṭoma ālabheta’ ‘aindrāgnamukthye dvitīyam |’ ‘aindraṃ vṛṣṇiṃ ṣoḍaśini tṛtīyam’ iti | samānavidhānatve pūrvapūrvo hyuttarottaratra pratyakṣaśrutatvātkriyata iti dvitīyatṛtīyadarśanamupapadyate | vikārapakṣe tu pratyakṣaśrutairaindrāgnādibhirāgneye bādhite sarvatraika eva syāt | nanu ca pratyakṣaśrutatve 'pi saṃsthāntare saṃsthāntarāsaṃbhavānnirnimittaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvo na prāpnoti | yo hyagniṣṭomastotre samāpyate so 'gniṣṭomo na tadvanmātra
mātraśabdaḥ kārtsnyavācī | tenokthyādisaṃsthāyāmagniṣṭomastotrasatve 'pi nāgniṣṭomastotreṇa kratuprayogoparama iti nokthyādīnāmagniṣṭomasaṃsthātvamiti jñeyam |m | yaścovathyādiṣu samāpyate nāsau pūrvatra samāpto bhavati | tena dvitīyadarśanādyaprasaṅgaḥ pakṣadvaye 'pi tulyaḥ | satyaṃ saṃsthānimittatve tulyaḥ | stotranimittatve tu samuccayaḥ | tathā ca bhāṣyakāra āha—dve hi tatra nimitte agniṣṭomastotramukthyastotraṃ ceti siddhavadetadbravīti | kathaṃ punaḥ saṃsthāstotrasādhāraṇāgniṣṭomādisamabhivyāhāre tulye stotranimittatvamevāṅgī kriyate na saṃsthānimittatvam | tāsāṃ hi phalavattvena prayojanavattvādakleśenaiva nimittatvamāpadyate | tatra kecidāhuḥ | satyapi śabdasādhāraṇye śāstrasya mahāviṣayatvānugrahārthaṃ stotranimittatvāśrayaṇamiti | athavā stotraviśeṣitāyā eva saṃsthāyā evaṃśabdakatvātpūrvatarapratītaviśeṣaṇanimittatvasaṃbhave jaghanyaviśeṣyanimittatvakalpanā na yuktā | yadvā ' 'kṛtya( a. 1 pā. 3 a. 9 ) |dhi
karaṇanyāyenaiva stotreṣu mukhyaḥ śabdaḥ saṃsthāyāṃ lākṣaṇikaḥ | śrutyasaṃbhave ca lakṣaṇā ' 'śrayitavyā | śaknoti ca stotramapi saptamīnirdeśānnimittatvaṃ pratipattum | niṣphalānāmapi ca bhedanādīnāṃ vacanasāmarthyānnimittatvamiṣṭam | athavā ‘saṃdigdheṣu vā
a. 1 pā. 4 a. 13 sū. 24 ) |kyaśeṣāt’ ityevaṃ stotrāśrayaṇam | satyapi vā saṃsthānāṃ mukhyatve vyavadhāraṇakalpanayā vākyaśeṣeṇa stotraparigrahaḥ | evaṃ hi śrūyate ‘āgneyamajamagniṣṭoma ālabheta’ ‘āgneyo hyagniṣṭomaḥ’ iti | katarasminnagniṣṭome, ya āgneyaḥ | stotrasya ca stutibhāgagnirdevatā vidyate na saṃsthāyāḥ | sā hi vyāpāraparityāgātmakatvādabhāvabhūtā | na cābhāvasya devatayā kāryamasti | yāgābhyāse 'pi hi yā devatā sā tasyaivā ' 'gneyatvaṃ karoti na saṃsthāyāḥ | na ca sa eva saṃsthā | taduttarakālaudāsīnyavacanatvātsaṃpūrvasya tiṣṭhateḥ | na cānyagatayā devatayā 'nyasya vyapadeśo bhavati | tathokthyaṣoḍaśinorapi darśayitavyam | api ca ‘aindrāgnānyukthyāni’ iti sphuṭameva stotragrahaṇam | na hi saṃsthā, ukthyā
ukthyānītyanenaiti—ukthyasaṃsthāyā ekatvāduhuvacanavirodhāpatteriti śeṣaḥ |nītyanena śabdenocyate | tasmātsati stotranimittatve yuktaḥ samuccaya iti | nanu vikārapakṣe 'pyadṛṣṭārthatvātpaśuyāgānāmanyonyakāryāpattyasaṃbhavādupapadyata eva samuccayaḥ | tathā hi |

yadi hi pratyakṣaśrutatvameva kevalaṃ virodhanirapekṣaṃ bādhakāraṇaṃ sthāttato na kiṃcinna bādhyate kratvantaragataṃ dṛṣṭārthamadṛṣṭārthaṃ vā tulyakalpamatulyakalpaṃ vā | na caitadiṣṭam | ata ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samuccayadarśanamupapannam | tathā ca vakṣyati ‘pra( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 1 sū. 1 ) |kṛtiliṅgāsaṃyogāt’ iti | tathā ‘prā( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 4 sū. 6 ) |jāpātyeṣu cā ' 'mnānāt’ ityādāvevaṃjātīyakānāṃ tatra tatrāvirodhātsamuccayaṃ vakṣyati | tatraivaṃ samādhimāhuḥ | astyevātra prakṛtiliṅgasaṃyogaḥ savanīyasamākhyānimittaḥ | sarve hyete savanīyaśabdenoktāḥ | tasmātsamākhyānāttulyakāryatve sati, asti virodha iti prāpnoti bādhaḥ | yadyevaṃ, tataḥ samānavidhānatve 'pi sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇabādhaprasaṅgaḥ | pūrvapūrvo hi paśurmahāviṣayatvātsāmānyavihito bhavati | uttara uttaro 'lpāvakāśatvādviśeṣavihitaḥ | bādhyate ca sāmānyaṃ sāvakāśaṃ vā viśeṣeṇa niravakāśena vā | kecittvāhuḥ | sarvāntyasya kevalasya niravakāśatvādatyantaviśeṣasthatvā
dvādhakatvaṃ bhavenna madhyamayoḥ | satyapi bahvalpaviṣayatve pramāṇagatistulyā | yathaivā ' 'gneyaḥ saṃsthācatuṣṭayaviṣayatvātsādhāraṇo bhavatyevamaindrāgno 'pi saṃsthātrayasādhāraṇaḥ | yāvatā ca yatnenāsau prāpnoti tāvatā ca pūrvo 'pi | meṣyāstu saṃsthānimittatve 'pyadoṣaḥ | na hi tadadhikā jyotiṣṭome saṃsthā 'sti | tasmādabādha iti | ucyate | yadyapi na bādhastathā 'pi vikalpastāvatprāpnoti | na hi tulyārthānāṃ kvacitsamuccayo dṛṣṭaḥ | seyamubhayataḥpāśā rajjuḥ | yadi tāvatkiṃcidapi kāryānyatvaṃ samuccayasiddhyarthamabhyupagamyate tato vikārapakṣe 'pi samuccayaḥ | atha tatra bādhaṃ samarthayituṃ kāryaikatvaṃ kalpyate tataḥ sāmā
sāmānavidhye 'pīti—sāmānavidhyāmiti pūrvapakṣe 'pītyarthaḥ |navidhye 'pi vrīhiyavādivadasamuccaya iti | na caitatpūrvapakṣavacanamātraṃ siddhānte 'pi darśanamevāgatyā vacanīkṛtya samuccayaṃ vakṣyati ‘vacanā( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 16 sū. 15 ) |ttu samuccayaḥ’ iti | tadavaśyaṃ vaktavyo viśeṣaḥ | sa ucyate |

sarve hi paśavaḥ sarvatra prāpnuvanto yatpūrvasaṃsthāsu pare na bhavanti tannimittābhāvāt | pratyakṣeṇa tu nimittena pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ paratra vākyātprāpnoti | tatra kiṃ samākhyayaikakāryatvaṃ kalpayitvā bādhavikalpayoranyatara āśrīyatāmuta vākyaprāptasamuccayānurodhena kāryānyatvaṃ kalpyatāmiti vākyabalīvastvātsamuccayena bhavitavyam | yathā prayājānuyājādīnāṃ satyapi samākhyaikatve vākyasāmarthyātkāryānyatvaṃ samuccayaśca | atideśe punaḥ, samākhyayā kāryaikatvam, atideśena kāryānyatvaṃ ( tenāpi samuccayaḥ ) | tasmā
tasmācceti—kalpitādideśāpekṣavetyarthaḥ |ccopadeśāntargatā samākhyaiva balīyasīti tatkṛtaṃ kāryaikatvamāśritya virodhādbādhaḥ parigṛhyeta | vikāre ca prakṛtiliṅgasaṃyogāpekṣā vidyata iti kāryāpattirvijñāyate | na tu samānavidhipakṣe prakṛtiliṅgasaṃyogaḥ kaścit, yena kāryāpattiravadhāryeta | kecittvāhuḥ | samānavidhitve parasparānapekṣairdravyadevatāsaṃyogaiḥ karmabhedo 'vasīyate | vikāre punaratideśaprāptayāgānuvādena guṇamātraṃ vidhīyate | tataścaika eva yāgaḥ syānna dvitīyādaya iti | sa tvayaṃ guṇavidhiraindrāgne saṃbhavennendrasarasvatyoḥ | anekadra vyadevatāvidhānena vākyabhedaprasaṅgādekāntena karmāntaratā | tenaivaṃ samarthanīyaṃ, karmāntaramevedaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ kimapūrvāntarasādhanatvaṃ pratipadyatāmuta prākṛtasavanīyāpūrvameva sādhayatviti | pūrvakḷ
pūrvakḷpteti—prakṛtikḷptamityarthaḥ |ptāpūrvaviniyogamātre saṃbhavati nāpūrvāntaraṃ kalpayitvā tatsādhanatvādhyavasānaṃ yuktam | tathā 'ttideśaprāptasavanīyāpūrvamapi sādhanāpekṣāvelāyāṃ pratyakṣaśrutasavanīyaparityāgena na savanīyāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti | sarvāpekṣāsu prakṛtāsaṃbhavenāprakṛtagrahaṇādyāgagato 'pi
vyāpāraḥ prākṛtenaivāpūrveṇa kḷptasaṃbandho na śaknotyapūrvāntarasaṃbandhaṃ pratipattum | kathama kḷptasāmarthyaṃ sabanīyāntaraṃ prākṛtamapūrvaṃ sādhayatīti cet | yathetarasminpakṣe 'pūrvāntaraṃ yāgagataṃ vyāpāramityadoṣaḥ | kastarhyanayorviśeṣaḥ | ucyate | yadā yāgagatavyāpāreṇāpūrvāṇyapekṣyante na tadā vaikṛtasavanīyāpūrvaṃ kḷptaṃ, yattasminnaṃśe nipatet | yadā punarapūrveṇa karmāpekṣyate tadā savanīyatvaprakṛtiliṅgasaṃyuktaṃ karmāntaraṃ vidyamānamavabudhya prākṛtaṃ nirākaroti | prakṛtau cāpūrvakalpanāvasarādvidhīyamānasavanīyacatuṣṭayānuniṣpādyapūrvacatuṣṭayaṃ kalpyate | na hi tatra jñāyate kataratpūrvataraṃ kḷptaṃ yasya sādhanāntarasaṃbandhaḥ syāt | karmālocanavelāyāṃ hi karmarūpāṇyeva dṛśyante | apūrvakalpanā 'pi yugapadbhavatīti na jñāyate viśeṣaḥ | vikārapakṣe tu jñāyate prākṛtasya pūrvataraṃ kḷptirityavaśyāvaheye 'nyatarasminkarmaṇi viprakṛṣṭaṃ prākṛtaṃ hātavyaṃ bhavatīti bādhaprasaṅgaḥ | nanu ca vikārapakṣe 'gniṣṭomasaṃsthāyā eva vikārabhūtāḥ parāḥ saṃsthā bhavanti na paraspareṇeti kevalasyā ' 'gneyasya prāptasya parairbādhātsarvatra dvitīyasya darśanaṃ na syādityetāvanmātraṃ vaktavyaṃ kimucyate tṛtīyasya darśanaṃ na prāpnotīti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadi tvayamaindrāgnādīnāṃ paratra prāptānāṃ bādhādadarśanaṃ brūyāttato niṣpramāṇakaṃ vadet | ayaṃ tvadarśanamātraṃ vadati | taccā ' 'gneyasya bādhānmadhyamayoścāprāptetavapannameva | tenaiva cā ' 'gneyo bādhyetetyāha—na pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pareṇeti | tasmātsamānavidhānāḥ || 42 ||

ukthādayaḥ samāptiviśeṣāḥ phalasādhanatvena codyamānāḥ samāptimantamāśrayamapekṣamāṇāḥ prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ samāśrayantastasya nijāmagniṣṭomasaṃsthāṃ vikṛtya niviśanta iti vikāraśabdenocyante | nanu cokthyādīnāṃ samāptitve siddhe samāptimadapekṣā bhavati | na caiṣāṃ prāg jyotiṣṭomasaṃbandhātsamāptitvasiddhiḥ, ārambhamadhyāpekṣatvātsamāptiśabdapravṛtteḥ | atha prathamaṃ tatsaṃbandhastataḥ prathamaṃ kratvarthatve '
vadhārite phalasaṃbandhābhāvāt ‘sa nityasya samatvāt’ ityevamavikāratvaprasaṅgaḥ | kiṃca |

lg.l: grahaṇādau ca vispaṣṭe codyamāne phalaṃ prati |

div.p:
tatra kaicidāhuḥ | grahaṇādīnāmapi phalasaṃbandhe 'dhika
adhikaraṇaṃ gacchatyeveti—adhikaraṇavicāraḥ saṃgacchata evetyarthaḥ |raṇaṃ gacchatyeva kiṃ jyotiṣṭomārtho dharmavidhiruta grahaṇādyartho 'pīti | saṃsthā
evamapi ‘saṃsthāstu samānavidhānāḥ’ iti sūtrasthasaṃsthāśabdānupapattiṃ śaṅkate—saṃsthāśabda ityādinā |śabdaḥ kathamiti cet | teṣāṃ grahaṇādīnāmante vidhānātsamāptisaṃbandho 'stīti tacchabdalābhaḥ | ‘paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt’ ṣoḍaśinā vīryakāmaḥ stuvīta’ iti pūrvasamāptyuttarakālaṃ codyamānānāṃ samāptyantaravyapadeśabhāktvaṃ bhavati | anye tvāhuḥ | grahaṇādayo 'pyatra phalavatsamāptyaṅgatvena prāptā eva sādhyasādhanasaṃbandhavidhipare vākye nirvapatyāsabhativadanūdyanta iti | kutaḥ |

nanu ca ‘ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt’ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogānnāmāpi grahaṇādīnāmeva syāt | naitadevam | ukthyastotrasaṃbandhāddhi samāptirevokthyaśabdenocyate, tatsaṃbandhādgrahaṇa upacaryate | na ca mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇaḥ parigṛhyate | nityuṃ tu yajñasāmānādhikaraṇyenokthyādīnāṃ prayogo dṛśyate, ‘ukthyena yajetokthyo yajñaḥ’ iti | tathā ‘ṣoḍaśinā yajate ṣoḍaśī yajñaḥ' | sa
navai, naiveti ca kvacidupalabhyate | vai ṣoḍaśī nāma yajño 'stīti | sa cātyantāvyatiriktasamāptivacanatve 'vakalpate na grahastotravacanatve | ṣoḍaśīti ca puṃliṅgaḥ samāptivacana evopapadyate | napuṃsakaliṅgasya stotravacanatvāt | yastu puṃliṅgaprayogaḥ stotre kvaciddṛśyate yathā ‘ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī’ iti, sa gauṇa iti pratipattavyam | iha vākyaśeṣe puṃliṅgaḥ ṣoḍaśī pratīyata iti saṃsthāvacanaḥ | ‘atirātreṇa prajñākāmam’ iti vispaṣṭameva saṃsthāvacanatvam | na hi tatra kriyāntaramupāttam | yajirapi ca ṇyarthopasarjanatvena śrutaḥ kleśena pradhānīkartavyaḥ | tasmādrātrimatītya yā samāptiḥ sā phalena saṃbadhyate | yadi ca grahaṇastotrayoḥ phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāttatastayoḥ kriyātvādāśrayāpekṣā nāstīti svatantrayoreva prayogaḥ prāpnoti | tatra ca prakaraṇāmnānaprayojanamukthyādiśabdaprayogaśca na jñāyeta | tasmādapi samāptayaḥ phalavatyaḥ | kathaṃ tu prāk kratusaṃbandhātsamāptitvamiti | keci
prathamaṃ tāvadyājñikamatamāha—kecitāvadityādinā |ttāvadāhuḥ | ‘sapta somasaṃsthā agniṣṭomo 'tyagniṣṭoma ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśyatirātro vājapeyo 'ptoryāmaḥ iti smaraṇātsomamātrasamāptivacanatve siddhe karmāntarāṇyanādṛtya
somayāgamātre 'pekṣite prakaraṇājjyotiṣṭomasyā ' 'śrayatvasiddhiriti | anye tu manyante | jyotiṣṭomasya kvacidabhyāsaviśeṣe samāptyantaraṃ vijñāyate yadutpadyamānamevokthyādivyapadeśaṃ labhate phalasaṃbandhaṃ ca tatra śrutibalīyastvātprakaraṇalabhyaṃ kratvarthatvaṃ bādhyate | yastvāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhaḥ so 'nuguṇatvādāśrīyate |

aparaṃ darśanam | ukthyādiśabdavācyaṃ kimapi prathamameva phalena saṃbadhyate | kiṃ punastadityapekṣāyāṃ vacanāntareṇa jyotiṣṭomasya samāptyantaraṃ vijñāyate | yadvā 'bhyāsaviśeṣa evāyaṃ vacanāntarājjyotiṣṭomasyānte niviśamānaḥ phalāya codyate | tena vā tasminvā kratuḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti saṃsthāśabdenābhidhīyate | kecitpunarmanyante | saṃsthā nāmāntyayāgābhyāsānantaraṃ yā kriyoparatiḥ sā 'bhidhiyate | na cākriyātmakatvāttasyāḥ phalasādhanatvaṃ yuktamatastadupalakṣito 'bhyāsaścodyata iti | a
tatra svamatamāha—anye tvāhurityādinā |nye tvāhuḥ | vacanasyātibhārābhāvādabhāvo 'pi codyamānaḥ phalasādhatvena naiva virudhyata iti | yathā ‘akurvanvihitaṃ karma’ ityatrākaraṇasyāsataḥ pratyavāyahetutvam | athavā 'styevātraudāsīnyapratipattirūpaḥ saṃkalpa ityavirodhaḥ | iha ca yathā guṇātphalaṃ bhavati yathā ca kāmyo guṇo nityamarthaṃ vikaroti tadindriyakāmā( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 11 ) |dhikaraṇagodohanādhika( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 3 ) |raṇābhyāmupasaṃhartavyam | taddarśayati—guṇādevaṃjātīyake phalaniṣpattiḥ | evaṃ hi śrūyate ‘paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt' | na jyotiṣṭomakāma ukthyagrahaṇakāmo vā, ityanena kratvarthatvaṃ nirākaroti | kratvarthatve hi sati, antareṇāpi kāmapadopabandhaṃ tadupakārakamevaitatkartavyamiti vijñāyate | yadi cokthyagrahaṇasvarūpamātraṃ cikīrṣyeta tato 'rthādukthyagrahaṇakāmasyaiṣa vidhirbhavedyasyaivaṃ prārthanamukthyagrahaṇasvarūpamātraṃ kathaṃ nirvartatāmiti | tattu dvayamapi paśukāmopādānādanavakḷptam | ataḥ kāmyatvādasti godohananyāyena vikāratvam | tatra kathamiti—itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ jyotiṣṭomagṛhītetikartavyatā 'tidiśyate | kaḥ punariha prakāro yenetikartavyatā gṛhyate | yadi tāvatsaṃnidhānaṃ tataḥ samānavidhānamevābhyupagataṃ bhavati | na hyatideśasya saṃnidhiḥ kāraṇaṃ, sārūpyaprabhavatvena vakṣyamāṇatvā
vakṣyamāṇatvāditi-saptamādhyāya iti śeṣaḥ |t |
atha kāryāpattyā, tatrāpi kāraṇāntaratvaṃ nirākṛta
nirākṛtamiti—‘naimittikamatulyatvāt’ iti sūtre, kiṃ kāryāpattirupadeśātideśābhyāmanyā, etayorevāntargatā vā’ ityādinā granthenāsmābhiriti śeṣaḥ |m | na ca dīkṣaṇīyādayaḥ saṃsthādharmāḥ | yataḥ kāryāpanne saṃsthāntare bhaveyuḥ | na jyotiṣṭomasyokthyādayaḥ kārye vartante | yatastaddharmānpratipadyante | etenātideśapakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ | yo hi manyate 'tidreśena dharmā bhaviṣyantīti, tasyāpyatideśakāraṇaṃ sārūpyaṃ nāstīti | yadyapyagniṣṭomasya saṃsthayā sāmānyamasti | jyotiṣṭomasya tu na kiṃcidukthyādisārūpyamityaprakṛtitvam | ata eva ca bhāṣyakāro 'pi saṃnidhānādityetāvanmātramuktvā tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ | tena vaktavyametat | ucyate |

yathā ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ ityatra vyākhyātaṃ, vinā 'pi sārūpyeṇānyathā tatphalāprāpteratideśo bhavati | sārūpyaṃ hi prakṛtyupasthāpanadvāreṇopayujyate nādṛṣṭopakāranirvṛttyā | tadihāntareṇāpi sārūpyamāśrayatvapratipattiḥ saṃnidhānādastyeva | bhāṣyakāro 'pyetadeva saṃnidhānamāha, na dīkṣaṇīyādisāmīpyam | āśrayatvena hi gṛhīto jyotiṣṭomaḥ śaknoti dīkṣaṇīyādyapūrvajānitaṃ svagataṃ vyāpāraṃ bodhayitumiti siddho 'tideśaḥ | āha | kathaṃ punaryeyamitikartavyatā sā nityasya, na punarasyaiva kāmyasya, sādhāraṇī veti |

yadi vinaiva pramāṇena kevalanityārthatvaṃ tvamicchasi hanta madicchayā 'pi kevalakāmyārthatvamevāstu | atha punaridamapramāṇakamiti nā ' 'śrīyate tataḥ pramāṇavatsādhāraṇyamiṣyatāmiti | tatrātiśayoktimasahamāno bhāṣyakāraḥ sādhāraṇapakṣe copakariṣyatīti
niṣpramāṇakamapi kevalakāmyapakṣameva tāvannyāyena nirākaroti—yatra yatra guṇe kāmastatra tatra kriyāyāṃ sādhyamānāyāṃ nānyatheti | yadi nāma guṇaḥ
guṇa iti—kāmyo guṇa ityarthaḥ | svātantryeṇetikartavyatāṃ grahītuṃ śaknuyāttata evaṃ syāt | sa ca kathaṃ śaknuyāt, yadi karaṇairevetikartavyatā saṃbadhyeta | yadi ca guṇānāṃ svatna eva bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet | na tāvatkaraṇairitikartavyatā saṃbadhyata ityukta
uktamiti—indriyakāmādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |m | saptamanavamādyayośca vakṣyati bhāvayetkathamityapekṣya bhavati na karaṇena kathamiti | yasyāṃ tu bhāvanāyāṃ dhātvarthāḥ karaṇaṃ bhavanti tasyāṃ te vastvantaranirapekṣāḥ paścāttanamaruṇaikahāyanīnyāyalamyamitikartavyatāsaṃbandhaṃ labhante | yasyāṃ punarguṇānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ tasyāṃ dhātvarthaviśeṣādvinā karaṇatvānupapatteḥ sādhyabhūṃto dhātvartho 'paro 'pekṣitavyaḥ | na hi vyāpārasāmānyasya guṇairutpattiḥ śakyā | na ca kriyāviśeṣasādhayan guṇaḥ sāmānyasādhanatvaṃ bhajate | tena yasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavasthito guṇa itikartavyatāṃ gṛhṇāti tasyāṃ prathamatarasaṃniviṣṭo dhātvartho ddaśyate| tataśca tena tāvatsaha prathamataramaruṇaikahāyanīva nniyamaḥ | yadi hītikartavyatāgrahaṇayogyaḥ sa na bhavettato na gṛhṇīyāt | sa tu phalavattvāditikartavyatādvārabhūtabhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvācca na kathaṃcinna gṛhṇāti | tatra catuṣṭayamapyatra prathamataraṃ grahaṇaṃ prayuṅkte | bhāvanā tāvanna dhātvarthaviśeṣādvinetikartavyatāṃ śaknoti grahītum | guṇo 'pi ca na dhātvarthamanupanīya svatantraḥ śaknoti tannirapekṣabhāvanārahitatvānnirviśeṣasya ca karotyarthamātrasyānanuṣṭheyatvādavyāpāratvācca gra
grahītumiti—itikartavyatāmityarthaḥ |hītumityāśraya
āśrayati—dhātvarthamiti śeṣaḥ |ti | tathā, itikartavyatā guṇābhimukhaṃ gacchantī na dhātvarthamullaṅghya śaknoti gantumiti tanmukhe tāvatpatati | dhātvartho 'pi svayamitikartavyatākāṅkṣaḥ san guṇārthamapi prasthitāmetāṃ grahaṇasamarthaḥ sankimiti parityajet | ato 'tra phalāya coditānāmukthyādīnāṃ jyotiṣṭomāśrayatvenāvagatānāmitikartavyatāmākāṅkṣatāṃ prakaraṇena dīkṣaṇīyādaya upanīyamānā mārgāntarābhāvādavaśyaṃ tāvajjyotiṣṭomamukhe patanti | na hyukthyādayaḥ samāptirūpāstatparihāreṇa grahītuṃ samarthāḥ | svamukhapatitāṃśca na kathaṃcijjyotiṣṭomastānupekṣate | taddarśayati—nāsau sādhyasyābhavantī sādhanena saṃbadhyate | sa hītikartavyatāviśeṣa evaṃ codyate, anena phalasya sādhanamukthyādi sādhakaṃ kuryāditi | yathā 'sau sādhako bhavati tathā kuryādityarthaḥ | tataśca karotisaṃsparśādbhāvanayaiva saṃbandhaḥ | evaṃ ca sati nāsti sa prakāro yena dhātvarthaṃ parihṛtyānayetikartavyatayokthyādayaḥ sādhakāḥ kriyeran | kriyāyāmasādhyamānāyām—ananugṛhyamāṇāyāmityarthaḥ | ye tu tenāsādhyamānāyāmiti—ukthyā
dineti sabandhayanti teṣāṃ pūrvaprastutetikartavyatāviśeṣaparityāgādasaṃbaddhatvam | tatra tatrakriyāyāṃ sādhyamānāyāmityanena ca punaruktatvaṃ syāt | tena sādhakasyāpi— guṇasya, itikartavyatāmicchatā sādhyasyāsau—dhātvarthasya, ityetadabhyupagantavyam | evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamuktvā saṃprati prastute viśeṣe yojayati sādhyaśca jyotiṣṭoma iti | tasmānna tāvatkevalakāmyārthatvam | atha kasmānna sādhāraṇatvamiti—balavattvena dvitīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ | siddhāntavādyāha | nityavadāmnānāditi | sarvatra hyaikarūpye sati tantrasaṃbandho ghaṭate | na ca dharmānprati jyotiṣṭomasya saṃsthānāṃ caikarūpyamasti | dharmā hi kāmanimittasaṃyogābhāvānnityavadāmnāyante, yadaiva jyotiṣṭomastadaiva dīkṣaṇīyādayaḥ prayoktavyā iti | satyapi ca jyotiṣṭome vinā paśukāmādinokthyādayo na saṃbhavanti | na tvetāsu jyotiṣṭomaḥ kadācinnāsti | sarvatra samastātmanā pratyekaṃ jātivatsamavetatvāt | ata e
ete—dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā ityarthaḥ |te yathāmnātā jyotiṣṭomena saha saṃbadhyante, nānityābhiḥ saṃsthābhiḥ | nanu satyapyāsāmanityatve jyotiṣṭomasyaikasya nityatvānnityavaddharmāmnānaṃ nityārthatve na virotsyate | nityāmnānaṃ tāvattaṃ prati kṛtārthaṃ bhaviṣyati | yadi tu tasminsatyevānityo 'pyaparaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyate kiṃ no bādhyate | yo hyanityārthameva nityavadāmnāyate sa virudhyate naivajātīyaka iti | naitadevam | evaṃ sati tantraṃ tāvatparityaktam, aprayojakalakṣaṇāpannatvāt | yadā hi nityavadāmnānaṃ nityārthatvena tāvadvinā na bhavati kḷpte ca tādarthye nirākāṅkṣībhūte pāṭhe prasaṅgāditarasaṃbandha iti na sāmānavidhyam | itarathā hyevaṃ dharmavidhiḥ syāt, nityametān jyotiṣṭome dharmānkuryātkadācicca yadā paśukāmādayo bhavantīti, tacca
vipratiṣiddhamekasya vidhānasya | nanu dvāvetau prakaraṇāmnānānumitau vidhī | tayoreko nityavadvidhāsyati, aparaścānityavaditi | satyaṃ prayogavacanayorbhedādavipratiṣedhaḥ | prayojyavacanāni tu nityānityaprayogavacanānuvidhānādvipratiṣidhyante | tenaiṣāṃ nityatvāvighātamicchatā 'vaśyaṃ grāhakamapi tadbhūyamevābhyupagantavyam | ataścāvyabhicārājjyotiṣṭomārthatvameva yuktamiti | nanvagniṣṭomasaṃsthā 'pi kāmyeti—yadā sarvasaṃsthānāmanityatvaṃ, na ca tadvyatiriktaṃ nityaṃ kiṃcijjyotiṣṭomarūpamasti tadā jyotiṣṭomena nityavadgrahaṇāttadvārabhūtena tulyakalpameva sarvāsā dharmopanayanamiti kva nityaḥ prayoga ityanavadhāraṇātkevalānityārthaṃ balādvaikalpikanyāyena bhaviṣyatītyata āha—sa nityasya samatvāditi | samau hi kratvarthapuruṣārthau vidhī | tau hi dvāvālocya ‘e
(a. 4 pā. 3 a. 3 sū. 5)kasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ ityevamagniṣṭomāntasya nityasyaiva kāmasaṃyoga iti | itarasya tu kevalakāmasaṃyogādanityatvamiti viśeṣaḥ | tena yadyapi prayogeṇeyamanityā tathā 'pi jyotiṣṭomasya nityatvādetasyāśca taṃ prati prāptirūpeṇa nityatvāttadgṛhītadharmaparabhāgalābhāccāgniṣṭomasyetyevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyapadeśaḥ | atha vokthyādiṣvapi prāptidvaye sati jyotiṣṭomāṃśena yā prāptiḥ sopadeśena, yokthyāśena sā 'tideśātmiketi vivekaḥ || 43 || 44 ||
viśiṣṭavidhānasya nātibhāraḥ || 45 ||

ṛtukaraṇeṣu cottaravidhau yatpūrvābhāvamanuvadati sa vikārapakṣe 'vakalpate | codakaprātasya cottareṇa pūrvasya bādhitatvāt | sāmānavidhye hi pratyakṣanimittasaṃnidhānātprāpte nimitte naimittikamavaśyaṃ kartavyamiti samuccayaḥ syāt | tatra pratiṣedhaḥ pṛthagvidherupagamyamāno vākyaṃ bhindyāt | na hyatra dvitīyatṛtīyādivadviśiṣṭavidhiravakalpate | vidhipratiṣedhayorvipratiṣedhāt, paryudāsāsaṃbhavācca | sarvaśceha savanīyapaśuviṣayaḥ pūrvapakṣavādyukto nyāyaḥ siddhāntatvenānusaṃghātavyaḥ | saṃsthānimittatve hi sāmānavidhye 'pi nimittābhāvādabhāvadarśanamupapadyetaiva | siddhānte 'pi cādṛṣṭārthatvātsamuccayaprasaṅge sati kratukaraṇasamākhyā prakṛtiliṅgamiti yojyam | kecitpunarāhuḥ | pracaraṇīhomaśeṣapratipattivaddhomasya paridhyañjanena pratipādite sāmānavidhye 'pyabhāvaḥ | sidhyatīti | tatra tu vākyena svatantre vidhīyamāne kathamaprastutaṃ pratipattitvamavagamyata iti vaktavyam | satyapi ca homena pratipādane yāvatā paridhyañjanaśabdārtho nirvartate kiṃcicca śrutyocyate tāvatpunaḥ saṃbhavatyeva | tasmādyathoktena nyāyena darśanamevedamabhāvasaṃkīrtanam || 46 ||

yattvaprakṛtasya yadiśabdopabandho dvādaśāhādivannāvakalpata iti | nokthyādīnāmanyairaprakṛtaistulyatā | yadyapi hyeṣāṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhātprakaraṇamagrāhakamitikartavyatāyāstathā 'pi saṃnihitatvādyadiśabdavyapadeśaṃ labhante | prastutaguṇidvāreṇa vā 'prastutānāmapi guṇānāṃ prastutavyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati | prakaraṇaprāptaṃ tvagniṣṭomagrahaṇaṃ nityānuvādaḥ | athavā stotranimittatvapratipādanaparatvādarthavadevetyadoṣaḥ | kiṃ bhavati prayojanam | phalacamasavade
deveti kecit | idaṃ tu vaktavyam | satyametatprayojanaṃ na tu sarvadharmeṣu | yāvanto hi sadomānādiṣu guṇakāmāste satyapyatideśe sa evaupadeśika āśrayo 'stīti na vikṛtyantaravadvihanyante | vikṛtyantareṣu hi jyotiṣṭomasyā ' 'śrayasyābhāvādguṇakāmā yathāśrutā na bhavantīti na sidhyanti | saṃsthāsu tu yadyapyaṅgaphalaṃ nātidiśyate tathā 'pi svayamarthitvātpuruṣasya cikīrṣamāṇasya guṇopāditsāyāṃ yathāśrutāśrayasaṃbhave nānupapattirguṇakāmānām | ato yanmātramukthyādisaṃsthānimittamukthyagrahaṇastotraśastrādyaprākṛtaṃ tatra yaditaragrahastotraśastradharmātideśena kiṃcidguṇakāmagataṃ prāpnoti tanna bhavatīti prayojanam | tathedamaparaṃ, yadi samānavidhānaṃ tata ‘a(a. 8 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 16)vyaktāsu tu somasya’ ityanena nyāyena ye jyotiṣṭomavikārā vijñāyante teṣu sarvāḥ saṃsthā vilkapena
pravartanta iti śeṣaḥ | dharmapradeśakā bhavantīti yāvat |, siddhānte tvagniṣṭomasaṃsthaivaikā pravartate | yatra cokthyādiviśeṣacodanā tatraiva kevalaṃ taddharmaprāptiriti prayojanaṃ siddham || 47 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīṃyādhyāyasya ṣaṣṭhaḥ pādaḥ |

div.p:
samānāsamānavidhānādhikāreṇaivaitadapi prastūyate vākyaprakaraṇavirodhāvirodhadvāreṇa | darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇasthā vediḥ taddharmāśca khananādayastathā barhistaddharmāśca lavanādayaḥ kimarthā iti | yadyapi ‘vedyāṃ havīṣi’ ‘barhiṣi havīṃṣi’ ‘barhirlunāti’ ‘vediṃ khanati’ iti cāviśeṣitena vākyenāṅgapradhānārthatvabuddhirbhavati | tathā 'pi svātantrye
sati laukikeṣvapi gṛhācchādanārtheṣu barhiḥṣu dharmaprasaktāvānarthakyādavaśyamapūrvasādhanatākāritaḥ saṃbandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ | sā cāpūrvasādhanatā na vākyasāmarthyena pratīyata iti prakaraṇāllabdhavyā | tataśca pradhānamātrasya tatpra
tatprakaraṇamiti—darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇamityarthaḥ |karaṇamityanena viśeṣeṇa pradhānasyaiva dharmā gamyante | satyapi ca prakaraṇasyāviśeṣakatve grāhakatvenaiva viśeṣarūpeṇa viniyojakatvādviśeṣasthāpanahetutvamityukta(a. 3 pā. 4 a. 5) añjabhyamānādhikaraṇe bhāṣyakṛdbhiriti śeṣaḥm | asaṃyuktamiti ca satyapi vākyena havirbahiḥsaṃyoge prakaraṇavirodhyarthāsaṃyogābhiprāyam | śakyau hi havirbarhiḥśabdau prakaraṇena samāveśayituṃ nāhīnavadasaṃbaddhāviti manyate || 1 ||

sarveṣāṃ vākyasaṃyogāviśeṣādityuktameva | yattu prarakaṇaṃ viśeṣeṇa viniyojakamiti, tatrā ' 'ha—atatprayuktatvāt | na prakaraṇamiha viśeṣakaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ | kathaṃ punaḥ sthitaṃ prakaraṇasya viniyojakatvaṃ nivartate, kathaṃ vā tādarthyalakṣaṇavyatiriktaṃ ca bahudoṣa
bahudoṣamupakāralakṣaṇaṃ śeṣatvamiti | ayamāśayaḥ | yadyupakārakatvaṃ śeṣatvaṃ tadā kṛṣṇadīnāmapi paramparayā yāgādyupakārakatvādyāgāṅgatāpattiḥ | yadi vihitatvaghaṭitaṃ tadvivakṣyate tadā 'pi ‘godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet’ iti vākyena paśvaṅgatayā vihitasya godohanasya praṇayanopakārakatvāttadaṅgatvāpattiḥ | athānyānupakārakatvaghaṭitaṃ tadā godohanasya praṇayanānyapaśūpakārakatvānnātiprasaṅga iti cet | godohanasya paśvaṅgatvameva na syādityādibahudoṣagrastatvādavaśyaṃ paroddeśapravṛttakṛtikārakatvena vihitatvarūpameva śeṣatvaṃ nirvācyamiti |mupakāralakṣaṇaṃ śeṣatvaṃ pratijñāyate | ucyate | naiva prakaraṇasyaivaṃjātīyakeṣu viniyojakatvaṃ sthitam | ‘asaṃyu(a. 3 pā. 3 a. 4 sū. 11)ktaṃ prakaraṇāt’ iti hyuktam | yattu virodho nāstīti | kathaṃ nāsti, yadā barhiṣāṃ prādhānyātpratyekaṃ dharmasaṃbandhe sati aṅgārthatvamapi jñāyamānaṃ prakaraṇānurodhena vyāvartyate | parastu yena kāraṇena vākyasyātiprasare bādhite nirvirodhaṃ prakaraṇamavagatavānidānīṃ tadupanyasyati laukike 'pi prāpnoti tataścā ' 'narthakyamiti | tasyottarametadeva vaktavyam | svarasapravṛttaṃ vākyaṃ yāvatyeva vispaṣṭamānarthakyaṃ tāvanmātrādeva nivartatām | na cāṅgabarhiṣāṃ laukikavadānarthakyam | atastatra bhaviṣyati | na
cātiprasajyata iti | anenaiva cābhiprāyeṇa, upakāralakṣaṇaṃ hi taditi tādarthyameva phalena vyapadiṣṭam | yadarthaṃ hi kalpyamānaṃ prayojanavadvijñātumākāṅkṣitopakāraniṣpattyā śakyate tadarthaṃ kalpanīyam | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇātiprasaṅganivṛttyarthaṃ prakaraṇādiṃtyuktaṃ taduttara
uttaraparicodaneti—‘ārādapīti cet’ ityanena kriyamāṇaparicodanetyarthaḥ | ata idaṃ bhāṣyaṃ ‘na tadvākyaṃ hi tadarthatvāt’ ityatrotkṛṣya vyākhyeyamityāśayaḥ |paricodanānavatāraprasaṅgādatitvaritoktamityupekṣaṇīyaṃ tāvat || 2 ||

yadi hyānarthakyāllaukikādbarhiṣo dharmanivṛttistato yatra tadānarthakyaṃ nāsti karmāntarārthe barhiṣi, tatra pravṛttiḥ prāpnoti | yadi tu kaścittannivṛttyartho hetuḥ so 'ṅegaṣvapyaviśiṣṭaḥ | tatra sauryādiṣvitarathā 'pyatideśena santyeva dharmā ityupadeśātideśaprāptirahitatvātpiṇḍapitṛyajña udāharaṇam | apūrvo hyayamanaṅgaṃ ceti sthā(a. 4 pā. 3 a. 8 sū. 29) ityatreti śeṣaḥsyati | tenātyantāniṣṭaprasaṅga iti || 3 ||

bhavedetadyadīdaṃ vākyaṃ svatantraṃ syāt | barhirveditaddharmāṇāṃ tu yadvākyaṃ taddarśapūrṇa
māsābhyāṃ sahaikam | tena vākyena sahaikavākyatāṃ gatamityarthaḥ | tena yattadekavākyāntargataṃ barhistasyaivaitaddharmaprāptirna bhinnavākyagatasya | na ta piṇḍapitṛyajñabarhirdarśapūrṇamāsavākyāntargatam | ato na saṃbhantsyata iti | nanu yadi darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ sahaikavākyatvamiṣyate tatastatprakaraṇaṃ muktvā nānyena labhyate | tacca prakaraṇaṃ pradhānamātrasyaivetyaṅgānāmasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sarvathā lavanakhananādayastāvanna sākṣādaṅegana pradhānena nā saṃbandhuṃ śaknuvanti | yatra vedibarhiṣī tatra gamiṣyanti | vedibarhiṣorapi havirāsādanena saṃbandhaḥ | tacca darśapūrṇamāsaprayogavacanagṛhītamāsādanaṃ saṃbadhyate | evamaṅgahavirāsādanamapi tatrāntargataṃ, sāṅgasya pradhānasyaikaprayogatvāt | nanu ca yathā prayājādaya ekaprayogavacanagṛhītatve 'pi ‘guṇānāṃ(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 12 sū. 22) ca parārthatvāt’ ityevaṃ parasparāṅgatvaṃ na pratipadyante tathā 'ṅgahaviḥsaṃbandhaṃ barhirna pratipadyate | naitadevam | yathaiva hi pradhānahavirāsādanamaṅgatayā saṃbadhyate tathā 'ṅgahavirāsādanamapyaṅgāṅgatayā saṃbhantsyate | yadi ci yaddarśapūrṇamāsārthaṃ havisthadbarhiṣyāsādayatītyevaṃ kalpyeta tatastanmātrasyaiva syānna tvevam | asyā ' 'narthakyabhayāttu svarūpe 'tikramyamāṇe kimevamatikramo 'stu yaddarśapūrṇamāsārthamuta yaddarśapūrṇamāsopakārīti | yadi tādarthyaṃ gṛhyate vākyasyātidūraṃ saṃkocaḥ kriyeta | tadupakāritvagrahaṇe tu bahutaraviṣayatvaṃ bhavati | yathā ca tadbhavati tadanugrahītavyam | aṅgāṅgamapi vinā 'pi tādarthyena tadupakārīti vijñāyate | tāvanmātrameva na taddvāraṃ yuktaṃ na tādarthyam | anupakāriṇi hi sthitaṃ nopakaroti nātadarthe | tathā ca ‘parā(a. 9 pā. 2 a. 14 sū. 44)rthe tvarthasāmānyam’ iti vakṣya
iti vakṣyati—iti sūtreṇa pūrvapakṣayitvā ‘kriyeran vā 'rthanivṛtteḥ’ iti siddhāntasūtreṇa vakṣyatītyarthaḥ |ti, vinā 'pi tādarthyenābhyu
abhyuditeṣṭyāmiti—‘yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudiyāt, sa tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajet | ye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet | ye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ, ye 'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum’ iti vākyena darśapūrṇamāsayorakālopakramanimittadoṣaparihārārthatayā vihitāyāmabhyuditeṣṭāktyirthaḥ |diteṣṭyāṃ dadhipayasostudupakāramātradarśanātpraṇītādharmaprāptirbhavatīti | tasmādevaṃ prakaraṇādekavākyatvaṃ kalpyate yasminnakriyamāṇe darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvaṃ na sidhyati tatra tatra kartavyā iti | aṅgahavirbhirapi ca viguṇaiḥ pradhānāpūrvaṃ na niṣpadyate | tasmātpradhānāpūrvaprayuktānāmevāṅegaṣvapi kriyā yukteti || 4 ||

yadi caivaṃjātīyakamaṅgapradhānārthaṃ tataḥ ‘prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhidhārayati’ ityetadaṅgapradhānārtham | tatra ca kramavākyeṣvayaṃ kramo nyāyaprāptaḥ siddhavaducyamāno hetuvannigado 'rthavattvādupapadyate ‘sa vai dhruvāmevāgre 'bhidhārayati' | kutaḥ | ‘tato hi prathamāvājyabhāgau yakṣyanbhavati’ iti | yadyājyābhāgahavirapyabhidhāraṇīyaṃ tata evaṃ vaktavyam | anyathā hi dhruvāyāmupāṃśuyājārthena kevalamabhidhāraṇaṃ syāt | tatra na cāgre 'bhidhāraṇaṃ syāt | na ca ‘tato hi prathamāvājyabhāgau’ iti hetuḥ samarthyeta | tasmātsarvārthatvamiti || 5 ||

‘yāja(a. 3 pā. 8 a. 2 sū. 4)mānāstu tatpradhānatvātkarmavat’ ityanenādhikaraṇena yeṣāṃ yājamānatvaṃ siddhaṃ te kiṃ yajamānasya kartṛtvāśenāṅgapradhānārthā uta bhoktṛtvāṃśena kevalapradhānārthā iti | kiṃ prāptaṃ | pūrveṇādhikaraṇena sarvārthatvam | sarvārthe hi yajamāne 'vasthitāḥ śaknuvanti sarveṣāmupakartum | na ca vyāvṛttikāraṇamastīti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

yadi hyete kartṛtvāṃśapātino bhaveyustataḥ sarvārthatvaṃ pratipadyeran | bhoktṛtvāṃśasthāstveti | sa hi tairvinā nopa
nopapadyata iti—bhoktṛtvāṃśasyādṛṣṭarūpatvenānirjñātaprakāratvāditi śeṣaḥ |padyate | kartṛtvaṃ tu tadabhāve 'pi yathā bhavati tathā sarvalo
kapratyakṣam | ṛtvijāmapi ta tatsaṃbhavānnaiva tebhyo nivṛttiḥ syāt | abhīṣṭe cārthe yogyatādhānamākāṅkṣati | yatra ca yogyatvamanupajātam | na tu yajamānasya kartṛtvasvarūpamabhīṣṭam | na ca prāgebhyo na niṣpannam | yogyatāṃ cā ' 'dadhānāḥ kriyāḥ saṃskārā ityucyante | tasmādbhoktṛtvāṃśaṃ bhajante | yasya ca varmaṇaḥ phalaṃ yajamānena bhujyate taddeśasthāstasyaivopakartuṃ śaknuvanti nānyasya | pradhānasya phalaṃ puruṣairbhujyate nāṅgānāṃ, kratvarthatvāt | tasmātpradhānasyaivaṃjātīyakāḥ | āha | yadi kratornirvartakāṃśe na patanti ta
tat—tadetyarthaḥ |t, phalasyaivāṅgaṃ prāpnuvanti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | eṣa eva hi pradhānasyopakāro yadasya phalagrahaṇāya yogyaḥ kartā kriyate | tataśca yathaivānyā
anyānyadṛṣṭārthānīti—ārādupakārakāṇyaṅgānītyarthaḥ |nyadṛṣṭārthānyaṅgāni phalayogyatāmapi kurvanti nāṅgatvātpracyavante tathaivaite '
ete 'pīti—yājamānāḥ saṃskārā apītyarthaḥ |pi draṣṭavyāḥ | prayojanamagnīṣomīyādivikāreṣu gamanaṃ vapanādīnāmagamanaṃ siddhānte || 6 ||

pūrveṇaiva nyāyaina saumikī vediḥ kevalapradhānārthā vijñāyate | iyati śakṣyāmahe 'syāṃ kartumiti yaccikīrṣitaṃ taduddeśenaivamabhidhīyate | phalavaccikīrṣitaṃ nāṅgāni | acikīrṣitatve sati cikīrṣitasiddhayarthatvena karaṇāt | evamaparyavasite cintāntaraṃ tāvatprastauti || 7 ||

saṃyogāditi vartate | paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ pradhānamātravacanatvāt ‘ānarthakyātta(a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18)daṅegaṣu’ ityevamavataratoḥ pradhānavahaviḥṣveva kevaleṣu pravṛttiḥ | tasmāccaturhotrāmantreṇa pañcahotrā na pradhānahavirmātramabhibhraṣṭavyam || 8 ||

vederdeśaviśeṣātmakatvāddeśakālayośca sāṅgapradhānaprayogaviṣayatvāvadhāraṇātsarvārthatvam | yo 'pi cikīrṣāsaṃyogaḥ so 'pi phalaprāpteḥ prayogādhīnatvāttadviṣaya eva jñāyate | tasmātsāṅgapradhānārtheyamityavadhāraṇādaṅgārthā 'pi syāt | evaṃ ca
siddhānte prayojanamāha—evaṃ ca satītyādinā | pūrvapakṣe ca vyatirekeṇa prayojanaṃ sujñeyamityāśayaḥ | sati agnīṣomīyādivikāreṣu
nirūḍhapaśvādiṣu kartavyā || 9 ||

dvitīyayā yasmādguṇabhūtamabhimarśanaṃ vijñāyate tasmātsarvārthamityasaṃbaddham | sthita eva guṇatve tadviśeṣacinteyaṃ prastutā | sutarāṃ ca prātipadikārthānusāriṇā dvitīyārthena pradhānahavirmātraguṇatvaṃ prāpnoti | tasmādanupapattireva | yacca paurṇamāsyarthamamāvāsyārthamiti coktaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣameva sādhayati | tenaivaṃ vaktavyam | ‘paurṇamāsīmabhimṛśet’ ityatra kālakarmatatsamudāyānāmanabhimraṣṭavyatvātpaurṇamāsīmiti gauṇena bhavitavyam | tatra prakṛtipratyayārthayoryadyapi pratyayārthasya prādhānyātprātipadikaṃ gauṇamityāpadyate tathā 'pyatra tāvatā 'pyabhimraṣṭavyaviśeṣānavagamātsamastasruvādiviṣayasaṃśayopaplave sati viśeṣo 'nyata eva labdhavya iti sākāṅkṣatvādasaṃdigdhārthaparigrahārthaṃ prathamapratītatvena ca prātipadikārthaṃ mukhyamāśritya vibhaktiḥ saptamyarye 'vakalpate paurṇamāsyāmiti | tadeva cātrā ' 'kāṅkṣitam | āsannahaviradhikāravidhinā 'bhimraṣṭavyaviśeṣasyāvadhāritatvāt | ataḥ kāladvāreṇa prayogadvāreṇa vā vyavasthārthamevedaṃ śravaṇamiti havirmātrābhimarśanam | adyāpi paurṇamāsyādiśabdena havirlakṣyate tathā 'pi tadupakāramātralakṣaṇātsarvārthatva siddhiḥ || 10 ||

‘phala( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 2 sū. 6 ) |saṃyogāttu svāmiyuktaṃ pradhānasya’ ityanenaiva gatārthatvāddīkṣāṇāmanudāharaṇatvam | anye tu samarthayante | sarveṣu somakra
somakrayādiṣviti—‘dīkṣitaḥ somaṃ krīṇāti’ yo dīkṣito yadagrīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhate’ ityādiṣvityarthaḥ |yādiṣu dīkṣitaśabdena viniyogo dṛśyate | dīkṣāśca dīkṣitatvasiddhayarthāḥ | tacca dīkṣitatvamupādīyamānatvāttatra tatra guṇatvena vivakṣitam | ato 'ṅgapradhānārthatvaprasaktiḥ | dakṣiṇānāmṛtvigānamanārthatvādānamanasya ca sāhāyyopāditsayā prayogārthatā | tasmāccikīrṣā( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 3 ) atratyanyāyenetyarthaḥ |nyāyena sāṅgapradhānaprayogaviṣayatvamiti sarvārthatvaprasaktiḥ | api ca pratyakṣamevaitaddṛśyate dakṣiṇopāttā ṛtvijo 'ṅgānyapi kurvanti | itarathā hi pradhānamātrameva tatparikrītāḥ kuryuḥ | na ca tāvanmātrārthaṃ yajamānasyaitaiḥ parikrītaiḥ prayojanam | ato yadyatparikrītāḥ kariṣyantītvavadhāryate tasmai dakṣiṇā | evaṃ ca kartṛtantratvābhidhānamekā( a. 11 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 8 ) |daśe yokṣyate | tasmātsarvārthatvamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | ‘dīkṣāḥ somasya’ ‘dakṣiṇāḥ somasya’ iti vacanātpradhānārthatā | य़stu dīkṣitaviniyogo 'ṅgeṣu sa puroḍāśakapālādivadaprayojakalakṣaṇāpatteḥ pradhānaprayuktasyaiveti jñāyate | dakṣiṇāśca pradhānārthāḥ satyaḥ prasaṅgādaṅgānāmupakurvantīti va( a. 12 pā. 1 sū. 31 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |kṣyāmaḥ || 11 ||

nirūḍhapaśau ca ṣaṅ
ṣaḍ̣dhotṛhomeneti—‘sūrye te cakṣuṣī, vātaṃ prāṇaṃ, dyāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ, antarikṣamātmā, aṅgairyajñaṃ, pṛthivīṃ śarīraiḥ’ iti ṣaḍ̣dhotṛmantrakeṇa homenetyarthaḥ |̣dhotṛhomena dīkṣānugrahaṃ vadannaprāptiṃ darśayati | sarvārthatve ca
syādeva dīkṣeti nānyenānugṛhyeta | nanu cānaṅgatve 'pyanugrahavacanamanākāṅkṣitatvādvayarthameva | naiṣa doṣaḥ | prakṛtau paraprayuktopajīvanāttatkṛta upakāra āsīditi, aprayojakatvāttadabhāve sati vaiguṇyamivā ' 'śaṅkyate, tatrānugrahavacanamupapatsyate || 12 ||

‘ardhamantarvedi minotyardhaṃ bahirvedi’ iti kimantarvedyekadeśo yūpāṅgatvena vidhīyate, atha bahirvedideśamiśrasaṃdhideśamātraṃ lakṣayatīti | nanu ca purastātsa
purastāditi—‘cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt’ ityasminnadhikaraṇa ityarthaḥ |rvārthatvamavasthāpyedānīmayukto vicāraḥ | sthita etasminnadhikaraṇe tadadraṣṭa
taddaṣṭavyamiti—cikīrṣādhikaraṇaṃ draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ |vyam | yadi hi vākyasaṃyogādyūpārthatā bhavetkutastadā kaimarthyavicārāvasaraḥ | sthite punardeśalakṣaṇārthatve tadarthatvātadarthatve yujyete | kiṃ prāptaṃ, prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā yūpasya vākyasaṃyogādbhavitumarhati | lakṣaṇā hītarathā syāt | na cāntaveṃdiśabdasya śrauto 'rtho na samavaiti yato lakṣaṇāṃ pratipadyate |
tasmāt ‘iyati śakṣyāmahe’ ityapi sāmānyaśāstraṃ yūpaviṣayamevopasaṃhṛtya vederyūpārthatvaṃ pratipattavyam | athavā pūrveṇādhikaraṇena sthite sāṅgajyotiṣṭomārthatve kiṃ yūpārthatvamapyasti nāstīti vicāryate | nanu sarvārthatvādeva siddhaṃ yūpārthatvamiti na vicāraṇīyam | na tena siddhaṃ, yūpasya paśvaṅgatvāt | jyotiṣṭomasya hi sāṅgasya vedirna paśoḥ | nanu ca paśurapi svāṅgabhūtāmaṅgebhyo dāsyati | dadyādyadi tasya svamahimnā vedirbhavet | pradhānadvāreṇa tvavatarantī tatsvarūpamātra evāvatiṣṭhate | prāpte ca vedikārye 'tideśena prāpnuvantīṃ dārśapaurṇamāsikīṃ vediṃ nirākṛtya paśvādiṣu saumikī niviśate | sā prākṛteṣveva vedikāryeṣu viniyoktavyā | na cedaṃ yūpamānaṃ prākṛtaṃ yato vediṃ labheta | tasmādaprāpteryūpasya laukikyaiva deśabuddhayā 'ntarbahirvā māne prāpte 'nena vacanenārdhasyāntarvedirniyamyata iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate || 13 ||
ubhābhyāmantarvedibahirvediśabdābhyāṃ madhyadeśo lakṣyate nāṅgāṅgibhāvo vidhīyate |

aṅgāṅgibhāve hi yūpo vā vedyaṅgaṃ bhavedvedirvā yūpāṅgaṃ, na caikamapyupapadyate nirākāṅkṣatvādadṛṣṭakalpanādvākyabhedaprasaṅgācca | na tāvatpaśubandhavyāpṛtasya yūpasya vediṃ pratyapekṣā 'sti | nāpi kartṛhavistadupakaraṇadhāraṇavyāpṛtāyā vedeḥ sahasrabhāgāṃśasaṃbandhini yūpe 'pekṣā | na cānyatarasya dṛṣṭopakāritvamavakalpate | kiṃ cārdhaṃ bahirvedītyaśiṣyaṃ, vidhyanuvādatvāsaṃbhavāttvatpakṣe | matpakṣe tu dvābhyāṃ vinā deśaviśeṣopalakṣaṇāsaṃbhavādavaśyaṃ śāsitavyametat | kathaṃ, samastasya yūpasyāntarbahirvā māne prāpte ‘ardhamantarvedi’ iti niyamyate, dvitīyasyārdhasya punarapyaniyamaprasaktau ‘ardhaṃ bahirvedi’ ityapi vidhātavyam |
tataścānekārthatvādvākyabhedo minotyākhyātānuṣaṅgakleśaśca prasajyate | pākṣikasya ca nityavadanuvādo 'narthakaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ | nanu cārdhasyāntarvedisaṃbandhe vihite vidhyabhāvādardhāntaraṃ bahirvedi bhaviṣyati | bhavedevaṃ, yadi nityamantarvedi bahirvedyeva vā yūpamānaṃ prasaktaṃ syāt | samastāntarvediprasaṅge hi sati ardhapunarvacanasāmarthyātparisaṃkhyāyetarasya bahirmānaṃ gamyeta | samastasya vā bahireva prasaṅge 'rdhasyāvihitamiti tadavasthamardhāntaramadhyavasīyeta | na tvetadubhayamapyasti | ataścedṛśamavadhāraṇamardhamantarvedyeva na tvardhamevāntarvedīti | tathā sati cārdhāntaramaniyatatvātkadācidantarapi prāpnotīti na bahirbhāvaḥ sidhyatīti | nanu ca yadi samastamantarvedi minoti tato 'rdhamantarvedītyevaṃ vidhirnaiva kuryāt | kathaṃ na karoti, yadardhaṃ tattāvanniyamato 'ntarminotyetāvacca vihitaṃ netaratpratiṣiddham | tasmādubhābhyāṃ viśiṣṭa eko deśo 'bhidhīyata ityevamavākyabhedaḥ || 14 ||

‘uta yatsunvanti sāmidhenīstadanvāhuḥ’ iti śrūyate | pūrvavadeva saṃdehavicārani
rṇayāḥ | kathaṃ na gatārthamiti cet | vispaṣṭārthadvayānupādānāt | na tvatraivaṃ dṛśyata idaṃ parasyāśiṣyamiti | mama tu śiṣyamiti | kathaṃ tarhi siddhāntasiddhiḥ | ucyate || 15 ||

somadhāraṇena tāvatpratyakṣaṃ nairapekṣyaṃ havirdhānasya, sāmidhenīnāṃ punaḥ prakṛtāvevāgnisamindhanārthatvātkḷptaṃ prayojanamiti nāstyaṅgāṅgitvāpekṣā | havirdhānaviśeṣasaṃbandhapare vākye sāmānyasaṃbandhaśaktimapi kalpayata āgneyyadhika( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 8 ) |raṇokto vākyabhedo yojyaḥ |
viśeṣeṇa sāmānyākṣepādvākyabhedaṃ pariharataḥ siddhasāmānyasaṃbandhena siddhāntapakṣeṇārthāpattikṣayo darśayitavyaḥ | asti hi prākṛtadeśopalakṣaṇatvena havirdhānayoranyatarasya prāptiḥ | tatra viśeṣamātraṃ sukhena vidhīyate | tasmādapi deśalakṣaṇā || 16 ||
havirdhānamiti, ananyaprayojanasya tādarthyavyapadeśo 'vakalpate | anyathā hi sāmidhenīdhānamityapi syāt || 17 ||

ataḥ paraṃ samākhyāyāḥ sarvaiḥ saha virodhāvirodhacintā va
vartiṣyata iti—‘te sarvārthāḥ prayuktatvāt’ ityadhikaraṇamārabhyeti śeṣaḥ |rtiṣyate | (hotā) hautramityādayaḥ kathaṃ viniyojikā iti | ta
‘śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari’ ityādinā kriyamāṇavicārasya balābalavicāratvābhāve nāsāṃgatyaṃ manasi nidhāya tadupodghātatayā balābalacintāśeṣatvena saṃgatiṃ tāvadupapādayati—tatretyādinā |tra prathamaṃ tāvadupodghātaḥ kriyate | yadi hotrādayo nānābhūtā vidyante tataḥ kva te viniyujyantāmiti vicāro bhavati | yadi tu sarvameva karma yajamānena kartavyaṃ na kartrantarāṇāmavakāśo 'sti tatastatsamākhyotthāpito virodhāvirodhavicāro naiva prastotavya iti | tatra darśapūrṇamāsādīni phaladakṣi
ṇā
phaladakṣiṇāvantīti—anena cāgnihotre parikrayānāmnānena bhāṣyakārodāhṛtasyāpi, agnihotrasyānudāharaṇatvaṃ sūcitaṃ jñeyam | vastutastu yadyapyagnihotraprakaraṇe tadaṅgatayā dakṣiṇā nā ' 'mnāyate tathā 'pi ‘aharaharyajamānaḥ svayamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt’ parvaṇi vā | brahmacārī vā juhuyāt | brahmaṇā hi sa parikrīto bhavati | kṣīrahotā vā juhuyāta, dhamena sa parikrīto bhavati’ hatyāpastambadhṛtabahvṛcabrāhmaṇe tatrāpi dakṣiṇākāryasya parikrayasyaiva vidhānāttadbalenāgnihotre 'pyanyasya kartṛtvaṃ saṃbhāvyata eveti saṃbhavatyevāgnihotrasyāpyudāharaṇatvamiti khaṇḍadevaprabhṛtīnāmabhiprāyaḥ |vanti karmāṇyudāharaṇam | teṣu vicāraḥ, kiṃ yajamānenaiva sarvaṃ prayoktavyamuta pradhānamātre yajamānaniyamaḥ kiṃ vā pradhāneṣveva yajamāno 'nyatrānya eva | kiṃ prāptaṃ, sarve yajamānenaiva kartavyamiti | kutaḥ | prayogavacanasthaṃ hyātmanepadaṃ sāṅgāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalārthinaṃ kartṛtvena prayuṅkte | sa yatraiva kartā na syāttatkṛtamevopakāraṃ na prāpnuyāt | tasmātsvayaṃ kuryāditi | phalasya cotpadyamānasyotpādayitṛtvena prayoktā yajamāna evocyate | hotrādisamākhय़ā ca tasyaiva tattatkurvāṇasya ‘ekasya( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 9 sū. 23 ) | karmabhedāt’ ityanena nyāyena bhaviṣyatīti manyate || 18 ||

pradhānamātravācino dhātoḥ pareṇa pratyayena tanmātrasyaiva phalārthikartṛkatvaṃ niyamyate | śeṣāṇāṃ tu nirvṛttimātraṃ pratīyate na kartṛviśeṣaḥ | tasmāttatrāniyamaḥ | nanu ca pradhānasamānakṛrtṛkatvādevāṅgānāmapi sa eva kartā setsyati | na | tatra prayojakatvenāpi kartṛtvānugrahāt | dravyotsarge hyanyena kriyamāṇe na kiṃcidyajamānena kṛtaṃ syāditi taṃ karoti | ta
tatra kṛta iti—pradhāne tu dravyotsargarūpe svayaṃ kṛta ityarthaḥ |tra kṛte parikrayādinā kāra
kārayannityasya prāgaṅgānīti śeṣapūraṇam |yanna kartṛtvātpracyavate | kecittu sutarāmātmanepa
dena prayojakatvamevābhidhīyata iti samarthayante | kartrabhiprāyakriyāphalavihita
vihitasyeti—‘svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale’ ityanayā smṛtyerthaḥ |sya hyātmanepadasya ṇijartha eva preṣaṇādirūpeṇa saṃvidhānātmako vācyaḥ | tathā ca yajanti yājakā iti prayojyavyāpāre parasmaipadam | yajate yajamāna iti prayojakavyāpāre, ātmanepadaṃ dṛśyate | na tvetadyuktam | evaṃ hi sati pradhānamapi yathākathaṃcidanyereva kārayitavyaṃ bhavet | yadeva hi svayaṃkartṛkaṃ jātaṃ tasyaiva phalaṃ na prāpnuyāt | na ca yadṛtvijaḥ kurvanti tasya kratvarthatvādyajamānagāmi phalaṃ yujyate | kāmaṃ tu pradhānakāriṇo yajamānasya yathākathaṃcidanugraheṇa prayojakatlādṛtvigvyāpāravacanaṃ parasmaipadaṃ ṇijarthe varteta nā ' 'tmanepadam | tasmātpūrveṇaiva vyākhyānena pradhānādanyasya svayamanyo vā kartā syāditi | tatrāpi tu pratyayapratipāditā bhāvanā pratyāsannatayā phalārthikartṛtvena gamyamānā kathaṃ karaṇāṃśamātra evopasaṃhriyata iti vaktavyam | tenaivaṃ vyākhyeyaṃ, nā ' 'tmanepadena phalārthikartṛtvaṃ codyate | kiṃ tarhi | bhāvanākṣiptakartṛtvasya svataḥ phalasaṃbandhitvam | ataśca phalena karturanyatra na gantavyam | na tu phalārthino 'nyena vyāpārakaraṇaṃ virudhyate | tāvatā ca siddho 'ṅgeṣvaniyama iti || 19 ||

anvāhāryadvādaśaśatādidānaṃ karmasaṃyuktebhyo 'bhidhānāt ‘parikra( a. 10 pā. 2 a. 8 sū. 23 )yārthaṃ vā karmasaṃyogāt’ iti daśame vakṣyati | svabhāvataśca parikrayaḥ paratra kriyate nā ' 'tmani, virodhāt | tatra yadi kadācitsvayamevāṅgāni yajamānaḥ kuryāttataḥ parikrayāsaṃbhavātparikrayo na kriyeta | tatrāsya nityavadāmnānaṃ virudhyeta | tasmāttannityatāṃ kartumavaśyaṃ parikrayārhāṇi kartrantarāṇyupādātavyāni | ataśca kvacitsvayaṃkaraṇātkvacitsaṃvidhānādyaja
mānasya kartṛtvam | ātmanepadasyāpi parikrayavatīṃ bhāvanāmāśritasyedṛśenaiva kartṛtvena phalopayogaḥ samānakartṛka ityartho na virotsyate || 20 ||

ekasya dvayorvopādāne parikrayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumityaniyamaḥ | athavā phalasamānakartṛkatve sāmānā
sāmānādhikaraṇyeti—phalapadasāmānādhikaraṇyetyarthaḥ |dhikaraṇyātmanepadābhyāṃ samastasya prayogasya prāpte, yanmātrametrābādhitvā parikrayavidhiraśakyastadeva bādhitavyam | sa
sa ceti—parikrayavidhirityarthaḥ | caikena kartrā yatkiṃcitkurvatopapanna iti nānekaṃ bādhitavyamiti || 21 ||

bhinnasamākhyāniyatakartṛkapadārthayuktabhāvanāvidhinā tāvatāmupādānamiti vihitaṃ bhavati | ‘saṃ( a. 2 pā. 2 a. 8 sū. 22 ) |jñā cotpattisaṃyogāt’ iti caiṣa nyāyo yathā karmabhedaṃ bodhayituṃ samarthastathā kartṛbhedamapīti yāvatptamākhyaṃ kartāra upādātavyāḥ || 22 ||

vyāpriyamāṇānāmetāḥ samākhyā upalabhyante | na ca lokādavagatā iti yūpādivatkāryatastāvatparicchidyante | tataśca pāca
pācakādivāditi—gṛhi 'smindevadattaḥ pācaka ityukte yoṃ 'smin gṛhe pākakartā sa devadatta ityevaṃ pākakarmasaṃyogādyathaiva devadattaśabdārtho nirṇīyate tadvatprakṛte 'pītyarthaḥ |kādivattattaddhautrādikarma kurvanhautrādiśabdairabhidhāsyata ityabhedaḥ || 23 ||

yadi hi karmaviniyogavelāyāmetaduttarakālaṃ vaitāḥ samākhyāḥ śrūyerannevaṃ sati na bhindyurapi | varaṇaṃ tvatyantāpravṛttānāṃ pravartanārthamabhyarthanam | tatraitāḥ śrūyante ‘brahmāṇaṃ vṛṇīte’ ityādi | na ca tadānīṃ nimittāntaraṃ dṛśyate yatkṛtaḥ samākhyābhedo bhavet | varaṇānyapi caitāni ‘eka(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 2 sū. 2)syaivaṃ punaḥ śrutiḥ’ ityevaṃ ‘guṇa(a. 2 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 24)ścāpūrvasaṃyoge’ ityevaṃ yāvacchruti bhidyante | tadbhedāccopādeyānāmṛtvijāmapi tatparimāṇa eva bhedaḥ | samāsvyānāmapi ca prāganupalabdheruttarakālaṃ ca siddhavadvayavahārādvaraṇanimittataiva gamyate | nimittabhedācca naimittikabhedasiddhiḥ | dṛṣṭārthatvācca naikasyaiva kartuḥ punaḥ punarvaraṇaṃ kartuṃ śakyate | sakṛdupāttasya punarupādānānupapatteḥ | utpattivākyaśiṣṭavarītavyabādhavikalpāsaṃbhavācca na śakyaṃ tenaiva varaṇena vriyamāṇāntaraṃ saṃbandhum | ato 'pi varaṇāni bhidyante | sarvāṇi ca tānyaindravāyavādigrahaṇavadaparyāyavidhāyinā prayogavacanena gṛhyante | tadgrahaṇavaśena ca sarvartvijāṃ grahaṇam | ato yāvadvaraṇamṛtvijāṃ bhedasiddhiḥ | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ tasmādeṣāṃ varaṇe saṃkīrtanaṃ na vidhirityādi tadavihitavaraṇaniyamaprāṃptyabhāvā
dayuktam | na caitāvato vākyarāśeḥ kalpitaikavākyatvasya sukhataropāyapracayalabhyasaṃkhyāmātrapratyāyanaṃ phala bhavitumarhati | tena varaṇavidhinaivānuniṣpādinī pracayaśiṣṭaiva saṃkhyā setsyatītyetadeva samarthayitavyam | na kiṃcittayā vihitayā || 24 ||

adhvaryava iti samākhyānātteṣāṃ camasasaṃbandhādadhvaryupuruṣā eva camasādhvaryava iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | pṛthaktvaniyatatvādvayapadeśānāṃ sarvaiścetaraistulyavatpṛthaktvena vyapadeśādutpattau ca varaṇāntarāmnānātpūrvavadeva bhedaḥ | yadyapi ca yajamānena vriyante tathā 'pi tadājñākaratvena vriyamāṇatvādbhavatyeva tadīyatvavyapadeśaḥ || 25 ||

utpattau tu bahu
‘utpattau tu bahuśruteḥ’ iti sūtrasthabhāṣyasya spaṣṭatvādavyākhyeyatāṃ matvā sūtrapāṭhamātraṃ kṛtam |śruteḥ || 26 ||

bahūtvāniyame ‘pra( a. 11 pā. 1 a. 7 sū. 42 ) |thamaṃ vā niyamyeta’ iti tritve prāpte daśapeye jyotiṣṭomavikāre daśatvānuvādātprakṛtau ca daśa vriyanta iti vijñāyate | svāmidaśatvāccamasadaśatvācca daśatvaprāptiḥ || 27 ||

śamitā ca śabda
‘śamitā ca śabdabhedāt’ iti sūtrasthaṃ bhāṣyamapi suspaṣṭatvādavyākhyāya pūrvapakṣasūtrasya pāṭhamātraṃ kṛtam |bhedāt || 28 ||

utpattigatā samākhyā bhedikā bhavati | na ceyaṃ tadgatā | tena ‘eka( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 9 sū. 23 ) |sya karmabhedāt’ ityevameva bhavati | nanvadhyaryvādiṣu vyāpriyamāṇeṣu ‘śamitā paśuṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti’ iti śravaṇādbhedaḥ syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | ya eva kaścidavyāpṛtaḥ sa eva grahīṣyati | na ca tadā sarvādhvaryupuruṣāṇāṃ sarvartvijāṃ vā vyāpāro vidyate | tadetadvakṣyati ‘i( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 10 sū. 21 ) |taramanyasteṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt’ iti | prāptyabhāvācca ‘yadyabrāhmaṇaḥ syāt’ iti liṅgamasādhakamato balādyajamānabiṣayaṃ kalpyate | yājamānaprakara
‘tadbrāhmaṇāya dadyāt, yadyabrāhmaṇaḥ syāt’ iti vākyasyeti śeṣaḥ | yajamānaviṣayaṃ kalpyata ityasya cānuṣaṅgeṇa śeṣapūraṇam |ṇāmnānācca, śāmitrasya na kathaṃcidabrāhmaṇaviṣayatvaṃ vijñāyate | hiṃsātvādbrāhmaṇo necchediti cettu lyametadabrāhmaṇasyāpi | sa hi mandapratīkāraḥ sutarāṃ pratyavaiti | tena yathaiva śūdrādiḥ kathaṃcidanicchankā
kāryata iti—śabhiteti śeṣaḥ |ryate tathaiva yo dānādivaśīkṛtaḥ kariṣya
kariṣyatīti—ārtvijyamityarthaḥ |ti so 'nuṣṭhāsya
anuṣṭhāsyati—śāmitramityarthaḥ |tītyavirodhaḥ | etenaiva hetunā ' 'rtvijyaṃ nindyate || 29 ||

upagāśca liṅgadarśanāt
‘upagāśca liṅgadarśanāt’ ‘vikrayī tvanyaḥ’ iti sūtradvayasthamapi bhāṣyaṃ suspaṣṭatvādupekṣyādhikaraṇadvayasūtramātrasya pāṭhaḥ kṛtaḥ | || 30 ||
vikrayī tvanyaḥ karmaṇo 'coditatvāt || 31 ||

ṛtvikśabdo hi nipātyamāna eva upapadadhātupratyayasamanvite 'rthe vartate, ṛtau yajantīti ṛtvijaḥ | etasmāccetkāraṇādṛtvijo bhavanti hanta sarveṣāṃ tadaviśiṣṭamiti
tadanusāramṛtviktvamapi sarveṣāmeva prāptam | ataścatvā
catvāra iti—darśapūrṇamāsayostāvat, brahmā—ūdhvaryuḥ—hotā—āgnīdhraśceti catvāraḥ | cāturmāsye pratiprasthātrādhikyena pañca | paśuyāge maitrāvaruṇādhikyena ca ṣaṭ | somayāge ca brahmagaṇe tāvat—brahmabra hmaṇācchaṃsyāgnīdhrapotāraścatvāraḥ | adhvaryugaṇe—adhvaryupratiprasthātṛneṣṭrunnetāraścatvāraḥ | hotṛgaṇe—hotṛmaitrāvaruṇācchāvākaprāvastutaścatvāraḥ | udnātṛgaṇe ca—udnātṛprastotṛpratihartṛsubrahmaṇyāścatvāraḥ | yajamānaḥ saptadaśa ityāhatya saptadaśa bhavantīti vastusthitiḥ |raḥ, pañca, ṣaṭ, saptadaśetyādyā avayavā apyetasya mahānta ityevaṃ stotumavayutyavādaḥ || 32 ||

parisaṃkhyānāditi bhāṣyakāreṇa parisaṃkhyaiva vyākhyatā | saptadaśasvanyeṣu ca prāptavatsu saptadaśapunaḥśravaṇaṃ na tāvanmātraparigrahārthaṃ, yo 'rthāditarābhāvapratyayastamāśrayituṃ, na saptadaśasvarūpaṃ pratyāpayitum | sarvatra hi dvayoḥ saṃbandhe kṛte tatsvarūpaṃ saṃsargaśca pratīyate 'nyanivṛttiśca | kvacicca kiṃcitprayojanavaśena vivakṣyate | svarūpasaṃsargāsaṃbhave ca balādeva vidhiritaranivṛttiprayojano bhavati | ataśca tridoṣatvamadoṣaḥ | svārthasya prāptatvenaiva heyatvātpratītasya ca parārthasyāparigrahe vidhyānarthakyāt | parastu
karmakaraṇameva hetuṃ parigṛhya sati nimitte 'nyeṣvapi śabdapravṛttyavaśyaṃbhāvitvaṃ matvā ' 'ha— nanu pratiṣidhyamāneṣvapīti | kāryapratiṣedhenaiva tāvatprakramate | sarvatra hi svarūpapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavātkāryaṃ pratiṣidhyate | tadyathā na mamaiṣa putraḥ, putrakārye na pravartata ityarthaḥ | evaṃ yo 'yamarthātsaptadaśabhyo 'dhikānāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate sa kāryaviṣayo na svarūpaviṣaya iti draṣṭavyam | varaṇaṃ tu śabdapravṛttinimittatvādanu
anudāharaṇamiti—ṛtvijo vṛṇīta ityevaṃ bhāṣyoktaṃ varaṇabhṛtvikkāryodāharaṇaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ |dāharaṇamiti cet | na | asminpakṣe karmayogādeva śabdaprayogasiddheḥ | itarastu svarūpāpratiṣedhāttannimittaṃ kāryamapi duṣpratiṣedhamiti kathamṛtau yajatāṃ teṣāmṛtviktvaṃ na syādityāha | siddhāntavādī tu tattvenottaraṃ vivakṣamāṇa evaṃ tarhi dvividho 'yamityādi prakramate | yadyeṣa yaugikaḥ syāttato na kutaścinnivartate | saṃskāraśabdastvayaṃ, varaṇabharaṇe
bharaṇaṃ—dakṣiṇādānamityarthaḥ | hi saṃskārau | te yeṣāṃ na sto na te satyapi kriyāyoge tacchabdavācyā bhaviṣyanti | te ca varaṇabharaṇe saptadaśānāmeva yajamānena kriyete | tannimitatvāśrayaṇe ca ‘saptadaśartvijaḥ’ ityanuvādo 'vakalpiṣyate | anyathā tvavayavānuvādo mṛṣātvarūpaḥ kalpyeta | tasmānnātiprasaṅgaḥ | nanu ca ya ṛtvijasteṣāṃ varaṇabharaṇe yeṣāṃ ca te, ta ṛtvija itītaretarāśrayaṃ prāpnoti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | prathamaṃ tāvadāñjasyenaiṣā vacanavyaktiranviṣyate | ya ṛtvijasteṣāṃ varaṇabharaṇe iti | yadā tu vṛkṣādivatte lokavyavahāreṣvaprasiddhāstadā 'rthādayamartho bhavati varaṇena ṛtvijaḥ
karotīti | yathaivāsya sūtrasya śāṭakaṃ vayetyukte vānena śāṭakaḥ kriyata iti hi bhāvini saṃjñāvijñānādavirodho vijñāyate tathaivātra pratyetavyam | etena ‘adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīte’ iti tadviśeṣavacanāni vyākhyātāni | evaṃ ca vriyamāṇānāmṛtvijāṃ dvitīyānirdeśo 'vakalpiṣyate | varaṇaṃ cā ' 'dhānavatkrarmaupayikāṃstānutpādayaddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhaviṣyati | vedapaurvāparyaparyālocanāttu te varaṇena kriyanta ityavasānānnāprasiddhiḥ | na
evaṃ tāvadyayāśrutaṃ bhāṣyārthamupavarṇyādhuvā tatra ca viśeṣaṃ vaktuṃ dūṣaṇe tāvadādau vadati | natvityādinā | tvidaṃ nipātanā
nipātaneti—‘ṛtvigdadhṛk—‘ityanayā smṛtyā ṛtvikpadasya kartṛvācikvinnantatvanipātanena ṛtuyajananimittatvaṃ gamyata ityarthaḥ |khyānadvāreṇa ṛtuyajananimittatvaṃ gamyamānaṃ satparityaktuṃ yujyate | na ca varaṇabharaṇayoḥ siddhartviksaṃbandhitvena tānuddiśya śrūyamāṇayorviparītā vacanavyaktiryuktā | yaccāprasiddhāḥ saṃskartuṃ na śakyanta iti varaṇe 'pyevaṃ tulyam | na hi kaścidaprasiddhaṃ vastu kuruṣvetyukto 'pyadhyava
nādhyasyatīti—buddhipūrvakārī tāvadaprasiddhaṃ vastu kartavyatayā na jānāti, na prayatate cetyarthaḥ |syati | nāpi tena vyā
vyāpṛtenāpīti—abuddhipūrvakāriṇā prayatnākhyavyāpāre yadṛcchayā kiyamāṇe 'pi na tena phalaniṣpattirnaikāntādbhavatītyarthaḥ |pṛtenāpi tannimittā niṣpattiradhyavasīyate | yadi tu vedavākyapaurvāparyeṇa jñāyata ityucyate tataḥ siddhānāmeva saṃskāraḥ sukhataramadhyavasīyate | jānāti hyevaṃ varaṇaṃ kurvanyathā vedasya prasiddhā eva kecidṛtvijaḥ | mama tu te varaṇadvāreṇa prasidhyanti, prāktasmādanyenānavadhāritatvāt | athavā tasyāpi sāmānyato 'styeva prasiddhiḥ | sarvo hi bhāvaḥ kenacidātmanā sidhyanvyavahāraṃ sādhayati | sarvātmikāyāḥ siddheḥ kvacidapyabhāvāt | ato ya ṛtau yajanti ye vā ' 'dhvaryavādikaṃ kurvanti ta ṛtvijaḥ | ke ca te, ye tatsamarthāḥ, sāmarthyarahitānāmanadhikārāt | ke ca samarthāḥ, ye vidvāṃsaḥ | tatrāpi smṛtiprāmāṇyādye brāhmaṇāstadaviśeṣaprasaṅge punarviśeṣo bhavati varaṇopāttā ya iti, tato 'pi punardakṣiṇābhirbhriyamāṇā iti | seyametairviśeṣaiḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavyutpattirbhavati | vijñānaṃ ca tadviṣaya
manyathā 'nyathā ca prasajyamānaṃ viśeṣaviṣayamupasaṃhriyamāṇa
upasaṃhriyamāṇamiti—ebhirviśeṣairbhavatīti pūraṇīyam |m | akriyamāṇameva siddhamṛtviktvam | api ca varaṇabharaṇābhyāmṛtvijo votpādyeran; ṛtviktvaṃ vā | tatra ṛtvijastāvanmātṛpitṛbhyāmevotpāditā iti na punarutpattimapekṣante | tathā yogyatālakṣaṇamṛtviktvamadhyayanaśravaṇābhyāṃ siddhamiti na punaḥ sādhanīyam | vakṣyati ca ‘yājamānā( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 2 sū. 4 ) |stu’ ityatra na yogyataiṣāṃ yajamānena kartavyeti | sarvatra ca yadanutpannaṃ tadutpādyate, kiṃ caiṣāṃ prāgvaraṇādanutpannaṃ karma pratyānamanam | nanu ṛtviktvamapyanutpannam | satyaṃ, tattu paścādapyutpadyamānaṃ na paśyāmaḥ | atha yadutpadyate tadeva ṛtviktvaṃ, tathā satyānamanameva tannānyatkiṃcit | na cedamadṛṣṭamṛtviktvam | yasya hi kāryamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tatsvarūpamapyadṛṣṭaṃ bhavet | ṛtvikkāryaṃ tu karmanirvṛttirdṛṣṭaiva sā kathamadṛṣṭasādhyā bhaviṣyati | yāvatā ca sā bhavati tatsarvaṃ vidvattvabrāhmaṇatvādi dṛśyata eva | yattvadṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcittatprakaraṇavaśātkarmaprayogavacanena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tadarthameva nādhvaryvāditve vyāpriyate | na ca tadvaraṇabharaṇābhyāṃ jāyata iti tayoranimittatvaṃ bhavati | āhavanīyādīnāṃ tvaprakaraṇotpattīnāmadṛṣṭopakārāṇāmanutpannāvasthānāṃ saṃskāravidhānādupapannamutpādyatvam | na hi tatra homādibhistyajyamānadravyādhāro 'pekṣitaḥ
apekṣita iti—devatāye tyaktasya dravyasya pūrvadeśavibhajanamātreṇāpi prakṣepaghaṭitahomapadārthaniṣpatterityarthaḥ | | tenāvaśyaṃ tatsaṃbandhādadṛṣṭamevābhyupagantavyam | na ca tadagnimātrātsidhyatīti tannirvṛttyarthamadṛṣṭamevā ' 'havanīyāditvamapekṣitam | ato naiṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ | yadi cādṛṣṭamṛtviktvaṃ varaṇabharaṇābhyāṃ janyeta, tataḥ satre 'pi yajamāneṣu tadādhātavyaṃ, tadviśeṣāścādhvaryvādayo dīkṣā
dīkṣāvākya iti—satrātmakadvādaśāhaprakaraṇe hyevaṃ śrayate ‘adhvaryugṛhapati dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayatitata udgātāraṃ, tato hotāraṃ tatastaṃ pratiprasthātāṃ dīkṣayitvā 'rdhino dīkṣayati—brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaṃ brahmaṇaḥ, prastotāramudrātuḥ, maitrāvaruṇaṃ hotuḥ, tatastaṃ neṣṭā dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyino dīkṣayati—āgnīdhraṃ brahmaṇaḥ, pratihartāramudrātuḥ acchāvākaṃ hotuḥ, tatastamannetā dīkṣayitvā pādino dīkṣayati—potāraṃ brahmaṇaḥ subrahmaṇyamudrātuḥ grāvastutaṃ hotuḥ, tatastamanyo brāhmaṇo dīkṣayati brahmacārī vā ' 'cāryaproṣitaḥ, iti, tadasminbākya ityarthaḥ |vākye 'nūdyanta iti varaṇabharaṇe kartavye syātām | tatra ‘varaṇamṛ( a. 10 pā. 2 a. 10 sū. 34 )tvijāmānamanārthatvātsatre na syātsvakarmatvāt’ ‘parikraya( a. 10 pā. 2 a. 11 sū. 35 ) |śca tādarthyāt’ iti ca virudhyate | tasmātkarmayogyatayā 'badhāritānāmeva varaṇabharaṇābhyāmupādānaniyamaḥ karmārthaḥ kriyate | ṛtvikśabdaścāvaiguṇyāttadviṣaya evopasaṃhriyamāṇaḥ sato 'pyanyānyogyānnā ' 'lambate | satre tu svayaṃkartṛkatvādvaraṇabharaṇayoranapekṣitayoragrahaṇādvinaiva tābhyāmavaiguṇyamiti yogyatāmātreṇaivādhvaryutvādisiddhiḥ | tadyathā paurṇamāsyāṃ vinā 'pi śākhāparivāsanena yadevāṅgārāpohanakṣamaṃ
dravyaṃ sa evopaveṣa ityadoṣaḥ | tasmā
