evaṃ tarhi ṛtvikśabdasya yaugikatve ‘varaṇena ṛtvijaḥ kriyante’ ityādibhāṣyasya kā gatiriti cedata āha—tasmādityādinā |dyathā ‘yūpasya svaruṃ karoti’ ityatrā ' 'dāne karmaśabda iti va
vakṣyatīti—( a. 4 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 6 ) ityatretyarthaḥkṣyati tathā 'tra bhāṣyakārasya draṣṭavyam || 33 ||

pakṣeṇeti cet
etatsūtrasthabhāṣyasya suspaṣṭatayā 'vyākhyāya sūtrasya pāṭhamātraṃ kṛtam | || 34 ||

vaiśvānaradvādaśakapālādhikāre hyaṣṭa
aṣṭatvādaya iti‘vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetputre jāte’ ityupakramyaivaṃ śrūyate’ yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati gāyatryaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti, yannavakapālastrivṛtaivāsmiṃstejo dadhāti, yaddaśakapālo virājaivāsminnannādyaṃ dadhāti, yadekādaśakapālastriṣṭubhaivāsminnindriyaṃ dadhāti, yadadvādaśakapālo jagatyaivāsminpaśūn dadhāti ( tai. saṃ. 2-2-5 ) ityādiriti śeṣaḥ |tvādaya uccāryamāṇāḥ svarūpeṇānupayujyamānāḥ śaknuvantyavayavatvaṃ gamayitum | stutyā copayujyante | na tviha paramasaṃkhyopāttā yadadhikārātsaptadaśatvamavayavaḥ pratīyeta | stutyarthaṃ ca syāt | tasmādṛtviktvopasaṃhārārthamevaitaditi saptadaśartvijaḥ || 35 ||

prakṛtānāṃ ye kecitsaptadaśeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogānniyamaḥ |
tacca dakṣiṇādānakramavākyagataṃ brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate na camasādhvaryūṇām | yadyapi ca siddhamṛtviktvamanūdyamānaṃ na śakyamupasaṃhartumiti buddhirbhavati tathā 'pi saptadaśaśrutyapekṣitaviśeṣāvasthānaṃ tadeṣveva vedena siddhavadāśritamato 'mmākamevaṃ paricchedo bhavati nūnameta evartvija iti || 36 ||

‘ya ṛtvijaste yajamānāḥ’ iti yajamānartvikśabdau samānaviṣayau niyamya yajamānasaṃskāraṃ dīkṣāṃ brahmādiṣu kramārthamanuvadanneteṣu tau dvāvapīti darśayati | tasmādbrahmatvādikaraṇayogyeṣvevartau yajatsu ṛtviktvaṃ na sarveṣu | tadviṣayameva cartuyajanaṃ śabdasya pravṛttinimittam | yathā sāsnādimadgamanaṃ gośabdasya, yathā dhāyyāśabdaḥ sāmidhenīṣu
nipātyamāna iti—‘pāyyasāṃnāyyanikāyyadhāyyā mānahavirnivāsasābhidhenīṣu’ pā. sū. ( 3-1-129 ) ityanayā smṛtyetyarthaḥ |nipā
tyamānastāsvevetyavadhāraṇānnānyāsu dhīyamānāsvapi dhāyyāśabdavācyatvaṃ bhavatītyavadhāryate | tathaitavartāveva yajatsu bhavati na tu bhavatyevetyavadhārayitavyam || 37 ||

dīkṣādakṣiṇāvākyayoḥ ṣoḍaśānāṃ saṃkīrtanāttāvanto 'vadhāritāḥ | saptadaśaḥ kasteṣāmiti na jñāyate | sadasyayajamānacamasādhvaryavaścāvaśiṣyante | tatra camasādhvaryūṇāṃ tulyakalpatvādanyatarāvadhāraṇapramāṇaṃ nāstīti sadasyayajamānayoranyataraḥ saṃdihyate | tatra karmakaratvasāmānyātsadasyagrahaṇaprasaktāvabhidhīyate | svāmisaptadaśāḥ syuriti | kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvatrartuyajamānakarmanimittatvamanabhyupagamyādhunā tatsāmānyātsvāminaḥ ṛtvikkarmābhidhīyate | ‘sadasyaṃ vṛṇīte’ iti cotpattisaṃyogādadhvaryvādivadbhedaḥ | na ca brahmaṇyavayavaprasiddhiḥ saṃbhavati | samudāyaprasiddhayā bādhitatvāt | na ca brahmaṇaḥ punarvaraṇaṃ vidhātumanuvadituṃ vā śakyam | adhvaryvādiṣvapyevameva prasaṅgāt | sarveṣu copahavādiṣu brahmamantravya
vyatirekeṇeti—‘brahmannupahavayasva’ ‘sadasyopahavayasva’ ityādinā brahmamantrāpekṣayā sadasyamantrasya pṛthagāmnānāt ‘brahmāṇameva te samāmananti’ ityādinā bhāṣyoktaṃ brahmaṇa eva sadasyatvaṃ durabhyupagamamityāśayaḥ |tirekeṇāsya mantraḥ paṭhyate | tatra cānyāyyo vikalpa āśrīyeta | na ca camasasaṃbandhe 'pi brahmaṇaḥ saṃkīrtanaṃ sadasyaśabdenopayujyate | sāmarthyākṣiptena copadraṣṭrā sadasyenāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam | so 'pi ca pratyavekṣaṇādṛtau yajatīti śakyo vaktum | sarve
yājñikāśca bhedena taṃ vṛṇvate | tasmādayuktā sa
sadasyanirākriyeti—brahmavyatiriktasya sadasyasya nirākriyetyarthaḥ |dasyanirākriyeti | ucyate |

sadasyo hi bhedena varītavya eva | na ca brahmā sadasyaśabdenocyate | ṛtuyajane sati varaṇenartviktvaniyamāddakṣiṇābhāgasaṃbandhadvādaśāhadīkṣāvākyayoścāsaṃkīrtanādṛtvigiti nocyate | yathā satyapi varaṇe ṛtuyajanasaṃbandhe ca kāraṇadvayāsaṃbhavāccamasādhvaryava ṛtvijo noktāḥ | svāminastu yadyapi ca varaṇaṃ nāsti tathā 'pyanyatsarvamastīti yuktamṛtviktvam | yattu sadasyo 'pi pratyavekṣaṇādyajatīti | vacanasāmarthyādevāsau vriyate, na tu kaścitpadārthastadadhīnaḥ, yenāsya vyapadeśaḥ syāt | na ca pratyavekṣaṇaṃ nāma kaścitpadārtho yenāsya kartṛviśeṣaḥ kenacitpramāṇena niyamyeta | tasmātsatyeva sadasye sūktaṃ svāmisaptadaśā iti | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa kiṃcitsadasyanirākaraṇaparamuktaṃ tadṛtviktvanirākaraṇaparasyātirabhasavacanamityupekṣaṇīyam || 38 ||

evaṃ kartṛbhedaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ samākhyāviniyogasya pūrvapakṣaṃ racayati sma | tatra ‘te sarvārthāḥ’ iti na jñāyate kiṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthābhiprāyamuta kratvarthasarvārthābhiprāyam | tatrāpi kiṃ vākyasaṃyuktasarvārthā utāsaṃyuktasarvārthāḥ | yadi tāvatpuruṣārthā apītyabhiprāyaḥ, sa varaṇabharaṇayoḥ prakaraṇāmnānena kratvarthatvādayuktaḥ | uktaṃ hi ‘prakara( a. 3 pā. 4 a. 5 sū. 15 ) |ṇaviśeṣādvā tadyuktasya saṃskāro dravyavat’ ityādiṣu | tathaikā
tathā dvādaśe vakṣyatītyevaṃ pāṭha āvaśyako 'pyekādaśa iti pāṭho lekhakabhrāntimūlaka iti jñeyam |daśe vakṣyati ‘nirdeśā(a. 12 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 3 ) |dvā vaidikānāṃ syāt’ iti | tasmādevaṃ tāvanna sarvārthatvam | nāpi saṃyukteṣu ‘tānpuro 'dhvaryurvi
bhajati’ ityādikaśrutānāmanyeṣāmavataraṇamastīti | yāni tvasaṃyuktāni kāryāṇi tāni yatra tatra vede paṭhitāni yena kenacitkartrā yathāsāmarthyaṃ kartavyānīti sarvārthāḥ | prayuktatvāditi—sarvāṇi hi kāryāṇi śaknuvanti tānprayo
tānprayoktuniti-adhvaryvādīnākṣeptumityeko 'rthaḥ |ktum | tathā
prayuktatvādityasyaiva dvitīyārthamāhatatheti | anuṣṭhātuṃ śaknuvantīti śeṣapūraṇam | te 'pi kāryāṇi | sa
‘sarvasmai puruṣakāryāya’ iti bhāṣyārthamāha-sarvamityādinā |rvaṃ puruṣakāryamiti—yadyatkarmaṇi puruṣaiḥ prāgvacanaviśeṣātsvasāmarthyena śakyate tattadityevaṃ yujyate, na puruṣārthābhiprāyeṇa | ye punarāhavanīyādayasteṣāṃ sarvārthatvamaprastutameva | na ca prasaṅgāducyate | svakālatvasya hetorapyasamarthatvāt | na ca tasyottarapakṣe kaścitpakṣasya hetorvā parāmarśo 'sti | yadi ca laukikakāryāpekṣayā sarvārthatvamabhidhīyate tato ‘vihā( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 1 )ro laukikānāmarthaṃ sādhayetprabhutvāt’ ityuktvā ‘nirdeśā( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 1 sū. 3 ) |dvā vaidikānāṃ syāt’ ityatra nirṇītatvādavicāryam | yadapi vedavihitāgnikāryasarvārthatvaṃ prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ, tadapi ‘agnimupanidhāya stuvate’ ityudāhṛtya ‘viśa(a. 7 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 30 ) |ye laukikaṃ syātsarvārthatvāt’ ( a. 7 pā. 3 a. 12 sū. 31 )‘na vaidikamarthanirdeśāt’ ( a. 7 pā. 3 sū. 32 ) |‘tathotpattiritareṣāṃ samatvāt’ ( dhiṣṇyāgnīnāṃ syāt ) iti nirṇītatvādavicāryam | siddhāntavacanamevaitannirākaraṇoktyabhāvāt | tasmādevaṃ varṇyate | naivedamagnīnāṃ sarvārthatvaṃ pūrvapakṣīkṛtam | kiṃ tarhi | adhikaraṇānta
adhikaraṇāntareti—‘prakṛtau vā dviruktatvāt’ ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 1 sū. 2 ) ityanārabhyavādādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtreṇa, khādiratvādeḥ prakṛtivikṛtyarthatve dviruktatvāpattilakṣaṇo yo 'yaṃ nyāya uktaḥ, ‘tatprakṛtyarthaṃ yathā 'nye 'nārabhyavādāḥ’ ( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 5 sū. 14 ) ityādhānādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasūtreṇa cā ' 'dhāne 'tideśāddrạdhīkaraṇena pratipāditaśca, tenānumitaḥ pūrvapakṣo yasya siddhāntasya sa evāgnīnāṃ sarvārthatvasiddhāntaḥ ‘te sarvārthāḥ prayuktatvāt’ iti sūtravākyāpekṣayā thagbhū tena ‘agnayaśca svakālatvāt’ ityanenocyata iti padaśo 'rtharasūtroktanyāyapratipāditānumitapūrvapakṣaḥ siddhānta evāyaṃ sūtravākyabhedenocyate | na caitadagnikāryāpekṣayā sarvārthatvam | kiṃ tarhi | prakṛtivikṛtyapekṣayā | tatrānārabhyavādanyāyenā ' 'dhānavadeva pūrvottarapakṣau racayitavyau kimāhavanīyādayaḥ prakṛtyarthā āhosvitsarvārthā iti | tatra
‘tatprakṛ(a. 3 pā. 6 a. 5 sū. 10 ) |tyarthaṃ yathānye 'nārabhyavādāḥ’ ‘prakṛtau vā( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 1 sū. 2 ) | dviruktatvāt’ ityevaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate | agnayaḥ sarvārthāḥ—prakṛtivikṛtyarthā bhaveyuḥ | kutaḥ | svakālatvāt—svatantrotpattitvādityarthaḥ | tadetadvarṇitaṃ ‘sva(a. 3 pā. 6 a. 5 sū. 15 ) |rvārthaṃ vā ' 'dhānasya svakālatvāt’ ityatra | na tvetatsarvaviṣayaṃ sarvārthatvamavakalpate |

lg.l: śāstreṇa coditā ye hi darvihomāḥ svarūpataḥ |

div.p: yajjuhvati tadāhavanīye iti śrūyate | na yadyajeranniti | tenāvaśyamāhavanīyacodanayā tāvatpratīkṣitavyaṃ yāvat ‘caturavattaṃ juhoti’ ‘yadgrahān juhoti’ ‘yaccamasān juhoti’ iti cātideśena saṃbandhāddvāraṃ prāptam |

tathā ca ‘tāsā( a. 3 pā. 6 a. 6 sū. 16 ) |magniḥ prakṛtitaḥ prayājavat’ iti siddhavatprakṛtyarthatvaṃ darśitam | tathā vaikṛtacarupuroḍāśānāṃ pratyakṣahaviḥśrapaṇavidhānādgārhapatyaprāptidvāraṃ nāstītyavaśyaṃ sagārhapatyameva śrapaṇaṃ prakṛtitaḥ prāpnuvadapekṣitavyam | agniṣu paryavasitam | ṛtvikṣūttaraṃ sūtramārabhyate || 39 ||

samākhyāsaṃyogādvayavasthā bhavet | na hi hautramakurvato hotṛsamākhyā 'rthavatī bhavati | nāpi tenākriyamāṇasya hautravyapadeśo 'vakalpate | tasmādanyathānupapattyā kalpitayā śrutyā viniyogaḥ | tatra kecidāhuḥ | anyonyanirapekṣayoreva rụ̄dhirūpeṇa kartṛkarmasamākhyayoḥ prasiddhayorakṣarasārūpyeṇopatiṣṭhamānayorviniyojakatvamiti | kutaḥ |

hotṛśabdastāvanna hautranimitta iti rājaśabdavadeva pratyayalopaprātipadikapratyāpattyorasmaraṇādavagatametat | na ca rājaśabdādiva rājyaśabdo hotṛśabdāddhautraśabdaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum | na hi yathā tatra manvādibhiḥ kṣatriyasya rakṣaṇaṃ vihitaṃ tadrājakarmatvena jñāyamānaṃ pratyayārthatvaṃ pratipadyate | tatheha kenacitsāmidhenyanuvacanāderhotṛkarmatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ yannimittā samākhyā syāt | na caivaṃ sati samākhyā viniyoktrītyavasīyate | kathaṃ tarhyasatyāmavayavavyutpattau viniyogaḥ | uktametacchabdasārūpyamātrāditi | na tvetadyuktam | yadi hotuḥ karma hautramityevaṃ na vyutpādyate tato 'ntareṇaiva kartṛkarmasaṃbandhaṃ rụ̄dhyā sārūpyasamākhyayorupapannatvānnārthāpattiḥ śrutiṃ kalpayet | na hi varṇasāmānyamātreṇa śālāmālayoḥ kaścitsaṃbandhaḥ | tathā ca va
( a. 10 pā. 4 a. 23 sū. 46 ) atratyaṃ ‘nāsau kaṇvānāṃ rathaṃtaraṃ kaṇvarathaṃtara mityevaṃ kṛtvocyate’ ityevaṃ bhāṣyamarthataḥ paṭhati vakṣyatītyādinā |kṣyati, na hi kaṇvarathaṃtare rathaṃtarasaṃbandhaḥ kaścidastīti | yadapi ca kṛte rājñaḥ karmasaṃbandhe rājyaśabdaḥ pravartata iti | tadayuktam | saṃbandhasyā ' 'dimattvaprasaṅgāt | tasmādyathaiva tatra nityayoreva śabdārthayornitya eva saṃbandhe śāstrataḥ pratīyamāne sādhutvapratipattivelāyāṃ rājaśabdamanvākhyāya rājyaśabdo 'nvākhyāyamāno yaugikastannimittaścocyamāno 'pi nityanimittatvānnā ' 'dimattvaṃ pratipadyate tathaivātra hautramiti vṛddhidarśanāddhotṛśabdāt ‘tasyedaṃ karma’ ityevamanvākhyānamiti gamyate | kena tu tattasya karmāvagatamiti | samākhyādarśanāttadeva tādṛśaṃ vacanamanumāsyāmahe | nanvitaretarāśrayaṃ prāpnoti samākhyātastadvacanaṃ, tena kḷpte saṃyoge samākhyāsiddhiriti | naiṣa doṣaḥ | samākhyā tāvatpratītirūpeṇa pratyakṣā | sā tu kena nimittena pravṛtteti pūrvapravṛttatayaiva nimittamapekṣate | na ca tadasti | tasmānnūnamīdṛśī śrutirasti, yathā hotrā kartavyametaditi | sarveṣveva liṅgādiṣvevametadbhavatīti vyākhyā
vyākhyātamiti—balābalādhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ |tam | ato netaretarāśrayatvamiti | nanu cedam ‘ākhyā( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 6 sū. 13 ) | caivaṃ tadarthatvāt’ ityanenaivādhikaraṇena siddham | satyaṃ siddhaṃ na tu tatra virodhāvirodhau vicāritau | iha tu yogyatvaprakaraṇaviśeṣātsarvārthatvaprasaktyā virodhamāśaṅkya pariharati, uttaravivakṣayā vā 'nuvadatītyapunaruktam || 40 ||
viśeṣasamākhyā 'pi viśeṣaśrutivadeva śīghratarapravṛtterbādhikā bhavati || 41 ||
sāmānyasamākhyāviniyogasyaivaitalliṅgam | viśeṣasamākhyāyāṃ tu kiṃcidanyaddraṣṭavyam || 42 ||

upadeśātsiddhe samākhyābādhe samastaikadeśaviṣayatvena vicāraḥ | jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa evaitacchrūyate ‘tasmānmaitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣyati cānu cā ' 'ha’ iti | pradarśanārthaṃ tvagnīṣomīya ityuktam | tatra sarvapraiṣāṇāmādhvaryavatvaṃ, sarvānuvacanānāṃ ca hautrasamākhyanam | tatkimanenopadeśena samastaviṣayaḥ samākhyayorbādha uta kvacideveti | kiṃ prāptaṃ, praiṣānuvacanoddeśena maitrāvaruṇopādānāduddiśyamānayośca śabda
śabdapratipāditeti—ekavākyopādānāvagatatyarthaḥ |pratipāditasāhityavivakṣānupapatteḥ
śrūyamāṇaśca caśabdaḥ samuccayānvācayamātraṃ pratipādayati netaretarayogasamāhārau, nityaṃ samāsagamyatvāt | na cehānvācayalakṣaṇamubhayostulyatvādupapadyata iti samuccayaḥ syāt | sa ca pṛthagapi sarveṣvanuṣṭhīyamāneṣu saṃbhavatyeveti sāmānyavacanātsarvapratyayaḥ || 43 ||

na sarvapraiṣānuvacaneṣvasau bhavet | kva tarhi | puronuvākyāsu | praiṣāntānyanuvacanāni puronuvākyāḥ | tāśca prakṛtyaitadvacanaṃ pravṛttaṃ ‘tasmānmaitrāvaruṇaḥ’ iti | tāśca tādṛśyo hautra eva paṭhitā iti tasyaiva kevalasya prāpnuvanti | yastu tāsāmante yajetiśabdaḥ sa iṣṭiprakṛtikeṣu tāvadaṅgeṣvatideśenādhvaryoḥ prāpnoti | somayāgeṣvapi ‘praiṣeṣu( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 11 sū. 22 ) | ca parādhikārāt’ ityevaṃ nivartamānaḥ ‘teṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ(a. 3 pā. 8 a. 10 sū. 21 ) | syāt’ ityevaṃ maitrāvaruṇasyaiva | athavā preṣakasyobhayatra kartṛtvādvakṣyamāṇena nyāyena preṣyatvaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya kalpayitvā hotureva prāpnoti | tathā 'dhvaryoḥ ‘preṣya’ iti preṣāntarāmnānāt ‘yaja’ ityeṣa nivartamānaḥ pratiprasthātuḥ prāpnoti | śeṣāṇi tu praiṣānuvacanāni nirjñātakartṛviśeṣatvānnirākāṅkṣāṇyeveti na teṣu maitrāvaruṇavidhiḥ saṃbhavati | puronuvākyānāṃ punarubhayāṃśapātitvādekapadārthatvena ca nānākartṛtvānupapatterhoturadhvaryośca pracyavamānānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvātsaṃnidhānācca yukto maitrāvaruṇāvidhiḥ | evaṃ caśabdo 'pi sahaprayogādapi prakṛṣṭārtheḥ samarthito bhavati, praiṣasaṃnidhānāt | na ca ‘preṣya’ ityādayo 'pi praiṣāstasyaivā ' 'tmaviṣayāḥ saṃbhavanti || 44 ||

prātaranuvāke ca hotṛdarśa
etatsūtrasthabhāṣyasya spaṣṭatvānna vyākhyātam |nāt || 45 ||
unnayanāsādanahomādi yāvatkiṃcidadhvaryoścamaseṣu prāpnoti tatsarvaṃ viśeṣasamākhyānāccamasādhvaryubhiḥ kartavyam || 46 ||

sā nāma viśeṣasamākhyā sāmānyasamākhyāṃ bādhate yā tannirapekṣā pravartate | camasādhvaryusamākhyā tu camaseṣvadhvaryuvadvṛttiṃ pratipādayati | tadyadi tāvadadhvaryurnaiva juhuyānna tarhi tān juhvataste camasādhvaryavo bhavanti | kāmamajuhvata eva tadvadbhāvaṃ labherannānyathā | yadi tu sa juhoti tataḥ kadācittasya vyāpṛtatvenāśaktau satyāṃ te juhvatastadvadbhaveyustasmājjuhotyadhvaryuḥ || 47 ||

vaṣaṭkāriṇaṃ prati prayojanāntarābhāvādbhakṣārthe nayane camasādhvaryuṃ netāraṃ bruvannahu
tasya bhakṣaṇāsaṃbhavādya eva juhoti sa eva prayacchati bhakṣaṇārthaṃ taṃ ca grahītṛtvena camasā dhvaryūṇāṃ vyāpṛtatvāttebhyo 'nyamadhvaryuṃ darśayati || 48 ||

aśaktau te pratīye
‘adhvaryurvā tannyāyatvāt’ iti sūtra eva ‘yadi tu sa juhoti tataḥ kadācittasya vyāpṛtatvenāśaktau satyām’ ityādinā vyākhyātatvādadhunā sūtrasya pāṭhamātraṃ kṛtam |ran || 49 ||

‘guṇamukhya( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 2 sū. 9 )vyatikrame tadarthatvānmuṃkhyena vedasaṃyoga’ ityatra vyākhyātaṃ yathā 'ṅgāni
pradhānavedavyapadeśaṃ labhanta iti | tasmācchayene sarve padārthāścodakaprāptā udgātṛbhiḥ kartavyā iti || 50 ||

u
uktamiti-guṇamukhyavyatikramādhikaraṇe svaracarcāyāṃ svayamuktamityarthaḥ |ktaṃ, va
vakṣyata iti—( a. 5 pā. 1 a. 10 sū. 18 ) ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇetyarthaḥ |kṣyate caitadyathā jaghanyakālatvātprayogavacanaścodakāddurbala iti | prayogavacanāśrayā ca pradhānasamākhyā, sā satyapi pratyakṣatve durbalā | yāvaccātideśena nāṅgāni prāpyante tāvatkasya kartāraṃ niyacchati | yadā tu prāptāni bhavanti tadaiṣāṃ kḷptakartṛsaṃbandhānna kadācidapekṣeti kiṃ samākhyā kariṣyati | na cātra prāptabādho bhavati, śrutikalpanena samākhyāyā viprakṛṣṭatvāt | u
( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 7 ) ityatra ‘atha yattatra tatrocyate, idamanena bādhyate’ ityādibhāṣyagranthavyākhyānāvasaraṃ ityarthaḥ |ktaṃ hyetadyathā kḷptamūlānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāptabādho bhavati na kalpyamūlānāmiti | tasmātprāptakṛtagrahaṇena tadadhikārasāmarthyājjyotiṣṭomavadeva nānākartṛkaḥ syāt | yadyapi ca prakṛtāvapi samākhyayaiva nānākartārastathā 'pi kḷptasaṃbandhatvādiha śrutitulyatā | yattvaprākṛtaṃ kiṃcidāmnāyate tasya pradhānasamākhyātakartā bhaviṣyatīti darśayannāha—‘avyaktaḥ śeṣe’ iti | akḷptāvasthatvādavyakto 'yaṃ kartṛsaṃbandhaḥ kḷptādanyatra bhavitumarhati | na tvasya viṣayaḥ samyagdṛśyate | kaṇṭakavitodanādīni yadvā pradhānasamākhyāte vede paṭhyante, vedāntare vā | yadi tāvattatraiva tataḥ samā
samākhyayaiveti—audgātramiti samākhyāyāḥ sarvanāmārthavihitataddhitāntatvena sarvanāmnaśca buddhisthaprakārāvacchinnavācitvātpratyekavṛttitvāvasāyātsvasamākhyayaiva kartṛprāptirna pradhānasamākhyayetyarthaḥ |khyayaiva teṣāṃ
kartṛsaṃbandho na pradhānadvāreṇa | atha tu vedāntare paṭhyante tataḥ pratyakṣatve satyapi tayaiva viśeṣasamākhyayā balīyasyā bhavitavyam | athātrāpi guṇamukhyavyatikramanyā
( a. 3 pā. 3 a. 2 ) atratyanyāya ityarthaḥ |ya āśrīyate tataḥ stotraśastrādīnāṃ jyotiṣṭomasyā ' 'dhvaryavasamākhyānādadhvaryukartṛkatvaprasaṅgaḥ | na cātra ‘mandraṃ prātaḥsavane’ ityādivatsamādhānamarita | taramānna pradhānenāṅgeṣu svasamākhyā bādhyate | sā tvautpattikena kartṛsaṃbandhena viniyuktārthā satī pradhānena gṛhyate | na cāṅgānāṃ pradhānadvāreṇā ' 'dhvaryavādisamākhyā yujyate | na hi pradhānānyādhvaryavādisamākhyābhiryujyante, guṇabhūteṣu kartṛvyāpārāt | yā ca pradhāneṣu na vyāpṛtā sā taddvāreṇāṅgeṣvavatariṣyatīti kuta etat | ṛgvedādisamākhyā pradhāneṣvaṅgeṣu cāviruddhā | tena kriyata iti ca tatra vyapadeśaḥ | sa ca pradhānaprayogavacanena vidheyatvādaṅgeṣu yujyate | pāṭhakṛtā cā ' 'dhvaryavādisamākhyā | sā yathāpāṭhameva bhavitumarhati | na cātra guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyenānabhyupagatena kiṃcidaduṣyati | kaṇṭakavitodanādayaśca pradhānavedasamānotpattaya eva draṣṭavyāḥ | tadātmanā ca śakyam, ‘avyaktaḥ śeṣaḥ’ iti vaktuṃ, nāvaśyaṃ pradhānādevāvatarantī samākhyā 'nugṛhyate | sākṣādanugrahe 'pyananugrahe 'pi vā 'nyāṅgeṣu kṛtārthatvenāvirodhāttena prākṛtāṅgavyatirikteṣu samākhyā viniyokrīti siddham || 51 ||

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyādhyāyasya saptamaḥ pādaḥ |

div.p: samākhyāpavādatvenaitadapi vicāryate | kiṃ parikraya ādhvaryavādiṣvāmnānāttatsamākhyātaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kartavya uta svāmineti | siddhe tvetasmin ‘anyo vā syā( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 8 sū. 20 ) |tparikrayāmnānāt’ ityetaddraṣṭavyam | tathā svāminā laukika upāya āstheyo yathā 'dhvaryvādayaḥ svadravyeṇetarānparikrīṇate samākhyānugrahārthamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate |

parikrayeṇa hi sarvatra svayaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yajamānasyopapāditaṃ yadi parikrayamapi na kuryānna kvacitkartṛtvaṃ pratipadyate | laukikenopāyena pratipatsyata iti cet | na vacanādṛte svayaṃ kartṛtvabādhāsaṃbhavāt | tasmātsvāmikarma || 1 ||

upadadhyāditi parasmaipadādayājamānatve 'vadhārite varadānamṛtvikkarma | tatsiddhiśca yadi tāvacchāstrīyeṇa parikrayeṇa labhyate tato 'styeva yajamānasya kartṛtvam | atha na labhyate tato laukika upāya iti || 2 ||
kartṛtvamevaitaurvinā | viguṇamiti yathāsamākhyaṃ saṃskārāḥ || 3 ||

puruṣapradhānatvādeṣāṃ yājamānatā | guṇabhūte hi kartaryapekṣite samākhyā niyāmikā bhavati | pradhānatvaṃ ca yajamānasvāsaṃdigdhamavadhāritam | na caite kartṛtvasaṃjananārthāḥ | tairvinā 'pi siddhe kartṛtve phalamātrānutpādāt | ṛtvikphalaṃ ca dakṣiṇālābhātmakaṃ vinā 'pi tairupalabhyate na tu yājamānam | tasmādyathaiva pradhānāni puruṣārthatvādyajamānakartṛkāṇi bhavanti, evamete 'pīti, yathāprāptarūpāṇāmeva caiṣāṃ yajamānagāmitvamiti na daṃntadhāvanamadhvaryuṇā gṛhītvā yajamānasya dantāḥ kṣālayitavyāḥ | keśaśmaśruvapane 'pi nityaṃ nā
nāpitakartṛke prayojakatvenaivāsya kartṛtvamiti kvaścitpāṭhaḥ |pitakartṛtvamiti nādhvaryoḥ kṣuragrahaṇāpattiḥ || 4 ||
adhvaryuvyāpāre ca ‘abhyanakti’ iti parasmaipadena nirdeśāt ‘abhyaṅkte’ ityātmanepadayukto vidhiryajamānasyeti gamyate || 5 ||

yattvitarakarmavatsamākhyayā niyamyata iti | tatra samākhyā niyāmikā bhavati, yatra karturapekṣā | kva cāsau, yadarthaḥ parikrayaḥ | sa ca kartuḥ kvacidguṇatvamāpādayituṃ kriyate na saṃskārāya | taddarśayati kalpanīyo hi vapanādibhiḥ saha vinaivāpekṣayā saṃbandhaḥ | i
itareḥ—ārādupakārakairaṅgairityarthaḥ |taraiḥ punaḥ kḷpto 'pekṣaṇāditi || 6 ||
pradhānāpūrvāśrayatvācca yajamānasya saṃskārāḥ saṃnikṛṣṭāḥ sukhamapūrveṇa grahīṣyante | tatsiddhayarthatvādvā tatraiva kartavyā iti || 7 ||

anena ca nyāyena yajamānasya, samākhyayā cartvijāṃ bhavantu virodhābhāvāt | na ca saṃskāratvātpratipradhānamāvartamānā dokṣyantīti codite vadati | naitadyuktam | sarvaṃ hi yajamānena svayaṃ kartavyaṃ parikrayeṇa vā kārayitavyam | tadyadi saṃskārānadhvaryvādayaḥ
kuryuste parikrayasyāyogyatvenāsādhyatvānna kāritā nāpi kṛtā ityakarmāṅgameva syuḥ | tasmānnartvigyajamānānāmete samānavidhānā iti || 8 ||

tapaso duḥkhakaratvātkartā guṇabhūtaḥ samākhyayā niyamyata ityāśaṅkāṃ nivartayati | yasmādidamapi saṃskāravatphalapratigrahaṇayogyatvaṃ karoti | yajamānasya ca yogyatvamapratibaddhaṃ kartavyaṃ nartvijastasmādyājamānam | yogyatā ca sarvatraiva dviprakārā doṣāpanayena guṇāntaropajananena vā bhavati | tatra saṃskārā guṇāntaramupajanayanti | tapaśca doṣanirdhātaṃ karoti | yo hi jyotiṣṭomādi karoti tasyaikāntenāsminnanyasminvā janmani vihitākaraṇapratiṣiddhasevānimittā doṣāḥ santi | te cānapanītāḥ kratuviparītasvaphalo pabhogadānādatyantāviguṇasyāpi kratoḥ phalaṃ pratibadhnanti | so 'yaṃ kraturapratibandhahetuṃ kaṃcidapekṣate | tatra prakaraṇaśrutasyaiva tapaso 'vaśyaṃ kratuṃ prati kathaṃcidupakārakatvaṃ kalpayitavyam | tatrāpekṣāsaṃnidhiyogyatvairdoṣakṣapaṇakalpanameva jyāyaḥ | śakyaṃ hi duḥkhadānādadharmasya kāryavirodhinastapasā 'panayanam | yathaiva prāyaścittacaraṇādduḥkhenālpenāpi satā
mahate duḥkhāntarāya pravṛttaḥ sannadharmo vināśyata iti vacanādgamyate tathaivātra draṣṭavyam | yāni tvakarmāṅgabhūtānyeva tapāṃsi śrūyante phalasaṃbaddhāni vā teṣāṃ phalasādhanasyāparasyābhāvātpratibandhanirākaraṇāpekṣā nāstīti svargādyeva kalpyate | yāni tu prāyaścittatapāṃsi teṣāṃ doṣāpahāramātrameva phalamiti na sarvatraikarūpatvamadhyavasātavyam || 9 ||
medhārhatvavākyaśeṣaścāmumevārthaṃ dyotayati || 10 ||

varadā
varadānavaditi—‘ya etāmiṣṭakāmupadadhyātsa trīnvarāndadyāt’ iti vacanādyathā varadānamādhvaryavaṃ tathā prakṛte 'pītyarthaḥ |navadetaddraṣṭavyam ‘ṛttvija upavasanti’ iti || 11 ||

‘gu( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 2 sū. 6 ) |ṇatve tasya nirdeśaḥ’ ityanena gatārthamityanyathā vyācaṣṭe, ye saṃskārāḥ santo vacanādṛtvijāṃ jātāmte kiṃ samākhyayā niyamyante neti | lohitoṣṇīṣādayo hyaudgātrā
diṣu paṭhyamānāḥ satyapi saṃskāratve vacanādṛ
vacanāditi—anena ca prakṛtodāharaṇasya vapanādhikaraṇanyāyāviṣayatayā vicāraviṣayatvaṃ yuktamiti sūcitam |tvijāṃ kriyamāṇāḥ samākhyāviṣayatāṃ pratipadyanta iti prāpte brūmaḥ |
ṛtviguddeśena hyete vidhīyamānāḥ pratipradhānāvṛttinyāyātsarveṣāṃ bhavanto na śakyāḥ samākhyayā bādhitum | tasmādiha na vyavasthā syāditi || 12 ||

pradhānakā
sautrasthakāmaśabdena prakṛtādhikaraṇaviṣayaṃ vivecayati—pradhānakāmasyetyādinā |masya yajetetyātmanepadātsāmānādhikaraṇyādādhānagatāccā ' 'tmanepadātpradhānakartṛviṣayatve 'nya
anyataḥ siddha iti—‘śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari’ ( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 8 sū. 18 ) ityadhikaraṇanyāyenetyarthaḥ |taḥ siddhe ye guṇakāmāḥ sadomānaviśeṣādiṣu śrutāsteṣu minuyādityanena
samānakartṛkatvādaviruddhayā samākhyayā 'dhvaryuviṣayatve prāpte, pradhānagatenā ' 'tmanepadena samastaprayogaviṣayaḥ phalasaṃbandho yajamānaviṣayo 'vagamyata iti yadi kāmayeta yajamāna iti prakaraṇādavardhāya tadbhāgitvaṃ gamyate | tathā cādhvaryuvyāpāre parasmaipadamupapatsyate | anyathā ‘ḍumiñ prakṣepaṇe’ ityasya kartrabhiprāyakriyāphalavivakṣāyāṃ ñitvādātmanepadaṃ syāt | anayā ca śru
parasmaipadaśrutyetyarthaḥ |tyā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vākyagamyaṃ bādhitamityadoṣaḥ | tadvaśena vā yajamānaprārthanānusāro yo 'dhvaryauḥ kāma eṣa me yajamāno vṛṣṭiṃ prāpnuyāditi tadapekṣayā sāmānādhikaraṇyamaviruddham | tathāśabdena ca pūrvādhikaraṇādetāvadatidiśyate samākhyayā na niyamyata iti || 13 ||

anyatra vacanāditareṣāṃ syādiha tādṛśasya vacanasyābhāvādvayapadeśādityucyate | vāśabdopādānādyajamānavyatirekeṇa cā ' 'tmagrahaṇāccaturthyā ca vispaṣṭatādarthyapratīteḥ ‘ātmane vā yajamānāya vā’ iti kartṛdvayasya phalasaṃbandha iti śakyaṃ vijñātum || 14 ||

akarmasaṃyuktā āśīrmantrāḥ samākhyayā niyamyante | na hi tebhyaḥ phalaniṣpattiḥ | mantrāṇāmavidhāyakatvādanyasya ca phalakalpanāhetorasaṃbhavāt | yattvāśāsanaṃ tadyajamānavadadhvaryoratyutsāhakaratvenāviśiṣṭamiti prāpte yājamānā ityucyate | te hi phalāntarābhāvātpradhānaphalaprāptimāśāsate | yajamānena ca tadāśāsanīyaṃ nartvijā | tadīyasya dakṣiṇālābhasyānyathā 'pi siddhatvādyajamānācca labhyamānatvenāgneraprārthanīyatvāt | atha yajamānārthamevāsau prārthayeta tatra ‘āyurme dehi’ ityātmaviṣayaṃ sadvirudhyeta | tasmādyajamānenaiva pradhānaphalaprāptirūpeṇā ' 'tmotsāhanārthe prayoktavyā iti || 15 ||

āśīrmantraṃ ca pravasadyajamānāgnihotreṣvagnyupasthānārthaṃ proṣitasya darśayati | na cartvijaḥ proṣitasya ṛtviktvaṃ saṃbhavati karmasaṃyogābhāvāt | yajamānasya tu dravyatyāgenopapadyate | tasmāttatsāmānyāditareṣu tathātvam || 16 ||

ājyagrahaṇādimantreṣu sāmānyenā ' 'dhvaryave punarviśeṣeṇa yājamāne kāṇḍe paṭhyamāneṣu kimubhau prayoktārau vikalpena samuccayena vā 'thānyatara iti | tatrā ' 'dhvaryavatve vikalpe vā prāpte dvāvityāha | nanu ca viśeṣasamākhyānātkevalayājamānatvameva syāt | tatra vayaṃ viśeṣasamākhyāṃ balīyasīmicchāmo yatra sakṛdāmnānam | ye tu sāmānye viśeṣe ca bhedenā ' 'mnāyante teṣu yadi viśeṣasamākhyā 'ṅgī kriyate tataḥ sāmānyapāṭhasyā ' 'narthakyameva syāt | ekaviṣayatve ca sāmānyaṃ viśeṣo bādhate | satyapi tvatra mantrābhede pāṭhabhedādviṣayānyatvam | pāṭhasya hi bhedena prayojanaṃ kalpayitavyam | na ca tadubhayaprayojyatvādamyatsaṃbhavati | tasmādubhāvapīti | nanu dvayoḥ pāṭhayorekaḥ svarūpaprajñāpanārtha itaro viniyogārthaḥ syāt | tatrāpi mantrāṇāṃ karmaprakāśanārthatvādaṅgapradhānānāṃ ca samānakartṛkatvādyatraivā ' 'jyagrahaṇādi kāryamāmnātaṃ tatraiva samākhyātenaiva kartrā viniyogo yuktaḥ | tatraiva ca mantrasya prayojyatvenāvagatasya kartṛviśeṣākāṅkṣā bhavati netaratra | rūpamātraprajñāpanasyāntareṇāpi karmakālaprayogamadhyayanamātreṇaiva siddhatvāt | ājyagrahaṇādi cāsaṃdigvamādhvaryavam | tasmānna yajamānena prayoktavyā iti | ucyate | yājamāne 'pi rūpamātrādevāntareṇāpi kāryaṃ prayojyatvenāvadhāraṇādastyeva kartrapekṣeti yajamānakartṛtvasiddhiḥ | kiṃ punasteṣāṃ prayujyamānānāṃ prayojanam | ucyate | yathaivādhvaryuṇā padārthāḥ kartavyāstathaiva yajamānenāpramādārthaṃ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ | tadyatra mantrā nā ' 'mnāyante tatropāyāntareṇa pratyavekṣyate, iha tu mantrairityarthavattā || 17 ||

yatra ‘yajamānaṃ vācayati’ iti śrūyate tatrāvidvānapi khaṇḍaśaḥ śakyo vācayitumityaniyamaḥ | athavā vidvānsvayameva brūyāt | tatra prayojakavyāpāravaiyarthyaṃ bhavet | tasmādavidvāneva vācayitavya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | na hyavidvānvihito 'stīti | yadi kāmaśrutiparigṛhītaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ bhavettataḥ prayogakāle 'pyadhyāpyeta | tattvādhānavadanārabhya vidhīyate ‘tasmātsvādhyāyo 'vyetavyaḥ’ iti | tathā sati cārthāpattyabhāvātsiddhamevedaṃ sarvakarmāṇyagnivadnṛhṇanti na śikṣaṇaṃ prayuñjate | na ca śikṣito vedo bhavati | tasmātprākkarmaṇo ye mantrāḥ paṭhitāste 'ṅgatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti nāviduṣo 'dhikāro 'tra | śakyate ca tatrāpi praipavatprayojakavyāpārasyārthavatā satyāmapi śaktāvaprayukto na brūyāditi | tacca prayojakatvaṃ dvedhā bhavati, yadi vā khaṇḍaśaḥ samarpyate 'thavā brūhītyabhidhīyata iti yatheṣṭaṃ karma | kriyatā punarviditeneti—vaiśeṣikādayaḥ svaśāstreṇāpyanadhigatenānadhikāraṃ vadantīti spaṣṭanirūpaṇārthaṃ pṛcchati | tatra vidvattāyāḥ śaktyutpādanadvāreṇa pratyakṣeṇaivopakāritvādyāvatā viditenetyāha | yadyapi svādhyāyagrahaṇena sakalo vedaḥ parigṛhītastathā 'pi darśapūrṇamāsau kurvāṇasya jyautiṣṭomikamantrabrāhmaṇaṃ na kvacidupayujyata iti, asadapi nādhikāraṃ vyāvartayati, iṣṭivedenaiva yogyatāyāḥ siddhatvāt | tena tadyā
jinastāvāneva svādhyāyaḥ | yattvasau sakalaḥ paṭhyate tannityakāmyanaimittikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ yathopapannakālatvānna jñāyate kataratkadā kariṣyata iti | tatra kadācidyanna paṭhitaṃ tatphalaprārthanānimittaṃ vā 'syopajāyate tatra tadavidvattvādaśaknuvanvihanyate, tadānīṃ vā 'dhīyānasya vrata
vrataniyameti-adhyāyānadhyāyate, śiṣyopādhyāyate, ityādayo 'dhyāyanāṅgabhūtā niyamā ityarthaḥ |niyamavadadhyayanāsaṃbhavātkarmabhiśca viśiṣṭakriyopāttavedanirākāṅkṣaistādṛśasyāgrahaṇādvaiguṇyaprasaṅgaḥ | kāmaśrutyaparigrahācca sarvairanārabhyavādavidhyadhīto vedo 'pekṣita ityavaśyaṃ brahmacaryakāla eva samasto vedo 'dhyetavyaḥ | yadi tu kaścidaśakto nādhīte sakalam, agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsamātraṃ kathaṃcidadhigacchati na tasya tatrānadhikāraḥ | evaṃ ca sati bāhyajñānaṃ dūraviprakṛṣṭameva | yattvātmajñānaṃ, tena vinā pravṛttireva nāstyataḥ sarvakarmārthamaṅgīkartavyam || 18 ||
ukhādhiśrayaṇāvahantyādīnāṃ dvādaśānāṃ karmadvaṃdvānāṃ yājamāna ādhvaryave ca paṭhitānāṃ hyāmnātamantravadubhābhyāṃ prayoktumaśakyatvādyājamānasamākhyānādyajamānakartṛkatvamiti || 19 ||

anutpannānāṃ dvaṃdvatvāpādanāśaktervidhāyakaśabdābhāvācca naiṣāṃ yājamāna evotpattiḥ | kiṃ tarhi | ādhvaryave | tatra ca kartrākāṅkṣā tadarthaśca parikraya ityavagate kartari na dvaṃdvāmnānavelāyāmapekṣā 'stīti yajamānakartṛtvānupapattiḥ | tatra svarūpasyāsati yajamānasaṃbandhe dvaṃdvatā ka
kathamiti pāṭhastu kvacidapi nopalabhyate | paraṃ tu ‘tatra svarūpasyāsati’ ityādivārtikasya ‘tatrādhvaryuḥ padārthān’ ityādi bhāṣyagranthavyākhyānārthasya yathāśrute vivakṣitārthālābhena kathamityādirāvaśyakamiti bhāti |thaṃ yājamānī kriyeta | na ca sā kartrantareṇa kriyamāṇānāṃ saṃbhavati | samāsannakaraṇaṃ hi dvaṃdvatā | na cānyakartṛkāṃ kriyāmanyaḥ samāsannāṃ kartuṃ samarthaḥ | na ca samāsannakaraṇānurodhena kriyāsvarūpamapi yājamānaṃ saṃbhavati | ato 'ṅgaguṇavirodhanyā
( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 27 ) atratyāditi śeṣaḥ |yāttadapyādhvaryavameva | yajamānastu smārayiṣyati dvaṃdvatāmiti samākhyārthavattā || 20 ||

‘parivīrasi’ ‘yuvā suvāsāḥ’ ityetayoḥ karaṇakriyamāṇānuvādinoradhvaryuṇā hotrā ca yugapatprakṛtau prayuktayoḥ kuṇḍapāyināmayane hautrādhvaryavayorekakartṛkatvādaśakteravaśyāvaheye 'nyatarasminkataraḥ pratigṛhyatāmiti saṃdehaḥ | tatrāniyamaḥ prāpnoti | yadvā hotuḥ siddhasvarūpasyā ' 'dhvaryavavidhānādajahatsvadharmatayā hautra eva yukta iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | etasminvipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | kutaḥ | samavāyaviśeṣāt | kecidāhuḥ | pradhānapratyāsattiḥ samavāyaviśeṣa iti | bahiraṅgo hyārādupakārakarūpatvātkriyamāṇānuvādī, karaṇastvantaraṅga iti | tadakāraṇaṃ, yadi hi pradhānadvāreṇāṅgeṣu kartā 'vatarettataḥ saṃnikarṣaviprakarṣāvupayujyeyātām | sa tu samākhyayā codakena ca pradhāneṣvaṅgeṣu cāviṃśeṣeṇa lakṣyate | na ca kaścidaṅgaguṇaviro
a. 12 pā. 2 a. 9 ) atratya iti śeṣaḥ |dhanyāyaḥ | ubhayoraṅgatvāviśeṣāt | na ca saṃnipātitvena kriyāntaragatamārādupakāritvaṃ durbalī kriyate | na cāyamatīvā ' 'rādupakārakaḥ | kriyamāṇaparivyāṇasmṛtyavicchedena dṛṣṭasaṃskārajananāt | tasmādānumānikāddhautrasaṃbandhātpratyakṣatvenaivā ' 'dhvaryavasya samavāyasya viśeṣo bhavati | katham | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ | yaduta hotrādayaḥ śrutivṛttā adhvaryvādiśabdalakṣiteṣu karmasu vidhīyante | tatra hautrasaṃbandho hoturānumānika ādhvaryavasaṃbandhamtu pratyakṣaḥ | yattvajahatsvadharma eva hotā ' 'dhvaryaveṇa saṃbadhyata iti | saṃbadhyeta, yadi tatprayogamātrakṛtamevāsya hotṛtvaṃ bhavet, yadi vā hautraṃ pratyadhvaryurvidhīyeta, hotāraṃ voddiśyādhvaryukarmavidhirbhavet, na tu tatsarvamasti | hotā tāvadyogyatāmātreṇāvadhāritaḥ satyapi ca karmanimittatve 'nyāni sahastrāṇi tadupalakṣaṇaṃ kariṣyanti | na ca hautraṃ pratyadhvaryuvidhiriha, hotradhvaryuśabdayoratyantavibhinnapuruṣavacanayormukhyasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādanyatarasyāvaśyakalpanīye lakṣaṇā
vṛttatve virodhanimittatvāllakṣaṇākalpanāyāḥ prathamoccārite hotṛśabde kiṃcidapi kalpanābījaṃ na paśyāmaḥ | tena ‘mu( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 8 sū. 25 ) |khyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāt’ iti
taṃ—hotṛśabdamityarthaḥ |taṃ svārthavṛttameva gṛhītvā 'dhvaryuśabdaḥ karmalakṣaṇārtho 'dhyavasīyate | tatrāpi tadu
taduddiśyaadhvaryupadalakṣitādhvaryukāryamuddiiyetyarthaḥ |ddiśya hotā vidhīyate, taddhi kratvarthena prayojanavanna tathā kartā | pradhānaṃ caivaṃjātīyakeṣūddiśyate | tataśca guṇabhūto hotopādīyamāno yaḥ pradhānāvirodhī dharmastanmātrayukta eva saṃbadhyate | yadi tu hoturādhvaryavaṃ vidhīyeta tatastasya karmāviruddhaṃ tatpravartata iti na kiṃcidapi hautraṃ hāpayet | aprākṛtakartṛsaṃskāratvaprasaṅgāccā ' 'dhvaryavasya naivaṃ saṃbandha iti pakṣāntaramavalambitam | tasmādādhvaryavasaṃbandha eva pratyakṣaḥ pradhānaṃ ceti siddham | atra codayanti | naivātrānyatarasyāpi mantrasya hotṛsaṃbandho bādhitavyaḥ | kutaḥ |

karaṇasya hi ‘ma
( a. 12 pā. 3 a. 10 sū. 20 ) etatsūtrasthamadhyamāvayavaḥ |ntrāntena karmādisaṃnipātaḥ’ ityanena nyāyena prākparivyāṇātprayogaḥ | kriyamāṇānuvādinastu tasminkriyamāṇe | tena dvāvapi prayoktuṃ samartho hoteti | naitadasti | kriyamāṇatā nāma saṃkalpādeḥ kārakapracalanātprabhṛtyāsamāpteḥ | ataśca pūrvapadārthasamāptyaiva paryupasthāpitaṃ cetparivyāṇaṃ vartate sa eva dīrghaḥ samastaḥ kriyamāṇānuvādinaḥ kālaḥ | evamapi kāraṇasya tādṛśādeva prākprayogādavirodha iti yadyucyeta | tanna | na hi ‘parivīrasi’ ityayaṃ saṃkalpaṃ raśanādānaṃ saṃnihitaṃ vā yūpamavayavakriyāmātrapravṛttaṃ vā parivyāṇaṃ śaknoti prakāśayitum | tasmātpradhānakriyārambha eva yūpasamīpasthena prayoktavyaḥ | nanvevamapi dīrghakāle karmaṇyekadeśe karaṇamekadeśe ca kriyamāṇānuvādinaṃ prayuñjāno na virotsyate | kathaṃ na virudhyate | yadā ‘yūpāya parivīyamāṇāyānubrūhi’ ityanena pāṭhakramātkaraṇaḥ praiṣasāmarthyāccetaro yugapadeva prāpyate, na ca kriyaikadeśe kriyamāṇānuvādinaḥ prayoga ityasti pramāṇam | sa hi raśanādānānantaraṃ prayuktena praiṣeṇa prayojitaḥ dīrghatvādāparivyāṇasamāpteḥ kālamavaruṇaddhi | tadantakāle cā ' 'dhvaryava āpanno na kathaṃcidavirodhenāvatiṣṭhate | nanu ca yugapatkālatā bādhyatāmekakartṛtvaṃ veti varaṃ padārthaprāpterjaghanyatvātkāla eva bādhituṃ nāntaraṅgaḥ kartṛsaṃbandha iti | bhavedetadevaṃ, yadi
prākṛtakāla bādhamānau mantrau svakāryānna pracyaveyātām | tayostu ya eva kālāntare prayuktaḥ sa eva svasāmarthyapratipādyādarthātpracyavate | so 'yaṃ liṅgavirodha āpadyate | nanu ca ‘yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ’ ityanayā śru
śrutyā—sāmānādhikaraṇyātmikayā śrutyetyarthaḥ |tyā liṅgaṃ bādhyeta | bādhyeta, yadi śrutiḥ syāt | vākyaṃ tvidaṃ, tadapi lakṣaṇayā | na hyatra kasyacicchabdasya śravaṇādidaṃ gamyate hautrādhvaryave samānakartṛke iti | kiṃ tarhi | hotradhvaryuśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāt | sarvatra caiṣa saṃbandho vākyalakṣaṇa ityu
( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 6 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |ktam | tatrāpi cādhvaryuśabdasya karmalakṣaṇārthatvādviprakṛṣṭatā | nanu liṅgamapyetaccodakāpekṣiṃtvādviprakṛṣṭataraṃ bhavet | vākyaṃ hyarthaviprakarṣālliṅgena bādhyeta | sa ceha viparīto 'rthaviprakarṣaḥ | na hiṃ codakenāprāptayormantrayorekakālaprayojyatvaṃ gamyate | tasmādekakartṛtvameva balīya iti | ucyate | satyamiha codakāṅgīkaraṇaṃ, tattu mantrasvarūpe na liṅge | dvayorapi ca tadaviśiṣṭaṃ, prāpte tu mantradvaye liṅgamaupadeśikenāviśiṣṭam | syādetadevaṃ yadi codakaḥ prāpayet | sa tu pratyakṣavākyaśiṣṭasamānakartṛtvavirodhimantradvayaṃ prāpayitumeva na śakṣyati | yadyapi hi vākyaṃ liṅgasya neṣṭe, codakasya tu svarūpaprāpaṇe paścādbhāvinamapi virodhamālocya śaktaṃ nirodhaṃ kartum | tataśchinnamūlatvālliṅgasya durbalateti | ucyate | sarvaṃ hi virodhavelāyāṃ bādhyate | na cānavagato virodho bādhakāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati | tadiha codakaprāptivelāyāṃ na kaścidapi virodho lakṣyate | yastu prāpte virodhastatra liṅgaṃ balavattaramityuktameva | yadi cātra dvayorapi samānakartṛtvaṃ vākyena vidhīyeta tato 'pyetasya balīyastvamudbhāvyeta | iha tvādhvaryavasya hotrā saha saṃbandho vidhīyate| na hautrasyāpi | sa hi codakena prāpnoti | tena yadi pratyakṣatvādetasya bādhakatvaṃ tataḥ samākhyākṛtameva kriyamāṇānuvādino hotṛsaṃbandhabādhanam | evaṃ ca sati liṅgavākyayoravirodhānna kiṃcidapi bādhiṣyate | ādhvaryavaprayogaśca setsyati | yathā tu liṅgabalīyastvamāśritamāsīttathā 'nyadevāniṣṭamāpadyeta | yo hyasya vākyasya viṣayaḥ sa bādhyeta | na cāsya hotṛhautrasaṃbandho viṣayaḥ | kastarhi | hotrādhvaryavasaṃbandhaḥ | tataśca
yathāprakṛtyeva prayogaḥ syāt | tasmātsamākhyākḷptamevā ' 'tideśikaṃ saṃbandhaṃ bādhitvā samavāyaviśeṣātkaraṇaḥ prayoktavya iti siddha
ādhvaryave karaṇamantre hotrā kriyamāṇe tadviruddhaṃ kriyamāṇānuvādinaṃ kaḥ prayuñjīyāditi śaṅkāyāṃ hotṛpuruṣeṣu ya eva kaścanāntaraṅgo 'rdhyādiḥ, tasya vā kāryāntaravyāpṛtatve bahiraṅgo vā tṛtīyādiḥ prayuñjīyādityebaṃ samādhānārthasya ‘itaramanyasteṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt’ ityuttarasūtrāvayavasya vyākhyārthaṃ ‘atha hautraṃ viruddhaṃ kaḥ kuryāt’ ityādibhāṣyaṃ bārtikakārairupekṣitam | tadupekṣānidīnaṃ tu kuṇḍapāyināmayane hotṛpuruṣāṇāṃ maitrāvaruṇācchāvākagrāvastunnāmakānāṃ trayāṇāmapi vacanātkāryāntaravyāpṛtatvena tādṛśapuruṣābhāvātprakṛtodāharaṇānupayogarūpaṃ draṣṭavyam |m || 21 ||

praiṣasya praiṣārthasya cā ' 'dhvaryavasamākhyātulyatvādadhvaryuprayojyatve 'vadhārite kathamātmanaḥ praiṣa iti cedāha—naivāyaṃ praiṣaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | prāptakālatāyāṃ loṭaṃ vakṣyāma iti | praiṣavādī tvāha—pratyagātmaviṣayā cetprāptakālatā vivakṣitā hantottamapuruṣeṇa bhavitavyam | na hi paraviṣayayuṣmadarthamantareṇa madhyamapuruṣo labhyate | praiṣe tu svabhāvataḥ paraviṣayatvātsulabha iti | parastvāha—yadā samākhyāvagatātsamānakartṛtvātpraiṣabuddhirapanītā tadā prāptakālatvamabhidhīyamānaṃ kiṃ kriyāṇāmabhidhīyatāmuta kartṝṇāmiti kriyāṇāmityeva gamyate | tā hi coditatvātprayojanavatyaḥ prathamataraṃ pratītāḥ | tāsāṃ cānuṣṭhānārthaṃ prāptakālatvasmaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭārtham | kartṛprāptakālaprakāśane tu sarvaṃ viparītam | ākhyāteṣu ca prathamādeḥ puruṣasya kasyacidavaśyaṃbhāvitvānnāntarīyakakṛta eva madhyamapuruṣo bhaviṣyati | kriyaiva cocyate tava prāptakāla iti | yadi ca kartuḥ prāptakālatvamucyeta tataḥ kiṃ kartumiti sākāṅkṣameva syāt, atha prokṣaṇyāsādanādi kartumi
itīti—adhyāhriyata iti śeṣapūraṇam |ti, tathā viśiṣṭārthapreṣa
ṇādvāṃkyabhe
vākyabheda iti—kartṛkriyābiśiṣṭākālaprāptatvoktyā gauravalakṣaṇavākyabhedaḥ syādityarthaḥ |daḥ syāt | tasmādapi kriyāyāḥ prāptakālatvaṃ prakāśyate | athāpi praiṣo 'yamāśrīyate tathā 'pyātmānameva kathaṃciccharīraśarīriṇoravasthāntarāṇāṃ vā bhedena preṣakaṃ preṣyaṃ ca vyapadekṣyatīti samānakartṛkatve prāpte, brūmaḥ | praiṣeṣu cetaramanyaḥ kuryāditi saṃbandhaḥ | kutaḥ | svabhāvetaiva teṣāṃ paraviṣayatvātparikrayavat | yattu naivāyaṃ praiṣa iti | tadayuktam | mantrarūpādeva praiṣapratyayotpatteḥ | yo hi samānakartṛkatayā taṃ bādhate tena samākhyayā liṅgaḥ bādhitaṃ syāt | na ca prāptakālatayā liṅgavirodhaḥ parihriyate | madhyamapuruṣārthasyāsaṃpādanāt | na ca śabdāntareṇānupāttā kriyaivaṃ śakyate vaktuṃ tava prāptaḥ kāla iti | yadyapi ca śakyate tathā 'pi na dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidarthaḥ syāt, cetanaviṣayatvādīdṛśasya prayogasya | tathā ' 'tmabhedaparikalpanāyāmapi naiba dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ, gauṇatā 'tra sthitaiva | mukhyaṃ ca kāryaṃ mantrāṇāmityavadhā
( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 1 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |ritam | tataśca yadyapi prāptakālatāyāmeva loṭ, tathā 'pi parasyaiva sā kathyata iti na parādhikāro nivartate | na ca vākyabhedo viśiṣṭārthapreṣaṇāt, avaśyaṃ cātra viśiṣṭatā 'bhyupagantavyā, prokṣaṇīpadopādānāt | na caikapadopātto 'neko 'rtho vākyaṃ minatti | sarvākhyāteṣu kriyākartṛsaṃkhyopagrahapuruṣaviśeṣabhāvanānāṃ yugapadupādānasyāparihāryatvāt | na cedṛśaṃ viśiṣṭavidhānaṃ kvacinnābhyupagantavyam | prāptakālatve ca kriyāyuṣmadarthayoḥ pṛthaktvādbhedena śaktiḥ kalpyeta | praiṣe tu tasya nityameva yuṣmadarthaviṣayatvānmadhyamapuruṣo 'nuvādaḥ | evaṃ caiṣā
eṣā samākhyā—praiṣasamākhyetyarthaḥ | samākhyā 'nugṛhyate | tasmālliṅgena samākhyābādhādanyaḥ praiṣo 'nyaśca praiṣārtha iti || 22 ||

‘yadanvañcaṃ dhārayedvajreṇādhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvīta’ vajro 'dhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvīteti vā pāṭhaḥ | sphyasya dhāraṇaṃ tāvadagnīdha ekāntena | sa cādhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvīteti vadannagnīdhaṃ sphyavantaṃ preṣakaṃ darśayati | kā tvasya prāptiḥ | ucyate | ‘a( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 9 sū. 27 ) |ṅgaguṇevirodhe ca tādarthyāt’ ityanenāṅgatvātpraiṣasya kartṛlopo yukto na pradhānasya | baṃhavaṃśca praiṣārthā eko nigadaḥ | tena ‘bhū( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 7 sū. 24 ) etaḥsūtrāvayavaḥyasāṃ syātsadharmatvam’ ityapi praiṣārthe 'dhvaryuriti pariśeṣātpraiṣe 'gnīta || 23 ||

‘mu( a. 12 pā. 2 a. 8 sū. 25 ) |khyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāt’ iti prāthamyātpraiṣe samākhyātaḥ kartā yuktaḥ | na hi tadānīṃ virodhaḥ kaścidasti | tasmiṃstu prayukte virodhātpraiṣārthe 'nyo bhavati | prayojakasya ca prayojyavyāpāre 'pi kartṛtvaṃ na vihanyata ityubhayānugrahaḥ | itarayā hi praiṣe 'tyantabādha eva syāt | na hi sa tena kṛto nāpi kārito bhavet | tasmādadhvaryupreṣito 'gnītkuryāditi | ‘vajreṇādhvaryum’ iti cā ' 'gnīdhrameva tatkāryāpatterabhidhāsyati || 24 ||

yathaivākaraṇeṣu yatphalaṃ tatprakaraṇasthaṃ kīrtyate nānyatkalpyate tathā ‘mamāgne varco vihaveṣvastu’ ityādiṣvapi | te tu yajamānenaiva prayujyante tasyaiva ca phalamityaviruddhāḥ | karaṇāḥ punarekāntena karmasamānakartṛkatvādādhvaryavāḥ | tairyadyadhvaryuṇā prayujyamānairyajamānasya phalamabhidhīyeta tato mametyabhidhānaṃ virudhyeta | kīdṛśaṃ tvadhvarthoḥ phalamanūdyata iti, tadbhāvabhāvitvamātreṇa supracaritṛtvayaśaḥ | tacca tasyotsāhaṃ kariṣyatīti nirūpayati || 25 ||

naivedamaka
akaraṇavaditi—‘āyurdā agne’ ‘aganma suvaḥ suvaraganma’ ityādayo ye, itikaraṇādyaviniyuktā mantrāstadvadityarthaḥ |raṇavadutsāhārthaṃ phalaṃ saṃkīrtyate | kiṃ tarhi | mantravarṇānnityāṅgāśrayaṃ phalamavakalpate | katham | vya
vyatirikteti—svaśaktyā prakāśyārthavyatiriktāgnyanvādhānākhyakriyāsādhanatvenetyarthaḥ |tiriktakriyāsādhanatvena hi mantraścoditastāṃ vā tatsaṃbandhi vā kiṃcitprakāśayannaṅgabhāvaṃ gacchati | tasmādiha yadyadhvaryuyaśaḥ saṃkīrtyate naitena sakalena mantreṇāgnyanvādhānaṃ sādhitaṃ syāt | na hi tatprakāśanamagnyanvādhānenā
pekṣitam | yadyapi tāvatpradhānaphalaṃ prakāśayettathā 'pi na saṃbadhyeta kimuta karmakālānaupayikānuniṣpādibāhyaṛtvigyaśaḥprakāśanena | tasmātsūktavākanyā
( a. 3 pā. 2 a. 5 ) atratyeneti śeṣaḥ |yenaiva coditamantrakaraṇatvānyathānupapattyā 'gnyanvādhānasya phalametatkalpyate | yāstvāśiṣastāḥ sākṣātpradhānāṅgamiti tatphalaprakāśanenaivāṅgaṃ bhavanti | yadi pṛthakphalaṃ sādhayeyustataḥ saṃyu
saṃyuktatvāditi-'asaṃyuktaṃ prakaraṇāditikartavyatārthitvāt’ iti prakaraṇādhikaraṇoktanyāyena liṅgādiviniyukteṣu prakaraṇīvaniyojyatvāsaṃbhavādityāśayaḥ |ktatvānnaiva prakaraṇena kratvaṅgabhāvaṃ gaccheyuriti vaiṣamyam | āha | satyapi pṛthakphalatve mamaśabdenādhvaryurgṛhyata iti vyapadeśa
( a. 3 pā. 8 a 5 sū. 14 ) atratyeneti śeṣaḥ |nyāyenā ' 'dhvaryavameva prāpnoti | ucyate | liṅgenā ' 'dhvaryavatvaṃ prāpnotyātmanepadaśrutyā yājamānatvam | athobhayānugrahārthaṃ karamātkarmāpi yājamānameva na bhavati | tathā sati hi mamaśabda ātmanepadaṃ cobhayamapi na virotsyata iti | naitadasti | yadi hyetanmantrapūrvakaṃ karma bhavettata evaṃ niyamyeta | prathamaṃ tvetadutpadyamānaṃ kevalakratvarthatvapratīteraviruddhādhvaryusaṃbandhaṃ samākhyānātpratipadyate | mantramātraṃ yājamānamiti cenna | karmaṇā ' 'kṛṣyamāṇasya tatsamānakartṛkatvaniyamāt | phalamapi tarhyākṛṣyeta | ākṛṣyeta, yadyātmanepadena na pratibadhyeta | tatrā ' 'tmanepadasya bādhāsaṃbhavādgauṇatvaprakārānupapatteśca mantragata eva mamaśabdo 'dhyāhāreṇa vā pūryate gauṇo vā bhavati, madīyasya yajamānasya madrūpasyaiva vā yajamānasya varco vihaveṣvastviti | tasmādyajamānaphalametaditi | ye
ye ca—kalpasūtrakārā ityarthaḥ | ca yajamānakartṛkamevāgnyanvādhānaṃ pakṣe vadanti teṣāmita eva mantravarṇādbhrāntiḥ | atha tu kiṃcidvacanamupanyasyanti tathā 'pi kiṃ karmavikalpavatphalamadhvaryuyajamānayorvikalpate kiṃ vā phalaṃ nityameva yājamānamiti vicāraḥ || 26 ||
sarvāśiṣāmṛtvikprayojyānāṃ yajamānasaṃbandhānuvāda evamavakalpiṣyate || 27 ||
yattvasaṃtāpādi phalaṃ karmaprayoga evopayujyate tadyajamānenāpi tatheṣyata eveti nā ' 'tmanepadena virudhyate || 28 ||

‘vyapadeśā
( a. 3 pā. 8 a. 5 sū. 14 ) atratyanyāyena paunaruktyaṃ tāvatpariharati—vyapadeśādityadinā |ditareṣām’ ityatra brāhmaṇagatamudāhṛtamiha tu prastāvavaśena mantragatam | taddhi kleśena kalpyamānaṃ kadācidubhayorna śakyate kalpayitumityāśaṅkā syāt | kalpanāhetustu yugapatpravṛtteraviśiṣṭa iti na kiṃcidgauravam | atha kasmānnobhāveva prayuñjāte | yadaikenāpi prayujyamānaḥ śaknotyevobhayagāmi phalaṃ prakāśamituṃ tadā siddhe 'rthe na kiṃcidubhayakartṛkatvena prayojanamastītyadhvaryuniyamaḥ || 29 ||

gataḥ samākhyāvirodhāvirodhaviṣayaḥ | sarvaśca śrutyādivirodhāvirodhavicāraḥ prakṛtāviva vikṛtiṣvapi draṣṭavyaḥ | yattu dharmāṇāṃ sāmānavidhyamaṅgapradhāneṣu pū
( a.3 pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 2 ) ityatreti śeṣaḥ |rvoktaṃ tadvikṛtiṣu kathamiti vicāre prāpte sūtrametat | śakyaṃ
evaṃ tāvadyathābhāṣyaṃ sūtraṃ prāptisūtratayā vyākhyāyādhunottarādhikaraṇaṃpūrvapakṣaparatayā 'pi yojayati—śakyamityādinā | tu pūrvapakṣe 'pyetatsamarthāyituṃ yasmātpravṛtau barhirādisaṃskāraḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ tasmādvikṛtāvapi tathaiva syāditi || 30 ||

yaṃ
‘ye ca pradhānasya’ ityādi siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ tātparyato vyācaṣṭe-yadyayamityādinā |dyayamaṅgopadeśa evānuṣaṅgarūpeṇa sādhāraṇaḥ syāt, yadi ca śāstrāṇyatidiśyeraṃstataḥ śāstrārthaḥ prakṛtivadvikṛtiṣvapi kalpyamānaḥ sarvārthatvenāvadhāryate kāryaprāptipuraḥsarastu
dharmātideśa i
iṣṭa iti—saptamādye prakṛtivikṛtisādhāraṇyanirāsena, daśamādye ca kāryaprāptipuraḥsaramatideśo 'bhipreta ityarthaḥ |ṣṭaḥ | tatra yāgagatena vyāpāreṇa gṛhītenā ' 'tmasiddhayarthaṃ niyamādṛṣṭadvārabhūtāni dṛṣṭānyadṛṣṭāni ca prayojanāni gṛhyante | tāni ca nirjñātaparimāṇānyeva prāpnuvanti | taiścā ' 'tmasiddhayarthaṃ padārthāḥ prāpyamāṇāḥ svātmaniyatā eva prāpyante | na ca yūpāvaṭāstaraṇaṃ nāma barhiṣaḥ kāryaṃ prakṛtau vijñātaṃ, yena barhistaddharmā vā gṛhyeran | yaistu vedistaraṇādibhirgṛhyante na teṣāṃ yūpāvaṭastaraṇamantareṇa kiṃcinnopapadyata iti na tadarthaṃ prāpyante | tasmādihāpūrvasyānadhikāra iti | pradhā
pradhānaṃ hītyanena śāstrātideśaḥ, api cetyanenopadeśasya prakṛtivikṛtisādhāraṇyaṃ ca niraṃstata itvevaṃ bhāṣyamavayavaśo vyākhyāsyāti—pradhānaṃ hītyādinā |naṃ hi codako 'pekṣata ityādinā, apinā sādhāraṇyaṃ śāstrā
śāstrātideśa ityārabhya sthita evetyanto grantho kāśīmudritapustake 'nupalabhyamāno 'pi vyākhyānādyavalambanena sthāpitaḥ |tideśo netyetannirākaroti | śāstrāpekṣāyāṃ hi sarvamabhinavaṃ prakṛtivatpunaḥ kalpayitavyaṃ syāt | dūrasthasaṃbandhādikleśaśca sthita eva | śāstrātideśātsāmānavidhyācca, paśudharmāṇāṃ madhye 'gnīṣomasaṃskārārthaḥ paśupuroḍāśo devatāntare na prāpnoti | tasyohasya ca darśanaṃ virudhyeta | tasmādupakārātideśa iti || 31 ||

idānīṃ prakṛtāvapi nātīva sarvārthatetyetatsādhayati | yathālūnasya barhiṣastridhātu pañcadhātu veti sakalasya staraṇavidhānādaśakyo 'nyaviniyoga iti sāmānyabhūto vidhṛtipavitrārtho darbhavidhiranyo draṣṭavyaḥ | dhāturiti stara
staraṇacaya iti—staraṇārthabarhirmuṣṭayavayava ityarthaḥ |ṇacayo 'bhidhīyate || 32 ||

puroḍāśadhānādīnāṃ savanīyayāgārthatvātpūrveṇaiva nyāyena graha
grahaṇe’ iti pā. |ṇaśrayaṇārthamanye puroḍāśaśakalādaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | ‘ekadeśa( a. 4 pā. 1 a. 13 sū. 28 ) |dravyaṃ ca’ ityenenāprayojakalakṣaṇāpatteranyasya ca śakalasyābhāvādvdyavadānamātre ca hute śeṣasya pratipādyamānasya dṛṣṭārthatvād
dvitīyānirdeśānugrahānna kaścidvirodho dṛśyate | tasmādatra prakṛtopādānam || 33 ||
yatra yatra sthitamupāṃśutvaṃ kāmyānāmiṣṭīnāmupakartuṃ śaknoti tatra tatra kartavyam || 34 ||

kecidāhurasya pratyakṣatvena prathamataraṃ prāpteścodakagrāhyāṇyaṅgāni na tāvatprāpnuvantītyacoditatvam | na tvetatsaṃbhavati | sarvatra codakasya prathamataraṃ pravṛtteḥ | tasmādayamarthaḥ | prakṛtau hi prakaraṇātpradhānārthatve prāpte vākyātsarvārthatvam | iha tu vākyameva viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ, kāmyā iti vacanāt | na hyaṅgāni kāmasaṃbaddhāni tasmānna teṣāmeva dharmaścodita iti || 35 ||

‘dṛtina
dṛtinavanītabhājyamiti—carmabhāṇḍasthitanavanītaprakṛtikamājyamityarthaḥ |vanītamājyam’ iti prakaraṇe viśiṣṭavidhānātsomo bādhiṣyata iti manyate | yatastvanekārthavidhyasaṃbhavādājyamanūdya viśeṣamātraṃ vidhīyate | na ca pradhānasyā ' 'jyaprāptiḥ | tasmāt ‘ānarthakyā( a. 3 pā. 1 a. 9 sū. 18 ) |ttadaṅgeṣu’ ityeva siddham || 36 ||
avaśyaṃ śyenopakāri yadājyamiti vaktavyam | tataśca pavamānahavirājyamapi śyenopakārīti dṛtinavanītaṃ syāt || 37 ||
na hyupakāritvamātreṇa saṃbandhaḥ | kiṃ tarhi | adhikārātprakṛtasyopakāriṇaḥ, prākaraṇikaṃ codakena saṃnihitaṃ na pavamāneṣṭigatamiti vyavasthā || 38 ||

saṃnidhiviśeṣātsāmānyato dṛṣṭācca tatkālānāṃ liṅgadarśanena dṛṣṭāntaṃ sādhayati | paśusāhityaṃ hyetadīyo dharmaḥ sutyākālo dṛṣṭo 'gnīṣobhīyānubandhyāsthānayoranyenānugrahavacanāt | tasmādayamapyetaddharmatvātsutyākāla iti || 39 ||
taduktaṃ ‘sarve( a. 3 pā. 7 a. 1 sū. 2 ) |ṣāṃ vā śeṣatvasyātatprayuktatvāt’ iti || 40 ||

nyāyagamye liṅgamīdṛśaṃ sādhakaṃ bhavati | āgamagamyastvayam | na ca sahā ' 'lambhasyaitaddharbhatvātsutyākālatā | kiṃ tarhi | anyata eva nyāyāt | na cāsau dṛtinavanīte saṃbhavati | taṃ nyāyaṃ darśayati | evaṃ vacanavarjito yaḥ kramaḥsaṃnikarṣalakṣaṇo 'numeyaśrutyarthaḥ so 'nugrahīṣyata iti | savanīyakāle hyālabhyamāneṣu na kasyacitpaśoḥ kā
kālamatikramyeteti—pradhānakālamityarthaḥ | ayamāśayaḥ | jyotiṣṭome, bhinnakālānuṣṭheyānāṃ trayāṇāmagrīṣomīyasavanīyānūbandhyānāṃ paśūnāṃ jyotiṣṭomavikārabhūte śyenayāge 'tidiṣṭānāṃ sāhityaṃ śrūyate ‘saha paśūnālabhate’ iti | tacca sāhityaṃ kasmindeśa ityapekṣāyāṃ yatraivānuṣṭhāne pradhānabhūtasomayāgapratyāsattiḥ, trayāṇāṃ paśuyāgānāṃ saṃbhavati | savanīyasyaiva tu sutyākālīnatvena tatraiva labhyate | evaṃ savanīyasthāna eva pūrvottarayoranuṣṭhāne dvayorapyagnīṣomīyānūbandhyayoḥ svasthānātikramamātreṇa tulyakālotkarṣo 'pakarṣaśca bhavataḥ | itarathā, anūbandhyāsthāne—avabhṛthānte, savanīyāgnīṣomīyayoranuṣṭhāne, savanīyasya svasthānātikramamātraṃ, agnīṣomīyasya tu svasthānātikramaḥ savanīyasyānātikramaśca | evamagnīṣomīyasthāne—aupavasathye 'hani, savanīyānūbandhyayoranuṣṭhāne, savanīyasya svasthānātikramamātraṃ, anūbandhyāyāstu sthānadvayātikramaśca prasajyeta | ataśca pradhānapratyāsattisthānātikramasābhyābhyāṃ savanīyasthāna eva trayāṇāmanuṣṭhānamiti nyāyata eva sidhyatīti |lama
tikramyeta | na ca dviguṇo 'dhvā bhavati | itarathā dvayamapi syāt | tasmādupapannaṃ darśanam || 41 ||

puroḍāśaśabdasya dhānādiṣvasamarthatvātsarvapuroḍāśaviṣayatvaṃ satyapi savanīyatve viśeṣṭumaśakyatvāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate | savanīyaśabdasyāpramādapāṭhātpuroḍāśaśabdaṃ liṅgasa
liṅgamavāyaḥ—alpatvam | dhānāḥ karambhaḥ parivāpaḥ puroḍāśaḥ, payasyeti pañca savanīyāni haviṃṣi | teṣu puroḍāśasyaikatvādalpavākhyagauṇīvṛttinimittena puroḍāśaśabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ |mavāyādgauṇaṃ kṛtvā dhānādīnāmapi grahaṇamiti || 42 ||
atyantabhinnatvāddravyāntareṣūpacāro na yukto yadi vā savanīyaśabdasyāpyavayutyānuvādena bhavatviti || 43 ||

‘puro
gauṇaṃ lākṣaṇikaṃ vā 'pi vākyabhedena vā svayam | vedo yamāśrayatyarthaṃ ko nu taṃ pratikūlayet iti nyāyena puroḍāśaśabdasyaiva gauṇatvaucityaṃ sūcayan siddhāntamāha—puroḍāśānityādinā |ḍāśānalaṃkuru’ iti prakṛtau dhānādiṣu lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭā na tu savanīyaśabdasyāsavanīyeṣu pravṛttiḥ | sāhityācca śakyate tena lakṣayituṃ netareṇa | na hyasavanīyasya puroḍāśasya dhānādibhiḥ saha saṃbandho 'sti | tasmāddhānādīnāṃ sthāne tarasā iti siddham |

div.trailer: iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike tṛtīyādhyāyasyāṣṭamaḥ pādaḥ |
